 
Eizooba eryakuratsireho, Maria akashaba orusa owa Mukuru w’eishomero. Enshonga ei yaahaire n’okuza kugura ebitabo by’Ebihimbo. Akatemba ka pikipiki shaaha nka ina z’akasheeshe nikwo kworekyerera ogwa Ncwanga eya Ishaka. Omu ruguuto, ebiiruka bikaba nibirigita. Obwire obwo, butandu z’ahanguuto zikaba zikizire kukanyisibwa abavugi ba zaapikipiki manya gukaba gwija niguba omuhango. Buri mutsigazi owaabaire aruga ati omu ishomero, azakuvuga pikipiki ngu aihemu esente. Abavugi baamotoka bagira amashomero g’okwegyeramu okuzivuga kwonka bo aba za pikipiki tibagagira. N’ahabw’ekyo, kikaba kyorobi kuza omukuvuga pikipiki okukira okuza omu murimo gw’okuvuga emotoka. Manya n’emotoka zigura omukunkuma gw’empiiha waagyeragyeranisa na zaapikipiki.
Pikipiki zikaija zaatandika nakuvugwa abatsigazi abaabaire bashomire baitu okutunga emirimo kubabeereire enkuuku-mbitsi. Baingi bakaba nibaikiriza ngu omurimo gw’okuvuga pikipiki ogu baingi baabaire nibamanya nka boodabooda gukaba gurimu sente. Abaabaire bakoresa amaani bakeehara okutuntumuurira sente omu bakazi hamwe n’omukugura amaarwa n’ebindi bitokooza-bwonko buzima bakaba baihamu sente, bombeka n’amaju.
Omu dakiika nka ikumi bakaba baahikire Ncwanga. Manya kuruga Bweranyangi kugaruka Ishaka bakaba nibavugira aha ruguuto nyiigyendwa orwa Mbarara-Kaseese. Omutsigazi owaabaire naavuga akaba nairukanga nk’owaaheza kwiba pikipiki. Abantu abu yaabaire arabaho basigara nibareeba ekiraabeho omu maisho. Ku baabaire bahika aha zaahampu epiki eguruka ehika owa nyakacu reero nyamwishiki omutima gumugwa omunda. Embeho ku yaabaire nyamwingi, nyamuvugi wa piki, yaamutiiza jaketi ye. Jaketi egi ekaba eine eiriho. Nikireebeka ekaba emazire ameezi nk’abiri etarikureeba g’ah’eiziba. Nyamwishiki akahurira neenuukamu etaabe hamwe n’ebindi bintu bi atareetegyereize. Ku yaakozire omunshaho y’egyo jaketi, yaashanga harimu omushamata gw’amababi agaabaire gari omu kapapura karikwiragura sirisiri. Uwe nyamwishiki akamanya ngu nink’amajaani nikwo kugagaruza omunshaho. Baitu muntu uwe aga gakaba gari amairungi. N’obu avuga nk’orikuza geehena, akaba weena asinzire. Amaisho ge gakaba nigatukura nk’agu baashukamu eshagama kandi ebigambo ebimwe bikaba bitashohora kurungi omu kanwa.
Maria ku yaareebire yaahika Ncwanga, nikwo kuteera ekiruhuuko okashusha oti yaija ayegwire pikipiki. Manya akateera ekiruhuuko boona abaabaire bariho baagamuhanga. Obu aija omu muhanda akaba naateekateeka aha mukundwa we. Akaija naashabira aha mutima obwo arikweshengyereza Nyamuhanga Ow’obushoboorozi bwona kwohereza omukono gwe ogw’embabazi gukaba nigwo gwakiza omukundwa we. Maria akaba ari omwishiki arikumanya kushaba.  N’obu yaabaire aine byona baitu akaba ashabira abaabaire baine oburemeezi. Akaba akira kushoma evangiri aha kereziya ya Kabingo. Hoona nabwo akaba akira n’okweshongora omu iramizo niryo rimwe. N’ahabw’ekyo eby’okushaba bikaba bitamuri hangahari.
Ku yaabaire yaimusya ati amaisho, yaareeba Mangyeri. Nyamukazi akaba yaashohora aheeru kugura obushera. Amaisho ge goona gakaba nigatukura ahabw’okuraara aha kiro. Weena akaba ari omwera ahakuba ebiro bibiri ebi yaabaire yaamara Ncwanga akaba atahereerukire kajuta. Ku yaareebire Maria yaamanya ngu aizire kureeba Daudi. Eki kikashemeza nyamukaikuru ahakuba akamanya ngu nyamwishiki naakunda omutabani – manya owaawe omu buremeezi niwe waawe buzima.
Mangyeri akatwara Maria omu kishengye ahu Daudi yaabaire ari. Omu kashengye ako hakaba harimu abandi barwaire bashatu baitu okwiha baabareeta embeera zaabo zikaba nizeeyongyera kwerarikiiriza abarwarisa baabo. Babiri bakaba bari abavugi ba boodabooda abu baatomiire kandi ondi akaba agwire omu bambuzi abaamutemire bakamuhutaaza bakasigaho kaingana-busha. Nyamushaija bakaba bamutemeire Nyarutuntu ogundi mwanya ogu ababisha baabaire bakira kutakiza abantu. Ogwo mwanya gukaba guri haihi n’etauni ya Ishaka. Ogwo mushaija akaba ari omushuubuzi w’enkaito omuri Ishaka. Akagwa omu bambuzi ahakya makumi abiri na munaana eizooba niryo rimwe obu Daudi yaibwaho sente ze zoona ez’omushaara. Ekishengye kikaba kiboogire abashuubuzi ba Ishaka abaabaire baizire kureeba mutaahi waabo ou baabaire beeta Kashaija. Kashaija akaba ari omutsigazi w’emyaka nka makubi abiri na mukaaga baitu akaba ataine mukazi. Akaba naazarwa omu kyaro kya Matimba. 
Kashaija niwe yaabaire naakirayo okusesya. Akaba agaaniirira abantu abaabaire baija kugura enkaito reero n’obundi bakyenda kugura enkaito baija aha duuka ye. Obumwe omuntu akaba aija ataine kiteekateeko ky’okugura kwonka ahabw’akarimi karungi ka Kashaija ahendera ashemburiire enkaito. Empangare n’abakazi nibo baabaire bakirayo kuba ba kasitoma be. Aba bakaba bakira kumuganzya bagumize ngu agwire aha mahega. Bakaba bakira kumubuuza, “Baitu kashaija oshwera ryari. Kanooshusha oti emyaka yaija neekugyendaho?”
Abandi bakaba bamubuuza, “Tugire ngu okaburwa omukazi w’okushwera, ente z’okujuga nainga tugire ngu baa ekakuribata?”
“Bantumwe ka nibagira ngu amaka tigoorobi. Abaine abakazi kanibarira ngu bababeereire enkuuku mbisi. Abakazi nabo nibarira ngu abashaija babaremire”
Abamwe bakaba bamwijutsya ngu tookaatiina kubyama ngu otakaaroota n’obu waakuba orugire kutunga ekirooto kirikutiinisa. Nawe akaba abagarukamu n’ekibuuzo, “Baitu imwe, ngu engozi ya muha teheeka oti ekaheeka nyakufa? Iwe toyebuuza ekyamwitsire? Ngu amaka n’oburiite, oti oshwera ryari Kashaija?”
Abaishiki bamwe bakagyezaho kumurigira baitu we yaabeeshumba. Bakaba baija kumutaayaayira aha duuka hamwe n’omunju ye eya Matimba. Abamwe bakaba bataaha obwire bwagyenzire bareeba rw’ekyojo atabariho. Abaishiki baingi bakaba nibamanya ngu n’ekifa-bigyere baitu hoona nabwo bakaba nibamukunda. Omu bantu abaayeshukire omu irwariro kumureeba abaingi bakaba bari abakazi n’abaishiki. 
Abeegyesa b’eishomero rya Mushana bakaba baarugaho bati kureeba Daudi. Bakasiga baaheereza nyina sente z’okumuhwera reero baaraba Kabingo kugambira ishe oku yaabaire yaija naateguukayo. Manya akaba yaatandika kwija naatabuukayo. Akaba naabasa kumanya omuntu kandi n’okugamba akaba yaija naagambamu. Ku yaareebire Maria, yaamwenyaho kakye, nyamwishiki waitu bambe yaayatika yaarira amashemererwa ga rukundo. Akamanya ngu Daudi oru naabaasa kurukira. Daudi akamwebaza ahabw’okwija kumureeba hamwe n’ahabw’okumukunda. Maria akakwata emitwaro ikumi ya Uganda yaagisigira Daudi ngu ebe neemuhwera. Akeebaza Mangyeri ahabw’okureeberera Daudi kandi yaabatengyera okurahuka kukira hamwe n’okugira obusingye.
Maria ku yaabaire naashohora aha geeti y’eirwariro omwe aha bakozi b’ishe yaamureeba. Abakozi ba Fabiano boona bakaba baragiirwe okurinda n’okureebuuza Maria kumanya ahu yaatamburira, ou yaatambura nawe, eki yaakora n’ou yaakikora nawe. Eryo izooba Badaada akaba atagiire kureebuuza n’okurega Maria. Mukama we akaba amutumire kugura omubazi gw’ente omu tauni. Uwe Maria tarareebire Badaada ahakuba akaba naakoma nibiragara agyendereire kugaruka ah’eishomero omu bwire. Manya mukuru w’eishomero akaba amuhaire eshaaha ibiri zonka kuba yaagarukire. Bamwe omu baishiki b’amashomero bakira kugira omuze gw’okushaba ensa reero bakaza kukora emicwe mibi. Abamwe bakaba babeiha ngu haine ebi barikwenda kugura omu tauni reero bagyenda kubugana abashaija baabo. N’obu ogu mucwe gwabaire gutakira kukanya omuri Bweranyangi baitu gukaba guriyo. Nangwa n’omu mashomero agandi ogu omuze gukaba gubereire abeegyesa amaino-ga-ruguru.
Maria akairuka yaacwekanisa oruguuto, ahaihi n’omu itundiro ry’ebitabo erya Tushome. Akagura ebitabo jubajuba nikwo kukwata pikipiki ekamugaruza Bweranyangi. Akaribata omu ishomero harikuburayo edakiika mukaaga kuba shaaha mukaaga nikwo kuza owa mukuru w’eishomero akamumanyisa ku yaagarukire kandi ku ekyaba kimutwire nakyo yaakibona.
Badaada akaba naakyetegyereza ngu mukama we ku yaakumanya ngu yaareeba Miria reero akabura kumugambira, ebye bikaba nibibaasa kuba ebindi. Ku yaagarukire omuka nikwo kugambira Fabiano. Nyamutungi ekiniga kikaba nikyenda kumubarura. Weena akatuumatuuma waashusha oti arihaihi kubaruka. Akatandika kutonganisa omukazi we Jovinta Kendagaano ou yaateereire esimu, ngu manya omwana mubi ajumisa nyina kandi maawe ngu n’okushusha ashusha nyina.
Fabiano akavuga emotoka obwo ekiniga kirikwenda kumushatura. Ku yaahikire omu ofiisi ya mukuru w’eishomero, baamushaba ku ategyerezaho kakye ahakuba mukuru w’eishomero akaba yaaza omu kibiina kwegyesa. Bakamumwetera reero mpaho baataaha omu ofiisi baagaaniira. Mukuru w’eishomero akagambira Fabiano ku Maria yaagyenda  akagaruka omu bwire kandi hoona ku yaaba aine n’orusa kuza omu tauni kugura ebitabo by’Ebihimbo ebi yaareeta.
