OKUSIIMA

Ekitabo eki kirugire omu kwebuuza n’okuhaburwa abantu b’emiringo etari emwe
otaireho abarokore barikuruga omu bicweka bitari bimwe omu Uganda.
Nitusiima ab’ekitongore kya Population Secretariat ekyareesireho
ekiteekateeko eki hamwe n’ab’ekitongore kya United Nations Pupulation Fund
(UNFPA) ekyahaire obuhweezi bw’okukora omurimo ogu.

Nitusiima munonga abeebembezi b’amakanisa g’abarokore aha madaara gatari
gamwe ahabw’omuhimbo ogubataire omu murimo ogu kureeba ngu ebiri omu kitabo
eki nibiikirizana n’ebiri omuri Baiburi.

Okusiima okwomutaano nikuza aha b’ekitongore ekya REEV Consult
International, ahabw’okurundaana, kushwijuma hamwe n’okukyebera ebyo byoona
ebihandiikirwe omu kitabo eki kandi n’okwongyeramu ebi baikiriziineho omu
kitabo eki. Tikirikubaasika kuhandiika amaziina goona g’ebitongore hamwe
n’abantu abaabasize kugira eki baata nainga ekibaayongyera omu kitabo eki,
kwonka boona abaagizire eki baata nainga baayongyera omu kitabo eki,
nitubasiima. Mukama Ruhanga, abongyere omugisha.

Okushoboorora Ebiri omu Kitabo Eki

Ekitabo eki, ekirikukwata aha kuta ebikwatiraine n’amagara ‘g’okuteerana’
hamwe n’eby’enkura y’abantu omu puroguraamu z’ekanisa, nikishoboorora aha
nyegyesa eri omu Baiburi erikugamba aha ntuura y’abantu erigyenda namunonga
abarokore. Ekitabo nikimurika aha bikwatiraine n’okuteerana hamwe n’ekikura
ky’abantu omu Uganda, omurimo gw’abeebembezi b’abarokore omu kushoborora
enshonga z’okuteerana hamwe n’ekikura ky’abantu nk’okuziri omu nyegyesa ya
Baiburi, kandi n’okuhiga amakanisa hamwe n’abeebembezi baago kushoma
ebirimu bakabyetegyereza kandi bakabyejunisa ahabw’oburungi bw’abakurasi ba
Kristo.

Ekitabo eki nikituha omugisha gw’okwihaho obutamanya, reero tumanye,
tuhindure enteekateeka, kureteho okukunda kandi n’enyikiriza enungi
n’okukora gye omu bantu baitu aha bikwatiraine n’okuteerana hamwe n’enkura
y’abantu.

Nitumanya gye omurimo muhango ogu ekanisa zirikukora aha kutunguura amagara
n’entuura y’abakurasi ba Kristo/abarokore. N’ahabwekyo ekitabo eki kiiziira
aha bwire obu kirikwetaagwa munonga kuhwera aha bureemeezi bw’abantu baitu
baine, obwo kiri aha mutindo n’ebyetaago by’ekanisa z’abarokore. Twine
amasiko ngu ekitabo eki nikiza kutaho omusingye guhamire ahu
turaayongyeserereze kukora omurimo gw’okuhereza Kristo kurungi munonga.

Kanshabe abeebembezi b’ekanisa z’abarokore nti kuteho omutima kandi
tugyenderere kuta ebyahandiikirwe omu kitabo eki omu kubuurira engiri obwo
turikugyenderera kutunguura omutindo gw’eby’amagara g’abantu baitu nk’oku
Ruhanga y’atuhangire kuba.

Ahabw’abarokore boona omu Uganda, kangarukyemu mpe okusiima kwangye
ab’ekitongore kya Population Secretariat hamwe na UNFPA ahabw’akaminyiso
k’okwendeza abantu amagara marungi. Kandi kangarukye ntware omugisha ogu
gw’okuhamya okusharaho kwaitu ngu nitwija kuta omu nkora ebiri omu kitabo
eki. Ahabwa Ruhanga, buri kimwe nikibaasika. Ruhanga abahe omugisha.

Dr. Joseph Serwadda,
 Omutume oriho,
Ahabw’Abarokore omu Uganda
Okumurika Ekitabo Eki
Ekitabo eki kirugire omu kwebuuza n’okuhaburwa abantu b’emiringo etari emwe
kworekyerera abarokore b’ekanisa eza Uganda. Ebiri omu kitabo omu
byegamiire enyegyesa ya Baiburi aha by’okuteerana n’ekikura ky’abantu kandi
birikukwatagana kurung n’amateeka hamwe n’ebiragiro bya Uganda. Ekitabo eki
kikoriirwe abo abarikubuurira aha by’amaka (family ministries) (ebirikukora
aha by’embariirira y’amaka, amagara g’abazaire, n’amagara g’okuteerana);
abarikubuurira abaana (children ministries) (abarikukora aha byokukuza
abaana hamwe n’obugabe bwabo); hamwe n’abakubuurira aha by’amagara (Health
Ministries) abarikubuurira aha kakooko akarikureeta siriimu hamwe n’endwara
ezirikuruga omu kuteerana); abarikubuurira abakazi (women ministries)

Hatariho ngyenderwaho, abantu b’enyikiriza zitari zimwe hamwe n’ab’ebibiina
by’obutegyeki by’emiringo etari emwe, obutumwa bumwe batwire
nibabwetegyereza omu miringo etarikushushana, kandi buri omwe arikugamanya
ekye.

Nahabwekyo, ekitabo ki kiteirweho kuhabura abeebembezi b’amadiini
n’ab’enyikiriza zitari zimwe hamwe n’abakurasi ba Kristo boona abu
barikwebembera, kwetegyereza, kwikiriza hamwe n’okwihamu enjuma omu butumwa
bw’omubaro gw’abantu hamwe n’entunguuka kandi beejunise okumanya oku
kutunguura omutindo gw’amagara gaabo. Ekitabo eki nikiija kukora
nk’obujurizi bw’abo boona abarikuha obutumwa bukwatiraine aha kuteerana
n’enkura y’abantu burikwegamira enyegyesa ya Kristo obwo barikwikirizana
hatariho muhondano omu kwetegyereza enyegyesa egyo, kandi erikwikirizana
n’ebiragiro bya Uganda ebiriho obwahati.

Ekitabo eki ekikozirwe, n’okuhikiiriza eki Uganda yaaraganiise ngu n’eija
kukora, omu kiteerane ekyabaireho ekirikwetwa International Conference on
Population and Development (ICPD) kandi nikiikirizana n’enteekateeka
y’okuta omu nkora eiteeka eririkukwata aha muhendo gw’abantu n’entunguuka
erya 2008. Ekitabo eki kirimu ebyo ebigyendereire: kutunguura eby’amagara
g’abakazi abarikuzaara hamwe n’abaana, ebirungi ebiri omu kuteekateeka
amaka; okuhanuura kw’omuzaire n’omwana, obugabe n’obujunaanizibwa bw’abaana
n’abazaire; eby’amagara g’eminyeeto n’okuteerana; okwerinda, okutambiza
hamwe n’okujanjaba akakooko akarikurwaza siriimu; kutunguura enkoragana
y’abashaija n’abakazi hamwe n’okumanya omwanya gw’abakazi hamwe n’omurimo
gw’ekanisa omu kutunguura ebyo byona.

Ninyesiga ngu ekanisa z’abarokore hamwe n’abarokore boona, ekitabo eki
nikiija kubabeera eky’omugasho kandi ebirimu nibaija kubita omu murimo
gwabo gw’okubunzya ekigambo kya Ruhanga. Ekitongore ekya Population
Secretariat kyeteekateekire kuguma nikikoragana n’abarokore boona kuta
ebiri omu kitabo eki omu nkora.

Mr. Charles Zirarema

Ahabwa Direkita wa Population Secretariat

Enturukiriro

Oruteerane oruirikwetwa International Conference on Population and
Development (ICPD) orwabaire omuri Cairo, Misiri omugwa 1994, rukataho
puroguraamu y’ebiraakorwe erikuhiga abaateireho omukono (otwariiremu na
Uganda) kureeba ngu haabaho enkoragana n’ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti,
eby’obuhangwa hamwe n’amadiini omu puroguraamu z’okutunguura eby’omubaro
gw’abantu n’entunguuka. Gavumenti ya Uganda (GoU) neemanya omurimo mukuru
ogu ebitongore bitari bya gavumenti hamwe n’amadiini omu kuhiga abantu
boona aha bintu bitari bimwe n’abumwe ebikwatiraine n’omuhendo gw’abantu
n’ebintu hamwe n’entunguuka. Kirikumanywa ngu abakurasi ba Kristo
nibakira kushanga oburemeezi omu by’amagara hamwe n’obutaringaniza omu
by’abashaija n’abakazi, nikikuru ngu ekanisa z’abarokore hamwe
n’obwebembezi bwazo nizikora omurimo muhanga omu kubuzya ekigambo n’enkuru
nungi ekirikureetera abaikiriza baatwaza gye nainga baahinduraho omu
mitwarize obwo harugyemu amagara marungi omu bicweka ebi ekanisa
erikuheereza.

Enshonga

Hahwaire emyaka mingi turikureeba ebantu batari bamwe barikuruga omu
nyikiriza n’ebibiina bitari bimwe batarikwetegyereza kumwe obutumwa nainga
okumanya ebikwatiraine n’omuhendo gw’abantu hamwe n’entunguuka. Eki
kikareetera ekyetaago ky’okutaho ekitabo eki, kwenda kuhabura abarokore aha
nshonga z’amagara g’amaka hamwe n’ez’abashaija n’abakazi.

Emihanda ei ekitabo kirabiremu kuhika aha kuhwa

Gavumenti ya Uganda, erikutunga obuhwezi kuruga omu kitongore ekya UNFPA
hamwe na Population Secretariat, etwire neekoragana n’abeebembezi
b’amadiini n’ekigyendererwa ky’okutunga amaka hamwe n’ebyaro birimu abantu
b’amagara marungi. Population Secretariat niyo yaayebeembeire emihanda
yoona y’okucondooza n’okwebuuza ekwateirweho ab’ekitongore ekya REEV
Consult Intarnational kwihamu ekitabo eki ekyegamiire enyegyesa ya Baiburi
obwo erikurabira omu kwebuuza aha beebembezi b’ekanisa z’abarokore omu
ihanga.

Okucondooza kuronda amazima kukakorwa omu disituriki 7 ahari munaana eziri
aha puroguramu ya za disiturikiti za UNFPA omu Uganda ezi: Kotido, Moroto,
Kaabong, Oyam, Kanungu, Mubende and Katakwi. Okuteisa aha nshonga nakwo
kukakorwa n’abantu omu bubiina bumwe, reero ebyarugiremu nibyo byakozire
ekitabo eki kitakashwijumirwe. Enkiiko z’okwebuuzaho nazo zikeetwa aha
rurengo rwa disiturikiti hamwe n’eihanga kuteisa aha kitabo eki kureeba
ngu buri kimwe nikyetegyerezebwa kandi ebirimu nibiikirizana n’enyegyesa ya
Baiburi hamwe n’ebiragiro otaireho n’amateeka ga Uganda. Ebimwe ebiri omu
kitabo eki nibiruga omu kitabo ekya UNFPA namunonga ebikwatiraine n’
Amagara g’Okuteerana N’okuzaara[1] hamwe n’ebindi bihandiiko
ebirikwongyerera aha biri omu kitabo eki.

OMUTWE 1: ENTEEKATEEKA Y’AMAKA

1. Embeera y’ebiri omu maka hamwe n’amagara g’ab’omu maka omu Uganda

Obwahati, Uganda n’emwe aha mahanga agu omuhendo gw’abantu gurikweyongyera
buri izooba omu nsi yoona. Eki nikireetwaho obuhango bw’amaka kandi
gatateekateekirwe. Okweyongyera kw’omubaro gw’abantu omu Uganda nikwingana
obucweka 3.2 ahari buri 100 buri mwaka (UBOS,[2] 2009). Aha rurengo orwo,
Uganda neeyongyera abantu barikwingana miriyoni emwe buri mwaka aha mubaro
gwayo. Ekyo nikimanyisa ngu omubaro gw’abantu abariho hati omu Uganda
niguza kuhika miriyooni 130 omu mwaka gwa 2050.

Enshonga ibiri nkuru ezirikureetera abantu baakunda amaka agarimu abaana
baingi ni: ekitiinisa hamwe na rufu; obwo barikuteekateeka ngu rufu
yaatwaraho abaana abamwe, abandi basigareho. Ekindi ekikuru, abakazi
baingi omu Uganda nibazaara abaana baingi abu batarikwetaaga. Ripoota ya
UDHS eya 2006 neegira ngu obucweka 46 ahari 100 bw’amazaara omu Uganda
gakaba gateeteekateekirwe, wagyeragyeranisa n’obucweka 38 ahari 100 omu
ripoota ya 2000-2001, ekirikumanyisa ngu ebintu nibyeyongyera kuba bibi.
Eki nikyo abakugu omu by’Omuhendo gw’Abantu n’Entunguuka ekibarikweta
“unmet need for birth control.” Eki nikimanyisa ngu n’obu abakazi baingi
baakubaire nibenda ngu bazaare omuhendo gw’abaana abu barikwetaaga,
tibakaakyebaasiza ahabw’okuba emibiri yaabo neebaasa kuguma neezaara nainga
shi emibiri eine amaani maingi g’okuzaara.

Kishemereire kumanywa ngu n’obu omuhendo gw’abantu baingi gwine omugasho
omu ntunguuka ahabw’okureetaho ebintu bingi hamwe n’akatare k’ebintu
kahango, eki nikihwera eihanga ryaba niribaasa kwegyesa abantu abo rikabaha
obushoborozi bw’okukora bakataho ebintu bingi ebi barikwetenga, bakagira
entaasya erikubahwera kutuura omu mbeera nungi.

Hatakaizire enyikiriza y’okukuratira Kristo omu Uganda, amaka maingi gakaba
gaba ag’omushaija aine abakazi bingi. Omushaija kushwera abakazi baingi
kikaba nikitwarwa nka kikuru munonga kiri ekintu kirikuhaisa ekitiinisa
kandi kireetera n’abashaija kutwarwa nka kikuru omu byanga byabo. Nangwa
n’erizooba, ekintu ky’okukunda amaka garimu abantu baingi kikiri omu bantu
baingi omu Uganda yaitu egi.

Ahabw’okugira ngu omwojo niwe yaabaire atwara obuhunguzi bw’eka
(ahabw’okuba omwishiki akaba aza kushwerwa) amaka maingi gakaba genda ngu
gazaare abaana b’aboojo. Ku baabaire bazaara abaishiki, bakaba baguma
nibazaara barikuronda omwojo kuhisya obu omugisha guraije bakazaara omwojo
obwo barikwenda ngu batungye omuhunguzi. Kwongyerera ahari ekyo, abantu
abandi bakaba benda kuzaara abaana baingi ahabw’okuteekateeka ngu nibaija
kubareeberera bo nk’abazaire, baakura batakiine maani g’okwekorera emirimo.
Ekindi, abaana bakaba bafa munonga, ebihikiirizi, okurwanagana hamwe
n’entaro bikaba bireetera amaka maingi gaazaara abaana baingi,
bagyendereire ngu rufu ku yaakutwaraho bamwe, abandi basigaraho.

Kurugiirira aha kucondooza okwakozirwe Singh, (2005), abakazi baingi omuri
Uganda, okutwariza hamwe, baine abaana babiri abongyeirwe aha mubaro gu
barikwetaaga kandi abakazi abarikwingana obucweka 50 ahari 100 bagyerizeho
kukozesa emiringo erikuta amagara gaabo aha butandu nk’okwihamu enda,
kutanga okuzaara okundi. Ekihandiiko ekya National Population Policy
(2008) nikigira ngu eibura ry’obujuma oburikutangira ruzaaro otaireho
n’okutatanga ruzaaro kuri aha Obucweka 41 ahari 100 (UBOS 2006) nibyo
bikuru aha nshonga zimwe ahari ezo ezirikureetaho enzaaro
ziteeteekateekirwe.

Eki kireesireho okumanya ngu ‘okubaririra ruzaaro’ nikishushana
n’okukutebeekanisa amaka. Okuteebeekanisa amaka n’ekintu kihango
ekitarikumanyisa kubaririra ruzaaro kyonka, kwonka nikitwarira hamwe
enteekateeka yoona y’okuhwera amaka kuzaara omuhendo gw’abaana
oguringaniire ogurikwikirizana n’entaasya y’eihanga ryabo kwinda ngu
bakakura omu muringo ogwakubaasa kuhwera amagara gaabo, obwegyese hamwe
n’enkuraakurana. Ekikuru ekyakubaasa kukorwa kutunga omuhendo gw’abantu
b’amagara marungi omu ihanga, n’okutunga omuhendo gw’abantu
ogurikwingaingana n’ebintu hamwe n’obuheereza.

Ekyo kukihikaho, nihetenga ngu habeho omuhanda gw’okubariiriramu omuhendo
gw’abantu ahu buri ka eraabaase kwebaasa kandi ekabaasa kweibeisaho
kurugiirira aha ntasya yaayo. Amakanisa g’abarokore nigaikiriza abarokore
kukozesa emihanda y’okuteekateeka amaka aha bafumbo bonka. Ahabw’okuba abo
abatakatungire maka ngainga abatakashwire nainga abatakashwirwe
tibashemereire kuba nibateerana omu muringo gwona. Mbwenu abatakatungire
maka bo nibakozesa emihanda y’okutangira ruzaaro omu muringo gw’okuhenda
ebiragiro kandi n’okusherekyerera emize mibi yaabo y’obushambani
ahabw’okuba okuteerana aheeru y’obushwere oburikwera n’ekibi.

2. Emihanda y’Ekikugu Erikukira Kukozesebwa Kusirika Ruzaaro
 a) Emihanda Erikuzibira Akashaho Kusindika Eihuri
Emihanda egi n’emihanda mirungi munonga y’okutangira/kusirika ruzaaro obwo
erikukozesa emiringo ebiri: combination hormonal methods (otwariiremu
obujuma, kucumita akashushu k’omubiri hamwe n’empeta); hamwe n’emihanda
ezirikukozesa obujuma (oburikumanywa nka emergency mini-pills), shots nka
Depo-provera na implants.

 b) Akooma karikuta Orububi ahari nyinenda (Intrauterine Device [IUD])
Ogu n’omuhanda ogurikukozesa akooma akarikutebwa ahari nyinenda kutangira
obutagira nda. Hariho emiringo ebiri ya IUDs: IUD eya Kipa (nka Paragard)
hamwe na hormonal IUDs (nka Minera). IUD ku barikigira omu mubiri
gw’omukazi nibaza kukuuma omukazi obutagira nda kumara emyaka 10
kurugiirira aha muringo gwayo hamwe n’oku omukazi arikuhurira[3] ari omu
mubiri gwe.

 c) Emihanda erikuzibira
Emihanda egi ekozirwe ngu ezibire amahuri g’omushaija kutaaha omuri
nyinenda y’omukazi kandi g’akahika eihuri ry’omukazi. Emihanda nk’egi ni:
diaphragm, cervical cap, cervical shield, akapiira (kondomu) k’abashaija,
spermicidal foam, sponge, gel, suppository or film. Okutwariza hamwe,
emihanda egi yo, ahakwongyerera aha ky’okugira ngu neekora gye, yo teine na
buzibu bwona burikuruga aha kugikozesa. Kwongyerera ahari ekyo, obupiira
bwo (obwabashaija n’abakazi) nibukuru aha kutangira endwara ezirikureetwa
omu kuteerana nk’akakooko akarikureeta siriimu akarikwetwa HIV[4], genital
herpes and Chlamydia.

 d) Okukomera kimwe Oruzaaro
Sterilization n’okushemeza omushaija nainga omukazi orikuba atakyenda
kuzaara. N’omuringo gumwe aha miringo erikukora gye aha kutangira ruzaaro
kwonka obuzibu bw’omuhanda ogu n’okugira ngu gwo tokaagugarura nyima,
ekirikumanyisa ngu nooba otarigaruka kuzaara.

3. Emihanda y’obuhangwa ey’okurama kusirika ruzaaro
Emihanda erikukira kukozesebwa hanu ni eshatu yonka:

 a) Omuhanda gw’okwihamu obushaija omu mukazi
Ogu n’omuhanda ogurikukozesebwa omushaija obwo arikwiha obushaija bwe omu
mukazi yaahuriza amahuri agarikuza omu bukazi bw’omukazi gaija reero
gakabura kutaaha omu mukazi. Ogu nigwo muhanda ogutarikukora gye kandi
ogutarikwesigwa kandi nikyenda ngu gukozesebwe omu bwire obu omukazi ataine
migisha y’okutwariramu enda, ekintu ekigumire kubariirira namunonga omu
bakazi abo abarikuza omu micwe kumwe kumwe nk’omu bunaku bw’ebiro 30-40.

 b) Kumanya Obwire bw’Okutwariramu
Ogu muhanda nigwenda ngu abafumbo bombi bakore kyati y’okubariirira obwire
obu omukazi arikubaasa kutungiramu enda reero beerinda okuteerana omu bwire
obwo. Ogu muhanda nagwo gwine oburemeezi bw’okusirika ruzaaro ahabwokuba
nihabaasa kubaho empindahinduka omu magara g’omukazi kireetere okubariirira
obwire bw’okugiriramu enda bwagwa.

 c) Omuhanda gw’Okwonsya ogurikwetwa (Lactational Amenorrhea Method (LAM)
Omuhanda ogu ogurikwetwa LAM n’ogw’okwonsya omwana ozairwe obutareka kandi
otarikumuha kintu ekindi kyona. N’obu omuhanda ogu nigwesigwa obucweka 98.5
ahari 100 omu bakazi baingi, abashaho tibarikuhabura bakazi kwesiga
omuhanda ogu ahabw’okuba abakazi abamwe nibagira enda kandi barikwonsya.
Nigukorwa kurungi omwana yaaba naayonka kwonka, kandi omukazi yaaba akiri
amenorhic kandi omwana owu aine atakahikize myezi 6.

4. OBUTUMWA AHA NTEEKATEEKA Y’AMAKA
Teekateekyera oku amaka gaawe gashemereirwe kwingana: abaana bato baataaha
omu bufumbo, ni kikuru ngu abashwereine bashutame hamwe bateekateeke amaka
gaabo, omuhendo gw’abaana abu barikwenda kuzaara. Abafumbo baine kubanza
bareeba ebintu ebi baine reero babone kuteekateeka omuhendo gw’abaana hamwe
n’abantu abu baakubaasa kubaisaho n’ebintu ebi baine. Baine kukimanya
kandi bakakyetegyereza ngu okuzaara abaana nikiija n’obujunaanizibwa.
Omuhendo gw’abaana ogu oine, nibyo bintu by’okubareebereza kandi nigo
magara marungi nainga mabi agu baraatungye.

Abaana boona n’ebiconco kurunga ahari Ruhanga: aboojo n’abaishiki boona
baine omugisha gw’okuba abantu b’omugasho omu ebyanga kandi boona nibabaasa
kureeberera ebintu baaba baheirwe obushobozi bw’okukikora. Oku eka
eshemereire kwingana tikishemereire kusharwaho kurugiirira aha muringo ogu
abaana abazaarwa, yaaba boojo nainga baishiki abaazairwe. Abaana
b’abaishiki bashemereire kuhwerwa buba abareeberezi b’ebintu byeka
n’ahabwekyo nibabaasa kusika eitaka hamwe n’ebindi bintu.

Kwenda kusirika ruzaaro, abafumbo tibaine kwerondera mubazi nainga bujuma
bw’okusirika ruzaaro. Baine kukyeberwa byona nka: emyaka, oburemeezi,
oburaingwa, oku atwire naaza omu kwezi, oku atwire naatwara enda, abaana bu
aine, omuringo gw’eshagama, oku erikutambura omu mubiri, hamwe n’ebindi
abashaho batakakuhaire mubazi bwona nainga batakakugambiire nainga kukuha
ekiraasirise ruzaaro yaawe. Abashaija hamwe n’abandi bafumbo baine kubanza
baayebuuza aha muhabuzi nainga shi kansara kandi tibaine kwehereza ekintu
kyona ekirikusirisa ruzaaro nainga omubazi gwona.

Okurya gye hamwe n’okugyendera aha mateeka g’okugira amagara marungi:
Abakazi baaheza kutunga okushoboororwa n’okuheebwa obujuma hamwe n’emibazi
erikusirika oruzaaro, baine kugyendera aha ndagiiriro ei baatunga. Abakugu
abaingi nibagira ngu emihanda nyingi ey’okusirika ruzaaro eshemereire kuba
neeyongyerwaho endya nungi hamwe n’okunywa munonga kutangira obuzibu
obwakubaasa kureetwa obujuma obwo.

Entaaniso eri ahagati y’obujuma kukora gye hamwe n’obwire bw’okubumiriramu:
abakugu baingi abarikukora aha nteekateeka y’amaka nibaha obuhabuzi aha
nkora nungi y’obujuma bw’emiringo nyingi.

Kurugirira aha butumwa obu aha ruguru, nikuru kuha obuhwezi ebitongore
by’amagara mu ihanga kureeba ngu byahwera abantu boona kugira amagara
marungi. Kwongyerera ahari ekyo, ebihandiiko by’obutumwa obuhikire,
obwegyese hamwe n’okugambirwa bishemereire kuhika omu bantu kwenda kwihaho
obuteetegyereza obutumwa oburikukwata ahabya obujuma hamwe n’emiringo
y’okusirika ruzaaro ey’obuhangwa eyakubaasa kubaheebwa omu majanjabiro.

 Eihanga ry’amagara marungi niryombekwa abantu b’amagara marungi riine
abantu baaryo barikubaasa kuhangaara kandi barikwebaasa. Eki ku kirikubaho,
kuteekateekyera amaka nikimanyisa kuteekateekyera eihanga (omuteekateeki
tarikumanywa, 1985).

5. OBUJURIZI OBURIKURUGA OMU BAIBURI
Ebyahandiikirwe

Okutandika 1:27:28; 4:1-25; 5:4 1Timoseo 5:8

Zaburi 127: 3-5 1Yohaana 3:3

Isaaya 66:9 2Yohaana1-11

Yeremiya 1:5 Luka 14:27-33

 a) Ruhanga akaragiira Adamu na Hawa ngu bazaare baijuze ensi omu
 Kutandika 1:28. Kwonka, Baiburi neegamba aha baana bashatu bonka:
 Abeeri, Kaini hamwe Seezi (Okutandika 4:1-25) kandi bakagira batabani
 na bahara baabo baingi. Ni kikuru kumanya ngu bakahangaara emyaka
 maingi munonga kandi baine obushoborozi bw’okuzaara. Eriigyenda,
 abantu nibabaasa kuzaara abaana kuhisya aha myaka 49 yonka.

 b) Adamu na Eva bakabaragiira kuzaara kwijuja ensi hatiine ogirimu
 ondiijo. Ekaba eri ensi yaabo bombi. Ensi eyaawe n’eha? Neingana ki?
 Ijuka, enteekateeka y’amaka nikimanyisa kutebeekanisagye amaka. Yesu
 naayegyesa aha nteebeekanisa y’amaka omuri Luka 14:28 “Nooha omuri
 imwe owakubaasa kuba naayenda kwombeka omunaara, otarikubanza
 yaashutama akabaariirira ebikozeso ebirabaase kugumara.”

 c) Baiburi neeyegyesa omuri Zaaburi 127:3-5 ngu “Mukimanye, abaana
 n’ekiconco kuruga ahari Ruhanga, ekijuma by’enda n’ekiconco. Nk’amata
 omu mikono y’abarwani, nikyo nk’abaana abu omuntu azaara omu buto bwe.
 Aine omugisha ogwo mushaija abaijwize omu mbuga ye, tibaraabashwaze,
 kwihaho kugamba n’abangizi baabo aha muryango.” Mukimanye ngu, abaana
 baaba barwaire, nainga babuzirwe ekyokurya barwaire mutuku,
 tibarikubasa kuba buta omu mikono y’abarwani. Amaka gashemereire
 kumanya ngu okuzaara abaana bu gashemereire kureeberera ni kikuru aha
 burungi bw’amagara g’omwana, eka, hamwe neihanga ryona okutwarira
 hamwe.

 d) Baiburi neejumirira eky’okwihamu enda eki erikweta okucwekyereza enda
 omuru Isaaya 66:9; “Nyakubaho naagira ati, “Ndyakuhisya aha bunaku
 bw’okuzaara, ndemwe kukuzaaza? Ruhanga waawe naagira ati: Nyowe oha
 oruzaaro, niinye ndaakinge enda?” Amagara nigatandikira aha kutwara
 enda. Omuntu ku amara kutwara enda, ogwo ari omu nda aba omuntu ou
 Ruhanda aikiriize kutuura kandi oshemereire kuba omu kyeshusha kye.
 Nahabwekyo, nikyo yaagiriire omurangi Yeremiya omuri Yeremiya 1:5
 “Ntakakuteire omunda ya nyoko, nkaba ninkumanya.”

 e) Omuri Yohaana 2:1-11, Yesu Kristo akaha omugisha obushwere oburikwera
 obu yaataaha obugyenyi omuri Cana ahu yaakoreire ekyokutangaaza kye
 eky’okubanza. Ekyokutangaaza kikaba kiri okuhindura amaizi gakaba
 viinyo akamanyiso k’okuzaarwa obusya n’okuhindurwa obusya kw’abafumbo
 abarikutaaha omu magara masya g’obufumbo. Abafumbo nibashabwa kuguma
 bashugaine ahabw’okuba Mukama nawe ashugaine omuri Yohaana w’okubanza,
 3:3 “Weena omwineho ago matsiko, ayeyeze nkawe oku ari orikwera.”

OMUTWE GWA 2: AMAGARA G’ABAKAZI ABARIKUZAARA

2.1 Amagara g’abakazi abazaire omu Uganda – oku gari obwahati

Amagara g’abakazi abazaire nikimanyisa amagara ga buri mukazi weena akiri
omu myaka y’okuzaara (15-49) kurugiirira aha kutwara enda, kuzaara hamwe
n’ayaaherize kuzaara.[5] Abakazi abarikufa nibazaara nibo barikuza aha
muhendo ogurikwetwa “Enfa y’abakazi omu Izaariro.” Omu Uganda, enfa egi
eyemereire aha bakazi 435 ahari 100,000 abarikuzaara (UBOS, 2006). Eki
nikimanyisa ngu bri izooba, abakazi 16 nibafa barikuzaara, ekirikureetera
omuhendo gwahika 5000-6000 omu mwaka (Ripoota ya MDG, 2010. Abakazi 41.1%
aha b’akazi b’omuri Uganda nibo barikuzaara baine obuhwezi bw’omushaho
omukugu (UBOS 2006) ekirikumanyisa ngu abakazi abaingi nibazaarira omu
bazaarisa b’aha kyaro nainga beesiga emihanda endiijo erikureetaho okufa
obwire (obwingi kirikurugiirira aha kujwa munonga obutahuumuza nainga
postpartum hemorrhage) hamwe n’okufa kw’omwana. Obumwe n’obumwe, omukazi
n’omwana bombi nibafa. Aha buri mukazi arikufeera omu izaariro, abandi
bakazi makumi abiri (20) nibatunga oburemeezi omu kuzaara (UNFPA, 2000).
Obujanjabi bw’abakazi abarikuzaara kurungi bushemereire kureeba ngu abaana
bazaarwa bahuriire kandi baine amagara marungi kandi naba nyina baakira gye
kuruga omu izaariro (obwire obw’emyezi kuruga obu yaazaara kuhika aha myezi
ena (0-4). Ebiro ebi omu Uganda, obucweka 13.7 bw’abaana boona
abarikuzaarwa tibarikuhisya myaka etaano (5), kandi obucweka 7.6%
bw’ab’ereere nibafa batakahikize mwaka (UNDP 2010).

2.2 Okuzaara abaana

Omu Uganda, okuzaara abaana n’okwemiringo ebiri:

 a) Okuzaara gye: oku kurimu okufunza nainga okwigura omuhanda gwa
 nyinenda ekirikureetera omwana n’ekyanyuma baarabaho.
 b) Okushemezebwa: ekirikumanyisa kwiha omwana omuri nyina barikurabira
 omu muhanda gw’okushemeza. Omwana naaraba ahaibondo ahatashemereire
 kurabira buriijo. Abakazi baingi nibatunga oburemeezi omu kuzaara
 okukira munonga nk’obu obwashoboororwaho ahaifo:
 a) Oburemeezi omu kuzaara nka: omwana kwija ari omu kishaho kye (breach
 birth) hamwe n’ekyanyima kubura amaani g’okushohora;
 b) Omwana kwija kubi (nk’okubanza kushohoza amaguru) kirikukira
 kureetwaho nyinenda kuburwa amaani.
 c) Oburemmezi bw’okuzaara nka okuhutaara omu bukazi hamwe n’okujwa
 munonga;
 d) Kuteeraho ekitahikire nainga shi kuzaara omwana atakahikize sande 37
 nainga okurenzya omu myezi mwenda (9) ezishemereire kuba nizimarwa.
 e) Oburemeezi oburikwetwa fisitura: oburwaire bubi obu omukazi arikutunga
 yaaba aremereirwe kuzaara reero akaatika haihi n’omwoyo nainga aha
 gati y’ekinyankari hamwe n’obukazi yaaba atatungire bujanjabi burungi.
 f) Kurugwamu enda: eki nikibaho obu ebintu byona ebikwatiriire enda byona
 nk’emisi, orububi hamwe n’ekishaho byona byarugaho reero omwana
 akashohora.
2.3 obwire obu omukazi aherize kuzaara arikuteereereramu

Obu n’obwire oburi ahagati kutandikana n’obu omukazi yaazaara kuhisya aha
muheru gw’emyezi ena. Obumwe n’obumwe abakazi nibatunga oburemeezi omu
kuzaara, reero ekyo kibareetera kushaasha kumara emyezi ena otaireho
n’enaku ei akuba aine atakazaire.

Ebicweka 80% by’abakazi abarikufa nibazaara biri omu mahanga abiri na rimwe
(21). Uganda n’emwe ahari go. WHO 2010.

2.4 OBUTUMWA BW’OKUTUNGUURA OMUTINDO GW’EBY’AMAGARA G’ABAKAZI ABARIKUZAARA

 1. Kukyebeza enda kuhika aha kuzaarwa
Abashaija bashemereire kuhwera abakazi baabo kwakiira hamwe n’okukuratira
amateeka g’abenda emyezi mwenda yoona ei barikuba baine enda. Omu bwire obu
abakazi beena kweteekateekyera buri ndwara zoona ezirikukira kwija omukazi
yaaba aine enda hamwe n’obumanyiso obubi bw’enda kwenda ngu abutangire
nainga endwara azitambize. Abashaija bashemereire kugyenda n’abakazi baabo
baaba nibaza kukyebeza enda kandi kyabaasika nawe ayekyebeze ekiraahwere
kwetegyereza gye ahaby’amagara g’omwana otakaziirwe.

 2. Kwekyebeza akakooko akarikureeta siriimu kwenda ngu ku baakushanga
 bakiine, omukazi w’enda atandike ART kutangira omwana kutunga akakooko
 kuruga ahari nyina ekirikwetwa PMTCT.

 3. Kubyama omu katimba kwenda ngu omukazi oine enda hamwe n’omwana
 otakazairwe batarumwa ensiri bakarwara omushwija. Omushwija gw’ensiri
 nigwo gurikukira kwita abakazi b’enda hamwe n’abaana omu Uganda.

 4. Okurya gye, kuhuumura ho hamwe n’okukora ebisasayizi: okurya gye ni
 kikuru aha magara g’omukazi aine enda hamwe n’ag’omwana. Abakazi
 abaine enda tibashemereire kunywa amaarwa nainga kureesa nainga
 kukozesa etaabe omu muringo gwona ahabw’okuba neekora kubi amagara
 g’omwana otakazairwe. Kwongyerera ahari ekyo, ni kikuru ngu omukazi
 aine enda akyendeeza aha mirimo ye eyarikukora obutoosha, atunge
 okuhuumuraho okuhikire kandi akore ebisasayizi kwenda ngu ayambweho
 kuzaara gye.
 5. Haaba hariho ayatikire oruhago enkari zirikwereeta, eki nikyenda ngu
 kimanywe kare reero omukazi bamushemezemu omwana kwenda ngu ahwerweho
 aha busaasi.
 6. Abashaija baiba babakazi baine kuhwera abakazi baabo baaba baine enda
 obwire bwona obu omukazi aine enda hamwe n’obw’okuzaara otaireho
 n’obwo obu yaaherize kuzaara. Abakazi baaba nibabonaabona, abashaija
 baabo baine kubahwera kwetebekanisa obutarinda kuhika aha izooba
 ryenyini ryokuzaariraho. Abashaija baine kuhwera abakazi baabo kukora
 emirimo ya buriijo kandi n’okubapakira kuza kukyebeza enda hamwe
 n’okuronda sente z’okugura ebikwato by’okuzaariramu.
 7. Abakazi bashemereire kugira obugwa gye baaba baine enda hamwe na
 baaheza kuzaara: obwire obwingi, amashemererwa nigaija omwana yaaheza
 kuzaarwa, hamwe n’okwonsya kuhisya emyaka ebiri ahabwokuba amabeere
 nimarungi aha mwana.

Baiburi neegamba munonga aha kuzaara kandi ebihandiiko ebingi nibigira ngu
ruzaaro n’omugisha. Buri omwe ahangirwe, ahangirwe kurugiirira aha
kigyendererwa, okukunda hamwe n’ekyeshusha kya Ruhanga. Kuhwera kwongyerera
aha kuzaaragye okutarimu mirabanamu, obujurizi obuhairwe ahaifo nibwongyera
kuhabura abashomi oku Baiburi erikugira aha magara g’okuzaara kw’abakazi.

2.5 OBUJURIZI OBURIKURUGA OMU BAIBURI

Ebyahandiikirwe:

Okutandika 2:25; 3:1-16

Matayo 1:18-24; 3:14-15; 3:19-23 Yohana 4:24

2Timoteseo 2:13-15

Abaami baine kukuratira ekyokureeberaho kya Yusufu reero bahwere abakazi
baabo baaba baine enda, omu kuzaara hamwe na baaheza kuzaara. Kurugiirira
ahari Matayo eshuura 1, 2 hamwe n’eya 3, Yusufu akaba ari omuhurizi ahari
Ruhanga obwire bwona. Yusufu naagambwaho omu Baiburi nk’omushaija owaabaire
akora ebihikire, kandi owaayangire kuhemukira Mariamu n’obu yaakimanyire
ngu Mariamu akaba aine enda etari eye. Yusufu akahunzya Mariamu obwo
arikumuhunzya omugabe Herode, yaamutwara omuri Misiri kuhisya obu obwire
bwahikire bakagaruka omuri Israel. Yusufu akakuratira byona ebi maraika
yaabaire naamugambira. Okwo nikwo kukwatanisa okurikuteekateekwa kuba
nikukorwa omushaija aha mukazi we yaaba ari omu bwire nk’obu.

Okuha obuhwezi bw’ebintu by’okuzaarisa n’okujanjabwa hamwe n'okumuha
obusingye omu bwire bw’okuzaara n’ekintu kikuru aha magara g’omukazi
orikuzaara. Eki ku kyakukorwa, abakazi baingi bakaatungire obujanjabi kandi
bazaara obwo barikuhwerwa abashaho abatendekirwe kandi baine ebikozeso
ebihikire. Kandi nabwo ni kikuru kuha emirimo abashaho abazaarisa, abanaasi
hamwe n’abashaho abaine obwegyese buhikire kandi baheebwe akasiimo
akaigiireyo ngu babaase kuguma aha mirimo yaabo omu marwariro goona kandi
n’okuha akasiimo akandi ahari abo abarikukorera omu myanya egumire kuhika.

OMUTWE GWA 3: OKUKUZA ABAANA, AMAGARA GAABO, ENDYA HAMWE N’OBUGABE
BW’ABAANA

3.1 Obugabe bw’abaana n’enki?

Omu Uganda, omwana n’ogwo atakahikize myaka 18 y’obukuru. Kurugiirira aha
nkora ya ICDP kumanya obugabe bw’abaana ni kikuru kuza omu muhanda guhikire
kuhika aha muhendo gw’abantu n’entunguuka. Kurugiirira aha nkora
eyateereirweho omuri Cairo erikwetwa Cairo Consensus, abaabaire bariyo
boona kuruga omu bicweka bitari bimwe n’amahanga gatari gamwe otwariiremu
Uganda, bakaikirizana aha mateeka 15 g’okugyenderaho, omuri ago harimu: (1)
Abantu boona nibazaarwa bataine kamogo kandi baine ekitiinisa n’obugabe;
(10): Buri omwe aine obugabe bw’okwega. Amaani n’omutima bishemereire kuza
aha bwegyese bw’abakazi namunonga obw’abaana abaishiki; kandi ekikuru
munonga consensus (11) erikugira ngu amahanga goona hamwe n’amaka
bashemereire kukorera abaana enshonga y’okubanza.

EBIRIKUBAHO OMU UGANDA BIRIKWOREKA OKURIBATIIRIRA OBUGABE BW’ABAANA

Ekyobusaasi, omu ebyanga yaitu erigyenda okutaha baana bugabe bwabo
n’okutakuratira ICPD consensus bigumiizemu kubaho. Ekanisa eine kutamu
amaani n’obutumwa bw’amaani kwihaho omuze gw’okuribatiirira obugabe
bw’abaana. Omuze ogwizire ebiro ebi ogurikuteganisa okweyanja
n’okukuraakurana kw’abaana ni okunagaho n’okutafa ha baana. Ahabw’baana
kushwerwa n’okushwera bakiri bato hamwe n’okufa gateerana na buri omwe
kutari mu bushwere, abaana bato baingi bataine oku baakubaasa kukuza abaana
bagyenzi baabo nibabarekaho babarekyera ba nyinenkuru nainga baishenkuru.
Abaana abarikuzaarwa omu muringo nk’ogu nibareebwa ‘nk’abarikuteganisa’
ahari ba nyina kandi kugira ngu nibakuzibwa aheeru y’amaka agarimu taata na
maama, nibakura batamazirwe kandi batarikwekunda baine n’okwetomboita.
Obwire obwingi abaana abo nibabonaabonesebwa namunonga abo abu batwire nabo
barikubagira ngu n’ebiijaija/ebinyandaaro. Kusadaaka/okuhonga abaana nagwo
gubaire omuze ogureeteire abantu ba Uganda obuzibu buhango omu myaka etaano
ehingwire. Ebicondoziibwe aha muze ogu byona nibitunga akakumu aha
bucecezi, oburogi hamwe n’okwenda obugaiga omu “nsi y’omwirima” nikigambwa
ngu ezo nizo nshonga nkuru ezireesireho okusadaaka abaana omu Uganda.

Okuhamba hamwe n’okutoroboza obwana buto ni bimwe aha bintu ebirikwima
abaana obugabe bwabo. Emishango y’abashomesa abashaija kutoroboza abaana
b’obwishiki abu barikushomesa ni nyingi. Obu haabaire hariho orutaro omu
matemba ga Uganda, okuhamba n’okutoroboza obwana buto bikaba bikanyire.
Kwongyerera aha bikorwa bya sitaani ebyo aha ruguru, obutaha baana
kitiinisa hamwe n’okubiima obugabe bwabo nibyo birimu omu byaro byaitu ebi
tutwiremu namunonga abaana baayeshanga omu mihajaana y’omu maka. Abaana
abamwe nibabiima ebyokurya, obugabe bw’okwega namunonga kwega aha
by’okuteerana. Orubaju orundi, abaana abamwe babaire endeme, tibarikuhurira
bazaire baabo hamwe n’abarikubareeberera kandi beetabire omu bintu
ebirikukyendeeza emigisha yaabo y’okuba gye omu bwire bw’omumaisho.

3.2 Omuzaire aine bujunaanizibwa ki?

Ebi baikiriziine eshuura 11 (omuri 3.1 aha ruguru) neeteerera omuranga
abazaire hamwe na gaavumenti okutwarira hamwe kureeba ngu abaana baatunga
obwegyese kutari kugira ngu nibabayamba kwihaho nk’obugabe bwabo.
Kwongyerera ahari ekyo kwega okwaishomero, abazaire baine kwegyesa abaana
baabo emicwe mirungi n’emituurire y’obujunaanizibwa ebiraabagunjure bakaba
abatuuragye b’obujunaanizibwa omu myaka y’omumaisho. Baaba nibakora eki,
abazaire baine kumanya ngu baine kuba ekyokureeberaho ky’abaana baabo
ahabw’okuba abaana bo nibakira kukopa ebi abakuru barikukora.

3.3 Ni bintu ki ebirikureetaho amagara marungi hamwe n’okuriisa gye omwana?

Uganda obwahati eriyo neeta omu nkora eiteeka ry’ebyokurya hamwe n’ekiriisa
kyabyo erya (2003) hamwe n’enteekateeka erikwetwa Uganda Nutrition Action
Plan (UNAP 2011-2016). Enteekateeka egi egyendereire kukyendeeza oburemeezi
burikuruga omu ndya mbi omu bakazi abarikuzaara hamwe n’abeereere otaireho
abaana bato gwaza kuhika omwaka 2016.

Ebihandiiko bikuru nk’ebi nibishoborora aha bintu bikuru ebi Uganda
nk’eihanga eine kuba neekora kwenda ngu etunge omuhendo gw’abantu b’amagara
marungi. Ekyokureeberaho, UNFP neegira ngu:

Buri sente 1,000 eziraateebwe omu by’endya nungi, nizibaasa kurugamu esente
zirikwingana 6,000 obwo obazire okukyendera kw’okupimpa kw’abaana,
kutunguura omutindo gw’abakazi abarikuzaara, kutunga ekiriisa omu mibiri
ey’abashaija, abakazi hamwe n’abaana.

Obuzibu bwa Uganda obukwatiraine n’endya n’amagara g’abaana, n’entaasya
nkye aha rurengo rw’eka ekirikureetera abakazi n’abashaija baaremererwa
kugura ebyokurya birikumara hamwe n’enyongyerwaho omu maka gaabo. Abahingi
ba tukye bibaguza otu bahingire twona ngu bakaabona akasente k’okugura
ebindi byetaago; ekyo kireetera amaka gaasigara gataine ky’okurya kyona
n’okuriisa abaana nainga abaana baabo babariisa kubi. Eki nikireeberwa aha
karoli ezi omunya Uganda arikutaasya ezirikwingana 2,220 omu izooba
waazigyeragyeranisa n’oz’omuntu wa Ireland ezirikwingana 3,600. Abacondoozi
nibagamba aha zindi nshonga ezirikureetera endya mbi omu bantu baitu nka:
kugira ebyokurya omu bwire obumwe reero obundi bwire bikabura
ekirikureetaho eibura ry’ebyokurya omu myezi 5-6 g’obutagira by’okurya omu
kicweka kihango kya Uganda; abazaire abakazi obutareeberera baana kurungi
kirikureetwaho abakazi obutaha baana baabo ebyokurya ebirimu ekiriisa obwo
otaireho n’obutatunga bujanjabi buhikire baaba barwaire.

Kwenda kutunga endiisa gye y’abaana hamwe n’okubareeberera gye, abazaire
hamwe n’abareeberezi b’abaana bashemereire kukora ebi:

 a) Kuhikiirira omushaho w’ebyamagara bakatunga obuhabuzi aha byokurya
 ebirimu ekiriisa ebi abeereere, abaana n’abanyina bashemereire kurya.
 b) Kuhinga ebihingwa obwo otairemu n’ebijuma, emboga hamwe n’ebindi
 kwenda kugira ebyokurya birikumara aha rurenge rw’eka. Ebi birimu
 emboga ezirikwiragura ezirikuriirwa aha byokurya, emiti y’ebijuma
 hamwe n’ebyokurya ebya buriijo.
 c) Kwega omugasho oguri omu kurya ebyokurya omu bwire bwabyo (kyansya,
 kyamushana hamwe n’akyakiro) otaireho okurya otuntuntu rwagati
 y’obwire obwo.
 d) Kuba abayonjo otwariiremu okunaaba omu ngaro n’esabuuni otakariire na
 waaheza kurya kandi na waaruga omu kamina/kihoronyo, ebyokurya biine
 kuriibwa bikirikwosya (kurya obuhoro mukirekye) kandi kureeba ngu
 omwanya ogubeetooroire n’omuyonjo gutarimu bukooko nk’enshohera
 ezirikubunzya oburwaire.
 e) Kutwara abaana kare aha irwariro eriri haihi baakwatwa endwara nainga
 baagira oku baayoreka obumanyiso bw’okutarya gye nka mutuku. Eki
 nikikorwa kwenda ngu batungye obujanjabi hamwe nibirikwongyerwa omu
 mubiri gwaba gutaine by’okurya birikumara. Ni kikuru ngu abazaire
 bamanye ni byokurya ki kandi biine ekiriisa ki: ekyokureeberaho,
 zaakaroti ziine ekiriisa ekirikuhwera ekishansha kucwagura ebyokurya
 bwangu kandi zigaruka zihwera aha kushohoza oburofa obutarikwetengwa
 omu mubiri obwakubaasa kureetaho endwara. Amoozi, ebitakuri nainga
 emondi hamwe na sipinaci biine ekiriisa ekirikwetwa vitamin kandi
 amate, amajuta g’ente, amahuri hamwe n’ebinyobwa biine ebiriisa nka
 Karishiamu hamwe na vitamiini. Ekiriisa ekirikwetwa Proteyini nikiruga
 omu mahuri hamwe n’emboga z’ebihimba nainga obusaza. Sitaaki neeruga
 omu bitakuri hamwe n’ebitekyere.

“Mugambire abantu ahu ekiriisa kya Proteyini kirikuruga nk’ekiriisa
kirikwombeka amagara. Mubagire ngu carbohydrates neeha omubiri peteroori
gubaase kugyenda, kandi ebishaju nibirugamu amaani. Miniroozi nizihwera aha
kwombeka omubiri n’okuguhwera kukora emirimo yaagwo” Bikagambwa President
Museveni aha kutongoza enkora y’endya erikwetwa Nutrition Action Plan,
omugwa 2011.

 3.4 Baiburi neegira eta aha nkuza y’abaana, kumanyisana, kuriisa abaana
hamwe n’obugabe bwabo?

Ebyahandiikirwe

Okutandika 1:31; 3:18 Matayo 18:6 19:14

Enfumu 22:6; 3:1-2; 23:13-25; 29:15 Abakorinto 1, 6:19

Zaaburi 127:2-4 Abeefeso 6: 1-4

Abarooma 1:30-32, Abakorosaayo 3:20-21

Ebirikukwata aha bazaire: obuzaire n’obureeberezi bw’abaana
n’obujunaanizibwa kuruga ahari Ruhanga; nahabwekyo abazaire tibashemereire
kureka abaana baabo kubonabona. Baine kureeberera abaana baabo nk’oku
kishemereire. Ekyokubanza, abazaire bine kureeta abaana baabo omu iramizo
kwenda ngu beegye ahari Ruhanga hamwe n’ebyahandiikirwe, nkoku Yusufu hamwe
na Mariamu baareesire Yesu omuri Nyaruju (Luka 2:22-24). Yesu wenka
naatugira ati ‘murekye abaana bato baije aharinye’ (Matayo 19:14) kwenda
ngu abariise omugaati gw’eiguru – ekigambo kyo. Baiburi neeyehanangiriza
abazaire kwegyesa abaana baabo oku bashemereire kutwaza, kandi baaba
baakuzire tibashemereire kuba nibahinduraho (Enfumu 22:6). Abazaire baaba
nibakora eki, beine kuba ekyokureeberaho omu maisho g’abaana baabo.
Bashemereire kukora ebirungi ebi abaana baraakope. Abaana ku baraabe endeme
baagira obutahurira, abazaire baine kubahabura obutabarekyerera bakareeba
aha rubaju. Abazaire tibaine kuba nibaisa abaana ekiniga (Abeefeeso 6:14).

Ebirikukwata aha baana n’obugabe bwabo: abaana bashemereire kworobera
abazaire baabo, kandi abo abarikujeemera abazaire baryacwerwa orubanja
(Abarooma 1:30-32). Abaana abahurizi kandi abarikukuratira ebiragiro
n’emihanda ya Ruhanga, aryabaha ekiconco ky’amagara nainga okuramaara
(Enfumu 3:1-3). Abo boona abarikubonabonesa hamwe n’abarikuribatiirira
obugabe bw’abaana, baryaheebwa ekifubiro nk’ekyo ekirikugambwaho omuri
Matayo 18:6 ‘kwonka oriteeza ensibo omwe aha baana bato aba
abarikuunyikiriza, akabareetera kushiisha, haakiri abohwe orurengo omu
maraca, orohwe okuzimu omu Nyanja.’

Ebirikukwata aha nyetegyerezana y’abazaire n’abaana: abazaire baine kugira
obwire bw’okugamba n’abaana baabo kutari kubarekyerera ngu batungye
obuhabuzi ahari banywani baabo bonka. Kandi nabwo, abaana bashemereire
kuronda obuhabuzi aha bazaire baabo obukwatiraine n’omuhanda gw’okutoora
omu magara g’ensi.

Ahabyendya: Ruhanga ku yaahangire eiguru n’ensi, akareeba ahari buri kimwe
eki yaahanga, yaashemererwa. (Okutandika 1:31). Baitu, okushiisha kw’omuntu
kukarugiriraho ekibi. Omu itaka hakaba harugamu ebishaka bikura reero
omuntu arya ebyo (Okutandika 3:18). Tutakariire kyokurya kyona, twine
kumanya ngu emibiri yaitu n’iramizo ry’Omutima/omwoyo orikwera (Abakorinto
1, 6:19-20). Eiramizo riteekwa kuba ryombekirwe n’amabaare g’agumire hamwe
n’obukugu, nikwo tushemereire kuriisa emibiri yaitu. Twine kuriisa emibiri
yaitu n’ebyokurya ebitaine bishaju bingi kandi bitaine shukaari nyingi,
kwonka biine ebiriisa nka (proteins, vitamins and iron) kandi biteekirwe
gye, okwenda ngu emibiri yaanyu egire amaani g’okuhereza Ruhanga omunsi
egi.

OMUTWE GWA 4: AMAGARA G’OKUTEERANA OMU MINYEETO

4.1 Enturukiriro

Abaana bato nibaahurwamu omu bicweka bishatu: abaana (kuruga ahari 0 kuhika
aha myaka 18); abari omu mushogoyo (kuruga aha myaka 12 kuhika ahari 19)
hamwe n’abairira abakuru (kuruga aha myaka 20-24). Obuzibu oburi omu magara
g’okuzaara kuzibiire eminyeeto mingi kurugwamu ekyakubaire nikibarugamu.
Ekyoburemeezi, eminyeeto ahu yaakubaire neeyejumbira omu by’entunguuka
kandi etakikore kigireeteire kufubira enkuraakurana yaabo kandi obwo
nibatuura omu bwire burimu empindahinduka kuruga omu bwana kutaaha omu
magara ga bukuru.[6] Ebyetaago by’abaana bato ni bingi. Ekanisa eine
omurimo muhango gw’okuhwera gavumenti omu kuta amateeka na za puroguraamu
zaayo omu nkora ezikwatiraine n’abaana abari omu mushogoyo. Amakanisa nigo
myanya ahu abaana bato bashemereire kwegyera emicwe mirungi, bakahaburwa
aha ntwaza kandi bakateekwamu omutima gw’okwekunda kandi n’okwegyesebwa aha
nshonga nyingi z’amagara. Kwongyerera ahari ekyo, hariho ekyetengo
kyokwongyera aha bikwatiraine n’enshonga z’abashaija n’abakazi, amagara
g’okuteerana n’okuzaara otaireho kwegyesibwa aha birikukwata aha kakooko
karikureeta siriimu omu mashomero, omu byaro, kwongyera amaani omu
kujanjaba magara g’okuteerana hamwe n’okuzaara, kuhiga eminyeeto kuba
abeebembezi omu nshonga z’okubinga/kukyendeeza obworo, hamwe
n’empindahinduka y’ebitongore by’amagara.

4.2 Oburemeezi obw’abari omu mushogoyo barikushanga omu magara g’okuteerana
n’okuzaara

Kugira emize mibi y’okufa agateerana ahabw’okuburwa obuhabuzi aha
by’okuteerana

Okutwariza hamwe, abazaire abaingi tibarikubaasa kugamba n’abaana baabo
rwatu aha nshonga y’okuteerana. Ekirugiremu, emishogoyo neeyiha obuhabuzi
obukwatiraine n’okuteerana aha banywani nainga omu b’orwingano. Akacweka
kakye k’eminyeeto akarikushoma kakamara siniya niko karikwegyera enshonga
y’okuteerana omu ishomero, kwonka nabwo beegyeho kakye aha kwetegyereza
amagara g’okuteerana kwonka kutari kwega aha micwe n’emitwarize
y’okuteerana.

Obwire obwingi, eminyeeto yahika omu myaka y’omushogoyo, neetandika kutunga
obutumwa bugwire, kandi bukuhabisa kuruga omuri bagyenzi bayo, oburikukwata
aha kuteerana n’okwenda kumanya ekirikubaho bwanyima y’okuteerana. Omu
matawuni, enshemeza hamwe nokworekwa ebishushani byobushegu, ebishushani
ebirikutambura anka za firimu, omumpapura zamakuru byaburikanya kandi
naburihantu hona. Ebyo biretaire eminyeto eri omumushogoyo kutunga
entekateeka kuterana aha bwobutumwa bugwire obubarikutunga. Ekirikurugamu,
nikiretera egyo minyeto yaza omukuterana kwenda kuteeka omunkora obutumwa
obyo. Ahanyima yabyo beshanga batunga enda zibatenzire hamwe nendwara
nyingi.

ENDWARA ZOBUSHAMBANI IZI ABAANA BATO BARIKUTUNGIRA OMUKUTERANA AHA
BWEBIRABO.

Abaana bato/eminyeeto nyingyi neekwatwa oburwaire bw’okuteeranaotwariiremu
n’akakooko ka sirimu ahabw’enshonga y’abashaija/abakazi bakuru kuteerana
n’obwana buto. Kurugiirira ahari ripoota ya Minisiture y’Ebyamagara omu
kucondooza kwayo kw’omwaka gwa 2009, neegira ngu abaana abari kukirayo
obwingyi, nibateterana bakiri aha mwaka y’ahansi munonga. Neegira ngu
ebicweka 17% y’abaana abaine emwaka erikutandikira ahari etano kuhitsya
emyaka ikumi (5-10) bakaba batandiikire kuteerana. Reero, omuhendo agwa
baana abari aha gati yemwaka 11-15 nigweyongyera kuza ahaiguru kuhitsya
ebicweka 19%. Embeera egi neyerarikiriza n’obu harabe hariho amateeka
agarikugira ngu kuteerana n’omwana atakahikize emyaka 18 naaba yaatoroboza
kandi naakwatsibwa omushango gw’amaani okurugirira aha maateeka nebiragiro
bya Uganda. Minisiture y’ebyamagara omugwa 2009 hamwe n’Ekitongore ekine
obuvunanizibwa aha kubara abantu, omu 2011, nibigira ngu abaana 4 abari
kuteerana, omwe aharibo, naahambwa nainga nibamugyema kuteerana
ateekundiire. Neema n’abandi bahandiiki omugwa 2004, (Neema at-el 2004)
nibagira ngu abaishiki abari omu mushogoyo abaine emyaka eri ahagati ya 18-
24, buri mwishiki omwe (1) ahari bana (4) abari kuteerana abeine emwaka 18,
ebicweka 50% naatungiramu enda.

Kugira Enda N’okushwerwa aha Myaka Mito

Uganda niryo eihanga eriine omuhendo gw’ahaiguru gw’abaana abarikutwara
enda bakiri bato omu nsi yoona, eki obumwe n’obumwe nikiretwaho okushwerwa
bakiri bato ekindi kirikurugiiria omu kibi ky’obushambani. Ekanisa
t’erikwikiriza kuteerana kw’omuringo gwona okutari ahagati y’abashweriine.
Entaasya nkye eri aha rurengo rw’amaka neereetera eminyeeto yaagumirwa
embeera y’obworo obwo ebareetera omu kushwerwa bakiri bato. Kwongyera
ahari ekyo, abazaire nabo obworo ku burikubaita, basharamu kusindikirira
obwishiki buto ngu bushwerwe nabwanyima batungyemu enjugano, abandi
bahabisibwa, bashwerwa ba muzeeyi ahabw’okubabeihabaihisa obugaiga.
Ahabw’okugira ngu abaishiki abarikukira obwingi tibaine bwegyese n’obukigu
bw’emirimo erikushashura gye, beeshanga nibaatuura n’abazeehi ahabw’okugira
ngu biine sente z’okubareeberera, abamwe barikubarwa nk’abakunzi baabo,
abandi bafa kutuura nabo omu bushwere butatongoziibwe.

Abaishiki ku barikugira enda, abazaire n’abataahi baabo nibareeba omwana
w’obwishiki nk’omushobya, ekitari ha mwojo we, kandi obwo omwojo niwe
orikureetera omwishiki yaaza omu kikorwa ky’okuteerana nawe. Ekikuru
munonga ekishemereire kumanywa, eminyeeto y’abasigazi abari omu mushogoyo
nibagumizamu batarikumanya ebirikukwata aha magara g’okuteerana n’okuzaara
ebirikubakwataho. Ekiraarugyemu, abasigazi tibarikubaasa kukora gye aha
nshonga ezirikukwata aha kuteerana. Nahabwekyo, nibeeshanga omu mbeera
y’okutweka abaishiki enda bakiri bato.

4.3 Ebirikuruga omuri Baiburi biine akakwate n’amagara g’okuteerana
n’okuzaara

Ebyahandiikirwe

Abareevi 18:22; 20:13; Zaaburi 119:9; Enfumu 12:26; 20:1; Omurangirizi 11:9-
10 Ekyeshongoro kya Sulemaani 2:7; Matayo 25:14-30; 1 Abakorinto 6:9-20;
7:31; 10:31; 13:4

Abarooma 1:26-27; Abeefeeso 6:1-3 na 1 Abateesoronika 4:31

Kurabura eminyeeto: Baiburi neerabura aha mashemererwa g’eminyeeto omu
Muburizi 11:9-10. Eminyeeto bashemereire kweteekateekyera embeera ya bukuru
ahabw’okuba ey’obuto neebagyendaho buri kaanya. “Abaana bato,
mushemerererwe omu buto bwanyu, mukore kyona ebi murikubaasa hamwe
n’okukuratira emitima yaanyu eki erikwenda. Kwonka, mwijukye ngu Ruhanga
naija kubasharira emishango ahari buri kyona eki muraakore.” Eki
nikimanyisa ngu eminyeeto egyo neija kwefuuza ahabw’ebikorwa byona ebibi
ebi eraabe ekozire. Eminyeeto eshemereire kuronda abanywani b’arikugihabura
bakagiha obwengye.

Banywani b’eminyeeto baine kihango eki barikukora aha minyeeto egyo
ahabwokuba nibahurizana munonga kukira oku barikuhurizana n’abeegyesa hamwe
n’abazaire baabo. Nahabwekyo, ekikuru munonga kiri ngu eminyeeto neehaburwa
kugira abanywani b’emicwe mirungi. Baiburi neeyegyesa, omu kitabo ky’Enfumu
12:26 ngu ‘Ohikiriire ashemereire kutoorana munywani we n’obwegyendesereza
ahabwokuba emihanda ya sitaani neebahabisa.’

Yehare kuteerana n’obwishiki buto ahabw’okububaihabaiha otwariiremu
n’ekyomushaija kuteerana n’ondiijo

Baiburi neegyegyesa ngu omubiri n’obutuuro wa mutima orikwera, nahabwekyo,
omubiri gwawe n’ogwokuhimbisa Ruhanga. Baiburi neeyongyera kurabura abo
abarikuteeranira omu kibi omu Bakorinto 1, 6:9 “Timurikumanya ku
abatahikiriire bataritaaha mu bukama bwa Ruhanga? Murekye kwebaiha, abakora
ebitakwatiraine n’obushambani; abarikuramya emandwa, abashambani
n’ebitingwa.”

Eminyeeto eri omu mushogoyo eshemereire kumanya engabirano zaayo kandi
ekazikozesa: eminyeeto eine kumanya engabirano zaayo kandi ezeesimiremu
ahabwokuba nizishemeza kandi ni nungi omu maisho ga Ruhanga. Omuri Matayo
25:14-30 Yesu naashoboorora omu nfumu y’engabirano n’oku omuntu yaakubaasa
kukozesa engabirano ye.

Kyerererwa kuteerana: eminyeeto eshemereire kwegyesibya kugira ngu ‘ngaaha’
aha nshonga y’okuteerana etakahikire mu bushwere, nk’oku Baiburi erikugamba
aha baana b’abaishik omu Kyeshongoro kya Sulemaani 2:7: Bahara ba
Yerusalemu ’mwe, nimurahire esirabo n’ebuguma z’empara, ku mutarikwija
kusisiimura nkunzi yangye; n’obu kwakuba kumwimusya atakeeyendeire.”

OMUTWE 5:

OBUGABE N’AMAGARA G’OKUTEERANA N’OKUZAARA

5.1 Amagara g’okuteerana n’okuzaara hamwe n’obugabe nikimanyisa ki?

Ni kikuru ngu abantu beihanga ryona bamanye kandi bashemerererwe omu bugabe
bw’amagara g’okuteerana n’okuzaara. Uganda ekata omukono aha ndagaano
ezirikugyenderera aha biragiro n’okugyendera ahari Konsitityoshoni ahu
obugabe bw’abantu boona burikumanywa. Obugabe bw’enyini oburikukwata ha
magara g’okuteerana n’okuzaara, kurugirira aha kitongore ICDP
nibushoboororwaho ahaifo:

Obugabe hamwe N’amagara G’okuteerana N’okuzaara

Obugabe hamwe n’amagara g’okuteerena n’okuzaara, okurugirira ahari ICPD,
nibwo bugabe bw’abantu obwikiriziibwe omu biragiro by’eihanga
n’omubihandiiko by’obugabe bw’abantu aha eidaara ry’ensi yona nka
okurangirira kw’obugabe bw’abantu bona (Universal Declaration of Human
Rights) nkoku bihandiikirwe ahaifo:

 • Obwegyese, obukugu, obuhwezi n’obuhereza, hamwe n’okumanya
 ebirikwetaagisa kusharaho aha by’okuteerana birikukwatagana
 n’emitwarize yaabo;
 • Ekitiinisa ky’omubiri hamwe n’okweshariraho kuza omu kuteerana;
 • Kutunga obuheereza bw’emiringo mingi bw’amagara g’okuteerana
 n’okuzaara;
 • Kweshariraho n’obujunaanizibwa omuhendo, omwanya n’obwire
 bw’okutungiramu abaana hamwe n’okumanya oku oraabikore.
 • Kutunga omutindo gw’ahaigiru gw’amagara g’okuteerana n’okuzaara;
 • Kusharaho okurikukwata aha kuzaara hatariho kushoroora, kagyema nainga
 katabanguko.

5.2 Okwega kuhikire aha bugabe bw’okuteerana n’amagara g’okuzaara kurimu
ki?

Ebiri ahaifo n’obutumwa bukuru obushemereire kuba niburuga omu beebembezi
b’ediini hamwe n’abarikukozesa ekitabo eki ebirikukwata aha kwega aha
bugabe bw’eby’okuteerana n’amagara g’okuzaara:

 a) Obuhangwa bw’omuntu n’ekiconco kikuru kuruga ahari Ruhanga
 ekirikutandikira obu omuntu yaazaarwa kuhika aha kufa. Obuhangwa
 bw’omuntu burimu endeebeka, emiteekateekyere, entwaza, endamya,
 obuntu, n’ebindi bintu ebirikureka twaba nk’oku turi. Tihariho muntu
 weena oine kuba naashoshorwa ahabw’obuhangwa bwe, oburugo, ediini nari
 embeera y’amagara ge.
 b) Abantu boona, abakazi n’abashaija, nibashushanisa obugabe
 bw’okuteerana hamwe n’okuhikwaho, kutunga obuheereza n’okumanya
 ebirikukwata aha magara gaabo g’okuzaara. Nahabwekyo, tihariho omuntu
 weena ashemereire kwemereza, kuzibira, kuteganisa, hamwe n’okwima
 mugyenzi waawe obugabe obwagambwa ahaiguru.
 c) Buri muntu arikuha obuhereza aine ekigyendererwa ky’okuha obuhereza
 aha by’amagara, ashemereire kubuheera omu muringo gutari kushoshora
 nainga kuhenda obugabe obw’agambwa ahaiguru.
 d) Buri mushaija nari omukazi aine obugabe bw’okurinda kusharamu aha
 nshonga z’okuteerana n’amagara g’okuzaara hamwe n’okumanya omuhendo
 gw’abaana abashemereire kuzaarwa hatariho kutiina kwona.
 e) Abaana baine obugabe bw’okuhikwaho obutumwa oburikukwata aha kuteerana
 n’amagara g’okuzaara kandi abazaire baabo bashemereire kutaho oburyo
 bwona obu baraakozese kugamba nabo.
 f) Omuka, omushaija n’omukazi bombi baine eiraka eririkwingana aha
 kusharamu omuhendo gw’abaana hamwe n’obureeberezi obubashemereire.
 g) Ku hakubaho obutahikiiriza bugabe bw’okuteerana n’okuzaara, omushaija
 n’omukazi bombi baine kuhurirwa ab’ebiragiro.
 h) Buri muntu weena aine obugabe bw’okwenyigira nainga kwanga kwenyigira
 omu ntwaza z’entuura y’abantu hatariho bugambe bw’okwanga ebimwe aha
 ntuura y’abantu ebi barikuteekateeka ngu nibibaasa kubakora kubi aha
 magara g’okuzaara.
 i) Omubonano, okwejumbira, obwegyese hamwe n’okumanya ti buyambi nainga
 buhereza bwonka. Okuhikibwaho ebi n’obugabe bw’omuntu omu
 by’okuteerana n’okuzaara.

5.3 Endagiiriro omu Baiburi ezirikukwata aha bugabe bw’okuteerana
n’okuzaara

Ebyahandiikirwe

Okutandika 1:26-27; 5:2

Ebyakozirwe Entumwa 10:28

Malaki 2:16

1 Abakorinto 7:1-40

1 Abatesoronika 4:3-7

Boona bakahangwa omu kyeshusha kya Ruhanga. Abashaija, abakazi n’abaana
boona bakahangwa omu kishushani kya Ruhanga, n’obugabe bw’amagara
burikwingana, n’okuronda amashemererwa (Okutandika 5:2). Nahabwekyo,
tihariho n’omwe owaakubaasa kugira obugabe bwingi kukiza ondiijo nainga
kukozesa obushoborozi bwe kwima nari shi kumaraho obugabe bw’ondiijo. Yesu
akareetaho okwingana kwa boona omu maisho ga Ruhanga. Tihariho muntu weena
okyenirwe nainga orikukundwa munonga (Ebyakozirwe entumwa, 10:28).

Kuteerana omu bufumbo: okuteerana n’okwabo bonka abari omu bushwere kandi
kuteerana aheeru y’obushwere n’okushambana, ekintu ekirikuhenda ebiragiro
bya Ruhanga. Kwonka ahabw’okugira ngu hariho obushambani bwingi, buri
mukazi ashemereire kugira omushaija we, kandi omushaija n’omukazi bombi
bashemereire okuhikiiriza emirimo yaabo hatariho kuhakanisagana. Kwihaho
baikirizana kukikora ahabw’okwenda kumara obwire barikushaba (Abakorinto 1,
7:3-5).

Obugabe bw’okushwera/kushwerwa nari okutashwera/obutashwerwa. Kimwe aha
bugabe bw’omuringo nk’ogu n’okushwera/kushwerwa nainga
okutashwera/okutashwerwa. Reka omutima gwawe gutasya n’ekyetengo
ky’okushwera, shwera ahabwokuba hariho obukozi bw’ebibi bwingi. Kwonka,
omuntu ku yaakwehayo kuhereza Ruhanga, naabaasa kugumira aho
atashwire/atashwirwe.

Amaka okushenyuka: ahabw’abashwereine, Paul omuhikiriire naahandiika ngu
omukyara tarikwikirizibwa kusigaho iba, kandi n’omwami tarikwikirizibwa
kubinga omukazi we (1 Abakorinto, 7:10-11). Haaba hariho omuntu
oshwire/oshwerwe omuntu Atari mwikiriza haza akatunga ekyetengo ky’okuruga
omu bushwere, naaba naikirizibwa (Abakorinto 1, 7:12-15). Kwonka,
arikukimanya ngu Ruhanga naayanga kushenya amaka (Malaki 2:16).

Rukundo hamwe n’obuhurizi omu bushwere: Ekikuru munonga omu kukuuma obugabe
bw’okuteerana omu bushwere n’obwabaami kumanya oku bashemereire kutuura
n’abakyara baabo omu mitwarize mirungi n’okubaha ekitiinisa kutari kuba
n’ebyetengo ebyakubaasa kureetaho obushambani. (Abatesoronika 1, 4:4-7).
Ruhanga naatweta omu buhikiriire butari bukozi bw’ebibi hamwe n’okuha
abandi ekitiinisa.

OMUTWE GWA 6: AKAKOOKO KA SIRIIMI HAMWE N’EZINDI NDWARA EZIRIKURABIRA OMU
KUTEERANA

6.1 Enturukiiriro

Akakooko ka siriimu omu bantu nikareetera abaserukare b’omubiri kuhwa
amaani na bwanyima kireetera omubiri gwatahirirwa oburwaire bwa buri kika,
ekirikurugamu okufa. Oburwaire obwo nibweyoreka nka: omushwija gwa buri
bwire, omubiri guteerwa ebihere, amaisho gakyendeera aha kuhweza, eishokye
rihanyuka kandi rihindura n’erangi, okunyangarara, kuhika aha bicweka 10%,
okwirukana okutarikukira kumara emyezi eri ahaiguru y’eshatu. Kandi obwire
obwingi, orukororo rwa kafuba (TB) narwo nirwiziramu. Endwara ya siriimu
ekamanywa kurungi omu Uganda omu mwaka gwa 1982 omuri Rakai, etyo yaaguma
neeyetooroora n’omuri disiturikiti ezeetooroire Rakai na bwanyima,
yaamarayo Uganda yoona. Omu kubanza, endwara ya siriimu ekaba neeyetwa
siriimu kurugirira aha kunyangarara oku yaareeteire abantu abu yaabandize
kukwata. Abantu abarikuhika omu mitwaro 80 bakaitwa siriimu, ku gwagiire
kuhika omu gwa 2000. Obwahati, omuhendo gw’abantu abarikukwatwa akakooko ka
siriimu nigukyeyongyera munonga. Omu mwaka 2009 gwonka, gukahisya emitwaro
24 z’abantu abaakwasirwe akakooko ka siriimu. Obwahati, enamba y’abaana
enfuuzi neeteeberezebwa kuba eri 1,100,000 abu abazaire baabo baisirwe
siriimu (Gavumenti ya Uganda, 2009). Okucondooza okuhwire nikworeka ku
omuhendo gw’abantu abarikukwatwa siriimu gukiriyo nigweyongyera kandi
ekirikutiinisa munonga n’abantu abari omu bushwere hamwe n’abandi bantu
abakuru.

Ekirikuretera omuhendo gw’abarwaire siriimu kweyongyera ni:

 1. Kumanyiira n’okutuura n’akakooka ka siriimu ekirikureetaho abantu
 baamanya ngu kutunga akakooko ka siriimu ti mize mibi;
 2. Abana bato munonga abari ahagati y’emyaka 15-30 baine omururu n’amaani
 g’okuteerana kandi tibarikwekuuma (kandi eki nikireetwaho obutumwa
 oburikuhagira enkozesa y’akapiira obugizire eiraka kukiza obutumwa
 oburikugamba aha kwekuuma).
 3. Abantu abari omubushwere kwenyigira omu bushambani: Ebizibu byona
 nibijumirirwa ahabantu abeyongiire kugira omururu gwokuterana aha
 by’omukoperezo ogubeihire omutawuni ezeeyongyeire obwingi hamwe
 nokushemezibwa oburango omuri zasinema, omubibanda bya firimu, hamwe
 n’abantu kwesiga emibazi ngu ebijuma ebiriho nibibasa kubisaho omuntu
 obwiire buraingwa. Ebizibu ebindi ni: abaishiki bato kuteerana
 n’abamuzeeyi.

Emihanda Akakooko ka Siriimu n’ezindi Ndwara zirikurabamu kujanjaara

Okukira obwingi, hariho emihanda 4 siriimu omu erikurabira;

 i. Kuteerana hatariho muntu akoziise akapiira
 ii. Eshagama y’omuntu orwire siriimu yaajwangana n’ey’omuntu otarwire
 siriimu nawe neemukwata;
 iii. Omwana kugiiha ahari nyina;
 iv. Kukozes emisyo, empitirizo n’ebindi bikwato ebyakozesebwa omuntu
 orwire siriimu omu kaanya kakye bakabikozesa n’aha ndiijo.

Kwetegyereza gye oburemeezi obu siriimu ereesire

Ekikuru munonga, n’okumanya ngu omuntu ku arikutunga akakooko ka siriimu
abonabona kumara obwire buraingwa obwo otaireho n’okurwaraguzibwa
ekirikureetera abaserukare abarikukuuma omubiri gwe gaagyenda nibahwa
amaani mpora-mpora, kimureetera n’okufa ahabw’okuba tihariho mubazi gwa
siriimu. Ebyo byona ku birikubaho, amaka googwo muntu orwaire siriimu
nigaraba omu buzibu bwingi nka: okushohoza munonga, okwerarikirira munonga,
obutaijura omu bantu, otaireho n’okushororwa obwo baaba nibamureeberera.
Omurwaire wa siriimu naarekwa aho ataine n’eki arikubaasa kwekorera nari
shi kuhereza. Nahabwekyo, naaremwa kugira kyona eki yaakora kwongyera aha
ntunguuka ye ey’amaka ge, ey’ekyanga kye hamwe neihanga rye okutwarira
hamwe.

Obwire

Emyaka 0

Emyaka 1-5

Emyaka 5-7

Omwaka 6 na 7th

Siriimu aha murimo

Omukozi naakwatwa

 Amagara mabi gatandika

Omukozi areka omurimo, afa

 Eki siriimu ekozire omu bitongore

Tihariho buzibu bwihaho obwerarikirira aha murimo

Kushashurira obujunjabi otaireho na insuwa hamwe n’obwire

[pic]kushashura kwemereza omukozi, kushahura ez’orufu, hamwe n’abakozi
abandi kuhwa amaani

 Kushohoreza okuhandiika omukozi, kutendeka abakozi abasya, kufeerwa obukugu
 n’amagyezi n’okukoragye

6.2 Obutumwa bukuru burikukwata aha kakooko ka siriimu
i) kuha bashwereine amaani n’obwesigye bw’okukyebeza eshagama babaase
kumanya embeera y’amagara gaabo.

ii) Omwe aharibo yaashanga ataine kakooko ka siriimu naabaasa kutuura
ayerinzire arekyere aho kuteerana nainga abe omwesigwa aha mukundwa we.

iii) Omukazi yaaba arwaire siriimu kandi aine enda, ashemereire kuza omu
irwariro atungye emibazi n’obuhwezi obundi kuzibira akakooka ka siriimu
obutakwata omwana we okiri omunda.

iv) Haaba hariho abakundaine abarwaire siriimu, haza bashwereine,
bashemereire kukozesa akapiira kwenda kwerinda obutagaruka kuturizana
oburwaire, kandi bahamire aha mibazi ei baabahaire.

v) Omuntu yaaba arwaire siriimu ashemereire kurya kurungi ebintu
nk’ebijuma, emboga, ebyokurya ebirimu ekiriisa nka puroteyini, sitaaki,
ebirikureeta amagara, kumurinda gye kandi aine kuringaaniza omu byokurya
obwire bwona. Ekyo nikiija kwongyera obujanjabi amaani reero abaase
kuhangaara obwire buraingwa. Ekyo kandi ni kiija kumuha amaani abaase
kukora emirimo y’okwebeisaho, okwetunguura, okutunguura amaka ge, ekyanga
kye hamwe neihanga rye.

vi) Abantu boona bashemereire kwehara okuteerana kwa buriijo, kukozesa kubi
amaarwa nari shi ebibazibazi ahabw’okugira ngu byo nibireetera omubiri
gw’omuntu gwarahukirwa kukwatwa siriimu.

vii) Hereza obuhwezi hamwe n’emibazi abaine akakooko ka siriimu. Yamba
amaka g’abaafeerwa omukundwa waabo kandi teekaho obukuumi burikumara aha
bintu ebi omugyenzi yaasiga ahabw’abantu be abu yaasiga enyima.

viii) Omwe aha bashwereine yaayekyebeza akashanga aine siriimu ashemereire
kumanyisa mugyenzi we embeera ye. Ekyo nikibayamba kurwanisa endwara hamwe
n’okuhereza omurwaire obuhwezi bwona obu arikwenda.

6.3 OBUJURIZI OMURI BAIBURI OBUKUGAMBA AHA KAKOOKO KA SIRIIMU N’EZINDI
EZIRIKURABIRA OMU KUTEERANA

Ebyahandiikirwe:

Abareevi 26:16 1 Abatesoronika 4:3-7

Ebiragiro 5:18; 28:22 1 Abakorinso 7:2

2 Samwiri 11:27 Abarooma 14:1

Luka 4:40 Abagaratia 6:8

Ebyakozirwe Entumwa 10:28

Akakooko ka siriimu obwire obwingi nikareetwa ekibi ky’okuteerana:
nitutuura omu nsi eijwiremu obukozi bw’ebibi bwingi nk’oku Paul
omuhikiriire arikugira omu Bakirinto 1, 7:2. Omunsi egi, ni kikuru ngu buri
mushaija n’omukazi we baine kuguma hamwe omu bushwere buri omwe ahamiire
ahari mugyenzi we. “Ahabw’okugira ngu omunsi omu harimu obukozi bw’ebibi
bwingi, buri mushaija aine kuhamira aha mukazi we, kandi na buri mukazi
akahamira aha mushaija we.”

38 | Human sexuality and Gender Issues Handbook
Baiburi neerabura aha bukozi bw’ebibi omu kuteerana hamwe n’ekifubiro kyabo
boona abari omu bushambani omu Bagaratiya 6:8. “Ku murasige omu musiri
gw’amairu g’ensi, nimwija kusharuuramu rufu.” Ruhanga naarabura aha ndwara
ezitarikukira eziriija omu nsi ahabw’obushambani omu Bareevi 26:16,
“Ninyija kubasindikira endwara zitarikukira n’emishwija eribahumya amaisho
kandi ekashiisha emibiri yaanyu. Baiburi neeshobooorora gye ngu obushambani
tiburikushemeza Ruhanga omuri Samwiri 11:27.

:Mutarishoroora abantu abaine akakooko ka siriimu: Baiburi nabwo neegira
ngu tihariho oshemereire kushoroora abantu abarwaire. Omu bwire bwa Yesu,
abantu abaabaire baba baine endwara nk’ebibembe, hamwe n’ezindi ndwara
bakaba babashoroora, kandi we Yesu akabooreka rukundo n’embabazi kandi
yaabakiza (Luka 4:40) Titushemereire kushoroora abantu abaine akakooko ka
siriimu nainga abaarwaire siriimu n’ezindi ndwara z’okuteerana. Ebyakozirwe
entumwa 10:28 abahandiiki nibagira ngu “…tinshemereire kweta muntu weena
otahikiriire nainga ngu t’ashemeire.” Baiburi neegira ngu abantu boona
bakashiisha kandi nibakora ebi Ruhanga atarikwenda, kandi ngu okujunwa
n’ahabw’embabazi za Ruhanga, tihabw’ebiturikukora.” Ni kikuru kugira ngu
abantu abaine akakooko ka siriimu batakaacwerwa orubanja. Abarooma 14:1
neegira ngu, “Mwikirize abo abaine okwikiriza kukye, mutarikubacwera
rubanja.”

Muhwerane kureeba ngu timwakwatwa kakooko ka siriimu n’endwara ezindi
z’okuteerana. Oburemeezi bw’akakooko ka siriimu n’obwa buri munya Uganda
weena, tibwabo bonka abarwaire siriimu. Turi amahe omu nkambi ya Yesu.
Twine kwezirika tukeetangira ekibi. (Abeebeso 5:6). Baiburi neetwegyesa
kugumisiririza buri omwe omu Bakorosiya 3:13 n’omu Bagaratiya 6:2 “Hwera
oyekorere omugugu gw’amugyenzi waawe, omu muringo ogwo, noija kuba
noohikiriza ekiragiro kya Kristo.

39 | Human sexuality and Gender Issues Handbook
 EKICWEKA KYA 7: ENKURA Y’ABANTU HAMWE N’ENTUNGUUKA

7.1 Enturukiriro

 Enkura Y’abantu (Gyenda) nikimanyisa enkorengana
 eri ahagati y’abashaija n’abakazi nk’oku
 erikumanywa omu bantu. Enkura y’abantu
 neeyorekyerera oku turikuteekateeka aha maka gaitu,
 ebyanga ebiturimu hamwe neihanga ryaitu.
 Okwingingana omu bashaija n’abakazi nikmanyisa ngu
 abakazi n’abashaija boona baheebwe ekitiinisa kandi
 batwarwe nk’abarikwingana reero boona baheebwe
 omugisha gurikwingana omu by’entunguuka.
 Omwinganoingano omu bashaija n’abakazi, ekyokubanza
 kya byona, n’obugabe bwa buri omwe. Abakazi
 bashemereire kuheebwa ekitiinisa, kandi bakarema
 kutuura omu kutiina abashaija obwire bwona.

Kwongyera amaani n’obushoborozi abakazi n’ekintu kikuru munonga omu kubinga
obworo hamwe n’omu ntunguuka. Kishemerire kwetegyerezibwa ngu ebikwatiraine
n’enkura y’abantu tibirikukwata ha bugabe n’abakazi bwonka. Oru n’orweto
rw’okumanya ngu, n’obu haraabe hariho okuha omugisha buri omwe omu
ntunguuka, abakazi bagumire enyima (ahabw’enshonga nyingi) omu kutunga
hamwe n’omukweyanja omu migisha y’okukora waagyeragyeranisa n’ abashaija

 Abakazi ni kimwe kya kabiri ky’abantu boona abari omu nsi kandi nibakora
 emirimo erikwingana bibiri bya kashatu (66%) by’obwire oburikukorerwamu
 kandi batungye obucweka 10% aha ntasya y’ensi yoona hamwe n’akacweka 1%
 k’esente z’okukozesa. (World Vision, 2011)8

8http://wvasiapacific.org/gender/gender-and-development.html

40 | Human sexuality and Gender Issues Handbook
 7.2 Ebyenkura y’abantu n’entunguuka omu Uganda

Enkora y’amateeka

Uganda ekata omukono aha mateeka goona ag’okwihaho okushoshora abakazi
(CEDAW) agaakozirwe omugwa 1979, omuri Beijing hamwe n’ebindi bihandiiko
by’aharurengo rw’ensi. Omugwa 1997 ekiragiro ekirikukwata aha nkura
y’abantu omu Uganda kikakorwa ahabw’okwenda kuteereeza enshonga z’enkura
y’abantu omu ntunguuka. Kwenda ngu enshonga z’enkura y’abantu zateebwa omu
nteekateeka y’entunguuka y’eihanga, enkora ya Uganda erikwetwa Uganda’s
Poverty Eradication Action Plan (PEAP) n’eyagisikiire National Development
Plan (NDP) ekashoboorora kandi yaata ebyokoreka ngu enshonga z’enkura
y’abantu zaateebwa omu nkora. Kuruga obwo, ebintu ebirikworeka ngu enshonga
z’enkura y’abantu zaateebwa omu nkora biakateebwa omu puroguraamu ezindi
nka Peace, Recovery and Development (PRDP).

 Ebyenkura y’abantu n’entunguuka hamwe n’emirabanamu omu Uganda

 a) Obutaringaaniza omu kutunga obuheereza: Kuruga aha kuheza eidaara rya
 purayimare, kuhika aha kuhayahayanira omugisha g’okwega hamwe
 n’okuhika aha kutunga ebintu n’obuhwezi bw’esente, hagumireho
 obutaringaaniza bwingi ahagati y’omukazi n’omushaija. Ahabw’enshonga
 zirikuruga omu entuura y’abantu, omwishiki, obwire obwingi, nayimwa
 obugabe n’omugisha gw’okutunga ebintu ebikuru by’okumubaisaho
 nk’eitaka nainga kukozesa esente zeeka.
b) Kubonabonesa abakazi otairemu n’okubakozesa kuteerana nabo batekundiire:

Kurugiirira ahari Uganda’s Demographic Health Survey 2006, ebicweka 60%
by’abakazi omu Uganda nibabonaabona. Omu Uganda y’amatemba, n’obu endwano
eziriyo zitaine kakwate n’ kubonababonesa abakazi omu maka, (nikubarirwa
aha bucweka 54% omu matemba), kuburwa obukuumi nikireetaho embeera
y’okubonabona kw’abakazi. Eby’entuura y’abantu ebimwe birekire embeera
y’okubonabonesa abakazi yaaguma omu maka kandi obwire obwingi nibiguma biri
ebihama by’omuka ahabw’okutiina kushwara n’okushekyererwa.

Enshonga nkuru ezirikukire kureetaho okubonabonesa abakazi nari abashaija
omu maka ziine emizi omu nyikiriza y’ekyanga kyona ngu omushaija aine kuba
aine ‘obugabe bw’okusinga’ omukazi.

 c) Okushara ebicweka by’omubiri: Abantu b’ebicweka ebimwe omu Uganda
 biine emize emwe neemwe omu ntuura y’abantu ekirimu kandi neekikuzibwa
 munonga n’obu eraabe neeretaho obuzibu omu magara g’abantu obwo
 oteebirwe obw’akakooko ka siriimu. Eki kireesireho okuteganisa amagara
 g’abantu. Abamwe nibaihamu amaino, (aboojo n’abaishiki) aha myaka
 mito, abandi nibafumura amabeere abaana baaba bakiri abeereere.
 Enganda ezimwe nizishara ebicweka by’ekihama aha baishiki. Obwire
 obwingi, ebikorwa nk’ebi bireesireho oburemeezi aha magara g’abakazi,
 obumwe nibwiziraho nainga obundi bwija bwanyima burimu okujwa
 eshagama, kutaahirirwa obukooko burikurwaza, kuburwa ebisha
 by’okuzaara hamwe n’obugumba obwo oteebirwe n’ebiteekateeko bibi.

 d) Kwongyerwa amaani omu ntaasya n’enshohoza: N’obu abakazi baraabe
 nibataho ebicweka 80% aha kukorera amaka, obwire obwingi, omushaija
 niwe arikusharaho oku entaasya y’eka eraakozesebwe ataikiriziine na
 mukazi. Eki nikireetera abakazi abaingi baaguma nibaheebwa baiba
 reero obwire bwingi batarikubaasa kweshariraho nainga kugira ebintu
 by’okubaisaho eeka. Hariho n’abashaija abamwe abatarikubaasa kwikiriza
 bakazi kuza kukora nainga kweyongyerayo omu kwega. Ni kihango
 ekirikwetaagisa kukorwa aha nshonga z’okwongyera abakazi amaani aha
 rurengo rw’eka, haaba hariho okutensa n’abashaija n’okubashoboororera.

 e) Kwejumbira omu by’obutegyeki: Eiteeka eririkukwata aha nkura y’abantu
 hamwe n’enteekateeka yaakyo byongyeire amaani omu kuteekateekyera
 eby’enkura y’abantu obwo harikubaho okutendeka abo abarikuteekateeka
 n’okuta omu nkora eiteeka eri, otaireho n’okushwijuma embariirira
 y’enshonga z’enkura y’abantu aha rurengo rwa gavumenti z’ebicweka. Omu
 Uganda y’erigyenda, harimu abarikujwekyera abakazi ahari buri idaara
 ry’obutegyeki – kuruga ahari Kansara Wabakazi kuhika aha bajwekyerwa
 omu Ishengero. (Sipiika wa Paramenti ya 9). Kwonka, hakiriho
 oburemeezi bwokukora okufayo omu by’obutegyeki kuha obuhagizi
 n’amaani g’omukazi w’aha rurengo rw’eka hamwe n’okwihayo omwana
 w’omwishiki.

42 | Human sexuality and Gender Issues Handbook

 f) Abashaija kwejumbiramu hamwe n’okuhagira. Omuringo gumwe gw’okuhagira
abakazi aha rurengo rw’eka, n’okuhagira abashaija. Omu ruteerane orwa
Beijing eya 1995 eyabaire neegamba aha bakyara n’entunguuka, abakazi
bakeeta abashaija ngu beejumbire omu mwinganoingano. Omu Uganda, abashaija
okutaaha omu nshonga z’amagara g’okuzaara kukiri kukye munonga
ahabw’enshonga z’obuhangwa n’entuura y’abantu. Kwonka, nk’oku abakyara
beejumbiire omu by’obwebembezi omu byaro, omu paramenti hamwe n’omu
kaabineeti, ebintu biriyo nibihinduka. Emyaka nkaikumi ehwire, abaishiki
batwire nibasinga omu by’obwegyese kandi eki kireeteire abaishiki baingi
baaza omu mashomero. Kwonka, enshonga nk’okushendekyereza mugyenzi waawe
ahairwariro hamwe n’okuha obugabe abakyara kukozesa obugaiga bw’eka bikiri
oburemeezi.

Uganda ekataho omukono aha biragiro biingi ebirikwihaho emiringo yoona
y’okushoroora abakazi (CEDAW) n’ekigyendererwa: kuta omu nkora eiteeka
ry’omwinganoingano gw’abakazi n’abashaija omu biragiro, harugyemu ebyo
ebirikushoroora abakazi, hazemu ebirikwikiriza oburingaaniza omu bakazi
n’abashaija; hazeho amahorezo hamwe n’ebindi bitongore ebirikurinda abakazi
obutashoroorwa. Kandi mureebe ngu okushoroora kw’omuringo gwona kwarugaho
omu bantu, n’omu ebitongore.

 7.3 Omwinganoingano gw’abashaija n’abakazi hamwe n’aBaiburi

Ebyahandiikirwe:

Okutandika 1:26; Okutandika 2:24; Okutandika 3:16 Abeefeeso 5:21-33

Okuruga21:22 1 Petero 3:1-7

Ebiragiro 32:36 Zaaburi 127:2-4

Malaki 2:10-16 Abarooma 12:19; 14:1

Matayo 19:1-11; Matayo 5:39 Enfumu 18:22

Mariko 15:38 Luka 24:10

1 Abakorinto 7:15; 7:39; 7:4–5

Omugasho gw’eka: Ruhanga akareeba ngu ti kihikire omushaija kutuura wenka.
Akahanga omuhwezi kuba nawe omu musiri gwa Eden “Bakaba bajwaire busha
kandi batarikwitwa nshoni” (Okutandika 2:25) Ekibi ku kyahikire omu ka
egyo, yaashenyaguruka. Adam na Eve bakabingwa omuri Eden, Cain akaita Abel
n’okucwerwa orubanja kwatandika. N’eriizooba, ni kikuru ngu eeka
teshemereire kwikiriza ekibi kugitaahamu kikagishenyera obushwere. Eeka
n’ekitongore ekitiirweho Ruhanga hamwe n’endagaano ezirikukorwa,
abarikuzikora bashemereire kuzitamu ekitiinisa. Kukuuma ebikuru n’oburungi
bw’eka nigwo musingye gw’enkura y’abantu hamwe nentunguuka.

Omushaija ashemereire kukunda omukazi we, n’omukazi ashemereire kworobera
iba:

Enshonga nkuru erikubaasa kwihaho okunyangaraza abakazi ni rukundo
n’okworoba omu maka. Omu ka, omukazi n’omushaija nibaba bamwe. Tihariho
oine obushoborozi nainga orusa rw’okwima nainga kunyangaraza mutaahi we.
Bombi bashemereire kurindana. Paulo omuhikiriire omu Bakorinto 1, 7:4
naagira ngu “ Omukazi tiwe mukama w’omubiri gwe, baitu omushaja we niwe
mukama waagwo. Omuri ekyo, omushaija nawe tari mukama w’omubiri gwaine,
baitu omukazi we niwe mukama w’omubiri gwe.” Omu muringo nigwo gumwe,
omushaija yaaba naaza omu bushwere n’omukazi we, nikwo kishemereire
kuguma.1 Abakorinto 7:24 “Buri omwe omuri imwe ashemereire kuguma omu
nkwatanisa na Ruhanga omu muringo gumwe nk’obu waayetwa.”

Abashaija nibateererwa omuranga kuhereza abakazi baabo ekitiinisa
n’okubatwariza gye: Baiburi neegira ngu abakazi biine emitima eyorobi
(Petero 1, 3:7). Nahabwekyo, nibeetenga kukwatwa n’obwegyendesereza Kandi
omu kitiinisa kyabo. “Omu muringo nigwo gumwe, imwe bashaija mwe
mushemereire kutuura n’abakazi baanyu kurungi murikwetegyereza gye, ngu
emitima yaabo eyorobi munonga, kukira eyaanyu. Mubahereze ekitiinisa kandi
mubatwarize gye.”

Abakazi baine obugabe bw’okushaba hataine orikubakwata aha mukono:
Abashaija n’abakazi boona nibaingana omu bukama bwa Ruhanga. Ekyo
kikahamibwa okutaaguka kw’orutimbe rw’eiramizo obu Yesu yaafeera aha
musharaba (Matayo 27:51).

Okusaasirana ni kikuru omu kumaraho endwano, entongani n’obuteetegyerezana:
Omuntu yaakushobeza, nooteekwa kumusaassira emirundi engahi? Yesu
akagarukamu ati? Emirundi 77. Matayo 18:21 omu kicweka ekirikwetwa Sermon
of the Mountain, naayegyesa ngu omuntu yaakuteera oruhi aha itama rya
bumosho, ohindure erya buryo naryo ariteere. (Matayo 8:29-31) Korera abandi
ebirungi nk’oku orikwenda nabo babikukorere.

EKICWEKA KYA 8: OMURIMO GW’ABEEBEMBEZI B’EDIINI OMU MUHENDO GW’ABANTU
NENTUGUUKA

 1. Omurimo gw’abeebembezi b’ediini ni guuha?

 Oruteerane rw’omubaro gw’abantu orurikwetwa ICPD orwabaireho omugwa 1994
 rukashaba amahanga goona (obariiremu Uganda) kureeba ngu ebitongore
 ebitari bya gavumenti, eby’obuhangwa n’entuura y’abantu kureeba ngu
 abantu baingi baayejumbira omu by’omuhendo gw’abantu n’entunguuka.
 Gavumenti ya Uganda (GoU) neemanya omurimo muhango ogu ebitongore bitari
 bya gaavumenti, omurimo gw’abeebeembezi b’amadiini omukwenyigira omu
 nteekateeka z’omuhendo gw’abantu n’entunguuka otaireho okutunguura
 entuura nungi barikukozesa ebintu ebyakubaasa kubahwera nk’ediini omu
 kumanyisa abantu aha bintu ebitari bimwe na bimwe by’entunguuka otaireho
 entunguura yeby’amagara barikukozesa ebiriho nk’ediini hamwe n’entuura
 y’abantu. Ekyo, Gavument ya Uganda aikiriize . n’eky’amazima, gavumenti
 ya Uganda aikiriize abantu boona namunonga ebitongore ebyo
 ebirikuhandiika ebitari bya gaavumenti. Abeebembezi b’abarokore hamwe
 n’abandi baikiriza nibashaba ngu:

a) Mwikirize omugisha gwabo bonka ogubaine nk’abeebembezi abarikuheebwa
 ekitiinisa omu byanga byabo kuba nibo babaaza kuteera omuranga gw’okuta
 enshonga z’abantu n’entunguuka omu nyegyesa ya Baiburi kwenda kuhindura
 enteekateeka n’emicwe y’abantu kwenda kutunguura abantu. Ekitabo eki
 kitiirweho ahabw’enshonga egi.

b) Kukozesa banywani baabo abu baine abarikubaasa kukorera busha hamwe
 n’ebigombe b’ebyanga ebiine obushoborozi bw’okwongyeramu kandi
 bukabaisaho empindahinduka omu micwe, nteekateeka, hamwe n’emitwarize
 erikubaasa kuhwera nainga kugarura enyima entunguuka. Kwongyera ahari
 ekyo baine kutwariramu enteekateeka nk’ey’okurya gye, empurizigana,
 ahagati y’omwana n’omuzaire, kutateerana kuhisya aha kutaaha omu
 bushwere, kuzaara gye, hamwe n’okutuura gye omuri byona. Kwongyera ahari
 ekyo, bashemereire kutamu obwire bwokuheeramu obutumwa oburi omu kitabo
 eki aha bantu boona omu bwire bw’okushaba. Kwenda kukora gye eki,
 abakugu b’emiringo nibaija kwetwa omu bwire bumwe na bumwe kuhwera
 n’okushoboorora aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirikugambwaho omu
 kitabo eki.

c) Koran nk’ekyokureeberaho abaine obwebembezi hamwe n’okukora n’okugira
 amagara nk’ekyokureeberaho omu byanga ahu barikukorera kandi bakozese
 ekyo omu rwatu kwenda kutamu abandi amaani g’okutwaza gye n’okuhindura
 emicwe y’ekyanga aha nshonga zitari zimwe nazimwe.

d) Kutuura nk’ekyokureeberaho kandi otwaze omu muringo ogutarikujumisa
bantu b’orikurugamu. Abeebembezi b’ediini nibeesigwa kandi nibaheebwa
ekitiinisa omu nsi yoona. Abantu nibabairukiraho kutunga obuhabuzi aha
nshonga ezirikubakwataho hamwe n’ez’amaka obariiremu okusharaho aha nshonga
z’amagara, obwegyese, entuura hamwe n’ebyobutegyeki. Nahabwekyo, nikiija
kuba kitari kirungi abo boona abarikukozes ekitabo eki baakora ebikorwa
bitarikwikirizana n’obutumwa oburi omu kitabo omu.

46 | Human sexuality and Gender Issues Handbook
Okuruga 29:44, Baiburi neetwegyesa ngu boona abariisa abarikumuheereza
nibaija kumuhurira kandi bahikiiriza obujunaanizibwa bwabo reero Atuure omu
bantu be. Matayo 5:13-14 naayegyesa ngu abakristo boona n’omwonyo kandi
ekyereerezi kyensi. Kandi agaruka agira ngu etaara teine kuteekwa hansi
y’ekiibo, nahabwekyo, abeebembezi baine kuhwera abakurasi ba Kristo kujwisa
omushana ngu abantu bareebe oburungi bw’eiziina Rye, reero ekitiinisa kya
Nyakubaho kibone kuhimbisibwa. Ekyahamuheru, Ruhanga naaraganisa kwimusya
abo abarikujanjaaza ekigambo kye, “Kandi ogwo oribyegyesa, araayetwa omu
bukama bw’omu Iguru” Matayo 5:19.

 EZIREESIRWEHO EMPINDAHINDUKA Y’OBWIRE OMU UGANDA

 Ebirikukwata aha kitongore kya NEPAD

 Ekitongore ekirikurwanirira entunguuka omuri Afrika omu
 kyasa ky’abiri na kimwe ekya NEPAD ekirikwebemberwa
 abeebembezi ba Afirika kukora aha nshonga ez’amaani
 ezinyangaraize Afirika. Enshonga ezi zirimu obworo,
 ebyentunguuka hamwe n’ensi ezindi okunagaijura Afirika .

 Ekitongore kya NEPAD nikiha omugisha gw’omutaano amahanga
 ga Afirika kubaasa kwekwatiramu omu nshonga
 z’ebyentunguuka, kukorera hamwe nk’amahanga ga Afirika,
 hamwe n’okukorera hamwe n’amahanga ag’aheeru ya Afirika.

 Ebirikukwata aha kitongore kya HOPE

 Ekitongore kya HOPE, ekirikukorera omu ihanga,
 ekyatandikirweho
 omu mwaka gwa 2006, nikiha abantu omugisha gw’okweyiha omu
 bworo. Ekitebe kya HOPE ekikuru nikishangwa omu tauni ya
 Entebbe omu disiturikiti ya Wakiso. Abantu abooro
 bashemereire
 kuhwerwa bakabaasa kutuura omu magara agatarimu
 okubonabona kw’amaani okurikureetwaho obworo. Ab’ekitongore
 kya HOPE nitushagika enteekateeka zoona ezigyendereire
 kumaraho okubonabona kwona okurikureetwaho obworo.
 Nitwikiririza omu kubaasa kw’abantu kukora bakabaasa kuruga
 omu bworo. Abantu abaingi hamwe n’amaka gaabo, okukora
 nibwo buryo oburikukirayo oburungi oburikubaasa kubaiha omu
 bworo. Ekitongore kya HOPE nikiha abantu abooro oburyo
 n’omugisha kubaasa kukora reero bakabaasa kwejwanzya gye
 omu bandi n’okwetunguura, reero bakatunga amagara marungi
 n’obugwa gye.

 [pic]

 Okutendeka okwakoreirwe omu disiturikiti ya Wakiso

 OKUSIIMA

 Nitusiima obuyambi bw’esente obwahairweyo ekitongore kya
 NEPAD ahabw’okutebeekanisa akatabo aka hamwe n’ekitongore
 kya Future Dialogue ahabw’obuhwezi bw’esente omu kushohoza
 akatabo aka. Hoona nabwo nitwebaza ebitongore byona, hamwe
 naabo boona abarikukorengana n’ekitongore kya HOPE
 abahaireyo kyona ekirikwetengyesa omu kutebeekanisa akatabo
 aka.

[pic]

 OKWANJURA

 Ekitongore kya HOPE kitebeekaniise akatabo aka
 akarikushoboorora emitwarize mirungi omu byobuhingi n’obutungi
 omu kukorera omu mbeera mbi ezireesirweho empidahinduka
 y’obwire. Ekigyendererwa ky’ekitongore kya HOPE n’okuha
 obuhabuzi abarikukora enteekateeka z’ebyobuhingi hamwe
 n’abahingi. Disiturikiti ishatu nizo zaatooreinwe
 kugyezesezamu emikorere mirungi omu byobuhingi erikugyenda
 n’empindahinduka y’obwire. Nizo ezi: Mbarara omu
 Burengyerwaizooba, Wakiso omu kicweka ekya Rwagati y’eihanga,
 na Lira kurunga omu Matemba g’eihanga. Akatabo aka nikagamba
 aha buryo hamwe n’okubaasa ebirikwetengwa ahabwokuhindura
 emitwarize omu byobuhingi kubaasa kugyenda n’empinduka
 ezirikubaho omu bwire.

 Akatabo aka kagyendereire kuhwera abahingi b’omu byaro omu
 disiturikiti ezitooreinwe hamwe n’ezindi kubaasa kuhindura aha
 mitwarize omu by’obuhingi n’obutungi bakakuratira emitwarize
 mirungi erikugyenda n’empindahinduka ezirikubaho omu bwire omu
 Uganda. Akatabo aka kakozirwe n’ekigyendererwa kuhwera
 abahingi kweyiha omu obworo ahabw’okubahwera kugumizamu
 nibakora emirimo yaabo y’ebyobuhingi n’obutungi n’obu haraabe
 hariho embeera mbi eziririkureetwaho empidahinduka y’obwire.

 Ekitongore kya HOPE kiine okwikiriza ku akatabo aka nikaija
 kuhwera abahingi kubaasa kutunguuka omu by’esente n’emituurire
 yaabo n’okukyendeeza obworo, na bwanyima ebyamagara kuza aha
 mutindo murungi.
[pic] [pic]
