 Ekiju ky’omurembe ekirikuhingirwamu

 Ebigambo ebihairwe ahaifo bishoborwirwe kurugiirira aha
 bigyendererwa by’akatabo aka

 1. Okuhindura aha mitwarize: Okuhindura aha mitwarize ey’obuhangwa
 n’ey’abantu omu kugyezaho kugyenda nk’oku obwire burikugyenda
 nibuhinduka n’okuteebereza oku burikwija kuhinduka, nainga embeera
 ezirikwija kubaho ahabw’empinduka omu bwire. Empinduka ezirikubaho
 nizikyendeeza aha kabi akaakubaasa kubaho ahabw’empinduka y’obwire
 nainga kutunga ebirungi ahabw’empinduka y’obwire. Hariho emiringo
 etari emwe y’okuhindura omu mitwarize erimu okuhindura aha
 mitwarize ahabw’ekyo eki orikuteekateeka ngu nikibaasa kubaho,
 okuhindura aha mitwarize ahabw’empinduka ebiireho, omuntu nainga
 abantu baingi nainga boona kuhindura aha mitwarize, hamwe
 n’empinduka erikwereetaho n’empinduka eteekateekirwe.

 2. Embeera embi ezireesirweho empindahinduka y’obwire: Empinduka omu
 mbeera z’obuhangwa bw’ensi nainga ebintu byona ebiine amagara
 ezireesirweho empindahinduka y’obwire ziine akabi akarikubaasa
 kuhindura ebirikushangwa omu by’obuhangwa ebyahangirwe nainga
 ebiteirweho abantu, nainga kukyendeeza amaani gaabyo
 ag’okugumisiririza embeera embi nainga okukanya kwabyo nainga
 kushiisha eby’emituriire hamwe n’ebyentaasya nainga amagara
 g’abantu n’ebyetengo byabo (okushoboorora n’okwa UNFCC).

 3. Obwire: Okubariirira obwire, empinduka omu butagasi, enjura,
 omuyaga hamwe n’ebindi bintu ebirikuhwera omu kuteebereza obwire
 kurugiirira aha bwire obuhairwe (okushoboorora n’okwa UNFCC).
[pic]

 4. Empindahinduka y’obwire: Okuhinduka kw’embeera z’obwire
 okurikuteekateekwa kuba nikurugiirira aha mirimo ei abantu
 barikukora erikureetera embeera ez’omumwanya omunsi yoona
 kuhinduka, erikureeberwa aha kugyeragyeranisa obwire butari
 bumwe.

 5. Embeera ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire: Okuhinduka
 kw’obwire aha buhangwa hamwe n’abantu. Okurugiirira aha
 mitwarize egyenzire neehinduka, omuntu naabaasa kutaanuura
 embeera eziriize kubaho kuruga aha biraabeho ahabw’embeera ezo
 (n’ebya IPCC).

 6. Omwoya ogwine akabi: Omwoya ogwine akabi (ogworekirwe nka GHG)
 nigwe mwoya ogurikushangwa omu mwanya, ogwobuhangwa hamwe n’ogwe
 ogurikuruga omu mirimo etari emwe erikukorwa abantu kandi
 ogurikureeta amaranzi againe akabi. (Okushoboorora n’okwa
 UNFCC).

 7. Okutagata kw’ensi: Okweyongyera kw’akabi kw’omwoya ogw’akabi omu
 mwanya ogurikuruga omu mirimo etari emwe erikukorwa abantu kandi
 ekirikureetera omwoya ogwo gwaba mwingi munonga omu mwanya,
 gwayakiira amaranzi ag’akabi agarikuruga aha mwariro gw’ensi.
 (Okushoboorora n’okwa UNFCC).

 8. Ekibiina ekirikutwara enteekateeka z’okuhindura embeera
 kuhikaana n’empindahinduka y’obwire (NAPA): Ebihandiiko
 ebihandiikirwe amahanga agakiri kukura omu byentansaya
 ebirikworekwa enshonga enkuru ez’omugasho ezirikuyamba omu
 mpindahinduka y’obwire Ekibiina ekirikutwara enteekateeka
 z’okuhindura embeera kuhikaana n’empindahinduka y’obwire.
 (Nebya UNFCC)

 9. Okugumira embeera: Okugumizamu n’emitwarize eya buriijo omu
 bwire bw’okuteganisibwa. (UNDP, 2005).

 10. Oburyo bw’okurabiramu kubaasa kugyendera aha mpinduka y’obwire:
 Enteekateeka y’ebishemereire kukorwa kukyendeeza aha buzibu
 oburikurugiirira omu mpindahinduka y’obwire otwariremu n’embeera
 z’obwire embi. Oburyo obu nibugaitirana enteekateeka
 n’ebiteirweho kumaraho obuzibu, ebironzirwe n’ekigyendererwa
 ky’okukyendeeza akabi akarikubaasa kuhika aha ihanga. (UNDP,
 2005)

 11. Okubeera omu mbeera ez’okwanguhirwa kuhikwaho akabi:
 okuremererwa kweyamba obuzibu oburikureetwa empindahinduka
 y’obwire obariiremu n’embeera z’obwire ezrikureetaho akabi
 k’amaani. Okwanguhirwa kuhikwaho akabi nikurugiirira aha maani,
 n’obwingi bw’embeera y’obwire erikuhika omu kicweka n’oku
 ekicweka ekyo kirikubaasa kuteganisibwa obuzibu obureesirwe
 embeera ezo n’empinduka omu mitwarize y’abatwiremu. (Biihirwe
 omu kihandiiko kya IPCC TAR, 2001)
 12. [pic]

 1.0 ENTANDIKIRIRO

 Empindahinduka y’obwire ni bumwe aha buremeezi oburikukirayo omu
 nsi yoona. Embeera z'obwire omunsi nizigyenda nizihinduka buri
 kaanya nk’oku kyabaire kitakabahoga kuruga ira na ira kandi obuzibu
 oburugiriire omu mpindahinduka ezi nibureebwa butunu. Omu Uganda,
 empidahinduka ezi nizireebeka kuba zireesireho okuteganisibwa omu
 mituurire y’abantu, nk’okubura amaizi, ebyokurya hamwe n’embeera
 mbi omu byamagara. Ebi nibireetaho okuteganisibwa kw’amaani omu
 magara g’abantu, ebyobuhangwa bwe’nsi, n’entunguuka y’eihanga omu
 byentaasya okutwarira hamwe.

 Obuhingi nibuguma buri oburugo bukuru bw’entaasya ya Uganda obwo
 erikwingana ebicweka 42 ahari 100 by’esente ezi eihanga
 ririkutunga, kandi nabwo obuhingi nibukora ebicweka 90 eby’ebintu
 ebirikuguzibwa aheeru y’eihanga, kandi hoona nabwo obuhingi nibuha
 abantu barikuhika ebicweka 90 ahari 100 emirimo kurugiirira aha
 kihandiiko kya NDPII (2015). Ebyobuhingi omu Uganda byegamiire
 munonga aha kugwa kw’enjura, ekirikumanyisa ngu hariho akabi
 k’amaani ahabw’empidahinduka ezirikubaho omu kugwa kw’enjura
 n’empinduka y’obwire okutwarira hamwe. Ebirikuruga omu buhingi
 nibiguma nibihindahinduka nk’oku obwire burikugyenda nibuhinduka,
 kandi obwo amagara g’Abanyayuganda gemereziibweho ebyobuhingi,
 kandi obwo ebyobuhingi birikuteganisibwa munonga empindahinduka omu
 bwire.

 Uganda neeshangwa omu kicweka ekishemereire kuba nikitunga enjura
 nyingi, kandi obuhangwa bwa Uganda, emiyaga, enyanja emigyera
 nibireetaho okwahukana kw’amaani omu njura erikugwa omu bicweka bya
 Uganda. Empindahinduka omu bwingi bw’amaizi omu Nyanja empago:
 Pacific, Indian hamwe na Atlantic nakwo kwine akakwate n’obwingi
 bw’enjura erikugwa hamwe n’obwire obu erikugweramu omu Uganda.

 Okurugiirira aha kihandiiko kya ARCC (2013), oku enjura erikugwa
 hati n’oku yaabaire neegwa omu biro eby’enyima nikworeka ku obwire
 obu erikugweramu nibutaana munonga. Obwire obu enjura erikugweramu
 buhindukire kuhika aha biro biri ahagati ya 15 na 30 (erikurahuka
 kutandika kugwa nainga erikwija ekyerereirwe). Kandi n’obwire obu
 enjura erikumara erikugwa nabwo nibugyenda nibuhinduka kuruga aha
 mwaka gumwe kuza aha gundi; buhindukire ebiro ebiri ahagati ya 20
 kuhisya ahari 40. Kwonka, kurugiirira aha kihandiiko kya ARCC ekya
 2014, tihariho mpinduka y’amaani omu bwingi bw’enjura erikugwa
 omwaka gwona omu myaka 60 ehingwire.
 Kandi hoona nabwo kishangirwe ku enjura omu kwezi Kwikuminebiri,
 Okwokubanza hamwe n’Okwakabiri ku eyeyongiire, obwire obwakubaire
 buri obw’omushana omu bicweka byona. Okweyongyera kwenjura omu
 myezi egi nikuteganisa ebyobuhingi okukira munonga ebihingwa
 eby’emiti (nk’omwani), hamwe n’emirimo erikukorwa ahanyima
 y’okushaaruura nk’okwanika ebihingwa n’okubibiika. Hoona nabwo
 okweyongyera kw’enjura nikureetaho embeera mbi (nk’enjura
 y’eihunga, okushandaara kw’amaizi, n’ebindi). Ebikwatiraine
 n’obutagasi, okushwijuma obutagasi obwabaire buriho omu myaka
 kuruga 1951 kuhisya 1980, hamwe na 1981 kuhisya 2010 nikworeka ku
 obutagasi omu mwanya bweyongyeire aha bicweka birikuteberezibwa
 kuba biri ahagati ya 0.5 na 1.2°C ahabw’obutagasi oburikuhererukayo
 ahansi hamwe na 0.6 na 0.9°C ahabw’obutagasi oburikukirayo
 ahaiguru. Obutagasi obu nibuteekateekwa kugumizamu nibweyongyera;
 nibuteekateekwa kwija kweyongyera kurenga 2°C omwaka gwa 2030 gwaza
 kuhika.

[pic]
 Okweyongyera kw’obutagasi nikubaasa kwija kugira akabi kahango aha
 bihingwa hamwe n’amatungo; akabi k’okukwatwa oburwaire hamwe
 n’okutaahirirwa obukooko nikaija kweyongyera.

 Embeera mbi ezireesirweho empindahinduka omu bwire nizireetaho
 okufeerwa kandi zireetera abantu abarikutuura omu myanya
 erikutuuramu abooro abarikukirayo okubonabona ahabwokugira ngu
 amagara gaabo nigaija kukira kuteganisibwa embeera mbi
 ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire. Akabi akarikukirayo kandi
 akarikuba omu myanya mingi ahabw’empindahinduka omu mbeera z’obwire
 n’ekyanda, okushandaara kw’amaizi, obutagasi bwingi kandi
 oburikugyenda nibweyongyera. Embeera mbi ezi niziteganisa munonga
 ebyobuhingi ekirikurugamu n’enjara, okubura ebiriisa birikumara,
 ebihingwa n’enyamaishwa kukwatwa oburwaire, n’okutunga amashaaruura
 makye. Nahabwekyo, hashemereire kubaho empinduka omu mitwarize
 kwenda kugyenda n’empindahinduka ezirikubaho omu bwire
 ezitarikubaasa kwerindwa, hamwe n’okureetaho emitwarize erikubaasa
 kuhwera omu kugumisiririza ebirikubaho ahabw’empindahinduka omu
 mbeera z’obwire (Twinomugisha, 2005) (UBOS, 2009), (1PCC, 2001).

 Ahabw’embeera mbi ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka omu bwire,
 ekitongore kya HOPE kirugireyo n’akatabo aka kuhwera abahingi
 kubaasa kuhindura aha mitwarize bakagyenda n’oku embeera omu bwire
 zirikuhindahinduka. oburyo bw’okubaasa kurwanisa obuzibu
 oburikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire kuhwera abantu omu byanga
 n’oburyo bw’okutwazamu embeera mbi ezirikwijaho
 ahabw’empindahinduka omu bwire.

 [pic]
 Okuhinga enyaanya omuri Wakiso

[pic] [pic]

 2.0 OMURINGO OGU OKUCONDOOZA KWAKOZIRWEMU

 Akatabo aka kakahandiikwa ahanyima y’okukora okucondooza omu
 bitabo, okwehanuuza aha bantu abu kirikukwataho, okugiraho emishomo
 omu okuhaana ebiteekateeko kwakoreirwe, okugyezesa hamwe
 n’okutendeka abahingi hamwe naabo boona abarikwejumba omu mirimo
 y’obuhingi n’obutungi etari emwe omu disiturikiti ishatu: eza
 Wakiso, Mbarara na Lira ezaajwekiire emyanya y’ebyobuhingi
 etarikushushana hamwe n’ebicweka by’eihanga ebiine embeera
 z’obwire ezitarikushushana. Ebicweka ebirikukurataho ahaifo nibiija
 kushoboorora oku okucondooza oku kwakozirwe okwarugiremu akatabo
 aka.

 1 Okushoma ebihandiiko

 Ebihandiiko ebirikukwata aha byobuhingi n’obutungi hamwe
 n’empindahinduka y’obwire ebirikukwata aha ihanga, ekyanga hamwe
 n’ebicweka bitari bimwe eby’omusi yoona bikakoresibwa. Ebihandiiko
 ebirikukwata aha biragiro, okucondooza okukozirwe omu bicweka
 bitari bimwe na bimwe, ripoota z’okucondooza okurikukorwa
 bikashomwa. Amakuru agaarundainwe gakaba gagyendereire kureetaho
 okumanya oburemeezi obu abahingi n’abatungi barikubugana
 ahabw’empindahinduka y’obwire hamwe n’okumanya oburyo obutairweho
 gavumenti, ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti hamwe n’abahingi
 kukyendeeza oburemeezi obwo.

2 Okugyezesa akatabo aka

 Ekitongore kya HOPE, kirikuhwerwaho ekitongore ekya Future Dialogue
 International (FDI LTD) kikataho omushomo gw’okutendeka
 ogwakoreirwe omu disiturikiti ya Wakiso ahu akatabo aka
 kagyezesiibwe kandi kakagororwa. Okugyeseza oku kukaba kurimu
 okushomesa hamwe n’okukora okucondooza omu faamu. Abaayejumbire omu
 kutendeka oku n’abeebembezi hamwe n’abandi bakozi kuruga omu
 Gavumenti z’Ebyanga, abarikukora enteekateeka z’ebyobuhingi
 n’obutungi aha disiturikiti, hamwe n’abahingi. Omwanya
 ogwakoreirwemu okugyezesa gukatooranwa kujwekyera abahiingi ab’omu
 byaro hamwe n’ab’omu bicweka ebihereire amatauni abarikwejumba omu
 mirimo etari emwe y’obuhingi n’obutungi, harimu okureeberera
 amatungo, okutunga enkoko, okutunga empunu, okuhinga ebimuri,
 okutunga ebyenyanja, okuhinga emisiri mikye y’ebijuma, embonga,
 n’ebindi, okuhinga eby’okurya n’okubiguza. Omu kutendeka,
 abaakwejumbiremu bakabagana ebibarabiremu omu mirimo yaabo
 ahabw’embeera ezireesirweho empindahinduka y’obwire, hamwe
 n’okubarikugyenzaho kukorera omu mbeera ezo. Okucondooza kukabamu
 okutaayaayira/okurambura omuhingi omwe orikuhingira ebihingwa omu
 kiju kikozirwe n’ebiveera ekirikumanywa nka greenhouse nk’omuringo
 gw’okubaasa kurwanisa n’okukorera omu mbeera mbi ezirikureetwaho
 empindahinduka y’obwire. Ebirungire omu kutendekwa, okutaayaayira
 omuhingi, hamwe n’ebi abaayejumbire omu kutendekwa kw’okugyezesa
 baabagaine bikongyerera aha kukora n’okumaririza akatabo aka.

 3 Okutendeka

 Ekigyendererwa ekikuru ky’okutendeka kukaba kuri okumanyisa
 abarikukora enteekateeka hamwe n’abahingi ekihandiiko eky’okubaha
 omuhimbo omu disiturikiti ezaabandize kugyezesezamu (Mbarara,
 Wakiso na Lira) kuta omu nkora emitwarize y’ebyobuhingi erikugyenda
 gye n’embeera ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire omu
 byobuhingi n’obutungi. Okutendekwa kukakorerwa omu disiturikiti za
 Wakiso, Mbarara na Lira kandi kukeejumbwamu abantu kurunga omu
 bicweka bya Burengyerwaizooba hamwe n’obukiika bw’Amatemba ga
 Uganda (reeba ekishushani 1). Okutendeka kukabamu okushomesa hamwe
 n’okuha abaakwejumbiremu omugisha kuhanuura aha bintu bitari bimwe,
 okuheebwa eby’okukora omu guruupu, hamwe n’abaayejumbire omu
 kutendekwa kwanjura ebi bakozire. Hakabamu n’okubuuza ebibuuzo
 n’okubigarukamu bwanyima haabaho okugamba omu bugufu aha
 byashomeesibwa. Okugamba omu bugufu ebyashomwa kukahwera omu
 kushwijuma ebyashomaw, okumanya ebitashoboororwa gye ebibuuzo hamwe
 n’oburemeezi obu abaayejumbire omu kutendekwa baabaire baine aha
 byashomwa. Okutendekwa kukabamu abahingi, abakozi (kuruga omu
 gavumenti z’ebyanga abari kukora aha nshonga z’ebyobuhingi,
 obwebembezi hamwe n’byobuhangwa bw’ensi) hamwe n’abakozi kuruga omu
 bitongore ebirikurwanirira obugabe bw’abantu.

 [pic]

 Okutendekyerwa omu musiri okwabaire Mbarara

 [pic]

 Okutendekyerwa omu musiri okwabaire omu disiturikiti ya Lira
[pic] [pic]

 Aka n’akatabo akatebeekanisibwe ab’ekitongore kya HOPE ekirikuha
 abantu omugisha kubaasa kweyiha omu bworo. Akatabo aka
 katebeekanisiibwe kuyamba abahingi b’omu byaro kubaasa kuhindura
 aha mitwarize omu byobuhingi bakagyenda n’emitwarize erikugyenda
 n’embeera mbi ezireesirweho empindahinduka y’obwire omu Uganda.
 Akatabo aka katebeekanisiibwe kuhwera abahingi kubaasa kweyiha omu
 bworo n’okubabaasisa kugumizamu nibeejumba omu byobuhingi
 n’obutungi n’obu haraabe hariho embeera mbi ezirikureetwaho
 empindahinduka y’obwire. Nahabwekyo, akatabo aka nikaha obuhabuzi
 aha birikwetengwa kukuratirwa omu kuhindura aha mitwarize omu
 byobuhingi ahabw’embeera mbi ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka
 y’obwire.

 Emitwarize omu byobuhingi ahabw’okwenda kugyenda n’empindahinduka
 y’obwire egambirweho omu katabo aka, yaaba ekuratiirwe kurungi
 nainga etairwe omu nkora eshemereire kuba neehwera abahingi kutunga
 entaasya, hamwe n’okwetunguura reero bakatuura omu magara marungi
 n’obugwa gye.

 Akatabo aka karimu amakuru aga:

 a. Okushoborora amakuru g’empindahinduka y’obwire’
 b. . Okushoboorora embeera mbi ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire
 aha byobuhingi.
 c. Okushwijuma akabi k’empindahinduka y’obwire ahaby’ebyobuhingi
 n’obutungi.
 d. Okuhindura aha mitwarize omu by’obuhingi hamwe n’enkora
 y’okukyendeeza aha mbeera mbi ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka
 y’obwire omu Uganda hamwe n’aheeru ya Uganda.
 e. Emitwarize erikuhwera kukora emirimo y’obuhingi omu mpindahinduka
 y’obwire.
 f. Ebyokureeberaho by’emitwarize omu byobuhingi erikugeyenda
 n’empindahinduka y’obwire kuruga omu mahanga agandi.
 g. Obuhabuzi obuhairwe aha buryo n’ebishemereire kukokorwa
 ahamitwarize eshemereire kukuratirwa.
 h. Okuhendera.

4 Ekigyendererwa ky’akatabo aka

 Ekigyendererwa ky’akatabo aka aha mitwarize mirungi omu by’obuhingi
 ahabw’empindahinduka y’obwire n’okuha abarikukora enteekateeka
 z’ebyobuhingi n’obutungi hamwe n’abahingi omu disiturikiti ishatu
 ezaatoreinwe kugyezesibwamu (Mbarara, Wakiso na Lira) kuta omu
 nkora emitwarize mirungi omu byobuhingi erikubaasa kugyenda kurungi
 n’embeera mbi ezireesirweho empindahinduka y’obwire.

5 Abantu abu akatabo aka kahandikiirwe

 Akatabo aka kakoreirwe abantu abarikukora enteekateeka
 z’ebyobuhingi n’obutungi hamwe n’abahingi n’abatungi omu
 disiturikiti ishatu za Uganda (Mbarara, Wakiso na Lira).

[pic]

6 Abantu abaraakorese akatabo aka

 Akatabo aka katebeekanisiibwe kukoresibwa abantu aba ahaifo:

 a. Abahingi n’abatungi: kwongyera kumanya ebirikukwata aha
 mpindahinduka y’obwire, oku empindahinduka y’obwire eine akabi aha
 byobuhingi hamwe n’oburyo obwakubaasa kuteebwaho kubaasa kukuratira
 emitwarize mirungi erikugyenda n’empindahinduka y’obwire.

 b. Abarikuteekateekyera ebyobuhingi n’obutungi: ab’ebyobuhingi
 n’obutungi aha disiturikiti n’aha magomborora hamwe n’obukiiko
 oburikukora aha by’enteekateeka kutunga amakuru bakagahisya aha
 barikuteekateekyera ebyobuhingi hamwe n’okumanyisa abahingi
 n’abatungi aha kakwate akari aha byobuhingi/obutungi hamwe
 n’empindahinduka y’obwire, hamwe n’oburyo obu baakubaasa kutaho
 kubaasa kukorera emirimo y’ebyobuhingi omu mbeera ezireesirweho
 empindahinduka y’obwire.

 c. Abakozi abarikukora omu kitongore ky’ebyobuhingi n’obutungi omu
 disiturikiti: Abakozi b’omu kitongore ky’ebyobuhingi n’obutungi omu
 disiturikiti hamwe n’abandi bajwekyerwa omu byobuhingi kutunga
 amakuru n’okugahisya abarikuteekateekyera ebyobuhingi hamwe
 n’okumanyisa abahingi n’abatungi akakwate akari aha byobuhingi
 n’obutungi hamwe n’empindahinduka y’obwire, hamwe n’oburyo obu
 baakubaasa kutaho kubaasa kukorera emirimo y’ebyobuhingi omu mbeera
 ezireesirweho empinduka y’obwire.

 [pic]

 Okuhinga emicungwa omu disiturikiti ya Lira

[pic] [pic]
 4.0 EMPINDAHINDUKA Y’OBWIRE

7 Empindahinduka y’obwire okutwarira hamwe

 Ekibiina ekirikukora aha mbeera z’obwire ekya Inter-Govermental
 Panel on Climate Change (IGPCC), nikishoboorora empindahinduka
 y’obwire nk’empinduka ezirikugyenda nizibaho omu bwire bw’ensi
 kumara omwanya muraingwa kandi eki nikibaasa kureetwa enshonga
 z’obuhangwa nainga obundi kireetwa emirimo ei abantu barikukora
 (amakuru aga gaihirwe omu kihandiiko kya IPCC, 2007). Obwire
 nikishoboororwa nk’embeera z’obwire eza buri kaanya nainga
 ezitwire nizibaho omu mwanya ezirikureeberwa omu kyoya n’obufuki
 oburikubaho kumara omwanya ogugyendereirwe. Ebintu ebikuru omu
 bwire ebirikureeberwaho empindahinduka n’enjura hamwe n’ekyoya
 n’obufuki (biihirwe omu kihandiiko kya Uganda NAPA, 2007).

8 Empindahinduka y‘obwire nikimanyisa ki?

 Empindahinduka y’obwire omu Uganda nikibaasa kushoboororwa omu
 bugufu nk’okuhindahinduka kw’ekyoya n’obufuki n’okuhindahinduka
 kw’obwingi bw’enjura n’amagingo agu erikugweramu omu mwanya
 gw’emyaka mikye ey’enyima. Okuhindahinduka kw’ekyoya n’obufuki
 kureesireho okweyongyera kw’obutagasi omu myanya mingi omu Uganda
 kukira oku bwabaire buri omu myaka ey’enyimaho. Okuhindahinduka omu
 njura kureesire empinduka omu magingo agu enjura erikugweramu,
 obwingi bw’enjura erikugwa n’emyanya ei erikugwamu hamwe
 n’empinduka y’omwanya ogu ekyanda kirikumara n’obu kirikubaho,
 n’ebindi. Omuri byona, okuteebereza enjura kurabira omu miringo
 y’obuhangwa tikwakyesigwa.

9 Ni ki ekirikureetaho empindahinduka y‘obwire?

 Empindahinduka y’obwire neeretwaho emirimo y’emiringo mingi ei
 abantu barikukora. Omu nsi yoona, ekirikukirayo kureetaho
 empindahinduka omu bwire n’omwoya ogw’akabi ogurikushohora kuruga
 omu mirimo ei abantu barikukora nk’omu byobuhingi, amakorero,
 okwosya ebintu ebirikubaasa kujunda n’ebiiruka, gukaza omu mwanya
 hamwe n’okutema ebibira, n’ebindi.

 Omu Uganda empindahinduka omu bwire nizireetwaho enshonga ezi
 ahaifo;
 i) ebirikubaho omu mpindahinduka y’obwire omu nsi yoona;
 ii) emirimo ei abantu barikukora okukira munonga omu kutema ebibira
 n’okushiisha ebibira, hamwe na,
 iii) okushiisha ebisharara. Amakorero omu Uganda gakiri makye kandi
 n’omwoya ogw’akabi ogurikuruga omu makorero nigwongyeraho akacweka
 kakye munonga omu kushiisha obuhangwa bw’ensi waagugyeragyeranisa
 n’omwoya ogurikuruga omu kushiisha n’okutema ebibira.

10 Akabi akarikuruga omu mpindahinduka y’obwire omu Uganda

 Uganda nk’amahanga agandi goona, ehikirweho akabi akareesirwe
 empindahinduka omu bwire. Akabi akarikukira kureebwa
 n’okweyongyera kw’ekyoya n’empinduka omu kugwa kw’enjura.

 a. Obutagasi: Kurugiirira aha kihandiiko kya USAID/ARCC (2013),
 nikiteeberezibwa ku obutagasi oburikugyenda nibweyongyera omu
 buhangwa bweyongiireho kuhika aha bwingi bwa 0.8oc. Okutwarira
 hamwe kandi eki kireeteire ekyoya kweyongyera (biiihirwe omu
 kihandiiko kya USAID/ARCC, 2003).

[pic]
 b. Empindahinduka omu kugwa kw’enjura: Eihanga ryona noobu riraabe
 ritwire niritunga obwingi bw’enjura omu mwaka burikwingana,
 habaireho empinduka omu myanya ei enjura erikugwamu, obwire obu
 enjura erikugweramu n’obwingi bw’enjura erikugwa. Oku enjura etwire
 neegwa omu bicweka by’eihanga ebitari bimwe kugyenzire nikuhinduka
 ekireesireho ebicweka ebimwe okugira ekyanda kingi ekirikumara
 obwire buraingwa (nk’omu disiturikiti za Napaka, Soroti, Mbarara,
 Kiruhura, Masaka, Lyantonde, n’ezindi) nainga ebicweka ebimwe
 kugwisa enjura nyingi erengyesereize (nk’omu disiturikiti za
 Butaleja, Ntoroko, Kasese, Kabale, Kapchorwa, Kampala n’ezindi).
 Obumwe enjura neegwa nyingi munonga kumara obwire bukye
 ekirikurugiiriraho okusiisikara kw’ebihingwa n’okufa kw’amatungo,
 eitaka okutwarwa omutunga, okubeguka kw’eitaka aha mishozi,
 okwijura kw’emigyera hamwe n’abantu kufa n’ebintu kusiisikara omu
 bicweka bingi omu ihanga.

11 Empindahinduka y’obwire hamwe n’Ebyobuhingi omu Uganda.

 1. Ebyobuhingi n’obutungi

 Omu kukoresa akatabo aka, Ebyobuhingi nibitwariramu ebintu ebi: i)
 Ebihingwa ebirikurugamu esente n’ebirikuriibwa; ii) Okutunga
 amatungo n’enkoko n’ebindi ebiri omu kika ky’ebinyonyi,; iii)
 Ebyobujubi n’okutunga ebyenyanja; hamwe na iv) ebirikukorwa omu
 kwongyera aha rurengo rw’ebirikuruga omu by’obuhingi otwariiremu
 obutare n’okuronda obutare bw’ebyobuhingi n’obutungi.

12 Okushoboorora ebyobuhingi n’obutungi omu Uganda

 Ebyobuhingi n’obutungi omu Uganda byegamiire munonga aha bahingi
 b’omu byaro abari aha rurengo rw’ahansi. Emiringo y’okuhinga
 erikukira kukuratirwa erimu okuhinga ekihingwa kimwe nainga kutunga
 amatungo ag’omuringo gumwe, okujwanzya ebihingwa nainga amatungo,
 n’okuhinga ebyokuguza. Okuhinga ekihingwa kimwe kurimu okuhinga
 ekihingwa kimwe omu musiri muhango kandi obwire obwingi
 ekigyendererwa nikiba kiri eky’okuguza amashaaruura g’ekihingwa
 ekyo, hamwe n’okutunga amatungo g’omuringo gumwe. Ebyobuhingi
 n’oburiisa eby’okujwanzya birimu okuhinga ebihingwa bitari bimwe
 ebirimu ebirikuriibwa n’ebirikurugamu esente z’onka n’okuriisa
 amatungo gatari gamwe. Ebijuma hamwe n’ebonga byo nibihingirwa
 akatare okukira kandi biriyo nibyeyongyera okukanya omu mihanda
 emikuru erikurabwamu ebyokurya ebirikutwa kuguzibwa, hamwe n’omu
 matauni agari haihi.

 Okutwarira hamwe, ebyobuhingi omu Uganda byemereziibweho okugwa
 kw’enjura, kandi emirngo y’ebya tekinologiya terikukira
 kukoresibwa, nk’okukoresa ebyoma, okukoresa orwezo, emibazi (reeba
 ekipande 2). Okwongyera amashaaruura omutindo omu Uganda ni kukye
 kandi n’okuboneza ebihingwa byaheza kushaaruurwa nakwo ni kukye.
 Nahabwekyo abahingi amashaaruura nibagaguza bataine eki
 bagongiireho baaheza kushaaruura.

[pic]

 Okushaaruura eshenda (Mbarara)

 Okukoresa tekinorogiya etari y’omutindo gw’ahaiguru n’okuhinga
 kurugiirira aha mbeera z’obwire nikureetera ebyobuhingi omu Uganda
 byateganisibwa munonga ahabw’empindahinduka y’obwire.

13 Oburemeezi oburikubuganwa omu byobuhingi oburikuretwaho empindahinduka
 y’obwire

 Empindahinduka y’obwire eyaagambwaho omu kicweka 2.4 neegumizamu
 n’okuteganisa ebyobuhingi omu Uganda omu miringo egi ahaifo:

 a. Amaizi makye n’amaizi maingi: nk’oku ebyobuhingi byegamiire enjura
 munonga, enjura nyingi munonga ereeteire eitaka kugira amaizi
 maingi hamwe/nainga emitunga. Eki nikiteganisa ebihingwa hamwe
 n’amatungo. Amaizi maingi omu itaka hamwe n’omutunga nibiteganisa
 ebimera kukura kandi bireetaho embeera erikureetera obukooko
 kushiisha ebihingwa hamwe n’endwara. Amaizi maingi omu itaka hamwe
 n’omutunga nibitwara ebihingwa n’amatungo, ekirikurugamu eitaka
 nirihwa amaani kandi omugasho gwaryo ahabw’ebyobuhingi
 nigukyendeera.

 b. Obutagasi: okweyongyera kw’obutagasi kureeteire obukooko
 n’endwara ezirikukwata ebihingwa n’amatungo kweyongyera
 n’okujanjaara omu myanya mingi. Bumwe aha bukooko n’endwara
 ezirikukwata amatungo n’ebihingwa bujanjiire omu myanya misya
 ahabw’okweyongyera kw’obutagasi. Nikyo kimwe, ebimera
 ebitarikutiina omushana n’obutagasi nka Lantana Camara
 ekirikumanywa nk’Omuhukye nainga Muhima omu Runyankore-Rukiga
 kibugire omu myanya mingi ahabw’okugira ngu tikirikutiina
 mushana n’obutagasi bwingi kandi nikiriirira ebihingwa ebindi.

 c. Embeera mbi ezireesirweho empindahinduka y’obwire: okukira
 munonga okushandaara kw’amaizi nainga ekyanda ky’amaani. Embera
 ezi zombi ziine akabi aha byobuhingi omu muringo gw’okufeerwa
 ahabw’ebihingwa kwanga kukura nainga amatungo kufa nainga
 esente ezirikugyendera omu kugyezaho kurwanisa embeera ezi
 ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire, nk’okushukyeera
 amaizi, okurwanisa endwara, n’ebindi.
 d.

14 Okugyezaho kurwanisa embeera mbi ezirikuteganisa ebyobuhingi
 ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire

 1. Ebirikukorwa

 Ebirikukorwa omu kugyenzaho kurwanisa embeera mbi aha byobuhingi
 ezirikureetwa empindahinduka y’obwire harimu okugyezaho kukyendeeza
 embeera mbi ezi hamwe n’okuhindura aha mitwarize omu byobuhingi

 Okugyezaho kukyendeeza omwoya ogw’akabi ogurikuza omu mwanya
 n’omuringo gumwe gw’okugyezaho kukyendeeza embeera mbi
 ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire. Oburyo obundi n’okugyezaho
 kukanyisa ebibira n’ebisharara kugira ngu bibiike omwoya ogw’akabi.
 Okurinda ebibira, n’okutabishiisha hamwe n’okurinda ebisharara
 obutabyomyamu amaizi n’okubikoreramu emirimu erikwija kubimaraho
 nikutangira omwoya ogw’akabi nainga kukyendeeza ogurikushohora.
 Okukyendeeza omwoya mubi nabwo kurimu okutunguura ebya tekinorogiya
 ebirikuhwera amakorero hamwe n’ebyoma ebindi nka furiigi kubaasa
 kushohoza omwoya mukye ogwine akabi. Oburyo obwakubaasa kuteebwaho
 kubiika omwoya ogu obutaza mu mwanya burimu nk’okuhinga emiti,
 okurinda ebisharara hamwe n’okukoresa kurungi eitaka

 Okuhindura omu mitwarize nikimanyisa kuhindura omu bikorwa
 eby’abantu n’ebyobuhangwa ahabw’embeera mbi ereesirweho
 empindahinduka y’obwire, nainga embeera ezo ezirikuteekateekwa
 kubaho hamwe n’akabi akarikuruga omu mbeera ezo, ebirikukyendeeza
 aha kabi nainga kutunga ebirungi ebirikubaasa kuruga omu
 mpindahinduka eriho (IPCC 2007b). Omu bigambo byanguhi nikibaasa
 kumanyisa abantu kuhindura omu mikorere n’emitwarize kubaasa
 kukorera gye omu mbeera ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire.
 Ekyokureeberaho okutandika kuhinga embibo ezirikugumira endwara
 nainga kutunga amatungo agarikuzaara munonga nk’oburyo
 bw’okurwanisa endwara hamwe n’okukanyisa amashaaruura kuruga omu
 faamu nainga omusiri gumwe.

15 Oburyo obutairweho (ebyokureeberaho kuruga omu Uganda)

 Oburyo obutairweho kuhindura emitwarize kukyendeeza akabi
 akarikwija n’empinadahinduka y’obwire, butairweho gavumenti,
 abahingi/abatungi, ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti,
 ab’ebyobwegyese hamwe n’ebitongore ebirikukora okucondooza
 ahabw’ebihingwa hamwe n’amatungo.

16 Oburyo obutairweho abahingi Response by farmers

 Abahingi bataireho oburyo bw’okukorera omu mbeera mbi ezireesirweho
 empindahinduka y’obwire omu miringo egi:

17 Okuhindura omu mitwarize

 Okutandika kukoresa tekinorogiya ey’omurembe nk’okukoresa ebika
 by’embibo ensya hamwe n’amatungo nainga okukoresa emiringo
 eyongiirwe omuntindo omu mirimo y’ebyobuhingi n’obutungi. Embibo
 ensya nainga ezongiirwe omutindo nainga ebika by’amatungo
 agarikuzaara munonga, n’embibo hamwe n’ebika byamatungo
 ebirikugumira endwara hamwe n’obukooko, nainga ebirikugumira
 embeera mbi munonga z’obwire bitandikire kukoresibwa.
 Ebyokureeberaho by’ebihingwa harimu: ebihimba (NABE 15, NABE 16,
 ebinyeebwa (Serenat 1 na Serenat 11), ebicoori (Longe 10, Longe
 6, 8, 9 na 11). Ebyokureeberaho by’amatungo: ente ez’ekika kya
 Boran, Jersey, embuzi ez’ekika kya Boer, n’enzindi.

 Ebyokureeberaho by’emitwarize mirungi erikukuratirwa omu
 byobuhingi harimu:

 i. Okuhindura aha nkuratanisa y’ebihingwa hamwe n’okuhindura aha bwire
 bw’okuhinga. Omu nkora egi, abahingi bahindwire aha nkuratanisa
 y’ebihingwa kandi batandinka kuhinga ebihingwa ebirikwera juba
 kandi ebirikwera munonga ahu barikubaasa kutunga amagoba maingi;
 nk’okuhinga ebimuri omu mpita nainga omu bisharara.

 ii. Okukoresa emibazi kwita obukooko kweyongiire. N’obu enkora egi
 erikwongyera aha sente ezirikushohora omu byobuhingi, enkora egi
 ekyenderize aha buremeezi bw’ebihingwa kuremwa kukura gye
 bikarugamu amashaaruura maingi nainga amatungo kuteganisibwa
 obukooko n’endwara ebirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire.

 iii. Okukoresa kurungi eitaka nk’okwongyera kukoresa orwezo, okurinda
 eitaka okutwarwa amaizi, hamwe n’okwongyera kujwanzya ebihingwa omu
 musiri gumwe omu kuhinga.

 iv. Okwongyera ebihingwa n’amatungo omutindo hamwe n’okutunguura
 omuntindo gw’akatare kwenda kutunga amagoba maingi. Ekyokureeberaho
 kukoresa ebishoshonkore by’enjoki kukora kanduro, okukoresa
 ebishushu by’omuceeri, omwani, hamwe n’ebinyeebwa kwarira emisiri
 nainga omu kuhemba, n’ebindi.

 v. Okwiha emirimo y’ebyobuhingi omu myanya y’ebibira, n’ebisharara
 kandi n’okubirinda. Okuhingira omu bibira nainga omu bisharara
 nibiha abahingi amagoba g’akaanya kakye kwonka ekirikurugamu
 n’okwongyerera aha mbeera mbi z’empindahinduka y’obwire.

 vi. Okutandikaho ebibiina by’okugaita abahiingi nka Cooperative na
 SACCO okwongyera amaani omu kutunga akatare k’ebintu ebirikuruga
 omu byobuhingi nainga okwogyera omugisha gw’okutunga rooni nainga
 okwongyera omugisha gw’okutunga ebintu by’okukoresa omu mirimo
 y’ebyobuhingi (nk’ensigo, ebyoma, n’obuhabuzi), hamwe n’ebindi.

 vii. Okwongyera aha mihanda y’okutungiramu esente etarikwanguha
 kuteganisibwa empindahinduka y’obwire, nk’okutunga ebyenyanja,
 okutunga enjoki, okutunga obume, empunu, enkoko, n’ebindi.

 viii. Okushukyerera amaizi omu bwire obu ekyanda kirikutwara obwire
 buraingwa omu bicweka bitari bimwe by’eihanga. Abahingi abamwe
 nibakoresa emiringo ey’esente nkye kubaasa kushukyeerera ebihingwa
 byabo nk’amaizi agarikutoonya aha bihingwa kandi abandi bakoresa
 emiringo ey’omurembe kushukyerera ebihingwa byabo.

18 Okukyendeeza akabi akarikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire

 Ebihairwe ahaifo nibyo abahingi barikukora kukyendeeza aha kabi
 akarikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire:

 i. Okuhinga emiti n’ekigyendererwa kya; i) okwongyerera eitaka okwera
 ahabw’eitaka eritaboneire kuhingamu, nk’aha nshozi. ii) okutaho
 oburyo bw’okukyendeeza akabi k’embeera mbi z’obwire: nk’okukorera
 omwani n’ebindi bihingwa nainga amatungo ekibunda; iii) okwongyera
 orwezo omu itaka, n’ebindi.

 ii. Okukoresa emiringo endiijo y’okutungiramu ebyokuhemba kukyendeeza
 aha kutema ebibira, nk’okukoresa esigiri ezirikukoresa omuriro
 mukye, okukoresa obusa bw’amatungo kukora amashanyarazi nainga
 omuriro, okukoresa ebishushu by’ebihingwa nk’eby’omwani, omuceeri,
 n’ebindi omu kuhemba.

 19 Ebi abarikuteekateekyera ebyobuhingi n’obutungi barikukora

 Ahabw’ekigyendererwa ky’akatabo aka, abarikuteekateekyera obuhingi
 n’obutungi barimu ebitongore ebitairweho gavumenti nka Minisiture
 y’Obuhingi n’Obutungi hamwe n’Ebyobujubi, enkora ya NAADS,
 ekitongore ekirikutunguura okuhinga omwani (CDA), Ekitongore
 ekirikukora aha kucondooza aha by’obuhingi omu ihanga (NARO),
 Ekitongore ekirikujunaanwa aha mutindo gw’amate n’okugaguza (DDC),
 za disiturikiti, n’ebindi. Obujunaanizibwa bw’ebitongore ebi
 n’okuteekateekyera hamwe n’okuhwera abahingi kubaasa kutunguura
 ebyobuhingi obwo barikutaho enteekateeka, okubabaasisa kutunga
 tekinorogiya hamwe n’embibo nainga ensigo, okubahisyaho obuhabuzi,
 okwongyera okubaasa kwabo omu kutunga akatare, hamwe n’ebindi.

 Bimwe aha birikukorwa abarikuteekateekyera ebyobuhingi n’obutungi
 kukora aha nshonga z’empindahinduka y’obwire n’ebi:

 a. Okutaho ebiragiro: Gavumenti ekataho ekiragiro kandi kyateebwa omu
 nkora (2012); enteekateeka y’Eihanga y’okukora aha kuhindura aha
 mitwarize (2010); hariho n’enteekateeka ezindi ez’ebitongore
 ezigyendereire kukyendeeza aha kabi k’empindahinduka y’obwire omu
 Uganda. Obwahati Uganda eriyo neeteekateeka enkora y’okukyendeeza
 omwoya omubi ahabw’okutema emiti n’okumaraho ebibira. Aha rurengo
 rwa disiturikiti ebiragiro by’okurinda ebyobuhangwa hamwe
 n’ebyokukyendeeza akabi akarikuruga omu mpindahinduka y’obwire
 bikozirwe kandi nibiteebwa omu nkora.

 b. Okwongyera ebitongore amaani: okutandikaho ekitongore omu
 Minisiture y’Ebyamaizi n’Obuhangwa bw’ensi kureeberera enkora za
 gavumenti ezirikukora aha nshonga z’empindahinduka y’obwire.
 Institutional Strengthening: creation of Climate Change Department
 in Ministry of Water and Environment to coordinate government
 action on climate change.

 c. Okwongyera kumanyisa abantu aha birikukwata aha mpindahinduka
 y’obwire hamwe n’akakwate akateirweho ahagati y’empindahinduka omu
 bwire hamwe n’entaasya y’eihanga. Ekyokureeberaho kurabira omu
 kitongore ky’Eihanga Ekirikujunaanwa aha Buhangwa bw’Ensi,
 gavumenti ekakora okucondooza aha mwoya ogw’akabi ogurikuza omu
 mwanya.

 d. Okurinda ebibira hamwe n’ebisharara ahabwokuba biine omugasho
 gw’amaani aha buhangwa bw’ensi.

 e. Esente z’okuha abahingi b’emiti omuhimbo: hakateibwaho ekibiina
 (ekya SPGS) eky’okuha esente abahingi abarikubaasa kuhinga emiti
 erikurugwamu embaaho kubaasa kuhwera abahingi kuhinga emiti.

 Ebi ni bimwe ebirikukorwa omu kuhindura aha mitwarize: The
 following are some of adaptation measures put in place:

 a. Okutunguura n’okujanjaaza emiringo y’ebyobuhingi emirungi nk’embibo
 ensya hamwe n’ebika by’amatungo ebisya. Development and
 dissemination of agriculture technologies such as new varieties of
 crops and animals.

 b. Okubaasisa abahingi kutunga emibazi y’okufuuhirira obukooko hamwe
 n’okubabaasisa kumanya kugikoresa hamwe n’ebindi ebirikwetengwa,
 nk’orwezo.
 c. Okushomesa abantu kubaasa kumanya obumanyiso oburikubanza
 oburikworeka obwire oku burikuza kuhinduka hamwe n’okwongyera
 kuhisya amakuru aha bantu kurabira aha tiivi hamwe na zaareediyo.

 d. Kubaasisa abahingi kwongyera kutunga amaizi g’okukoresa omu buhingi
 n’obutungi nk’okutimba ebidiba nainga kutunga za tanka z’okubiika
 amaizi, okutaho emiringo y’okutambuza amaizi g’okushukyeerera hamwe
 n’okumanya okugikoresa.

 e. Abakozi by’Ebyobuhingi barikukorera hamwe n’ebitongore ebitari bya
 gavumenti hamwe n’abandi kuta amaani omu kushomesa abahingi
 kukoresa kurungi eitaka.

 20 Ebirikukorwa abandi abarikukwatwaho Responses by other
 stakeholders

 Abarikukwatwaho abandi ab’amaani abaine eki bakozire aha
 kukyendeeza n’okuhindura aha mitwarize harimu abarikuhinga emiti
 y’okwihamu esente, abarikuhindura ebirugire omu buhingi n’obutungi,
 abarikuronda akatare. Ebi ahaifo ni bimwe aha bikozirwe abantu aba
 omu kuhindura aha mitwarize n’okukyendeeza akabi akarikuruga omu
 mpindahinduka y’obwire: :

 a. Okubyara ebibira ebirikurugwamu emiti y’embaaho n’ekigyendererwa
 ky’okukoresa emiti nk’eibikiro ry’omwoya omubi kandi hoona emiti
 egi neeyamba kukyendeeza aha miti ey’obuhangwa erikutemwa
 kusharamu embaaho n’okugikoresa ebintu ebindi. Kandihoona
 bareeteire abantu abandi kutunga emirimo kandi baakyendeeza aha
 ky’etengo ky’eitaka ry’okuhingaho.

 Ebi ahaifo n’emwe aha miringo y’okuhindura aha mitwarize
 erikuhaburwa:

 a. Okubaasisa abahingi kutunga ebyokukoresa omu mirimo y’obuhingi
 kurabira omu kutunga rooni nainga kutunga ebikwato by’okukoresa omu
 mirimo y’ebyobuhingi n’obutungi (kutaho oburyo bw’okubisya aha
 bahingi).

 b. Okwongyera omutindo ebirugire omu buhingi n’obutungi ekirikureetera

 c. Omutindo gw’akatare kweyongyera n’omuringo ogu ebintu
 birikutwazibwamu ahanyima y’okushaaruura.

 21 Ebyokureeberaho by’ebikozirwe kuruga omu mahanga agandi

 Akatabo aka nikaha ebyokureeberaho kuruga omu mahanga ga Rwanda,
 Kenya, Ethiopia na Tanzania

 Ekyokureeberaho 1: Purogyekiti ya MNV ey’okutega amaizi g’enjura
 omu kyaro kya Mayange omuri Rwanda

 The Mayange MNV Rain Harvesting Project in Rwanda Omugasho
 gw’okutega amaizi g’enjura n’okugarinda: Purogyekiti y’ekyaro
 kya Mayange eya MVP omuri Rwanda neekoresa omuringo gw’okutega
 amaizi g’ebidiba by’amaizi ebirikwingana obuhango bwa 100 -
 250m3 ebitimbirwe omu misiri nainga faamu, birimu emiguha
 n’ebyoma by’okusindika amaizi omu misiri y’okuhingamu emboga.
 Ebidiba noobu biraabe birikubaasa kukyendeeramu amaizi
 ahabw’omwoya ogurikurugamu (rita nka 200 kuhika 300 buriizooba),
 nibashakaara ebidiba barikukoresa ebintu ebya buriijo
 ebitarikutwara esente nyingi ahabw’okwenda kukyendeeza aha mwoya
 ogurikuruga omu bidiba. Omuhendo ogurikugyendera omu kushakaara
 nigushashurirwa omu kusigaza amaizi maingi omu kidiba
 agarikukoresibwa omu bihingwa. Omuhandiiki Ngigi (Omwaka 2008a)
 akashanga ngu waakyendeeza aha mwoya ogurikuruga omu maizi
 nikingana n’okukyendeeza aha buhango bw’ekidiba ekirikumanyisa
 ngu omuhendo gw’okushakaara ekidiba nigugyendera omu kukyendeeza
 aha buhango bw’ekidiba eki orikutimba. Okurinda amaizi
 nikwongyerwaho omutindo omu kukoresa ebyoma by’okusindika amaizi
 ebirikukozesibwa engaro , n’ebirikukoresibwa ebigyere hamwe
 n’emipiira y’amaizi erikutoonya amaizi aha bihingwa. Biihirwe
 aha intaneeti: endagiiriro:
 http://mp.convo.net/site/pageserver?pagename=mv_mayange

 Ekyokureeberaho 2: Purogyekiti z’okurinda ebyobuhingi omuri
 Ethiopia, Kenya na Tanzania

Okurinda ebyobuhingi kurimu okukyendeeza okuteganisa eitaka kandi
nikutwariramu emiringo y’okutebeekanisa ah’okuta ebihingwa erikwetengyesa
okukoresa abakozi bakye n’okwongyera ekiriisa ekiri omu itaka. Hoona nabwo
kurimu okurinda eitaka kuguma riine amaizi n’okurireetera okworoba,
n’okuryongyera amaani g’okurinda amaizi kumara omu itaka omwanya muraingwa.
Okurinda ebyobihingi nikimanyisa okworobya eitaka n’okuryongyera amaani
g’okurinda amaizi kumara omwanya muraingwa. Okurinda ebyobuhingi n’emiringo
ey’orurengo rw’ahaiguru erimu okukyendeeza aha amaizi agarikwetengwa.
Enkora egi ey’okurinda amaizi ni nungi kandi neereetera amashaaruura
gaayeyongyera obwingi ebicweka 50 kuhika ahari 150 ahari 100 (birugire omu
kihandiiko kya Ngigi ekya 2003). Amaizi nigaguma omu itaka obwo ebinyaatsi
n’ebisigarira by’ebihingwa byarekwa omu misiri, haabaho okukyendeeza aha
kutema ebishaka n’okureka omu misiri ebikonko by’ebihingwa ebirikusigara
bitakwirwemu, okuhinga omu nyiriri n’okutema eitaka kuhika ahansi, okuhinga
amahambira, okuhindura ebihingwa ebihingirwe omu itaka eryo omu sizoni,
n’okuhinga ebihingwa ebirikurandira ahansi. Omuringo gw’okuhinga ogu
nigubaasa kukoresibwa orikwejunisa okuhingisa amatungo agarikukurura ebyoma
ebirikuhinga. Enkora egi egyenzire neeyeyongyera omu bicweka bya Afirika
ey’Amashuuma g’eruguru ya Sahara ahu okuhinga kurikukorwa omu bwire
bw’enjura, kandi nigugambwa kuba gureeteire amashaaruura okweyongyera.
Abantu okwikiriza kukoresa omuringo ogu, hamwe n’okugutunguura
nibyetengyesa okuha abantu ebyoma by’okuhingisa ebyanguhi kukora hamwe
n’okumanyiiza amatungo g’okubikurura nk’endogoya, ente n’engamira. Omu
mahanga maingi, okukoresa amatungo omu kuhinga n’omuringo gumwe aha miringo
y’okuhinga ey’enzaarwa; okukira munonga omu bicweka bimwe bya Ethiopia,
Kenya, Tanzania, na Gambia. Nahabwekyo, ekirikwetengyesa munonga omu nkora
egi n’okushomesibwa hamwe n’okutunga ebyoma. Omuri Zambia, abahingi
abarikurenga 120,000 abari aha rurengo orw’ahansi nibakoresa omuringo
gw’okurinda ebyobuhingi omu bicweka bya Lusaka, omu mashuuma, burugwaizooba
na rwagati eby’omu ihanga eryo. Hariho ebitongore bingi ebiri aha rurengo
rw’eihanga, ekyanga n’ensi yoona ebirikutunguura enkora y’okurinda
ebyobuhingi ebirikukorera ahansi y’ekitongore kya African Conservation
Tillage (ACT), ekirikutunguura enkora egi.

Biihirwe aha intaneti: www.act-africa.org

 Ekyokureeberaho 3: Ekitereko ky’abahingi ba Amiran omuri Kenya
 ekirikumanywa nka AFK

Ekitereko ky’abahingi ba Amiran ekya AFK n’ekyokureeberaho ky’omuringo
gw’orurengo rw’ahaiguru omu byobuhingi ekyateirweho n’ekigyendererwa
ky’okuhwera abahingi abari aha rurengo orw’ahansi kubaasa kukoresa emiringo
y’ebyobuhingi ey’omurembe, tekinorogiya ensya n’ebyokukoresa omu buhingi
eby’orurengo rw’ahaiguru. Ekitereko kya AFK kikateebwaho kuhwera abahingi
kumaraho obuzibu obu omuhingi nainga guruupu z’abahingi barikushanga obwo
barikukoresa ebiri omu kitereko kuhikaana n’embeera z’obwire oburi omu
kicweka, enshusha y’ensi (enshozi, empanga n’empita) hamwe n’obumanyi obu
omuhingi aine omu by’okuhinga. Ekitereko kirimu ekiju ky’ebiveera,
eky’okuhingiramu ekiine obuhango bwa 120m2 n’ebirikwejunisibwa omu
kushukyeerera amaizi, byona ebirikukora aha musiri gwa 1/8 kya hiika.

Ebintu by’omutaano ebiri omu kitereko kya AFK.

a. Ebirikwejunisibwa kukora ekiju ky’ebiveera eky’okuhingamu
 eky’obuhango bwa mita 8 ahari 15.

b. Ebirikwejunisibwa kwitira amaizi omu bihingwa ebirikubaasa kwitirira
 obuhango bw’omusiri obwa 1/8 ekya hiika.

c. Tanka y’amaizi erikuzamu lita 600 z’amaizi.

d. Ebbomba y’okufuuhirira, erikuzamu lita 16.

e. Ensigo ez’ekika ky’ahaiguru ezirikuza omu kicweka 1/8 kya hiika.

f. Orwezo rw’okuta omu bihingwa kumara sizoni emwe.

g. Emibazi y’okufuuhirira omu musiri kumara sizoni emwe.

h. Eby’okwerindisa emibazi omu kufuhirira.

Hariho okuteekateeka aha kukozesa ekitereko kandi abarikutendekwa nibatunga
ebaruha y’okutendekwa. Ahabw’okwenda kuhwera abahingi abari aha rurengo
rw’ahansi omuri Kenya kubaasa kweguza esente z’okubahwera kukoresa enkora
egi, ab’ekibiina kya Amiran omuri Kenya bakakwatanisa na banka ya Equity
kuguza esente abahingi z’okugura byona ebiri omu kitereko nainga bimwe aha
biri omu kitereko. Kurugiirira aha kihandiiko Organic Farmer, noobaasa
kutunga esente z’okugura byona ebiri omu kitereko nainga bimwe aha biri omu
kitereko kya AFK.

Kurugiirira aha kihandiiko kya Organic Farmer, emiringo ey’obuhangwa (ekya
2009), esente ezirikwetengwa kutunga ekitereko kya AFK nizingana Doora za
Amerika 2640; kwonka omuhingi yaahingamu emiti y’enyaanya 1,000, naabaasa
kwihamu Doora za Amerika 5330, ekirikumanyisa ngu naakora amagoba ga Doora
za Amerika 2690. Okubara amagoba nikworeka ku ekitereko kya AFK kirikuhwera
abahingi ab’orurengo rw’ahansi kutunga entaasya ahabwokuba nibabaasa
kushashura rooni omu sizoni emwe yonka kandi bakoraho n’amagoba.

Biihirwe aha intaneti:
ww.amirankenya.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=282

 Ekyokureeberaho 4: Enkora y’abahingi ba Michimikuru ey’okukorera
 omu mpindahinduka y’obwire (Kenya)

Michimikuru n’eikorero ry’amagyani kandi niribaasa kusa amagyani
garikwingana kiro miriyooni 15 z’amagyani amabisi buri mwaka.

Ahagati y’omwaka gwa 2008 na 2009, ekibiina ekirikukorera omu mpindahinduka
y’obwire kikazoora enkora y’okumanya akabi n’emigisha ebiri omu
mpindahinduka y’obwire kirikukora okugyezesa aha ikorero rya Michimikuru.
Bakashanga ngu abahingi bakaba nibabonabona nikwo kutaho ekyokugyenderaho
omu kushwijuma akabi n’okukakyendeeza nk’oku birikworekwa omu kipande eki
ahaifo:

|n’eitaka kusinduka | |ikorero n’omu maka kwenda|
| | |kurinda ebibira |

 5.0 EBISHEMEREIRE KUKORWA OMU KUHINDURA AHA MITWARIZE OMU
 BYOBUHINGI

 Ebihairwe ahaifo n’obuhabuzi bw’ebishemereire kukorwa kukyendeeza
 akabi akarikureetwaho embeera mbi ahabw’empindahinduka y’obwire:

26 Okwongyera kumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha mpindahinduka y’obwire
 n’akabi aku empindahinduka y’obwire erikureeta aha byobuhingi

 Empindahinduka y’obwire hamwe n’oburemeezi oburikurugiirira aha
 mpinduka egi aha byobuhingi oburikumanywa bwashoboororwaho omu
 kicweka 2.5.3. Nikiteekateekwa ngu abahingi abarikukira obwingi
 tibarikwetegyereza kurungi akakwate akari aha mpindahinduka
 y’obwire hamwe n’obuhingi. Nahabwekyo hariho ekyetengo kuhwera
 abahingi kubaasa kwetegyereza kurungi eki empindahinduka y’obwire
 erikumanyisa hamwe n’akabi aku empinduka eine aha by’obuhingi.
 Ebihairwe abaifo bihairweyo omu kihandiiko eki kwongyera aha
 kumanya oku abahingi baine aha mpindahinduka y’obwire nainga
 akakwate akari ahagati y’obuhingi n’empindahinduka y’obwire.

 a) Kujanjaaza amakuru agarikukwata aha kakwate akari ahagati
 y’empindahinduka y’obwire hamwe n’ebyobuhingi kurabira omu mihanda
 egi:

 i. Kuvunuura amakuru kugata omu ndimi z’enzaarwa hamwe n’okujanjaaza
 amakuru aga kurabira ahari zaarediyo, omu nkiiko z’ebyanga,
 okugajanjaaza kurabira omu kuhandiika ebitabo, okukoresa epipande,
 hamwe n’endiijo miringo. Obutumwa nibubaasa kugyenderera abahingi
 boona hamwe nainga buhandiikirwe ekika kimwe ky’abahingi.

 ii. Okuha abatendeki nainga abandi bajwekyerwa obukugu kubaasa
 kuhikiirira abahingi n’abatungi n’okubaasa kubahisyaho amakuru.

 b) Okworeka akabi akarikurugiirira aha mpindahinduka y’obwire hamwe
 n’emitwarize eyaakubaasa kukuratirwa kugyezaho kukorera omu mbeera
 ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka y’obwire:

 i. Okutayaayirana nainga okwongyera aha bi abandi bakozire.

 ii. Okutandikaho faamu z’okwegyeramu hamwe n’okwegyesa abahingi
 ebyobuhingi ebyomurembe.

27 Okukyendeeza akabi akaakubaasa kurugiirira aha mpindahinduka y’obwire
 aha byobuhingi

 Okushwijuma ebibi ebirikuba aha byobuhingi omu Uganda
 ahabw’empindahinduka y’obwire nikushoboororwa omu kicweka 2.4.
 Obuzibu oburikubaho nibubaasa kweyorekyera aha muhingi nainga aha
 kyaro nainga omu kyanga. Ekihandiiko eki nikiha obuhabuzi obu
 ahaifo kwenda kukyendeeza akabi akaakubaasa kuhika aha byobuhingi
 karikurugiirira aha mpindahinduka y’obwire.
[pic]

 a. Okutandika kukoresa emiringo ey’omutindo gw’ahaiguru omu byobuhingi
 nk’okukoresa embibo nainga amatungo ebyongiirwe omutindo. Ebintu
 ebyogiirwe omutindo ebyokukoresa omu buhingi nibibaasa kutungwa
 kuruga omu gavumenti, nainga kurabira omu bitongore nainga
 puroguraamu ezitari za gavumenti.

 b. Okutandika kukoresa orwezo hamwe n’okukoresa tekinorogiya
 ey’omutindo murungi, eshemereire, erikwongyera amashaaruura kuruga
 omu bihingwa hamwe n’okutunga amashaaruura g’omuntindo murungi.
 Ekindi, abahingi nibatendekwa omu muringo gw’okukoresa ebintu ebi
 omu buryo burungi.

 c. Okukuratira enkora erikurwanisa nainga erikukyendeeza okufeerwa
 ahabw’obukooko n’oburwaire oburikutaahirira ebihingwa n’amatungo.

 d. Okukoresa tekinorogiya nungi ahanyima y’okushaaruura; tekinorogiya
 omu kwongyera ebihingwa omutindo hamwe n’okutaho oburyo
 bw’okurondera ebihingwa akatare, byona hamwe ebirikwongyera amagoba
 kuruga omu bihingwa nainga amatungo.

 5.3. Oburyo bw’okwongyera okubaasa kugumira embeera ezirikureetwaho
 empindahinduka y’obwire.

 Oburyo obu nibwongyerera ahari obwo obuhairwe omu kicweka 3.1 na
 3.2 aharuguru
 a) Okukuratira emitwarize erikubaasa kurinda gye eitaka kurwanisa
 omutunga kutwara eitaka n’okusiisikara kw’eitaka kurabira omu
 kutimba ebiina kwetoorora amaka, kubyara ebinyaasi kukwata eitaka,
 okurima enkingo, okutimba ebiina kuzibira amaizi kwiruka n’okutwara
 eitaka, okwaririra emisiri hamwe n’okuhinga ebibira, n’ebindi.
 b) Okuta esente n’amaani omu bintu n’emirimo erikubaasa kukyendeeza
 empindahinduka y’obwire, nka: okubyara emiti, okukoresa ebindi
 bintu ebyakubaasa kutuha amashanyarazi nainga ebyokuhembesa,
 okugaruraho ebisharara, n’ebindi.
 c) Okutunguura enkoresa nungi y’amaizi ekyokureeberaho nk’okureeka
 amaizi g’enjura, okushukyeera ebihingwa aha rurengo rw’ahansi
 nainga okurinda amaizi omu itaka.
 d) Okutunga inshuwa kwerinda okufeerwa obwo abahingi/abatungi
 barikwegaita hamwe omu bibiina nk’ebya SACCO, okwegaitira omu
 bigombe ebirikubaasa kuha obuhwezi bw’okwongyera ebihingwa
 omutindo, okutunga akatare k’ebihingwa, okutunga rooni z’okukoresa
 hamwe n’okutunga obuhabuzi kuruga omu bakugu b’ebyobuhingi.

 [pic]

[pic]

 6.0 OKUHENDERA

 Ekihandiiko eki nikiha amakuru agarikukwata aha mpindahinduka
 y’obwire hamwe n’embeera mbi ezirikureetwaho empindahinduka egi aha
 byobuhingi. Amakuru aga nigatwarwa kuba ekintu ky’omugasho omu
 kuhwera abahingi n’abatungi kubaasa kukorera omu mbeera
 ezireesirweho empindahinduka y’obwire.

 Oburyo bw’okugyenderaho oburikuhagirwa bwashoboororwaho kurungi.
 Eki kigyendereirwe kureeba ngu abahingi baabaasa kukukuratira
 oburyo oburikukirayo oburikubaasa kubahwera, kandi obubarikubaasa
 kukoresa kandi oburiije kubareetera kusingura.

3.0 AKATABO

[pic]

 Emiringo y’ebyobuhingi emirungi; ebirikukorwa kukyendeeza aha buzibu
 oburikurugiirira omu mpindahinduka y’obwire

 “Okwosya ebisigarira by’ebihingwa, nainga okwosya ebintu byona
 ebirikurugwamu omwika mwingi kushemereire kwetantarwa. Bishemereire
 kuhindurwamu orwezo. N’obu gwakuba omwata nagwo nigubaasa kuhindurwamu
 orwezo rurungi. okwosya ebintu byona ebirikurugwamu omwika mwingi
 nikwongyerera aha mwoya ogw’akabi oguri omu mwanya, ekirikurugiiriramu
 n’okwongyerera aha butagasi hamwe n’okutagata kw’ensi okutwarira hamwe”.

ahabwekigyendererwa ky’obwegyese hamwe n’ebigyendererwa ebindi
by’obushubuuzi hatariho kubanza yaatunga orusa oruri omu buhandiikye kuruga
owa mukama w’ekihandiiko eki, ku yaakuba amanyiise abandi ahu abiihire.

kubiguza ogundi murundi nari shi ahabw’obundi bushuubuzi otaine rusa oruri
omu buhandiikye kuruga aha waakihandiikire, tikirikwikirizibwa. Okushaba

Okwanjura ekihandiiko eki

Ekihandiiko eki kikaruga omu kihandiiko ekihango ekirikwetwa Farmer
Institutions Development (FID) Training Manual, nk’enyorekyerero y’abahingi
n’abatungi abarikwejumbira omu mirimo ya FID. Nikiha okwetegyereza nk’oku
ekibiina kiine kukorwa, kutunguuka, hamwe n’okugumaho.

FID yo neeyorekyerera abakugu abarikugita omu nkora, kandi kyo ekihandiiko
eki nikihabura abari omu bibiina by’aha rurengo rw’ahansi orurikureebererwa
aba Agricultural Technology and Agribusiness Advisory Services (ATAAS).
Abagyendereirwe kuta FID omu nkora ni: Abarikuhwera omu byaro abarikwetwa
CBFs hamwe n’abarikutunguura emirimo y’ekibiina abarikwetwa GPs boona
abaahereze kutunga okwegyesebwa FID.

Nahabwekyo, ekihandiiko eki tikirikwihaho nainga kuza omu mwanya gwa FID
kwihaho nikyongyerera aha bi FID erikugambaho.

Dr. Samuel Mugasi
Executive Director

Okusiima

Ekihandiiko eki kuruga omu kindi kikaihwamu omukugu (Mrs. Luzobe Beatrice)
owaashwijumire ekihandiiko ekihango ekya Farmer Institutions Development
Training Manual. Naasiima omurimo gw’abataire omu nkora ekitabo ekihango
kandi bakeejumbira omu kukishwijuma. Okusiima kw’omutaano nikuza aha
disiturikiti ya Mpigi namunonga abo abarikukora emirimo y’eby’obuhingi
n’obutungi, abaakozire n’omuhimbo kureeba ngu ekihandiiko eki kyashwijumwa.
Okwebaza okwomutaano nikuza ahari abo abarikuhwera omu byanga hamwe
n’abarikutandikaho ebibiina abarikuruga omu magomborora aga Kamengo na
Buwama abaakyebeire ekihandiiko, hamwe n’abahingi abaagarukiremu ebintu
bikuru ahabw’okuta aha mutindo ekihandiiko eki.

Nitusiima obuhwezi bwa sente obwarugire omu purogyekiti ya ATAAS
obwatuhwereire kukora ekihandiiko eki.
EKICWEKA 1: OKUTANDIKAHO EKIBIINA

1.1 Ekibiina hamwe n’emigasho y’akyo

1.1.1 Ekibiina Ky’abahingi n’abatungi nikyo kiiha?

Ekibiina ky’abahingi n’abatungi nikyo abantu bari
kwegaitiramu n’ekyetengo ky’okuganiira aha nshonga
z’obuhingi hamwe n’obutungi bwabo obwa buriijo.

1.1.2 Omugasho gw’ekibiina ky’abahingi nainga abatungi

 ▪ Okuhitsya aha muhingi n’omutungi obuheereza
 bw’obuhabuzi, obukoryo, obutare hamwe
 n’okumanya kuronda obutare bw’ebihingwa,
 n’okutunga bwangu amabanja.
 ▪ Kwongyera amaani g’okutunga n’okukozesa
 obukoryo butsya ahabwokuba ba memba b’ekibiina
 nibahigwa/nibagyemeserezebwa kukozesa obukoryo
 obutsya.
 ▪ Abahingi n’abatungi nibabaasa kukorera hamwe
 omu kuronda obutare bw’ebihingwa byabo
 n’okugura eby’okukozesa. Omuri ekyo, nibatunga
 amaani nairaka rihango.
 ▪ Kuhwera abakozi b’ebyobuhingi n’obutungi kuhika
 aha bahingi n’abatungi baingi omu bwire bumwe.
 ▪ Kyanguhi kukozesa obukoryo butsya kuteereza
 hamwe n’okutaho oby’okurugamu.
 ▪ Kutaho enkora y’okuhwea abahingi n’abatungi
 kumanyana, kubagana obukugu hamwe n’okwegyera ahari bagyenzi baabo.
 ▪ Kurabira omu kibiina, ba memba nibabaasa kuhindura entekateeka yaabo
 embi, emicwe hamwe n’eby’entuura.
 ▪ Ebibiina nibiha abahingi n’abatungi omugisha
 gw’okwejumbira omu nteekateeka z’entunguuka.
 ▪ Abahingi n’abatungi baaba begaitsire hamwe, nibarahuka
 kuzoora/kureeba oburemeezi kandi bareebe oku babaasa kutaho oburyo
 by’okubumaraho.
 ▪ Kutunguura enkorengana y’abaantu aharurengo rw’ebyanga.
 ▪ Ebibiina nibikora emigasho nyingi nk’ey’okuhereza obutumwa hamwe
 n’okumanyisa abantu obukoryo butsya.
 ▪ Ebibiina nibihwera abantu b’omubyanga kutaho enteekateeka hamwe
 n’okurinda gye eby’okukozesa.
 ▪ Kuhwera abahingi n’abatungi kwenyigira omu kureeberera hamwe
 n’okuhabura aha enteekateka z’ekibiina.

1.1.3 Emiringo hamwe n’ebicweka by’ekibiina ky’abahingi hamwe n’abatungi.

Abahingi hamwe n’abatungi kwebaganisamu okurugirira aha bashaija n’abakazi,
emyaka, obushubuzi, embeera y’entatsya. Ekyokureeberaho: ebibiina
by’abashaija, ebibiina by’abakazi, eby’eminyeeto, eby’abagurusi,
eby’orujwangye hamwe n’ebibiina by’abarema.

Ebibiina biri omu miring ebiri: Ebihandiikisibwe omugavumenti kandi
bitongoziibwe hamwe n’ebitahandikisibwe kandi bitatongoziibwe. Ebibiina
ebitahandikisibwe nibibaasa kugira obumanyiso oburikushushana n’obwebibiina
ebihandikisiibwe omu butongore.

1.2 Omuhanda gw’okukora ekibiina ekihandikisiibwe/ekitongoziibwe
1.2.1 Omuhanda

Ekibiina ekitongoziibwe nekyetaaga akamanyisho hamwe n’entaniso ahabwokuba
ebyo n’ibitaanisa ba memba b’ekibiina aha bandi hamwe n’ekibiina aha bindi.
Omuringo gw’okuhandiikisa ekibiina omugavumente gurimu ebihandikirwe
ahansi:
 ▪ Kuronda eizina ry’ekibiina: eiziina ry’ekibiina n’akamanyiso
 akarikwejunisibwa kworeka entaniso y’ekibiina kuruga aha bindi
 bibiina. Nabw’anyuma, reshemeraire kw’oreka ekibiina omunsi yoona
 kandi n’abanyakibiina bashemereire kury’esiimisa. Kandi eiziina eryo,
 niribaasa kuteekateekyerwa aha nkora y’abashaija n’abakazi b’ekibiina,
 eby’obushubuzi nainga emirimo hamwe n’okuronda ekibiina.
 ▪ Omwanya gw’okutamu ekibiina: Ekibiina kishemareire kuza omu mwanya
 murungi oguri kurahuka kureebwa hamwe n’okuhikibwaho.
 ▪ Endagiriro ya posita: kukozesa empurizana y’okukozesa muhanda
 ebaruha hamwe n’ebiindi bintu ebihandikirwe.
 ▪ Amateeka g’ekibiina: Amateeka n’eky’omugasho munonga aha kugumaho
 kw’ekibiina. Nigatondekagye ebigyendererwa by’ekibiina, ebiragiro
 hamwe n’eby’okugyenderaho omu kwebembera ekibiina. Ekibiina ekiine
 obwebembezi burungi nikiguma kirikuhebwa ekitiinisa omu byanga kandi
 n’abantu barikukireba gye.
 ▪ Obwebembezi bw’ekibiina: Eki n’ekintu kikuru munonga ahabwokuba
 nikyorekyerera enkora n’endeeberera y’ekibiina. Ekibiina kyaba kiine
 obwebembezi burungi nikiija kuguma nikireebwa gye abantu kandi
 kiheebwe ekitiinisa omu byanga.
 ▪ Ebishare by’ekibiina: ebishare by’omunyakibiina n’okwehayo n’omutima
 gumwe kuruga owa buri munyakibiina. Ekishare nikira kushashurwa
 omurundi gumwe omu muringo gw’esente kandi nizishoroozebwa omurundi
 gumwe omu mwaka. Esente ezo nizeejunisibwa kubaisaho, enkora
 n’endeeberera y’ekibiina. Ekishare kya buri munya kibiina
 nikimureetera kuteerana n’ekibiina kandi nikimanyisa obwekambi
 n’obumwe. Abanyakibiina boona nibaikirizana aha muhendo gw’esente ezi
 buri munya kibiina araashashure hamwe n’obwire obu araashashuriremu.
 ▪ Ebihandiiko by’ekibiina: ebihandiiko biine omugasho gw’amaani
 ahabwokuba nibihwera abanyakibiina kuguma nibaijuka ebyasharwamu hamwe
 n’emirimo eyaabaheebwa.

1.2.2 OKUKORA KONSITITYUSHONI

Konsitityushoni n’ekihandiiko ky’ebiragiro ebikozirwe abanyakibiina obwo
barikukorera hamwe. Nikishoboorora ekigyendererwa kikuru, ebigyendererwa
ebindi hamwe n’amateeka g’okugyenderaho agarikworekyerera oku emirimo
y’ekibiina eraakorwe. Konsitityushoni neeshoboorora kurungi obugabe
n’obujunaanizibwa obwa buri munyakibiina obu aine aha kibiina kye.
Konsitityushoni neebaasa kukorwa kandi ehindurwe abanyakibiina boona.
Amateeka g’ekibiina gashemereire kwikirizibwa abanyakibiina boona.
Konsitityushoni neehinduka kurugiirira oku ekibiina kirikukura. Nahabwekyo,
konsitityushoni neehinduka. Abanyakibiina bonka nibo bakukora amateeka.
Konsitityushoni y’ekibiina eshemereire kukorwa nainga kuhandiikwa omu
murimi rworobi orurikwetegyerezebwa buri munyakibiina kandi buri omwe
atungyeho kope.

Ekyokureeberaho ky’okukora konsitityushoni

|No.|Ebirimu |Enshonga z’okuteisaho |
|1 |Eiziina ry’ekibiina|Nirirondwa abanyakibiina bonka |
|2 |Endagiriro |Omwanya hamwe n’akasanduukye ka posita |
|3 |Ebigyendererwe |Okurugiirira aha kibiina ky’abahingi, |

|4 |Ba memba |Ni baahi, omuhendo gwabo, hamwe |
| | |n’obujunaanizibwa |
