COVER PAGE

Kwongyeramu amaani omu kutunga obwegyese bw’eidaara ry’ahaiguru

EKITONGORE EKIINE OBUJUNAANIZIBWA BW’OKUHA SENTE ABEEGI B’EIDAARA
RY’AHAIGURU

EBIBUUZO EBIRIKUKIRA KUBUUZIBWA (EEK)

OKWOKUBANZA, 2015

 COLUMN I
HESFB EBIBUUZO EBIRIKUKIRA KUBUUZIBWA (EEK)

Ekibuuzo: Ekitongore ekiine obujunaanizibwa bw’okuha sente abeegi
b’arikweyongyera omu mishomo y’eidaara ry’ahaiguru nikyo kiiha?

Ekigarukwamu: Ekitongore ekirikwetwa Higher Education Students’ Financing
Board (HESFB) n’ekitongore ekyatairweho eiteeka rya Paramenti, namba 2 eya
2014, kuha obuhwezi bwa sente omu muringo gw’amabanja hamwe na sikaara,
abeegi abanyauganda, abahikire kuza omu matendekyero g’ahaiguru
agarikwikirizibwa, kwonka batarikubaasa kweshashurira omu matendekyero ago.

Ekibuuzo:Ni nshonga ki ereesireho ekitongore eki?

Ekigarukwamu: Ekitongore eki kiriho kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa ebi ahaifo:
 i) Kureeba ngu haabaho okwinganisa omu kutunga obwegyese bw’eidaara
 ry’ahaiguru;
 ii) Kuhwera abeegi abanyauganda abasingire ebigyezo kwonka bataine
 sente z’okubasobozesa kutunga obwegyese bw’eidaara ry’ahaiguru;
 iii) Kureeba ngu ebicweka byona bya Uganda byabaganaho aha bwegyese
 bw’eidaara ry’ahaiguru;
 iv) Kutaho kandi n’okuhwera ebyo ebiraayegwe ebirikubaasa kuhwera aha
 ntunguuka y’eihanga; hamwe n’okureeba ngu haabaho omutindo omu
 by’obwegyese omu matendekyero ga gavumenti.
 v) Kureeba ngu abaaheebwa amabanja baashashura kandi n’abandi baatunga
 esente ezo.

Ekibuuzo: Nooha ashemereire kutunga eibanja/looni?
Ekigarukwamu:
 1) Obuhwezi bugyendereire omwegi omunyauganda orikuronda obuhwezi bwa
 sente bw’okweyongyera aha mishomo y’eidaara ry’ahaiguru obwo
 arikushoma amashomo agaikiriziibwe, kandi arikushomera omu
 eitendekyero erikiriziibwe ekitongore ky’eihanga ekirikwetwa National
 Council of Higher Education (NCHE).
 2) HESFB niyo erikushwijuma yaaba omwegi ashemereire kutunga obuhwezi bwa
 sente obwo rurikwetegyereza ebi: ekicweka eki arikurugamu, yaaba ari
 omushaija nainga omukazi, ebyetaago bye hamwe n’okuringaniza hamwe
 n’ebindi bicweka.
 3) HESFB neerangirira amashomo agaraaheebwe obuhwezi omuri ogwo mwaka omu
 bantu boona.

Ekibuuzo: Eibanja eririkuheebwa omwegi n’ery’okukora ki?
Ekigarukwamu:
1) Eibanja, n’ery’okukora ahari ebi ahaifo:
 a) Kushashura fiizi
 b) Kushashura ebishare; na
 c) Kushashura sente z’okucondooza;
 d) Kushashurira eby’okuhwera abeegi abaine oburema aha mibiri yaabo.
2) Omu biro by’omumaisho, kandi empiiha zaabaho, eibanja niriza
kwongyerwamu sente ezirikuhwera aha buraaro, ebyokurya, HESFB yaamara
kwetegyerza ngu esente nizimara ebintu ebyo. Omuhendo gw’esente nigutaana
kurugiirira aha mashomo, kandi n’aha matendekyero ahabwokuba esente
zirikushabwa omu matendekyero tizirikwingana.

Ekibuuzo: Omwegi naaheebwa obwire burikwingana ki kutandika kushashura
eibanja?
Ekigarukwamu: Omwegi naaheebwa emyezi 12 (nigwo mwaka) yaamara kuheza
omushomo ogu yaabaire atungiire eibanja. Naija atandika kushashura eibanja
eryo hamwe n’amagoba gaaryo ahanyima y’omwaka amazire emishomo ye ei
yaatungiire eibanja.

Ekibuuzo: Eibanja nibariha omwegi ari aha rurengo ruuha?
Ekigarukwamu: Eibanja niribeebwa omwegi ari aha rurengo oru ahaifo:

 a) Dipuroma hamwe na Saatifiketi
 b) Diiguri y’okubanza
 c) Ebyongyeirwe aha diguri y’okubaja (Dipuroma na diguri ya kabiri)
 d) Diguri ya kashatu erikumanywa nka Ph.D

Ekibuuzo: Gavumenti, neija kuha abeegi abaatungire amabanja aha muheru
gw’okwega?
Ekigarukwamu: Ngaaha. Kwonka, amashomo agarikushashurirwa enteekateeka egi,
gaine akatare ahabwokuba abagakugukiremu nibeetaagwa kukorera gavumenti
hamwe n’ebindi bitongore by’abantu. Nahabwekyo, nitwesiga ngu omwegi
yaaheza kujwara, taratware mwanya muraingwa kubona omurimo nainga
kwetandikiraho omurimo ogwe nk’omuntu.

 COLUMN 2

Ekibuuzo: Omwegi naikirizibwa kuza kukorera eheeru y’eihanga yaaheza
kushoma?
Ekigarukwamu: Eego, kandi omwegi owaatungire eibanja naashabwa kuha HESFB
puraani nk’oku araaba naashashura eibanja hamwe na adureesi ei araabe
naakozesa
 Kope ya CRB/Card eyaamuhereirweho eibanja
 Foomu eijwije ey’okushabiraho eibanja
 Ahu omwegi arikutuura/maapu erikworeka owaabo
Abeegi nibashaba eibanja baaheza kuheebwa omwanya gw’okwega omu
matendekyero g’ahaiguru.

Ekibuuzo: Omwegi naija kutunga ata sente z’eibanja?
Ekigarukwamu: HESFB yaaheza kutunga eti empapura zirikubana kuruga omu
eitendekyero, neija kushashura sente zoona ezi omwegi ashabire, aha
akaunti y’eitendekyero eryo buri semesita.

Ekibuuzo: HESFB nirwikiriza omwegi kutandika kushashura eibanja omwaka
gutakahwire aherize kwega?
Ekigarukwamu: Eego, eki nikiikirizibwa, kandi HESFB neetaho enteekateeka
oku enshashura eraakorwe.
Ekibuuzo: Omwegi owaaheirwe eibanja naabaasha kusazibwamu?
Ekigarukwamu: Eego, omwegi nibabaasa kumusazamu haabaho ebi ahaifo:
 a) Yaagwa, akabura kutembe eidaara erindi;
 b) Yaahindura obutuuzi akaba omutuuzi w’eihanga erindi;
 c) Kyamanywa ngu empapura zi yaahaireyo zigingiriire/ku yaakuba
 yaabaihire omu bi yaagambaire aba HESFB.
 d) Omwegi ku yaakuba enkozi ya bibi akakora omushango;
 e) Omwegi ku yaakubingwa omu ishomero.

Ekibuuzo: Omwegi naabaasa kushaba eibanja nainga arekye kutunga eibanja
yaaba naashoma?
Ekigarukwamu: Eego, omwegi naabaasa obutashaba eibaanja kumara obwire,
reero aije ashabe eibaaja obwire obwo obu araazeetaagiremu. Enteekateeka
egi neikiriza omwegi kugiizamu obu yaayetenga obuhwezi kandi OBU
YAABWETENGA KWONKA. Omwegi naabaasa kusharaho obu yaayetaaga obuhwezi bwa
sente, obu ashemereire kutunga eibana hamwe n’obu atashemereire kuritunga.

Ekibuuzo: Omwegi naikirizibwa kutunga eibanja kuruga omu banka kandi akiine
erya HESFB?
Ekigarukwamu: Eego, ahabwokuba, okushashura eibanja ry’omwegi
tikirikumaraho sente ezihaingwire ebikweka 30% by’omushara gw’omwegi, kandi
okushashura eibanja ry’omwegi nikitwara omwanya gw’okubanja kukira eibanja
erindi ryona.

Ekibuuzo: Omuzaire nari shi omureeberezi w’omwegi we naashashurira ki?
Ekigarukwamu:
 a) Oburaaro
 b) Ebyokurya
 c) Eby’amagara
 d) Ebitabo, n’ebindi bikwato by’omwegi arikwetaaga ebitari feezi hamwe
 n’esente z’okucondooza
Ekibuuzo: Omwegi naaheebwa obwire burikwingana ki kuba yaaherize kushashura
eibanja?
Ekigarukwamu: Ni emirundi ebiri obwire obu arikumara aha mushomu, gaitaho
n’omwaka ogu arikumara aherize.

Ekibuuzo: Omwegi naikirizibwa kuruga omu itendekyero rimwe kuza omu rindi?
Ekigarukwamu: Eego, omwegi naabaasa kuhindura eitendekyero kuza omu rindi
kwonka eriikiriziibwe.

Ekibuuzo: Nihabaho ki omwegi ohairwe eibanja ku yaakufa?
Ekigarukwamu: Omwegi ohairwe eibanja ku yaakufa, HESFB neesazamu eibanja
eryo, erikugyendera aha kirikwetwa Loan Protection Fund.

Ekibuuzo: Loan Protection Fund n’enki?
Ekigarukwamu: Egi n’enteekateeka erikushaba orikuhora sente, kugira ka
fiizi aku yaayahura kugira ngu ku haakubaho rufu nainga oburema
ebirikuzibira omuntu kukora, sente ezo zigaruke omu mwanya gwa ziri
ezaahairwe ogwo otakiriho nainga otakikora.

 COLUMN 3

Ekibuuzo: Eibanja nirishashurirwa amagoba?
Ekigarukwamu:
 i) Buri eibanja ry’omwegi arikutunga, nirishashurirwa amagoba.
 ii) Amagoba ago nigatiibwaho Minisiture y’eby’obwegyese n’emizaano,
 erikwebuuza ahari Minisita ow’eby’esente obwo egaruka ehaburwa
 HESFB.

Ekibuuzo: Amashomo agarikuheebwa obuhwezi nigo gaahi?
Ekigarukwamu: Amashomo agarikuheebwe obuhwezi nigarondwa HESFB, ekorangaine
na Minisiture y’eby’Obwegyese n’emizaano.

Ekibuuzo: Nimbaasa kutunga eibanja eri aha akaunti yangye?
Ekigarukwamu: Ngaaha, esente z’eibanja ry’omwegi nibazishashura omu
eitendekyero.

 Ekibuuzo: Okushaba kwangye ninkuta nkahi naaba ningyenda eibanja?
Ekigarukwamu: Za foomu z’okushabiraho eibanja nibazita ahari buri mataagi
goona ga Banka ya Centenary omu eihanga ryona. Kandi foomu nizibaasa kuruga
aha weebusaiti y’Ekitongore kya HESFB : http://www.hesfb.go.ug, Weebusaiti
ya Minisiture y’eby’Obwegyese: http:///www.education.go.ug. Abeegi
nibahaburwa kushaba eibanja baaheza kwikirizibwa omu yunivasite kwonka
okutandika kwega kutakahikire kwenda ngu habeho obwire bw’okutebeekanisa
n’okushashuriramu. Abarikushaba boona nibashabwa kuha fiizi
z’okutebeekanisa empapura zaabo obwo zirikuteebwaho ekitongore kya HESFB.

Ekibuuzo: Omwegi naaba naayetaaga ki kushaba eibanja?
Ekigarukwamu: Kushaba eibanja ry’abeegi omuntu ashemereire kuba aine ebi
ahaifo:
 1) Omwegi naashaba HESFB eibanja.
 2) Buri foomu erikushaba eibanja eine kugyende n’ebi:
 a. Ebaruha erikworeka ku omwegi ahairwe omwanya gw’okwega omu
 itendekyero/yunivasite.
 b. Endanga muntu etakahwaireho
 c. Kope ya satifiketi nainga obubonero obu waatungire
 d. Kope y’ebaruha y’obuzaarwa nainga paasipoota
 e. Obushushani bushatu bwa paasipoota.
 f. Ekirikworeka ngu fiizi z’okushaba eibanja zishashwirwe.

Ekibuuzo: Ni mashomo ki agaraabaase kushashurirwa enteekateeka egi omu
mwaka gwa 2015/16?
Ekigarukwamu: HESFB niyo erikusharaho amashomo agaraheebwe obuhwezi, reero
bagarangirire omu mpapura z’amahurire ahabwa boona kubimanya.

AMASHOMO AGARAAHWERWE OMU MWAKA GWA 2015/16
Amashomo aga ahaifo gahinguziibwe HESFB kweta abeegi ba kabiri omu
nteekateeka egi omu mwaka gwa 2015/16:

 COLUMN 4

Ekibuuzo: Omuntu aine kushashura eibanja yaaremwa kumara emishomo ye?
Ekigarukwamu: Eego, buri omwe orikutunga eibanja omu nteekateeka egi, aine
kushashura sente zoona ezi yaahairwe, kwihaho:
 a) owaatungire eibanja/looni ku yaakuba omurema
 b) owaatungire eibanja ku yaakufa
Omuri ebyo byombi, HESFB neija kwiha sente ezo omu nteekateeka ya Loan
Protection Fund. Omwegi yaaremererwa kumara emishomo ye, eibanja
nibarishashuza ahonaaho.

Ekibuuzo: Omuntu naabaasa kushaba ebicweka by’eibanja?
Ekigarukwamu: Eego, omuntu naikirizibwa kushaba omuhendo gwa sente
ogwarikwenda.

Ekibuuzo: HESFB neija kuha obuhwezi obwa za sikaara?
Ekigarukwamu: Eego, HESFB neija kuha za sikaara abeegi abo abarikutwara
amashomo agu HESFB erikutwara nka makuru aha ntunguuka y’eihanga.

Ekibuuzo: Ni sikaara ki eziraheebwe abeegi kuruga ahari HESFB?
Ekigarukwamu: Sikaara ezi niziija kuba ez’emiringo ebiri: ez’aha rurengo
rw’eihanga hamwe n’ez’amahanga abiri.

Ekibuuzo: Sikaara ezi niziija kuba nizihwera kukora ki?
Ekigarukwamu: Nizija kuba nizikora ebi ahaifo:
 a) Fiizi;
 b) Ebishare;
 c) Ebitabo hamwe n’ebindi bihandiiko by’okushoma;
 d) Esente z’oburaaro;
 e) Ebyokurya;
 f) Esente z’okucondooza

 COLUMN 4

 g) Ebikwato/nainga ebyetaago byabo abaine oburema aha mibiri yaabo;
 h) Ebindi ebyakubaasa kuteekateekwa HESFB kandi bikaikirizibwa Minisita.

Ekibuuzo: Nooha oshemereire kutunga obuhwezi bwa sikaara?
Ekigarukwamu: Buri mwegi omunyauganda orikwega amashomo agarikumanywa nka
makuru aha ntunguuka y’eihanga, kandi agarikuhwera kwigaza ebiina ebiri omu
eibura ry’abakozi.

Ekibuuzo: Obuhwezi obwa sikaara nabwo nibushashurwa?
Ekigarukwamu: Ngaaha, kwihaho omu nshonga zitari zimwe na zimwe nk’ezi:
 a) omwegi yaaremwa kumara emishomo ye ahabw’enshonga
 zitarikwetegyerezebwa nk’oku zirikurambikwa HESFB, sikaara
 neesharwamu, kandi omwegi naashabwa kushashura sente zoona
 ezaamuhairwe.
 b) Omwegi ku yaakuba agingiriire ebihandiiko akabikozesa kutunga obuhwezi
 bwa looni nainga sikaara.

Table 1: Orunyiriri rwa yunivasite za Gavumenti hamwe n’Ez’abantu
eziikiriziibwe ekitongore kya NCHE (2014), ezihinguziibwe HESFB

Ekibuuzo: HESFB neeshanga nkahi?
Ekigarukwamu: Nitushangwa aha adureesi egi ahaifo:

 EKIHANDIIKO EKIRIKWIKIRIZA OMUNTU KWETABA OMU KUCONDOOZA OYEKUNDAIRE.

Omutwe ogurikucondoozibwaho : Amate gonka buzima: Enkora nsya nkura
eraije kuhwera
 Abakazi omu
kuheereza abaana omubazi

Abacondoozi abakuru: Aparna Ramanathan, MD; Tawanda Gumbo, MD

ENTANDIKIRIRO

Ebi oshemereire kumanya aha kucondooza oku:

 • Nooshabwa kwetaba omu kucondooza oku.

 • Foomu egi erikukushaba kwetaba omu kucondooza neeshoboorora aha
 kucondooza hamwe n’eki iwe oshemereire kukora.

 • Reeba ngu waakishoma noobwegyendesereza kandi waatwara obwire
 burikumara bwona obworikwenda kureeba ngu waakyetegyereza

 • Ori nyekundaire. Obaasa kucwamu obuteetaba mu kucondooza oku kandi ku
 waakwetabamu, obaasa kukurugamu eshaaha yoona. Torikwija kutunga
 ekibonerezo kyona ku oraacwemu kuruga omu kucondooza.

Entandikiriro

Okuheereza abaana omubazi obwire obu kigumire kandi nikimaraho n’esente
nyingi. Ahabw’okushanga ngu amaizi amarungi agatarimu burwaire g’okunywa
gagumire kubona, nikicendeeza aha miring endiijo y’okumira obuzuma nari
okutabura omubazi ogw’esaano ogurikurugwamu omubazi ogw’amaizi
ogurikwetenga amaizi marungi nk’agoObwahati, okwiha omubazi ogw’amaizi omu
mwanya gumwe kugutwara omu gundi mwanya nikimara esente nyingi kandi obwire
obwingi emibazi nk’egi neesiisikara ahonaaho.. Turi omu nteekateeka
y’okukora ekyoma ekiraije kureetera abaana baarahuka kumira emibaazi yaabo
kurungi bataine kugumirwa kwona, kandi hoona nabwo ekyoma eki nikiija
kureeba ngu abaana baatunga ekipiimo ky’omubazi ekihikire. Hati twaza
kukworeka ekintu narishi ekikwato ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere.

Ekigyendererwa ky’okucondooza oku:
Okucondooza oku, kuriyo nikukorwa ahabw’okwenda kumanya yaaba abaana bato
nibiija kwikiriza kukoresa ekintu ekirikuringa omunwa gw’eibeere omurundi
gumwe omu izooba. Ku waakuba nookunda, nitukushaba ngu okorese ekintu
ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere eki omurundi gumwe omu izooba kumara ameezi
abiri omu bwire obu oraabe nooyonsya omwana waawe. Ebi turaarundaane
nibiija kuhwera kandi bikoresibwe omu kutaho ekintu ekiraije kukoresibwa
gye omu kuha abaana bato omubazi. Abantu nka 220 nibo baraije kwetaba omu
kucondooza oku.

Okucondooza nikwija kumara ameezi abiri. Noobaasa kucwamu okeemereza
okwetaba kwawe omu kucondooza ahabwa buri nshonga ei waakuba oine, kandi
nookikora eshaaha yoona ei orikwenda.

Baitu nabwo, ku oraacwemu kwemereza okwetaba kwawe omu kucondooza oku,
nikuhiga ngu omanyisa abacondooza baitu. Obaasa kwija kubuuzibwa yaaba
noikiriza kumaririiza kumwe aha kukyebeera okurukukorwa abo abaacwamu
kuruga omu kucondooza.

Ahabwenki orikushabwa kwetaba omu kucondooza oku

Nooshabwa kwetaba omu kucondooza oku ahabw’okuba ori omwe omu baheereze
kuzaara omwana juba.

Entwaza y’okucondooza:
Ku oriikirize kwetaba omu kucondooza oku, noija kushabwa kuta omukono gwawe
aha foomu egi erikukushaba ngu oyetabe omu kucondooza oyekundiire,
nabwanyima noija kukyeberwa hamwe n’entwaza yaakwo.

Entwaza hamwe n’okushwijuma okuraakorwe omu bwire bw’okucondooza:

Okucondooza oku nikwija kukorwa kurikugyendera hamwe n’okuragurirwa
okw’eirwariro okuraije kuba nikukorwa buraijo ahabw’okwenda ngu
otateganisibwa; hoona nabwo okwija kwongyera kutaayaayira eirwariro
okwongyeirweho kubaasa kwija kwetengwa ahabw’okucondooza oku. Okwongyera
ahari eki, abacondooza baitu nibaija kuguma nibakutaayaayira kureeba oku
orikukoresa ekintu ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere, emirundi ebiri omu
sande.

Entwaza y’okutoorana abaraayetabe omu kucondooza hamwe n’okwikiriza kwabo
beekundiire (Kitware nk’eshaaha ibiri)
1. Noija kubuuzibwa eziina ryawe, emyaka, orurimi, oruganda, ebyafaayo
 by’okuragurirwa kwawe, okuragurirwa kwawe okwa hati, omuringo ogu omwana
 waawe yaazairwemu, oburemeezi obwakuba bwabaireho orikumuzaara, ebyafaayo
 by’endagurira y’omwana waawe, hamwe na yaaba oine enteekateeka y’okwija
 kwonsya nari otaraije kwonsya omwana waawe.
2. Oburaingwa n’oburemeezi bw’omwana waawe nibwija kupimwa.
3. Abarikucondooza nibiija kukugambira ebindi ebikwatiraine n’okucondooza
 kandi bakuhe n’obwire burikumara bw’okubuuza ebibuuzo ebya buri muringo
 gwona. Nabwanyima noija kubuuzibwa yaaba waikiriza kwetaba omu kucondooza
 oku oyekundaire.
4. Obaasa kwija kuteebwa omu guruupu ey’abantu abatarikwejunisa ekintu
 ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere nari omuri abo abariyo nibagyezesebwaho
 ekintu ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere.
5. Okwonsya omwana waawe nikwija kuguma nikureebwa kandi n’oku omwana
 araakwate gye eibeere kurita omu kana akaryonka nakwo nikwija kureeberwa
 orubaju rumwe (orubaju iwe oraacwemu). Omwana waawe ku araaheze kwonka
 naija kupimwa aha minzaani.
6. Ku oraabe ori omu guruupu y’abantu abo abarikugyezesibwa oku kukoresa
 ekintu ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere, noija kugambirwa kandi oyorekwa
 oku orikukikoresa. Oku omwana waawe arikukwata eibeere nakwo nikwija
 kushwijumwa obwo ekintu ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere nakyo kyaba
 kiririho.

Entwaza hamwe n’okukyebera okuraakorwe omu bwire bw’okucondooza ( Kimare
nk’eshaaha 2 buri sande habeho okutaayaayira abo emirundi 16 omu bwire
bw’ameezi abiri.)

 1. Iwe n’omwana waawe, nimwija kuguma nimureebwa omu bwire bw’okwonsya
 obwo aha eibeere haaba hariho ekintu ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere(
 eki nikiija kuba kitairwe aha rubaju oru iwe nyina w’omwana oraareebe
 ngu amashereka nigagyenda gye omwana yaaba naayonka.). Eki, nikiija
 kukorwa emirundi ebiri omu sande kandi oburemeezi n’oburaingwa
 bw’omwana waawe, nibiija kuba nibipimwa reero bihandiikwe
 otakamwokize, hamwe na bwanyima ya buri kumwosya. Ku oraabe ori mu
 guruupu erimu abo abairikugyezesibwa , noija kuheebwa ekitabo ahi
 buriizooba, oraagume orikuhandiika obu waakoresa ekintu ekirikurinda
 omunwa gw’eibeere. Oku omwana arikukwata eibeere akonka, nikwija kuba
 nikureebwa buri rutaayaayo.
 2. Ku oraabe ori omu guruupu erimu abo abairikugyezesibwa, noija kuguma
 nooshwijumwa buri sande ahabw’okwenda ngu tumanye yaaba okukoresa
 ekintu ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere kyorobi nari kigumiresa, hamwe
 n’okubaasisa abacondooza baitu kumanya oburemeezi bwona obwakubaasa
 kukirugamu
 3. Abazaire abari omu guruupu erikugyezesibwa, nibiija kugaruka
 babuuzibwe aha muheru gw’okucondooza ahabw’okwenda ngu bamanyise
 abacondoozi baitu aha ki barikuteekateeka nari oku bashangire enkora
 egi ey’okukoresa ekintu ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere.
Ebirikukwata aha ku omwana arikukwata eibeere okuraareebwe hamwe n’oku
omwana arikuremeera, ebiraarundanwe omy kucondooza oku, nibiija kutaibwaho
ahabwokwenda kubicondoozaho kutaruri kubikoresa omu byokuragurira abantu.

Ebicondooziibweho ebiraarundanwe ebi, tibirikwija kugira omugasho
gw’okumanya oburemeezi narin oburwaire. Nobu abacondooza baitu
batarikureeba oku omwana waawe arikukwata eibeere akonka hamwe n’okumanya
oburemeezi bwe ngu batambe endwara nari kumuragurira, nibaija kubaasa
kukugambira ku baakugira eki baamanya nari baareeba ekitari kya buriijo.
Iwe n’omushaho waawe owa buriijo nimwija kucwamu hamwe yaaba mugumizamu
mukongyera kukyebera n’okuragurira omwana ogwo ku haakuba haine ekintu
nk’ekyo ekireebirwe abacondooza baitu. Ahabw’okushanga ngu ebiraarundanwe
omu kucondoozaq oku ebikwatsire aha ku omwana arikwonka n’oku arikuremeera
bitagyendereire kukoresibwa omu kuragurira bantu, ebiraarugye omu
kucondooza, tibirikwija kukwohorerezibwa nari kwohorezibwa omushaho waawe
owa buriijo.

Akabi nari obutabeerwa gye

Entwaza y’okucondooza:

Ahabw’okwetaba kwawe omu kucondooza oku, hariho omugisha muhango gw’okwija
kuhikwaho ebintu ebi ebitari birungi ebiine akakwate n’okucondooza oku.
Reeba ngu waabigaaniiraho n’abarikukucondoozaho hamwe n’orikukira
kukuragurira. Ekintu ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere eki orikukoresa
kibaasa kureetaho bimwe , nari byona ebi, nainga kibaasa n’obutagira ebibi
ebi kyareetaho omu bihandikire ahansi. Ebitari birungi ebirukumanywa gye
nk’ebirikureetwa enkora egi, birimu okukyendera okw’omuringo ogu
amasherereka garikuruga omu ibaare kuza omu kanwa k’omwana, omuri ebyo,
akabi akongyeirweho ak’okwigaza enshekye z’omu mabeere ezirikutwara amate
omu mabeere. Baitu hoona nabwo , ekintu ekirikukoresibwa kurinda omunwa
gw’eibeere, n’ekikwato ekiikiriziibwe kandi kikahinguzibwa, kandi habaire
haine omu kucondooza okundi kwingi ahi kibaire kyakoresiibwe nk’omu muringo
gurikukoresibwa ogutaine kabi aha mwana muto na nyiina.

Oburuhe bw’omu biteekateeko

Bimwe aha bibuuzo ebi turaakubuuze nka bimwe ebiri omu kucondooza oku,
bibaasa kukureetera obutabeerwa gye. Obaasa kwanga kugarukamu ekibuuzo
kyona, obanze waayehuumuzaho, nari oyemereze okwetaba kwawe omu kucondooza
oku eshaaha yoona ei oraayendereho

Okuremwa kukuuma enaama

Eshaaha yoona ebicodooziibwe byaheza kurundanwa, nihaba hariho omugisha
muhango gw’okumanya eyaakubaire eri enaama yaabyo. Nitwija kutaho oburyo
bwona kureeba ngu twakuuma ebikucondooziibweho nk’enaama kwonka eki tubaasa
obutakihamiza kimwe ahabwokuba tikyorobi.

 Akandi kabi

Habaasa kuba hariho ebindi ebitari birungi ebitarikumanywa eshaaha egi
ebyakubaasa kuhika aha beetabire omu kucondooza oku. Ku waakuba
oyeraarikiriire kwija kubugana oburemeeza nk’obu obwotakamanyire, reeba ngu
waabigaaniiraho n’abantu abarikucondooza..

Ebirungi ebiri omu kucondooza:

Ku oriikirize kwetaba omu kucondooza oku, habaasa kubaho ebirungi ebi iwe
nari omwana waawe mwakubaasa kuganyirwamu nari bibaasa obutabaho.
Abacondoozi tibarikubaasa kukuhamiza ngu nooteekwa kugira okuganyirwa okwa
butunu oku oraatungye ahabw’okwetaba omu kucondooza oku. Bamwe
abaraakwetabemu babaasa kukuganyirwamu omu muringo gw’okutunga n’okumanya
okwonsya okushemeziibwemu. Hoona nabwe, okuba kwawe kandi okamaara obwire
bwingi orikugaaniira n’abashaho abahangu (abakugu) abari omu kucondooza
oku, nikwija kuha iwe n’omwana waawe, obwire omugisha gw’okuba hamwe
mukabuuza ebi mutarikumanya kandi mukagurukwamu omu bwijwire, ogutarikukira
kuba guriho omu marwariro agarikuragurizibwamu abantu abaingi.

Twine amatsiko ngu ebi oraamanyisibwe kandi okeega kuruga omu kucondoozibwa
oku, nibiija kubeera eby’omugasho abakazi abazaire abandi omu bwire
bw’omumaisho. Ebi turaatungye kuruga omu kucondooza oku, nibiija kurugwamu
emiringo misya eyorobi ey’okuhwera omu kuha abaana bato abakiri kwonka
emibazi.

Okuta amaani nari okuha ekihembo abaraayetabe omu kucondooza oku:

Noija kushashurwa shiringi 20,000 za Uganda (Emitwaro ebiri y’esente za
Uganda) ahabw’enshohoza y’ebyengyenda hamwe n’ebyokunywa byawe. Noija
kwikirizibwa kuguma obiikire ekikwato ekirikurinda omunwa gw’eibeere
ekiraabe kikoresiibwe omu bwire bw’okucondooza, eki oraije kukuhwera omu
kwonsya.

Okukuuma enaama y’ebicondoziibwe :

Ebi oraije kutugambira n’ebirakwihweho omu kucondooza oku, nibiija kukuumwa
nk’enaama ahabwokuba thariho muntu ow’aheeru weena otarikucondooza naitwe
oraije kubimanya nari kubireeba. Nitwija kukoresa ebipapura
by’okucondoorezaho hamwe n’ebipande twaba niturundana ebi turikucondoozaho,
kandi ebi nibiija kubikwa kumara omwaka gumwe nabwanyima
bihwerekyerezibwe. Oshemereire kumanya ngu ebitongore ebyo ebyakubaasa
kuhika nari kureeba aha kopi y’ebihandiiko by’ebyamagara gaawe nari
ebyokuragurirwa kwawe baaba nibacondooza, okureeba yaaba biri omu buteeka,
 nari baaba nibabishwijuma, ebitongore ebyo harimu n’ebi:

 • Abajwekyerwa b’ebitongore bya Gavumenti nk’ekitongore ekirikutegyeka
 ebyebyokurya n’emibazi ekya ‘Food and Drug Administration (FDA)’,
 ekirikureeba ngu okucondooza kwaguma kutari kw’akabi aha magara
 g’abantu , hamwe na

 • N’akakiiko akakuru aka ‘UT Southwestern Institutional Review Board’
 hamwe na n’akakiiko aka Yunivasite ya Mbarara aka ‘MUST
 Institutional Review Board’.

 • Tihariho abandi bantu abashashuriire okucondooza oku abaraije kutunga
 aha birugire omu kucondooza oku.
Okurinda okweherera kw’abakwetabiremu omu bwire bw’okubabuuza
n’okurundaana eby’okucondoozaho: Shoboorora oku eki kiraije kukorwa.

Ebi oraatugambire nari ebiraakwihweho ebituraabiikye omu bihandiiko
byaitu, tibiraije kuba biriho eiziina ryawe, nari ebiro ebi waazaariirwe.
Kopi z’ebihandiiko byawe ebirikukwata aha by’amagara n’eby’okuragurirwa
kwawe zoona niziiza kubiikwa omu mwanya ogukuumirwe gye oguraije kuguma
kukingirwe obwire bwona. Ebiraakwihweho omu bwire bw’okucondooza oku
nibiija kukoresibwa omu kucondooza oku kwonka kandi hoona tihariho ndiijo
muntu oraije kubaasa kwikirizibwa kubihikaho nari kubikoresa kureka nk’oku
kyayorekwa aharuguru.

Obugabe bw’okwanga kwetaba nari kuruga omu kucondooza:

Okwetaba omu kucondooza oku n’okw’okwekundira. Okwanga kwetaba omu
kucondooza oku, tikurikwija kurugwamu ekibonerezo kyona nari okufeerwa
ebirungi ebi ogabirwe kandi ebi oshemereire kutunga. Ku oraacwemu kwetaba
omu kucondooza oku, nabwanyima okahindura aha nteekateeka yaawe okenda
kukurugamu, oine obugabe bw’okukikora eshaaha yoona ei oraayendere

Ku waakuruga omu kucondooza oku hakaabaho ki?

Ku waakucwamu kurekyeraho kwetaba omu kucondooza oku, tikirikwija kushiisha
akakwate kaawe aku oine n’abakozi nari abashaho ba UT Southwestern. Oba
oyetaba omu kucondooza oku nari obura kukwetabamu tikirikwija kugira oku
kyakwihaho obugabe bwawe hamwe n’omutindo gw’obuheereza bw’ebyamagara
bwawe.

Nimbuuza oha nari ninteerera oha ku naakuba nyine ebibuuzo nari
oburemeezi?

Ku waakuba oine ebibuuzo ebikwatiraine n’okucondooza oku, hikiirira Aparna
Ramanathan aha simu ye egi: 617-388-8643 erikuba eriho obwire bwona
buriizooba.

Aha bibuuzo ebikwatiraine n’obugabe bwawe nk’omuntu oyetabire omu
kucondooza oku, hikiirira ofiisi za ‘UT Southwestern Institutional Review
Board (IRB)’ aha simu egi: 214-648-3060 nari akakiiko ka Yunivasite ya
Mbarara aka ‘Mbarara University of Science and Technology (MUST)
Institutional Review Committee’ aha simu yaabo egi: 256-4854-33795

Okuta omukono nari ekinkumu kyawe aha foomu egi nikimanyisa ki?

Okuta omukono gwawe aha foomu egi nikimanyisa ngu

 • Waamanyisibwa byona ebikwatiraine n’omugasho, entwaza, akabi hamwe
 n’okuganyirwa, ebiri omu kucondooza oku.

 • Waaheebwa omugisha gw’okubuuza ebibuuzo otakataireho omukono gwawe

 • Waikiriza oyekundaire okuza omu kucondooza oku.

<runya parent_folder="compressedFiles.zip" id="file2565116" filename="Nutrition (merged).doc">
Ebiriisa ebiri omu byokurya ebitoorainwe kuruga omuri Uganda

 Ebyokurya ebirikukira kuriibwa omu bicweka bya rwagati ya Uganda hamwe na
 burengerwa-izooba ya Uganda hamwe n’ebiriisa ebirimu

 Ekitabo eki omuntu naabaasa kukyejunisa obwo arikukuratira endagiiriro

 Ekitabo eki omintu arikubaasa kukoresa nk’omuntu, ataine buhabuzi
 bw’omukugu omu by’endya nari omushaho

Ebirimu

 ENTANDIKIIRIRO

1. Ebituteeire omuhimbo kuhandiika ekitabo eki

Uganda n’emwe aha mahanga againe emiringo mingi y’ebyokurya hamwe
n’obushoboorozi bw’okuriisa abantu baayo kandi bakaguza n’ebindi omu
mahanga g’aheeru. Baitu embeera y’endya-nungi omu ihanga ekiine oburemeezi
kandi ni kimwe aha buremeezi obutambire eikono eby’entunguuka. Bumwe aha
buremeezi omu by’endya-nungi n’eibura ry’amakuru n’obutumwa obuhikire kandi
oburikwizira omu bwire omu buri kwetengyerwamu, kuhwera Abanyayuganda
kucwamu kurungi ebi baraarye. Nikigambwa ngu Abanyayuganda tibarikuta
mutima aha kurya ebiihuro ebiine ebiriisa byona, n’obu ebyokurya ebirimu
ebyo biriisa biriho omu byanga byabo. N’ahabw’ekyo n’ekyomugasho kugira
ekitabo ekirimu ebirikukwata aha ndya-nungi.

Ekitabo eki kirimu amakuru g’omugasho aha byokurya ebirikukira kuriibwa omu
Uganda, na munonga omu bicweka bya rwagati hamwe n’ebya burengyerwa-izooba
ya Uganda. Ekigyendererwa ky’ekitabo eki ekikuru n’okumanyisa hamwe
n’okureetera ensi yoona kumanya kandi ekata omutima aha byokurya ebya kunu
hamwe n’ebyo ebiihirwe omu mahanga agandi ebi abantu barikurya, ebiriisa
ebibirimu, endya yaabyo hamwe n’omugasho ogu biine aha magara.
Eky’omutaano munonga, ekitabo ki n’engendererwaho erikubaasa kuteebwa omu
nkora kandi ekakuratirwa abantu buntu omu kutoorana hamwe n’okwemanyiza
endya-nungi. Hoona nabwo, ekitabo eki kibaasa kukoresibwa abakozi b’omu
byanga nk’eky’okujurizibwaho omu kwetegyereza endya-nungi hamwe n’ebiriisa
ebiri omu byokurya bitari bimwe na bimwe; reero eki kibahwere kuhabura gye
abantu abu barikuheereza.

1.2 Ebyokurya ebishoboorooreirwe omu kitabo eki

Ebyokurya bingi bishobororeirwe omu kitabo eki. Tukurateire bimwe ahari ebi
omu kutoorana ebyokurya ebi;

 i) Omugasho gw’ekyokurya omu kyanga. Eki kirugireire aha
 kakwate k’ekyokurya hamwe n’ekyanga. Ekyokureeberaho,
 ekyokurya kibaasa kuba kiri omuryo omukuru omu kyanga
 nainga kiine ekiriisa kingi. Omu muringo ogwo, nitwenda ngu
 tuhe abantu amakuru garikukiraho kwenda ngu batoorane kandi
 barye ebiihuro ebiine ebiriisa byona.

 ii) Okubaho kw’ekyokurya omu kyanga. Aha tutooreine ebyokurya
 ebi abantu barikubaasa kugura aha mihendo y’ahansi nainga
 ebi barikubaasa kwehingira bonka.

 iii) Emigasho ei ebyokurya ebyo biine aha magara gaabo. Amagara
 marungi ni kimwe aha birungi ebirikuruga omubyokurya.
 Okugira amagara marungi n’emwe aha nshonga nkuru
 erikureetera abantu kurya. Hippocrates, omwe aha bantu
 abarikumanywa munonga obubyafaayo by’emibazi y’ekijungu,
 eizooba rimwe akagira ati: Reka ebyokurya bibe omubazi
 gwawe, n’omubazi gwawe gube ebyokurya byawe." N’ahabw’ekyo,
 ebyokurya ebiine emigasho mingi aha magara bikateebwa omu
 kitabo eki.

 iv) Obunuzi – Hariho ebyokurya ebi abantu barikurya
 ahabw’obunuzi. Ekyokureeberaho kirungi n’esenene:
 Abanyayuganda bingi nibarya esenene ahabw’obunuzi bwazo.

Ni kikuru kumanya ngu ebyokurya ebiteirwe omu kitabo eki tibyo byonka
ebirikuhingwa n’okuriibwa omu bicweka bya rwagati hamwe na burengyerwa-
izooba ya Uganda. Ebingi ebirikuriibwa, ebiriyo kandi ebirimu n’ebiriisa
tibiteirwemu. Hariho amatsiko g’okuguma nitwongyera ebindi twaheza kutunga
ebirikubikwataho.

Emiringo y’ebyokurya egi niyo turikuhanuuraho.

 1. Enyama, ebyenyanja, amahuri, n’ebinyonyi
 2. Amate n’ebikorwa omu mate
 3. Obukooko oburikuriibwa
 4. Otunyoobwa
 5. Enjuma
 6. Emizi, empimbi hamwe n’emboga rukanca
 7. Ebijuman’emboga ezirikwiragura
 8. Otwokurya
 9. Ebishaju by’enyamaishwa hamwe n’eby’ebihingwa

 Buri muringo gwine ebyokurya byagwo. Ekyokureeberaho, enyama
 n’ey’emiringo mingi: enyama y’ente; enyama y’entaama; hamwe n’enyama
 y’empunu. Nikikuru kumanya ngu ebyokurya ebiri omu kibiina kimwe
 nibishushana kwonka tibirikwinganisa ekiriisa. Ekyokureeberaho, muhogo
 n’ebitakuri n’emiryo mikuru eijwire ekiriisa empa-maani kwonka ebipimo
 by’ekyokiriisa tibirikwingana. Hoona nabwo, ebitakuri na muhogo
 tibirikwinganisa ebiriisa by’emyonyo, enyombeka-mubiri hamwe na
 vitameeni. N’ahabw’ekyo, noohaburwa kutoorana ebyokurya bingi kuruga omu
 bibiina by’ebyokurya ebikuru hamwe n’ebitari bikuru munonga, kwenda ngu
 otungye ekiihuro ekiijwire ebiriisa byona. Nikikuru oihe ebyokurya omu
 myanya mingi ahabwo’okuba ekiriisa nikirugiirira aha mutindo gw’eitaka.

1.3 Amakuru

Okutoorana ebyokurya ebiteirwe omu kitabo eki kwegamiire ebibuuzo nk’ebi:
N’enki eki omuntu wa buriijo arikwetenga kumanya aha byokurya hamwe n’endya-
nungi. Okugarukamu ekibuuzo eki, emitwe egi eteirwemu.

 i) Okushoboorora omu bugufu, oteireho ekishushani aha buri kyokurya.

 ii) Ebiriisa ebirimu

 iii) Emigasho aha magara

 iv) Endya yaabyo/okubirikuriibwa

 v) Emitwarize emirungi/erkwetengwa n’egyo etarikwetengwa/emibi

1.4 Abu ekitabo eki kikoreirwe/oraakyejunise

Ekitabo eki kigyendereire kuhwera abantu ba buriijo hamwe n’abanyamyoga
abaine obushoboorozi kuzanzaaza amakuru omu bantu ba buriijo hamwe
n’okubamanyisa endya y’ebyokurya. Abanyamyoga abu ekitabo kihandiikiirwe
barimu aba:

 i) Abakugu omu nshonga z’endya abari omu kyanga

 ii) Abarikuzanzaaza obutumwa bw’ebyamagara hamwe n’endya-nungi

 iii) Emikutu y’amakuru (empapura z’amakuru, obutabo, ebitabo, reediyo
 hamwe na tiivi)

 iv) Abeegyesa

 v) Abakozi b’ebyamagara

Abantu abaine oburemeezi bw’eby’amagara oburikwetenga ebiihuro by’ekiriisa
eby’omutaano nibahaburwa kutunga ebaruha y’okukyeberwa kuruga ow’omushaho
otendekirwe, reero mpaho babone kuza ow’omukugu w’eby’endya.

 Oku oshemeire kwejunisa ekitabo eki
 EKICWEKA KY’OKUBANZA

 ENYAMA, EBYENYANJA, AMAHURI, N’EBINYONYI

Ebyokurya ebirikushangwa omu kibiina ky’ebyokurya eki nibikira kwetwa
enduga-mu-nyamaishwa nari enyombeka-mubiri eziruga omu nyamaishwa.
Ebyokurya ebi birimu ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri kandi hoona nabwo n’oburugo
burungi bw’ebiriisa bya vitameeni hamwe n’emyonyo. Emigasho ei biine aha
magara neeshoboororwa ahaifo obwo turikukwata kimwe aha kindi.

1.1 Enyama

Enyama erimu eminofa, ebicweka by’omubiri gw’enyamaishwa nk’omutima hamwe
n’ebindi bicweka by’enyamaishwa; ebinyonyi; ebyenyanja; hamwe n’ebyokurya
ebiihwa omu nyanja. Omu nshonga z’eby’endya, enyama n’ey’ebika bibiri:
erikutukura hamwe n’erikwera. Enyama erikutukura erimu egyo eruga omu nte
hamwe n’encwamutwe; eruga omu ntaama n’entaama ento; hamwe n’egyo
ey’embuzi. Enyama erikwera erimu egyo eruga omu nkoko, embaata, sekoko
hamwe n’endahi. Enyama y’empunu; ey’omu mbaju n’omu mugongo gw’empunu,
hamwe n’ey’omu kibero ky’empunu.
Okutwarira hamwe, enyama ezirikutukura n’oburugo burungi bw’ekiriisa
ky’enkora-shagama kwonka ziine ebishaju bingi ekirikukanyisa akabi
k’okukwatwa endwara z’omutima. Baitu oshemeire kumanya ngu enyama
y’ebinyonyi obumwe neebaasa kugira ebishaju bingi kukira eby’enyama y’ente
hamwe n’ezindi nyama.
Enyama neekira kukizayo ebeeyi omu byokurya ebirikukora ekiihuro;
n’ahabw’ekyo, bamwe nibagireeba nk’ekyokurya ky’abagaiga. Ahabw’emihendo
y’ahaiguru ei eguzibwaho hamwe n’okureebwa nk’ekyokurya ky’abagaiga,
neekira kuriibwa abo abaine sente z’okugigura.Okutwarira hamwe, abaineho
aha sente, nibakira kurya enyama nyingi, reero bahendera bateire amagara
gaabo omu kabi. Orubaju orundi, abantu abaine esente nkye tibarikukira
kurya enyama; n’ahabw’ekyo bari omu kabi k’eibura ry’ekiriisa enyombeka-
mubiri, vitameeni ahamwe n’emyonyo. Omu Uganda, enyama erikukira kuriibwa
n’ey’ente, ey’empunu, enkoko, ekyenyanja, ey’embuzi hamwe n’ey’entaama.
Enyama y’ente n’egyo erikuruga omu nte kandi nigwo muringo gw’enyama
ogurikukirayo kuriibwa omu Uganda. Ekiriisa ekiri omu nyama y’ente
nikitaana kurugiirira aha by’okurya ebi ogabureire ente; endya y’ente;
hamwe n’amagara g’ente eine aha bunaku obu yaabaagirwaho.

 Oku erikuriibwa

Omu Uganda, enyama y’ente neetekwa nk’emboga z’okukoza omu miryo emikuru
nk’ebitookye, oburo, omukyeri, obuhunga na muhogo. Emboga z’okukoza
nibazikora barikuteeka entogo z’enyama nainga ezitatarikire munonga. Omu
kuteebeekanisa ebiihuro ebitari by’amaani nka kyansya, enyama neetaburwa
omu miryo emikuru ey’ebyanga nka ebitookye kukora akatogo. Enyama etarikire
(omukaro) neekira kuriibwa nk’akokurya.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Enyama y’ente erimu ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri, ebishaju, vitameeni hamwe
n’emyonyo. Omutindo gw’enyama hamwe n’ebiriisa ebirimu nibyegamira ekicweka
eki enyama yaatemwaho.

 • Enyama erikusharwa aha bicweka ebitarikukora munonga nk’amaraka,
 embaju hamwe n’omugongo neekira kuba eijwire ebishaju, byorobi kandi
 birikuteerera; n’ahabw’ekyo enyama y’ebishaju egi neekira kukundwa
 abaguzi b’enyama.

 • Enyama erikusharwa aha bibero hamwe n’aha maguru ag’omu maisho neeba
 etaine bishaju bingi baitu neekira kuguma kufutana kukira eshazirwe
 aha bicweka ebindi byona. N’ahabw’ekyo, abari abaingi b’enyama
 tibarikukunda enyama etaine bishaju (enkapa).

 • Enyama eyetooreire amagufa agakiriyo nigakukura/nigaguma eine
 akanenerano kaingi hamwe n’engaitsi. Omuhendo gw’akanenerano hamwe
 n’engaitsi nigwegamira obukuru bw’enyamaishwa. Enyama y’enyamaishwa
 ezikiri nto neeba eine akanenerano kaingi hamwe n’engaitsi eyorobi
 kukira enyama y’enyamaishwa ezikuzire.

Ahaifo nitworeka ekipande ekirikworeka ebiriisa ebiri omu miringo eshatu
y’enyama y’ente etoorainwe kurugiirira aha bwingi bw’ebishaju ebigirimu.
Okutwarira hamwe, enkapa (enyama eine ebishaju bikye) eine enyombeka-mubiri
nyingi, vitameeni hamwe n’emyonyo okukira enyama eine ebishaju bingi.

Ekipande1: Ebiriisa ebiri omunyama y’ente eteekire (150 g)

 Biihirwe omu: NutriSurvey 2007

 Emigasho aha magara

Enyama y’ente n’ekyokurya kirungi ky’okutungamu ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri,
za vitameeni hamwe n’emyonyo. Okutwarira hamwe, neemanywa ahabw’okuha
ebiriisa bya by’enkora-shagama hamwe n’enkora-nkojo.

 Emitwarize mirungi

 i) Enyama y’ente neebaasa kuba kimwe aha byokurya ebikora ekihuuro
 ekirikuheereza amagara marungi. Baitu nikikuru oyefubire/oyepimire aha
 bwingi bw’enyama ei oraarye hamwe n’emirundi ei enyama eraabe eri kimwe
 aha byokurya ebiraakore ekiihuro. Ekihaburo ekyahamwe nikigira ngu
 ogaburire abaana n’abantu bakuru enyama omurundi gumwe nari ebiri omu
 izooba. Baitu nabwo, ijuka ngu abaana nibeetenga enyama nk’abantu
 abakuru ahakuba nibeetenga ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri omu bwingi kwenda
 ngu bakure. Egabo emwe y’enyama neingana na guraamu 84 z’enyama etarimu
 bishaju bingi. Enyama egi neeba neingana nk’omutuumo gw’amatatu.

 ii) Ni kikuru kumanya ngu ebyenyanja, amahuri, hamwe n’obukooko
 oburikuriibwa, nibibaasa kukoresibwa omu mwanya gw’enyama y’ente. (Reeba
 ebicweka ebiine akakwate). Hoona ogu n’omutwarize murungi ahakuba nikihwera
 kuhindura aha miringo y’ebyokurya.

 Emitwarize etarikwetengwa

 i) N’omucwe mubi kurya enyama nyingi aha kiihuro kimwe. Omu Uganda,
 abantu abakuzire nibakira kurya enyama nyingi, obwo barikugiima abaana
 nainga obumwe bakabaha kaingana-busha. Eki nikita abakuru omu kabi
 k’okugira obugomokye/obuhango-bwa-busha, oburemeezi burengyesereize,
 ekookoro, endwara z’omutima, shukaari hamwe n’oburwaire bw’ensigo. Omu
 maka agamwe, enyama nibagigura omu bwingi aha mazooba amakuru kandi
 ago mazooba ni makye omu mwaka. Eki nikimanyisa ngu aha mazooba aga,
 nibarya enyama omu bwingi. Egi n’entwaza mbi ahakuba:
 ii) Enyama neekira kuba erimu ebiriisa enyombeka-mubiri hamwe n’ebishaju
 ekirikumanyisa ngu omuntu ku arikurya enyama nyingi naatunga ebishaju
 bingi ebirikuruga omunyamaishwa.
 iii) Okurya enyama nyingi nikiha omubiri omugugu gw’okcwanyagura hamwe
 n’okushohoza omwika ogukira endiijo (oguruga omu nyombeka-mubiri)
 kuruga omu mubiri. Eki nikireetera ekine hamwe n’ensigo byakora
 obucweka-eihembe. Obumwe ebishaju ebirengesereize nibihendera
 byeshukire omu bicweka bikuru nk’omutima.

1.1.2 Enyama y’embuzi

Ogu nigumwe aha miringo y’enyama ei abantu b’omu bicweka bya rwagati hamwe
n’ebya burengyerwa-izooba barikukunda. Baingi nibaikiriza ngu enyama
y’embuzi enuzire kukira ey’ente. Niko kokurya k’amaani akarikuriibwa abantu
abatarikurya nyama y’ente. Eki nikimanyisa ngu niko kokurya akarikukira
kuriibwa omu birabo by’ebyokurya (za hoteeri), omu birabo by’amaarwa
(ebaara), aha magyenyi hamwe n’ahamihanda.

 Oku erikuriibwa

Enyama y’embuzi neekira kuriibwa nk’emboga z’okukoza hamwe n’omucuuzi.
Hoona nabwo nibagitarika reero eguzibwa nk’akokurya omu hoteeri, omu baara,
aha magyenyi hamwe n’ahamihanda.

Ebiriisa ebirimu

Biihirwe omu: NutriSurvey 2007

 Emigasho aha magara

Okutwarira hamwe, enyama y’embuzi n’ey’omutindo gw’ahaiguru kukira ey’ente
hamwe n’ey’enyamaisho ezindi empango. Baingi nibaikiriza ngu omucuuzi
gw’embuzi nigugaruzamu, gwongyeramu amaani kandi gwozya omubiri: nikyo
barikuguheera abarwaire hamwe n’abakazi abaherize kuzaara.

 Emitwarize mirungi

 Okwejunisa omucuuzi gw’enyama y’embuzi kugaruramu abarwaire amaani ni
 kirungi ahakuba nikyongyera omubiri amaizi hamwe n’ebiriisa reero mpaho
 omurwaire arahuka kutaraaka.

 Emitwarize etarikwetengwa

 Okurya muchomo y’embuzi nyingi nikikira kukorwa abantu abarikuza omu
 baara ezirikuguza muchomo. Okurya enyama nyingi y’embuzi nikireetera
 omuntu yaagira ebishaju bingi ebiruga omu nyama y’enyamaishwa ebirikuta
 amagara omu kabi byaheza kuba bingi.

1.1.3 Enyama y’entama ento hamwe n’ey’entaama enkuru

Egi n’emiringo y’enyama erikuruga omu ntaama. Entaaniso eriho neeretwaho
obukuru bw’entaama eyaabaagwa. Ey’entaama ento neruga omu ntaama eri ahansi
y’ameezi ikumi n’ana (14) kandi ey’entaama enkuru neeruga omu ntaama
erengize ameezi ikumi n’ana (14) ag’obukuru. Baingi nibakunda enyama
y’entaama ento ahakuba neeba eyorobi kandi etaine kahooho (mushongye)
gw’amaani. Ey’entaama enkuru neeba neiragura, egumire kandi eine akahooho
k’amaani, akarikweyongyera entaama yaaguma neekura. Obwire obwingi,
kigumire kutaanisa enyama y’embuzi hamwe n’ey’entaama. Omu Uganda,
okuriisa, okubaaga hamwe n’okurya enyama y’entaama bikiri ahansi ahakuba
entaama tiziine katare kaingi.
 a) Oku erikuriibwa

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Ebiriisa ebiri omu nyama y’entaama ento n’enkuru tibirikutaana munonga
n’ebyo ebiri omu nyama y’ente. Entaaniso enkye eriho neeyegamira oku
oriisize enyamaishwa hamwe n’obukuru bwayo.

 Emigasho aha magara

Baingi nibaikiriza ngu enyama y’ekishaju ekiihwa omu kikira ky’entaama
n’omubazi. Nikyo abantu bamwe barikugyejunisiza omu kuraguurira endwara
z’abato nk’obusheru hamwe n’akakonko.

Emitwarize mirungi/erikwetengwa
 i) Enyama y’entaama neebaasa kuriibwa omu mwanya gw’ey’embuzi. Enyama
 y’entaama neekira kugira ebishaju bingi kukira ey’ente hamwe
 n’ey’embuzi; n’ahabw’ekyo, eshemeire kubanza yaaharagatwaho ebishaju
 ebirengyesereize etakateekirwe.
ii) Hoona nabwo nikirungi obutongyera ebishaju byona omunyama y’entaama
 waaba noogiteeka. Ebishaju ebiri omu nyama y’entaama nibyemariirira,
 kandi obumwe nibiba birengyesereize – enshonga ahabw’enki oshemeire
 kubikamuuramu.
iii) Amaka gamwe nigakira kwejunisa ebishaju ebiihwa omu mukira gw’entaama
 kuta akahooho omu mboga ezirikwiragura, ebihimba, hamwe n’omuniino
 gw’ebihimba ebiteekire. Eki nikirungi aha bantu b’ebyanga abaine
 oburemeezi omu kutunga ebishaju ebiruga omu nyamaishwa hamwe na zaabuto
 eziruga omu bihingwa. Entwaza egi neeha abantu omugisha gw’okutunga
 ekiriisa nyombeka-mubiri, ebishaju ebiruga omu nyamaishwa hamwe
 n’ebiriisa ebindi ebishangwa omu bishaju by’omukira gw’entaama. Eki
 nikitangira abaana okushinya hamwe n’endwara eziine akakwate n’endya-
 mbi, mpaho bakura gye.

3 Emitwarize mibi

i) Baingi tibarikukunda nyama y’entaama: nibagyeta biizi-bitoosya – ahakuba
 neerahuka kuhora. Enteekateeka egi eine akakwate n’okugira ngu enyama egi
 eijwire ebishaju ebirikurahuka kukwatana. Obutaharagata bishaju
 ebirengyesereize nikyo kirikutuma enyama y’entaama etaagira katare
 nk’ezindi.
ii) Ebishaju by’entaama ebyomire/ebikarangire ti kyokurya kirungi aha bantu
 abarikurahuka kutunga emiringo endiijo ey’enyama hamwe n’ebindi bishaju
 na zaabuto eziruga omu bihingwa.

1.1.4 Enyama y’empunu

Egi n’enyama eruga omu mpunu.Enyama y’empunu omu Uganda neekira kuguzibwa
ahanyima y’okubaga. Abantu nibagigura ah’ababagi mbisi baitu erikukira
obwingi neeguzibwa aha birabo by’empunu, obwo baamara kugisiika,
kugikaranga hamwe n’okugyosya. Okukora omu nyama y’empuni ebindi bintu
nikitamba eikono enyikiriza ezirikunuga empunu n’enyama yaazo.

 Oku erikuriibwa

Nk’oku ezindi nyama zirikuriibwa, enyama y’empunu neebaasa kuriibwa eshaaha
yoona nk’akokurya nainga nk’ekyokurya kimwe aha kiihuro. Enyama y’empunu
neekira kuriibwa baingi omu bantu abaine emirimo kandi neekira kuriibwa
n’amaarwa omu birabo. Baitu ebaasa kukora nk’endiijo nyama. Neebaasa
kukorwamu emboga z’okukoza, reero eriibwe eka yoona. Omu zaadisiturikit
ezirikukirayo omukuriisa empunu, enyama y’empunu etandikire kuriibwa kukira
ey’ente ahabw’okugira ngu tibarikugiseera kandi enuzire kukira enyama
y’emiringo endiijo. Hoona nabwo, abantu batandikire kukunda kurya zaasosegi
z’empuni kandi babaasa kugiihamu n’emigaati ekorwa omunyama.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

N’obu eraabe eri enyama y’ebishaju, enyama y’empunu eshazirwe aha mpunu
emwe terikwinganisa bishaju hamwe n’ebiriisa kurugiira ahu yaasharwa.

Biihirwe omu: NutriSurvey 2007

 Emigasho aha magara

Okutwarira hamwe, enyama y’empununeereebwa nk’eine ebishaju bingi. Baitu
obwingi bw’ebishaju niburugiirira aha kika ky’empunu, ebi erikugabuurirwa
hamwe n’ahu enyama yaasharwa. Enyama y’empunu etaine bishaju bingi
n’oburugo burungi bw’ekiriisa enyombeka-magara kandi eine ebishaju bikye
okukira entongo z’ebishaju by’enyama y’ente, ey’embuzi, ey’enkoko hamwe
n’eye’entaama. Omu byanga ebitarikurahuka kutunga ebishaju, enyama y’empunu
eijwire ebishaju neebaasa kubahwera ahakuba eijwire ebiriisa. Eine ebiriisa
bya Vitameeni B (namunonga ey’ekika ky’endinda-bwongo), ekiriisa enkora-
nkojo hamwe n’ekiriisa enkora-shagama.
N’obu eraabe eine ebirungi byayo, nikikuru kumanya ngu, nk’enyama ezindi,
enyama y’empunu eijwire ebishaju ebyakubaasa kuta amagara omukabi. Waarya
enyama y’empunu eringaniire, nootunga ebiriisa bingi eby’omugasho. Omuntu
tashemeire kurya enyama erengire kimwe-kya-ikumi kya kiro. Oshemeire
kwepimira obwingi bw’enyama y’empunu ei oraarye n’emirundi ei oraagirye
kwenda ngu okyendeeze aha bishaju ebitarikwetengwa omu mubiri.

 Emitwarize mibi/etarikwetengwa

 • Omu Uganda abantu abakuru abarikukora nibakira kushaba haihi kiro emwe
 y’emyama y’empunu aha birabo by’empunu reero yoona bagirya bagimaraho
 omurundi gumwe. Okurya enyama nyingi nikirwaza endwaire nk’okuzimba
 engingo. Ebirabo by’empunu nibiguza enyama ekarangire/eyokize hamwe
 n’egyo esiikire kwonka abantu abaingi nibakira kushaba esiikire
 ahakuba neerahuka kusya. Enyama esiikire hoona nabwo neeguma eine
 ebishaju byayo ebingi, ekirikuta amagara omu kabi kahango nk’okurwaza
 endwara z’omutima.
 • Enyama y’empunu neekira kuriibwa omu bwingi n’amaarwa ekirikureetera
 baingi baagomoka ekirenga, kandi abandi baagira obuhango bwa-busha.
 • Ababaagi b’empunu obwahati ni bakye ekirukureetera empunu zaabaagirwa
 omu mariisizo omu muringo gw’oburofa. Eki nikirugamu enyama y’empunu
 ey’omutindo gw’ahansi. Egi n’emwe aha nshonga ahabw’enki abantu abamwe
 barikutiina kurya enyama y’empunu.
 • Enyama y’empunu etahaire gye; erikuruga omu masyo agarikureebererwa
 kubi; nari omu mabaagiro amarofa neebaasa kurugamu endwara endeetwa-
 burofa nk’enjoka.

1.2 Ebinyonyi

Hariho emiringo y’ebinyonyi ebirikuriibwa, baitu omu Uganda omubaro
gw’ebirikuriibwa guri ahansi. Ebirikuriibwa kandi bikatungwa omu maka omu
Uganda birimu enkoko, embaata, sekoko, hamwe n’endahi. Baitu omu nganda
z’abantu abamwe, ebinyonyi by’omwishwa nibiriibwa.

1.2.1 Enyama y’enkoko

Omu Uganda, enyama y’enkoko etwire eri ekyokurya nyamunura omu nganda
nyngi. Eyanguhi kutungwa aha rurengo rw’eka. Amaka maingi gatungire enkoko
omu muringo gwa rweriisa-rwetaasya ezirikubaagirwa abagyenyi nainga
zikariibwa aha mikoro ey’omutaano. Kurugiirira aha by’obuhangwa, enyama
y’enkoko neekira kuteekwa nk’emboga z’okukoza emiryo emikuru nk’ebitookye
omuri Buganda hamwe n’oburo omu bicweka bya burengerwa-izooba. Baitu hoona,
enkoko neebaasa kuriibwa n’ebindi byokurya byona nk’ebitakuri, muhogo,
ebitekyere hamwe n’obuhunga. Enyama y’enkoko eyokize/ekarangire n’akokurya
akarikukukundwa omu birabo by’amaarwa hamwe n’ahamihanda-nyigyendwa. Enyama
y’enkoko eteekirwe omu ndeere (oruwombo) neekundwa munonga omu bicweka bya
rwagati ya Uganda. Obwahati, enkoko neeteekwa omu miringo mingi aha mikoro
etari emwe-n’emwe. Enyama esiikire munonga etandikire kuriibwa n’okukundwa
munonga kukira eyokize.

 Oku erikuriibwa

Enyama y’enkoko neebaasa kuriibwa obwire bwona, kandi omu muringo gwona.
Emboga z’enkoko nari omucuuzi gwayo nibibaasa kugyendera aha byokurya
ebiine ekiriisa ky’empa-maani hamwe n’emigaati. Hoona nabwo, neebaasa
kuriibwa nk’empa-kooyooyo (ekyokukundisa omuntu ebindi byokurya), akokurya
k’aharubaju nainga ekoresibwe nk’omucuuzi, emboga, akatogo, eriibwe
n’ebijuma, eteebwe omu byokurya by’abaana, nainga eteebwe omuri
zaasumbuusa. Neebaasa n’okurwamu sosegi nainga entongo z’okuriibwa aha
mikoro. N’ahabw’ekyo, enyama y’enkoko neebaasa kuriibwa obwire bwona.
Okutwarira hamwe, noohaburwa kugabura enyama emirundi gumwe nari ebiri
(guraamu 84 nari) buri kugabura kandi gumwe aha mirundi egi obaasa kugabura
enkoko. Enyama y’enkoko neebaasa kukoresibwa omu mwanya gw’endiijo nyama
yoona.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Nk’enyama ezindi, enyama y’ebinyonyi erimu ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri. N’obu
baingi barikugira ngu ebinyonyi biine ebishaju bikye, enyama y’ebinyonyi
neeshushanisa enyama ezindi ebishaju. Obwingi bw’ebishaju oburi omu
kinyonyi nibwegamira ogu ekinyonyi kigaburiirwe, ekika kyakyo hamwe n’ahu
enyama yaasharwa. Ekyokureeberaho, enkoko z’enjungu ez’enyama nizikira
kugira ebishaju bingi kukiza ez’Enyankore eza rweriisa –rwetaasya hamwe
n’ezo ezitakiteera mahuri. Waaba noogyeragyeranisa aha nyama eshazirwe,
noija kushanga ngu ekibero n’omugongo biine ebishaju bingi kukira ekifuba.
Hoona nabwo, obwingi bw’ebiriisa ebyetengwa omu bukye nk’emyonyo na
vitameeni nibwegamira eki enkoko egaburiirwe, ekika kyayo hamwe n’ahu
enyama eshazirwe. Ekyokureeberaho, enyama y’embaata eine ekiriisa kingi
ky’enkora-shagama okukira enkoko; Enyama erikwiragura nk’ekibero hamwe
n’omugongo eine ekiriisa enkora-shagama kingi kukira ey’ekifuba. Ebiriisa
ebiri omu nkoko hamwe n’obwingi bwabyo nibyorekwa omu kipande namba ya kana
(4) hamwe n’endiijo nyama y’ebinyonyi. Ekipande eki kigyendereire kukuhwera
kugyeragyeranisa enyama y’ebinyonyi bitari bimwe-na-bimwe.

ebirikukira kuriibwa hamwe n’obwingi bw’ebiriisa (guraamu 100 buri kimwe).

Biihirwe omu: NutriSurvey 2007

 Emigasho aha magara

Nk’oku enyama y’ente eri, n’enyama y’enkoko neebaasa kuba kimwe aha
byokurya ebirikukora ekiihuro ekireeta amagara marungi. N’oburugo burungi
bw’ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri, emyonyo hamwe na zaavitameeni ebirikwongyera
aha burungi bw’amagara. Baitu ni kirungi oyepimire obwingi bw’enkoko obu
oraarye hamwe n’obu oraagirye (ni bwanyima ya bwire ki?)

 Emitwarize mirungi/erikwetengwa

Enyama y’enkoko erimu ebiriisa bingi kukiza ezindi nyama n’ahabw’ekyo
neekora kihango aha biihuro byaitu. Ni kirungi orye enyama y’enkoko omu
mwanya gw’ey’embuzi, ey’ente hamwe n’ebyenyanja. Okukora eki, emirundi ei
oraaryemu enyama y’enkoko neija kurugiirira aha mirundi ei obaire nooryamu
enyama. Ekyokureeberaho, omu ka erikurya enyama buriizooba, ni kirungi
kurya enyama y’enkoko haakiri omurundi gumwe omu wiiki. Reebeka ngu
waakwata enyama y’enkoko embisi n’obuyonjo hamwe n’obwecumi kutangira
endwara endeetwa-burofa.

 Emitwarize mibi

Okitwarira hamwe, enyama y’enkoko neekiza ezindi nyama ebiriisa baitu
omuringo oguturi kugikwatamu kandi tukagiryamu nigwo gurikureeta yaaba
endofa kandi yaabura kuhikiiriza emigasho yaayo hamwe n’okuha abantu bamwe
ebiriisa. N’ahabw’ekyo, yehare ebi:
 • Okurya enyama y’enkoko n’ekishushu kyayo nikyongyera aha bwingi
 bw’ebishaju oburikuza omu mubiri gwawe. Abantu abarikukira kurya
 enkoko hamwe naabo abari omu kabi k’okugomoka oburengye n’okugira
 obuhango-bwa-busha bashemeire kwehara ekishushu. Nikirungi kwihaho
 ekishushu otakateekire nkoko.
 • Abantu abamwe nibaikiriza ngu waarya enyama y’enkoko erimu eshagama
 nootunga ekiriisa ky’enkora-shagama kingi, ekirikukuhwera okukora
 eshagama. Oshemeire kwehara entwaza mbi egi ahakuba okuteeka enkoko
 tikurikukyendeeza aha bwingi bw’ekiriisa enkora-shagama ekirikuba kiri
 omu nkoko nari ezindi nyama. Orushagama nirworeka ku ekinyonyi kyaba
 kikiri kito kandi eki kibaasa kukuta omu kabi k’endwara eziruga omu
 kukwata kubi ebyokurya nk’okukurwaza omunda.
 • Nk’enyama ezindi, enyama y’enkoko neerahuka kusiisikara. Enyama mbisi
 teshemeire kubiikwa aheeru ya furiigi nari hare n’omuriro kumara
 eshaaha emwe ahakuba neerahuka kukwatwa obukooko-endwaza nk’obwo
 oburikurwaza omunda. Baitu nabwo, enyama embisi nari eteekire
 teshemeire kubiikwa omu furiigi kurenzya ebiro bishatu (3).

1.2.2. Enyama y’embaata

Omu Uganda, embaata nizikira kutungirwa haihi n’emyegyengo y’enyanja hamwe
n’omu ndembo. Abantu bamwe nibakunda enyama y’embaata ahakuba eine enyama
nyingi kukira enkoko.

Oku erikuriibwa

Enyama y’embaata neeshangwa omu myanya mikye omu Uganda; n’ahabw’ekyo
neeribwa abantu bakye. Okutwarira hamwe, neeriibwa aha biro bikuru nka
Paasika ahabw’okugira enyama nyingi. Neekira kuteekwa reero otunga emboga
z’okukoza baitu ebaasa kuteebekanisibwamu ebindi nka sosegi na zaakeeki
ebirikuriibwa eshaaha yoona nka ekyokurya kimwe aha kiihuro nainga
nk’akokurya; nk’entongo z’okuriibwa n’omucuuzi hamwe n’ebijuma.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Enyama y’embaata erimu ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri eky’omutindo gw’ahaiguru
kandi eine ebishaju bikye waagyeregyeranisa n’enkoko. Hoona nabwo eine
ebiriisa ebikora eshagama okukira enkoko. Reeba ekipande namba 4.

Emigasho aha magara

Enyama y’embaata neeshushanisa ebiriisa n’ey’enkoko. Okwongyera ahari eki,
enyama y’embaata eijwire ebiriisa ebikora eshagama.

 Emitwarize mirungi/erikwetengwa

Enyama y’embaata neekira kukoresibwa nk’ey’enkoko. Eki nikyongyera aha
bwingi bw’ebyokurya ebiruga omu binyonyi ebyariibwa. Waagikoresa aha biro
bikuru nk’aha kiihuro kya Paasika, enyama y’embaata neemara eka mpango
ahakuba ni nyingi kukira ey’enkoko.

 Emitwarize mibi/etarikwetengwa

 i) Nk’oku enyama y’enkoko eri, enyama y’embaata n’enyama eijwire ekiriisa
 kwonka erikurahuka kusiisikara. Waagikwata kubi, neebaasa kurwaza
 endwara ezireetwa enkwata-mbi y’ebyokurya.
ii) Abantu abamwe tibarikurya nyama y’embaata ahakuba tibarikumanya
 kugiteeka. Abantu abakuru nibahendera bariire enyama y’embaata omu
 bwingi omu zaahoteeri. Eki tikiri kirungi ahakuba nikitaasya omu mubiri
 ebishaju bingi ebirikuta amagara omu kabi.

1.2.3. Enyama y’endahi

Endahi n’emwe aha binyonyi by’omwishwa ebikizire kuhigwa kandi obwa hati
abantu baingi batandikire kutunga endahi ahabw’amahuri gaayo. Enyama
y’endahi eyeyongyeire kukundwa ahabw’okukyendeeza ebishaju omu mubiri,
n’obu oku enyama y’endahi eri kukora eki kukiriyo nikucondoozibwa. Baitu
ebirugire omu kucondooza okukozirwe nibyoreka ngu enyama n’amahuri g’endahi
biine ebishaju bikye kukira ebyokurya ebiruga omu nkoko, embaata, sekoko.

 Oku erikuriibwa

Endahi neekira kuriibwa yoona n’ahabw’ekyo ni nungi y’okukora emboga
z’okukoza hamwe n’omucuuzi. Kwonka, enyama y’endahi neebaasa kujwangibwamu
ebiruga omu binyonyi ebindi kukora emiringo y’enyama endiijo eine emigasho
mingi.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Ahabw’okugira ngu n’akanyonyi kakye, enyama y’endahi neeba eijwire emisi
ekirikureetera yaagira ebiriisa bingi kukira ebindi binyonyi. Eijwire
ebiriisa ebijunaanizibwa okukora eshagama. Hoona nabwo, eine ebishaju bikye
okukira enyama z’ebindi binyonyi. Reeba ekipande namba ina (4).

 Emigasho aha magara

Enyama y’endahi eine ebishaju bikye kandi eijwire ekiriisa enkora-shagama
hamwe n’enkora-nkojo hamwe n’ebindi biriisa kukira enkoko n’embaata:
n’ekinyonyi kikuhwera, amagara kukira ebindi, namunonga amagara g’abantu
abari ahari rebu-rebu y’okukwatwa endwara z’emitima.

 Emitwarize mirungi/erikwetengwa

Okugaita enyama y’endahi aha kiihuro nikibaasa kuhwera okuhindura aha
byokurya obwo orikwongyera aha mubaro gw’enyama eziine ebiriisa nyamwingi.
Abarikwenda kukyendeeza aha bwingi bw’ebishaju ebiri omu biihuro byabo
babaasa kurya enyama y’endahi omu mwanya gw’ezindi nyama z’ebinyonyi.

 Emitwarize mibi/etarikwetengwa

Okukoresa amahuri g’endahi nikyo kihangire omu Uganda obwahati. Abantu
baingi nibarya ebirikukorwa omu ndahi nk’emibazi beebwa ngu enyama y’endahi
nayo erimu omuhendo murungi gw’ebiushaju. Ni kikuru kwijuka ngu ku orikurya
munonga ekyokurya kimwe oba waareka ebindi byokurya ebiine ebiriisa ebindi
n’emigasho endiijo aha magara. Omu muringo nigwo gumwe, okurya munonga
enyama y’endahi nikibaasa kwongyera aha bishaju reero kite amagara gaawe
omu kabi. Oshemeire kurya enyama y’endahi, eringaniire.

1.2.4 Sekoko

Sekoko n’ekinyonyi ky’omuhendo gw’ahaiguru ekirikukira kuriibwa aha mikoro
omu matemba g’America baitu n’Abanyayuganda batandikire kugikunda.
Ahabw’okuba ekinyonyi kihango abantu abaingi abarikutunga sekoko omu Uganda
tibarikuzitunga kuzirya okwihaho okuziguza. Ahabw’esente ezi abantu
barikwiha omukuguza sekoko, abantu batandikire kuzitunga.

 Oku erikuriibwa

Sekoko neeriibwa aha biro bikuru nka Nohiri. Abatungi ba sekoko abaingi
nibaziguza abagaiga abarikumanya kurungi okuziteeka. Sekoko nibakira
kugyosya nainga bagikoramu emboga z’okukoza; hoona nabwo, neebaasa
kukorwamu ebindi bintu ebirikubaasa kuriibwa eshaaha yoona. Ebi birimu
nk’ebi:

 • Sosegi za sekoko ezirikubaasa kuriibwa ahari kyansya; akagaati
 k’enyama ya sekoko nainga enyama ya sekoko erikuriibwa n’emigaati –
 reero eriibwe nk’otwokurya nainga ebiihuro.

 • Entongo z’enyama ya sekoko nizibaasa kukora omucuuzi nainga emboga
 z’okukoza, kuriibwa n’ebijuma nainga zitaburwe omu mukyeri (piraawo)
 nari zikorwemu sumbuusa.

 a) Amagufa, engaitsi hamwe n’enyama z’ah’arubaju rw’amagufa nizibaasa
 kuteekwa hamwe reero bikorwemu omucuuzi, emboga hamwe n’omu kukora
 piraawo.

 b) Ebiriisa ebirimu

Enyama ya sekoko n’enyama eine ekiriisa ahakuba eine ebishaju bikye kukira
n’enyama y’ebinyonyi ebindi. Hoona nabwo kimwe-kya-kashatu (1/3)
ky’ebishaju bya sekoko n’ebyo ebirikwetengwa omubiri. Eki nikireetera
sekoko yaagira enyama erikukizayo ekiriisa omu binyonyi byona – eba eya
kabiri aha ndahi. Sekoko hoona nabwo eijwire ekiriisa ky’enkora-nkojo hamwe
n’ebika bya vitameeni B. Reeba ebipimo omu kipande namba 4.

 Emitwarize mirungi/erikwetengwa

 N’obu enyama ya sekoko eraabe eine ekiriisa kingi, eshemeire kuba
 neeriibwa omubipimo ebihikire. Nk’oku twareeba ebipimo by’enyama
 ezindi, abantu abakuru nibetenga guraamu 84 z’enyama ya sekoko aha
 kiihuro kimwe. Okuta enyama ya sekoko eringaniire aha kiihuro
 nikyongyera aha bwingi bw’enyama y’ebinyonyi ei waarya.

 Emitwarize mibi/etarikwetengwa

 i) Okurya enyama nyingi ya sekoko n’ebishaju byayo ti kirungi aha magara
 gaawe. N’obu waakuba nooyenda kukora omucuuzi omu bishaju ebyo, nikiba
 nikyenda ngu otakarya mwingi.

 ii) Kugira ngu n’ekinyonyi kihango, enyama ya sekoko neekira kusigaraho,
 reero ekorwamu ebindi byokurya. Okukwata kubi enyama eyaasigaraho,
 nk’okubura kugita omu furiigi nikibaasa kureeta oburwaire obureetwa
 ebyokurya ebirofa.

1.3. EBYENYANJA

Hariho enkumi n’enkumi z’ebyenyanja ebirikuriibwa, hamwe n’enyamaishwa
ezirikutuura omu njyanja ezirikuriibwa omu nsi yoona. Omu Uganda,
ebyenyanja nibireebeka nk’ekyokurya ekirikukirayo okuriibwa omu byokurya
byona ebirikwihwa omu nyanja. Eki nikireetwaho okugira ngu ebyokurya
ebiihwa omunyanja nibikye omu Uganda. Enganda zimwe tizirikukunda emiringo
emwe y’ebyenyanja kandi ezindi nizibikunda munonga. Hoona, gavumenti nayo
neeta emihingo ahakutega n’okushaaruura ebyokurya by’omunyanja
ekirikureetera omubaro gw’ebyokurya ebiruga omu nyanja gwaba mukye.
Ebyenyanja nka empuutabiine ebishaju bingi baitu ebishaju by’ebyenyanja
bikwatiine ekirikureeta byaba ebyakabi kakye kukira ebicwekire –
n’ahabw’ekyo ebyenyanja ebiine ebishaju ni birungi aha magara kukira enyama
ezirikutura.

Ebika by’ebyenyanja ebirikukira kuriibwa omu Uganda birimu engyegye,
empuuta, eshonzi (emare), semutundu, mukene naenkeje. Ekika ky’ebyenyanja
ekirikuriibwa n’ekyo ekiriho. Ahabw’abantu kukunda kubirya hamwe
n’okukyendeera kw’ebyenyanja ebihango nka empuuta n’engyegye, abantu
batandikire kurya ebyenyanja ebikye nka mukene n’enkejje. Ebisigarira
by’ebyenyanja nka ekishushu, amagufa n’eby’omunda ebitarikuriibwa
ebirikuruga omu makorero agarikubishemeza nabyo nibiriibwa nk’ebyenyanja.
Ahaifo nitukworeka ekiteeberezo ky’ebiriisa ebiri omu byenyanja ebirikukira
kuriibwa.

 Oku ebyenyanja birikuriibwa

Ebyenyanja nibibaasa kuriibwa eshaaha yoona omu miringo mingi. Ebiruga omu
kyenyanja nk’ekyenyanja ky’akagaati nikibaasa kuriibwa nk’akokurya hamwe
nk’akokurya ka kyansya. Ekyenyanja ekiteekire nk’emboga n’omucuuzi
nikiriibwa n’ebyokurya. Ebyenyanja ebiteekire, ebikazire hamwe n’ebisiikire
na munonga empuuta hamwe n’emamba nibiriibwa nk’akokurya kandi nibikira
kuguzibwa aha mihanda hamwe n’omubirabo by’amaarwa.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Twabarira aha kipimo kya buri guraamu, ekyenyanja kiine ekiriisa kingi
ky’enyombeka-mubiri kukira ebishaju. Hoona nabwo, kiijwire zaavitameeni
nyingi hamwe n’emyonyo. Eky’okureeberaho, ekishushu ky’ekyenyanja kirimu
ekiriisa kya rugumya-magufa kandi omutwe gwine ekiriisa enkora-shagama omu
bwingi.

Ekipande5: Ebiriisa ebiri omu buri guraamu 100 z’ebyenyanja ebirikuriibwa
omu Uganda

 Biihirwe omu: HarvestPlus-Uganda Food Composition Table

Nikikuru kumanya ngu omutoororo ogwa kinekye gwine ebiriisa ebirikukira
obwingi omu ihuri. Ebishaju byona nibishangwa omu kacweka aka. Omutororo
ogwa mutare gwine obucweka 91 ahari 100 obw’ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri hamwe
na obucweka buna (4) ahari 100 bw’ebishaju. It important to note that the
egg yolk constitutes much of the nutrients. N’ahabw’ekyo abantu abakuru
babaasa kukyendeeza ebishaju ebibarikurya kurabira omukurya akacweka
k’eihuri aka mutare kwonka.

 Emigasho aha magara

Amahuri nigaha amagara ebiriisa; gaine ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri
ekirikuhwera omukukuza n’okurinda enyama z’omubiri. Nk’ebika by’ekiriisa
enyombeka-mubiri ebindi, amahuri nigaheereza omubiri ebiriisa nyamwingi
ebirikuhwera omukukura hamwe n’okweyongyera kw’omubiri.

 a) Emitwarize emirungi/erikwetengwa
 i) Okurya eihuri rimwe omu izooba nikirungi aha baana abato
 abakirikukura, abari omumushogoyo, abakazi b’enda hamwe n’abo
 abarikwonsya. AAbandi bantu abakuru tibarikwetengwa mahuri obwire
 bwona. Gaatebeekaisibwa na buto nkye nainga gaaba gatateebekaniisibwe
 na buto yoona, amahuri ni ekyokurya kimwe ekirikukora ekiihuro
 ekirikuha omubiri ebiriisa kandi kikaha omuntu amagara marungi.
 Ekihaburo ahabakuru hamwe n’abato n’obutarenzya eihuri rimwe
 buriizooba. Ni kikuru kusiikisa amahuri buto nkye nari kwongyera buto
 nkye nainga ebindi bishaju omu mahuri.

 N’omutwarize murungi kugabuurira abantu b’omuka yaawe yoona amahuri.
 Amahuri geijwire ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri ekirikwetengwa omukukuza
 hamwe n’okukuuma omubiri. Abakazi hamwe n’abaishiki nabo nibetenga
 amahuri kwenda ngu bagume baine amagara marungi.

 a. Emitwarize emibi/etarikwetengwa

 i) Kugira ngu abantu baingi nibamanya ngu amahuri geijwire ekiriisa
 enyombeka-mubiri, nibabaasa kuhendera baraire maingi kukira ago
 agarikwetengwa kubaheereza amagara marungi. Abantu baingi omu ndembo
 hamwe n’omundembo enkyeho nibakira kugira omuze ogu.Amahuri hoona nabwo
 gari aha nkarara z’ebyokurya omu birabo by’ebyokurya nka zaahoteeri
 hamwe n’ahamihanda. Abantu baingi abakuru nibakira kurya amahuri abairi
 (2) aha kiihuro kimwe, wagyeragyeranisa emiriire y’abantu boona hamwe.
 Amahuri aga nigakira kuba gasiikirwe omuri buto n’ebishaju bingi
 ebirikuhazya eihuri.Omutwarize ogu niguta abantu baingi omu kabi
 k’obugomokye-bwa-busha, obuhango oburengirehamwe n’endwara y’omutima
 nk’endwara y’ebishaju bingi omu shagama. Aha muheru, ebishaju ebi
 nibiigaza emisi rutambuza sahagama reero mpaho omuntu anyangarazibwa
 endwara z’omutima, puresha hamwe n’endwara z’ensigo.

ii) Kurugiirira ahabyafaayo bya burengyerwa-izooba hamwe na rwagati ya
 Uganda, abakazi hamwe n’abaishiki abanyeetsire bakaba bataikirizibwa
 kurya amahuri. Entwaza egi ekiriho omu maka gamwe. Omucwe ogu
 tigurikwetengwa ahakuba nigukyendeeza emigisha y’abakazi kurya amahuri,
 agari oburugo bw’ekiriisa ky’enyombeka-mubiri kandi obwo nigagura sente
 nkye. Entwaza nk’egi kuyaakuba neegumizamu reero abakazi bakabazibira
 kurya ebindi byokurya ebiruga omu nyamaishwa, omucwe ogu gubaasa
 kutamba eikono endya-nungi omu bakazi hamwe n’abeerere nari ruzaaro
 yaabo.

1.4.2 Amahuri g’embaata

Embaata nizikira kwanga amhuri gaazo, mpaho zanga kugaatura haagira
owaagakwataho nari akagaiha ahu zigateereire. Ahabw’enshonga egi, abariisa
baingi tibarikwihaho amahuri ago kugarya. Baitu, amahuri g’entaama ganuzire
munonga kandi nikigambwa ngu gaine ebiriisa nk’enyombeka-mubiri, rugumya-
magufa, enkora-shagama hamwe n’ekiriisa rutereereza-nkuratima kukira
amahuri g’enkoko. Emigasho y’amahuri g’embaata neeshushana n’egyo
ey’ag’enkoko. Nigabaasa kuteekwa empgogora, kugaata okagateeka omu maize
garikutabura, hamwe n’okugaata okagateeka omu mate nainga amajuta g’ente,
nainga okugasiika. Noobaasa n’okugakoresa omukukora keeki hamwe n’endiijo
migaati.
Ni kikuru kumanya ngu amahuri g’embaata nigabaasa butaba marungi ahari abo
abarikugyezaho kukyendeeza obwingi bw’ebishaju oburuga omu byokurya
ebibarikurya. Amahuri g’embaata nigateeberezibwa kuba nigakiza ag’enkoko
ebishaju ebyaburiijo emirundi ebiri (2) hamwe n’emirundi eshatu ebishaju
ebyakinekye.

1.4.3 Amahuri g’amaiba

Aga ni mahango kandi gaine akahooho karungi kukira aga’embaata hamwe
n’ag’enkoko; baitu hoona gaine n’ebishaju bingi (Ebishaju ebyakinekye,
miriguraamu 1,227; guraamu 19 z’ebishaju ebyaburiijo).

1.4.5 Amahuri g’endahi

Aga amahuri againe erangi nungi gatandikire kugira obuganzi omu bantu
abarikwenda kukyendeeza ebishaju by’omushagama yaabo. Ahabw’enshonga egi,
amahuri aga nigakoresibwa nk’omubazi omu Uganda. Amahuri aga obumwe
nigateekwa munonga reero gakoresibwa kuhuuga ebyokurya nari omukukora
ekiihuro ky’ebijuma (saradi).
 EKICWEKA KYA KABIRI

 AMATE N’EBYOKURYA EBIRUGA OMU NYAMAISHWA

Ebyokurya ebirikuruga omu nyamaishwa n’oburugo bukuru bw’ekiriisa
ky’enyombeka-mubiri omu biihuro ebirkuriibwa abantu b’omubicweka bya
rwagati hamwe na burengyerwa-izooba ya Uganda. Ebyokurya ebirikukira kuruga
omu nyamaishwa empango ebirikuriibwa n’okunyubwa omu Uganda ni amashununu
(amate amabisi), ciizi, amakamo (yogati), amajuta g’ente, amate g’embuzi
hamwe n’amate ga bongo.

2.1 Amate

Amate nigaruga omu mabeere g’enyamaishwa ezihangirwe kwonsya abaana baazo.
Amate nitugeiha omu nte, embuzi, engamiya hamwe n’embogo. Omu Uganda, amate
g’ente nigo garikuriyo okunyubwa; abantu bariyo nibateerwa omuhimbo
ktutandika kunywa amate g’embuzi agaahikire omu katare n’obu baingi bakiri
kugareebesa einugane. N’ahabw’ekyo, omu kicweka eki, nitwija kugamba aha
mate g’ente gonka.
Omu Uganda, amate obwahati noobaasa kugatunga omu miringo mingi:
 i) Amashununu (agakiri mabisi agataine kigaakozirweho). Aga nibagauza aha
 matundiro g’amate (dayare), omu maduuka, kandi obumwe abantu
 nibatambura barikugagauza omu byanaga byabo. Abantu abamwe nibagagura
 kuruga aha bariisa. Ekikuru aha mate aga n’okugira ngu tihaine kikub
 akyagakozirweho. Omuguzi naashaba agu arikwenda reero omuriisa
 agamupimira obwo arikwejunisa ekikopo. Amate agarikurayo obukye agu
 omuntu arikubaasa kugura gakiri mabisi n’ekicweka kya rita. Amashununu
 nigakira kuba niagagura ebeeyi y’ahansi kandi niganyuubwa baingi.
 Hoona nabwo, nigakira kugurwa abantu abarikwenda kukorerera amajuta
 g’ente omu maka gaabo. Omutindo g’amate aga nigurugiirira aha muriisa
 kandi amate aga gabaasa kushukwamu amaizi.
 ii) Amate amabisi (amashununu) agasibirwe omu micepe n’epakiti nago nigaba
 gataine kihango ekigakozirweho. Obwire obwingi, nibaba bagashemeize
 barikugafukisa munonga kwita obukooko hamwe n’okugata ahamutindo.
 Tigarikumara bwire bwingi omu maduuka baitu abantu nibagakunda
 ahabw’okugira ngu tigateirwemu bindi bintu nk’emibazi kandi omutindo
 gwago gubaasa kuteeberezibwa. Amate agasibire nigaija omu miring mingu
 kurugiirira yaaba gacwekire nari gakwatsire. Hariho ago agakwataine
 nk’amajuta kandi againe ebishaju byago byona; aga ni marungi aha baana
 abarikukura. Amate againe ebishaju bikye (2% obwire obumwe) hamwe
 n’ago ageihwerweho orukoko (1%) nigaba gaine ebishaju bikye kandi ni
 marungi aha bantu abatarikwenda kwongyera aha buremeezi hamwe n’abo
 abarikwenda kukyendeeza oburemmezi.
 iii) Amate agarikumara obwire bwingi. Aga haine ebirikugakorwaho
 kugashemeza omu muringo gw’omutaano reero gakasibwa omu micepe hamwe
 n’epakiti kwenda ngu gamare omwanya muraingwa. Okupakira/okusiba
 kw’omutano oku obumwe nikwongyera aha beeyi baitu abantu abarikwenda
 amate marungi agarikunywebwa ahaonaaho nibakira kugakunda. Aga nago
 nibagaguza omu miring mingo baitu agakwataine munonga nigo garikukira
 obwingi omu katare.
 iv) Amate g’esaano n’ago agoomiibwe kandi gakwataine kukira ebika ebindi.
 Nikikuru okuratire endagiiriro kuruga ahari abo abakozire ago mate
 g’esaano waaba nookora amate kuruga omu saano y’amate egi.

 Okugarikunyubwa

Omu Uganda, amate nigagabuurirwa abaana abato hamwe n’abarwaire. Baitu
amate gashemiere kuba niganyuubwa buri omwe. Buri mwana ashemeire kuba
naagabuurirwa amate g’ekipimo kya zaamiiru (siisi) 125 kuhisya 250 emirundi
ebiri kuhisya ahari eshatu (2-3) briizooba. Ekipimo ky’amate ekihikire
kugabuurirwa omwana nikirugiirira yaaba naayonka nari; emyaka ye’ hamwe na
yaaba oine amate nainga. Abantu abakuru bashemeire kufayo kunywa amate
emirundi ebiri omu izooba, nikyo ekicweka kya lita y’amate goona hamwe.
Amate gabaasa kunyuubwa obwire bwona. Ahaifo nitukworeka emiringo
y’okubaasa kunywa amate hamwe n’ebiihuro ebi oraarye omu izooba.

Abaana abato (Emyaka 1-3 ) – Bahe amate ahari kyansya; nk’akokurya obwo
akasana kaaheza kutagata; reero ogaruke ogabahe nk’akokurya batabyamire
nyekiro.

Abaana abatakatandikire eishomere (Emyaka 3-5 ) – aba nibabaasa kunywa
siisi/miiru 250 nari ¼ kya lita y’amate aha bwire bwa kyansya reero ogaruke
obahe amate nk’akokurya omu mwebazyo.

Abaana abarikushoma (Emyaka 6-11) hamwe n’abo abari omu mushogoyo (Emyaka
12-18) – Bagabuurire siisi/miiru 250 z’amate aha bwire bwa kyansya reero
ogaruka obahe ekipimo nikyo kimwe ekikomirwe nk’akokurya, ekikopo nari
sakyeti y’amakamo (yogati).

Abantu abakuru – Nibeetenga ekicweka kya lita y’amate nari ebikozirwe omu
mate buriizooba. Eki nikibaasa kukorwa omuntu ku yaakunywa siisi/miiru 500
z’amakamo (yogati) nka kyansya nainga akokurya k’entagata nari ekicwka kya
lita (tampeko ) y’amate.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Amate garimu ebiriisa bingi ebihangiirwemu. Emiringo y’ekiriisa
ky’enyombeka-mubiri eri omu mate neerahuka kucwanyagurwa. Ahabw’okugira
ekiriisa ky’enyombeka-mubiri eky’omutindo gw’ahaiguru, amate nigahwera
omukukura kandi gakira kukoresibwa nk’ekyokurya kirkuru omu baana
abarikucuuka. Amate nigakira kwetwa ekyokurya ky’obuhangwa ekirikwemariira
ahabw’okugira ebiriisa bingi ebirikwetengwa kukuza n’okukuma omubiri.

Ekipande7: Ebiriisa ebiri omu bika bitari bimwe-na-bimwe by’amate (buri
guraamu 100)

Biihirwe: NutriSurvey 2007

 Emigasho aha magara

Amate gaine emigasho minga aha amagara ahabw’ebiriisa nyamwingi ebigarimu.
Omuntu arikunywa ekipimo ky’amate ekihikire naakira kugira amagara marungi
ahakuba amate nigamuha bingi aha biriisa ebi arikwetenga omu izooba. Buri
muntu abaasa kugira eki yaiha omu mate ahakuba kiijwiremu ekiriisa
ky’enyombeka mubiri, ekiriisa rugumya-magufa hamwe n’ekiriisa rukora-
bawarutukura.
.

 Emitwarize mibi/erikwetengwa

 i) Enganda zimwe nizizibira abantu kurya enyama hamwe n’okunya amate aha
 kiihuro kimwe. Eki ni kirungi ahakuba ekiiisa rugumya-magufa ekiri omu
 mate nikibaasa kukoma hamwe ekiriisa enkora-shagama hamwe n’ekiriisa
 enkora-nkojo ebishangwa omu nyama reero kireetere omubiri gwabura
 kutunga ebiriisa bikuru ebi.

ii) Abantu abaingi baine obucupa n’ebindi bikoresa omu barikubiika amate
 gonka. Eki ni kirungi kutangira amate okusiiwa ebindi byokurya.

iii) Amate nigarahuka kugira akanuuko k’ebyokurya ebindi; gashemeire
 kubiikwa omu bintu ebiyonjo kandi ebiine ebifundikizo.

iv) Omu Uganda, amate nigatamburizibwa omu bintu ebikozirwe ebyoma kwenda
 ngu amaranzi g’eizoobagatahika amate gakaita ekiriisa rukora-bwarutukura
 hamwe na vitameeni endinda-maisho, bimwe aha biriisa ebishangwa omu
 mate.

 Emitwarize mibi/etarikwetengwa

 i) Okunywa amate mabisi ni kibi ahakuba nikibaasa kukurwaza oburwaire
 obureetwa okunywa amate g’amarofa. Gashemeire kuteekwa kurungi kwenda
 kwita obukooko oburwaza endwara omu matungo ahakuba ezo ndwara ezirimu
 nk’omushwija gw’ente ogwa burusela hamwe n’akakonko k’ente nizibaasa
 kukwata abantu. Amate goona, oteiremu n’ago agu orikwenda kukoramu
 amakamo (yogati), amacunda, amajuta hamwe n’ebindi, oshemeire kubanza
 waagateeka.
ii) Okutabura amajaani omu mate nikikyendeeza aha biriisa ebishangwa omu
 mate. Nikikira kunywa amate gatarimu majaani.

2.2 Amakamo/yogati

Amakamo nibagakora omu mate kandi gabaasa kukoresibwa omu mwanya g’amate.
Nibagakora kurabira omukureka amate gakakyera reero gakakwatanisibwa
kurugamu akahooho karikushaarira.

 Okugari kunyuubwa

Yogati (amakamo) nigakira kunyuubwa nk’akokunywa ahakuba nigarahuka
kwigutsa. Obumwe nibagataburamu ebijuma kukoramu ebyokunywa ebinuzire
kandi byorobi. Abandi bantu hoona nabwo nibanywa amakamo nk’ekyokurya kya
kyansya, obwo barikugariisa emberengye.

 Ekiriisa ekiri omu makamo

Amakamo n’oburugo bw’amaani bw’ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri, rugumya-amagufa
hamwe n’ekiriisa rutereeza-nkuratima. Okwongyeramu ebijuma nikyongyera
ekiriisa hamwe n’obunuzi. Ni kikuru kumanya ngu amakamo againe obuhooho
nk’obwa vanilla hamwe n’obwenkyerere nibuteebwamu, tibuhangiirwemu. Omu
Uganda harimu zaayogati nkye nka Campus Yorghurt eziine akahooho k’ebijuma
nk’enanansi. Enyingi ziine akahooho k’ebijuma bingi.

 Emigasho aha magara

Ebintu by’emikyeri/ebiteire ebirikukorwa omu mate nk’amakamo na bongo
nibiba birimu ekika ky’akakooko ka bakitiiriya ak’ekika kya Lactobacilli.
Obukooko obu nibwereeta omu muhanda gw’ebyokurya kandi bwine amaani kukiza
hamwe n’okwosya omubiri. N’ahabw’ekyo ebintu eby’omukyeri nibitangira
oruhumbwe hamwe n’akakooko ka bakitiiriya, oburikubaasa kurwaza omuntu.
Emibiri y’abantu baingi neeremwa kucwanyagura shukaari eruga omumate. Amate
ku garikuba nigakyera, rushaarizi/ekirungo ekirikukora aha shukaari eruga
omumate nikicwagura shukaari egi omu bucweka oburikubaasa kuba obw’omugasho
omu mubiri reero kitangira okuriibwa omubiri. Mbwenu abantu ab’emibiri
yaabo etarikukwatagana gye na shukaari y’omumate nibagoba kihango banywa
amate g’omukyeri nk’amakamo na bongo (amacunda).

Emitwarize emirungi/erikwetengwa
 i) Okukwatagye, okubiika hamwe n’okukoresa amakamo nikikuru nk’okutwareeba
 amate.
ii) Ni kirungi hoona nabwo kunywa amakamo nk’akokurya, ekyokurya
 ky’ahamuheru gw’ekiihuro, ekyokukozamu nainga okugasiiga ahakyokurya
 ekindi. Eki nikyongyera aha mutindo gw’ekiihuro. Ahabw’okugira ngu
 ekiriisa rugumya-magufa ekiri omu makamo nikikoma hamwe ekiriisa enkora-
 shagama hamwe n’ekiriisa enkora-nkojo ebishangwa omu nyama, ekirikureeta
 omubiri gwafeerwa ebiriisa bibiri ebi, ni kikuru otakaarwa enyama
 okanywa n’amate omurundi gumwe.

 Emitwarize mibi/etarikwetengwa

 Tikiri mirungi kukora amakamo kuruga omu mate agatashemezeibwe n’obufuki
 ahakuba eki nikibaasa kukureetera waarwara oburwaire bw’enyamaishwa
 oburikubaasa kukwata abantu.
EKICWEKA KYA KASHATU

 OBUKOOKO OBURIKURIIBWA

Omunsi yoona, obukooko oburikuriibwa n’oburugo bw’ekiriisa ky’enyombeka-
mubiri kandi obwo bukooko bubaasa kuriibwa omumwanya gw’enyama
y’enyamaishwa ezindi. Omu Uganda, obukooko oburikukira kuriibwa burimu
esenene, encebebe, ebyana by’enjoki, hamwe n’ebijerere.

3.1 Enkyebebe/kashwa

Ekyebebe/kashwa n’ekyokurya ky’obunuzi bwingi ekirikuriibwa omu bicweka
bingi bya Uganda. Baitu abaingi omu bicweka bya rwagati y’eihanga hamwe
n’ab’omuri burengyerwa-izooba nibazeeta enshwa (kashwa/omushwa). Baitu
abantu abamwe omuri burengyerwa-izooba nibazitaanisa kurugiirira aha rangi
hamwe n’obuhango. Nizituura omu itaka kandi ziijwire emyonyo hamwe na
zaavitameeni.

 Okuzirikuriibwa

Enkyebebe nizibaasa kuriibwa mbisi zikihuriire. Nizibaasa n’okukarangwa
ziriibwe nk’akokuryanari akantu koona akanuzire. Ezoomire nizibaasa
kuriibwa Mukono gumwe narizishekurwe reero bazitagure omu binyoobwa,
amacanda, simusimu, emboga ezirikwiragura nari ebihimba. Enkyebebe/kashwa
niziija zigaruka zigyenda, baitu ahabw’okugira ngu nizibaasa kwanikwa,
okukarangwa kandi zikabiikwa ahabw’ebiro by’omumaisho, n’ekyokurya kikuru
ky’okwetugurira obwire bw’enjara kwenda ngu ebyokurya byaba biri bikye,
abantu bagume nibatunga ebiriisa ebirimu.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Nk’enyamaishwa ezindi ezirugamu ebyokurya, kashwa/enkyebebe zijwiremu
ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri, ebishaju, ekiriisa enkora-shagam hamwe n’enkora-
nkojo. Hoona nabwo zirimu Vitameeni B-12 hamwe n’ekiriisa entabiikwa-mu-
mubiri.

n’esenene

 Emigasho aha magara

Obushaza bwijwire ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri, entacwanyagurwa hamwe na
vitameeni rukora-shagama. Ahabw’okugira entacwanyagurwa nyingi, obushaza
obwomire nibuhwera omukukyendeza n’okureka shukaari aha rurengo
orurikwetengwa omubiri. Entacwanyagurwa eri omu bushaza hoona nabwo neereka
ebishaju aha rurengo rw’ebyo ebirikwetengwa omubiri.

4.3 Enkoore/omugobe

Ekika ky’obushaza eki nikihingwa rwagati hamwe n’omuburengyerwa-izooba bwa
Uganda ahabw’obunuzi bw’amababi gaabwo; baitu hoona nabwo abantu b’omu
matemba ga Uganda nibaburya.

 Oku enkoore zirikuriibwa

Amababi g’enkoore amato kandi agoorobi nigakorwamu emboga z’ekivurugye.
Amababi hoona nigabaasa kutaburwa omu mboga z’ebinyoobwa kubinuza n’okubiha
akahooho, reero mpaho biriibwe n’oburo, ebitakuri, muhogo, obuhunga
n’ebindi. Hoona amababi nigabaasa kwanikwa, gasiibwe kukoramu esaano
erikutaburwa omu mboga z’ebihimba nari ebinyoobwa.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Enkoore zirimu ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri, emyonyo hamwe na zaavitameeni.
Enjuma z’enkoore ziine obucweka 25 ahari 100 bw’ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri.
Enkoore nizongyerera aha biihuro eby’enjuma reero byongyera aha bwingi
hamwe n’omutindo gw’ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri ekiri omu kiihuro ekyo.

Biihirwe: HarvestPlus-Uganda Food Composition Table

 Emigasho aha magara

Nk’emboga ezirikwiragura hamwe n’enshoga ezindi, enjuma hamwe n’amababi
g’enkoore geijwire ebiriisa.
 i) Enkoore ziine ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri ekirikuhwera kwombeka enyama
 z’omubiri.

ii) Enkoore ziine entacwanyagurwa, namunonga egyo erikubaasa kwenga,
 erikuhwera okunafuura ebyokurya bikagyenda mpora omumuhanda gwabyo,
 ekahwera omukukyendeeza aha bishaju kandi ekongyera aha mubaro
 gw’obukooko bwa bakitiiriya obw’omugasho obushangwa omurura oruhango.

iii) Enkoore tiziine bintu ebirikuzibira okujwanga kw’ebiriisa.

 Emitwarize emirungi/erikwetengwa

 Ni kirungi orye amababi n’enjuma ezikuzire nk’emboga; reero orye
 enjuma ezoomire nk’oku orikurya ezindi nshonga (nk’ebihimba) ahakuba
 ebintu bishatu ebi birimu ebiriisa kandi biine omugasho aha magara.

 Emitwarize mibi/etarikwetengwa

 i) Okuteeka hamwe n’okwanika amababi g’enkoore aheeru ngu gatoonyorokemu
 amaizi ni kibi ahakuba nikikyendeeza aha biriisa.

 ii) Okugaanika aha mushana ngu garugyemu obukooko nka zaakanyamugombwe
 nikiihaamu ebika bingi by’ekiriisa kya vitameeni endinda-maisho.

 iii) Nk’ebihimba n’enkoore zoona okuziri, nibireeta enda z’abantu bamwe
 zaazaamu omwika ekirikureetera baingi baazeetantara, reero mpaho
 kikyendeeza okuhindahindura aha byokurya.

4.4 Empokya

Empokya n’emwe aha bihingwa by’enshoga ebirikuriibwa omu bicweka bitari
bimwe-na-bimwe omu nsi yoona. Omu Uganda, empokya nizihingwa munonga omu
myanya ei barikuhinga ebihimba.

 Oku empkya zirikuriibwa

Okutwarira hamwe, empokya nibazikaranga reero ziriibwa nk’akokurya nainga
bazisa bazigaita omu saano y’enjuma nyingi nk’oburo n’obuhunga kukora
obushera.

 • Okukora esaano y’enjuma nyingi erikukorwamu obushera hamwe n’ebyokurya
 by’okugabuurirwa abaana abacuukire. Esaano ejwangiibwemu ey’empokya erimu
 soya ey’oburo, soya ey’obuhunga, soya ey’omugusha hamwe na soya
 ey’omukyeeri.

 • Esaano y’empokya neekoresibwa omukukora obwokurya nk’amandaazi, keeki,
 bagiya hamwe n’otusiikasiikye.

 • Okukora ebiruga omu mate n’enyama ebirikuriibwa/kunyuubwa omu mwanya
 gw’ebyaburiijo. Ebi birimu soya ey’amate, soya ey’amakamo (yogati),
 sosegi eza soya. Ebi biine ebiriisa ebihwera omubiri kandi ni birungi
 ahakuba tibirimu shukaari nyingi eruga omu mate kandi nibibaasa
 kuriibwa/kunyuubwa abantu abatarikurya nyama, hamwe n’abo abrikwenda
 kukyendeeza aha bishaju ebibaine omumubiri hamwe n’ebyo eby’erangi ya
 kinekye ebiruga omunyamaishwa.

 Ebiriisa ebirimu

Empokya nikyo kihingwa kyonka ekiine orurengo rw’ekiriisa enyombeka-mubiri
ekirikwingana n’ekyo ekiruga omubyokurya ebiruga omunyamaishwa. Okutwarira
hamwe, empkya ezoomire ziine 40 % by’ekiriisa ky’enyombeka-mubiri; 20%
bw’ebishaju; 35% bw’ekiriisa empa-maani; hamwe na 5% bwa kashenda. Eki
nikimanyisa ngu empokya nizikiza ebyokurya by’ebihingwa byona ekiriisa
ky’enyombeka maani.
