c) Emigasho aha magara

Obutunguru bwine emigsaho mingi aha magara; baitu obutunguru butari bumwe
na bumwe bwine emigasho etari emwe n’emwe. Ekyokureeberaho, otutunguru
otukye turimu ebipimo bingi by’engira-migaju kukiza ebitunguru ebihango.
Obutunguru obw’erangi ya kinekye bwine ebirungo bw’emigaju/akahooho kandi
obw’erangi ya bururu erikutukura hamwe n’erangi erikutukura bwine ekirungo
ekirikubuha erangi ya bururu erikutukura. N’ahabw’ekyo ni kirungi kurya
obutunguru bw’ebika bingi.

d) Emitwarize mirungi

Obutunguru niburiibwa munonga omu Uganda, obwo barikubuta haihi omu buri
mucuuzi, emboga, obutogo hamwe n’omu biihuro by’emboga n’ebijuma bibisi
(saradi).

e) Emitwarize emibi

 i) Ebipimo by’obutunguru ebirikukira kuriibwa nibiba biri bikye:
 tookaagira ngu n’egabo.

 ii) Obumwe abantu nibateeka munonga obutunguru kandi eki nikimaramu
 ebiriisa ebimwe.

Emboga ezindi

Ezindi mboga eziri kuriibwa omu Uganda zirimu entura/entonga, biringanya,
eshenda, karoti hamwe n’entorobo z’ebyozi.

a) Oku ebi birikuriibwa

Entonga (entura) na biringanya nibabisiika kandi bikora nk’emboga. Hoona
nabwo, nibabigaita omu mboga, omucuuzi hamwe n’obutogo. Bitu entura
(entonga) zo obumwe nibazitungika aha byokurya, bazitaburamu amaizi
n’omwonyo, bazikyeba kukora emboga. Bwakatunkuma nabwo nibabutebeekanisa
omu muringo nigwo gumwe.

Entorobo (obwozi buto) obumwe nibabutabura omu bishuusha (amababi g’ebyozi)
babitabura kukoramu ekivurugye. Kandi obumwe, ka gaamu k’ebinyoobwa nainga
emboga zaabyo nibazigaita omu kivurugye eki kwongyera aha biriisa.

Eshenda nazo obumwe nibazikoresa nk’akahooho omu Uganda. Eshenda embisi
(etarikushaariira munonga) nibagigaita n’ezindi mboga nka karoti, enyaanya
kukora ekiihuro ky’emboga hamwe n’ebijuma ebibisi (saradi).

b) Ebiriisa ebirimu

Emboga ezi tizirimu ebiriisa bingi nk’oku abantu baingi barikuteekateeka.
Ziine ebiriisa by’emiringo mingi kwonka omu bipimo bikye. Ekyokureeberaho,
ziine ebipimo bikye bya vitameeni rukora-shagama na vitameeni endinda-
maisho.

Eshenda (ey’erangi ya kinyansi, kinekye hamwe n’erikutukura) eine vitameeni
rugumya-magufa omu bwingi kandi zo entorobo z’ebyozi ziinemu ebika bya
vitameeni endinda-maisho ebiringaniire.

Ekipande 33: Ebiriisa ebiri omu ntonga (entura), entorobo z’ebyozi hamwe
n’eshenda y’erangi ya kinyansi

Biihirwe: HarvestPlus-Uganda Food Composition Table

c) Emigasho aha magara

Emboga zoona ezi zirimu ebipimo birungi by’entacwanyagurwa ebirikuhwera omu
kutambuza n’okucwanyagura ebyokurya, ebishaju hamwe n’okubikoraho
bitakajwangiibwe omu shagama, kandi neekyendeeza n’akabi k’okukwatwa
endwara ezitakira.

d) Emitwarize mirungi

 i) Ni kirungi kuta emboga zoona ezi omu kiihuro kwenda ngu otunge
 entacwanyagurwa kandi oyerinde enjara, obwo orikugyeteguurira.

 ii) Emboga ezi ni nungi waazitungika aha mutwe gw’ebindi byokurya.

e) Emitwarize mibi

 i) Entura (entonga) na biringanya obumwe nibabisiika kukora emboga nari
 akokurya k’aharubaju. Eki tikiri kirungi ahakuba okusiika nikwongyera
 ebishaju omu kiihuro.

 ii) Abantu baingi nibakoresa eshenda (enuzire) nk’omugaju (akahooho), obwo
 barikugishara bakagisiikira omu buto erikwosya munonga. Eki ni kibi
 ahakuba nikireetera baafeerwa vitameeni rugumya-magufa eri omushenda
 ezinuzire.

 EKICWEKA KYA MUNAANA

OBWOKURYA

Obwokurya oburikukira kushangwa omu butare bwa Uganda burimu obubanda,
kyapati, amandaazi, sumbuusa, donati n’ebindi. Obundi bwokurya burimu
chipusi z’emondi hamwe na muhogo, bagiya, otunyoobwa otukarangire, enjuma
hamwe n’emiryo mikuru eyokize nka muhogo, ebitakuri hamwe n’ebicoori.

8.1 Obubanda

Obubanda n’otugaati oturikukorwa omu saano ya muhogo nari obuhunga ei
barikukanda n’eminekye, reero bakabisiika munonga. Obubanda n’akagaati
akarikurahuka kuteekwa kandi nikakundwa abato n’abakuru. Akahooho kabwo
ak’omutaano akarikuruga omu minekye ya kabaragara esiikire nikashendashenda
kandi baingi kabareetera baaragarwa orufuzi.

a) Ebiriisa ebirimu

Ebiriisa ebiri omu bubanda nibyegamira ekika hamwe n’obwingi bw’eminekye
hamwe n’ekika kya buto ei waasiikisa. Nk’oku oraareebe omu kipande ahaifo,
omunekye gwa kabaragara gumwe oguringaniire nigubaasa kukuha obucweka 10
ahari 100 bw’amaani ag’omubiri gurikwetenga buri kiihuro ekirimu ekipimo
ky’amaani ekirikwingana otwani (kcal) 2,500. Hoona nabwo, obubanda
nibubaasa kuba oburugo burungi bwa vitameeni rugumya-magufa hamwe na
vitameeni endinda-maisho.

Ekipande 34: Ebiriisa ebiri omu bwokurya oburikukira kuriibwa (guraamu 100
buri kokurya)

Biihirwe: HarvestPlus-Uganda Food Composition Table

c) Emigasho aha magara

Obubanda nibuha omubiri amaani. Obubanda obu barikukora barikusiikisa buto
eyongyeirwemu ekiriisa kya vitameeni endinda-maisho nari egyo ekorwa omu
buto ya kicungwa ekorwa omu bikindo nibuha omubiri ekiriisa kya vitameeni
endinda-maisho kandi egi neehwera omubiri okukura.

d) Oku obubanda burikuriibwa

Abantu baingi tibarikwesiikira bubanda. N’ahabw’ekyo, nibabugura aha
mihanda, amaduuka agarikuguza otwokurya hamwe n’omu birabo by’ebyokurya
(hoteeri). Abamwe nibakoresa obubanda nk’ekyokunywisa chai nari ekindi
kyokunywa kandi kandi abandi nibaburya bwonka. Obubanda hoona nabwo
nibubaasa kugaburwa nk’ekyokurya kimwe aha kiihuro kandi bubaasa kuriibwa
n’emboga z’ebihimba, obushaza, ebinyoobwa, emboga ezirikwiragura hamwe
n’emicuuzi.

d) Emitwarize mirungi

 i) Ahabw’okugira ngu nibabusiika munonga, oshemeire kwepimira obubanda
 kwenda ngu otarya bwingi.

 ii) Okunywera obubanda aha byokunywa ni kirungi ahakuba nikikyendeeza
 obwingi bw’obubanda obu oraarye ahakuba noorahuka kwiguta waaba
 noonywa.

 iii) Okuriisa obubanda emboga nari okunyweraho ekyokunywa nk’amaizi nari
 eshande nikikyendeeza akabi k’okurwara ekiheero/okugumirwa.

e) Emitwarize mibi

 i) Okuta akasaano k’okukora emigaati omu bubanda nikibworobya; baitu
 obubanda nibunywa buto nyingi waaba noobusiika kandi okurya buto
 nyingi n’eky’akabi aha magara gaawe.

 ii) Okusiika obubanda nikikira kutwara buto nyingi. Abari kubusiikira
 n’okubuguriza aha mihanda nibakira kukoresa buto ei baasiikiiseho
 emirundi mingi kwenda ngu bakyendeeze aha sente ezi baraakorese. Baitu
 omuze ogu ni mubi ahakuba nikireetera obubanda bwagira ebishaju
 ebitarikwetengwa omu mubiri, mpaho byongyera aha kabi k’okukwatwa
 ekookoro hamwe n’endwara z’omutima.

 iii) Okubiika obubanda obwire bwingi munonga ti kirungi ahakuba obubanda
 niburahuka kusiisikara kandi buhumba n’obu waakuba otarikubureebaho
 ruhumbwe. Eki nikikurwaza endwara ezireetwaho okurya ebyokurya ebiine
 oburofa.

8.2 Kyapati

Kyapati n’omugaati gubarikusiikira aha kikaraaya kuruga omuri ngano.
Kyapati eine omubiri mukye kandi n’eya saako. Omwonyo n’ebirungo ebindi
nk’obutunguru nibakira kubyongyera omu ngano ei baaheza kukanda kutamu
akahooho baitu omu rurimi orworobi, kyapati n’engano ei barikusiika
ekanzire. Okwongyeramu ebirungo ebirimu ebindi biriisa nk’esaano ya
moringa, eya karoti hamwe n’ey’empokya nikyongyera ebiriisa omu kyapati.

Oku kyapati erikuriibwa

Omu bicweka bya rwagati na burengyerwa-izooba bwa Uganda, kyapati neeriibwa
nk’akokurya kandi obumwe baginywera aha chai nari ebyokunywa nk’eshande
y’obutunda. Hoona nabwo, kyapati nibagigabura nk’ekiihuro, obwo
barikugiriisa emboga z’ebihimba nari obushaza nari omucuuzi gw’enyama
y’enkoko n’ey’ente. Omu byokurya ebi barikuguriza aha muhanda, kyapati
nibagizinga omu mahuri (rolekisi), nari bagijwanzya omu bihimba nari
obushaza (ekikomando) kandi eminyeeto n’abaana nibo barikukira kurya ebi.

b) Ebiriisa ebirimu

Ebiriisa ebiri omu kyapati nibyegamira omutindo gw’engano ogwakoresibwa
kugikora. Engano eyongyeirwemu ebiriisa hamwe n’egyo esiirwe omu njuma
zitashushwire neekora kyapati y’omutindo gw’ahaiguru munonga. Nk’oku
twakworeka omu kipande aharuguru, kyapati erimu ebishaju hamwe n’ekiriisa
empa-maani. Kyapati ekozirwe omu ngano eyongyeirwemu ebiriisa n’oburugo
burungi bw’omwonyo enkora-shagama hamwe na vitameeni enkora-shagama.

c) Emigasho aha magara

Kyapati neeha omubiri amaani kandi egyo eyongyeirwemu ebiriisa neekyendeeza
aha kabi k’okwomankana ahakuba erimu omwonyo hamwe na vitameeni enkora-
shagama.

d) Emitwarize mirungi

 i) Kyapati n’emwe aha migaati etagumire kukora kandi erikubaasa kukorwa
 omu buto nkye. Eki nikireeta yaaba ey’omugasho aha magara kukira
 obwokurya obusiikire munonga.

 ii) Okugabura kyapati nk’ekyokurya kimwe aha kiihuro, nari okugikoramu
 rolekisi n’ekikomando nikyongyera aha biriisa ebigirugamu kandi
 kikyendeeza aha kabi k’ekiheero (okugumirwa).

e) Emitwarize emibi

 i) Okuta akasaano k’okuteeka emigaati omu kyapati nikigyorobya; baitu
 kyapati neenywa buto nyingi waaba noogisiika kandi okurya buto nyingi
 n’eky’akabi aha magara gaawe.

 ii) Okusiika munonga kyapati nakyo kiizire nikikwata akati kandi eki
 kishemeire kujumiirirwa ahakuba okusiika munonga nikireka buto nyingi
 omu kyapati.

8.3 Amandaazi na donati

Hariho emiringo mingi y’okuteeka amandaazi na donati. Baitu ebirikukira
kuriibwa omu Uganda nibikorwa omu ngano ekanzire n’amaizi. Shukaari obumwe
neeyongyeramu kunuza otugaati otu baitu obwahati bamwe aha bantu
abarikuguriza amandaazi na donati aha mihanda batandikire kugaitamu emboga
nka karoti. Abandi nibakora amandaazi na donati kuruga omu ngano ekanzire,
reero bahindura aha nshusha. Baitu okutwarira hamwe, amandaazi nigakira
kuba goorobi kandi garimu buto nyingi kukira donati ezirikuba zoorobi kandi
zigumire.

a) Oku amandaazi na donati birikuriibwa

Omu bicweka bya rwagati na burengyerwa-izooba bwa Uganda, amandaazi na
donati nibikira kuriibwa nk’akokurya kandi obumwe babinywisa chai hamwe
n’ebindi byokunywa.

b) Ebiriisa ebirimu

Reeba ekipande aharuguru. Amandaazi na donati ebiri omu kipande ekyo
bikakorwa omu birungo birikushushana.

c) Emigasho aha magara

Amandaazi na donati nibireebwa nk’ebitaine biriisa ahakuba biine ekiriisa
empa-maani omu bwingi hamwe n’ebindi biriisa omu bipimo bikye. Nk’oku
kyayorekwa omu kipande aharuguru, kimwe kya kabiri (1/2) ky’amaani nikiruga
omu bishaju n’ahabw’ekyo amandaazi na donati ni birungi ahari abo
abarikwenda kwongyera aha bishaju hamwe n’amaani.

d) Emitwarize mirungi

Waayepimira amandaazi na donati (waaba otabiriire kirenga), nibibaasa kuba
ebyokurya bimwe aha kiihuro ebirikuheereza amagara marungi, namunonga aha
bantu abarikwetenga amaani maingi nk’abaana b’eishomero hamwe n’abo
abarikurya ebiihuro bikye omu izooba.

e) Emitwarize mibi

 i) Okwongyera ebitumbisa bingi omu mandaazi na donati kwenda ngu
 bihanguhe nikireetera byanywa buto nyingi kandi buto nyingi n’ey’akabi
 aha magara gaawe.

 ii) Amandaazi na donati ebibarikukora omu bikanzire ebyobrobi nibikira
 kuzamu buto nyingi, ekirikuta amagara omu kabi.

8.4 Sumbuusa

Sumbuusa n’otugaati otu barikuzinga reero bakateekamu ebihimba, enyama,
kabegi hamwe n’ezindi mboga nka karoti n’obutunguru omu nda. Akashaho aku
barikutamu ebi nibakasiika kuruga omu bikanzire n’ebirungo ebirikushushana
n’ebyo ebiri kukorwamu kyapati. Akashaho aku barikukomamu obushaza n’ebindi
nibubaasa kugira akabiri kakye nari kahango, baitu omu Uganda akabiri
k’akashaho akakomwamu obushaza n’ebindi nikaba karinganiire.

a) Oku sumbuusa zirikuriibwa

Omu bicweka bya rwagati hamwe na burengyerwa-izooba, sumbuusa nibazirya
nk’obwokurya kandi nibakira kuzinywesa chai n’ebindi byokunywa.

b) Ebiriisa ebirimu

 Reeba ekipande aha ruguru. Okutwarira hamwe, sumbuusa ziine ebishaju bingi
kukiza amandaazi, donati hamwe na kyapati ahakuba buto erikuza omu
biwaakoma omu nda yoona teri kutoonyorokamu kurungi. Ebika bya sumbuusa
byona ebi twayoreka omu kipande aha ruguru biine obwingi bw’ebishaju oburi
kurenga guraamu 40. Ahabw’okugira ngu sumbuusa ti zirimu ngano nyingi
n’obundi bw’okurya, obucweka 80 ahari 100 bw’amaani agarikuruga omu
sumbuusa nigaruga omu bishaju. Baitu kurugiirira aha ki waata omu nda
y’akashaho (obushaza, enyama, n’ebindi) hamwe n’obwingi bwa buto ei
byanywa, sumbuusa neebaasa kukuha ekipimo kya vitameeni endinda-maisho
eringaniire.

c) Emigasho aha magara

Okutaana n’enyikiriza erikugira ngu sumbuusa n’akokurya akarikuha amagara
marungi, sumbuusa n’ey’akabi aha magara kukira obwokurya obundi ahakuba
eijwiremu ebishaju.

d) Emitwarize mirungi

 i) Okwanika/okuteeka sumbuusa omu oveni nk’oku emigaati eteekwa nikibaasa
 kukyendeeza obwingi bwa buto.

 ii) Waarya eziringaniire, sumbuusa nizibaasa kuba kimwe aha byokurya
 ebirikukora ekiihuro ekirikuha amagara marungi kandi nizibaasa kuba
 nungi aha bantu abarikwetenga amaani nk’abaana b’eishomero hamwe n’abo
 abarikurya ebiihuro bikye omu izooba.

e) Emitwarize mibi

 ← Okusiika akashaho k’okukomamu obushaza n’ebindi otakabikomiremu ni
 kibi ahakuba nikyongyera buto omuri sumbuusa.

 ← Okukoma kubi sumbuusa nikireetera buto yaaza omu bi waakomera omu
 nda.

EKICWEKA KYA MWENDA

EBISHAJU NA BUTO

Ebishaju na buto byona hamwe nibyetwa ebishaju ebitengwa kandi biine
omugasho muhango ahakuba nibikora amaani kandi bihwera n’omu kujwanga
kw’ebiriisa ebirikubaasa kwenga omu bishaju. Buto ekorwa omu mizeituuni
hamwe n’omu bicoori neekira kushangwa omu ndembo. Hariho ebishaju hamwe na
buto ebirikukoresibwa omu kuteeka omu Uganda kandi nibikorwa omu bikindo,
amacanda, simu-simu hamwe n’empokya. Okutwarira hamwe, ebishaju na buto
nibibaasa kuteebwa omu bibiina ebi.

a) Okubiri kukoresibwa

Omu bicweka bya rwagati hamwe na burengyerwa-izooba bwa Uganda, ebishaju na
buto nibikoresibwa omukusiika omucuzi hamwe n’emboga. Omu ndembo, buto
hamwe n’ebishaju by’empunu nibikoresibwa kusiika emboga z’emiringo etari
emwe n’emwe. Omukuteeka ebyokurya ebitaine iteeka, buto nk’ey’emizeituuni
hamwe n’eya simu-simu nibagisiiga ahabyokurya ebiriibwa bibisi (saradi).
Amajuta g’ente nibagata omu mboga nk’ebihimba hamwe n’emboga zikwiragura
ezikyebire. Obu bicweka bya burengyerwa-izooba bwa Uganda, eshabwe
nibagiriisa oburo.

b) Ebiriisa ebirimu

Ebishaju obumwe nibimanyisa eby’empunu, amajuta g’ente hamwe n’ago agakorwa
omubihingwa. Buto nayo eijwiremu ebishaju. Ebishaju nka Tamu, Kimbo,
Cowboy, amajuta ga magariini, hamwe n’amajuta g’ente biinemu ekiriisa
enyombeka-mubiri, empa-maani hamwe n’amaizi. Omu Uganda, buto eyongyeirwemu
vitameeni endinda-maisho, ekirikureetera ebika bya buto bingi byagira
ebipimo by’ahaiguru ebya vitameeni egi. Ahaifo nitukworeka ebiriisa ebiri
omu buto n’ebishaju ebirikukoresibwa omu Uganda.

Ekipande 35: Ebiriisa ebiri omu guraamu 100 za buto n’ebishaju
ebirikukoresibwa omu Uganda

by’omunyamaishwa, eby’empunu, ebibisi

by’omunyamaishwa, mutton, ebibisi
|0.0 |100.0 |902 |0.0 |100.0 |0.0 |0 |0.0 |0.0 |0 | |c) Emigasho aha magara

N’obu ebishaju biraabe biine akakwate n’endwara nyingi ezitarikukira,
n’ekiriisa ky’omugasho aha magara. N’oburugo bukuru bw’amaani kandi
nikihwera omukujwanga kwa za vitameeni ezirikubaasa kwenga omubishaju.
Ebishaju biirimu ebirungo ebiine emigasho mingi omu mibiri yaitu, erimu
nk’okutangira okuzimba ebicweka by’omubiri nk’enyama hamwe n’engingo.
Ebishaju ebimwe nibimanywa ahabw’okurinda omubiri obutakwatwa oburwaire.
Ekyokureeberaho, ebishaju by’ekikira ky’entaama nibikyendeeza aha kabi
akareetwa obusheru.

Waaba noogura ebishaju na buto, ni kirungi otoorane ebishaju eby’amaizi
nainga ebyo ebirikurahuka kuyaga ahakuba ebi nibibaasa obutarahuka kwekwata
bikebumba byaheza kuhika omunda, reero bikakureetera oburemeezi. Okutwarira
hamwe, buto zoona ezikuruga omubihingwa/omubimera n’ez’omugasho aha magara
kukira ebishaju ebiruga omunyamaishwa oihireho buto ezo ezirikubaasa
kukwatana n’omwoya gwa hayidurogyeni. Buto etari nungi aha magara
n’ey’ebikindo hamwe n’ey’eya kokonati ahakuba buto ezi ziine ebishaju
ebicwekire.

d) Emitwarize mirungi

i) Ni kirungi kwiha ebishaju omubyokurya ebituri kurya. Ekyokureeberaho,
 ebinyoobwa, simu-simu, amacanda, empokya, amahuri, amate, enyama
 n’ebyenyanja, byona birimu ebishaju ebyabihangiirwemu. Abantu baingi
 abakuru nibabaasa kutunga ebishaju ebi emibiri yaabo erikwetenga kurabira
 omukurya ebyokurya ebi.
ii) Ebyenyanja by’ebishaju hamwe na zaabuto eziruga omumboga (oihireho buto
 eruga omubikindo) n’oburugo burungi bw’ebishaju ebiine omugasho aha
 magara. Noohaburwa kwongyera ebipimo bikye by’ebishaju ebi omukiihuro
 kyawe.
iii) Ni kirungi kuharagata ebishaju aha nyama otakagiteekire kwehara okurya
 ebishaju bingi. Waakora eki, toshemeire kwongyera buto nari ebishaju
 byona omu nyama waaba noogiteeka. Ebishaju ebirikuba byasigara omunyama
 nibimara kuteeka enyama otongyeiremu ebindi.

e) Emitwarize mibi

i) Abantu baingi nibaikiriza ngu ebishaju ni birungi aha magara kukira
 buto, ekirikureetera bakoresa ebishaju. Eki ti kirungi ahakuba ebishaju
 kubikuhora nibikwatana, byebumba kandi bibaasa kwerunda omu misi reero
 bireete endwara z’omutima hamwe n’eshagama. Ni kirungi kutoorana buto
 omumwanya gw’ebishaju ebikwataine n’ebyo ebitakwataine munonga.
ii) Baingi nibakira kwosya ebishaju na buto n’omuriro mwingi baaba
 nibasiika. Eki nikireetera omuntu yaarya emiringo y’ebishaju
 etarikwetengwa omumubiri, kandi nikiteeka amagara omukabi k’okukwatwa
 endwara ezitakira nk’ekookoro hamwe n’endwara z’omutima.
iii) Ku barikuba nibagura ebishaju na buto, abantu nibagyendera aha
 mihendo. Ekyokureeberaho n’abantu bakye abarikugura buto ekozirwe
 omumacanda gonka, nari omu simu-simu nainga emizeituuni. Baitu abantu
 nibagura buto ekozirwe omubikindo hamwe n’ebipimo bikye bya simu-simu
 n’amacanda. Ni kirungi kumanya ngu ebishaju na buto ebikozirwe omu
 birungo ebirikugura sente nkye baitu bitari birungi aha magara nka buto
 y’ebikindo nibiiza bikwihamu sente nyingi obwire bwaguma nibugyenda obwo
 orikuraguriza n’okutuura n’endwara ezitakira.

OBUGABE BW’OMUNTU: OBW’AMAGARA, EKITIINISA HAMWE N’OKWERINDA

 EKICWEKA KYA 4 EKY’ENGYENDERWAHO ERIKWETWA “MAPUTO PROTOCOL”

 OKWANJURA EKIHANDIIKO EKI

Ekitongore ekirikwetwa, The Eastern African Sub-regional Support Initiative
for the Advancement of Women (EASSI), n'ekitongore ekitari kya gavumenti
eky'aha rurengo rw'amahanga g'ekicweka kimwe, ekirimu abantu abeehiireyo,
ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti, hamwe n'ebindi bitongore ebitari bimwe na
bimwe, kigyendereire kutunguura enkorengana y'abashaija n'abakazi omunsi
yoona namunonga omu kicweka kya burugwa eizooba bwa Afirika. Nikikorera
omuri Burundi, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Kenya, Rwanda, Somalia, Tanzania hamwe na
Uganda.

Engyenderwaho erikuza omu Ndagaano Nkuru y’enyikiriza ya Afirika erikukwata
aha Buntu bw’Abantu hamwe n’Obugaba bw’Abakazi erikumanywa nk’Engyenderwaho
ya Maputo eyaateirwe omu nkora omu Kwaikumi na kumwe 2005, neehamya obugabe
bw’abakazi otwariiremu obugabe bw’okwejumbira omu by’obutegyeki hamwe
n’eby’entuura y’abantu byona, obwo barikubyejumbiramu n’abashaija, kuhika
aha kwebaasiza amagara gaabo g’okuzaara kandi n’okukomya okusiraamura
obukazi (kushara ebicweka bimwe by’omubonano). Nk’oku eiziina ryayo
ririkugira, Engyenderwaho egi ekateebwaho amahanga ageeteeraniire omu
mukago gwa Afirika omu muringo gw’Engyenderwaho, erikuza omu Ndagaano Nkuru
ya Afirika ey’obuntu hamwe n’Abugabe bw’Abantu.

Ekicweka kya 4 ky’Engyenderwaho ya Maputo, nikihamiza kimwe omurimo mukuru
gw’abakazi omu kurinda imicwe n’ebyobuhangwa bwa Afirika, barikugyendera
aha mateeka g’oburingaaniza, obusingye, obugabe, ekitiinisa, okukwatanisa
hamwe n’obutegyeki burungi obwo otaireho n’okumanya omugasho muhango
gw’abakazi omu ntunguuka.

Engyenderwaho n’ekintu kikuru omu nteekateeka, omugasho gwayo mukuru
n’okureeba obugabe bw’abakazi omuri Afirika bwabaho, obwo harikwebembezebwa
oburingaaniza omu bashaija n’abakazi. Neehamiza kimwe okutwarira hamwe,
obuteebaganisamu hamwe n’okukorengana omu nshonga ezikwatiraine n’obugabe
bw’abakazi oburikumanywa omu mahanga goona kandi oburikuhamibwa omu
bihandiiko byona by’obugabe bw’abantu omu mahanga goona nka ebiragiro
bikuru ebirikwetwa: Universal Declaration of Human Rights (UHDR), the
international Covenant on Civil and Political Rights (ICCPR), The
International Covenant on Economics social and Cultural Rights (ICESCR),
the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms fo Descrimination Against
Women (CEDAW) hamwe n’engyenderwaho eraabite omu nkora erikwetwa The
African Charter on the Rights and Welfare of the Child otaireho n’ezindi
ndagaano z’aha rurengo rw’amahanga g’ekicweka kimwe hamwe n’amahanga goona.

ENGYENDERWAHO YA MAPUTO

Ekicweka 4: Obugabe bw’omuntu: obw’Amagara, Ekitiinisa hamwe n’Okwerinda

Ekicweka 4: Buri mukazi aine kuheebwa obugabe bw’amagara ge, ekitiinisa,
kandi arindwe. Omuringo gwona ogwakubaasa kunyunyuuta, kubonabonesa,
nainga kumuha ebifubiro bikumaraho ekitiinisa ky’omukazi,
tigurikwikirizibwa.

Ekicweka 4 (2) nikigira ngu abaateireho omukono nibaza kugyezaho
ekirikubaasika kureeba ngu ebi ahaifo byabaho:

 a) Kutaho ebiragiro kandi bikateebwa omu nkora ebirikuzibira emiringo
 yoona y’okubonabonesa abakazi otaireho okugyema omukazi kubyama nawe,
 yaaba okubonabonesa oku kubaho omu rwatu nainga omu bwesherekye;

 b) Kutaho nainga kukozesa oburyo bwona bw’ebiragiro, entegyeka, enkora
 hamwe nentuura bw’okuzibira, kufubira hamwe n’okwihiraho kimwe
 emiringo yoona y’okubonabonesa abakazi;

 c) Kumanya ekirikureetaho okubonabonesa abakazi kandi n’ebirikuruga
 omuri okwo kubonabona, reero hakareebeka omubazi ogwakubaasa
 kukitangira n’okukiihiraho kimwe;

 d) Kwongyera amaani omu kwegyesa abantu ebikwatiraine n’obusingye obwo
 barikukozesa endagiiriro y’obwegyese hamwe n’okumanyisana kwenda ngu
 harugireho kimwe enyikiriza ey’ira, hamwe n’ebikorwa ebirikwikiriza
 n’okugumizamu nibibonabonesa abakazi;

 e) Kufubira abarikubonabonesa abakazi kandi kutaho enkora y’okugarura
 abakazi ababonabonesiibwe omu buteeka obu baabaire barimu
 batakabonaboine;

 f) Kutaho enkora hamwe n’obuheereza oburikuhisya okumanyisa narishi
 information, hamwe n’okugarura busya abarikubonabonesa abakazi;

 g) Kuzibira hamwe n’okujumiirira kimwe okupakira abakazi kubaiha omu
 byaro byabo baine ekigyendererwa ky’okubakoramu sente, kufubira
 abarikubapakira kandi n’okurinda abakazi abo abari ahari bugyengye
 y’okupakira;

 h) Kuzibira kubuuririza n’okushoma aha bakazi okwakubaasa kukorwa omuntu
 weena ataine rusa nainga kwikirizibwa, okurugira aha bakazi abo.

 i) Kuha ebintu by’okukozesa nk’oku bibaririirwe omu nkora n’omu
 kureeberera ebikorwa ebyo ebirikuzibira okubonabonesa abakazi.

 j) Kureeba ngu, omu mahanga ago agakirimu ekifubiro ky’okwita abantu,
 omukazi ti yaitwa aine enda nainga arikwonsya;

 k) Kureeba ngu abashaija n’abakazi baashemerererwe omu bugabe bwabo omu
 muringo gw’okutunga obuhungiro kandi haazaho amateeka agarareebe ngu
 abakazi empungi baarindwa gye kurugiirira aha kiragiro ky’ensi yoona,
 obariiremu n’oku bari.

Nyowe (itwe) ninkorera purogyekiti erikwetwa PREDICT, progyekiti eya USAID
erikukurirwa puroguraamu erikugyezaho kutanga akabi, erikwetwa Emerging
Pendamic Threats. Purogyekiti egi neekorwa aba Makarere Yunivasite
barikukorengana n’ebitongore bingi omuri Amerika otaireho na Yunivasite ya
Calfonia, Davis. Nitugyezaho kucondooza n’okwenda kumanya oku amagara
g’enyamaishwa, amatungo n’abantu gaine akakwate, nainga garikubaasa
kukosana, reero kituyambe kureeba omu maisho ei ebintu ebikuru ebyakubaasa
kureetaho oburwaire birikuruga. Kimwe aha birikucondoozibwa n’okuhika ahari
buri ka, kwenda kwetegyereza gye omuringo gw’abantu barikutuuramu
n’enyamaishwa hamwe n’amatungo gaabo. Kandi nabwo, nitubuuza abo
abarikutaaha omu kibira, obumwe n’obumwe, omu enyamaishwa zirikutuura. Ndi
hanu erizooba, kukubuuza yaaba noobaasa/nooyenda kwetaba omu
kubuuririza/kucondooza oku obwo orikugarukamu ebibuuzo ebi aha rupapura,
nainga orikugamba naanye. Ebibuuzo nibiza kukutwarira edakiika nka ashatu
zonka (Yoreka edakiika 10 zonka ahari abo abarikukozesa ekibira obumwe
n’obumwe hamwe n’abarambuzi). Kiri ahari iwe kusharaho kwetaba omu
kucondooza oku kandi oine obugabw bw’okugarukamu ekibuuzo nainga okakireeka
waaba otarikwenda. Buri kimwe eki oraatugambire/eki oraahandiike nitwija
kukitwara nk’ekihama kandi n’ebyo byona ebirikukwata aha maka gaawe gaaba
gari omu kucondooza tibiraashohozibwe. Tihaine oraakufubire ngu waagira
eki waagamba, nainga ngu waagira ou waagambaho. Ebi oraatugambire nari ebi
oraahandiike nibiija kutuhwera kwetegyereza gye endwara ezaakubaasa kuruga
omu nyamaishwa nainga amatungo kuza omu bantu, reero tuzigambire
abeebembezi b’ebyaro, eihanga hamwe n’ebitongore ebitari bya gaavumenti
otaireho n’abacondoozi abandi.

Abeetabire omu kucondooza omu ka egi (bateho) baikiriize kutuhwera omu
kucondooza oku.

 A. Iwe nookora ki ekikuru munonga ekirikukubaisaho (amaka gaawe
 noogabaisaho ota)?
 B. Ni mirimo ki endiijo ei orikukora obumwe n’obumwe? (nitumanyisa, tikyo
 eki orikukora buriijo kikakubaisaho, kwonka obumwe n’obumwe nookora
 omurimo ogwo).

1. Omuri egi tahuni/kyaro/mwanya otwiremu obwire burikwingana ki?
2. Waarareebireho enyamaishwa, gatari matungo, ziri haihi n’ahu otwire?
3. Ni nyamaishwa ki nainga ziiha zoona ezi waarareebire haihi n’ahu otwire?
4. Waarareebireho enyamaishwa z’ekishaka ziri omu nju yaawe?
5. Ni ziiha ezi waarareebire omu nju yaawe?
6. Noozireeba emirundi engahi/buri bwire ki omu nju yaawe?
7. Nooteekateeka ngu nikireetwa ki enyamaishwa ezo kutaaha omu nju yaawe?
8. Ni nyamaishwa za muringo ki ezi waarakwasireho omu ngaro zaawe ahari ezo
 ezirikutaaha omu nju yaawe?
9. Ni muringo ki ogu otwire nookoragana n’ezo nyamaishwa?
10. Waaratungireho enyamaishwa y’omukishaka okagireeberera kuruga
 waatandika kutuura omu mwanya ogu? (enyamaishwa ritari eitungo)
11. Ni nyamaishwa ki ei waaratungireho okareeberera?
12. Enyamaishwa egi okagitunga ota?
13. Enyamaishwa yaawe y’otungire okagiiha nkahi?
14. N’ahati okigitungire?/okigiine?
15. Amaizi g’okunywa noogaiha nkahi?
16. Waarareebire enyamaishwa haihi n’ahu orikwiha amaizi g’okunywa? (omu
 mwanya gurikwingana 10m).
17. Ni nyamaishwa ki ezi waarareebire aha mugyera gwanyu?
18. N’emirundi engahi ei waarareebire enyamaishwa aha mugyera ogu
 murikutahaho amaizi?
19. N’emirundi engahi ei waarataahire omu kibira?
20. Ni nshonga ki erikukutwara omu kibira?
21. Ni bintu ki ebi orikubaasa kwiha omu kibira?
22. Ni nshonga ki ezirikutwara abandi bantu b’omu maka gaawe omu kibira?
23. Iwe nainga mwena aha kyaro nimukora ki kubainga ensiri? Shoboorora.

2.1 Ni ryari obu orikurya .............................?
 Ekyenyanja, enkoko, ente, embuzi, empunu, n’ebindi.
2.2 Enyama egyo noogitebeekanisa ota otakagiriire?
2.3 Hariho obu orikurya enyama ya buri nyamaishwa/eitungo yoona
etateekire/mbisi?
2.4 Nitukimanya ngu okurya enyamaishwa gatari matungo ti kya buriijo.
Kwonka, hariho obu iwe nainga omuntu ondiijo w’aha kyaro orikurya enyama
y’enyamaishwa y’ekishaka? N’ekindi ebi oraatungambire omuri eki n’ebihama
byaitu naiwe kandi bigyendereire kumanya okuraahwere amagara g’abantu
b’ekyaro kyona.
2.4A Iwe nainga omuntu w’orikumanya aha kyaro mwarariireho enyamaishwa
y’ekishaka enyimaho (nitumanyisa, omu bwire obu ekibira kya bwindi
kitakakozirwe paaka)?
2.5 Ni nyamaishwa ya muringo ki y’ekishaka ei murikurya?
2.5A Ni nyamaishwa ki y’ekishaka ei mwarariire?
2.6 Ni ryari obu orikurya enyamaishwa nk’egyo?
2.7 Noomanya oku omuntu arikubaasa kutunga enyama y’enyamaishwa?

3.1 Waararumirweho, hazirweho, nainga hutaaziibweho enyamaishwa y’ekishaka?
3.2 Ni nyamaishwa za muringo ki?
3.3 Ni emirundi engahi ei waararumirweho, hazirweho, nainga hutaaziibweho
enyamaishwa y’ekishaka?
3.4 Haine obu iwe nainga ou orikumanya weena orikukora omugyenzo
gw’okukozesa eshagama erugire omu nyamaishwa (nka: ebyokurya, ebyokunywa,
kutinda aha mikoro nainga kugikozesa omu mikoro etari ya butoosha)?
3.5 Ni shagama ya muringo ki ei murikukozesa?
3.6 Ni mugikozesa muta?
3.7 Nimukira kugikozesa ryari?
3.8 Omu mwaka oguhwaire, okakwataho aha nyamaishwa y’ekishaka omu ngaro
zaawe?
3.9 Nookwata nainga obe n’enyamaishwa z’ekishaka kurenga aha murundi gumwe
omu kwezi?
3.10 Ni nyamaishwa za muringo ki?
3.11 Iwe okazikwatira ki?
3.12 Omu nyamaishwa ezi waakwasire, hariho eyaabaire neereebeka kuba
erwaire nainga eine obuhuta?
3.13 Waarariireho ekijuma nainga emboga zirumirweho enyamaishwa?
3.14 Ni byokurya ki ebi waarariire birumirweho enyamaishwa?
3.15 Ebyokurya ebirumirweho enyamaishwa noobirya kangahi?
3.16 Haine emiringo y’enyamaishwa ei orikumanya erikushiisha ebyokurya
ebyo?

4.1 Noogura enyamaishwa ezihuriire nainga zifiire z’okurya enyama?
4.2 Ni kangahi obu orikuza omu katare kugurayo enyamaishwa ezi?
4.3 Enyamaishwa z’okuguza kurya enyama nibazibaagira nkahi?

5.1 Ni matungo ki agu mutungire omu ka yaanyu obwa hati?
5.2 Ni matungo ki agu murikwita ngu murye?
5.3 Ni nkahi ahu murikugaitira, mukagatebeekanisa gye, gakaba ag’okurya?
5.4 Mwisire amatungo angahi omu ka yaanyu egi omu kwezi okuhwaire?
5.5 Waamara kugaita, nooha orikutebeekanisa emitumbi yaago?
5.6 Amatungo gaanyu nimugabaaga muta?
5.7 Ni kangahi obu amatungo gaanyu garikwija omuka yaanyu?
5.8 Haine amatungo gaanyu agarwaire nainga agafiire omu mwaka oguhweire?
5.9 Ni gaahi?
5.10 Waarareebireho enyamaishwa eri omu matungo gaawe? (erikurya nago,
erikuraara nago, birikurwana, n’ebindi?
5.11 Ni nyamaishwa ki?
5.12 Ni kangahi obu enyamaishwa z’ekishaka nk’ezi zirikwija omu matungo?
5.13 Nooriisiza amatungo gaawe haihi n’ekibira?
5.14 Ni kagahi obu orikutwara amatungo gaawe haihi n’ekibira?
5.15 Haine eitungo ryawe eryarahiigireho nainga eyaaraisireho enyamaishwa?
5.16 Ni eitungo ki eryarahiigireho nainga kwitaho enyamaishwa kandi ni
nyamaishwa ki ezi ryaraisire?
5.17 Haine enyamaishwa ezaaraisire amatungo gaawe?
5.18 Ni matungo ki agaaraisirwe enyamaishwa?
5.19 Ni kangahi obu amatungo gaawe garikwitwa enyamaishwa?

6.1 Waarareebireho enyamaishwa nainga obumanyiso bwazo omu misiri yaawe
nainga omu bihingwa byawe?
6.2 Ni nyamaishwa ki ezi waarareebire?
6.3 Enyamaishwa ezi ozireebire omu misiri yaawe kangahi?
6.4 Ni bihingwa ki ebi enyamaishwa ezi zirikushiisha?
6.5 Noorinda ota emisiri yaawe kureeba ngu enyamaishwa ezi
tizaagitaahirira?
6.6 Waarareebireho enyamaishwa nainga obumanyiso bwazo (endibatiro, enkari,
ekinuuko, nainga ekibande) ahu orikubiika emisharuuro yaawe?
6.7 Nyabura, gyezaho kushoboorora enyamaishwa ezo hamwe n’obumanyiso obwo.
6.8 Obumanyiso obwo noobureeba kangahi?
6.9 Hariho puroguraamu yoona aha kyanga kyaanyu erikubahwera kureeba ngu
enyamaishwa tizaashiisha misiri yaanyu?

Nabwo, ebi oraatugambire/oraahandiike byona nibiza kuba ebihama kandi
byeyambisibwe kuhwera amagara g’ekyanga kyona.
7.1 Ni nyamaishwa ki ezi orikuhiiga nainga okatega?
7.2 Noohiiga kangahi?
7.3 Noohiiga nkahi?
7.4 Waararaireho omu kibira?
7.5 Ni kangahi obu waarariireho omu kibira?
7.6 Nootema, oboneze nainga otebeekanise eitungo ryawe eri waita?
7.7 Ni nkahi ahu orikutemera nainga okabonereza eitungo ryawe eri waita?
7.8 Ebi waiha omunda y’eitungo ebitarikuriibwa noobita nkahi?
7.9 Enyama y’enyamaishwa ei waahiiga noogikozesa ki?

8.1 Waaba otari mu kibira, nootuura nkahi?
8.2 Ahabwenki orikuza omu kibira? Nookora yo ki?
8.3 Omu kibira noihamu bintu ki?
8.4 Ni kangahi obu orikutaaha nainga okaraba omu kibira?
8.5 Waararaireho omu kibira?
8.6 Ni kangahi obu waarariireho omu kibira?
8.7 Waarakwasire nainga waarakwasirweho enyamaishwa ori omu kibira?
8.8 Ni nyamaishwa ki ezi waarakwasireho nainga zikakukwataho?
8.9 Enyamaishwa naiwe nimukwatagana muta?
8.10 Ni kangahi obu orikukwata nainga okakwatwa enyamaishwa?

11.1 Waaba waagizire ngu okaba ori omu ……………… Nookora murimo ki?
11.2 Omwanya ogu orikukorera mu noobaasa kugushobororaho ota?
11.3 Nookora nainga nooraba ahagati y’ekibira nk’omurimo gwawe?
11.4 Omu kibira nootaahamu nainga noorabamu ota waaba nooza kukora?
11.5 Waararaireho nainga kugumaho omu kibira kumara omwanya muraingwa?
11.6 Ni kangahi obu orikuguma nainga orikuraara omu kibira okutwarira
hamwe?
11.7 Waarareebireho enyamaishwa nainga obumanyiso bwazo omu mwanya ogu?
11.8 Ni nyamaishwa ki ezi waarareebiremu?
11.9 Waarakwasireho nainga okakwatwaho enyamaishwa yoona ori omu kibira?
11.10 Ni nyamaishwa ki ezi orakwasireho nainga okakwatwaho ori omu kibira?
11.11 Ni kangahi obu waarakwasireho enyamaishwa nainga zikakukwataho?
11.12 Nimukwatagana muta n’enyamaishwa ezi?
11.13 Nookora ki kwerinda nainga kutangira ebiriiririzi aha mwanya
gw’orikukoreramu?
11.14 Waita enyamaishwa ahabw’okuzitangira kukusiisira, emitumbi yaazo
noogigira ota?
</runya>

OKWANJURA EKIHANDIIKO EKI

Nyine okushemererwa kuhango kukwanjurira ekitabo ekirikukwata aha kwongyera
amaani omu nkora ya Kooti z'Ebyanga ezirikwetwa "Local Council Courts
(LCC)" omu Rungyereza, ekigyendereire kuhwera ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga
kwetegyereza n'okuta omu nkora ebiragiro ebi bashemereire kumanya.
Okwegyesebwa kwa ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga ni kikuru omu kutunguura
omutindo gw'okukorera aha buringaaniza. Ekitabo eki nikiha ebyokureeberaho
hamwe n'ebintu ebikozirwe ebirikworeka ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga
kwetegyereza enshonga eziri omu byanga byabo, kandi bashareho gye omu
kushoboorora obuteetegyerezana n'okureetaho obusingye/obuteekaana omu
byanga ebyo.

Ekitabo eki kirugire omu kwebuuza hanu na hariya, kwongyerera kuruga omu
mashomo ageegirwe omu mirimo n'okugamba n'abari aha bukiiko bw'emiringo
etari emwe omu gavumenti, n’abanywani ba gavumenti omu mirimo y’entunguuka
(ba patina) hamwe n'abukirikukwataho. Ekitabo eki kirimu ebi za Kooti
zirabiremu, ebi zeegire hamwe n'oburemeezi obu ziine omu kukora emirimo
yaazo. Ekitabo eki kandi kirimu ebiragiro n'empindahinduka nsya z’okutwara
omu maisho Kooti z'Ebyanga.

Kutunga oburingaaniza n'ekintu kikuru aha bugabe bw'omuntu ekirikutwariramu
kutunga obuheereza, (obw'obukugu hamwe n'oburikureebwa), kwetegyereza
ebiragiro nk'oku birikugyenda, omwanya gw'omuntu arikumara kuhika aha mbuga
z'ebiragiro n'oburingaaniza hamwe n'okubaasa obuheereza (ebishare
ebirikuheebwa), kwonka kiine kutwariramu omutindo gw'obuheereza
oburikutungwa nka kuringaaniza omu kucwa emanja, obwangu bw'emanja
zirikucwerwaho hamwe n'ebyaruga omu kucwa emanja. Kooti z'ebyanga hamwe
n'obuhwezi bw'okuhorereza abatarikwebaasa byona nibigyenderera kureeba ngu
abantu boona baatunga oburingaaniza namunonga abo abatarikwebaasa hamwe
n'abooro omu Uganda.

Ekigyendererwa ekikuru n'okuhwera abantu ba Uganda, namunonga abooro, abari
ahari bugyengye hamwe n'abakazi kwetungira obugabe bwabo, oburingaaniza
reero batuure omu busingye. Kwenda kwongyera aha birungi ebihikirweho obwo
kirikugyenderera amashomo ageegirwe, ekitabo eki nikyongyera kugyenderera
ngu ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga beetegyereze entunga y'oburingaaniza kandi
bamanye oku burikuhikwaho habone oku baabita omu nkora. Obuhwezi obu kandi
bugyendereire kuhabura abantu b'ebyanga kumanya omugasho n'obujunaanizibwa
bwa Kooti z’Ebyanga.

 Nahabwekyo, abukirikukwataho nibahaburwa kuta ekitabo eki omu nkora
ahabw'okuba nikihwera ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga kumanya kandi bakata
ebirimu omu nkora baaba nibacwa emishango. Kwonka, ekitabo eki kishemereire
kushomwa nainga kugyendera hamwe n'ebihadiiko by'ebiragiro ebya gavumenti
z'ebyanga ekirikwetwa 'Local Goverments Act', hamwe n'ekirikukwata aha
Kooti z'ebyanga ekya 'Local Council Regulations' hamwe n'ebindi biragiro
obwo otaireho n'ebihandiiko ebindi ebiine akakwate n'ebi kwenda kuhika aha
birungi.

Adolf Mwesige
Minisita wa Gavumenti z'Ebyanga

Okwokubanza 2015
 OKUSIIMA
Okukora ekitabo kya boona ekigyendereire kutunguura omutindo gwa Kooti
z'ebyanga kukakuratira enkora eyaakuraatiirwe obu baabaire nibakora ekitabo
ky'okutendeka abatendeki ekyakozirwe ahanyima y'okukora ebintu bingi ebi
ahaifo: enkiiko z'abukirikukwataho, kubuuza abu kirikukwataho, hamwe
n'okushoma ebihandiiko ebindi. Ekitabo eki kyo nikigyenderera ogwo omuntu
wenyini ou kiraahwere - ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga - kandi nikiija kuba
nikikora nk'ekikwato kirikwegyesa kandi eky'okujurizamu reero kibahwere omu
kukora emirimo yaabo ya kooti .

Abo boona abaatumanyiise, abaatairemu obwire bwabo hamwe n'amagyezi omu
kuhandiika n'okushwijuma ekitabo kya Kooti z'Ebyanga, boona nitubasiima.

Minisiture y'Ebyanga neesiima abantu boona hamwe n'ebitongore
ebyagihwereire munonga kukora n'okumariiriza ekitabo eki ekya Kooti
z'Ebyanga.

Okwebaza okw'omutaano nikuza aha kitongore ekirikurwaniirira entegyeka
y’oburingaaniza omu by’obutegyeki ekirikwetwa Democratic Governance
Facility (DGF) abaatuhaire obuhwezi bwa sente obureeteire okukora ekitabo
eki ekya Kooti z'Ebyanga kwabaasika.

Nitwebaza obuhwezi obw'ekikugu obwatuhairwe abakuru aba Minisiture
y'Eby'ebiragiro n'eby’enshonga z’Engyendererwaho y’eihanga (Kinsityushoni),
ebindi bitongore by’ebiragiro n’oburingaaniza ebirikwetwa 'Justice, Law
and Order Sector (JLOS), eitendekyero ry’ebiragiro ery’ensi yoona erya
International Law Institute-African Centre for Legal Excellence (ILI-ACLE),
ekitongore ekya baapuriida abakazi ba Ugandaa ekyetwa Uganda Association
of Women Lawyers (FIDA Uganda), Judicial Service Commission, Judicial
Studies Institute, Law Development Centre, Uganda Law Society, Uganda Law
Reform Commission, ekitongore kya gavumenti z’ebyanga ekya Uganda Local
Governments Association (ULGA) hamwe n’ekitongore ky’endembo ekya Urban
Authorities Association of Uganda (UAAU).'

Ka nyongyere nsiime obuhwezi bw'ebitongore ebirikurwaniirira oburingaaniza
nka: Minisiture y'Enshonga z'Omunda, abaramuzi, ekitongore ky'ebihome,
ekitongore kya Pooriisi, Omuhorereza wa Gavumenti, Minisiture y'eby'ekikura
ky'abantu - Ofiisi y'enshonga z'amaka - hamwe n'ekitongore
ekirikurwaniirira obugabe bw'abantu.

Kwongyerera ahari ebyo, ekitabo eki tikyakuhwaire kuri hatarabaireho
obuhwezi bw'obukugu bw'okukikora n'okukishwijuma oburikuruga omu bakozi ba
gavumenti z’ebyanga omu nshonda zoona.

Kandi nabwo, Minisiture neesiima abakozi baayo ahabw'obukugu bu batairemu
kushwijuma n'okureeba ngu ekihandiiko eki kyakorwa. Nitusiima munonga aba
'Local Councils Development Department' ahabw'omurimo muhango ogu bakozire.

Kantware omugisha ogu kwebaza abeebembezi b'eby’obutegyeki omu Minisiture
hamwe n'aba memba abarikwebembera abakozi ahabw'obuhwezi bwabo.

Ekitabo eki ekya Kooti z'Ebyanga nikiija kukora omurimo muhango omu kuhwera
abarikukora omu za Kooti omu kuramura n'oburingaaniza. Ba memba ba Kooti
y'Ekyanga baaba batendekirwe gye reero bakeeteerana nibaija kukuratira
ebiragiro by'obugabe bw'abantu hamwe n'oburingaaniza omu kuramura abantu
b'ebyanga byabo. Eki nikiijaa kukyendeeza omwijuro gw'emishango aha Kooti
z'aha rurengo rwa disiturikiti, kireeteho empandiika n'embiika gye
y'ebitabo, abatarikwebaasa nk'abaana hamwe n'abakazi batunge oburingaaniza,
kandi kikyendeeza omuhendo gw'abantu abarikujurira ngu baabashariire kubi.

Patrick K. Mutabwire
Oshutami omu Ntebe y’Omuhandiiki w’Entuura
Okwokubanza 2015

 ENSHOBOORORA Y'EBIGAMBO
 Kushoboorora ebigambo bimwe ebikozesiibwe omu kitabo eki

Kitabaarizibwa - Omuntu aine orubanja; ou barikutabaariza omu kooti.

Eiteeka - ekiragiro ekikozirwe kandi kikahinguzibwa eishengyero rya Uganda.

Kuhutaaza (n'ekicumuro) - okuteera omuntu kukarugamu okuhutaara nainga
obuhuta.

Endwano (n'ekicumuro) - Kurwanira omu rwijwire.

Kushaba ekiganyiro/okusaasirwa - Omushobya eki arikugambira ou yaashobeza
ngu amusaasire yaamushobeza.

 Kujuriza - Omuntu ku yaakuba atarikwikirizana n'ebyasharwaho kooti reero
akatabaaza omu kooti erikukiraho arikushaba ngu ebyasharwaho bigarukwemu.

Owaajuriza/Kijuriza - Omuntu atarikwikiriza n'eki kooti yaasharaho,
orikushaba kooti erikukiraho ngu ebyasharwaho bigarukwemu.

Okuteera (Nigucwibwa kitaka)-Omuntu kureetera muntu ondiijo kutiina ngu
naabaasa kumuhutaaza.

Okutiinatiinisa n'okuteera (Nigucwibwa kitaka) - Omuntu yaatiinatiinisa
ondiijo ngu naija kumuhisyaho akabi nainga kutabangura omuntu ondiijo kandi
akagumizamu akamuhisyaho obuhuta.

Eitungo - Ekintu kyona ekirikubaasa kurugwamu sente, ebintu, eitaka,
n'ebintu ebindi.

 Okukwata n’okuguza ebintu- Nikimanyisa ngu ebintu by'omuntu nibitwarwa
kooti kandi ebiguriza omu rweteereine kwihamu sente za kooti hamwe
n'owaasinga orubanja, owaasingwa yaaba atarikubaasa nainga atarikwenda
kuzishashura.

Okubiisya - Eki nikikwata aha manja ezi omuntu omwe arikubiisya ondi ekintu
kye nainga akakimutiiza ahabw’enshonga ei baikirizanaho, reero we ori
akakinageijura.

Ekiragiro ky’ekyanga - ekiragiro ekirikukorwa akakiiko k'ekyaro/ekicweka,
omuruka,woodi, egomborora/tahuni kanso nari diviijoni.

Omwana - Omuntu weena atakahikize myaka 18 y'obukuru.

Orubanja orurikucwibwa kitaka – Emanja ezi owaashobya arikuheereza nari
akakorera ekintu ou yaashobeza.

Ekicumuro - Emanja ezi omuntu arikukora agyendereire kucumura kandi ezi
Gavumenti erikushoboorora erikukoma abantu abo, kubatangisa nainga
kubashashuza sente z’omuringo ogundi gwona.

Omutwe – Omutwe gw’omushango ogutabaaziibwe omu kooti.

Kitabaaza - Omuntu orikutwara okwetomboita kwe omu kooti.

Okukwata/okuteera okwa butoosha – Okukoresa amaani kutiinatiinisa omu
ogyendereire nari otagyendereire. Okuriha – Ekiragiro kya kooti
ekirikuragiira owaasingwa orubanja kushashura owaarusinga esente ezi
afeereirwe nari kumuha ekintu kyona ekirikubaasa kurugamu sente.

Obukugu – Emyoga n’okumanya okuri kuhwera omuntu kukora emirimo ye.

Okwetomboita – omushango oguri kutabaazibwa omu kooti

Endagaano – Okwikirizana okuhandiikirwe nari okw’akanwa ahagati y’embaju
ibiri (2) nari eziri kukiraho, obwo zirikwikirizana ngu rumwe ruheereze
obuheereza nari ekintu ekirikuhanisibwamu sente nari ebindi bintu.

Okuhindura/okwiba – Omuntu okutwara ebintu bitari bye, akabakikoresa, obwo
arikubiima nyinabyo.

Sente y’okufeerereza – Ekiragiro kya kooti ekiri kushaba orubaju rumwe
kushashura sente ezi orubaju orundi rukoraise omu kureeta omushango omu
kooti.

Kibanza- Omuntu ou ondiijo ayegurizeho sente nari ekindi Kintu.

Akacweka ka sente - akacweka kamwe ka sente karimu emitwaro ebiri
(20,000/=) ya Uganda.

Ekiragiro ky’ekyanga ekikuratira emitarize n’ebiragiro byakyo – Emitwarize
y’abantu b’ekyanga erikwikirizibwa nk’ebiragiro omu kyanga ekyo:
Neeyagamira ebyafaayo, emigyenzo hamwe n’ebindi bintu by’enzaarwa
eby’ekyanga ekyo.

Eitaka erikutegyekwa ebiragiro by’ekyanga – Ahu eitaka riri omu mikono
y’ekyanga, nainga oruganda, nari ekika, obwo rikuhwera abantu boona kandi
rikakoresibwa kurugiirira aha biragiro n’emitwarize yaabo.

Eibanja – Omuhendo gwa sente (nari ekintu kyona) oguri kubanzibwa omuntu,
kurugiirira aha ndagaano ekozirwe embaju ibiri (2).

Kibanzibwa – Omuntu arikweguza sente ow’ondiijo (Kibanza).

Okurangiirira – Kooti okurangiirira obugabe bw’embaju zombi, obwo etari
kuha kiragiro.

Okwehayo – Omuntu kukora emirimo ye n’omujinya.

Okushoroora – okutwariza kubi omuntu okuri kwegamira oruganda, erangi,
oburema, enyikiriza, orurengo rw’eby’entaatsya, nari ebindi nk’ebyo.

Baanyin’omwoga – Ebitongore bya Gavumenti hamwe na banywani baayo omu
by’entunguuka abari kuragiirwa kuhisya aha bantu obuheereza hamwe
n’okurinda obugabe bwabo.

Kuta omu nkora- Kukora ekyaragiirwa

Ohubame – ekirikureetwa orubaju rukureeta omu kooti kushagika empoza
yaarwo.

Oburingaaniza - Okutwariza abantu boona omu muringo gumwe.

Emicwe - Ebiragiro by’entwaza ebiri kuhwera abantu kutaanisa ekibi
n’ekirungi; okumanya ekikuru, ekiri kwetengwa nainaga ekiri kwikirizibwa.

Okwetomboita okutarimu nsha –Enshonga etarimu muhoho erikureetwa omu kooti.

Ekiragiro ky'okuhabura omwana - ekiragiro kya kooti ekirikuta omwana
owaashobya omu mikono y'omuntu nainga ekitongore ngu amureeberere kandi
amuhabuure.

Omuhunguzi - Omuntu aine orusa kuheebwa ebintu by’omuntu ahanyima y’ogwo
muntu kufa.

Obwakireereetsi- Burimu obwamaraaya, okuteera zaara, okutabangura
obusingye, okuzeereera, n’ebindi nk’ebyo ebiri kukorerwa omu bantu.

Obutagwera-rubaju - Nikimanyisa omuramuzi kucwamu atarikutiina,
atarikugoberera, nainga okugira eitima. Okwetongora - Nikimanyisa omuramuzi
orikukoresa ebiragiro kutari kutiinisibwa nari kubeihabeihwa kuruga omu
bantu abandi nk'abanyabuzaare, ab'eby'obutegyeki, ebitongore n'abandi.

Emitwarize mirungi- Okuba ow’amazima, okugira emicwe n’okukora ebintu omu
murino gwenyini.

Obushoboorozi- obushoboorozi bwa kooti kuhurira orubanja

Encwamu/ensharaho/mu- Kooti okurangiirira owaasinga n’owaasigwa orubanja.

Ekibanja- poroti y’eitaka

Omuringo gw’okugiramu eitaka (gw’okuba mukama w’eitaka) – Oku abantu buntu,
nari zaaguruupu z’abantu barikuba bakama b’eitaka barikukuratira ebiragiro
n’emitwarize y’ekyanga.

Obushoboorozi bw'ebiragiro - Obushoborozi bw'ebiragiro obu kooti eine
kuhurira nainga kucwa emanja.

Eibanja – Ekintu ky’omuhendo (nka sente) ekirikuheebwa omuntu owaikiriza
kukigaruraho nari kukishashura kurugiirira aha bushonshorokye obu
yaikirizanaho n’omuntu owaakimuheereza.

Okushiisha ebintu nkana- Ekikorwa ky’okushiisha ebintu by’omuntu ondiijo
ekiri kuhenda ebiragiro eki omuntu arikukora ayekundeire.

Minisita – Minisita wa Gavumenti z’Ebyanga.

Minisiture – Minisiture ya Gavumenti z’Ebyanga

Omuntu arikuhorereza omwana – Omuntu orikujwekyera omwana, omurema nari
omuntu weena otarikubaasa kwejwekyera kurungi omu kooti.

Ekiragiro kya kooti – Eki kooti yaaragiira ngu kikorwe.

Ekiragiro kya disiturikiti- Ekiragiro ekikozirwe akakiiko ka disiturikiti.

Orubaju- Omuntu ari omu rubanja – kitabaaza nari kitabaarizibwa.

Nyakutuntuza – Omuntu orikuteeberezibwaho kuba yaakozire ekikorwa kyona
ekiine akakwate n’obutabanguko bw’omu maka.

Entwaza nungi – Kukora nk’oku entwaza n’ebiragiro by’ekyanga birikuragiira.

Obwamaraaya – Okwegaita n’omuntu omu by’omubonano ahabwa sente.

Koramu– omubaro gw’anatu abashemereire kuba bari omu kooti yaaza kutandika
kuhurira orubanja.
Okugarukanisa – Okugaruraho enkoragana nungi n’omukago ahagati y’embaju
ezibaire zigizire obutaikirizana.

Ekiheneso – Eki kooti erikucwamu ngu owaasingwa orubanja akore; ekiri
kuhebwa owaasinga orubanja kumushemeza.

Okugaruzaho – Kooti okushaba owaasingwa orubanja kugaruraho ebintu bya
kitabaaza nari okumugarura omu mbeera ei yaabaire arimu orubanja
rutakabaireho.
Abaine obugabe – Baamemba b’ekyanga abaine obugabe kushaba baanyin’emyoga
kubaheereza abantu b’ekyanga obuheereza.
Okushashurira ebya mageyendo – Okushashurira ebintu n’obuheereza
ebitarabire mumateeka.
Omwanya ogu kooti eineho obushoboorozi – Obushoboorozi bwa kooti kuhurira
emanja eziri omu kicweka eki erimu.
Obushuma – Okutwara ekitari kyawe, obwo mukama waakyo atakwikireize, kandi
otarikwenda kukigaruza.
Okucwekanisa (orubanja orushoboororwa emitango) - Omuntu okutaaha omu
eitaka ry’ondiijo, nari okuteganisa eihoreere ry’ondiijo, okushemererwa
hamwe n’okuremesa omuntu kuba mukama w’eitaka.
Okucwekanisa (Ekicumuro)- Okutaaha omu Kintu ky’omuntu, akwikiriize nari
kwanga kushohora ahanyima y’obwire bw’okuba omu Kintu ekyo bwahwayo, obwo
ogyendereire kucumura, kutiinatiinisa, kujuma nari kugwisa kubi omuntu.
Okwetomboita okutarimu muhoho - Enshonga etaine buhamizo ereetsirwe omu
kooti.
Orubanja orugyendereire kugwisa kubi kwonka – Enshonga erikureetwa omu
kooti, baitu egyendereire kuteganisa n’okunyiizya omuntu.
Ohutaaziibwe – Omuntu otungire obuhuta, nari okukorwa kubi kwona, okurugire
omu rubanja nari akatabanguko koona.
Omujurizi – Omuntu orikumanya ebiri kukwata aha rubanja oruri omu kooti.
 ENTURUKIIRIRO

Ekitabo eki kikozirwe kuhwera ba memba b'akakiiko ka Kooti y'Ekyanga
kutunga obukugu kuruga omu kutendekwa. Ekitabo kigyendereire kuhangusya aha
nkora y'okwetongora ei Uganda eteireho kuha ab'akakiiko ka Kooti y'Ekyanga
obukugu bw'okushara emanja omu buringaaniza.

Ekitabo eki kirimu emitwe ikumi yoona hamwe. Omutwe gw'okubanja gurimu
ebirikukwata aha Gavumenti ya Uganda, enkora y'okwetongora, omurimo gwa
Kooti z'Ebyanga omu kushara emishango n'oburingaaniza, hamwe n'ebiragiro
ebirikutegyeka Kooti z'Ebyanga. Omutwe gwa kabiri niguhwera boona
abarikwejumbira omu murimo ogu kwetegyereza obugabe bw'abantu – ahu
burikuruga, ahabwenki bwine omugasho kandi oku bushemereire kutwazibwa
ab'akakiiko ka Kooti z'Ebyanga baaba nibasharaho eky'aha muheru. Omutwe gwa
kashatu nigushoboorora aha bikwatiraine n'emitwarize y'abanyabiragiro,
erikushoboorora aha bukuru bwayo kandi oku eshemereire kuteebwa omu nkora
Kooti z'Ebyanga omu kukozesa obujunaaniza bu babahaire omu mateeka. Omutwe
gwa kana n'ogwa kataano nibyanjurira abashomi b'ekitabo eki ebyetengo
n'entwaza eteirweho omu kiragiro ekirikutegyeka Kooti z'Ebyanga omu muringo
gurikubooreka ahabwenki entwaza egi erikwetaagisa kutari kufa kukwata
amateeka omu mutwe. Omutwe gwa mukaaga n'ogwa mushanju neeha abashomi
obujunaanizibwa bwa Kooti z'Ebyanga ahansi y'eiteeka ry'Obutabanguko
bw'Omumaka eririkwetwa 'Domestic Violence Act' hamwe n'ery'abaana
eririkwetwa 'Children Act'. Omutwe gwa munaana nigushoboororera abashomi
aha bujunaanizibwa bwa Kooti z'Ebyanga omu kushoboorora obutaikirizana
obwakubaho omu nshonga z'eitaka ery'oburagwa/ery’ensikirano. Omutwe gwa
mwenda niguha ab'akakiiko ebikwato by'okushoboorora obutaikirizana
oburikubarukaho nk'omuringo gw'okuhweraho za kooti. Ekitabo nikihendera
n'omutwe gw'eikumi ogurikuha ekyokureeberaho kya Kooti y'Ekyanga
ekirikworeka omuhanda gw'okuta ebyayegwa omu mitwe eyaashoboororwa aha
nyimaho omu nkora barikugyendera aha mateeka ga Kooti y'Ekyanga. Ebyo
byona obitaireho, ekitabo kikuru ky'okujuriramu n’Engyendererwaho y’eihanga
(Konsityushoni ya Uganda), Eiteeka rya Gavumenti z'Ebyanga, Eiteeka rya
Kooti y'Ekyanga, ebiragiro bya Kooti z'Ebyanga hamwe n'endagiiriro ya Kooti
z'Ebyanga.

Buri kicweka kikozirwe omu muringo gw'okuhwera abashomi kwetegyereza n'oku
baakubaasa kukozesa ebi baayega omu mirimo yaabo nka ba memba ba Kooti
y'Ekyanga. Kwenda kutungamu akarungi omu puroguraamu egi, abagirimu
bashemereire boorekye eki baakubaasa kuba bataayetegyereza ahabw'okuba ekyo
nikiija kureetaho okwega n'okubagana ebyayegwa.

Nk'oku kirikworekwa omu Eiteeka rya Kooti y'Ekyanga erya 2006, Kooti
z'Ebyanga "obutatwara bukugu bw'ebiragiro n'okubigyenderaho makushu" omu
kuhuurira n'okushara emishanga/enshonga. Nahabwekyo, ekigyendererwa
tikwenda ngu ba memba ba Kooti bamare gakwata ebiragiro makushu, kwihaho,
kureeba ngu nibeetegyereza ahabwenki ebiragiro ebimwe nibikora, ni bugabe
ki obu ebiragiro ebi biine kuba nibarinda, kandi ni nkahi ahu baakubaasa
okumanyisibwa omu kitabo ahu baakubaasa kujuriza.

|EITAAGI ERIRIKUTEGYEKA |Eitaagi eririkutegyeka niryebemberwa |
| |omwebembezi w'eihanga rya Uganda orikukora |
| |nka mukuru w'eihanga rya Uganda kandi agaruka|
| |akora nka omuduumizi w'amahe. |
| | |
| |Eitaagi eri niryorekyerera kandi ritegyeka |
| |emirimo ya gavumenti. Purezidenti niwe |
| |arikutaho orukiiko rukuru orurikwetwa |
| |Kabineti, orurimu ba minisita hamwe |
| |n'omuhorereza wa gavumenti. Kabineti niyo |
| |erikukora ebiragiro omu iziina rya gavumenti;|
| |neekora n’endiijo mirimo nk'oku ebiragiro |
| |birikugira. |
| | |
| |Emirimo y'eitaagi eri emingi neekorwa |
| |ebitongore ebindi biingi bya gavumenti |
| |nk'ekitongore ekirikureeberera abakozi |
| |b'eihanga, akakiiko k'oby'obwegyese, akakiiko|
| |k'eby'amagara hamwe n'akakiiko k'ebiragiro, |
| |akarikutaho kandi kakafubira abakozi ba |
| |gavumenti. Abakozi ba gavumenti abarikukora |
| |omuri buri minisiture nibataho kandi bata omu|
| |nkora ebiragiro. |
|EISHENGYERO |Omurimo mukuru gw'eishengyero n’okukora |
| |amateeka/ebiragiro ahari buri kintu kyona |
| |ky'obusingye, obutebeekana, entunguuka hamwe |
| |n'obwebembezi burungi omu Uganda. Eishengyero|
| |riine obujunaanizibwa bw'okurinda |
| |Konsityushoni ya Uganda n'okwongyera amaani |
| |omu ntegyeka ekuratira eky’abaingi |
| |(demokurase). Eishengyero niryetegyereza, |
| |riteisa kandi rishwijuma ebiteiso ebyanjwirwe|
| |kandi ebitakahinguziibwe nk'amateeka. |
| | |
| |Eishengyero rya Uganda ririmu abajwekyerwa |

| |disiturikiti, ebicweka ebindi, abakazi, |
| |amahe, abakozi, eminyeeto hamwe naabo abaine |

| |y'okusharaho. |

| |by'ebyanga. |

| |ya Uganda) nainga ekiragiro kyona eky'aha |
| |rurengo rw'eihanga. |
|EITAAGI RY'EBIRAGIRO |Eitaagi eri rikozirwe embuga |
| |z'amateeka/ebiragiro eririkushoboorora |
| |obutaikirizana ahagati y'abantu, ebitongore |
| |hamwe na gavumenti. Eitaagi eri |
| |nirishoboorora kandi rita omu nkora |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga (Konsityushoni ya |
| |Uganda) hamwe n'ebinddi biragiro. |

| |y'Ekyanga nikimanyisa kuza aha Kooti y'aha |

| |Magyesitureeti/omuramuzi w’eidaara ry’ahansi.|

|ENKORA Y'OKUHA OBUSHOBOOROZI|Kuruga 1992, gavumenti ya Uganda, erikurabira|
|BUMWE GAVUMENTI Z'EBYANGA |omu Minisiture ya gavumenti z’ebyanga, etwire|
|OMU Uganda |neetwara omu maisho enkora ya |
| |'decentralisation' ahu obushoboorozi bwa |
| |gavumenti ya rwagati obukwatiraine |
| |n'enkurakurana, enteekateeka, kubaasa |
| |eby'esente, hamwe n'okukora emirimo |
| |y'obutoosha hamwe n'okusharaho aha nshonga |
| |z'ebiragiro n'obuheereza bikagaruka aha |
| |gavumenti z’ebyanga ezi abantu beetooraniire.|
| | |
| |Obushoboorozi obu Minisiture ya gavumenti |
| |z’ebyanga nk'oku buri omu kacweka ka 95-98 |
| |omu iteeka rya gavumenti z’ebyanga (cap. 243)|
| |butwariiremu, n'obu buraabe butarikukoma aho:|
| |kukwataganisa, obuhwezi, kureeberera, kuha |
| |obuhwezi bw'obukugu, omu gavumenti z’ebyanga |
| |zoona omu ihanga. |
| | |
| |Ebirungi ebiri omu kuha obushoboorozi bumwe |
| |gavumenti z'ebyanga |
| |Ebirungi ebirimu n'ebi ahaifo: |
| |Kuheebwa obushoboorozi nikikyendeeza |
| |oburemeezi obu gavumenti ya rwagati erikuba |
| |eyekoreire bw'okuhisya obuhereza haihi |
| |n'abantu, ekyo kigiha obwire bw'okuta amaani |
| |aha nshonga ezindi z'okukora ebiragiro |
| |by'eihanga, enteekateeka hamwe n'okutaho |
| |omutindo. |
| | |
| |Kugarura obushoboorozi omu gavumenti |
| |z'ebyanga nikiha omugisha abantu ba Ugandda |
| |kwejumbira omu nteekateeka, n'okusharaho aha |
| |rurengo rw'ekyanga. |
| |Nikyongyera kihwera abantu kutunga obuheereza|
| |haihi nabo ahabw'okuba abarikuheereza nibaba |
| |nibakorera omu byanga ahu abantu barikutuura.|
| | |
| |Obushoboorozi bumwe omu gavumenti z'ebyanga |
| |nibuha omugisha ebibiina by'abantu ebimwe |
| |nk'abakazi, eminyeeto, abantu abaine oburema |
| |aha mibiri yaabo, abagurusi n'abakaikuru |
| |kwejumbira omu kusharaho aha nshonga |
| |ezirikubakwataho. |
|OMURIMO GWA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA |Ebyafaayo bya Kooti z'Ebyanga |
|OMU KUKORA OBURINGAANIZA | |
| |Omu bwire bw'ekishaka/bw'orutaro orwa |
| |'National Resistance Movement (NRM) orwa |
| |(1981-1986) ebicweka ebi abaheekyera baabaire|
| |bahamba, bakaba batamu obukiiko bwa |
| |Rwangisiriza oburikwetwa Resistance Councils |
| |(RCs). Obukiiko obwo bukaba bwine |
| |obushoboorozi bw'okukorera abantu hamwe |
| |n'okushara emanja omu byanga bi bwabaire |
| |burimu. Gavumenti ya NRM ku yaagiire aha |
| |butegyeki omu gwa 1986, ekateeraho kimwe |
| |ekiragiro ky'obukiiko bwa Rwangisiriza, 1987,|
| |obwateeriirweho kimwe nk'ekiragiro omu ihanga|
| |ryona. Obukiiko bwa Rwangisiriza kuheebwa |
| |obushoboorozi bw'okuramura emishango |
| |bukatongozibwa ekiragiro eky'akakiiko ekya |
| |1988. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga, nk'oku zaizire kumanywa aha |
| |kutongoza Konsityushoni ya Uganda eya 1995 |
| |bukanjurwa burikurugiirira aha nteekateeka |
| |y'oburingaaniza bwa boona hamwe n'enkora ya |
| |demokorase. Kooti z'Ebyanga zikateebwaho |
| |kuhwera oburemeezi oburikushanga n'enkora ya |
| |Kooti eza buriijo. |
|AMAANI GA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA |Amaani ga Kooti z'Ebyanga nigashoboororwa |
| |omuri ebi ahaifo: |
| | |
| |Kooti z'ebyanga ziri haihi n'abantu ba |
| |buriijo. |
| |Aha kyaro/kyanga hamwe n'aha rurengo |
| |rw'omuruka, Kooti z'Ebyanga zishemereire |
| |kuteererwa akaruuru. Nahabwekyo zikoriirwe |
| |kuhikiiriza kandi zikareeba ngu zaakorera |
| |abantu abu zirikuheereza. |
| | |
| |Nabwo, aha rurengo rw'egomborora/tahuni |
| |nainga eishaza/diviijoni Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |nizirondwa bakuru b'obukiiko bwabo omu |
| |magomborora/tahuni/masaza nahabwekyo |
| |nibajunaanwa abantu abu barikuheereza. |
| | |
| |Ahabw'okugira ngu ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga|
| |nibatuura n'abantu omu byanga byabo, |
| |nibeetegyereza enshonga n'oburemeezi |
| |bw'abantu hamwe naabo abarikukoresa za Kooti.|
| | |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nizitwaza mpora kandi |
| |nizikozesa orurimi rw'enzaarwa oru abantu |
| |b'ekyanga barikwetegyereza kurungi. |
| |Omuhendo gw'esente gw'okureeta omushango omu |
| |Kooti y'Ekyanga ni mukye waagyeragyeranisa |
| |n'ogwa kooti ezindi. |
| | |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nizigyezaho kugarukanisa |
| |abantu obwo zirikushoboorora enshonga zaabo |
| |zireetaho obutebeekana kutari kureeka abantu |
| |bakareebana barikworeka obwangane omu kooti. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nizihurira kandi zishara |
| |emishango juba wagyeragyeranisa na kooti |
| |ezindi nk'eza haidaara rya disiturikiti. |
|Oburemeezi bwa kooti |Oburemeezi obukuru bwa za Kooti z'Ebyanga |
|z'ebyanga |nibushoboororwa ahaifo: |
| | |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga abamwe tibeegire |
| |kurungi. Nahabwekyo, baine obuzibu omu |
| |kushoma n'okuhandiika. |
| |Ba memba abamwe tibarikumanya ebiragiro n'obu|
| |byakuba ebirikutandikirwaho nangwa n'omurimo |
| |gwabo hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa tibarikubimanya|
| |nk'oku birikurambikwa gye omu biragiro. |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti y'Ekyanga obumwe n'obumwe |
| |nibashara emishango etari yaabo nari shi ei |
| |bataineho bushoboorozi nk'okutoroboza obwana |
| |buto. |
| | |
| |Obwire obwingi, ba memba ba Kooti y'ekyanga |
| |tibaine nari shi tibarikutunga Konsityushoni,|
| |Eiteeka ry'Ekyanga erya 2006, Ebiragiro |
| |by'ekyanga ebya 2007 hamwe n'ebindi |
| |bihandiiko by'omugasho. |
| | |
| |Okusharaho/kucwamu kwa Kooti z'Ebyanga obwire|
| |obwingi tikurikugyenderera bugabe bw'abakazi,|
| |obw'abaana, abantu abaine oburema aha mibiri |
| |yaabo hamwe n'abakaikuru n'abagurusi nk'oku |
| |kirikurambikwa omuri Konsityushoni y'eihanga.|
| | |
| | |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga abamwe nibarya |
| |ebituga. Kandi obundi n'obu baakusharira aha |
| |mazima, abantu abamwe nibabaasa kugira ngu |
| |bariire ebituga. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga obumwe tizirikumanya kubiika |
| |bihandiiko by'emishango kurungi, |
| |ekirikureetaho oburemeezi omu kujuriza. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga obumwe n'obumwe nizitunga |
| |oburemeezi kuta omu nkora eki zishazireho. |
|EBIRAGIRO EBI KOOTI | |
|Z'EBYANGA ZISHEMEREIRE | |
|KUKORERAHO | |
|KONSITYUSHONI YA Uganda |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga (Konsityushoni) |
| |niyo Ishe-biragiro nkuru omu Uganda. Eki |
| |kimanyisa ngu buri biragiro byona ebirikuza |
| |aheeru ya Konsityushoni ni busha. |
| |Konsityushoni niyo mpagi ahu buri eitaagi |
| |ry'ekiragiro ryona ririkuruga. |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga einemu ekiragiro |
| |ky'okutaho Kooti z'Ebyanga nka kimwe ahari |
| |ebyo ebiri omu nk'ora y'okuha obushoboorozi |
| |ebyanga. Ekicweka 129(1) ekya Konsityushoni |
| |(Engyendererwaho y’eihanga) nikishoboorora |
| |ahari zaakooti eziri ahansi ya Kooti enkuru, |
| |Kooti ey'okujuriramu hamwe na Kooti |
| |y’enshonga z’Engyendererwaho y’eihanga. |
| |Okutaho Kooti z'Ebyanga n'okuhikiiriza ebiri |
| |omu Engyendererwaho y’eihanga ngu abantu ba |
| |Uganda baine kwejumbira omu kukorerera |
| |oburingaaniza. Ekicweka 126(1) ekya |
| |Konsityushoni (Engyendererwaho y’eihanga) |
| |nikigira ngu: |
| |“Obushoboorozi bw'amateeka niburuga omu bantu|
| |kandi nibuza kukorwa za kooti eziraabe |
| |zitairweho Konsityushoni egi omu iziina |
| |ry'abantu. Nibuza kugyendera aha biragiro, |
| |emicwe n'enteekateeka y'abantu. |
|Eiteeka rya kooti y'ekyanga |Eiteeka erya Kooti y'Ekyanga erya 2006 niriha|
|erya, 2006 |Kooti z'Ebyanga obushoboorozi bw'okuhurira |
| |n'okushoboorora enshonga/emishango eya |
| |kitaka. |
|EBIRAGIRO BYA KOOTI |Ebiragiro bya Kooti z'Ebyanga zikateebwaho |
|Z'EBYANGA EBYA, 2007 |omu gwa 2007 kushoboorora gye oku Eiteeka rya|
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga riraakore. |
|EITEEKA ERIRIKUKWATA AHA |Eiteeka eri niriha abakakiiko k'ekyanga aka |
|BAANA |LC obushoboorozi bw'okurinda hamwe |
|(Cap. 59) |n'okutunguura obugabe n'embeera nungi |
| |y'abaana. Nirigaruka riha za Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |obushoboorozi by'okuhurira n'okushara |
| |emishango ekozirwe abaana. |
|Eiteeka rya gavumenti |Eiteeka rya gavumenti z'ebyanga |
|z'ebyanga (Cap. 243) |nirishoboorora aha ndengo z'ab'obukiiko |
| |bw'ebyanga (LCs) hamwe n'oku burikukorwa |
| |hamwe n'abashemereire kubamu. |
|EITEEKA RY'OBUHEEREZA BW'AHA|Eiteeka eri niriikiriza Kooti z'Ebyanga kuha |
|KYANGA |omurimo, gwa burungi bwa nsi, omuntu ori omu |
|(Cap. 115) |nshobi etari mpango. |
| |Eiteeka ry'obutabanguko bw'omu maka niriha |
|EITEEKA RY'OBUTABANGUKO |Kooti z'Ebyanga obushoboorozi bw'okuhurira |
|BW'OMU MAKA ERYA, 2010 |emishango egyo kandi rirambika emihanda eki |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga ziine kurabamu, kugihurira |
| |n'okugishara. |
|EITEEKA RY'EITAKA |Eiteeka ry'eitaka niriha Kooti y'Ekyanga |
|(Cap. 227) |ey'aha muruka/waadi obushoboorozi |
| |bw'okuhuurira n'okusharaho obutaikirizana |
| |oburikurugiirira aha itaka |
| |ery’empungurano/ensikirano. (Kiine kumanywa |
| |ngu eki nikitaana aha iteeka rya Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga eririkugira ngu Kooti z'Ebyanga aha|
| |rurengo rw'ekyaro/seeru ziine kubanza |
| |zaahurira buri mushango gwona oguri omu |
| |kyaro, otaireho n'emishango ey'eitaka |
| |ry'empungurano). |

|ENDUGIIRIRO |Eiteeka ry'obugabe bw'abantu ery'ensi yoona |
| |(eri Uganda etaireho omukono) niririnda |
| |obugabe bw'abantu boona ahabw'okugira ngu |
| |n'abantu. Obugabe obu nibworekwa omu |
| |ngyendererwaho y’eihanga aha mutwe gwa 4. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nizishabwa nk'eiteeka kuta |
| |amateeka g'okurinda obugabe bw'abantu omu |
| |nkora zaaba nizikora emirimo yaazo. |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw'abantu n'enki? |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw'abantu nibwo bugabe obu abantu |
| |boona bashemereire kuheebwa bo nk'abantu. |
| |Obugabe obu tiburikutuheebwa muntu weena |
| |kwihaho tubwine ahabw'okugira ngu turi |
| |abantu, otatairemu: eihanga eri omuntu |
| |arikurugamu, yaaba n'omushaija nainga |
|AMAKURU G'OBUGABE BW'ABANTU|omukazi, obukomooko bwe, oruganda rwe, |
| |ediini, orurimi, yaaba n'omugaiga nainga |
| |omworo nangwa n'ekitiinisa eki aine. Obugabe |
| |obu nigwo mutima gw'obuntu bwaitu. Eki nikyo |
| |kirikumanyisa twaba nitugira ngu |
| |nibuzaariranwa/n'obw'enzaarwa. Bwine |
| |akakwate kahango n'ebyetaago by'omuntu |
| |ebikuru omu magara g'ensi, obugabe hamwe |
| |n'ekitiinisa - kandi nirikora aha bantu hamwe|
| |n'aha bibiina. |

|OBUGABE BW'ABANTU OMU |Obugabe bw'abantu buri aha mutwe gwa 4 omu |
|kONSITYUSHONI YA uGANDA |ngyendererwaho y’eihanga. Omutwe ogu kandi |
| |nigumanywa nka ekirangiiriro ky'obugabe. |
| | |
| |Akacweka ka 20 ak’Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, |
| |kandi niko kacweka k'okubanza aha mutwe gwa 4|
| |nikagira kati: |
| | |
| |20. Obugabe bw'abantu obukuru obugabe. |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw'omuntu obukuru n'obw'enzaarwa |
| |kandi tiburikuheebwa eihanga. |
| |Obugabe bw'omuntu hamwe n'ebibiina oburi omu |
| |mutwe ogu nibwija kuheebwa ekitiinisa, |
| |burindwe kandi butunguurwe ebitongore byona |
| |bya gavumenti hamwe n'abantu boona. |
|Ekirangiriro ky'obugabe |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga neehamya obugabe |
|bw'abantu |bw'abantu boona omu Uganda. Obugabe obu |
| |n'obw'obuzaariranwa nk'oku kirikushoboororwa |
| |omu mutwe 4 omu Engyendererwaho y’eihanga. |
| |Bwine kuheebwa ekitiinisa, burindwe kandi |
| |butunguurwe ebitongore byona bya gavumenti |
| |hamwe n'abantu boona. |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga neegira ngu abantu |
| |boona nibaingana omu biragiro, kandi baine |
| |kurindwa ebiragiro omu muringo nigwo gumwe. |
| |Kutwariza abantu omu miringo etarikushushana |
| |- nk'okubashoshora kurugiirira aha: nkura |
| |yaabo, rangi, ruganda, burugo, nyikiriza |
| |nainga ediini; oku beemereire omu bya sente, |
| |ebibiina by'obutegyeki, nainga oburema aha |
| |mibiri yaabo, tikirikwikirizibwa. |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 21). |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|EMIRINGO Y'OBUGABE |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga yo neegamba aha |
|BW'ABANTU |bugabe bwona hamwe n'obw'obutegyeki kandi |
| |egaruka egamba aha bugabe bw'eby'entaatsya, |
| |entuura hamwe n'entwaza. Neegaruka egamba aha|
| |bugabe bw'abo abatarikwebaasa. Omu bugabe |
| |bwona obwagambwa aha ruguru, tihariho |
| |oburikukira bugyenzi bwabwo; nangwa obwingi |
| |bwine akakwate kandi nibukorengana. |
| |Ekyokureeberaho, nikibaasika kugira obugabe |
| |bw'amagara marungi otarikutunga bujanjabi? |
| |Omuntu naabaasa kugira amagara marungi ataine|
| |by'okurya? |
| | |
| |Ahaifo hariho obugabe oburi omu |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga: |
| | |
| |Obugabe bwa boona hamwe n'obw'obutegyeki |
| |Okwingana kandi obutashoshorwa |
| |(Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka 21) |
| |Obugabe bw'amagara (Engyendererwaho |
| |y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 22) |
| |obugabe bw'omuntu nk’omuntu (Engyendererwaho |
| |y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 23) |
| |Ekitinisa ky'obuntu n'okurindwa obutatwazibwa|
| |nk'enyamaishwa (Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, |
| |Akacweka ka 24) |
| |Okurindwa obutatwazibwa nk'omuhuuku, |
| |n'obutagyemwa kukora. (Engyendererwaho |
| |y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 25) |
| |Okurindwa obutaimwa ebintu ebi oine kuba |
| |nootunga (Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka|
| |26) |
| |Obugabe bw'okwehereera nk'omuntu, kw'etungira|
| |eka, hamwe n'ebintu ebyawe nk'omuntu. |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka 27) |
| |Obugabe bw'okuhurirwa kutarimu kinkutiira. |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka 28 |
| |Kurinda obugabe bw'omuntu bw'okuteekateeka, |
| |kugamba, obw'ediini, kugira oruteerane hamwe |
| |n'okuhikaana n'abandi. Engyendererwaho |
| |y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 29). |
| |Obugabe bw'eka (Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, |
| |Akacweka 31). |
| |Obugabe bw'entwaza y'abantu n'ebirikugyenda |
| |nabwo (Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka ka|
| |37) |
| |Obugabe bw'okumanya ebirikukwata aha ihanga |
| |hamwe n'ebi eihanga ririkukora. |
| |(Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 38 |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw'okutunga okumanyisibwa. |
| |(Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 41) |
| |Obugabe bw'okutwarizibwa omu buringaaniza |
| |kandi kutwarirwa hamwe nk'abarikwingana omu |
| |kusharaho ebiraakorwe (Engyendererwaho |
| |y’eihanga, Akacweka, ka 42) |
| |Obugabe bw'eby'entaatsya, entuura hamwe |
| |n'emitwarize |
| | |

| |Akacweka ka30) |

| |Akacweka ka 31) |
| |Obugabe bw'entwaza y'abantu n'ebirikugyenda |
| |nabwo (Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka ka|
| |37) |
| |Obugabe bw'okutuura ahantu ahayonjo kandi |
| |ahaboneire. (Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, |
| |Akacweka ka 39) |
| |Obugabe bw'eby'entaatsya (Engyendererwaho |
| |y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 40) |
| | |
| |Obugabe obw'omutaano aha bundi |
| |Kutaho enkora eya 'affirmative action' |
| |ey'okuhwera abarikuribatiirirwa kurugayo. |
| |(Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 32) |

| |y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 33) |

|Eiteeka ry'oburingaaniza |EITEEKA RY'OBURINGAANIZA NIRYO ITEEKA |

| |abajuririzi n'ebizibiti kwongyera ahari ebi |
| |arikugamba. |
|EBIRAGIRO EBIRIKUKWATA AHA |Kooti eine kureeba ngu buri rubaju |
|BY'OBUHANGWA N'EMIGYENZO |rwamanyisibwa omu bwire okuhoza |
|Y'ENZAARWA |kutakabaireho. |
| |Memba wa kooti aine akakwate n'omushango |
| |taine kuba ari omwe ahari abo abarikuhurira |
| |omushango ogwo. |
| |(Eiteeka rya Kooti z'Ebyanga erya 2006, |
| |Akacweka ka 24) |
| | |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga neeha obugabe |
| |abanya Uganda boona kukora emigyenzo yaabo |
| |y'obuhangwa omu byanga byabo. |
| |(Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 37). |
| |Kwonka neegaruka egira ngu tihariho mugyenzo |
| |gwona gw'obuhangwa oguri ahaiguru ya |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga hamwe n'ebindi |
| |biragiro kukorerwa omu Uganda. |
| | |
| |Nk'oku kirikworekwa omu kishushani eki |
| |ahaifo, Kooti z'Ebyanga zishemereire kuta omu|
| |nkora ekiragiro kirikukwata aha migyenzo |
| |y'obuhangwa zirikugyendera aha Konsityushoni |
| |hamwe n'ebiragiro ebindi. |

|N'OHA OSHEMEREIRE KURINDA |Buri omwe. |
|OBUGABE BW'ABANTU? | |
| |Kwihaho, gavumenti hamwe n'ebitongore byayo |
| |otairemu Kooti z'Ebyanga, biine |
| |obujunaanizibwa bw'okurinda obugabe kandi |
| |nibimanywa nka bya Njunaanizibwa. Biine |
| |obujunaanizibwa kuha ekitiinisa n'okurinda |
| |kandi n'okuhikiiriza obugabe bw'abantu hamwe |
| |n'ebibiina ebiraabe nibibashaba. |
| | |
| |Omu bugufu, Kooti z'Ebyanga ziine |
| |obujunaanizibwa bw'okuha ekitiinisa, kurinda |
| |hamwe n'okutunguura obugabe bw'abo boona |
| |abarikubaijaho - omu muringo ogu |
| |barikutwazamu emishango yaabo, okugihurira |
| |n'oku barikutwaza enshonga hamwe |
| |n'okubarikutwaza abantu abaabaijaho omu |
| |nsharaho yaabo. Ba memba ba Kooti y'Ekyanga |
| |baine kuba nibamanya ni bugabe ki obu abantu |
| |baine kuheebwa nainga obu baakubaasa kuheebwa|
| |oburikubaasa kuribatiirirwa omu kukora aha |
| |mishango. Bashemereire kuba baine okumanya |
| |abantu abo nainga ebibiina ebyo |
| |ebitarikwebaasa reero bareebe ngu baabikorera|
| |n'oburingaaniza nk'abandi boona ab'aha |
| |kyanga. |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw'abantu n'ebibiina ebiri omu mutwe |
| |ogu nibwija kuheebwa ekitiinisa, burindwe |
| |kandi butunguurwe amataagi hamwe n'ebitongore|
| |byona bya gavumenti kandi n'abantu boona. |
| |(Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka ka 20 |
| |(2) |
| | |
| |Kandi ekindi, baine obujunaanizibwa |
| |bw'okumanyisa abandi ebiri omu ngyendererwaho|
| |y’eihanga obwo otaireho n'ekirangiiriro |
| |ky'obugabe bw'abantu. |
| | |
| |Bimwe aha bitongore ebiine obujunaanizibwa |
| |bw'okurinda obugabe bw'abantu omu Uganda |
| |Abeebembezi b'ebyanga (LCs) |
| |Pooriisi |
| |Za kooti z'ebiragiro |
| |Ekitongore kya 'Public Service Commission' |
| |hamwe n'akakiiko k'aha disiturikiti akaine |
| |obujunaanizibwa aha mirimo ya gavumenti (ku |
| |haakubaho omukozi wa gavumenti |
| |orikuribatiirira obugabe bw'abandi). |
| |Ekitongore ekya 'Judicial Service Commission'|
| |(ahabw'abo abarikukora omu by'ebiragiro). |
| |Ekitongore ekya 'Health Service Commission' |
| |(Ahabw'abo abarikukora ahaby'amagara) |
| |Kareebi/karishorisho wa Gavumenti (IGG) |
| |Ekitongore kya 'The Uganda Human Rights |
| |Commission' |
| |Kooti y’enshonga za Konsityushoni |
| |(Kushoboorora ebiri omu Engyendererwaho |
| |y’eihanga hamwe n'omu kirangiriro ky'obugabe |
| |bw'abantu) |
| |Ebindi bitongore bya gavumenti |
| |Ebindi bitongore ebirikurwanirira obugabe |
| |bw'abantu (Otairemu ebibiina bya ba |
| |nyekundiire) |
| |Iwe na nyowe! |
|KUNYWANISA OBUGABE |Ekirangiriro ky'obugabe bw'abanti nikigira |
|BW'ABANTU HAMWE N'EKIGAMBO |kiti: |
|KY'OKUTUNGA OBURINGAANIZA |Abantu boona baine kuheebwa omugisha |
| |gw'okuhurirwa mangu omu buringaaniza omu |
| |maisho ga kooti etaine rubaju ru erikugwera |
| |nainga akakiiko koona akatairweho ebiragiro. |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka 28 (1) |
| |Engyendererwaho y’eihanga neegaruka egira |
| |ngu: |
| |Oburingaaniza bushemereire kukorerwa buri |
| |omwe hatariho kushoshora kurikuga aha |
| |kitiinisa ky'omuntu. |
| |Oburingaaniza/kusharira omuntu tikushemereire|
| |kusiibayo |
| |Abu basiisiire bashemereire kuhongyerwa omu |
| |muringo oguhikire. |
| |Okugarukanisa nikwo kushemereire |
| |kwebembezibwa |
| |Oburingaaniza nibwo bushemereire kukorwa |
| |kutari kuta omutima munonga aha bukugu |
| |bw'ebiragiro. |
| |(Engyendererwaho y’eihanga, Akacweka 126 (2))|
| |Kutunga oburingaaniza omu kuramurwa nikibaho |
| |buri omwe, otaireho n'abatarikwebaasa hamwe |
| |n'abooro, kuronda kandi bakatunga |
| |ekigarukwamu ky'oburingaaniza omu biragiro, |
| |yaaba aine eki afiire na mungyenzi we - |
| |kurikwikirizana n'omutindo gw'obugabe |
| |bw'abantu. |
| |Kutunga oburingaaniza omu kuramurwa ni kikuru|
| |aha bugabe bw'omuntu. |
| |Obugabe bw'abantu niburindwa hamwe |
| |n'okuhikiirizibwa kurugiirira enkora |
| |y'ebiragiro eriho. Kutunga oburingaaniza |
| |nigwo muhanda gw'okuhika aha biheneso hamwe |
| |n’okurihwa. |
|OMURIMO GWA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA|Abantu baingi omu ihanga ryona baine |
|KUHWERA OMU KUTUNGUURA |oburemeezi bw'okutunga oburingaaniza aha |
|ENSHONGA Y'OKUTUNGA |nshonga zaabo z'obutaikirizana, hamwe |
|OBURINGAANIZA OMU KURAMURWA|n'okutunga obuhereza bwa kooti. Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga ziine omurimo muhango gw'okukora |
| |omu kureetaho oburamuzi omu byanga byabo, |
| |namunonga ahari abo abataine kihwera hamwe |
| |n'abooro. |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga tiziri haihi n'abantu kwonka,|
| |kwihaho ziri ahansi kukira kooti ezindi, |
| |nizihurira emishango omu rurimi oru abantu |
| |b'ekyanga barikwetegyereza. Emihanda ei Kooti|
| |z'Ebyanga zirikukozesa zaanguhi kandi |
| |terikutiinisa nka kooti ezindi. Ahabw'okugira|
| |ngu ziri omu kyanga nikyo kimwe, ba memba ba |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nibakira kuba nibamanya |
| |enshonga nyingi ezi barikushoboorora. |
| |Ebi byona nibyongyera kumanyisa omugasho gwa |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga omu kwita ekituri ky'okuhisya|
| |oburamuzi aha bantu abaingi abaakubaire |
| |bataine ky'okukora. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|NI BANTU KI ABATAINE |Abataine buhwezi nibo abo abari ahari |
|BUHWEZI KANDI AHABWENKI |bugyengye y'okubeera kimwe kubi munonga |
|BAINE KUFIIBWAHO? |haabaho oburemeezi nainga ebiijiija. Abataine|
| |buhwezi omu mwanya nainga eihanga rimwe |
| |nibataana n'abo ab'omwihanga erindi, n'obu |
| |haraabe hariho abo abari batyo omu myanya |
| |yoona. |
|ENKORA Y'OBUGABE BW'ABANTU |Buri ki ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga |
|EIKIRIZIIBWE |baraakore, n'okukikora barikugyendera aha |
| |mutindo gw'obugabe bw'abantu, barikukita aha |
| |mutindo nk'abaine obujunaanizibwa bw'okurinda|
| |n'okuhikiiriza obujunaanizibwa obwo. Ekyo |
| |nikyo barikweta Enkora y'obugabe bw'abantu. |
| |Ebyashoboororwaho ahaifo n'ebiragiro |
| |by'enkora y'obugabe bw'abantu: |
| | |
| |Okwejumbiramu |
| |Buri omwe aine obugabe bw'okwejumbira omu |
| |kusharaho okurikukwata aha bugabe bw'abantu. |
| |Okwejumbiramu tikushemereire kugyemwa, kube |
| |okw'amaani, kandi kwine amakuru, omu muringo |
| |hamwe n'omu rurimi orurikwetegyerezibwa. Abo |
| |boona abarikwija omu Kooti z'Ebyanga baine |
| |obugabe bw'okwejumbira omu kuteisa barikuha |
| |ebiteekateeko byabo. |
| |Ebintu nk'okugarukanisa, ekiri kirungi nangwa|
| |obwire obwingi kwonka ti mu buri mushango |
| |gwona namunonga (ekyokureeberaho emishango |
| |ey'amaani) kushemereire kwejumbiramu abantu |
| |b'embaju zombi reero ekirikurugamu, kiherize |
| |kumanywa ngu, okwikirizana omu muringo ogu |
| |nikuheebwa ekitiinisa. |
| |Obujunaanizibwa |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti y'Ekyanga baine kumanya ngu|
| |baine obujunaanizibwa aha bantu omu byanga |
| |byabo kandi bashemereire kukorera emirimo |
| |yaabo omu rwatu. |
| |Obutashoroora hamwe n'oburingaaniza |
| |Okushoroora omu bantu okwa buri muringo gwona|
| |tikurikwikirizibwa. Omuringo nigwo gumwe, |
| |abatarikwebaasa kureeba ngu obugabe bwabo |
| |bwarindwa kandi bwatungwa kandi |
| |tibaribatirirwa. |
| |Okumanyisibwa kwa abaine kuheebwa obugabe |
| |Abantu b'ekyanga baine kumanya obugabe obu |
| |baine babone kubushaba kyayetaagisa. Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga nizikora kihango aha kureeba ngu |
| |abantu baayetegyereza eki bashemereire |
| |kushaba kurugiirira aha ngyendererwaho |
| |y’eihanga. |
| |Okwikirizibwa kw'obugabe |
| |Kwikiriza ngu obugabe buri omu mateeka, |
| |n'obwa buri hamwe kandi bwine akakwate |
| |n'ebiragiro by'ensi yoona. Ba memba ba Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga baine kureeba ngu emirimo yaabo |
| |neekwatagana n'obugabe bw'abantu. |

 EMICWE Y'OBURAMUZI EYA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA
