Kuratira ebi:

Ekiraakorwe 1:

Pepper naahayo okwetomboita kwe omu kooti y’Ekyaro. Kooti eshemereire
kukora byona ebirikwetaagisa omu kweteguurira okuhurira orubanja.

Ekiraakorwe 2:

Kooti y’Ekyaro neehurira orubanja rwa Pepper ohababiire Brown.

Ekiraakorwe 3:

Reka tugire ngu, aba kooti y’ekyanga ku baabaire nibacondooza, Mukuru
w’Entebe yaatunga okwetomboita kuruga ahari kirinju w’ekika kurikugira ngu
Uncle Pepper akahenda ekiragiro kya disiturikiti ekikwatiraine n’okuhinga,
okureetsa, hamwe n’okugira enzaayi. Kora okwegyezamu obwo orikweteguurira
okuhurira, hamwe n’okucwera Pepper orubanja.

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q1: Ni micwe/mitwarize/migyenzo ki ei orikuteekateeka ngu
n'ey'obuzaariranwa omu kyanga kyanyu?

Eky'okuteisaho:

Q2: Ni ryari obu kirikwikirizibwa/kwetaagwa ngu abantu batwazibwe omu
miringo etarikushushana omu kooti?

Ekyokureeberaho: Abakazi tibashemereire kugira eitaka.

Ekyokureeberaho: Omushobya/kitabaarizibwa yaikiriza ngu ashobize kandi
yaashaba okusaasirwa nk'oku kiri omu migyenzo y'abantu b'ekyanga.

Ekiragiro/entwaza y’ekyanga

 Ni kirungi

Engyendererwaho y’eihanga n’ebindi biragiro ebihandiikirwe

Ngaaha

Eky'okuteisaho:

Q3: Nihabaho ki ku haakuba hariho emitwarize y'abantu y'obuhangwa
etarikwikirizana na Engyendererwaho y’eihanga?

Eky'okuteisaho:

Q4: Noikiriza ku enshonga ezaaheebwa aha ruguru zitungwire enshonga
y'okutunga oburamuzi omu bantu boona?

Q5: Iwe nka memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga, oshangire ki omu kuhwera abantu
b'ekyanga kyawe kutunga oburamuzi?

Hariho akaaro omu Uganda haihi n'esharo ya Uganda na Tanzania. Akaaro ako
kaine purayimare na siniya. Abantu nibeesiima ahabw'okuba nibabaasa
kwohereza abaana baabo kushoma omu siniya kwetungira obwegyese bw'ahaiguru.
Abantu b'omu mwanya ogu n'abooro munonga kandi obumwe n'obumwe abaana
nibabooshesa kwega obwire burikwingana esande, baza kubahweraho aha mirimo
nk’okuhinga. Kandi obundi abaana tibarikuza ah’eishomero ahabw’okuburwa
ebyokurya. Abaana abaingi nibatuura omu kyaro, kandi baine kutambura
orugyendo ruraingwa, nangwa obumwe rurimu akabi, kuza omu katahuni ahu
eishomero riri, ekintu ky'akabi namunonga aha baishiki baba bari bonka.

Omu siniya, abaishiki nibatwara munonga enda. Abashomesa hamwe n'abantu
b'amaani omu ishomero nibo barikutweka abaishiki abo. Eki ku kirikubaho,
abazaire abaingi barahuka kusharaho ngu bashwerwe, kubacwa nainga kubabinga
omu maka gaabo. Abaishiki aba tibarikutunga mugisha gw'okugarukayo omu
ishomero. N'emirundi mikye munonga obu abazaire abamwe bagiire omu
gavumenti y'ekyanga kwetomboita ahabw'ebirikubaho omu ishomero. Obwire
obwingi nibabagira ngu tihaine ekiraakorwe kandi ngu ishomero riine
omugisha kutunga amashomero ago abiri. Obwire bwingi abazaire nibatiina
kuhoora enzigu, banga kuhababa omu Kooti z'Ebyanga kandi bareka n'okuta
abaishiki baabo omu siniya egyo.

Q1: Ni baahi abaine obugabe hamwe n'abaine obujunaanizibwa?

Q2: Nibugabe ki oburikukwatwaho?

Q3: Ni muringo ki omurungi gw'okukora aha nshonga nk'ezi?

Q1: Ahabwenki ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga zirikushabwa kuhikiiriza omutindo
gw'emicwe?

NOTE TO DESIGNER

Natural Justice Facts Applicable Law – Enkoresa y’ebiragiro omu
buringaaniza bw’enzaariranwa

Influences, inducements, pressures, threats – okubeihabeiha
n’okutiinatiinisa.

Private interests – Ebigyendererwa by’abantu buntu

Bias or prejudice based on sex, colour, ethnicity, religion, religion, age,
social or economic status, political opinion, or disability – okugwera
orubaju orikwegamira ediini, enganda, emyaka, obutungi n’ebindi.

Fear, favour , or ill-will – okutiina, okugwera orubanju hamwe
n’okugyenderera kubi abantu.

Decision of Court – encwamu/ensharamu/okuramura kwa kooti

January naatuura omu igomborora rya Kyoma. February ni memba
w'eby'okwerinda w'ekyanga omu igomborora niryo rimwe kandi ni muriraanwa wa
January. Embuzi za February zikeeyiba zaaja omu musiri gwa muhogo ya
January zaagishiisha yoona. February akahikiirira March, memba wa Kooti
y'Ekyanga, yaamugira ngu omushango ku guraije omu kooti, ashare gye
February abe niwe yaagusinga, kitari ekyo, naija kukareeba. Omushango hati
guri omu Kooti y'Ekyanga.

Q1: March akuratire eki February amuragiire?

May ni memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga owaija kuhurira omushango/orubanja.
Yaashanga ba memba ba Kooti abandi hamwe n'ab'omushango bariyo
bamutegyereize. Yaahika akyerereirwe eshaaha ibiri zoona, arikwosya,
aruhire, ahabwokuba yaija naavuga egaari kuruga omu ka ye eri omu kiromita
15. Kwongyerera aha busaasi, emotoka yaamurabaho erikwiruka, omucuucu gwona
gwamweshuka. Aza kureeba areeba omuhababi ari August, amanya ngu eizooba
niriza kurenga. Naamanya August - atwire naamureeba arikutongana n'abataahi
aha kyaro. Eriizooba, naahababira iba, September, orikumanywa aha kyaro.
Okwezi okuhwire ijo, May akaba ari omugyenyi mukuru aha kwiguraho ekishaaha
ky'abaana aha kyaro, eki September hamwe n'ekibiina kye ky'obutegyeki
ekirikumanywa nka 'National Democratic Forum Movement (NDFM), kandi eki
yaagabiire ekyanga. Nk'abandi bagyenyi eryo izooba, May akagyenda na
Tiishaati ya NDFM hamwe n'obucumu. Erizooba, September yaareetera ba memba
ba Kooti y'Ekyanga ecupa z'amaizi, abaazisiima munonga, ahabw'omushana
n'ekyoya ebiriho. May yaatangaara munonga kuhurira ngu August naahababira
September ahabw'okumuteera. Ondiijo memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga amuhwehura
arikugira ngu we naateekateeka ngu September niwe ahababiire August. May
asheka ayesherekire enyima y'ecupa y'amaizi.

Kooti ku yaaba yaatandika kuhurira omushango, enjura etandika kugwa munonga
n'amaizi garaba omu kisasi, gabatoonyorokyera. Ba memba ba Kooti y'Ekyanga
bashoberwa eky'okukora. September agira ekiniga rero agira ngu nabwo
tarikutangaara oku ebintu birikugyenda. Agira ngu tiyaakusiisire bwire bwe
arikwija kuhurikiza ebitahikire omu Kooti y'Ekikwangara (Kooti
y’ekishobobo).

Akaba aine ekiteekateeko ky'okuza aha Kooti y'aha gomborora nainga owa RDC,
boona ni banywani be, kweyihaho engambo zirikumusiisira ekitiinisa.

August atandika kurira ngu okuhoza kugumizemu. Agira ngu kimutwariire bingi
kureeba ngu areesire omushango ogu omu Kooti. "Atwire nanteera kumara
emyaka 10 n'okurengamu, buri mwaka, nikyeyongyera kuba kubi. Naija kunyita!

n'abooro? Enjura obwo neetonyera kimwe kandi neibaati niryenda kurugaho.
September we akyatamirwe kwonka agira ngu baze omu duuka ye, eine
ekishengye kihango enyima eki baakubaasa kukozesa.

Turi bamwe aha batuura gye b’ekyanga. Twine obugabe kwetaba omu nkora za
kooti y’ekyanga, okwihaho yaashutama bwesherekye, kwenda kurinda bamwe aha
bantu, ebintu, ninga enshonga z’abaana

Ndi mukuru w’entebe, kandi naija nkuratiirwe abandi ba memba ba kooti
y’ekyanga bashutami aha nanye.

Omushango ogu nigukwata ahari nyowe; niinye kitabaarizibwa

Nyine amakuru maingi g’okuha aha mushango ogu ndi omujurizi

Nkareeta enshonga egi omu kooti niinye nyina faiyiro y’omushango.

Ndi omuramuzi, niinyikirizibwa omu kooti egi aha mushango ogw’omwana ninga
enshonga y’okuhenda ebiragiro.

Saturday na Anyday nibariranwa omu muruka gwa Kati. Butoosha nibatuura omu
kurwanagana n’entongane ahabwa Saturday kuguma naatahiirira omusiri gwa
Anyday. Nyomwebazyo, barwaniire omu maisho ga One. One nawe yaatebezaho
Two. Anyday atwaire enshonga ye omu kooti y’ekyanga. N’oha kitabaaza na
kitabaarizibwa nk’oku waabireeba.

Q3: Ebaruha z’okwetomboita zishemereire kubiikwa oha kandi nkahi?

Okutabaaza kugyendereire kusetsya, kunyizya kandi tikwiine buhamizo?

Kyaba kiri kityo, kooti neebaasa kwanga kuhurira orubanja oru

Kyaba kitari kityo, kooti neija kugumizamu eguhurire

Kooti eine obushoboorozi kuhurira orubanja?

Yaaba ebwine, egumizemu ehurire omushango

Yaba etabwine egurugyeho reero egwohereze omu b’obushoboorozi abandi

Orubanja ruri omu kooti endiijo?

Yaaba gwahikireyo, kooti y’ekyanga etaguhurira

Gwaba gutakahikireyo, kooti eguhurire

Kwonka shi itwe katutatunga nkoko, nkazikwibaho nta?

Omushaija wangye tabaasize kuba omwesigwa ahari nye. Niinyija kumutwara omu
kooti anshashure.

Akaiba enkoko zangye!

Obuhaburo omu kuronda obwire n’omwanya ogu kooti y’ekyanga eraashutame:

1. Manya ekika ky’abantu abarikuza kutwara ekicweka omu kooti – abakazi,
 abashaija. Ekyokureeberaho kooti yaaba neehurira omushango ogurimu
 omukazi, neija kuteeka teeka aha ky’okugira ngu omukazi aine kukora
 emirimo y’ahaka atakagiire mu kooti. Nahabwekyo nibamwongyeramu akaire.

2. Manya amazooba agu amadiini gatari gamwe na gamwe garikuza aha maramizo.
 Eki nikimanyisa ngu orwakataano, orwamukaaga, na sande n’amazooba
 gagumire kurugiirira aha madiini n’enyikiriza z’abantu.

3. Kooti nebaasa kushutama buri hamwe hoona ekikuru haba hari omu kicweka
 ekyerikutwara. Omwanya ogwatooranwe gwine kwanguhira buri omwe,
 ab’omushango n’abajurizi. Omwe aha bantu abaine omurwa omu mushango yaaba
 aine obumuga, ekyo nakyo kiine kureebwamu omukuronda omwanya.

Seven na Six ni bariraanwa. Omwaka ogwahwaire Six akaguza mushanju sente
emitwaro abiri na mushanju (270,000) kutandika kuguza ebicoori kandi
baikirizana ngu ashashure omu meezi ashatu ateiremu amagoba g’emitwaro
eshatu. Omugisha mubi Seven akashuubura ebihimba kwonka tibiragyenzire gye
esente ez’enguzano zaayanga kurugamu. Hati hahweireho omwaka gumwe Seven
takashashwire Six.

Six bimushobiire , yaatwara omushango omu kooti y’ekyanga, kooti yaashanga
ngu buzima kwe Seven aine kushashura Six emitwaro ye makumi ashatu
(300,000) kwonka kandi n’omworo runuuka. Bamwe aha ba memba ba kooti
baagira ngu Seven aine ekibanja ky’eitaka n’embuzi nshaaju ezi ishe
yaamuragire nahabwekyo bakwatirizeho embuzi Seven baziguze bashashure
eibanja rya Six.

SITATIMENTA Y’ORUBANJA

Otabaariziibwe orubanja rw’okuremwa kuhandiikisa embuzi zaawe bitakarengire
biro ___ (okwezi kwa), 20__, nk’oku ebiragiro by’ekyaro kya Cassava
birikugira.

EBIRI KUKWATA AHA RUBANJA ORU

Aha biro ___ (Okwezi), 20__, buri mutuuragye w’ekyaro kya Cassava akaba
naaragiirwa kuhandiikisa embuzi ze n’abakakiiko k’ekyaro, nk’oku ebiragiro
by’ekyaro eki birikugira. Nitumanya ku oine embuzi 12 (ikumi na ibiri),
kandi ku oremirwe kuzihandiikisa omu kakiiko. Eki nikimanyisa ngu okahenda
ekiragiro ky’ekyaro.

Q3: Okuhandiika enshonga ahabw’enki kooti yaacwamu nk’oku yaakora kiine
mugasho ki?

Ten na Zero baamara emyaka mukaaga (6) omu bushwere. Esaabiiti ehwaire
kirinju omwe areebire Kamukama na muriraanwa we Number barikurwanira
ah’eiziba. Ten abaire naakabukira Number arikumutura okwegaita n’omukazi we
Zero omuby’omubonano. Number ayehakaine ku ataine eki arikumanya aha
nshonga egi. Ebyo bikiri aho, Ten agambiire kirinju w’ekyaro ku yaashangire
siripa ya Number omuka ye. Number uwe naagira ngu ku arikuba atari ha
murimo, aba ari aha kanisa n’omuriisa; ekanisa egyo eine ekitabo
ky’abagyenyi. Ten uwe naagumizamu atabaaza omu kooti y’Ekyanga

arikubaasa kuba omujurizi omu rubanja oru?

kubaasa kukoresibwa nk’ebizibiti?

Mukuru w’entebewa kooti ejurirwamu
Ahari .............................................

Omuntu (Kitabaaza) ku yaakutabaariza ondiijo (Kitabaarizibwa [owaabaire
naavuga pikipiki emanywa nka boodabooda]) arikumwomesereza ngu akacwa
egaari ye, obu bombi baatunga butandu.
Q1: Nincwamu ki ei kitabaaza atari kwikirizibwa kujuriza?

A. Kooti ku yaakugira ngu kitabaarizibwa akacwa egaari ya kitabaaza, reero
ekamuragiira kushashura kitabaaza Shiringi emitwaro ebiri (Shs 20,000).
Kitabaarizibwa ku yaakujuriza ekiragiro kya kooti eki.

B. Kooti ku yaakushanga ngu owaacwire egaari ya kitabaaza tari
kitabaarizibwa; ngu egyo gaari ekacweka obu kitabaaza yaagiteera omu kiina
obwo arikugivuga asinzire. Kitabaaza ku yaakujuriza encwamu ya kooti
eyaarangiriire ku kitabaarizibwa ataine rubanja.

C. Ababiri ku baakwikiriza ngu kitabaarizibwa ashashure Shiringi omutwaro
gumwe (Shs 10,000) z’okukanika egaari ya kitabaaza. Baitu kitabaaza ku
yaakushaba kujuriza omu kooti, obwo agumize ngu okukanika egaari kukatwara
sente nyingi, ngu n’ahabw’ekyo kitabaarizibwa akaba ashemereire kumuha
sente zirengire Shiringi omutwaro gumwe.

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q1: Niryari obu kooti ejurirwamu erikubaasa kucwamu kubinga okujuriza, obwo
etakeetsire abajurizi, nainga etakashutamire?

Jam na Marmalade baine omuhara orikwetwa Pineapple; omwishiki ogu aine
emyaka mushanju (7) y’obukuru. Eizooba rimwe, Pineapple akarwara, yaagira
omushwija mwingi, yaatuutuka kandi yaagira n’omutetemo (ekitengo), hamwe
n’obusaasi omu nyama z’omubiri. Ebi bikamureetera yaagwa kihuumura (yaaza
omu koma). Abutuuragye bakaba nibateeebereza ku Pineapple yaabaire arwaire
omushwija gw’emibu ahabw’okugira ngu eka egi neetuura haihi n’ekisharara.
Eka egi eijwire obukyene kandi akarwariro akari haihiho kari kiromita 11
kuruga ahu bari kutuura. Ahabw’obutagira sente z’okubatwara aha karwariro
aka, abazaire ba Pineapple bakacwamu kuraguriza muhara waabo n’eshaara.
Bakamushabira kumara ebiro bitaano (5), baitu aha kiro kya mukaaga muhara
waabo akaba ari aha ncwamba za rufu. Abatuuragye bakaheereza abazaire ba
Kekirunga sente ezaatwire muhara waabo omu karwariro. N’obu araabe
ataraitsirwe burwaire obu, bukashiisha obwongo bwe. Obw’ahati tarikubaasa
kurya, tarikubaasa kutambura hamwe n’okukora ebindi bintu nk’ebyo.
Ekibuuzo1: Hariho obugabe bwa Pineapple obwaribatireirwe? Ahabw’enki
bwakaatagireirwe?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo3:Heereza emigyenzo n’emitwarize y’enzaarwa eine akabi aha baana.

Coffee n’efaakazi y’emyaka 72; kandi naareeberera abaijukuru bashatu –
abaana b’omuhara. Omwijukuru omukuru, Tea, aine emyaka 13. Coffee arwaire
n’ahabw’ekyo tarikubaasa kukora sente eziraabareeberere. Eki nikireetera
Tea yaaruga omu ishomero kuza kukora omu kirombe ei barikuhondera amabaare
g’okuguza, ekiri haihi nahu barikutuura.

Ekibuuzo 1: Tea n’omwana?

KOOTI Z’EBYANGA TIZIRIKWIKIRIZIBWA KUKOMA ABAANA

Kooti y’Ekyanga teine bushoboorozi kuragiira ku omwana akomwa. (Ekiragiro
kya kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka.49)

N’omurimo gw’abantu b’omu kyanga kutwara enshonga z’okutuntuzibwa,
okunageijura hamwe n’okukaatagiirira obugabe bw’abaana omu ofiisi ya
gavumenti z’ebyanga eri omu kicweka kye. Ofiisi egi eshemereire kukuratira
enshonga egi nk’oku kyashoboororwa aharuguru (Ekiragiro ky’enshonga
z’abaana, Akacweka. 11(1))

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q7: Hariho abantu abashemeire kwenyigira omukurinda obugabe bw’abaana
abatari aha rukarara orw’ayorekwa aharuguru?

Q8: Nokoregana ota n’abantu abaayorekwa aharuguru?

Q9: Ni buremeezi ki obu obugaine omukukoregana nabo kurinda obugabe
bw’abaana?

Q1: Kooti ekakora kurungi omurimo gwayo? Ahabw’enki?

Q2: Noogira ngu kooti ekaba eshemereire kukora ki ebi etarakozire?

Silver n’omwojo w’emyaka 15 kandi tari mu ishomero. Akafeerwa abazaire be
kandi obwahati naareebererwa nyinenkuru orikwetwa Nakityo. Naakora emirimo
ya reijareija ei arikwihamu otusente twokwereeberera hamwe n’omwijukuru.
Eizoobwa rimwe, abantu bakashanga Silver arikwogyera omu kidiba
ky’ebyenyanja eky’omugurusi Ssetubba. Omugurusi akamurabira obutarigaruka
kunaabira omu kidiba kye ky’ebyenyanja. Aho niho Silver yaamurekyereire
amabaare. Nyamugurusi naawe nawe mpaho akairuka yaatabaariza nyamwojo omu
kooti y’Ekyanga.

Q1: Ni manja ki ezi Silver arikuja kwetwa kuhoza?

Q2: Kooti neebaasa kuha kisingwa-orubanja biheneso ki?

Q2: Ni ki ebi kooti erikubaasa kukorera omugurusi Ssetubba?

Orange n’omwojo w’emyaka 13. Mwene-ishe, Ten aine emyaka 11.Kwiha nyinabo
afa emyaka eshatu ehwaire, ababiri bakozire ebishobyo bingi omu kyanga.
Nibarwana, banywa amaarwa kandi baiba ebintu kuruga omu maka n’omu maduuka
g’abashuubuzi. Pooriisi ebakwatsire emirundi mingi kandi yaabarabura.
Enshumi nkye ehwaire, kirinju omwe agambiire ab’obushoboorozi ku enkoko ze
ziibirwe. Abantu boona bateekateekire ku Orange na Ten nibo baibire ezo
nkoko; ekyanga kyona kyabatamirwe. Kirinju mpaho akatabaariza ababiri omu
kooti y’Ekyanga. Ahabw’ebicumuro ebindi ebibaabaire baakozire, kooti
ekasingisa ababiri orubanja. Abatuuragye bakatensa ku abo boojo batwara omu
kihome ky’abaana. Baitu ekyo kihome kiri kiromita 65 kuruga omu kyanga
ekyo, kandi hoona kiri n’omu disiturikiti endiijo. Ahabw’enshonga egi kooti
eragiire ku Orange na Ten batwarwa omu kihome ekiri haihi.

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q1: Ni buremeezi ki obu orikubugana omu kushoboorora enshonga z’eitaka?

Q2: Ni nshonga ki ez’eitaka ezimukizire kubugana? Ezi gumire munonga omuri
ezo ni ziiha?

ENSHONGA Z’OBUSHUURU N;OKUPANGISA ITAKA RYA MAHIRO: Nk’oku kyayorekwa aha
ruguru, omuringo ogwa mahiro nigutaanisa mukama w’eitaka oyehandiikise
hamwe n’abantu abari ah’eitaka (abashengi). Obushuuru n’esente
z’empangisano ezi omushengi (omupangisa) arikushashura mukama w’eitaka.

KOOTI Z’EBYANGA TIZIINE BUSHOBOOROZI AHA NSHONGA EZI: Kooti z’Ebyanga
tiziine bushoboorozi aha nshonga z’eitaka erya mahiro hamwe n’eryo
ery’obutwire; ziine obushoboorozi aha nshonga z’eitaka eriri omukyanga –
kandi erikutegyekwa ebiragiro n’emitwarize y’ekyanga, nk’oku
kiraashoboororwe ahaifo.

Ekibuuzo 10: Abantu abataine bwekoro omu kyanga kyanyu baine obugabe
obukwatiraine n’enshonga z’eitaka nk’oku zaagambwaho?

Purple akaba ashweirwe October, owaafiire omwaka oguhwaire. October akaba
aine ebibanja bingi hamwe n’enju y’eibaati n’omusheenyi. Purple n’iba
bakaba bazaire abaana bataano (5), kandi omukuru n’empangare, Brown,
ow’emyaka 19. Ahanyima y’orufu rwa October, bakuru b’ekika bakashutama omu
rukiiko kugaaniira eby’okuhunguurira omugyenzi. Bakaikirizana ku ekiragiro
ky’Ekyanga kirikugira ngu mutabani wa kifa omukuru niwe arikuteekwa
kuhungura ebintu bye, kandi yaaba ataine mutabani weena, ebintu
bishemereire kutwarwa mwene-ishe wa nyakufa omukuru. Number, mwene-ishe wa
October omukuru, obwahati akwise naabinga Purple n’abahara ah’eitaka.
Mpaho, Purple yairukira omu kooti y’Ekyanga.

Ekibuuzo 1: Nka memba wa kooti y’Ekyanga, okaakoresa ota ekiragiro
ky’Ekyanga eky’enshonga z’eitaka kushoboorora enshonga egi?

 EBIRI OMU KIRAGIRO KY’EITAKA EBIINE AKAKWATE N’ENSHONGA EGI
39. Okuzibira ab’eka okuguza eitaka.
(1) Tihariho muntu weena orikwikirizibwa—
 (a) kuguza, kuhanisa, kupangisa, kufurura, kuraganisa, kusinga,
 eitaka ryona;
 (b) kuza omu ndagaano y’okuguza, kufurura, kuhanisa, kuraganisa,
 kusinga nari okupangisa eitaka ryona; or
 (c) kuhayo eitaka nari kukora ekintu kyona ah’eitaka eryo— eri
 arikutuuraho n’omukazi nari omushaija we, kandi eri barikukoresa
 kwebeisaho, okuhisya yaaheza kutunga ekihandiiko kirikworeka ku
 omukazi we nari omushaija we yaikiriza.

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 11: Kora orukarara rw’obugabe obu abataine bw’ekoro
barikwesiimiramu omu byanga byanyu. Baine obushoboorozi kugira n’okukoresa
eitaka?

EKIKURU OMU KIRAGIRO KY’EITAKA

(Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’eitaka, Akacweka. 39): Ekihandiiko kiri kworeka ku
omukazi nari omushaija yaikiriza nikikuru omu buri kintu ekyaza kukorwa
ah’eitaka ry’eka.

Eleven aine poroti y’eitaka, Poroti A, omukyaro kya Kihungye. Aineho eka
n’omusiri gw’ebicoori kandi niho arikutuura uwe n’omukazi we n’abaana baabo
babiri. Ten naatuura haihi na Eleven aha Poroti B ahu arikutuura wenka;
aineho akaju n’omusiri gw’ebihimba. Ahagati ya poroti ibiri ezi hariho
omuti ogurikuteera emiyembe eine akatare omu kikomera ky’ekyaro. Bombi
nibenda kukoresa ogwo muti kwonka baremirwe kwikirizana mukama w’omuti
n’oha. Mpaho ababiri nibareeta enshonga egi omu kooti y’Ekyaro.

Ekibuuzo 1: Enshonga egi ekaashoboororwa eta kurugiirira aha biragiro
n’emitwarize y’Ekyanga? Ni bibuuzo ki ebikuru ebishemereire kubuuzibwa?

EKY’OKUREEBERAHO 2

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q1: Ni buremeezi ki obu murikushanga omu kucwa emanja z’eitaka?

Q2: Ni manja ki ezi murikukira kutunga? Ni ziiha eziri kubagumira?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 12: Nooteekateeka ngu abantu nibakira kushaba abu bashweraine nabo
orusa, batakagurize nari kukora ekindi kintu aha mataka? N’ahabw’enki kiri
kikuru kushaba ou oshweraine nawe kukuha orusa kugira ekiwaakora ah’eitaka?

Twelve akazaarirwa omu kyaro kya Nyasango. Akatuura n’abazaire be aha
poroti y’eitaka ahu baabaire baine enju, ekitara n’omusiri gw’amagyani.
Hakabaho orugamba omu kyaro kyabo, obwo aine emyaka eshatu (3), reero
yaahungira omu disiturikiti ehereire ey’owaabo. Amazire emyaka 25 atari mu
kyaro kya Nyasango, kandi omu bwire obu nibwo abazaire be baafa. Akagaruka
kutuura aha kibanja ky’abazaire be ahu yaashangire Omw. Obeyo arikutuura
n’eka ye, obwo agumize ati: “Eri n’eitaka ryangye: Niinye mukama waaryo!”
Mpaho Twelve naayeta iwe na memba omwe wa kooti y’Ekyaro abagambira ku
arikwenda kutabaariza Omw. Obeyi omu kooti y’Ekyaro.

Ekibuuzo 1: Egi nshonga ekaashoboororwa eta kurugiirira aha biragiro
n’emitwarize y’ekyanga kyanyu? Twelve naabaasa kugaruka kutonganira eitaka
ry’abazaire be?

Saturday ni muka Thirteen; baamara ameezi 2 gonka omu bushwere. Esaabiiti 2
enyimaho, Thirteen aguzire poroti omukyaro kya Sigawa ahu arikwenda
kwombeka enju. Eky’obusaasi, Thirteen afiire; Saturday hati n’efaakazi.
Mwene-ishe w’omugyenzi, Fourteen, yaaheza kumugambira ku hati niwe mukama
w’eitaka rya mwene-ishe. Saturday, owaagwisibwa kubi ebigambo ebi,
naaguraku Fourteen ku eitaka n’erye obwo agumize ati, “Nshemereire
kuhungura eitaka ry’omushaija wangye!” Mpaho Fourteen yaareeta enshonga omu
kooti y’ekyaro.

Q1: Egi enshonga ekashoboororwa eta kurugiirira aha biragiro n’emitwarize
y’ekyanga?

Omu kugarukanisa abantu:

1. Embaju zombi nizo zirikucwamu.

2. Embaju zombi nizikora hamwe kushoboorora enshonga yaabo.

3. Endagaano neekorwa kurugiirira aha bintu ebi buri rubaju rurikwenda,
 hamwe n’ebyo ebi bombi barikwenda.

4. Enshonga zaabo tizirikukira kuhurirwa omu rwijwire rw’abantu.

5. Embaju zombi zibaasa kuhika aha kukora endagaano omu bwire bukye.

6. Embaju zombi nizisinga orubanja.

Q6: Are any of these realistic? Are any favourable?

Discussion:

Q4: If the mediation is not successful, what is the best situation that
could result for Thomas? What is the worst situation which could result?

 OKWANJURA EKIHANDIIKO EKI

Nyine okushemererwa kuhango kukwanjurira ekitabo ekirikukwata aha kwongyera
amaani omu nkora ya Kooti z'Ebyanga ezirikwetwa "Local Council Courts
(LCC)" omu Rungyereza, ekigyendereire kuhwera ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga
kwetegyereza n'okuta omu nkora ebiragiro ebi bashemereire kumanya.
Okwegyesebwa kwa ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga ni kikuru omu kutunguura
omutindo gw'okukorera aha buringaaniza. Ekitabo eki nikiha ebyokureeberaho
hamwe n'ebintu ebikozirwe ebirikworeka ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga
kwetegyereza enshonga eziri omu byanga byabo, kandi bashareho gye omu
kushoboorora obuteetegyerezana n'okureetaho obusingye/obuteekaana omu
byanga ebyo.

Ekitabo eki kirugire omu kwebuuza hanu na hariya, kwongyerera kuruga omu
mashomo ageegirwe omu mirimo n'okugamba n'abari aha bukiiko bw'emiringo
etari emwe omu gavumenti, n’abu gavumenti erikukwatanisa nabo omu mirimo
y’entunguuka (ba patina) hamwe n'abukirikukwataho. Ekitabo eki kirimu ebi
za Kooti zirabiremu, ebi zeegire hamwe n'oburemeezi obu ziine omu kukora
emirimo yaazo. Ekitabo eki kandi kirimu ebiragiro n'empindahinduka nsya
z’okutwara omu maisho Kooti z'Ebyanga.

Kutunga oburingaaniza n'ekintu kikuru aha bugabe bw'omuntu ekirikutwariramu
kutunga obuheereza, (obw'obukugu hamwe n'oburikureebwa), kwetegyereza
ebiragiro nk'oku birikugyenda, omwanya gw'omuntu arikumara kuhika aha mbuga
z'ebiragiro n'oburingaaniza hamwe n'okubaasa obuheereza (ebishare
ebirikuheebwa), kwonka kiine kutwariramu omutindo gw'obuheereza
oburikutungwa nka kuringaaniza omu kucwa emanja, obwangu bw'emanja
zirikucwerwaho hamwe n'ebyaruga omu kucwa emanja. Kooti z'ebyanga hamwe
n'obuhwezi bw'okuhorereza abatarikwebaasa byona nibigyenderera kureeba ngu
abantu boona baatunga oburingaaniza namunonga abo abatarikwebaasa hamwe
n'abooro omu Uganda.

Ekigyendererwa ekikuru n'okuhwera abantu ba Uganda, namunonga abooro, abari
ahari bugyengye hamwe n'abakazi kwetungira obugabe bwabo, oburingaaniza
kandi batuure omu busingye. Kwenda kwongyera aha birungi ebihikirweho obwo
kirikugyenderera amashomo ageegirwe, ekitabo eki nikyongyera kugyenderera
ngu ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga beetegyereze entunga y'oburingaaniza kandi
bamanye oku burikuhikwaho habone oku baabita omu nkora. Obuhwezi obu kandi
bugyendereire kuhabura abantu b'ebyanga kumanya omugasho n'obujunaanizibwa
bwa Kooti z’Ebyanga.

 Nahabwekyo, abukirikukwataho nibahaburwa kuta ekitabo eki omu nkora
ahabw'okuba nikihwera ba memba ba Kooti y’Ekyanga kumanya kandi bakata
ebirimu omu nkora baaba nibacwa emishango. Kwonka, ekitabo eki kishemereire
kushomwa nainga kugyendera hamwe n'ebihadiiko by'ebiragiro ebya gavumenti
z'ebyanga ekirikwetwa 'Local Goverments Act', hamwe n'ekirikukwata aha
Kooti z'ebyanga ekya 'Local Council Regulations' hamwe n'ebindi biragiro
obwo otaireho n'ebihandiiko ebindi ebiine akakwate n'ebi kwenda kuhika aha
birungi.

Adolf Mwesige
Minisita wa Gavumenti z'Ebyanga

Okwokubanza 2015
 OKUSIIMA
Kukora ekitabo kya boona ekigyendereire kutunguura omutindo gwa Kooti
z'ebyanga kukakuratira enkora eyaakuraatiirwe obu baabaire nibakora ekitabo
ky'okutendeka abatendeki ekyakozirwe ahanyima y'okukora ebintu bingi ebi
ahaifo: enkiiko z'abukirikukwataho, kubuuza abu kirikukwataho, hamwe
n'okushoma ebihandiiko ebindi. Ekitabo eki kyo nikigyenderera ogwo omuntu
wenyini ou kiraahwere - ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga - kandi nikiija kuba
nikikora nk'ekikwato kirikwegyesa kandi eky'okujurizamu reero kibahwere omu
kukora emirimo yaabo ya kooti .

Abo boona abaatumanyiise, abaatairemu obwire bwabo hamwe n'amagyezi omu
kuhandiika n'okushwijuma ekitabo kya Kooti z'Ebyanga, boona nitubasiima.

Minisiture y'Ebyanga neesiima abantu boona hamwe n'ebitongore
ebyagihwereire munonga kukora n'okumariiriza ekitabo eki ekya Kooti
z'Ebyanga.

Okwebaza okw'omutaano nikuza aha kitongore ekirikurwaniirira entegyeka
y’oburingaaniza omu by’obutegyeki ekirikwetwa Democratic Governance
Facility (DGF) abaatuhaire obuhwezi bwa sente obureeteire okukora ekitabo
eki ekya Kooti z'Ebyanga kwabaasika.

Nitwebaza obuhwezi obw'ekikugu obwatuhairwe abakuru aba Minisiture
y'Eby'ebiragiro n'ebya Kinsityushoni, ebindi bitongore by’ebiragiro
n’oburingaaniza ebirikwetwa 'Justice, Law and Order Sector (JLOS),
eitendekyero ry’ebiragiro ery’ensi yoona erya International Law Institute-
African Centre for Legal Excellence (ILI-ACLE), ekitongore ekya baapuriida
abakazi ba Ugandaa ekyetwa Uganda Association of Women Lawyers (FIDA
Uganda), Judicial Service Commission, Judicial Studies Institute, Law
Development Centre, Uganda Law Society, Uganda Law Reform Commission,
ekitongore kya gavumenti z’ebyanga ekya Uganda Local Governments
Association (ULGA) hamwe n’ekitongore ky’endembo ekya Urban Authorities
Association of Uganda (UAAU).'

Ka nyongyere nsiime obuhwezi bw'ebitongore ebirikurwaniirira oburingaaniza
nka: Minisiture y'Enshonga z'Omunda, abaramuzi, ekitongore ky'ebihome,
ekitongore kya Pooriisi, Omuhorereza wa Gavumenti, Minisiture y'eby'ekikura
ky'abantu - Ofiisi y'enshonga z'amaka - hamwe n'ekitongore
ekirikurwaniirira obugabe bw'abantu.

Kwongyerera ahari ebyo, ekitabo eki tikyakuhwaire kuri hatarabaireho
obuhwezi bw'obukugu bw'okukikora n'okukishwijuma oburikuruga omu bakozi ba
gavumenti z’ebyanga omu nshonda zoona.

Kandi nabwo, Minisiture neesiima abakozi baayo ahabw'obukugu bu batairemu
kushwijuma n'okureeba ngu ekihandiiko eki kyakorwa. Nitusiima munonga aba
'Local Councils Development Department' ahabw'omurimo muhango ogu bakozire.

Kantware omugisha ogu kwebaza abeebembezi b'eby’obutegyeki omu Minisiture
hamwe n'aba memba abarikwebembera abakozi ahabw'obuhwezi bwabo.

Ekitabo eki ekya Kooti z'Ebyanga nikiija kukora omurimo muhango omu kuhwera
abarikukora omu za Kooti omu kuramura n'oburingaaniza. Ba memba ba Kooti
y'Ekyanga baaba batendekirwe gye reero bakeeteerana nibaija kukuratira
ebiragiro by'obugabe bw'abantu hamwe n'oburingaaniza omu kuramura abantu
b'ebyanga byabo. Eki nikiijaa kukyendeeza omwijuro gw'emishango aha Kooti
z'aha rurengo rwa disiturikiti, kireeteho empandiika n'embiika gye
y'ebitabo, abatarikwebaasa nk'abaana hamwe n'abakazi batunge oburingaaniza,
kandi kikyendeeza omuhendo gw'abantu abarikujurira ngu baabashariire kubi.

Patrick K. Mutabwire
Oshutami omu Ntebe y’Omuhandiiki w’Entuura
Okwokubanza 2015

 ENSHOBOORORA Y'EBIGAMBO
 Kushoboorora ebigambo bimwe ebikozesiibwe omu kitabo eki

Kitabaarizibwa - Omuntu aine orubanja; ou barikutabaariza omu kooti.

Eiteeka - ekiragiro ekikozirwe kandi kikahinguzibwa eishengyero rya Uganda.

Kuhutaaza (n'ekicumuro) - okuteera omuntu kukarugamu okuhutaara nainga
obuhuta.

Endwano (n'ekicumuro) - Kurwanira omu rwijwire.

Kushaba ekiganyiro/okusaasirwa - Omushobya eki arikugambira ou yaashobeza
ngu amusaasire yaamushobeza.

 Kujuriza - Omuntu ku yaakuba atarikwikirizana n'ebyasharwaho kooti reero
akatabaaza omu kooti erikukiraho arikushaba ngu ebyasharwaho bigarukwemu.

Owaajuriza/Kijuriza - Omuntu atarikwikiriza n'eki kooti yaasharaho,
orikushaba kooti erikukiraho ngu ebyasharwaho bigarukwemu.

Okuteera (Nigucwibwa kitaka)-Omuntu kureetera muntu ondiijo kutiina ngu
naabaasa kumuhutaaza.

Okutiinatiinisa n'okuteera (Nigucwibwa kitaka) - Omuntu yaatiinatiinisa
ondiijo ngu naija kumuhisyaho akabi nainga kutabangura omuntu ondiijo kandi
akagumizamu akamuhisyaho obuhuta.

Eitungo - Ekintu kyona ekirikubaasa kurugwamu sente, ebintu, eitaka,
n'ebintu ebindi.

 Okukwata n’okuguza ebintu- Nikimanyisa ngu ebintu by'omuntu nibitwarwa
kooti kandi ebiguriza omu rweteereine kwihamu sente za kooti hamwe
n'owaasinga orubanja, owaasingwa yaaba atarikubaasa nainga atarikwenda
kuzishashura.

Okubiisya - Eki nikikwata aha manja ezi omuntu omwe arikubiisya ondi ekintu
kye nainga akakimutiiza ahabw’enshonga ei baikirizanaho, reero we ori
akakinageijura.

Ekiragiro ky’ekyanga - ekiragiro ekirikukorwa akakiiko k'ekyaro/ekicweka,
omuruka,woodi, egomborora/tahuni kanso nari diviijoni.

Omwana - Omuntu weena atakahikize myaka 18 y'obukuru.

Orubanja orurikucwibwa kitaka – Emanja ezi owaashobya arikuheereza nari
akakorera ekintu ou yaashobeza.

Ekicumuro - Emanja ezi omuntu arikukora agyendereire kucumura kandi ezi
Gavumenti erikushoboorora erikukoma abantu abo, kubatangisa nainga
kubashashuza sente z’omuringo ogundi gwona.

Omutwe – Omutwe gw’omushango ogutabaaziibwe omu kooti.

Kitabaaza - Omuntu orikutwara okwetomboita kwe omu kooti.

Okukwata/okuteera okwa butoosha – Okukoresa amaani kutiinatiinisa omu
ogyendereire nari otagyendereire. Okuriha – Ekiragiro kya kooti
ekirikuragiira owaasingwa orubanja kushashura owaarusinga esente ezi
afeereirwe nari kumuha ekintu kyona ekirikubaasa kurugamu sente.

Obukugu – Emyoga n’okumanya okuri kuhwera omuntu kukora emirimo ye.

Okwetomboita – omushango oguri kutabaazibwa omu kooti

Endagaano – Okwikirizana okuhandiikirwe nari okw’akanwa ahagati y’embaju
ibiri (2) nari eziri kukiraho, obwo zirikwikirizana ngu rumwe ruheereze
obuheereza nari ekintu ekirikuhanisibwamu sente nari ebindi bintu.

Okuhindura/okwiba – Omuntu okutwara ebintu bitari bye, akabakikoresa, obwo
arikubiima nyinabyo.

Sente y’okufeerereza – Ekiragiro kya kooti ekiri kushaba orubaju rumwe
kushashura sente ezi orubaju orundi rukoraise omu kureeta omushango omu
kooti.

Kibanza- Omuntu ou ondiijo ayegurizeho sente nari ekindi Kintu.

Akacweka ka sente - akacweka kamwe ka sente karimu emitwaro ebiri
(20,000/=) ya Uganda.

Ekiragiro ky’ekyanga ekikuratira emitarize n’ebiragiro byakyo – Emitwarize
y’abantu b’ekyanga erikwikirizibwa nk’ebiragiro omu kyanga ekyo:
Neeyagamira ebyafaayo, emigyenzo hamwe n’ebindi bintu by’enzaarwa
eby’ekyanga ekyo.

Eitaka erikutegyekwa ebiragiro by’ekyanga – Ahu eitaka riri omu mikono
y’ekyanga, nainga oruganda, nari ekika, obwo rikuhwera abantu boona kandi
rikakoresibwa kurugiirira aha biragiro n’emitwarize yaabo.

Eibanja – Omuhendo gwa sente (nari ekintu kyona) oguri kubanzibwa omuntu,
kurugiirira aha ndagaano ekozirwe embaju ibiri (2).

Kibanzibwa – Omuntu arikweguza sente ow’ondiijo (Kibanza).

Okurangiirira – Kooti okurangiirira obugabe bw’embaju zombi, obwo etari
kuha kiragiro.

Okwehayo – Omuntu kukora emirimo ye n’okwehayo. When a person carries out
his/her duties with commitment n’omujinya.

Okushoroora – okutwariza kubi omuntu okuri kwegamira oruganda, erangi,
oburema, enyikiriza, orurengo rw’eby’entaatsya, nari ebindi nk’ebyo.

Baanyin’omwoga – Ebitongore bya Gavumenti hamwe na banywani baayo omu
by’entunguuka abari kuragiirwa kuhisya aha bantu obuheereza hamwe
n’okurinda obugabe bwabo.

Kuta omu nkora- Kukora ekyaragiirwa

Ohubame – ekirikureetwa orubaju rukureeta omu kooti kushagika empoza
yaarwo.

Oburingaaniza - Okutwariza abantu boona omu muringo gumwe.

Emicwe - Ebiragiro by’entwaza ebiri kuhwera abantu kutaanisa ekibi
n’ekirungi; okumanya ekikuru, ekiri kwetengwa nainaga ekiri kwikirizibwa.

Okwetomboita okutarimu nsha –Enshonga etarimu muhoho erikureetwa omu kooti.

Ekiragiro ky'okuhabura omwana - ekiragiro kya kooti ekirikuta omwana
owaashobya omu mikono y'omuntu nainga ekitongore ngu amureeberere kandi
amuhabuure.

Omuhunguzi - Omuntu aine orusa kuheebwa ebintu by’omuntu ahanyima y’ogwo
muntu kufa.

Obwakireereetsi- Burimu obwamaraaya, okuteera zaara, okutabangura
obusingye, okuzeereera, n’ebindi nk’ebyo ebiri kukorerwa omu bantu.

Obutagwera-rubaju - Nikimanyisa omuramuzi kucwamu atarikutiina,
atarikugoberera, nainga okugira eitima. Okwetongora - Nikimanyisa omuramuzi
orikukoresa ebiragiro kutari kutiinisibwa nari kubeihabeihwa kuruga omu
bantu abandi nk'abanyabuzaare, ab'eby'obutegyeki, ebitongore n'abandi.

Emitwarize mirungi- Okuba ow’amazima, okugira emicwe n’okukora ebintu omu
murino gwenyini.

Obushoboorozi- obushoboorozi bwa kooti kuhurira orubanja

Encwamu/ensharaho/mu- Kooti okurangiirira owaasinga n’owaasigwa orubanja.

Ekibanja- poroti y’eitaka

Omuringo gw’okugiramu eitaka (gw’okuba mukama w’eitaka) – Oku abantu buntu,
nari zaaguruupu z’abantu barikuba bakama b’eitaka barikukuratira ebiragiro
n’emitwarize y’ekyanga.

Obushoboorozi bw'ebiragiro - Obushoborozi bw'ebiragiro obu kooti eine
kuhurira nainga kucwa emanja.

Eibanja – Ekintu ky’omuhendo (nka sente) ekirikuheebwa omuntu owaikiriza
kukigaruraho nari kukishashura kurugiirira aha bushonshorokye obu
yaikirizanaho n’omuntu owaakimuheereza.

Okushiisha ebintu nkana- Ekikorwa ky’okushiisha ebintu by’omuntu ondiijo
ekiri kuhenda ebiragiro eki omuntu arikukora ayekundeire.

Minisita – Minisita wa Gavumenti z’Ebyanga.

Minisiture – Minisiture ya Gavumenti z’Ebyanga

Omuntu arikuhorereza omwana – Omuntu orikujwekyera omwana, omurema nari
omuntu weena otarikubaasa kwejwekyera kurungi omu kooti.

Ekiragiro kya kooti – Eki kooti yaaragiira ngu kikorwe.

Ekiragiro kya disiturikiti- Ekiragiro ekikozirwe akakiiko ka disiturikiti.

Orubaju- Omuntu ari omu rubanja – kitabaaza nari kitabaarizibwa.

Nyakutuntuza – Omuntu orikuteeberezibwaho kuba yaakozire ekikorwa kyona
ekiine akakwate n’obutabanguko bw’omu maka.

Entwaza nungi – Kukora nk’oku entwaza n’ebiragiro by’ekyanga birikuragiira.

Obwamaraaya – Okwegaita n’omuntu omu by’omubonano ahabwa sente.

Koramu– omubaro gw’anatu abashemereire kuba bari omu kooti yaaza kutandika
kuhurira orubanja.
Okugarukanisa – Okugaruraho enkoragana nungi n’omukago ahagati y’embaju
ezibaire zigizire obutaikirizana.

Ekiheneso – Eki kooti erikucwamu ngu owaasingwa orubanja akore; ekiri
kuhebwa owaasinga orubanja kumushemeza.

Okugaruzaho – Kooti okushaba owaasingwa orubanja kugaruraho ebintu bya
kitabaaza nari okumugarura omu mbeera ei yaabaire arimu orubanja
rutakabaireho.
Abaine obugabe – Baamemba b’ekyanga abaine obugabe kushaba baanyin’emyoga
kubaheereza abantu b’ekyanga obuheereza.
Okushashurira ebya mageyendo – Okushashurira ebintu n’obuheereza
ebitarabire mumateeka.
Omwanya ogu kooti eineho obushoboorozi – Obushoboorozi bwa kooti kuhurira
emanja eziri omu kicweka eki erimu.
Obushuma – Okutwara ekitari kyawe, obwo mukama waakyo atakwikireize, kandi
otarikwenda kukigaruza.
Okucwekanisa (orubanja orushoboororwa emitango) - Omuntu okutaaha omu
eitaka ry’ondiijo, nari okuteganisa eihoreere ry’ondiijo, okushemererwa
hamwe n’okuremesa omuntu kuba mukama w’eitaka.
Okucwekanisa (Ekicumuro)- Okutaaha omu Kintu ky’omuntu, akwikiriize nari
kwanga kushohora ahanyima y’obwire bw’okuba omu Kintu ekyo bwahwayo, obwo
ogyendereire kucumura, kutiinatiinisa, kujuma nari kugwisa kubi omuntu.
Okwetomboita okutarimu muhoho - Enshonga etaine buhamizo ereetsirwe omu
kooti.
Orubanja orugyendereire kugwisa kubi kwonka – Enshonga erikureetwa omu
kooti, baitu egyendereire kuteganisa n’okunyiizya omuntu.
Ohutaaziibwe – Omuntu otungire obuhuta, nari okukorwa kubi kwona, okurugire
omu rubanja nari akatabanguko koona.
Omujurizi – Omuntu orikumanya ebiri kukwata aha rubanja oruri omu kooti.
 ENTURUKIIRIRO

Ekitabo eki kikozirwe kuhwera ba memba b'akakiiko ka Kooti y'Ekyanga
kutunga obukugu kuruga omu kutendekwa. Ekitabo kigyendereire kuhangusya aha
nkora y'okwetongora ei Uganda eteireho kuha ab'akakiiko ka Kooti y'Ekyanga
obukugu bw'okushara emanja omu buringaaniza.

Ekitabo eki kirimu emitwe ikumi yoona hamwe. Omutwe gw'okubanja gurimu
ebirikukwata aha Gavumenti ya Uganda, enkora y'okwetongora, omurimo gwa
Kooti z'Ebyanga omu kushara emishango n'oburingaaniza, hamwe n'ebiragiro
ebirikutegyeka Kooti z'Ebyanga. Omutwe gwa kabiri niguhwera boona
abarikwejumbira omu murimo ogu kwetegyereza obugabe bw'abantu – ahu
burikuruga, ahabwenki bwine omugasho kandi oku bushemereire kutwazibwa
ab'akakiiko ka Kooti z'Ebyanga baaba nibasharaho eky'aha muheru. Omutwe gwa
kashatu nigushoboorora aha bikwatiraine n'emitwarize y'abanyabiragiro,
erikushoboorora aha bukuru bwayo kandi oku eshemereire kuteebwa omu nkora
Kooti z'Ebyanga omu kukozesa obujunaaniza bu babahaire omu mateeka. Omutwe
gwa kana n'ogwa kataano nibyanjurira abashomi b'ekitabo eki ebyetengo
n'entwaza eteirweho omu kiragiro ekirikutegyeka Kooti z'Ebyanga omu muringo
gurikubooreka ahabwenki entwaza egi erikwetaagisa kutari kufa kukwata
amateeka omu mutwe. Omutwe gwa mukaaga n'ogwa mushanju neeha abashomi
obujunaanizibwa bwa Kooti z'Ebyanga ahansi y'eiteeka ry'Obutabanguko
bw'Omumaka eririkwetwa 'Domestic Violence Act' hamwe n'ery'abaana
eririkwetwa 'Children Act'. Omutwe gwa munaana nigushoboororera abashomi
aha bujunaanizibwa bwa Kooti z'Ebyanga omu kushoboorora obutaikirizana
obwakubaho omu nshonga z'eitaka ery'oburagwa/er’ensikirano. Omutwe gwa
mwenda niguha ab'akakiiko ebikwato by'okushoboorora obutaikirizana
oburikubarukaho nk'omuringo gw'okuhweraho za kooti. Ekitabo nikihendera
n'omutwe gw'eikumi ogurikuha ekyokureeberaho kya Kooti y'Ekyanga
ekirikworeka omuhanda gw'okuta ebyayegwa omu mitwe eyaashoboororwa aha
nyimaho omu nkora barikugyendera aha mateeka ga Kooti y'Ekyanga. Ebyo
byona obitaireho, ekitabo kikuru ky'okujuriramu ni Konsityushoni ya Uganda,
Eiteeka rya Gavumenti z'Ebyanga, Eiteeka rya Kooti y'Ekyanga, ebiragiro bya
Kooti z'Ebyanga hamwe n'endagiiriro ya Kooti z'Ebyanga.

Buri kicweka kikozirwe omu muringo gw'okuhwera abashomi kwetegyereza n'oku
baakubaasa kukozesa ebi baayega omu mirimo yaabo nka ba memba ba Kooti
y'Ekyanga. Kwenda kutungamu akarungi omu puroguraamu egi, abagirimu
bashemereire boorekye eki baakubaasa kuba bataayetegyereza ahabw'okuba ekyo
nikiija kureetaho okwega n'okubagana ebyayegwa.

Nk'oku kirikworekwa omu Eiteeka rya Kooti y'Ekyanga erya 2006, Kooti
z'Ebyanga "obutatwara bukugu bw'ebiragiro n'okubigyenderaho makushu" omu
kuhuurira n'okushara emishanga/enshonga. Nahabwekyo, ekigyendererwa
tikwenda ngu ba memba ba Kooti bamare gakwata ebiragiro makushu, kwihaho,
kureeba ngu nibeetegyereza ahabwenki ebiragiro ebimwe nibikora, ni bugabe
ki obu ebiragiro ebi biine kuba nibarinda, kandi ni nkahi ahu baakubaasa
okumanyisibwa omu kitabo ahu baakubaasa kujuriza.

|ENTURUKIRIRO Y'AMATAAGI GA |Gavumenti ya Uganda erimu ebicweka/amataagi |
|GAVUMENTI YA uGANDA |ashatu: |

| |EITAAGI ERIRIKUKORA AMATEEKA; na |
| |EITAAGI ERIRIKUTA AMATEEKA OMU NKORA . |
|EITAAGI ERIRIKUTEGYEKA |Eitaagi eririkutegyeka niryebemberwa |
| |omwebembezi w'eihanga rya Uganda orikukora |
| |nka mukuru w'eihanga rya Uganda kandi agaruka|
| |akora nka omuduumizi w'amahe. |
| | |
| |Eitaagi eri niryorekyerera kandi ritegyeka |
| |emirimo ya gavumenti. Purezidenti niwe |
| |arikutaho orukiiko rukuru orurikwetwa |
| |Kabineti, orurimu ba minisita hamwe |
| |n'omuhorereza wa gavumenti. Kabineti niyo |
| |erikukora ebiragiro omu iziina rya gavumenti;|
| |neekora n’endiijo mirimo nk'oku ebiragiro |
| |birikugira. |
| | |
| |Emirimo y'eitaagi eri emingi neekorwa |
| |ebitongore ebindi biingi bya gavumenti |
| |nk'ekitongore ekirikureeberera abakozi |
| |b'eihanga, akakiiko k'oby'obwegyese, akakiiko|
| |k'eby'amagara hamwe n'akakiiko k'ebiragiro, |
| |akarikutaho kandi kakafubira abakozi ba |
| |gavumenti. Abakozi ba gavumenti abarikukora |
| |omuri buri minisiture nibataho kandi bata omu|
| |nkora ebiragiro. |
|EISHENGYERO |Omurimo mukuru gw'eishengyero n’okukora |
| |amateeka/ebiragiro ahari buri kintu kyona |
| |ky'obusingye, obutebeekana, entunguuka hamwe |
| |n'obwebembezi burungi omu Uganda. Eishengyero|
| |riine obujunaanizibwa bw'okurinda |
| |Konsityushoni ya Uganda n'okwongyera amaani |
| |omu ntegyeka ekuratira eky’abaingi |
| |(demokurase). Eishengyero niryetegyereza, |
| |riteisa kandi rishwijuma ebiteiso ebyanjwirwe|
| |kandi ebitakahinguziibwe nk'amateeka. |
| | |
| |Eishengyero rya Uganda ririmu abajwekyerwa |
| |kuruga omu nshoda zoona otairemu za |
| |disiturikiti, ebicweka ebindi, abakazi, |
| |amahe, abakozi, eminyeeto hamwe naabo abaine |
| |oburema aha mibiri yaabo. |
| | |
| |Omuhwezi w'Omwebembezi w'eihanga hamwe na ba |
| |minisita abatari bajwekyerwa nibaza omu |
| |ishengyero nk'abaikiriziibwe abarikubaasa |
| |kuza omu ishengyero kwonka tibaine rusa |
| |rw'okuteera akaruuru haaba hariho enshonga |
| |y'okusharaho. |
| |Obumwe n'obumwe, eishengyero niribaasa, obwo |
| |ririkugyendera aha biragiro, rihe |
| |obujunaazibwa bw'okukora ebiragiro, abandi |
| |beebembezi nka minisita, n'ebindi bitongore |
| |by'ebyanga. |
| | |
| |Ekyokureeberaho, Eiteeka rya gavumenti |
| |z’ebyanga niriha obukiiko bwa disiturikiti |
| |obushoboorozi kukora ebiragiro byabo |
| |(ebiragiro byabo nkabo omu disiturikiti egyo)|
| |kandi n'obukiiko obw'ahansi yaayo nabwo |
| |kukora ebiragiro ebyabo ebirikwetwa bye-laws |
| |(ebi n'ebiragiro ebirikukora omu byanga |
| |by'aha kyaro. Ebiragiro ebyo byona |
| |bishemereire kuba nibiikirizana na |
| |Konstityushoni ya Uganda nainga ekiragiro |
| |kyona eky'aha rurengo rw'eihanga. |
|EITAAGI RY'EBIRAGIRO |Eitaagi eri rikozirwe embuga |
| |z'amateeka/ebiragiro eririkushoboorora |
| |obutaikirizana ahagati y'abantu, ebitongore |
| |hamwe na gavumenti. Eitaagi eri |
| |nirishoboorora kandi rita omu nkora |
| |Konsityushoni ya Uganda hamwe n'ebinddi |
| |biragiro. |
| | |
| |Eitaagi ry'ebiragiro eri nirigaruka |
| |rireeberera Kooti z'Ebyanga. Okujurira Kooti |
| |y'Ekyanga nikimanyisa kuza aha Kooti y'aha |
| |rurengo rwa disiturikiti eya Magyesitureeti. |
|ENKORA Y'OKUHA OBUSHOBOOROZI|Kuruga 1992, gavumenti ya Uganda, erikurabira|
|BUMWE GAVUMENTI Z'EBYANGA |omu Minisiture ya gavumenti z’ebyanga, etwire|
|OMU Uganda |neetwara omu maisho enkora ya |
| |'decentralisation' ahu obushoboorozi bwa |
| |gavumenti ya rwagati obukwatiraine |
| |n'enkurakurana, enteekateeka, kubaasa |
| |eby'esente, hamwe n'okukora emirimo |
| |y'obutoosha hamwe n'okusharaho aha nshonga |
| |z'ebiragiro n'obuheereza bikagaruka aha |
| |gavumenti z’ebyanga ezi abantu beetooraniire.|
| | |
| |Obushoboorozi obu Minisiture ya gavumenti |
| |z’ebyanga nk'oku buri omu kacweka ka 95-98 |
| |omu iteeka rya gavumenti z’ebyanga (cap. 243)|
| |butwariiremu, n'obu buraabe butarikukoma aho:|
| |kukwataganisa, obuhwezi, kureeberera, kuha |
| |obuhwezi bw'obukugu, omu gavumenti z’ebyanga |
| |zoona omu ihanga. |
| | |
| |Ebirungi ebiri omu kuha obushoboorozi bumwe |
| |gavumenti z'ebyanga |
| |Ebirungi ebirimu n'ebi ahaifo: |
| |Kuheebwa obushoboorozi nikikyendeeza |
| |oburemeezi obu gavumenti ya rwagati erikuba |
| |eyekoreire bw'okuhisya obuhereza haihi |
| |n'abantu, ekyo kigiha obwire bw'okuta amaani |
| |aha nshonga ezindi z'okukora ebiragiro |
| |by'eihanga, enteekateeka hamwe n'okutaho |
| |omutindo. |
| | |
| |Kugarura obushoboorozi omu gavumenti |
| |z'ebyanga nikiha omugisha abantu ba Ugandda |
| |kwejumbira omu nteekateeka, n'okusharaho aha |
| |rurengo rw'ekyanga. |
| |Nikyongyera kihwera abantu kutunga obuheereza|
| |haihi nabo ahabw'okuba abarikuheereza nibaba |
| |nibakorera omu byanga ahu abantu barikutuura.|
| | |
| |Obushoboorozi bumwe omu gavumenti z'ebyanga |
| |nibuha omugisha ebibiina by'abantu ebimwe |
| |nk'abakazi, eminyeeto, abantu abaine oburema |
| |aha mibiri yaabo, abagurusi n'abakaikuru |
| |kwejumbira omu kusharaho aha nshonga |
| |ezirikubakwataho. |
|OMURIMO GWA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA |Ebyafaayo bya Kooti z'Ebyanga |
|OMU KUKORA OBURINGAANIZA | |
| |Omu bwire bw'ekishaka/bw'orutaro orwa |
| |'National Resistance Movement (NRM) orwa |
| |(1981-1986) ebicweka ebi abaheekyera baabaire|
| |bahamba, bakaba batamu obukiiko bwa |
| |Rwangisiriza oburikwetwa Resistance Councils |
| |(RCs). Obukiiko obwo bukaba bwine |
| |obushoboorozi bw'okukorera abantu hamwe |
| |n'okushara emanja omu byanga bi bwabaire |
| |burimu. Gavumenti ya NRM ku yaagiire aha |
| |butegyeki omu gwa 1986, ekateeraho kimwe |
| |ekiragiro ky'obukiiko bwa Rwangisiriza, 1987,|
| |obwateeriirweho kimwe nk'ekiragiro omu ihanga|
| |ryona. Obukiiko bwa Rwangisiriza kuheebwa |
| |obushoboorozi bw'okuramura emishango |
| |bukatongozibwa ekiragiro eky'akakiiko ekya |
| |1988. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga, nk'oku zaizire kumanywa aha |
| |kutongoza Konsityushoni ya Uganda eya 1995 |
| |bukanjurwa burikurugiirira aha nteekateeka |
| |y'oburingaaniza bwa boona hamwe n'enkora ya |
| |demokorase. Kooti z'Ebyanga zikateebwaho |
| |kuhwera oburemeezi oburikushanga n'enkora ya |
| |Kooti eza buriijo. |
|AMAANI GA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA |Amaani ga Kooti z'Ebyanga nigashoboororwa |
| |omuri ebi ahaifo: |
| | |
| |Kooti z'ebyanga ziri haihi n'abantu ba |
| |buriijo. |
| |Aha kyaro/kyanga hamwe n'aha rurengo |
| |rw'omuruka, Kooti z'Ebyanga zishemereire |
| |kuteererwa akaruuru. Nahabwekyo zikoriirwe |
| |kuhikiiriza kandi zikareeba ngu zaakorera |
| |abantu abu zirikuheereza. |
| | |
| |Nabwo, aha rurengo rw'egomborora/tahuni |
| |nainga eishaza/diviijoni Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |nizirondwa bakuru b'obukiiko bwabo omu |
| |magomborora/tahuni/masaza nahabwekyo |
| |nibajunaanwa abantu abu barikuheereza. |
| | |
| |Ahabw'okugira ngu ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga|
| |nibatuura n'abantu omu byanga byabo, |
| |nibeetegyereza enshonga n'oburemeezi |
| |bw'abantu hamwe naabo abarikukoresa za Kooti.|
| | |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nizitwaza mpora kandi |
| |nizikozesa orurimi rw'enzaarwa oru abantu |
| |b'ekyanga barikwetegyereza kurungi. |
| |Omuhendo gw'esente gw'okureeta omushango omu |
| |Kooti y'Ekyanga ni mukye wagyeragyeranisa |
| |n'ogwa kooti ezindi. |
| | |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nizigyezaho kugarukanisa |
| |abantu obwo zirikushoboorora enshonga zaabo |
| |zireetaho obutebeekana kutari kureeka abantu |
| |bakareebana barikworeka obwangani omu kooti. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nizihurira kandi zishara |
| |emishango juba wagyeragyeranisa na kooti |
| |ezindi nk'eza haidaara rya disiturikiti. |
|Oburemeezi bwa kooti |Oburemeezi obukuru bwa za Kooti z'Ebyanga |
|z'ebyanga |nibushoboororwa ahaifo: |
| | |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga abamwe tibeegire |
| |kurungi. Nahabwekyo, baine obuzibu omu |
| |kushoma n'okuhandiika. |
| |Ba memba abamwe tibarikumanya ebiragiro n'obu|
| |byakuba ebirikutandikirwaho nangwa n'omurimo |
| |gwabo hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa tibarikubimanya|
| |nk'oku birikurambikwa gye omu biragiro. |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti y'Ekyanga obumwe n'obumwe |
| |nibashara emishango etari yaabo nari shi ei |
| |bataineho bushoboorozi nk'okutoroboza obwana |
| |buto. |
| | |
| |Obwire obwingi, ba memba ba Kooti y'ekyanga |
| |tibaine nari shi tibarikutunga Konsityushoni,|
| |Eiteeka ry'Ekyanga erya 2006, Ebiragiro |
| |by'ekyanga ebya 2007 hamwe n'ebindi |
| |bihandiiko by'omugasho. |
| | |
| |Okusharaho/kucwamu kwa Kooti z'Ebyanga obwire|
| |obwingi tikurikugyenderera bugabe bw'abakazi,|
| |obw'abaana, abantu abaine oburema aha mibiri |
| |yaabo hamwe n'abakaikuru n'abagurusi nk'oku |
| |kirikurambikwa omuri Konsityushoni y'eihanga.|
| | |
| | |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga abamwe nibarya |
| |ebituga. Kandi obundi n'obu baakusharira aha |
| |mazima, abantu abamwe nibabaasa kugira ngu |
| |bariire ebituga. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga obumwe tizirikumanya kubiika |
| |bihandiiko by'emishango kurungi, |
| |ekirikureetaho oburemeezi omu kujuriza. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga obumwe n'obumwe nizitunga |
| |oburemeezi kuta omu nkora eki zishazireho. |
|EBIRAGIRO EBI KOOTI | |
|Z'EBYANGA ZISHEMEREIRE | |
|KUKORERAHO | |
|KONSITYUSHONI YA Uganda |Konsityushoni niyo Ishe-biragiro nkuru omu |
| |Uganda. Eki kimanyisa ngu buri biragiro byona|
| |ebirikuza aheeru ya Konsityushoni ni busha. |
| |Konsityushoni niyo mpagi ahu buri eitaagi |
| |ry'ekiragiro ryona ririkuruga. Konsityushoni|
| |einemu ekiragiro ky'okutaho Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |nka kimwe ahari ebyo ebiri omu nk'ora y'okuha|
| |obushoboorozi ebyanga. Ekicweka 129(1) ekya |
| |Konsityushoni nikishoboorora ahari zaakooti |
| |eziri ahansi ya Kooti enkuru, Kooti |
| |ey'okujurizamu hamwe na Kooti y’enshonga za |
| |Konsityushoni. Okutaho Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |n'okuhikiiriza ebiri omu Konsityushoni ngu |
| |abantu ba Uganda baine kwejumbira omu |
| |kukorerera oburingaaniza. Ekicweka 126(1) |
| |ekya Konsityushoni nikigira ngu: |
| |“Obushoboorozi bw'amateeka niburuga omu bantu|
| |kandi nibuza kukorwa za kooti eziraabe |
| |zitairweho Konsityushoni egi omu iziina |
| |ry'abantu. Nibuza kugyendera aha biragiro, |
| |emicwe n'enteekateeka y'abantu. |
|Eiteeka rya kooti y'ekyanga |Eiteeka erya Kooti y'Ekyanga erya 2006 niriha|
|erya, 2006 |Kooti z'Ebyanga obushoboorozi bw'okuhurira |
| |n'okushoboorora enshonga/emishango eya |
| |kitaka. |
|EBIRAGIRO BYA KOOTI |Ebiragiro bya Kooti z'Ebyanga zikateebwaho |
|Z'EBYANGA EBYA, 2007 |omu gwa 2007 kushoboorora gye oku Eiteeka rya|
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga riraakore. |
|EITEEKA ERIRIKUKWATA AHA |Eiteeka eri niriha abakakiiko k'ekyanga aka |
|BAANA |LC obushoboorozi bw'okurinda hamwe |
|(Cap. 59) |n'okutunguura obugabe n'embeera nungi |
| |y'abaana. Nirigaruka riha za Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |obushoboorozi by'okuhurira n'okushara |
| |emishango ekozirwe abaana. |
|Eiteeka rya gavumenti |Eiteeka rya gavumenti z'ebyanga |
|z'ebyanga (Cap. 243) |nirishoboorora aha ndengo z'ab'obukiiko |
| |bw'ebyanga (LCs) hamwe n'oku burikukorwa |
| |hamwe n'abashemereire kubamu. |
|EITEEKA RY'OBUHEEREZA BW'AHA|Eiteeka eri niriikiriza Kooti z'Ebyanga kuha |
|KYANGA |omurimo, gwa burungi bwa nsi, omuntu ori omu |
|(Cap. 115) |nshobi etari mpango. |
| |Eiteeka ry'obutabanguko bw'omu maka niriha |
|EITEEKA RY'OBUTABANGUKO |Kooti z'Ebyanga obushoboorozi bw'okuhurira |
|BW'OMU MAKA ERYA, 2010 |emishango egyo kandi rirambika emihanda eki |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga ziine kurabamu, kugihurira |
| |n'okugishara. |
|EITEEKA RY'EITAKA |Eiteeka ry'eitaka niriha Kooti y'Ekyanga |
|(Cap. 227) |ey'aha muruka/waadi obushoboorozi |
| |bw'okuhuurira n'okusharaho obutaikirizana |
| |oburikurugiirira aha itaka |
| |ery’empungurano/ensikirano. (Kiine kumanywa |
| |ngu eki nikitaana aha iteeka rya Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga eririkugira ngu Kooti z'Ebyanga aha|
| |rurengo rw'ekyaro/seeru ziine kubanza |
| |zaahurira buri mushango gwona oguri omu |
| |kyaro, otaireho n'emishango ey'eitaka |
| |ry'empungurano). |

|ENDUGIIRIRO |Eiteeka ry'obugabe bw'abantu ery'ensi yoona |
| |(eri Uganda etaireho omukono) niririnda |
| |obugabe bw'abantu boona ahabw'okugira ngu |
| |n'abantu. Obugabe obu nibworekwa omu |
| |Konsityushoni ya Uganda aha mutwe gwa 4. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nizishabwa nk'eiteeka kuta |

| | |
| |Obugabe bw'abantu n'enki? |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw'abantu nibwo bugabe obu abantu |
| |boona bashemereire kuheebwa bo nk'abantu. |
| |Obugabe obu tiburikutuheebwa muntu weena |
| |kwihaho tubwine ahabw'okugira ngu turi |
| |abantu, otatairemu: eihanga eri omuntu |
| |arikurugamu, yaaba n'omushaija nainga |
|AMAKURU G'OBUGABE BW'ABANTU|omukazi, obukomooko bwe, oruganda rwe, |
| |ediini, orurimi, yaaba n'omugaiga nainga |
| |omworo nangwa n'ekitiinisa eki aine. Obugabe |
| |obu nigwo mutima gw'obuntu bwaitu. Eki nikyo |
| |kirikumanyisa twaba nitugira ngu |
| |nibuzaariranwa/n'obw'enzaarwa. Bwine |
| |akakwate kahango n'ebyetaago by'omuntu |
| |ebikuru omu magara g'ensi, obugabe hamwe |
| |n'ekitiinisa - kandi nirikora aha bantu hamwe|
| |n'aha bibiina. |

|OBUGABE BW'ABANTU OMU |Obugabe bw'abantu buri aha mutwe gwa 4 omu |
|kONSITYUSHONI YA uGANDA |Konsityushoni. Omutwe ogu kandi nigumanywa |
| |nka ekirangiiriro ky'obugabe. |
| | |
| |Akacweka ka 20 aka Konsityushoni, kandi niko |
| |kacweka k'okubanza aha mutwe gwa 4 nikagira |
| |kati: |
| | |
| |20. Obugabe bw'abantu obukuru obugabe. |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw'omuntu obukuru n'obw'enzaarwa |
| |kandi tiburikuheebwa eihanga. |
| |Obugabe bw'omuntu hamwe n'ebibiina oburi omu |
| |mutwe ogu nibwija kuheebwa ekitiinisa, |
| |burindwe kandi butunguurwe ebitongore byona |
| |bya gavumenti hamwe n'abantu boona. |
|Ekirangiriro ky'obugabe |Konsityushoni neehamya obugabe bw'abantu |
|bw'abantu |boona omu Uganda. Obugabe obu |
| |n'obw'obuzaariranwa nk'oku kirikushoboororwa |
| |omu mutwe 4 omu Konsityushoni. Bwine kuheebwa|
| |ekitiinisa, burindwe kandi butunguurwe |
| |ebitongore byona bya gavumenti hamwe n'abantu|
| |boona. |
| |Konsityushoni neegira ngu abantu boona |
| |nibaingana omu biragiro, kandi baine kurindwa|
| |ebiragiro omu muringo nigwo gumwe. Kutwariza |
| |abantu omu miringo etarikushushana - |
| |nk'okubashoshora kurugiirira aha: nkura |
| |yaabo, rangi, ruganda, burugo, nyikiriza |
| |nainga ediini; oku beemereire omu bya sente, |
| |ebibiina by'obutegyeki, nainga oburema aha |
| |mibiri yaabo, tikirikwikirizibwa. |
| |Konsityushoni ya Uganda, Akacweka ka 21). |

|EMIRINGO Y'OBUGABE |Konsityushoni yo neegamba aha bugabe bwona |
|BW'ABANTU |hamwe n'obw'obutegyeki kandi egaruka egamba |
| |aha bugabe bw'eby'entaatsya, entuura hamwe |
| |n'entwaza. Neegaruka egamba aha bugabe bw'abo|
| |abatarikwebaasa. Omu bugabe bwona obwagambwa |
| |aha ruguru, tihariho oburikukira bugyenzi |
| |bwabwo; nangwa obwingi bwine akakwate kandi |
| |nibukorengana. Ekyokureeberaho, nikibaasika |
| |kugira obugabe bw'amagara marungi |
| |otarikutunga bujanjabi? Omuntu naabaasa |
| |kugira amagara marungi ataine by'okurya? |

|Eiteeka ry'oburingaaniza |EITEEKA RY'OBURINGAANIZA NIRYO ITEEKA |

| |Omu mikorere yoona, Kooti z'Ebyanga |

|EBIRAGIRO EBIRIKUKWATA AHA |Kooti eine kureeba ngu buri rubaju |
|BY'OBUHANGWA N'EMIGYENZO |rwamanyisibwa omu bwire okuhoza |
|Y'ENZAARWA |kutakabaireho. |
| |Memba wa kooti aine akakwate n'omushango |
| |taine kuba ari omwe ahari abo abarikuhurira |
| |omushango ogwo. |
| |(Eiteeka rya Kooti z'Ebyanga erya 2006, |
| |Akacweka ka 24) |
| | |
| |Konsityushoni neeha obugabe abanya Uganda |
| |boona kukora emigyenzo yaabo y'obuhangwa omu |
| |byanga byabo. (Konsityushoni ya Uganda, |
| |Akacweka ka 37). Kwonka neegaruka egira ngu |
| |tihariho mugyenzo gwona gw'obuhangwa oguri |
| |ahaiguru ya Konsityushoni hamwe n'ebindi |
| |biragiro kukorerwa omu Uganda. |

| |ahaifo, Kooti z'Ebyanga zishemereire kuta omu|
| |nkora ekiragiro kirikukwata aha migyenzo |
| |y'obuhangwa zirikugyendera aha Konsityushoni |
| |hamwe n'ebiragiro ebindi. |

|N'OHA OSHEMEREIRE KURINDA |Buri omwe. |
|OBUGABE BW'ABANTU? | |
| |Kwihaho, gavumenti hamwe n'ebitongore byayo |
| |otairemu Kooti z'Ebyanga, biine |
| |obujunaanizibwa bw'okurinda obugabe kandi |
| |nibimanywa nka bya Njunaanizibwa. Biine |
| |obujunaanizibwa kuha ekitiinisa n'okurinda |
| |kandi n'okuhikiiriza obugabe bw'abantu hamwe |
| |n'ebibiina ebiraabe nibibashaba. |
| | |
| |Omu bugufu, Kooti z'Ebyanga ziine |
| |obujunaanizibwa bw'okuha ekitiinisa, kurinda |
| |hamwe n'okutunguura obugabe bw'abo boona |
| |abarikubaijaho - omu muringo ogu |
| |barikutwazamu emishango yaabo, okugihurira |
| |n'oku barikutwaza enshonga hamwe |
| |n'okubarikutwaza abantu abaabaijaho omu |
| |nsharaho yaabo. Ba memba ba Kooti y'Ekyanga |
| |baine kuba nibamanya ni bugabe ki obu abantu |
| |baine kuheebwa nainga obu baakubaasa kuheebwa|
| |oburikubaasa kuribatiirirwa omu kukora aha |
| |mishango. Bashemereire kuba baine okumanya |
| |abantu abo nainga ebibiina ebyo |
| |ebitarikwebaasa reero bareebe ngu baabikorera|
| |n'oburingaaniza nk'abandi boona ab'aha |
| |kyanga. |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw'abantu n'ebibiina ebiri omu mutwe |
| |ogu nibwija kuheebwa ekitiinisa, burindwe |
| |kandi butunguurwe amataagi hamwe n'ebitongore|
| |byona bya gavumenti kandi n'abantu boona. |
| |(Konsityushoni ya Uganda, Akacweka ka 20 (2) |
| | |
| |Kandi ekindi, baine obujunaanizibwa |
| |bw'okumanyisa abandi ebiri omu Konsityushoni |
| |obwo otaireho n'ekirangiiriro ky'obugabe |
| |bw'abantu. |
| | |
| |Bimwe aha bitongore ebiine obujunaanizibwa |
| |bw'okurinda obugabe bw'abantu omu Uganda |
| |Abeebembezi b'ebyanga (LCs) |
| |Pooriisi |
| |Za kooti z'ebiragiro |
| |Ekitongore kya 'Public Service Commission' |
| |hamwe n'akakiiko k'aha disiturikiti akaine |
| |obujunaanizibwa aha mirimo ya gavumenti (ku |
| |haakubaho omukozi wa gavumenti |
| |orikuribatiirira obugabe bw'abandi). |
| |Ekitongore ekya 'Judicial Service Commission'|
| |(ahabw'abo abarikukora omu by'ebiragiro). |
| |Ekitongore ekya 'Health Service Commission' |
| |(Ahabw'abo abarikukora ahaby'amagara) |
| |Kareebi/karishorisho wa Gavumenti (IGG) |
| |Ekitongore kya 'The Uganda Human Rights |
| |Commission' |

| |(Kushoboorora ebiri omu konsitityushoni hamwe|
| |n'omu kirangiriro ky'obugabe bw'abantu) |

|KUNYWANISA OBUGABE |Ekirangiriro ky'obugabe bw'abanti nikigira |
|BW'ABANTU HAMWE N'EKIGAMBO |kiti: |
|KY'OKUTUNGA OBURINGAANIZA |Abantu boona baine kuheebwa omugisha |
| |gw'okuhurirwa mangu omu buringaaniza omu |
| |maisho ga kooti etaine rubaju ru erikugwera |
| |nainga akakiiko koona akatairweho ebiragiro. |
| |Konsityushoni ya Uganda, Akacweka 28 (1) |
| |Konsityushoni neegaruka egira ngu: |
| |Oburingaaniza bushemereire kukorerwa buri |
| |omwe hatariho kushoshora kurikuga aha |
| |kitiinisa ky'omuntu. |
| |Oburingaaniza/kusharira omuntu tikushemereire|
| |kusiibayo |
| |Abu basiisiire bashemereire kuhongyerwa omu |
| |muringo oguhikire. |
| |Okugarukanisa nikwo kushemereire |
| |kwebembezibwa |
| |Oburingaaniza nibwo bushemereire kukorwa |
| |kutari kuta omutima munonga aha bukugu |
| |bw'ebiragiro. |
| |(Konsityushoni ya Uganda, Akacweka 126 (2)) |
| |Kutunga oburingaaniza omu kuramurwa nikibaho |
| |buri omwe, otaireho n'abatarikwebaasa hamwe |
| |n'abooro, kuronda kandi bakatunga |
| |ekigarukwamu ky'oburingaaniza omu biragiro, |
| |yaaba aine eki afiire na mungyenzi we - |
| |kurikwikirizana n'omutindo gw'obugabe |
| |bw'abantu. |
| |Kutunga oburingaaniza omu kuramurwa ni kikuru|
| |aha bugabe bw'omuntu. |
| |Obugabe bw'abantu niburindwa hamwe |
| |n'okuhikiirizibwa kurugiirira enkora |
| |y'ebiragiro eriho. Kutunga oburingaaniza |
| |nigwo muhanda gw'okuhika aha biheneso hamwe |
| |n’okurihwa. |
|OMURIMO GWA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA|Abantu baingi omu ihanga ryona baine |
|KUHWERA OMU KUTUNGUURA |oburemeezi bw'okutunga oburingaaniza aha |
|ENSHONGA Y'OKUTUNGA |nshonga zaabo z'obutaikirizana, hamwe |
|OBURINGAANIZA OMU KURAMURWA|n'okutunga obuhereza bwa kooti. Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga ziine omurimo muhango gw'okukora |
| |omu kureetaho oburamuzi omu byanga byabo, |
| |namunonga ahari abo abataine kihwera hamwe |
| |n'abooro. |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga tiziri haihi n'abantu kwonka,|
| |kwihaho ziri ahansi kukira kooti ezindi, |
| |nizihurira emishango omu rurimi oru abantu |
| |b'ekyanga barikwetegyereza. Emihanda ei Kooti|
| |z'Ebyanga zirikukozesa zaanguhi kandi |
| |terikutiinisa nka kooti ezindi. Ahabw'okugira|
| |ngu ziri omu kyanga nikyo kimwe, ba memba ba |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga nibakira kuba nibamanya |
| |enshonga nyingi ezi barikushoboorora. |
| |Ebi byona nibyongyera kumanyisa omugasho gwa |
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga omu kwita ekituri ky'okuhisya|
| |oburamuzi aha bantu abaingi abaakubaire |
| |bataine ky'okukora. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|NI BANTU KI ABATAINE |Abataine buhwezi nibo abo abari ahari |
|BUHWEZI KANDI AHABWENKI |bugyengye y'okubeera kimwe kubi munonga |
|BAINE KUFIIBWAHO? |haabaho oburemeezi nainga ebiijiija. Abataine|
| |buhwezi omu mwanya nainga eihanga rimwe |
| |nibataana n'abo ab'omwihanga erindi, n'obu |
| |haraabe hariho abo abari batyo omu myanya |
| |yoona. |
|ENKORA Y'OBUGABE BW'ABANTU |Buri ki ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga |
|EIKIRIZIIBWE |baraakore, n'okukikora barikugyendera aha |
| |mutindo gw'obugabe bw'abantu, barikukita aha |
| |mutindo nk'abaine obujunaanizibwa bw'okurinda|
| |n'okuhikiiriza obujunaanizibwa obwo. Ekyo |
| |nikyo barikweta Enkora y'obugabe bw'abantu. |
| |Ebyashobororwaho ahaifo n'ebiragiro by'enkora|
| |y'obugabe bw'abantu: |
| | |
| |Kwejumbiramu |
| |Buri omwe aine obugabe bw'okwejumbira omu |
| |kusharaho okurikukwata aha bugabe bw'abantu. |
| |Okwejumbiramu tikushemereire kugyemwa, kube |
| |okw'amaani, kandi kwine amakuru, omu muringo |
| |hamwe n'omu rurimi orurikwetegyerezibwa. Abo |
| |boona abarikwija omu Kooti z'Ebyanga baine |
| |obugabe bw'okwejumbira omu kuteisa barikuha |
| |ebiteekateeko byabo. |
| |Ebintu nk'okugarukanisa, ekiri kirungi nangwa|
| |obwire obwingi kwonka ti mu buri mushango |
| |gwona namunonga (ekyokureeberaho emishango |
| |ey'amaani) kushemereire kwejumbiramu abantu |
| |b'embaju zombi reero ekirikurugamu, kiherize |
| |kumanywa ngu, okwikirizana omu muringo ogu |
| |nikuheebwa ekitiinisa. |
| |Obujunaanizibwa |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti y'Ekyanga baine kumanya ngu|
| |baine obujunaanizibwa aha bantu omu byanga |
| |byabo kandi bashemereire kukorera emirimo |
| |yaabo omu rwatu. |
| |Obutashoroora hamwe n'oburingaaniza |
| |Okushoroora omu bantu okwa buri muringo gwona|
| |tikurikwikirizibwa. Omuringo nigwo gumwe, |
| |abatarikwebaasa kureeba ngu obugabe bwabo |
| |bwarindwa kandi bwatungwa kandi |
| |tibaribatirirwa. |
| |Okumanyisibwa kwa abaine kuheebwa obugabe |
| |Abantu b'ekyanga baine kumanya obugabe obu |
| |baine babone kubushaba kyayetaagisa. Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga nizikora kihango aha kureeba ngu |
| |abantu baayetegyereza eki bashemereire |
| |kushaba kurugiirira aha Konsityushoni. |
| |Okwikirizibwa kw'obugabe |
| |Kwikiriza ngu obugabe buri omu mateeka, |
| |n'obwa buri hamwe kandi bwine akakwate |
| |n'ebiragiro by'ensi yoona. Ba memba ba Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga baine kureeba ngu emirimo yaabo |
| |neekwatagana n'obugabe bw'abantu. |

 OMUTWE III
 EMICWE Y'OBURAMUZI EYA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA

|EKIGYENDERERWA KIKURU |Kwanjurira abeetabire omi ishomo enshonga |
| |y'emicwe hamwe n'engyenderwaho y'emitwarize |
| |ebishemereire kukuratirwa Kooti z'Ebyanga omu|
| |kukora emirimo zaazo. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw'eishomo, abaryetabiremu |
| |bashemereire kuba nibamanya: |
| | |
| |Kuha kandi bakashoboorora amakuru n'enkora |
| |yoona y'emicwe. |
| |Kushoboorora emicwe ei bashemereire kugira. |
| |Kuha kandi n'okushoboorora akakwate akari |
| |ahagati y'ebiragiro by'oburamuzi burungi |
| |hamwe n'enkora ya Kooti z'Ebyanga. |
| |Kushoboorora ahabwenki okuta omu nkora |
| |ebiragiro by'emicwe y'oburamuzi ni kikuru |
| |kuhwera za Kooti z'Ekyanga omu kukora |
| |oburamuzi n'okureetaho empinduka omu kyanga. |
| | |
|OBWIRE |ESHAAHA 1 N'EDAKIIKA 30 |
|EBIRIMU |Okwanjura emicwe n'enki |
| |Kwetegyereza ebiragiro by'emicwe y'oburamuzi |
| |Emitwarize mirungi |
| |Engyendererwaho y'emitwarize y'abaramuzi |
| |Obukoryo aha mitwarize mirungi |

|EMICWE N'ENKI? |Emicwe – n’entwaza erikwebembera okusharaho. |
| |(Kutoorana ekihikire aha kigwire; kwihamu |
| |ekirungi aha kibi) Obwengye bwawe kukumanyisa |
| |ekihikire, ekikuru, ekirikwetaagwa kandi |
| |ekirikwikirizibwa. |
| | |
| |N'obu haraabe hariho entaaniso omu micwe |
| |y'amahanga g'emiringo mingi, omu nyikiriza |
| |zitarikushushana, hariho ekicweka kihango omu |
| |birikushushan omu mitwarize ei boona |
| |barikutwazamu: |
| | |
| |Kuha omuntu ekitiinisa kye nk'omuntu |
| |Kumanya n'okuha ekitiinisa obugabe bw'omuntu |
| |Kubingirira oburamuzi |
| |Kufa ahari abo abarikwetaaga obuyambi |
| |Kuta ekitiinisa omu bwesigwa, obutabuzaabuza, |
| |hamwe n'emicwe. |
|OMUTINDO GW'EMITWARIZE OMU| |
|BURAMUZI | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Ahabwenki omutindo gw'emicwe nigwetaagwa omu |
| |byanga:: |
| | |
| |“Turi ekibiina omu kyanga. Turi bakye |
| |abatoorainwe kukora omurimo gw'ekitiinisa. |
| |Nituheebwa emirimo, eizooba aharindi, ngu |
| |tugikore n'obushoboorozi. Omu kukozesa |
| |obushoboorozi obu, kiine eki kirikukora aha |
| |magara gaabo abaine omugisha abarikutwijaho. |
| |Abatuuragye tibakaahamya yaaba bo nainga emigisha|
| |yaabo neija kurugiirira oku twasharamu. |
| |Tibarikushaba ngu obushoboorozi buheebwe ogwo ou |
| |batarikumanya ngu naija kuba omwesigwa, nainga ou|
| |omutindo gw'emicwe ye gutarikwetegyerezibwa. Ni |
| |kikuru munonga ahabw'okutunguura entwaza |
| |y'ebiragiro nk'oku turikugimanya, ngu habeho |
| |omutindo omu ntwaza omu kooti n'aheeru ya kooti, |
| |ekirikuhwera kuta obwesigwa omuri abo |
| |abarikututamu obwesigwa." |
| |Nebya J.B. Thomas, Judicial Ethics in Australia, |
| |Sydney, Law Book Company, 1988, p.7. |
| | |
| | |
| |[pic] |
|Amateeka mukaaga |Amateeka g'emicwe y'oburamuzi agaikirizibwe omu |
|by'entwaza y'oburamuzi |mahanga goona nigo garikukora engyenderwaho |
| |y'entwaza y'oburamuzi omu Uganda. |
| | |
| |Amateeka mukaaga omu ngyenderwaho y'entwaza |
| |y'oburamuzi omu Uganda nigo aga ahaifo: |
| | |
| |Okwetegyeka/Okweshariraho |
| |Obutagwera rubaju |
| |Emitwarize mirungi |
| |Okwetwara gye |
| |Oburingaaniza |
| |Omuzimbwe n'okufayo kukora |
| | |
|Eiteeka 1: OKWETEGYEKA/ |Kooti z'Ebyanga ziine obushoboorozi bw'oburamuzi,|
|OKWESHARIRAHO |nahabwekyo ziine kugyendera aha ngyenderwaho |
| |y'emicwe y'oburamuzi. |
| | |
| |Okwetegyeka nibwo bugabe bw'okweshariraho |
| |hatariho kutaahataahwamu. Okusharaho omu buramuzi|
| |kushemereire kurugiirira aha kwetegyereza |
| |ebiragiro. Tihashemereire kutaahataahwamu |
| |ebirikuruga aheeru nka: |
| | |
| |Kumanywa |
| |Kubaihabaihwa |
| |Kunyangarazibwa |
| |Kutiinatiinisibwa |
| |Kuteganisibwa |
| | |
| | |
| |Abaramuzi bashemereire kusharaho bo bonka |
| |hatariho ekibataahataahiremu n'obu baakuba |
| |bagyenzi baabo n'obu okwebuuza kuraabe |
| |nikwikirizibwa. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|EITEEKA 2: OBUTAGWERA |Oburamuzi tibushemereire kukorwa kwonka, kwihaho |
|RUBAJU |bushemereire kureeba burikukorwa. |
| | |
| |Omuramuzi aine kukora emirimo ye y'oburamuzi |
| |ataine: |
| |Kutiina |
| |Kutugirwa |
| |Kugyenderera |
| |Kugwera orubaju |
| |Obutaringaaniza |
| | |
| |Omuramuzi ashemereire kureeba ngu |
| |emicwe/emitwarize ye omunda nainga aheeru ya |
| |kooti, reero abu arikuramura babone kumutamu |
| |hamwe n'oburamuzi bwona, obwesigye. |
| | |
| |Omuramuzi taine kuhurira omushango ogu okutagwera|
| |rubaju kwe kuraabuuzibweho. Ekyokureeberaho: |
| | |
| |Omuramuzi yaaba aine eki arikumanya ahari bwino |
| |eyareetwa ei barikwanga; nainga |
| |Haaba hariho omuntu w'omuka y'omuramuzi aine |
| |akakwate omu nshonga ei barikufa. |
| | |
| |"Eeka" erimu omukazi, omuzaire, omwana, |
| |omukamwana, omukwe, nainga ondiijo munyabuzaare |
| |weena w'omuramuzi nainga owaakuba naatuura omu ka|
| |ye. |
| | |
| |Akacweka 24(d) ak'eiteeka rya Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |erya 2006 nikagira ngu: “Buri memba wa Kooti |
| |y'Ekyanga aine akakwate, k'omuringo gwona, omu |
| |nshonga erikuhajaanwaho, tarikwikirizibwa |
| |kuhurira omushango ogwo/enshonga ezo. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |

|Eiteeka 3: EMITWARIZE |Emitwarize mirungi nikwo kuba omwesigwa, okaba |
|MIRUNGI |omuntu w'emicwe mirungi kandi ohikiriire. Omu |
| |ngyenderwaho y'emicwe y'oburamuzi harimu |
| |orunyiriri: “Emitwarize mirungi niyo eibaare omu |
| |kukora oburamuzi." |
| | |
| |Nka kikuru omu kurinda emitwarize, omuramuzi |
| |ashemereire kuta ekitiinisa omu ebiragiro |
| |by'eihanga. Omuramuzi aine kukora ekirikubaasika |
| |kureeba ngu yaagira emicwe mirungi kandi kureeba |
| |ngu tiyaajumwa nk'omuntu otaine bwengye. |
| | |
| |Omuramuzi aine kworeka kandi akatunguura |
| |emitwarize y' omutindo gw'ahaiguru. Ashemereire |
| |kuhwera hamwe n'okuha amaani abandi baramuzi |
| |kukuratira omutindo gw'engyenderwaho y'emicwe |
| |y'oburamuzi. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |

| Eiteeka 4: KWETWARA GYE |Okwetwara gye nikimanyisa kugyendera aha mutindo |
| |gw'emicwe n'emitwarize erikwikirizibwa omu bantu |
| |bu ori nabo. Abaramuzi baine kutwaza gye omu |
| |muringo ogurikwikirizana n'ekitiinisa kya ofiisi |
| |y'oburamuzi. Engyenderwaho y'emicwe y'oburamuzi |
| |neeha ebiragiro ebi ahaifo. Abaramuzi |
| |tibashemereire: |
| | |
| |Kukozesa ofiisi yaabo y'oburamuzi |
| |kwekore/kweshabira ebyabo nk'abantu hamwe n'amaka|
| |gaabo. |
| |Kwikiriza ngu habeho enteekateeka ngu omuntu |
| |weena naabaasa kubabeihabeiha aha murimo gwabo. |
| |Kwehisya omuntu weena owaakubaasa kubajoogyesa |
| |kikareka abantu baateekateeka ngu mugwereire |
| |orubaju. |
| |Kucondooza bwino eri omu mushango hatariho rusa |
| |rurikuruga omu biragiro nainga kwikirizana |
| |kw'embaju zombi. Omuramuzi taine kugambira abantu|
| |b'orubaju rumwe hatariho bantu ab'orubaju orundi.|
| |Kwenyigira omu bibiina by'obutegyeki. |
| |Kwikiriza nainga kushaba kimwe ahari ebi ahaifo |
| |(butunu birikurabira omu muntu w'eka nainga |
| |omuntu ondiijo) birikuruga ow'omuntu oine |
| |akakwate n'omushango: |
| |Ekiconco |
| |Oburagwa |
| |Eibanja |
| |Obufura |
| |Obuhwezi |
| |Kwenyigira omu bintu bya sente nainga omuri za |
| |bizinesi ezirikubaasa kutaahataaha omu nkora |
| |nungi y'oburamuzi, nainga ezaakubaasa kwita |
| |eiziina rye kandi obundi zikareka yaagwera |
| |orubaju. |
| | |
| |Kwikiriza kushashurwa ahabw'obuhereza |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga tibashemereire |
| |kubuuza nainga kwikiriza okushashurwa |
| |okw'omuringgo gwona ahabw'obuhereza obu barikuha |
| |nk'oku kirikugambwa aha mutwe IV (Enkora ya Kooti|
| |z'Ebyanga). |

|EITEEKA 5: OBURINGAANIZA |Abantu boona bashemereire kuringanizibwa omu |
| |kurindwa kwa ebiragiro. Oburingaaniza nikimanyisa|
| |okushushanisa omu ntwaza nainga ekitiinisa - |
| |oburingaaniza omu bantu, kwinganisa omu kuheebwa |
| |emigisha. |
| | |
| |Omuramuzi taine kuba naayoreka orubaju nainga ngu|
| |tiyasiima muntu weena, omu bigambo, omu bikorwa |
| |nainga omu mitwarize ye kurugiirira ahari: |
| |Bushaija nainga obukazi bwe |
| |Erangi |
| |Oruganda rwe |
| |Ediini |
| |Emyaka |
| |Oku ayemereire omu by'esente |
| |Enteekateeka ye y'eby'obutegyeki |
| |Oburema |
| | |
| |Omuramuzi taine kuba memba naniga kuba omwe ahari|
| |abo abaine akakwate n'okutaanisa/okubaganisa |
| |abantu. |
| | |
| | |

|EKYOKUREEBERAHO 5 | |

|ENSHONGA 6: OBUKOZI |Abaramuzi baine kuba beegire kandi barikumanya |
|N'OKUNYIIKIRA/okwehayo |omurimo gwabo – bagushemereire, kandi bakore |
| |n'omuhimbo, okufayo n'omutima gumwe – |
| |Okunyiikira. Omuramuzi aine kuba naaronda |
| |obwengye n'obukugu, hamwe n'oku ari nk'omuntu |
| |ebirikureka yaakora gye emirimo ye y'oburamuzi. |
| | |
| |Omuramuzi aine kushara omushango juba, kwonka omu|
| |kukora ekyo, aine kumanya ngu |
| |oburamuzi/oburingaaniza bwahikirira. Omuramuzi |
| |aine kutaho obutebenkana hamwe n'okuta ekitiinisa|
| |omu kuhoza kandi areebe ngu haabaho |
| |obugumisiriza. |
