 OMUTWE IV
 ENKORA YA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA

 ORUPAPURA

|EKICWEKA I |BA MEMBA BA KOOTI |
|EKICWEKA II |......................................36 |
|EKICWEKA III | |
| |OBUSHOBOOROZI/AMATWARE GA |
| |KOOTI........................................|
| |........................43 |
| | |
| |AKASIIMO, EBISHARE HAMWE N'OKURIHA OMU KOOTI|
| |Z'EBYANGA |
| |.............................................|
| |............................48 |

|EISHOMO i |BA MEMBA BA KOOTI Y'EKYANGA |
|EKIGYENDERERWA KIKURU |Kureeba ngu abeejumbiire omu mushomo ogu |
| |baayetegyereza abashemereire kuba bari ba |
| |memba ba Kooti y'Ekyanga n'abashemereire kuba|
| |ba memba hamwe n'aba memba abashemereire |
| |kubaho orukiiko kutandika. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw'eishomo, abaryetabiremu |
| |bashemereire: |
| |Kumanya abashemereire kuba bari omu Kooti |
| |y'ekyaro, y'omuruka, y'egomborora/tahuni |
| |hamwe neishaza. |
| |Beetegyereze ba memba abashemereire kubaho |
| |okuhoza kukatandika. |
|OBWIRE |EDAKIIKA 35 |
|EBIRIMU |Amadaara ga Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |Ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |Kutunga ba memba abaine kuba bariho okuhoza |
| |kukatandika. |

|AMADAARA GA KOOTI Z'eBYANGA|Eiteeka erya Kooti z'Ebyanga erya 2006 |
| |niriheereza za Kooti z'Ebyanga obushoboorozi |
| |bw'okuhurira n'okushara enshonga n'emishango |
| |emikye (erikucwubwa kitaka). |
| | |
| |Ebiragiro bya Kooti z'Ebyanga bikateebwaho |
| |omu 2007 kushoboorora oku eiteeka rya Kooti |
| |y'Ekyanga riraakore. |
| | |
| |Eiteeka rya Kooti z'Ebyanga niritaho Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga aha madaara ashatu: |
| | |
| |Eiteeka rya Kooti z'Ebyanga nirigira ngu buri|
| |mushango/nshonga eshemereire kutandikira aha |
| |rurengo rw'ekyaro, reero Kooti z'aha |
| |muruka/woodi hamwe n'aha igomborora/tahuni |
| |zibe ez'okujuriramu. |
|BA MEMBA BA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA|Kooti z'Ekyaro/Seero n'ezaha Muruka/Woodi |
| | |
| |Kooti z'aha Kyaro/Seero n'ezo ez'aha |
| |Muruka/Woodi zirimu ba memba b'akakiiko k'aha|
| |kyaro/seeru nainga ab'aha muruka/woodi nk'oku|
| |kiri omu eiteeka rya Gavumenti z'Ebyanga. |
| | |
| |Kooti z'aha Gomborora/Tahuni/Diviijoni |
| | |
| |Kooti z'aha eigomborora/Tahuni |
| |Kanso/Diviijoni nizikorwa abantu bataano (5) |
| |abarikuteebwaho akakiiko k'egomborora, |
| |barikushembwa akakiiko akakuru. (Eiteeka erya|
| |Kooti z'Ebyanga erya 2006 Akacweka 4(2)). |
| | |
| |Ahari ba memba bataano, haakiri babiri (2) |
| |bateekwa kuba bari abakazi |
| | |
| |Mukuru w'entebe hamwe n'orikumuza omu bigyere|
| |baine kuteererwa akaruuru ba memba ba Kooti |
| |ey'aharurengo rw'eigomborora/Tahuni |
| |Kanso/Diviijoni. |
| | |
| |Kwikirizibwa kuba memba wa Kooti |
| |y'ahaigomborora/Tahuni Kanso/Diviijoni, buri |
| |memba ateekwa: |
| |Kuba naatuura omu mwanya ogwo ahu Kooti |
| |y'Ekyanga eine obushoboorozi; |
| |Kuba ari omuntu w'emicwe mirungi kandi aine |
| |emitwarize mirungi; |
| |Abe naamanya orurimi orurikukoresebwa omu |
| |kyanga ekyo hamwe n'Orungyereza; |
| |Atari memba w'akakiiko k'aha kyanga, memba |
| |w'Eishengyero nainga memba w'ekitongore kyona|
| |(ekitairweho omu biragiro), kandi; |
| |Atari memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga endiijo. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Obujurizi – Ebiragiro bya Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |akacweka, 4-8. |
|Emirimo ya kooti z'ebyanga |Omurimo gwa Mukuru w'Entebe |
| | |
| |Mukuru w'entebe naayakiira enshonga ahabwa ba|
| |memba boona b'akakiiko kandi ayebembere |
| |orukiiko. Mukuru w'entebe naija kuronda |
| |omwanya ahu Kooti eraagume |
| |neehuririra/neecwera emishango omu kyanga |
| |kye. |
| | |
| |Omurimo gw'orikuhwera mukuru w'entebe |
| | |
| |Mukuru w'entebe yaaba ari omushaija, omuhwezi|
| |ashemereire kuba omukazi; kandi mukuru |
| |w'entebe yaaba ari omukazi, omuhwezi |
| |ashemereire kuba ari omushaija. |
| | |
| |Mukuru w'entebe ku yaakuremwa kukora emirimo |
| |ye, omuhwezi we ashemereire kugikora kuhisya |
| |obu Mukuru w'entebe araagarukye akagikora. |
| |Mukuru w'entebe ku yaakufa, yaakurekura |
| |nainga yaihwaho, omuhwezi we ashemereire kuba|
| |Mukuru w'entebe kuhisya obu baraaronde mukuru|
| |w'entebe ondiijo. |
| | |
| |Mukuru w'entebe hamwe n'omuhwezi we ku bombi |
| |baakuba batariho, ba memba abandi baine |
| |kutaho Mukuru w'entebe omu bwire bw'ogwo |
| |mushango bwonka. |
| | |
| |Bishangye omu - Biragiro bya Kooti z'Ebyanga,|
| |akacweka 18. |
|OKURAHIRA |Okurahira kwa ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |ATAKATUNGIRE OFIISI, BURI MEMBA WA KOOTI |
| |Y'EKYANGA ASHEMEREIRE KURAHIRA AKABONA |
| |KUTWARA OMWANYA GWE, KANDI AHAMIZE BURI OMWE |
| |KU ARIKUZA KURAMURA N'OBURINGAANIZA. |
| |EKIRAHIRO NIKIHEEBWA OMURAMUZI W'AHA RURENGO |
| |RWA DISITURIKIKITI OMU MWANYA OGU KOOTI |
| |Y'EKYANGA ERIMU. EKIRAAMO EKYANGUHI |
| |EKIRITEERWA BA MEMBA BA KOOTI Y'EKYANGA |
| |BATAKAGIIRE MU NTEBE KIRI AHAIFO, NK'OKU |
| |KIRIKURUGA OMU BIRAGIRO BYA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA. |
| |EKIRAHIRO KY'OBURAMUZI KYA BA MEMBA BA KOOTI |
| |Z'EBYANGA |
| |Nyowe,.......................................|
| |..............nindahira ngu, niinyija kukora |
| |kurungi emirimo empiirwe, kandi niinyija |
| |kukorera abantu boona ekihikire. Kurugiirira|
| |aha Konsityushoni ya Uganda hamwe n'ebiragiro|
| |ebirikugyenderwaho, ebirikwejunisibwa omu |
| |Uganda, hatariho kutiina n'okwitira omuntu |
| |weena eriisho, okukunda nainga EBIRAAYEGWE |
| |bibi. (Nahaabwekyo, Ruhanga mpwera) |
| | |
| |OMUKONO ………………………………………………………… |
|KWIHWA OMU NTEBE |Memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga naabaasa kwihwa omu |
| |ntebe akakiiko k'ekyanga akakuru akategyeki |
| |karaaragiire. (Eiteeka rya Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |erya, 2006, Akacweka 7(1)) |
| | |
| |Ebicweka bibiri ahari bishatu biina kushemba |
| |okwihwaho kwa memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga |
| |ahabw'enshonga ezi ahaifo: |
| |Kukozesa kubi ofiisi ye; |
| |Enguzi; |
| |Kuremwa kukora emirimo ye; |
| |Kusingwa omushango omu kooti ahabw'ebicumuro |
| |haza ebiragiro bikagira ngu asharirwe emyezi |
| |mukaaga n'okurengaho ari omu kihome; |
| |Emitwarize/emicwe mibi; or |
| |Yaarwara omutwe/Akaremwa ahabw'amaani mabi. |
| | |
| |Omwanya gwa memba wa Kooti y'ekyanga nigwija |
| |kubamu busha haabaho ebi ahaifo: |
| | |
| |Memba yaarekura kandi akaha Mukuru w'entebe |
| |ya Kooti y'Ekyanga ebaruha ku yaarekura. |
| |Memba ku yaakuba ataine birikumwikiriza kuba |
| |memba wa Kooti y'Egomborora/Tahuni |
| |Kanso/Diviijoni); |
| |Memba ku yaakufa; nainga |
| |Memba yaabura kuhurira emishango omu kooti |
| |emirundi eshatu ekurataine, kwihaho ba memba |
| |abandi baikirizi okwehozaho kwe nainga |
| |enshonga ahabwenki abaire atariho. |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti erya 2006, Akacweka 7(2))|
| | |
| |Omwanya gwa memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga gwaba |
| |ogw'okwijuja, akakiiko k'ahaiguru |
| |nikamanyisibwa, reero akakiiko ako kashembe |
| |memba ondiijo omusya. |
|OBUTAIKIRIZIBWA |Memba ku yaakuba aine akakwate n'omushango |
| |oguri omu kooti obwire obwo, ashemereire |
| |kugamba akakwate ku aine n'omushango reero |
| |ayeihemu omu kuguhurira. (Eiteeka rya Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga erya, 2006, Akacweka 24(d); |
| |Ebiragiro bya Kooti z'Ebyanga, ekiragiro kya |
| |20(1)). |
| | |
| |Orubaju rumwe rwayanga ngu memba atahurira |
| |omushango ahabw'okugwera orubaju, Kooti |
| |neebaasa: |
| |Kwihamu memba omu mushango yaashanga ngu kwo |
| |enshonga ei barikuha kwanga memba ehikire; |
| |nainga |
| |Areke kuhurikiza okwanga kw'orubaju orwo |
| |yaareeba ngu enshonga erikuheebwa terimu |
| |nsha, nainga terikworeka ngu memba agwereire |
| |orubaju. |
| | |
| |Orubaju rwaguma rwangire, Kooti eine |
| |kuhandiika okwanga okwo hamwe n'enshonga |
| |ahabwenki okwanga kwabaho reero bagumizemu |
| |omushango. (Ebiragiro bya Kooti z'Ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro, 20(2)) |
|OKURINDA BA MEMBA HAMWE |TIHARIHO MEMBA WA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA ASHEMEREIRE|
|N'ABAKUNGU BA KOOTI |KUHABABIRWA OMU KOOTI YOONA AHABW'OKUKORA |
|Z'EBYANGA |EBIRI OMU BIRAGIRO NARI EKI KOOTI Y'EKYANGA |
| |YAAMURAGIRA. (EITEEKA RYA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA, |
| |AKACWEKA, 43) |
| | |
| |Tihariho memba wa Kooti z'Ebyanga ashemereire|
| |kuba naahababirwa ahabw'ekikorwa kyona |
| |ekiyaakora arikuhikiriza emyoga ye |
| |y'oburamuzi, ku kyakuba ngu, omu bwire bwona,|
| |Kooti niyo emusindikire. (Eiteeka rya Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga erya 2006, akacweka 43). |
| | |
|OKUSHARAHO KWA KOOTI | |
|Y'EKYANGA |Buri nshonga yoona erikukwija omu Kooti |
| |y'Ekyanga eine kusharwaho ba memba boona. |
| | |
| |Oburuuru bwa ba memba ku bwakwingana, |
| |akaruuru ka Mukuru w'Entebe kaine kusharaho. |
| |Mukuru w'Entebe hamwe na ba memba boona baine|
| |kurangiirira eki kooti yaasharaho. |

|KUREEBERERA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA|Eiteeka rya Kooti z'ebyanga niriragiira |
| |omuramuzi omukuru aha disiturikiti orikwetwa |
| |'Chief Margestrate' kureeberera Kooti |
| |z'Ebyanga. (Eiteeka rya Kooti z'Ebyanga erya,|
| |2006, akacweka 40) |

|KWORAMU |AKACWEKA KA 8(4) AKA EITEEKA RYA KOOTI |
| |Z'EBYANGA AKA, 2006 NIKAGIRA NGU KOOTI |
| |Y'EKYANGA TAINE KUHURIRA OMUSHANGO GWONA BA |
| |MEMBA BATAHIKIZE KWORAMU. |
| | |
| |Kworamu n'enki? |
| | |
| |Kworamu nikimanyisa omubaro gw'abantu |
| |abashemereire kuba bariho kwikiriza omushango|
| |kuhurirwa. Omubaro ogu gushemereire kuguma |
| |omu kuhurira omushango ogwo kuhisya obu |
| |guraahwe. |
| | |
| |Kworamu yaabura kuhika, Mukuru w'entebe aine |
| |kurekyera aho kuhurira omushango ogwo, agute |
| |orundi runaku. |

| | |
|KUHISYA KWORAMU |OMU KYARO/SEERU NAINGA AHA MURUKA/WOODI, |
| |OMUHENDO OGURIKWIKIRIZIBWA KUBAHO KOOTI |

| |ABAKAZI. |

| |Kanso/Diviijoni, omuhendo gw'abantu ni |
| |bashatu, omwe ahari abo ashemereire kuba ari |
| |omukazi. |

| |Ku kyakubaho ngu Kooti y'Ekyanga ebuzirwe |
| |Kworamu ahabw'eburemeezi obutakwebeera, (nka |
| |memba ku yaakuba arwaire nari ayoshire obwire|
| |buraingwa, Kooti y'Ekyanga neebaasa kuronda |
| |abantu kuheereza aha Kooti egyo. |
| | |
| |Kurondwa ngu omuntu abe memba wa Kooti |
| |y'Ekyanga, ashemereire kuba: |
| | |
| |Ari mukuru; |
| |Arikuteekateeka gye; |
| |Arikuteekateekwa kuba ow'amaani; |
| |Arikuraara omu kicweka ekyo eki kooti erimu |
| |neehorereza. |
| |Ataine buzaare naabo boona abari omu |
| |mushango. |

|KUHURIRA OMUSHANGO? | |

|EISHOMO iI |OBUSHOBOOROZI BWA KOOTI Z'EBYANGA |
|EKIGYENDERERWA KIKURU |Kumanyisa abeetabire omu mushomo obushoborozi|
| |obu Kooti z'Ebyanga ziine. |
|EBIGYENDERERWA |Aha muheru gw'eishomo eri, abagwetabiremu |
| |bashemereire: |
| |Kumanya amakuru g'obushoborozi; |
| |Kumanya ni mishango ki ei Kooti z'Ebyanga |
| |zishemereire kucwa/kuramura eziri omu matware|
| |gaazo. |
|OBWIRE |edakiika 40 |
|ebiri omu ishomo eri |Obushoboorozi nikimanyisa ki |
| |Obushoboorozi bw'amatware |
| |Obushoboorozi bw'ebiragiro |

|obushobOorozi |Obushoboorozi bwa Kooti z'Ebyanga nibwo |
| |bushoboorozi bw'okuhurira n'okushara |
| |emishango nka kooti. |
| | |
| |Obushoboorozi bwa Kooti z'Ebyanga buri omu |
| |emiringo ebiri: |
| | |
| |Obushoboorozi bw'amatware); hamwe na |
| |Obushoboorozi bw'ebiragiro. |
|obushoboorozi bw'amatware |Kooti y'Ekyanga eine obushoboorozi kuhurira |
| |enshonga n'emishango omu kyanga ekyo: |
| | |
| |Erikuruga omu myanya ei akakiiko akarikukora |
| |kooti karikurugamu; |
| |Enshonga yaaba erikukwata aha itaka, akakiiko|
| |akari omu mwanya ogu itaka ririmu; nainga |
| |Ou bahababiire/Kitabaarizibwa yaaba naatuura |
| |omu mwanya ogu akakiiko karimu haza kooti ahu|
| |eri. |
| |(Eiteeka rya Kooti z'Ebyanga erya 2006, |
| |Akacweka. 9; Ebiragiro bya Kooti z'Ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro kya. 25) |
| | |
| |Kihababirwa naabaasa kutaikiriza |
| |obushoboorozi bwa Kooti y'Ekyanga kuhurira |
| |omushango. Kooti ku yaakwikiriza okwanga kwe,|
| |omushango gushemereire kutwarwa omu kooti |
| |endiijo eine obushoborozi bw'okugushara. |
| | |
| |Kooti ku yaakwanga, eshemereire kuhandiika |
| |okwanga kwayo reero egumizemu ehurire/ecwe |
| |omushango. |

|EKICWEKA iII |OBUSIIMO, EBISHARE N’EMITANGO YA KOOTI |
| |Y’EKYANGA |
|EKIGYENDERERWA EKIKURU |Kwenda abantu bamanye enkora y’obusiimo, |
| |ebishare n’emitango ya kooti y’ekyanga |
| |nk’okukirikworekwa omu kiragiro kya kooti |
| |y’ekyanga |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Ahamuheru gw’ekicweka eki, abeetabire omu |
| |mushomo baine kumanya gye ebi: |
| |bamanye akasiimo ka kooti y’ekyanga nk’oku |
| |kari omu mateeka |
| |bamanye nooha ashemeire kushashura ebishare |
| |nainga omutango |
| |beetegyereze oku ebishare n’emitango ya kooti|
| |y’ekyanga birikukoresibwa |
| |beetegyereze oshemeire kuba naabiika |
| |ebihandiiko by’ebishare n’emitango ya kooti |
| |y’ekyanga |
| |bamanye kandi babaase kuta omu nkora |
| |engyederwaho ya ebishare bya kooti y’ekyanga |
| |nk’oku kiri omu mateeka |
|OBWIRE |EDAKIIKA 15 |
|EBIRIMU |Obusiimo bw’abakakiiko ka kooti y’ekyanga |
| |Okushashura ebishare |
| |Enshohoza ya ebishare n’emitango |
| |Okubiika za ebihandiiko by’ebishare |
| |n’emitango |
| |Engyenderwaho ya ebishare bya kooti y’ekyanga|

|OBUSIIMO BWa kooti |EITEEKA NIRIRAGIIRA NGU BURI MEMBA WA KOOTI |
|y’ekyanga |Y’EKYANGA ORIKUZA OMU KOOTI OMU BWIRE |
| |OBW’OKUCWA EMISHANGO ASHASHURWE AHEEBWE |
| |AAKASIIMO. |
| | |
| |Akasiimo ka menba n’omuhandiiki ab’etahuni, |
| |ebyanga nainga egomborora yo ebe 10,000 eza |
| |Yuganda buri kushutama. |
| | |
| |Reeba- Eiteeka rya kooti z’Ebyanga , akacweka|
| |ka kabiri. |
|ebishare BYa kooti | |

|N’oha arikushashura |Kihababa ninga omuntu owaareta omushango omu |
|ebishare? |Kooti y’Ekyanga aine kushashura ebishare bya |
| |kooti arikugyendera aha kipimo kya ebishare |
| |ekitiirweho. Kooti ez’ebyanga zibaasa |
| |kweyogyerayo zitangise na kitabaarizibwa. |
| |(Ekiragiro kya kooti z’ebyanga 2006, |
| |akacweka. 41) |
|OKU EBISHARE N’EMITANGO |Emitango na ebishare ebirundainwe kooti |
|BISHEMERE KUKOZESIBWA |biine kukora ebi: |
| |Okugura obucumu, amakaraamu, ebitabo, |
| |empapura n’ebindi by’etaago bya kooti; |
| |Okureeta n’okugarurayo abajurizi; na |
| |Obusiimo bwa ba memba ba kooti. |
| |( Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga 2006, |
| |akacweka. 42) |
|OKUBIIKA EBIHANDIIKO |Kooti eshemeire kuba neebiika gye ebitabo |
|BY’EBISHARE N’EMITANGO |ebibarirwamu sente kwenda kworeka gye |
| |entaasya n’enshohoza. |
| | |
| |Aha rurengo orw’egomborora, omuhandiiki wa |
| |kooti niwe arikubuuzibwa entaasya y’ebishare |
| |n’emitango n’enshohoza yaabyo. |
| |Aha rurengo orw’ekyaro n’omuruka, omukuru |
| |w’ekyaro (mukuru w’entebe) niwe arikubuuzibwa|
| |ebishare n’emitango n’okubyakoresiibwe. |
|ekipande ekya kooti |Ekipande eki kiteirwe aha peegi eyaakurataho:|
|z’ebyanga ky’okworeka | |
|emihendo y’ebishare | |
|n’enshashurwa | |

|EKICWEKA I |ABANTU ABAINE KWETABA OMU NKORA ZA KOOTI |
| |Y’EKYANGA |
|EKIGYENDRERWA EKIKURU |Kwenda kumanyisa abantu ngu kooti y’ekyanga |
| |erimu abantu batari b’omuringo gumwe |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw’ekicweka eki, abantu baine |
| |kumanya gye ebi: |
| |Kumanya abantu abarikutwara ekicweka omu |
| |nkora ya kooti y’ekyanga |
| |Beetegyereze ni ryari obu abahoza |
| |abeempangisano barikwikirizibwa omu nkora za |
| |kooti y’ekyanga |
| |Beetegyereze ekirikureetera omuntu yaaba |
| |omujurizi ahikire |
|obwire |edakiika 15 |
|ebiri omu kicweka |Okushoboorora aha muntu arikuhandiika fairo |
| |y’omushango akagireeta omu kooti |
| |Okushoboorora ahari kitabaarizibwa |
| |Okushoboorora aha bahoza abempangisano |
| |Okushoboorora aha mujurizi |
| |Okutaasyamu aba kakiiko ka kooti y’ekyanga |
| |Okutaasyamu abantu ba butoosha |

|n’oha arikwetaba omu nkora ya kooti ey’ekyanga? |
|ABANTU ABARIKUZA OMU KOOTI Y’EKYANGA TIBARI BAMWE NA BAMWE, NK’OKU |
|KIRIKWOREKWA OMU KISHUSHANI AHANSI: |
| |
| |
| |
| |
| |
| |
| |
| |

|[pic] |
| |
|abarikuba barimu |Nyin’omushango/kitabaaza – omuntu |
| |arikutandikaho omushango akahandiika faiyiro |
| |y’okwetobita kwe akagitwara omu kooti. |
| |Nyin’omushango noobaasa kumweta kyetomboita, |
| |kitabaaza nainga kihababa. |
| | |
| |Kitabaarizibwa – ogu n’omuntu atabaariziibwe.|
| | |
| |Ijuka: omuntu arikuza kureebukaho omu kooti |
| |kuyaakutungamu akahugye omu mutwe nainga |
| |akaba atarikwehurira gye omu magara, naabaasa|
| |kujwekyerwa ondiijo muntu omu kooti, |
| |ashemereire kuba : |
| |Atoorainwe kitabaaza/nyinomushango nainga |
| |kitabaarizibwa weenyine; nainga |
| |Omuntu arikureeberera ogwe muntu nainga |
| |ebintu bye. |
| | |
| |Kooti niyo erikusharamu nju ogwe mujwekyerwa |
| |ajwekyere omuntu omu kooti. (Eiteeka rya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka. 16 (1)) |
| | |
| |Arikuza omu kooti naabaasa kuba ari omwe |
| |nainga abantu baingi bakwataniise hamwe, |
| |nainga kampuni. Kubarikuba bari baingi, |
| |nibajwekyerwa omuntu omwe ou barikutoorana |
| |kandi bakaheereza obushoboorozi |
| |bw’okubajwekyera omu buhandiikye. (Eiteeka |
| |rya kooti z’ebyanga, akacweka. 17) |
|abahoza abeempangisano/BA |Okukoresa ba puriida tikirikwirizibwa omu |
|PURIIDA |kooti y’ekyanga yaaba neegyenda omu maisho. |
| |Eki nikibaho kwenda ngu kooti y’ekyaro egume |
| |eyanguhiire abantu ba butoosha abatarikumanya|
| |endimi z’ebirarago ezigumire n’ebindi bingi. |
| | |
| |Hariho enshonga ibiri ezirikureetera abahoza |
| |abeempangisano barikubaasa kwikirizibwa omu |
| |kooti y’ekyaro: |
| |Enshonga erikuteisibwaho yaaba eri |
| |ey’okuhenda ebiragiro ebikorwa obukiiko |
| |bw’ebyanga; nainga |
| |Omwe ahari kitabaaza na kitabaarizibwa yaaba |
| |ari omwana. |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka.|
| |16 (2); Ebiragiro kya kooti, Ekiragiro. 23) |
|abajurizi |Aba n’abantu abaine bwino aha mushango |
| |ogurikuba nigusharwa omu kooti. Nibeetwa kuha|
| |amakuru n’obujurizi aha byabaireho ahu kooti |
| |yaabaire etari. |
|ekyoKUREEBERAHO 1 | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |

|ekicweka II |ENSHONGA EZIRIKUKWATA AHARI BURI OMWE: |
| |OBYOKUKORA OTAKAHOZESIIBWE |
|ekigyendererwa ekikuru |Kumanyisa abantu abarikwetegyereza |
| |ebigyenderwaho omu kooti y’ekyanga kuheereza |
| |abantu amagyezi agakwatiraine n’ebyokukora |
| |otakahozesiibwe |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw’ekicweka eki abantu baine: |
| |Kwetegyereza omugasho gw’ebigyenderwaho kandi|
| |bamanye eby’enshonga z’oburingaaniza |
| |Bamanye kitabaaza oku arikureeta omushango |
| |omu kooti y’ekyanga |
| |Beetegyereze oku kitabaarizibwa aine kwetwaza|
| |aha mushango ogwamujunanwa |
| |Kumanya omugasho gwa kooti y’ekyanga |
| |kumanyisa ab’akakiiko n’abajurizi obu |
| |omushango gurahurirwe |
| | |
|obwire |edakiika 30 |
|ebirimu |Omugasho gw’ebigyenderwaho omu kooti |
| |y’ekyanga |
| |Kitabaaza n’ebi arikugamba aha mushango gwe |
| |Obu omushango guraahurirwe |
| |Okumanyisibwa kw’okuhurira omushango |
| |n’amabaruha g’okweta kitabaaza na |
| |kitabaarizibwa |
| |Okweta abajurizi |

|ahabwaki eBIgyenderwao |Ahabw’okwenda kukuuma gye obutegyeki |
|BIiri eBY’omugasho? |n’oburingaaniza, n’eky’omugasho kooti |
| |kukuratira ebigyenderwaho ebi abantu |
| |barikukuratira omu kuhababa – eki nikireetera|
| |abantu baayanguhirwa. |
| | |
| |N’emishango eri omu kooti eshemereire eine |
| |kukuuma obugabe bw’abo boona abarikugiizamu |
| |kurabira omu muhanda oguri gwe. |
| |Ebigyenderwaho omu kooti y’ekyanga |
| |etebeekanisiibwe omu muringo murungi kwenda |
| |ngu buri omwe weena ayetegyereze ahabw’okuba |
| |n’orurimi orurikukozesibwa n’orwanguhi. |
| | |
| |Ba memba ba kooti bashemereire kufayo munonga|
| |aha kucwa emishango omu muringo gwanguhi |
| |kandi murungi kutari kukozesa ebigambo |
| |ebigumire. |
| | |
| |Reeba Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006. |
| |Okuhaburwa okundi okweyongyeireho kuri omu |
| |Ngyenderwaho ya kooti z’ahansi, 2007. |
|okuhurira omushango |Kutandika kuhurira omushango omu kooti |
|nikutandika kuta? |y’ekyanga, kitabaaza aine kubanza kwegambaho |
| |omu maisho ga mukuru w’entebe. |
|ebaruha y’okwetoboita |Egi baruha eshemereire kuba eri omu |
| |buhandiikye kandi kitabaaza ateireho omukono.|
| |Eshemereire kushoboorora ekika ky’omushango |
| |oguteirwe ahari kitabaarizibwa. |
| | |
| |Kitabaaza naabaasa kwehandiikira ebaruha egi |
| |kandi agiteho omukono. |
| |Nainga, mukuru w’entebe, omuhandiiki nainga, |
| |memba weena owa kooti naabaasa kuhandiika |
| |egyo baruha kurugirira aha bigambo bya |
| |kitabaaza. Ekyo kihandiiko nikishomerwa |
| |kitabaaza bwanyima atekeho omukono. |
| |Nyin’omushango yaaba atarikubaasa kutaho |
| |omukono omw’iziina rye, naabaasa kukozesa |
| |ekinkumu. Mukuru w’entebe nawe naataho |
| |omukono. |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga 2006,akacweka. |
| |14; Ebiragiro bya kooti by’ekyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 29) |
| | |
| |Fayiro |
| |Kooti y’ekyanga eshemereire kuta omu fayiro |
| |ebaruha y’okwetoboita. (Eiteeka rya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka. 14(3)) |

|ebiri omu baruha |Ebiri omu baruha y’okwetomboita |
|y’okwetoMboita | |
| |Amaziina, emyaka, ahu kitabaaza arikutuura; |
| |Amazima aha mushango n’ebiheneso ebi |
| |orikwenda; |
| |Omuhendo gwa sente ezi orikwenda; |
| |Amaziina g’abajurizi n’ahubarikutuura; |
| |Ba kitabaaza baaba bari abantu baingi, |
| |eiziina ry’ogwe aheirwe obushoboorozi; na |
| |Amakuru goona agaakugira omugasho aha |
| |mushango. |
| | |
| |IJUKA: kooti neebaasa kushaba ngu kitabaaza |
| |aheereze bwino nyingi n’ebisaanirizo |
| |ebirikukwata aha mushango kwenda ngu |
| |kwomesereza kitabaarizibwa |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 31 |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|okwetoMboita kw’omwana |Omushango ogw’omwana nainga omuntu atari gye |
|nAinga omuntu atari gye omu|omu mutwe gushemereire kureetwa omuzaire |
|mutwe |nainga munywani we. (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 30). Munywani we omu |
| |muringo ogu ni omuntu weena arajwekyere |
| |omwana ninga omuntu atari gye omu muntwe |
| |(atabaukire nainga aine akahugye) ahabw’okuba|
| |tarikubaasa kweyemerera. Tibaine kakwate omu |
| |mushango kwonka nibayamba omu kukuuma obugabe|
| |n’ebyetengo by’omwana n’omuntu atari gye omu |
| |mutwe. |
|okushashura ebishare bya |Buri kitaabaaza weena kutwara omushango gwe |
|kooti |omu kooti naija kushashura omuhendo gwa sente|
| |ogumanyisiibwe omu kooti egyo. Kooti neebaasa|
| |kusaasira kitabaaza kusashura sente yaareeba |
| |ngu kitabaaza tarikuzibaasa. (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 65) |
| |Okumanya ebirikukiraho – kutunga |
| |ah’okushashurira ebishare, reeba Ebiragiro |
| |bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ebyongeirweho ekicweka |
| |kya kashatu. |
|omurimo gw’omuhandiiki wa |Okukoramu za kope ezindi |
|kooti y’ekyanga yaaheza |Kooti yaaheza kutunga ebaruha y’okwetomboita,|
|kutUnga ebaruha |omuhandiiki naakoramu kope ezirikumara |
|y’okwetoMboita |ezirakoresibwe ba memba ba kooti n’abandi |
| |bantu, kandi aziteera sitampu ateekaho |
| |omukono. (Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ekyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 33) |
|okwanga okwetoMboita |Kooti neebaasa kwanga kuhurira omushango |
| |gwaba: |
| |Omushango gwaba gutari gw’omugasho gwona, |
| |gutaine butandikiro nainga gugyendereire |
| |kunyizya. |
| |Kooti yaaba etaine bushoboorozi kuhurira ogwe|
| |mushango; nainga |
| |Enshonga yaaba niyo emwe ekiri omu kooti |
| |endiijo. |
| |(Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |34) |

|ekishushani ky’enshonga ezitiine mugasho |
|[pic] |
|OKUHEEREZA KITABAARIZIBWA |OKUHEEREZA KITABAARIZIBWA EBARUHA |
|OKUMANYISIBWA |Y’OKUHABABIRWA |
| |Ebaruha ey’okutabaaza etakatiirwe mu fayiro, |
| |kitabaarizibwa aine kuba yaahairwe eye |
| |ey’okumumanyisa ngu bamutabariize. (Ekiragiro|
| |kya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka. 15(1)) |
|okwehozaho |KITABAARIZIBWA YAAHEZA KUTUNGA EBARUHA |
| |Y’OKUMUTABAARIZA, NAABAASA KWEHOZAHO |
| |ARIKWEHAKANA NAINGA ARIKWIKIRIZA OMUSHANGO |
| |OMU BUHANDIIKYE NAINGA OMU BIGAMBO OMU BIRO |
| |BITAANO (5) EBI ATUNGIIREMU EBARUHA |
| |Y’OKUMUTABAARIZA. OKWE NIKWE KWEHOZAHO |
| |(EBIRAGIRO BYA KOOTI Z’EBYANGA, EKIRAGIRO. |
| |38(1)). IJUKA NGU KOOTI NEEBAASA KWIKIRIZA |
| |OKWEHOZAHO OKURI OMU BUHANDIIKYE OKWAREETWA |
| |EBIRO BITAANO BYAHINGWIRE, EKIKURU |
| |KITABAARIZIBWA YAAHEEREZA ENSHONGA NKURU |
| |EZAAMUREETEIRE OKUKYERERWA. (EBIRAGIRO BYA |
| |KOOTI Z’EBYANGA, EKIRAGIRO. 38 (3)) |
| |Okwehozaho omu bigambo |
| |Kitabaarizibwa yaayehozaho omu bigambo, |
| |omuhandiiki wa kooti aine kubita omu |
| |buhadiikye.( Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 38 (2)) |
|okumanyisa KITABAAZA |Kitabaaza aine kumanyisibwa okwehozaho kwa |
|okwehozaho kwa |kitabaarizibwa hatakahweireho biro bitaano |
|kitabaarizIbwa |(5) kitabaarizibwa areesire okwehozaho kwe. |
| |(Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 38|
| |(4) |
|okutaho obwire bw’okuhurira|Obwire bw’okuhurira omushango nibuteebwaho |
|omushango |kitabaarizibwa yaaheza kureeta okwehozaho kwe|
| |omu buhandiikye (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro.40). Kitabaarizibwa aine|
| |kureeta okwehozaho kwe hatakahweireho biro |
| |bitaano (5) ebi atungiiremu ebaruha |
| |y’okutabaarizibwa. (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 38) |
|obwire n’omwanya ahu kooti |Obwire n’omwanya ahu kooti eraashutame |
|eraAshutame |(Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |17(1), (2)) |
| |Kooti z’ebyanga nizishutama ahagati ya shaaha|
| |2:00 na shaaha 12:00 z’eihangwe. Kooti |
| |eshemereire kushutama emirundi erikumara |
| |kwenda ngu buri mushango baguhurire. Kooti |
| |eine kushutama ahu abantu bari okwihaho aha |
| |nshonga ey’emishango y’abaana. (Ebiragiro bya|
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 41 (a)) |
| | |
| |Ahu kirikwetaagisa, kooti neebaasa kubinga |
| |omuntu nainga abantu obutahika haihi n’ahu |
| |kooti eriyo neehuririra omushango. (Eiteeka |
| |rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka. 36 (2)) |

|OKUMANYISA KITABAAZA NA |Nkoku kyaba kyayorekirwe kareho, kooti |
|KITATABAARIZIBWA OBU |yaaheza kutunga ebaruha y’okwetomboita |
|OMUSHANGO GURAAHURIRWE |n’ey’okwehozaho, neeteekaho eizooba, obwire, |
| |n’omwanya ogu kooti eraahurireho omushango. |
| |Mukuru w’entebe aine kumanyisa kitabaaz na |
| |kitabaarizibwa obu omushango guraahurirwe |
| |kandi abeete omurwijwire baije baze omu kooti|
| |y’ekyanga. Eki nikikorwa omu buhandiikye omu |
| |baruha erikubamanyisa ebiro by’okwezi, obwire|
| |n’omwanya. (Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |2006, akacweka. 15 (2); Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 35 (2)) |

|ebiri omu baruha y’okweta |Ebaruha y’okweta ab’omushango eine kuba erimu|
|KITABAAZA na kitabaarizibwa|ebi: |
| |Amaziina ga nyin’omushango na kitabaarizibwa.|
| |Enamba y’omushango. |
| |Ekika ky’omushango. |
| |Okumanyisibwa ngu baine kwehikira omu kooti |
| |Ekiro n’eshaaha ez’omushango guraahurirwemu. |
| |Okumanyisibwa kubareeta abajurizi. |
| |Okumanyisibwa ngu omuntu kuyaakubura |
| |omushango niguhurirwa kandi encwamu neeheebwa|
| |. |
| |Ebiro by’okwezi. |
| |Omukono gwa ceyamaani. |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Foomu A, |
| |Ekyongyeirweho namba 4. |
|okugaba ebaruHA z’okweta |Ebaruha ezi ziine kugabwa orikukozesa gumwe |
|abantu omu kooti |aha miringo egi: |
| |Okumanyisa omu bigambo (Eiteeka rya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka. 15 (3); Ebiragiro |
| |bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 35(3)) |
| |Mukuru w’entebe naabaasa kugambira kitabaaza |
| |na kitabaarizibwa obwire n’omwanya ogu |
| |omushango gurahuririrwemu omu buntu. |
| |Mukuru w’entebe yaamanyisa kitabaaza na |
| |kitabaarizibwa omu bigambo, aine kuba aine |
| |omujurizi ataine nshonda ei arigwera babe |
| |hamwe. |
| | |
| |Okumanyisa okw’obuhandiikye (Eiteeka rya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacwekac. 15 (4); |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 36)|
| |Okumanyisa kwaba kuri omu buhandiikye, |
| |bushemeirwe kuheebwa omuntu weenyine ou |
| |bugyendereire. Kukyakwanga kubaasika |
| |kubuhisya omuntu weenyine, noobaasa kukozesa |
| |emiringo egi kwenda ngu bumuhike: |
| |Noobaasa kubusigira omuntu mukuru omu ka ye |
| |nainga arikutuura nawe; nainga |
| |Ebaruha ogikwase aha kimwe aha bicweka |
| |by’enju ye ahu arikurahuka kureeba. Noobaasa |
| |kugishonshoreka ahansi y’orwigi. |
| | |
|ebaruha y’okweta omuntu omu|EKY’OKUREEBERAHO KY’EBARUHA Y’OKWETA OMUNTU |
|kooti |OMU KOOTI: |

| |Ekyongeirweho namba 4. |

|okubiika EBIHANDIIKO BYA |Okumanyisa kw’okweta abantu omu kooti kwaba |
|kooti Z’ekyanga |kukozirwe omu buhandiikye, obumwe bwine |
| |kuteebwa omu fayiro ya kooti obundi bakabuha |
| |arikuza kwetwa. (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 36 (1)) |
| |Obuhame bw’okwetwa omu kooti (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 37) |
| |Okuhisya okumanyisa kuruga omu kooti kuhika |
| |aha bantu abagyendereirwe nikimanywa |
| |nk’obuhame bw’okwetwa. Obuhame bw’okwetwa ni |
| |bwino y’okugira ngu boona ababa |
| |bagyendereirwe kumanyisibwa baamanyisibwa. |
| | |
| |Buri kutwarira omuntu ebaruha, ashemereire |
| |kuhamya ku yaagitunga obwo arikutaho omukono.|
| |Kuyaakuba atarikumanya kuhandiika naabaasa |
| |kuteeraho ekinkumu. Ebaruha yaarekwa omu maka|
| |g’omuntu, owaagitwarayo ashemereire kugaruka |
| |omu kooti akaha enshonga ahabw’enki yaakoresa|
| |omuringo ogwo kandi ebi yaagamba bihamibwe |
| |omujurizi ou yaagaba agyenzire nawe. |

|ekyOKUREEBERAHO 1 | |

|OKUCONDOOZA OKWA KOOTI | |
|Y’EKYANGA | |
| | |
| | |
| |Kooti neebaasa kuhika aha mwanya ahu |
| |omushango gwatandikiire ehandiikye ebi |
| |yaareeba. (Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 41(1)(k)) |
|okumanyisa abajurizi |RITAKAHIKIRE EIZOOBA RY’OKUHURIRA OMUSHANGO, |
| |KOOTI EINE KWETA ABAJURIZI ABARIKUZA KUBAHO, |
| |EBAMANYISE EKIRO N’OBWIRE OBU BARAABE |
| |NIBEETAAGWA N’OMWANYA OGU KOOTI |
| |ERAASHUTAMEMU. (EITEEKA RYA KOOTI ,Z’EBYANGA |
| |2006, AKACWEKA. 20(1)) |
|EBIRI OMU KUMANYISA |EBARUHA Y’OKWETA ABAJURIZI ESHEMEREIRE KUBA |
|ABAJURIZI |ERIMU EBI: |
| |Amaziina ga nyin’omushango na kitabaarizibwa.|
| |Enamba y’omushango. |
| |Okumanyisa ngu abajurizi baine kuba bariho. |
| |Ekiro n’eshaaha ez’omujurizi aine kuhikaho. |
| |Bwino ei abajurizi baine kureeta omu kooti. |
| |Ekiro kibaahandiikiraho ebaruha. |
| |Omukono gwa mukuru w’entebe. |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Foomu B, |
| |Ekyongyeirweho namba 4 |
|okugaba ebaruha z’okweta |Ezi baruha ziine kugabwa omu miringo egi : |
|bajurizi |Okumanyisa omu bigambo (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 39(4)) |
| |Mukuru w’entebe aine kumugambira obwire |
| |n’omwanya omu buntu risho aha rindi. Omu |
| |kumanyisa omu bigambo, mukuru w’entebe aine |
| |kugyenda n’ondiijo muntu. |
| | |
| |Okweta okuri omu buhandiikye (Eiteeka rya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka. 20; |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 39)|
| |Ni kirungi okweta okuri omu buhandiikye |
| |kukuha mukama wakwo weenyine, obaasa |
| |kubisigira omuntu mukuru omu ka ye nainga ou |
| |arikutuura nawe. |
| | |
| |[pic] |
|ekyokureeberaho ky’ebaruha y’okweta abajurizi |

|OKUBIIKA EBIHANDIIKO |OKWETA ABANTU OMU KOOTI KWAKORWA OMU |
|N’ebaruha ez’okweta abantu |BUHANDIIKYE, KOOTI EINE KUSIGAZA KOPE EMWE |
|omu kooti |REERU ENDIIJO ERAATERWE SITAMPU EKABA NIYO |
| |YAATWARIRWA OMUJURIZI OU BAGYENDEREIRE. |
| |Okwikiriza - omujurizi nainga omuntu weena |
| |oraikirize akaakiira ebaruha omu mwanya |
| |gw’omujurizi aine kuta omukono nainga |
| |ekinkumu aha kope ei kooti erikusigaza |
| |yaaheza kugyakiira. |
| | |
| |Omujurizi nainga omujwekyerwa we yaaheza |
| |kwanga kutaho omukono aha baruha, memba aine |
| |kuhandiika okwanga okwo omu buhandiikye. |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka.|
| |20(5)) |

|HAMYA KWORAMU | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Kooti etakatandikire, mukuru w’entebe aine |
| |kubanza kumanya yaaba omuhendo gw’abantu |
| |abaine kuba bariho kooti kutandika gwahikire.|
| |Omuri abo bantu torikubariramu ba memba ba |
| |kooti. Omuhendo ogwe gwine kuguma niguhika |
| |kooti yaaza kutandika |

|ekicweka III |ENSHONGA EZIRIKUKWATA AHARI BURI OMWE: |
| |EBY’OKUKORA ORIKUHOZESIBWA |
|ekigyendererwa ekikuru |Kwenda kubaasisa abantu kwetegyereza ebiri |
| |omu biragiro n’engyenderwaho ya za kooti |
| |z’ebyanga kandi n’oku baheereza amagyezi aha |
| |bikwatiraine n’okuhozesibwa. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw’eishomo eri, abeetabiremu |
| |baine: |
| |Kwetegyereza ni ryari obu memba wa kooti aine|
| |kubingwa omu nkora za kooti y’ekyanga. |
| |Kwetegyereza ni rurimi ki orwine kukoresibwa |
| |omu kooti y’ekyanga |
| |Kwetegyereza ni ryari obu kooti y’ekyanga |
| |eshemeire kuronda obuhabuzi omu by’amateeka |
| |Kwetegyereza ebirikurabwamu omu kuhozesa |
| |omuntu |
| |Kwetegyereza ekirikubaho omwe ahari |
| |kitabaaza, kitabaarizibwa, n’omujurizi |
| |yaabura kwija omu kooti. |
| |Kwetegyereza okubarikubaasa kutaasyamu |
| |oburingaaniza omu kooti y’ekyanga |
|obwire |edakiika 35 |
|ebirimu |Okubinga ba memba ba kooti |
| |Orurimi orurikukozesibwa omu kooti |
| |Kooti y’ekyanga kwetaaga obuhabuzi omu |
| |by’amateeka |
| |Enshoronga y’entwaza ya kooti |
| |Omwe ahari ba nyin’omurwa yaabura kureebukaho|
| |omu kooti |
| |Omujurizi yaabura kwija omu kooti |
| |oburingaaniza |

|okubinga ba memba omu kooti|Buri memba wa kooti weena arikworeka okugwera|
| |orubaju abingwe omu kooti. Kwenda kuha |
| |encwamu etarikubanganisibwa ba memba baine |
| |kuba batarikugwera rubaju. |
| | |
| |Abantu abari omu mushango baine obugabe |
| |kwanga memba ou batarikwenda. Memba ogwe |
| |naija kubingwa omu kooti kurugiirira aha |
| |maani g’enshonga ezi abantu abo baraaheereze |
| |zikareetera baamwanga. (Eiteeka rya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka. 24 (d); Yeta |
| |kitabaaza na kitabaarizibwa kuhurira |
| |omushango. 41(1) (b)) |
|orurimi orurikukozesibwa |Ebiri kukorwa omu kooti byona n’ebihandiiko |
|omu kooti |biine kubiikwa omu rurimi oruri kuba |
| |nirukozesibwa munonga omuri ekyo kyanga |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka.|
| |21 (1)). Kwonka ebihandiiko eby’etahuni, |
| |diviijoni, n’egomborora biine kubiikwa omu |
| |Rungyereza. (Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |2006, akacweka. 21(3)) |
| | |
| |Ahu kooti yaahurira omu rurimi orw’enzaarwa, |
| |nibiija kuhindurwa biteebwe omu Rungyereza |
| |kandi kope zombi ey’Orungyereza n’ey’orurimi |
| |orwenzaarwa omuhandiiki azibiikye omu fayiro.|
| | |
| |Omwe ahari kitabaaza nainga kitabaarizibwa |
| |yaaba atarikumanya orurimi oru kooti |
| |erikukozesa, kooti neemurondera omuvunuuzi. |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka.|
| |21 (2)) |
| | |

|obuhabuzi bw’ebyebiragiro |BA MEMBA BA KOOTI NIBABAASA OKUSHANGA |
|(Ebiragiro bya kooti |OBUREMEEZI OMU KUVUNUURA EKIRAGIRO KYETAAGISE|
|z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro 69) |ABAKUGU. OMU NSHONGA EGI KOOTI Y’EKYANGA |
| |EBAASA KUSHABA OBUYAMBI KURUGA OMU BARAMUZI |
| |ABARI OMU KOOTI NAINGA OMUSHANGO |
| |BAGWONGYEZEYO BAGUTE AHA KIRO EKINDI BATUNGYE|
| |OBUHABUZI KURUGA OW’OMURAMUZI ATANDIKIRWAHO |
| |NAINGA OMUJWEKYERWA W’OMUHOREREZA W’EIHANGA |
| |OW’AHA KYANGA EKYO. |
| | |
|ebirikuzibira okuhurira |KOOTI Y’EKYANGA TEKAAHURIRA MUSHANGO |
|omushango |OGWABAIRE GWAHURIIRWE KOOTI NIYO EMWE KANDI |
| |N’ABANTU NIBO BAMWE KANDI TEKAAHURIRA |
| |MUSHANGO OGURI OMU KOOTI ENDIIJO GUTEGYEREIJE|
| |OKUHURIRWA. (EITEEKA RYA KOOTI Z’EBYANGA, |
| |2006, AKACWEKA. 44) |
|ENSHORONGA YA KOOTI/EBIRI | |
|KUKURATIRWA OMU KOOTI | |
|SITATIMENTA ya kooti |Mukuru w’entebe obwe arikujwekyera kooti aine|
|erikuza kutandika kuhurira |kubanza yaaheereza sitatimenta, ashoboorore |
|omushango |ekigyendererwa kya kooti kandi ateho |
| |ebiragiro ebyahonaaho. Kooti eine |
| |kushoboorora gye abantu ngu omutima neija |
| |kuguta aha mushango kandi teraafe aha kuguma |
| |kwebigambo ebiragambwe. (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 41 (1) (a)) |
| | |
| |Kooti eine kumanyisa kitabaaza |
| |(nyin’omushango) ku aine orugamba rw’okuha |
| |amazima goona agakwatiraine n’omushango gwe |
| |(niwe aine obwamushinja). (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 41(1)(h)) |
|okugamba kwa kitabaaza |Nyin’omushango nainga kitabaaza niwe aine |
|nAinga kitabaarizibwa |obugabe bw’okushoboorora omushango gwe |
| |n’ekyabaireho. Bwanyima kooti neemubuuza |
| |nainga omuntu weena ari omu mushango |
| |amubuuza, kitabaaza akiheza ayoreka abajurizi|
| |be n’ekizibiti kyaba kiriho; aho niho kooti |
| |erikucumikira omujurizi ebibuuzo na |
| |kitabaarizibwa akamwongyera ebindi. |
| |(Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |41(1)(g)) |
| | |
| |Kitabaarizibwa nawe aine obugabe kuha |
| |enshonga eze obwe arikugamba ekyabaireho. |
| |Bwanyima kooti neemubuuza ebibuuzo aha |
| |nshonga ey’okwegambaho marungi. Bwanyima |
| |naayoreka abajurizi be n’obwamushinja ku |
| |ataine rubanja. Kooti na kitabaaza nibabuuza |
| |abajurizi ba kitabarizibwa.( Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 41(1)(i)) |
|okugamba kw’abajurizi |Abajurizi baine kubanza barahira batakahaire |
| |bujurizi aha mushango. (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 39 (7)) |
| |Omuvunuuzi nawe ashemereire kubanza yaarahira|
| |kooti etakatandikire (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 41(1) (d)). |
| |Kumanya endahiro ei kooti eine kuha |
| |omujurizi, reeba Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro Foomu G, Ekyongyeirweho |
| |namba 4. |
|omujurizi yaabura |Haaba hariho obuhame ngu omujurizi ebaruha |
|kureebuKAhO omu kooti |ekamuhika omu bwire kwonka yaabura omu kooti |
| |kandi atahaire nshonga yoona, kooti neija |
| |kumuha ekipapura ekya “mundeetere” kandi |
| |eyohereze poorisi ebe niyo yaamureeta omu |
| |kooti. (Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, |
| |Akacweka. 39(6)) |
| | |
| |Omujurizi ayesirwe yaaremwa kwija akabura |
| |kuha enshonga eyaamuzibira, akabuzaabuza |
| |obujurizi, omujurizi ogwo naatangisibwa |
| |omubaro gwa sente ogurikwingana akacweka |
| |kamwe nainga naakomwa ebiro 10. |
| | |

| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|ahu orikushanga omwe nAinga|Okubura okwa kitabaaza (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
|boona abakuru omu mushango |z’ebyanga, Ebiragiro.42, 45) |
|baayanga kwija omu kooti |Kooti yaaba eine obuhame ngu ebaruha |
| |y’okuhurira omushango bakagimwekwasiza gye, |
| |kwonka we nka kitabaaza yaayanga kwija kandi |
| |kitabaarizibwa yaija, kooti neekora ebi: |
| |kitabaarizibwa yaikiriza omushango, kooti |
| |neegumusharira. |
| |Kitabaarizibwa yaayehakana omushango, kooti |
| |neegubinga |
| |Omushango gwaba gwabingirwe, okugaruka |
| |kuguhurira kitabaaza aine kuha enshonga |
| |ezirikweyemerera ezimuzibiire kwiza omurundi |
| |ogwabandize. |
| |Okubura okwa kitabaarizibwa (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 43) |
| |Kooti yaaba eine obuhame ngu kitabaarizibwa |
| |akatunga ebaruha y’okuhurira omushango kwonka|
| |yaayanga kwija omu kooti kandi kitabaaza |
| |ariho, kooti neehurira omushango omu butabaho|
| |bwe. Kooti yaashanga ngu kitaabaaza |
| |omushango agukozire bukora ecwamu terikubaho.|
| | |
| | |
| |Kwonka kitabaaza naabaasa kushaba kooti omu |
| |bigambo nainga omu buhandiikye etakora |
| |encwamu mpaka nawe aheereize enshonga eze |
| |ezaamureetiire yaabura. |
| | |
| |Boona baabura kwija omu kooti (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 44, 45) |
| |Boona abakuru omu mushango baabura kwija omu |
| |kooti, kooti neebaasa kubinga omushango. |
| |Kwonka kitabaaza yaarugayo akaha enshonga |
| |ezaamuzibiire, kooti ebaasa kugaruka ehurire |
| |omushango ogwo. |
|oburingaaniza |Omu mikorere yaayo yoona , kooti y’ekyanga |
| |eshemereire kuba neeyebemberwa omu |
| |buringaaniza n’obutagwera rubaju: |
| |Kooti eine kuhurira buri muntu; |
| |Kooti eine kwikiriza omuntu kureeta omujurizi|
| |ayongyere ahari bwino eshonga ye eremeere – |
| |eyeyongyere amaani; |
| |Kooti eine kureeba ngu buri muntu yaaheebwa |
| |okumanyisibwa obu kooti eraashutame kandi |
| |nkahi; |
| |Memba wa kooti atarikumanya kyakwenda abingwe|
| |omu kooti. |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka.|
| |24) |

|ekicwka IV |ENCWAMU ZA KOOTI N’OKUZIRIKUTWAZIBWA |
|ekigyendererwa ekikuru |Ekicweka eki nikishuruurira abantu |
| |ebigyenderwaho omu ntwaza ya kooti y’ekyanga|
| |kandi kiheereza amagyezi aha ncwamu za kooti|
| |n’okuzirikubaasa kutwazibwa |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw’eishomo, abeetabiremu baine: |
| |Kwetegyereza oku kooti erikuhika aaha ncwamu |
| |Kwetegyereza oku kooti erikumanyisa abantu |
| |encwamu yaayo |
| |Kwetegyereza eki omuntu owaasingwa omushango |
| |yaakubaasa kukora omushango gwaheza kuhwa |
| |Ebi kooti erikukora yaaheza kuha encwamu |
| |yaayo |
| |Nihabaho ki kitabaarizibwa yaaremwa |
| |kushashura |
|obwire |eshaaha 1 |
|ebirimu |Okumanyisa obu encwamu eraakorwe |
| |Okukora encwamu |
| |Okuhisya encwamu abu egyendereire kuhikaho |
| |Ebi kooti erikubaasa kukora bwanyima y’okuha |
| |encwamu |
| |Omurimo gwa kooti y’ekyanga kitabaarizibwa |
| |yaaremwa kushashura |

|okumanyisa obu encwamu |Bwanyima y’okuhurira omushango, kooti |
|eraAkorwe |neemanyisa abu kirikukwataho obwire n’omwanya|
| |ahu encwamu eraakorerwe. (Ebiragiro bya kooti|
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 51(1)). Eki kiine |
| |kukorwa hatakahweire biro bitaano omushango |
| |gurugire kuhurirwa. (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 51 (2)). Omwe aha |
| |bukirikukwataho yaabura kwija obwe aheire |
| |ebaruha erikumweta, kooti neeha encwamu yaayo|
| |atariho. (Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 53(b)). |
|okukora encwamu |Encwamu ya kooti eine kukorwa kurugiirira aha|
| |bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe: |
| |Oburingaaniza obwemereire aha mazima |
| |agarikureebuka |
| |Okukozesa amateeka (konsityushoni, |
| |eby’obuhangwa, n’ebindi.) |
| | |
| |Encwamu ya kooti neekorwa mukuru w’entebe na |
| |ba memba boona abaabaire bariho omu kuhurira |
| |omushango n’okuha obujurizi (Eiteeka rya |
| |kootoi z’ebyanga, 2006,akacweka. 8 (9); |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |52(1)) |
| | |
| |Encwamu eine kukorwa obwo ebi |
| |birikukuratirwa: |
| |Buri nshonga neetererwa akaruuru kandi eziine|
| |bwingi nizo zirikurabaho. Omu karuuru aka |
| |abantu omu kooti nibahanika emikono haza |
| |ebarwa. (Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ebiragiro. 21(1), 52 (2)) |
| |Oburuuru bwingana omu mubaro, mukuru w’entebe|
| |naikirizibwa kuteera akaruuru akarikusharaho.|
| |(Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |21(2)) |
| |Kitabaaza na kitabaarizibwa nibabaasa kucwamu|
| |ngu baikirizigane omu buntu (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 52(4)) |
|ebirimu |Encwamu eine kuhaandiikwa kandi ekahandiikwa |
| |kooti. Eine kuba erimu ebi. (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 54 (1)): |
| |Eiziina rya kooti; |
| |Enamba y’omushango; |
| |Amaziina ga kitabaaza na kitabaarizibwa; |
| |Obuhandiiko bukye oburikukwata aha mushango; |
| |Obujurizi omu bugufu, n’enshonga ahabwenki |
| |bawikiriize nainga ei babwangiire; |
| |Ecwamu ya kooti n’enshonga zaayo aha ncwamu; |
| |Eby’okukora bwayima y’encwamu; |
| |Okushashura. |
|okuhisya encwamu ahaRI ABO |Mukuru w’entebe nainga omuntu weena |
|ABU egyendereire |atoorainwe naashomera abantu encwamu ya |
| |kooti. (Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 53(2)(a)). Ahonaaho baaheza |
| |kushomerwa encwamu, kitabaaza na |
| |kitabaarizibwa baine kumanyisibwa ku baine |
| |obugabe kujuriza. (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 53(2)(c)). Bwanyima |
| |y’okushoma encwamu, mukuru w’entebe |
| |n’omuhandiiki baine kutaho emikono n’ebiro |
| |by’okwezi, kandi kukyakuba nikibaasika abantu|
| |boona abaaba bari omu kooti bateho emikono. |
| |(Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 53|
| |(2)(b)). |
| |
|Ekipande kirikworeka ebi kooti erikukuratira omu kuhurira emishango. Kiri|
|aha peegi erikukurataho:[pic] |

|OKUMANYISIBWA AHA KUJURIZA |abantu baine kumanyisibwa kandi bakaheebwa |
| |obugabe kujuriza hatakahweire biro 14 |
| |barugire kuheebwa encwamu nainga |
| |kutangisibwa. |
| | |
| | |
| |[pic] |
|eby’okukora bwaNyima |Kooti y’ekyanga neebaasa kuheereza owaasinga |
|y’eNcwamu |omushango kimwe aha miringo y’okumumanyisa |
| |obugabe bwe n’ebindi ebiyaakubaasa kukora: |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka.|
| |13; Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyang, ekiragiro. |
| |55): |
| |Okusaasirana n’okugarukana |
| |Okugamba ekiri aha mutima |
| |okukiita |
| |okugaruriza |
| |sente |
| |okushaba okusaasirwa |
| |okukwatiriza n’okuguza |
|okusaasirana n’okugarukana |Okugarura busya enkwatanisa eyaabaire eriho |
| |n’okureetaho obumwe. |
|okugamba ekiriho |Kooti neegamaba ekiriho aha bugabe bwa |
| |kitabaaza na kitabaarizibwa etarikugwera |
| |rubaju. |
|okukiita |Oku n’okushashura kitabaaza nari |
| |kitabaarizibwa (owaasingwa orubanja) |
| |ebiyaafeeriirwe. |
| | |
| |Kooti neeragiira kitabaarizibwa ku ashashura |
| |kitabaaza omu bintu nainga sente |
| |ezirikwingingana ebyo bintu. Ahu kooti |
| |erikukiita esente ezirikuhika emitwaro |
| |500,000, omushango nigwoherezibwa |
| |ow’omuramuzi atandikirwaho kuba niwe |
| |yaaguhurira. Omuramuzi yaashanga esente ziri |
| |nyingi aine obugabe kuzikyendeeza nk’oku |
| |kirikubaasika kurugiirira aha mishango |
| |endiijo ey’ekika nk’ekyo. (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 56 (1)) |
| | |
| |Okukiita ebintu |
| |Omu nshonga ey’okukiita ebintu, kooti |
| |neeragiira kisingwa-orubanja kureeta ebintu |
| |ebirikwingana n’ebyasiisikaire nainga |
| |abishashure omu sente. Ekyo kiine kukorwa |
| |hatakahweireho biro mushanju (7) aheirwe |
| |encwamu y’omushango.( Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 56 (2)(a),(b)) |
| | |
| |Okukiita obuhuta |
| |Omu kukiita obuhuta, kitabaarizibwa naashura |
| |sente ezi kooti erikureeba ngu nizibaasa |
| |kumara. Eki kiine kukorwa omu biro mushanju |
| |(7) kooti eherize kuha encwamu yaayo.( |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 56 |
| |(2)(c),(d)) |
| | |
| |Kisingwa-orubanja yaayanga kushashura |
| |Kitabaaza yaayanga kushashura kandi akabura |
| |kuha enshonga ezikweyemerera omu bwire, |
| |mukuru w’entebe naija kumushaba ngu ahe |
| |enshonga. Ekyo kyaheza kumurema kooti neija|
| |kukora ekipapura eky’okukwatiriza n’okuguza |
| |ebintu bya kitabaarizibwa.( Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 56(3)) |
|okugaruriza |Okugarura kitabaaza omu buteeka, |
| |naagarurizibwa ebintu bye ebyasiisikaire – |
| |omu bintu nainga omu sente. |
| | |
| |Kooti yaaheza kushanga ngu kitabaaza niwe |
| |nyina ebintu ahikire, neeragiira |
| |kitabaarizibwa kubigarura. Eki kiine kukorwa |
| |omu biro mushanju (7) kooti yaaheza kuha |
| |encwamu. Kooti neebaasa kuhurira okushaba kwa|
| |kitabaaza ngu eguze ebintu bya kitabaarizibwa|
| |yaaheza kwanga kumushashura. (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 57) |
|sente |Aha kooti neebara buri rusente rwona orwa |
| |koresiibwe nk’omuntambura, okugura fayiro |
| |zoona zishashurwa bakama b’omushango kwonka |
| |sente ezi tizikaakira ezi kitabaaza |
| |arikuheebwa kitabaarizibwa. Nahabwekyo |
| |batakaheerize mukuru w’entebe naabuuza buri |
| |memba enshohoza ye atunga omuhendo gwa hamwe.|
| |(Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |66) |
|okushaba okusaasirwa |Noobaasa kushaba okusaasirwa ahabwokuba |
| |omushango okagukora n’omuntu okamuhisyaho |
| |obuhuta, kwenda ngu omutima gwawe gube mwere.|
|okukwatiriza n’okuguza |Kooti neeragiira ngu ebintu bya |
| |kitabaarizibwa asingirwe omushango biguzibwe.|
| | |
| | |
| |Okukwatiriza nikubaho kooti yaatwara ebintu |
| |byawe ekabibiika nainga ekabibuzaho. |
| | |
| |Okuguza: Ebintu nibiguzibwa nk’ebiri aha |
| |mworeko omu rwijwire (Eiteeka rya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka. 27; Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 58). |
| | |
| |Kitabaarizibwa yaaremwa kushashura omubaro |
| |gwa sente nainga ebintu ebi kooti |
| |yaamucweriire, kooti neekora ekipapura |
| |eky’okukwatiriza n’okuguza ebintu bye. Kwonka|
| |eki nikibaho kitabaarizibwa yaabura kuha |
| |enshonga yoona erikumuzibira kushashura |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka.|
| |28 (1)). Haaba hatariho nshonga yoona |
| |erikuheebwa, kooti neeza kwoherereza |
| |kitabaarizibwa ekipapura ky’okukwatiriza |
| |n’okuguza ebintu bye. |
| | |
| |Abaramuzi ab’amadaara ab’okutandikirwaho |
| |n’abajwekyerwa b’omuhoreereza wa gavumente |
| |nibagira ngu eki kitakakozirwe kooti eine |
| |kubanza yaabuuza abantu b’ahakyanga bareebe |
| |eki bari kukiteekateekaho. |
| | |
| |Ekipande kiriho ebaruha y’okukwatiriza |
| |n’okuguza ebintu bya kisingwa-orubanja. Kiri |
| |aha peegi erikukurataho. |
| |

| |

|Reeba- Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, Foomu C, Ekyongyeirweho namba 4. |
| |Okuguza ebintu bya kitabaarizibwa nikikorwa |
| |omuntu aheirwe obushoboorozi kuruga omu kooti|
| |kandi arikugyendera aha kirango ky’ekiro |
| |n’omwanya ekyakozirwe. |
| |Omukuru w’entebe naaguma naahabura omuntu |
| |arikuguza aha mihendo y’ebintu ebiri nk’ekyo|
| |eriho obwire obwo. Kwonka ekyo kintu n’obu |
| |kyakuguzibwa aha sente z’ahansi |
| |waagyeragyeranisa n’emihendo eriho nikiba |
| |kitiine nshonga ekikuru ezaarugamu zaaba |
| |nizishashura eibanja ryabo. (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 58(4),(5),(6)) |
| | |
| |Abantu abatarikwikirizibwa kugura ekintu |
| |ekyo: |
| |omuntu atoorainwe mukuru w’entebe ngu abe |
| |niwe yaaguza; na |
| |ba memba abari aha kakiiko akategyeki |
| |ak’ekyaro n’aba kooti y’ekyanga n’aba maka |
| |gaabo. (Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, |
| |Akacweka. 27 (3)) |
| | |
| |Ebintu ebitakakwatirizibwa kuguzibwa |
| |Ebintu ebi nibibaasa obutakwatirizibwa nainga|
| |okuguzibwa kooti y’ekyanga: |
| |ekintu ekya kampuni, kwihaho kampuni nayo |
| |yaaba ebaire eine omukono omuri ogwo mushango|
| |ogu omuntu aremirwe kushashura. |
| |Ekintu eky’amakwatane. |
| |Amaka ge nainga ekibanja. |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka.|
| |28) |
| | |
| |Ebi nibikorwa haaba hariho okwikiriza |
| |kw’omuramuzi atandikirwaho okuri omu |
| |buhandiikye: |
| |Okukwatiriza ebintu ebitarikutambura |
| |nk’eitaka; |
| |Okukwatiriza ebihingwa ebikiri omu musiri; |
| |Okushiisha enju ya kitabaarizibwa; nainga |
| |Okubinga kitabaarizibwa omw’itaka rye |
| |(Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |58(3)) |
| | |
| |Ebyaruga omu kuguza |
| |Ezaaruga omu kuguza ziine kukoresibwa ziti: |
| |Kushashura eibanja rya kooti; na |
| |Kushashura ezaashohoire omu bwire bw’okuguza |
| |kuzaakuba ziriho. |
| |(Eiteeka rya kooti z’ebyanga, 2006, akacweka.|
| |29) |
| | |
| |Enshaagi yoona eine kuheebwa owaabaire ari |
| |mukama w’ekintu ekyaguziibwe. |

|omugasho gwa kooti |Kitabaarizibwa yaaremwa nainga yaayanga |
|y’ekyanga kitabaarizibwa |kushashura kwonka kooti ekareeba ngu naabaasa|
|yaayanga kushashura |kushashura kwonka yaayanga nkana, neebaasa |
| |kumwohereza ow’omuramuzi arikutandikirwaho |
| |kandi obwe bamuteireho ebaruha y’okushaba ngu|
| |bamukome. |

|EISHOMO V |OKUHENDA EBIRAGIRO BY’EKYANGA HAMWE N’EBYA |
| |DISITURIKITI: EBIRI KUKURATIRWA OMUNTU |
| |ATAKAHOZESIIBWE NA YAABA NAAHOZESIIBWA |
|ekigyendererwa EKIKURU |Eishomo eri niryegyesa abaraayetabe omu |
| |mushomo enkora ya kooti y’Ekyanga, obwo |
| |ririkubamurikira ebiri kukuratirwa omuntu |
| |atakahozesiibwe na yaaba naahozesibwa emanja |
| |z’okuhenda ebiragiro by’Ekyanga hamwe n’ebya |
| |disiturikiti. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Abaraayetabe omu eishomo eri bashemereire |
| |kwega kurungi ebi: |
| |Okwetegyereza oku zaakooti z’Ebyanga ziri |
| |kushoboorora emanja z’okuhenda ebiragiro |
| |ebikozirwe ekyanga, gavumenti hamwe |
| |n’ab’obushoboorozi abandi. |
| |Okwetegyereza ebiri kukuratirwa omuntu |
| |atakahozesiibwe na yaaba naahozesibwa emanja |
| |z’okuhenda ebiragiro by’Ekyanga hamwe n’ebya |
| |disiturikiti. |
| |Okwetegyereza ebiheneso ebiri kuhebwa omuntu |
| |ahenzire ebiragiro ebikozirwe ekyanga hamwe |
| |n’ebyo ebikozirwe disiturikiti. |
| | |
|OBWIRE |EDAKIIKA MAKUMI ABIRI (20) |
|ebiri omu eishomo |Ebiri kukuratirwa omuntu atakahozesiibwe |
| |Okuhozesibwa |
| |Ebiheneso |
| |Okubiika obuhame |

|EBIRI KUKURATIRWA OMUNTU |Ebiragiro by’Ekyanga ni ebyo ebikozirwe |
|ATAKAHOZESIIBWE |obukiiko bw’ebyaro, egomborora, orurembo nari|
| |obukiiko bwa zaamunisiparite. Ebiragiro bya |
| |disiturikiti n’ebyo ebikozirwe obukiiko bwa |
| |zaadisiturikiti. |
| | |
| |Nihaija kubaho okushutama kwa kooti y’Ekyanga|
| |okw’omutaano okugyendereire kuhurira |
| |n’okushoboorora enshonga eziine akakwate |
| |n’okuhenda ebiragiro by’Ekyanga hamwe |
| |n’ebiragiro bya disiturikiti. Nk’oku kyaba |
| |kyagambirweho aharuguru, baakitabaarizibwa |
| |nibaija kwikirizibwa kujwekyerwa baapuriida |
| |omu manja nk’ezi. |
| |Omuntu weena orikwikiriza ku omuntu ondiijo |
| |yaacumura, obwo arikuhenda ebiragiro |
| |by’Ekyanga nari ebya disiturikiti aine |
| |obugabe kumutabaariza omu kooti y’Ekyanga. |
| |Kitabaaza naikirizibwa kuhayo okwetomboita |
| |kwe omu bigambo – arikwejunisa akanwa ke |
| |nainga omu buhandiikye. Kitabaaza ku |
| |araayejunise akanwa kuhayo okwetomboita kwe, |
| |Ceyamaani, Omuhandiiki nari memba wa kooti |
| |weena naija kuta okwetomboita okwo omu |
| |buhandiikye, reero kitabaaza ate omukono aha |
| |kihandiiko ky’okutabaaza. (Reeba: Eiteeka rya|
| |Kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka. 18(1); |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |47(1)(2)) |
|FOOMU Y’EMANJA |Ahanyima y’okutunga okwetomboita, Mukuru |
| |w’entebewa kooti ashemereire kucwamu yaaba |
| |kitabaarizibwa aine emanja ezi ashemereire |
| |kuhoza. Zaaba ziriho, Mukuru |
| |w’entebenaaragiirwa kutebeekaninisa foomu |
| |y’emanja. Foomu egi neeshoboorora ebiri |
| |kukwata aha manja ezi kooti erikuteekateeka |
| |ku kitabaarizibwa yaakozire, kandi neeba |
| |eriho nk’ebi: |
| |Ebiri kukwata ahari kitabaarizibwa (eiziina, |
| |emyaka, endagiiriro); |
| |Omwanya n’omuringo gw’orubanja oru |
| |kitabaarizibwa arikuteekateekwa kuba |
| |yaakozire ; hamwe na |
| |Omwanya gw’okuhoza n’okucwa orubanja. |
| |(Reeba: Eiteeka rya Kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, |
| |Akacweka.19; Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 48) |
| | |
| |Kitabaaza ashemereire kushomerwa foomu |
| |y’emanja reero we hamwe na Ceyammani wa kooti|
| |nari omuhandiiki bakakataho omukono (nari |
| |ekinkumu) hamwe n’ebiro by’okwezi. Ahanyima|
| |y’okutereeza foomu y’emanja, Mukuru |
| |w’entebeashemereire kumanyisa kitabaarizibwa |
| |kwija omu kooti y’Ekyanga ah’eizooba eri |
| |baramwetereho. |
|OKU FOOMU Y’EMANJA ERI |Oku foomu y’emanja eri kushusha: |
|KUSHUSHA | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |

| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |

| | |
| |Reeba: Eiteeka rya Kooti z’Ebyanga, Foomu C, |
| |Ekyongyeirweho namba 4. |
|EBIRI KUKURATIrWA OMU |Aha kuhurira orubanja, Mukuru |
|KUHURIRA ORUBANJA |w’entebenaaragiirwa kushomera kitabaarizibwa |
| |foomu y’emanja (y’orubanja), reero akamushaba|
| |kwikiriza nari kwehakana emanja (orubanja) |
| |ezaamushomerwa Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga,|
| |Ekiragiro. 49(1)(a)), kandi akandiika |
| |“okuhoza kwa ndi mwere’ nari “okuhoza kwa |
| |nyine-orubanja”, kurugiirira aha bi |
| |kitabaarizibwa yaagamba. Ebigyenderwaho bya |
| |Kooti z’Ebyanga, Ekigyenderwaho. 49(1)(b)). |
| |Ijuka ngu kitabaarizibwa naikirizibwa |
| |kujwekyerwa baapuriida abu araayeshashuurire.|
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Ahu kitabaarizibwa arikwikiriza ku yaahenzire|
| |ekiragiro |
| |Kitabaarizibwa ku arikwikiriza ngu akahenda |
| |ekiragiro ky’Ekyanga nari ekya disiturikiti, |
| |kooti ebaasa kumurabura, nainga emutangise, |
| |nari emuhe ekiheneso kyona nk’oku ekiragiro |
| |ekihenzirwe kiri kugira. Ebiragiro bya kooti|
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 49(1)(c)) |
| | |
| |Ahu kitabaarizibwa arikwehakana orubanja |
| |Kitabaarizibwa yaayehakana orubanja, kooti |
| |neetekwa kushaba abajurizi (abaraaretwe |
| |kitabaaza, nainga Mukuru wa kooti) kuha |
| |obwamushinja (obuhame) aha rubanja oruri omu |
| |kooti. Ahanyima y’abujurizi, kitabaarizibwa |
| |ashemereire kuheebwa omugisha kwehozaho obwo |
| |arikweta abajurizi abe nainga arikuhayo |
| |obuhame obundi. Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro.49(1)(d)) |
| | |
| |Kooti eshemereire kupima obuhame obwareetwa |
| |omu kooti reero ekacwamu. |
|OKUHANDIIKA OBUHAME |Ebi bishemereire kuhandiikwa: |
| |Kitabaarizibwa ku yaayehakana nainga ku |
| |yaikiriza orubanja. (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro.49(1)(b)); |
| |Ohuhame obwareetwa abajurizi (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 49(1)(iv));and |
| |Encwamu ya kooti, ebiro hamwe n’emikono ya |
| |Mukuru w’entebewa kooti hamwe na baamemba ba |
| |kooti abandi abaaba bariho. (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 49(1)(e)). |
|Ebiheneso |Omu kucwa orubanja rw’okuhenda ebiragiro |
| |by’Ekyanga nari ebya disiturikiti, kooti |
| |ebaasa kutangisa kitabaarizibwa, okumucwera |
| |okukora burungi-bwa-nsi, nari ekiheneso kyona|
| |kurugiirira aha kiragiro ekyahendwa. Kooti ku|
| |yaakucwamu kukoresa omuntu burungi-bwa-nsi, |
| |eshemereire kukuratira engyendererwaho |
| |y’ebiragiro bya burungi-bwa-nsi ebya 2001. |
| | |
| |Kooti neetekwa kushoboorora omuringo |
| |gw’omurimo gwa burungi-bwa-nsi oguraakorwe |
| |owasingwa orubanja; omurimo ogwo gushemereire|
| |kuba guringaniire kandi gutarengire amaani |
| |g’ogwo muntu - ashemereire kuba naagubaasa. |

|EISHOMO VI |OKUHANDIIKA EBIRAABE OMU KOOTI HAMWE |
| |N’OKUBIIKA EBIHANDIIKO BYA KOOTI Y’EKYANGA |
|ekigyendererwa EKIKURU |ABARAAYETABE OMU EISHOMO ERI NIBAIJA |
| |KWEGYESIBWA OKUHANDIIKA EBIRAABE OMU KOOTI |
| |HAMWE N’OKUBIBIIKA. EBIRAAHANDIIKWE |
| |BISHEMEREIRE KUBA BIRI EBY’AMAZIMA, |
| |EBIHIKIRE, KANDI BIRIMU N’EBIBAIRE OMUNCWA |
| |Y’ORUBANJA ENSHUMI NKYE EHWAIRE. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |AHAMUHERU GW’EISHOMO, ABARAARYETABEMU |
| |BASHEMEREIRE KUKORA EBI: |
| |Kwetegyereza empandiika hamwe n’embiika |
| |y’ebiraabe omu kooti |
| |Okwetegyeresa omuringo gw’enshonga za kooti |
| |ezishemereire kuhandiikwa. |
|OBWIRE |EDAKIIKA MAKUMI ABIRI (20) |
|EBIRI OMU EISHOMO |Omurimo gw’okuhandiika ebiraabe omu kooti |
| |hamwe n’okubiika kurungi ebyo bihandiiko |
| |Enshonga ezishemereire kuhandiikwa |

|OMURIMO GW’OKUhandiika |Zaakooti z’Ebyanga zoona zishemereire |
|ebiraabe omu kooti |kuhandiika ebiraabe omu kooti |
| |nk’eby’okutabaaza, okuhoza hamwe n’encwa |
| |y’emanja eziraareetwe. Zaakooti z’ebyaro |
| |zibaasa kutoorana omuntu w’okuhandiika |
| |ebiraabe omu kooti; baitu owaatooranwa |
| |tashemereire kuteera akaruuru nainga |
| |kwikirizibwa kukora encwamu yoona omu kooti |
| |egi. |
| |Buri kooti eshemereire kutaanisa ebihandiiko |
| |by’ebiraabe omu manja z’empenda-biragiro |
| |(ez’ebicucumuro) hamwe n’ez’emanja enkye |
| |ezirikubaasa kucubwa kitaka. (Ebiragiro bya |
| |kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro.67(1)) |
|EBISHEMEreIRE KUHANDIIKWA |Ebi nibyo bishemereire kuhandiikwa buri |
| |kushutama kwa kooti: |
| |Enamba y’orubanja; |
| |Sitaatimenta y’okutabaaza; |
| |Ebaruha ezaahandiikiirwe kitabaaza na |
| |kitabaarizibwa hamwe n’abajurizi zirikubeeta |
| |omu kooti (zaaba nizetengwa); |
| |Ebiro by’okwezi obu baayetwa omu kooti; |
| |Eizooba eriteirweho kuhurira orubanja; |
| |Amaziina n’endagiiriro za kitabaaza hamwe |
| |n’abajurizi be; |
| |Amaziina n’endagiiriro za kitabaarizibwa |
| |hamwe n’abajurizi be; |
| |Enshoboorora y’orubanja omu bugufu; |
| |Obuhame obu embaju zombi zaareta |
| |nk’ebizibiti, kubyakuba biriho; |
| |Ebizibiti ebiri omu muringo gw’ebihandiiko, |
| |ku haakuba haine ekiriho; |
| |Ekiragiro (encwamu) ya kooti eky’ahamuheru, |
| |okukishemereire kukuratirwa owaasingwa |
| |orubanja hamwe n’obu kyarangwa.; |
| |Enshonga ahabw’enki kooti yaaragiira |
| |kitabaarizibwa nk’oku yaakora; |
| |Ebiro by’okushashuriraho eibanja rya kooti; |
| |hamwe na |
| |Ebiri kukwata aha ku owaasingwa orubanja |
| |araahikiirize ebyamucwerwa. |
| |(Eiteeka rya Kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka.|
| |22 (3); Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 67(2)) |
| |Zaakooti z’egomborora/tahuni kanso/ diviijoni|
| |nazo zishemereire kuhandiika omu bugufu, |
| |obuhame obwareetwa embaju zombi hamwe |
| |n’abajurizi baazo. Hoona nabwo, zaakooti |
| |z’Ebyanga zishemereire kuhandiika ebiri |
| |kukwata aha zaakaunta za kisingwa-orubanja, |
| |hamwe n’ebiri kukwata aha nshashura ya sente |
| |zaakooti hamwe n’emitango. (obukongi |
| |bw’okushashuriraho [risiiti] hamwe |
| |n’enshohoza ya sente ezo nabyo biine |
| |okuhandiikwa n’okubiikwa) (Eiteeka rya Kooti |
| |z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka. 42) |
| | |

|eishomo VII |OKUJURIZA |
|EKIGYENDERERWA ekikuru |Eishomo eri niryegyesa abaraaryetabemu ebiri |
| |kukuratirwa omu kujuriza encwamu y’orubanja. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw’eishomo, abaraaryetabamu |
| |bashemereire: |
| |Kwetegyereza oku okujuriza encwamu kuri |
| |kukorwa |
| |Kwetegyereza obu omuntu ashemereire kujuriza |
| |Kwetegyereza oku omuntu ashemereire kumanyisa|
| |kooti ku arikwenda kujuriza |
| |Kwetegyereza amaani ga kooti ezijurirwamu |
|obwire |EDAKIIKA MAKUMI ASHATU (30) |
|ebiri omu eishomo |Obwire obu omuntu ashemereire kujuririzamu |
| |Okuhayo okujuriza |
| |Okumanyisa kooti ku orikwenda kujuriza |
| |Ebiri kukuratirwa omu kujuriza |
| |Amaani ga kooti ezijurirwamu |

|OKWANJURA |Ahanyima y’okuha encwamu yaayo, kooti |
| |neeragiirwa kumanyisa embaju zombi ku ziine |
| |obugabe kujuriza. Kitabaaza na kitabaarizibwa|
| |babaasa kujuriza encwamu za kooti, oihireho |
| |encwamu ei kooti ekozire bwanyima y’embaju |
| |zombi kwikirizana n’okugarukana. (Eiteeka rya|
| |Kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka. 32 (1); |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro . |
| |60(1)). |
| |Orubaju orutashemereirwe n’encwamu ya kooti |
| |rubaasa kujuriza ruti: |
| |Ku encwamu ya kooti y’Ekyaro nari seeru |
| |ejurizibwa omu kooti y’omuruka nari eya |
| |woodi. |
| |Ku encwamu ya kooti y’Omuruka nari woodi |
| |ejurizibwa omu kooti y’Egomborora, eya tahuni|
| |kanso nari eya diviijoni. |
| |Ku encwamu ya kooti y’Egomborora/tahuni |
| |kanso/ diviijoni ejurizibwa omu kooti |
| |y’Omuramuzi w’eidaara ry’ahansi. |
| |Ku ekiragiro ky’Omuramuzi wa kooti y’eidaara |
| |ry’ahansi kijurizibwa omu Kooti Enkuru. ( |
| |Eiteeka rya Kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka. |
| |32(2); Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 60(2)) |
| | |
| |Baitu, emanja z’okujurizibwa omu Kooti Enkuru|
| |ziine kubanja zaahamibwa omuramuzi wa Kooti |
| |y’eidaara ry’ahansi hamwe na Kooti Enkuru ku |
| |buzima ziri ez’amaani – nizeetenga |
| |okushoboorokyerwa kwa kooti enkuru, kandi |
| |kooti y’Ekyanga hamwe n’ey’Omuramuzi |
| |w’eidaara ry’ahansi tizicwire manja ezo |
| |n’oburingaaniza. (Eiteeka rya Kooti |
| |z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka. 32(3)). |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |[pic] |
| | |
|OBWIRE BW’OMUNTU |Kijuriza ashemereire kumanyisa kooti ku |
|ASHEMEREIRE KUJURIRIZAMU |arikwenda kujuriza encwamu ya kooti |
|ENCWAMU |y’Ekyanga, omu bunaku bw’ebiro ikumi na bina |
| |(14) kuruga ah’eizooba eri encwamu |
| |erikujurizibwa yaakorwa. |
| |Kijuriza ashemereire kumanyisa kooti ku |
| |arikwenda kujuriza encwamu y’omuramuzi |
| |w’eidaara ry’ahansi, omu bunaku bw’ebiro |
| |ikumi na bina (14) kuruga aha eizooba eri |
| |kooti egyo nari kooti enkuru erikuheera |
| |akahuumuro k’okujuriza. Kijuriza ashemereire |
| |kushaba akahuumuro aka omu biro makumi ashatu|
| |(30) kwiha encwamu erikujurizibwa yaakorwa. |
| |Kooti ebaasa kwongyerayo obunaku |
| |bw’akahuumuro, kaaba katakahwireho na kaaba |
| |kaahwireho. |
|OKUHAYO OKUJURIZA |Kijuriza ashemereire kumanyisa Mukuru |
| |w’entebenari omuhandiiki wa kooti ejurirwamu |
| |ku arikwenda kujuriza encwamu ya kooti, obwo |
| |arikuta omukono aha ndagaano y’okujuriza. |
| |Endagaano egi neeyoreka enshonga z’okujuriza.|
| |(Eiteeka rya Kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka.|
| |33(2); Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 61(4)) |
| | |
| |Oku foomu y’endagaano y’okujuriza erikushusha|
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |

| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Reeba: Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro, Foomu E, Ekyongyeirweho. |
| | |
| |Omu kumanyisa kooti ku arikwenda kujuriza, |
| |kijuriza naija kugambira kooti yaaba |
| |agyendereire kujuriza kimwe ahari ebi ( |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |61(5)): |
| |Encwamu yoona; |
| |Ekicweka ky’encwamu (Kyaba kiri kityo, |
| |heereza ekicweka eki orikwenda kujuriza); |
| |okwomesereza nainga ekiheneso. |
| | |
| |Bwanyima, kijuriza naatekwa kumanyisa |
| |kitabaarizibwa. (Ebiragiro bya kooti |
| |z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. 61(7)) |
| | |
| |Oku omwana arikubaasa kujuriza- Omwana ku |
| |yaakwenda kujuriza, omureeberezi nari |
| |munywani we okuzire naikirizibwa kumanyisa |
| |kooti ku ogwo mwana arikwenda kujuriza. ( |
| |Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |61(6)) |
|Okushashura ebishare |Omuntu arikwenda kujuriza naaragiirwa |
|(Ekiragiro. 65) |kushashura ebishare ebiteirweho kooti ei |
| |arikwenda kujuriramu. Kooti neebaasa |
| |obutashaba kijuriza ebishare kuyaakuhamya ngu|
| |tarikwebaasa – n’ahabw’ekyo takaabaasa |
| |kushashura ebishare bya kooti. |
| |(Reeba: Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro, Ekyongyeirweho namba 3.) |
|ENGYENDERERWAHO Y’OKUJURIZA|Kijuriza naija kuheereza abantu abari |
|( Ekiragiro . 63) |kukwatwaho za kope z’okubamanyisa ku |
| |arikwenda kujuriza omu bunaku bw’ebiro |
| |mushanju (7) kuruga obu yaamanyisa kooti |
| |ejurirwamu. Kope y’okumanyisa Kitabaarizibwa |
| |ku kijuriza arikwenda kujuriza encwamu ya |
| |kooti, eshemereire kutwarwa omu maka ge obwo |
| |kijuriza arikukuratira endagiiriro ye. |
| |Oku foomu y’okumanyisibwa endagaano |
| |y’okujuriza erikushusha: |
| | |

| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |(Reeba: Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro , Foomu F, Ekyongyeirweho 4.) |
|EBYAHANDIIKIRWE OMU KOOTI |Kooti ejurirwamu neija kushaba ebihandiiko |
|EYAaBANDIZE |ebirimu ebyabaire omu kooti ey’ahansi |
| |eyahureire kandi ekacwa orubanja. Kooti |
| |ejurirwamu tereije kuhurira orubanja busya |
| |baitu neija kupima obujurizi oburi omu |
| |bihandiiko reero ehamye ku kooti yaahaire |
| |encwamu y’oburingaaniza nainga ku yaacwire |
| |kubi orubanja. Kooti ejurirwamu ku eraashange|
| |ngu kooti eyabandize ekahozesa kandi yaacwa |
| |kubi orubanja; ngu nainga obuhame |
| |obuhandiikirwe tiburimu muhoho, neija kucwamu|
| |yonka, nainga kurabira omu kushabwa kijuriza |
| |nari kitabaarizibwa, ku ehurira orubanja |
| |busya. |
| |Kijuriza nainga kitabaarizibwa abaasa kushaba|
| |kooti ejurirwamu kushaba obuhame obundi; |
| |obumwe, kooti ebaasa kweshabira obwo buhame; |
| |neebaasa n’okweta abajurizi ku |
| |yaakuteekateeka ngu nibabaasa kugihwera kucwa|
| |orubanja rw’oburyo. |
|AMAANI GA KOOTI EJURIRWAMU |Bwanyima y’okuhurira okujuriza, kooti |
| |neebaasa kukwikiriza nainga ekwange. |
| |Okwanga okujuriza- Eki nikikorwa kooti |
| |ejurirwamu yaahamya ku encwamu ya kooti |
| |eyaabandize yaabaire ehikire. |
| |Okwikiriza okujuriza- Kooti ejurirwamu ku |
| |erikuhamya ku encwamu ya kooti eyaabandize |
| |yaabaire etahikire, kooti niyo emwe |
| |eshemereire kwikiriza okujuriza kandi ebaasa:|
| | |
| |Kuhindura encwamu ya kooti eyaabandize; |
| |Kuhindura encwamu ya kooti yoona nari |
| |ekicweka kyayo; |
| |Kwongyera nari okutuubya aha muhendo |
| |ogushemereire kurihihwa (enkeishi) nari aha |
| |mutango ogu kooti yaashabire owaasingirwe |
| |orubanja; |
| |Okwongyera nari okukyendeeza eshaaha nari |
| |ebiro, nari kuhindura omuringo gw’omurimo gwa|
| |burungi-bwa-nsi, ebi osingirwe orubanja |
| |yaabaire aragiirwe kukorwa.; |
| |Kooti ejurirwamu ebaasa kuhanisamu ekiragiro |
| |kya kooti ey’ahansi, kijuriza aheebwe ebi: |
| |Okugarukanisa embaju zombi; |
| |Okurangiirira; |
| |Okuriha/okukeita; |
| |Okugaruurirwa ebyasiisikaire; |
| |Okushashura sente ezaakoresiibwe omu |
| |kutabaaza n’okuhoza; |
| |Okushaba okusaasirwa/ekiganyiro; |
| |Ebintu kukwatirizibwa, hamwe n’okubiguza; |
| |nari |
| |Omutango. |
| |(Reeba: Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, |
| |Ekiragiro. 64) |
