|OMUTWE VI |
|OKUSHOBOORORA ENSHONGA Z’OMU KIRAGIRO KY’OBUTABANGUKO BW’OMU MAKA |
| |
|ekigyendererwa EKIKURU |Eishomo eri nirishoboorora oku enshonga eziri|
| |omu kiragiro ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka |
| |zishemereire kucubwa. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw’eishomo eri, abaraaryetabemu |
| |bashemereire kumanya ebi: |
| |Amakuru g’obutabanguko bw’omu maka |
| |Okuha emiringo y’obutabanguko bw’omu maka |
| |Okuheereza ebiri omu rubanja rw’obutabanguko |
| |bw’omu maka |
| |Kwetegyereza ebishemereire kukuratirwa omu |
| |kucwa emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka |
|ObWIRE |ESHAAHA EMWE (1) |
|EBIRI OMU EISHOMO |Obutabanguko bw’omu maka ni ki? |
| |Ekiragiro nikishoboorora kita obutabanguko |
| |bw’omu maka? |
| |Embaju eziri omu nshonga z’obutabanguko |
| |bw’omu maka |
| |Obushoboorozi bwa kooti z’Ebyanga omu |
| |kushoboorora enshonga z’obutabanguko bw’omu |
| |maka |
| |ebishemereire kukuratirwa omu kucwa emanja |
| |z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka |

|OBUTABANGUKO BW’OMU MAKA NI |Obutabanguko bw’omu maka n’emihondano erikuba |
|KI? |ahagati y’abantu b’eka emwe kandi abatwire |
| |hamwe omuri egyo ka. Ahabw’emanja nyingi |
| |eziri omu eihanga, abantu ababonaboneire omu |
| |butabanguko bw’omu maka nibaikirizibwa |
| |kutabaaza omu kooti z’Ebyanga, oteireho na |
| |zaakooti z’abaramuzi ab’eidaara ry’ahansi |
| |hamwe n’aha Pooriisi. (Ekiragiro |
| |ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka, 2010, Akacweka. |
| |6(1); Ebigyenderwaho by’Ekiragiro |
| |ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka, Ekigyenderwaho. |
| |3) |
|EKIRAGIRO NIKISHOBOORORA |Ekiragiro ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka |
|KITA OBUTABANGUKO BW’OMU |eky’omwaka 2010, nikishoboorora obutabanguko |
|MAKA? |bw’omu maka nk’okutuntuzibwa kw’omubiri, |
| |okuntuzibwa omuby’okwegaita okw’omubonano, |
| |okutuntizibwa okuri kuretwaho okujumiirana, |
| |okutuntuza ebiteekateeko, hamwe n’oku omuntu |
| |arikwehurira, hamwe n’okutuntuzibwa |
| |omuby’entaatsya ebiri kuhikibwa aha muntu, |
| |obwo nibimuhikibwaho omuntu nari abantu abu |
| |arikutuura nabo omuka emwe, nari (ba) memba |
| |w’eka egyo. Obutabanguko bw’omu maka burimu |
| |okuharahaaza, okuhutaaza, okukora kubi hamwe |
| |n’okutiinatiinisa omuntu otuntuziibwe |
| |obutabanguko bw’omu maka (nari oine obuzaare |
| |nari omukago nawe), obwo nyakumukora ebyo aine|
| |ekigyendererwa kyokumugyema kwikiriza kuhayo |
| |ebintu nari omusingo omu muringo |
| |gw’ekibanda-biragiro. |
| | |
| |Gamwe aha makuru g’ebigambo (Kurugiirira aha |
| |kiragiro ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka ekya |
| |2010, akacweka ka kabiri) |
| |Okutuntuzibwa omuby’entaatsya – okwima omuntu |
| |esente n’eby’etaago ebi ashemereire kuheebwa. |
| | |
| |Okutuntuzibwa omu bigambo, omu biteekateeko |
| |hamwe n’oku omuntu arikwehurira kurimu ebijumo|
| |bya bwasya-bwizire; okweta omuntu amaziina |
| |g’okujumiirana, hamwe n’okukiniika; |
| |n’okutiinatiinisa okurikureetaho obusaasi omu |
| |biteekateeko; okworeka omuntu ku omwineho |
| |obushoboorozi; eitima; hamwe n’omwana okuguma |
| |naareeba emiringo y’okutuntuzibwa erikubaasa |
| |kuhutaaza owaagihikibwaho. |
| |Omutuntuza – Omuntu arikuteekateekwaho kuba |
| |akozire ekikorwa ky’okutabangura amaka. |
| |Nyakutuntuzibwa – ogu n’omuntu ori omu ka |
| |owaatuntuzibwa omu muringo ogw’ahonaaho kandi |
| |ogurikureebwa hamwe n’omu muringo |
| |ogutarikureeba kandi ogutari gw’ahonaaho – |
| |naabaasa kutuntuzibwa nari atiinatiinisibwe. |
|EMBAJU EZIRI OMU MANJA |Embaju eziri omu manja z’obutabanguko bw’omu |
|Z’OBUTABANGUKO BW’OMU MAKA |maka (kitabaaza na kitabaarizibwa) ti mukazi, |
| |omushaija n’abaana baabo bonka, baitu zirimu |
| |n’abandi banyabuzaare hamwe n’abandi bantu |
| |abarikutuura omuka egyo (harimu n’abakozi |
| |nk’abarezi b’abaana, hamwe n’abakozesa). Kooti|
| |ebaasa kucwamu yaaba enkwatanisa y’abantu abo |
| |neeyetwa eka, obwo erikupima omuringo gw’egyo |
| |nkwatanisa nk’ebiragiro okubiri kugira, |
| |kureebera aha bwire obu abo bantu bamazire |
| |hamwe, kandi n’ahu babumareire. (Reeba: |
| |Ekiragiro ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka ekya |
| |2010, akacweka ka kashatu). |
|oBUSHOBOOROZI BWA KOOTI |Kooti y’Ekyanga eine obushoboorozi kucwa |
|Z’EBYANGA |emanja ezi erikubaasa – ezirikwetenga |
| |okushoboorokyerwa ekiragiro ky’amaka, emanja |
| |ezindi ezaashoboororwa omu kihandiiko eki, |
| |hamwe n’ezo eziri kukwata aha baana |
| |ezirikushoboororwa omu Kiragiro ky’Enshonga |
| |z’abaana. Kooti ezi hoona ziine obushoboorozi |
| |kukora aha manja z’okutiinatiinisa, kwenda |
| |kutangira emihondano n’obutabanguko bw’omu |
| |maka. |
|EBIRI KUKURATIRWA OMU KUCWA |Ebiri kukuratirwa omukuhozesa n’okucwa emanja |
|EMANJA OMU KOOTI Z’EBYANGA |z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka nibishushana n’ebyo|
| |ebiri kukuratirwa zaakooti z’Ebyanga zaaba |
| |nizicwa emanja eza buriijo. Baitu hariho ebiri|
| |kutaanaho: |
| | |
| |1. Kooti zishemereire kuhurira kandi zikacwa |
| |emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka omu |
| |bwira.(Reeba Ebigyenderwaho omu kucwa emanja |
| |z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka, Ekigyenderwaho. 14|
| |(8)) |
| | |
| |Kooti z’Ebyanga zishemereire kuhurira emanja |
| |ezi omu shaaha ana na munaana (48), kitabaaza |
| |yaaheza kuhayo okwetomboita kwe omu kooti |
| |(Reeba: Ekiragiro ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka |
| |ekya 2010, Akacweka. 6(10)). Obumwe kooti |
| |ebaasa kushaba embaju zombi kugarukana kandi |
| |zikahuumurizibwa; kyaba kityo, kooti neija |
| |kubaha ebiro bitaano (5). Kwenda ngu emanja |
| |ezi zicubwe ahonaaho, Ekiragiro |
| |ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka nikiikiriza kooti |
| |kushutama eizooba ryona eri yaatoorana, |
| |oteireho n’amazooba ag’omu kahuumuro ka wiiki |
| |(wiikenda) hamwe n’aha biro bukuru.(Reeba: |
| |Ebigyenderwaho omu kucwa emanja z’obutabanguko|
| |bw’omu maka, akacweka 6(11)). Eki nikikorwa |
| |ahabw’omuringo gw’emanja z’obutabanguko obu |
| |oburimu n’obusheesha-shagama, ekirikureetera |
| |kyayetengesa kuzikoraho ahonaaho kutangira |
| |obusheesha-shagama. |
| | |
| |2. Ebiri aha foomu y’okutabaaza |
| | |
| |Emanja ziri kukwata aha butabanguko bw’omu |
| |maka ziine foomu y’omutaano eshemereire |
| |kwijuzibwa omuntu yaaba naatabaaza. Egi foomu |
| |neemanya nka “Foomu y’okutabaaza”. (Reeba |
| |Ebigyenderwaho omu kucwa emanja z’obutabanguko|
| |bw’omu maka, Foomu 1, Orukarara |
| |orwongyeirweho). Foomu egi neijuzibwa |
| |kitabaaza, omujwekyerwawe, nainga memba wa |
| |kooti y’Ekyanga ((Reeba Ebigyenderwaho omu |
| |kucwa emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka, |
| |Ekigyenderwaho. 5). Ebishemereire kuhandiikwa |
| |omu foomu egi: |
| | |
| | |
| |Ebiri omu foomu y’okutabaaza omu kooti |
| |y’Ekyanga |
| | |
| |Amaziina, Emyaka, kitabaaza (nyakutuntuzibwa) |
| |yaaba ari omukazi nari omushaija, oruganda, |
| |ediini n’omuringo gw’oburema (kitabaaza ku |
| |yaakuba abwine), omwoga (omurimo) hamwe na |
| |kitabaaza (nari omujwekyerwa we) yaaba |
| |ashweirwe nainga atashweirwe hamwe n’ahu |
| |arikutuura. *kyaba nikyetengesa,naija |
| |kuheereza ebiri kukwata ahari kitabaarizibwa |
| |(omutuntwize) |
| |Amaziina n’emyaka y’abaana ba nyakutuntuza, |
| |hamwe n’abo baana baaba bari aboojo nari |
| |abaishiki. |
| |Omuringo gw’okutuntuzibwa oku kitabaaza |
| |areesire omu kooti; |
| |Obwire obu kitabaaza yatuntuziibwe; |
| |Yaaba ogu nigwo murundi gw’okubanza |
| |nyakutuntuzibwa (nari omujwekyerwa we) |
| |kutabaaza orubanja rw’okutuntuzibwa kw’omu |
| |maka. Gwaba gutari gw’okubanza, n’emirundi |
| |engahi ei ayetomboitsire omu kooti egi |
| |oihireho ogu. |
| |Haaba hariho ekikozirwe kushoboorora enshonga |
| |egi aheeru ya kooti. |
| |Ekiragiro ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka ekya |
| |2010, akacweka ka mukaaga |
| |*Ijuka ngu: Okwetomboita ku kwakukorwa |
| |omujwekyerwa wa nyakutuntuzibwa, omujwekyerwa |
| |ashemereire kuhandiika omwoga (omurimo) gwe |
| |kandi akaha n’enshonga ahabw’enki yaahayo |
| |okwetomboita ahabwa nyakutuntuzibwa. |
| |Omujwekyerwa hoona naaragiirwa kushoboorora |
| |ekiti eki arikureeteramu okwetomboita hamwe |
| |n’enshonga ahabw’enki naateekateeka ngu |
| |obutabanguko n’okutuntuzibwa bibaireho, |
| |nikugyenda omu maisho kandi kubaasa |
| |kugumizamu. (Reeba Ebigyenderwaho omu kucwa |
| |emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka, |
| |Ekigyenderwaho. 4) |
| | |
| |3. Okwoherezibwa aha pooriisi hamwe n’omu |
| |Kooti y’omuramuzi w’eidaara ry’ahansi. (Reeba:|
| |Ekiragiro ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka ekya |
| |2010, akacweka ka 6(6)) |
| |Ahu: |
| |Nyakutuntuza acumwire omurundi gwa kabiri, |
| |nari akozire ekihagaro eki emirundi mingi; |
| |Kooti erikwikiriza ku nyakutuntuza abaasa |
| |kwongyera kukora kubi kitabaaza |
| |(nyakutuntuzibwa); nainga |
| |Kooti erikwikiriza ngu obutabanguko |
| |n’okutuntuzibwa nibyetenga pooriisi |
| |kubitaahamu; |
| | |
| |Kooti y’Ekyanga neeragiirwa kuhandiikira |
| |pooriisi nainga kooti y’omuramuzi w’eidaara |
| |ry’ahansi reero ekabooherereza orwo rubanja |
| |ngu barukoreho. Foomu namba ya 5 ey’orukarara |
| |orwongyeirwe aha Bigyenderwaho omu kucwa |
| |emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka. |
| |4. Okuhandiikira hamwe n’okwoheereza orubanja |
| |owa Mukuru w’enshonga z’amaka hamwe n’owa |
| |Mukuru w’enshonga z’entuura y’abantu. (Reeba:|
| |Ekiragiro ky’obutabanguko bw’omu maka ekya |
| |2010, akacweka ka 6(7), (8)) |
| |Kooti eshemereire kuhandiikira Mukuru |
| |w’enshonga z’amaka hamwe n’entuura y’abantu |
| |erikubashaba kuguma nibasuura abaana, |
| |okubarinda hamwe n’okubareeberera. Omukuru ogu|
| |naija kwanjura ripoota y’ebi acondoorize |
| |kuruga omu baana hamwe n’ekishemereire |
| |kukorwa, omu bunaku bw’ebiro mushanju (7) |
| |kuruga obu okuragiirwa kwa kooti kukorwa. |
| |5. Okumanyisa eby’okuhurira orubanja hamwe |
| |n’oku kuraatwekwe. ( Reeba: Ebigyenderwaho omu|
| |kucwa emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka, |
| |Ebigyenderwaho. 9, 10) |
| |Okumanyisa eby’okuhurira orubanja, nk’ebiro |
| |hamwe n’omwanya nikwija kukorwa obwo kooti |
| |erikwejunisa Foomu namba ibiri (2) eri omu |
| |rukarara orwongyeirwe aha bigyenderwaho omu |
| |kucwa emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka ebya |
| |2011. |
| | |
| |Okweta embaju eziri kukwatwaho omu kooti |
| |kushemereire kukorwa obwo ebaruha ya |
| |kooti-neekweta erikuheebwa kitabaarizibwa |
| |n’abandi abari kwetengwa omu kooti. Abu kooti |
| |erikwetenga kuyaakuba etababoine kubaheereza |
| |ebaruha ya kooti-neekweta, Mukuru w’entebewa |
| |kooti naija kuragiira ku ebaruha bagirekyera |
| |omuntu mukuru weena, nainga ou omuka ye, |
| |nainga omuntu mukuru weena ou arikutuura nawe;|
| |nainga ebaasa kurekwa aha kicweka kyona |
| |eky’enju ye ahu nyinayo arikubaasa kurahuka |
| |kugireeba. Egi baruha eshemereire kuhika |
| |nyinayo omu shaaha abiri na ina (24). |
| |6. Okugarukanisa hamwe n’okuhuumurizibwa ( |
| |Ebigyenderwaho omu kucwa emanja z’obutabanguko|
| |bw’omu maka, Ekigyenderwaho. 12) |
| |Nk’oku kyayorekwa aharuguru, kooti ebaasa |
| |kushaba omuntu w’obujunaanizibwa nainga |
| |ab’obushoboorozi boona kugarukanisa hamwe |
| |n’okuhuumuriza embaju zombi. Kooti neija |
| |kwejunisa Foomu namba 5 eri omu nkarara |
| |ez’ongyeirwe aha bigyenderwaho omu kucwa |
| |emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka. |
| |Omugarukanisa naija kuhandiika ebyaruga omu |
| |kugarukanisa, reero we n’ab’embaju zombi bate |
| |emikono yaabo aha kihandiiko eki. |
| |Embaju zombi ku zaakwikirizana, kooti neija |
| |kuhandiika okwikirizana oku reero ebahe |
| |ekihandiiko ky’okwikirizana. Ku baakwikirizana|
| |aha bintu bimwe reero bakaguma bataanire aha |
| |nshonga z’orubanja ezindi, kooti neija kubaha |
| |ekihandiiko kirikworeka kubailirizana aha |
| |bintu bimwe, reero ehurire enshonga |
| |ezibataikirizanaho. Okugarukanisa ku |
| |kwakurema, kooti neija kuhurira byona ebiri |
| |kukwata aha rubanja. |
| |7. Eby’okuhurira hamwe n’ebiri kukuratirwa omu|
| |kucwa emanja ( Reeba Ebigyenderwaho omu kucwa |
| |emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka, |
| |Ebigyenderwaho. 13, 14) |
| |Orubanja ku rwakuba rugumangaine, kooti ebaasa|
| |kuhurira orubanja etaine bantu baingi – omu |
| |kihama. (Reeba Ebigyenderwaho omukucwa emanja |
| |z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka, Ebigyenderwaho. |
| |13(1)) |
| |Kurugiirira aha Eiteeka rya Kooti z’Ebyanga |
| |ekya 2006, akacweka 36(2), kooti y’Ekyanga |
| |ebaasa kuzibira abantu ba buriijo nainga |
| |omuntu weena obutaija omu kyombeko, nari |
| |ekishengye nari omwanya oguri kukoresibwa nka |
| |kooti. Ekiragiro eki nikikora aha idaara |
| |ry’okuhurira orubanja ryona. |
| |Okuhurira orubanja kushemereire kworoba, |
| |kukahabura embaju zombi kandi kukakorerwa omu |
| |bwire bukye. ( Reeba Ebigyenderwaho omu |
| |kucwa emanja z’obutabanguko bw’omu maka, |
| |Ebigyenderwaho. 14(8), (9)) |
| |8. Ebi kooti erikubaasa kuragiira |
| |Kooti ebaasa kucwamu ku kitabaarizibwa akorera|
| |kitabaaza kimwe ahari ebi; ebimwe n’ebiheneso |
| |ebiri kubaasa kuhebwa kitabaariza ku |
| |yaakusingwa orubanja: |
| |Okumurabura ku ayegyendesereza |
| |Okushaba ou yatuntwize ku amusaasira |
| |Okuhuumuriza |
| |Okukora burungi-bwa-nsi |
| |Omutango gutari kurenga emitwaro makumi ataano|
| |(Shiring 500,000). |
| |Okuriha/okukeita |
| |Okugarukanisa |
| |Okurangiirira |
| |Okugaruzaho ebyasiisikaire |
| |Okukwatiirira n’okuguza ebintu |
| |9. Okujuriza |
| |Okujuriza nikwikirizibwa, baitu kijuriza |
| |ashemereire kukuratira ebigyenderwaho |
| |ebikuratirwa omu kujuriza butoosha. |

|OMUTWE VII |
|OKUSHOBOORORA EMANJA Z’OMU KIRAGIRO KY’ENSHONGA Z’ABAANA |
| |
|ekigyendererwa EKIKURU |Eishomo eri nirishoboorora ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana kandi kimurikira |
| |abaarayetabe omu mushomo obushonshorokye obu |
| |baamemba ba kooti z’Ekyanga baraayejunise omu|
| |kukora emirimo yaabo. Niriha orukarara |
| |rw’obugabe bw’abaana hamwe n’ebishemereire |
| |kukuratirwa omu kushoboorora enshonga |
| |z’abaana eziraareetwe omu kooti – okubagye |
| |kwabo kushemereire kutwarwa nka kikuru. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw’eishomo, abaraaryetabemu |
| |bashemereire: |
| |Kwetegyereza obugabe bw’abaana |
| |Kwetegyereza emyoga ya kooti z’Ebyanga nk’oku|
| |erikworekwa omu kiragiro ky’enshonga |
| |z’abaana. |
|obwire |ESHAAHA IBIRI (2) |
|ebiri omu eishomo |Okushoboorora “abaana” ni ki? |
| |Obugabe bw’abaana |
| |Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana hamwe n’ebiri |
| |kukitegyeka |
| |Emirimo ya kooti z’Ebyanga hamwe n’obukiiko |
| |bw’Ebyanga omu kurinda abaana |
| |Okukwata hamwe n’okucwera abaana emanja |
| |Okuhurira emanja ezirimu abaana hamwe |
| |n’ebiheneso |
| |Abashemereire kurinda obugabe bw’abaana |
| | |
| | |

|OKWANJURA |Abaana n’ekintu kikuru omu kyanga kyaitu. Omu|
| |bwingi, nibakora kimwe kya kabiri ky’abantu |
| |abari omu eihanga ryaitu. Tushemereire |
| |kubakuza gye ahabw’okuba nibo eihanga rya |
| |nyencakare. Omu kukura abaana bashemereire |
| |kuheebwa obugabe nk’abandi bantu boona, baitu|
| |ahabw’okugira ngu n’abaana bashemereire |
| |kurindwa omu muringo gw’omutaano. |
| |Abaana baingi omu Uganda nibakurira omu |
| |mbeera mbi ezirikutamba eikono okukura kwabo,|
| |zikabaremesa okurugamu abatuuragye b’abakozi |
| |kandi ab’amagara marungi. Emibiri hamwe |
| |n’emiteekateekyere yaabo byaba nibikura, |
| |abaana babaasa kuhabibwa batwarwe omu mivuyo,|
| |batuntuzibwe, banagweho kandi n’obundi |
| |babonaabonesibwe. Hoona nabwo, nitumanwa ku |
| |abaana barikucumura, baitu kooti eza butoosha|
| |ziine oburemeezi omu kucwa emanja eziine |
| |akakwate n’abaana. |
|OKURINDA ABAANA |Gavumenti ya Uganda eteireho okuhamya, |
| |okwebembeza, n’okurinda obugabe bw’abaana. |
| |Ebi bikozirwe kurabira omu kukora ebiragiro |
| |ebi: |
| |Konsityushoni ya Uganda |
| |Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana, Cap. 59 |
| |Bumwe aha bucweka oburi emu kiragiro ekikwata|
| |aha manja n’ebiheneso – nka akacweka ka 156, |
| |157, 200 – oburi kukwata aha kunageijura |
| |abaana. |
| |Okuhaazaana, okwikiriza hamwe n’okuta emikono|
| |aha ndagaano z’ensi yoona eziri kurwaniirira |
| |obugabe bw’abaana. Endagaano ezi zirimu |
| |Endagaano y’Obugabe bw’Omwana (Convention on |
| |the Rights of the Child), hamwe n’Endagaano |
| |y’Amahanga g’Afirika erikukwata aha bugabe |
| |n’endeebeerera y’Omwana (African Charter on |
| |the Rights and Welfare of the Child). |
| | |
| |Gavumenti hoona eteireho kooti z’enshonga |
| |z’abaana hamwe n’ebishemereire kukuratirwa |
| |omu kuhozesa abaana abarikuhenda ebiragiro. |
| |Zaakooti z’Ebyanga hamwe n’obukiiko |
| |bw’Ebyanga bishemereire kurinda obugabe |
| |bw’abaana. Kooti z’Ebyanga nizo kooti ezi |
| |emanja enkye hamwe n’ez’encumurano ezirimu |
| |abaana zishemereire kubandiza ahakuba |
| |nizirahuka kuhikwa. |
|AHABW’ENKI EZI KOOTI |Ziri haihi n’ebyanga, ekikworobera abazaire |
|NIZIIJA KUHWERA ABAANA? |na baamemba b’ekyanga abandi kwenyigira omu |
| |kurinda abaana hamwe n’okuhwera abashobize |
| |kweteisa kandi bakareka emicwe mibi. |
| |Tizirikutiinisa nka kooti ezindi eza |
| |butoosha, kandi eki nikirungi omu kucwa |
| |emanja z’abaana hamwe n’okugaaniira nabo. |
| |Zoorobi kushutamisa waagyeragyeranisa na |
| |zaakooti eza butoosha; |
| |Niziheereza ebiheneso bingi ebitarimu okukoma|
| |abaana nk’oku zaakooti ezindi zirikukora; |
| |Nizeejunisa Orurimi rw’enzaarwa hamwe |
| |n’engyenderwaho etagumire; ebi nibihwera |
| |abaana kukuratira ebirikugyenda omu kooti |
| |hamwe n’okwenyigira omu kuhurira encwa |
| |y’emanja. |
|OMWANA NI KI? |Okurugiirira aha kiragiro ky’enshonga |
| |z’abaana, omwana n’omuntu ari ahansi y’emyaka|
| |ikumi na munaana (18). (Reeba Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana, akacweka ka kabiri) |
| |Ijuka ngu omu ngyenderwaho y’eihanga rya |
| |Uganda aha nshonga y’emirimo y’akabi, omwana |
| |naashoboororwaho nk’omuntu ori ahansi |
| |y’emyaka ikumi na mukaaga (16) . |
| |(Engyendererwaho/Konsityushoni y’eihanga rya |
| |Uganda, akacweka ka 34 (5)) |
| | |
| |Kooti ku erikushanga ngu omuntu ou eyetsire |
| |abaasa kuba ari ahansi y’emyaka 18, |
| |neeragiirwa kuhamya emyaka ei aine. Kooti |
| |neebaasa kwikiriza obuhame, obwakubaasa |
| |kubamu obw’abashaho. (Reeba Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana, akacweka ka. 107 (1) |
| |(2)) |
|OBUGABE BW’OMWANA |Abaana baine obugabe bw’okubaho, okukura, |
| |okurindwa hamwe n’okwenyigira omu mirimo |
| |etari emwe n’emwe. |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw’abaana oburi kubaheebwa |
| |Engyendererwaho (Konsityushoni) y’Eihanga |
| |(Engyendererwaho/Konsityushoni y’eihanga rya |
| |Uganda, akacweka 34) |
| | |
| |Nk’oku kyashoboororwa omu birikukwata aha |
| |bugabe bw’abantu, engyendererwaho y’eihanga |
| |neeha abaana obugabe, kandi burimu obu: |
| |Abaana baine obugabe kumanya abazaire/ |
| |abareeberezi baabo, kandi aba nibaragiirwa |
| |kubareeberera; |
| |Abaana baine obugabe kutunga obwegyese |
| |obutandikirwaho. N’omurimo gwa gavumenti |
| |n’abazaire kwegyesa abaana; |
| |Okuraguurirwa, obwegyese hamwe n’ebindi ebiri|
| |kubutuura embeera z’abaana tibishemereire |
| |kubimwa obwo gavumenti n’abazaire |
| |barikubatura enyikiriza zaabo nk’ediini; |
| |Abaana abakozire ebishobyo tibashemereire |
| |kukomerwa omu bihome ebirimu abantu bakuru - |
| |abakozire nainga abari kuteeberezibwa kuba |
| |bacumwire. |
| |Efuuzi hamwe n’abaana embura-buhwezi |
| |bashemereire kurindwa kandi bakareebererwa |
| |omu muringo gw’omutaano. |
| | |
| | |
| |Obugabe bw’abaana oburi kubaheebwa Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana |
| |Obugabe kutuura n’abazaire (Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana, akacweka ka kana) |
| |Omwana aine obugabe kutuura n’abazaire be |
| |nainga abareeberezi, kandi aba nibabaasa |
| |kumwihwaho: |
| |Ku ab’obushoboorozi baakuragiira ngu omwana |
| |ataanisibwe n’abazaire be; |
| |Omwana ku yaakutaanisibwa n’bazaire (nainga |
| |abareeberezi) kurugiiriira aha biragiro |
| |n’ebigyenderwaho omu kubatanisa |
| |Ku kyakuba nikihwera omwana; hamwe na |
| |Omwana ku yaakubona abaakubaasa kumureeberera|
| |kukira abazaire nari abareeberezi. |
| |N’obugabe bw’omwana kubeisibwaho kandi |
| |akareebererwa omuzaire nainga omureeberezi |
| |(Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana, akacweka ka |
| |kataano) |
| |N’omwoga gw’omuzaire, omureeberezi nari |
| |omuntu weena orikutuura n’ogw’omwana |
| |kumubeisaho kandi akamurinda. Obugabe obu |
| |nibuha omwana obundi bugabe oburimu obu: |
| |Obwegyese n’okuhaburwa; |
| |Okusirikwa endwara nyamwita; |
| |Ebyokurya ebiine ebiriisa byona kandi |
| |ebirikuhaazya omwana; |
| |Ebijwaro; |
| |Enju y’okutuuramu; |
| |Okuragurizibwa; hamwe na |
| |Okutangirwa okuzonzorwa, okutuntuzibwa hamwe |
| |n’okunageijurwa. |
| |N’obujunaanizibwa bwa buri muzaire |
| |kureeberera omwana we. ( Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana, akacweka ka mukaaga). |
|EKY’OKUREEBERAHO 1 | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Okurinda abaana okutuntuzibwa emigyenzo |
| |y’enzaarwa eine akabi aha magara gaabo |
| |(Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana, akacweka ka |
| |mushanju) |
| |Nikihenda ebiragiro kukora aha baana |
| |emigyenzo hamwe n’endiijo mitwarize |
| |y’enzaarwa eine akabi aha magara gaabo. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Okurinda abaana obutakoresiibwa emirimo |
| |y’akabi (Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana, |
| |akacweka ka munaana) |
| |Tihariho mwana oshemereire kuheebwa omurimo |
| |nari kukoresibwa omwoga gwona oguri kubaasa |
| |kuta amagara ge, okushoma kwe, enkura |
| |y’omubiri, enkura omu nteekateeka hamwe |
| |n’enkura omu mitwarize n’emicwe, omu |
| |kangarateete (omu kabi). |
|EKY’OKUREEBERAHO 2 | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Abaana abaine oburema aha mibiri yaabo |
| |(Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana, akacweka ka |
| |mwenda) |
| |N’omurimo gwa gavumenti hamwe n’abazaire |
| |kukora kyona ekiri kubaasika kureeba ngu |
| |abaana abaine oburema baatwarizibwa kurungi |
| |kandi haateebwaho ebikoresibwa by’okushemeza |
| |entuura yaabo. Hoona nabwo abaana abaine |
| |oburema bashemereire kuheebwa omugisha |
| |gw’okwega nk’abo abataine burema. |
|EKY’OKUREEBERAHO 3 | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Obugabe kuhuumuraho hamwe n’okwenyigira omu |
| |by’emizaano (Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana, |
| |Orukarara orwongyeirweho1,akacweka. 4 (a)) |
| |Omwana aine obugabe bw’okuhuumuraho, kandi |
| |okuhuumuraho tikushemereire kushiisha emicwe |
| |ye. Hoona nabwo, omwana aine obugabe |
| |kwenyigira omu mirimo y’eby’enzaarwa hamwe |
| |n’eby’okuhangahanga nk’okweshongora, okuzina,|
| |okuzaana emizaano n’ebindi. |
| | |
| |Obugabe kutunga obuheereza omu bunaku |
| |bw’engamba n’ebigwererezi (Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana, Orukarara |
| |orwongyeirweho1,akacweka. 4 (b)) |
| |Omwana aine obugabe kutunga ebikoresibwa |
| |n’obuheereza bwona obu abantu beetenga, |
| |ekyanga eki arikutuuramu kyaba kiri omu |
| |rugamba na kyaba kiteirwe ebigwererezi |
| |by’omuringo gwona – ebirikwereeta hamwe |
| |n’ebirikureetwaho emirimo y’abantu. |
| | |
| |Obundi bugabe bw’abaana ( Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana, Orukarara |
| |orwongyeirweho1, akacweka.4 (c)) |
| |Abaana baine obundi bugabe oburi kubaheebwa |
| |endagaano n’ebiragiro by’amahanga g’ensi |
| |yoona hamwe n’ebitongore ebiri kurwaniirira |
| |obugabe bwabo. Endagaano ezi zirimu nka; |
| |Endagaano y’Amahanga Ageeteraine ey’Obugabe |
| |bw’Omwana (the United Nations Convention on |
| |the Rights of the Child (CRC)) hamwe |
| |n’Endagaano y’Omukago gw’Amahanga g’Ekizinga |
| |kya Afirika erikukwata aha bugabe |
| |n’okushemeza entuura y’Omwana w’omwiraguju |
| |(Organization for African Unity Charter on |
| |the Rights and Welfare of the African Child |
| |(CRWAC). |
|Obujunaanizibwa bw’obukiiko|Ebi nibikwata aha kooti z’ebyaro, hamwe |
|bw’ebyanga omu kurinda |n’ez’emiruka ahu baamemba b’obukiiko |
|obugabe bw’abaana |bw’ebyanga bari na baamemba ba kooti |
| |z’ebyanga. (Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana, |
| |Akacweka. 10) |
| | |
| |Obukiiko bw’ebyanga bushemereire kurinda |
| |obugabe bw’abaana kandi bukagarukanisa abaana|
| |n’abazaire baabo. N’omwoga gw’aburi kakiiko |
| |k’ekyanga koona kuruga aha kyaro mpaka aha |
| |disiturikiti okukora ebi: |
| | |
| |Okurinda n’okureeberera kurungi abaana abari |
| |omu kyanga ekyo; |
| | |
| |Kuha memba w’akakiiko omwe omwoga |
| |gw’Omuhandiiki w’enshonga z’abaana. Memba |
| |ogu, obwo arikuhwerwa baamemba b’akakiiko |
| |abandi, ashemereire kureeba ngu abaana |
| |baareebererwa kurungi; |
| |Okwenyigira omu nshonga eziine akakwate |
| |n’okutangira okukaatagiirira obugabe |
| |bw’abaana, namunonga enshonga ezi: |
| |Okurinda omwana; |
| |Obugabe bw’omwana kuhungura eby’obutungi |
| |bw’abazaire be; |
| |Okutangira abaana obutazonzorwa, |
| |obutatuntuzibwa hamwe n’obutanageijurwa; |
| | |
| |Okuhandiika amaziina g’abaana abaine oburema |
| |(omu regisita) hamwe n’okubahwera; |
| | |
| |Okuheereza abaana obuhwezi hamwe n’oburaaro, |
| |namunonga abo ababuzire, abanagirweho |
| |abazaire baabo hamwe n’abo abarikusherura |
| |obuhungiro; |
| | |
| |Okusherura abazaire/abareeberezi b’abaana |
| |ababuzirweho abantu baabo, hamwe |
| |n’abanagirweho. Mwejunise emikura y’amakuru |
| |nk’empapura z’amakuru, zaareediyo hamwe na |
| |zaatiivi omu kusherura abazaire abo. Ku |
| |muraaremwe, mutware enshonga nk’ezi aha |
| |pooriisi hamwe n’owa mukuru w’enshonga |
| |z’abaana n’okureeberera eby’entuura y’abantu;|
| | |
| |Okweta, obwo murikurabira omu muhandiiki |
| |w’enshonga z’abaana, abo boona abari kutungwa|
| |akakumu ahabw’okukaatagiirira obugabe |
| |bw’abaana hamwe n’okubanageijura. Mugaaniire |
| |nabo aha nshonga egi reero mucwemu |
| |ekiraahwere abaana nk’abo. |
| | |
| |Omuntu ou murikuteekateeka kuba |
| |arikukaatagiirira obugabe bw’omwana ku |
| |yaakwanga kukora nk’oku omuhandiiki |
| |w’enshonga z’abaana yaacwamu, omuhandiiki |
| |ashemereire kutwara enshonga egi omu kooti |
| |y’Ekyanga. Kooti egi ebaasa kukora ebi: |
| | |
| |Okuhwera nari okuragiira omuntu ogwo nk’oku |
| |ebiragiro birikugira; |
| |Nyakukaatagiirira obugabe bw’omwana ku |
| |yaakuba ari omuzaire, ashemereire kuragiirwa |
| |kuta omukono aha kihandiiko ky’okuhamya ku |
| |yaikiriza kureeberera omwana ogwo. |
| | |
|EMYOGA Y’OMUTAANO |Abaana bashemereire kutabaarizibwa omu kooti |
|ESHEMEREIRE KUHIKIIRIZIBWA |y’Ekyana eki barikuteekateekwa kuba |
|ZAAKOOTI Z’EBYANGA OMU |baacumureiremu kandi eki barikutuuramu. |
|KUCWA EMANJA | |
|EZITABAARIZIIBWE ABAANA |Kooti y’ekyaro niyo kooti etandikirwamu kandi|
| |eine obushoboorozi bw’okucwa emanja enkye |
| |hamwe n’ez’encumurano. |
| | |
| |Oku kooti z’ebyanga zishemereire kushoboorora|
| |emanja z’abaana |
| | |
| |Kooti z’ebyaro nizo ziraatandikirwemu emanja |
| |ezi: |
| | |
| |Okurwanira omu bantu |
| |obwakireereetsi, oburimu: |
| |obwamaraaya; |
| |Okuzaana zaara; |
| |Entwaza erikubaasa kutabura obusingye; |
| |Emitwarize mibi |
| |Okushabiiriza omu muringo mubi hamwe |
| |n’okuzeereera; |
| |Okutaahiirira omuntu kifuba hamwe |
| |n’okutiinatiinisa – okugyendereirwe |
| |n’okutagyendereirwe |
| |Okuhutaaza omuntu |
| |obushuma |
| |Okucwekanisa n’okutaha omu kyombeko/ omu |
| |kibanja ky’omuntu otaine rusa, nainga okwanga|
| |kurugamu (kushohora) bwanyima y’orusa orwo |
| |kuhwaho, obwo ogyendereire kucumura, |
| |kutiinatiinisa, kujuma nari kunyiizya omuntu |
| |weena. |
| |Okushiisha ebintu by’ondiijo muntu nkana |
| |(Eiteeka rya Kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka.|
| |49) |

|OKUHURIRA EMANJA EZIRIMU | |
|ABAANA | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Omukucwa emanja ezirimu abaana, kooti |
| |z’Ebyanga zishemereire kukuratira |
| |ebigyenderwaho ebi zaakooti z’amaka hamwe |
| |n’abaana zirikwejunisa. (Ekiragiro kya kooti |
| |y’enshonga z’abaana, Akacweka. 16) Kooti |
| |zishemereire kukuratira ebigyenderwaho |
| |ebitwaba twagambireho, ebirimu ebi; |
| | |
| |Kooti eshemereire kushutama ahonaaho; |
| |Emanja z’abaana tizishemereire kucubwa omu |
| |bantu – zishemereire kucubwa omu kihama – |
| |ekirikwetwa “okuhurira emanja omuri kamera”; |
| |Okuhurira emanja kushemereire kuba kworobi |
| |nk’oku kirikubaasika; abaana tibashemereire |
| |kubuuzibwa omu muringo gurikutiinisa; kooti |
| |teshemereire kukuratira ebigyenderwaho |
| |okashusha ngu neetonganisa omuzigu. |
| |Abazaire/abareeberezi b’abaana bashemereire |
| |kuba bari omu kooti, kyaba nikibaasika; |
| |Omwana ashemereire kugambirwa ku aine obugabe|
| |kujuriza encwamu. |

|EBIHENESO |Ebi nibyo biheneso ebi Kooti z’Ebyanga |
| |zirikubaasa kuha abaana : |
| | |
| |Okugarukanisa |
| |Okuriha/okukeita |
| |Okugaruzaho ebyasiisikaire |
| |Okukora burungi-bwa-nsi |
| |Okushaba okusaasirwa |
| |Okurabura |
| |Okwongyera ahari ebyo, kooti ebaasa kuragiira|
| |omuntu kuhabura, akareebuza kandi akahwera |
| |omwana kuhindura aha mitwarize ye. Obuhabuzi |
| |n’okureebuuza bishemereire kumara ameezi |
| |mukaaga. (Eiteeka rya kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, |
| |Akacweka.49) |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|OKWONGYERA AHA KOOTI |Abazaire/abareeberezi |
|Z’EBYANGA, NI BANTU KI |Ab’obukiiko bw’Ebyanga (ab’obushoboorozi omu |
|ABANDI ABASHEMEREIRE |byanga), namunonga omuhandiiki w’enshonga |
|KURINDA OBUGABE BW’ABAANA |z’abaana. |
| |Abarikukurira enshonga z’amaka hamwe |
| |n’enshonga z’okureeberera eby’entuura |
| |y’abantu. Aba basheremeire kutaayaayira |
| |amaka, bakagaaniira n’abazaire hamwe n’abaana|
| |(abakuzire kubaasa kushoboorora enshonga |
| |eziri kubakwataho). Ebi baraihe omu |
| |kutaayaaya oku nibiija kuuhwera kooti |
| |okuragiira ku omuzaire areeberera omwana |
| |kandi ku areebuuzibwa kuhamya kuyaakora |
| |nk’oku yaaragiirwa. Ekiragiro eki |
| |nikiragiirwa abakuru kubaakuhamya ngu omwana |
| |ou baataayaayira ariyo naabonaabona nari |
| |abaasa kubonaabonesibwa kuyaakuguma omu |
| |mbeera ei arimu. |
| |Kooti z’abaana hamwe n’amaka. Ezi nizicwa |
| |wmanja zoona ezitabaariziibwe abaana, |
| |oihireho ezo ezi ekiheneso kyazo kiri |
| |okuhanikwa; hamwe n’ezo ezi omwana ateiweho |
| |orubanja oru akozire n’omuntu mukuru. Kooti |
|Omurimo gw’abantu b’omu |ezi nabwo nizicwa emanja z’ekishoboorora |
|kyanga |biragiro, namunonga ezikwatiraine |
| |n’okureeberera hamwe n’okukuza abaana. |
| |Kooti Enkuru neekora aha manja z’okujuriza, |
| |hamwe n’ebicumuro ebihango nk’obwitsi. Kooti |
| |enkuru ebaasa kukora na zaakooti ezindi |
| |ezijurirwamu. |
| |Minisiture y’eby’obuhangwa bw’abantu, abakozi|
| |hamwe n’entunguuka y’entuura y’abantu (The |
| |Ministry of Gender, Labour and Social |
| |Development). |
| |Abaana |
| |Abantu b’omu kyanga |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Pooriisi, erikurabira omu kitongore kyayo |
| |eky’okurinda abaana n’amaka ( Family and |
| |Child Protection Unit) |

|EBI OSHEMEREIRE KUMANYA AHA|Omwana ashemereire kujunaanwa yaabaahikize |
|KUKWATA, OKUSHOMERA HAMWE |emyaka 12 (Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana, |
|N’OKUCWERA ABAANA EMANJA |Akacweka. 88) |
| |Abaana abari ahansi y’emyaka 12 |
| |tibashemereire kucwerwa emanja. |
| | |
| |Okukwata abaana abahenzire ebiragiro |
| |Pooriisi eine obushoboorozi kukwata abaana. |
| | |
| |Pooriisi ebaasa kurabura kandi erekure omwana|
| |etarabiire mu kooti. ( Ekiragiro ky’enshonga |
| |z’abaana, Akacweka.89 (1), (2)) |
| | |
| |Pooriisi eshemerereire kumanyisa |
| |abazaire/abareeberezi b’omwana ou yaakwata |
| |hamwe n’omuhandiiki w’enshonga z’abaana |
| |ow’ekyanga, yaaheza eti kumukwata. (Ekiragiro|
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana, Akacweka. 89 (3)). |
| |Pooriisi ku yaakuremwa kuhika |
| |abazaire/abareeberezi b’omwana, neeragiirwa |
| |kumanyisa Mukuru w’enshonga z’amaka hamwe |
| |n’okureeberera eby’entuura y’abantu, nari |
| |omuntu weena obeibwe obushoboorozi kukora aha|
| |nshonga z’abaana. |
| |Omwana ashemereire kubuuzibwa obwo |
| |omuzaire/omureeberezi we ariho. Baitu eki |
| |tikishemereire kukorwa kukyakubaasa kugwisa |
| |kubi omwana. |
| | |
| |Kyaba kitabaasikire kutwara omwana omu kooti |
| |ahonaaho, omwana ashemereire kurekurirwa aha |
| |musingo gwa pooriisi. Obumwe pooriisi ebaasa |
| |kuzibira omwana kurekurwa aha musingo gwa |
| |pooriisi ku omukuru wa pooriisi |
| |yaakuteebereza ngu okurekurwa kwe kubaasa |
| |kutamba eikono oburingaaniza, nainga ku |
| |yaakuteekateeka ngu ni kikuru kumureka omu |
| |kihome, kwenda kumutangira akabi aku |
| |yaakubaasa kushanga aheeru.(Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana, Akacweka. 89 (6)) |
| | |
| |Pooriisi yaaba etarekureire omwana aha |
| |musingo gwa pooriisi, eshemereire kumurekura |
| |omu bwire butarikurenga eshaaha 24. |
| | |
| |Abaana tibashemereire kukomwa n’enkozi |
| |z’ebihagaro ezikuzire. ( Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana,Akacweka. 89 (8)) |
| | |
| |Baaba bari omu bihome, abaana b’abaishiki |
| |bashemereire kureebererwa ofiisa w’omukazi. |
| |(Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’abaana, Akacweka.89 |
| |(9)) |
| | |
| |N’obujunaanizibwa bw’akakiiko ka gavumenti |
| |y’ekyanga kwombeka nari okupangisa omwanya |
| |gw’okurindiramu abaana abu pooriisi erayange |
| |kurekuurira aha musingo. (Ekiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’abaana, Akacweka. 91 (4)) |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |

|OMUTWE VIII |
|OKUSHOBOORORA ENSHONGA Z’EITAKA ORIKWEJUNISA EBIRAGIRO BY’EKYANGA |
|eKigyendererwa ekikuru |Eishomo eri niryegyesa aha ncwa y’emanja |
| |z’eitaka obwo turikukoresa ebiragiro |
| |by’Ekyanga. Nirimanyisa abaraaryetabemu |
| |ahabikwatiraine n’ebiragiro by’Ekyanga n’oku|
| |bishemereire kukora omu kushoboorora |
| |enshonga z’eitaka. Nirikkwata aha nshonga |
| |z’okugira obushoboorozi aha eitaka, |
| |okurishemereire kutungwa n’okuhikwa hamwe |
| |n’obugabe bw’abantu abataine bwekoro. |
| |Eishomo niriija kwegyesa aha kushoboorora |
| |emanja z’eitaka, reero mpaho tutaazye enkora|
| |ya zaakooti z’ebyanga, hamwe n’okuta |
| |ekitiinisa omu bugabe bw’abantu. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw’eishomo abaraaryetabemu |
| |bashemereire kukora ebi: |
| |Kumanya ebiri kukwata aha kugira |
| |obushoboorozi aha eitaka hamwe n’enkoresa |
| |yaaryo nkoku biri omu Uganda obwahati |
| |Okushoboorora Ekiragiro ky’Eitaka, hamwe |
| |n’ebigyenderwaho omu nshonga z’eitaka, hamwe|
| |n’oku zaakooti z’Ebyanga zishemereire |
| |kubikoresa |
| |Shoboorora eby’okugira obushoboorozi |
| |ah’eitaka nk’oku ebuiragiro n’emitwarize |
| |y’Ekyanga erikuragiira, nka gumwe aha |
| |muringo gw’okugira obushoboorozi ah’eitaka. |
| |Okucwa emanja z’eitaka orikwejunisa |
| |ebiragiro n’emitwarize y’Ekyanga aha nshonga|
| |z’eitaka |
|obwire |eshaaha 2 |
|ebirimu |Ebiri kukwata aha kugira obushoboorozi aha |
| |eitaka hamwe n’enkoresa yaaryo nkoku biri |
| |omu Uganda obwahati |
| |okwanjura Ekiragiro ky’Eitaka |
| |Obugabe bw’abantu abataine bwekoro |
| |omunshonga z’eitaka |
| |eby’okugira obushoboorozi ah’eitaka nk’oku |
| |ebiragiro n’emitwarize y’Ekyanga |
| |erikuragiira, nka gumwe aha miringo |
| |y’okugira obushoboorozi ah’eitaka |
| |Okucwa emanja z’eitaka orikwejunisa |
| |ebiragiro n’emitwarize y’Ekyanga aha nshonga|
| |z’eitaka |

|EKY’OKUTEISAHO KYA GURUUPU | |
|EKY’OKWANJURA OMUTWE | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|OKWANJURA |Eitaka n’ekikoresibwa kikuru omuby’entuura |
| |y’abantu – nirituurwaho, rihingwaho kandi |
| |ry’ombekwaho. Nirikoresibwa omukukora emirimo|
| |y’entaatsya erikureeta obutungi. Abantu |
| |abarikukira obwingi nibabeisibwaho eitaka – |
| |niryo barikukoreraho emirimo yaabo. Enshonga |
| |z’eitaka nizireeta ebiniga kandi nizikira |
| |kurugamu obutabanguko. Ahabw’okweyongyera |
| |kw’omubaro gw’abantu, emanja z’eitaka |
| |niziguma nizeeyongyera kuguma. |
| |Okugira obushoboorozi ah’eitaka nikimanyisa |
| |omuringo ogu eitaka ririkuza omu mikono |
| |y’omuntu (y’abantu). Eitaka niribaasa kuza |
| |omu mikono y’omuntu (y’abantu) omu miringo |
| |ena (4), kandi egi neeshoboororwa kurungi omu|
| |Ngyendererwaho y’Eihanga (Konsityushoni), |
| |Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’Eitaka (1998), hamwe |
| |n’ebigyenderwaho omu nkoresa n’encwa y’emanza|
| |z’eitaka (Uganda National Land Policy, 2013).|
|EBIRAGIRO EBIRI KUTEGYEKA |Engendererwaho y’Eihanga rya Uganda |
|ENSHONGA Z’EITAKA |(Konsityushoni ya Uganda) |
| |Ekicweka kya 15 omu Konsityushoni ya Uganda |
| |nikikwata aha nshonga z’eitaka hamwe |
| |n’ebiragiro by’okuzishoboorora. Eitaka |
| |niribaasa kuza omu mikono y’abantu (y’omuntu)|
| |omu miringo ena (4) – kurugiirira aha |
| |biragiro n’emitwarize y’ekyanga, eitaka |
| |ery’obutwire, eitaka erya mahiro, hamwe |
| |n’ery’empangisano[1]. |
| |Akacweka 26 k’ekirangiiriro ky’obugabe |
| |bw’abantu (Bill of Rights) nikaha ibara muntu|
| |obugabe bw’okugira ebintu wenka nk’omuntu |
| |nainga ebi akwataniise n’abandi. Nikarinda |
| |n’obugabe bw’abantu abaimirwe n’abo abaakirwe|
| |ebintu omu muringo gutarimu buringaaniza, |
| |kandi n’abo abatarihiriirwe nk’oku ebiragiro |
| |birikugamba. |
| |Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Cap. 227 |
| |Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka nikyo kiragiro|
| |ekikuru omu nshonga z’eitaka – okurikuza omu |
| |mikono y’abantu, okuri kukoresibwa hamwe |
| |n’oku enshonga zaaryo zishemereire |
| |kutwazibwa. |
| |Mahiro (Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka , |
| |Akacweka. 3(4)) – Omuringo ogu gwine oburugo |
| |omu ndagaano y’Abakubuuzi hamwe n’Obugabe bwa|
| |Buganda eya 1900. Omuringo ogu nigutaanisa |
| |okugira obushoboorozi ah’eitaka n’enshonga |
| |y’okugira obushoboorozi aha bintu ebi omuntu |
| |oritwireho ari kukoreraho. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Eitaka eri omuntu arikuba mukama waaryo mpaka|
| |(obutwire) ( Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka ,|
| |Akacweka. 3(2)) – Ogu n’omuringo ogu omuntu |
| |arikuba aine obushoboorozi ah’eitaka |
| |erihandiikirwe, obutwire nk’oku ebiragiro |
| |birikugira – obushoboorozi ah’eitaka tiburiho|
| |kikomo. Ogu omuringo n’ogw’Abanyayuganda |
| |bonka. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Eitaka ery’empangisano (erya liizi) |
| |(Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Akacweka. |
| |3(5)) – Ogu n’omuringo ogu mukama w’eitaka |
| |arikuha omupangisa obushoboorozi bw’okukoresa|
| |eitaka kumara obwire obubaikirizanaho obwo |
| |omupangisa arikushashura nyin’eitaka esente |
| |z’empangisano. Bakama b’eitaka erya mahiro, |
| |ery’obutwire, hamwe n’eririkutegyekwa |
| |ebiragiro n’emitwarize y’ekyanga, nabo |
| |nibabaasa kupangisa amataka gaabo. |
| |Eitaka erikutegyekwa ebiragiro n’emitwarize |
| |y’ekyanga (Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, |
| |Akacweka. 4(1)) – Ogu nigwo muringo gu eitaka|
| |ogu kooti z’Ebyanga ziineho obushoboorozi, |
| |kandi nigushoboororwa ahaifo. |
| |Ebigyenderwaho omu nkoresa y’eitaka, |
| |obushoboorozi ah’eitaka hamwe n’okushoboorora|
| |enshonga z’eitaka, 2013 |
| |Ebigyenderwaho ebi bikabagwa ahanyima |
| |y’okwebuuza aha bantu, kandi bigyendereire |
| |kushoboorora kurungi enshonga y’okugira, |
| |okugaba (okuha), okukoresa, n’entwazamu |
| |y’eitaka hamwe n’okushoboorora obukuru |
| |bw’eitaka omu ntunguuka y’eihanga. Nibigamba |
| |ah’eitaka nk’empagi erikukirayo obukuru omu |
| |ntuura y’abantu hamwe n’omuntunguuka |
| |y’eihanga[2]. Ebigyenderwaho ebi nibiikiriza |
| |kuhariho ebitari kugyenda gye omu nshonga |
| |z’okugira obushoboorozi ah’eitaka, enkoresa |
| |n’endeeberera yaaryo hamwe n’obugabe |
| |bw’abantu aha nshonga nizo zimwe. Mpaho |
| |ebigyenderwaho nibiheereza emihanda |
| |eshemereire kukuratirwa omu kuteereza enshobi|
| |ezi. Emihanda egi egyendereire kurinda |
| |obugabe bw’abantu abataine bwekoro, |
| |okwikiriza kuhariho ekyetengo kihanga |
| |ky’eitaka, hamwe n’okureebeka ngu eitaka |
| |ryakoresibwa kurungi kureetaho entunguuka. |
| |Gumwe aha mihanda egi n’okumanya omugasho |
| |gw’ebitongore by’ebyanga omukukora ebiragiro |
| |by’okutegyeka enkoresa n’obushoboorozi |
| |ah’eitaka, okushoboorora emanja z’eitaka |
| |hamwe n’okurinda obugabe b’wbantu |
| |obukwatiraine n’enshonga nizo zimwe. [3] |
| |Kooti z’Ebyanga n’okuzishemereire |
| |kushoboorora emanja z’eitaka |
| |Ekiragiro kya kooti z’ebyanga (Orukarara rwa |
| |3 orwongyeirweho) hamwe n’ebigyenderwaho |
| |(Ebiragiro bya kooti z’ebyanga, Ekiragiro. |
| |26(1)(g)(i)) nibiha zaakooti z’ebyanga |
| |obushoboorozi kuhurira emanja z’eitaka |
| |eririkutegyekwa ebiragiro n’emitwarize |
| |y’ekyanga. Nahabw’ekyo, eishomo eri niriija |
| |kutsimba akati aha nshonga egi. |
|EITAKA ERIKUTEGYEKWA |Eitaka erikukira obwingi omu Uganda |
|EBIRAGIRO N’EMITWARIZE |niritegyekwa ebiragiro n’emitwarize |
|Y’EKYANGA |y’ebyanga. Kurugiirira aha Kiragiro |
| |ky’enshonga z’eitaka, eki nikimanyisa ngu |
| |eitaka ryona hamwe n’emanja zaaryo |
| |nibishoboororwa ebiragiro n’emitwarize |
| |y’ekyanga kandi ebiragiro ebi nibikwata |
| |ekibiina ky’abantu abari kubiikiririzamu, |
| |hamwe n’abo abaatungire eitaka kurabira omu |
| |biragiro ebyo n’emitwarize egyo. |
| |Ahabw’enshonga egi, enshoboorora y’enshonga |
| |z’eitaka erikukuratira ebiragiro n’emitwarize|
| |y’ekyanga eshemereire kukuratira entwaza, |
| |emigyenzo n’emitwarize y’ekyanga ekyo. |
| |(Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Akacweka. 2,|
| |4(1), 28) |
| |Omuntu naabasa kuba mukama w’eitaka ohikire |
| |n’obuyaakuba ataine kyapa ky’eitaka nari |
| |ekihandiiko kirikukwata aha eitaka niryo |
| |rimwe. Baitu omuntu weena, eka nari ekyanga |
| |abari ah’eitaka rya gavumenti, nibabaasa |
| |kuheebwa satifiketi y’okuba bakama b’eitaka |
| |omu muringo ogwegamiire ebiragiro |
| |n’emitwarize y’ekyanga (Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga|
| |z’Eitaka, Akacweka.5), ahanyima y’okushaba |
| |akakiiko k’enshonga z’eitaka ak’omuruka. Eki |
| |kigyendereire kuhamya mukama w’eitaka |
| |namunonga omuntu yaaba naayenda kuriguza, |
| |kurigura, kuripangisa nari kurihayo |
| |nk’omusingo omu banka – kasita satifiketi eba|
| |etarikuzibira omuntu kukoresa eitaka rye |
| |ebintu nk’ebyo. (Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga |
| |z’Eitaka, Akacweka. 9). |
| |Omu biragiro n’emitwarize y’ebyanga, eitaka |
| |niritegyekwa bakuru b’ebika hamwe na bakuru |
| |b’amaka. Bakuru b’ebika nibareeba ngu hariho |
| |abahunguzi abatoorainwe kureeberera eitaka, |
| |n’okureebuuza n’okwikiriza okuriguza. Emirimo|
| |ya bakuru b’ebika hamwe n’amaka neekorerwa |
| |ab’amaka gaabo hamwe n’ahabw’abantu |
| |ab’obusingye (omurembe) oburiija. Baitu |
| |okucondooza nikworeka ku eitaka riizire |
| |niriruga omu mikono y’enganda kuza omubika; |
| |okuruga omubika kuza omu mikono y’amaka |
| |ag’atwirwemu abanyabuzaare baingi; kuza omu |
| |maka amakye agarimu g’abazaire n’abaana baabo|
| |bonka; kuza omu mikono y’abantu buntu. |
| | |
| | Ebiragiro n’emitwarize y’ekyanga erikukwata |
| |aha nshonga z’eitaka: |
| |Nibikora omu kyanga hamwe n’aha kibiina |
| |(guruupu) ky’abantu ekiri kwetegyerezibwa |
| |kandi eky’omutaano; |
| |Obushoboorozi bwabyo bushemereire kuba |
| |nibwikirizibwa ekibiina (guruupu) ky’abantu, |
| |kandi ebyo biragiro bishemereire kuta |
| |ekitiinisa omu bugabe bw’abakazi, abaana, |
| |hamwe n’abantu abaine oburema. |
| |Nibikora aha muntu (abantu) orikwenda eitaka |
| |omu kyanga ekyo; |
| |Bishemereire kuba biine ebigyenderwaho, shana|
| |byaba nibizonzora abakazi, abaana, n’ebirema |
| |– ekintu ekitarikwikirizibwa; |
| |Nibikora aha ku bantu buntu n’oku amaka |
| |garikutunga, gakakoresa; kandi gakagura, |
| |gakaguza n’okusinga eitaka omu banka; |
| |Bishemereire kwikiriza abantu b’ekyanga |
| |kugira obushoboorozi kandi bakakoresa eitaka |
| |erya hamwe; |
| |Obucweka bw’eitaka nibwikirizibwa nk’ebibanja|
| |by’omuntu, eka nari ekitongore |
| |ky’eby’enzaarwa kyona; |
| |Tihariho kikomo aha bwire obu omuntu |
| |ashemereire kugira obushoboorozi ah’eitaka. |
| |Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Akacweka. |
| |4(1) |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Bakuru b’ebika bashemereire kureebeerera |
| |eitaka ry’ekyanga erya hamwe; eitaka eri |
| |nirikorerwa emirimo nk’okuhiiga, okuriisa, |
| |okusheenya, okwihamu eby’okwombekyesa, |
| |eby’okurya, emibazi y’ebishaka hamwe |
| |n’endiijo mirimo y’enshonga z’enzaarwa. |
| |(Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Akacweka. |
| |24(3)) |
| |Ensharo z’itaka eryo zishemereire kuba |
| |nizimanywa abatuuragye boona. (Ekiragiro |
| |ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Akacweka. 24(2)) |
| | |
| | |
|OBUGABE BWA BAAMEMBA |Obu nibwo bugabe bwa baamemba b’ekika: |
|B’EKIKA |Kutuura ah’eitaka ry’eka; |
| |Kuhinga n’okuriisiza ah’eitaka ry’eka, |
| |obushoboorozi aha eitaka eririho amariisizo |
| |n’emisiri; |
| |Kukoresa eitaka ry’ekyanga erya hamwe; |
| |Kuziika abafu baabo ah’eitaka ry’eka; hamwe |
| |na |
| |Kukoresa ebintu byona ebiri ah’eitaka |
| |ry’ekyanga erya hamwe. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|Obujunaanizibwa bwa |Okukorera ah’eitaka eryo emirimo |
|baaMEmba b’ekika |y’entunguuka; |
| |Okurinda eitaka: okutarishiisha; |
| |Okushoboorora emanja z’eitaka omu busingye; |
| |Okurinda n’okurwaniirira obugabe bw’okugira |
| |n’okukoresa eitaka |
| |Okurinda n’okurwaniirira obugabe bw’abantu |
| |abataine bwekoro obw’okugira n’okukoresa |
| |eitaka |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|abandi bantu abari |Mukuru w’enju – Omu ntwaza y’ebiragiro |
|kujunaanizibwa aha nshonga |by’ekyanga, “eka (famire)” nikimanyisa |
|z’eitaka |omuntu; eka neejwekyerwa Mukuru w’eka/Mukuru |
| |w’enju. (Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, |
| |Akacweka. 23(2)) |
| |Ebibiina by’eitaka rya hamwe – Oburi kukorwa|
| |ekibiina ky’abantu kandi bukareebuuzibwa |
| |omuhandiiki w’ebyapa by’amataka owa |
| |disiturikiti. Ebibiina ebi biine |
| |obushoboorozi bw’okureebeerera eitaka rya |
| |hamwe, obwo barikukuratira ebiragiro |
| |by’ekyanga (nainga ekindi kiragiro). Ekibiina|
| |nikibaasa nakushaba kandi kiheebwe satifiketi|
| |y’okugira eitaka kurugiirira aha biragiro |
| |by’ekyanga ebitegyeka enshonga z’eitaka |
| |(Akacweka. 16). Okutunga satifiketi egi, |
| |ekibiina kishemereire kuhamya ku eitaka ryona|
| |nari ekicweka kyaryo kirikutuurwaho kandi |
| |kikakoresibwa abantu n’amaka. (Ekiragiro |
| |ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Akacweka. 23(1)) |
| |Obukiiko bw’amataka – Akakiiko ka |
| |disiturikiti, karikuhaburwa ak’egomborora, |
| |nikabaasa kutoorana akakiiko k’enshonga |
| |z’eitaka aha rurengo rw’egomborora nari |
| |diviijoni, kurugiirira aha kacweka |
| |k’ekiragiro aka. Akakiiko aka nikaija kukora |
| |emirimo ei akacweka k’ekiragiro aka nari |
| |ekiragiro kyona kiri kuragiira. Obukiiko obu |
| |nibujunaanizibwa omurimo gw’okuhamya |
| |n’okuramba ensharo z’eitaka erikutegyekwa |
| |ebiragiro by’ekyanga omuntu ku yaakushaba |
| |satifiketi y’eryo eitaka. Akakiiko |
| |kashemereire kuba kaine abantu bana (4) |
| |(abarimu hakiri omukazi omwe (1)), abaine |
| |obukugu omu nshonga z’eitaka. (Ekiragiro |
| |ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Akacweka. 1; 5-7; |
| |65–69) |
| |Akakiiko ka disiturikiti ak’enshonga z’eitaka|
| |– Akakiiko aka kashemereire kuba kari omu |
| |disiturikiti. Kaine obushoboorozi ah’eitaka |
| |eritaine mukama waaryo kandi nikajunaanizibwa|
| |omurimo gw’okurigabira abari kuryetenga. |
| |Nikaheereza zaasatifiketi ahanyima |
| |y’okwakiira okushaba oku abantu bahaireyo omu|
| |bukiiko bw’egombororora obw’eitaka. |
| |(Ekiragiro ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Akacweka. |
| |8; 57- 64) |
| |Akakiiko ka Uganda ak’enshonga z’eitaka |
| |(Uganda Land Commission) – Kaine |
| |obushoboorozi kandi nikareeberera eitaka rya |
| |Gavumenti ya Uganda – oteireho n’eitaka |
| |ry’emirimo ya gavumenti. (Ekiragiro |
| |ky’Enshonga z’Eitaka, Akacweka. 47 - 56) |
| |Minisiture y’amataka, amaju n’entunguuka |
| |y’endembo (Ministry of Lands, Housing and |
| |Urban Development) – Neekora ebigyenderwaho |
| |hamwe n’enteekateeka eziine akakwate |
| |n’amataka, amaju hamwe n’enkoresa y’eitaka |
| |ebigyendereire kutunguura entuura y’abantu. |
| |Hoona nabwo, minisiture egi niyo eri |
| |kukomokaho kandi ekakyebera ebiragiro |
| |by’eitaka bitakagiire hamwe na byaheza |
| |kuhinguzibwa eishengyero ry’eihanga. |
| |Minisiture hoona nabwo neehabura aha nshonga |
| |z’eitaka kandi ereebuuza emirimo y’eitaka, |
| |amaju n’endembo erikukorwa zaagavumenti |
| |z’ebyanga. |

|OKU OBUGABE BW’ABANTU | |
|BUSHEMEREIRE KUTWAZIBWA OMU|EKIRAGIRO KY’ENSHONGA Z’EITAKA, AKACWEKA KA |
|KUTA OMUNKORA EBIRAGIRO |28, NIKAGIRA NGU ECWAMU ERAAKORWE KURUGIIRIRA|
|BY’EBYANGA EBIKWATITAINE |AHA BIRAGIRO BY’EKYANGA EBY’EITAKA |
|N’EITAKA : |BISHEMEREIRE KUTA EKITIINISA OMU MITWARIZE, |
|okuhabura zaakooti |EMICWE N’ENSHONGA Z’EBY’ENZAARWA EBY’EKYANGA |
| |EKYO. BAITU ENCWAMU TESHEMEREIRE KWIKIRIZIBWA|
| |YAABA NEIMA ABAKAZI, ABAANA, NAINGA ABAREMA |
| |KIMWE AHARI EBI: |
| |Obushoboorozi kuba bakama b’eitaka; |
| |Okutuura ah’eitaka; |
| |Okukoresa eitaka; nari |
| |Okureetaho embeera erikuhenda obucweka 33-35 |
| |obwa Konsityushoni aha bushoboorozi |
| |bw’okugira eitaka, kutuura ah’eitaka nainga |
| |okurikoresa. |
| |Akacweka ka 33 aka Konsityushoni ya Uganda |
| |nikakwata aha bugabe bw’abakazi, obwo |
| |kagumize ngu omukazi ashemereire kuteebwamu |
| |ekitiinisa kirikwingana nk’ekirikuteebwa omu |
| |mushaija; kandi bashemereire kutwarizibwa |
| |nk’oku abashaija barikutwarizibwa oteireho |
| |n’okutunga emigisha (n’okuheebwa obugabe) |
| |nk’ei bashaija baine omu mirimo |
| |y’eby’obwebembezi, eby’obutegyeki, |
| |eby’entaatsya hamwe n’omu by’entuura |
| |y’abantu. N’omurimo gwa Gavumenti kutaho |
| |embeera, emigisha n’ebintu ebigyendereire |
| |kubutuura entuura y’abakazi, okubarinda hamwe|
| |n’okurinda obugabe bwabo. |
| |Akacweka ka 34 omu |
| |Ngyendererwaho/Konsityushoni ya Uganda |
| |nikakwata aha bugabe bw’abaana oburi |
| |kushoboororwaho omu eishomo ry’Ekiragiro |
| |ky’Enshonga z’Abaana. Bumwe aha bugabe oburi|
| |kugambwaho n’okurinda obugabe bw’efuuzi |
| |n’abaana abataine bwekoro. |
| |Akacweka ka 35 nikakwata aha bugabe bw’abantu|
| |abaine oburema n’okubashemereire kuteebwamu |
| |ekitiinisa kandi bakatwarizibwa nk’abantu |
| |abandi. N’omurimo gwa Gavumenti hamwe |
| |n’abatuuragye kuhwera abarema, okukoresa |
| |amaani n’obwengye bwabo okuhikiiriza ebirooto|
| |byabo hamwe n’okubarinda – okubatangira |
| |akabi. |
| |Ekihandiiko ky’ebigyenderwaho omu nshonga |
| |z’eitaka (The National Land Policy) nikihamya|
| |ngu ebiragiro by’ekyanga nibikira kushoroora |
| |n’okutwariza kubi abakazi[4] Ekihandiiko eki |
| |nikigira ngu abanyabukiiko bw’ebyanga |
| |tibarikuta munkora ekiragiro ekiri |
| |kujumiirira okushoroora nk’oku bashemereire |
| |kuba nibakora. |
| |Kurugiirira aha biragiro by’ebyanga |
| |ebirikutegyeka enshonga z’eitaka, eitaka |
| |rishemereire kukurirwa omuntu omwe (Mukuru |
| |w’eka nari Mukuru w’ekika), orikuritegyeka |
| |ahabw’oburungi bwa baamemba abandi, oteiremu |
| |n’abakazi. Baitu okucondooza nikworeka ngu |
| |obujunaanizibwa n’obushoboorozi bw’okukoresa |
| |eitaka bwizire nibuza omu mikono y’abantu |
| |buntu, kandi eki kireetsire obutaikirizana |
| |n’okukoresa kubi ebiragiro by’byanga[5] |

|okuhungura eitaka |Efaakazi n’abaana nibareebwa nk’abataine |
|(EKIRAGIRO NIKIHWERA KITA |bwekoro omu nshonga z’okugira obushoboorozi |
|ABATAINE BWEKORO) |aha bintu hamwe n’enshonga z’okuhungura. |
| |Abantu baingi nibafa batakozire buragwa. Eki |
| |kukyakubaho, Ekiragiro ky’enshonga |
| |z’okuhungura (Succession Act, Cap. 162) |
| |nikiragiira ngu ebintu biheebwe abantu aba: |
| |Omukazi |
| |Abaana (baababaafiire kwonka bakasigaho |
| |abaana baabo, ebintu nibo birikuheebwa); |
| |Omuhunguzi kurugiirira aha micwe y’omugyenzi |
| |(Omuntu orikwikirizibwa kuhungura ebintu, |
| |kurugiirira aha micwe y’ekika ky’omugyenzi – |
| |ogu abaasa kuba omwana w’omugyenzi). |

|OU OSHWERAINE NAWE | |
|OKWIKIRIZA KU OHUZA EITAKA |Eitaka erIkukoresibwa eka tirishemereire |
| |kuguzibwa baamemba b’eka batateire emikono |
| |aha kihandiiko ky’okuhamya ku baikiriza ngu |
| |riguzibwe. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Kiguza yaaba naatuura n’omukazi we nari |
| |omushaija we, abaana nari amafuuzi |
| |abarikwenda kuhungura eitaka eryo, |
| |ekihandiiko ky’okwikiriza kuguza, kupangisa, |
| |kufurura, kuhayo, kusinga nari ekindi kintu |
| |kyona, rushemereire kubanza rwatungwa kurunga|
| |ow’ogwo mukundwa (omukazi nari omushaija). |
| |Eki kiri omu kacweka ka 39 ak’Ekiragiro |
| |ky’Enshonga z’eitaka. |
| |Ekihandiiko ky’okwikiriza kuguza nikiheebwa |
| |akakiiko k’enshonga z’eitaka. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |“Ebyarugire omu kucondooza bikashanga |
| |ngu…Tihariho bihandiiko byona ebi abakazi |
| |baateireho emikono nari ebinkumu kwikiriza |
| |b’ibabo kuguza eitaka. [B’ishenteko b’ebyaro]|
| |bakagira ngu bo nibaba nibateekateeka ngu |
| |abashaija nibaba baikiriziine n’abakazi |
| |baabo. BaaMukuru w’entebeaba tibarikugarukayo|
| |kuhamya eki abashaija barikubagambira. |
| |Nibagira ngu omukazi yaaba |
| |atabeeetomboitiire, nibamanya ngu omukazi |
| |akaikirizana n’iba.” |
| | |
| |Kiihirwe omu Nyorekyerero y’Ekiragiro |
| |kirikukwata aha bintu omu Uganda (A Guide to |
| |Property Law in Uganda, UN-HABITAT, 2007, p. |
| |41 quoting Adoko and Levine, A Land Akatare |
| |k’okumaraho obworo? (Market for Poverty |
| |Eradication? Eky’okureeberaho ky’ebiragiro |
| |by’itaka bireetsirweho omubikwatiraine |
| |n’entunguuka hamwe n’okubinga obworo (A Case |
| |Study of the Impact of Uganda’s Land Acts on |
| |Policy Hopes for Development and Poverty |
| |Eradication, LEMU, June 2005) |

|OMUTWE IX |
|OKUGARUKANISA |
|EKIGYENDERERWA EKIKURU |Eishomo eri nirikwata aha kugrukanisa abantu |
| |nka gumwe aha miring ei kooti y’Ekyanga |
| |eshemereire kwejunisa omu kushoboorora |
| |obutaikirizana ahagati y’embaju ibiri. |
|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru y’eishomo eri abaraaryetabemu |
| |bashemereire kuba nibabaasa kukora ebi: |
| |Okwetegyereza okugarukanisa abantu hamwe |
| |n’ebirungi bikurimu |
| |Okwetegyereza amadaara g’okugarukanisa |
|Obwire |ESHAAHA EMWE N’EKICWEKA |
|EBIRI OMU EISHOMO ERI | |
| |“OKUGARUKANISA” N’ENKI? |
| |Ebirungi hamwe n’ebirikuremesa okugarukanisa |
| |abantu |
| |Abagarukanisa |
| |Ni ryari obu abantu bashemereire |
| |kugarukanisibwa |
| |Okugarukanisa nikukorwa kuta |
| | |
| | |
| | |

|OKWANJURA |N’obu okuza omu kooti kiri kikuru omu |
| |kureetaho oburingaaniza, zaakooti nazo ziine |
| |oburemeezi bwazo. Eky’okureeberaho, zaakooti |
| |zibaasa kutwara obwire bwingi, obwo |
| |zirikukuratira ebigyenderwaho biraingwa omu |
| |kucwa emanja. Eki nkirugamu omutuumo g’emanja|
| |ezitacwirwe. Baitu emanja ezimwe zibaasa |
| |kushoboororwa embaju zombi zitakuratiire |
| |enkora ya kooti kandi hatariho n’abantu |
| |baingi. |
| |Egi niyo nshonga ahabw’enki emiringo |
| |y’okushoboorora enshonga n’emanja eiteirweho |
| |kwenda ngu abantu batoorane omuringo ogu |
| |barikwenda. Kurugiirira aha buhangwa bwazo, |
| |kooti z’Ebyanga zoorobi kuhikwa kandi tiziri |
| |kukuratira ebigyenderwaho bingi nka zaakooti |
| |ezindi – niziikiriza n’okugarukanisa abantu, |
| |nk’oku turaareebe omu kicweka eki. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|OKUGARUKANISA ABANTU |Okugarukanisa nikimanyisa okushoboorora |
|N’ENKI? |obutaikirizana, obwo embaju zombi zirikuhika |
| |ahakukora endagaano. Okugarukanisa nikukorwa|
| |omuntu arikuba ataine rubaju oru arikugwera |
| |omu nshonga erikushoboororwa. Omuntu ogu |
| |naayetwa omugarukanisa/kigarukanisa. |
| |Okugarukanisa nikwenda kushushana n’enkiiko |
| |z’ebika nari ez’ebyaro ahu baakirinju |
| |barikushoboororera enshonga. Baitu omu |
| |kugarukanisa, omugarukanisa naahwera embaju |
| |zombi kuhika aha ndagaano ei barikwekorera |
| |bonka. |
| |Omugarukanisa tarikucweramu ab’embaju ezi |
| |arikugarukanisa; naabuza ebibuuzo ebiri |
| |kuhwera kwetegyereza ekireetsire |
| |obutaikirizana. |
| |(Teeka ekishushani ekirikushoboora ebiri |
| |kukuratirwa omu kugarukanisa) |
|AHABW’ENKI TUSHEMEREIRE |Enshonga ezimwe nizibaasa kushoboororwa |
|KUGARUKANISA ABANTU ABATARI|kurungi kurabira omu miringo endiijo |
|KWIKIRIZANA? |nk’okugarukanisa kukira okwehuuba omuri |
| |zaakooti eziri kukuratira ebigyenderwaho |
| |bingi kandi ebirikurutsya. N’ahabw’ekyo |
| |emanja eziri kureetwa omu kooti z’Ebyanga |
| |nizibaasa kushoboororwa aheeru ya kooti, |
| |namunonga kurabira omu kugarukanisa embaju |
| |zombi. |
| |Hoona nabwo, kuruga 2013, embaju eziri |
| |kutongana emanja enkye eziri kureetwa omu |
| |Kooti Enkuru hamwe n’omukooti ez’ahansi |
| |niziragiirwa kubanza zaateeraho kukoresa |
| |omuringo gw’okugarukana. Ebiri kukiraho |
| |bishange omu Biragiro by’okugarukanisa, 2013.|
| | |
| |Okugarukana kurimu ebirungi bingi kandi |
| |tikuri kutaana n’omuringo ogu kooti z’Ebyanga|
| |zirikushoboororeramu enshonga. |
| | |
| |Ebirungi by’okugarukanisa embaju ezitari |
| |kwikirizana |
| |Nikutwara obwire bukye waagyeragyeranisa na |
| |zaakooti |
| |Nikitwara sente nkye; kandi sente ezo |
| |nizikoresibwa kurungi (abantu |
| |tibarikushashura ebishare bya kooti) |
| |Embaju zombi nizikora kihango omu kugarukana |
| |oku kandi babaasa nakuba ab’omukago nyensya |
| |Nikureeta hamwe embaju zombi kushoboorora |
| |obutaikirizana bwabo: Okugarukanisa nikubyara|
| |embibo z’okukorera hamwe. |
| |Nikurinda enkoregana ahagati y’abantu. Eki |
| |tikirikubaasika omuri zaakooti ahakuba nihaba|
| |hariho kisinga na kisingwa orubanja. |
| |Enshonga ei embaju zombi zirikufa neeguma |
| |erikumanywa abantu bakye kandi kiguma kiri |
| |ekihama kyabo hamwe n’omugarukanisa. |
| | |
| |Ebyakubaasa kuremesa okugarukanisa abantu |
| |Okugarukanisa nikwegamira okwikirizana hamwe |
| |n’okwehayo kw’embaju zombi kushoboorora |
| |enshonga. |
| |Endagaano z’okugarukana tizikaabaasa |
| |kujurizibwa |
| |Embaju zombi zibaasa kucwamu obutagamba |
| |mazima |
| |Okugarukanisa kubaasa kutangwa eikono ebintu |
| |nk’obutaingana omuby’entaatsya, obutungi aha |
| |bantu b’embaju zombi. |
|N’OHA ORIKUGARUKANISA? |Obumwe, baakigarukanisa babaasa kutooranwa |
| |kooti. |
| |Memba wa kooti weena orikureebwa |
| |nk’omwebembezi murungi omu kyanga abaasa |
| |kushabwa kugarukanisa abantu abaine |
| |obutaikirizana omu kyanga kye. |
| |Omugarukanisa murungi: |
| |N’omuhurizi |
| |Naabaasa kumanya ku abantu baakwatwa ebiniga,|
| |reero akore ekiri kubaasika kureeba ngu |
| |embaju tizaarwana kandi zikaremwa kuhika aha |
| |kwikirizana. |
| |Taine ki arikuba naayenda kugoba omu |
| |butaikirizana oihireho okubumaraho |
| |Tarikugwera rubaju |
| |Naayakiira kandi aheereza obutumwa omu |
| |muringo murungi |
| |Naateeraho kureeba ngu buri rubaju |
| |rwayenyigira omu by’okugarukana rutaine |
| |kwerarikiirira, rutaine ekiruteganiise kandi |
| |rurikuhurira ruteirwemu ekitiinisa. |
| |Naabaasa kwesigwa, kandi abaasa kubiika |
| |ebihama |
| |Naatwara okugarukanisa embaju zombi nk’ekintu|
| |kikuru, obwo arikuha ekitiinisa abantu abo. |
| |Naayetegyereza enshonga z’eby’enzaarwa hamwe |
| |n’ez’ekyanga ekyo |
| |Naarinda obwire kandi yaaragaana kwija naija |
|OKUGARUKANISA NIKUBAHO |Okugarukanisa nikubaho embaju zombi zaikiriza|
|RYARI? |kubugana kushoboorora enshonga z(y)aabo, |
| |ezishemereire kuba nizicwerwa omu kooti. |
| |Kooti nebaasa kweta embaju ezitari |
| |kwikirizana kubaija omu kooti |
| |kugarukanisibwa; kwonka baamemba ba kooti |
| |bashemereire kwijuka ku omuntu arikugarukana |
| |na mutaahi we ayekundiire. Ahanyima |
| |y’okugarukanisibwa, embaju zombi zishemereire|
| |kumanyisa kooti ku zaagarukana. |
| |Okugarukanisa nikubaasa kuheza emanja |
| |z’emiringo yoona? |
| |Ngaaha. Emanja z’encumurano (oihireho emanja |
| |ezikozirwe abaana), embaju ezitarikwenda |
| |kukwatanisa kushoboorora enshonga |
| |(abarikubaasa kurwana), hamwe n’emanja ezi |
| |kooti z’Ebyanga zitaine bushoboorozi kucwa |
| |zishemereire kutwarwa omu kooti ez’ahaiguru. |
| |Okwongyera ahari ekyo, abantu abamwe |
| |nibakunda kutwara enshonga zaabo omu kooti, |
| |mpaho bakeetonganaho obwo abantu boona |
| |bahureire. Okugarukanisibwa tikurikugyemwa |
| |muntu weena. |
| | |
| |[pic] |
| | |
| |Ebi oshemereire kuteekateekaho otakacwiremu |
| |yaaba orubanja rubaasa kucubwa kurabira omu |
| |kugarukanisa embaju ibiri |
| |Embaju zombi zeetegwire kwetaba omu hururu |
| |y’okugarukanisibwa? |
| |Hariho omugarukanisa arikubaasa kukora ogwo |
| |murimo kurungi? |
| |Hariho owaarateireho kugarukanisa abantu aba?|
| |Orwo rubanja rwaratweire omu kooti? Ebyo |
| |bikarugamu ki? Mbwenu okugarukanisa |
| |kukaashoboorora kuta ebyaremire kooti hamwe |
| |n’omugarukanisa owaabandize? |
| |Ahabw’enki embaju zombi ziremirwe |
| |kushoboorora enshonga zaabo bo bonka? |
| |Muhwezi na Mugumya n’abataahi kumara emyaka |
| |30. Baitu ameezi 3 agahweire batungire |
| |obutaikirizana buri kukomooka aha muti |
| |muhango oguri omu mbuga ya Muhwezi. Mugumya |
| |aruhire kureeba amababi g’ogwo muti agari |
| |kugwa omu mbuga ye, ekiri kumureetera |
| |yaayeherera kabiri buri izooba. Atwire |
| |naarahira kutema ogwo muti, baitu we Muhwezi |
| |naagukunda kandi tarikwenda kuteekateeka |
| |kugutema. Naagira ngu Mugumya naakunda |
| |entonganisibwa otubabi tukye oturi kugwa omu |
| |mbuga ye kandi ngu n’omushaija agumire. |
| |Obutaikirizana obu nibuziikuura entongane |
| |zaabo z’ensharo n’emigoorora ezi baabaire |
| |baine enyimaho. Buri omwe naacwamu kubyara |
| |amahwa ga rutaazya omu nsharo-nsharo |
| |arikuzibira ondi kucwekanisa. Aha muheru |
| |ababiri nibareeta enshonga yaabo omu kooti |
| |y’ekyanga. |

| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
|EBIGYENDERWAHO 5 |OKUGARUKANISIBWA NIKUKORWA KUTA? |
|EBISHEMEREIRE KUKURATIRWA |Ebi nibihwera kigarukanisa omu kugarukanisa |
|OMU KUGARUKANISA ABANTU |embaju zombi, reero abahisya n’aha kuhandiika|
| |endagaano. |
| | |
| |Ekigyenderwaho 1: Taanisa abantu n’enshonga |
| |ei barikufa. |
| |Kigarukanisa naahwera abantu kumanya ku |
| |ekizibu kitari muntu ou arikufa nawe. Ekizibu|
| |n’ekintu ekyabaireho, enteekateeka eriho |
| |obwire obwo, nainga obutaikirizana |
| |bw’omuringo gwona. Embaju zombi zishemereire|
| |kumanya ku ekizibu atari muntu kureka |
| |ebikorwa n’ebigambo ebi agambire; omuntu |
| |naakira ebyo. Eky’okureeberaho, omukazi waawe|
| |naabaasa kuruga omu mbeera (omu muudu), reero|
| |eki kireeteho engungu omu bashweraine; baitu |
| |eki tikirikumanyisa ngu omukazi ogu n’omuntu |
| |mubi! Ekizibu ni muudu mbi n’ekigireesire – |
| |ekizibu ti mukazi waawe. |
| |N’ahabw’ekyo, nikikuru kutaanisa ekizibu |
| |n’abantu abaine eki barikufa. Ekigyendererwa|
| |ky’okugarukanisa n’okutaahirira kandi |
| |okahezaho ekizibu, kutarikuhezaho abantu |
| |abaine obutaikirizana. Omurimo gwa |
| |kigarukanisa n’okuhwera embaju zombi kumanya |
| |enshonga ei barikufa – ekizibu. |
| | |
| |Ekigyenderwaho 2: Ta omutima aha bintu |
| |ebirikuhimbya, bitari ebyo ebirikushabwa. |
| |“Ebirikushabwa” nikimanyisaki? |
| |Nikimanyisa ebintu ebi bagyendereire kwiha |
| |omu mpanuura eziri kuteeraho kubagarukanisa; |
| |n’ebyo ebi barikwenda ngu bibakorerwe nainga |
| |bibaheebwe batakaikirize kugarukana n’orubaju|
| |orundi. |
| |Ebirikushabwa birimu nk’ebi: |
| | |
| |Naatekwa yanshashura Shiringi 30,000/= kandi |
| |akaatuurira ekika kyona oku yanshangiize. |
| |Yaaba atakozire eki, niinyija kumukoraho |
| |nk’omushaho. |
| |Naateekwa yampa ente 12 hamwe n’egaari. |
| |Tihariho ekindi eki ndikwenda; tinkwenda |
| |ebiri ahansi y’ebi |
| | |
| |“Ebintu ebirikuhimbya” nikimanyisaki? |
| |Nikimanyisa ebintu ebirikureetera abantu |
| |kwenda kugarukana; niyo nshonga ahabw’enki |
| |nibenda kushoboororera enshonga aheeru ya |
| |kooti. Ebirikuhimbya nibyegamira ebyetengo, |
| |ebiri kubakwataho hamwe n’ebyo ebi |
| |barikutwara nka bikuru. |
| |Nikikuru kumanya kuhariho abantu abandi |
| |abaine ebi barikwetenga hamwe n’ebiri |
| |kubakwataho omu nshonga ei oriyo nooteraho |
| |kushoboorora, oihireho embaju ibiri ezi |
| |orikumanya. Ahabw’enshonga egi, n’eky’oburyo |
| |kumanya ebyakubaasa kuhimbya n’abo abatariho |
| |ahakuba endagaano y’ababiri neija |
| |kubakwataho. |
| |Ebirikuhimbya birimu ebi: |
| |Okuriha/Okukeita |
| |Eiziina rirungi |
| |Okutenda kworeka ekiniga omu bantu, namunonga|
| |omuntu yaaba naamanya ku ekiniga |
| |kirikumukoresa ebiri kuhemura |
| |Enkwatanisa, obuzaare, akakwate, hamwe |
| |n’emikago |
| |Okwenda ngu otata obutungi hamwe n’amagara |
| |gaawe omu kabi/okurinda amagara n’ebintu |
| |Okuhoora enzigu |
| | |
| |Nk’oku kiraashoboororwe aha rupaura |
| |oruraakurateho, ebirikuhimbya bibaasa kugira |
| |emiringo mingi y’ebi omuntu arikwenda. |
| | |
| |Kuruga aha ncwamu y’ebi omuntu arikwenda kuza|
| |aha birikuhimbya |
| | |
| |[pic] |
| |Nk’oku muhogo erikukurira ahansi omu eitaka, |
| |noobaasa butamanya ebirikuhimbya omuntu |
| |kurabira omu kuhurira bi arikugamba. |
| |Omugarukanisa ashemereire kwetegyereza kandi |
| |akeecumintiiriza aha bi abantu abo baagamba, |
| |kwenda kwihayo ebirikubahimbya ebi baakubaasa|
| |kuba baashereka. Nangwa n’obumwe, ab’embaju |
| |ezitari kwikirizana babaasa kuba |
| |batarikumanya ebirikubahimbya, kwonka |
| |orugyendo rw’okugarukanisa rushemereire |
| |kubita aha mushana, nk’omuringo gumwe |
| |gw’okushoboorora enshonga. |
| | |
| |Katugaruke kakye ahaby’okureeberaho bi ebintu|
| |ebirikushabwa: |
| |Ahabw’enki omuntu A arikwenda ngu omuntu B |
| |ayatuurire ekika kyona oku yaamushagiize? |
| |Ahabw’enki mwene-ishe w’omuntu naatekateeka |
| |ngu ashemereire kuhungura ente nyingi? |
| |Ebintu ebi embaju zombi zirikwenda bibaasa |
| |kuguma nibihinduka omu rugyendo |
| |rw’okugarukana, kwonka ebirikuhimbya abantu |
| |kugarukana nibikira kuguma nk’okubiri |
| |okutwarira hamwe. Abantu n’obu baakuba batari|
| |kwikirizana n’ebintu ebi buri omwe |
| |ashemereire kuheebwa, tikiri kumanyisa ngu |
| |n’ebiri kubahimbya tibiri kukwatagana. Kooti |
| |eshemereire kumanya ebirikuhimbya abantu abo |
| |ebibari kushushanisa. Omu bigambo ebindi, |
| |kigarukanisa nari kooti teshemereire kufa |
| |kubuuza, “Nooyenda ki?”. Nikikuru ebabuuze |
| |eti, “Ahabw’enki nimwenda ebimwashaba? |
| |Ekibuuzo eki nikikuhwera kuhikaanisa |
| |ebirikuhimbya embaju zombi, kutari |
| |kuhikaanisa ebiri kushabwa. |
| | |
| |Endagaano nungi n’ezo eziri kuhikaanisa |
| |ebirikuhimbya embaju zombi, omu muringo ogu |
| |bombi barikwikiriza – tihariho orikusinga |
| |mutaahi we; boona nibagoba. |
| | |
| |Mwine: Ogu omuti nikuteekwa kutemwa! Ogu |
| |omushema naija kungaya kuhisya nkahi! |
| |Tindikwija kuguma ninyeherera amababi |
| |butoosha. Nintuura nyenka kwiha omukazi |
| |wangye afa. Kwiha ogu mushaija ayongyera aha |
| |nju ye, hamwe n’okugura ente ezindi, |
| |akatandika kuntwariza kubi! Naashiisha embuga|
| |yangye, kandi hariho n’obu naashanga |
| |abatabani barikuyombera hamwe n’okuzaanira |
| |aha bintu byangye! Eki Mwebesa naakikora |
| |ahabw’okunyanga; agyenderereire kumpitsyaho |
| |akabi – naatekateeka ngu n’ow’amaani; ngu |
| |nankira, kandi obwo nimukiza emyaka 10. Eki |
| |nikingwisa kubi ahakuba tutwire turi |
| |ab’omukago kumara emyaka mingi. Naateekwa |
| |yaatema omuti ogu kandi akazitira n’ekibanja |
| |kye, namunonga ahu turikwatanira! Amazima |
| |gari ngu omuti ogwo gubaasa kuba guri omu |
| |eitaka ryangye. |
| | |
| |Mwebesa: Ogwo muti tindigutema! Ogu |
| |n’omushaija agumire – tindikumanya |
| |n’okuyaabaire omutaahi kandi munywani wangye |
| |kumara obwire buraingwa. Ago amababi tigari |
| |maingi – kandi ogwo muti gukabyarwa |
| |shwenkuru. Nikireebeka kwakuzire yaaba |
| |omushaija mubi; Kigumire kugamba nawe. |
| |Hariho obu naayohereza aboojo bangye |
| |kweherera embuga ye, reero we akababinga – |
| |Nooshanga nayenda ngu muhe sente! Yaaba aine |
| |eki arikufa n’omuti, afuruke – asherure |
| |eitaka erindi! Haza manya, n’ekicweka eki |
| |arikugira ngu amababi g’omuti nigagwa |
| |nikibaasa kuba kiri ekicweka ky’embuga |
| |yangye! |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |Ekigyenderwaho 3: Sherura emiringo mingi |
| |erikubaasa kuhwera embaju zombi kushoboorora |
| |hamwe enshonga yaabo, obwo baine eki |
| |barikugobamu. |
| |Ahanyima y’okumanya ebirikuhimbya embaju |
| |zombi, kigarukanisa ashemereire kubateera |
| |omuhimbo kandi akabahwera kuteekateeka |
| |emiringo y’okuhika ahari ebyo bintu ebiri |
| |kubahimbya. |
| |Kigarukanisa ashemereire kukora hamwe |
| |n’embaju zombi kusherura emiringo |
| |y’okushoboorora enshonga eyegamiire ebiri |
| |kubahimbya; emiringo ei bombi baraagoberemu. |
| |Ni kikuru kutaanisa “eidaara ry’okusherura |
| |emiringo y’okushoboororamu enshonga” |
| |n’eidaara eriraakurateho “ery’okucwamu |
| |eky’ahamuheru”. |
| |Kooti yaaba eyetsire embaju zombi kuheereza |
| |emiringo ei barikuteekateeka ngu neebaasa |
| |kuhwera omu kushoboorora enshonga yaabo, |
| |kooti niyo emwe eshemereire kumanyisa abantu |
| |b’embaju zombi kubatari kwikirizibwa |
| |kuhakanisa emiringo eyaaretwa ow’orubaju |
| |orundi. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| |EKIGYENDERWAHO 4: HAMIRA AHA KUGARUKANISA |
| |ABANTU OKUTARIMU OKUGWERA ORUBAJU. |
| |Kigarukanisa hamwe n’abo abu agyendereire |
| |kugarukanisa bashemereire kutaho ebiragiro |
| |ebi baraakuratire kupima oburingaaniza bwa |
| |buri muringo ogwaheebwayo kushoboorora |
| |enshonga. Ebiraakuratirwe bishemereire |
| |kureetwa omuntu ondiijo ataine rubaju oru |
| |arikugwera, reero embaju zombi |
| |zikabiikirizanaho. |
| |Nimubaasa kukuratira ebi: |
| |Enshonga nk’ezi zikashoboororwa zita enyimaho|
| |Ni biragiro ki eby’eihanga n’ekyanga ebya |
| |kubaasa kuhwera omu kushoboorora enshonga egi|
| |Omukungu omu nshonga nk’ezi – omuntu |
| |orikwetegyereza encwa y’emanja nk’ezi |
| |Omuhendo gw’ekintu ekireetsire obutaikirizana|
| | |
| |Ekigyenderwaho 5: Teekateeka aha birungi |
| |n’ebibi ebya kubaasa kubaho, ababiri ku |
| |baakuba batahikire aha ndagaano |
| |Ogu n’omugisha gw’ababiri kuteekateeka aha |
| |kishemereire kukorwa ku baakuba batahikire |
| |aha ndagaano, ahanyima ya kigarukanisa |
| |kuteeraho kubagarukanisa. Okubamurikira |
| |ebyakubaasa kubahikaho ku baakuba |
| |batashobooreire ebi barikufa kibaasa |
| |kubareetera baafayo kusherura emiringo |
| |y’okuhezaho obutaikirizana bwabo. |
| |Eki omuntu yaikiriza kukorera ondiijo kyaba |
| |nikihita, ekiyaaba naagyenda, n’eky’oburyo |
| |nyakuhebwa omugisha ogwo kwikiriza eki |
| |yaaraganisibwa, reero kikamukorerwa. |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |
| | |

 Ebi oshemereire kwijuka omubikwatiraine n’okugarukanisa

Okugarukanisa nikukorerwa omu madaara abiri. Omu idaara ry’okubanza,
ekizibu nikyetegyerezibwa kandi n’ebirikuhimbya embaju zombi bimanywa. Aha
idaara rya kabiri, emiringo y’okushoboororamu enshonga neeretwa kandi
embaju zombi zitooranamu ogurikuhita ogundi. Aha muheru, embaju zombi
niziikirizana, zigarukana kandi zikora endagaano.

Noija kushanga enteekateeka y’okugarukanisa ahaifo. Buri kugarukanisa
nikubaasa kutaana aha kundi, ekiri kumanyisa ngu n’ebiri kukuratirwa omu
garukanisa embaju zombi tibiri kushushana. Tikiine mugasho kukuratira
enteekateeka egi, baitu ijuka ngu hariho ebikuru ebi oine kukuratira.

Oshemereire kumanya yaaba enshonga erikubaasa kushoboororwa kurabira omu
kugarukanisa.

 EIDAARA 1:

 a. Okugamba kwa:
 ▪ Kigarukanisa
 a. Shoboorora ekigyendererwa ahabw’enki nooteeraho kugarukanisa abantu
 abo
 b. Shoboorora ebirungi by’okugarukana
 c. Taho ebiragiro ebishemereire kukuratirwa (nk’omuntu obutacwa
 ondiijo ekirimi, obutajumiirana obwo omuntu arikweta ondi amaziina
 mabi, okubiika ebihama hamwe n’ebyagaaniirwaho)
 d. Buuza yaaba haine eki barikwenda kubuuza
 ▪ Kitabaaza
 ✓ Ashoboorore eki arikumanya aha nshonga
 ✓ Kigarukanisa amubuuze ebibuuzo kwenda kwongyera kwetegyera
 enshonga; amubuuze ebi ataashoboorokyerwa
 ▪ Kitabaarizibwa
 ✓ Ashoboorere eki arikumanya aha nshonga
 ✓ Kigarukanisa amubuuze ebibuuzo kwenda kwongyera kwetegyera
 enshonga; amubuuze ebi ataashoboorokyerwa
 2. Raba omu birikuhimbya embaju zombi omu bugufu. Ihamu enshonga
 enkuru.

 ✓ Yejunise Orurimi orutari kugwera rubaju, kwetantara okugira ou
 waagwisa kubi. Omu mwanya gw’okugambira omuntu oti, “Oine amaryo!”
 mugire oti, “Ninshaba ngu tutakoresa ebigambo ebiri kubaasa kugwisa
 ondiijo kubi! Embu y’okugira oti: “Tubaremu amagyezi!” kigarukanisa
 abaasa kugambira omuntu ati, “Reka twongyere kugaaniira aha nshonga
 egi.”
 EIDAARA 2:

 1. Manya ebirikuhimbya buri rubaju
 2. Muteekateeke aha miringo y’okushoboorora enshonga; mutakaacweramu aha
 idaara eri
 3. Muteho ebi murikwenda kukuratira kupima emiringo ei mwateekateekaho
 ▪ Ebi mwakubaasa kukoresa kupima emiringo y’okushoboorora
 enshonga birimu ebi:
 ▪ Eby’enzaarwa (oku baashwenkurimwe baabaire
 bacwa emanja nk’ezi)
 ▪ Embaju zombi zikaagoba zita zitashiisire sente
 hamwe n’obwire bwingi kurabira omu muringo ogu.
 ▪ Omuringo ogwatooranwa nigwija kuheza sente
 hamwe n’obwire burikwingana ki.
 ▪ Ekipimo ky’emitwarize
 ▪ Okutwariza embaju zombi n’oburingaaniza,
 hatariho kuzonzorwa, kandi obwo obugabe bw’abantu
 burikuteebwamu ekitiinisa.
 ▪ Eby’okureeberaho by’ebishemereire kukuratirwa etarikugwera
 rubaju:
 ▪ Kirinju otaine rubaju abaasa kushabwa
 kushoboorora ekiragiro kirikukwata aha nshonga
 z’eitaka omu kyanga ekyo.
 ▪ kumanya omuhendo gw’egaari, nimubaasa kubuuza
 omuntu oine eduuka y’egaari.
 4. Renga emiringo y’okushoboorora enshonga orikukuratira ebiragiro
 by’okupima emiringo egyo.
 ▪ Handiika endagaano erikworeka ebi embaju zombi
 zaikirizanaho.
 ▪ Gishome reero ogiteereze kurungi
 5. Kora zaakope 4 z’egyo ndagaano: 1 eya kigarukanisa, 1 eya kooti, 1 eya
 kitabaarizibwa, 1 eya kitabaaza
 ▪ Reka boona abariho bate emikono yaabo (nari ebinkumu)
 hamwe n’ebiro by’okwezi aha ndagaano
 ▪ Heereza buri rubaju kope.
 ▪ Ahanyima y’ebi byona, embaju zombi niziba zaagarukana!

 6. Orubanja ku rwakuba rwarugire omukooti, nooragirwa kuha kooti egyo
 kope y’endagaano y’okugarukana.
 7. Teeraho kukuratiriza embaju zombi kuhamya ku buzima bariyo
 nibakuratira endagaano. Bimwe aha bibuuzo ebirikukwata aha
 kukuratiriza endagaano nibigarukwamu ahaifo.

 o “Okukuratiriza endagaano” nikimanyisaki?

 ▪ Nikimanyisa okureeba yaaba embaju zombi
 ziriyo nizikuratira endagaano eyaakozirwe.
 Okukuratiriza tikuri kugyenderera kureeba
 yaaba embaju zoona zimazirwe kurungi
 n’endagaano (ahakuba eki tikirikubaasika
 omu magyezi g’obuntu). Orubanja niruba
 rwahwa ahanyima y’okuhika aha ndagaano,
 shana haagira orubaju orwaremwa kukuratira
 egyo ndagaano reero ondi akahayo
 okwetomboita kwe omu kooti nari aha
 pooriisi.
 o N’oha oshemereire kukuratiriza endagaano?

 ▪ Eki kishemereire kukorwa ondiijo muntu
 atarikugwera rubaju, baitu atari
 kigarukanisa. Okutoorana ondiijo muntu
 nikihwera kigarukanisa kureka enshonga egi
 kandi akakora emirimo endiijo. Nikihwera
 na baamemba ba kooti kumubuuza nari
 kumwegyekyerera enshobi kuhaakugira
 ebitaagyenda gye omu nshonga ei
 yaakozireho.
 o Omurimo gwa kigarukanisa niguhwera nkahi?

 ▪ Niguhwa yaaheza kuheereza kooti
 endagaano.
 o Ahabw’enki omurimo gwa kigarukanisa niguhwera aha?

 ▪ Hashemereire kubaho omuheru gw’enshonga
 oguri kwetegyerezibwa kuhwera kooti kuta
 amaani aha manja ezindi.
 ▪ Nikiiha omugarukanisa omu nshonga
 z’ab’embaju zombi, kubaakugaruka bakagira
 obundi butaikirizana. Omugarukanisa
 orikuteeraho kukora aha buri nshonga
 y’omuntu, enshonga nizibaasa kumukiza
 amaani!

 o N’enki ekiri kukorwa haagira owaahenda endagaano?

 ▪ Orubaju orwagwisibwa kubi okuhendwa
 kw’endagaano kushemereire kutwara enshonga
 omu kooti. (Owaahenda ekiragiro naaba
 yaayozyamu kooti amaisho). Owaagwisibwa
 kubi okuhendwa kw’endagano ku yaakuba
 naayenda ngu enshonga ye ekorweho
 ahonaaho, ashemereire kwirukira aha
 pooriisi na kope y’endagaano y’okugarukana
 ehenzirwe.
 o Endagaano neetekwa eta omu nkora?

 ▪ Endagaano yaaba yatwirwe omu kooti,
 n’omurimo gwa kooti egyo kureeba ngu
 endagaano egyo yaakuratira, kasita: 1)
 orubaju rumwe rugihenda; 2) kasita orubaju
 rumwe rwetomboita omu kooti, obwo rwine
 kope y’endagaano ehenzirwe.
 ▪ Ebyagambwa aharuguru ku byakukora, kooti
 eshemereire kuragiira pooriisi kukwata
 nyakuhenda endagaano.

 Orupapura rw’okuhandiikaho eby’okugarukanisa

EMIRINGO Y’OKUSHOBOORORERAMU ENSHONGA HAMWE N’EBIRI KUKURATIRWA OMU
KUSHOBOORORA ENSHONGA

| | |

|OKWEGYEZA OMU ntwaza ya kooti eY’okuhurira n’OKUCWA EMANJA |
|eKIGYENDERERWA KIKURU |Eishomo eri niriheereza abaraayetabe omu |

|EBIRAAYEGWE |Aha muheru gw’eishomo eri, abaraaryetabemu |
| |bashemereire: |
| |Kuta kurungi omu nkora ebigyenderwaho omu |
| |kweteguurira encwa y’emanja omu kooti |
| |y’Ekyanga. |
