|EBIRIMU |Okwijuza foomu y’okutabaaza omu kooti |
| |y’Ekyanga |
| |Ebiri kukuratirwa omu kweteguurira okuhurira |
| |n’okucwa emanja omu kooti y’Ekyanga |
| |Okwegyeza omu ntwaza ya kooti ey’okuhurira |
| |n’okucwa emanja |
| | |

Yetegyereze amazima:

Kenyonyoozi n’omwishiki w’emyaka 13. Naatuura na beene-nyina, Kembabazi
ow’emyaka 9 hamwe na Kengoma ow’emyaka ena, omukyaro kya Kabingo.
N’amafuuzi – ishebo akaitwa Siriimu ameeezi mukaaga enyima, kandi nyinabo
akaitwa oburwaire nibwo bumwe emyaka ebiri ishebo atakafiire.

Abaishiki aba nibahwerwa abatuuragye, baitu oburemeezi bw’okureeberera
beene-ishe kutegaaniise Kenyonyoozi omu biteekateeko hamwe n’omunshonga
z’omubiri gwe. Batwire baine amatsiko omu kibanja eki ishebo yaarekireho.
Ekyo kibanja nikitegyekwa ekiragiro ky’ekyanga kya Kabingo. Obu yaabaire
ari aha ncwamba za rufu, ishe w’abaana aba, Tumwebaze, akagambira
abatuuragye ku yaabaire naagyenda ngu abahara bahungure eitaka rye.

Omunyabuzaare w’abaana aba akiriho n’ishento orikwetwa Tumwekwatse,
arikwatananabo. Eky’obusaasi, Tumwekwatse akatandika kutoroboza Kenyonyoozi
obu yaabaire aine emyaka 9. Kenyonyoozi nibwo aherize kugambira Twijukye
aha nshonga egi. Twijukye ni munywani w’eka yaabo, oteireho munonga
kubareeberera omu muringo gw’omutaano, kandi hoona ori na memba wa kooti
y’Ekyaro kya Kabingo. Twijukye akagambira kirinju omwe aha nshonga egi,
reero ogwo kirinju nawe yaateeraho kushoboorora enshonga egi aheeru ya
kooti; eky’omugisha mubi, okushoboorora enshonga egi tikurabaasikire.

Esaabiiti ehwaire, Tumwekwatse akaza Kampala aha rugyendo
rw’eby’obushuubuzi. Ku yaagarukire yaashanga enzaayi ye hamwe n’ebitookye
bye biibirwe: eki kikamugwisa kubi munonga. Enzaayi neeretsibwa munonga
omuri Kabingo, kandi abari kugihinga nibagiihamu sente nyingi – kwonka
okuhinga, okuguza n’okureetsa enzaayi nikihenda ebiragiro. Eizooba
eryakuratsireho, Tumwekwatse akaimuka arikubuuza abatuuragye ku haakuba
hariho orikumanya aibire ebintu bye. Omuntu omwe, orikumanya nka Mutambi
akamugambira ku yaashangire Kenyonyoozi omu mbuga ya Tumwekwatse obu
yaabaire naaruga omu disiko shaaha mushanju z’ekiro.

Tumwekwatse akaba atwire naareeba Kenyonyoozi nk’owaabaire naarugwaho
ebizibu byona. Akaba ateeraho kwangira ishento ogu kumutoroboza, kandi
amwatuurira ati: “Abaana b’abaishiki nabo baine obugabe.” Ebigambo bya
Kenyonyoozi bikaba bigwisa kubi Tumwekwatse; eizooba rimwe akamutiinisiriza
ati, “niinyiza kukukora kubi, niinyija kukaraaza,” obwo arikumuteera
emigyere y’eibondo. Hoona nabwo okureeba abaishiki aba barikutuura
ah’eitaka rya mwene-ishe kikaba kimugwisa kubi. Mpaho akacwamu
kubatabaariza omu kooti y’Ekyanga, obwo agyendereire kubatiinisa ngu
barekeho ekibanja ekyo.

Tumwekwatse akatwara okwetomboita kwe omu kooti y’Egomborora ya Kabingo.
Obwahati naayenda kutabaariza Kenyonyoozi na beene-nyina arikushaba ngu
kooti ebabinge aha kibanja. Hoona nabwo naatura Kenyonyoozi orubanja
rw’okwiba ebitookye bye ebi arikubariramu Shringi 200,000 (n’obu araabe
yaabaire aine ekiniga ahabw’okwibwa kw’enzaayi ye erikubarirwamu miriyooni
emwe n’ekicweka). Tumwekwatse naikiriza ngu abakazi tibashemereire kugira
obushoboorozi bw’okugira ebibanja, ngu kandi abaishiki tibashemereire
kuhungura ebibanja. Abantu baingi omuri Kabingo baine enteekateeka nk’eya
Tumwekwatse.

Puriida (omunyabiragiro) omwe kuruga Kampala ku yaaherize kuhurira enshonga
egi yaacwamu kujwekyera Kenyonyoozi omu kooti. Baitu, Kabagambe, omuramuzi
omukuru owa kooti ey’eidaara ry’ahansi owa kooti ya disiturikiti yoona ari
omu kihuumuro.

Ekiragiro ky’Ekyaro kya Kabingo

Ekiragiro ky’eitaka eky’Ekyaro kya Kabingo nikiikiriza abakazi kugira
obushoboorozi bw’okuba bakama b’eitaka. Abaishiki n’abakazi abashweirwe
nibaikirizibwa kuhungura ebibanja n’amataka ga b’ishebo, kubyakuba
bibaragirwe omuburagwa oburi omu buhandiikye. Haaba hatariho ekirikumanywa
aha bikwatiraine ahaby’oburagwa bw’omugyenzi, omunyabuzaare w’omushaija
arihaihi n’omugyenzi omu buzaare naija kuba mukama w’eitaka. Ekiragiro
tikirikuta kitiinisa omu buragwa obw’akanwa (obw’omubigambo).

Ekiragiro kya disiturikiti ya Kabingo ekiri kukwata aha nzaayi

Okushangwa n’enzaayi, okugireetsa hamwe n’okugihinga tibiri kwikiribwa omu
disiturikiti ya Kibingo. Omuntu orikuhenda ekiragiro eki naija kutangisibwa
Shiringi emitwaro ikumi, nainga akomwe ebiro 10, nari byombi hamwe.

Ebishemereire kukorwa omu kwegyezamu kw’entwaza ya kooti

Kuratira ebi:

Ekiri kukorwa 1:

Tumwekwatse naahayo okwetomboita kwe omu kooti y’Ekyaro. Kooti eshemereire
kukora byona ebiine kukorwa omu kweteguurira okuhurira orubanja.

Ekiri kukorwa 2:

Kooti y’Ekyaro neehurira orubanja

Ekiri kukorwa 3:

Reka tugire ngu Kirinju w’ekika akeetomboitera Mukuru w’entebeagumize ngu
Tumwekwatse akahenda ekiragiro kya disiturikiti ekikwatiraine n’okuhinga,
okureetsa, hamwe n’okugira enzaayi. Kora okwegyezamu obwo orikweteguurira
okuhurira orubanja, hamwe n’okucwera Tumwekwatse orubanja.

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q1: Ni micwe/mitwarize/migyenzo ki ei orikuteekateeka ngu
n'ey'obuzaariranwa omu kyanga kyanyu?

Eky'okuteisaho:

Q2: Ni ryari obu kirikwikirizibwa/kwetaagwa ngu abantu batwazibwe omu
miringo etarikushushana omu kooti?

Ekyokureeberaho: Omushobya/kitabaarizibwa yaikiriza ngu ashobize kandi
yaashaba okusaasirwa nk'oku kiri omu migyenzo y'abantu b'ekyanga.

Ekiragiro/entwaza y’ekyanga

 Ni kirungi

Konsityusho n’ebindi biragiro ebihandiikirwe

Ngaaha

Ekyokureeberaho: Abakazi tibashemereire kugira eitaka.

Eky'okuteisaho:

Q3: Nihabaho ki ku haakuba hariho emitwarize y'abantu y'obuhangwa
etarikwikirizana na Konsityushoni?

Eky'okuteisaho:

Q4: Noikiriza ku enshonga ezaaheebwa aha ruguru zitungwire enshonga
y'okutunga oburamuzi omu bantu boona?

Q5: Iwe nka memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga, oshangire ki omu kuhwera abantu
b'ekyanga kyawe kutunga oburamuzi?

Hariho akaaro omu Uganda haihi n'esharo ya Uganda na Tanzania. Akaaro ako
kaine purayimare na siniya. Abantu nibeesiima ahabw'okuba nibabaasa
kwohereza abaana baabo kushoma omu siniya kwetungira obwegyese bw'ahaiguru.
Abantu b'omu mwanya ogu n'abooro munonga kandi obumwe n'obumwe abaana
nibabooshesa kwega obwire burikwingana esande, baza kubahweraho aha mirimo
nk’okuhinga. Kandi obundi abaana tibarikuza ah’eishomero ahabw’okuburwa
ebyokurya. Abaana abaingi nibatuura omu kyaro, kandi baine kutambura
orugyendo ruraingwa, nangwa obumwe rurimu akabi, kuza omu katahuni ahu
eishomero riri, ekintu ky'akabi namunonga aha baishiki baba bari bonka.

Omu siniya, abaishiki nibatwara munonga enda. Abashomesa hamwe n'abantu
b'amaani omu ishomero nibo barikutweka abaishiki abo. Eki ku kirikubaho,
abazaire abaingi barahuka kusharaho ngu bashwerwe, kubacwa nainga kubabinga
omu maka gaabo. Abaishiki aba tibarikutunga mugisha gw'okugarukayo omu
ishomero. N'emirundi mikye munonga obu abazaire abamwe bagiire omu
gavumenti y'ekyanga kwetomboita ahabw'ebirikubaho omu ishomero. Obwire
obwingi nibabagira ngu tihaine ekiraakorwe kandi ngu ishomero riine
omugisha kutunga amashomero ago abiri. Obwire bwingi abazaire nibatiina
kuhoora enzigu, banga kuhababa omu Kooti z'Ebyanga kandi bareka n'okuta
abaishiki baabo omu siniya egyo.

Q1: Ni baahi abaine obugabe hamwe n'abaine obujunaanizibwa?

Q2: Nibugabe ki oburikukwatwaho?

Q3: Ni muringo ki omurungi gw'okukora aha nshonga nk'ezi?

Eby’oburingaaniza eby’obuhangwa

Eky'okuteisaho

Q1: Ahabwenki ba memba ba Kooti z'Ebyanga zirikushabwa kuhikiiriza omutindo
gw'emicwe?

NOTE TO DESIGNER

Natural Justice Facts Applicable Law – Enkoresa y’ebiragiro omu
buringaaniza bw’enzaariranwa

Influences, inducements, pressures, threats – okubeihabeiha
n’okutiinatiinisa.

Private interests – Ebigyendererwa by’abantu buntu

Bias or prejudice based on sex, colour, ethnicity, religion, religion, age,
social or economic status, political opinion, or disability – okugwera
orubaju orikwegamira ediini, enganda, emyaka, obutungi n’ebindi.

Fear, favour , or ill-will – okutiina, okugwera orubanju hamwe
n’okugyenderera kubi abantu.

Decision of Court – encwamu/ensharamu/okuramura kwa kooti

Discussion:

Q2: What are some examples of direct or indirect external influences,
inducements, pressures, threats, or interference?

Q3: What is an example of proper professional consultation between judicial
officers?

Eby'okuteisaho:

Q2: Ni byokureeberaho ki ebirikureebwa n'ebitarikureebwa eby'okumanywa,
kubeihabaihwa, kunyangarazibwa, kutiinatiinisibwa, hamwe n'okuteganisibwa?

Q3: Ni kyokureeberaho ki obu omuramuzi ashemereire kwebuuza ahari bagyenzi
be?

Eky'okuteisaho:

Q5: Heereza eky'okureeberaho obu okwetaba omu kuhurira kw'omushango
kurikubaasa kubuuzibwaho.

Eky'okuteisaho:

Q4: Ahabwenki kiri kikuru kutakora oburamuzi kwonka kwihaho kureeba
oburamuzi burikukorwa?

January naatuura omu igomborora rya Kyoma. February ni memba
w'eby'okwerinda w'ekyanga omu igomborora niryo rimwe kandi ni muriraanwa wa
January. Embuzi za February zikeeyiba zaaza omu musiri gwa muhogo ya
January zaagishiisha yoona. February akahikiirira March, memba wa Kooti
y'Ekyanga, yaamugira ngu omushango ku guraije omu kooti, ashare gye
February abe niwe yaagusinga, kitari ekyo, naija kukareeba. Omushango hati
guri omu Kooti y'Ekyanga.

Q1: March akuratire eki February amuragiire?

May ni memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga owaija kuhurira omushango/orubanja.
Yaashanga ba memba ba Kooti abandi hamwe n'ab'omushango bariyo
bamutegyereize. Yaahika akyerereirwe eshaaha ibiri zoona, arikwosya,
aruhire, ahabwokuba yaija naavuga egaari kuruga omu ka ye eri omu kiromita
15. Kwongyerera aha busaasi, emotoka yaamurabaho erikwiruka, omucuucu gwona
gwamweshuka. Aza kureeba areeba omuhababi ari August, amanya ngu eizooba
niriza kurenga. Naamanya August - atwire naamureeba arikutongana n'abataahi
aha kyaro. Eriizooba, naahababira iba, September, orikumanywa aha kyaro.
Okwezi okuhwire ijo, May akaba ari omugyenyi mukuru aha kwiguraho ekishaaha
ky'abaana aha kyaro, eki September hamwe n'ekibiina kye ky'obutegyeki
ekirikumanywa nka 'National Democratic Forum Movement (NDFM), kandi eki
yaagabiire ekyanga. Nk'abandi bagyenyi eryo izooba, May akagyenda na
Tiishaati ya NDFM hamwe n'obucumu. Erizooba, September yaareetera ba memba
ba Kooti y'Ekyanga ecupa z'amaizi, abaazisiima munonga, ahabw'omushana
n'ekyoya ebiriho. May yaatangaara munonga kuhurira ngu August naahababira
September ahabw'okumuteera. Ondiijo memba wa Kooti y'Ekyanga amuhwehura
arikugira ngu we naateekateeka ngu September niwe ahababiire August. May
asheka ayesherekire enyima y'ecupa y'amaizi.

Kooti ku yaaba yaatandika kuhurira omushango, enjura etandika kugwa munonga
n'amaizi garaba omu kisasi, gabatoonyorokyera. Ba memba ba Kooti y'Ekyanga
bashoberwa eky'okukora. September agira ekiniga rero agira ngu nabwo
tarikutangaara oku ebintu birikugyenda. Agira ngu tiyaakusiisire bwire bwe
arikwija kuhurikiza ebitahikire omu Kooti y'Ekikwangara (Kooti
y’ekishobobo).

Akaba aine ekiteekateeko ky'okuza aha Kooti y'aha gomborora nainga owa RDC,
boona ni banywani be, kweyihaho engambo zirikumusiisira ekitiinisa.

August atandika kurira ngu okuhoza kugumizemu. Agira ngu kimutwariire bingi
kureeba ngu areesire omushango ogu omu Kooti. "Atwire nanteera kumara
emyaka 10 n'okurengamu, buri mwaka, nikyeyongyera kuba kubi. Naija kunyita!
Nshemereire kuteerwa nkafa ahabwokuba tindashomire kandi n'ahu ndikuzaarwa
n'abooro? Enjura obwo neetonyera kimwe kandi neibaati niryenda kurugaho.
September we akyatamirwe kwonka agira ngu baze omu duuka ye, eine
ekishengye kihango enyima eki baakubaasa kukozesa.

October n'omukozi wa bizinesi omu tahuni ya Kyoma. Naakira kushashurira
emikoro y'ekyanga. November n'omuhingi orikutuura omu tahuni ya Kyoma kandi
mutaahi wa October. Ahabw'okugira ngu n'omugaiga, October ashazire ensharo
ye yaataaha omu itaka rya November. November atwire enshonga egi omu Kooti
y'Ekyanga.

Turi bamwe aha batuura gye b’ekyanga. Twine obugabe kwetaba omu nkora za
kooti y’ekyanga, okwihaho yaashutama bwesherekye, kwenda kurinda bamwe aha
bantu, ebintu, ninga enshonga z’abaana

Ndi mukuru w’entebe, kandi naija nkuratiirwe abandi ba memba ba kooti
y’ekyanga bashutami aha nanye.

Omushango ogu nigukwata ahari nyowe; niinye kitabaarizibwa

Nyine amakuru maingi g’okuha aha mushango ogu ndi omujurizi

Nkareeta enshonga egi omu kooti niinye nyina faiyiro y’omushango.

Ndi omuramuzi, ninyikirizibwa omu kooti egi aha mushango ogw’omwana ninga
enshonga y’okuhenda ebiragiro.

Saturday na Anyday nibariranwa omu muruka gwa Kati. Butoosha nibatuura omu
kurwanagana n’entongane ahabwa Saturday kuguma naatahiirira omusiri gwa
Anyday. Nyomwebazyo, barwaniire omu maisho ga One. One nawe yaatebezaho
Two. Anyday atwaire enshonga ye omu kooti y’ekyanga. N’oha kitabaaza na
kitabaarizibwa nk’oku waabireeba.

w’entebe eshemereire kuteebwaho omukono kitabaaza na mukuru w’entebe?

Q3: Ebaruha z’okwetomboita zishemereire kubiikwa oha kandi nkahi?

Okutabaaza kugyendereire kusetsya, kunyizya kandi tikwiine buhamizo?

Kyaba kiri kityo, kooti neebaasa kwanga kuhurira orubanja oru

Kyaba kitari kityo, kooti neija kugumizamu eguhurire

Kooti eine obushoboorozi kuhurira orubanja?

Yaaba ebwine, egumizemu ehurire omushango

Yaba etabwine egurugyeho reero egwohereze omu b’obushoboorozi abandi

Orubanja ruri omu kooti endiijo?

Yaaba gwahikireyo, kooti y’ekyanga etaguhurira

Gwaba gutakahikireyo, kooti eguhurire

Kwonka shi itwe katutatunga nkoko, nkazikwibaho nta?

Omushaija wangye tabaasize kuba omwesigwa ahari nye. Niinyija kumutwara omu
kooti anshashure.

Akiiba enkoko zangye!

Obuhaburo omu kuronda obwire n’omwanya ogu kooti y’ekyanga eraashutame:

1. Manya ekika ky’abantu abarikuza kutwara ekicweka omu kooti – abakazi,
 abashaija. Ekyokureeberaho kooti yaaba neehurira omushango ogurimu
 omukazi, neija kuteeka teeka aha ky’okugira ngu omukazi aine kukora
 emirimo y’ahaka atakagiire mu kooti. Nahabwekyo nibamwongyeramu akaire.

2. Manya amazooba agu amadiini gatari gamwe na gamwe garikuza aha maramizo.
 Eki nikimanyisa ngu orwakataano, orwamukaaga, na sande n’amazooba
 gagumire kurugiirira aha madiini n’enyikiriza z’abantu.

3. Kooti nebaasa kushutama buri hamwe hoona ekikuru haba hari omu kicweka
 ekyerikutwara. Omwanya ogwatooranwe gwine kwanguhira buri omwe,
 ab’omushango n’abajurizi. Omwe aha bantu abaine omurwa omu mushango yaaba
 aine obumuga, ekyo nakyo kiine kureebwamu omukuronda omwanya.

Mushanju na mukaaga ni bariraanwa. Omwaka ogwahwaire Mukaaga akaguza
mushanju sente emitwaro abiri na mushanju (270,000) kutandika kuguza
ebicoori kandi baikirizana ngu ashashure omu meezi ashatu ateiremu amagoba
g’emitwaro eshatu. Omugisha mubi Mushanju akashuubura ebihimba kwonka
tibiragyenzire gye esente ez’enguzano zaayanga kurugamu. Hati hahweireho
omwaka gumwe Mushanju takashashwire mukaaga.

Mukaaga bimushobiire , yaatwara omushango omu kooti y’ekyanga, kooti
yaashanga ngu buzima kwe Mushanju aine kushashura Mukaaga emitwaro ye
makumi ashatu (300,000) kwonka kandi n’omworo runuuka. Bamwe aha ba memba
ba kooti baagira ngu mushanju aine ekibanja ky’eitaka n’embuzi nshaaju ezi
 ishe yaamuragire nahabwekyo bakwatirizeho embuzi mushanju baziguze
bashashure eibanja rya Mukaaga.

EBIRI KUKWATA AHA RUBANJA ORU

Aha biro ___ (Okwezi), 20__, buri mutuuragye w’ekyaro kya Kiyagaara akaba
naaragiirwa kuhandiikisa embuzi ze n’abakakiiko k’ekyaro, nk’oku ebiragiro
by’ekyaro eki birikugira. Nitumanya ku oine embuzi 12 (ikumi na ibiri),
kandi ku oremirwe kuzihandiikisa omu kakiiko. Eki nikimanyisa ngu okahenda
ekiragiro ky’ekyaro.

Kamukama na Baayoroba baamara emyaka mukaaga (6) omu bushwere. Esaabiiti
ehwaire kirinju omwe areebire Kamukama na muriraanwa we Karamaare
barikurwanira ah’eiziba. Kamukama abaire naakabukira Karamaare arikumutura
okwegaita n’omukazi we Baayoroba omuby’omubonano. Karamaare ayehakaine ku
ataine eki arikumanya aha nshonga egi. Ebyo bikiri aho, Kamukama agambiire
kirinju w’ekyaro ku yaashangire siripa ya Karamaare omuka ye. Karamaare uwe
naagira ngu ku arikuba atari ha murimo, aba ari aha kanisa n’omuriisa;
ekanisa egyo eine ekitabo ky’abagyenyi. Kamukama uwe naagumizamu atabaaza
omu kooti y’Ekyanga

Mukuru w’entebewa kooti ejurirwamu
Ahari .............................................

Omuntu (Kitabaaza) ku yaakutabaariza ondiijo (Kitabaarizibwa [owaabaire
naavuga pikipiki emanywa nka boodabooda]) arikumwomesereza ngu akacwa
egaari ye, obu bombi baatunga butandu.
Q1: Nincwamu ki ei kitabaaza atari kwikirizibwa kujuriza?

A. Kooti ku yaakugira ngu kitabaarizibwa akacwa egaari ya kitabaaza, reero
ekamuragiira kushashura kitabaaza Shiringi emitwaro ebiri (Shs 20,000).
Kitabaarizibwa ku yaakujuriza ekiragiro kya kooti eki.

B. Kooti ku yaakushanga ngu owaacwire egaari ya kitabaaza tari
kitabaarizibwa; ngu egyo gaari ekacweka obu kitabaaza yaagiteera omu kiina
obwo arikugivuga asinzire. Kitabaaza ku yaakujuriza encwamu ya kooti
eyaarangiriire ku kitabaarizibwa ataine rubanja.

C. Ababiri ku baakwikiriza ngu kitabaarizibwa ashashure Shiringi omutwaro
gumwe (Shs 10,000) z’okukanika egaari ya kitabaaza. Baitu kitabaaza ku
yaakushaba kujuriza omu kooti, obwo agumize ngu okukanika egaari kukatwara
sente nyingi, ngu n’ahabw’ekyo kitabaarizibwa akaba ashemereire kumuha
sente zirengire Shiringi omutwaro gumwe.

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q1: Niryari obu kooti ejurirwamu erikubaasa kucwamu kubinga okujuriza, obwo
etakeetsire abajurizi, nainga etakashutamire?

Mwebaze na Baataatsya baine omuhara orikwetwa Kekirunga; omwishiki ogu aine
emyaka mushanju (7) y’obukuru. Eizooba rimwe, Kekirunga akarwara, yaagira
omushwija mwingi, yaatuutuka kandi yaagira n’omutetemo (ekitengo), hamwe
n’obusaasi omu nyama z’omubiri. Ebi bikamureetera yaagwa kihuumura (yaaza
omu koma). Abutuuragye bakaba nibateeebereza ku Kekirunga yaabaire arwaire
omushwija gw’emibu ahabw’okugira ngu eka egi neetuura haihi n’ekisharara.
Eka egi eijwire obukyene kandi akarwariro akari haihiho kari kiromita 11
kuruga ahu bari kutuura. Ahabw’obutagira sente z’okubatwara aha karwariro
aka, abazaire ba Kekirunga bakacwamu kuraguriza muhara waabo n’eshaara.
Bakamushabira kumara ebiro bitaano (5), baitu aha kiro kya mukaaga muhara
waabo akaba ari aha ncwamba za rufu. Abatuuragye bakaheereza abazaire ba
Kekirunga sente ezaatwire muhara waabo omu karwariro. N’obu araabe
ataraitsirwe burwaire obu, bukashiisha obwongo bwe. Obw’ahati tarikubaasa
kurya, tarikubaasa kutambura hamwe n’okukora ebindi bintu nk’ebyo.
Ekibuuzo1: Hariho obugabe bwa Kekirunga obwaribatireirwe? Ahabw’enki
bwakaatagireirwe?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo3:Heereza emigyenzo n’emitwarize y’enzaarwa eine akabi aha baana.

Mangyeri n’efaakazi y’emyaka 72; kandi naareeberera abaijukuru bashatu –
abaana b’omuhara. Omwijukuru omukuru, Keemi, aine emyaka 13. Mangyeri
arwaire n’ahabwe’ekyo tarikubaasa kukora sente eziraabareeberere. Eki
nikireetera Keemi yaaruga omu ishomero kuza kukora omu kirombe ei
barikuhondera amabaare g’okuguza, ekiri haihi nahu barikutuura.

Ekibuuzo 1: Keemi n’omwana?

Ekibuuzo : Ni bugabe ki obu obukaatagireirwe? N’ahabw’enki bukaatagireirwe?

Kebirungi akazaarwa aine obuteta. Ahabw’oburema obu, ishe naamukingirana
omunju obwo arikwenda ngu atashekyererwa abataahi.

Ekibuuzo 1: Kebirungi aine obugabe?

Ekibuuzo 2: Obugabe bwe buribatireirwe? Okaamanya ota ngu bukaatagireirwe?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 4: Ni manja ki eziri kukorwa abaana ezimuri kushoboorora omu kooti
zaanyu?

Ekibuuzo 5: Hariho emanja nyingi z’okutoroboza abaana omu Uganda.
Nimushoboorora muta emanja ezi? Nimukoraki kureeba ngu nyakutorobozibwa
tiyayeyongyera kubonaabona ahanyima y’okucwa orubanja?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 6: Nimucwa muta emanja z’abaana? Omuringo ogwo nigukora kurungi?

Abatuuragye, nitubashaba mushohore! Nitwenda kugamba n’ogu omwana wenka,
nk’omuringo gumwe gw’okuta ekitiinisa omu bugabe bwe.

KOOTI Z’EBYANGA TIZIRIKWIKIRIZIBWA KUKOMA ABAANA

Kooti y’Ekyanga teine bushoboorozi kuragiira ku omwana akomwa. (Ekiragiro
kya kooti z’Ebyanga, 2006, Akacweka.49)

N’omurimo gw’abantu b’omu kyanga kutwara enshonga z’okutuntuzibwa,
okunageijura hamwe n’okukaatagiirira obugabe bw’abaana omu ofiisi ya
gavumenti z’ebyanga eri omu kicweka kye. Ofiisi egi eshemereire kukuratira
enshonga egi nk’oku kyashoboororwa aharuguru (Ekiragiro ky’enshonga
z’abaana, Akacweka. 11(1))

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q7: Hariho abantu abashemeire kwenyigira omukurinda obugabe bw’abaana
abatari aha rukarara orw’ayorekwa aharuguru?

Q8: Nokoregana ota n’abantu abaayorekwa aharuguru?

Q9: Ni buremeezi ki obu obugaine omukukoregana nabo kurinda obugabe
bw’abaana?

Reka tweijutsye ebi:

Q1: Kooti ekakora kurungi omurimo gwayo? Ahabw’enki?

Q2: Noogira ngu kooti ekaba eshemereire kukora ki ebi etarakozire?

Mubangizi n’omwojo w’emyaka 15 kandi tari mu ishomero. Akafeerwa abazaire
be kandi obwahati naareebererwa nyinenkuru orikwetwa Kyomuhendo. Naakora
emirimo ya reijareija ei arikwihamu otusente twokwereeberera hamwe
n’omwijukuru. Eizoobwa rimwe, abantu bakashanga Mubangizi arikwogyera omu
kidiba ky’ebyenyanja eky’omugurusi Mushabe. Omugurusi akamurabira
obutarigaruka kunaabira omu kidiba kye ky’ebyenyanja. Aho niho Mubangizi
yaamurekyereire amabaare. Nyamugurusi naawe nawe mpaho akairuka
yaatabaariza nyamwojo omu kooti y’Ekyanga.

Q1: Ni manja ki ezi Mubangizi arikuja kwetwa kuhoza?

Q2: Kooti neebaasa kuha kisingwa-orubanja biheneso ki?

Q2: Ni ki ebi kooti erikubaasa kukorera omugurusi Mushabe?

Magara n’omwojo w’emyaka 13. Mwene-ishe, Kaamusiime aine emyaka 11.Kwiha
nyinabo afa emyaka eshatu ehwaire, ababiri bakozire ebishobyo bingi omu
kyanga. Nibarwana, banywa amaarwa kandi baiba ebintu kuruga omu maka n’omu
maduuka g’abashuubuzi.Pooriisi ebakwatsire emirundi mingi kandi
yaabarabura. Enshumi nkye ehwaire, kirinju omwe agambiire ab’obushoboorozi
ku enkoko ze ziibirwe. Abantu boona bateekateekire ku Magara na Kaamusiime
nibo baibire ezo nkoko; ekyanga kyona kyabatamirwe. Kirinju mpaho
akatabaariza ababiri omu kooti y’Ekyanga. Ahanw’ebicumuro ebindi
ebibaabaire baakozire, kooti ekasingisa ababiri orubanja. Abatuuragye
bakatensa ku abo boojo batwara omu kihome ky’abaana. Baitu ekyo kihome kiri
kiromita 65 kuruga omu kyanga ekyo, kandi hoona kiri n’omu disiturikiti
endiijo. Ahabw’enshonga egi kooti eragiire ku Magara na Kaamusiime batwarwa
omu kihome ekiri haihi.

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q1: Ni buremeezi ki obu orikubugana omu kushoboorora enshonga z’eitaka?

Q2: Ni nshonga ki ez’eitaka ezimukizire kubugana? Ezi gumire munonga omuri
ezo ni ziiha?

ENSHONGA Z’OBUSHUURU N;OKUPANGISA ITAKA RYA MAHIRO: Nk’oku kyayorekwa
aharuguru, omuringo ogwa mahiro nigutaanisa mukama w’eitaka oyehandiikise
hamwe n’abantu abari ah’eitaka (abashengi). Obushuuru n’esente
z’empangisano ezi omushengi (omupangisa) arikushashura mukama w’eitaka.

KOOTI Z’EBYANGA TIZIINE BUSHOBOOROZI AHA NSHONGA EZI: Kooti z’Ebyanga
tiziine bushoboorozi aha nshonga z’eitaka erya mahiro hamwe n’eryo
ery’obutwire; ziine obushoboorozi aha nshonga z’eitaka eriri omukyanga –
kandi erikutegyekwa ebiragiro n’emitwarize y’ekyanga, nk’oku
kiraashoboororwe ahaifo.

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 1: Oshangire ota okukora na baakirinju omu byanga? Amataka nigaza
omu mikono y’abantu buntu nainga?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 2: Abantu b’ekyanga nibamanya emyanya erimu eitaka erya hamwe?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 3: Heereza emiringo y’obugabe endiijo ei baamemba b’ekika omu
kyanga kyanyu baine?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 4: Heereza emiringo y’obujunaanizibwa endiijo ei baamemba b’ekika
omu kyanga kyanyu baine?

Ekibuuzo 5: Mwaratungire emanja ezatabaariziibwe memba w’ekika
owaanageijwire obujunaanizibwa bwe obukwatiraine n’enshonga z’eitaka?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 6: Abantu aba obashangire ota? Hariho abandi abu twakubaasa
kwongyera aha rukarara oru?

Ekibuuzo 7: Heereza bimwe aha biragiro by’ekyanga ebirikukwata aha
bahunguzi ebi muri kukoresa omu kyanga kyanyu?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 8: Noikirizana n’ebyarugire omu kucondooza ebyayorekwa aharuguru?

Ekibuuzo 9: Haine za guruupu z’abantu ezitari kugambwaho omu kacweka ka 28
ezi barikuzonzorwa omu nshonga z’eitaka?

Ekibuuzo 10: Abantu abataine bwekoro omu kyanga kyanyu baine obugabe
obukwatiraine n’enshonga z’eitaka nk’oku zaagambwaho?

Kenyangi akaba ashweirwe Kajungu, owaafiire omwaka oguhwaire. Kajungu akaba
aine ebibanja bingi hamwe n’enju y’eibaati n’omusheenyi. Kenyangi n’iba
bakaba bazaire abaana bataano (5), kandi omukuru n’empangare, Aine,
ow’emyaka 19. Ahanyima y’orufu rwa Kajungu, bakuru b’ekika bakashutama omu
rukiiko kugaaniira eby’okuhunguurira omugyenzi. Bakaikirizana ku ekiragiro
ky’Ekyanga kirikugira ngu mutabani wa kifa omukuru niwe arikuteekwa
kuhungura ebintu bye, kandi yaaba ataine mutabani weena, ebintu
bishemereire kutwarwa mwene-ishe wa nyakufa omukuru. Mwijukye, mwene-ishe
wa Kajungu omukuru, obwahati akwise naabinga Kenyangi n’abahara ah’eitaka.
Mpaho, Kenyangi yairukira omu kooti y’Ekyanga.

Ekibuuzo 1: Nka memba wa kooti y’Ekyanga, okaakoresa ota ekiragiro
ky’Ekyanga eky’enshonga z’eitaka kushoboorora enshonga egi?

 EBIRI OMU KIRAGIRO KY’EITAKA EBIINE AKAKWATE N’ENSHONGA EGI
39. Okuzibira ab’eka okuguza eitaka.
(1) Tihariho muntu weena orikwikirizibwa—
 (a) kuguza, kuhanisa, kupangisa, kufurura, kuraganisa, kusinga,
 eitaka ryona;
 (b) kuza omu ndagaano y’okuguza, kufurura, kuhanisa, kuraganisa,
 kusinga nari okupangisa eitaka ryona; or
 (c) kuhayo eitaka nari kukora ekintu kyona ah’eitaka eryo— eri
 arikutuuraho n’omukazi nari omushaija we, kandi eri barikukoresa
 kwebeisaho, okuhisya yaaheza kutunga ekihandiiko kirikworeka ku
 omukazi we nari omushaija we yaikiriza.

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 11: Kora orukarara rw’obugabe obu abataine bw’ekoro
barikwesiimiramu omu byanga byanyu. Baine obushoboorozi kugira n’okukoresa
eitaka?

EKIKURU OMU KIRAGIRO KY’EITAKA

(Ekiragiro ky’enshonga z’eitaka, Akacweka. 39): Ekihandiiko kiri kworeka ku
omukazi nari omushaija yaikiriza nikikuru omu buri kintu ekyaza kukorwa
ah’eitaka ry’eka.

Asiimwe aine poroti y’eitaka, Poroti A, omukyaro kya Kihungye. Aineho eka
n’omusiri gw’ebicoori kandi niho arikutuura uwe n’omukazi we n’abaana baabo
babiri. Karuhanga naatuura haihi na Asiimwe aha Poroti B ahu arikutuura
wenka; aineho akaju n’omusiri gw’ebihimba. Ahagati ya poroti ibiri ezi
hariho omuti ogurikuteera emiyembe eine akatare omu kikomera ky’ekyaro.
Bombi nibenda kukoresa ogwo muti kwonka baremirwe kwikirizana mukama
w’omuti n’oha. Mpaho ababiri nibareeta enshonga egi omu kooti y’Ekyaro kya
Kihungye.

Ekibuuzo 1: Enshonga egi ekaashoboororwa eta kurugiirira aha biragiro
n’emitwarize y’Ekyanga? Ni bibuuzo ki ebikuru ebishemereire kubuuzibwa?

EKY’OKUREEBERAHO 2

Eky’okuteisaho:

Q1: Ni buremeezi ki obu murikushanga omu kucwa emanja z’eitaka?

Q2: Ni manja ki ezi murikukira kutunga? Ni ziiha eziri kubagumira?

Eky’okuteisaho:

Ekibuuzo 12: Nooteekateeka ngu abantu nibakira kushaba abu bashweraine nabo
orusa, batakagurize nari kukora ekindi kintu aha mataka? N’ahabw’enki kiri
kikuru kushaba ou oshweraine nawe kukuha orusa kugira ekiwaakora ah’eitaka?

Naasaasira akazaarirwa omu kyaro kya Kakombe. Akatuura n’abazaire be aha
poroti y’eitaka ahu baabaire baine enju, ekitara n’omusiri gw’amajaani.
Hakabaho orugamba omu kyaro kyabo, obwo aine emyaka eshatu (3), reero
yaahungira omu disiturikiti ehereire ey’owaabo. Amazire emyaka 25 atari mu
kyaro kya Kakombe, kandi omu bwire obu nibwo abazaire be baafa. Akagaruka
kutuura aha kibanja ky’abazaire be ahu yaashangire Omw. Obeyo arikutuura
n’eka ye, obwo agumize ati: “Eri n’eitaka ryangye: Niinye mukama waaryo!”
Mpaho Naasaasira naayeta iwe na memba omwe wa kooti y’Ekyaro abagambira ku
arikwenda kutabaariza Omw. Obeyi omu kooti y’Ekyaro.

Ekibuuzo 1: Egi nshonga ekaashoboororwa eta kurugiirira aha biragiro
n’emitwarize y’ekyanga kyanyu? Naasaasira naabaasa kugaruka kutonganira
eitaka ry’abazaire be?

Kyompaire ni muka Kamukama; baamara ameezi 2 gonka omu bushwere. Esaabiiti
2 enyimaho, Kamukama aguzire poroti omukyaro kya Nkuuna ahu arikwenda
kwombeka enju. Eky’obusaasi, Kamukama afiire; Kyompaire hati n’efaakazi.
Mwene-ishe w’omugyenzi, Bazeyo, yaaheza kumugambira ku hati niwe mukama
w’eitaka rya mwene-ishe. Kyompaire, owaagwisibwa kubi ebigambo ebi,
naaguraku Bazeyo ku eitaka n’erye obwo agumize ati, “Nshemereire kuhungura
eitaka ry’omushaija wangye!” Mpaho Bazeyo yaareeta enshonga omu kooti
y’ekyaro.

Q1: Egi enshonga ekashoboororwa eta kurugiirira aha biragiro n’emitwarize
y’ekyanga?

Omu kugarukanisa abantu:

1. Embaju zombi nizo zirikucwamu.

2. Embaju zombi nizikora hamwe kushoboorora enshonga yaabo.

3. Endagaano neekorwa kurugiirira aha bintu ebi buri rubaju rurikwenda,
 hamwe n’ebyo ebi bombi barikwenda.

4. Enshonga zaabo tizirikukira kuhurirwa omu rwijwire rw’abantu.

5. Embaju zombi zibaasa kuhika aha kukora endagaano omu bwire bukye.

6. Embaju zombi nizisinga orubanja.

 Omugarukanisa

 /kigarukanisa

 Encwamu

 Birikuhimbya

 Orubaju A Orubaju B

 Okwikirizana

 /Okugarukana

3. Okurihiirira okuragiirwe kooti. 6
4. Abandi bantu abaine akakwate n’okubonabonesa 6
5. Oku orikubaasa kuhababa n’okwiguraho omushango gw’okubonabonesa 8
6. Omuringo ogu kooti erikutwazamu emishango y’obwinazi ey’okubonabonesa
8
Enkozesa y’ebigambo 10

Enyanjura

Eki n’Ekihandiiko ekyorobize eky’Ekiragiro kya 2012, Eky’okukingira
n’Okuzibira Okubonabonesa, ekitebekanisiibwe Ekitongore ekya African Centre
for Treatment and Rehabilitation of Torture Victims (ACTV); nikyo
ekirikujanjaba n’okugarura busya abantu ababonabonesiibwe. Oku n’okuteeraho
kureetaho okumanya omu bantu ba Uganda ebibi ebirikuruga omu kubonabonesa.

Engyenderwaho ya Uganda omutwe gwa 24 neegira ngu tihariho muntu
oshemereire kubonabonesibwa nainga kutwazibwa omu muringo gw’obukare,
ogutari gw’obuntu gurikugayisa nainga kuhenesibwa. Omutwe gwa 44(a)
nigugira ngu buri muntu kushemerererwa omu busingye hatariho
okutabonabonesibwa n’okutwazibwa kubi, okutwazibwa omu muringo gutari
gw’obuntu nainga gurikugayisa, nainga kufubirwa. Okwongyerera ahari ebi
aharuguru, ebiro 10 /12 /1984, Uganda ekata omukono aha Ndagaano y’Ekigombe
ky’Amahanga Ageeteeraine kurwanisa Okubonabonesa n’okutwaza n’obukare,
okutwaza omu muringo gutari gw’obuntu nainga gurikugayisa nainga okufubira
omuntu. Eki kikarugiiriramu ekiragiro ky’Okutangira Okubonabonesa, obwahati
ekiri ekiragiro ahansi ya Minisiture y’Ebyebiragiro, erikubaasa kureetaho
entwaza eyaakubaasa kureetera ekiragiro eki kuteebwa kurungi omu nkora.

Nahabwekyo, hakabaho ekyetengo ky’okworobya omu kiragiro eki
n’ekigyendererwa ky’okumanyisa abantu akabi akakari omu kubonabonesa omuntu
omu muringo gwona. Okwongyerera ahari eki, abantu boona abarikurwanirira
Obugabe bw’abantu n’oburingaanizanibeetenga kwongyera kwegyesibwa aha
bugabe bwabo, n’obujunaanizibwa obu baine, ebishoborwirwe omu kiragio eki.

Omu kihandiiko eki, Ekitongore ekirikujanjaba n’okugarura busya
ababonabonesiibwe. Ekya African Centre for the Treatment and Rehabilitation
of Torture Victims- ACTV) nikikoresa ebigambo byorobi ebirikukoresibwa omu
rurimi orwa buriijo. Ebigambo eby’orurimi rw’ebyebiragiro bikoresiibwe
kukye. Kwonka, ahu kirikwetengyesa, ebigambo ebigumire ebirikukira
kukoresibwa bikoresiibwe kandi hoona ebikoresiibwe omu kiragiro eki.
Ebigambo ebimwe ebitarikukira kukoresibwa nibibaasa kuba bitoorobize omu
kihandiiko eki, kwonka bishoboroirwe omu kacweka ak’okushoboorora enkozesa
y’ebigambo. Eki nikigyenderera kuha omushomi ekihandiiko ky’ekiragiro
ky’Okuzibira n’Okutangira Okubonabonesa ekirikumwanguhira kushoma kandi
akeetegyereza.

Okusiima

Aba ACTV nibatwara omugisha gw’okusiima obuhwezi n’okugarurwamu amaani
okuruga omu bitongore bitari bimwe n’okuruga omu bantu buntu abatari bamwe
abakwataniise naitwe, abarimu ab’ebitongore, nk’ekya Coalition against
Torture (CAT), eki ACTV erikukurira, ekitogore Ekirikurwanirira Obugabe
bw’Abantu omu Uganda (UHRC), Abakwataniise naitwe omu ntunguuka
n’ab’ekitongore eky’Oburamuzi, Ebiragiro n’Obutebenkana(JLOS) omu kukora
ekihandiiko eki ekifunziibwe. Omu muringo gw’omutaano, nitusiima ekigombe
Ekirikugaita Amahanga ga Buraaya ekya EU ahabw’okushashurira omurimo ogu
gwona.

Samuel Herbert Nsubuga
Chief Executive Officer
African Centre for Treatment and Rehabilitation of Torture

1. Okushoboorora amakuru g’okubonabonesa

Okubonabonesa nikimanyisa okureetera omubiri nainga ebiteekateeko by’omuntu
obusaasi; Eki nikibaasa kukorwa butunu waakora ekintu aha muntu nainga
hatari butunu waayanga kugira eki waakoraho kutangira omuntu
kubonabonesibwa. Okubonabonesa nikukorwa omuntu nainga abantu
bakigyendereire nainga baragiriirwe abandi bantu. Okubonabonesa nikukorwa
kwiha amakuru aha muntu ateekundeire, kufubira nainga kutiinatiinisa omuntu
ngu agire eki yaakora. Kwonka, obusaasi bwona nainga okubonabonesa
okwikiriziibwe omu biragiro tibirikutwazibwa nk’okubonabonesa.

Akashushani akari ahaifo nikoorekaho eby’okureeberaho bikye eby’emiringo
y’okubonabonesa kandi n’oku kurikukorwa aha muntu:

 Eby’okureeberaho by’okubonabonesa

|Omuringo | Oku omuntu arikubaasa kubonabonesibwa |
|Aha mubiri|Okuteera ekicweka kyona ky’omubiri n’ekintu kiine obwogi |
| |nainga kumuteeza ebicweka by’embundu; |

2. Obugabe bw’okutabonabonesibwa:

 Buri muntu aine obugabe bw’okutabonabonesibwa. Ku haakubaho orutaro,
 akaimukyeero omu by’obutegyeki, akatabanguko omu ihanga nainga okuragiira
 kuruga omu gavumenti; ebyagambwaho ebi tibishemereire kuba rwekwasyo
 y’okubonabonesa omuntu. Omu muringo nigwo gumwe, omuntu yaajeemera
 ekiragiro ekimuhairwe kubonabonesa ondiijo muntu, tarikwija kuheebwa
 ekifubiro. Nahabwekyo, omuntu orikubonabonesa mutaahi we naaba aine
 omushango. Omushango ku gurikumusinga,naabaasa kuheebwa ekibonerezo
 ky’okukomwa emyaka 15, nainga aragiirwe kushashura omutango gwa shiringi
 obukaikuru mushanju n’emitwaro makumi abiri (7.200.000/=)nainga byombiri.

 Omuringo gw’okubonabonesa ogurikukirayo kuba ogw’akabi n’ogwo omu omuntu
 arikubonabonesibwa kumara omwanya muraingwa, obundi n’ekigyendererwa
 ky’okureetaho nainga kutiinatiinisa omuntu ngu naija kuhikwaho
 akabinainga kubonabona. Omuringo ogu hoona nigubaasa kubamu okukukoresa
 omubazi kuteganinsa ebiteekateeko by’omuntu. Obumwe okubonabonesa oku
 kurimu okutiinatiinisa omuntu ngu naaza kwitwa nainga kumutiinatiinisa
 ngu ondiijo muntu niwe arikuza kwitwa ahonaaho.

 Omu muringo gw’okubonabonesa nk’ogu, abakozire omushango nibaheebwa
 ekibonerezo ky’okukomwa amagara gaabo goona, ku kyakuhamibwa ngu kimwe
 nainga bimwe ahari ebyo ebihairwe ahaifo n’amazima bikabaho aha bwire obu
 okubonabonesa omuntu kwakorwa, nainga bikabaho obwire bukye obw’enyima
 okubonabonesa kutakabaireho, nainga bikabaho omu bwire bukye
 okubonabonesa okwo kumazire kubaho:

 a) Okozire ekihagaro akoreise ekikwato ky’akabi nainga akoreise
 okuteerana nk’omuringo gw’okubonabonesa omuntu;

 b) Omuntu owaabonabonesiibwe akaihamu oburema;

 c) Owaabonabonesiibwe aine oburema aha mubiri;

 d) Owaabonabonesiibwe akaba aine enda nainga akagira enda;

 e) Owaakozire ekihagaro akareeteera omuntu kufa;

 f) Owaabonabonesiibwe akakozesibwa nk’ekikwato ahabw’okugyezesa
 emibazi kw’abashaho;

 g) Owaabonabonesiibwe akakwatwa akakooko ka siriimu;

 h) Owaabonabonesiibwe akaba atahikize myaka 18 y’obukuru;

 i) Ekikorwa ky’okubonabonesa nikyeyongyera kukorwa.

3. Okurihiirira okuragiirwe kooti.

(a) Kooti neebaasa kuragiira ngu habeho okushashurira ebyasiisikaire,
okurikubaasa kubamu ebi:(a) Okugarura owaabonabonesiibwe, ab’eka ye, nainga
abu arikureeberera omu mbeera ezi babaire barimu okubonabona
kutakabaireho.Eki nikibaasa kuba omu muringo gw’okubagarurira ekintu kyona
ekyabaire kibaihirweho, okushashura esente ahabw’okushiisha nainga
okufeerwa okubaireho; kandi n’okuha obuheereza.

(b) Okushashura esente ahabw’ebisiisikaire ezirikubaasa kubarwa
ahabw’okuhikwaho oburemeezi aha mubiri nainga omu biteekateeko, okufeerwa
omurimo, okufeerwa okwega nainga kusiisikarirwa ebintu n’esente okuheebwa
obuhwezi bw’omutaano, n’ebindi ebirimu: okuha omuntu obonaboneseibwe
obujanjabi, okumujanjaba endwara z’omutwe (omuntuoteganisiibwe omu mutwe)
nainga okuha obuhwezi bw’obuhabuzi n’obuheereza omu by’ebiragiro nka
yaateganisibwa omu biteekateeko.

(c) Okushashurira ebisiisikaire n’okufeerwa okubaireho, okuragurira omuntu
nainga okurihiirira kwona okuragiirwe kooti nibibaasa kushashurirwa ebintu
by’omuntu osingirwe omushango ahabw’okureetera omuntu ondiijo kubonabona.

Orikuteekateekwaho kuba yaakozire omushango ku yaakushangwa yaatwariize
omuntu n’obukare,ku yaakuba yaatwariize omuntu omu muringo gurikugayisa
nainga ku yaakuba yaamuhaire ekifubiro, nainga yaamutwariize omu muringo
gurikuhemura, naaba aine omushango. Kandi naaheebwa ekibonerezo ky’okukomwa
emyaka mushanju nainga kuha omutango gutarengire obukaikuru bushantu na
bishatu nkaga (3.000.360/=).

4. Abandi bantu abaine akakwate n’okubonabonesa

(i)Okuhwera omuntu kutandika kubonabonesa: Omuntu weena orikutunga,
orikuhwera, orikushaba, orikuha amaani, nainga akaragiira obushagiki byona
ebi omuntu arikumanya ngu nibiza kukoresibwa kutandika kubonabonesa naaba
yaakora omushango.

(ii).Okuhwera omuntu oine omushango akatoroka atahebwe kifubiro: Omuntu
orikuhwera ondiijo oine omushango omu kiragiro eki, kumubaasisa kutoroka
ngu ataheebwa ekifubiro, naaba yaakwatanisa nawe omu kihagaro. Omuntu
nk’ogwo naaba aine omushango.

Nahabwekyo omu kicweka (i) na (ii) aharuguru, omuntu yaashangwa aine
omushango, naakomwa emyaka erikuhika mushanju nainga ahe omutango
gw’obukaikuru bushatu n’emitwaro nshanju n’ebiri (3.720.000/=) nainga
byombiri.

Kwonka, omukazi ou iba aine omushango gw’okubonabonesa tarikutwarwa
nk’okwataniise nawe omu kihagaro ky’okubonabonesa kyaheza kuhamibwa ku iba
yaakozire ekihagaro ekyo; omukazi ku araabe abaire naamuhwera nainga
kuhwera ondiijo muntu ngu atoroke atahairwe kifubiro obwo iba ariho nainga
arikukoresa obushoboorozi bwa iba. Nangwa n’omushaija tarikubarwa
nk’okwataniise n’omukazi omu kihagaro ky’okubonabonesa kyaheza kuhamibwa
ngu abaire naahwera omukazi we kutoroka ngu ataheebwa ekifubiro.

(iii). Omwebembezi ow’ahansi kuragiirwa orikumukurira kubonabonesa omuntu:
Omwebembezi mukuru ashemereire kuba naajunaanwa ahabw’ekikorwa kyona
ky’okubonabonesa ekikozirwe omwebembezi ori ahansi ye ebihairwe ahaifo ku
byakubaho;

(a) Omukuru akaba naakimanya nainga tarafiire ha makuru agaabaire nigoreka
gye ku omwebembezi ori ahansi ye naakora nainga ari hakye kukora ekihagaro
ky’okubonabonesa.

(b) Ekihagaro ekikozirwe omwebembezi ow’ahansi kirimu ebikorwa ebyabaire
biri ahansi y’obushoboorozi bw’omwebembezi omukuru; kandi

(c) Omukuru aremirwe kwimukiramu akacondooza, akafayo kukoresa
obushoboorozi bwe omu butongore kandi akahana abakozire omushango kwenda
kuzibira ekikorwa ekyo kugumizamu; kandi n’okukwatanisa n’ab’ebiragiro omu
kucondooza emishango y’okubonabonesa.

(iv).Okuha oburinzi abajurizi n’abantu abarikuhababa emishango
y’okubonabonesa; Omuntu weena orikuhababa nainga omujurizi weena naateekwa
kureeba ngu yaaheebwa oburinzi kuruga omu gavumenti kugira ngu
atabonabonesibwa nainga kutiinatiinisibwa.

(v).Okwiha abantu omu mwanya kubata omu gundi: Kyaba nikiteekateekwaho ngu
omusibe naabaasa kubonabonesibwa, tihaine muntu orikwikirizibwa kukora ebi:

(a)kurekura nainga kwiha omusibe omu mwanya kumuhayo omu b’obushoboorozi
bw’ondiijo muntu nainga gavumenti endiijo;

(b) kwiha omusibe omu mwanya nainga kukomera omusibe omu mwanya ogundi
gutari mwanya gu poriisi erikusibiramu abasibe naingaekihome; nainga

(c) okunagaho omusibe omu mwanya ahu arikubaasa kubonabonesezibwa.

Yetegyereze: Ebyagambwaho aharuguru tibirikwija kuhinduka omusibe yaaba ari
Omunyayuganda nainga atari Munyayuganda. Nangwa tikiine na kakwate
n’omwanya ahu omusibe akomiirwe, ahu yaahindurirwa nainga ahu yaarekurirwa.

(vi). Enshonga ezirikureetera omuntu ataabaasa kugarurwayo omu ihanga ahu
arikubaasakubonabonesezibwa: N’eky’amazima ngu okubonabonesa n’ekihagaro
ekirikubaasa kureetera omuntu yaagarurwayo omu ihanga ahu yaakikoreire.
Kwonka, ekiragiro eki hamwe n’ekiragiro ky’okugarura omuntu omu ihanga ahu
yaakoreire ekihagaro (ekishoboroirwe omu nkozesa y’ebigambo), nikigira ngu
omuntu tarikwija kwoherezibwa kuruga omu Uganda kuza omu ihanga erindi,
omuntu ogwo yaaba naabaasa kubonabonesezibwayo. Nahabwekyo
n’obujunaanizibwa bw’omuntu orikuteekateeka ngu naabaasa kubonabonesibwa
kuhayo obuhame omu kooti burikworeka ngu buzima naaza kubonabonesibwa.

Kwenda kuhamya yaaba omuntu arikubaasa kubonabonesibwa nainga yaaba ari omu
kabi k’okubaasa kubonabonesibwa, kooti neija kucondooza kumanya amazima
goona garikukwata aha kuribatiirira obusingye bw’abantu omu ihanga
eririkushaba ngu omuntu agarurweyo omu ihanga. Kwonka ku kyakubaho omuntu
atoherezibwe mu ihanga erindi nainga kugarurwa omu Uganda ahabw’ekiragiro
eki, omuntu ogwo naija kuhozesibwa omu Uganda.

5. Oku orikubaasa kuhababa n’okwiguraho omushango gw’okubonabonesa

Obugabe bw’okuhababa nikimanyisa ngu omuntu yaaba niwe abonabonesiibwe
nainga atariwe, hoona omuntu naahababa aha poriisi nainga omuntu weena oine
obushoboorozi aha mushango ogwo.Omuntu orikuteekateeka ngu okubonabonesa
kukozirwe oine obushoboororzi nainga omuntu wa buriijo, ashemereire
kumanyisa poriisi ekirikumureetera kuteekateeka atyo.Yaaheza kuhayo
okwetomboitwa kwe okucondooza nikutandikiraho. Enshonga z’okuhayo
okwetomboita ku zaakushangwa ziri ez’amaani, poriisi neekwata kandi ekome
omuntu ogwo kandi emujunaane omushango gw’okubonabonesa. Omuntu owaakwatwa
naija kuhwerwa abase kugambaho n’omujwekyerwa w’eihanga rye ahonaaho.

Okuhurira omushango ogu aharuguru nikukorerwa omuri gumwe aha miringo egi
ahaifo, hatariho okwekwasa kwona:

(a) Omuporiisi naija kureeta omu kooti omuntu owaakwatwa kujunaanwa ebaruha
y’okumukwata yaaba eriho nainga n’obu yaakuba etariho.

(b) Omuporiisi naija kuta omushango aha muntu owaakwatwa omumaisho
g’omuramuzi kandi ashabe ebaruha y’okumukwata nainga ashabe ku areeta
omuntu ogwo omu kooti; nainga

(c) Omuntu weena, oihireho orikukwasisa emishango ya Gavumenti nainga
omuporiisi naija kuhababa ow’omuramuzi. Ogu ashemererire kuba ari omuramuzi
oine obushoboorozi bw’okutonganisa nainga kucondooza omushango ogu. Nainga
okuhozesibwa nikubaasa kukorerwa omu kooti eine obushoboorozi erikushangwa
omu mwanya ahu omuntu orikujunaanwa arikutuura.

Okuhababa nikubaasa kuheebwayo omu kanwa nainga omu buhandiikye kuriho
omukono ogw’orikuhababa. Ku kurikuheebwayo omu kanwa, omuramuzi naahandiika
ebyagambwa kandi orikuhababa abiteho omukono. Omuramuzi ku arikutunga
okuhababanaayebuuza aha beebembezi b’ekyanga omu mwanya ahu okuhababa
kurugire kandi ahandiike ebi baamugambira. Kandi okuhababa kwija kuriho
ebaruha erikuruga omu beebembezi b’ekyanga, omuramuzi naabaasa kufa kuta
egyo baruha omu fairo ya kooti.

Omuramuzi yaamara kuhamya ku okuhababa okwo kuhikire, naabaasa
kutebeekanisa kandi ate omukono aha kihandiiko ky’okujunaana omuntu omu
butongore,kirikworeka ekihagaro nainga ebihagaro ebyanjwirwe kuba bikozirwe
orikujunaanwa. Omuramuzi naaragiira orikujunaanwa kwija omu kooti ei
arikukurira. Omuramuzi yaaba ataine bushoboorozi bw’okuhurira omushango
ogwo, nigwoherezibwa omu kooti erikubaasa kuguhurira.

Omuramuzi orikutunga okuhababa kwona naabaasa kukuhandiika, kukwongyezayo
aheyo ekiragiro kya kooti kandi naabaasa kuragiira poriisi kucondooza
okuhababa okwo kandi ekaija ekanjura omu kooti egyoebi yaihayo. Omuporiisi
tarikukwata muntu ataine kuragiirwa ahabw’omushango ogurikubaasa kuhurirwa
omu kooti egyo. Kooti neebaasa kucwamu kuhayo semanisi nainga ebaruha
y’okukwata omuntu kandi egiheyo aha izooba ryona eri yaabona, n’obu haakuba
aha Sande.

6. Omuringo ogu kooti erikutwazamu emishango y’obwinazi ey’okubonabonesa

Omushango gw’okubonabonesa ku gurikuhurirwa, orikukurira eby’okukwasisa
emishango y’a Gavumenti naabaasa kubitaahamu agumizemu nagwo, nainga
agwemereze hoona ahu gurikuba gwahika gutakashazirwe. Naabaasa kubuuza
omuntu obonabonesiibwe nainga omuntu ohababire kuhayo amakuru n’obuhwezi.

Omuntu weena, oihireho orikukwasisa emishango nainga omuporiisi naabaasa
kwiguraho omushango gw’obwinazi ahabw’ekihagaro kyona ky’okubonabonesa. Eki
tikiine kakwate n’emirimo y’Ekitongore ekirikurwanirira Obugabe bw’abantu
omu ihanga ekya Uganda Human Rights Commission omu kukora aha mishango eine
akakwate n’okuribatiirira obugabe bw’abantu. Kandi hoona, amakuru goona
agatungirwe kuruga aha muntu, agatungirwe kurabira omu kumubonabonesa
tigarikwikirizibwa kukoresibwa omu kooti omu kuhozesa omuntu ogwo. Omuntu
weena orikukoresa amakuru agatungirwe kurabira omu kubonabonesa omuntu omu
mushango oguri omu kooti, naaba aine omushango kandi gwamusinga naabaasa
kukomwa emyaka ebiri nainga atangisibwe kushashuraesente zitarikurenga aha
mitwaro kyenda na mukaaga (960.000/=) nainga byombiri. Kwongyerera ahari
eki, amakuru nk’ago nigabaasa kwikirizibwa kukoresibwa aha muntu
orikujunaanwa omushango ogw’okubonabonesa, nk’obujurizi omu kooti,
burikworeka ku amakuru ago gaatungirwe ahanyima y’omuntu kubonabonesibwa.

Kooti y’Omuramuzi Mukuru eya Uganda neija kuba eine obushoboorozi kushara
emishango y’okubonabonesa omu mwanya gwona ahu ekihagaro kikoreirwe; yaaba
hanu omu Uganda nainga aheeru ya Uganda. Nahabwekyo, Omuramuzi Mukuru
naabaasa kwikiriza okwemerererwa omu kushara omushango gw’okubonabonesa.

Omuramuzi mukuru hoona nabwo naabaasa kusharira omushango omu mwanya gwona
omu Uganda; noobu haakuba aha ryato erihanikireho ebendera ya Uganda nainga
enyonyi ehandiikiirwe omu Uganda, omu bwire obu ekihagaro kyakorerwamu.
Omuntu weena orikutuura omu Uganda, nawe naabaasa kuhozesibwa
ahabw’omushango gw’okubonabonesa noobu yaakuba atari Munyayuganda. Kwonka
omuntu otari Munyayuganda tarikwija kuhozesibwa ahabw’omushango ogu akozire
ahansi y’ekiragiro eki kwihaho haaba hariho orusa kuruga ow’Orikukurira
Eby’okukwasisa emishango ya Gavumenti.

Yetegyereze: Ekiragiro Eky’okusaasiraabakozire ebihagaro tikirikubaasa
kukoresibwa kusaasira omuntu orikujunaanwa ogw’okubonabonesa.

Enkozesa y’ebigambo

Amakuru g’ebigambo n’enyiririz’ebigambo ebikozesiibwe:

Ekiragiro ky’okusaasira n’ekiragiro ekikozirwe Eishengyero ry’eihanga
ekirikuha okusaasira nainga okusaasirwa kw’Abanyayuganda abarikuba bakozire
ebikorwa by’okurwanisa Gavumenti.

Okusaasira nikimanyisa okwiha orubanja aha muntu otwire naakora ebihagaro
nk’eby’orugamba.

Yaakora ekihagaro/omushango nikimanyisa okubonabonesa ondiijo muntu.

Okuriha nikimanyisa okushashurira ebisiisikaire.

Endagaano nikimanyisa okwikiriza omu buhandiikye okurikukorwa ahagati
y’amahanga abiri nainga garikurengaho nainga zaagavumenti nainga ahagati ya
Gavumenti n’ekigombe ky’ensi yoona. Endagaano eyaakozirwe erikurwanisa
Okubonabonesa n’Endiijo miringo y’Okutwaza n’obukare, etari y’obuntu,
Erikugayisa nainga okuha omuntu ekifubiro ekakorwa Amahanga Ageeteeraine
kandi yaateebwaho omukono Gavumenti ya Uganda

Ebikwato by’akabi nikimanyisa ekintu kyona ekikozirwe ahabw’okurasha,
okucumita okushara nainga kureetera omuntu oshaagiziibwe kugwa kihuumura
(kutamanya eby’ahaiguru). Ebikwato ebi nibibaasa kureetera omuntu kufa,
okuhutaaza munonga nainga kutiinisa.

Okugayisa nikimanyisa okutwariza omuntu omu muringo gw’okumushiisha,
okuhemura nainga omu muringo gw’okwisa enshoni.

Omusibe:ogun’omuntu orindiirwe omu kihome na munonga ahabw’omushango
gukwatiraine n’eby’obutegyeki nainga n’ekigyendererwa ky’okumubuuza
ebibuuzo.

Orikukurira eby’emishango ya gavumenti (DPP) n’omuntu mukuru omu gavumenti
orikuhabura pooriisi ebikwatiraine n’emishango kandi akashara emishango
y’obwinazi omu Uganda.

Ekiragiro ky’okugarura omuntu omu ihanga ahu arugire n’ekiragiro ekikozirwe
Eishengyero ry’eihanga ekirikukwata aha ku omuntu orikugambwa kuba akozire
omushango omu ihanga, arikubaasa kugarurwa omu ihanga kwetonganaho aha
mishango erikumujunaanwa.

Obushoboorozi nikimanyisa amaani n’okubaasa kwa kooti kushara omushango.

Okuzibira nikimanyisa kutangira, kwemereza nainga kuremesa ekihagaro
kurugiirira aha kiragiro.

Omwebembezi omu Gavumenti: n’omuntu oine ofiisi nainga orikukora omu ofiisi
ya Gavumenti.

Okugarura busya nikimanyisa okukiza nainga kutambira omuntu, kandi
obariiremu n’okuhuumuriza nainga kuha obuhabuzi.

Okugaruraho nikimanyisa okuta ekintu omu buteeka bwakyo nk’oku kyabaire
kiri.

Omutonganirizi wa Gavumenti ogu ni puriida wa Gavumenti orikujwekyera
eihanga omu mishango.

Oshagiziibwe n’omuntu obonabonesiibwe.
</runya>

obw’emiringoy’ebyempurizanaey’okurabiramukuhweraabaana.

shaahaeibarikubanibeetengaobuhwezikwonkabatainemuntuweenaobarihaihiorikubaas
akububaha.

Sautineetahooburyoobuabaanabarikubaasakugambiramuomukihamabaabanibabonabones
ibwakandin’okutungaobuheerezaoburikubaasakubayambakurugaomuburemeezioburikur
eetwaokubonabonesibwa,obwobarikubahikaanisan’abarikukwatisaebiragirokureeban
guabarikubonabonesaabaanabaajunaanwa. Enkoraegineegyendera aha
bintubishatubikuruomukuhaobuheereza:

buriizooba.

SAUTI NEEHA BUHEEREZA KI?

1. Okuhuumuriza (okurikukorerwa aha simunaingamaishonamaisho)

kwoherezaomwanaoriomukabiomumyanyaendiijokutungaobuheerezaoburikwetengwa.

5. Okuhaamakuruagarikukwata aha kubonabonesaabaana,
obugabebw’abaanan’okurindaabaana.

F. NOOHA ORIKUBAASA KUKORESA EMIRINGO Y’EMPURIZANA Y’OKUTUNGA OBUHWEZI
BW’ABAANA?

Obuheerezabw’okuhweraabaanaokukiramunongabukoreirweabaana.
Baituabantubakurunabonibabaasakuteeraesimubarikuhweraabaananaingabaabanibend
akumanyaokubaakubaasakutwazamuenshongaezirikukwata aha baana.

Abaanaokukiramunongabashemereirekuteeraesimuahabwenshongaeziahaifo:

 • Kugambaokubarikubonabonesibwa

 • Kutungaamakuru aha nshongaezirikubakwataho

 • Kutungaamakuru aha buheerezaobubaakubaasakutunga,
 obwakubaasakubahwerakukora aha
 byetengoebibainenaingaoburemeeziobubaakubaasakubabaine.

Abantuabakurunabonibabaasakuteeraesimuahabw’enshongaezi:

 • Kuhayoamakuruagarikukwata aha kubonabonesaabaana

 • Kutungaamakuruagarikukwata aha
 buheerezaoburikubaasakuhweraomwanaorikwetengakureebererwanaingakuheebwa
 oburinzi

 • Kutungaobuhabuziburikuwata aha nshongaz’okureebereran’okurindaabaana.

kubonabonesaabaanan’enshongaz’obuntu.

bugabebw’abaanaokukiramunonga aha
bugabebw’okutangiraabaanaokubonabonesibwakubabaasisakukoraokusharahookuhikir
e.

Uganda Coffee Development Authority

 OKURWANISA N’OKUBAASA EKIKOOKO KY’OMWANI EKIRIKWETWA “TWIG BORER” (BCTB)

 Ekikooko BCTB n’obumanyiso bwakyo

EKIHANDIIKO KYA UCDA EKYA 12

OKWANJURA AHA KIKOOKO KY’OMWANI /EKIRIKURYA EMPIMBI Z’OMWANI

EBIRIKUKIKWATAHO

 • Eiziina ryakyo: Ekikooko kyomwani ekirikumanywa nka
 “Coffee Twig Borer” (CTB)

 • Eiziina rya saayansi: Zairosandurasi sp (Xylosandrus sp)

 • Orunyiriri: Koleoputera (Coleoptera

 • Ekika: Sikoritadi (Scolytidae)

 • Ahu kirikutuura: Omu bimera birikukira ahari 225
 obariiremu omwani, amagyani hamwe na kokowa.

 • CTB neezaara erikurabira omu muhanda gw’okutembana hamwe
 n’ogutari gw’okutembana, n’ahabwekyo eine omugisha
 gw’okukanya ahonaaho.

 • Nikigambwa ngu CTB ekijanjaara omu nsi yoona erikuruga
 omu nsi ya Asia.

 • Ebikazi ebikuru nibibaasa kuhururuka bikahika nka mita
 200

 • Neeza buri hamwe kandi eine obuhangaazi bwingi

 • CTB neetwara oruhumbu ruri nk’obutuzi orurikwetwa
 ‘ambrosia’ oru erikubanza yaata aha byokurya.

Ebyafaayo bya CTB omu Yuganda/CTB omu Uganda

 ➢ Ekabanza kugambwa omuri Bundibugyo Disiturikiti omu gwa 1993.

 ➢ Yaagaruka kuhurirwa omuri zaadisiturikiti, eya Rukungiri,
 Kanungu na Bushenyi omu gwa 2002.

 ➢ Ekagaruka kuhurirwa omu Disiturikiri ya Mukono omu gwa 2008

 ➢ Obwahati, haihi buri disiturikiti yoona erikuhinga omwani gwa
 Rubosita oihireho ebicweka bimwe omu matemba ga Uganda,
 yaakwasirwe, kwonka ezirikusingayo kuba kubi ni Mukono, Kayunga,
 Buikwe, Mpigi, Butambala, Luwero, Nakaseke, Masaka, Lwengo,
 Kalungu, Mityana na Mubende. Kandi nabwo neegambwa omu
 zaadisiturikiti nka Bushenyi, Ibanda, Rukungiri, Hoima, na
 Kibale.

 ➢ Nahabwekyo, ekikooko ky’omwani ekirikumanywa nka ‘Coffee Twig
 Borer (Xylosandrus sp) n’omuzigu musya w’obuhingi bw’omwani omu
 Uganda kandi haine kuzaho oburyo kureeba ngu yaarwanisibwa.

Obumanyiso aha biti by’omwani ebikwasirwe ekikooko ky’omwani (CTB)

Obuhuru nainga obubara bukye munonga (oburikwina empitirizo nainga akapini
k’egaari) nibuza ahu CTB erikuba erabire kutaaha omu kiti ky’omwani.

Emiti ekwasirwe neetandika kuhinduka eshusha nka kinekye, eguma neehonga
reero bwanyima efa kandi terikutaho bijuma.

Ku waakuhenda ekicweka kimwe ky’omwani ekirwaire okakishatura,obukooko
bukye burikwiragura hamwe n’obuhuri oburikwera nibuba buri ahagati y’ekiti.

Haaba hatagizire kyakorwa, omuti gwona gw’omwani nigufa, ekyo kirugemu
okufeerwa ebijuma byona hamwe n’esente ezaakurugiremu.

Obumanyiso bwa CTB omu kutandika kukwata Eki CTB erikukora yaaba
eriire omwani omwani kumara obwire
buraingwa

OKU EKIKOOKO KY’OMWANI KIKOZIRE OMWANI GWA RUBOSITA

Okucondooza okwabaire omu disiturikiti ya Mukono na Kayunga omu 2008
kukashanga ngu:

 • Ebicweka 37.5 ahari 100 by’omwani gwa Rubosita bikaba
 birwaire.

 • Ebicweka 21.2 ahari 100 by’emiti y’omwani bikaba
 birwaire.

 • Ebicweka 3.7 ahari 100 by’omwani omuto bikaba byafiire.

 • Ekikooko kya CBT kikaba nikijanjaara munonga.

 • Eigomborora eryabaire ritairwe kubi munonga ni,
 Namuganga, rikaba riine ebicweka 100 ahari 100
 by’amashamba garimu ekikooko, hamwe na 86 hari 100 emiti
 nayo eine ekikooko, kandi hamwe n’ebicweka 12.5 ahari 100
 by’obuti bw’omwani obukiri buto nabwo bikwasirwe.

Okucondooza okukozirwe ebiro ebi nikworeka oku CTB erwaize omwani gwa
Rubosita omu disiturikiti ezi ahaifo:

 o Mukono na Kayunga, ebicweka 40 – 50 ahari 100 by’emisiri erwaire, obwo
 ebicweka 5 – 10 birikuhiduka kurugamu ebwo kijubwe.

 o Luwero /Nakaseke ebicweka 40 – 60 ahari 100 by’emisiri erwaire.

 o Masaka /Sembabule ebicweka 30 – 50 ahari 100 by’emisiri erwaire.

 o Mpigi / Butambala ebicweka 40 – 50 ahari 100 by’emisiri erwaire.

 o Mityana / Mubende ebicweka 40 – 50 ahari 100 by’emisiri erwaire.

 o Bushenyi / Ibanda / Rukungiri – 20 – 30 ahari 100 by’emisiri erwaire.

III OKU EKIKOOKO KY’OMWANI EKYA CTB KIRIKUKWATA OMWANI

 1. ----------- Ekikooko kikuru CTB
 2. Ekikooko ekikazi ekikuru kiri omu mababi g’omwani
 3. akati kafa.
 4. Obuti bwingi nabwo nibwija bufa
 5. Akati kashatwire nikooreka amadaara agu CTB erimu omu butuuro bwayo.
 6. Omuti gwona nigufa kwonka amababi gaguma aha muti gufiire.

Oku CTB erikukwata omwani hamwe n’obumanyiso bwayo

Eitaagi ry’omwani rishatwire ririkworeka obukooko bw’omwani n’amahuri omu
bugyera bw’eitaagi

IV OKUSHISHIKARA N’OKUFEERWA AHABWA CTB

Omwani niguha eihanga rya Uganda entaasya erikwingana ebicweka 20 ahari 100
kandi gugarukye gubariirirwemu ebicweka 80 ahari 100 bw’ebirikuruga omu
buhingi bwona.

Amaka agarikwenda kwingana miriyooni 1.3 hamwe n’omuhendo gw’abantu
ogurikwingana miriyooni munaana omuri Uganda nibatungwa omwani.

Omugwa 2008, bakashanga (CORE/UCDA) ngu ebicweka 3.7 ahari 100 by’ebijuma
aha miti efiire omuri Mukono na Kayunga kandi ebicweka 12.5 ahari 100
bikashangwa omu eigomborora rya Namuganga honka.

Okufeerwa kwa Mukono na Kayunga kukwakuba aha eihanga ryona,
nikiteekateekwa ngu nihabaasa kubaho okukyendeera kw’okuguza omwani aheeru
okurikwingana ebicweka 3.7 ahari 100.

Omu 2008, Uganda ekataasya miriyooni za doora za Amerika 257 kandi omu
2009/10 na 2010/11 zikaba ziri 267, omuri ezo zoona, 448 zikaba zirugire
omu mwani. Okufeerwa ebicweka 3.7 ahari 100 ahabwa CTB kikabaasa kurugamu
okufeerwa miriyooni za dooro 9 omu 2008/9; miriyooni za doora 13.25 omu
2009/10 hamwe na miriyooni 18.1 omu 2010/11. Nahabwekyo, okufeerwa ni
kwingi munonga ahabw’okweyongyera kwa CTB hati okurikwingana ebicweka 5 –
10 byona hamwe.

Omuri Buhindi, nikgamwa ngu neefeerwa ebicweka 20 ahari 100 eby’omwani gwa
Rubosita. Omu muringo nigwo gumwe, okufeerwa hamwe n’ebibi ebiraabe aha
bahingi b’omwani omu Uganda n’okwamaani.

EMIHANDA ERIKURAGIIRWA KURABAMU KUMARAHO EKIKOOKO KY’OMWANI (CTB)

Kuyonja omusiri (nikyetwa phytosanitary)

Ahabw’okugira ngu n’ekiririzi kisya omu Uganda, abahingi baingi
tibaakamanyire obumanyiso hamwe n’okubaakubasa kumanya ekikooko eki,
ekirugiremu, okukora ekyakubaire kihikire kukorwa kibiire kikye.
Ebyatondekwa ahaifo nibikuru aha kutangira CTB:

 o Kuza omu musiri buri izooba kureeba yaaba habamu ekiti ekyakwatwa
 nainga harimu akamanyiso k’ekikooko.

 o Kubagara gye kandi okaziika omwata gwona ogwabagarwa. Omwata
 tigushemereire kurekwa ahabw’okuba nigubaasa kuba amatembeza
 g’ekikooko kuruga aha kiti kimwe kuza aha kindi.

 o Kwihamu ebiti ebiine ekibunda kingi omu eishamba ry’omwani (rekamu
 ebiti ebiine ekibunda kikye).

 o Kuhagura kandi kwosya amataagi goona agakwasirwe ekikooko.

 o Kuriisa gye ebihingwa nk’okutamu ebiriisa nka manyuwa, fataraiza,
 amaizi n’eitaka rirungi, hamwe n’okwarira ahabw’okwenda kutunga
 ebihingwa birungi.

 o Ebihingwa obihe emyanya nk’oku kirikuragiirwa kwenda ngu by’eshanje
 bitakaaturirana.

 o Kukwatanisa n’abandi boona aha kyanga, mukakora ebiragiro by’okwerinda
 n’okumaraho ekikooko ky’omwani.

 o Kugambira omuhingisa w’aha kyanga ebikooko n’oburwaire busya obwakuba
 bubarukireho aha kyanga.

KUHAGURA n’OKWOSA amataagi goona agaakwasirwe obwire, kyaba kikozirwe
abahingi boona b’omwani omu kyanga kyona nikibaasa kumaraho ekikooko. Eki
nikyenda kukorwa ab’ekyanga kyona ahabw’okuba omuhingi omwe yaaba niwe
yaakikora ekikooko ebirikuruga omu misiri y’abandi nibibaasa kuturira eye.

Kufuuhirira

Okutarikushushana n’oburwaire bw’omwani obwa Coffee Wilt Disease (CWD)
obwabaire butaine mubazi gw’okufuuhirira, obumazireho ebicweka 56 ahari 100
kuruga 1993 kuhisya hati kandi obukufeerereza eihanga miriyooni za doora
150 buri mwaka, CTB yo neebaasa kumarwaho kurungi barikukozesa endeebeerera
gye y’omusiri nk’oku yaagambwaho aha ruguru hamwe n’okufuuhirira
orikweyambisa emibazi nka Monocrotophos, Chlorpyrifos na Permethrins. Omuri
egyo yoona, oine kubanza waakora aha by’obuyonjo reero obone kufuuhirira.
Kufuuhirira na Immadocroprid 20g/1 (IMAX), guri omubazi murungi, nikigambwa
ngu nigukora gye kandi gutwire nigukora gye aha mashamba maingi g’omwani.

Okukozesa kurungi omubazi hamwe n’endiijo mihanda eyagambwaho nibirinda
eby’obuhangwa n’abantu (abarikubikozesa hamwe n’abarikugura), kandi
kikyendeeze aha nshohoza y’omuhingi. Emibazi y’okukozesa kufuuhirira CTB
eine kuba eri ‘systematic’ kwenda ngu ehike gye ekikooko omu mpuku yaakyo.

Abahingi baine kukuratira endagiiriro eri aha mibazi ebyo kandi nibateekwa
kugigyenderaho omu kutabura hamwe n’okupima kwenda ngu omubazi gukore gye.

Okucondooza

Kucondooza kuronda amagezi oku CTB yaakubaasa kumarwaho nikwetengwa kandi
kwine kukorwa kwenda kuteerana amagezi g’okubaasa n’okumaraho ekikooko
n’okukitangira obutajanjaara:

Kumanya ekikooko eki kijanjaire kita omu ihanga ryona;

Kwetegyereza ebirikukireetera okujanjaara hamwe n’obwingi bwakyo

Kwenda kumanya embeera zaakyo, kikozirwe kita kandi kiine kakwate ki
n’abigyenzi byako nka oruhumbu, obutuzi n’omwani.

Kuta omu nkora puroguraamu eya‘bio-control.’

Kushwijuma emiringo mingi ekozesiibwe kumaraho CTB nka: okufuuhirira,
emitego hamwe n’obuhooho bw’okukibinga.

 Uganda Coffee Development Authority

 EKIKOOKO KY’OMWANI/EKIKOOKO KY’EMPIMBI EKIRIKWETWA BLACK COFFEE TWIG /STEM
 BORER (BCTB)

 (Xylosandrus campactus Eichhoff)

 1. Ekikooko ekisya, ekirikumanywa nka Black Coffee Twig Borer nainga
 Coffee Stem Borer kitaire omwani gwa Rubosita omu Uganda.
 • N’akakooko kakye munonga karikukira kuba kari omu mataagi nainga
 omu buti burikumera aha mwani kwonka nabwo nibubaasa kuza omu
 mpimbi z’emiti y’omwani.

 2. Oku abahingi bashemereire kumanya BCTB n’obumanyiso bwayo aha mwani:

 • Obubara bukye/obwina (burikwingana n’empitirizo) nibureebeka ahu
 akakooka kataahiire omu kati k’omwani.
 • Akahanda ahu akakooko karabire kabaasa kuba keetooroirwe obuntu
 burikwera buri nka pawuda oburikwetwa Ambroisia.
 • Amataagi nainga obuti obu ekikooko kyataahamu bwiragura,
 buhinduka buba kinekye kandi bwoma.
 • Ku eitaagi erirwaire nainga akati kaakoboka kakashaturwa kureeba
 omu nda, obukooko bukye burikwiragura hamwe n’obundi burikwera
 buri nka obuhuri nibureebeka omu buhanda bw’akati – ahu
 burikurya aha gati y’akati, nibukareetera kufa.
 • Obukooko bwaba buri bwingi nibubaasa kureetera ekiti kyona
 ky’omwani kyafa.

 3. Abahingi nibabaasa kutanga bata Coffee Twig / Stem Borer:

 • Kuza omu musiri buri izooba kureeba yaaba habamu ekiti
 ekyakwatwa nainga harimu akamanyiso k’ekikooko.
 • Kuhagura kandi kwosya amataagi goona agakwasirwe ekikooko.
 • Kubagara gye kandi okaziika omwata gwona ogwabagarwa. Omwata
 tigushemereire kurekwa ahabw’okuba nigubaasa kuba amatembeza
 g’ekikooko kuruga aha kiti kimwe kuza aha kindi.
 • Kufuuhirira n’omubazi ogwine ‘systematic properties’ z’ahaiguru
 nka Imidacroprid 20g/l (imax).
 • Kukwatanisa n’abandi boona aha kyanga, mukakora ebiragiro
 by’okwerinda n’okumaraho ekikooko ky’omwani.
 • Kugambira omuhingisa w’aha kyanga ebikooko n’oburwaire busya
 obwakuba bubarukireho aha kyanga.
