Okusiima

Omurimo nk’ogu, obwire obwingi, niguruga omu biteekateeko by’abantu bangi,
okubeebaza boona tikirikukira kubaasika. Abakakiiko akarikukurira
abasiraamu boona omu Uganda aka Uganda Muslim Supreme Council (UMSC)
abarikukora ahaby’omubaro gw’abantu (Population Programme) nibasiima abantu
boona hamwe n’ebitongore eby’atairemu obwengye omu kushwijuma ekitabo eki
ekirikwetwa Kutunga eeka nungi y’omusiraamu erimu okushemererwa n’obugwagye

Nitusiima munonga ab’ekitongore kya United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA)
na gavumenti ya Uganda erikurabira omu kitongore kya Population
Secretariat, ahabw’obuhwezi bwa sente hamwe n’obuhabuzi bw’okushwijuma
ebiri omu kitabo eki kuhisya aha muheru.

Nitusiima Dr. Aramanzan Madanda ow’omu kitongore kya Women and Gender
Studies, ekya Yunivasite eya Makerere, owaakuriire abakugu abandi omu
kushwijuma ekitabo eki, kukigyeragyeranisa n’ebindi bihandiiko, kwongyeramu
ebikuru ebirikwetengwamu ebiine akakwate n’okumanya okw’omurembe.

Omu muringo nigwo gumwe, nitusiima Sheikh Dr. Annas A. Kalisa, omukugu omu
by’obusiraamu kuruga omu Yunivasite y’abasiraamu erikwetwa Islamic
University in Uganda ahabw’obukugu bwe hamwe n’okuta omu kitabo omu esaara
n’ebicweka by’omuri Koraani obwo arikuhwerwa ba memba ba Majilis Ulama
(Eishomero rya baasheeka) hamwe naba imaamu abandi n’abandi otaireho
nabashaho abatendekirwa namunonga Dr. Said Karama.

Omu muringo ogw’omutaano, nitwebaza Owekitiinisa Mufti wa Uganda Sheikh
Shaban Ramadhan Mubajje, omuhandiiki omukuru w’akakiiko ka UMSC, abakakiiko
boona aba UMSC, abeebembeai b’abasiraamu aha madisiturikiti boona
abaayetabire omu murimo gw’okushwijuma ekitabo eki.

Nitwongyera kusiima abeebembezi nab a memba b’akakiiko k’eby’omuhendo
gw’abantu aka UMSC ahabw’okukora omurimo muhango gw’okushwijuma ebihandiiko
omu kitabo omu kuhisya obu eki kihikirweho.

Ahamuheru, katusiime, twihire aha mutima kandi tutabaarusye abakozi ba UMSC
Population Programme hamwe n’aba memba ba boodi eya Uganda Muslim Medical
Bureau hamwe n’abakozi ahabw’omurimo murungi.

Okukira byona, nitusiima Ruhanga ahabw’obuhabuzi omu murimo ogu. Eshaara
yaitu n’okureeba ngu ekitabo eki ekirikwetwa Kutunga amaka ageemereire aha
musingye gw’Obusiraama agaijwiremu Okushemererwa n’obugwa gye, kikozesebwe
kandi ky’ongyere okwetegyereza ebikuru ebi amaka geemereire aha musingye
gw’obusiraamu garikwebembeza kandi bitunguure omutindo gw’amaka
g’abasiraamu.

Ahari imwe mwena abaatuyambire kwonka abu tutaagamba maziina, mwebare
munonga.

Kushoboorora aha kitabo

Nikimpa omuhimbo kwanjura ekitabo eki ekirimu bicondoziibwe kandi kyanguhi
kushoma eki omutwe gwakyo guri aha kushemererwe hamwe n’okunanuka omu maka.
Ekitabo nikishoboorora aha bintu bingi ebikwatiraine n’amaka, okutazaara
butwera, okutwara enda n’okuzaara abaana hamwe n’obugabe bw’abantu
namunonga abakazi. Nikiza kuhwera kwetegyereza bingi ebirikukwata aha maka
ebibaire bitashoborokire kandi buri omwe arikubyetegyereza okwe, omu
basiraamu nangwa n’abatari basiraamu. Ahabw’okugira ngu ekitabo eki
nikiiha obujurizi kuruga omuri Koran hamwe na Sunnah (Ebigambo n’emitwarize
ya Nabbi Muhammad) (Abarangi), hakabaho ekyetengo ky’okugira ngu ekitabo
eki kishwijumwe kandi kiikirizibwe abakugu aha by’obusiraamu hamwe
n’abebembezi b’abasiraamu. Nshemereiwe kureeba ngu ebiri omu kitabo eki
nibiza kukozesebwa nk’enyorekyerero aha nshonga ezikwatiraine n’amaka,
otwariiremu n’amagara g’okuzaara hamwe n’obugabe bw’abantu.

Kantware omugisha ogu nyebaze ab’Orukiiko orukuru orw’abasiraamu omu Uganda
orwa Uganda Muslim Supreme Council Population Committee, Eishomero ry’aba
Sheeka, abeebembezi aha madisiturikiti hamwe n’abasiraamu boona abashaija
n’abakazi, abaateiremu obwengye omu kitabo eki. Kandi ninsiima aba UNFPA
abateiremu obuhwezi bw’esente kuhika aha kumara ekitabo eki. N’ekyetengo
kyangye kureeba ngu ekitabo eki kyavunuurwa omu ndimi ezaitu hanu omu
Uganda kandi kihike buri omwe ahu atwire.

Nyine okushemererwe hamwe n’okwesiima kureeba ngu ninta omukono aha kitabo
eki obwo ndikushaba abantu boona abu omwoga gwabo guri ogw’okutwara
obutumwa n’obwengye ahabw’oburungi bw’abantu hamwe n’okuhikirira
oburikuheebwa Ruhanga ow’amaani.
[pic]
Sheik Shaban Ramadhan Mubajje
Owek. Mufti wa Uganda
Uganda Muslim Supreme Council

Enturukiriro

Amagara g’eby’okuzaara, omu Rungyereza agarikumanywa nka Reproductive
Health (RH), n’obu omuntu arikuba aine obutebeekana omu mubiri, omu bwongo,
omu ntuura hamwe n’omu biteekateeko omu nkora hamwe n’aha bicweka bye byona
by’okuzaara.

Ebikwatiraine n’amagara g’okuzaara nibimanyisa ngu abantu nibabaasa
kushwera nainga kushwerwa, kukora amaka kandi n’okutunga amagara marungi
kandi barikubaasa kuzaara n’okuzaarirukana baine n’obugabe bw’okusharaho ni
ryari obu baakubaasa kuzaara.

Okwenda kushemerererwa omu bugabe obu, amagara g’okuzaara nigenda ngu
omuntu abe aine ahu araihe obujanjabi burungi, hariho obuheereza bw’abakazi
oburungi obwakubaasa kurabya omukazi omu rutaro rw’enda, omu kuzaara hamwe
n’okureebererwa yaaheza kuzaara; zaapuroguraamu ez’okwerinda endwara
ezirikuraba omu kuteerana obariiremu akakooko akarikurwaza siriimu; kutunga
okumanya hamwe n’obwengye aha by’amagara hamwe n’okuteerana, kwihaho
obutaringaaniza omu bashaija n’abakazi namunonga omu kuheebwa obuheereza;
hamwe n’ohwera abakazi n’abaishiki kutunga obugambiro ahaby’amagara gaabo
g’okuteerana. Kuhikira kimwe aha nshonga y’enyini, obugabe bw’omuntu,
abafumbo hamwe n’ebyanga obw’amagara g’okuteerana bushemereire kurindwa.

Amagara g’eby’okuzaara gaine kukwata aha birikuteganisa abaana hamwe
n’abari omu mushogoyo. Abari omu mushogoyo bo bari ahari bugyengye
ahabwokuba nibahurira nibenda kumanya munonga aha by’okuteerana omu
batashwire/batashwirwe, kandi batiine ahu baraihe okumanya hamwe
n’obuhabuzi omu byaro byabo ebingi.

Ekitabo eki ekirikwetwa, kutunga eeka y’omusiraamu eijwiremu okushemererwa
n’obugwa gye, n’ekyomuhendo munonga ahabwokuba ebirimu n’obutumwa
burikukwata aha magara g’okuzaara otwariiremu obushwere, okutunga amaka
n’omugasho gwago, ebirikukwata aha kutwara enda, kuzaara gye, kukuza
omwana/abaana, okureeberera abaana, obugabe bw’abaana, hamwe n’okuteerana
kw’abari omu mushogoyo; ebirikukwata aha bashaija n’abakazi,
okubonabonesebwa hamwe n’embeera y’abakazi, obugabe bw’okuteerana hamwe
n’endwara ezirikurabira omu kuteerana otwariiremu n’akakooko akarikurwaza
siriimu (HIV/AIDs).

Omugasho gw’amaka hamwe n’eki eka nungi y’omusiramu erikumanyisa byona
nibishoboororwa omu kitabo eki. Obutumwa hamwe n’okumanya nibishoboororwaho
gye omu kitabo eki ekigyendereire kuha obuhabuzi aha magara g’okuzaara omu
basiraamu.

Omu kihandiiko eki, enshonga nkuru ezebembeziibwe zoona ziine akakwate aha
nyegyesa ya Koraani na Hadiithi, ahabw’okuba nibyo bitabo ebirimu amateeka
g’obusiraamu. Ahu kyetaagiise, obujurizi bw’omugasho bwihirwe omu bitabo
ebyagambwaho aha ruguru, bwareetwa omuri eki kitabo kwenda kushoboororagye
enshonga.

Ekitabo eki ekirikwetwa Kutunga eeka y’omusiraamu eijwiremu okushemererwa
n’obugwa gye, n’eky’abantu, abafumbo, hamwe n’amaka agarikufayo kwongyera
aha omutindo amagara g’abantu hamwe n’ebyaro.

Ekitabo eki n’ekyabo boona abaine obujunaanizibwa bw’okuhabura amaka hamwe
n’amagara g’abantu hamwe n’ebyaro byabo ngu bihikye aha mutindo.
N’obuhabuzi oburi omu kitabo omu ebyaro byaitu nibibaasa kuhaburwa aha
kutunga amaka marungi gaine okushemererwa n’obugwa gye.
 [pic]

 [pic]

 Omu iziima rya Ruhanga, ow’Ekitiinisa kandi Omusaasizi

 Imwe bantu mwe! Mutiine Ruhanga waanyu, owaabahangire kuruga omu
 muntu omwe, ohangirwe, kandi kuruga omuribo, bakajanjaara
 (nk’ensigo) abashaija n’abakazi batarikubarwa. Mutiine Ruhanga
 kandi omuri we mumushabe (obugabe) bwanyu, kandi mworobere enda
 (ezaabazaire); reero Ruhanga abarinde

 (Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:1)

Eka y’omusiraamu

Omu kicweka eki

1. Amakuru g’eka

2. Okugaitwa (Obushwere obutaribugeitwe)

3. Abakazi baine abaana batashwirwe (bakigyendereire)

4. Obushambani

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Omushaija n’omukazi kushwerana batagaisirwe tikirikwikirizana n’enyegyesa
 y’obusiraamu kandi nikiima abaana amaka gatebeekeine kandi gaikiriziibwe.
 Nikigaruka kiima abazaire omugisha gw’okukuza abaana baabo omu muringo
 murungi. Tibarikwega diini kandi n’abazaire obwire obwingi nibaremwa
 kwegyesa abaana baabo eby’obuhangwa.

Eeka y’omusiraamu
Eeka neemanywa nk’omusingye mukuru omu basiraamu kandi obushwere
bw’ekisiraamu ni kikuru aha kukora eeka egyo. Omu busiraamu, obushwere
hamwe n’okukora eka nibitwarwa nk’obujunaanizibwa bw’amaani otaireho
n’ebyamagara g’okuzaara, n’ahabwekyo okuteekateekyera amaka n’ekintu kikuru
munonga. Eka y’omusiraamu eine kuba neekorerwa aha biragiro by’obushwere
omu basiraamu.

 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]

Koraani neegira ngu Ruhanga akahanga abanywani omu kyeshusha kye, omuri bo
abaana hamwe n’abaijukuru barugyemu.
Kandi Ruhanda abakoriire abakazi abarikushusha nkaimwe, kandi ahahaire,
kuruga omu bakazi baanyu, abaana hamwe n’abaijukuru kandi abateereireho
n’ebintu birungi…
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nahl 16: 72)

Okukora amaka omu miringo egi ahaifo tikirikwikirizibwa mu busiraamu:

1. Kushwera/kushwerwa otagaisirwe. Eki nikimanyisa ngu abafumbo nibabaasa
 kutwara enda kandi bazaare abaana batari mu bushwere obw’ebiragiro,
 obw’obuhangwa hamwe n’ediini. Obushwere nk’obu tiburikwikirizana
 n’amateeka g’obusiraamu kandi nibwima abaana amaka gatebeekeine kandi
 garikwikirizibwa. Nigagaruka gaima abazaire omugisha gw’okukuza abaana
 baabo omu muringo omurungi. Tibarikwega diini kandi abazaire obumwe
 nibaremwa kwegyesa abaana baabo emicwe hamwe n’eby’obuhangwa. Omwana
 aine obugabe bw’okukurira omu biragiro hamwe n’okuheebwa eiziina
 rirungi. Ebi nibibaasa kutungwa omu maka gatebeekeine. Enyegyesa ya
 Muhammad eri ahaifo neeyoreka ngu Muhammad Omurangi (PBUH) akaha
 ekiragiro aha nshonga y’omwana orikwikirizibwa.

Obugabe bw’omwana aha muzaire n’okuheebwa okukuzibwa kurungi hamwe
neiziina rirungi.
 (Hadith ekiikirizibwa/ekahamisirizibwa Al-Baihaqi )
Abaana baine obugabe bw’okumanya abazire baabo kandi beesiimire omu magara
g’eka yoona hamwe nabanyabuzaare.
2. Kuzaara abaana otari mu bushwere haza okigyendereire

Ruhanga naayenda ngu tushwere/tushwerwe nk’oku kiri omu bujurizi ahaifo:

 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]

 Mushwere abo omuri imwe abatakashweirwe/abatakashweire nangwa muronde
 n’omu bahuuku baanyu abarikutwaza gye, abashaija nainga abakazi. Ku
 baakuba bari abooro, Ruhanga naija kutaho oburyo, ahabw’embabazi ze;
 ahabw’okuba Ruhanga n’omugabi kandi n’amanya buri kimwe.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Nur 24:32)

Kandi nabwo, obusiraamu nibujumiirira obutashwera nk’oku kiri omu ngiri
nyegyeesa n’emitwarize yentumwa Muhammad (PBH) ahaifo:
 Basigazi bangye, omuri imwe abarikubaasa kushwera, mushwere,
 ahabwokuba obushwere nibuza kubahwera obutagirira bakazi abandi omururu
 kandi kubahwere obushambani. Kwonka abo abatarikubaasa bashemereire
 kusiiba nk’omuringo gw’okwefubira okwetenga ebyokuterana kw’eby’ensi.

 (Al-Bukhari and Muslim from Hadith Abudallah Ibn Mas’ud)
 Nindahira omwiziina rya Ruhanga, Ahabwa Ruhanga, ndi omukurasi kukukira
 ...; ninsiiba kandi nsiiburuka; ninshaba kandi nza kubyama n’okushwera.
 Ogwo weena atarikugyendera mu mihanda yangye, tiwangye.
 (Hadith- Al-Bukhari na Muslim)
Obu tutarikubaasa kusiiba obwire bwona bw’amagara gaitu, hadiithi
y’aharuguru neeshoboorora ngu obushwere nigwomuhanda ogwanguhi omu magara
g’obusiraamu. Ahabw’okushemererwa n’obugwagye bw’eka y’omusiraamu,
abasiraamu bashemereire kukora amaka gaabo barikurabira omu bushwere
oburikwikirizibwa.

3. Obushambani. Obusiraamu tiburikwikiriza bushambani bw’omuringo gwona
 kandi nibuha ebifubiro bibi munonga ahari egyo mize mibi ebiri.
 Obujurizi obu ahaifo nibworeka ngu obushambani tiburikwikirizibwa.
 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]
 Muteihirira hihi n’obushambani ahabwokuba n’ekibi kihango kandi
 n’omuhanda gw’ebindi bibi.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Isra 17:32)

 :ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰﻭﻗﺎﻝ

 [pic]

 Omukazi nainga omushaija oraakwatirwe omu bushambani mumuteere kibooko
 igana (100) kandi hatariho kumusaasira obwo ateerwe ari ahagati
 y’abaikiriza.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-nur 24:2)

Obushambani nibushiisha omusingye gw’eka kandi busiisira abaana abaazairwe
n’abatakazairwe. Nibubaasa kureetaho obwisi, endwano hamwe n’okweshiisha
okaburwa ekitiinisa nangwa n’okufeerwa ebintu. Obushambani nibureetaho
obwangani omu bantu. Ahabw’amaka marungi g’omusiraamu, obushambani
bushemereire kwetantarwa tikugira ngu n’ekibi kwonka, kwihaho nk’omuze mubi
ogushemereire kwerindirwa kimwe.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Obushwere oburikwikirizana n’obusiraamu nibwikirizibwa omu busiraamu.
 Ahabw’eka nungi kandi erimu okushemererwa n’obugwa gye, abasiraamu
 bashemereire kukora amaka gaabo obwe barikukuratira amateeka
 g’obushwere ag’obusiraamu.

Emigasho y’eka y’omusiraamu
Omu kacweka aka:
1. Omugasho gw’ediini
2. Omugasho gw’eby’obuhangwa
3. Rukundo n’obunywani
4. Omwoga gw’okwerinda
5. Omwoga gw’okuzaara
6. Omwoga gw’okwega n’okutuura omu bandi
7. Omwoga gw’eby’entaasya n’enshohoza
8. Omwoga gw’okurinda obuhangwa

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Ahabw’amaka marungi g’omusiraamu, hariho ebintu omu buhangwa bw’abantu
 ebirikubaasa kureetaho okutashemererwa, nahabwekyo nibyetengwa
 kuhindurwa. Ebimwe omu buhangwa nibireetaho okushemererwa, nahabwekyo
 biine kukozesebwa omu maka ahabwo’kushemerewa n’okugwa gye.

Emigasho y’eka y’omusiraamu

1. Omugasho gw’ediini
Eeka nigwo mwanya ahu ediini eshemereire kuba neetandikira ekajanjaara omu
bantu b’eka. Abazaire beine obujunaanizibwa bw’okwegyesa abaana baabo
ediini y’obusiraamu. Ekindi, baine kutendeka abaana baabo hamwe n’abandi
bantu omu ka egyo okushaba, okusiiba, obwesigwa hamwe n’okwerinda ebikorwa
bya sitaani hamwe n’ebyo ebirikureetera omuntu okushiisha nk’okunywa
amaarwa, ebibazi birikushiisha obwongo nk’enjaayi obwo oteebirwe
n’obushambani.

2. Omugasho gw’eby’obuhangwa
Eeka nigwo musingye gw’ebyaro n’eihanga ahu obuhangwa n’emicwe bishemereire
kuba nibyegyerwa kuruga aha mukuru kuhika aha muto. Kwonka ahabw’okwenda
okushemererwa n’obugwa gye omu ka y’omusiraamu, hariho ebintu omu buhangwa,
ebirikureka okushemererwa kwabura omu maka. Ebindi nibireetaho
okushemererwa omu maka kandi biine kumanywa kandi bikeegyesebwa.
Bimwe aha by’obuhangwa ebi abantu barikukira kwebembeza ni:-
Kuha abeebembezi ekitiinisa. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebi obusiraamu
burikwebembeza n’okuha mukuru w’eka ekitiinisa (taata nainga maama), kuha
abantu bakuru ekitiinisa, abeebembezi b’ediini hamwe n’ab’ebyaro.
Ahabw’amaka marungi g’omusiraamu, okuha abantu ekitiinisa kushemereire
kumanywa buri omwe omu ka y’omusiraamu.

• Kukorengana n’abandi. N’ekyobuhangwa kukorengana n’abandi. Eeka nungi
y’omusiraamu eine kumanya ngu abantu tibarikushushana kandi ngu abantu
baine enteekateeka etarikushushana omu micwe hamwe n’obuhangwa. Okushaza
n’okuhabura omuntu omu rwatu ti mucwe gw’obusiraamu kandi gushemereire
kwerindwa obwire bwona. Okusiima ebikorwa birungi ni kirungi omu busiraamu
kandi kishemereire kukorwa, kandi mube abeesigwa.
• Omubonano: okuta ekitiinisa omu bintu by’omubonano ni kikuru omu
busiraamu. Ogu mucwe gushemereire kukorwa namunonga omukazi kuba niwe
yaakyebera ondiijo mukazi omu ebicweka by’enshoni, hamwe n’okugambirwa
ebigambo by’ekihama nk’omushaho n’ainga omuhabuzi.
• Kushwera abakazi baingi: Kushwera abakazi baingi n’omuze guri omu
buhangwa bw’abantu baingi. N’obu obusiraamu burikwikiriza omushaija
kushwera abakazi mpaka ahaikize bana, abakazi baingi b’omushaija omwe omu
ka emwe nikikira kureetaho obutashemererwa omu ka kandi haburemu
n’entunguuka. Nahabwekyo, omusiraamu aine kwepima kurungi atakabataahize
ahabwokuba tiriri iteeka ngu buri mushaija omusiraamu aine kushwera abakazi
barengire ahari omwe.

Obushwere: Obushwere omu busiraamu n’ekirikutwarwa nk’eky’obuhangwa. Eki
n’ekintu kirungi ekishemereire kugyenda omu maisho. Kwonka, ni kirungi
kutamu abantu omutima gw’okwanga kushwerwa nainga kushwera batakahikire.
Abantu baine kushwera bwanyima baamara kukura bakeetegyereza oku ensi
erikugyenda hamwe n’entebeekanisa y’amaka.
• Abaana: Abaana omu buhangwa n’ab’omuhendo. Amaka g’abantu baingi ira
gakaba gaheebwa ekitiinisa. Obusiraamu nibutwara abaana nka kikuru. Kwonka,
obuhangwa bwa rukundo erengyesereize aha baana bwine kuringaanira na
rukundo aha baana barungi kandi baine emicwe mirungi kandi nabwo omuntu
aine kupima ebi aine, abone kumanya omuhendo gw’abaana ogu araazaare.
• Enkorengana y’omushaija n’omukazi. Omu buhangwa bw’abantu baingi,
omushaija aine obushoborozi bwingi kukira omukazi kandi abashaija
nibaribatiirira abakazi baabo. Omu busiraamu, enkorengana y’omushaija
n’omukazi eine kwongyerwamu amaani kureeba ngu bombi baaguma nibabuuzana
aha kusharaho aha bintu bingi ebirikukwata aha maka gaabo.
• Emirimo y’abakazi y’obunyakare. Omu mitwarize n’obuhamgwa bwingi, abakazi
emirimo yaabo ekaba ashangwa omu kiyungu, kuteeka hamwe n’okureeberera
abaana n’omushaija nangwa n’abarwaire. Obwahati, amaka kugiramu
okushamererwe nikyenda ngu abakazi bakwatanise na baiba omu miringo yoona.
Eki nikyetaagisa kuhindura omu nyikiriza y’obuhangwa kuyamba abakazi obwo
barikuhwerwa kutunga obwegyese, kubaha emirimo, kubaha amagyezi
g’okwekorera ngu bagire entaasya hamwe n’okubaha omugisha gw’okuba
abeebembezi.
• Enkora y’abatuuragye b’ebyanga. Omu buhangwa, abatuuragye b’ebyanga
bakaba beetaba omu mirimo etari emwe n’emwe y’entunguuka ya boona
nk’okuyonja eiziba nainga ekintu kyona ky’abantu boona. Enkora
y’abatuuragye nabwo kikaba kimanyisa okuhwerana, kukorera omu
bigombe/bibiina kuhiikiriza ekigyendererwa kimwe nainga kushonda ebintu
kumaraho oburemeezi obwa butoosha. Omu busiraamu omucwe gw’okuha Zakat na
Sadaqat ni mukuru kandi n’ogwaira. Omucwe gwaira gw’abantu kwejumbira omu
mirimo ya hamwe gwongyerwemu amaani namunonga kuhwera abo abatarikwebaasa
hamwe n’abaine oburemeezi. Omurangi omukuru Muhammad (PBH) akaba ayenda ngu
abantu bakorere hamwe obwire obwingi. Engiri/Hadiithi ahaifo neeshoboorora
eti:

Mwine kuguma hamwe kandi mukakorera hamwe ahabw’okuba obuhwezi bwa Ruhanga
nibuheebwa abari hamwe.

 (Hadith ekaheebwa Omusiraamu)

3. Rukundo n’Obunywani. Hateekwa kubamu rukundo hamwe n’okubagana omu bantu
b’eka. Eeka neeha obusingye, okuhwerana hamwe n’okwe- tegyerezana ahagati
y’omushaija n’omukazi hamwe n’ahagati y’abafumbo hamwe n’abandi bantu abari
omu ka. Rukundo neemanyisa embabazi, obunywani hamwe n’okuhwerana.
Obusingye nikimanyisa embabazi ekirimu okwetegyerezana, kusaasirana
n’okugarukana, hamwe n’okwemerana. Rukundo omu maka hamwe n’obunywani nabyo
nibikuru ahari Ruhanga nk’oku arikubita omu Koraani nka bimwe aha bumanyiso
bwe.

 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﻧﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]
 “Kandi kimwe aha bumanyiso bwa Ruhanga n’okugira ngu akabahangira
 bagyenzi banyu kuruga omuri imwe ngu mube nabo omubusingye
 n’okushemererwa kandi nabaragiira okugira rukundo hamwe n’embabazi
 ahagati yanyu.”
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Roum 30:21)

Egi Ayat neegamba aha nkorengana omu maka erikutandikira ahari rukundo,
obusingye n’okugambirana gye, kuhisya aha kwetegyerezana, embabazi hamwe
n’okusaasira. Obutabanguko omu maka nibuteganisa obusingye omu ka
nahabwekyo mushemereire kubwehara.

4. Omugasho gw’oburinzi: Eeka neekora nk’omurinzi w’abantu baayo, erikubaha
obukuumi hamwe n’obusingye omu mitima yaabo. Eeka neeha obuhwezi obu abantu
bamwo barikutungira obusingye hamwo barikutungira obusingye hamwe
n’obukuumi. Eki ni kikuru namunonga ahari abo abakirikutunga obuhwezi
kuruga aha bandi nk’abaana, abagurusi n’abakaikuru, abarwaire hamwe
n’abarema.

5. Omwoga gw’okuzaara. Eeka eine obujunaanizibwa bw’okutekateeka kuzaara
hamwe n’okukanyisa oruganda. Eeka neeha abafumbo orusa rw’okuteerana
bakeemara omururu hamwe n’okukuza abaana. Nahabwekyo, eeka eine kutamu
amaani aha magara g’okuzaara. Amagara g’okuzaara nikimanyisa okubagye omu
magara g’omubiri, omu biteekateeko hamwe n’omuntuura, kutari kubura kurwara
kwonka, kwihaho enshonga zoona ezikwatiraine n’ebicweka byona ebyokuzaara
n’oku birikukora. Eki nikimanyisa ngu abantu:

 • Baine kushwera/kushwerwa bakakora amaka;
 • Baine kumarwa omu kuteerana;
 • Nibabaasa kuzaara;
 • Baine obugabe bw’okusharaho obu baraazaare abaana.

Kutunguura omwoga gw’okuzaara omu ka, ni kirungi ngu abantu babone
obuheereza burungi otwariiremu:
 • Obuheereza oburaahwere abakazi kugira enda bakahika aha kuzaara.
 • Kutunga okumanyisibwa aha bikwatiraine n’amagara hamwe n’okuteerana.
 • Kwihaho obutashoroora mu bashaija nainga bakazi omu kuha obuheereza.
 • Kuhwera abakazi hamwe n’abaana b’obwishiki kweshariraho aha
 bikwatiraine n’amagara gaabo g’okuteerana n’okuzaara.
 • Kugira za puroguraamu ezirikuta amaani aha kwerinda endwara
 ezirikurabira omu kuteerana obwo otwariiremu akakooko akarikureeta
 siriimu
 • Kurinda obugabe bw’abantu, abafumbo hamwe n’abatuuragye, obwa’magara
 gaabo g’okuteerana.

 • Kukora aha nshonga z’abaana hamwe n’abari omu mushogoyo.

6. Omwoga gw’okukuza hamwe n’okwegyesa. Eeka eshemereire kutaho enkora ahu
abantu bamwo boona baraarabire kutunga obwegyese obw’ediini hamwe
n’obwensi, kumanya emicwe, kumanya okukorengana n’abandi hamwe
n’okwikirizana aha rurengo rweka hamwe n’orwabantu boona. Eeka neekora
nk’ekyoma omu kukuza abantu baamwo. Kuruga omu buhangwa, buri muntu omu ka
aine omwoga gwe. Abagurusi n’abakaikuru bakaba batebeza abaijukuru
ebitebyo, babagambira enfumu; ba maama bo baine omwoga gw’okureeberera
abaana. Ba taata, ba maama hamwe n’abandi banyabuzaare, baine kureeba ngu
omuka harimu emicwe mirungi obwo barikureeba n’okuhabura buri omwe omu ka.
Abaana abakuru, ogwabo n’okuzaana hamwe n’okureeberera abaana. Eeka
eshemereire kureeba ngu ebyetaago by’obutoosha hamwe n’eby’obwongo
byahikirizibwa otaireho okumanyisana omu ka, kukwatanisa n’abataahi babo
n’abariraanwa hamwe n’obwegyese.

7. Omwoga gw’entasya n’enshohoza. Eeka eine kubaasa kuha abantu baayo
ebyetengo. Eeka neebaasa kwebeisaho omu miringo egi ahaifo:-
 ▪ Kubaasisa eeka ngu ebaase kugira obushobozi bw’okuha abantu baayo
 ebyetaago ebyaiteeka obariiremu ah’okuraara, ebyokurya, ebijwaro,
 obwegyese hamwe n’eby’amagara.
 ▪ Kubiika buriijo.
 ▪ Kwejumbira omu mirimo erikureetaho entaasya.
 ▪ Kutunguura ebyakubaasa kureetera abakazi n’abashaija entaasya.
 Kubaariirira enkozesa y’entaasya omu ka kwenda ngu egasire abakazi
 n’abaana.
Okutunguura nikitwariramu okwikiriza abakazi kugira obujunaanizibwa aha
ntaasya y’eka n’oku eshemereire kuba neebaganisibwa kuhwera abaana omu
kwega, kurya hamwe n’okujanjabwa. Abeeka boona bashemereire kukorerera
kutunguura eeka yaabo kandi hamwe n’okumanya ebirikugasa ahari bo hamwe
neeka yoona.

8. Omwoga gw’okurinda obuhangwa. Eeka eine kurinda obuhangwa obw’ensi,
entuura hamwe n’ediini kwenda ngu nyensya abaraabe bariho babone oku
baabaho. Obuhangwa obwensi burimu ebi ahaifo:-

 • Obuyonjo omuka otwariiremu okunaga kasasiro.
 • Eeka kutunga hamwe n’okukozesa amaizi marungi;
 • Kurinda kurungi ebintu ebi Ruhanga yaahangire nk’eitaka, ebibira hamwe
 n’enyanja.
Obuhangwa bw’entuura y’abantu nikimanyisa okukorengana omuka hamwe n’omu
batuuragye. Eeka hamwe n’ekyaro byona bishemereire kukwatanisa bikagira eki
byata aha kwetunguura. Obusingye bw’omuntu bushemereire kupimwa
bukagyeragyeranisa n’obujunaanizibwa bw’ekyaro.

Obuhangwa bw’okuramya burimu enkorengana y’eka na Ruhanga. Eeka neekora
nk’omusingye ogu abeeka barikwemereraho kukorengana na Ruhanga barikurabira
omu diini.

 OBUTUMWE BUKURU

 Eeka neekorera kandi eine kuha abantu baayo ebyetaago by’okutunguuka
 nk’okubiika hamwe n’okumanyisibwa ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe.

Eeka nungi kandi erikutunguuka ey’omusiraamu niyo eha?
Omu kacweka aka ahaifo, eeka nungi erimu okushemererwe n’entunguuka niyo
egi:
1. ekozirwe abafumbo bagaisirwe omu busiraamu.
2. Erikubaasa kukora emyoga yaayo y’eka
3. Erikutunguura enkorengana nungi y’abashaija n’abakazi.
4. Erikwejumbira omu ntunguuka y’ekyaro hamwe n’eihanga.
5. Erikwetegyereza ebintu ebi eine hamwe n’abantu abu eine.
6. Erikubaasa kukuraakurana kandi erikwega ekeeyongyera aha mutindo hamwe
 n’abantu baayo bakagira amagara g’obutoosha.
7. Erikwerinda ebikorwa ebyakubaasa kuteganisa enkurakurana yaayo omu bya
 Ruhanga hamwe n’ebintu ebya buriijo.
 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Abantu abakuru omu ka nibahisya obwire bafa nainga barugamu bagyenda,
 abaana nibabaasa kuba nibo baaba ba nyineeka, nangwa barikushoma kwonka
 babe nibo baayebembera maka batware obujunaanizibwa busya.

Eeka nungi erimu okushemererwe n’entunguuka niyo eha?
eeka nungi erimu okushemererwe n’entunguuka, omu nyikiriza y’obusiraamu
niyo egi:

1. Ekozirwe abafumbo bagaisirwe. Obushwere bw’abashaija n’abakazi bwine
 kuraba omu mateeka kandi bukaikirizibwa ediini.
2. Erikubaasa kukora emyoga yaayo y’eka. Emyoga egi ni: ediini, obuhangwa,
 rukundo n’obunywani, oburinzi, okuzaara, okuza omu bandi n’okwega,
 kurinda eby’obuhangwa hamwe n’entaasya.
3. Erikutunguura enkorengana nungi y’abashaija n’abakazi. Abashaija
 n’abakazi bashemeire kutuura kumwe omu busingye; baringanize omu
 kubagana obujunaanizibwa bw’abafumbo, bateho enkorengana nungi ahagati
 y’abantu boona abari omuka hatariho kushoshora omu boojo nainga
 abaishiki; bamanye ngu abakazi hamwe n’abaishiki bashemereire kuhwerwa
 barikutunga obwegyese n’okuheebwa omugisha gw’okukora hamwe
 n’okwebembera abandi. Enkorengana nungi nayo eshemereire kuba
 neetandikira aha kyaro ekagumizamu ahari buri omwe.

 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]

 Kandi nimwe abaikiriza, abashaija n’abakazi mwena, muri abakuumi,buri
 omwe akuume mugyenzi we, omu kukora ebirungi kandi n’omukwanga
 ebitahikire, abaikiriza bagume bashabe obutoosha, bahereze abooro kandi
 bahurire Ruhanga hamwe n’Omutume we. Ruhanga naija kubagirira embabazi.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Taubah 9:71)
Eeka nungi y’omusiraamu eijwire okushemererwa n’egyo erimu omushaija
n’omukazi barikwesigana kandi barikusharaho kumwe aha bintu bikuru
birikubakwataho.
4. Erikwejumbira omu ntunguuka y’ekyanga hamwe n’eihanga. Hashemereire
 kubaho enkorengana nungi ahagati y’eka hamwe n’abatuuragye aha kyaro.
 Eki nikimanyisa ngu eeka yaaba eine ebi erikwenda ngu abatuuragye
 b’ekyaro bagikorere, nayo eine kugira eki yaakorera abatuuragye abo,
 ahabw’entunguuka ya boona. Eeka neebaasa kuhayo omu miringo mingi nka
 sente, ebintu nainga kukora emirimo etari emwe y’ekyaro.

 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]
 Imwe baikiriza mwe! Muhe ebintu birungi ebi mutungire omu mihanda
 mirungi n’ebijuma by’ensi ebi twerize kandi mutarirondamu ebibi ebi
 mutarikubaasa kwetwarira obwo murikukiina, mukimanye ngu Ruhanga aine
 byona kandi ashemereire kuhimbisibwa.
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Baqara 2:267)

 [pic]

 4. Erikwetegyereza okuringaniza kw’ebintu eby’eyine hamwe n’oburungi
 bw’abantu abu eine. Eki nikimanyisa ngu eeka neekora ekirikubaasika
 kureeba ngu yaatunga ebirikumara abantu baayo obwo erikumanya ngu
 ebintu n’ebyaibura reero etaza omu buzibu bwaibura.
 Ku haakubaho omwe omuri imwe, owaakuba aine omusiri gwe gwa Paamu
 hamwe n’emizaabibu zine amaizi garikuzirabamu kurungi kandi ziine
 emiringo yoona y’ebijuma; reero bukuru ekaija kandi atakiine gakora;
 butandu ekaija ekaguteera, reero omuriro gukagyosya gukagimaraho.
 Mumanye ngu Ruhanga naabaha ebyokureeberaho e bi ngu mugume
 mubiteekateekeho.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Baqara 2:266).
 Arabic text?
Eeka mpango erimu abantu baingi batarikwingana n’ebintu ebi eine
terikubaasa kuba eka nungi kandi erikutunguuka. Koraani neebuuza yaaba
abaana baingi n’akamanyiso k’omugisha gwa Ruhanga.

 [pic]

 Nibagira ngu omu bugaiga n’abaana abu turikubaha, niturahuka kubaha
 ebirungi? Ingaaha, kwonka tibaine kukiteekateeka batyo.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Mu’minuun 23:55, 56)

6. Erikubaasa kukuraakurana kandi erikwega ekeeyongyera aha mutindo hamwe
n’abantu baayo bakagira amagara g’obutoosha. Eeka nungi erikukuraakurana
neetaho oburyo oku yaakubaasa kugumizamu ku haakubaho ebihikiirizi
ebyakubaasa kugiteganisa. Obwire ku birikuhika, abantu abakuru omu ka
nibafa; abaana nibabaasa kuruga omu ka baze aha mashomero nainga bakure
babe abantu bakuru nabo bagire obujunaanizibwa aha maka.

7. Erikwerinda ebikorwa ebyakubaasa kuteganisa enkurakurana yaayo omu bya
 Ruhanga hamwe n’ebintu ebya buriijo. Obusiraamu nibwanga enkora naiga
 emirimo yoona erikusiitaaza eeka. Egi neetandikira aha kunywa amaarwa,
 obushambani, obutafayo hamwe nobutagira bujunaanizibwa aha byetaago by’eka
 n’ekyaro kyona. Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu, abantu boona abari omu ka
 egyo, baine kukorera oburungi bw’eka omu bintu by’ensi hamwe n’omu bi
 Ruhanga arikukunda.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu, ab’eka bashemereire kukorera oburungi bw’eka
 omu bintu by’ensi hamwe n’ebya Ruhanga.

Obushwere
Omu kacweka aka:
1. Okushwerwa nainga kushwera otakahikiza myaka 18 nikyongyera bugyengye
 y’okunioganira omu maka hamwe n’okutaana kandi kireetere n’omuntu yaaza
 ahari bugyengye y’amagara mabi.
2. Okweyikiririza ni kikuru aha kusingura omu bufumbo.
3. Abantu bashemereire kweteekateeka batakatandikire bufumbo.
4. Abantu abarikweteekateekyera obufumba baine kuhaburwa batakabutandikire.
5. Abakazi baingi b’omushaija omwe nikikira kureetaho obutamarwa kandi
 nikikira kureetaho obutabanguko omu maka.
6. Okutaana nikureetaho okutatunga bintu aha rubaju rw’omukazi n’omwana
 kandi kushemereire kweharwa.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU
 Abafumbo bato tibarikubaasa byetaago by’obushwere, kukora amaka kandi
 n’okworora abaana.
Obushwere

Obushwere ni kimwe aha bintu bikuru birikukora eka. Obushwere, n’omusingye
mukuru gw’okwombeka eeka, n’endagaano nkuru kitari kantu kakye. Nahabwekyo,
bwine kuteebekanisibwa n’obwegyendesereza. Ekigyendererwa kikuru omu
bushwere n’okugira obusingye, rukundo hamwe n’okusaasira. Ekirikumanyisa
ngu obushwere bushemereire kureetaho eka nungi eijwiremu okushemererwa.
Obutumwa obu ahaifo, nibubaasa kuhwera abasiraamu kugira amaka marungi
gaijwire okushemererwa.

1. Okushwerwa nainga kushwera otakahikize myaka 18 nikyongyera bugyengye
y’okunioganira omu maka hamwe n’okutaana kandi kireetere n’omuntu yaaza
ahari bugyengye y’amagara mabi. Abafumbo bato tibarikubaasa byetaago
by’obushwere, kukora amaka hamwe n’okworora abaana. Okuteerana n’obwishiki
buto butakahikize myaka nikireetaho okushiishikara hamwe n’okwatika omu
micweka by’omubonano. Akaishiki ku kaakutwara enda, nikaba kari ahari
bugyengye hamwe n’omwana waako ari omu nda. Omuntu yaaba akiri muto,
kigumire kwesariramu kuza omu bushwere, ekirikureetera obushwere bwarema.
Emyaka y’obushwere erikukuratirwa omu basiraamu omu Uganda neeruga omu Ayat
egi ahaifo.
 [pic]

 Murekye efuuzi, kuhisya obu ziraakure zikahisya emyaka y’obushwere;
 kitari ekyo, nimwija kucwerwa orubanja, mubahe ebintu byabo …
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:6)
Emyaka y’obushwere erikugambwaho omu Ayat egyo aha ruguru niyo egyo obu
abaana baraakure bakahisya emyaka. Omu mahanga maingi g’abasiraamu,
abasiraamu abanyamateeka bakizire kushoboorora eiteeka eri ahabw’oburungi
bw’obugabe bw’okuteerana hamwe n’okuzaara kw’abantu kandi baataho ebiragiro
birikugamba aha myaka y’okutandika obushwere.

 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]
Name of sura?
English version of Ayat?

Omu Uganda, omuntu n’omwana kuhisya aha myaka 18. Emyaka y’okutandika
obushwere omu basiraamu b’omu Uganda teshemereire kuza ahansi y’emyaka 18
nk’oku erikumanywa omu biragiro kandi erikwikirizibwa abanyamateeka
b’abasiraamu. Abazaire hamwe n’aba Imaamu tibashemereire kwikiriza abaana
kutandika obushwere bakiri bato.
2. Okweyikiririza ni kikuru aha kusingura omu bufumbo. Kwenda kutunga amaka
g’abasiraamu marungi gaijwire okushemererwa, abantu baine kweshariraho,
bakaikiriza kushwerwa nainga kushwera aha myaka ehikire. Omu biragiro bya
Uganda, omuntu tarikubaasa kwikiriza atakahikize myaka 18 y’obukuru. Egi
niyo myaka ei omuntu arikutwarwa nka mukuru. Hadithi na Ayat ezaaheebwa
ahaifo nizigamba aha kwikiriza obushwere butakabaireho. Omurangi (PBUH)
akagira:
 Omukazi tashemereire kugyemwa kutaaha omu bushwere. Omwishiki oshugaine
 nawe ashemereire kubanza yaikiriza atakashwirwe. Ku baamuburize oku
 bashemereire kumanya ngu yaikiriza, yaagira ngu: okuhunama kwe.
 (Hadith- eikiriziibwe Sahaba )

 Ruhanga akagira:
 Kandi muhe abakazi ebirabo (aha kushwera) nkaiteeka; kwonka ku
 yaakwekundira akagaruza ebintu bimwe ahari ebi birabo owaawe, byakiire
 n’omutima gumwe.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:4)
 Arabic version?

Okwikiriza Mahr (ebirabo ebi barikuha abazaire b’omwishiki orikushwerwa)
nikimanyisa ngu omwishiki aikiriize kushwerwa. Obusiraamu bukahinguza
eky’okwikiriza kw’omukazi munonga, ahabw’okureeba ngu obushwere nibubaasa
kushazibwamu omukazi baaba bamugyemire. Kurugiirira ahari AI-Bukhari na
Muslim, Omurangi Muhammad (PBH) akashazamu obushwere bwa Khansa Bink Khudam
Al-Ansariya ahabw’okuba ishe akamugyema kushwerwa omushaija ou yaabaire
atarikwenda.

3. Abantu baine kweteekateeka batakagiire mu bushwere. Ahabw’amaka marungi
 g’omusiraamu, entaasya/eshaho y’omushaija orikwenda kushwera ni kikuru.
 Omushaija orikwenda kutaaha omu bushwere ashemereire kuba aine entaasya,
 kitari ekyo, obushwere bushemereire kwongyezebwayo. Obujunaanizibwa aha
 kukuza abaana n’eiteeka omu bushwere. Abo boona abarikwenda kutaaha omu
 bushwere baine kweteekateekyera kukuza abaana aha musingye gw’obusiraamu
 kandi n’okubaasa obujunaanizibwa bw’amaka. Ni kikuru kumanya ngu omukazi
 naabasa kuba aine sente ezirikubaasa kuhwera omu bushwere. Obumwe
 n’obumwe, abakazi nibahwera omu kugura ebyetaago by’omu maka. Khadijja,
 omukazi w’okubanza ow’omurangi Muhammad (PBUH) n’ekyokureeberaho kirungi
 ky’omukazi w’omugaiga orikuhwera amaka. Ni kikuru kugira ngu ebintu
 by’omushaija neby’omukazi byahwerahwerana omu kutunguura amaka. Nikirungi
 nabwo ngu entaasya y’abafumbo einganeingane. Omwe yaaba naakira ondiijo
 munonga esente n’ebintu, obwire obwingi nikireetaho obutabanguko omu
 maka. Enyegyesa egi ahaifo neegamba aha kubanza waayeteekateeka
 otakataahire mu bushwere.

 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]

 Murekye abo abatakatungire bintu/buryo bw’okushwera babe barekire
 kuhisya obu Ruhanga araabaheere oburyo …
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Nur 24:33)
 Imwe boojo mwe! Omuri imwe ku haakuba harimu orikubaasa amaka, ashwere
 … kwonka ogwo otarikubaasa ashemereire kusiiba nk’omuringo gw’okwerinda
 emitego y’obushambani.
 Arabic Quran quotation?
 (Hadith ei baikiriziineho kuruga Ibn Mas’ud )
Kuha omukazi ebi arikwetaaga hamwe n’ab’eka boona nikimanyisa okumuha byona
ebikwatiraine n’omubiri nk’ah’okuraara, okurya, okujwara, okuzaana nainga
kukyakaraho, hamwe n’obujanjabi namunonga obw’omukazi n’abaana harimu
n’okukyebeza nk’oku obushaija bwemereire.

Obushwere bw’omusiraamu burimu Mahr (akisiimo) k’omukazi. Omushaija ku
yaakuba atarikubibaasa, aine kuba arekire kandi ayerinde. Omu buryo nibwo
bumwe, omushaija otarikubaasa maka ashemereire kwongyezayo obushwere
kuhisya obunaku obu araabe yaayeteekateekire.
4. Boona abarikuteekateeka kushwera/kushwerwa baine kubanza baahaburwa.
Imaamu ashemereire kubaanza yaahabura kandi yaatendeka abo abarikwenda
kutaaha omu bushwere nangwa n’aha izooba ry’okugaitwa. Aine kubahabura aha
bintu nk’ebi ahaifo:
 • Obuzaire (okukuza n’okureeberera abaana).
 • Omugasho gw’eka.
 • Obumanyiso oburikworeka eeka nungi erimu amashemererwa kandi
 erikukurakurana.
 • Okutwara enda n’okuzaara.
 • Obutazaara kumwe-kumwe hamwe n’endeeberera y’omuzaire n’omwana.
 • Kushoboorora enshonga n’obutabanguko omu bushwere.
 • Obujunaanizibwa hamwe n’obuhwezi bw’omwami omu maka.
 • Endwara ezirikurabira omu kuteerana otairemu akakooko akarikureeta
 siriimu (HIV/AIDS).
Obusiraamu nibuhabura kuronda okumanya n’obwengye nk’oku kiri omu Hadiith
ahaifo:-

 Muronde obwengye ahu buri hoona, n’obu bwakuba buri China...

 ( Hadith – Ibn Majah )

 Okwega n’obujunaanizibwa bwa buri musiraamu (omushaija nainga
omukazi)

 ( Hadith- eikiriziibwe Al Bukhari
Kwonka shi abantu nibabasa kuhurizana bata nibamanya bata? Ni muringo ki
omurungi ogwakubaasa kuhisya kurungi obutumwa? bamanyisa? Okumanyisibwa
(nainga shi “information” omu rungyererza), nikubaasa kuhindurwa kuta
kukaba okw’omugasho ahari buri ka hamwe na buri kyaro kwenda ngu
bashemererwe kandi bakuraakurane?

Kurugiirira aha kirikumanywa, ebintu byaguma nibigambwaho kandi
bikagarukwamu kuruga omu nshonda zoona kumara emyaka nyingi, amaka hamwe
n’ebyaro nibitunga okumanyisibwa.

Nahabwekyo, obuhwezi nibwetaagwa kuruga omuri abo boona abakubaasa kuha
okumanyisibwa kwona abantu b’amaka hamwe n’ebyaro Ba Imaamu abarikugaita
abarikutaaha omu bushwere hamwe n’ebibiina by’abakazi n’eminyeeto biine
kutwara obujunaanizibwa bw’okubunzya engiri y’okumanyisa abafumbo bakatunga
okumanya n’amagyezi agakwatiraine n’amagara g’obushwere kwenda batungye eka
nungi erimu okushemererwa n’entunguuka.

5. Okushwera abakazi bingi nikireetera eka etaagira bintu birikumara kandi
kureeteho obutabanguko omu maka.
N’obu obusiraamu buraabe nibwikiriza okushwera abakazi baingi, nabwe hariho
ebintu bingi ebishemereire kugyenderwaho omuntu atakashazireho kushweera
omukazi ondijo. oburomborombo obukwakurizo bwingi ekirikureka okushwera
abakazi baingi kwaguma. Enyegyesa kuruga omuri Koraani ahaifo neegamba aha
bukwakurizo/oburomborombo obu omuntu aine kukuratira yaaba nayenda kushwera
abakazi baingi:

 [pic]

...Taasya abakazi baingi obu orikwenda, babiri nainga bashatu nainga bana;
kwonka waaba noomanya ngu t’oraabaringaanize, shwera omwe wenka…
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:3)

 [pic]
Tikirikubaabaasikira kukora oburinganiza aha bakazi n’obu mwakuba
nimukyetenga; nahabwekyo guma n’omukazi omwe; kutari kumureka omu mwanya
naazereera …
(Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:129)
Omuri Koraani erikwera, Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:129, Ruhanga
naakyencumintiriza ngu omushaija tarikubaasa kuringaaniza omu bakazi
abarengire ahari omwe, kwonka tarikuzibirwa kushwera abakazi baingi.
Ruhanga naayehanangiriza abaikiriza kwegyendesereza enshonga y’okushwera
abakazi baingi.

6. Okutaana nikireetera abakazi n’abaana baaburwa oburyo bw’entaasya
n’ahabwekyo mukweshumbe. Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu erimu okushemererwa
n’obugwa gye, ebintu ebirikubaasa kureetaho okutaana, nka: obwamaraaya,
okushwera/kushwerwa bakiri bato hamwe n’obuteesigana, bishemereire
kwerindwa.

Ku harikubaho okutaana, abakazi nibiimwa ebintu kandi tibarikwikirizibwa
kukozesa eitaka nainga kubona buri kimwe ekyakubaasa kubayamba kwekorera.

Abakazi abarikubingwa omu maka, obwire obwingi, nibabiima n’abaana baabo
ahabw’okuba abashaija nibagira ngu omu buhangwa, nibo baine kuba nibaguma
n’abaana nainga obumwe omukazi taine oku araareeberere abaana ahabwokuba
taine ki aine. Obushwere, ekintu kikuru munonga aha kukora amaka,
n’endagaano nkuru kitari kintu ky’okuzaanisa. Okuhenda endagaano egi
n’ekintu kirikureetaho oburemeezi buhango omu maka hamwe n’omu batuuragye
aha kyaro kyona. N’obu obusiraamu buraabe nibwikiriza okutaana, hariho
obukwakurizo/oburomborombo bwingi.
 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]
Iwe murangi we! Ku oraabingye abakazi, babingye kumara obwire
oburikuragirwa omu Korani(Iddah) obu barikwenda kandi obare ebiro
nkokubyaragirirwe reero oyegyendesereze obujunaanizibwa bwawe.
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Talaq 65:1)
Omu bintu ebi Ruhanga arikwanga, n’okutaana nainga kuhenda obushwere.
(Hadith- ekaikirizibwa Abu Dawoud na Ibn Marja)
Mushwere kwonka mutarisheenya amaka, ahabwokuba Ruhanga tarikwenda bashaija
n’abakazi abarikuroza obushwere. (Hadith- Eikiriziibwe Al-Tabarani )

Obusiraamu nibugyezaho kureeberera amaka nk’oku kirikubaasika namunonga
ahabw’abaana. Kwonka, obusiraamu tiburikwikiriza ngu omushaija nainga
omukazi anyigirizibwe omu nshonga nkuru eza rukundo hamwe n’amaka.
Okwegarukamu ni kikuru. Kwonka abantu baaremwa kugarukanisibwa, tikihikire
kubareka hamwe.

Kandi ku baakusharaho kutaana, Ruhanga niwe muhurizi, kandi orikumanya
byona. (Holy Qur’an: Surat Baqara 2:227)

Ebintu ebi omukazi araabe aine akiri omu bushwere tihaine oshemereire

Kwonka, ku waakusharaho kubinga omukazi okashwera ondiijo, n’obu waakuba

 [pic]
( Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:20)
Omukazi aine enda taine kuba naabingwa akiine enda. Bashemereire kurinda

Abakazi ababingirwe nibaija kurindaho emyezi eshatu. Nikihenda amateeka ku

Iwe ntumwa we! Ku murabinge abakazi; mubabinge kwonka mubahe obwire bwabo
