(Holy Qur’an: Surat Talaq 65:1)

 [pic]
Tikihikire omwikiriza, omushaija nari omukazi, ekintu kyasharwaho Ruhanga
hamwe n’omutume we, kukireka mukakora ekyanyu. Ku haraagire owaabura
kuhurira Ruhanga n’omutume we, naija kuba ari omu muhanda gutahikire.

 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Ahzab 33:36)

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Obushwere bw’abasiraamu nibwenda Mahr (akasiimo)ky’omukazi.
 Omushaija yaaba atarikugibaasa, aine kurindaho kandi akeekuuma.
 Omuringo nigwo gumwe, omushaija atarikubaasa kureeberera eka aine
 kurindaho kuhisya obwire obu areehurire ngu naabaasa eka.

Okubaka hamwe n’okutwara enda

Omu kacweka aka:

1. Kwerinda kutwara enda otakahikize myaka 18 nainga ori ahaiguru y’emyaka
 35 nikikyendeeza obuzibu bw’okuzaara.
2. Abaana kuza aha bugyengye y’okufa nikibaasa kweyongyera haaba hatariho
 mwanya murungi ahagati y’amazaara.
3. Buri ka eine kuronda obutumwa n’okumanyisibwa ahaby’okuzaara kurungi
 kuruga aha mushaho otendekirwe kwenda ngu etungye okushemererwe n’obugwa
 gye.
4. Kukyendeeza aha buremeezi bw’okutwara enda, buri ka eine kumanya
 obumanyiso oburikurabura.
5. Omuntu otendekirwe aine kuhwera ahari buri izaara.
6. Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu, omushaija, abantu boona omu ka,
 ab’eby’amagara, abatuuragye, hamwe n’abantu boona baine kuha obuhwezi
 abakazi b’enda.
7. Ahabweka nungi, abasiraamu baine kuzaara abaana abataraaburwe ebintu
 ebiraabareeberere.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Kuza ahari bugyengye omukazi aine enda, kikizire kuba omu bakazi
 abatashomireho kandi abatarikumanya omugasho gw’okukyebeza enda omu
 bwire, omugasho gw’okuhuumuraho, hamwe n’ebyomuntu ashemereire kurya
 yaaba aine enda.

Okubaka n’okutwara

Okubaka n’okutwara enda nibihikiiriza omwoga gw’okuzaara omu ka. Obutumwa
obu ahaifo nibubaasa kuhwera kuta aha mutindo embeera nungi y’abafumbo
kandi kizibire kurwara-rwara omu bafumbo.

1. Kwerinda obutagira nda otakahikize myaka 18 kandi ori ahaiguru y’emyaka
35 nikikyendeeza oburemeezi oburi omu kuzaara. Abaishiki boona bashemereire
kukura bakabanza baaba abakazi batakabaire ba maama. Amaka g’abasiraamu
gaine kukora ekirikubaasika obutahingira mwana w’omwishi atakahikize myaka
18 y’obukuru. Eki nikibaasa kubaho abaana aba baaguma omu ishomero
nibashoma nainga omu itendekyero bakabanza baakura.
 [pic]
Kandi mugyezeho … ku baraahisye emyaka y’okuza omu bushwere kandi
kumuribacwera orubanja, mubahe ebintu byabo.

 (Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:6)

Abatahakize myaka 18 (Abaana) tibarikubasa kweshariraho cwerwa rubanja
kandi tibarikubaasa kureeberera abandi baana hamwe neeka. Abafumbo
bashemereire kuteekateeka kumara kuzaara omukazi atakahikize myaka 35
y’obukuru. Omukazi yaahisya emyaka 35 naaba ari ahari bugyengye y’okutwara
enda kandi akagizaara gye, kandi n’omwana omunda nawe naaba ari ahari
bugyengye.

2. The risk of death for young children is increased if the space between
births is less than two years. Abaana bato nibaza ahari bugyengye y’okufa
baaba babazaariire kumwe-kumwe. Ahabw’amagara ga bombi omwana na nyina,
abazaire bashemereire kurinda kuhisya obu omwana waabo omuto araahisye
emyaka nangwa ebiri (2 years) batakazaire ondiijo mwana. Abaana
barikuzaarirwa kumwe-kumwe (obutwera) tibarikukura gye, omu mubiri n’omu
bwongo. Omubiri gw’omukazi azaire nigwetenga haakiri emyaka ebiri (2)
kugaruka omu buteeka bwagwo. Nikitwara obwire omukazi azaire kugarukwamu
amaani aha nyima y’okutwara enda n’okuzaara. Omukazi w’enda taine bwire
bw’okureeberera abaana abakuru omu muringo gw’okubaha ebyokurya byabo hamwe
n’okuguma abataireho kariisho. Ekyarugyemu, omwana abura kukuragye.

Omukazi orikugira enda aharize kuzaara haza atakagarukire omu buteeka,
naaba ari ahari bugyengye bw’okuzaara omwana mukye nainga atahikire. Omwana
mukye munonga kandi atarikuremeera nabaasa obutakura gye; naabaasa kurwara
kandi afe omu mwaka gw’okubanza ogwazaariirwemu. Koraani ekataho obwire omu
omukazi ashemereire kwonkyezamu – emyaka ebiri (2) kandi Omurangi akarabura
aha kuha omwereera amate g’omukazi w’enda.
 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]

Abaana baryayonkyera emyaka ebiri…

 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Baqara 2:233)

 :ﻭﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]
...kandi baraabacukiza aha myaka ebiri ...

 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Luqman 31:14)
Obunyiriri bubiri obu nibubaasa kutwarwa nk’ekyokugyenderaho ky’okureka
omwanya omu mazaara kuhwera omukazi kwonsya omwana kandi akagaruka omu
buteeka yaaheza kuzaara. Eki nikimanyisa ngu omu bwire obu, kubaka endiijo
nda ti kirungi. Amazaara maingi kandi gahikaine nainga ago ag’abakazi
bakuru nainga bato munonga nigareetaho okufa kw’abaana kurikwingana
obucweka 1/3 aha beereere boona abarikufa omu nsi. Kureka omwanya omu
mazaara nigwo muringo mukuru gw’okuta amagara g’omukazi n’ag’omwana aha
mutindo.

3. Buri ka eshemereire kuronda kandi kutunga okumanyisibwa kuruga aha
mukozi w’eby’amagara kwenda kutunga eka nungi erimu amashemererwa. Abantu
baingi tibarikumanya ebikwatiraine n’okuzaara namunonga kutwara enda.
Abakazi baaba batarikumanya ebirikukwata aha kukyebeza enda, kuhuumuraho,
n’okuryagye, hamwe n’eki omukazi w’enda ashemereire kuba naakora n’eki
atashemereire kukora kuzaara omwana w’amagara marungi, nibaba bari ahari
bugyengye n’enda zaabo zi baine. Obusiraamu nibushaba abantu kuronda
obwengye.

Bwino y’abeegi neekira eshagama y’abajurizi.
(Hadith –Al Tabar)

Omukozi w’eby’amagara naahabura aha:
 • Mihanda y’okukyerererwa kugira enda endiijo
 • Endya y’omukazi oine enda hamwe n’omwana
 • Oku enda eyemereire hamwe n’amagara g’omwana atakaziirwe.
 • Amagara g’omukazi w’enda obwo arikukyebera oku eshagama erikugyenda omu
 bubiri.

 o Kukyebera kureeba yaaba eshagama erimu neemara;
 o Kukyebera eshagama kureeba yaaba harimu obukoko burikureetwa
 okuteerana nk’akakooko karikurwaza siriimu, nainga enziku.
 o Kuha omubazi gurikutangira omushwija.
 o Kuha omubazi kurikutangira eibura ry’eshagama.
 • Oku omuntu ashemereire kweteekateekyera kuzaara.
 • Kumanyisa aha ngaburira y’abaana n’emiringo y’okubagaburiramu otaireho
 kwonsya.
 • Kuteera omukazi w’enda ekikatu kirikuziiza/kutangira akakooko akarikwetwa
 tetanus hamwe n’ezindi ndwara zirikukira kukwata ab’enda.
4. Kukyendeeza aha buremeezi bw’enda, buri ka eshemereire kumanya
obumanyiso oburikurabura.

Kwega n’obujunaanizibwa bwa buri omwe, omushaija nari omukazi.

( Hadith-ekaikirizibwa Al-Bukhari )

Abeeka, omwami hamwe n’omukyara aine enda bashemereire kumanya ebitari
birungi nk’oku bihairwe ahaifo:
 • Kugira enda omwana ou oine atakahikize myaka ebiri (2).
 • Omuzaire oine emyaka etakahikire 18 hamwe n’omukazi orikuzaara arengize
 emyaka 35.
 • Omwana arikuzaarwa atahikize kiro ibiri (2)
 • Orikuzaara ari mugufu munonga arikuhisya oburaingwa bwa sentimita 145.
 • Omukazi owaazaire abaana bana ninga abarikukiraho
 • Omukazi ou bashemeize nainga owaatungire oburemeezi omu kuzaara.
 • Omukazi owaarugirwemu enda, nainga owaagiihiremu nainga owaazaire
 oburengye.

 5. Omuntu otendekirwe ashemereire kuhwera ahari buri kuzaara.

 • Ebisha ku byatuura aha muntu kumara obwire buraingwa.
 • Kuyonja omuhanda gurikurabamu omwana kwehara oburwaire bw’oburofa.
 • Ekyokukora omwana yaaba naashohorera omu mwanya gutari gwo nainga omu
 buryo butari bwa butoosha.
 • Ekyokukora omukazi yaaba naarugwamu eshagama nyingi.
 • Obu arikubaasa kweta omushaho atendekirwe arikumukiraho.

6. Ahabw’amaka marungi g’omusiraamu agaijwiremu okushemererwa, omwami,
abeeka, ab’eby’amagara, abatuuragye, hamwe n’abantu boona baine kuhwera
abakazi baine enda. Eki nikimanyisa ngu abari haihi n’omukazi wenda boona
baine kumumanya, bakamwikiriza kandi bakamuha obuhwezi omu muringo gwona.

Abakazi b’enda nibenda obuhwezi kuruga ahari baiba, hamwe n’ebitongore,
eeka ye, abeebembezi b’ebyaro hamwe n’ab’ediini, abakozesa hamwe
n’abashuubuzi, abashaho hamwe n’abarikukora aha by’amagara; ebibiina
by’abakyara, abone kuzaara gye.

 [pic]

Abaikiriza, abashaija n’abakazi, n’abanywani; nibashemererwa n’ekihikire,
kandi bazibira ekitahikire …

 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Taubah 9:71)

Kuba omu mwanya gurikuhwera nikimanyisa ngu abantu boona b’eka hamwe
n’abatuuragye nibamanya ngu:
 • Abakazi b’enda boona nibeetaaga ebyokurya by’ekiriisa hamwe n’ebindi
 baaba baine enda, kandi batunge okuhuumuraho. Eki obumwe nikimanyisa ngu
 bahwerwe kukora emirimo y’obutoosha hamwe n’okutunga obuhwezi bw’esente.

 • Abakazi bashemereire kuhwerwa bakaza ow’omushaho otendekirwe baaba baine
 enda.
 • Abakazi bashemereire kutunga okumanyisibwa aha kuzaara, kureka omwanya
 omu mazaara, ah’okuzaarira, obumanyiso obubi omuntu yaaba aine enda
 nainga atakazaire.
 • Ni kikuru kuhwera omukazi w’enda kuhika aha mushaho otendekirwe kukyebeza
 hamwe n’okuzaara eki kireeteho okwongyera enshonga z’okuzaara aha mutindo
 hamwe n’okwongyera aha migisha y’omwana kuzaarwa ahuriire kandi
 akagumaho.
 • Kutaho oburyo bw’okureeba ngu omukazi w’enda yaarya gye kandi yaatunga
 okuhuumura kurikumara kandi obwo n’obujunaanizibwa bw’omushaija hamwe
 n’ab’eka yoona.

 • Kuhwera abakazi kugamba n’okumanya ebirikukwata aha kutazaara butwera
 hamwe n’okweteekateekyera kutwara enda ahabw’okwongyera omutindo
 gw’amagara ge hamwe n’ag’omwana.

 • Abashaija bashemereire kuhwera abakazi baabo hamwe n’abakazi b’enda.
 Omushaija omurungi naafayo, aine rukundo kandi naamanya obujunaanizibwa
 bwe omu ka hamwe n’aheeru y’eka, naahwera omukyara we omu bwire obu aine
 enda hamwe n’omu kuzaara, arikumuhwera omuri buri kimwe.

 [pic]

Abashaija ni baakiyambi na kikuumi w’abakazi ahabw’okuba Ruhanga akabaha
amaani kukira abakazi kandi baine oku baraabahwere…

(Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:34)

Enyegyesa egyo aha ruguru mushemereire kugiha nk’obujurizi kwenda ngu
abashaija baikirize bahe abakazi baabo obuhwezi omu ka namunonga baaba
baine enda. Abarikukora ahaby’amagara baine kuha obuhwezi abakazi abazaire.

…kandi omuri imwe ku haribaho oricungura amagara g’omuntu omwe, oraashusha
oti yaacungura amagara g’abantu boona.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Maida 5:32)

Ayat egi aha ruguru eshemereire kuheebwa nk’obujurizi kwongyera abakozi
b’abeby’amagara amaani g’okukora aha bakakazi barikuzaara na rukundo,
bakyebere abakazi batakazaire, bariyo nibazaara kandi na baaheza kuzaara
kandi bahe obujanjabi bw’omutaano abakazi abaine oburemeezi omu bwire
bw’enda n’omukuzaara kandi bahe obuhabuzi hamwe n’amagyezi aha nshonga
y’okuzaara gye. Abarikukora aha by’amagara baine:
 • Kugira rukundo kandi bakagambira gye abakazi aha marwariro.
 • Bahe abakazi obuhabuzi obu barikubaasa kwetegyereza gye.
 • Bate obuheereza bw’enshonga z’okuzaara omu mirimo yaabo kwenda ngu
 abakazi babutungire hamwe omurundi gumwe.
 • Bareebe ngu ebi baabagambira hamwe n’ebyo ebi bareeba barikubakyebera
 byaguma biri ebihama hamwe.
Abatuuragye hamwe n’abantu boona baine kuta omutima aha bintu
ebirikureetaho amagara marungi g’omukazi aine enda. Ebintu ebi ahaifo
bishemereire kwetegyerezebwa:
 • Kuhwera omukazi ari aha nda kuhika ow’ebyamagara.
 • Kumupakira
 • Kugambira abeebembezi b’ebyaro abakazi abarikufa nibazaara kwenda ngu
 bakaagira eki baakora aha nshonga.
 • Kuhwera ab’eby’amagara kukora omurimo gwabo kurungi nk’abazaarisa b’aha
 kyaro hamwe n’abashaho.
 • Kutamu abakazi obuhame bw’okwonsya ahabwokuba abakazi nibenda kubahamya
 n’okubatamu amaani kuruga aha baami, ab’eby’amagara, abanyabuzaare,
 abamahurire, ebibiina hamwe n’abakozesa.

 • Kuha obuhwezi oburikwetaagwa obwakubaasa kutunguura omutindo
 gw’eby’obuyonjo omu bakazi biine enda.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Omushaija omurungi n’ogwo orikufayo kandi aine rukunda
 n’obujunaanizibwa bwe yaaba omuka nainga ahandi, arikufayo aha mukazi
 we yaaba aine enda, arikumuhwera omuri buri kimwe.

8. Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu, abasiraamu baine kuzaara abaana abu
barikubaasa kureeberera n’ebintu ebi baine. Eka nungi y’omusiraamu neemanya
obuzibu oburiho obw’okuringaniza ebintu ebiri omu ka hamwe n’abaana abu
omuntu aine. Amaani g’eka nikimanyisa ebi ab’eka barikuta omu ntunguuka.
Ebintu by’eka nikimanyisa ebyo byona ebiriho nainga ebi eka eine
ebirikubaasa kukozesebwa kureetaho eitungo omu ka nk’eitaka.

 [pic]
Nibakimanya ngu obugaiga hamwe n’abaana abu twabahaire tibaine mugasho
ogundi kwihaho kubahwera kutunga obundi bugaiga? Ngaaha bambe. Kwonka
tibarikwetegyereza.

 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Muminun 23:55-56).

Arabic verse?

Ayat egi neeyoreka ngu eby’ensi, amatungo, obukama, abaana n’okumanywa
nibibaasa kuba emitego. Abaikiriza tibaine kuteekateeka ngu ebi byona
nibireetaho amashemererwa.

Kuzaara abaana barengire ahari bana b’omukazi omwe nikyongyera bugyengye
omu by’okutwara enda n’okuzaara. Kugira abaana baingi nikurugamu kubagana
eitaka buri omwe akatunga akaporoti akatarikubaasa kuhwera abantu b’eka.
Abaana baingi nibabaasa kumaramu orikubareeberera kuhika aha muheru
ekyakubaasa kureetaho obutabaha ebintu birikumara kandi nabo bakamarwa.
Hadith ahaifo neegyezaho kwehanangiriza abakurasi ngu baringanize omuhendo
gw’abaana hamwe n’ebintu ebi biine omu ka.

Omutego mukuru n’okugira abaana baingi kwonka otaine by’okubareebereza.
 (Hadith – ekaikirizibwa al Hakim, ahairwe orusa Abdullah ibn Omar )

Abaana baingi ni kimwe aha bintu bibiri ebirikureetaho obworo kwonka abaana
bakye nibo bari aha bintu bibiri ebitarikuteganisa.
 (Hadith –ekaikirizibwa Quda’ei in Musnad al Shahab)

Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu eijwire okushemererwa n’okugwa gye, abasiraamu
bashemereire kupima/kwetegyereza omugasho gw’abaana nk’oku kiri omu
buhangwa, hamwe n’oku baakubaasa kubakuza/kuboorora omu micwe y’obusiraamu.
Eki nikimanyisa kubaasa kwegyesa abaana, kubaha n’ebyetengo bya butoosha
nka ebyokurya, ebijwaro hamwe nah’okuraara.

Koraani neekozesa orutaro rwa Hunayn kushoboorora ngu ebingi hatarimu
karungi nibibaasa kuba bugyengye aha batuuragye nkoku kiri omu Ayat ahaifo:

 [pic]

Buzima, Ruhanga abayambire emirundi mingi munonga . Aha izooba rya Hunayan,
ku mwayepankire ngu muri bingi, tihaine eki kyabayambire – ahabw’okuba ensi
egi, n’obu eraabe eri mpango ekaba kakye munonga ahari imwe kandi
mukagaruka, musingwirwe.

 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Tawbah 9:25)

Abasiraamu nyensya yaabo eri omu kwitanira ebirungi, okutwazagye hamwe
n’obumwe kwonka butari bwingi bw’abantu. Abantu baingi b’abasiraamu, kwonka
batashomire, baine enjara nainga barwaire mutuku n’oburemeezi buhango aha
ntunguuka y’abasiraamu. Aha rubaju orundi, abantu baaba bari baingi kwonka
bashomire kandi baine obukugu nibabaasa kuhwera kihango aha entunguuka
y’abasiraamu.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Abaana baingi nibabaasa kuteganisa orikubareeberera kuhisya obu
 arikuruha ekirikureetaho obutabaha kirikubamara.
Abaana

Omu kacweka aka:-

1. Obuhangaazi bw’abaana nibweyongyera baaba batarikukuratana kumwe-kumwe
 kandi omwanya ahagati y’amazaara gwaba guri ogw’emyaka ebiri n’okugarura
 ahaiguru.
2. Amabeere gonka nikyo kyokurya hamwe na kyokunywa kikuru aha mwereere omu
 myezi ena y’okubanza omu magara g’abeereere.
3. Yaahisya emyaka ena (4) omwereere naayetaaga ebindi byokurya kwongyerera
 aha mashereka.
4. N’obu okwonsya kuraabe kwine omugasho mwingi aha kutazaarirana,
 tikukaayemariirira kwonka omu kurekaho omwanya aha gati y’amazaara.
5. Kugambagye, kuzaana hamwe n’okworeka rukundo omwana ni kikuru aha magara
 g’okukura kw’omwana, aha beteekateeko bye hamwe n’obwongo bwe.
6. Omwana ashemereire kukuzibwa omu mwanya gurimu obusingye, omu bantu
 barikufayo kandi omu mwanya gutarimu katabanguko.
7. Abaana b’aboojo n’abaishiki nibainganisa omugasho.
8. Abaanan boona bashemereire kutunga obwegyese.

9. Amaka gashemereire kuteekateekyera omuhendo gw’abaana abu garaabaase
 kuta omu ishomero.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Obuhangaazi bw’abaana bwabaho, ekyetengo ky’okuzaara abaana baingi
 nikikyendeera ahabw’kugira ngu abazaire nibakyendeeza enteekateeka
 y’okuzaara abaana kugira ngu bamwe ahari bo bakaahangaara.

Abaana

Abaana n’amashemererwa, ekiconco kandi n’omuringo gw’okwezaara. Obusiraamu
nibutuhabura kuzaara abaana kwonka butwehanangiriza ngu bashemereire kugira
emicwe, babe barungi kandi bahikiirire. Eki nikimanyisa ngu n’okutamu
amaani maingi kukuza abaana abo. Obutumwa obu ahaifo nibubaasa kuhwera omu
kukuza abaana b’amagara marungi kandi bashemereirwe omu ka y’omusiraamu.

1. Obuhangaazi bw’abaana nibweyongyera haaba hariho omwanya gw’emyaka ebiri
 ahagati y’amazaara. Ahabw’amagara marungi gw’omwana na nyina, abazaire
 bashemereire kurindaho kuhisya obu omwana waabo omutu araahisye emyaka
 ebiri (2) batakagirize endiijo nda y’okumukurasa. Abaana barikuzaarirwa
 kumwe-kumwe tibarikukura gye omu magara, n’omubwongo nk’abo
 abarikukirakiranaho emyaka ebiri.

 Bimwe aha birikuteganisa amagara g’omwana ari ahansi y’emyaka ebiri,
 nokumuzaariraho ondiijo mwereere. Naaba atakibaasa kwonka kandi nyina
 naaba atakiine bwire bwe bw’okumuteekyera ebyokurya bye nk’omwana
 ebyarikwetaaga. Nyina w’omwana naaba atakibaasa kuha omwana obureeberezi
 obu omwana arikwetaaga namunonga omu burwaire. Ekiraarugyemu, omwana
 tarikubaasa kukura gye nk’oku kyakubaire nikyetengwa.

 Eka erikufeerwa abantu baayo nainga erimu abapumpwire (abagufu munonga
 wagyeregyeranisa n’emyaka yaabo) terikubaasa kushemererwa n’okugwa gye.
 Okuhangaara kw’abaana kwayeyongyera, ekyetengo ky’okuzaara abaana baingi
 ahabw’okutiina rufu nikikyendeera.

 Obuhangaazi bw’abaana nibubaasa kutunguurwa haabaho kurekaho omwanya omu
 mazaara, kubariisa gye, kumanya enkura nungi, kubatangira endwara, kandi
 n’okugira omuhendo gw’abaana abu eka erikubaasa kureeberera.

2. Amabeere gonka nikyo kyokurya na kyokunywa ky’omwereere omu myezi yaabo
 ena y’okubanza. Abeereere baine kutandikikraho kwonk baaheza kuzaarwa
 bati. Bashemereire kuguma nibonka kuhisya emyaka ebiri nainga
 kurigiirira nk’oku kiraabasike. Ba nyina b’abaana nibeetenga obuhwezi
 kuruga omu maka gaabo, abariraanwa, ab’ebyamagara, abakozesa, hamwe
 n’ebigombe by’abakazi kugira obuhame reero bakonsya kandi bakagira
 obwire buraingwa bw’okwonsya.
 [pic]

Omukazi araayonsya omwana we kumara emyaka ebiri ahabw’ogwo (mushaija)
orikwenda ngu kibe kityo. Kwonka ogwo (mushaija) aryashashura ebyokurya
hamwe n’ebijwaro omu buringaaniza.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Baqara 2:233)
Abaami tibaine kuba nibabinga abakazi baabo barikwonsya ahabwokuba ekyo
nikireetaho kuburwa ahagati y’omwana na nyina. Abantu b’eka baaba baine eki
babuzirwe, tibarikubaasa kushemererwa.

3. Aha myezi ena, omwana nayetaaga ebyokurya ebindi kwongyerera aha
 mashereka. Omwana otakahikize myaka eshatu (3) aine kuba naarya emirundi
 ebiri nainga ishatu omu izooba. Ebyokurya by’omuka biine kuba birimu
 ekiriisa bibone kuha omwana amaani ag’arikwetaaga. Eki nikimanyisa kumuha
 buri byokurya omu buringaaniza. Ahabw’oburungi bw’eka y’omusiraamu,
 abafumbo baine kuha abaana baabo ebyokurya byokwongyerera ebyo ebiri omu
 ka ahabw’okwenda ngu bakure gye.

4. N’obu okwonsya kwine omugasho gw’okureka omwanya ahagati y’abaana, kwo
 ahabwa kwo, tikurikumara kureetaho ogwo mwanya.

Omukazi orikwonsya naabaasa obutatwara nda omu muringo gw’ebyashoboorwaho
 ahaifo:-
 • Yaaba atarikuza mu micwe/kwezi: omukazi tarikutwara yaaba atakagurukira
 kuza omu micwe/kwezi kuruga yaazaara.
 • Yaaba naayonsya obwire bwona: okwonsya kushemereire kubaho obwire
 bwona, emishana n’ekiro ahu omwana araayendere kwonka. Okwonsya
 kushemereire kutandikiraho omwana yaaheza kuzaarwa ati.
 • Omuntu atakahikiza myezi mukaaga aherize kuzaara: omukazi yaamara
 emyezi mukaaga azaire, okwonsya kwonka takaabaasa kukwesiga nk’omuringo
 gw’okutanga ruzaaro.

Kutunga kurungi omwana ahagati y’enzaaro, amaka hamwe n’abafumbo baine
kuhikiirira abashaho abatendekirwe.

5. Kugamba, kuzaana, n’okworeka rukundo ni bikuru aha kukura kw’omwana omu
 mubiri, bwongo n’omu mitwarize. Kwongyerera aha kukura kwomubiri, abaana
 biine ebindi byetengo bibiri ebirkuru aha kukura kw’obwongo hamwe
 n’emitwarize.
 • Rukundo: abaana boona nibeetaaga rukunda n’enkorengana nungi
 n’abantu abakuru abari kubafaho. Enkorengana egi hamwe n’omwana kumanya
 ngu abandi bamwiniire rukundo ni kikuru aha kukura kw’ebicweka
 by’omubiri ebiri omunda ahu tutarikureeba. Nibwo burugo bw’enkurakurana
 y’omwana kumanya ngu arinzirwe.

 • Kukuza obwongo: obwongo bw’omwana nangwa n’omubiri nibyetaaga
 obuhwezi kugira ngu bikure. Ebintu bishatu ebirikuhwera omuri ekyo
 ni: orurimi, okuzaana hamwe na rukundo. Omwana naayetenga kugamba
 nawe, kumumwenyera, kumukirigiita, kumuhurikiza, hamwe n’okumuhabura
 kugarukamu arikugamba nainga arikugira eki yaimusya.

 Obugabe bw’omwana obu arikwiha aha muzaire n’okureeba ngu omuzaire
 yaamwegyesa okuhandiika, kwoga … hamwe n’okumuha buri kimwe omu
 bwijwire.

 (Hadith- eikiriziibwe al-Baihaqi )

Abaana nibeega barikukora. Nahabwekyo, omwana yaaba naakura, naayetaaga
obugabe bw’okuzaana n’okujumbura ebindi. Kumwikiriza kuzaana hamwe
n’okumuha ebyokuzaanisa n’okumuhabura nibyo bikuru aha bukoryo bw’okukuza
omwana.

Ababw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu, abasiraamu baine kuteekateekyera amaka gaabo
kwenda ngu abafumbo babone obwire bw’okuba n’abaana kandi bakabaha rukundo.
Abaana abarikutunga rukundo kuruga aha bazaire baabo nibagira obwesigye
hamwe n’obutaterebuka. Abaana nk’abo nibabaasa kwereeberera baaba
baakuzire.
6. Abaana bashemereire kuba nibakuzibwa omu mwanya gurimu obusingye,
 barikufiibwaho kandi guri ogu ihoreere. Eki nikimanyisa ngu abaana
 nibaheebwa ebikuru omu magara gaabo nk’ebyokurya, ebyokujwara,
 ah’okuraara, hamwe n’eby’amagara. Abaana bashemereire kukuzibwa omu ka
 erimu ihe na nyina barikutuura hamwe. Abaana baine obugabe kumanya
 abazaire baabo kandi n’okushemerewa nabo. Omwana otakahikize myaka eshatu
 aine kuba naariisibwa emirundi etaano nainga mukaaga omu izooba.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Abaana nab a nyina baabo nibeetaaga obuheereza bw’okubarinda hamwe
 n’okubatambira oburwaire obariiremu kuteerwa ebikatu by’okwerinda,
 kwegyesebwa aha by’amagara, kutambirwa hamwe n’okumanya ebirikukwata
 aha magara.

Eka nungi erimu okushemererwa n’okugwagye eshemereire kuha abantu baayo,
haakiri kyamushana na kyakiro omu izooba.

Abantu b’eka nungi y’omusiraamu bashemereire kuba baine ebijwaro haakiri
bw’emiringo eshatu, buri kijwaro kiine omurimo gwakyo: ekyokusiibamu,
ekyokugyendana, hamwe n’eky’emirimo. Aboojo n’abaishiki tibashemereire kuba
nibaraara hamwe namunonga kutandikira aha myaka ikumi (10) kugarura
ahaiguru.

 Yegyesa abaana baawe kushaba aha myaka mushanju, bafubire baabura
 kushaba aha myaka ikumi kandi mutabaraaza hamwe, buri omwe araare
 wenka.

 (Hadith- ekaikirizibwa Ahmad Ibn Hanbali ).

Eki nikimanyisa kutunga omwanya gw’aboojo bonka n’obw’abaishiki bonka,
kwahura ebitanda hamwe n’eby’okweyarira. Aho niho abazaire bashemereire
kuteekateekyera amaka ahabwokuba ebyo byona nibyetaaga sente.

Eeka nungi y’omusiraamu eine kurya kumwe haakiri omurundi gumwe omu izooba.
Eki nikihwera ab’eka kumanyana n’okukorera hamwe. Eki kandi nikihwera
abazaire kwegyesa abaana emicwe y’obuhangwa.

Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu, abantu boona abari omu ka bashemereire
kutunga obujanjabi. Abaana nab a nyina bashemereire kutunga obuhwezi
bw’okwerinda endwara hamwe n’okutambirwa otairemu okuteerwa ebikatu
by’okwerinda, kwegyesebwa ahaby’amagara, kutambirwa hamwe n’obuhabuzi
ahaby’amagara. Amaka gaine kubiika sente z’amagara.

Murinde abaana batagwa omu mitega y’abantu b’emize mibi
nk’okusadaaka/kuhonga, erikutwara amagara gaabo. Ebintu bibi nka okushara
obukazi bw’abakazi, kuguza abaana, kukozesa abaana bato, kubagyema
kushwerwa/kushwera, kubagyema kuteerana, hamwe n’okutwara obaana bato omu
mahe. Omwana ari omu buremeezai nk’obwo ahaiguru hamwe n’obundi, niwe
ashemereire kubanza yaatunga obuhwezi. Aba kukira munonga nibakira kuba
enfuuzi n’abaishiki.

7. Abaana b’aboojo hamwe n’abaishiki boona baine omugasho. Eeka
y’omusiraamu erimu okushemererwa n’okugwagye terikushoroora mu baana.
Aboojo n’abaishiki boona nibinganisa omugasho.

 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ
 [pic]

 Mube abaringaaniza aha baana baanyu nk’oku mwakwenda ngu nabo
 babaringanirize.
 ( Hadith- ekaikirizibwa Al-Suyuti )

Abaana bashemereire kugira obugabe n’emigisha erikwingana hatarimu
kushoroora omu boojo hamwe n’abaishiki.

We (Ruhanga) naaha abaishiki ogwo ou arikwenda kandi aboojo nabo abaha ogwo
ou arikwenda.

( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Shura 42:49)

Kukunda aboojo, okanga nainga okabura kufa aha baishiki nikkjumirirwa
munonga omu busiraamu.
8. Abaana boona bashemereire kutunga obwegyese. Eka nungi y’omusiraamu
neekora kyona ekirikubaasika kureeba ngu abaana boona baayega. Eki kirimu
okwega ediini hamwe n’eby’ensi. Abazaire baine obujunaanizibwa bw’okwegyesa
abaana baabo ediini y’obusiraamu. Kansi baine kubeegyesa emicwe mirungi
kandi babeegyese kwerinda emihanda ya sitaani nk’okunywa amaarwa, kunywa
enjaga, hamwe n’obushambani.

Kwega n’obujunaanizibwa bwa buri musiraamu, abashaija n’abakazi.

 (Hadith- ekaikirizibwa by Al-Bukhari)

English translation?

Abaana beegire nibarahuka kumanya aha birikukwata aha kuteerana, kuzaara
gye, kurya gye n’endeeberera y’abaana.

Kwegyesa abaana ahaby’okuteerana kurugiirira aha myaka ei baine nikihwea
abaana kwetekateekyera bukuru kandi nikireetera omwana kwerinda kuteerana
atakashwire/atakashwirwe hamwe n’okugira enda akiri omu mushogoyo.

Okwega nikikyererezaho emyaka y’okushwera /kushwerwa kandi kihwera aha
kutwara enda y’okubanza. Abakazi abashomire nibamanya omugasho
gw’okukyebeza enda n’okutunga obujanjabi omuntu yaaba aine enda. Eki
nikikyendeeza amagara g’omukazi kuza ahari bugyengye yaaba aine enda.

Obwegyese nibuhindura aha nteekateeka y’abooja aha baishiki hamwe n’abakazi
boona okutwarira hamwe. Aboojo nibeega kuha abaishiki/abakazi ekitiinisa.
Nibakyetegyereza ngu abaishiki nabo nibabaasa kukoragye nk’aboojo. Aboojo
ku barikukura bakaba abaami, nibaha abakyara baabo obuhwezi hamwe
n’ekitiinisa. Eeka erimu abantu bateegire, tekaatunga mashemererwa
n’obugwagye ahabwokuba abateegire tibarikutunga kumanyisibwa n’obwengye
buhikire kuruga omu bandi bantu.

9. Amaka gashemereire kuteekateeka kugira abaana abu barikubaasa kwegyesa.
Eeka yaaba eine abaana baingi neegira oburemeezi bw’okubareeberera namunoga
omu bunaku obu obw’emihendo y’obwegyese erikuguma neeyeyongyera ahaiguru.
Abaana bateegire nibaza aha bugyengye bw’okubonabonesebwa namunonga abo
abarikwenda kubakozesa, kuteerana nabo kandi obumwe nibaza omu bikorwa
by’okuguza emibiri yaabo. Bumwe aha bugabe bw’abaana omu busiraamu
n’obugabe bw’okwega kandi n’okumanya ngu esente zoona z’okwega niziruga omu
mihanda mirungi (halal).

Amaka g’abantu baingi nigatwara ebintu bingi kandi gata omu mutego
abarikugareeberera gw’okutunga ebintu nainga sente omu mihanda etahikire
kwenda ngu bahe abaana ebi barikwenda. Omurangi akaragiira ngu esente
n’ebintu byona by’obwegyese bw’abaana biine kuruga omu mihanda ehikire.
Hanabwekyo, kihikire kureeba ngu abaana abaazaarwa baine ebintu
ebiraabareeberere.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

Obwegyese nibuhindura aha nteekateeka y’abooja aha baishiki hamwe n’abakazi
boona okutwarira hamwe. Aboojo nibeega kuha abaishiki/abakazi ekitiinisa.
Nibakyetegyereza ngu abaishiki nabo nibabaasa kukoragye nk’aboojo. Aboojo
ku barikukura bakaba abaami, nibaha abakyara baabo obuhwezi hamwe
n’ekitiinisa.

Omushogoyo

Omu kacweka aka:
1. Obushwere bw’ab’emyaka eri ahansi ya 18 nibuta amagara ahari bugyengye.
2. Kugira enda oine emyaka eri ahansi ya 18 nikuta amagara g’omwana na
 nyina ahari bugyengye.
3. Kuteerana otakashwirwe nainga otakashwire n’ekibi.
4. Abari omu mushogoyo bashemereire kumanyisibwa aha bikwatiraine
 n’okuteerana hamwe n’amagara g’okuzaara.
5. Abaishiki abari omu mushogoyo tibashemereire kubaahuramu.
6. Abari omu mushogoyo bashemereire kuraburwa aha bikwatiraine n’okunywa
 ebibazi ebirikushisha obwongo hamwe n’okuteerana, kuteera zaara hamwe
 n’obushambani.
7. Abari omu mushogoyo bashemereire kugambirwa obujunaanizibwa bwabo aha ka
 yaabo neihanga ryona.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Abato, aboojo n’abaishiki, nibabuzaabuzibwa namunonga aha bikwatiraine
 n’amagara gaabo g’okuteerana hamwe n’okubaakubaasa kwerinda oburemeezi
 bw’okutwara enda hamwe n’endwara ezirikureetwa omu kuteerana.

Omushogoyo

Abari omu mushogoyo nibo abo abari ahagati y’emyaka 10 kuhisya 19
y’obukuru. Omu Uganda, eminyeeto yo eri ahagati y’emyaka 18 na 30.

Omushogoyo nibwo bwire obu omuntu arikuba naahinduka kuruga omu bwana kuza
omu bukuru. Omu bwire obu, nihabaho empinduka mpango omu boojo n’abaishiki
aha mibiri yaabo nangwa n’omu bwongo. Kandi nibwo bwire obu barikugyerezaho
buri kimwe otaireho n’okuteerana.

Ebintu ebi abari omu mushogoyo barikukora nibirugwamu bingi ebimwe ni bibi.
Okuteerana nikurugamu enda ezitarikwetaagwa. Bimwe aha birikuruga omu
kutwara enda n’okuruga omu ishomero, kuburwa obutooro kandi n’okuguma
nooteganisa abazaire kuguma nibakuhwera. Aha bikwatiraine n’amagara,
niharugamu oburemeezi omu kuzaara, okufa kwabeereere hamwe n’aba nyina
nakwo nikweyongyera, okurya kubi hamwe n’okukura kubi. Okwihamu enda nakwo
kuri ahaiguru. Enshonga ezi ahaifo nizibaasa kuzibira endwara (nainga
amagara mabi) hamwe n’okufa (enfu) ezirikureetwaho enda z’abari omu
mushogoyo.

1. Obushwere bw’abari ahansi y’emyaka 18 nibuta amagara ahari bugyengye.
Abazaire bashemereire kutegyereza abaana babanze baahisya emyaka 18 babone
kubareka kushwera/kushwerwa. Omu maka maingi g’abasiraamu, abarikutwara
enda bari omu mushogoyo ni baingi ahabw’okuba abaana nibashwerwa bakiri
bato batandika n’okuzaara kare. Kushwera/kushwerwa kare ni kimwe aha
birikureetaho obutabanguko omu maka, kandi n’enshonga nkuru aha kureetaho
abakazi batashwirwe barikukuza abaana bonka kukanya.

2. Kutwara enda omwishiki atahikize myaka 18 nikita amagara g’omwana na
nyina ahari bugyengye. Ahabw’enshonga z’amagara zonka, tihariho mwishiki
ashemereire kuba naatwara enda atakahikize myaka 18. Omukazi naaba
atakahamire ngu abase kuzaara omwana atakahikize myaka 18. Abaana
barikuzaarwa abaana batakahikize myaka 18 obwire obwingi nibazaara abaana
batahikire kandi batainemu karemeezi. Abaana nk’abo nibakira kufa omu mwaka
gwabo gw’okubanza. Ba nyina babo baana nabo nibaba bari ahari bugyengye.
Babies born to women younger than 18 years are more likely to be born
prematurely and weigh too little at birth. Such babies are much more likely
to die in the first year of life. The risks to the mother’s own health are
also greater.

3. Okuteerana kutari mu bufumbo n’ekibi. Abazaire baine kugira
obujunaanizibwa bw’okukuza abaana kurungi kandi baine kubahabura
kutateerana batakashwire/batakashwirwe. Obusiraamu nibuzibira kuteeranira
aheeru y’obufumbo obwikiriziibwe. Nibuzibirira kimwe okuteerana
kw’abatakashwire nainga abakatakashwirwe hamwe naabo abaashwire kwonka
bakashambana.

Omukazi nainga omushaija ou murikwatira omu bushambani, mumuteere kibooko
igana (100) obutamusaasiramu na kakye.

 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Nur 24:2)

 [pic]
Mutarihika haihi n’obushambani, ahabw’okuba n’ekikorwa kibi munonga kandi
n’omuhanda gwa sitaani ogurikurabamu ebindi bibi bingi.

 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Isra 17:32)

Abari omu mushogoyo baine kugambirwa ebi byona omu kubakuza. Kuteerana
otakashwire/otakashwirwe nikireetaho enda ezi oteteekateekire hamwe
n’okuziihamu. Kwihamu enda nikibaasa kureetaho okufa namunonga orikugiihamu
yaaba atatendekirwe. Okwihamu enda n’abantu batatendekirwe nikiita enkumi
n’enkumi z’abakazi buri mwaka.

Kuteerana otakashwire/otakashwirwe nikita emishogoyo ahari bugyengye
y’okukwatwa endwara zirikurabira omu kuteerana otairemu akakooko ka
siriimu. Enda ezirikuruga omu mishogoyo nizireetera abaana baaruga omu
ishomero kandi nizireetaho obutambanguko omu maka g’emishogoyo yombi.

4. Abari omu mushogoyo bashemereire kutunga obuhabuzi hamwe n’okuheebwa
amagyezi aha birikukwata aha kuteerana n’ahamagara g’okuzaara. Abato,
abaishiki n’aboojo nibabaihabaihwa aha bikwatiraine n’amagara gaabo
g’okuteerana hamwe n’oku baakubaasa kwerinda oburemeezi burikureetwa
kuteerana otakashwirwe. Nibeetenga kumanya bingi kandi baine kuheebwa
obuheereza kandi abarikubaha obuhereza n’abari kubakyebera baine kukuuma
ekihama kandi baine kubaha ekitiinisa haza baine kwikiriza. Abazaire baine
obujunaanizibwa bw’okwegyesa abaana baabo omu muringo oguhikire.

Obugabe bw’omwana aine kuruga aha muzaire we n’omuzaire kwegyesa omwana …
kandi kumuha buri kimwe ekihikre…

 (Hadith – ekiikirizibwa Al-Baihaqi)

Abazaire nabo baine obujunaanizibwa bw’okwegyesa n’okuhabura abaana
ahabikwatiraine n’okuteerana obwo barikukwatanisa naba Imaamu b’emizigiti
hamwe n’amashomero g’ediini.

Abaana okweyongyera kutwara enda, kuzaara abaana bakiri bato hamwe
n’okwihamu enda byona nibyoreka obuteegyesebwa n’okuburwa kuhaburwa
abakuru.

Abaana b’aboojo n’abaishiki nibeetaaga obwegyese oburikukwata aha kuteerana
ahabwokweteekateekyera obwa nyensya baaba baakuzire. Abaana abaishiki
nibenda kwega kweshariraho kandi beege okugamba ekibari aha mutima bataine
nshoni obwo otaireho n’okwega aha by’okwegaita.

Abaana aboojo nabo nibenda kwegyesebwa aha by’okuteerana kandi amaani
gashemereire kuza aha kubagana obujunaanizibwa n’abakazi omu nshonga
z’okuteerana n’okuzaara kandi n’okuha ekitiinisa ebi abakazi
barikweshariramu n’emyoga yaabo.

 [pic]

Kandi bumwe ahabumanyiso bwa Ruhanga n’okubahangira abahwezi kuruga omuri
imwe ngu mutuure omu busingye nabo mwijwire rukundo hamwe n’okusaasirana.
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Roum 30:21)

Egi Ayat neegamba aha nkorengana y’abantu b’omu maka kuruga ahari rukundo,
kwetegyerezana, kuhaana ekitiinisa, kugirirana embabazi hamwe
n’okusaasirana kandi eshemereire kukozesebwa kubagana obujunaanizibwa
ahagati y’omushaija n’omukazi.

5. Abaishiki abari omu mushogoyo tibashemereire kwahurwa. Abaana b’aboojo
n’abaishiki boona baine omugasho. Nahabwekyo boona baine kutunga obwegyese
omu muringo gumwe, batungye obujanjambi hamwe n’emirimo. Omu busiraamu
entaaniso eri ahagati y’abashaija n’abakazi ekwatiraine n’okusingiza
Ruhanga kwonka ti enkura yabantu (gender) ha by’ensi.

 [pic]

Imwe bantu mwe. Tukabahanga kuruga omu mukazi n’omushaija kandi twabakora
amahanga n’enganda ngu mumanyane. Reeba! Lo! Abantu abarikukundwa
(Ruhanga) n’abo abaraabe bahikiriire nibo turaahe ebirungi.

 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Hujurat 49:13)

Abaishiki hamwe n’abakazi bato namunonga efuuzi hamwe n’abooro nibeeshanga
omu buremeezi bw’okuteerana kandi abantu baingi nibabakozesa eby’enshoni,
bababonabonesa kandi beeshubura. Nahabwekyo, nibetaaga kwegyesebwa
n’okuhaburwa, obujanjabi hamwe n’ebyokukora.

6. Abari omu mushogoyo bashemereire kuraburwa n’okuhanwa obutakozesa bibazi
ebirikushiisha obwongo, kumara gateerana, kuteera zaara hamwe
n’obushambani.

Eeka hamwe n’abatuuragye babi nibibaasa kushiisha abaana bari omu mushogoyo
kandi bashemereire kubyetantara. Emishogoyo eshemereire kwetantara akakungu
akarikubaasa kubata omu kunywa amaarwa n’okukozesa ebibazi birikushiisha
obwongo.

 [pic]
Imwe baikiriza mwe! Ebirikusinza hamwe n’okuteera zaara … ni bibi munonga,
n’ebya sitaani. Murekye ebyo bihemu mubone kutunga ebirungi. Enteekateeka
ya sitaani n’okureeba ngu haabaho obwangani ahagati yaanyu, mwaba abanywi
hamwe n’abazaani ba zaara, mwayebwa Ruhanga kandi timwijuka na kushaba
(Okusaara).
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Maida 5:90-91)

Kukozesa ebibazi birikusinza hamwe n’okuteera zaara nibimwe aha bintu
ebirikureetaho endwara zirikureetwa omu kuteerana, obubengye, endwano hamwe
n’okufa gateerana.

7. Emishogoyo eshemereire kumanya obujunaanizibwa bwayo aha ka hamwe
n’eihanga ryona. Obujunaanizibwa bw’abari omu mushogoyo aha bazaire
nibworekwa omu nyegyesa eri omu Koraani kandi bufunziibwe ahaifo:

Omwe nainga bombi kubarahisye emyaka yabukuru, mutabagambira ebyakarebure,
nainga mukababinga, kwonka mugambe nabo omu kitiinisa. Muboorekye embabazi,
ekitiinisa hamwe eifubo reero mugambire mukama muti: Mukama wangye!
Basaasire! ahabwokuba bakanyorora bandeeberera obu naabaire ndi muto.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Isra 17:23-24)

Kuruga omuri egi Ayat, nitubaasa kwihamu ngu obujunaanizibwa bw’abaana aha
bazaire burimu:-
 • Kugambira kurungi abazaire. Obutabagambira kubi kandi kugamba nabo
 neifubo.
 • Kuta ekitiinisa omu biteiso byabo. ‘otaribabinga.’
 • Kubatwaza gye n’embabazi hamwe na rukundo. ‘kandi kubagirire embabazi
 neifubo’.
 • Kubashabira orikwebaza ebi baakukoreire omu buto obwo orikugira, “Mukama
 wangye basaasire.” Kwongyerera aha bujunaanizibwa obwo, omwana aine
 obundi bujunaanizibwa nk’oku burikushoboororwa ahaifo:
 o kukorera enkwatanisa y’eka, abakuru n’abandi bantu b’omuka kubaha
 ekitiinisa.

 o Kukozesa okumanya kwe ahabw’oburungi bwa boona. Emishogoyo
 teshemereire kuba neerekwa aha rubaju omu kuteekateeka n’okuha obuheereza
 abatuuragye b’ekyaro. Eminyeeto eine kihango eki erikugasa omu ka hamwe
 n’aha kyaro nahabwekyo teshemereire kurekwa aha rubaju.

 o kurinda n’okwongyera amaani omu by’obuhangwa omu nkoregana ye n’abandi
 bantu. Eki kishemereire kukorwa omu mutima gw’okugumisirizana,
 kwikirizana, kuteisa hamwe n’okwebuuza aha bandi hamwe n’okwongyera aha
 micwe y’abantu boona.

 Mutabani! Guma oshabe obutoosha, kora ekyamazima kandi oyangye
 ekitahikire; kandi ogire obugumisiriza. Eki nikiba nikyoreka okugira
 ekigyendererwa omu kukora emirimo yaawe.

( Holy Qur’an: Surat Luqman 31:17)
Enshonga z’abakazi n’abashaija

Omu kacweka aka:-
1. Abakazi n’abashaija bakahangwa barikwingana.
2. Abakazi n’abashaija bakahangwa kurindana.
3. Abakazi nibashabwa kwega nk’abashaija.
4. Tihariho oshemereire kugyema omwishiki nainga omukazi kushwerwa.
5. Abaana b’aboojo n’abaishiki boona baine omugasho kuruga aha izooba eri
 baazaarwa.
6. Kubonabonesa abakazi n’abaishiki ni kibi ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Abashaija bashemereire kuhwerwa kwejumbira omu nshonga z’okwihaho
 abakazi n’abaishiki omugisha gw’okukora emirimo y’abashaija kwenda ngu
 okwahura omu bantu kwahwaho omu kugaba ebintu.

Enshonga z’abakazi n’abashaija
Enshonga z’abakazi n’abashaija nikimanyisa enkora y’okwahura omu bashaija
n’omu bakazi omu miringo mingi. Obusiraamu nibutwara enshonga ezi nka
kikuru. Abakazi nibaingana n’abashaija omu miring maingi nk’ediini, entuura
hamwe n’okukunda eihanga. Abakazi tibashemereire kugyemwa ab’omuka nainga
abarikubareeberera kushwerwa, bashemereire kweshariraho. Omu bushwere,
omukazi ashemereire kukuuma eiziina rye ry’obukazi. Omu by’entaasya, aine
kweyemerezaho. Aine kukozesa esente ze nk’oku arikwenda. Nk’omuzaire,
omukazi naamanywa nka kikuru omu kukunda abaana n’okuguma nabo. Omu
busiraamu, omukazi aine obugabe bw’okugamba aha bugabe bwe kwonka omu
muringo murungi. Omushaija aine obujunaanizibwa bw’okubanza omu nshonga
z’amaka. Omushaija niwe murinzi kandi mureeberezi w’eka. Okwahukana
nokwabantu bingi abarikukitwaara, omunyikiriza y’obusiraamu, abakazi
nibaikirizibwa kwejumbira omu nshonga z’eihanga, zentuura kandi baine
obugabe bw’okukora, ekintu ekyaabare kitariho kuruga ira. Obutumwa obu
ahaifo nibuza kuhwera kwetegyereza enshonga z’abashaija n’abakazi
ezirikureetaho okushemrerwa omu ka nungi y’omusiraamu:

Abashaija n’abakazi bakahangwa barikwingana. Omu busiraamu entaaniso eri
ahagati y’abashaija n’abakazi neekwata aha bya Ruhanga, kwonka ti ha kukura
kw’abantu (gender). Abashaija bashemereire kujumiirira enshonga
y’okwahuramu omu bashaija n’abakazi namunonga obutaikiriza bakazi kukora
nainga kwejumibira omu bintu bimwe n’abashaija hamwe n’okwahura abakazi
obutabaha bintu nk’eitaka. Omu busiraamu, abakazi nabo biine
obujunaanizibwa bw’okurwanirira ediini yaabo, ebintu hamwe neitaka nk’oku
kirikworekwa omu Ayat ahaifo:
 [pic]

 Mugyende omu maisho, yaaba mwine ebyokurwanisa nainga mutabiine,
 murwanirire ebintu byanyu hamwe n’amagara gaanyu ahabw’enshonga ya
 Ruhanga …
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Tawbah 9:41)

Kwonka, egi Ayat taine kuba neekozesebwa kuta amagara g’omukazi omu buzibu
hamwe n’omu ntaro ahabwokuba nikibaasa kureetaho okumubonabonesa namunonga
kumugyema kuteerana nawe hamwe n’okumuhamba.

1. Abashaija n’abakazi, buri omwe n’omurinzi wa mugyenzi we. Abashaija
baine kuhwera abakazi baabo namunonga omu bwire bw’omukazi ainiremu enda
kuhisya aha kuzaara. Abashaija bashemereire kufayo aha nshona y’eby’amagara
g’okuzaara. [pic]

Abaikiriza, abashaija n’abakazi n’abanywani; nibakunda ekihikire kandi
bange ekibi …
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Tawbah 9:71)

 [pic]

Abashaija n’abarinzi b’abakazi, ahabwokuba Ruhanga akabakora baine amaani
maingi kusinga abakazi, kandi ahabwokuba nibabayamba kuruga omu bi biine.

 (Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:34)

Okutaho oburyo kw’abashaija kukuuma abakazi baabo n’abaana ni kikuru aha
magara marungi n’okushemererwa kw’eka y’omusiraamu.

Abakazi baine kwega nk’abashaija. Abazaire baine kuheerera abaishiki hamwe
n’aboojo bataine kushoshora baishiki omu kwega. Kwegyesa omukazi ni kimwe
aha bintu bikuru ebi eihanga ryakubaasa kukora. Okwega kwomwishiki kwine
ebirungi bingi otaireho kukyerererwa kushwerwa n’okuzaara omwana
w’okubanza. Nikigaruka kikyendeeza aha kutwara enda kw’abaana bakiri omu
mushogoyo hamwe n’omuhendo gw’abaana ogu omukazi aine kuba naazaara.
Abazaire n’ebyaro byona bashemereire kurekyera aho kushorora omu baana aha
nshonga y’okwegyesa aboojo n’abaishiki.

2. Omwishiki nari omukazi tibashemereire kumugyema kushwerwa. Omu kutoorana
abashaija, abakazi baine obugabe burikwingana n’obwabashaija. Obusiraamu
nibwikiriza omukazi kweshariraho kushwerwa ahabwokuba obushwere nibubaasa
kushazibwamu omukazi yaaba agyemirwe.

Omukazi tashemereire kuba naagyemwa kushwerwa. Ashemereire kuba
ayekundiire. Omwishiki oshugaine nawe ashemereire kuba naayeshariraho …
(Hadith- ekaikirizibwa bwa Sahaba)

Abazaire tibaine kugyema baishiki baabo omu bushwere. Abaishiki
batakahikize myaka 18 tibashemereire kuba nibashwerwa ahabwokuba nikita
amagara gaabo ahari bugyengye.

5. abaana aboojo hamwe n’abaishiki nibinganisa omuhendo kuruga aha izooba
eri baazaarirwaho. Obusiraamu nibwenda oburingaaniza ahagati y’aboojo
n’abasishiki kandi tiburikwikiriza kushoshora baana kuruga ahaizooba ryabo
ry’okubanza omu magara g’ensi.

 [pic]
Kandi omwe omuri bo ku arikutunga amakuru g’okuzaarwa kw’omwana
w’obwishiki, agira omwirima aha maisho n’okugwibwa kubi. Naayeshereka
kuruga omubandi bantu ahabwokutekateeka ngu yakora eihano. Atandiika
kw’ebuuza ati: Omwaana ngume nawe nyikirize kushwaara? ninga muzike
ahuriire?Omumazima! okusharamu oku (okukuziiika omwana ahuriire)
n’okwobusiisi.
 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Nahl 16:58-59)

 [pic]
Ruhanga niwe muhangi w’iguru n’ensi. Naahanga eki Akunzire. Akahanga
omushaija n’omukazi omu kukunda kwe n’enteekateeka ye.
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Shura 42:49)

Kukunda omwojo akaba niwe yaatunga obuhwezi otairemu okwega n’okujanjabwa
tikirikwikirizibwa mu busiraamu. Abaana boona baine kutunga okumanyisibwa,
obwegyese, n’obuhereza obundi omu buringaaniza hatariho kubashoroora.

6. Kubonabonesa abakazi n’abaishiki ni kibi ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu.
Omu Uganda, abakazi n’abaishiki mushanju ahari ikumi nibabonabonesebwa
abantu baabo namunonga abaami baabo. Kubonabonesa abakazi n’abaishiki
nikibagarura enyima; nikikyendeeza imikorere yaabo, kitwara obwire
bw’okukura emirimo y’eka, kandi nikibaasa kureetaho na rufu. Amaka marungi
gaijwire okushemererwa g’omusiraamu tigashemereire kuzamu butabanguko
n’okubonabona nk’okwo. Abantu boona abari omu ka omwo bashemereire
kushemererwemu nk’abaamwo. Eeka y’omusiraamu eine kutuura omu obusingye,
hakabaho okuhwerana n’okwetegyerezana ahagati y’omwami n’omukyara hamwe
n’abandi bantu omu ka. Hashemereire kubamu rukundo ekirikumanyisa
kukundana, embabazi, omukago hamwe n’okuhwerana. Obusingye nikimanyisa
kusaasirana ekirimu kwetegyerezana, kugarukana, hamwe n’okwemerana.

Obugabe bw’okuteerana n’okuzaara

Omu kacweka aka:
1. Abakazi be’enda bashemereire kugira obugabe bw’amagara.
2. Abantu baine obugabe bw’okushwera/kushwerwa n’okukora amaka.
3. Abantu hamwe n’abafumbo baine obugabe bw’okwega n’okumanyisibwa.
4. Obusiraamu nibwikiriza obugabe n’okuringaniza hamwe n’obutashoshora mu
 bantu.
5. Kukuma ekihama hamwe n’eby’omu mubonano ni kikuru ahabikwatiraine n’ebyo
 ebirikukwata aha bafumbo.
6. Eeka hamwe n’ekyaro bishemereire kutunga obuhereza burungi bw’amagara,
 otaireho obwo oburikukwata aha magara g’okuteerana n’okuzaara.

7. Abakazi, abashaija, eminyeeto hamwe n’abantu boona aha kyaro baine
 kukora ebibiina by’okutunguura omutindo gw’obuheereza bw’eby’okuteerana
 n’amagara g’okuzaara.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Obwegyese bw’abaishiki ni kikuru omu kutunguura omutindo gw’ebyamagara
 g’eka, kureeteho okukyendeera kw’abaana n’abakazi abarikufa buri mwaka.
 Obwegyese bw’aboojo nikubahwera kwikiriza abaishiki hamwe n’abakazi
 nk’abagyenzi baabo omu ntunguuka.

Obugabe bw’okuteerana n’okuzaara

Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu, obugabe bukuru bw’abantu hamwe n’abafumbo
n’okweshariramu omuhendo, omwanya hamwe n’obwire bw’oktungiramu omwana
hamwe n’okutunga okumanyisibwa hamwe n’oku baakubaasa kubihikaho kandi
n’obugabe bw’okutunga kumanyisibwa aha magara g’okuteerana n’okuzaara.
Kwongyerera ahari ekyo, okusharaho kw’enshonga z’okuzaara kushemereire
kurugamu kwahurwa, kugyema n’okubonabonesa. Obutumwa obu ahaifo nibwija
kuhwera kwetegyereza obugabe bw’okuteerana n’okuzaara n’oku byakubaasa
kureetaho okushemererwa n’okugwa gye omu ka nungi y’omusiraamu.
1. Obugabe bw’amagara bwine kuteebwa omu nkora kukuuma amagara g’abakazi
agari omu kabi baaba baine enda. Ekigyendererwa n’okukyendeeza aka kufa
kw’abakazi omu bwire bw’okuzaara nk’okufa kurugiriire aha buzibu bw’enda.
Obusiraamu nibwikirizana n’obugabe bw’amagara ahabwokuzibirira kimwe okwita
omuntu ahabw’enshonga yoona. Abakazi kufa barikuzaara ahabw’obutafayo,
kuremwa kumanyisa abantu aha nshonga z’okuteerana n’okuzaara nabye
nibibaasa kuza omu.

 [pic]
Kandi omwana w’omwishiki owaaziikirwe ahuriire ku arabuzibwe enshonga
eyamwisize; ebihandiiko ku biriija; buri omwe aryayehozaho.
 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Takwir 81:8-14)

Kukora aha nshonga z’okufa kw’abakazi barikuzaara nikimanyisa
obujunaanizibwa aha rurengo rw’eka hamwe n’orw’ekyaro kyona omu:-
• Kuha abakazi obwegyese oburaabahwere kukozesa kurungi okumanyisibwa okuri
aha mibazi hamwe n’okugikozesa gye.
• Kutunguura embeera y’abakazi kubahwera kweshariramu aha buhereza
bw’amagara obu barikwenda.
• Kwongyera aha buheereza bw’ab’enda, kutendeka abazaarisa hamwe n’okuha
obuhwezi bwa bwangu.
• Kuha obuheereza bw’okureetaho omwanya ahagati y’amazaara.
• Kwegyesa aha by’amagara, kuteerana, n’enshonga z’abashaija n’abakazi
hamwe n’okworora gye abaana.
2 . Abantu baine obugabe bw’okushwera/kushwerwa bakakora amaka.

 [pic]

Mushwere abo abatakashwirwe omuri imwe kandi abarikutwaza gye … abashaija
n’abakazi.
( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Nur 24:32)
Imwe basigazi mwe! Omuri imwe orikubaasa kureberera amaka, ashwere.

Arabic version?

(Hadith – Eikiriziinweho Al-Bukhari na Muslim)

Obushwere n’obujunaanizibwa bw’amaani nahabwekyo bushemereire
kuteekateekyerwa kurungi. Boona abarikwenda kutaaha omu bushwere
bashemereire kwikirizana obushwere butakabaireho. Abaishiki n’aboojo
nibashemereire kugyemwa kushwera nainga kushwerwa. Kutaaha omu bushwere
otakahikize myaka 18 nikikuta ahari bugyengye y’omuhondano omu maka,
n’amaka kushenyuka. Nikigaruka kita amagara ahari bugyengye. Kurugiirira
omu ntuura y’abantu, abaana bato tibarikubaasa byetaago by’obushwere.
Abaana baingi omu ka nibeetaaga ebintu bingi kandi nibabaasa
obutashemererwa ahabwobutabahika.

Eeka nungi y’omusiraamu erimu okushemererwa n’okugwa gye eyemereire aha
musingye gw’obushwere bwikiriziibwe. Obushwere bushemereire kwikirizibwa
ediini. Kumara agatuura n’omushaija obwire obwingi otagisirwe nkoku
obusiramu burkuragira, nikireetaho obutabanguko omu maka omuheru
n’okutaana.

3. Abantu hamwe n’abafumbo baine obugabe bwokutunga kumanyisibwa hamwe
n’obwegyese. Abantu hamwe n’abafumbo nebetaaga kumanya aha nshonga
ezirikukwata aha kuteerana hamwe n’amagara g’okuzaara. Abakazi bateegire
bari ahari bugyengye y’endwara baaba batarikumanya omugasho gw’okukyebeza
enda. Hariho obwegaago bw’okutendeka omuntu w’okuhwera omukazi w’enda buri
kuza kuzaara, kumanya obumanyiso bw’amagara mabi omukazi yaaba atakagizire
nda na yaaba aine enda, omugasho gw’okurya ebyokurya by’ekiriisa omukazi
yaaba aine enda, hamwe n’eki omukazi w’enda ashemereire kukora kuzaara
omwana w’amagara marungi. Abantu hamwe n’abafumbo biine kumanya omugasho
gw’obutazaara kumwe-kumwe hamwe n’okuzaara abaana abu eka erikubaasa
kureeberera. Individuals and couples should also be informed of the need
for birth spacing and balancing family size with family resources.
Kuhikiiriza omwoga gw’okumanyisa n’okwegyesa nikyo aha bingu ebikuru
by’orikuha abakazi n’abashaija obwengye n’amagyezi, obukoryo hamwe
n’obumanzi oburikwetaagwa omu kwejumbira omu ntunguuka.

Obwegyese nibuhwera abakazi kwetegyereza ebirungi n’ebibi ebiri omu myonga
yaabo y’obunyakare kandi kuhinduka nainga kuhindura kurugiirira aha mbeera
erikuba eriho.

Abakazi beegire nibwire obwingi nibeebaasa, nibeejumbira omu mirimo bakore,
beerondere obujanjabi bwabo hamwe n’obwabaana baabo.

Okutunguura omutindo gw’obwegyese bw’abaishiki n’abakazi nikireetaho
kukyerererwa kushwerwa kandi kikyendeeze ha kugira enda omu bwire
bwomushogoyo hamwe n’okugira eka erimu abantu bakye.

Obwegyese bw’abaishiki ni kikuru aha kutunguura amagara g’eka, kukyendeeza
aha kufa kw’abaana n’abakazi. Obwegyese bw’aboojo nibureetaho okwetegyereza
kandi buyamba kumanya ngu abakazi n’abaishiki ni bagyenzi baabo omu
ntunguuka.

Obwegyese nibuhwera aboojo kwetegyereza omwoga gwabo nk’abashaija,
beeyihemu eky’okumanya ngu n’abategyeki beetegyereze bamanye ngu
n’okukwatanisa nainga kukorera hamwe.

Abazaire, abeebembezi, hamwe n’abatuuragye boona baine omurimo muhango
kureeba ngu abaishiki baabaasa kuza ahaishomero, bagume mu kandi beegye
obukoryo oburaabasinguze aha mirimo n’omu byaro byabo.

 ﺭﻭﺍﻩ ﺑﺨﺎﺭﻯ (ﻛﻠّﻜﻢ ﺭﺍﻉ ﻭﻛﻞ ﺭﺍﻉ ﻣﺴﺆﻭﻝ ﺭﺍﻋﻴﺘﻪ ) :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺭﺳﻮﻝ ﺍﷲ ﺻﻠّﻰ ﺍﷲ ﻋﻠﻴﻪ ﻭﺳﻠّﻢ
Buri omwe omuri imwe n’omuriisa, haza omuriisa aine obujunaanizibwa aha
matungo ge.

Hadith Al-Bukhari

4. Obusiraamu nibwikiriza obugabe bwokuringaaniza hamwe n’obutashoshora omu
muringo gwona.

Obugabe obu bushemereire kwihwayo bukatangira amateeka nainga ebiragiro
ebitarikwikiriza abaishiki kuguma omu ishomero hamwe n’enkora y’amaka gamwe
gamwe garikushoshora aboojo gakabura kufa aha baishiki omu bintu
by’obwegyese, ebyokurya, hamwe n’obujanjabi. Eeka tekaabaasa kushemererwa
n’okunaanuka haaba harimu okushoshora.

Kushoshora omu myaka nakyo tikihikire kandi mushemereire kukyehara kwenda
ngu abaana nabo bagire obugabe bw’ebibagambira ab’ebyamagara kukumwa
nk’ebihama nk’oku kiri omu bakuru. Okushoshora ba kirinju nakyo tikihikire,
mukyehare.

5. Kukuuma ebihama hamwe n’ebikoriirwe omu mubonano nikyetaagwa namunonga
kukuuma ebirikukwata aha muntu ebi abantu n’abafumbo barikuha ebarikuha
obuhereza. Ekiragiro ekirikukwata aha bihama kishemereire kwihwayo kukuuma
ebihama by’abantu boona abarikutunga obuhwezi bw’okwegaita n’okuzaara ngu
bitakaamara gabiha abantu abandi batari ebu kirikukwataho. Ebihama omu ka
ni kikuru kandi kiine kuheebwa ekitiinisa.

 [pic]

Imwe baikiriza! Mutaritaaha omu maju gatari gaanyu kuhisya obu muraatungye
orusa …...Eki ni kirungi ahari imwe kwenda ngu mukore ekihikire.
( Holy Qur’an: Surat Nur 24:27)

 Eeka erikwatura ebihama byayo aheeru aha bantu abandi neetunga obuzibu
kandi terikutunga mashemererwa n’obugwagye.

Ebihama by’eka ebi abeeka barikugambira abarikuha obuheereza nibyenda
kurindwa gye obutabigambira bandi.
6. Ab’eka hamwe nab’ekyaro boona bashemereire kutunga obujanjabi burungi
otaireho obwo oburikukwat aha magara g’okuteerana n’okuzaara. Obugabe
bw’okutunga obujanjabi bushemereire kumanywa kurinda amagara g’abakazi
abarikubaasa kufa ahabw’oburemeezi bw’enda ahabw’okuburwa ah’okwiha
obujanjabi.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Ni kikuru kukuuma ebihama ebi abantu baagambira abarikuha obuheereza.

... omwe ahari imwe ku arikiza amagara, araaba yaakiza amagara g’abantu
boona.
( Holy Qur’an: Surat Maida 5:32)

Amaka n’abantu boona biine kuhwera abakazi b’enda namunonga okubahwera oha
kubatwara ow’omushaho baaba bari aha nda nainga barikuzaara.

Abashaho baine kureeba gye abakazi babagumye kandi babahabure kukozesa kuta
omu nkora ebi baabagambira. Abashaija baine kuhwera abakazi baabo baaba
biine enda.

7. Abakazi, abashaija, eminyeeto hamwe n’ekyaro kyona baine kukora ebibiina
by’okutunguura obugabe bw’okuteerana hamwe n’okuzaara.

Abakazi bashemereire kugira omuhimbo gw’okukora ebibiina kumanya aha
birikukwata aha nfa y’abakazi barikuzaara, bakore emirimo erikubareetera
sente hamwe n’egyo erikubayamba.

Obusiraamu nibuha obugabe abakazi n’abashaija kwejumbira omu bikorwa
by’ensi hamwe n’okukora emirimo y’ensi oteebirwe kushuubura. Ebyafayo
ebihandiikirwe nabyo nibyoreka ngu abakazi bakaba baza omu myanya y’abantu
boona hamwe n’omu ntaro.
 :ﻗﺎﻝ ﺗﻌﺎﻟﻰ

 [pic]

Abaikiriza abashaija n’abakazi n’abanywani. Nibakora ekihikire kandi banga
ekitahikire kandi bashaba kuha zakat bagaruka baikiriza Ruhanda n’entumwa
ye – Ruhanga naija kubasaasira. N’ekyamazima, Ruhanga n’owahaiguru kandi
tihariho orikumwingana.

 (Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Tawbah 9:71)

Ebibiina nibibaasa kukorwa kuhwera abashaho nainga ab’eby’amagara nka
abazaarisa b’aha kyaro, hamwe n’abazaarisa abashaho, kukora omurimo murungi
omu kutunguura ebuheereza bw’eby’amagara. Ebibiina by’eminyeeto nibibaasa
kukorwa kuhwera aha kumanya enshonga z’abari omu mushogoyo kandi
n’okubaakubaasa kubahwera. Ebibiina bya tuhwernane nibibaasa kuhwera
abakyara abari aha bisha kuhika aha w’eby’amagara nainga omushaho. Ebibiina
by’abakazi nabyo nibaasa kuhwera omu kutayo eiraka ry’okuhaga abashaija
n’ekyaro kyona kuhwera abakazi b’enda.

 Obutumwa bukuru

 Obusiraamu nibuhamya abashaija n’abakazi ngu biine obugabe
 bw’okwejumbira omu mirimo y’ensi nk’obushuubuzi.

Endwara ezirikureetwa omu kuteerana

Omu kacweka aka:

1. Siriimu teine mubazi kandi neerabira omu kuteerana, omu shagama, nainga
 abaana abatakazairwe kugiiha ahari ba nyina.
2. Abafumbo boona biine kwegyendesereza omu by’okuteerana obutaza heeru
 y’obufumbo.
3. Okwerinda kukwatwa akakooko akarikurwaza siriimu, abantu hamwe
 n’abafumbo baine kumanya kandi kwerinda ebirikubata ahari bugyengye.
 Abakazi abaine akakooko karikurwaza siriimu biine kuhikiirira abashaho
 baaba nibenda kugira enda.
4. Abo boona abarikwenda kushwera/kushwerwa bashemereire kubanza
 baayekyebeza akakooko ka siriimu batakashwire/batakashwirwe.
5. Abazaire bashemereire kugambira abaana baabo oku baakubaasa kwerinda
 siriimu.
6. Abaana abooroirwe kurungi biine emicwe mirungi nibabaasa kwerinda kumara
 agateerana ekirikubaasa kubata ahari bugyengye y’okutunga akakooko
 karikurwaza siriimu.
7. Eeka hamwe n’ekyaro ebyarwaire nainga byarwaize siriimu nibetaaga
 obuhwezi n’okureebererwa.
8. Amaka hamwe n’ebyaro biine kutaho oburyo kurinda abakazi n’abaana ebintu
 ebyakubaasa kubareetera kukwatwa akakooko karikurwaza siriimu.
9. Okusiraamura nikukyendeeza aha buzibu bw’okukwatwa akakooko karikurwaza
 siriimu kandi abantu biine kukutamu amaani. Abasiraamu nibo biine
 kutunguura enshonga egi omu bandi. Enkora y’okoshomesa abantu (Dawa)
 ahakyaro

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Ahabw’okugira ngu abakazi bakye beegire, abaingi tibarikumanya
 ebirikukwata ahari siriimu hamwe n’okubaakubaasa kugyerinda.

Endwara ezirikureetwa omu kuteerana

Endwara ezirikureetwa omu kuteerana ezirikumanywa nka (STDs) nendwara ezi
abantu barikutunga baateerana n’abo abazirwaire.

STDs ezirikukira kubonabonesa abantu n’enziku, ebihooya, ebizimba omu
bukazi, na siriimu. STDs nizireetera ozirwaire obuzibu bwingi nk’okuba
engumba, kansa y’ebicweka by’omubonano, kwihamu enda, kuzaara obwana
butahikire, omwana kufeera omunda, hamwe n’abaana kuzaarwa biine obuzibu.
STDs nizongyera kuzanzaaza akakooko karikureeta siriimu.

STDs namunonga siriimu nizitabangura amaka, zireeteho okufa n’okufeerwa
omuntu w’omuka arekeho abaana b’enfuuzi. Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu,
abafumbo biine kwerindira kimwe endwara ezirikureetwa omu kuteerana.

Akakooko akakurwaza siriimu/siriimu n’ekizibu kyeihanga ryona. Buri ihanga
nirigitiina ahabwokuba abantu barikwingana miriyoni 34 omunsi yoona bakaba
biine akakooko omugwa 2010. Akakooko ka siriimu nikiita ahabw’okurwanisa
abaserukare boona omu mubiri bakahwamu reero endwara ezindi zikabura
ekyazirwanisa. Omugwa 2010, abantu barikwingana miriyoni 1.2 bakaba biine
akakooko ka siriimu, kandi enfuuzi zo zikaba ziri miriyoni 1.2. aha bantu
barikwingana emitwaro nshanju (700,000) abaine kuba nibatunga omubazi
gurikuhwera ahari siriimu, emitwaro abiri na mukaaga (260,000) bonka bakaba
nibatunga omubazi ogwo. Siriimu niyo ndwara y’okubanza omu Yuganda omu
kureetaho omuraaro mubi omu bantu kandi neerya munonga esente z’eka hamwe
n’eihanga.

Okushoba kw’akakooko akarikurwaza siriimu nikuruga omu muringo gwako
ahaifo:
 • Omuhanda gwako mukuru ahu karikurabira n’omukuteerana.
 • Nikakira kukwata abo abakiine amaani g’okukora. Abantu aba kandi nibo
 biine entaasya n’enshohoza. Embiika y’esente neekyendeera omuntu ku
 arikukwatwa siriimu ahabw’okuba naaba naazikozesa kujanjabwa.
 • Okukora nikukyendeera aha rurengo rw’omuntu ahabwokuba omuntu
 naaremererwa kuhinga nari kuza aha murimo. Aha rurengo rw’eka, okukora
 nikukyendeera ahabwokuba abantu nibamara obwire barikureeberera
 omurwaire w’akakooko ka siriimu.

 Ahabw’entaasya kuguma neekyendeera omu ka, omurwaire obumwe nibamwima
 obujanjabi hamwe n’obuhwezi bwa banywani be nabwo bubure. Eki
 nikimureetera kutuntura, kuteekateeka munonga hamwe n’okwetamwa. Eka
 erimu omuntu nainga abantu baine akakooko karikurwaza siriimu
 terikubaasa kushemererwa n’okugwagye.
 • Abantu abaine akakooko akarikurwaza siriimu nibarikureebekaho burwaire
 bwona kumara obwire buraingwa reero omuri obwo bwire nibabaasa
 kuturiza abandi.
 • Siriimu neekwata abantu abakiine amaani g’okukora nahabwekyo neekora
 kubi entaasya y’amaka hamwe neihanga ryona.
Akakooko nikakira kurabira omu bintu ebi ahaifo:-
 • Kuteerana n’omuntu aine akakooko nikuhisya obucweka burikwingana 75-
 80% ahari abo abarikumanywa.
 • Omwana kugiiha omuri nyina yaaba naazaarwa nikitaho obucweka 15-20%
 ahari abo abarikumanywa.
 • Kukozesa eshagama erimu akakooko nikitaho obucweka butarikwingana 2%
 ahari abo abarikumanywa.
 • Kukozesa hamwe ebintu birikushara nainga birikucumita
 bitashanyaraziibwe nikireetaho obucweka butarikuhika 1% ahari abo
 abarikumanywa.

Omubaro gw’abaana abarikuzaarwa baine akakooko karikurwaza siriimu nibaguma
nibeeyongyera. Omuri Uganda, nikiteekateekwa ngu abaana 150,000 abari
ahagati y’abatakahikize mwaka kuhisya aha myaka 14 (0-14) biine akakooko
karikurwaza siriimu. Omu Uganda nabwo, obucweka burikwingana 18%
bw’abarikukwatwa akakooko ka siriimu busya n’abaana barikukaiha ahari ba
nyina. Akakooko nikasheenya amaka hamwe neihanga kandi kazibire aha kuhika
aha bigyendererwa by’eka eby’okushemererwa n’okugwa gye. Obutumwa oburi omu
kacweka aka nibuza kuhwera kuhindura ekintu ky’obusaasi eki.

1. Siriimu teine mubazi kandi neerabira omu kuteerana, omu shagama, nainga
abaana abatakazairwe kugiiha ahari ba nyina.
Tihariho kamanyiso koona akarikworeka ngu omuntu aine akakooko ka siriimu
kuhisya obu omuntu araarware akareeta obumanyiso bwa siriimu. Abantu
nibabaasa kureebeka gye nk’abandi boona. Omuntu weena orikweteekateekaho
kuba aine akakooko akarikurwaza siriimu aine kwekyebeza. Akakooko ka
siriimu nikaruga omu muntu kuza omu ndiijo omu miring egi:-

 • Omu shagama, omu maizi g’arikuruga omu kuteerana ag’ogwo aine akakooko
 karikurwaza siriimu garikuruga omu muntu kuza omu ndiijo. Akakooko
 karikurwaza siriimu reero nikajanjaara kuruga omu mushaija kaza omu
 mushaija, omu mushaija kuza omu mukazi nainga kuruga omu mukazi kuza
 omu mukazi.
 • Kweteera omubazi gw’ebikatu. Kubagana empitirizo n’ebikatu
 bitashanyariize ahabw’okwenda kweteera ekikatu n’omuringo ogundi
 ogurikujanjaaja akakooko akarikurwaza siriimu.
 • Kuta eshagama omu muntu etakyebeire.
 • Omukazi aine akakooko kukaturiza omwana otakazairwe.
2. Abafumbo boona baine kuteeranira omu bufumbo kutari kumara g’ateerana.
Eki nikimanyisa ngu tihariho mufumbo aine akakooko arikukareetera ondiijo
nainga abafumbo bahamire hamwe.

Omuhanda omurungi gw’okwetantara siriimu akakooko karikurwaza siriimu
n’okuguma hamwe mwesigiine nk’abafumbo otaine kakooko, obutaza kuteerana
n’abaheeru. Omu busiraamu, eki nikimanyisa omukazi/omushaija ou ogaisirwe
nawe.

Kuteerana otakashwire/otakashwerwe hamwe n’obushambani tibirikwikirizibwa
omu busiraamu ahabwokuba nibuta omuntu ahari bugyengye y’okukwatwa akakooko
ka siriimu omu bizibu obundi bwona. Ahu omuntu arikukoma n’abantu abu
arikuteerana nabo, nibwo bunkenke bu arikuba ariho kutunga akakooko ka
sireemu.

3. Kwerinda bugyengye y’okukwatwa akakooka ka siriimu abantu n’abafumbo
biine kumanya ebirikugireeta.

• kuteerana n’abantu barengire ahari omwe. Aba nibabaasa kuba abantu
baingi ahu omuntu arikuteerana n’gu aha ndiijo. Abafumbo nk’abo nibaba
bari nk’abari omu bwa maraaya nainga abaine abakazi baingi ekirikumanywa
nka polygamy. Obusiraamu nibuzibirira kimwe okuteerana otashwirwe hamwe
n’obushambani.

 [pic]

Mutarihika haihi n’obushambani ahabwokuba n’ekibi kya sitaani kandi
n’omuhanda gw’ebindi bibi.

( Holy Qur’an: Surat Isra 17:32)

 [pic]

Omushaija n’omukazi abarikwatirwa omu bushambani, mubateere kibooko igana
(100) obutabasaasira …

( Holy Qur’an: Surat Nur 24:2)
Enyiriri ezi (Ayats) zishemereire kwihwayo nk’obujurizi kurabura abaikiriza
obuzibu oburi omu butaba bwesigwa n’okututeerana n’abantu batari bamwe na
bamwe.

 • Kunywa amaarwa hamwe n’ebindi ebirikusinza

 [pic]
Imwe baikiriza mwe! Ebirikusinza hamwe n’okuteera zaara n’ebihemu bya
sitaani. Mwehare ebihemu ebyo mubone kutunguuka n’okugwagye.

 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Maida 5:90-91).

Amaarwa hamwe n’ebindi ebirikusinza nibita omuntu ahari bugyengye
y’okutunga akakooko akarikurwaza siriimu ahabwokuba nibizibira orikubinywa
kuteekateeka kurungi ngu ayehare akabi. Egi shuura omu Koraani nabwo
neegambira abaikiriza ngu batakaareka amarwa hamwe n’ebirikusinza byonka,
kwihaho ebyo bihemu byona otairemu n’obushambani.

• kushwera efaakazi zitakyebeirwe kakooko ka siriimu.

 [pic]
Imwe baikiriza mwe! Timurikwikirizaibwa kushwera nfaakazi zitaikiriize ….

( Holy Qur’an: Surat An-Nisa 4:19)

Omu buhangwa bumwe, omushaija ku arikuheza kufa, abarumuna nainga bakurube
nainga obundi abatabani b’omukazi ondiijo nibahungura enfaakazi hamwe
n’ebintu by’omushaija. Obusiraamu tiburikwikiriza mucwe gurikushwaza
nk’ogu, ahabw’okuba abantu ti bintu by’okuhungura.

Kuhungura enfaakazi eine akakooko karikurwaza siriimu n’omuhanda mukuru
gw’okujanjaaja akakooko ka siriimu, nahabwekyo n’ogw’okwerinda.

 • Kuteerana barikurabira omu kibunu nikireetera abarikuteerana kujwa.
 • Kuteerana n’omuntu weena arikweteera ebikatu.
 • Kwiha ebintu aha muntu ekirikubaasa kureetera abakazi baataaho omu
 bikorwa bitahikire.
 • Endwara ezirikurabira omu kuteerana nk’enziku, ebihooya, hamwe neezo
 ezirikureetaho ebironda omu bicweka by’omubonano nibireka omuntu
 yaakwatwa akakooko ka siriimu juba.

4. Abakazi biine akakooko ka siriimu baine kubanza baahikiirira omushaho
 bakatagizire nda.

 Abakazi baine akakooko karikurwaza siriimu emigisha yaabo y’okuzaara
 omwana akaine neingana obucweka 50%. Abaana abaingi abarikuzaarwa
 n’akakooko nibafa batakahikize myaka eshatu y’obukuru. Nahabwekyo,
 abakazi baine akakooko bashemereire kuronda obuhwezi batakagizire enda
 ahabw’okwenda ngu batungye obuhwezi bw’okurinda omwana ari omunda
 obutakwatwa kakooko.

5. Abantu abarikuteekateeka kushwera/kushwerwa bateekwa kwekyebeza kakooko
 batakatahire mu bushwere. Obutenda ngu habeho okuturizana akakooko
 n’okukaha omwana ari omunda, ni kikuru ngu abantu beekyebeza akakooko ka
 siriimu batakashwire/batakashwirwe.
 Abatakashwirwe/abatakashwire tibashemereire kuteerana. Abo boona
 abarikuhabura abatakashwire bashemereire kubahamiza oburemeezi
 bw’okukwatwa akakooko karikurwaza siriimu kandi babeehanangirize
 kwerinda ebirikukareeta.

 Kuteerana omuntu atakashwire nikibaasa kureetaho endwara ezindi
 z’okuteerana nk’enziku, ebihooya ezirikubaasa kureetaho obugumba,
 kwihamu enda, kuzaara oburengye, hamwe n’abaana kuzaarwa bari
 ebimburimburi zaaba zitatambiirwe.

6. Abazaire bashemereire kuhabura abaana baabo kwerinda kukwatwa akakooko
 akarikurwaza siriimu. Kwongyerera aha kwerinda n’omurigirwa waawe,
 nimubaasa kukuuma abaana banyu obutakwatwa kakooko karikurwaza siriimu.
 Eki nookibaasa waaba noomanya emiringo ei waakubaasa kwerindamu akakooko
 ka siriimu.

 Obugabe obu omwana aine kuruga aha muzaire we n’omuzaire kumwegyesa
 kuhandiika hamwe n’okuziha/kwoga… nokumuha omu bwijwire.

 ( Hadith- ekaikirizibwa Al-Baihaqi )

7. Abaana abakuziibwe kurungi kandi baine emicwe mirungi nibabaasa kwerinda
 kuza omu bikorwa birikubareetera akakooko ka siriimu.
 Abazaire biine obujunaanizibwa bw’okwegyesa abaana baabo enyikiriza/ediini
 y’obusiraamu. Baine kubeegyesa kushaba, kusiiba, obwesigwa, hamwe
 n’okwerinda emize mibi ya sitaani nk’okunywa amaarwa,enjaga,
 n’obushambani.

 [pic]
 Mutabani! Guma oshabe, oyangye ekibi, kandi ogumisirize na buri
 kimwe ekiraakuteganise.

 ( Holy Qur’an: Surat Lukman 31:17)

Tihariho kirungi nk’omuzaire kusigira omwanawe eitungo ry’okumukuza gye.

( Hadith- ekaikirizibwa al-Tabarani )

Obujurizi bw’emiringo ebiri oburi ahaiguru nibugamba aha kukuzibwa omu
diine hamwe n’omu micwe erikwanga ekibi.
8. Eeka hamwe naabo boona abaine akakooko ka siriimu hamwe n’abarwaize
 nibeetaaga obuhwezi. Nibeetaaga obujanjabi nk’emibazi y’okutamba
 oburwaire n’obusaasi. Abarwaire munonga hamwe naabo abaayehwire amasiko
 nibeetaaga kushabirwa n’okuhurira ebya Ruhanga.

Abarwaire siriimu nibabaasa kufa gye/n’obusingye baaba batungire okuhaburwa
ahabya Ruhanga. Obu n’obujunaanizibwa bw’abaikiriza. Abarwaire boona hamwe
n’amaka gaabo hamwe n’abarwaize nibeetaaga kuhumurizibwa hamwe
n’okuhaburwa.

Obuyambi nk’ebyokurya, ebijwaro, hamwe n’ebyokwerinda ebyabajanjabi
nibwetaagwa abarwaire hamwe n’amaka gaabo. Enfuuzi ezireesirweho siriimu
nizetaaga obuyambi kuruga ahari ab’eka abakiriho obw’ebyokurya,
n’okugumizamu kwega. Abekyaro bashemereire kuronda ebigombe ebirikuha
enfuuzi obuhwezi. Abaana abu abazaire baabo bafiire aha bwa siriimu
bashemereire kurindwa obutabaisa naku, n’obutababonabonesa. Obusiraamu
nibuhabura aha kuhwera n’okureeberera abarwaire n’amafuuzi hamwe n’enkwate.

 [pic]

Nibakuuma endahiro zaabo kandi nibatiina eizooba eri omwangizi araajanjaare
haihi ha hare. Kandi nibarya, ahabwa rukundo ya Ruhanga mugihe enfuuzi
n’embohe.

(Holy Qur’an: Surat Insan 76:7-8)

Endahiro eziri omu Ayat egyo aha ruguru nizimanyisa endahiro ez’ebya
Ruhanga. Harimu obumanyiso oburikukwata aha booro, enfuuzi hamwe n’embohe
nka:
 • Embohe omu bya Ruhanga.
 • Abo abataine kantu koona kandi batiine kireeberera.

 • Abo abataine ki baine omu by’empiiha n’ebyentuura.

Ebintu bishatu ebyagambwaho aharugur nibiikirizana n’embeera y’abarwaire ba
siriimu. Egi Ayat eshemereire kwihwayo nk’obujurizi kwongyera abaikiriza
amaani kureeberera n’okuhwera abarwaire ba siriimu hamwe n’amaka gaabo
ahabwa Ruhanga.
9. Amaka hamwe n’ekyaro kyona bishemereire kugyezaho nk’oku birikubaasa
kurinda abakazi obutakwatwa kakooko. Emicwe y’obuhangwa nk’egyo
erikwikiriza kushwera abakazi baingi, kuhungura enfaakazi, hamwe
n’obutabaha bintu byona nibimaraho abakazi obushoborozi bw’ekwasariraho
kibareetere kuba aha rutezo rw’okukwatwa akakooko ka siriimu. Ahabw’okugira
ngu abakazi bakye nibaza omu ishomero, abaingi tibarikutunga kumanya aha
birikukwata ahari siriimu hamwe n’oku omuntu yaakubaasa kugyerinda.

Omu bushwere bw’abakazi bingi aha mushaija omwe, kukwatwa akakooko ka
siriimu ni kingi omu bakazi kukira abashaija ahabwokuba omushaija omwe
yaaba aine akakooko, naakaturiza abakazi baingi abu aine. Abakazi abaingi
nibabaisibwaho abashaija, nangwa ti mu kubareeberera kwonka, kwihaho
n’okusharaho omu nshonga z’okuteerana. Eki nikireka baaza ahari bugyengye
y’ebibatarikwenda otaireho n’okuteerana n’omushaija ou barikumanya ngu aine
akakooko ka siriimu.

Ahabw’eka nungi y’omusiraamu erimu okushemererwa n’okugwa gye, buri muntu
weena namunonga abakazi, abooro, abateegire hamwe n’abaana baine kuheebwa
omugisha g’okwega kandi ebi bishemereire kwebembezibwa byorekyerere
n’ebikorwa ebindi. Kuha abantu obukugu nikyenda ngu abandi bamanye
omugasho n’obugabe bw’okumanya obwengye, okweshariraho, hamwe n’okugira
omurimo. Abasiraamu baine kutunguura eby’empurizigana namunonga omu bakazi
ahabwokwenda ngu ebyokumanya bijanjaare. Abakazi, eminyeeto hamwe
n’abashaija bashemereire kutunguura enshonga y’amaka amarungi agaijwiremu
okushemererwa.

Okusaraamura nikikyendeeza bugyengye y’okukwatwa akakooko karikurwaza
siriimu kandi kushemereire kuhagirwa abasiraamu nk’okukora okushomesa
(Dawa).

Kusiraamura kikikyendeeza bugyengye y’okukwatwa akakooko ka siriimu. N’obu
okusiraamura kuraabe kutarikutangira kimwe kakooko ka siriimu, kushemereire
kutunguurwa nk’enyongyerero y’okuhweraho kutangira akakooko ka siriimu
namunonga omu bashaija. Omu muringo gw’okukora okushomesa (Dawa),
abasiraamu bashemereire kutunguura okusiraamura omu byaro byona nk’omuringo
gw’okukyendeza bugyengye y’okukwatwa akakooko ka siriimu.

 OBUTUMWA BUKURU

 Omu maka agarimu omushaija aine abakazi baingi, kukwatwa akakooka
 karikurwaza siriimu ni kwingi omu bakazi kukira abashaja ahabwokuba
 omushaija omwe naaturiza abakazi be boona.

 [pic]

Ruhanga naayenda ngu otungye buri kimwe; t’arikwenda ngu mubonabone.

( Holy Qur’an: Surat Baqara 2:185)

 [pic]

Nka Zakariyo oku yaashabire Mukama we! Arikugira; Mukama wangye! Ninkushaga
ngu ompe abaana abahikiriire …

( Holy Qur’an: Surat Al-Imran 3:38)

Okworora n’okubikirira

Endiisa n’endeberera y’ente z’enyankore
Ente z’enyankore nizetenga kurebererwagye kwonka
tizirikwetenga endeberera ey’omutaano
Obunaku bw’ente zemeramu
Emyaka y’enyena eyemeraho
Obunaku obw’ente eheza kugarukamu kwema bwanyima y’okuzaara
Omuhendo gw’enyena ente z’enyankore zizaara buri kuzaara
Amazaara g’ente y’enyankore erikuzaara omumagara gaayo
Amazaara agarikugumaho
Ebiro by’ente y’enyankore erikuhangaara
Ebigyendererwa by’okucooka ente z’enyankore
(okutandika n’ekikuru munonga)
