12

OBUKOMOOKO
Ahagati y’okwakabiri n’okwataano 2009, itwe abariisa ba Nyabushozi, Kiruhura
district, tukakwatanisa n’abakozi ba PENHA Uganda, LPP na LIFE Network Africa,
kuhandiika aha nte zaitu z’enyankore. Ekiteekateeko kikatandika bwanyima
y’owayebembeire okuhandiika ekihandiiko eki, kuza omumushomo ogwabeireho
omukwakataano, 2007 omuri Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. Omushomo gukaba guri aha
“Kureberera ente z’enzaarwa omuri Africa, Ebishemereire kuteebwa omunkora,
Ebishemereire kutandikirwaho, Obugabe bw’abariisa n’ebishemereire kukorwa
omubiro by’omumeisho” Omushomo gukoreka ngu emiringo mingi ey’ente
n’egyenda necwekyerera ahabw’okwibikirira enjungu. Eki kikatuhabura ngu ente zaitu
ez’enyankore nazo zigyenzire nituuba kandi eki nikibaasa kuziretera okucwekyerera.

OMURINGO GUKYAHANDIIKIRWEMU
Tukakozesa omuringo gwa “LIFE“ ogwokuhandiika aha nte z’enzaarwa. Omuringo
ogu niguhwera bakama b’ente kuheereza ebiteekateeko byaabo aha nte zaabo
z’enzaarwa.
Entebekanisa ekakorwa, abantu ba Nyabushozi beija bagamba ahabikwatireine
n’okubarikureeba ente zaabo z’enyankore omubiro by’omumeisho n’okubakubaasa
kwirinda kureeba ngu tizacwekyerera
Eki kikakorwa kiti:
(1) Enkiiko ibiri zikurataine, ezabariisa aha gomborora ya Sanga.
(2) Orukiiko rw’abaana n’abashomesa ba Lake Mburo Senior Secondary School.
(3) Okutayayira amaka g’abariisa n’amarisizo ga gavumenti.
(4) Okwebuuza ahabashomesa b’amatendekyero ag’ahaiguru n’ekitongore kya
gavumenti ekirikurinda ente z’enzaarwa kureeba ngu tizacwekyerera (NAGRC).
(5) Okushoma ebihandiiko ebyahandiikirwe kare aha nte z’enyankore.
Abantu abaheire ebiteekateeko aha nte z’enyankore bakaba barimu abariisa, abashaho
b’enyameishwa, abantu abarikucondoza aha nte z’enyankore, abarikwirinda ngu
itacwekyerera n’abandi boona abarikukwatwaho omumiringo etari emwe. Abariisa 70
n’abandi bantu nibo babeire bari omunkiiko za Sanga, abaana 91 n’abashomesa 5
nibo babeire bari omurukiiko aheishomero n’abandi bantu 22 abashangirwe omumaka
gaabo na ahamirimo yaabo. Ahabantu 184 abahaireize ebiteekateeko byaabo
ahakihandiiko eki, 68 bakaba bari abakazi. Amaziina g’abantu gahandiikire aha muheru
gwekihandiiko eki.

1

Ebiri omukihandiiko eki nibyo biteekateeko by’abariisa ahabikwatireine n’ente zaabo
z’enyankore kurigirira okubyahandikirwe omunkiiko ezabeire aha gomborora ya Sanga,
Nyabushozi. Ebindi eby’ongyeirwemu n’ebiteekateeko by’abandi bantu omunkiiko
zitari zimwe na zimwe.
1.

EBIKWEITSE AHA NTE Z’ENYANKORE N’ENSI EYIZAHANGIIRWEMU

Okw’ente z’enyankore ishisha:
Ente zaitu z’enyankore ziine amahembe maraingwa kwonka hariho n’ezenkungu.
Enyankore niziba ziri ndeingwa, ziine amaguru n’omukundi bireingwa n’eibango rikye.
Niikira kuba ziri ez’ebihogo kwonka ezimwe ziine esiina, egaaju, amayenje, ebiremba
n’agandi mabara. Ziine amaisho makye, enyindo nkye n’amatu makye (kwonka obukye
bw’ebyo byoona niburigirira ekiwashishanisa). Ziine n’obwoya bukye kandi nijugagye.
Ente z’enyankore nizo zabandize omunsi kandi zigumire n’ahabwekyo nizemera
ebizibu bingi kandi zirya n’obunyatsi bukye.
Mapu ya Uganda erikworeka ekicweka ekirimu ente

2

Ente z’enyankore nishangwa omumyanya egi
Ente z’enyankore nishangwa omuri Nkore/ Nyabushozi n’ebichweka ebigihereire nka
Buganda, Bunyoro, Kasese, Luwero, Nakaseke, Nakasongora na Masindi kwonka
hati nishangwa na Karamoja hamwe n’omumahanga agahikire Uganda nka Karagwe
(Tanzania) na Rwanda. Abashomire nibatugira ngu hati nishangwa omunsi yoona na
buraaya nk’omumwanya gw’okurindiramu enyamaishwa ogwa Denver omuri Colorado
na Texas omuri America hamwe na Bungyereza. Okwo omuri Buraaya nibazeeta
“Ankole – Watutsi”.
Ekicweka ekirikwororagye ente z’enyankore
Ekichweka ekirikukira kwororagye ente z’enyankore ni Nkore. Ishaza rya Nyabushozi
niryo ririkukirayo oburungi. Kwonka ente z’enyankore nizororwagye omuri Bukanga,
Kashari, Kiboga na Masindi. Hamwe n’emyanya eteine bibungo bihango kandi eine
abantu bakye.
Mapu ya Uganda erikworeka ebyanga bya Nkore (Bushenyi, Ibanda, Isingiro,
Kiruhura, Mbarara, ebichweka bya Ntungamo n’ebichweka bya Rukungiri)

3

2. EMICWE N’EBY’OBUHANGWA
Oburugo bw’ente y’enyankore n’amakuru g’eiziina “Ankole”
Ente zaitu z’enyankore zikahangwa Ruhanga kandi aha zikaretwaho Abachwezi (aba
nibo batandikireho Nkore; omuhandiiki). Ente z’enyankore nizikomooka omuri Bihogo
(Bihogo niyo nte y’Abachwezi eyabandize; Omuhandiiki).
Omubutegyeki bw’omugabe Nyabugarobweera Ntare1, ente zikahwa omunsi, abantu
bakaba bajuga enyonza. Abashaija b’Omugabe bakaba bamwokyeza ebitookye ngu
kwonka eizooba rimwe akareeba omushaija we naiba ekitookye, yahurira yahemuka,
yakwata obuta bwe “enfumura iguru” yarasha iguru, enjura yagweera ebiro bina, ngu
ah’eizooba rya kataano abantu kubagiire kwimuka bashanga buri ka erimu ente, kwiha
obwo abantu baziriisiza omunsi nungi “Nkore”
Eiziina “Ankole” rigwiire. Erihikire ni “Nkore”. Omuhandiiki , G.N. Kirindi akagira ngu
abakubuuzi nibo bahindwire eiziina ry’ensi yaitu bakagyeeta „Ankole“ ahakuba bakaba
batarikumanya kugamba gye eiziina “Nkore’’.
Nkore obumwe n’obumwe nitugyeeta“Kaaro Karungi’’. Eri eiziina rikaruga aha rutaro rwa
Nkore na Bunyoro. Abanyoro kubahambire Nkore, bagira ngu “aka Kaaro karungi’’.
Kandi twine endijo ngamba aha nsi yaitu erikugira ngu; “Nkore ekora omunda“. Eki
kikaruga aha kutonzya kw’omukazi, Kibangura munyanya Ntare obuyafereirwe
omwanawe owagwiire aha rugamba. Akashaasha munonga yeirikanga yaza kuteera
bagyendanwa omweko, kwonka bamuzibira ngu ataroga engoma. Kuyabeire natonzya
yagira ati; “tekiri kaaro karungi, yankora omunda“
Abantu ababandize kuriisa ente z’enyankore
Abantu ababandize kuriisa ente z’enyankore niba tatenkuruz’itwe. Aba harimu;
Abachwezi (abatandikireho Nkore kandi batatenkuruz’itwe), Abahima n’Abanyankore
(abantu abarikutuura omunsi ya Nkore).
3. OBUKURU N’EMIGASHO EBIRI OMUKURIISA
Ebirikutungwa omunte z’enyankore n’emigasho yaabyo:
Ente zaitu nizo magara gaitu kandi nizo matungo gaitu ahabw’okuba nizirugwamu
ebintu bingi eby’omugasho omumagara gaitu. Emigasho egi erimu ey’obuhangwa,
ey’entansya, ey’emibazi n’ebindi nkokubyahandiikwaho ahaifo:

4

Emigasho y’obuhangwa
•
N’enyemibwa, tizigumisirize kandi nishemeza amaisho
•
Nihangara
•
Nitwijuga abakazi
•
Nitwihaana kandi twihamu emikago
•
Nitwihonga twagira enshobe eyitwakora omuntu ninga twateera omuzeire.
•
Okukaraba enzigu twakora ihano nk’okwita omuntu.
•
Empu nizikorwamu ebijwaaro, ebyokushitamira n’ebyokubyamira.
•
Amahembe nigashemeza amaisho kandi nigarugwamu enkwanzi, enzamba,
endingiri n’amagoreko.
•
Amagaanga nigacuragura ebirere n’ebishaabo.
Eby’okurya:
•
Nitunywa amate gaazo agagumire kandi turya enyama yaazo enungi etaine
bishaju bingi.
•
Amashita gaazo marungi, niturungamu eshabwe
•
Ira tukaba twiganira kandi turya enjuba omushagama yaazo
Emigasho y’entasya:
•
Ente zaitu nihangara
•
Tizirikurwarazaguzibwa
•
Nizemera enjara n’ekyanda
•
Nituzitungamu sente (nituguza ente, empu - bazikoramu enkaito, enshaho,
enkoba, n’engoma, amahembe – bagakoramu amapeesha, enzamba, enkwanzi,
enyungu n’eby’emikono ebindi, ebyaara- babikoramu gaamu.
•
Nizirugwamu sente nyingi kukiza ente z’enganda.
•
Amasha gaazo nitugahembeza kandi abamwe tugakozesa nk’enku
•
Okumanywa n’ekitinisa ky’eitu nikirigirira aha masyo n’oburungi bw’ente ez’omuntu
aine.
•
Enyorora yaazo neyetenga esente nkye ahakuba nizitungwa obunyatsi n’amaizi
kandi Nkore eine obunyatsi burungi. Nizemera buri muringo gw’ensi gwoona
kandi nibaasa kurebererwa buri muntu ozitungire (n’obubakuba abooro).
Okushomesa:
•
Nitutunda ente twihamu sente z’okushomesa abaana baitu.
Emigasho y’emibazi:
•
Amagaanga - nitugakoramu kashumba erikutamba orukororo n’omunda
•
Amasha – Nitugabungisa, nigatambira abereere omunda, nigatamba obusheru,
omukazi kuyabeire afiisa omwana bagakoramu omubazi gw’abakazi kugurutsya
•
Amate nigaragurira endwara nyingi

5

•
•

Amahembe nitugakozesa kurumika kandi n’okuhereeza omutohooro
Ebyaara abantu nibabirya kugumya amagufa

Emigasho y’okuhinga:
•
Amasha nigakora ekiriisa kirungi ky’entokye n’obunyatsi
Obuzaare bw’abantu n’ente omubuhangwa bwa Nkore:
Emirimo yaitu emingi ekaba ekwatiraine n’ente zaitu. Omuntu kuyabaire ahereeza
mugyenziwe enimi nungi, emuzarira ente nungi, mugira omukago, mugumizamu
n’okuhaana kandi kibaretera okukwatanisa omubintu bingi.
Omuntu kuyabaire arigira omwishiki murungi, amujuga ente nungi. Ente zikaba
zigira emirimo mingi eyabaire eretera abantu kukwatanisa; eby’okureeberaho n’ebi;
kutwabaire tuhaazya omukasheshe, tuguma omwishaazi nituganiira, obumwe tukaba
tugira ishaazi tuhaburana ahabintu bitari bimwe na bimwe, turiisa, tuturaniza hamwe,
turasha ente kandi tuteera hamwe amaato. Nyekiro kutwabaire tutarama, tukaba
tuzeshongora / twihimba, twirahira, tuzesimirana kandi tuzevuga. Ente zaitu nizo
zitutunga, tunywa amate gaazo kandi turya enyama yaazo n’eshagama yaazo.
4. OKWORORA N’OKUBIIKIRIRA
Endiisa n’endeberera y’ente z’enyankore:
Ente zaitu nituziriisa gye kandi tuzirinda obutaitwa nyameishwa. Omukasheshe
nituziseetura tuza kwiriisa. Omwihangwe nituzesherera ohabwato buturikuteeza itaka,
kwonka amaizi gaaba garuho, ente nizibaasa kweribatira eshaaha yoona kurigirira
okuzirikwenda. Nituzengyera kandi nitwirasha zaaba zirwaire, nitukozesa emibazi
y’ekinyankore kwitsirika kwonka nituziteera n’ebikatu by’emibazi y’ekijungu kwigyema
n’okwiragurira kandi tuzigaburira n’ey’enjoka.
Buri kasheeshe nituhembera omwishaazi, omubwabazyo nituhembera omukibuga kandi
omwihangwe tuhembera ahakikumiriro. Nituhembeza esingo n’obunyatsi bwomire.
Okuhembera nikuyamba ente kutagata n’okubinga enshihera. Tukaba nituzeyera buri
eizooba, twiragaza n’enkuyo, tuzagaaga kuziiha engoha ahabw’okwikunda munoonga
kandi hati nituzoozya buri sabiiti kubinga engoha.
Encwamutwe tukaba tuzireka zoonka omuhondo, twitsibika omukarugu omunju,
enyena nto tuziraaza omubihongore, tuzarira ekyarire ky’omutuyo kandi enkuru
tuziraaza omubigombe.

6

Ente z’enyankore nizetenga kurebererwagye kwonka tizirikwetenga endeberera
ey’omutaano.
Ahabw’okukunda ente zaitu munonga, nazo nizitukunda. Ente ezirikukamwa
kuturikuzikunda nitubaasa n’okuzikama obwaasi ninga tutaine mboha.
Ente z’enyankore tizirikwetenga kwitetsa munonga ahabw’okuba tizirikwetenga
by’okurya by’omutaano, tizirikwetenga emibaazi mingi y’ekijungu, tizirikwetenga amaizi
maingi kandi emirimo yaazo terikuhenda nkey’enjungu.
Obunaku bw’ente zemeramu:
Ente z’enyankore zeema ahagati y’okwezi kw’okubaanza n’okwakashatu, obumwe
kuhitsya omukwakataano. Ebiro by’akatarango oruhira niruba nirutandika kumera,
omumirari obunyatsi nibumera, ente zirya zigomoka, omu kaanda enjura yaaba
n’ehwayo kwonka omushana gutakajwire munonga, ente zitandika kweema.
Emyaka y’enyena eyemeramu:
Enyena z’enyankore zemera ahagati y’emyaka ebiri n’ekicweka n’emyaka ena. Kwonka
enyena eyonkiregye n’eyemera ahamwaka gumwe nari ebiri.
Obunaku obw’ente eheza kugarukamu kwema bwanyima y’okuzaara:
Ente kwerikwororwagye nari yaaba eine obunyatsi, n’eyemera ahagati y’esabiiti ibiri na
munaana bwanyima y’okuzaara. Kandi yaaba etoreirwegye, n’eyemera nk’omumeezi
ana. Ente ezirikurahuka kweema zaheza kuzaara,nikira kugira amate makye kwonka
ezirikuturaho kweema zaheza kuzaara nigira amate maingi nka litta mushanju nari
ikimu (7-10ltrs). Ente ezoreirwe gye nikira kukamwa amate maingi kwonka nirahuka
kuhweisa.
Omuhendo gw’enyena ente z’enyankore zizaara buri kuzaara:
Ente z’enyankore enyingi nizaara enyena emwe buri izaara, kwonka obumwe n’obumwe
nizaara empasha kandi obumwe n’obumwe zizaara enyena ishatu ekiturikweta
“ekihangukano”.
Amazaara g’ente y’enyankore erikuzaara omumagara gaayo:
Ente zaitu, okukira munonga ente z’embarasi, nizaara amazaara ikumi nari makumi
abiri (10-20) omumagara gaazo. Kwonka ezimwe nihitsya amazaara makumi abiri
n’ataano (25).
Amazaara agarikugumaho:
Abamwe nibagira ngu ahamazaara nka makumi abiri n’ataano (25), nihagumaho
amazaara ikumi nari makumi abiri (10-20). Abandi nibagira ngu ahamazaara ikumi

7

n’amukaaga (16), nihagumaho amazaara ikumi (10). Kwonka obumwe n’obumwe
amazaara goona nigagumaho. Kwonka katugire ngu haba hariho amazaara ikumi
n’abiri (12), amazaara munaana (8) nigo garikubaasa kugumaho ahabw’okuba, enimi
nibabaasa kuziguza, ezimwe nizifa kandi ezindi nibabaasa kwihereza abandi bantu.
Ebiro by’ente y’enyankore erikuhangaara
Ente zaitu z’enyankore, zaaba zoreirwegye, zanywa amaizi, zikarya obunyatsi, kandi
tutaziriire, nizibaasa kuhangara emyaka makumi abiri ninga makumi ashatu (20-30)
Ebigyendererwa
munonga)

by’okucooka

ente

z’enyankore

(okutandika

n’ekikuru

Kutuba nitucooka tuba nituronda obunyemibwa (obuhango, oburaingwa, obwoyabihogo n’agandi mabara marungi n’amahembe maraingwa garikwera kandi
gategizegye). Enimi yaba eri nungi, n’ezaara enyena nungi.
Nitucooka ente z’amate maingi kandi z’emicwe mirungi.
Nitucooka kuzaaza ente z’omubiri gumwe nari ibara rimwe ahabw’okuba
nirebekagye, nishemeza amaisho, kandi niguma hamwe ahabw’okuba niba
nikundana kandi nirahuka kumanywa zaaba zibuzire nari zibirwe.
Ente ezicookiregye niziba ziri nungi kandi niziheisa mukamazo ekitinisa.

“Ruhogo” – Enimi nk’egi ninungi y’okubiikira
8

Ebirungi eby’omutaano aha nte z’enyankore
•
Nihangaara.
•
Ziine obwoya burungi n’amabara marungi nka mayeenje n’ebihogo, empu zaazo
niba nishishagye munonga.
•
Nizibaasa kugyenda orugyendo ruraingwa.
•
Ziine amate marungi garikurugwamu amashita maingi kandi marungi kandi ziine
enyama nungi etaine bishaju.
•
Ente zaitu nizitumanya kandi nizimanya kutanisa abantu b’omuka n’abahandi,
ekyokureberaho enimi ekagurwa yatwarwa Entebbe omukitingore ekirikubiika
amaizi g’enimi, kwonka ekaremesa abashaho ahakuba ekaba ebacumita, kwonka
omurundi gumwe mukamayo owagibagurize kuyagireyo, yagiterera enkome,
yagyeterera, yamuhika yagyagaaga, yagira emicwe mirungi munonga, abashaho
batangaara!
•
Nizimanya bukuru ahakuba ente kw’orikugyeterera, ejuga kandi eija.
•
Enyankore nigumira ebizibu bingi, tizirikurwaraguzibwa, nizemera ebintu bingi
nka; omushana n’ekyanda, endwara z’emiringo mingi, emyanya etakozire, nizirya
obunyatsi bukye, zinywa amaizi makye, n’ahabwekyo okuzoroora kworobi.
•
Ziine amahembe mahango kandi maraingwa ag’okwerindisa kandi omushaho
w’ente akatugira ngu nigaziyamba obuteitwa mpiita omubwire bw’omushana.
•
Ente ezimwe kuzirikuzaara, zishereka encwamutwe zaazo omubishaka, ngu
enyameishwa zitazirya ninga erekye kugyenda orugyendo ruraingwa ninga
abazigu bataziita kandi zo zeshereka zizayo zizontsya.

Ente z’ebihogo ahari famu ya gavumenti eya Ruhengyere zizagiire omunda
y’emiti zakuuka.

9

•
•
•

Enyankore zigira omuhako mukye n’ahabwekyo tizigumire kukama.
Enyankore tizirikwita nsi kandi kuzirikuba nizirya nizitoranamu obunyantsi
oburungi.
Nizizaara empasha munonga kukiza enjungu, obumwe n’obumwe nizizaara
enyena ishatu (ekihangukano)

.

Hati abantu abaingi nituriisa ente z’enjungu ez’amate ezirikwetwa “Holstein
Friesians”:

1.Enjungu ziine amate maingi

ekyanda n’endwara)

nk’ey’enyankore
Enshonga ahabw’enki nitukozesa enimi kwemesa ente zaitu:
Ente zaitu nizemebwa enimi (titurikuzemesesa amaizi g’okuzaara) ahabw’okuba
nitwenda kucooka tukatunga ente eziine ebirungi eby’omutaano nkebyagambwaho
ahaiguru. (Omuriisa wa butosha tarikubaasa kukozesa amaizi g’enimi g’okuzaara
ahakuba amaizi aga nigetenga esente nyingi ahakuba gaine ibiika - Omuhandiiki)
Ekigyendererwa ky’okubiikira:
Ente zaitu nitwibiikirira ahabw’okwenda ngu tutungye ente z’enyemibwa. Ente
empango, nungi kandi z’amate maingi. (Kwonka omumurembe gw’esente, abantu hati
nibabiikirira kutunga n’ente zirikuremeera kiro nyingi ez’enyama - Omuhandiiki)
Ahitwiha ente z’okutunga n’enimi z’okubiikira:
Ente n’enimi enyingi ezitutunga tuzihungura kuruga ahabazaire baitu, eky’okureberaho
aboojo kubabeire bashwera, bakaba batunga ente kuruga ahari beishebo. Abeishiki
kare bakaba batahungura nte kuruga ahari beishebo, kwonka ahabw’empindahinduka,
hati nabo nibabaraga ebintu n’ente. Abazeire abashaija, n’abaana baboojo, nabo

10

nibatunga ente kubarikuhingira bahara baabo n’abanyanyabo. Obundi ente n’enimi
nituzitunga omukuhaana, okuturaniza, okukwatirira kandi obundi nituzezariza nari
twigura.
Enimi eziturikwenda zoonka nizo zirikwemya:
Enimi zoona eziri omunte tizirikwikirizibwa kwemya. Ezitutarikwenda ngu zeemye,
nitwinaaha, twibaaga nari tuziguza zikiri nto. Abamwe omuritwe abarikumanya emibazi
y’ebishaka, nitutsirika enimi kwizibira kutemba bahara baazo.
Enimi zaitu z’engundu niguma omunte nk’emyaka ebiri kuhitsya ahari mushanju.
Kwonka eki nikirigirira ahabigyendererwa by’okubiikira, ahakuba enimi n’ebaasa
kuguma omunte yaaba n’ekizaara enyena nungi. Nitukira kubikira enimi ibiri, engundu
n’endijo ento buri busyo. Enimi yaaba eri omunte yonka n’ebaasa kwemya nk’ente
igana.
5. OBWINGI BW’ENTE
Obwingi bw’ente z’enyankore omunte zoona eziri omuri Nyabushozi
Ente z’enyankore ibaganikire. Buri nte ikumi eziri omuri Nyabushozi, ahagati y’’ente
emwe n’ente mukaaga nizo nyankore. (Eki nikimanyisa ngu buri nte igana, ahagati
y’ente ikumi n’ente makumi mukaaga -10% - 60% nizo nyankore).
Ente z’enyankore ibaganikire omumyaka ikumi ehweire.
Nitukireeba ngu ente zaitu z’enyankore ibaganikire munonga omumyaka ikumi ehweire
kandi ziriyo nicwekyerera ahabw’enshonga nyingi nkezagambwaho aheifo:
•
•
•
•
•

Amate makye
Emyanya mikye
Okutuzibira kufuruka n’ente zaitu tukaguma nitwirisiza omumwanya gumwe
Enshohoza eya haiguru ahabindi by’etengo ( nitwetenga esente z’okukora ebindi
bintu nk’okushomesa n’okwombeka amaju g’omurembe)
Ahabw’entasya kuruga omumate g’enjungu n’esente enyingi eziturikutunda ente
z’enjungu

Ente z’enyankore nitureeba ziriyo nihwaho kwonka kandi nitubaasa kwirinda:
Abamwe omuritwe nituteekateeka ngu ente z’enyankore niziza kucwekyerera kwonka
abandi nituteekateeka ngu ente z’enyankore niziza kubaganika n’ahabwekyo niziija
kutandika kugura ahaiguru.

11

Nizija kucwekyerera ahabw’enshonga ezi:
•
Ahabw’enshonga ezizireteire kubaganika omumyaka ikumi ehweire
ezagambwaho ahaiguru nka emyanya mikye kandi n’abantu kweyongyera
obwingi.
•
Enjungu kweyongyera obwingi kandi n’okubikirira enyankore enjungu tukazaaza
za kuroosi
•
Okuteekateeka ngu ente z’enjungu n’ezomuhendo kukira enyankore ahakuba
nitutungamu amate maingi tugaguza twihamu sente.
•
Nituguza enyankore ngu tuziyiheho zoona ahakuba tizakigura sente zahaiguru.
•
Enkora ya gavumenti eya boona batungye n’eyokutunguura eby’obuhingi
n’oburiisa (NAADS) erikwenda kureeba ngu buri ka yagira entasya ya milliyoni
makumi abiri (20) buri mwaka. Egi enkora ehagiire munonga okubiikirira enjungu
kureeba ngu abantu batunga amate g’okuguza kutunga esente nyingi.
Nizija kutuuba kwonka zigumeho ahabw’enshonga ezi:
Ente z’enyankore nizija kugumaho kuturagumizemu nitukora ebintu ebi;
•
Kuturagumizemu n’okucooka ente ahab’wobunyemibwa n’amate maingi, kandi
twibikirire enimi zaazo
•
Amataka ga gavumenti kubaragatuhe tukariisizamu ente z’enyankore
•
Amataka ga paaka bagahindure ag’okuriisizamu enyankore
•
Itwe n’abandi bantu abarikukwatwaho turekyeraho kugamba kubi aha nte
z’enyankore kureka tugambe aha burungi bwazo n’omuhendo gwazo.
•
Tugyezeho tukore endijo mirimo y’entasya turekyeraho kuteekateekyera aha nte
zoonka.
•
Twegyendesereze twaba nitubikirira enjungu n’enyankore tuboone kutunga za
kuroosi nungi ezitwiniire omugasho.
•
Twororegye kandi tureberere gye ente zaitu z’enyankore tuziteireho omutima
nk’okuturikworora enjungu.
•
Tugumizemu n’obuhangwa bw’abahima obw’okukunda ente zaitu z’enyankore
nkokukyabaire kiba kare tutakatungire njungu.
•
Turonde akatare k’ente z’enyankore n’ebintu byoona ebiturikuzihamu kandi
twegyese n’abashubuzi bagure kandi batunde enyankore n’ebirikwirugamu
nk’amate n’enyama eby’omuringo gw’ahaiguru.
•
Twegyese abantu aha bikweitse aha nyankore nk’obunyemibwa bwazo, emigasho
n’ebirungi byazo hamwe n’omuhendo gwazo.
•
Tutandikyeho ebigombe by’okurinda ente z’enyankore n’obuharabe hatariho
myanya mihango y’okwirisiizamu. Omwe ahabantu abarikuhabura abarambuzi
akagira ngu nikirungi itwe kwetandikiraho ebigombe by’okurinda ente zaitu
tutaketsire ebigombe ebyaheru kutukwatsa.
•
Tuziteere ebishushane tuzorekye abantu b’amahanga g’aheeru bareebe oburungi
bwazo nk’amahembe maraingwa n’amabara gaazo ag’omutaano.

12

•
•
•
•
•
•
•
•
•
•

•
•

•

Abashaho babiikye amaizi g’enimi z’enyankore enungi tubaase kuzaaza ente
nungi.
Twegyese ebigombe naza kampuni z’abarambuzi ebikweitse aha nte z’enyankore
babaase kumanyisa abarambuzi oburungi bwazo.
Tuteho oburyo abarambuzi bagume baije omumaka gaitu bareebe emirimo y’ente
z’enyankore, nk’okukama, okurasha, okwengyera, okwitira n’okucunda.
Naitwe tukwatanise n’ebigombe by’abarambuzi omukubarambuza
Abebembezi ba za paka z’enyameishwa, beikirize ente z’enyankore zigume ziriire
omu paaka nk’ebihangirwe eby’omutaano.
Omwaana wa L.Mburo S.S.S akagira ngu gavumenti ete omushoro muhango
ahari abo abarikuriisa ente z’enjungu.
Gavumenti etuhereze kaani z’amate kibaganise aha sente eziturikuta
omukugyemura.
Gavumenti eteho irisiizo ry’okurinda ente z’enyankore (irisizo ririho omuhandiiki)
Habeho okuzibira kuzaara abaana baingi tubaganise obwingi bw’abantu.
Tugarukye turiise ente zaitu ez’enyankore ahabw’okuba hati titurikwetenga
esente nyingi z’okushomesa abaana ahabwa “Boona Bashome” erikutuhwera
ahakushomesa abaana.
Turiise ente nkye eziturikubaasa kwororagye omumwanya gw’okuriisa ente nyingi
nka kare.
Manegya wa irisizo rya govumenti akatugira ngu tuhingye obunyatsi bw’okuriisa
ente zaitu zirekye kuguma nigyenda engyendo ndaingwa nizitorana obunyatsi
oburungi omu bubi.
Itwe abarikuriisa ente z’enjungu n’enyankore, ebigombe ebirikugaba sente
bituhwere tubaase kubaganisa enjungu twongyere aha nyankore kandi naitwe
abarikuriisa enyankore zoonka bituhwere tubaase kwirinda nitugumizamu
n’okuziriisa omumuringo gwaitu gw’obuzariranwa.

Sanga, Nyabushozi, Kiruhura District

amaaya1 [amaaya] z. Ebijwaro bikuzire, bitaanyagurikire. Yaajwara
 amaaya.
amaaya2 [amaaya] z. Emiina, erikuba erimirwe enyamurimi, nari amabaare
 agari nk'ebishengye agataahwamu enyamaishwa nka zaamuha nari empitsi.
 Enyamaishwa zaataaha omu maaya gaazo. bm: [eryaya].

 kuba kigaaju. Abamwe nibagira ngu nyakugarwara aba aribatsire ahu
 baahashanuriire, nari ariire emboga z'aha kituuro ky'omuntu waabo.
 Arwaire amabugane.
amabura-kindi [amabura-kîndi] z. Obukono oburiho oburabyo bw'obukangaga
 (omugugu). Obundi, bukoresibwa kuboha ebyanguhi ahabw'okuburwa ebindi
 eby'okubohesa; nikyo bwayeteirwe amabura-kindi.
amabwabwa [amabwábwa] z. Amabeere g'embwa. Embwa eine amabwabwa munaana.
amabwebwo [amabwebwo] z. Amate nari amashereka g'embwa. Akanywa amabwebwo
 yaafa.
amacanda [amacânda] z. RT: amacande. 1) Ekihingwa ky'amababi mahango
 geenaaganagire, ekirabyo kyakyo n'ekya kinekye. Kikira kukura
 kirikuranzya ei eizooba ririkuturuka. 2) Entetera z'ekihingwa ekyo.

 amagana. 3) Omuringo ogu omuntu nari ekihuriire kyona kirikutuuramu.
 Aine amagara marungi, naayehurira gye omu mutima. fum: Amagara gakira

 kukoramu kyayi. Buri kasheeshe nibamutwekyera amagyani.

amashemererwa [amashémererwa] z. Emitwire y'omuntu erikureetwa obusingye
 n'okunanuka. Amashemererwa n'ag'okunyita ahabw'okubona motoka yangye
 ebaire eibirwe. RT: amasemererwa. fum: Amashemererwa gatembesa
 orusiika.
amashengo [amashengo] z. Ebigambo birungi by'okushendashenda mukama
 waawe, ngu okaagira eki waamwihaho. Amashengo gaawe ningamanya; banza
 omare ebi naakuragiira kukora, ebindi nitubigambaho bwanyima.
amashereka [amashéreka] z. Amate agaruga omu mabeere g'omukazi, agonkwa
 omwana akiri muto. Amashereka gabuzire, ahabwa nyina kurwara amabeere.
amashobe [amashóbe] z. Amazi* g'enjangu. Yaashanga amashobe omu buro
 bwe.
amashookorindo [amashookorindo] z. Amazi* g'ebinyonyi eby'omu kishaka,
 ebirikwombeka ebyashuri omu miti. Yaija arengyeirwe amashookorindo omu
 mutwe. gyer: AMATOTORO.
amashoro [amashoro] z. Obuhonzi obureebeka aha butanta bw'amaisho
 g'abantu abamwe. Yeragaze amashoro aha maisho.
amashununu [amashúnunu] z. Amate g'ente agaaruga kukamwa, agakirikutagata.
 Amashununu ganurira abarikugakunda.
amashurubu [amashurubu] z. Endwara erikukwata omuntu akazimba aha nsinsi
 y'okutu. Muhara wangye arwaire amashurubu.
amashushane [amashusháne] z. Ebintu ebirikushushana omu ndeebeka nari
 omu bigambo. Omutanga n'eryozi n'amashushane.
amashuuma1 [amashuuma] z. Omwanya gw'okuruga ahaiguru, kuza ahansi.
amashuuma2 [amashuuma] y. Ekicweka ky'ensi kya buryo y'oburugwa-izooba.
 Azania (South Africa) neeshangwa omu mashuuma ga Afirika.
amashuyo [amashuyo] z. 1) Enyama y'aha ntsintsi y'okutu, namunonga omu
 njangu. Aine amashuyo nk'aga ishe. koz: KI. 2) Endwara y'ente namunonga
 emitavu erikureetwa okurumwa engoha; erikugireetera kuzimba enturugunyu
 aha ngingo z'omubiri gwayo. Emitavu ye erwaire amashuyo
 ahabw'obutoogibwa nari kusiigwa omubazi gw'engoha. 3) Endwara
 y'okuzimba amashuyo. Arwaire amashuyo, nikyo ayesiigiire enziro
 z'enyungu aha matama. gyer: AMASHAMBANGIRA.
amasira [amasira] z. reb: AMATSIRA
amasoosi [amasóòsi] z. 1) Amaizi g'ebitakuri, agakwatira aha ntango
 y'enyungu; ebitakuri ebigahererukamu binura nk'ebisiigirwe obwoki.
 Mwijukye kumbiikira ebitakuri by'amasoosi. 2) Amasira. koz: kikoresibwa
 abantu bamwe.
amasya1 [amásya] z. Ebironda ebireetwa okwokibwa ekintu kirikwotsya,
 nk'amaizi nari omuriro.
amasya2 [amasya] z. Obukoome bukye obutabirwa omu kishaka kitahingirwe,
 bukabyarwamu entetera nari emiti; reero ekishaka kikaija kuhingwa
 bwanyima, entetera zaatandikire kuranda. Ohinge gye nooyetonda, otatema
 entetera zangye ezi mpingire omu masya.
amasyosyo [amasyosyo] z. km: emisyoko. 1) Amaizi garikwokyeza kimwe.
 Amasyosyo nigo gaamwokize. 2) Orufuzi nari amaizi, agaija omu kanwa
 ahabw'ekyetengo ky'okurya, namunonga waareeba ondi naarya eky'okurya
 eki orikukunda.
amataane [amatáàne] z. Omwanya ogu emihanda erikubuganiraho. Emotoka
 zaatomeranira aha mataane.
amataasho [amataasho] z. Ahantu aharikugiibwa bwesherekye kukora
 ebitahikire. Osiibire nkahi? Naaronda ow'okumpa amaizi yaabura, garuka
 omu mataasho gaawe.
amatahaanure [amatahaanure] z. Amaizi agatoorwa aha nyungu omugoyi
 yaareeba gari maingi, garikubaasa kutotsa oburo. Irirayo amatahaanure
 gatakwotsya mwana 'we.
amatanga [amatanga] z. reb: EBITANGA
amate [amáte] z. RT: amata. 1) Eky'okunywa kirikwera ekirikuruga omu
 muhako gw'enyamaishwa, nk'ente. Nyina ku yaafiire, yaakurira aha mate.
 2) Amaizi garikwera agaruga omu bimera, nk'ekitooma. Amate g'oruyenje
 gaamugwa omu riisho.
amateere [amateere] z. 1) Amakoome. Ente ze zikatabagura amateere
 gangye. 2) Ebihingwa ebihingirwe n'ebindi omu musiri gumwe.
 3) Amatsinde gaconyirwe.
amategyengyere [amategyengyére] z. Obujuma burikwera aha mutegyengyere.
 gyer: OMUTEGYENGYERE.
amatemba1 [amatemba] z. Ekicweka ky'ensi kya bumosho y'oburugwa-izooba.
 RT: amatemba.
amatemba1 [amatemba] z. Omwanya gw'okuruga ahansi, kuza ahaiguru;
 okutungama; okunyegyera. Amatemba tigarema, harema amatemburuka. RT:
 amatemba.
amatembane [amatembáne] z. Abaana abarikuzaarwa okurugiirira omu kuteerana
 kw'abanyabuzaare nk'omwojo na munyaanya, nari omu nyamaishwa enimi na
 nyinayo.
amatembezo [amatembezo] z. Omuhanda ogwombekyeise, nk'amatafaari nari
 ebyoma, kutemberaho nari kutemburukiraho. Waaba nooshuuma amatembezo,
 oyeetware otahirima. RT: itembezo. gyer: AMADAARA. bm: [eitembezo].
amaterekyero [amaterekyero] z. Omwanya gw'okubiikamu ebintu,
 gukoreirweho obuntu bugyerekaine. Ebigiiko obirondere aha materekyero.
amatobo [amatobo] z. Amabara mahango, geebumburikire agarikuba gari aha
 kintu, nk'embuzi nari ente. Embuzi ye eine amatobo ga mutare.
amatojo [amatojo] z. reb: EBITOJO
amatone [amatóne] z. Amabara maingi agari aha nyamaishwa. Emondo eine
 amatone garikwenda kushusha nk'ag'orunyamatone. koz: KI. RT: amatone.
 km: amatono.
amatono [amatóno] z. reb: AMATONE koz: NK. km: amatone.
amatonto [amatonto] z. reb: AMATOOTO koz: NK.
amatontori [amatontori] z. reb: AMATOOTORO
amatooto [amatooto] z. reb: AMATOTORO koz: KI.
amatootoro [amatóótoro] z. Amazi* g'ebinyonyi nk'enkoko. Amatootoro gaine
 orwezo rurungi. reb: AMASHOKORINDO; OKUTOTORA koz: NK. km: amatonto;
 amatontori; amatooto.
amatsiko [amatsiko] z. Obwesigye bw'okutunga nari kureeba eki otuura
 nooyetenga. Nyine amatsiko ngu niinyija kuheza kwombeka egi nju, omu
 Kwamukaaga ogu mwaka.
amatsinde [amatsînde] z. Ahantu ahabanjwirwe ahabw'okweteekateekyera
 kubyaramu embibo. Akahinga amatsinde gaagwayo. Amatsinde gangye ninza
 kugatabiramu emondi.
amatsira [amatsira] z. Ebintu birikumaatiira ebishangwa omu maizi nari
 omu mate g'ebiti agajwire, gakooma, obundi gakaba gaine akanuzi. reb:
 AMASOOSI 2)
amatu g'abakaikuru [amatu g'abakáíkuru] z. Ebintu ebiri omu ruganda
 rw'ebijegye, ebimera aha bitsintsi by'ebiti ebirikujunda. km: emisino
 y'abakaikuru.
amatungo [amatûngo] z. Enyamaishwa ezi batunga omu maka, nk'ente,
 embuzi, entaama, n'ebindi. Amatungo gaawe gaanyoneire emisiri, ija
 oreebe oku gagigizire; gatsigire gaahakuunuuza!
amatwengye [amatwéngye] z. Amashemererwa agu ogira omu mutima, okamwenya
 munonga. Omukaikuru ku yaareebire omukaamwana, yaagira amatwengye.
amayangi [amayangi] z. 1) Abaana b'amahasha, bombi b'aboojo nari bombi
 b'abaishiki. 2) Ekikubyo eki beeta empasha, omuri egyo ka mwaba
 mwazizaireho. Muka Karwemera ogwo azaire ki? Agarukire yaazaara
 amayangi. 3) Ebintu biri hamwe birikureebeka gye, nk'abantu baingi
 bajwaire ebirikushushana. Ebijwaro by'abaana b'eishomero abo
 byabareebekyesa nk'amayangi.
amayasha [amayásha] z. reb: EIYASHA bm: [eiyasha].
amayengo1 [amayengo] z. (endeebeka erikushushana) obugongo n'obuhita
 ebirikureebeka omu bunyaatsi bw'eyojwa nari omu maizi; nk'enyanja byaba
 nibihuuhwa omuyaga; ebigonzi. Amayengo g'omu nyanja Rwitanzigye ni
 maingi munonga.
amayengo2 [amayengo] z. Emireebekyere y'eishokye erihotsirwe, eriinemu
 nk'amateere g'ebitakuri, obugongo n'obuhita. Eishokye rye yaaritamu
 amayengo.
amayenje [amayenje] z. Amabara g'ente garikwera, gabugire omubiri gwayo
 gwona. Ente z'amayenje nizindeebekyera gye.
amayombera [amayombera] z. Obwoma butari bw'omuringo gumwe bufumwirwemu
 ebifumuka by'okurabyamu amashumi g'oruhu, omu kuhimbya ekizino. Bakaba
 baine ekizino kirikwetwa, "Oije ogurire abaana amayombera."
amayonza [amayónza] z. Ebijuma by'omuyonza. Abaana baaza omu kishaka,
 baareeta amayonza g'okurya. km: enyonza. bm: [eiyonza].
amazi* [amázi] z. Ebintu ebishohorezibwa omu nio* omu bantu
 n'enyamaishwa ebirikukomooka omu by'okurya. Yeetware otaribata amazi.
 reb: AMAFAKUBI RT: amazi.
amaziga [amazíga] z. Amaizi agaruga omu maisho g'omuntu yaaba naarira,
 yaasheka munonga nari aine ekyamukora omu riisho. Yaaba aine amaziga
 omu maisho. koz: NK. RT: amaziga. km: emiziga.
amaziika1 [amaziika] z. Obunaku obu bateeramu omufu omu kiina.
 Nkamuheruuka aha maziika ga ishe.
amaziika2 [amaziika] z. Ebintu nari sente ebirikuheebwa aha rufu. Esente
 z'amaziika baashorooza nyingi.
amazima [amazima] z. Ebintu ebi waagamba ebihikire, ebitarimu kubeiha.
 Yaagamba amazima, omuramuzi yaamutuubiza aha kiheneso. fum: Amazima
 tigaitirwa maisho. Ekishuba kiimuka kare, amazima gakitangayo.
amazimoora [amazimoora] z. Amabara agarikushusha emihirizi, agarikushangwa
 omu ntegye, emikono, n'ebindi bicweka, namunonga omu bakazi. Aine
 amazimoora maingi omu ntegye.
amazimwe [amazímwe] z. Ebigambo by'okwetomboiterana, ebirimu
 okwijutsyana ebyahweire kare. Nyowe ka mpuname, tindikwenda kuteera
 mazimwe.
amazomba [amazomba] z. Endwara erikureetera omubiri kugira amabara nari
 amatone. Arwaire amazomba aha maisho. RT: amazomba.
ameehangye [ameehángye] z. Amaryo g'okwehanga kukora ekintu ekikurengire
 kandi otarikukibaasa. Omwana ogwo aine ameehangye. fum: Ameehangye
 gakaita kanyaamunyu. Ameehangye gainaza: Ntakirwa atema eminyaara.
ameera [améèra] z. Amaizi g'enyanja, agari omu mwanya oguri okuzimu
 munonga. Yaarohamira aha meera, tarikwija kujabuka juba.
amoogi [amóògi] z. Embaju ibiri z'ekintu ky'obwogi. Ekihompo kyangye,
 kiine amoogi abiri.
amooshe [amóòshe] z. reb: OBWOSHE
amooya [amooya] z. reb: ERYOYA bm: [eryoya].
arifu [arifu] z. bg: [za-arifu]. 1) Enyuguta ezihandiikwa omu rurimi,
 nka a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i, j, k, l, m, n, o, p, r, s, t, u, v, w,
 y, z. 2) Akatabo akarikwegyesa enkoresa y'enyuguta n'empandiika
 y'ebigambo. Kare hakaba hariho obutabo bwa arifu.
ashwihi [ashwíhi] p. reb: AWIHi koz: KI.
ashwiriri [ashwíriri] p. Ekigambo ekirikukoresibwa kuhakana ekintu
 ekyakugambwaho. Akagira ati: "Ashwiriri, nyowe tiinye naabigambire".
 koz: KI.
awihi [awíhi] p. Ekigambo ekirikukoresibwa kworeka okwanga ekintu eki
 waagambirwa. Awihi, nyowe tindikuzayo. koz: KI.
awiiriri [awííriri] p. reb: AWIHI koz: KI. km: ashwihi.
ayaayaaya [áyaayaaya] t. Ekigambo ekikoresibwa omu kutangaarira ekintu
 ekyareebwa nari ekyahurirwa. Ayaayaaya, eki kinuuko omuntu aha kiraba
 hi!

 B - b

b [bá] z. Enyuguta ya kabiri omu nyuguta za arifu.
baa [báá] z. Eiraka nk'ery'okujuga kw'entaama.
baaburangahi [baaburangáhi] y. Ekikubyo ky'omuntu orikukunda kutaaha
 obugyenyi, n'obu barikuba batamwetsire. Ogu muntu ka ni baaburangahi,
 na kunu yaahikireyo! bg: [baabaaburangahi].
baamushinja [baamushînja] z. reb: KAREEBI km: mushinja.
baamwana [baamwâna] z. Eiziina eri abazaire b'omuukazi nari omushaija
 abashweraine beetana. Ninza kureeba baamwana wangye, arwaire. koz: KI.
baasi1 [báási] t. Ekigambo ekikoresibwa omuntu yaaba naatangaara,
 naikiriza nari naayetomboita. Baamuteera baasi! Kare baasi! Yebare
 kunyima eby'okurya.
baasi2 [bbáàsi] z. Ekimotoka kihango ky'okutwara abantu. Twagyendera
 omu baasi obu twaba nituza Kabaare. kom: [< Rung. Bus].
baatatenkuriitwe [baatatenkuriitwe] z. Abazaire baitu abaabandize.
 Baatatenkuriitwe bakaba bari emanzi.
baaziina [baazíína] z. Omuntu ou eiziiina rye, ririkushushana n'eryawe.
 Naareeba baazina, ka nze kumuramutsya. koz: KI. bg: [baabaaziina].
bagonzire [bagonzire] z. Enkoni egondekyeirwe aha ifundo, nainga
 eboneziibwe kuruga omu kiti ekikwirwe n'emizi yaakyo, kikacurikwa,
 emizi ekagaruka ahaiguru ekooma egondami. Abakwe boona baaba baine
 bagonzire. bg: [zaabagonzire].
Bagyendanwa [bagyendánwa] z. Engoma ei omugabe wa Nkore, yaabaire
 ateeraho omurisyo naayema. Bashangire Bagyendanwa efumukire. gyer:
 KABEMBURA.
bagyenzi1 [bagyênzi] y. Abantu abu orikuhurizana nabo. Bagyenzi bangye
 bampemukireho, baanyaga.
bagyenzi2 [bagyênzi] t. Nikikoresibwa omu muringo gw'okwehanangiriza
 n'obucureezi, owaashaazya. Hoona bagyenzi, tomureka akarabaho!
bahungu [bahûngu] z. Obwoya oburambiire bukiizi, oburi aharuguru
 y'ebitsigye by'omuntu.
baibanye [baibánye] z. Ekigambo ekikoresibwa omukazi kumanyisa abaramu.
 Ku yaanteire naahungira omuri baibanye.
baitu [báìtu] sh. 1) Ekigambo ekirikunywanisa ekyaruga kugambwa,
 n'ekirikugamba obubi nari oburungi aharikyo. Tukukorera, baitu tosiima.
 Omurimo ni mukye, baitu ni murungi. 2) Ekigambo ekibandiza
 ebikirikushuminkanisa. Baitu n'obu twaija aha, haine ekyatwebayo.
 3) Obundi nikishuminkanisa ekirikumanywa (kwonka ekitaagwambwa),
 n'ekirikukigambaho. Baitu ka wankabya. gyer: KWONKA2.
bakihuuta [bakihúúta] y. Omuntu omunyabishuba nari ow'orugambo. Ogambe
 nootsigira enda, obu ari aho ni bakihuuta, nikirara kibugire ekyaro.
 gyer: KITANDAARAMU. bg: [baabakihuuta].
bambe [bâmbe] t. Akagambo akarikukoresibwa omu kusaasira ori omu
 buremeezi. Bambe ka mureebire n'omurwaire! km: bambi.
bana [bana] z. Omuzaano oguzaanwa embaju ibiri z'abantu barikuhayahayanira
 akati, orubaju orumwe nirukarinda, orundi niruteeraho kukaiba. Baasiiba
 nibazaana bana, ryarenga.
bantu 'mwe1 [bantu 'mwé] t. Ebigambo ebirikukoresibwa omu kutangaara
 ahabw'eki waareeba nari waahurira. Bantu 'mwe, mwareeba ekiteta ku
 kyagwitsa akagwe; kuhamba omwana!
bantu 'mwe2 [bantu 'mwé] p. Ekigambo kirikworeka emicwe y'obuntu aha
 bu orikugamba nabo. Imwe bantu 'mwe timwaruha, timuhinguuka?
baro [báro] z. Omushaija okushweire (waaba ori omukazi). Baro yaaruga aha
 naakuronda. reb: IBANYI RT: baro. bg: [baabaro].
barukingirebata [barukingirebáta] kb. Ekigambo ekikoresibwa kutsintsina
 encugura*. Nyekiro obu ntatwairwe barukingirebata, ninza kukira. [ebik:
 Kikomooka aha ncugura* y'omugyenyi, otarikumanya oku araigure orwigi
 kuza eishaazi.]
batu [bátu] p. 1) Eiraka rihango eririkuhurirwa omuntu yaateera mugyenzi
 we oruhi ruhango, nk'orw'aha kibunu. Bakamuteera, ngu: batu.
 2) Ekigambo ekirikushoboorora emiimukire y'ahonaaho. Enduuru ku
 yaagambire, twareeba yaabatuka, ati: batu! Yairukanga titwagaruka
 kumubona.
batu-batu [batu-bátu] p. Ekigambo ekirikushoboorora omuringo gw'okugyenda
 enkuratane, omwe aha ndiijo, bwanyima y'omwanya mukye. Twareeba
 baabatabatuka, bati batu-batu, twabazibira baazira, baayanga kushutama.
bigahwa [bigáhwa] p. Omubaro mukye gw'ekintu. Itwe twakyerererwa;
 twashangaho bigahwa, twafa kutwarirayo.
Bigo bya Mugyenyi [Bigo bya Mugyenyi] z. Omwanya ogu barikuteekateeka
 ngu gukaba guri embuga nkuru y'Abacwezi. Nigushangwa omuri Masaka.
Biheeko [biheeko] z. Emwe aha mandwa. Biheeko niyo yaamwitsire. [ebik:
 Ekaba neemanywa abantu b'omuri Rwanda kuhitsya haihi n'enyanja ya
 Bunyonyi, nk'emandwa y'orugamba.]
biika-oguze [biika-oguze] z. Eiziina ry'ekibiina ky'abarikurundaanira
 hamwe esente zaabo, bwanyima bakazeeguza kuzikoresa, bakazigarurayo
 bongyeiremu enshaagi. Akaiha sente omuri zaabiika-oguze. bg: [zaabiika-
 oguze].
biizi-bitootsya [biizi-bitóòtsya] z. Ekikubyo ky'enyama y'entaama,
 ahabw'amaizi gaayo kuhora juba. Mpitsya biizi-bitootsya egyo n'oburo,
 tureebane.
bijumeero [bijumééro] z. Ekirembeserezo ky'okuhunamisa omwana orikurira.
 Yehunamire bijumeero bya nyinomwana.
binkwatiireki [binkwatiireki] y. Ekikubyo ky'orikunagaijura ebintu
 by'omugasho, okashanga atabyetaireho. Ogu mushaija ni binkwatiireki.
 reb: BYAFANDIMU RT: binkwatiireki. bg: [baabinkwatiireki].
binzaari [binzaari] y. reb: KINEKYE
biri [bíri] sh. Ekigambo ekikoresibwa omuntu yaaba naayenda kuhamya eki
 yaagambiirwe nari eki yaagambirwa. Biri obu yaabaire nandaga, akaba
 naayenda kuzayo?
birindi [birîndi] y. Ekikubyo ky'omuntu osinzire munonga. Aganywereire
 aha baara, yaataaha yaabaire birindi.
biringanya [biringánya] z. bg: [zaabiringanya]. 1) Ekihingwa kirikwenda
 kushusha entura nainga entonga, ky'ebijuma by'eibara rya kakobe, biri
 nk'endembe, birikuriibwa nk'emboga. 2) Ebijuma by'ekimera ekyo.
Biruuru [Birúúru] z. Okwezi Kwokubanza.
bishasha [bishásha] z. Kimwe aha bicweka by'enyamaishwa endiibwa,
 ekitwarwa omuhuhuzi wa kabiri, abahiigi baaba nibabagana ebiteero.
bishuba [bishúba] z. Akatwe k'orurimi.
bisonabiso [bisónabiso] p. Ira na ira. Obwa bisonabiso hakaba hariho
 omushaija aine enshongo.
bitunta [bitunta] z. Endwara y'ente erikugikwata ekazimba. Ente ye
 ekaitwa bitunta. reb: KOOTO
bituri-bingi [bituri-bîngi] z. Ekikwato ekirikwejunisibwa omu kukanika
 egaari, kiine ebifumuka bingi bitarikwingana. Egaari yaagishumikisa
 bituri-bingi. bg: [zaabituri-bingi].
bo [bo] s. 1) Entsigwa enyetwara, ey'omuntu wa kashatu, omu bwingi. Ku
 waababuuza, bo baagarukamu bata? 2) Entsigwa empamisiriza, ey'omuntu wa
 kashatu, omu bwingi. Nibo baamutwara?
bogoya [bbogoya] z. Ekika ky'emitumba erikwana ekitookye ky'eminwa
 mihango miraingwa erikuriibwa nk'eminekye. km: mbogoya. bg: [bogoya,
 zaabogoya].
bonshatu [bónshátu] y. Abantu bashatu bari hamwe, hatagizire owaarugaho.
 Bonshatu baza kutaha amaizi.
booteboote [booteboote] y. reb: EBOOTE km: eboote.
bucece [bucece] p. Okugyenda bucece: Okukora nari kugyenda mpora
 otarikuteera mutsindo. Omushuma akaija bucece, twashanga atwemereire

bucura [bucura] z. reb: BUCURACURIRO km: bucuracuriro. bg:
 [baabucura].
bucuracuriro [bucuracuriro] z. Omwana w'aha muheru omu kuzaarwa. Owaitu
 niinye bucuracuriro. reb: MACURA; MACURANDA bg: [baabucuracuriro].
bucuranda [bucuranda] z. reb: BUCURACURIRO bg: [baabucuranda].
bucwekye [bucwêkye] p. Omuntu nari ekintu kufeerwa abaana boona
 kikatsigara kyefumbatsi. Akafa bucwekye.
bufuuni [bufúúni] p. Okwecwa bufuuni na buhoro: Okakoresa ebi oine omu
 bukye bwabyo n'ekigyendererwa ky'okwetunguura. koz: amakuru
 g'omuguutuuro.
bufuuzi [bufúùzi] z. reb: OBUFUUZI fum: Bufuuzi teita.
bugango [bugângo] y. 1) Omuringo ogu omuntu nari enyamaishwa
 erikushangwamu efiire, egangaire. Egyo nte turaire nitugironda; mbwenu
 twashanga eri bugango. 2) Ekintu kihango, nk'ente nari omuntu, yaaba
 aine amaani maingi kandi ari muhango munonga.
bugaye [bugaye] z. Omuringo gw'okutaha bandi eibanga nari ekitiinisa.
 Kuntwarira ebintu ntabikuhaire, egi ti bugaye! km: obugayane.
bugigi [bugígi] z. Bugyeme; kukora ekintu kigumire, oteekundiire.
 Hoona egi ti bugigi; eri itaka nindihinga omu shaaha emwe?
bugingo [bugíngo] z. Omuheru gw'amagara. Haihi buri mubazi ogu baine,
 bagumpaire oburwaire bwarema; ningira ngu egi ni bugingo empikiire.
 fum: Ti bwa nsi kuguma ni bugingo ehweire.
bugubugu [búgubugu] y.
 — p. 1) Okukora omurimo noorahukiiriza otafiireyo kuhamya yaaba
 gwakorwa gye. Baija baganzire, eby'okurya baabiteeka bugubugu.
 2) Okwaka kw'omuriro gurikunaga endimi. fum: Bugubugu ti muriro.
 Bugubugu tezaaza mwojo. Bugubugu etoroozya: etwarira ira ezaara
 oguhikire.
bugyeme [bugyeme] p. Okukora ekintu otekundiire. Yaaza kuhingira ahari
 bugyeme.
buheekwa [buhéèkwa] y. Ekikubyo ky'omuhwanshoni, enteekurani. N'omukazi,
 ni buheekwa! Obu yaatandika hati, nikimuseeseraho.
 okureeta buheekwa gut. Okutongana munonga kumara omwanya muraingwa. Ku
 yaahikaho yaareeta buheekwa.
buhungu [buhûngu] p. Okutwaza nk'ekihungu. Ogwo mwishiki orikuguruka
 buhungu, ebyo ku arishwerwa aryabukaara?
bujinja [bujinja] z. reb: NKURUGUTU
bujwa1 [bujwa] z. Eibara eririkwenda kushushana n'orwamba. Omu mabara,
 bujwa, kinyaatsi na kakobe; nyowe nkunda bujwa.
bujwa2 [bujwa] y. Enshusha y'ekintu ekiine ibara eryo. Yaaba
 ayeshubikire omwenda gwa bujwa.
bukabuka [bukabuka] z. Akashaka k'oburabyo bwinemu akagaju kakyekakye.
 Aba ira bakaba bakakoresa kwomoora obuhuta.
bukara [bukára] z. 1) Ekiti ky'omubazi gw'okutamba omunda
 n'obuhendeki. Omubungi akahinga bukara ahakwe. 2) Akabaare
 karikwiragura akakoresibwa kurumuura obushegu, nk'obw'enjoka n'embwa,
 zishazire. Okantiiza bukara yaawe, nza kurumuura muhara wangye
 owaarumwa embwa?
bukiizi [bukiizi] z. Ahakiikami kugaruka buryo nari bumosho; aha kuri
 omumaisho haaba heemereire.
bukondo [bukondo] z. Empare ndaingwa erikuhika aha bugombamburi.
 Bakamujweka bukondo yaagyenda naagiribatira. bg: [bukondo, zaabukondo].
bukunya [bukúnya] p. reb: BUKUNYU
bukunyu [bukúnyu] p. 1) Okugambira omuntu kabukunyukye. Yaamugambira
 bukunyu. 2) Okutumbuza; okujwara busha. Amuteire yaamucwanyagurira
 ebijwaro aha mubiri, yaamutsiga bukunyu.
bukuru [bukúru] p. Amagara g'emyaka mingi y'ekintu. Arwariire omu
 magingo ga bukuru yagumizamu yaafa. Otamucwera orubanja, bukuru niyo
 ekimukoreise. fum: Bukuru ehinya omugongo.
bumosho [bumosho] z. Orubaju rw'omukono gw'emosho. Omutabani yaaba
 ashutami aha rubaju rwa bumosho. RT: bumosho.
bundi-nyamaishwa [bundi-nyamaishwa] p. (Okutwaza) nk'enyamaishwa.
 Eby'okurya naabirya bundi-nyamaishwa.
bunyoga [bunyôga] y. Amara amakye. Yaatugurira amara ga bunyoga gonka.
 bg: [bunyoga, zaabunyoga].
burahanda [burahanda] z. Obugaati nari obubanda obu bakora omu minekye
 n'esaano ya muhogo. Otugurire burahanda omu katare. koz: KI. bg:
 [burahanda, zaaburahanda].
burangiti [burángiti] z. Kimwe aha byeshweko ekiine omukoba muhango
 n'ebyoya. Burangiti yaabo ekuriire kimwe, yaahwaho. RT: eburangiti. bg:
 [burangiti, zaaburangiti].
buri1 [buri] y. Kyona kyona ekirikugambwaho. Buri muntu aine
 kweshashurira, kubona kutaahamu. Buri ka omu kirorero kyaitu ereete
 amatafaari g'okwombekyesa rwebisingo.
buri2 [buri] p. Ekigambo ekirikumanyisa amagingo nari obunaku
 obwahingwire. Buri obu ondeebire, mbaire ninza Kinyaasaano.
buriijo [buriijo] p. Obutoosha. RT: buriijo.
buriizooba [buriizooba] p. Okukuratanisa amazooba hatariho kwosha. Omukozi
 wangye naija aha buriizooba.
burikooti [burikooti] z. Omuti ogu ebishushu byagwo bikoresibwa kuhindura
 empu, nk'ez'okukoramu enkaito. Gurugwamu n'amakara marungi g'okuhemba.
buriya [buríya] p. Obunaku obwahingwire, obu kigamba na kigambirwa
 barikumanya. Buriya tukakweta waayanga kwija.
burongo [burongo] z. reb: BURONGYERO bg: [burongo, zaaburongo].
burongyero [burongyero] z. Omwina gwa hare munonga ahu efukuzi
 erikweshereka. Efukuzi baagishanga burongyero. km: burongo; karongyero.
buroro [burôro] p. Okunyeeta buroro: Okukura otaine kihabura, okabura
 eki waamanya. Ogu mwana akanyeeta buroro; hoona yaaremwa n'okweyogyeza
 emyenda?
burundu [burundu] p. Okuguza nari okutwara ekintu kyona otatsigyeho.
 Eitaka rye ryona akariguza burundu.
burungi-bwansi [burungi-bwánsi] z. Emirimo erikukorwa kyeyendere,
 ahabw'oburungi bw'abatuuzi b'omu mwanya nari ekyaro ekyo;
 nk'okuharagata omuhanda, n'ebindi. Ka naahurira enzamba ya burungi-
 bwansi, yaagambira hi?
buryo [búryo] z. Omwanya ogurikugaruka ei omukono gw'endyo guri.
 Huumura torikuhaba, ku oraahingure aha ishomero eriri aha biso aho,
 okiikame ahari buryo, nooranzya enju eshakairwe amategura; haza niyo
 egyo.
busha [busha] z. 1) Ekintu ekitaine muhendo nari omugasho. Abaana abu
 yaazaire boona bakamurugiramu busha. 2) Akantu kakye munonga. gut:
 'Busha bwa busha. Busha bw'aha kikungu.'.
bushaato [bushaato] z. reb: BUSHANSHA bg: [bushaato, zaabushaato].
bushansha [bushânsha] z. Abandi bagyeta akanyabusha, bushaato; ekicweka
 ky'ebyenda by'enyamaishwa ekiri nk'ekishansha, kiine obushengye omunda
 buri nk'empapura, haza kirimu amasha. Omubaagi taroogize gye bushansha,
 obushengye obumwe bukatsigaramu amasha. gyer: AKANYABUSHA. bg:
 [bushansha, zaabushansha].
bushashara [bushashara] p. Enduka y'okutahikaanisa ebyarukisibwa. Eki
 kiibo kyaba kirukirwe gye; kyaitwa kurukwa bushashara.
bushoberwa [bushoberwa] z. Ekintu ekirikukukozesa eki otakunzire. km:
 kashoberwa. fum: Bushoberwa ekushweza ka-mbe-Nkwine.
busya [busya] p. (Okugaruka kukora omurimo) nk'oku gwakozirwe aha
 murundi gw'okubanza. Ekyombeko bakihundwize, kyagaruka busya.
butaamosho [butáámosho] z. reb: KITAAMOSHO
butandu [butándu] z. Ekintu kibi ekirikubaho kiteeteekateekirwe,
 kikareetaho okusiisikara, okuhutaara, okufa, n'ebindi. Barikuruga omu
 kiro kikuru, bakatunga butandu abantu baingi baafa. RT: butandu. bg:
 [butandu, zaabutandu].
butatara [butatara] y. Okwijura enda, ekashusha omuguta. Ariire ebihimba
 n'ebitakuri enda yaamuraara eri butatara.
butida [butida] z. reb: KAATURI RT: butida. bg: [butida, zaabutida].
buto [búto] p. (Okukora) nk'omuntu w'emyaka mikye. Kyatandikwa buto.
butsimba [busimba] p. Bwemi; hatariho kukiikama, kuhengama. Egyo nyomyo
 ya kashatu gihenguure, eyemerere butsimba. RT: busimba.
butugu [butúgu] z. 1) Akajoka kakye kagufu; kaine omutwe muhango
 n'obushegu bw'amaani. Orareebireho enjoka erikwetwa butugu? 2) Akatunda-
 bwigutsi.
butundu [butûndu] z. reb: BUTUGU koz: KI.
butunu [butunu] p. 1) Ekintu kukorwa kitasherekirwe, kirikureebwa
 boona. 2) Okureebana maisho na maisho. Naamugambira butunu,
 yaabwerabwera. gyer: ORWATU.
butwe na burega [butwe na burega] gut. Ebintu ebyabaireho kare munonga.
 Otatwijutsya ebya butwe na burega.
butwe-bwa-ntaama [butwe-bwa-ntaama] p. Okushengurana, nk'emirwanire
 y'entaama. Emotoka zaashengurana butwe-bwa-ntaama, abantu baingi
 baafeeramu.
buzima [buzima] p. Ekigambo ky'okuhamya ebyagambwa nari ebirikuza
 kugambwa. Buzima torikubeiha, niwe yaahoma enju.
bwaga [bwâga] z. Amate g'amacunda nari amakamo, agoosireho omu kirere
 gateekire. Abaana be nibakunda kunywa bwaga.
bwahara [bwahara] y. Ekintu kihango munonga. Hakaija bwahara bw'enumi,
 twahunga.
bwahwayo [bwahwayo] p. Okugamba byona, hataine ekyatsintsinwa. Yaagamba
 bwahwayo, abamwe baayekwata ahamaisho.
bwangye-mburye [bwangye-mburye] y. 1) Omuringo gw'okuha omuntu ekintu
 otakimuhaire. Eby'okurya byo yaabimpa kwonka yaabimpeera ahari bwangye-
 mburye. 2) Omuze gw'okukora ekintu otarikufayo, orikushushwa oti
 bakugyemire, hataine eki bikukwatiire. Yaabikora bwangye-mburye.
bwanyima [bwanyima] p. Omuheru gw'amagingo g'ekintu ekyagambwaho.
 Bwanyima y'okumusiibuura, omurwaire akahika omuka yaaremba. RT:
 hanyuma.
bwara [bwara] z. Ekishaka kiine amahwa, nikyenda kushushana
 omukwatangwe. Omu bishushu byakyo kiinemu amaizi garikurendemuka.
bwasheesha [bwásheesha] p. Eizooba nari ekiro ekirikukurata nyenkyakare.
 Nyokoromi atumire ngu naakuzindukira bwasheesha. koz: KI.
bwataho [bwataho] p. Ekiro ekirikukurata bwasheesha. Bwataho, turyaba
 nitukora burungi-bwansi.
bwehereere [bwéhereere] p. (Ekintu kwikara) kwikara kitaine ekikiri aha
 rubaju. Ka waashutama bwehereere, hariho ki.
bwemi [bwemi] p. 1) (Ekintu kwemerera) butsimba, kugaruka ahaiguru.
 Omuti gukura bwemi; enteija eranda ahansi. 2) Okukora ekintu
 oyemereire, otashutami. Yaija aine obwira, naamuha obushera, yaabunywa
 bwemi, yaagyenda.
bwere [bwere] p. Okugambira omuntu butunu, nari kukora ekintu
 obutatsigaho. Twamugambira bwere, titwamushereka.
bwesherekye [bwesherékye] p. Emigirire n'emikorere y'okwehereera,
 y'okutenda kureebwa nari kuhurirwa abandi bantu. Enkomba akagishigisha
 bwesherekye, twaija kumumanyira aha yaabaire emwesiigire aha itama.
bwino [bwîno] z. RT: bwino. kom: [< Rsh. bwino]. 1) Ebintu biri
 nk'amaizi by'amabara gatarikushushana, ebirikukoresibwa omu kuhandiika.
 Ekaraamu yangye yaahwamu bwino. 2) Obwamushinja: Okugambira omuntu buri
 kimwe ekimukwatsireho. Bakamugambira bwino yoona yaatiina.
bwizi [bwîzi] p. Ekintu kukorwa omu muringo gwanguhi nari n'obwira
 bwingi. Akashozi yaakanywa bwizi.
bwohe [bwohe] z. Emiteekateekyere mibi erikugyema omuntu, ekamuta omu
 nshobi, ekamureetera kuhikwaho akabi. Egi ni bwohe, tarikumanya kuvuga
 obwato naabaasa kurohama.
bwomoomo [bwomoomo] p. Omuringo gw'okwoma munonga kw'ekintu,
 ahabw'okuburwamu amaizi. Yaabiteeka bwomoomo byasiriira. Nsiibire
 bwomoomo tinkahumire maizi.
bwonshatu [bwonshátu] y. Obuntu bushatu bwaba nibugambwaho hamwe. Obugati
 bwonshatu bwona, yaabutwara.
byafa-ndimu [byafa-ndimu] y. reb: BINKWATIIREKI bg: [baabyafa-ndimu].
byombi [byômbi] y. Entsigwa entamarayo, erikugamba aha bintu bibiri.
 Entsigwa egi neehinduka kurugiirira aha kirikuba nikigambwaho eti:
 abakazi bombi
 emiti yombi
 enyindo zombi
 amatama gombi
 obuti bwombi
 otugambo twombi
 engyendo zombi
 amatu gombi
 ahantu hombi
 agataama gombi

 C - c

c [cá] z. Enyuguta ya kashatu omu nyuguta za arifu.
cakacaka [cakacaka] y. Oku omwanya gurikuba guri bwanyima y'enjura
 yaamara kugwa, amaizi gakaterama omu muhanda ogurimu ebinyaatsi.
ce [cé] t. Akagambo akarikumanyisa okuhunama, nk'okuzibira omwana ngu
 ahuname arekye kurira. Gira ce? Ntakareetsire munyaafu.
cee [céé] y. Omuringo ogu ekintu nari omwanya gurikuba gurimu, haaba
 harimu obucureera. Ku baahika omunju abaana boona baagira ngu cee.
 gyer: OKUCECEKA.
co [có] p. Akagambo k'okutangaara, karimu n'okwebuuza ahabw'enki ekintu
 kyaba nk'oku kitashemereire kuba. Co! Owaatsiga yaigurira aga maizi
 n'oha? koz: KI.
coo [cóó] p. Eiraka ry'abahiigi, baaba babingire enyamaishwa. coo coo
 coo. reb: OKUCOOCOOZA
curi [curi] y. Ekigambo ekirikugambwa omu kworeka oku ekintu kyagwa
 nikibanza omutwe ahansi. Ku twaba turi aho tureeba ekikyere kiti: Curi,
 kyaburira omu maizi.
curucuru [curucuru] p. Ekintu kyaba kiine eibara ririkwiragura munonga.
 Omushuma ou twakwatsire akaba nairagura curucuru. reb: SIRISIRI km:
 cuucuucu.
cuucuucu [cuucuucu] p. Ekintu ekirikwiragura munonga. Embuzi neiragura
 cuucuucu. reb: CURUCURU RT: cuucuucu.

 D - d

d [dá] z. Enyuguta ya kana omu nyuguta za arifu.
de [dé] t. Omuringo gw'ekimanyane gw'obugufu bw'ekigambo "reeba".
doodo [doodo] z. Ekimera ekirikukunda kumera omu ntookye n'emisiri;
 amababi gaakyo nigariibwa nk'emboga. Yateeka emboga za doodo nizo
 baarya. RT: doodo. bg: [doodo, zaadoodo].
 Emiringo ya doodo
 - ekinyabaishiki (omuriri)
 - enshanga-mbaganzya
 - enyabutongo
 - kyangwe
 - kacumu

 E - e

e1 [é] z. Enyuguta eya kataano omu nyuguta za arifu.
e2 [é] t. Eiraka erikukoresibwa kuhunamisa orikugamba ngu ahuname,
 ohurire obundi bwaku oburikuruga ahandi. E! Ekyagamba eki ni ki?
e3 [é] t. Eiraka eri omuntu arikushohoza haaba haine ekyamukanga. E!
 Embwa yaaba endiire.
ebaafu [ebaafu] z. Ekintu ekikozirwe omu kipiira, eki boogyezamu
 emyenda nari bakatamu amaizi g'okunaaba. Yaanywa amaizi g'omu baafu.
 RT: ebaafu. bg: [ebaafu, amabaafu].
ebaara [ebbáára] z. Omwanya ogu barikugurizamu n'okunyweramu amaarwa.
 Yaaza aha baara, baamuteererayo. reb: EKIRABO; EINYWERO RT: ebaara. bg:
 [ebaara, amabaara].
ebaasi [ebaasi] y. Rutaaba; ekintu kihango kirikuremeera. Eki
 kifunyika ka n'ebaasi, hoona noogira ngu ninkyeteruza?
ebaaya [ebáàya] z. reb: EBAAYI bg: [ebaaya].
ebaayi [ebáàyi] z. Ebirabyo by'emibimbiri nari emishojwa,
 ebituntumurwa omuyaga byomire. Ab'entaasya nkye, babita omu nshaho
 y'omwenda; bikora nk'omufariso nari omushego. Omufariso gwawe
 gw'ebaayi, okaguta nkahi? km: ebaaya.
ebahaasa [ebbaháàsa] z. Akashaho k'orupapura akateebwamu ebaruha, kugira
 ngu ehikye nyinayo etashomirwe. N'emicwe mibi kukomoorora ebahaasa
 etari yaawe. RT: ebbahaasa. bg: [ebahaasa, amabahaasa].
ebakuri [ebbakúri] z. Ekintu ekyemi nk'eihungu ryemereire,
 eky'okuriiramu nari kunyweramu. RT: ebbakuri. bg: [ebakuri, amabakuri].
ebaraafu [ebarááfu] z. Ekyoma ky'okufukiiriza eby'okunywa, nari
 eby'okurya nk'enyama, kubirindiramu ngu bitasiisikara. Enyama yaagita
 omu baraafu. RT: ebbaraafu. bg: [ebaraafu, zaabaraafu].
ebaraasi [ebaráási] z. Eibara eririkushangwa, aha matu g'enyamaishwa,
 nk'ente, embuzi, n'ebindi. Embuzi ye eine ebaraasi ya mutare.
ebarirwa [ebarirwa] z. reb: EBARUHA koz: omu bantu bakuru. bg:
 [amabarirwa].
ebaruha [ebarúha] z. RT: ebbaruha. km: ebarirwa. bg: [amabaruha].
 1) Orupapura oruhandikirweho ebigambo ebi orikwenda kugambira ogwo ou
 waabihandiikira. Akamuhandiikira ebaruha y'okumweta aha bugyenyi.
 2) Ekihandiiko ekirikworeka omwoga ogu omuntu atendekirwemu. Akaza
 kwega yaija ataine baruha. reb: EBARIRWA
ebendera [ebendéra] z. Omwenda, nari ekindi ekiriho akamanyiso k'eihanga
 nari ekigombe. Ebendera ya Yuganda eine amabara ashatu. RT: ebendera.
 bg: [bendera, zaabendera].
ebibago [ebibágo] z. Ebiti, nk'emingo, ebi barikukoresa kubaga enju
 z'obudongo. Ebibago byangye ebi mbaire ntemire, babiibire. bm:
 [ekibago].
ebibaiziro [ebibaiziro] z. Ebishushu ebiihwa aha muti omu kubaija. Omuriro
 naaguhembesa ebibaiziro.
ebibembe [ebibémbe] z. Endwara y'abantu erikukwata omubiri, ekaita
 enyindo, amatu, enkumu z'engaro n'ebigyere, bikabaasa kucwekaho.
ebibindiso [ebibindiso] z. Ebintu, nk'obwenda n'ebindi, ebikoresibwa
 abakazi kuzibira eshagama kushiisha ebijwaro baaba bari omu kwezi.
 Naayebwayo ebibindiso byangye, waaba oine ebi oineho, bimpe.
ebiboogi [ebiboogi] z. Amashereka agu omwana agarura yaamara kwonka
 yaaba aigutsire nainga baamucundagura. Omu ngozi harimu ebiboogi
 by'omwana. gyer: OMUGUMA.
ebibuuzo [ebibúùzo] z. gyer: EKIGYEZO. bm: [ekibuuzo].
ebibwa [ebibwa] z. Ebikooko ebirikubuzya ebinyoro, ebirikukunda ahantu
 hariho omucuucu nk'omu maju amarofa. bm: [ekibwa].
ebicencure [ebicéncure] z. reb: EMICENCURE
ebicoboyo [ebicobóyo] z. Ebihimba nari enkoore z'enkaiga zitakagumize.
 Embeba zitemire ebihimba bye byabaire ebicoboyo. gyer: ORUKAIGA. bm:
 [ekicoboyo].
ebicukwe [ebicúkwe] z. reb: EBINYIGA
ebicurwe [ebicúrwe] z. Ebicwanyagurika nk'eby'ebishushu bya'amashaza
 ebyaihwa ahaiguru yaago omu kwera. Amashaza mugate omu kitukuru,
 ebicurwe mubite omuri rw'ebisingo. reb: EKUMBWE 1)
ebicwanyagurika [ebicwanyaguríka] z. Bimwe aha bicweka by'ekintu
 ekyacwanyagurwa. Yaanyita, yaareeba ekicwanyagurika yaaba nikyo yampa?
 bm: [ekicwanyagurika].
ebicwerenkaniza [ebicwérenkaniza] z. Ebigambo ebirikukoresibwa omu mwanya
 gw'ebyo ebirikwitsa enshoni. Omubazi gw'omu maarwa, gwangambisa
 ebicwerenkaniza.
ebicwererane [ebicwérerane] z. Amabara marungi gasiigirwe gye aha
 kintu, haza gajwangaine. Ekitambi kye kiine ebicwererane birungi.
 Eiguru Ruhanga akaritamu amabara g'ebicwererane.
ebicwetsyo [ebicwêtsyo] z. Omuyonga gw'omu mahega, amakara gaaheza
 kuraara. Omuriro tigurimu, hatsigairemu ebicwetsyo.
ebifunga [ebifûnga] z. bm: [ekifunga]. 1) Ebicweka by'ebigagara nari
 engozi ebikoreirweho, kurabyamu emigamba, kuheeka omurwaire. Ogwo
 mugamba gwaba mukye, mushandikye ebifunga gurekye kwehindura.
 2) Ekifunga ky'engabo ekikwatwa engaro emwe omu kukinga engabo, kurwana
 nainga kwemurika.
ebiga [ebiga] z. Endwara y'amaguru g'embuzi ahabw'okuziseetura
 hakiriho orume. Obwana bw'embuzi ze, burwaire ebiga.
ebigambo [ebigambo] gut. Oburemeezi oburi ahagati y'abantu oburugiriire
 omu kintu ekibaireho. Omurimo ogu gwareeta ebigambo.
ebigasha [ebigasha] z. Ekintu ekitarimu muhoho nari ekitaine mugasho
 gw'amaani omu nkora yaakyo. Baitu ebi bintu byona ka n'ebigasha, ka
 bitarimu makuru.
ebigogo [ebigogo] z. Endwara erikukwata abantu aha maraka bakahurira
 hariho obusaasi bwingi baaza kumira. Arwaire ebigogo.
ebigojo [ebigójo] z. Enyama zituumire aha mubiri ahabw'obugomokye.
 Omwana we aine ebigojo aha mikono. gyer: OMUHIRO 2).
ebigooro [ebigóóro] z. Ebintu ebiruhize eikora ebi orikuzaho okahurira
 ku waahwamu amaani. Hoona mwana wangye, ebyo bigooro ebi wampa ntakiine
 maani, noogira ngu nimbibaasa?
ebigyegyenera [ebigyegyenêra] z. Amaizi agarikugyegyenwa omu by'okurya
 ebiteekire, nk'omutoha gw'ebihimba; omunoino. Ebyo bigyegyenera
 mubibiikye mubihe entaama erwaire.
ebigyene [ebigyéne] p. Okugirirwa kubi okurengyesereize. Hoona shi ku
 naagira ngu atooranemu ebi arikwenda, atsiga yaabizambaguza ebi
 bigyene?
ebihaata [ebiháàta] z. Endwara erikukwata encwamutwe, ekazikuura obwoya
 zikagira ebicweka bimwe bitariho bwoya.
ebihaatira [ebiháátira] z. Ebishushu ebi barikuhaata aha by'okurya,
 nk'emondi, ebitookye, n'ebindi. Ebihaatira mubinagye omu rutookye,
 emondi muzite aha mahega. gyer: EKISHUSHU.
ebihagi [ebihági] z. Amaani agu omuntu arikwereebekyesa, nari agu
 abandi barikumureebekyesa nk'ogaine. Omwana ogwo naayeteera ebihagi
 akora ebi ataakukozire.
ebihande [ebihánde] z. Esaano eseire kubi etanogire munonga. Orubengo
 oru nirusa ebihande. gyer: EBIHERE.
ebihangirwe [ebihangirwe] z. reb: EKIHANGWA bg: [eKihangirwe].
ebihangwa [ebihangwa] z. reb: EKIHANGWA km: ebihangirwe. bg: [ekihangwa].
ebiharagatwa [ebiharagatwa] z. Ebikogoto ebi baaharagata omu nyungu ei
 baagoyamu. Abaana bato nibo bakira kurya ebiharagatwa.
ebiharamuriro [ebiháramuriro] z. Enkuru ndaigwa ezirikubanza kuruga aha
 ruhu baaba nibaruhara. bm: [ekiharamuriro].
ebihembo [ebihêmbo] z. reb: EKIHEMBO bm: [ekihembo].
ebihendo [ebihêndo] z. Ebirenzyo. koz: KI. [ebik: Bihendo n'eiziina
 ry'omuntu.]
ebihere [ebihére] z. Esaano eseire kubi, ehanzire. Ebihere mubihe
 enkoko, obunono tube nibwo twagoya. reb: EBIHANDE
ebihikiirizi [ebihikíírizi] z. Ebigwererezi, nari ebintu bibi
 ebirikuhika aha muntu atabyetegire. Eriigyenda tukagira ebihikiirizi
 bingi; birimu n'okufeerwa mutaahi waitu. bm: [ekihikiirizi].
ebihindiizo [ebihindiizo] z. Empimbi ezaabaire ziteebwa omu irembo
 ahansi, zikagyerekwaho emihingo omu kukinga. Iwe mwana 'we ba otaire
 ebihindiizo omu irembo, emihingo mwije kugigyegyerekaho bwanyima. bm:
 [ekihindiizo].
ebihinzi [ebihinzi] z. reb: EBIMIRA
ebiho [ebiho] z. Ebigambo ebirikugambwa omu iraka rikye eri abandi
 batarikuhurira. Baaba nibagambira omu biho.
ebihonzi [ebihonzi] z. Ebintu birikwera ebishangwa omu maisho waaheza
 kusiimuka nari waaba orwaire amaisho. gut: 'Okugyenda omu maisho
 nk'ebihonzi.'. Naabisa ogu mwana aine ebihonzi omu maisho. reb:
 EBIREZI; EKICUMATE bm: [ekihonzi].
ebihoro [ebihoro] z. Ekiti kirikumera omu rufunjo kiine empimbi
 eyorobi, nikitukura; ebijuma byakyo nibabirya. Bakaba nibaza kucwa
 ebihoro, baatiinayo. reb: OBURO BW'ENKOMBE bm: [ekihoro].
ebihorootsyo [ebihórootsyo] z. Eby'okurya bihozire kwonka bitarikufuka.
 Nshangire nibarya eby'okurya by'ebihorootsyo. bg: [ebihorootsyo].
ebihungu [ebihûngu] z. Endwara erikukira kukwata abaana bakaguma
 nibeesikura nibarerembuka amaisho nk'abagwi b'entsimbo. Omwana we
 arwaire ebihungu.
ebihuruguto [ebihuruguto] z. Ebintu ebihugutiire omu nda y'omwongo
 ogukuzire ogurikwenda kwihwamu ekisisi. Ku orikunywa obushera burimu
 ebihuruguto nootanaka.
ebihurugutu [ebihurugutu] z. Ecumbwe eshangwa omu matu. Amatu ge
 gaijwiremu ebihurugutu. km: ebishurugutu.
ebihwehwe [ebihwéhwe] z. Ebigambo ebirikuhwihwitsibwa omu kugamba, kugira
 ngu abandi batabihurira. Baaba nibagamba ebihwehwe.
ebiiga [ebííga] z. Endwara y'ente erikuzizimbya amaju. Ente yangye
 ezimbire amaju, bangira ngu erwaire ebiiga.
ebiino [ebíìno] z. Oburwaire oburikukwata engino y'abaana batakamezire
 maino. Omwana wangye arwaire ebiino.
ebiita-nte [ebííta-nte] z. Ebigambo birikuhemura. Omukazi ajumire omuramu
 ebiita-nte.
ebiizi [ebíìzi] z. Amaizi garikureebeka kubi obundi garikunuuka.
ebijaburiro [ebijáburiro] z. 1) Orujwangye rw'omwonyo n'amaizi.
 2) Ebishaka by'emiringo mingi ebiteebwa omu maizi garikwotsya
 bakabyogyesa abaana nari bakabinywaisa abantu abakuru abarwaire
 amahinyangi (enfumbi).
ebijaga [ebijága] z. kom: [<Rut. Ebijaga]. 1) Ebinyoro; endwara
 y'ebishebe aha mubiri gw'omuntu. Ekabonabonesa aba ira, omubazi
 gutakajumbwirwe. 2) Ebinwanwa.
ebijangura [ebijangura] z. Amaarwa agarikutsigaraho baaheza kuteeka
 waragi. Anyweire ebijangura, weena abyamire nk'okabire.
ebijengye [ebijengye] z. Oburo bugoyirwe kubi, oburimu amaizi, bujengire.
 Yaabaha ebijengye baabyanga.
ebijojongoro [ebijojongoro] z. Ebihimba byomire ebi baaheza kukuura omu
 musiri. bm: [ekijojongoro].
ebijwengye [ebijwengye] z. 1) Ebyoya bingi kandi biraingwa birikureereeta.
 Ebijwengye by'ekicuncu. 2) Ebintu birikureereeta ebi bakomera nari
 babaziirira aha bijwaro kubihunda ngu bireebekye gye. Esaati ye eine
 ebijwengye aha mahega.
ebikaafiire [ebikaafíìre] z. Ebigambo nari ebijumo birikuhemura nainga
 birikwitsa enshoni. Nyihaho ebikaafiire.
ebikaamuuro [ebikáámuuro] z. Ebintu bikaamwire bikatsigara bitainemu
 maizi, nk'omubazi gw'ekishaka. Ebikaamuuro ebi baihamu omubiriizi,
 baabinaga. RT: ebikamuuro. gyer: EMIKAMBI.
ebikaca [ebikaca] z. Endwara erikwenda kushushana n'omuze, kwonka yo
 etarikwita munonga.
ebikambi [ebikâmbi] z. bm: [ekikambi]. 1) Eby'okurya ebirikufutanwa
 bikanyuunyuutwamu amaizi. Ekikambi ky'etaabe, ky'ekikaijo n'ebindi.
 2) Ekirikutsigara omu kanwa amaizi gaaba gaanyuunyuutsirwe omu
 ky'okurya ekirikufutanwa.
ebikangaga [ebikangaga] z. gyer: OBUKANGAGA. bm: [ekikangaga].
ebikangura [ebikangura] z. Omu kuruka emikyeeka n'ebirago: omwanya
 ogurikutsigara ahagati y'omugoyi gumwe n'ogundi. Omukyeeka gwawe gwine
 ebikangura bihango. reb: EBISEERA koz: KI. bm: [ekikangura].
ebikanja [ebikânja] z. Ebintu ebitsigara aha ntango y'ekintu, nk'enyungu
 nari ekisisi ekirimu obushera, baaheza kwihaho nari kunywa omurera.
 Obushera twabunywa twabumaramu haatsigara ebikanja. RT: ebikanja. gyer:
 OMUKUUNYU.
ebikatsi [ebikátsi] z. Ebintu ebirikutsigara waaheza kugyegyena ekintu,
 nka kyayi nari omubazi. Yata ebikatsi ebyo, ondeetere akagyegyena.
ebikocore [ebikocóre] z. Obuntu nk'obwina oburikuba buri aha kintu
 kisiigiriize. Abaana baata ebikocore aha rusiika rwe. bm: [ekikocore].
ebikogoto [ebikógoto] z. Oburo bw'aha kibunu ky'enyungu egoya
 oburikwihisibwamu enkogotso. Oburo bubaire bwahwireho yaarya ebikogoto.
 gyer: KUKOGOTA. bm: [ekikogoto].
ebikomanyo [ebikómanyo] z. Ebiti ebikomerwa aha nyomyo nk'embazi ngu
 zihame zirekye kunyegaanyenga. Mwana 'we riita ebikomanyo enju ehame.
 bm: [ekikomanyo].
ebikooko [ebikóóko] z. Ebihangwa ebikye, ebitaine magufa n'eshagama;
 ebimwe nibiguruka, ebindi nibitondagira. bm: [ekikooko].
ebikukumbwa [ebikukumbwa] z. Enjuma z'omugusha gushatagurukire
 ogutsigara aha ntango y'ekitara gujwangize n'ebishushunga. Rundaana
 ogwo mugusha ogutsigaire omu kitara twihemu ebikukumbwa.
ebikundukundu [ebikundukúndu] z. reb: EBIKANJA RT: ebikundukundu.
ebikunguutsi [ebikungúútsi] z. Enyogori z'enshohera ezikurira omu
 bisheshengo nk'eby'entaama n'abantu abarofa, ahabw'okuteera amahuri omu
 bimiira birikushuriza omu nyindo, nyinabyo akabishoreza n'ago mahuri.
 bm: [ekikunguutsi]. [ebik: Obumwe entaama ku eyetsyamura, ezo nyogori
 zishohora. Abantu bo obundi, baronda ab'okubibakunguutamu, aha buso,
 nikyo baabyeteire ebikunguutsi.]
ebikurikuri [ebikurikuri] z. Enyamaishwa ezirikuzaarwa zitaine mikono
 na maguru. bm: [ekikurikuri].
ebimiira [ebimííra] z. reb: EBIMIRA koz: KI.
ebimira [ebimira] z. Ebintu ebirikwera ebirikurendemuka ebiruga omu
 nyindo namunonga omuntu yaaba arwaire ekihinzi. Obundi nyinabyo yaaba
 naakiruuka ekihinzi, nibireebeka nka kinekye. Ku orwara omutwe ogira
 ebimira. koz: NK. RT: ebimira.
ebimwemwe [ebimwémwe] z. Ensheko ei omuntu arikusheka atasinikire maino.
 Akaija ebimwemwe bimwijwire ahamaisho.
ebingonzi [ebíngonzi] z. Emijumba y'amaizi g'enyanja garikuhuuhwa omuyaga
 gakashusha nk'empimbi zirikwehirika. Ebingonzi bikajuumika obwato. RT:
 ebigonzi. gyer: AMAYENGO.
ebinika [ebbiníka] z. Ekintu ky'ekyoma nari eibumba ky'okugaburiramu
 kyayi nari obushera. Abandi bakitamu amaizi. Yaabareetera obushera omu
 binika. RT: ebinika.
ebinogo [ebinogo] z. reb: EBINONKO km: ebinonko.
ebinonko [ebinônko] z. Ebiina by'amaisho. Samusooni amaisho ge
 bakagaihamu yaatsigaza ebinonko. Amaisho gamurengyeire omu binonko.
 koz: KI. km: ebinogo. bm: [ekinonko].
ebintu [ebintu] z. Ebikozeso, amatungo, ebijwaro, eby'okurya,
 ebikwato, n'ebindi byona, ebi omuntu aine. Bakamwiba ebintu bye byona,
 baabitwara. gyer: EKINTU 1. bm: [ekintu].
ebinure [ebinure] z. Amaarwa agu baamara kutaha gatakahiire gye. Baaza
 kunywa ebinure.
ebinwangari [ebinwángari] z. Ebinwa bihango, biraingwa, bihenukire.
ebinwanwa [ebinwânwa] z. Endwara y'ebironda erikukwata amatungo nk'embuzi
 aha minwa ekagicwanyagura. Embuzi erwaire ebinwanwa, terikubaasa kurya
 gye. gyer: EBIJAGA. km: obunwanwa.
ebinyaari [ebinyáàri] z. Amaizi garikwereruka agashohozibwa omushaija
 nari omukazi omu kuteerana. km: amanyaari.
ebinyaatsi [ebinyáàtsi] z. Ebishaka ebirikwemeza bingi, bitarikubagarwa.
 Yaayekuringa omu binyaatsi ahansi. RT: ekinyansi. bm: [ekinyaatsi].
 Gamwe aha maziina g'ebinyaatsi
 - ekinyamajuta (ekirandura/orurandura)
 - ekinyangingo
 - enkyemba
 - ensheko y'ensi
 - ejubwe
 - emburara
 - ejwa
 - omuteete
 - omushojwa

ebinyamakara [ebinyamakára] z. Enkyerere z'omu kishaka, zaaba zihiisize
 zirikushushana nk'amakara gatariho muriro. Ebinyamakara binura munonga.
ebinyasaano [ebinyasaano] z. Oburo oburikutsigara enyima y'eseiso
 bunjwangiremu esaano, omuntu yaaba naasa. koz: NK.
ebinyiga [ebinyiga] z. Eby'okurya bitarimu mwonyo. Abantu ba kare bakaba
 bakunda kurya ebinyiga. Eriigyenda, esente zibuzire, owangye niturya
 ebinyiga. Bantu 'mwe okurya ebinyiga ka kwatukabya! reb: EBICUKWE
ebinyimi [ebinyimi] z. Emireebekyere y'ekintu ekirikwengyegyeta eki
 ebicweka byakyo birikukiranisa okwaka byaba nibitengyesibwa nari
 orikubireeba yaaba naabirabyaho amaisho. Omucuuzi nigucwa ebinyimi.
ebinyoobwa [ebinyóòbwa] z. RT: ebinyoobwa. bm: [ekinyoobwa]. 1) Ebihingwa
 by'enjuma zirikwerera omu itaka, ezi barikwihamu emboga, nari bakazirya
 zikarangire. Omwaka ogu, ahingire ebinyoobwa bingi. 2) Enjuma
 z'ekihingwa ekyo.
ebinyoro [ebinyóro] z. Endwara y'obushambani erikureetera omuntu
 ebironda aha mubiri nari omu kanwa. Ogwo mushaija akarwara ebinyoro.
ebinzaari [ebinzáàri] z. RT: ebinzaari. 1) Akasaano ka kinekye
 k'okurungisa, aku barikuta omu by'okurya. Omu by'okurya ebi yaateeka
 yaatamu ebinzaari bingi. 2) Engugo ya kinekye ei barikukoresa ekikaba
 ky'enju.
ebiragarikira [ebiragarikíra] z. Ebiragaire, ebigwire kuruga aha bindi.
 Ebiragarikira by'ebihimba twabishanga omu muhanda.
ebirahuri [ebirahúri] z. reb: GAARUBINDI bm: [ekirahuri].
ebireju [ebireju] z. reb: OBUREJU
ebiremaigamba [ebiremaigamba] z. Ebigambo ebiri omu kibazo kimwe biine
 engingo zirikushushana, haza zirikuteganisa kwatura. Akasisi
 nyabutahatwa, katahatwa orakakatahatsire, otakatahataga ku akatahata
 akaata. bm: [ekiremaigamba].
ebirembeero [ebirembeero] z. Ebigambo nari otweshongoro nka "kiikiiki,
 tinzaara", tw'okurembeera omwana ngu agwejegyere juba. Omwana wangye
 naamukwatira ebirembeero yaagwejegyera. bm: [ekirembeero].
ebirenzyo [ebirênzyo] z. Ebigambo ebirikugambwa nibyekiikuura,
 ebirikugambwa okundi, birikumanyisa agandi makuru. "Ou batsigire, ati
 bandinzire" n'ekirenzyo. bm: [ekirenzyo].
ebirezi [ebirezi] z. reb: EBIHONZI
ebirika [ebirika] z. Orubaare orukwatiire aha mutwe gw'orushozi. RT:
 ebirika. kom: [<Rut. ebirika].
ebiro [ebíro] z. bm: [ekiro]. 1) Obunaku bw'amazooba omu mwezi.
 Eriizooba n'ebiro bingahi? N'ebiro bina by'Okwamushanju Enkumi ibiri
 n'etaano. 2) Obunaku bw'amazooba, omu kubara omwanya oguhingwireho.
 Akaija bwanyima y'ebiro bishatu.
ebiroora [ebiróòra] z. Ebishaju ebirikuzeereera ahaiguru y'amaizi
 bitarikushushana nago; ebimwe nibiba nibishushana n'oruhumbu, ebindi
 nk'ebishaju biyagire. Ago maizi gaine ebiroora, mutaganywa. reb:
 EBIROORO
ebirooro [ebiróóro] z. km: ebiroora. 1) Engonera ezirikuba zoomeire aha
 muntu yaaruga kwimuka. Baamushanga aine ebirooro aha munwa. 2) Ebintu
 ebirikuba bikwatsire omu kisisi kyaba kihweiremu obushera
 kitakoogiibwe. Omu kisisi harimu ebirooro birikwiragura.
ebirungi [ebirúngi] z. Ebintu biboneire, birikushemeza amaisho. Ebirungi
 tibituura; ebirungi niho byaija. RT: ebirungi. fum: Ebirungi tibikanya,
 eshabwe teijura rwabya.
ebirungo [ebirungo] z. Ebintu ebiteebwa omu by'okurya, kubinuza nari
 kubiha omugaju, nk'omudarasiini. Omu mboga ze akatamu ebirungo bingi.
 RT: ebirungo.
ebirungye [ebirúngye] z. Eby'okurya ebitairwemu amajuta g'ente.
 Baatuteekyera ebirungye. RT: ebirunge.
ebisaasi [ebisáàsi] z. Ebintu ebi enjoki zirikuzaariramu, nari kubiikamu
 obwoki bwazo. Yaarya ebisaasi by'enjoki. koz: KI. bm: [ekisaasi].
ebisaasingo [ebisaasingo] z. Ebicwanyagurika by'ebinyaatsi
 ebirikuzambaaza ahantu, bikahareebekyesa kubi. Kwatakwata ebisaasingo,
 ohemberere orwina, ohanikye ebyo bitookye.
ebisasiro [ebisásiro] z. reb: EKUMBWE 1) RT: ebisasiro.
ebiseera [ebisééra] z. bm: [ekiseera]. 1) Ebikangura. 2) Amabara
 g'omwera agaza ahamaisho g'abantu abamwe. Oine ebiseera ahamaisho,
 ronda amajuta oyesiigye.
ebisente [ebisênte] z. Ebintu byezigoire ebirimu otuhere, ebirikuteera
 omuntu aha mubiri, namunonga aha mutwe n'ahamaisho. Bamwe omu baana
 bato bakira kurwara ebisente. bm: [ekisente].
ebisha [ebisha] z. Okurumwa kw'omukazi yaaba naayenda kuzaara. Ebisha
 bikamukwata omu itumbi, yaazaara burikusheesha. bg: [ekisha].
ebishagasha [ebishagasha] z. reb: EBISHWAGARA koz: KI.
ebishaju [ebisháju] z. Ebintu ebirikuyagayaga nk'amajuta, ebishangwa omu
 mubiri gw'omuntu nari enyamaishwa. Egi nyama yaagira ebishaju bingi,
 tindikugirya.
ebishambariito [ebishambariito] z. reb: OMUKARABANDA
ebishandu [ebishándu] z. reb: EBISHANDURIRA
ebishandurira [ebishandurira] z. Eshagama n'amaizi ebirikushohora
 omukazi yaaheza kukwatwa ebisha by'okuzaara. Ebishandurira ku
 byatandikire kwija, baamutwara omu irwariro. km: ebishandu.
ebishare [ebisháre] z. 1) Ebicwero ebi omuntu ashemereire kuha nk'omu
 kigombe. Bamucwereire ebishare bingi, byamurema. 2) Ekisisi ekifumwirwe
 aha ibondo, kukoresibwa nk'omu kutaha amaizi, obushera, n'ebindi.
ebishashara [ebisháshara] z. reb: EBISAASI koz: NK. bm: [ekishashara].
ebishazi [ebishazi] z. gyer: EIRARO.
ebisheshengo [ebishéshengo] z. Ebicweka by'omu nyindo ebirugwamu otwizi
 twokworobya enyindo; kandi nibyo bishohoza ebimira.
ebishi [ebíshi] t. Ekigambo ekirikukoresibwa omu kwetomboita nari omu
 kutangaara. Ebishi ka nkaakuteera. Ebishi omujungu aba eihano.
ebishokonkoro [ebishokonkoro] z. Ebirabyo by'ekimera kyona, ebirikukwata
 aha bijwaro by'abantu nari ebyoya by'enyamaishwa. Embuzi zaaraba omu
 kishaka zaija ziijwireho ebishokonkooro. koz: KI.
ebishomerere [ebishomerere] z. Amaarwa masya. Baaza kunywa
 ebishomerere.
ebishuba [ebishúba] z. Amakuru g'omu bigambo ebirikugambwa nari
 ebirikuhandiikwa, bigyendereire kubeiha nari kuhabisa orikubihurira
 nainga orikubishoma. Reka kutubeiha, ebishuba byawe byatukabya! RT:
 ebisuba.
ebishurugutu [ebishúrugutu] z. reb: EBIHURUGUTU km: ebihurugutu.
ebishushunga [ebishushúnga] z. Ebikumba ebirugirwemu enjuma z'oburo
 nari omugusha. Aha rufu bakatuha ebishushunga; nibyo twayeyariire. RT:
 ebisusu.
ebishuuriita [ebishuuriita] z. Ebintu ebirikwoga omu bindi, bikaguma
 nibirengyeera. Shara ebishuuriita ebyatsigara aha mugoye.
ebishwagara [ebishwagara] z. Ebishushu byomire, ebi baamara
 kutondoramu nari kuhuuramu ebihimba, amashaza, n'ebindi nk'ebyo.
 Ebishwagara nibyo yaahembesa omuriro. km: ebishagasha.
ebisimooni [ebisimóòni] z. Esente z'ebyoma. Ebisimooni byangye byaragara
 ahansi byabura. bm: [ekisimooni].
ebisingo [ebisingo] z. Ekumbwe n'ebindi byona ebirikuragarika omu mbuga.
 Ebisingo nibabinaga omu kiina.
ebisiriirira [ebisiriirira] z. 1) Amakara agareire. 2) Eby'okurya
 ebirengirwe omuriro bikakwatira aha kibunu ky'enyungu nainga
 ky'esafuriya bikahinduka amakara. Hoona mwana 'we ku wandeetera
 ebisiriirira, nibyo ndaarye?
ebiso [ebíso] p. 1) Aheeru. Tikiri mu nju waakita ebiso. 2) Omwanya
 oguri hangahari kwonka haihi; baitu hatarikureebwa. Irooko nookishanga
 aha biso.
ebisooroora [ebisooróóra] z. Omugaju ogurikuruga omu nyama ei
 barikwotsya. Twahurira ebisooroora, nooshusha ngu bariyo nibootsya
 enyama. RT: ebisooriro.
ebitaabafu [ebitaabafu] z. Ebifuzi ebirikureetwa omu kanwa k'omuntu yaaba
 naakaba. Bakamushanga naareeta ebitaabafu baamanya ngu naaza kufa.
ebitaako [ebitaako] z. Ebintu nk'enkoni ebihunzirwe n'enkwanzi, ngu
 bibonere. Enkoni ye n'ekitaako. bg: [ekitaako].
ebitanaki [ebitanaki] z. Eby'okurya ebi omuntu agarura kuraba omu kanwa
 ahabw'okurwara nari ahabw'okugira esheshemi. Omwana we niwe yaayata
 ebitanaki. RT: ebitanaki. km: ebitanako; entanaki.
ebitanako [ebitanako] z. gyer: EBITANAKI.
ebitanga [ebitanga] z. Ekibara kihango omu gandi. KATANGA: eiziina
 ry'omwagazi nari enyena y'amabara nk'ago; KITANGA: eiziina ry'ebuguma
 (y'empene) nari ejigija (y'ente) y'amabara nk'ago; RUTANGA: eiziina
 ry'empaya nari enimi y'amabara gatyo. Ku oraahikye aha ibaagiro, oreebe
 yaaba orikubaasa kumboneraho oruhu rw'ebitanga; orungurire. km:
 amatanga. bg: [ebitanga].
ebitanvuure [ebitanvúùre] z. 1) Ebintu ebitaine mugasho, nk'ebijwaro
 bicwekire, eby'okunaga. Mpa ebyo bitanvuure byangye. 2) Ebijunja;
 ebintu ebirikuba nibireereeta aha kintu.
ebitaraakira [ebitaráákira] z. Ebintu ebyataraaka, nk'omu kuhuura
 bikagwa oku n'oku. Muronde juba ekiibo, muze kutoratoora ebitaraakira
 by'ebihimba. km: obutaraakira.
ebiteero [ebitéèro] z. Enyama ei abahiigi babagana aha nyamaishwa ei
 baita, kurugiirira aha murimo gwa buri omwe omu kugiita. Omu kuhiiga
 nihaba hariho owaabanza kucumita enyamaishwa, abandi baba bategire
 ebitimba, n'abandi bagiirukangize. Abahiigi baabagana ebiteero.
ebitegye [ebitegye] z. reb: EMITEGO
ebitingwa [ebitingwa] z. reb: EKITINGWA bm: [ekitingwa].
ebititi [ebititi] z. Ebicwanyagurika by'ebishushunga nari ebishwagara
 ebirikuza ahaiguru waaba nooshungura, omu kwera. Ebititi mube mubitaire
 omu kihumi, twije kubyarire emitavu. bm: [ebititi].
ebitojo1 [ebitojo] z. Ebishaka ebiine amababi gariho amahwa, birikweraho
 ebirabyo bya kakobe; embuzi nizibikunda munonga. Akacumitwa akahwa
 k'ekitojo kaamucumbagiza. bm: [ekitojo].
ebitojo2 [ebitojo] z. Endwara erikwenda kushushana n'obusheru kwonka yo
 eine otuzimba tuhango, kukira otw'obusheru. Ku birikukira bikusigaho
 amabara. Arwaire ebitojo byamukora kubi. reb: OBUTOJO km: amatojo.
ebitoogo [ebitóógo] z. Ebifunjo ebitemirwe bikooma. Ebitoogo bye
 biteirwe enjura, byajunda. gyer: ENKOROGOTO. bm: [ekitoogo].
ebitsigarira [ebitsigarira] z. Eby'okurya ebirema eiheza ekyaba nari
 owaaba naabirya. Murye, ku muraaheze niinyija kurya ebitsigarira.
ebitsya [ebítsya] z. Ekicweka ky'omubiri ekiri ahagati y'omutwe
 n'amabega. Ayetaire ahansi yaahendeka ebitsya. RT: ebikya.
ebitu [ebitu] z. Kugwa ebitu: Okuhemuka okashobangirirwa, okagwa omu
 kahuurikano. Bakamushanga naashambana yaagwa ebitu.
ebituna [ebituna] z. Ebicweka by'eminekye ebitsigara omu nshande,
 bitanogire. Omu nshande ye haaba harimu ebituna bingi. bm: [ekituna].
ebitunda by'endandano [ebitunda by'endandáno] z. Ekika ky'ebitunda
 ebirikurandira ahansi, aha miti nari aha mihango. Ebitunda bye
 by'endandano hati bikwatsire.
ebitunguuta [ebitunguuta] z. reb: EKITIRIBIITA
ebiturumwa [ebiturúmwa] z. reb: ENTURUMWA bm: [ekiturumwa].
ebitutu [ebitutu] z. Eishokye rikomire omu butuumo, omu mutwe. Aine
 ebitutu bishatu omu mutwe. RT: ebitutu. bm: [ekitutu].
ebituzi [ebitúzi] z. Ekintu ekirikumera omu itaka; kyaba nikikura
 kirikwata eitaka, omutwe gwakyo niguba guri nk'enkofiira, ku kirikukura
 kigaara. Ebituzi ebimwe biriibwa, ebindi tibiriibwa. Omukazi akaba
 naaraba aha nkungu, yaashangaho ebituzi yaabitwara omuka. RT: obutuzi.
 bm: [ekituzi].
