<archive_file filename="EDITED ESSAYS/EBIRI KUKWATA AHA UGANDA edited.doc"> EBIRI KUKWATA AHA YUGANDA
                                    By Ahabu Bwesigye
Yuganda ne eshangwa ahagati y’amahanga agari omu burengyerwa izooba bwa
Afirika, eine eby’obuhangwa ebirimu amaizi marungi nka ag'anyanja eya
Vctoria. Yuganda eyetooroirwe amahanga nka Kenya, Sudan, Democratic
Republic of Congo, Tanzania, na Burundi. Eihanga eri ni rimwe aha mahanga
agarikwegaitira hamwe omu kigombe ekirikugaita amahanga ga East Africa
ekirikwetwa East African Community (EAC). Eihanga eri obwa hati
niriteganiisibwa akakooko ka siriimu akareeteire abaana, abantu bakuru,
abakazi b'enda kufa.

Omuhendo gw’abantu niguteekateekwa kwingana miriyooni igana n'ishatu (103)
z’abantu kurugirira aha kihandiiko ekirikwetwa vision 2050. Kurugirira omu
kubara abantu omu mwaka gw’enkumi ibiri ikumi neina,(2014) ebya shohoziibwe
ebiro 18, 9 2014, omuhendo gw’abantu omu Yuganda nigwingana miriyoni ashatu
n'ina n’obucweka mwenda(34.9 ) z’aba nya YYuganda. Eki nikimanyisa ngu
omuhendo gw’abantu omu Yuganda gweyongyeire na miriyoni ikumi n’obucweka
mushanju buri mwaka (10.7)  z’abanyayYuganda  kuruga omu mwaka ogwa 2002.
N’ahabwekyo, abanyayYuganda nibeeyongyera n’obucweka bushatu ahari
igaana buri mwaka (3.03%).

Oihireho okurwanisa abaheekyera ba Yozefu Kony na Al shabab, Yuganda aine
ezindi ntaro ez’omunda eziri ahagaati y’enganda zitari zimwe na zimwe.
N’obu gavunmenti eraabe neegyezaho kurwanisa ebizahambuki, hariho endwano
n’obutabanguko obutweire nibubaho omu mishozi eya Rwenzori. Gavumenti
ekiriyo neekyondooza obukomooko bw’endwano ezi. Kurugirira aha butabanguko
obwatandikire ebiro 5, 7, 2014 ehi enkumi n'enkumi z’abantu batari bamwe na
bamwe kuruga omu Bakonjo beekunganiire hamwe bakataahirira enkambi za
pooriisi n’ez’amahe obwo beine ebirwaniso nka: embundu, amacumu, obuta,
empango, n’emihoro. Eki kikareetaho orutaro ahagati y’Abakonjo n’ezindi
nganda omu naku nkye ezaakuratsireho. Eki kikareetera ebitongore
ebirwanirira obusingye n’obugabe bw’abantu kutaayayira amarwariro
n’okushomesa abantu aha kabi kendwano. Nikigambwa ngu Abakonjo abo
abataahiriire enkambi za pooriisi n’ez'amahe bakaba beesangiire aha maisho.
Eki kikabaho omu myanya eri omu disiturikiti eya Kasese, Bundibugyo na
Ntoroko. Gavunmenti erikuyambwaho ekitongore kya poorisi eyaagyerizeho
kwetooroora emyanya egyo ekareetaaho obusingye obwo erikukwata abo
abaabaire bataine biitiso. Ekitongore ekiri kurwanira obusingye omu bantu
kikatunga ripoota erikworeka ku aba pooriisi abamwe nabo bakaba benyigiire
omu kwita abantu. Ekituru kimwe ki katimbwa omu baazikiire abantu
nyamwingi.

Eby’obuteegyeki omu Yuganda, mukuru w’ihanga eri ni ow’ekitinisa Yoweri
Kaguta Museveni obatsize kwebembera ihanga eri kumara emyaka abiri na
mwenda (29) kuruga 1986-2015.  Bikatandika bitari birungi omu  mwaka ogwa
1962.  Omu mwaka ogwa 1971-79 obutegyeki bwa ngamba nyeka obwa  Idi Amin
nibwo bwareesire okufa kwa abantu bari kwingana emitwaro makumi ashatu
(300,0000) abaabeire bateekateekwaho kuba nibahakanisa gavumenti. 1980-
1985  orutaro orwa guerrilla rukareetaho okuturugunywa kw’abantu hamwe
n’okubabuza obusingye omu  bwire bwa Obote II.

Kuruga omu myaka ya 1980, Yuganda ekaruga omu ntaro z’omunda kandi
yaatandika kutunguuka obwo erikutunga obusingye, obutebeekana, hamwe
n’okugaigahara kwa boona.
Omu myaka eya  1970  na 1980 abantu bakabonabona munonga kandi n’obugabe
bw’abantu bwacumbatirirwa omu bwire bw’omutegyeki ngamba nyenka Idi Amin 
kuruga 1971-79  na bwanyima y'okugaruka kwa Milton Obote aha ngoma,
owaabaire aihirweho Amin.
Omu bwiire obu kimwe kya kabiri kya miriyoni emwe y’abantu bakaitwa omu
butabanguko obwareetsirweho abakuru kuruga omu gavumenti.
Na hati, obusingye omu by’obutegyeki tibukeeyongyeire. Purezidenti  oriho
obwahati Lt. Gen. Yoweri Kaguta owaagiire aha butegyeki omu mwaka ogwa
1986  kandi abaasize kuba aha ntebe y’obwa president kumara emyaka 29 nka
mukuru w’ihanga na gavunmenti. purezidenti bakamuteerera akaruru
k’ekisagyja ky’emyaka etaano omu mwaka gwa 2001 omu buruuru obwabandize,
kandi nibwo bwabire buri oburuuru bw’okubanza kuruga atunga engoma egi omu
gwa 1986.

Ow’ekitinisa Yoweri Museveni akareetaho ebya demokurasiya omu mwaka ogwa
1986 kandi naayebazibwa ahabw’okureetaho obugabe omu bantu obwo ari
kukyendeeza okuturugunyizibwa kw'amahe na pooriisi ebyabaire bizuumikire
eihanga.
Ebikwatiraine na Yuganda harimu Eby’obuteegyeki: omu Yuganda harimu
ebigombe by’ebyobutegyeki ebya garwirweho omu mwaka gwe 2005. Ebigombe
ebihakani ni byemurugunya ngu purezidenti Museveni ni ngamba nyeka kandi ku
naakoresa amaani. Yuganda eine ebigombe by’eby’obuteegyeki ebiri kwejumbira
omu karuuru k'abantu boona akari kubaaho buri muheru gw’emyaka etaano.
Ebigombe ebi, birimu ekigombe ekiri kumanwya nk’eky'abakozi ekya Labour
Party ekirikukurirwa Barigayomwe Rogers, Conservative Party(CP) kikuriirwe
Ken Lukyamuzi, Democratic  Party (DP) kikuriirwe Nobert Mao, ekya Forum
Democratic Change (FDC) kikuriirwe Mugisha Muntu, Justice Forum(JF)
kikuriirwe Muhammad Kibirige Mayanja, Federal Democratic Party (FDP) ekya
Simon Peter Kabala-Kasirye, ekya National Democratic Forum (NDF) kikuriirwe
Karuhanga Chapaa, ekigombe ekya NRM kikuriirwe  Yoweri Museveni, People’s
Progressive Party (PPP) kikuriirwe Jaberi Bidandi Ssali n’ekya Yuganda
Federal Alliance(UFA) ekya Beti Kamya -Turwomwe, People’s Development Party
(PDP) ekya ABed Bwanika. Ebigombe ebi ni bikuru munonga omu kurwanisa
obushomankuzi obu kukira kubaho omu bakuru omu gavumenti, nibigyezaho
kureetera gavumenta yaakora kurungi munonga, nikigambwa ngu obwesharingo
obwaretsirweho owabaire ari mukuru w’ekigombe kya FDC Dr.  Kiiza Besigye
obwabeireho aha zaadisiturikiti za Kampala namunonga omu katare aka kiseka
 omu mwaka 2011 empindahinduka omu by’enkuraakurana omu Yuganda. Aha mukono
ogundi, obwesharingo obu bukareeta okufa, abashuma abaabeire nibaaya
eby’obushuubuzi, hamwe n’omwika gwa tiyagaasi ogwine akabi aha magara
g’abantu. Abantu baingi bakateekwa omu nkomo oteebirwe owaabeire naakurira
ekigombe kya FDC Dr. Kiiza Besigye.

Omuby’okwerinda, Yuganda  kubinga abaheekyera kuruga omu matemba ga
Yuganda  omu mwaka gwa 2005/6 kandi amahe g’aha nsharo z’ihanga na muno-
muno omu matemba ga Yuganda gatweire gaine okwerarikirira abaheekyera ba
LRA, ow'ekitinisa purezidenti Y.K. Museveni ebiro 18th  8 2015 ekahinguza
abantu barikwingana 3,348 abaraabe ni barwanisa obuhwezi bw’amateeka omu
YYuganda. Eki kikabaho bwanyima baamara esande mushanju bari kutendekwa aha
bikwatiraine n’okuhenda  amateeka ah'ishomero eri kushomesa aba pooriisi
erya Kabarya omu disiturikiti eya Masindi. Omutwe gw’omushomo gukaba guri
okurwanisa eibura ry’emirimo n’obworo kurabira omu makorero n’okukora.
Pooriisi eshemereire kuba neekwata kandi ekateeka enyima y’emitehimbwa abo
abarikuhenda ebiragiro, amateeka, abari kubonabonesa bataahi baabo, abari
kuhonga abaana, abitsi, abashuma, abafere eky'okurebeeraho, pooriisi ya
Yuganda eherize kuta enyima y’emiteehimbwa abantu babiri abaabeire nibaiba
abantu obwo barikubabaiha ngu n’aba pooriisi, eki kikamanywa omu rukungaana
rw’abanyamahurire orwabaire rwetsire omu gambirizi wa pooriisi Fred Enanga
aha kiteebe kikuru kya pooriisi omuri Naguru. Abashuma aba bakamanwya nka
Nduga na Kakuru abatuuragye ba Kalerwe na Mpererwe omu Kampala.  Amahe ga
Yuganda gariyo nigakora kurungi munonga, gabaatsize kurwanisa abaheekyera
ba LRA omu matemba ga Yuganda, gareetsireho obusingye omu mahanga g’aheru
agarimu Somalia obwo garikurwanisa abaheekyera ba Al shabab abaabaire
bataireho Yuganda  aha baara emwe eya Ethiopian Village omuri Kabalagala
n’omu kizaaniiro ky’omupiira g’okugwererana ogwa rugby ahi abantu
barikwingana 74 baafiire omu mwaka gwa 2011. Eki tikirashemeize bantu
nyamwingi oteebirwe orikukurira ekigombe ky’omupiira omu nsi yoona ekya
FIFA orikumanwya nka Sepp  Blatter. Naagira ngu abahagizi bakaba bataine
mushango gwona.  Kwenda kutunguura ebyokwerinda omu Yuganda amashomero
g’ebyamahe gakombekwa omu myanya etari emwe n'emwe. Omu kwa kabiri omu
mwaka gwa 2015, Yuganda egumire n’amashomero g’amahe agarimu Bihanga
Military Training School eriri kushangwa  omu disiturikiti eya Ibanda,
Kalama Armoured Warefare Training school eriri kushangwa Kabamba omu
district eya Mubende, National Leadership Institute eriri kushangwa omuri 
Kyankwanzi, Yuganda Air Force Academy eriri kushsngwa omu  Nakasongola,
Yuganda Junior  Command & Staff College eri kushangwa omuri Qaddafi
Barakisi omu distirikiti eya Jinja n’agandi gagyendereire kushomesa
ebikwatirine n’okurinda obusingye omu Yuganda obwo barikushomesa ebyo
kuruga omu myaka mito.

Omu byentatsya, Yuganda neeshohoza omwani aheeru y’ihanga kandi nimwe
ririkwiha sente nyingi wagyeragyeranisa n'ebindi bintu eby’erikushohora
aheeru. Amajuta nago gariyo nigatunguura eihanga eri obwo oteebirwe
ebitookye, amate, ebijuma, amatungo omu ntastya y’ihanga eri. Eihanga eri
niryeyongyera kuhama omu by’etastya, eki kikatandika omu mwaka gwa 1990
bwanyima y’okweyongyera kw’emihendo ya shiringi. Entaasya y’eihanga eriyo
neeyeeyongyera ahabw'amajuta agajumbwirwe omu mwanya ogwa  Bunyoro.
Disiturikiti eya Hoima, Buliisa, Kibale, Masindi, na Kiryandongo zoona ziri
Bunyoro ni zimwe aha disiturikiti 25 eziri omu mwanya ogwa Albert eziraabe
niitunga obucweka mushanju ahari igaana  (7%) bwa sente eziraabe niiruga
omu majuta. Amashomero agari kushomesa ebyobukugu ebikwatireine n’okutimba
amajuta niriza kutandikwaho omu disiturikiti eya Buliisa. Kurugiirira aha
kitongore ky’ebye sente omunsi yoona ekya Internal Monitary Fund (IMF),
Yuganda  neeza kuba eine obucweka 5.8 (5.8%) omu by’entaatsya omu mwaka gwa
2015/16  kubarira omu sente. Eki kiretsirweho okutunguuka omu nguuto,
amarwariro, obutare, amashanyarazi ebiriyo ni bitunguura abantu ba burijo.
Ni kigambwa ngu abakuru kuruga omu kitongore ky’ebye sente omunsi yoona ba
katayayiraho Kampala beebembeirwe Ana Lucia Coronel kushwijuma  puraani
y’eby’entunguuka omu Yuganda aha bw'omwaka ogwa 2015.

Yuganda neeyamba amahanga gatari gamwe na gamwe omu bweire bw’entaro
n’obutabanguko agarimu Sudan ey’amashuuma, Somalia , hamwe DR. Congo. Kandi
ori kuteekateekwaho kuba arikukurira abaheekyera ba ADF Jamiru Mukula  
naaza kujunanizibwa omu kooti yensi yoona. Eby’okwerinda  omu Afirika ni
byerarikiriza  birikureetwaho obutegyeki bubi, okumara emyaka miraingwa omu
ntebe, obushomankuzi n’oburi bwenguzi. Omu Sudan eya mashuuma hakabaho
obutiakirizana  ahagati ya Purezidenti Salva Kiir hamwe n’omuheekyera we
Riek Machar ekyareetsireho okufa n’oku bonabona kw'abantu omuri Sudan
y'amashuuma. Eki kikareetera Yuganda kusindika amahe gaayo omu Sudan kwenda
kurinda obusingye bw’abanya Sudan hamwe na abanya Yuganda amahe aga gakaba
geebembeirwe Gen Katumba Wamala.
Kurugirira aha ntunguuka y’orurengo rw'ensi yoona, Yuganda eriyo
neetungukira aha sipidi ya hiri hiri kwonka emaisho goona egateire aha
sente ezirikuruga omu mwani, kandi emihendo y’ebyokurya eriyo neeyeyongyera
ahaiguru. Yuganda eri omu mahanga ikumi agariyo nigatunguukira ahaiguru
munonga.
Eki kikareetera abahakanisa ba gavumenti obutaikirizana na purezidenti
Museveni obwo arikuronda akaruuru ka 2011. Abahakanisa bakeesharinga
batambura aha nkuuto obwo barikuhakanisa okweyongyera kw’emihendo
y’ebyokurya, hamwe n’okubaaho kwabo, otebirwe okurwanira obuteeka omu
by’obururu. Bwanyima y’akaruru ke 2011, entaro n’obutabanguko bukabaho omu
rurembo Kampala.
Kwonka DR Congo neeyemurugunya ahabwa Yuganda kushanga neeyetaatsya omu
by’obugaiga byayo ebirimu embaaho n’amajuta. Yuganda nayo neegira ngu Kongo
nayo eremirwe kwiha kandi akabinga abaheekyera kuruga omu Yuganda ah'itaaka
ryayo.
Omu bwire bukye obuhwaire abantu b'omu matemba ga Yuganda bakabonabonesebwa
abaheekyera ba LRA omu rutaro orwatwaire abantu nyamwingi.

Abantu babi nk'aba Lord's Resistance Army (LRA), abaabaire nibeebemberwa
omuheekyera Joseph Kony,  bakatandikaho obwitsi  emwaka 23 erabireho kandi
emitima mibi yaabo ekworekwa baatandika kuhamba abaana b’abaishiki obwo
nibabashwera ny’omushana, kandi babakoramu abahuuku. Eki kikareetaho
okufuruka kw’abantu barikwingana miriyooni ebiri (2.000.000) kufuruka omu
matemba ga Yuganda.

Abaheekyera ba LRA bakabingwa omu matemba ga Yuganda omu mwaka gwa 2005/06.
Kuruga obwo bakaza omu mahanga aga rwagati ya Afirika, amashuuma ga Sudani,
hamwe na Democratic Republic of Congo.

Ebaheekyera ku baarugire omu matemba ga Yuganda, omwanya ogu gukatandika
kukurakurana kandi enkumi z’abaheekyera barugireyo baayegaita aha kigombe
ekiri kurwanira obusingye omu kibiina ekya Yuganda’s Amnesty Commission.

Yuganda eine obuhanguzi omu kurwanisa akakooko ka siriimu eri kurabiira omu
kampeyini zi tari zimwe na zimwe. Eki kikyendiize akakooko ka sirimu omu
ihanga ryona kuhiika aha 30% omu myaka eya 1990.

Omu diini, tihariho ediini yoona erikwetwa ey’ihanga. Ediini nyamwigi
ziriyo niziija kandi nizeeyongyera omu Yuganda. Kuruga obunyakare abantu
bakaba nibaramya emandwa nka nyarubaale, abacwezi, nyamwezi.Omu kuramya oku
bakaba batunga ebi baabaire bashaba nk'enjura, amatungo, amashaarura
marungi, eby’obugaiga nk'oku kiri hati.  Abakurisito baine obucweka  41.9%,
Abakurisitaayo obucweka 35.9%, Abacwanga 1.5% , Abasiraamu baine obucweka
12.1%, abandi beine obucweka 3.01% Abakaafiire bo baine 0.9%. Kwonka
abajungu ku baizire omu Yuganda ediini nk'eya Abakurisito, ekuratiirwe
Abakurisitaayo. Ediini ezindi zirimu Abasiraamu, n’ezindi nyingi. Abantu
barikwingani 530 ku baafiire ebiro 17th 3 2000 omu disiturikiti eya Kanungu
aha bw’ediini y’ekishobobo eyaabire neeyebemberwa Joseph Kibwetere owaabire
aine emyaka nkaaga na munaana eyobukuru obwo ari kugambira abantu ku
emperu  neeza kuhika ebiro 31 12 2000. Eki kikareetera abantu
okwerarikirira ediini z’ebishobobo. Ediini nyamyizizireho kandi abantu
batari bamwe na bamwe bariyo ni batandikaho amaramizo agaabo. Omuri
Kampala, omuntu weena aine obugabe kushabira ah'arikwenda. Hariho ba pasita
ab'abashaija, abakazi, entumwa za Ruhanga ziriyo nigyenda omu maisho
n’okuhitsya aha bantu ekigambo kya Ruhanga.

Ningira nikirugirira aha mutima gw’omuntu kusharamu aharaashabire.
Eby’okutangaaza bingi biriyo nibikorwa omu ma diini gatari gamwe na gamwe.
Abamwe nibazora abari aha ncwamba za rufu, abamwe ni babinga za sitaani,
abamwe ni bagaba eby’obugaiga. Baiburi neegira ngu kuri buri omwe
nateekateeka ngu n’ediini kandi akeegaruriza amaani, akabiiha omu tiima
gwe, ediini y’ogwe muntu t'eine mazima. ediini ehikiriire omuri Ruhanga,
Ishe boona neegi: kutayayira efuuzi, ba okuyamba abarema, kandi okesaasira
ebyensi. Juma 1:26-27. Yohaana 14:6, Yesu naagira ati, niinye muhanda,
matsiko n’amagara. Tihariho n'omwe ohika ow’ishe boona atarabire omu
riinye. Erigyenda abantu baingi nibetwara nka ba Yesu, abamwe nka Ruhanga.
Omu myaka eira ekigambo ediini kikaba kiine amakuru maingi  kandi hakaba
hariho okuhakana ahagati yaazo, omu myanya yoona kandi zoona zikaba
nizeetwa ‘diini’  zoona zikaba zishomesa aha birikukwata aha nsi kandi 
ziyambaho na aha bizibu. Kwonka obwahati ediini ziine obutumwa
butakushushana. Ediini ezi ziine ebigombe ebiri kugaita abantu baazo
ekyokureberaho, Mothers Union neegaita abakazi boona omu diini
y'ekikurisitaayo, father’s union neegaita abashaija boona, Musiriimu
Society of Yuganda n’ekigombe ekirikugaita aba saraamu boona omu Yuganda.
Abashomi ba kare abarimu Emile  Durkhein kuruga Germany, naagira ngu ediini
 n’emizabibu eine akamanyiso k’eshagama y’omwana wa Ruhanga kandi
n’eyomugasho. Noyongyera agira  ngu edini  tikiri ky’obuhangwa, ngu
n’abwokugira ngu hariho obucweka bwingi omu myanya etari  emwe ne mwe,
ebintu ebi omuntu arikuramya kwihaho nibyoreka amaani g'ensi kandi ondijo
mushomi w’ebirikuba aha bantu awaabire ari orikumanwya nka Karl Marx nagiri
ati ediini neeshweka bushweka aha maisho g'abantu, abamwe nibakozesa
ebizibu by’arwire, abanaku, nshobangiriirwe kwenda kutunga eby’obugaiga
kurabira omu diini.

Nk’ediini, omu Yuganda tihariho runaku rwona ngu n’orwa  Yuganda. Abaganda
nibaingana obuchweka 17% bw’omubare gw’abantu omu Yuganda, kwonka ezindi
nganda zibaganisibwe munonga. eganda  ezi ni  Ankole, Basoga, Iteso,
Bakiga, Langi, Rwanda, Bagisu, Acholi, Batooro, Banyoro, Alur, Bagwere,
Bakonjo, Jopodhola, Karamojongo, na Rundi. Enganda nyingi ahare ezi ziine 
2-8% aha muhendo gw’abanya Yuganda hataine eri ahaiguru y’endiijo. Hariho
n’ezindi nganda eziri  kuruga seeri y’amayanja nka Bungyereza, omu ba
Baharabu, na China.

Obuhingi n’oburiisa nibyo bintu bikuru omu Yuganda, obuhingi nibuhistyaho
emirimo aha banya Yuganda barikwingana obucweka kinaana ahari igana (80%).
Omwani nigwe namba y’okubanza omu kureetaho entasya kuruga aheeru y’ihanga.
Kuruga omu mwaka gwa1986 gavunmenti ekozire n’obucweka ihembe kutereeza
entasya y’ihanga erikurabira omu ntebekanisa za sente z’ihanga, kwongyera
emihendo y’eby’obuhingi kwenda kutungura entansya y’abantu b’omubyaro,
kwongyera emihendo y’ebyo ebiri kushohora aheeru y’ihanga, emihendo
y’amajuta, hamwe n’okwongyera obuhereza burungi aha bantu. Ekindi, abakazi
nibaza kwongyera aha ntaasya yaabo kurabira omu mashanyaraze g’amasha.
Ahabwokuba nigayambaho omu kurinda eby’obuhangwa kwenda kureetaaho enjura
erikweza ebimera. Mr. Museveni akozire munonga kwenda kutunguura
eby’obuhingi kurabira omu proguramu eya NAADS.  Ebitakuri n’obutunda biine
ekiriisa kya vitamini. Ebitakuri bikatongozibwa omu mwaka gwa 2007 omu
kitongore ky’eby'okucondooza  omu insi yoona ahabw’ekiriisa kyakyo
n’eby’amagara. Ekitongore eki nkimanwya nka Harvest Plus. Ekitongore
ekirikuhereza obuyambi omu Yuganda ekiri kumanwya nka USAID kuruga omuri
America  kiriyo nikikora na Yuganda  kwenda kwongyera aha ntuuragye
y’abanya Yuganda  hamwe n’okutunguura eby’obuhingi kurabira omu kwongyera
obwingi n’oburungi bw’ebyo ebiri kuruga omu buhingi. Ebi birimu ebyokurya
hamwe n’ebyokuguza kutunga aka sente. Embibo nsya y’ebitakuri eriyo neeza
kureetwa omu Yuganda kwenda kubuganira rwa gaati n'ebyo ebirikwetengwa omu
kyoma ekirikwongyera omutindo omu mbibo y’ebitakuri ebirikushangwa omuri
Kisoro. Yuganda ekatooranwa ahabwokuba abahingi b'ebitakuri ni bingi
barikwingana obucweka ana na buna ahari igaana(44%) aha bahingi omu Yuganda
kandi ebitakuri nibikwata omwanya gwa kaana omu kuriisa abanya Yuganda,”
Anna Marie Ball, manager wa Harvest Plus, ekitongore kimwe aha
bikukyondooza omu by’obuhingi obugyendereire kuhitsya emiryo mirungi hamwe
n’amagara marungi aha banya Yuganda. Minisiture y’eby’obuhingi,
enyamaishwa, n’obujubi eine obugabe, n’obujunaanizibwe kureeba ngu 
eby’oburiisa n’obuhingi nibigyenda kurungi omu maisho. Ekitebe
ekijunaniibwe eby’okurinda eby’embibo nikyoreka ku kiine obushoborozi
kurwanisa omwata, obukooko oburi kurya embibo, kandi kikahikiriza
ebishemereire kuba nibishohora aheeru y’ihanga. Entunguuka eriyo neeyorekwa
omu eby’abahingi bashemereire kukuraratira kwenda kwongyera omu mbibo
eziriyo nizihingwa omu Yuganda. Ebishemereire ku kuratirwa omu buhingi aha
rurengo rw'ensi yoona bikoorekwa omu rukiiko rw’eby’obuhingi omu ihanga,
orwabire aha hoteeri eya Golf Course omuri Kampala ebiro 25th 6 2015. omu
rukiiko oru rukooreka ku Yuganda neekora kubi omu kuta omu nkora emitendera
emisya eri kureetwa gavunmenti, abahingi 30% nibo bari kukozesa embibo
ezongyeiremu omutindo, 0.9% nibo barikuhinga bari kukozesa amaizi gatari
g’enjura kandi nibakye munonga abo abarikukozesa ebigimusa. Burungi bwansi
nayo neiza kugyemwa abantu kandi abo abara gyehare nibaza kuteebwaho faini
kwenda kutunguura abantu b’omubyaro n’omutawuni kandi n’okubinga obworo.
Ihanga erya South Korea naryo rikaraba omu burungi bwansi kuhika ahi riri.
Minisita wa za gavunmenti eza aha rurengo rwa disiturikiti, Adolf Mwesigye
nagira ngu burungi bwansi neyamba abantu b’omu bwaro kweyamba omu kubinga
obworo, kwetegyeka, kukura-kurana ebiteekyerezo byobo bya nyensya,
kurwanisa ibura ry’amashanyarazi, enguuto nungi obwo barikukwatanisiza
hamwe. Omujwekyerwa w’ihanha erya South Korea omu Uganga, Park Jong Dae
arikugambaho  aha bikwatireine na burungi bwansi ebiro 30th 07 2015, amu
maka gye kampala,  akagira ngu Korea ekatandikaho buringi bwansi omu mwaka
1970 kandi kikaba kiri ekigyemo buryomwe kukora n’abandi. Akongyera yaagiri
ku abantu bakakora bekundiire.  

Eby’obwegyese omu Yuganda birikurungi munonga ahabwokuba  abashaija 
abashomire, nibaingana 56.6%  kandi abakazi nibaingana 30.7%. Omu mwaka
1997 Purezidenti Museveni akatandikaho boona bashome aha rurengo rwa
purayimare kwenda kutunguura eby’obwegyese omu ihanga na boona bashome eya
secondary schools bwanyima y’emyaka ikumi ya boona bashome eya purayimare.
Eki kikakyendeeza  aha muhendo gw’abaana b’abishiki abirikuruga omu
mashomero kushwerwa bakiri bato. Yuganda aine ebyerikugyenderaho omu boona
bashome eya siniya ei yaatongwize omu 2007. Eki nikimanyisa ngu buri mwana
weena oraahike ebigyeze by’ekibiina kya mushanju n’obubonero 28 n’okugaruka
ahansi, naaza omu siniya ahabwa busha. Eki tikiri kumanyisa ngu buri mwana
oine emyaka y'okuza omu siniya naaza kuzamu. Ni gavunmenti aine
obushoborozi kuta abaana omu mashomero agu bashemereire kuzaamu.
Orikukurira eshomero erya King’s college, Budo ari kugambwaho n’abanya
mahurire kuruga omu rupapura orwa Daily Monitor naagira ngu kwenda kugumya
omutindo, bo nibaza kuronda abaana abo abarikukora kurungi munonga. Eki
nikimanyisa ngu, abaana abanyamugisha  abarikushomera omu mashomero marungi
kandi barikutunga obuyambi burikumara kuruga aha bazaire baabo nibo
barikuza omu mashomero marungi aga boona bashome eya siniya. Abo
abarikuruga omu mashomero mabi, n’amaka mabi, abarikubonaabona omu kushoma
kwabo, bakashomera omu mashomero mabi gateine bikozeso nk'ebitabo, bateine
bwire bwa home work babaasa butatunga kagisha. Ekyo nikireetaho ebibuuzo
nyamweingi nka: Hoona egi niyo boona bashome? Omu boona bashome eya 
purayimare, Yuganda eriyo neekora kurungi munonga, eki nikyorekwa omu
kushanga ngu omwojo n’omweshiki boona hati nibaza aha ishomero. Obwahati
buri mwana weena abaasa kumara omushomo goona ogaarikwenda obwo yaaba
yaakozire kurungi ebigyezo bye, omwana weena abaasa kumara emishomo ye eya
purayimare kuruga omu mwaka gwa 1997. Hariho abaana nyamwingi abashomire
omu mashomero ga boona bashome ababaasize kushomera busha aha ma yunivasite
gatari gamwe na gamwe geebembibwe eitendekyero erya Makerere. Gavunmenti
neeyoreka ku eine ekiteekateeko ky’okuhitsya obucweka igana ahari igana
(100%) bw’abaana abarikushomera busha aha rurengo rwona. Gavunmenti
egyerizeho kwombeka amatendekyero agaahaiguru obwo kwenda kwongyera aha
mitindo y’obwegyese  omu Yuganda. Amatendekyero nk'erya Makerere
Yunivaasite rikyasingireyo kushomeseza busha abaana aha rurengo rwa
yunivasite. Yuganda obwahati eriyo neehisya amayunivasite garikurenga
makumi ashatu na rumwe (31). Hariho amashomero g'abantu buntu agariyo
nigakoragye omu by’obwegyese, amashomero aga tigaine nshonga yoona
ahabwokuba gabatsize kutunguura eby’obwegyese omu Yuganda. Omu ihanga eri,
abantu batandikireho amashero kwenda kukora sente kwonka bebembeize
obwegyese. Kandi gariyo nigakora kurungi munonga.

Eby’amagara n’ekizibu kihango munonga ahabwokuba abantu nyamwingi barwaire
endwara zitari zimwe na zimwe zirikuhika omuri makumi ataano zeebembiirwe
siriimu. Abantu barikwingana miriyoni emwe  nari shi obucweka buna ahari
igana(4%) z’abanya Yuganda  beine akakooko ka siriimu. Okufa kw’abantu
nyamwingi, abaana b’ahansi y’emya etaano abarikwitwa akakooko ka siriimu
nibingana kinaana(80) aha baana rukumi (1000) abarikuzaarwa, abaana bakufa
bari ahansi y’emyaka etaano nibaingana 50 aha baana 1000 abari kuzaarwa,
kandi abarikuzaarwa n’akakooko ka sirimu nibaingana 38%.  Omu Yuganda
abantu beingi tibarikurya kurungi ahabw'okuba tibaine kumanya kuhango aha
kukozesa eby’okurya ebiine ebirisa byona. Abaana barikwingana 23% baine
endwara y’omunwyengyeberero ahabw'okurya kubi.

Eirwariro rya Mulago, n’irwariro rikuru ry’abantu buntu omu ihanga,
nirishangwa omu kibuga kikuru kya Kampala aharubaju rw'itendekyero rikuru
erya Makerere Yunivasite. Eri niryo irwariro ryonka ahu waakubaasa kushanga
emibazi mingi, omurwaire weena kwarikurwara ekirenga  bamutwara  omu
irwariro eri. Omu Yuganda twine amarwariro ikumi (10) agari aha rurengo
rw’eshonda z’ihanga againe emibazi erikumara ku gyeragyeranisa na
amarwariro aga health centre iv otaireho kiriniki eza abakugu ezirikukora
aha barwaire b’emitwe n’ezindi ndwara. Purezidenti Museven naagira ngu
 okukingira oburwire kishemereire kutandika omwana akiri omunda ya  nyina.
Ebi akabigamba obu yaabeire naigura eirwariro rikuru omu disituriki eya
Aru. Mr. Museveni akahabura abantu boona hamwe n’abashaho ku bashemereire
kwerinda endwara ezirikutambwa. Minisita w’ebyamagara, Dr. Elioda
Tumwesigye naashaba abantu ba Arua ku bata omu nkora ebi purezidenti
w’ihanga arikubagambira kwenda kwerinda obutashohoza sente nyamwingi
kurabira omu kuragurira oburwire, Museven naagira ngu oburwire noobaasa
kubukingira omwana atakazairwe kurabira omu kurya gye, ekirikureetera
abaana kukura baine amagara marungi. Mr. Museveni akagira ngu waamara
kuzaara, abazaire bashereire kureebeeka ngu omu omwana baamugyema kandi
baamuteeza akakatu ka pooriyo. Endwara nyingi omu Yuganda niziruga aha
miryo mibi, kunwya amaizi gatateekire, kuraara n’enyamaishwa nk'e nkoko,
embuzi, kapa, hamwe n'obutakozesa bihoroonyo. Abantu nya mwingi nibakozesa
ebitabura bwonko kandi ebi nk'etaabe nibireetaho kansa y’omukifuba.
omushwija gw’esiri gukiriyo niguteganisa eihanga eri, kandi gavumenti 
neekigushohorezaho sente nyamwingi. Kwenda kutunguura eby’amagara omu
Yuganda president naashaba abanya Yuganda abashomire obushaho abarikureka
eihanga ryabo bakaza aheeru kuronda emirimo y’esente nyingi ekirikureetera
eibura ry’abashaho omu Yuganda. Kwenda kukyedeeza akakooko ka sirimu
abashaija boona omu Yuganda bakashabwa ku bakuratira ehururu y’okurwanisa
akakooko ka siriimu kurabira omu ku siramura. Kurugirira aha kigombe
kye’eby’amagara omunsi yoona ekya World Health Organisation (WHO),
okusiramura omu bashaija nikikyendeza akabi k’okukwatwa akakooko ka siriimu
n’obucweka  nkaga ahari igana(60%). Kwonka omu Yuganda kukikoraho kurungi
tikyanguhi ahabwokuba tibaine bikozesibwa kandi n’emihendo eri ahaiguru.
Amarwariro gatari gamwe na gamwe nigasharira busha agandi maingi munonga go
nigenda sente kutandikira aha mitwaro ebiri(20000) n’okugaruka ehaiguru.
Ekindi kizibu kibarikushanga emyanya egi eri hare munonga kandi emihendo
y’ebiiruka eri aheiguru munonga. Abw’enshonga za sente, omurimo ogu guriyo
nigukorwaho omu myanya eya Kampala n’endiijo nka aha nyaja Victoria. 
Yuganda ku yatirwe ikirwire kya ebola omu Guru omu mwaka gwe 2000 ne
20014,minisiture y’ebyamagara ekarwana munonga kureebeka ngu yaabinga
oburwire obu kurabira omu nkora eyaatirweho gavnmenti. Omu bwire obu,
Yuganda eine omwanya gw’okubanza omu kurwanisa oburwire bwa ebbora. kwenda
kurwanisa omushwija gw’esiri, ehururu y’okubyama omu butimba bw’esiri eine
obucweka 89 ahari igana kandi minisiture y’ebyamagara ekahayo obutimba
burikwingana miriyoni abiri nimwe(21M) . Embaririra ya ruzaaro nayo eriyo
neeyongyera amaani ahabwokuba president museveni  naashaba abanya Yuganda
kugira omuhendo gw’abantu abaine amagara marungi.  Kuta aha mutindo nainga
shi okudabiriza amarwariro kuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho obwo buri kishengye
kyairwariro kuba kirimu ebitanda birikumara, Mulago ekatandika ku
dabirizibwa omu 2014 omu sente eza banka eya Afirika Development Bank.
Entebeekanisa ziriyo nizigyenda omu maisho kuhisya emotoka za  Amburensi
ziri kwingana 19 kandi emwe aha ryezo neeza omu irwariro erya Anaka.

 Eby’emizaano omu Yuganda biri ahansi ya minisiture y’obwegyese n’emizaano.
Ekizaaniro kikuru omu Yuganda  n’ekya Namboole Kampala nikishutamisa abantu
barikwingana 45,202. Omupiira n’omuzaano mukuru munonga omu ihanga.

Tiimu y’ihanga y’omupiira gw’ebigyere neemanwya nka Yuganda Crane. Tiimu
egi neeyebembwerwa ekigombe kirikukurira eby'omupiira omu Yuganda ekya
Federation of Yuganda Football Association (FUFA), ekaheruka kuza omu
kuhayana omu kikopo ky’amahanga ga Afirika aha mupiira ogw’ebigyere omu
mwaka ogwa 1978, orikutendeka abazaani ni bamweta  Milutin Sredojevic
kuruga omu ihanga erya Serbia. Tiimu egi tekazagaho omu kuhakanira ekikopo
kyensi yoona. Bingi nibikyetaagwa kukorwa kwenda kutunguura omupiira
gw'ebigyera omu Yuganda kwenda kuta akasheko aha matama g’abanya Yuganda.
Abazaani bakye nibo barikuzaana omupiira gw’esente omu nsi z’aheru.
Abazaani aba bariumu  Iburahim Ssekagya, Brian Omonyi, Yunis Ssetamu
n'abandi baingi. Ihanga rya Kenya ritwire obwire buraingwa ririkuhangura
emidaari ya za zaabu, y’efeeza nendiijo kwonka obutegyeki bubi
kubwahwireho  Docus Izukuru na Akii Bua  batandika kuhangura emidaari ya
zambu. Steven Kiprotich yaaba omushaija w’okubanza  kuruga omu Yuganda
kuhangura omudaari gwa zaabu ogwaherurikuhangurwa omu mwaka gwo 1972, Akii
Bua akasinga mitaazi 400 omumpaka za Olympics azaabeire omu kibuga Munich
eki kikabakora abazira b'ensi yoona kuruga omu Yuganda.  Tiimu y’omupiira
gw’engaro eya abakyara eya she cranes nayo neekora kurungi munonga omu
kutunguura eby’emizaano. Yuganda ekiremirwe kuta sente zirikumara omu
mizaano, omu mwaka gwa 2011 Phiona omuzaani w’omuzaano gwa Chess akaba
yasingire kuzaana omumpaka ze emizaano ya Afirika eya All Africa Games
kwonka akaburwa sente z’okumureeberera. Eki nikimanyisa ngu gavunmenti
eshemereire kutaho oburyo bwona hamwe n’amaani omu mizaano.
 

Tihariho eihanga eryakubaho riteine amahurire, Yuganda ni rimwe aha mahanga
agari kuha ekitiinisa abanya mahurire n’ahibarikukorera, orupapura orwa New
Vision nirwo rwebembeire ezindi omw’ihanga. Ezindi zirimu, Orumuri,
Bukedde, red pepper, kamunye, entasi, eireho empapura abantu nibahandiika
za magaziini, ebipande, kwendi kuhisya amakuru n’obutumwa aha bantu. Radio
na za tiivi naazo ni nyingi kandi nizihisya abutumwa aha bantu. Obusingye
 n’obugabe bw’abanyamahurire omu Yuganda tiburi kurungi ahabwokuba
nibateerwa ekoni, emyika ya tiyagasi, nibashashurwa kubi kandi sente ezi
ninkye munonga. Amateeka gamwe agari omu ngyenderwaho ye’ihanga gakooreka
ahi bashemereire kukoma baaba nibakora emirimo yaabo. Engyendererwaho
y’ihanga necumbatirira obugabe n’obusingye bwabo.  Agandi mateeka agariyo
nigakorwa agarimu eiteeka erikurwanisa ebisiyaga, eiteeka erya abari
b'enguzi, hamwe n’obushonshorekye oburi omu kitabo eky’emishango
n’ebibonerezo oteebirwe iteeka eriri ahakutunga okumanyisibwa erya Acess to
Information Act 2005, eritarikwikiriza muntu weena kushohoza ebihandiiko
ebirikugambwa omu rukiiko rw’abakuru omu ishengyero ry’eihanga. Amahurire
n’obu gaabaireho kandi n'amaraka g’abantu boona. Nigayamba abantu kumanya
ebiriyo nibigyenda omu maisho, ebi gavumenti eriyo nekora n’ebi erikuza
kukora. Omu bwire bw’obururu abantu nibantunga okumanyisibwa ebikwatiraine
n’akaruru kurabira omu mpapura z’amahurire nainga shi radio na television.
Okubonabona kw’abanyamahurire omu Yuganda nikukyeyongyera. Ekigombe
ekirikugaita abanyamahurire omu Yuganda ekya Yuganda Journalists Union
nikikyenera kimwe okuturugunwya kw’abanya mahurire. Kikaihirira ha kuhondwa-
hondwa kw’omunyamahurire wa tiivi eya WBS orikumanwya nka Joram Mwesigye
owu pooriisi yaatiire, ekakurura aha ruguto erikumutwara omu nkomo.

Yuganda tekabwine abakugu barikumara omu by’amahurire, nibakye munonga
abari kuhereza aha mareediyo g’omu byaro abashomire kandi bakahika aha
rurengo orwa za diguri. Eki kiriyo nikireetaho okuhenda amateeka
ahabw'okuba nooshanga batarikumanya engyendererwaho y’ihanga.
Eky’okureberaho akawayiro ka 40 na 43 bwa consititushoni oteebirwe aka 29
akiri kuheereza obugabe aha muntu weena kugamba ekyarikwenda.

kuruga ira-niira, abanyakore  bakaba basoma Ekitaaguriro, abakiga bateera 
Ekizino, bataagurira kushemererwa, abaganda bazina baakisimba, Nankasa,
muwongola,Basoga bazina Tamenaibuga, Irongo,Nalufuka, Bagisu Baiina mwanga.
Ebizino ebi nibiba bigyenderire kushomesa abaana b’abishiki ebi
bashemereire kukora baahika omu maka gaabo, kureetaho emicwe mirungi omu
baana bato. Omuri ankore hariyo abazini nk'aba Ndere troupe. Omu bizina ebi
bakaba bateera emukuri, enyungu, omubanda, engoma. Ebizina ebi harimu
kawahwa, emibanda, kahwahwe,kurungi ngweyo,ekyenshasha ekya katakura,
 omurimo gwangye n’ebindi. Oihireho ebizina ebyeira, okweshongora kuriyo
nikukwata ahansi n’ahiguru, abeeshongozi nyamwingi abaine ebiconco omu
kweshongora bashaziremu kuza omu kweshongora kwenda kutunga sente,
ebyeshongoro birimu ebya rukundo nka Niwe ekyayeshongwire Dianah, eby’edini
nka calendar. Hamwe nebindikwenda ekya Ray G, nabandi kuruga omu myanya
endiijo erimu kampala, Bunyoro otaireho n’aheeru y’ihanga.

Yuganda n’ihahagi eriine eby’obugaiga bwingi ebirimu eby’omwitaka, omu
mwanya nk'e ensya nungi eri kureetera abantu bayejumbira omu kuhinga
n’okuriisa, eby’omumaizi ahu abajubi bari kujuba ebyenyanja bakaihamu
akasente kukubaisaho eka zaabo, bakatwara abaana aha mashomero n’omushenyi
gw’okwombekyesa. Ihanga eri nirikuratira amateeka agari omu Ngyendererwaho
y’ihanga. Obuhingi n’oburiisa bibatsize kutunguura eihanga eri, nikigambwa
ngu amajuta/oil gabaasa kukyendeeza emihende y’ebintu kuruga aheeru
y’ihanga. Emishoro neeruga omu bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe. Ba musiga
nsimbi omu bintu ebi kutunguura Yuganda ni baruga aheeru y’ihanga kanda
abamwe n’abanya Yuganda. Obwa hati ihanga riine abashuubuzi baingi kuruga
omu ihanga n’aheru y’ihanga ahabw’obusingye n’ebyokwerinda ebitebekaine.
Abantu baaryo bashomire ahabwokuba emirimo mingi neyenda abantu
abashomireho. Yuganda neeyebembeza Ruhanga N’ihanga Ryangye.

<archive_file filename="EDITED ESSAYS/KA HENDEKE TEITA MBOGO (1).doc"> KAHENDEKE TEITA MBOGO

 Samuel Kamugisha mwene Mugisha

KAHENDEKE TEITA MBOGO n’ekitebyo kirikushoboorora enshonga zitari zimwe na
zimwe ezikwatiraine n’entuura y’abantu. Bimwe ahari ebyo ebirikugambwaho
birimu okwega, okukuza abaana, oburimanganyi, obutaikirizana omu ntwaza
ey’eriigyenda hamwe n’ey’ira, oburemeezi bw’okusherura emirimo hamwe
n’oburingaaniza. Obutungi niburigatsa obukyene reero rukundo ebumbatira
rwango obwo ekitebyo kirikuguma nikurukirwa omu mihiro egi.

Amagara ga Daudi Nkunda na Maria Karungi hamwe n’abo abu barikuhikaana nabo
omu ntuura yaabo y’obutoosha nigahanuura bingi kandi gaihayo enshonga
enkuru hamwe n’ebyegyeso.

Ekitebyo kyogosirwemu amashumi g’enfumu, okugyeragyeranisa hamwe n’okuteera
obushushani enyima omu ndiijo miringo y’entebya. Ebi ni bimwe ahari ebyo
ebigyendereire kumanyisa n’okwegyesa abashomi ahanshonga z’entuura y’ensi
ezitari zimwe na zimwe.

Ninkwendeza okushoma kurungi.

 Samuel Kamugisha mwene Mugisha

 Bushenyi, Uganda

 16 Nyairirwe, 2013

 EKICWEKA KY’OKUBANZA

 1

Daudi Nkunda akabureebera omu rwigi nka buriijo. Ebisho hakaba haija
nihahumuura, eizooba ryatandika kutooka mpaho ryamara okwezi amaani.
Akateera burangiti ogw’embaraasi, yaayenanuuramu kakye mpaho yaateera
ekibiriiti kuhemba ka kanduro.

 Akashengye ke kakaba kamiirwe amasha ahansi. Ebisiika bikaba bisiigirwe
omushenyi. Akaba agaitsire ebiti kukora ekitanda. Ebiti bikaba biri empimbi
bitari mbaaho. Obumwe ezo mbaaho zikaba ziteruka reero aimuka nyekiro
kuzitereeza. Akaba aguzire omufarasi, eshuuka hamwe na ka burangiti
akaabaire koogwamu embeho na munonga omu bwire bw’enjura.

Ekisiika kikaba kiijwiremu emisimaari ei yaabaire ahanikaho ebijwaro bye.
Aha kameeza ke akaabaire kari omu kishengye kye hakaba hariho akatabo ke ka
dayare, ebitabo ebindi, akacumu hamwe n’empapura. Ahansi y’akameeza hakaba
hariho akabokisi aku yaabaire naabiikamu ebinushu. Aha bisiika
by’ekishengye kye hakaba habambireho ekishushani ky’omwana wa Ruhanga.

Akateera orutimbi rw’aha rwigi, yaatsindika akaboroti k’aha rwigi, nikwo
kwiguraho, akashuka amaizi omu kikopo, akata omubazi gw’amaino aha buraashi
reero mpaho akashohora kweza amaino ge hamwe n’okunaaba aha maisho. Akarimi
k’eshaaha akagufu kakaba kaaheza kati kurigata omuri mukaaga reero bwo
bubiri obundi bukaba bwayeshumbire nka kaingana-busha omuri ikumi na ibiri.
Nkunda akaba ateire akade omu shaaha ye aku yaabaire ahaire omurimo
gw’okumwimusya aha nkoko. Egi niyo shaaha yonka eyabaaire eri omu ka ya
Yozefu Banturaki. Nkunda akaba ahingire za kabegi ze ezi yaabaire atwara
omu katare ka Rutookye akaguza.

Daudi Nkunda akaba ari omutsigazi w’emyaka nka ikumi na mwenda. Akaba yaija
naareeta akareju aku yaabaire atandikire kworora mpaho kakaba kaatandika
kwenda kuba nk’akareju k’empaya. Nyakareju kakaba kajwarana gye n’erangi
y’omubiri gwe erikwera. Akaba ari muraingwa, w’enyindo mpango esongoize.
Ekiraka kye kikaba kireetera baingi okugira ngu n’omushaija mukuru munonga.
Ku yaabaire agamba oshusha oti naagambira omu nyungu. Amaisho ge gakaba
gari mahango. Baitu gakaija gaarwara, reero abashaho b’amaisho baamuha za
garubindi ngu agume areeberemu mpaho banywani be baamweta maisho-ana.
Esaati n’empare bye bikaba bitiinisa enshohera ahabw’enkindo. Abamwe bakaba
bagira ngu enshohera yaarabaho neebaasa kuhutaazibwa orukindo.

Eri rikaba riri eizooba ry’okubanza ery’encuro y’okubanza omu mashomero
goona omu Uganda. Daudi akaba naaza kutandika kwegyesa omu kashomero ka
siniya akaabaire katandikire omwaka ogwo. Mushana High School kakaba kari
akashomero kakye waagyeragyeranisa n’amashomero mahango agaabaire gari
omuri Bushenyi.

Kakaba kaine akombeko kamwe karimu ebishengye bibiri baitu buri kimwe
kibaganisiibwemu kabiri n’embaaho. Abeegi kubaahuumurukire, baatandika
kwega baafumuramu emihengyere kwenda ngu bagume bahurizane na bagyenzi
baabo. Ebibiina bikaba bitasimintingirwe ahansi kandi omucuucu gukaba
guteera za jambo abeegi ku baabaire bataahamu na baaba nibashohora.
Enkororo zikaba enkororo zaashenyiga zaabasheera ebihande. Abeegi abamwe
bakaba bareka enkororo zaabo zikura reero batandika kuhigura oshusha oti
n’empaka z’okuhigura. Abaabaire baribatisa ebigyere nk’ente bakaba
beeshanga boona bari omucuucu oshusha oti nigwo basiibire nibanaaba.

Eishomero rikaba riine abeegyesa mushanju bonka abaabaire nibehuuba omu
bibiina bina eizooba ryona. Buri mwegyesa akaba aine makatara y’okwegyesa
amashomo gatari hansi y’abiri. Hakaba hatariho kaire k’okuteeka akabunu
ahansi. Eri niryo eishomero eri Daudi yaabaire ariyo naayeteguurira
kutandika kwegyesamu eizooba eryo kumara ameezi munaana. Akaba ari
omuhiirwa. N’oha owaabaire naabaasa kutunga omurimo omu kyanga kya Rutookye
arikuruga omu ka nk’eya Banturaki?

Daudi akaba amazire siniya ya mukaaga kand ari omu kihuumuro kiraingwa
n’ahabw’ekyo akaba aine okwezirika bikahama reero akakungaanya esente
z’okumuhwera aha Yunivasite. Nyamwojo akaba naayenda ngu ashome
eby’obushuubuzi ahari Makerere.

 2

Eizooba niryo rimwe Maria Karungi akaba naakwata nibiragara arikweteguurira
okugaruka Bweranyangi Girls’ kutandika siniya ya mukaaga. Karungi akaba
ariire za shukuukuru ikumi na munaana. Akaba ari omwishiki enyongore. Ku
yaabaire araba Omukatoogo, enshohera zeesiima zirikutaahira eminwa
y’abatsigazi. Ku yaabaire aba naatambura abamukurateire namunonga
abatsigazi basigarira ogw’okuteera entsibo obwo bagamuhangire. Akaba
akurize akashokye, ka paafu koona kari nk’obugaara. Akanyindo ke kakaba
kari nk’ak’abaraaro. Baingi bakaba bagira ngu waaba omwine omunju , nooba
otarikwetenga taara ahabw’okuba amaisho ge gakaba gari enyonyoozi.
 Karungi akaba
atuura ari omuntu arikukunda abantu. Abagurutsi n’abakaikuru ba Kabingo
bakaba bamugaaniiza ngu naamwenyerera nk’akasisi k’omwonyo gwa Katwe.

Akaimuka shaaha nka ibiri, yaimata akapeesha k’okwasya etaara reero
amashanyarazi agaabaire nigaruga omu kyoma kya genereeta hamwe n’ago
agaabaire niganyunyuutwa omu maranzi g’eizooba, yaayeshoka omu kinaabiro
ekyabaire kiri haihi n’orwigi rw’ekishengye kye. Ekishengye kye kikaba
kirimu ekyoma ky’ebaraafu eyaabaire epakiire eby’okunywa nk’amate, amaizi,
obutunda hamwe na za sooda. Ekitanda kye n’omufarasi gwakyo bikaba biri
rutaaba. Emeeza ye ekaba eriho arubamu eijwire ebishushani. Hakaba hariho
n’ebitabo by’eishomero hamwe na Baibuli y’Orungyereza. Tiivi ekaba eri omu
kishengye nikyo kimwe obwo erikuhuuhwa ka faani. Aha kisiika hakaba
habambirweho ebishushani bya Yesu hamwe n’obupande bwingi bwijwire ebibazo
bitari bimwe na bimwe ebyabaire birimu nk’ebi; GIRA OBUNTU, OBUNTU
BUKUREETERE ABANTU, ABANTU, BAKUREETERE EBINTU, KORERA ABANDI OMU MURINGO
OGU WAAKWENZIRE NGU NAIWE BAKUKOREREMU. ENKORA-BIRUNGI EBIZIMUURURWA, EKI
ORIKUBIBA NIKYO ORIKUSHAARUURA, AHAKUBA NIMMANYA EBI NDIKUBATEEKATEEKYERA,
EBY’OBURUNGI, BITARI BY’OBUBI.

Ku yaataaruukire okwo, yaamara eshaaha nk’emwe ariyo naayeboneza. Ekabada
ye ekaba neebooga amajuta g’okwesiiga hamwe n’emigaju y’ebika byona. Hariho
eyaabaire ehuumura kurungi oti n’omushongi gw’eby’okurya birungi kandi
n’egyo eyaabaire ehuumurira abandi kubi. Orubaju orundi rukaba nirukooja
n’ebijwaro ebyabaire nibiboogabooga omu kitukuru kya purasitiika. Ebi
bikaba nibiija kusigara omuka kandi gukaba guri omurimo gw’omukozi w’ahaka
kubyozya oti we Karungi yaabyozya emikono neecwekaho. Fabiano Mpairwe, ishe
wa Maria, akaba atenda ku omuhara abonaabona n’emirimo y’ahaka. Akaba akira
kwegambira ati, “Hoona nkore reero na muhara wangye akore?” Baitu we nyina
akaba akunda kureeba omuhara arikwejumbira munonga omu mirimo nk’egyo.
Ishe ku yaabaire aba tarimu, Jovinta Kendagaano agyenda n’omuhara hamwe
n’abakozi baza omu misiri y’omwani, amajaani, obutunda, hamwe n’ebindi
barengyezayo eizooba kandi Maria akaba ateetomboita. Eki Kendagaano akaba
akikora yaaba atagiire kwegyesa nk’omu wiikenda.

Ku yaaherize kwekoraho, yaashotooka mpora ahaihi ni omu iriiro ahu
yaashangire kyansya emutegyereize. Omukozi akaba aimukire kare shaaha nka
ikumi n’ibiri kukama, akaboneza kandi akatebeekanisa kyansya. Akaba akora
bundi ndogoya kureeba ngu enshaho ye yaasheka na shiringi emitwaro ebiri ya
Uganda ezi mukama we yaabaire amuha omu bwire. Ahabw’okugira ngu akaba
naashashurwa omu bwire, Badaada, omukozi hamwe n’abandi bataahi be bakaba
batakateekyerezaga kutaaha. Bakaba bakozire owa Fabiano kumara emyaka nka
ikumi. Ekyo nikyo kyakingire amaisho gaabo kikabeebesa ebijumo bya mukama
waabo obwo bagumize bati, “Ka hendeke teita mbogo”. Nangwa n’obumwe akaba
abaniha ey’embaraasi kandi obundi oti naayasya pikipiki, obwo nteebirwe
n’okubaigatira empi. Eizooba rimwe akatuma Badaada kumureetera sigara aha
buduuka onu yaakyererwa ahakuba akashanga ab’owa Mushabe batariyo yaabanza
kubasherura omu musiri. Ku yaagarukire yaashanga mukama we omunwa nigukira
enyindo, mpaho naayenda kubaruka nikwo kumwigatira oruhi ebyara bikakwata
aha itama reero ori akatanyangwa agumize ati, “Mumwake enyondo yaanozya”.
Abakozi abandi ku baabaire benda kumuganzya n’okumuzaanisa bamwijusya eryo
izooba.

 3

Obwire bukaba bwatandika kuhumiza mpora mpora baitu eizooba rikaba
nirikiitaitamu eriiso ryaryo. Godoni Ruhangariyo, muriraanwa wa Fabiano
Mpairwe yaakwata mpora yaija owa Yeremiya Turibamwe owaabaire ari mukuru
w’ekyaro kya Kabingo. Ababiri bakaba nibaatana emigorora. Gordon
Ruhangariyo akaba naakora emirimo ya reijareija. Egi ekaba erimu okuhwera
omu kwombeka amaju, ebinaabiro, za kamina, obutandaaro, ebiyungu, ebiju
by’embuzi n’enkoko hamwe n’okukora omu ntookye n’omu misiri. Akaba akora
ey’okugogoorora, okuteera eishansha, okuteera enkonya, okwitira hamwe
n’okucwanyaguza ebitumba omu ntookye z’abantu. Hoona nabwo akaba ahwera omu
kubyara, okwombera, okushaaruura, okwanika hamwe n’okuhuura amashaaruura
nk’ebihimba hamwe n’oburo.

Ruhangariyo akaba ari nk’omu myaka ya makumi ataano baitu akaba ataine
mukazi n’obu yaabaire aine abaana babiri b’abaishiki. Omwe akaba
yaashweirwe baitu ondi, Ayiriini Kyomuhendo, akaba amazire okushoma
obwakaraani baitu atakatungire murimo. Omukazi wa Ruhangariyo akaba afiire
emyaka nk’etaano enyimaho. Kugira ngu akaba ataine sente z’okumara kujuga
kandi nabwo hoona yaagizire abaana bakuru, eby’okushwera omukazi ondiijo
akabyeteisa nk’oku enkoko yaayeteisize kyakiro. Akaba ari omushaija
owaabaire naakunda munonga Ruhanga kandi arikwejumbira omu mirimo y’ekanisa
namunonga ey’okukunira abagyenyi b’ekanisa – akaba ari mukuru w’obufura.
Akaba naakunda kugaaniira. Ahu yaabaire aba ari okaba ohurira esheko zonka.
 Akaba naatebya kurungi kandi abaingi bakaba bashanga ebigaaniiro bye biri
eby’obwengye. Nangwa na bamwe bakaba bamwijaho kusherura obuhabuzi.

Akaba ari omushaija mugufu akagatsire. Omutwe gwe gukaba gwatandikire
kutaahiirirwa enju, amaisho ge gaatandikire kutukura, ahamaisho
haatandikire kufunyanyara, emikono n’amaguru bikaba bireegire n’emisi
erikureebeka. Amaino ge gakaba gaatandikire kuhindura erangi. Gakaba gatari
kwera kandi gatari kitaka. Abamwe bakaba bagira ngu entumbwe ze
nink’ez’abaitsire Yesu abandi ngu nink’ez’abareegi b’engoma beete abaremi.
Ekyo we akaba akitwara omu mutima murungi nangwa ayongyera abashesya ku ari
ekikaaka nka bene Anaka ab’omu Kitabo Ekirikwera abu entatsi za Isiraeli
zaareebire zikatiina, zikashushana nk’ensenene omu maisho gaabo.
Ruhangariyo akaba naashesya kandi kikaba kigumire kushanga anyiigire. Ku
byabaire bikiikama agira ati, “Ruhanga ariyo!” Mpaho abaana bamugira ngu
yaayegamba taraakure nawe abagarukamu ati, “Naaba ninkyenda kukura ogwa
kangahi?”

Baitu omwabazyo ogwo, Ruhangariyo akaba aijwire omwirima aha maisho kandi
amaisho ge garikushushana nk’agari kwenda kutoonya obusaasi. Owaabaire
amureeba amanya ngu buzima kwo omutima gwe nigubooga obujune. Abantu boona
abu yaarabireho bakaba bagambirana bati, “Ogu mushaija abeireki?” Ku
yaarabire aha buduuka bw’Omukatoogo, yaayakura abaabaire bariho baitu
baingi baamanya ku omushongi gw’eiraka rye gutari nk’ogwa butoosha, mpaho
baamanya ku aine oburemeezi. Abasinzi abaabaire bari aho baamutambikira
ebigambo ngu aije ahuute ka waragi obundi akaayebwa enaku. Omutwe gwe ku
gwabaire gutakamizirwe orushaka orwabaire nirwakiira abagyenyi ba Yeremiya,
Ruhangariyo nikwo kubahurira akabagira ati, “Manya ago nirwongyerera-
maganya nk’owaashabire omukazi ari kurumwa. Ekitabo ekirikwera kigeeta
omuteezi w’enaku”

 4

Nkunda akasiimuura aha maisho yaiha amajuta ge omu kamoori, yaayesiiga,
yaakora ekishunshura aha meeza eyaabaire eri omu kishengye ky’okushutamamu.
Ku yaabaire ari haihi kukiigatira omu mutwe gwe yaijuka ku amweire omu
mwebazyo. Akateerateera ekishunshura aha kameeza haarugamu eishokye
riraingwa ahakuba nyina Mangyeri akaba akyejunise kutereeza eishokye rye.
Akajwara empare erikwiragura, yaajwara esaati ya mutare mpaho yaanaanika
enkaito ye ya mushonsyo omu bigyere.

Akashohoza akagaari ke. Kakaba kakuziibwe emirimo baitu kakirikubaasa
kumutwara. Akaba amanyiriire kusiiba na nyakagaari owa ba makanika. Ku
kaabaire kaba katafiire bureeki biri omupiira gwine ekituri, kandi kaaba
kataine kituri biri orujegyere rugutukire. Eky’omugisha murungi akagaari ke
kakaba katakamuhonorahoga n’obu karabe kabaire kamuteera owa ishe-butaaka
bwasya-bwira. Eizooba rimwe akaba aheekireho munywani we ow’ahamara, Paulo
Baguma, akagaari kaahwamu za bureeki nikwo kubarundura omu ruhanga. Daudi
akagurukaho reero kaateera Paulo ahansi baitu nawe tarasiisikaire munonga.
Kwiha obwo, nyamwojo akarahira obutarigarukira kuheeka omuntu weena aha
kagaari ke ahakuba ekyo kikaba nikiteeka amagara gaabo omu kamwenda.

Ku yaabaire naashohoza akagaari, nyina Mangyeri yaamwakura n’onu yaamwetaba
batyo baatengyerana eizooba rirungi. Mangyeri akaba ari omukazi w’emyaka
nka makumi ana n’etaano. Akaba azaire abaishiki babiri kandi boona bakaba
baashweirwe. Omuhara omukuru Jowana Naamara akaba ashweire omushaija
orikukora omu bikomera, Raimondi Mukiza. Jowana akaba naakunda kuza omu
butare. Orwokubanza akaba aza Kizinda, Orwakabiri aza Kagango, Orwakashatu
aza Kaamabaare reero Orwakana aza Rutookye. Akaba akomire omu kibiina kya
mushanju ahabw’okutsibaaza. Ahu yaagyereire kuheza puriimare akaba aine
emyaka makumi abiri. Akaba atsigaire omu bibiina emirundi etari hansi ya
mushanju. N’ahabw’ekyo ku yaarugire ati omu ishomero, yaayehayo kutunga
diiguri omu butare, ebikomera n’obujaagiro. Ku yaabaire aba ataine sente,
aragara omu biti by’omwani, atookooza, mpaka ahikize eziraamutware. Obumwe
akaba anoga ebitumbwe bingi akigutwara owa Muramuzi, omushuubuzi w’omwani
ayanga kumuha sente. N’obu araabe yaabaire ari omwishiki, akaba naatemba
bundi-kishaija. Okaba omushanga atembire omu biti by’omwani obukindi
nibumwereera. Ishe, Yozefu Banturaki, akaza kumuta omu ishomero
ry’okwegyesa eby’emikono onu yaayanga agumize ati, “Ag’okwega
tibaragampeire”. Okwo omubutare niyo yaabugaine Mukiza ameezi mukaaga
amazire kuheza ekibiina kya mushanju.

Omuhara ondiijo akaba naayetwa Jesika Naatukunda. Jesika ku yaamazire
siniya ya kana yaayega eby’okukoma eishokye. Ameezi nka munaana amazire
kushoma ogwo mwoga, akatunga omushaija w’omwegyesa, yaamugamba obugyenyi.

 5

Karungi ku yaaherize kuroga enjoka, obwo arikuzibeihabeihisa entagata,
yaatandika kweteguura kugaruka ah’eishomero. Eshanduukye ye y’ebintu ekaba
eraire etebeekanisiibwe, n’ahabw’ekyo akaba atsigaize ogw’amaragaane na
banywani be abaabaire nibashomera omu gandi mashomero. Munywani we
ow’ahanda akaba naayetwa Piisi Busingye. Piisi akaba naayegyera omu
ishomero rya siniya erya Nyabubaare kandi boona bakaba bari omu kibiina
kimwe. Bakaba bakuzire kumwe kuruga omu buto. Abantu bakaba bakira
kuzaanisa Piisi ahabw’okugira amaziina abiri gombi gaine amakuru gamwe
baitu we Karungi akaba amugira ati, “Huumura kanywani, ti rubanja rwawe.
Abaakwetsire ago maziina bakaba baine enshonga”.

Ababiri bakashutama omu kishengye kya Karungi baagaaniira okuhisya obu
baija kubamanyisa ku kyamushana yaasya. Bakagaaniira ahaby’okushoma,
baaragaana kuguma nibahandiikirana okuhisya obu encuro eraahwe. Piisi
akaragaanisa Karungi ku arikwija ku mutayaayira ah’eizooba ry’okutayaayira
abeegi eri baabaire beeta vidiihi. Bakongyera baagaaniira n’aha nshonga
z’abakundwa baabo. Karungi akatsiga yaashaba munywani we ku aguma naamanya
abaishiki abu Daudi Nkunda arikutambura nabo.

 6

Ruhangariyo akahika omwa Yeremiya Turibamwe shaaha emwe y’omwebazyo
erikubanzibwa edakiika nka ikumi na itaano.

Osiibire kurungi muka Chaimaani?

Nsiibire kurungi? Ni buhooro okwo?

Muka Ceyamaani, omuky. Aneti Kyokushaba, akaba ari omukazi arikutaasya eka.
Ku yaareebire Ruhangariyo naakooza yaamanya ngu haine ekishobire.

“Yeremiya arimu?”

“Tarimu, yaaba agiire omu tauni kwonka nyine amatsiko ngu arihaihi
kwegaranjura aha. Kwonka shi ni buhooro?

“Mbwenu k’okundeka, ni buhooro na nkahi.”

Kyokushaba akaigurira omugyenyi wa iba yaataaha omunju, nikwo kumwakiiza
egiraasi y’ekitiribiita. Nyamugyenyi akateeramu emisha nk’eshatu, egiraaasi
yaaba bwomoomo. Ku yaamazire kuteera nyakagiraasi pooshi, yaateera
ekiruhuuko obwo agumize ati, “Ka zaare!”

Kyokushaba akamushukiramu endiijo giraasi, ei yaanyweire naayeshotoora.

Ku baabaire bakiri aho, Ceyamaani yaatabiirira. Akatangaara kushanga abantu
barikugambira omu nju, orwigi rutakingire hatarimu tabaaza kandi manya obwo
zikaba zaabaire shaaha nk’emwe n’ekicweka. Ahabw’embuga yaabo kwetooroorwa
emiti, akabira aharubaju rwa buryo hamwe n’orutookye aharubaju rwa bumosho,
omwirima gukaba gurahuka kutaaha omunju. Shaaha nk’ikumi na ibiri okaba
oshanga enju yoona yaabaire ndindindi. Kandi uwe Ruhangariyo akaba
amanyiire kuhemba shaaha nka ishatu nangwa n’obumwe akaba ariira aha kwezi.
Yeremiya akaba naija kugabwa ayombire ahabw’okushanga enju etakingire.
Akaba atenda ku emibu etaaha omunju ahakuba akaba atenda kubyama mu katimba
k’ensiri aku yaabaire agira ngu nikareeta ekibiga kingi. Obumwe akaba
aimuka omu itumbi akakomoorora reero nazo ensiri ziraara nizimweshongorera
n’okujunjuuta kwazo oteebirwe n’okumuruma, okashanga omubiri gwona
gutumbire omu kasheeshe.

“Ryarenga buhooro?”

Omukazi we niwe yaabandize kumugarukamu,“Eego Sebo.”

“Eego Chaimaani”

“Ruhangariyo, biri obaire aha, ni buhooro?”

“Ni buhooro Chaimaani.”

“Buzima?”

Kyokushaba akashotooka mpora yaakinga orwigi, yaahemba etaara nikwo
kweshoka omu kiyungu ei yaajumbukire na ka chai ka Chaimaani. Gakaba gari
amate omu furasika rutaaba gashendekyereziibwe esohaani eboogire emigaate
ekuratiirwe endiijo erikukooja n’ebinyoobwa bikarangire. Ebyo nibyo
Chaimaani yaabaire ainukiraho atakatangireire kyakiro y’ekiihuro rweiguuga.

“Weeza eshagama neeruga omu rushandago.” Ekyo nikyo Ruhangariyo
yaateekateekire obwo yaamara kureeba Chaimaani owaabaire aine orubondo
rurikubwegabwega nk’orwa mukama w’enkyebebe. Omutwe gwe gukaba guri
nk’omupiira gushagatiirwe ebigojo n’emihiro, enyima n’omu maisho. Akaba
naatuuheera ahabw’okuvuga ka pikipiki kuruga Ishaka mpaka Kabingo. Aha
maisho ge hakaba hajubiibwe etuutu orikushusha oti baamunaabisa omu mugyera
gwa Ncwera.

 8

Nkunda eizooba ry’okubanza rikaba rimugyendeire buhooro. Egaari ye ei
yaabaire naayerarikiira ahabwa bureeki zaayo ezaabaire zaahonzire ahansi
munywani we ow’ahamara rikarenga etamurundwire hansi. Akavuga mpora mpora,
yaaguma naaraba aha beegi abaabaire nibakwata nibiragara ngu batakyerererwa
bakabateera ezi Mbaguta yaateire muha. Gukaba guri omucwe kuteera abeegi
eminyaafu omu mashomero obwire obwo. Baingi bakaba nibaikiriza ngu
okunyafura abeegi nikibareetera baagira obwengye.

Abeegyesa bakaba batuma abeegi eminyaafu y’okubatsibura. Omwegyesa akaba
aine obushoboorozi kuteera ahu yaasiima kuteera. Rukaba rutari rubanja
kunyafura omu mugongo, aha maguru, emikono, omutwe, omu bitsya hamwe n’aha
kibunu. Abeegi baingi bakaba barahuka kumanyiira eminyaafu eyaabaire
ebateerwa aha kibunu. Ku baabaire beega emiringo y’okugumira nyaminyaafu ei
baabaire beeta okugifurizinga, nikwo okugihorohoza, batandika kwesiimirana
abeegyesa bagumize bati, “Kibooko n’omuyaga, ekibunu n’eibumba.” Abamwe
bakaba bajwara empare na za sikaati nyingi kwenda kutangira eminyaafu
okubasaasa.

Omu muhanda ogwo hakaba harimu abeegi babiri ebihanda abu baabaire
babingire omu ishomero rimwe omuri Kampala kwonka bari enzaarwa za Kibingo.
Aba baakashekyerera egaari ya Nkunda. Egaari ye n’obu eraabe yaabaire
neeshusha nk’eyaahonire omwegyemure gwa Noa, ekaba eine ekerengyere nsya.
Nyaboojo ku baagireebire nikwo kumugira ngu aguze ekerengyere agure egaari,
ekyareeteire abeegi abaabaire bari omu muhanda baasheka baarya ebinyansi.
Abantu abaabaire bahingire haihi n’orwo ruguuto orurikuza Rutookye bakagwa
omu katangaaro. Eki tikiramugwisize kubi ahakuba tigwo gwabaire guri
ogw’okubanza kukihuurira.

Nyaboojo babiri bakaba nibaza omu kibiina kya kana. Bakaba bari
baarurangaanwa omu micwe mibi. Bakaba baine ebishaka aha mutwe ngu
n’eishokye, bajweire ebisaati biine obumata, bagyenda ebisaati
bijangariire, bari baaruyombagatana, baagunyweka kandi omu kuganzya abandi
bakamba bainemu akati.

Nyaboojo ku baatandikire nibahika bati omu kibiina baashutama omu ntebe
y’enyima eyaabaire eri omu kashonda. Ahabw’eishomero kuba risya rikaba
riine n’abeegi basya, abaingi batamanyiine okwihaho nyaboojo babiri.

Omu kibiina hakabanzamu omushomesa w’eishomo ry’emibazi erimanywa nka
Kemisiture, owaabaire naamanywa nka Bumbakare. Akaba ari omushaija
w’oruhara rurikwengyengyeta omu kashana baitu obumwe akaba ajwara
akakofiira k’abasiraamu. Akaba aine omureju muraingwa kandi obumwe ku
yaabaire aba naarya ashanga gwatangire engaro omusohaani. Akaba akira
kujwara empare za bishatu bya kana , reero omubigyere anaanikamu enkaito na
zaasokisi za mutare.

“Amaziina gangye niinye Bumbakare Muhamadi”

Ku yaamazireyo ati abeegi bateera engaro n’akaari k’okumutangiirira. Abamwe
bakateera za desiki zaabo, reero abandi baateera ahansi ebigyere byabo,
ecuucu yaayereera.

“Niinyija kuba nimbatwara omu ishomo rya Kemisiture”

Aho engaro n’akaari tibirabeire bingi. Abeegi bakaba batari banyamikago ba
Kemisiture. Baingi bakaba bagira ngu n’amaino-ga-ruguru. Nk’eiteeka buri
mwegi omu siniya akaba aine okushoma Kemisiture. Boona bakakyemera kwonka
bakaba batakikunzire. Ku bataragyemirwe, Kemisiture ekaba neetwarwa
bigahwa. Manya nabo bakaba nibatiina, bakaba nibasinga. Abeegi abubaabaire
bakuratiire omu mashomero agu baabaire barugiremu bakaba bakizire kutunga
enkoni za ba biishoopu omu ishomo niryo rimwe.

“Hati n’imwe mweyanjure. Abeegi bataahi baanyu babamanye naanye mbamanye.”

“Nyowe nibaanyeta Sipayidamaani.”

“Kandi nyowe nibaanyeta Baadimani.”

Nyaboojo babiri kubaamazire kweyanjura, kiraasi yoona yaagira eti hwaaa,
baasheka barya ebinyansi.

“Tinaija aha kuzaana n’imwe”

Ahonaaho, omwirima gukajwara aha maisho ha Bumbakare. Akaba atakira kukunda
kushiisa omwanya.

“Naabuuza amaziina gaanyu ba sebo”

“Nyowe nibaanyeta Sipayidamaani”

“Kandi nyowe nibaanyeta Baadimani”

Abeegi bakaatika baasheka. Abaabaire bari omu kibiina kyakashatu nabo
baasheka ahakuba bakaba bahuriire ebyabaire nibigyenda omu maisho omu
kibiina kya kana. Eryo izooba, ondiijo mutsigazi omukibiina kya kashatu
akatandika kufumura omuhengyere omu kibaaho ekyabaire nikyatanisa ebibiina
bibiri. Aha muheru gwa wiiki y’okubanza akaba naabaasa kuhurizana kurungi
na Sipayidamaani hamwe na mugyenzi we Baatimaani baitu bambe bakaba
baamizirwe ensi.

Bumbakare akareega oruhi yaareeguura Sipayidamaani yaabanga orundi
yaarubandika Baatimaani, abeegi boona baakwata aha minwa reero ebibiina
byona byagira ngu ceceku!

“Maani, ogu gaayi yanteera omuteehimbwa?”

“Nikireebeeka nyowe yanteeza enyondo.”

Sipayidamaani na Baatimaani ku baamazire kugambirana batyo, ekibiina
kyayatika kyasheka. Mpaho Bumbakare akababuuza ogundi murundi, batyo
baamwesiza nikwo kubabinga omu kibiina kye ah’eizooba rya kyabugyenyi.
Abeegi abandi bakeeyanjura boona emitima ebari omu kanwa. Bakababeemerera,
bagamba amaziina gaabo n’ahu babaire nibashomera. Ku haabaire nihaburayo
omuntu omwe ekide kyagamba nikwo Bumbakare kubasiibura akashohora.

Omwegyesa owaakuratsireho akaba ari Daudi Nkunda. Sipayidamaani na
Baatimaani ku baamureebire baayekanga. Bakashohora n’ebyabo baamirwa ensi.
Abandi beegi tibaramanyire nshonga yaabatwara okwihaho abo abu baizire
nabo. Nibwo baamanya ngu omushaija ou baabugana omukasheeshe n’omwegyesa
waabo.

“Muraire kurungi abeegi?”

“Turaire kurungi Sebo?”

“Amaziina ndi Daudi Nkunda”

Abeegi bakamuteerera omu ngaro. Baitu ku zaabaire nizikigamba yaareeba
omutwe gurikuringuuririza omu muhengyere ogwabaire gufumwirwe omu kibaaho
ekyabaire nikitaanisa siniya ya kana hamwe na siniya ya kashatu.

“Mutsigazi we yetware!”

Abeegi abamwe bakareeba nyakatsigazi kakye baasheka kandi ko kaabura
kumanya ku omwegyesa akateireho abiri.

“Kare. Ogwo reka tuwime amaisho”

“Niinyija kuba nimbegyesa Orungyereza”

 EKICWEKA KYA KABIRI

 1

Ayiriini Kyomuhendo akaba asiibiire owa nyinento owa Nkuuna. Eizooba eryo
akaraarayo ekiro kyona bwasheesha. Akaba asiibire arikuhwera nyinento
kuhuumurusya abaana. Nyinento, Jovanisi Naashaba akaba aine abaana bato,
omujigaijo guri omu kibiina kya mukaaga kandi obwo akaba agugwize.

Ku yaahurire ngu omuhara amazire obwakaraani, yaatandika kumusheruurira
omushaija. Ayiriini na Jovanisi bakaba nibakundana munonga. Jovanisi akaba
naakiza Ayiriini emyaka nka munaana yonka. Nyina wa Ayiriini ku yaafeire,
nyinento yaamuhuumuririza reero omukago gwayeyongyera. Jovanisi akaba
arezireho nyamwishiki omu buto bwe.

Ku baamazire kyamushana ah’eizooba rya kabiri ry’oruzinduko rwe, ababiri
baashutama aha mukyeka ahansi y’ekiti ky’omuyembe ogwabaire guri omu
kibuga.

“Kaanyesige ngu tihaine ahureire ebitwaza kugamba, muhara wangye”

“Oihireho ow’ahaiguru, nyakwento”

Ayiriini ku yaabaire atakakiherize omu kanwa, omuyembe gwaragara gwateera
rwagati yaabo boona baaguruka baakanga owa nyakacu obwo nyinento we
arikumanya ngu owaaba ari ahaiguru yaahanantukayo”

Eizooba rimwe omushaija akaza kwiba na mutabani we. Baakwata omuhoro
n’efuka baaza kwiha muhogo ei baabaire batabyaire. Nyamushaija akagambira
omutabani ati iwe guma nooreebareeba, ku haakugira owaija kutukwata
ongambira batanjandura bukaba obuhano.

Omushaija ku yaabaire akiriyo naiha muhogo atakaihireyo na munwa gumwe,
yaabuuza omutabani ati, “Haine oriyo?”

“Eshonda ina tihaine ou ndikureeba kwonka Ow’ahaiguru agatuteireho”

Nyamushaija akamanya ngu baamureeba nikwo kushaba akabunu amaguru, akairuka
buguru-butakora-hansi. Akaija kwijuka ngu yaayebwayo efuka n’omuhoro ebi
yaabaire amazire kwiha ow’omuheesi enshumi nkye.

“Kwonka mutabani waareeba oha?”

“Tihaine waaba ariyo, naaba niimanyisa ngu Ruhanga ariyo naatureeba ahakuba
omubuurizi akatugira ngu aine ekiisho kihango.”

Omutima ku gwamugarukire omunda, yaatandika kugaaniira n’omuhara.

“Ongizire ngu obwakaraani obuherize?”

“Eego, yebare kunshabira”

“Hati shi ekirikukurataho n’enki?”

“Ninja kusherura omurimo.”

“Ebyo waatandikire mwana wangye. Nyowe ka ningira ngu okatungire omushaija
oshwerwa?”

“Ruhanga rwangye!”

“Otatangaara. Nambwebu nyowe mbaire naakureebeireyo”

Ku yaabaire ariyo naakimarayo yaareeba Ayiriini yaahinduriza aha maisho,
yaamanya ngu ebi yaamugambira byamugwitsa kubi. Ekyo kikareetaho akaceceko.

“Ngire ngu eki nikyo ki abaire anyeteire? Nyowe mbaire mushabire omushaija?
Kwonka nikireebeka n’omurimo gwe.”

Ayiriini ku yaarugire omu itobe y’ebyo bibuuzo, yaagambira nyinento ku
arikwenda kugaruka owaabo. Iba wa Jovanisi akaba atarimu, akaba agiire omu
ruzinduko. Buri omwe akaba naamumanya ahabw’okukunda abakazi. Ogu gukaba
guri omurundi gw’okubanza Ayiriini kutayaayira nyinento n’okuraara
akaraara. Kwiha yaatandika kunyeeta iba wa Jovanisi akaba amureebesa
eriisho ririkwaka rukundo kandi eki kikeeraarikiriza Jovanisi.

Ayiriini akaba amaririire obutashwerwa atakaboine murimo akatunga esente
z’okuhwera ishe Ruhangariyo. Eki kikagwisa kubi nyinento owaabaire
yaamutungire omushaija owaabaire naavuga takisi aha ruguuto rwa Ishaka-
Rutookye. Ayiriini akaba naamanya ngu ti kyorobi kutunga omurimo ebiro
ebyo ahakuba baingi abaabaire barikumukiza obwegyese bakaba batambwire
enguuto za Kampala barikusherura emirimo egumize eti ndahi. Baitu nabwo
akaba atarikwenda kwiruka kwenaga omu bushwere ataine kuyaayekoreire
ahakuba okubinga abakazi gukaba guhindikiremu omuhango. Nyinento akaba
ayangaine emirundi etari hansi y’etaano omu mwaka gumwe gwonka. Akaba
akwata iba n’abakazi abandi reero abanza ayangana akiza kugarukayo ashanga
ataahize. Baitu eky’omugisha murungi, ku yaabaire agaruka ababinga.

 2

Ku yaagarukire omuka yaateekyerereza ishe eki nyinento yaamugambira. Ishe
akaba atarikumanya eki araamugarukemu. Omutima gwe gukaba nigutoonya
obujune ahabw’enshonga z’eitaka eri Fabiano yaabaire ariyo naayeteguurira
kuryangatanisa. Buri izooba akaba akuura omugoorora aguma naahangusya
eitaka rye.

Akaba arugire owa Chaimaani owaabaire amugizire ngu agarukye aha Saabiiti
ahakuba akaba aruhire. Obwire obu yaamazire owa mukuru w’ekyaro bukafa
busha oihireho egiraasi ibiri z’ekitiribiita ezi Aneti Kyokushaba yaabaire
amuhaire. N’obu Turibamwe yaamwesire kurya nawe, Ruhangariyo akatiina
ahakuba nyamushaija bakaba nibamumanya nk’omushuma. Kandi hoona nabwo akaba
naateekateeka aha naku y’okwibwaho eitaka.

N’ahabw’ekyo enju yaabo ekiro ekyo ekaraara neetoonya obujune n’amaganya
ahabw’emirabanamu erikureebeka nk’eyaabaire yaatandika oruzinduko rwayo
omuka ya Ruhangariyo. Emirabanamu egi ekaba egwire nk’enjura. Ekaba eri
omugyenyi ataine kaadi, eri kibwetaasya baitu etaizire kumaraho obwire
bukye.

Ruhangariyo akateeka amaju ahansi gaajwarana n’akacuucu, yaahanika emikono
ahaiguru yaatandika kutakira Ruhanga,

“Ruhanga nimmanya ngu oriho kandi nooreeba enaku yangye. Ngirira embabazi.”

Ku yaahikire aho eby’okushaba byahwahyo – ekicweka kyagarukira aho, omuhara
yaakwata omuhanda yaaza omu kishengye kye yaayejumbika omu kitanda. Ku
yaagweire ati aha kitanda yaayebwa kweshweka. N’obu haabaire hariho embeho
ei bamwe baabaire bahurira omu mishokooro, we akaraara naatuutuka obwo
eriisho arigunwire. Akaraara omu kibira ky’ebiteekateeko. Akabanza
yaateekateeka aha bi nyinento yaamugambira, yaatekateeka aha buremeezi obu
ishe yaabaire naarabamu mpaho yaateekateeka aha by’okusherura emirimo.
Akaijuka omwishiki munywani we, Ketura Kekirunga ou munywani we yaatwire
Buganda kusherura emirimo. Ku yaahikireyo yaamutwara kukora omurimo
gw’obwamaraaya ogu nawe yaabaire aherizemu emyaka ebiri. Ayiriini akaba
atarikwenda kuba atyo.

Ngu engozi ya muha teheeka oti ka yaaheekire nyakufa. N’ahabw’ekyo akacwamu
obutatwarwa muntu ou atari kwetegyereza kurungi ngu naaza kumusheruurira
omurimo. Ketura akaba aija omu kyaro aha Nohiri bareeba naabereshera baitu
baingi bakaba batamanya eki akora Buganda.

Eizooba rimwe omu ka huumuro ka Nohiri, Ayiriini akeekiikana Ketura
yaamuteekyerereza byona ebyamubaireho.

“Naanye bambe nkaba ntakunzire ngunze kuguza omubiri gwangye kandi tihaine
muntu yaabaire naateekateeka ngu nimbaasa kukora ekintu nk’ekyo. Baingi
bakaba nibaamanya nk’omurokore – ow’eishemwe kashushu, ou barikukutuma
okatwara. Ku naaherize kwega eby’okuteeka, munywani wangye Arisi Kyarimpa
yantwara Kampala ngu aze kunsheruurira emirimo y’okukora omu hoteeeri.
Nkaba ngyerizeho kusherura emirimo baitu ekaba embereire amaino-ga-ruguru.

“Hoona shi kanywani ka ntainemu na simooni n’emwe”

“Otafayo niinyija kukusigira ez’entambura reero onshangye Kampala.
Oraazingaruurira ku orizitunga”

Eryo izooba amashemererwa gakandemesa n’okurya. Nkareeba ku buzima kwo
Arisi ari munywani wangye ow’ahanda kandi ori kunfaho.

Nkatandika kweteguurira orugyendo rw’okuza Buganda nkaza kusherura esente.
Obwire ku bwahikire obwa Arisi kugaruka Kampala, nkatandika kumuhwera
kumutebeekanisiza ebintu ebi yaabaire naija kutwara Buganda. Okutu kwa
Arisi kukaba kutaruga aha simu. Akaba agamba n’abantu abaingi, ogu akiba
atakaherize, ondiijo aba yaateire, za haro zaaba za haro.

Nkamutengyera orugyendo rurungi kandi twaragaana ngu mushange Kampala
ahanyima y’ebiro bibiri. Nkaba niinyija kumushanga omu baasi paaka
antegyereize.

Nkasimbura shaaha nk’emwe naaza aha kooru-bokisi naamuteerera esimu
kumumanyisa kunaasimbura hamwe n’okumugambira ekika kya baasi eki naatemba.
Nkamuraganisa kuguma niimumanyisa ahu baasi yaahika obwo ndikwejunisa esimu
z’abantu abaabire bari omu baasi.

Shaaha nka mwenda nk’egaranjura Kampala reero maawe naareebera okutangaara.
Nkamanya nti tinaatuma naayehikira ahakuba omutima gukampamiza ku naabaire
ntarikubaasa kuburwa omurimo omu rurembo ruhango rw’eihanga nk’oru.

Arisi akaba naatura omu kashengye aku yaabaire naapangisa omuri Bwaise eya
Kampala. Nkaba mpurira nibagira ngu ogu n’omwanya ogu otari kubaasa kugamba
ngu amaizi n’amagara ahakuba emyegyemure ekaba ebakora eki omukazi
yaakozire mukaiba enjura ku yaabaire egwa. Nyakashengye kakaba karimu
emifarasi ebiri, ebijwaro, amajuta g’emiringo n’emigaju mingi hamwe
n’ebikoma bitari bimwe na bimwe. Amaisho gangye gakaremera aha busikaati
bugufu obu naabaire ntakareebaga Arisi ajwaire.

Akantindira ahansi naabyama naagwejegyera baitu ekiro naasiimurwa emibu ya
Bwaise eyaabaire neejunjuuta omu matu gangye nk’omuzinga gw’enjoki
zirikwenda kutonera.

Ekyamazire ekikoba aha mutwe n’okushanga nyakuntaayaayisa atari
mukishengye. Nkateekateeka nti obumwe yaashohora aheeru kakye kwonka ku
naategyereize omwanya muraingwa naimuka naakyebera orwigi naashanga omunda
rutatsibire baitu rutsibiire aheeru.

Omutima gukampuruutuka omu nda nikwo kwimuka nkateera ekibiriiti nkahemba
ka kanduro. Nkareeba bwa sikaati bwingi bugufu obutari kubaasa kujwarwa na
mwereere. Ku naabwepimiremu naatiina munonga oti haine owandeeba.
Bukaba butari kubiika n’obukaakuba akahare k’omunda. Omuntu akaba naabasa
kureeba oku waazairwe. Ahanyima y’eshaaha nka ibiri nkahurira emitsindo
y’abantu babiri aheeru hamwe n’amaraka abiri. Rimwe rikaba riri rihango
reero akandi kari kakye. Omutima nkagukwata omu ngaro naamanya nti abashuma
ba Kampala bantaahiirira, naategyereza ahu kiraayatire eitaka.

Nkahurira omukazi yaateeka ekishumuuruzo omu nkufuru yaakihindura, yaigura.
Nkahuuha akataara kwenda ngu owaataahamu atandeeba. Ku yaataahiremu
n’omushaija we, orwigi baarwigatira akaboroti reero Arisi yaahemba etaara.

“Ogu shi nawe nookora nawe nainga ni munywani waawe?”

Nkahurira Arisi yaagarukamu omushaija omu karaka kakye agumize ati, “Ekyo
tikyawe kumanya Sebo.”

Ka burangiti akunaabaire nyeshwekire kakaba kari akahuuhe kandi kari
kureeberwamu. Arisi akaba ajwaire kamwe aha busikaati bwe obukunkuri kandi
omunda hatarimu mpare. Akaba ajwaire ka toopu, kagufu karikworeka omukundi
reero go amabeere garikwehuuba kutoroka. Uw e n’ogwo mushaija bakaba bari
nk’empata n’orwigi beemereire barikunywegerana.

Nyamushaija akaba ari rutaaba w’ebikono n’ebiguru biri nk’emitumba. Akaba
aine omutwe muhango gurihaihi kushangirwa emihiro n’ebigojo. Ekitanda
bakakyejumbamu. Omu daakiika nka itaano nkahurira Arisi yaamugira ati
shohora ezaawe zaahwayo. Omushaija akaimuka obwo arikutuutuka nk’ou
baajabika omu maizi ga Ncwera. Ku yaashohoire ati, Arisi akaigi
yaakateekamu boroti, yaatungikaho n’engufuru.

Eizooba eryakuratsireho akaanyaturira eki arikukora.

‘Niinyesiga ngu tori mwereere. Kampala egi ei orikureeba teyorobi.
Yetebeekanise tugyende hamwe omu mwebazyo.”

“Tuze kukora ki?”

“Otafayo noija kukireeba. Reka kuba nk’omwereere.”

Nkatandika kwekyengyera eki Arisi arikukora. Nkongyera naamubuuza nti,
“Hoteeri ei omboneire kukoramu nibakora omu mwebazyo n’ekiro bwonka?”

“Naakugira ngu Kampala egi teyorobi. Yepime omu busikaati obwo. Nitwija
kugyendana omu mwebazyo. Tiinyine murimo ogundi.”

Omu mwebazyo ku naayangire kugyenda yaanyima eza kyakiro naagwekoma. Omu
kasheeshe tarampeire z’entagata nk’oku yaabaire akozire ebiro bibiri
enyima. Kyamushana nayo nkagwekoma nikyo kimwe na kyakiro. Omu mwebazyo
akambuuza ati, “Tugyende hamwe aha murimo?”

“Ngaaha noija kuntungira ogundi murimo.”

Akahunama yaagyenda ngu naaza kukora. Ekiro ekyo taragarukire kandi naanye
nkaraara ndigunwire bwarugaho bwahumuura. Eizooba eryo manya ryona ryona
taranuukire muka obwo tingira kundateire omu nda ebiro byayeshumba omuri
bibiri. Ku yaagarukire omu mwebazyo yankabukira, “Waaba otarikwenda
kugyenda naanye ekiro eki osherure ahu oraraare. Waaba otahaine otambure
aha bigyere nk’ente ogaruke Kabingo.”

Nkaba ntaine ky’okukora okwihaho…... Ketura ku yaahikire aho yaayatika
yaarira naanye yankwasa enaku naayatika naarira.

Obu aijuka ebi byona, abayo ahononoka, oturo turiyo nitumutwara.
Ruhangariyo akaza kukanguka omu muhononoko yaashanga omuhara naacura.

“Huumura!”

 2

Daudi ku yaagarukire omuka shaaha nka ikumi na ibiri yaashanga Piisi
Busingye amutegyereize. Nyina akaba ayerarikireire ahakuba Piisi akanga
kumugambira eki yaabaire naayendera omutabani. Piisi akaba ari omwishiki
arikukunda kugaaniira baitu arikumanya kubiika ebihama.

Akategyereza edakiika nka ikumi na itaano. Ku yaabaire naaganiiramu na
Mangyeri, yaahurira ekerengyere neeranga okwija kwa Daudi. Mangyeri nikwo
kumugira ati,

“Manya ngu gwo yaija gyenda omubugane.”

“Ngaaha nanshanga aha mpaha.”

“Musiibire kurungi.”

“Eego, shana iwe?”

Boona bakamugarukamu hamwe nk’abaaba bakitensize.

“Ni buhooro baitu Piisi niwe asiibire akutegyereize.”

“Piisi, ni buhooro?”

“Eego, huumura!”

Daudi akahigika akagaari ke aha mbaraza y’ekiyungu yaahika haihi na Piisi
reero nyina yaayeyongyera omu kiyungu kwinegyeza omuriro omu mboga za
kyakiro.

“Nyine obutumwa bwawe.”

“Obutumwa bwangye? Kuruga nkahi?”

Manya obwo obu bagamba bwona bahwihwitsa ngu Mangyeri atabahurira
akabashekyera. Akaba ari omukazi nyeikazi owaabaire ayenda ngu abaana be
bagire emicwe. Jowani Naamara ku yaaherize kushwerwa owa Raimondi Mukiza,
omukozi w’ebikomera, nyamukaikuru yaahwa amaani.

Jowani akagyenda eizooba rimwe ataine ou agambire. Akaba ataine nshagarizi
yoona n’obu yaakuba ey’omubazi. Akashanga Raimondi omu kikomera,
nyamwishiki yaatoorana emyenda omu bi nyamushaija we yaabaire naaguza mpaho
baakwata ogwa Bukuba ei Raimondi yaabaire naazaarwa.

Nyamushaija taraijire kweranga. Baamahwehwe nibo baagareetsire ngu
akashwerwa Bukuba. Abandi bakaba bakira kumureeba omu butare naarabarabamu
na nyamutsigazi omu shaaha z’omu rwita-waabo obwo akatare kaamara kukinga.

Okwiha obwo Mangyeri akaba amaririire kureeba ngu omutabani Daudi
tiyaashiisikara atamuhikize aha kitiinisa. Obugyenyi akaba ahereerukire
obwa Jesika Naatukunda omuhara omukuru.

Mangyeri akaba ayehanangisireize Daudi kuruga aha baishiki akateeka omutima
aha kushoma. Baitu rukundo ye na Maria ekabyarwa bakiri bato, yaatooka
baija nibakura, mpaho yaarabya omu bunyeeto bwabo. Ekaba etegyereize
kugyeswa omu bushwere oburikwera obwo baaheza emishomo.

Fabiano akaba atakendaga kureeba Daudi aine omuhara, Maria. Akaba naayenda
ngu omuhara ashwerwe mutabani wa munywani we ou baabaire nibakora hamwe omu
tauni ya Ishaka. Eduuka ya Fabiano eya Faabi Saapurayizi ekaba eshungaine
n’ey’omugaiga Kanyankore. Kanyankore akaba naaguza ebyoma kandi eduuka ye
niyo yaabaire neekizayo obuhango omuri Ishaka yoona. Kanyankore akaba ari
akashaija kakye kagufu kari nk’omu myaka makumi ataano. Abamwe bakaba
batamanya ngu aba omutungi ahabw’okuba akashaija kakye.

Omu magyenyi gatari gamwe na gamwe, bakaba babanza bamushutamisa enyima
okuhisya obu abaabaire nibamumanya baabaire bamwihayo bakamushutamisa omu
myanya y’ekitiinisa. Mutabani wa Kanyankore akaba aherize omwaka
gw’okubanza aha Yunivasite enkuru eya Makerere arikushoma diguurii omu
by’ebiragiro. Baitu abaabaire nibamumanya bakaba nibagira ngu bikaba bitari
kumutwariza kurungi. Manya nyamutsigazi, Edisoni Mwesigye, uwe akaba
naayenda kwega eby’okushuubura kwonka ishe yaamugyema kwega ebiragiro.

Nk’ishe, Edisoni akaba ataruga mu bakazi n’abaishiki manya empitirizo
eshusha eki ebaziira kandi ngu kajuga ezaara kaborooga. Egi niyo nshonga ei
Karungi Maria yaabaire abaha obwo nibamumugyema.

Kanyankore akaba aine sente ensya n’enkuru baitu tihaine mukazi yaabaire
amara owe emyaka ebiri. Niwe yaabaire naakizayo abaana omuri Ishaka. Buri
mwana akaba aine nyina. Baitu ahabw’okugira ebibanja bingi abakazi abaingi
bakaba bagumaho boorora abaana baabo kandi abandi bongyera bashwerwa ahandi
reero baguma baija kushuura abaana baabo. Abamwe bakaba bagyenda n’abaana
baabo ei baabaire baza kusherwa. Abamwe bakaba babatambikira ba nyinabo
bagyenda kushwerwa busya.

Edisoni akaba ayejunisa esente z’ishe kushendashenda abaishiki. Ou yaabaire
ayegaita nawe biri ekicweka kyagarukira aho. Aha myaka makumi abiri
n’etaano akaba aine abaana mwenda, kandi abo n’abaabaire nibamanywa.

Omu kihuumuro kiraingwa ekya siniya ya mukaaga ekyatandikire omu kwezi kwa
ikumi na kumwe, Daudi akaba akira kureebwa aine Maria. Emirundi mingi
Fabiano akaba akabukira omuhara ngu arugye ahari Daudi baitu waashusha oti
onu amatu agateiremu ebiti oti nainga naateerera embwa omukuri.

Eizooba rimwe, ababiri bakaba bashutami ahansi y’omuti omu shaaha
z’ekirenga-bazaana, bariyo nibagaaniira. Ekigaaniiro kikaba nikikwata
ahaby’emishomo. Ku baabaire bari aho Fabiano yaija mpora yaabashurika
eminyaafu. Akongyera yaarabura Daudi Nkunda,

“Mutsigazi ruga ahari muhara wangye waaba nooyenda obusingye.”

Daudi na Maria bakatoora gumwe obwo Maria ahabw’okutiina eminyaafu
yaagyenda naacura. Daudi akaiha akatambaara omu nshaho ye yaamuragaza
amaziga, yaamubumbatira obwo arikumuhunamisa kyabwereere.

N’obu baraabe baabaire nibakundana munonga kuruga n’omu buto bwabo, ababiri
bakaba baragaine okutarya ebitumbwe. Bakaba baragaine okutegaita omu
by’omubonano okuhisya aha bushwere. Obumwe n’obumwe bakaba beeshanga
ah’ekiikire kwonka omwe akyenda kukyemwa ondi amwijutsya endagaano. Daudi
akaba akira kukyemwa munonga.

Amakuru g’okushurikwa n’okunyafurwa ezi Mbaguta yaateire muha ku gaahikire
Mangyeri na Yozefu, abazaire ba Daudi Nkunda, baijura enaku baamanya ngu
mutabani waabo ari omu kabi nk’esaano. Fabiano akaba atari mushaija
w’okuzaaniraho ahakuba akaba naabaasa kukoresa obugaiga bwe kukora nari
kutunga kyona eki arikwenda. Akaba naabasa kwejunisa obutungi bwe kwihaho
buri nkongi yoona eyaabaire neeyemerera omu muhanda gwe.

Hakaba nihazereera engambo omuri Kabingo ngu nyamushaija akaba aine
akakwate n’okusya kw’enju ya Mujurizi, owaabaire ayangire kumuguza eitaka
kumara emyaka ikumi. Eryo itaka rikaba niryatana na faamu ya Fabiano. Akaba
amuhaire sente nyingi azangire ngu uwe tarikwenda kuriguza.

Nikigambwa ngu nyamugaiga akapangisa aboojo, embura-mukoro kugyenda kwosya
enju ye. Enju ku yaahiire nyamushaija yaataka ngu Fabiano amuhe esente ezi
araamuhe onu nawe yaamuha nkye ahari ezo ezi yaabaire naaza kumuha enju ye
etakacumikirweho ogw’oruhiira ahakuba ebintu bye bingi oteireho na pikipiki
ei yaabaire naavuga nka boodabooda. Kyakahaire tihaine muntu owahiireire
omuri egyo nju. Uwe n’omukazi we owaabaire aine enda y’omujigaijo
bakarahuka kwamuuka omuri egyo nju. Bwanyima y’ameezi nka mukaaga, aboojo
abaayokize enju bakaija baabyatura. Bakaija baagira obutaikirizana na
mukama waabo owaayangire kubongyera sente nk’oku yaabaire abaraganiise. Aho
pooriisi ekaija yaabajandura reero kooti yaaragiira abazaire baabo ngu
bashasure ebintu ebyahiire ebyabazirwemu obukaikuru makumi abiri kandi obwo
oteireho n’okubakoma emyaka etaano buri omwe obwo manya bari omu kihome
Nyamushekyera. Abagurusi n’abakaikuru bakacuramiirirwa baaguza otutaka
twabo baashasura ogwo mukunkuma gw’esente. Fabiano akareebwa nk’owaabaire
ataine rubanja ahakuba niwe yaabandize kuhwera Mujurizi obwo arikumuguraho
eitaka rye kwenda ngu akaabona ei yaatandikira. Enshonga ezindi kooti
ekagira ngu zikaba zitaine mutwe n’amaguru ngu kandi zikaba zigyendereire
kukomaho Fabiano amatu g’embuzi ngu zimuriise engwe.

N’ahabw’ekyo ababiri bakaba nibatiiniirira amagara ga mutabani waabo. Ekiro
ekyo bakamwehanangiriza ku aruga ahari muhara w’omugaiga onu yaahunama
yaayegyera omu kitanda yaabyama.

Ahabw’okutiina Mangyeri, Piisi akateeka ebaruha omu nshaho y’esaati ya
Daudi yaasiibura nyamukaikuru atyo yaagyenda.

 3

Yeremiya Turibamwe ku yaaherize kureeba oburemeezi obwabaire buri ahagati
ya Gordon Ruhangariyo hamwe na Fabiano Mpairwe, yaayeta Fabiano kwenda ngu
amanye eki arikuteekateeka aha rubanja oru Ruhangariyo yaabaire amazire
kumutabaariza omu kooti y’ekyaro kya Kabingo.

Omugaiga akavuga emwe aha motoka ze ez’ekika kya ipusaamu yaija owa
Chaimaani. Yeremiya akaba ashutami omu irembo aha katebe akuyaabaire
ashaagireho. Akaba ajwaire kaavesiti akaabaire nikeera baitu koona kakaba
kari ekyambu ahabw’ekyoya eki yaabaire ahungire omunju. Ka vesiti
kakagyezaho kushangira orubaju rumwe rw’enda baitu kaaremwa rwaza aheeru.

Okuhuumuza ahabiteekateeko akaba araarize reediyo ngu neemuyombeerera.
Amabeeho g’omwebazyo gakaba gaatandika kumuhuuha nikwo kureeba motoka
erikutemba owe. Omuri kabingo ni Fabiano wenka owaabaire aine motoka
z’ebika nk’ebyo. Kugira ngu akaba amutumireho, Chaimaani akaba naamanya ngu
ni Fabiano. N’obu yaabaire ari omugaiga, akaba naateeka eifubo omuri
Yeremiya ou obugaiga bwe bwabaire buhuuyuukire. Nangwa n’obumwe Yeremiya
akaba aza owa Fabiano ngu amuguze sente. Yeremiya akaba ari omutungi emyaka
nk’etaano ey’enyima. Akaba aine eduuka y’ebijwaro eyaabaire neekizayo
obuhango omuri Ishaka baitu akaija yaaginywa yaahwaho, atyo yaagaruka ahari
busha. Abagaiga bataahi be bakaija baamushondashondera sente baamutandikira
eduuka endiijo kwonka ekaba neekora biguru-bya-mpitsi.

Fabiano akaija n’ebicupa bina by’amaarwa ebibaabaire nibaija kugaaniiriraho
obwo barikuhazya enshonga esaano. Ku baamazire kuramukanya, omutungi yaaza
omu buutu y’emotoka yaihamu ebyo bicupa yaafunduurira Chaimaani baatandika
kunywa obwo nibagaaniira.

“Noomanyisa aizire aha kuntabaariza?”

“Akaruga aha ijo kwonka naamugira ngu agaruke aha Saabiiti. Manya obwo
bwona nyenda ngu mbanze nkureebe tufuutire egi nshonga ekibiriizi.”

Aho omugaiga akeereza ecupa n’ori yaayereeza eye reero baazihondanisaho
kakye kworeka rukundo n’obumwe.

“Baitu reka mbuuze, mushaija we n’amazima eitaka ry’omushaija nooyenda
kuriiba?”

“Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!!!”

“Ka waasheka kandi n’enki?”

“Amazima go gari ngu eitaka rye nkizire kuguma nindagiira abakozi kuriiba
mpora kwonka ninshaba obuhwezi bwawe, ha ha ha!”

“Ahabw’enki nooyenda kubonabonesa omugurusi w’omukyene nka Ruhangariyo?”

“Hoona shi torikumanya ngu omuntu kigumire okumarwa. Ku orikubona ekintu,
nyencakare oyenda ngu obone ekindi.”

Chaimaani akaba yaija naayenda kumaramu ekicupa ky’okubanza. Eki kikaba
