nikimanyisa ngu buri omwe aine ekicupa kimwe ky’okugaaniiriraho.

“Kwonka nkawaamarwa nooba ota?”

“Naakwetegyereza Omwami Yeremiya, reka ebintu tutabitwara hare munonga.”

 4

Ayiriini Kyomuhendo akaimuka kare yaayetebeekanisa kuza kusherura omurimo
gw’obwakaraani. Akaba naakimanya ngu tikiri kirungi okushiisa obwire.
Akatebeekanisa empapura ze z’obwegyese yaazita omu bbahaasa ya kitaka.
Akajwara ebijwaro ebijwarwa omu ofiisi mpaho yaajwara enkaito y’ekika kya
kakondo ei yaabaire atiirize owa munywani we manya ngu efura etatiiza
ehemura abaabo.

Akatemba motoka ezaabaire niziza Ishaka omu tauni. Emotoka z’aha ruguuto
rwa Rutookye kuza Ishaka zikaba nizipakira abantu nk’ebitookye. Ba dereeva
b’okwo bakaba batarikuvuga zaakamunye ezirikwegura abantu ikumi na bana.
Bakaba nibavuga bwamaikaaha obushemeire kutwara abantu mukaaga. Baitu bo ba
dereeva bakaba baziigatiramu abantu mpaka eboogire. Abamwe bakaba bakiikira
bataahi baabo reero abandi beemerera.

Ahabw’oruguuto kubamu ebiina bingi, kikaba kiri eky’akabi kahango kupakira
abantu bundi-bitookye. Butandu enyingi aha ruguuto orwo zikaba ziine
akazaare kahango n’okupakira munonga. Obumwe dereeva okaba oshanga ashutami
n’abantu bashatu aha ntebe ye yonka.

Enjura ku yaabaire egwa, ensi yoona eba ecakacaka. Emotoka, za pikipiki
hamwe n’obugaari bikaba byeshanga owa ishe-butaka. Eizooba rimwe, Daudi
akaba naahuumura ari aha piki obwo enjura yaamara kufukunkuka. Ku baabaire
nibashuuma, obuterezi bwabarundura ahansi weena yaajuba, n’eshanduukye ye
y’ekyoma yaagondama. Pikipiki ekashiisikara baitu kyakahaire akaba ari
haihi kuhika owaabo nikwo kuzingira ebintu engata, akabirasha aha mutwe
mpaka Kabingo. Ebiiruka ebimwe bikaba bikwamira omu muhanda biraaramu mpaka
oruguuto rwomire. Baitu nabwo bakama baabyo bakaba baraara nibeeshengyereza
Ow’ahaiguru ngu hatakaakyeraho enjura nainga ekaraara neefukunkuka nk’ei
babingire omu iguru.

Abarikutambura aha bigyere bakaba bahika omuka baajubire, boona bari
efuurure ahabwa za motoka, egaari, n’epiki kubashuka ebyondo. Abaabaire
bababataine zaabututsi nainga enkaito bakaba bahika omuka barikushusha
abaaruga kukaata obudongo.

Ayiriini akaba naamanya embeera y’entambura omu kyanga kyabo. Shiringi
rukumi rukaba nirubaasa kumutwara omu motoka baitu akaba naayeganya
okumupakira nk’ebitookye. Za boodabooda zikaba nizitwarira shiringi rukumi
na bitaano baitu ku mwabaire mubugana omuntu arikwenda kutemba boodabooda,
omuvugi waayo akaba amucumitaho abatwara mwembi. Nangwa n’abamwe bakaba
batwara abantu bashatu. Ayiriini akaba naashaba ngu batabugana ondiijo
muntu weena orikuza Ishaka. Eryo izooba Ruhanga akagarukamu eshaara za
Ayiriini.

Akataaha omu ofiisi emwe omuri Ishaka ei yaabaire naateekateeka ngu hariyo
emirimo. Kyakahiire emirimo ekaba eriyo.

 EKICWEKA KYA KASHATU

 1

Omukundwa Daudi,

Naagaruka ah’eishomero n’obunaabe ntaabaasa kukusiibura. Ekikuru nookimanya
ngu ninkukunda kandi ninkwendeza ebirungi byonka.

Ogume oijukye ngu n’iwe wenka ori omu mutima gwangye. Tihariho ondiijo.

Otaryebwa endagaano y’okwerinda mpaka ah’eizooba eri orikumanya. Ninkushaba
ngu n’obu abandi baishiki baakukureeba n’amaisho k’okukushendashenda,
otaribaikiriza. Naanye tihaine ou ndiikiriza.

Ninkimanya ngu taata tarikukunyendeza kwonka nyowe ninkukunda. Ekikuru iwe
guma, orugamba nitwija kururwana kandi nitutabaaruka hamwe.

Ninkwendeza okwegyesa kurungi abaana ba Mushana High School.

Ogumeho omukundwa.

 Niinye Maria Karungi

 Omukundwa waawe

Ebaruha ekaba ehandiikirwe omu mukono gwa Maria gwenyini. Daudi akagishoma
nyekiro emirundi erikurenga ikumi-na-gumwe. Akateekateeka ahari rukundo
yaabo, yaayetegyereza amakuru g’ebigambo by’omubaruha, yaamanya buzima kwo
Maria ku arikumukunda. Akaijura amashemererwa gaamwebesa n’okutebeekanisa
ebi araashomese abeegi eizooba eri raakurateho. Maria akaba naahandiika
kurungi munonga. Ahabwa rukundo ebaruha zoona ezaabaire ziruga owa Maria,
Daudi akaba azibiika omu kibbahaasa kihango eki yaabaire ata omu
kishanduukye ky’ebitabo. Ku yaabaire aba aine ekiri kumuteganisa ekiine
akakwate na rukundo, ashoma zimwe aha baruha za Maria reero omutima
gugaruka omu buteeka.

 2

Piisi akatandika kuguma naija owa Daudi omu wiikenda ngu amurabire omu
byashomire omu ishomo ry’eby’entaasya erimanya nka Ikonomikisi. Mpaho
bakaba beegaranjura omu kishengye kya Daudi amubarira ebibaro amuteerera na
za kaavu.

Daudi ku yaabaire aba aine eby’okukyebera aheereza Piisi endagiiriro reero
nyamwishiki amugororera aha bipapura. Bakaba bamara obwire bwingi hamwe
ekyareteire baingi baateekateeka okundi. Baingi bakaba nibagira ngu bari
omu mukundano kandi n’okuteerana baatandikire okuteerana.

Eizooba rimwe, Piisi akaija kutaayaayira omukundwa wa munywani we. Abazaire
ba Daudi bombi bakaba batarimu bagiire omu bugyenyi. Nyamwishiki akaija
ajweire kaasikaati kagufu karikworeka entegye n’ebibero. Ku yaabaire
ainama, abareebi bakwata ahamaisho. Akaija hoona ateiremu ka burawuzi
karikworeka omukundi akubeeta kundishooho.

Ku yaatandikire naahika ati omu kishengye kya Daudi yaashutama aha kitanda
kye. Onu akaba naagoorora ebipapura by’abeegi atamweteireho.

“Baitu osiibire gye kishaija?”

“Eego kikazi, ryarenga rita?”

Amaisho nyamutsigazi akagaiha aha bipapura yaagahanga ekicweka ky’omukundi
gwa Piisi. Ku yaareebire ka sikaati kagufu, omutima gwagyenda, ebipapura
yaabirugiraho kimwe.

“Ryarenga buhooro kishaija.”

Nyamwojo amaisho akagahanga ekibero kya Piisi ekyabaire nikibereshera
ahabw’otujuta otuyaabaire akitontobekire.

“Nikireebeka omurimo gw’obushomesa ti gworobi. Buriizooba nooba oine
ebipapura by’okugorora?”

“Haza gworobi. Nyowe ningukunda.”

Eshaaha zikaba ziri haihi kuhika emwe. Omwirima gukaba gwija nigutaahiirira
ekishengye kyabo kandi Piisi atarikwetengyesa kugyenda. Ku yaabaire
ahindukaho kakye, ekibero kyongyera kuhenuuka baitu omwirima gukaba
gweyongyera kuba ndindindi. Omuri nyamwirima ogwo, nyamwishiki akaatuurira
Daudi ati, “Ninkukunda!”

Daudi akahurira nk’amashanyarazi gaamwogamu. Akaba naakimanya ku Piisi
arikwetegyereza ngu ari omu mukundano na Maria. Hoona nabwo akaba
naakimanya ngu Piisi ni munywani wa Maria kandi akaba atakateekateekahoga
okuza omu mukundano na Piisi. Akaba amureeba nka munywani w’omukundwa we
Maria. Daudi akaba atakateekateekahoga kureebya Maria n’obu baabaire
batakabyamahoga hamwe omu by’omubonano. Akaba naamukunda kandi nawe
arikukimanya ngu n’ori naamukunda.

Ku yaabaire akiri omu nyanja y’ebiteekateeko, Piisi yaamuhika haihi obwo
sikaati eba aha mugongo, weena akahenuuka kare ahabw’okuguma naayiriirira
Daudi atarikwenda ngu akimanye ngu ariyo naamuhika haihi.

Akamurenzya omukono omunda, ogundi gwareetwa ow’omugongo, reero mpaho
yaamubumbatira, baitu nyamwojo atenzire n’obu kaakuba kaingana-busha baitu
ahabw’obweremwa bw’omubiri, akaba atarikubaasa kukora bingi. Ku yaabaire
ariyo naaza kumunywegyera, baahurira Mangyeri na Yozefu nibataaruuka omu
bugyenyi. Manya obwo ziba shaaha nka ibiri z’ekiro aho niho ekyo kicweka
kyagarukiire, Daudi akeeshumba atyo okukyemwa.

Piisi akabwerabwera, enshoni zaamwijura aha maisho. Akamanya ngu Daudi
yaayetegyereza eki yaabaire agyendereire baitu aha shaaha ei nyamutsigazi
yaabaire arihaihi kugwa omu mutego ogu nyampangare yaabaire emutegire,
nyabazaire niho baagarukiire. Piisi akeetereeza sikaati yaaginyuurira
yaahika omu ntegye, obwo weena arikureeba ahansi. Daudi akashohora aheeru
kutabaarutsya abazaire omu bugyenyi. Piisi tihaine oku yaabaire naabasa
kushohora ahakuba abazaire ba Daudi bakaba nibaija kumureeba yaajumbuka omu
nju baabuza nyamutsigazi akasyo n’akahindu.

Ahabw’oburuhe, Mangyeri na Yozefu bakaza kukiikamaho omwe omu ntebe, ondi
omu kishengye. Aho niho Piisi yaashohoreire shaaha nka ibiri n’edakiika
ikumi na itaano.

Piisi akaba ataine bazaire be bombi. Bakaba bagwire omuri butandu emyaka
nka munaana enyima. Akaba akuriire owa nyinenkuru, kizaara-ishe, owaabaire
ari omu myaka ya makumi mushanju. Ogu mukaikuru booteboote akaba
atarikufayo ahabwa bukuru. Akaba aza kare omu kitabo kye. Shaaha ibiri
zikaba zitamushanga bisho. Omuhara ku yaabaire aba atariho, aba yaateekire
kyakiro, arya reero aza kukiika omugongo gwa bukuru ahansi.

 3

Ayiriini akashanga omu mirimo eyaabaire eri omu ofiisi y’ekitongore
ekyebuuzibwaho harimu n’ogw’obwakaraani. Omushaija ari omu myaka nka makumi
ashatu n’etaano akaba ashutami omu ofiisi ya mukuru w’abakozi. Akaba ari
muhango baitu ataine eibondo nk’abandi bashaija abaabaire bashangwa omu
ofiisi obwire obwo. Akaba aijwire omu kitebe kya rwetoroora arikuhuuhwa
akayaga karikuruga omu faani. Aha meeza ye hakaba hariho orupapura
rw’amakuru orw’eryo izooba. Hakaba hariho n’amaizi g’omu kacupa agu
yaabaire yaamara kwiha omu baraafu.

Ku yaateire kodi, nyamushaija yaamwikiriza ku ataahamu nikwo kumworeka
akatebe k’okuhuumuzaho omugongo. Ayiriini akaba naarebuka nk’oine eiriho.
Nyamushaija akaigura ebaraafu ye yaihayo akacupa k’amaizi yaakamukwatsa.
Ayiriini akatangaara kandi aha mutima yaamanya ngu ogu mushaija ezi mbabazi
zi yaamugirira ku yaakugumizamu nazo, abaasa kutaaha n’omurimo.

“Mpuriire ngu mwine emirimo Sebo, naaba nyizire kushaba obwakaraani.”

“Emirimo tugiine, na waaza aha rubaho rw’ebirango oruri aheeru
noogireebaho. Nangwa n’eriizooba twaranga omu mpapura z’amakuru.”

Eki akakigamba arikumworeka ahu emirimo eri omu rupapura rw’amakuru.
Ayiriini akongyera kugira amatsiko g’okutunga omurimo.

“Empapura zaawe z’obwegyese zirinkahi?”

Ayiriini akakwata ebbahaasa yoona eyabaire eijwire ebihandiiko bye byona
eby’obwegyese yaabiheereza ogu mushaija.

Nyamushaija akaigura eduroowa yaihamu za gaarubindi ze yaarabya amaisho omu
mpapura ze z’obwebyese yaashanga ebishaaniirizo ebyabaire nibyetengwa
byona abiine.

“Ayiriini, ori omwishiki murungi, ngire ngu oine omushaija nainga?”

“Tiimwine Sebo.”

“Aaaaaa, nooreeba eriigyenda, ti kyorobi kutunga omurimo baitu yo emirimo
eriho. Nambwenu, n’ogu guriho. Nyine obushoboorozi kugukuha nainga
kugukwima. Baingi barugire aha kandi ebi mbagambiire nibyo naaza
kukugambira.

Buri muntu ogwakora nigwo aryaho. Ti ndikwenda ngu ompe sente zaawe ahakuba
nizo ziwaija kusherura. Naaba naakugambiire ngu oboniire. Ikiriza tugyende
omu roogi ahaifo, nyencakare nootandika kukora.”

 4

 Eizooba ry’okutayaayira abeegi ah’eishomero rya Bweranyangi rikaba ririyo
niriteera kodi. Abeegi bakaba nibeeteguurira eizooba eri. Maria Karungi
akaba ari mukuru w’eby’amakuru aha kakiiko kakuru akaabaire nikeebembera
abeegi. Akaba naaheereza encuro y’ahamuheru ei yaabaire naija kubugira aha
muheru gwa taamu ya kabiri. Akaba ariire obukama bwanyima y’okwereeza
abandi beegi bashatu abu yaabaire ayetsimbire nabo.

Maria akaba naacwera Orungyereza reero arutereza aha rurimi weeza ohurira
waasiima. Abaishiki ba Bweranyangi boona bakaba nibaikiriza ngu omukugamba
Orunyanyindo, naayeshumba Abangyereza. Bakaba bamukubize Kwini
ekirikumanyisa Omugabekazi wa Bungyereza. Ku yaabaire aza aha pareedi
kushoma amakuru, boona bagira ngu ceceku. Manya akaba ahenda eiraka oshusha
oti ni kaanyonza. Omukunuza amakuru akaba ari ow’ekika ky’ahaiguru. Amakuru
ge gakaba gaijwire ebirungo ebi beeta obunuzamenti.

Baingi bakaba bagira ngu Orungyereza rwe rwine akakwate n’eishomo
ry’Ebihimbo erimanywa nka Liiturica. Omu ishomo eri bakaba bashoma obutabo
obwetwa novoro obw’abahandiiki rurangaanwa nka Ngugi wa Thiong’o owa Kenya
na Chinua Achebe owa Nigeria, emizaano y’abahandiiki nka William Tigita-
Icumu (Shakespeare) ou emizaano ye yaabaire eshemeza Abangyereza omu myaka
ya 1500 na 1600. Baitu ekibaabaire batarikumanya ahari Maria n’okugira ngu
akaba naakunda kushoma ebitabo bihandiikirwe omu Runyankore-Rukiga.
Baibuli ei yaabaire agyendana omu caporo ekaba ehandiikirwe omu Runyankore-
Rukiga.

Ahabw’okuba mukuru w’eby’amakuru, Maria akaba naayetegyereza gye ku ekiro
kya 30. 03 ekyabaire kiri eky’okutaayaayirwa. Akaba aine edebe y’amatsiko
ku munywani we ow’ahamara, Piisi Busingye, owaabaire naashomera Nyabubaare
omu Siniya ya mukaaga yaabaire naija kumutaayaayira. Ishe, omw. Fabiano
Mpairwe, nawe akaba akunda kutaayaayira omuhara. N’ahabw’ekyo, Maria akaba
aine amatsiko ku aine abagyenyi babiri.

Ebyarugire omu bibuuzo by’okuhendera okwezi kwa Kabiri bikaba biri birungi.
Maria akaba naamanya ngu ishe ku araabireebe naija kushemererwa. Okworeka
okushemererwa kwe, Fabiano akaba aha omuhara esente nyingi. N’obu yaabaire
ataine bingi by’okuzikozesa oihireho okuzitoizera Daudi, Maria akaba ayenda
ngu ishe amusiime na sente ahakuba akaba aziine.

Aha mazooba nk’ago akaba areeba abeegi bamwe omuri bataahi
bataabataayaayira. Abandi bakaba babareetera eby’okurya biteekire ebi
baabaire barya bikahweraho kwerinda okushanga bigagire eizooba erindi.
Gukaba guri omwoga gwe nka kwini kuheereza abantu nk’abo ahaby’okurya
n’eby’okunywa ebyabaire bitarahuka kujunda. Ishe akaba amureetera za
kwenca, emigaati, za busikwiti hamwe n’ebindi.

Maria akaba atenda kubiika by’okurya nainga ebyokunywa. Akaba ayeta bataahi
be abibaganisa byona bihwaho eizooba eryo. Abeegi bakaba baakimanyiire.
Buri mwebazyo gw’eizooba ry’okutaayaayirwa bakaba baza owa Maria. Maria
akaba abaijutsya omwishiki omwe ou Piisi yaabaire akunda kumutebeza. Ogwo
mwishiki bakamureetera eby’okurya biteekire, yaabibika omushanduukye, obwo
atarikwenda kubibagana na bataahi be. Eizooba rimwe hakaba habuzire ebitabo
by’eishomero reero abeegyesa baacwamu kucaaka buri shanduukye ya ibara
mwegi. Ku baafundwire eshanduukye y’ogwo mwishiki baashanga eby’okurya
bikamera kare eishokye. Omushomesakazi omwe ku yaabireebire yaayekanga
agizire ngu n’embeba.

Ondiijo mwishiki ou Piisi yaabaire amutebeizeho akaba abiikire obunena.
Obunena n’enjuma z’obucoori, empokya, amacanda, ebinyoobwa hamwe n’ezindi
njuma zikarangire. Ahabw’obutenda kuhaho bataahi be, akaba aburiira nyekiro
omu burangiti obwo amashanyarazi gaamara kurugaho. Eizooba rimwe, abeegyesa
bakaija kucebera abeegi omu kiro kureeba yaaba haine abaatoroka. Abeegi
bakaba bareetsire omuze gw’okuguma nibazinga emyenda kukoramu ekintu kiri
nk’omuntu. Eki bakaba bakitereeza gye aha kitanda reero abeegyesa
bakikireeba bamanya ngu omwegi ariho. Eizooba rimwe mukuru w’eishomero
akabugana omwegi omu tauni shaaha nka itaano z’ekiro. Ku yaahikire
ah’eishomero yaatuma omwegyesa owaabaire ari aha saabiiti (dyute) kukyebera
ogwo mwegi yaaba ari omu kitanda.

Omwegyesa ku yaareebire akashaija akaabaire kazingirwe omuby’eshweko,
yaamanya ngu omwegi arimu abyami. Ku yaagambire heedimasita, onu yaayanga
kukiikiriza nikwo kugyenda akeereebera mpaho akashanga biri ebyahi
bizingire.

N’ahabw’ekyo abeegyesa bakaba nibaragiirwa kushuuruura bakeetegyereza
kurungi yaaba omwegi arimu. Abeegyesa kubaizire kukyebera baashuruura
nyamwishiki baashanga ahagatiire emberengye ariyo naanena, mpaho
yaabwerabwera.

Aha izooba ry’okutaayaayirwa, baingi bakaba bataza mu iriiro ry’eishomero.
Eby’okurya bikaba bitandabarana, bibura owaabirya. Esaabiiti yoona ekaba
ehwa abeegi batarikwirukangira munonga eby’okurya by’eishomero. Amaduuka
g’omu ishomero gakaba gakora munonga esaabiiti egyo. Abazaire bakaba
bareetera bahara baabo esente reero abandi batunga enyongyezo kuruga omuri
banyaanyabo, bakuru baabo, baishenkazibo, bainyinentobo, baishentobo nanga
n’obumwe kuruga omu bakundwa baabo abaabaire nibakishoma hamwe n’abandi
abaabaire nibakora emirimo etari emwe n’emwe.
 Weeza maawe
eizooba rikaba riba rirungi ndikaitwa!

Piisi akatandika kweteguura kutaayaayira munywani we. Baitu hoona akaba
aijwire okutiina. Daudi akaba naija kugambira Maria ebyabaireho? Akaijuka
ku niwe yaabaire akyemire Daudi. Akongyera yaayebuuza ekyakubaasa kubaho
omukundwa we Sityuwati Muhoozi ku yaakumanya ngu akakyema Daudi.

Piisi akaba agiire omu mukundano na Sityuwati ameezi mukaaga enyima. Akaba
agizire abakundwa baingi abu yaabaire ayegaitsire nabo omu by’omubonanao
kumara obwire bwingi. Eishomero ryona rikaba nirimanya ngu Piisi
n’omwishiki w’omutaanyo mwingi. Bakaba bamubingire omu mashomero
garikurenga mukaaga ahabw’emicwe y’obujunde. Nyinenkuru akaba akooza aza
Nyabubaare, ayeshengyereza mukuru w’eishomero kumugumisiririza omuhara
ahakuba akaba naamanya ngu emicwe ye ti mirungi.

Piisi n’obu yaabaire aine egyo micwe etarikuhaisa kitiinisa, abeegi bataahi
be bakaba nibamukunda ahabw’entebya ye nungi. Omwegyesa ku yaabaire aba
atakaizire mu kibiina, oshanga abeegi beehumbire ahu yaabaire ashutama
akwise naabatebeza. Ni uwe yaabaire aba naamanya abaishiki abaabaire
baihiremu enda, abaabaire batwire, abeegyesa abaabaire nibashedashenda
abeegi kubatwara omu nsi y’okwegaita okw’omubonano. Ebimwe ebi yaabaire
atebya bikaba bihikire kandi ebindi bikaba bitagira mutwe na kibunu.

Obu baabaire batakamubingire omu boodingi, obwo arikushashurirwa ishento,
Piisi akaba araaza abeegi batagwejegyeire. Ku yaabaire atandika kubatebeza,
boona oturo tubaguruka. Doomu ei yaabaire naaraaramu ekaba eraara
neeshekyereza burugaho buyangayanga. Abeegi bakaba bashaba ngu baraazibwe
omu doomu egi. Abamwe bakaba beemera okubingwa ahabw’okushangwa batari mu
doomu zaabo ekiro.

Piisi akaba naayetwa Shwenkazi ahabw’okugira ngu akaba akira kutebeza
abeegi ahabikwatiraine n’ekitanda. Baingi bakaba nibakimanya ngu
naayetegyereza enshonga z’eby’omubonano. Akaba ari omuhwanshoni omu nshonga
ezo. Ku yaabaire aba naatebeza abaishiki bataahi be akaba ayeta ekitiiho
ekitiiho kitari kigiiko kihango. Eby’okutsintsina akaba abijunirwe.

Niwe mwishiki wenka owaabaire aine reediyo. Abeegyesa bakaba bacaakire
abeegi zoona reediyo bazikwatsire okwihaho eye. Eizooba eri baacaakire,
nyamwishiki akaba atorokire atari mu ishomero. Abeegi bataahi be
bakagyezaho n’amaani gaabo goona kureeba ngu abeegyesa tibaamanya ngu
tariho. Omu doomu egyo hakaba harimu ekitanda kimwe ekyabaire nikiraarwaho
abaishiki babiri. Ahabw’omwegyesa owaabaire naakurira doomu yaabo kuba
atariho, kikaba kitoorobi kumanya ngu hariho abeegi abaabaire nibaraara
babiri. Eki baakozire, bakaarira omwegi owaabaire naaraara na mutaahi we,
yaaba niwe yaaza aha kitanda kya Piisi. Eshanduukye ye bakagisindika ahansi
y’ekitanda kye. Za reediyo zoona bakazitwara kwonka bambe baakiza
ishenkazibo.

Reediyo egi niyo baabaire bahurikiiririzaho zaapuroguraamu z’okwegyesa
abashwereine emirimo y’ekitanda. Puroguraamu ezi zikaba zikira kubaho omu
wiikenda shaaha nka mukaaga z’ekiro. Abeegi bakaba bazitegyereza reero
zikihwa batandika kuzihaazaanaho obwo Piisi arikubashoboororera ebyabaire
bibabeera bisya. Baingi omu bwire obwo enshonga z’eby’omubonano bakaba
bazeegyera aha mashomero, obwo barikuhwerwa abeegyesa nainga abeegi
bagyenzi baabo.

Ahabw’okubyama bakyerereirwe, abeegi bakaba baimuka kikyererezi. Eshaaha
z’okwimuka zikaba ziri ikumi n’ekicweka z’akasheeshe. Obwire obu bukaba
bubabwijwire embeho kandi egi niyo nshonga ahabw’enki baabaire nibabweta
winta. Egi ku yaabaire ejwangana n’oturo, nyabeegi bagwejegyera nangwa
n’obumwe entumba zigyenda. Abeegi bamwe bakaba baine omuze gw’okuta
ebipapura omu minwa ya bagyenzi baabo ku baabaire bagwejegyerera omu winta.
Ebipapura ebi bakaba babizinga nk’enyungu z’okureesa reero bashukamu esaano
ya cooka. Omwegi ku yaabaire aba naagona, esaano egi eguma neecumbuka reero
abandi batandika kumushekyerera.

Abeegi n’obu baabaire bakunda emboozi ya Piisi, baingi bakaba beeganya
okwimuka. Mukuru w’eishomero akaba arabwire Piisi kurekyera aho okuraaza
abeegi batagwejegyeire baitu akaba ari nk’orikuteerera embwa omukuri.
Abeegi bo bakaba nibakunda ebigaaniiro bya ishenkazibo.

Eizooba rimwe kubaizire kwimusya doomu yaabo ngu eze omu winta, omwegyesa
yaashanga boona babyami. Akaasya amashanyarazi yaareeba hataabaho kateezo,
yaakongoota aha rwigi byaba ebyabusha. Akagyezaho kubiimusya, kwonka ku
yaabaire aimusya ogu yaaza kwimusya ondiijo ashanga abu yaarugaho
baagarukire omu migono obwo n’entumba zirikugamba nka bomu zirikubaruka.
Akagumizamu yaazakwimusya ab’omu doomu ezindi kandi bo yaashanga abaingi
baimukire.

Aha shaaha nka ikumi na ibiri akaza kukyebera omu doomu kureeba ku haakuba
hariho baarwesiga-bugumi abaasigara nainga abaagaruka omu doomu. Omu doomu
ishatu ez’abaishiki, ibiri zoona zikaba zitarimu muntu baitu ei Piisi
yaabaire naaraaramu, tihariho muntu weena owaagiire omu winta
y’Orwokubanza.

Omwegyesa akakwata orwigi yaarwigatiraho enkufuru reero yaagyenda yaaha
riipoota y’eizooba owa mukuru w’eishomero. Abandi abeegi ku baarugire omu
winta, baaza aha kyansya eyaabaire eri ey’akashera k’obuhunga. Eryo izooba
abeegi bakaikirizibwa kunywa emirundi ebiri ahakuba abaishik nka Magana
abiri bakaba bakibyami. Abeegi namunonga aba Siniya y’okubanza bakahuuta
obushera amabondo gaabahika omu maraka. Eizooba eryo, abeegi ba siniya
y’okubanza bakaba bashohora haihi buri dakiika. Aboojo ab’ebibiina
eby’ahaiguru bo eby’okunywa ebikopo bingi by’obushera bakabyesaasira
ahabw’okukunira abanywani baabo b’abaishiki. Manya bo abaishiki bakagabwa
batenda ku aboojo bamanya ngu nibarya munonga.

Abandi beegi ku baagiire omu bibiina byabo, abeegyesa baigura doomu reero
baarundaana abaishiki abo omu mbuga y’eishomero obwo boona bajwire enshoni
n’okubwerabwera ahamaisho. Abeegyesa bakabarambika reero baabateera ezi
Mbaguta yaateire muha. Baingi bakagarukayo nibateera emirengye. Mukuru
w’eishomero akabaragiira kuhandiika ebaruha z’okushaba okusaasirwa kandi
yaarabura ngu ku barigarukira, aryababinga bataahe babyame omuka kumara
okwezi kumwe reero bagarukye n’abazaire. Okwiha obwo, abeegi bakatandika
kureebuka ngu baimuka kare n’obu baraabe batararekiire aho okuhurikiiriza
ebitebyo bya Piisi.

Aha muheru gw’ogwo mwaka gwa 2000, Piisi akaba naamariira Siniya ya
kataano. Omu kibiina, akaba atasinga bandi kandi hoona nabwo akaba
atanyurura mukira. Mukuru w’eishomero akamuragiira kuguma naaraara omuka
reero akaija ah’eishomero omukasheeshe kandi akagarukayo omu mwebazyo. Eki
kikasaasa abaishiki ahakuba bakaba batarikwija kugaruka kuhurikiriza
obuboozi bwa ishenkazibo omu kiro.

Piisi akatandika emicwe y’akajunde obu yaabaire naashomera Nyakatooma High
School. Hereni Kaitesi niwe yaabandize kumutorora kumutwara omu disiko
y’Omukanyansi omu tauni ya Ishaka. Piisi akaba atakabyamaga na mushaija.
Omu mwaka gwa 1996 nibwo yaabyama n’omuvugi wa takisi kandi akaba aine
emyaka ikumi n’ena ari omu siniya y’okubanza. Nyakaisiki kakaba
katakanywahoga maarwa okuhisya eryo izooba.

Ku baahikire omu disiko, Hereni owaabaire aine emyaka ikumi na mukaaga
kandi ari omu siniya ya kabiri akatandika kuhenda amagufa n’abatsigazi. Ku
baabaire baruha bashutama babanza bahuumurira aha twarwa. Piisi we akaba
areebera okutangaara obwo Hereni bamunyigire zaaskiwizi oteireho
n’okumunyogyera. Piisi akaguma ayemereire okuhisya obu omutsigazi yaizire
akamukwata omu ntigita reero we Piisi akamwoha nyamutigazi akagwa ahansi
obwo arikwehonda aha cupa za bia. Ba nyinazo, bakamuteera obwo
barikumukyeena n’okumuteera mutinzi barikumutuura etsindo kandi obwo akaba
atakamizire n’obu ryakuba eitondo ry’amaarwa.

Piisi akahungira owa Hereni. Hereni akamusigira omutsigazi ou yaabaire
naazina nawe yaaza kusherura ondiijo.

“Ba noozina n’enyongore egyo ngarukye.”

“Noozahi murungi wangye?”

“Ninza kurondera Piisi ow’okuzina nawe.”

Hereni ku yaarugireho, nyamutsigazi yaateeraho kuzina na Piisi kwonka Piisi
yaayanga. Akaba naateekateeka omutsigazi ou yaabaire yaamara kuteera
orutsindiko. Obwoba bukamwijura omutima yaamanya ngu nyamutsigazi ku
yaakumugwaho, naabaasa kukaraaza. Akaba ahurira abantu nibatebya aha bandi
bantu abaabaire baitirwa omu zaadisiko.

“Omurungi Piisi, reka tuzine!”

“Nimpurira ntarikwenda kuzina.”

Ku yaabaire akyangire kuzina, Hereni yaagaruko n’omutsigazi. Piisi ku
yaareebire ogwo mutsigazi yaatandika kutuutuka orurimi. Manya ogu akaba ari
waamutsigazi ou yaabaire yaamara kuteera orutsinduko rutaaba. Eki yaakozire
akatandika kuzina na waamutsigazi ou Hereni yaabaire amutsigiire baitu ou
yaabaire ayangire kuzina nawe.

Ahu zaagyereire kubeera shaaha nka mushanju z’ekiro, Hereni akaba
atarikumanya ahu Piisi yaabaire ari. Hereni akakwata omuhanda yaagaruka
ah’eishomero obwo nyamutsigazi yaaheza kumuha enkumi itaano z’okumugarura
ah’eishomero aha kapikipiki. Ogwo mutsigazi akagambira Hereni ahu yaabaire
naatuura kandi baaragaana ngu babugane omu katare ka Kizinda Orwokubanza
orwabaire nirukurataho baitu Hereni n’obu yaabe yaikirize akagira ati aha
mutima, “Ogu mushaija n’omworo, naabasa ata kumpa shiringi enkumi itaano
eza Uganda zonka?”. Hereni akaba amanyiire abashaija kumuha emitwaro
n’emitwaro ya sente obwo baamara kuzina hamwe nangwa n’obumwe agyendanabo
abaraarira.

 Aha shaaha nka ikumi na ibiri Piisi akaza kwimuka yaashanga ari omu mikono
y’omushaija w’emyaka makumi ashatu n’etaano. Bombi bakaba nibataamirana
amaarwa. Nibwo yaamanyire ku araire n’ogu mushaija, omuvugi wa takisi aha
ruguuto rwa Kyamuhunga kugaruka Ishaka. Nyamushaija akamuheereza emitwaro
ebiri nikwo kugaruka ah’eishomero ahu yaashangire Hereni ayerarikireire
akamutebeza ebintu oku bigyenzire. Ekyakizire okushemeza bombi n’emitwaro
ebiri ei baahaire Piisi. Okwiha obwo, Piisi akatandika kuguma naaza omu
disiko baitu ekyakizire kumutamba eikono n’enda eziyaabaire atunga. Akaba
atazitunga wenka baitu na munywani we Hereni akaba akira kuteerwa zaagooro.

Hereni uwe eki akaba atakireeba nk’oburemeezi ahakuba akaba naamanya omuntu
owaabaire naihamu enda omu ka tauni akaabaire nikeetwa Omuporoti. Hereni
akagambira Piisi ku yaabaire aihiremu enda zitari hansi ya itaano. Piisi
nawe akatandika kwihamu enda arikureebera ahari munywani we.

Ngu nikwo mbazaara akafeera aha izaara rya mwenda. Enda yaagyenzire
n’amagara ga Hereni obwo arikugifukunkuramu ekaba eri nk’eya mwenda.
Abakugu omu by’okwihamu enda bakagira ngu enda ekaba ekuzire munonga
y’okwihamu. Okufa kwa Hereni kukareeta obufuki omu mutima gwa Piisi nawe
nikwo kuba asimbire akati ahaby’okuza omu bashaija. Baitu n’obu yaarekire
eby’omubonano, amaarwa g’akamuseera ebihande reero mpaho baamubinga
ahabw’okushanga ari ebireere emirundi mingi. Akazenga omu gandi mashomero
maingi kandi amaarwa gaayongera gaamubeera enkuuku mbisi.

 EKICWEKA KYA KANA

 1

Hakaba nihaburayo ebiro mbarwa rikahika eizooba ry’okutaayaayira abeegi
ah’eishomero rya Bweranyangi. Daudi akaba agyendereire kuteera omukundwa we
kaasapuraizi. Okumumanyisa ngu akaba naija kumutaayaayira akaba akibiikire
munonga. Eby’okuraarika akaba atakira kubyetaho. Abaabaire nibamwetegyereza
gye bakaba bagira ngu uwe naagwa nk’enjura y’ekyanda. Enteekateeka ya Daudi
ekaba eri ey’okutaayaayira katima-kanura we, akaba naakimanya kurungi ngu
omushaara gwe gw’okwezi kwa Katumba gukaba nigumara kuhwera eka yaabo hamwe
n’okugurira omurungi we otuhembo tw’okumworeka buzima ku amwine aha mutima.
Esente ezi yaatungire omu kwezi kwa Kaatambuga akaba azeejuniise kuraguriza
ishe owaabaire ari hakye kushekyerwa omushwija gw’emibu.

Aha izooba rya makumi abiri na munaana omu kwezi kwa Katumba, abeegyesa
b’eishomero rya Mushana boona bakasiiba baine akamwenyo. N’obu baraaba
baabahaire sente zaabo omu mwebazyo baamara kwegyesa, baingi bakaba
nibakimanya kurungi kuruga omu kasheeshe ngu tirikubaasa kurenga
batatungire mishaara yaabo. Abaabaire baine zaakawunta omu zaabanka, sente
ezaabo zikaba ziteebwaho ebiro nka bishatu, abandi batakatungire. Abaabaire
baine akawunta omu mabiikiro g’empiiha nibo baabaire bagambira abaabaire
bataziine.

Daudi akaba atakareebaga mugasho omu kwiguraho akawunta omu banka. Sente
akaba azitwara kuhwera abazaire kandi hamwe nawe. Akaba azikorera puraani
zitakaizire. Ku yaabaire ahika omuka, azibiisya nyina. Nyina, Mangyeri
akaba aziteera omweko reero onu aguma naashoshooraho mpora. Nyina akaba ari
banka ye.

Eizooba eri yaatungiireho sente, Daudi akasiiba ah’eishomero. Akaba
agyendereire kwegyesa amashomo g’omu mwebazyo agaabaire nigashasurwa
ahonaaho. Manya bagira ngu obunura bubiri bwata amatama.

Shaaha nk’emwe n’ekicweka, akasiiburana n’abeegyesa abandi, akagaari ke
yaakaha omugyere, mpaho yaayorekyerera ogwa Kabingo, owaabo. Ezi zikaba
ziri eshaaha ezi abarungi baruganiraho kandi ezi abandi beeta orwitabaabo
manya omu shaaha ezi noobaasa n’okuteera owaanyu enkurungu otamumanyire.

Mpaho akashuuma obushuumo, yaarenga obutembo bumwe kwonka obundi bwamurema.
Omu muhanda akaba abuganamu abantu barikutambura, abandi barikuvuga
zaapikipiki kandi hamwe n’emotoka nkye. Embwa z’omuri ogwo mwanya zikaba
zaatandika kumokaamoka, reero abariisa bamwe bakiri kutaaruuka omu
mariisizo.

Haihi n’oruguuto rwa Ncwera, hariho enguuto ibiri. Orwa bumosho
nirwejunisibwa abarikuza Rutookye reero orwa buryo rwejunisibwa abarikuza
Ishaka. N’ahabw’ekyo Daudi akeejunisa oruguuto orwa buryo. Omu maisho
g’orwo ruguuto hakaba hariho orutindo. Orwo rutindo rukaba rukozirwe omu
myaka ya makumi ataano kandi rukozirwe abajungu. Ahansi yaarwo hakaba
hariho ebibaare rweiguuga ebi amaizi gaabaire gateeraho okahurira obwaku.
Omu kiro akaceceko n’okuhooreera kw’amaizi bikaba bitiinisa baingi. Omu
nshonda ina z’ogwo mugyera n’ebibira ebyabaire bishakambire bitari nk’obwa
hati. Abantu bakaija nibabitema kubyaraho oburo, abamwe baatembuuraho
entookye kandi abamwe baayombekaho n’amaju.

Omwanya gwa Ncwera ogwo tiguba mwanya gw’okuzaana. Abantu baingi bakaba
batsigireho amagara gaabo. Abanyabuzaare baabo bakaba babasherura biba
ebyabusha. Pooriisi ekaba etamanya ngu n’abantu aba baitirwa omu mwanya
ogu. Kakaba kari akaanya k’abanigi, abaitsi, abahotsi hamwe na baarunkunku.
Abariisa hamwe n’abaana bato abaabaire boohorezibwa kusheenya enku omu
kibira ekyo nibo baabaire bareeba emitumbi y’abantu reero bakagambira
abazaire baabo abaabaire bagambira bakuru b’ebyanga byabo reero mpaho
bakamanyisa abapooriisi. Baitu emirambwe emwe ekaba ejundira omuri ekyo
kibira bakiza kugireeba bashangaho otwenda twonka.

 Ababisha obumwe bakaba baitira okwo abantu reero emibiri yaabo baginaga
omuri ekyo kibira. Ba kondo ba Ncwera bakaba beejunisa embundu, emihoro,
ebihuuzo,emiteehimbwa hamwe n’enyondo. Nikigambwa ngu embundu bakaba
baziiha omu bapooriisi abu baabaire batensa nabo kandi ezimwe baziiba aha
bakuumi nyekiro, manya ngu n’abarinzi nibahumizaho kakye. Obumwe abo
barinzi bakaba babanza kurwana n’ababisha reero bakibakiza amaani babaaka
embundu. Abapooriisi hamwe n’abarinzi abamwe bakaba bateera ababisha nangwa
n’obumwe babaitamu.

Ogu nigwo mwanya ogu Daudi yaabaire naaza kurabamu shaaha nka ibiri
z’ekiro. Baingi ku baabaire bareeba eshaaha zaarenga omuri emwe,
eby’okucwekanisiza ahari Ncwera babirugaho. Nangwa n’abamwe bakaba
bashazamu engyendo zaabo ahabw’okutiina Ncwera.

Abaana bato bakaba batiina kuraba aha mwanya ogu n’obu bwakuba omu ihangwe.
Abaana b’abaishiki bakaba batiina okurahurwa abariisa. Abahambi na
baanyakutoroboza boona bakaba beeshereka omuri ako kabira. Kikaba kigumire
omwana muto kwikiriza kumutuma ahantu hoona ahaabaire haraba Ncwera. Abaana
b’eishomero bakaba bagyenda omu bikoosi n’ebimbuuro kutangira ababisha abo
okubahisyaho akabi.

Daudi ku yaahikire aha mwanya gw’enguuto ibiri, yaahurira abantu babiri
baamukwata. Omwe akamukwata amaraka reero ondiijo yaakwata amaguru ge
yaagakomera aha gaari. Nyababisha bakaba bataine mbundu kwonka emihoro
etyarize nk’egirita kandi eshongoire bundi-migyeto ekooreka amaisho ga
Daudi ku amagara ge gari omu ka mwenda. Omwe ahari abo babisha babiri
akakwata omunshaho kwihamu ebandaara y’esente. Daudi aha mutima akagira
ati, “Obuntafiire ni ryari?” Manya ngu kanyaamunyu ekashamba eiguru, eti
manya omushaija afa agyerizeho. Abamwe ngu kagyende busha niyo mbi.

Daudi obwo arikutuutuka obwoba akagyezaho kurwana n’amaani ge kwonka
nyabatsigazi baamukiza amaani. Manya bakaba bari embogo. Daudi ku yaabaire
naatebeza bataahi be abagira ati, “Manya nibakukwata ogira oti mwije
mukomoorore ekyoma kyankamuura.” Omu kurwana omwo nimwo yaagire kweshukuza
omuhoro gukamutema aha mukono gukataho ekironda. Ku baamazire kumwihaho
empiiha ezi yaabaire akoreire okwezi kwona, nikwo kumwigatira entomi
n’emigyere barikutiina ngu obumwe atakaaba yaabamanya akahwera pooriisi omu
kubajandura. Manya bakamugutura, baamanya ngu baakaraaza nikwo kumirwa
ekibira kya Ncwera.

Ahanyima y’edakiika nka itaano, motoka ya piikaapu eyaabaire eyorekyereire
ogwa Ishaka ekaija kakye ekaraarize kimwe. Ku baayemereire baashanga
nyamutsigazi niguhara eitaka nikwo kumwirukangiza omu irwariro erya
Nyakatsiro. Ah’eirwariro eri abashaho bakakora n’agaabo okureeba ngu Daudi
yaaruga omu koma baitu tibarabaasize nikwo kumwohereza omu irwariro erya
Ishaka erimanywa nka Ncwanga. Ahanyima y’ebiro bibiri, Daudi akeeshanga
ahagati y’abazaire be ecupa emuri ahaiguru kandi ebicweka bingi by’omubiri
bishembire.

 2

Fabiano ku yaareebire Yeremiya Turibamwe owaabaire ari mukuru w’ekyaro
yaayenda kukoresa oburingaaniza, yaacwamu ku abeihabeiha omutima gwe obwo
arikwejunisa esente. Akaba naamanya ngu Yeremiya aine oburemeezi bwa sente.
Akeejunisa obworo bwa Chaimaani nk’eirobo reero empiiha ze zaaba omwambu
ogwa muhwereire kushoha omutima gwa Yeremiya. Owa biso akagira ati
ekirirema sente bakinage reero n’abandi nikwo kumugarukamu omwe aha ndiijo
nk’abaabaire bamweteguurire;

Sente nizibaasa kukugurira ekitanda kirungi kwonka tizirikubaasa kukuha
oturo

Sente nizibaasa kukugurira eby’okurya n’eby’okunywa byona ebi orikwenda
kwonka tizirikubaasa kukuha akooyooyo k’okubirya.

Sente nizibaasa kushasura abashaho kwonka tizikaabaasa kugura magara. Manya
nabo bakira kugira ngu, “Nituragura kwonka amagara n’okutamba biba ebya
Nyamuhanga.

Sente nizibaasa kukwombekyera enju nungi kwonka tiziribaasa kukuha
obusingye bw’okutuura omunju egyo.

Sente nizibaasa kukutwara buri hantu hoona oihireho omwiguru.

Sente nizibaasa kukuhwera kushwera omukazi murungi kwonka tizirikukuhwera
kugura rukundo.

Sente nizibaasa kukuhwera kutaaha omu bushwere kwonka tizirikukuha mwana.

Sente nizibaasa kugura ebintu bingi oihireho omwitsyo.

Manya ebitabo ebirikwera bizeeta oburugo bw’ebibi byona. Oteebwa ngu
zikareetera Yuda yaareebya Yesu. Fabiano akakwata emitwaro makumi ashatu ya
Uganda yaagiha Yeremiya ngu abinge omushango. Akakwata emitwaro ikumi
ezindi yaaziha omutsigazi omwe aha kyaro ngu agume naateera aha dirisa ya
Ruhangariyo kumutiinisa reero obwo ngu nyamutsigazi ku araamare agyende
ayongyere kufurura omugorora obwo arikutwara eitaka rya nyakagurutsi.

Ruhangariyo ku yaagarukire owa Yeremiya aha Saabiiti, Chaimaani
yaamugambira ku ebintu bitoorobi.

“Abanyankore bagira ngu akukizire naaguma akukizire. Abandi nibongyera
bagira ngu okukizire naita sho ayongyera ashwera nyoko.”

Egi nfumu ekaijusya Ruhangariyo omutsigazi w’aha kyaro kya Bukuba ou
omugaiga omwe yaitsire ahabw’omukazi. Nyamutungi naakunda muk’abandi ogu
baitu omukazi ku yaabaire aruga owa nyamugaiga, nyamukyene amuteera ezi
Mbaguta yaateire muha. Nyamutungi eki yaakozire n’okusherura abaitsi
akabaha omukunkuma gw’empiiha. Ekiro enjura ku yaabaire neegwa, ababisha
baataahirira eka egyo baacwanyagura omushaija, mpaho omukazi baamureka
ataine kamogo. Ebiro bikye bamazire kuziika iba ou yaabaire azaire nawe
abaana babiri, omukazi akagyenda n’omugaiga yaamutaatsya reero yaashenda
ogwo ou yaabaire azaire nawe abaana mukaaga.

“Noobaasa kutabaariza Fabiano kwonka noobaasa obutahika hare ahakuba
abakama boona abaine omu ikumi ry’engaro. Eki oraakore oikirize mubimare
kitaka reero akugure waaba nookunda ofurukye omurekyere obusingye. Manya
naanye tiinyine kindikubaasa kumukora ahakuba n’omutungi. Nimmanya ngu
baingi nibagira ngu nampayo omugaati kwonka ebyo byona n’amatu g’embuzi agu
barikunkoma ngu ndibwe engwe. Nookimanya kurungi ngu nyowe nincwa emanja
z’oburyo kandi tiinyine ou nyitira aha riisho. Ekibi nkireeba nk’ekibi
kandi nkijumiirira.

N’ahabw’ekyo omwami Ruhangariyo, naaba ninkuhabura ku oreka omushaija.
Ebitwire nibiba omu byaro ebitwehinguririze noobihurira kandi tinkwenzire
ngu bikuhikyeho. Manya kubirikuhika omu kyanga kyaitu biri nituba twayata.
Abanyankore eshi bakaba baine obwengye! Bakongyera baacwa enfumu ngu
amagara nigakira amagana. Tikiine mugasho kukiza eitaka okafeerwa amagara.
Buzima nooba waacundira kamena. Ku orikuba osigaize amagara, ebintu
noobikorera. Ensi manya ekaija neehwamu oburingaaniza. Omuntu orikuba aine
sente naakukora eki arikwenda.

Ebi naabikugambira kukiza amagara gaawe, kurinda obugwagye n’obusingye omu
kyaro kyaitu kya Kabingo. Baitu hoona nabwo n’omwoga gwangye nka mukuru
w’ekyaro eki kuhabura n’okuhuguura abantu abu ndikwebembera”

Yeremiya akamariira obuhabuzi bwe n’okwehahaamura. Manya akeeshama
waashusha oti naayenda kumira omuntu. Okaba nooshusha oti nink’ekyenyanja
eki Ruhanga yaatumire ngu kimire Yona ahabw’okujeemera ekiragiro kye.
Nikireebeka Chaimaani akaba aine enjara nyingi. Okugaaniira n’abakyene
kukaba kumureetera ebironda by’omu mara ebi beeta arusaazi. Manya abaahati
nibagira ngu orufu rw’omutungi nirukira obugyenyi bw’omukyene. Manya enkoko
neeshonda aku erikubaasa kumira. Uwe Ruhangariyo akaihire nkahi eza bia
y’okugaaniiriraho. Baitu eshagama terikuruga omurushandago neeruga omu
ibaare? Shana ibaare eryareetsire amaizi n’eri Musa yaateire enkoni, mpaho
abaana ba Isiraeli bakagagotomera obutaisya manya ngu eiriho rikaba
ryaboomize.

Ekinyonyi ku kiguruka kitagambire ngu biri n’ekyana. Ruhangariyo akakora
omu iraka eryabaire nirijwa obujune. Ahamaisho he hakaba harimbagiriirwe.
Amaisho akaba nooshusha oti baagashukamu orwamba weeza obusaasi okaba
noobaasa kubushoma aha maisho ge.

“Ensi teine buringaaniza ahakuba abahairwe obushoboorozi kucwa emanja
bahongire obukuru bw’obushoboorozi bwabo ah’eitambiro ry’empiiha”

Yeremiya ku yaahuriire ebi yaataaha omu nju yaamusigaho n’onu yaanyomboroka
yaataaha owe obwo omutwe nigwenda kushaturwa ebiteekateeko n’obujune.
Akagaita enaku y’omuhara n’eye yaahamya ku egyo yaabaire etari nguma y’ensi
baitu ku buzima bugingo yaabaire emuhikiire. Baitu omuri byona akaba
agambira omuhara ati, “Ruhanga ariho!”

 3

Ku haabaire hahingwire esaabiiti nka ibiri Ayiriini aherize kuremwa omurimo
omu kitongore ekyebuuzibwaho, yaatunga omurimo omu kitongore kyanyekundiire
ekyabaire nikikora ahaby’obugabe bw’abantu.

Ekitongore eki kikaranga emirimo yaakyo aha reediyo Wesiti. Ruhangariyo
akaba aine rediyo ye eyaabaire eine aheeru ahaabaire hari ekiti reero
omunda biri ebyoma na zaawaaya. Rediyo egi ekaba emazire emyaka erikurenga
makumi abiri. Ekaba eyeteera ahansi eguma neegamba. Obumwe ku yaabaire
ehanantuka nk’ahakatandaaro yaayegutura ahansi eyanga kugamba. Ruhangariyo
akaba agibiika kumara ebiro nka bibiri reero akigiihayo yaimata akapeesha
k’okugigambisa ashanga neerangira. Nikyo abantu baabaire bagyetera kyoma-
kya-kare. N’obu reediyo egi yaabaire etarikunywa munonga amanda, obwire
obwingi ekaba etagamba ahabw’amanda kuhwamu. Ruhangariyo akaba agiteera
mpaka amanda gatandikire kujwa. Akaba atamu amanda ahanyima y’ameezi nka
ana.

Egi niyo reediyo ei Ayiriini yaahuriirehe ebirango by’okuranga omurimo.
Akatebeekanisa ebihandiiko by’obwegyese omuhanda yaagwenagamu ngu manya
owaafa naaggyenda amaguru tigamugaya. Akagira ati, “Reka nteereho,
tokaamanya” Baingi eby’okusherura emirimo bakaba bakizire kutabyetaho
ahakuba kikaba kitoorobi kutunga omurimo.

Bakuru b’ebitongore bakaba babanza kushaba ngu babyame n’abaishiki
n’abakazi omuby’omubonano. Haza muntuwe hakaba hariho n’engambo ngu abakazi
batari bamwe na bamwe abaabaire nibakurira ebitongore bakaba bashaba
kubyama n’abatsigazi batakabahaire mirimo. Abakazi bakaba baizire
nibahinduka. Bakaba bashaba abashaija ngu beegaite nabo omuby’omubonano
ekyabaire kitakira kuhurirwa omu myaka ey’enyima. Baingi bakaba bagira ngu
okuheereza abakazi obugabe bw’ekirenga kikabateera eishaija baatandika
kukora ebintu bundi-mashaija. Abakazi abamwe bakaba bashaba kubyama
n’abakozi b’ahaka, baadereeva baabo hamwe n’abandi bakozi. Manya abazaana
n’omu bitabo ebirikwera bakaba bahambwa. Abarikubyetegyereza nibahamya ngu
Yosefu akarigirwa muka Potifaari, mukama we kandi omwe aha bakuru b’engabo
za Faraaho.

Abashaija nabo obwo bunaku bakaba basheegire. Bakaba bakira kurigira
abakozi b’abaishiki namunonga ab’ahaka. Abakazi abamwe bakaba benda ngu
baahausigaaro bakore burikimwe oteireho n’okwara ekitanda. Bakaba barekyera
abashaija baahausigaaro reero nabo bakyemwa bashanga bagiire
omuby’omubonano. Abamwe bakaba babazaaramu n’abaana nangwa n’obumwe
baremesa baanyinamaka abu baibabo baabaire bashenda bakataasya
baahausigaaro baabo. Baitu abashaija bamwe bakaba bari baarushaju kandi
bakaba batareebera mukazi weena busha okwihaho okwegaita nawe
omuby’enshoni. Abantu bakaba babagaaniiza ngu n’obu waakukoma sikaati aha
motoka, baarushaju nibagikinaho mpaka batungire egyo sikaati.

Hoona nabwo okutunga emirimo kukaija kwazamu eigufa ahabw’abantu kuguma
nibendeza emirimo ab’eka n’enganda zaabo. Ekyabaire kiri kikuru n’omuntu ou
orikumanya ti bukugu obu oine. Manya abanyankore bakagicwa ngu shwento
yaawe ku ahakuura, okomba ebyara. Abandi ngu ekishorobwa ekihango okyendeza
enkoko eyaawe. Kwonka nibo bamwe abagira ngu oyorora zoona tomanya
erikutambira. Kikaba kyorobi omuntu kuha mwene-ishe omurimo n’obu yaabaire
aba ataine bukugu obwabaire buba nibwetengwa. Manya ngu n’obukyakuba
ekifeera nikiba kiri ekifeera kyanyu. Kikaba kitari kutangaaza kutaaha omu
ofiisi okaakirwa omuntu w’oruganda nanka, akakwohereza ow’omunyaruganda,
reero okiba nooshohora okashanga haihi abakozi boona nibagaaniira omu
rurimi rumwe. Eki kikaba kibugire omu bicweka bya Uganda byona.

Abantu bakaba batakyenda nakuhandiika nibashaba emirimo n’obu baabaire
bagiranga. Bakaba beetomboita ngu zaakampuni niziba ziine abanyabuzaare
b’abamwe omuri bakama baazo abu barikuba babiikiire egyo mirimo. Bakaba
bongyera bagira ngu okuranga emirimo zaakampuni niziba zigyendereire kukoma
abantu akatambaara ahamaisho ngu bakaagira ngu kampuni neeha abantu
emirimo.

Mukuru w’abakozi ku yaabaire atakushaba kwegaita nawe omuby’omubonano,
akaba akushaba enguzi. Manya ngu baingi bakaba baheerezayo omushaara gwabo
gw’okubanza kwenda ngu batungye omurimo. Bamwe bakaba babingwa ahanyima
y’okwezi kw’okubanza obwo baamara kutoizera bakama baabo reero mpaho
barugiramu aho nk’abaita warujoka.

Okuha enguzi nainga okubyama na mukama waawe kikaba kitari kumanyisa ngu
omurimo waatunga ogw’entuura. Ba boosi ku baabaire baheza kubyama n’abakozi
baabo emirundi mingi basherura za rwekwaso reero bababinga bareeta abasya.
Manya ngu akatari kaawe okabiika oteigutsi ngu kandi akati karaakusiige
amazi onia nikeimukyera. Hariho abaabaire batabyama na bakama baabo
okuhisya baahika aha murimo. Nabo ku baabaire bareeba batunga omurimo,
eby’okubyama n’abakama baabo babyangira kimwe. Kwonka bakama baabo bakaba
basherura za rwekwaso mpaho bababinga aha mirimo.

Kikaba nikitwara obumanzi, omuntu kwimuka arikuza kusherura omurimo obunaku
obwo. Ayiriini akaba ari omwe omu manzi ezo. N’obu yaabaire naamanya
oburemeezi oburi omu kusherura emirimo, akongyera yaatebeekanisa
ebihandiiko by’obwegyese, mpaho yaaza kushaba obwa karaani omu kitongore
ekyabaire nikirwaniirira obugabe bw’abantu.

Omwakizi niwe yaabaire aragiirwe kuheebwa ebihandiiko. Buri muntu owaahayo
okushaba kwe akaba naaragiirwa okuhayo enamba y’esimu nainga endagiiriro
ye. Ayiriini we akaba ataine simu n’ahabw’ekyo akasigayo endagiiriro ye.
Manya obwire obwo esimu nibwo zaabaire zaatandika okubuga omu Uganda.
Abaabaire baziine omu byaro bakaba bari mbarwa. Ayiriini akaijuka obwire
obu esimu yaabaire ekwatirwa aha mwanya gumwe. Kikaba kitoorobi kuyungwa
aha muntu kugambira nawe aha simu. Fabiano niwe yaabandize kugura esimu omu
kyaro kya Kabingo kandi akaba agiteerera aheeru y’enju ye aha kiti
ky’orutunda. Ngu aho niho esimu yaabaire egambira kurungi reero akahurizana
n’abantu be. N’obu bwabaire buba buri nyekiro, akaba ashohora aza kwakiira
esimu. Ebitongore by’esimu bikaba biri mbarwa kandi abaine esimu
barikuzishasuurira n’omushoro. Baingi omu byaro bakaba batangaara oku
omuntu ari Kampala arikubaasa kugamba n’omuntu ori Kabingo barikwejunisa
akooma kakye.

Ahanyima y’esaabiiti emwe, ebirango bikaraba aha reediyo obwo ekyo
kitongore kirikweta abaabaire bateireyo okushaba kwabo kugyenda kugyezibwa
kureeba baaba nibabaasa kukora kurungi emirimo. Okugyezibwa oku nikwo beeta
ntaaviyuuhu.

Abaishiki bashatu nibo baabaire bashabire obwa karaani kandi kampuni ekaba
neeyenda karaani omwe ah’eitaagi ryayo erya Ishaka.

Beti Arinda. Sikoovia Katushabe. Ayiriini Kyomuhendo. Aba nibo baabaire
nibariitanira omurimo gw’obwa karaani. Beti Arinda akaba aherize Siniya ya
mukaaga kandi ari omu kihuumuro kiraingwa. Akaba agyendereire kutunga ahu
araabe naayehugiza okuhisya ahu ekihuumuro kiraahwere. Baitu akaba
areetsire ekihandiiko kya siniya ya kana ekyabaire kiine enkoni ina za
biishoopu. N’obu araabe yaabaire naacwera Orungyereza obuhano, akaba
arwihiremu enkoni ya biishoopu.

 Akaija ajwaire ka sikaati kagufu. Okaba nooshusha oti yaiba ak’omwe aha
barumuna abaabaire bakiri bato. Ku yaabaire ainama, abareebi bakwata aha
maisho ngu batareeba amahano. Ahabw’okugabwa yaabaire ayegiire Kampala,
enjwara nk’egyo akaba naagireeba nk’etaine nshonga baitu bo abantu b’omu
myanya y’ebyaro bakaba bakireeba nk’emijwarire ya ba maraaya. Omu maisho
akaija ateiremu ebirahuri bihango birikwiragura ebi baabaire nibeeta
ebiwaani. Baingi bakaba babireeba nk’eby’abayaayi. Omu bigyere akaba
ateiremu enkaito eziri nka butusi ezi yaabaire areeba abeeshongozi
b’abakazi barikujwara omuri Kampala.

Ogu niwe yaabandize kutaaha omu kishengye kya ntaaviyuuhu. Hakaba harimu
abashaija babiri n’abakazi babiri. Ku yaataahiremu omukazi w’emyaka nka
makumi ana owaabaire ajwaire gaarubindi, yaakwata aha munwa nikwo kwihamu
za gaarubindi kuhweza gye ogu mwishiki. Ogu mukazi akateekateeka ngu
gaarubindi obundi zaareeba ebiwaazi kwonka bambe zikaba zitari kumworeka
biwaazi, zikaba nizimworeka ebiri byo.

“Ni mugamba ki ba kyari?”

Abana bakareebana. Ogwo mukazi w’a gaarubindi akeekwatiirira yaamubuuza
amaziina ge. Beti akamugaruka omu Rungyereza rurikuterera ha rurimi.
Nyamukazi nikwo kutambika akacumu enyima ya Beti akamugira ngu
akamwihireho. Beti akateeraho kunyurura ka sikaati kukagaruza ahansi byona
byaba ebyakubeiha. Akafa mamigye yaakaihaho reero baakwata aha minwa mpaho
baagwerwa akagwe. Bakacwamu kumusiibura bakamutuma ondiijo.

Sikoovia Katushabe akaba ajwire ka syuti k’erangi ya kakobe kandi weena
arikureebeka gye. Akaba ashomire eby’okuteeka baitu bakaba bamubingire omu
hoteeri ei yaabaire naakoramu.

Ku yaatahire omu kishengye baamuhabura kuhandiika arikushaba omurimo
gw’okuteeka ahakuba nagwo bakaba bagurangire kwonka tihaine muntu yaabaire
ashomire eby’okuteeka omu bantu boona abaabaire bahaireyo okushaba kwabo.
Sikoovia akahandiika ebaruha ahonaaho reero baamushaba ku ateeka kyamushana
y’abantu bataano ei yaateekire boona bakarya bakasiima. Egyo niyo yaabaire
eri ntaviyuuhu ye kandi nyamwishiki w’emyaka nka abiri na mukaaga akatunga
omurimo eizooba eryo.

Ebibuuzo ebibaahaire Ayiriini bikaba bitagumire ahakuba akaba ashomereire
omurimo ogwo. Ebirikukira obwingi akabiikaarira reero eizooba niryo rimwe
baamuha ebaruha y’okumwikiriza kutandikiraho kukora. Nyamwishiki akasimba
amaju yaayebaza abaabaire nibamubuuza reero mpaho nabo baamwenyamwenya.
Bakamweta aha kyamushana ei Sikoovia yaabaire atebeekanisize. Akakoraho
kakye ahabw’amashemererwa kandi hamwe n’ahabw’amakune.

 4

Fabiano akaba naamanywa ah’eishomero rya Bweranyangi. Baingi bakaba
nibamumanya nk’omutungi rurangaanwa. Abandi nk’ishe wa Maria Karungi.
Abandi barikumumanya nka mukama wa Faabi Saapuraayizi. Baitu eki abeegi,
abeegyesa n’abakumi b’eishomero rya Bweranyangi baabaire nibakira
okumumanyaho n’okukyera kare ah’eizooba ry’okutaayaayira abeegi. Tihariho
muzaire yaabaire amutanga ah’eishomero eizooba eryo. Okutaayaaya kukaba
kutandika shaaha ina z’akasheeshe. Akarimi k’eshaaha ku kaabaire kaba
nikarigatsa kati omuri ina z’akasheeshe nawe aba naapaakinga emotoka aha
geeti. Abeegi bakaba batuura nibashaba mukuru w’eishomero ku ataho empaka
z’okukyera ah’eizooba ry’okutaayaaya. Ezo buri mwegi akaba naamanya ngu
Fabiano naatwara ekikopo ataine kihakanisa. Uwe Maria akaba aza aha geeti
bukiri kare harikuburayo nk’edakiika ikumi na itaano kuba shaaha ina.

N’ah’eizooba rya makumi ashatu ry’okwezi kwa Katumba, nyamushaija niwe
yaabandiize abandi. Ahu zaagiire kubeera shaaha itaano, akaba ariyo
naasiibura omuhara obwo baamara kugaaniira bingi. Bimwe omu bibaagaaniire
hakaba harimu eby’okushoma. Maria akashaba sente z’okugura obutabo
bw’eishomo ry’Ebihimbo erimanywa nka Liiturica. Ezi ishe akazimuha
yaamugira ngu aije ashabe orusha aze omu tauni abigure.

Ku zaabaire nizihika shaaha nka munaana, omurinzi yaatuma abaishiki ngu
bamwetere Maria Karungi. Karungi akaba naamanya ngu abagyenyi be baahwayo
ahakuba ishe akaba yaamara kugyenda. Nyamwishiki akaba ari omu doomu
ahuumwireho nikwo kuhurira omuntu arikumusiimura. Akaimuka yaagyenda buguru-
butakora-hansi ahaihi n’aha geeti. Ku yaabaire atakahikireho nikwo kunaga
amaisho akareeba munywani we Piisi ari aha geeti. Piisi akaba ayegwire
ekishaho kihango.

Maria akayoora Piisi yaamuhombera batakamuhandiikire n’okumuhandiika. Mpaho
bakamwikiriza kutaaha omu ishomero reero mpaho bashutama ahansi y’omuti
baatandika kugaaniira. Piisi akaba areeteire munywani we enanansi,
obutunda, ebinyoobwa bikarangire hamwe n’ebikoijo. Ebi ni bimwe
ahaby’okurya ebi Maria yaabaire naakunda n’obu ishe yaabaire
atabimureetera. Ishe ebi akaba abireeba nk’eby’okurya by’abakyene,
abatarikubaasa kugura emigaati, za sooda, za kwenca, enyama z’omu micebe
hamwe n’ebindi nk’ebyo. Ebyo nibyo byabaire biri eby’okurya by’abaana
b’abagaiga.

N’obu baashutamire kugamba, Piisi akaba naahurira aha mutima weena
asingirwe orubanja. Nyarubanja rukaba ruri orw’okukyema omukundwa wa
munywani we ou yaabaire aizire kutaayaayira. Akaba aguma naayebuuza
ekyakubaasa kubaho Maria ku yaakumanya ngu Piisi akaba naayenda ngu
ayegaite n’omukundwa we omuby’omubonano. N’obu Maria yaabaire atarikumanya
ebi akaba arahureireho abaishiki abu banywani baabo baabaire bashendashenda
kandi bakarigira abakundwa baabo bakahendera babashweire. Akaba arahureire
ngu hariho abakazi abarikurigira abashaija b’abanywani baabo. Baitu Maria
akaba naakimanya kurungi ngu Daudi naamukunda kandi tarikubaasa kwegaita
n’omwishiki ondiijo ahakuba akaba ayerindiire omukundwa we.

Maria n’obu yaakuzire ari munywani wa Piisi, akaba atarikumumanyaho bingi.
Akaba ashomiire omu mashomero marungi kandi akaba araarayo. Obumwe n’obumwe
bakaba bashoma omu bihuumuro kandi bakiba batashomire mubihuumuro, ishe
amutwara omu myanya y’okurambura nk’amarindiro g’enyamaishwa. N’ahabw’ekyo,
Maria akaba atarikumanya obujunde bw’emicwe ya munywani we. Akaba atuura
naamureeba nk’omwishiki w’emicwe mirungi munonga.

Amakuru agu Piisi yaateire Maria gakaba gatari marungi. Ogu nigwo murundi
gw’okubanza ogu Maria yaateekateekire ngu munywani we naabeiha. Akeebuuza
ahabw’enki ishe atamugambira amakuru age. Ku yaabaire akijabikirwe omu
nyanja y’ebiteekateeko, yaijuka ku ishe atenda Daudi Nkunda. Manya akaba
naayenda ngu ashwerwe mwene-Kanyankore, omusinzi owaabaire ataruga mu
bakazi niwe Edisoni Mwesigye.

Okumugambira aha bizibu by’omukundwa we kikareetera eby’okugaaniira na
Piisi byabura. Maria akaruga omu buteeka, weena yaaza omu biteekateeko.
Eky’okubanza akaba atarikwikiriza ngu n’amazima. Ekya kabiri kugaakuba gari
amazima, akaba naatiiniirira amagara ga Daudi. Akaba naakimanya ku kigumire
Daudi kutunga obujanjabi ahakuba owaabo bakaba bataine sente. Ekya kashatu
akaba naayebuuza yaaba ishe aine omukono omu butandu egi. Akaba atuura
naakimanya ku ishe atari mushaija w’amazima n’oburingaaniza. Nyamwishiki na
nyina bakaba batuura nibajumiirira ebikorwa bye.

Eizooba eryakuratsireho, Maria akashaba orusa owa Mukuru w’eishomero.
Enshonga ei yaahaire n’okuza kugura ebitabo by’Ebihimbo. Akatemba ka
pikipiki shaaha nka ina z’akasheeshe nikwo kworekyerera ogwa Ncwanga eya
Ishaka. Omu ruguuto, ebiiruka bikaba nibirigita. Obwire obwo, butandu
z’ahanguuto zikaba zikizire kukanyisibwa abavugi ba zaapikipiki manya
gukaba gwija niguba omuhango. Buri mutsigazi owaabaire aruga ati omu
ishomero, azakuvuga pikipiki ngu aihemu esente. Abavugi baamotoka bagira
amashomero g’okwegyeramu okuzivuga kwonka bo aba za pikipiki tibagagira.
N’ahabw’ekyo, kikaba kyorobi kuza omukuvuga pikipiki okukira okuza omu
murimo gw’okuvuga emotoka. Manya n’emotoka zigura omukunkuma gw’empiiha
waagyeragyeranisa na zaapikipiki.

Pikipiki zikaija zaatandika nakuvugwa abatsigazi abaabaire bashomire baitu
okutunga emirimo kubabeereire enkuuku-mbitsi. Baingi bakaba nibaikiriza ngu
omurimo gw’okuvuga pikipiki ogu baingi baabaire nibamanya nka boodabooda
gukaba gurimu sente. Abaabaire bakoresa amaani bakeehara okutuntumuurira
sente omu bakazi hamwe n’omukugura amaarwa n’ebindi bitokooza-bwonko buzima
bakaba baihamu sente, bombeka n’amaju.

Omu dakiika nka ikumi bakaba baahikire Ncwanga. Manya kuruga Bweranyangi
kugaruka Ishaka bakaba nibavugira aha ruguuto nyiigyendwa orwa Mbarara-
Kaseese. Omutsigazi owaabaire naavuga akaba nairukanga nk’owaaheza kwiba
pikipiki. Abantu abu yaabaire arabaho basigara nibareeba ekiraabeho omu
maisho. Ku baabaire bahika aha zaahampu epiki eguruka ehika owa nyakacu
reero nyamwishiki omutima gumugwa omunda. Embeho ku yaabaire nyamwingi,
nyamuvugi wa piki, yaamutiiza jaketi ye. Jaketi egi ekaba eine eiriho.
Nikireebeka ekaba emazire ameezi nk’abiri etarikureeba g’ah’eiziba.
Nyamwishiki akahurira neenuukamu etaabe hamwe n’ebindi bintu bi
atareetegyereize. Ku yaakozire omunshaho y’egyo jaketi, yaashanga harimu
omushamata gw’amababi agaabaire gari omu kapapura karikwiragura sirisiri.
Uwe nyamwishiki akamanya ngu nink’amajaani nikwo kugagaruza omunshaho.
Baitu muntu uwe aga gakaba gari amairungi. N’obu avuga nk’orikuza geehena,
akaba weena asinzire. Amaisho ge gakaba nigatukura nk’agu baashukamu
eshagama kandi ebigambo ebimwe bikaba bitashohora kurungi omu kanwa.

Maria ku yaareebire yaahika Ncwanga, nikwo kuteera ekiruhuuko okashusha oti
yaija ayegwire pikipiki. Manya akateera ekiruhuuko boona abaabaire bariho
baagamuhanga. Obu aija omu muhanda akaba naateekateeka aha mukundwa we.
Akaija naashabira aha mutima obwo arikweshengyereza Nyamuhanga
Ow’obushoboorozi bwona kwohereza omukono gwe ogw’embabazi gukaba nigwo
gwakiza omukundwa we. Maria akaba ari omwishiki arikumanya kushaba. N’obu
yaabaire aine byona baitu akaba ashabira abaabaire baine oburemeezi. Akaba
akira kushoma evangiri aha kereziya ya Kabingo. Hoona nabwo akaba akira
n’okweshongora omu iramizo niryo rimwe. N’ahabw’ekyo eby’okushaba bikaba
bitamuri hangahari.

Ku yaabaire yaimusya ati amaisho, yaareeba Mangyeri. Nyamukazi akaba
yaashohora aheeru kugura obushera. Amaisho ge goona gakaba nigatukura
ahabw’okuraara aha kiro. Weena akaba ari omwera ahakuba ebiro bibiri ebi
yaabaire yaamara Ncwanga akaba atahereerukire kajuta. Ku yaareebire Maria
yaamanya ngu aizire kureeba Daudi. Eki kikashemeza nyamukaikuru ahakuba
akamanya ngu nyamwishiki naakunda omutabani – manya owaawe omu buremeezi
niwe waawe buzima.

Mangyeri akatwara Maria omu kishengye ahu Daudi yaabaire ari. Omu kashengye
ako hakaba harimu abandi barwaire bashatu baitu okwiha baabareeta embeera
zaabo zikaba nizeeyongyera kwerarikiiriza abarwarisa baabo. Babiri bakaba
bari abavugi ba boodabooda abu baatomiire kandi ondi akaba agwire omu
bambuzi abaamutemire bakamuhutaaza bakasigaho kaingana-busha. Nyamushaija
bakaba bamutemeire Nyarutuntu ogundi mwanya ogu ababisha baabaire bakira
kutakiza abantu. Ogwo mwanya gukaba guri haihi n’etauni ya Ishaka. Ogwo
mushaija akaba ari omushuubuzi w’enkaito omuri Ishaka. Akagwa omu bambuzi
ahakya makumi abiri na munaana eizooba niryo rimwe obu Daudi yaibwaho sente
ze zoona ez’omushaara. Ekishengye kikaba kiboogire abashuubuzi ba Ishaka
abaabaire baizire kureeba mutaahi waabo ou baabaire beeta Kashaija.
Kashaija akaba ari omutsigazi w’emyaka nka makubi abiri na mukaaga baitu
akaba ataine mukazi. Akaba naazarwa omu kyaro kya Matimba.

Kashaija niwe yaabaire naakirayo okusesya. Akaba agaaniirira abantu
abaabaire baija kugura enkaito reero n’obundi bakyenda kugura enkaito baija
aha duuka ye. Obumwe omuntu akaba aija ataine kiteekateeko ky’okugura
kwonka ahabw’akarimi karungi ka Kashaija ahendera ashemburiire enkaito.
Empangare n’abakazi nibo baabaire bakirayo kuba ba kasitoma be. Aba bakaba
bakira kumuganzya bagumize ngu agwire aha mahega. Bakaba bakira kumubuuza,
“Baitu kashaija oshwera ryari. Kanooshusha oti emyaka yaija neekugyendaho?”

Abandi bakaba bamubuuza, “Tugire ngu okaburwa omukazi w’okushwera, ente
z’okujuga nainga tugire ngu baa ekakuribata?”

“Bantumwe ka nibagira ngu amaka tigoorobi. Abaine abakazi kanibarira ngu
bababeereire enkuuku mbisi. Abakazi nabo nibarira ngu abashaija babaremire”

Abamwe bakaba bamwijutsya ngu tookaatiina kubyama ngu otakaaroota n’obu
waakuba orugire kutunga ekirooto kirikutiinisa. Nawe akaba abagarukamu
n’ekibuuzo, “Baitu imwe, ngu engozi ya muha teheeka oti ekaheeka nyakufa?
Iwe toyebuuza ekyamwitsire? Ngu amaka n’oburiite, oti oshwera ryari
Kashaija?”

Abaishiki bamwe bakagyezaho kumurigira baitu we yaabeeshumba. Bakaba baija
kumutaayaayira aha duuka hamwe n’omunju ye eya Matimba. Abamwe bakaba
bataaha obwire bwagyenzire bareeba rw’ekyojo atabariho. Abaishiki baingi
bakaba nibamanya ngu n’ekifa-bigyere baitu hoona nabwo bakaba nibamukunda.
Omu bantu abaayeshukire omu irwariro kumureeba abaingi bakaba bari abakazi
n’abaishiki.

Abeegyesa b’eishomero rya Mushana bakaba baarugaho bati kureeba Daudi.
Bakasiga baaheereza nyina sente z’okumuhwera reero baaraba Kabingo
kugambira ishe oku yaabaire yaija naateguukayo. Manya akaba yaatandika
kwija naatabuukayo. Akaba naabasa kumanya omuntu kandi n’okugamba akaba
yaija naagambamu. Ku yaareebire Maria, yaamwenyaho kakye, nyamwishiki waitu
bambe yaayatika yaarira amashemererwa ga rukundo. Akamanya ngu Daudi oru
naabaasa kurukira. Daudi akamwebaza ahabw’okwija kumureeba hamwe
n’ahabw’okumukunda. Maria akakwata emitwaro ikumi ya Uganda yaagisigira
Daudi ngu ebe neemuhwera. Akeebaza Mangyeri ahabw’okureeberera Daudi kandi
yaabatengyera okurahuka kukira hamwe n’okugira obusingye.

Maria ku yaabaire naashohora aha geeti y’eirwariro omwe aha bakozi b’ishe
yaamureeba. Abakozi ba Fabiano boona bakaba baragiirwe okurinda
n’okureebuuza Maria kumanya ahu yaatamburira, ou yaatambura nawe, eki
yaakora n’ou yaakikora nawe. Eryo izooba Badaada akaba atagiire kureebuuza
n’okurega Maria. Mukama we akaba amutumire kugura omubazi gw’ente omu
tauni. Uwe Maria tarareebire Badaada ahakuba akaba naakoma nibiragara
agyendereire kugaruka ah’eishomero omu bwire. Manya mukuru w’eishomero
akaba amuhaire eshaaha ibiri zonka kuba yaagarukire. Bamwe omu baishiki
b’amashomero bakira kugira omuze gw’okushaba ensa reero bakaza kukora
emicwe mibi. Abamwe bakaba babeiha ngu haine ebi barikwenda kugura omu
tauni reero bagyenda kubugana abashaija baabo. N’obu ogu mucwe gwabaire
gutakira kukanya omuri Bweranyangi baitu gukaba guriyo. Nangwa n’omu
mashomero agandi ogu omuze gukaba gubereire abeegyesa amaino-ga-ruguru.

Maria akairuka yaacwekanisa oruguuto, ahaihi n’omu itundiro ry’ebitabo erya
Tushome. Akagura ebitabo jubajuba nikwo kukwata pikipiki ekamugaruza
Bweranyangi. Akaribata omu ishomero harikuburayo edakiika mukaaga kuba
shaaha mukaaga nikwo kuza owa mukuru w’eishomero akamumanyisa ku
yaagarukire kandi ku ekyaba kimutwire nakyo yaakibona.

Badaada akaba naakyetegyereza ngu mukama we ku yaakumanya ngu yaareeba
Miria reero akabura kumugambira, ebye bikaba nibibaasa kuba ebindi. Ku
yaagarukire omuka nikwo kugambira Fabiano. Nyamutungi ekiniga kikaba
nikyenda kumubarura. Weena akatuumatuuma waashusha oti arihaihi kubaruka.
Akatandika kutonganisa omukazi we Jovinta Kendagaano ou yaateereire esimu,
ngu manya omwana mubi ajumisa nyina kandi maawe ngu n’okushusha ashusha
nyina.

Fabiano akavuga emotoka obwo ekiniga kirikwenda kumushatura. Ku yaahikire
omu ofiisi ya mukuru w’eishomero, baamushaba ku ategyerezaho kakye ahakuba
mukuru w’eishomero akaba yaaza omu kibiina kwegyesa. Bakamumwetera reero
mpaho baataaha omu ofiisi baagaaniira. Mukuru w’eishomero akagambira
Fabiano ku Maria yaagyenda akagaruka omu bwire kandi hoona ku yaaba aine
n’orusa kuza omu tauni kugura ebitabo by’Ebihimbo ebi yaareeta.

 EKICWEKA KYA KATAANO

 1

Omuhiigo gw’okusherura ababisha gukatandika. Pooriisi ekataayaayira
Kashaija na Daudi omu irwariro. Kurugiirira aha bibaagambire, pooriisi
ekashanga ngu abantu abaibire ababiri bakaba baine akakwate. Ekyabaire
nikitaana zikaba ziri eshaaha ezi baabaibiiremu. Abarinzi b’obusingye
bakatandika kucondooza mpora kusherura ezi ntendeza-karungi ezaabaire
zigyendereire kuta akatoonyezo aha magara g’abantu abaabaire bataine
rubanja.

Esaabiiti nk’emwe ababiri bamazire kugwa omu bambuzi, abatsigazi babiri
bakarwanira omu tauni ya Kizinda, eri ahaifo ya Ishaka. Pooriisi ekabatwara
omu kihome kwenda ngu econdooze kurungi enshonga zaabo. Ababiri aba bakaba
bari aboojo b’emyaka eri nk’omuri makumi abiri. Omwe akagira ngu bakaba
nibamweta Karaudio Musaasizi reero ndi ari Ediga Bamwine.

Omu kurwana kw’ababiri bakaba nibafa sente. Kurugiirira aha baabaire bariho
obu nyaboojo baarwana, nikireebeka ngu haine eki baabaire bakozire hamwe
kwonka bwanyima hakabaho obutaikirizana aha muringo gw’okubagana amagyesha.
Amakuru gakabuga hoona ku abatsigazi babiri baarwanira omu tauni ya
Kizinda. Baingi aga tibaragareebire nk’amakuru. Bakaba nibateekateeka ngu
pooriisi eine okukora ekirikukira aho ekakwata enkozi z’ebihagaro
nyamuhango nk’abaitsi.

“Poorisi eriyo neetubuzaabuza. Omu mwanya gw’okukwata ababisha ba Ncwera
abaherizeho abantu bariyo nibaza kuzaanazana n’abarwani.”

“Ebya pooriisi bitutamire. Ahabw’enki batarikukwata ababisha abaherizeho
abantu ahari Nyarutuntu?”

Okwo nikwo bamwe baahuriirwe nibatonzya. Ahonaaho baaheza kuhika aha
pooriisi, ababiri bakahandiika sitaatimenta. Kurugiirira aha bi
baahandiikire bakaba nibafa sente ezi baabaire baine kubagana. Buri omwe
akateebwa omu kishengye kye kwenda ngu bataikirizana kubuzaabuza owaabaire
naacondooza. Baitu hoona buri omwe akaba ainiire mugyenzi we ekiniga
ahabw’omuringo mubi ogu yaabaire naayenda ngu babagane emitwaro nkaaga
y’esente za Uganda. Sente ezi zikaba ziri omu kaju aku baabaire nibatuuramu
omuri Kizinda. Bariraanwa baabo bakagira ngu nyaboojo bakaba basiiba
babyami ngu reero omu mwebazyo okaba otahurira kateezo koona okuhitsya omu
itumbi ribisi. Abapooriisi bakagyenda na Karaudio Musaasizi owaabatwire omu
kaju akubaabaire nibaraaramu. Karaudio, ahabw’okugira ekiniga akacwamu
kugambira abapooriisi byona ebyabaireho. Manya akaba ari ebireere weena
asinzire kandi arikureebeka nk’aine oturo twingi. Amaisho ge gakaba
nigatukuurira kimwe munonga. Akaba ari omushaija ekikaaka nka beene Anaka
abu bagamba omu Baibuli.

Ahanju yaabo hakaba haigateireho enkufuru ibiri rugogoma. Nyamwojo ku
yaigwireho, abataka baakwata aha munwa.

Emihoro erikurya busha. Enyondo. Emiteehimbwa. Embundu ina.
Egutiya y’amairungi

Ebi nibyo byabaire biri entebe, emeeza, n’ebimuri omu nju yaabo. Nyamwojo
akaimusya ahansi y’omufarasi gw’ekitanda kyabo nikwo kushangayo omushamata
gw’emitwaro nkaaga. Aha rubaju rw’omushamata ogwo hakaba hariho akapapura
k’okushashurirwaho akaabaire kari omumaziina ga Daudi Nkunda. Nyakapapura
kakaba kongyera kooreka ku Daudi Nkunda ori omwegyesa ah’eishomero rya
Mushana High School yaashaswirwe emitwaro makumi ashatu ey’esente za
Uganda.

Akandi kapapura kakaba nikooreka ku omushuubuzi w’enkaito, Kashaija Wiriba,
yaabaire atwire emitwaro makumi ashatu omu banka kugibiika. Kakaba kongyera
kooreka n’empapura ezi yaatwireyo.

Pooriisi ahonaaho ekatandika kusherura abantu abu amaziina gaabo
gaashangirwe omunju y’ababisha. Ekakwata ebiitiso byabo nikwo kubitwara aha
kitebe kyayo ekya Ishaka kwongyera kucondooza.

Aha shaaha nka ikumi na ibiri z’omwebazyo, Karaudio akaba yaija naagarukamu
akengye. Nikireebeka akaba yaatandika kusinduuka. Nibwo yaatandika kumanya
ku ari omu kihome. Akatandika kwebuuza yaaba ebyabaire nibigambwa embohe
bagyenzi be byabaire bitari birooto. Bakaba nibamukabukira ahabw’okuba
ekifeera akeehayo kandi akahayo na mutaahi we. Baingi bakaba bagamuzooroire
barikwenda kumukora kubi baitu owaabaire naabakurira yaabazibira.

Obwo nibwo yaijuka ku yaayehayo kare omu mikono ya pooriisi kandi ku
yaabatwara n’omunju yaabo ei baiha ebikwato, esente n’obupapura, hamwe
n’amairungi. Embohe zikamurabura kare ku orubanja rwe rurimi emanja nyingi
kandi kururi orubanja nyamuhango orurikuhurirwa kooti enkuru yonka
ey’eitaagi erya Mbarara.

Abandi bantu abaabaire bari omu kishengye kimwe na Daudi boona tibarakizire
okwihaho Kashaija. Ebiro nka bibiri Maria aherize kumutaayaayira omu
irwariro, Daudi akasiiburwa, yaayoherezibwa omuka. Akaba yaatandikire
kutaraaka. Eizooba niryo rimwe, Kashaija nawe akooherezibwa omuka. Ku
haabaire hahweireho ebiro bibiri basiibwirwe, abandi abubaabaire baine omu
kishengye, baatwarwa boona eizooba rimwe baitu aha shaaha zitari
kushushana.

Abapooriisi ku baahikire Ncwanga, baabaheereza endagiiriro za Daudi Nkunda
hamwe na Wiriba Kashaija reero mpaho baabasherura.

Daudi ku yaareebire abatsigazi babiri abo yaashusha nk’owaabamanya. Na
nyabatsigazi bakashusha nk’abaamwetegyereza. Bakareebana reero mpaho emitwe
baagiinika omu maguru. Abo batsigazi bakaba bari baahi? Bakaba batari
bandi: akaba ari Sipayidamaani hamwe na Baatimaani.

Abapooriisi ku baaherize kucondooza baaheereza ababiri esente ezibaabaire
baibirweho abo batsigazi babiri abaatorokire omu kibiina kya Daudi eizooba
ry’okubanza. Manya aba nibo beegi abaabaire batorokire ah’eishomero hataine
obabingire. Nyaboojo bakaijuka eizooba ry’okubanza eryo. Karaudio akaijuka
oku yaabaire agambiire kubi Daudi obwo atarikumanya ku n’omwegyesa waabo.

Daudi akeebuuza yaaba nyaboojo aba baine eki baabaire nibamutura. Akaba
ataine kiteekateeko ky’okubatabaariza owa mukuru w’eishomero ahakuba nawe
akaba naamanya ku egaari ye yaabaire ekuzire. Akongyera yaayebuuza yaaba
Fabiano niwe yaabaire abaguzire kukaraaza. Kandishi ahabw’enki baatwire
esente ze? Fabiano akaba abatumire esente? Ebi ni bimwe aha bibuuzo ebi
Daudi yaayebuurize bikaguma nibimuteganisa omumutwe .

Amazima gakaba gari ngu nyabojo babiri, amazima gakaimukira owaabo
baakimanya ku eby’okwega baabaire bataine rugyendo. Bakaba nibakora kubi
munonga omu bibiina ahabw’obutafayo hamwe n’obugangaazi. Hoona nabwo bakaba
bari baarurondooka batakwiha minwa mu nshekye. Buri shaaha bakaba nibenda
ngu obushekye bube nibunyaarira engino. Omuze gw’okunywa amaarwa gukaba
gukizire kukanya omu baana bato namunonga ahabw’obukungu manya Abanyankore
bagira ngu akakungu kariisa etaabe.

Nyaboojo bakaba beegire okuhuuta amaarwa obwo bakiri omuri Kampala. Bombi
hariho encuro emwe obu baarya sente z’ebishare by’eishomero. Abazaire ku
baazibahaire ngu bazitware omu banka, bo baazishuumaho baazicwekyereza
waashusha oti bakatunga kare. Obwire obwo bakaba batarya by’okurya
by’eishomero kandi okubona omwe aharibo okaba nooba ori omuhairwa.
Nikireebeka sente ezi zikaba nizibateeza omutwe. Kyansya, kyamushana na
kyakiro bakaba babikwatira omuri zaahoteeri empango omuri Kampala. Reero
kyo eky’okunywa, reka otagamba. Omu biro nka bishatu, sente zoona zikaba
zaahuuyuukire.

Ku zaayaabuukire, baacwamu kugaruka ah’eishomero. Mukuru w’eishomero ku
yaaruhire n’okushanga batari mu kishengye eki baabaire nibaraaramu gyete
doomu, yaacwamu kubiika ebintu byabo omu kishengye ky’eishomero ekibaabaire
babiikamu ebintu nk’ebyo. Ku baagarukire omu ishomero, baashanga ebintu
byabo bitarimu, nikwo kumanya ngu ebyabo byahikwamu omwonyo. Ekyakizireyo
okubooreka ku obwire bwabo ah’eishomero bwabaire bwija nibuhwayo, n’abeegi
kubagambira ku mukuru w’eishomero apangiise abapooriisi kubahiiga bundi-
nuuma.

Pooriisi ku yaabateire omu ikumi ry’engaro obwo erikubajumbura omu mwanya
gw’ekyoro ogwa Katwe ei baabaire basiiba nibasherura igana na bibiri
zangire kubeetaba, yaabatwra ah’eishomero reero mukuru w’eishomero nikwo
kubatuma abazaire. Sipayidamaani na Baatimaani bakaba nibazaarwa omu kyaro
kya Kibingo ekyabaire nikyatana na Kabingo.

Ahabw’okwegyera Kampala ei baabaire bagiire bakiri encuukye, abantu b’aha
kyaro bakaba batari kubamanya gye. Hoona nabwo abazaire baabo bakaba
bafurukire kuruga omu bicweka bya Mbarara batari nzaarwa z’ekicweka ekyo.
N’ahabw’ekyo baingi bakaba batarikubeetegyereza gye n’obu baakuba abazaire
baabo. Baitu abagurusi abaabaire bariho omu myaka eya kinaana obu abo bantu
baafurukira Kibingo nibagira ngu engambo zikaba nizibuga ngu ekyabatoroire
n’emicwe mibi yaabo eyaabaire erimu n’obushuma.

Abashaija babiri abo bakaija n’abakazi baabo. Omwe akaba aine enda akurize
reero ondiijo akazaara bwanyima y’ameezi nk’ataano. Nooshusha oti nawe
akaba aine enda kwonka obu aija ekaba etakareebekire. Ku baabaire bamazire
obwire bukye aha kyaro, embuzi n’ente z’abantu zaatandika kubura. Abataka
bakacwamu kutaho omuhiigo nikwo kushanga embuzi n’ente zaabo omu maka
g’ababiri. Ngu manya omubi ahunga ataine n’amurigiise. Nyabashaija
bakeeteguura kuruga omu mwanya ogwo baitu bakaba baija bashuura enju
n’entookye zaabo. Abataka tihaine okubaabakozire kubi kwona. Ku bwabaire
buri nk’obwa hati, bakaba nibabacumikaho enkanja y’ogwa geehena bafa
nibanena enshaya. N’ahabw’ekyo, nikireebeka ngu empindu ekaba neeshusha
ekiyaabaire ebaziire, manya ejuga ezaara eborooga.

Nyabatsigazi ku baareebire eby’okuzengana omu mashomero byabarusya,
baacwamu kutaaha omu kyaro bakagyezaho amashomero ag’okwo. Bakaba bataine
sente zoona oihireho ez’entambura. Bakagyezaho kuguza ebibanja by’ab’ishe
kwonka abataka baatiina kubigura ahabw’obugumi bw’enshonga z’eitaka
ezaabaire ziriho omu kyanga ekyo oteebirwe n’enshonga za Fabiano Mpairwe
hamwe na Godoni Ruhangariyo.

Bakasherura emyanya omu mashomero maingiho kwonka bakuru b’ago mashomero
baabiima emyanya ahakuba bakaba baine zaariipoota z’ekibuza-buryo.
Ahabw’eishomero rya Mushana kuba risya, bakaba nibenda abaana. N’ahabw’ekyo
bakaba batarikufa aha bihandiiko. Bakuru b’eishomero bakaba batambura enju
aha ndiijo barikusherura abeegi obwo barikugamba n’abeegi hamwe n’abazaire
baabo. Abamwe bakaba babacwera aha bishare by’eishomero. N’ahabw’ekyo
kikaba kyorobiire Karaudio na Ediga kutunga omwanya ah’eishomero rya
Mushana.

Ah’eizooba eri baashaba omwanya, bakashanga mukuru w’eishomero, Wirisoni
Katungye omu ofiisi ye agwejegyeire shaaha nka munaana z’eihangwe, omushana
gurikwaka tukutuku. Eryo izooba ry’Orw’okubanza akaba atatungire beegi
baingi abaabaire baizire kushaba emyanya. Ku baateire kodi aha rwigi rwa
ofiisi ye, haabanza kuburayo akateezo. Edakiika nk’ishatu ku baagarukire
kuteeraho, baigura baataahamu ori atabeesire nikwo kushanga yaaba
agwejegyeireho kakye nk’oku yaabagambeire. Omutwe akaba aguteire aha
meeza gubangiirwe emikono yombi. Ekooti ye ekaba neeteeraho kutaahiirira
omugorora gw’esohani ei yaabaire ariirireho kyamushana. Omuniino
gw’ebihimba gukaba gwija nigwoma.

Mukuru w’eishomero akahandiika amaziina gaabo, reero yaabaha foomu
z’okwijuzamu. Foomu egi ekaba eri ey’abusha. Eki kikaba kitari kya buriijo.
Omu mashomero agandi foomu nk’ezo zikaba zitandikira omu mutwaro gumwe
ogw’esente za Uganda kugarura ahaiguru. Ekyetengo ky’abeegi baingi nikyo
kyareeteire bakuru b’eishomero obutashaba sente zoona ngu n’ez’okugura
foomu. Foomu za busha zikaba ziri amarobo g’okureeta abeegi omuntukuru
y’eishomero. Ababiri bakaheebwa omwanya nikwo kusiima mukuru w’eishomero
kandi bakamwendeza obusingye n’emigisha ya Ruhanga. Hedamasita akaba
atarikumanya ngu abeegi abu yaaha emyanya baine emicwe y’obujunde.

Amakuru ku gaahikire ah’eishomero ku Sipayidamaani na Baatimaani nibo
baabaire nibenda kwita Daudi Nkunda, eishomero rwagwa omukatangaaro. Daudi
tihaine kibi kyona eki yaabaire akozire abo beegi. Nangwa n’okugyenda kwabo
tihaine yaabaire ababingire. Daudi niwe mwegyesa owaabaire naakundwa
munonga omu meezi abiri agu eishomero ryabaire rimazire. Abeegi baingi ku
baahureire ngu ari aha kitanda niguhara eitaka baashaasa munonga. N’obu
yaabaire atatendekirwe nk’omwegyesa, akaba naamanya kushoboororera abeegi
bakeetegyereza. Akaba atasiga mwegi n’omwe enyima.

Eishomo rye ry’Orungyereza rikaba niryegwa omu ihangwe. Obwire obu baingi
bakaba baruga aha kyamushana barikutaaha omu bibiina. Omu bibiina ebimwe
okaba oshanga haihi nka kimwe kya kashatu ky’ekibiina kitarimu. Ku baabaire
bababarimu, oshanga baingi bagwejegyeire kandi omwegyesa ariyo naashomesa.
Eizooba ry’Orwakana, kakaba kakira kuba akatare ka Rutookye. Ah’eizooba
eri, abeegi baingi bakaba bashoma kuhisya shaaha mushanju reero bagyenda
kwandaara n’okuhuuza omukikomera, baitu kyo ekibiina kya Daudi okaba
oshanga kiijwire n’okubooga kirikubooga. Manya ku yaabaire areeba abeegi
baatandika kwenda kugwejegyera, atandika kubatebeza otuboozi reero baatika
basheka, n’abaaba bagwejegyeire basiimuka. Abamwe bakaba bakangukayo
batarikumanya ekyabaho reero mpaho bakangarana. Abeegi bakaba babaramu
okufeerwa amashomo ga Daudi n’okufeerwa obubanda bwa Rutookye bacwamu
baguma ah’eishomero.

 Daudi niwe mwegyesa wenka owaabaire atakwata minyaafu kandi abaana bakaba
bamworobera ahakuba bakaba nibamukunda. Abandi beegyesa bakaba bahuura,
banyafura, bahonda, baigatira empi nangwa n’obumwe bateera emigyere obwo
oteebirwe n’okigambira abeegi kabukunyukye. Nooshusha oti nikwo baabaire
babatendekire.

N’ahabw’ekyo baingi bakaba batarikureeba ahabw’enki Daudi yaabaire arihaihi
kwitwa abeegi be. Baingi bakaba batakyaijuka ku eryo izooba akatwara
esente. Hoonashi haine omwegi nari abeegi baabaire bamuregire nainga akagwa
omu bambuzi nk’oku abandi babagwamu?

 2

Ayiriini ebye bikaba biri kooyakooya. Bikaba bitoorobi kandi bikaba
bitagumire munonga. Akaba aherize kutunga omurimo gw’obwakaraani omu
kitongore ekirikurwaniirira obugabe bw’abantu. Ekiro ky’okubanza, Sikoovia
owaabaire ayehangureire ogw’okuteeka ogu yaabaire ashomereire akaba
abateekiire kyamushana nungi baitu ei onu yaaremirwe kurya
ahabw’amashemererwa.

Ku yaagarukire omuka, ekiro ekyo akatunga oturo, yaagwejegyera kakye
n’okukyerererwa, akyererwe. Ishe niwe yaamwimukize. Ruhangariyo ku
yaatungire amakuru g’omuhara kutunga omurimo, yaasiima Ruhanga. Esaabiiti
eyaakuratsireho uwe n’omuhara bakagyenda omu kanisa baasiima Ruhanga. Hati
nawe akaba aine obutandikiiriro.

Eizooba eryakuratsireho, nyamugurutsi ku yaabaire naaraba Ahakatoogo,
abaabaire bariho baareeba eryo izooba atarimbiriirwe nk’oku yaabaire
arabaho ari ebiro bikye enyimaho. Akabaakura, yaagaaniiraho n’abagurutsi
bataahi be abaabaire baizire kumarira omwebazyo gwabo Omukatoogo.

Manya abagurutsi ba Kabingo bakaba babuganabuganira omuri aka kasenta reero
batebya ebya ira. Bakaba bagamba oku ebintu bihindukire obwire obu. Baingi
omuri bo bakaba batarikwikirizangana n’omurembe oguriho. Enjwara
y’eriigyenda bakaba batarikwikirizangana nayo n’obu kaakuba ak’omubazi.
Bakaba bakira kugijumiirira kandi bagyeta eya sitaane. Abagurusi aba bakaba
batenda kureeba abaishiki b’ahakyaro bajwire obuteeteeyi bugufu na
zaasikaati ngufu. Ebijwaro ebyabaire byoreka entumbwe, emikundi hamwe
n’amabeere bikaba bibatanasya. Nyabagurusi bakaba bareebeesa einugane
abaishiki n’abakazi abaabaire babijwara. Bakaba baijuka oku abaishiki ba
ira baabaire bajwara ebirikukwata aha bigyere. Egyo niyo njwara ei baabaire
nibenda ngu abaishiki bajwaremu.

Bakaba bongyera bagamba aha by’obushwere obwa ira ebi baabaire
bagyeragyeranisa n’ey’eriigyenda. Bakaba bakira kwikirizana ku abaana ba
hati batiishukire ahantwaza ehikire ey’obushwere. Kikaba nikibakwataho
munonga kushanga haabaire hatakiriho abaishiki baingi bashugaine
waagyeragyeranisa na ira. Ngu manya eriigyenda, okushugaana kw’omwishiki
kikaba kihaisa ekitiinisa bitari nk’ebya hati ahu obushugaane burikworeka
obunyakyaro n’obubisi. Manya ngu omu baahati, omwishiki orikuba
ayegaitsireho n’abashaija baingi, biri ogwo naaba ashemuukire kandi buzima
ari engunjukye. Bo obwa ira abo bakaba babareeba nk’ebifamutima.

Nyabagurusi hoona bakaba booreka okukwatwaho kwabo aha baishiki abaabaire
nibatwara enda z’endaaro. Bamwe bakaba bashaasa kureeba ngu ebiheneso
ebyabaire biriho kare ahabw’ebicumuro nk’ebyo bikaihwaho. Ngu manya,
omwishiki ku yaabaire atwara enda-y’endaaro, bamuhanika n’embiire. Reero bo
Abakiga bakaba bakurundura Bunyonyi. Ngu manya okaba oreebwa nk’ekihemu,
ekifeera kandi ekihagaro kandi ekikorwa nk’ekyo kikaba kijumisa ekyanga
kyona, niyo nfumu ngu omwishiki ku atwara aha mugongo ajumisa boona. Manya
obwire obwo, kukaba guri omwoga gwa buri muzaire nari omuntu weena omu
kyanga kworora abaana omu muringo gw’obujunaanizibwa, yaaba n’owaawe nainga
n’owa nanka. Omwana ku yaabaire ashangwa ari omu nshobi, omuntu weena akaba
naikirizibwa kumuhuguuza akarera-baana. Baitu ebya hati ngu waakwata aha
mwana wa nanka noobitebeza aha pooriisi.

Ngu owaateera oburaaza abwebanza. Manya ngu tokaaha muntu eki otaine.
Ekitongore eki Ayiriini yaabaire naaza kukorera kikaba nikijunaanizbwa
ahaby’obugaba bw’abantu. Obugabe obwo bukaba burimu obw’okugira ebintu
oteiremu n’eitaka. Obu nibwo buremeezi obu Ayiriini yaabaire aine. Eizooba
rimwe akashaba kugambaho n’omukazi owaabaire naakora ahanshonga z’eitaka

Ruhangariyo taramazirwe n’ebyarugire omu mushango aha rurengo rw’ekyaro.
Mukuru w’ekyaro, Yeremiya Turibamwe akaba amuhabwire ku amara ebintu kitaka
kandi akaikiriza eki omugaiga yaamugambira. Ruhangariyo akaba naamanya ngu
esente nizibaasa kukora bingi kwonka akaba aine amatsiko omu kooti. Akaba
naamanya ngu abaasa kutunga oburingaaniza. Omuhara okutunga omurimo kikaba
kimuhaire amatsiko kandi n’okwongyera kwikiriza ngu haihi burikimwe
nikibaasika.

Fabiano ku yaamanyire ngu orubanja ruhikire omu kooti, yaakora buri kimwe
ekirikubaasika kureeba ngu yaatunga omuramuzi kandi yaagira eki yaagambamu
nawe. Akabuuza omuri bataahi be nikwo kumuha endagiiriro z’abaramuzi ba
kooti y’eidaara rya kashatu boona. Ogwo muramuzi ku yaagambiremu na Fabiano
ebintu byayongyera kushiisikara. Manya omushango bakagubinga ngu tigwine
mutwe na maguru okwihaho gugyendereire kusiiga eiziina rya Fabiano enziro.

 3

Fabiano akaba atazaire Maria Karungi wenka. Akaba azaire n’omwojo ou
baabaire nibeeta Ronadi Ntiinaki. Nibo baabaire bari abaana be bonka. Manya
ngu abagaiga bakaba batazaara abaana baingi. Bakaba bagira ngu okuzaara
abaana baingi n’omucwe gw’abairaguzi hamwe n’abooro. Baingi bakaba
baikiriza ngu enshonga ahabw’enki abajungu barikutuura amagara marungi
n’ahabw’okugira ngu nibazaara abaana bakye. Okuzaara abaana bakye baingi
bakaba bagureeba nk’omucwe gw’abajungu. Abajungu bo bakaba bareeba okuzaara
abaana baingi nk’omucwe gw’abairaguzi abarikutuura omunsi ya Afirika.

Baitu Abafiriki bakaba baine enshonga zaabo ahabw’enki baabaire bazaara
abaana baingi. Omuzaire ku yaabaire aba aine abaana baingi akaba
atagambwaho. Abaishiki akaba abareebamu ente. Obwo manya ebintu bikaba
bitakashiisikaire nk’obwa hati obu abatsigazi bamwe barikutwara bahara
b’abantu batahaire b’ishe n’obu kaakuba akame. Manya abarikurwaniirira
obugabe bw’abakazi nibagira ngu omushaija ku arikujuga omukazi nikireetera
yaamutuntuza ahakuba naaba naamureeba nk’ekintu eki yaimukire eizooba rimwe
akakwate omuhanda akaza omu katare nk’aka Kizinda akamugura n’esente
ezirugire omutuutu ye. Omushaija abaishiki bu yaabaire aba azaire, nizo nte
ezi yaabaire naabara. Baitu abaahati nibajuga esente reero muhara w’omuntu
abeera kimwe ekintu nk’ekiguzibwa omu katare.

Omuntu ku yaabaire aba azaire abaana be b’aboojo akaba ahurira ari
omushaija omu bandi bashaija. Manya obwa ira, abaana b’aboojo bakaba
babatwara nkakikuru kukira abaana b’abaishiki. Amaka gamwe n’obu haizire
okushoma gakaba gatakitwara nkakikuru okwegyesa abaana b’abaishiki. Bakaba
babareebera ogw’okubahingira bakabaihamu ente. Abashaija bakaba bakira
kwenda ngu n’abakazi baabo bajigaize abaana b’aboojo batari b’abaishiki.
Omukazi ku yaabaire azaara abaana b’abaishiki bonka biri ogwo yaacwa
oruganda. Omushaija akaba naikirizibwa kushwera omukazi ondiijo
oraamuzaarire abaana b’aboojo.

Omuzaire kuyaabaire aba aine aboojo be, tihaine waabaire naabaasa
kumwozyamu amaisho. Omushaija kuyaabaire akigahuuta yaasinda, atandika
kuteera omurengye obwo manya riba eitumbi ribisi. Ku haabaire habaho
