abaayenda kumurahura. Abagira ati, ‘Munkwateho embwa zibarye.” Hoona nabwo
aboojo bakababarinda eka hamwe n’ekyanga haabahariho engamba nainga
okutaahiirirwa.

Abafiriki bakaba bazaara abaana baingi ahabw’embeera mbi z’eby’amagara.
Okutunga akabazi k’okutamba endwara nainga okugigyema obwire obwo kikaba
kitari kintu ky’okuzaana. N’ahabw’ekyo, omuzaire akaba azaara abaana baingi
kwenda ngu obusheru ku buraije bwatwaraho nka babiri asigazeho, omushwija
kuguraije gwagira abugwatwaraho hagire abaasigaraho. Baitu hariho emize
eyaabaire esiga yaacwa abazaire amabeere ekabasiga amooya omungaro.

Enshonga ezi nizireebeka kuba zaabaire zikiine amakuru n’omu kyasha kya
makumi abiri na kimwe. Abatungi bakaba bagira ngu abooro nibazaara munonga
ahabw’okugira ngu obwire obwingi nibabumara omu bitanda ahabw’obutagira
ky’okukora.

N’ahabw’ekyo, Fabiano nk’abagaiga abandi boona akaba azaire abaana be
babiri, omwishiki n’omwojo. Baitu abagaiga abandi nka Kanyankore bo bakaba
baine abaana baingi ahabw’okushweraguza. Kanyankore akaba atarikumanya
mubaro gw’abaana abu yaabaire aine n’obugwakuba ogw’abakazi.

Ronadi Ntiinaki akaba ari omu siniya ya Kana ah’eishomero rya Nganwa eya
Sheema. Okwo niyo esente z’ishe zaabaire zikunkumukira n’okugura ebizingo
bya singyengye. Bakabanza baamubinga Ntare, reero ishe yaamutwara Mbarara
High ei baamubingire reero ishe akamutwara St. Kaggwa ei yaarugire arikuza
Nganwa. Ronadi akaba ari akoojo kakye kandi kagufu munonga. Baingi bakaba
bagira ngu akashusha nyina.

Eizooba rimwe obu yaabaire naashomera Mbarara, uwe n’abataahi be bashatu
bakateeraho kuhamba omwishiki owaabaire naaraba omu faamu y’eishomero.
Omwishiki akabanza kurwana nabo reero kuyaarugaho yaareba ngu taraababaase
nikwo kwemerera baanyarwojo bakakora ebi baabaire nibabaasa. Ku baaherize
nikwo kumwesiimirana kubaamuheereza, kubaamukora ekikoro, eki omukazi
yaakozire mukaiba. Nyamwishiki akabeesiza yaatagiira yaacwekanisa nikwo
kuhika nseeri. Ku yaahikire nseeri obwo manya bakibayo bamuhweshura nawe
nikwo kubagira ati, “Naanye naabaheereza!”

Ag’amakuru gakatwarwa abeegi owa mukuru w’eishomero baitu tibaramuhaire
maziina g’abo beegi. Abeegi baanyakukora ekyo kihagaro buri omwe akaba
naabamanya kubari enkuuku-mbitsi. Manya obwo we Ronadi Ntiinaki akaba ari
omu siniya ya kabiri, yaija naashogoya. Akaba atakita eifubo omuri ishe.
Akaba naayereeba nk’omuntu okuzire ashemeire kurekwa kukora eki arikwenda.
Baitu nyina, Jovinta Kendagaano akaba akira kumugambira ati, “Mwana wangye
yetware!”

Eizooba eryakuratsireho, omushaho w’eishomero akeetwa ku aija buguru-
butakora-hansi akairukiirira aboojo bashatu abaabaire baine obusaasi bwingi
omu bicweka by’enshoni. Manya boona bakaba bari omukutaaga orikushusha oti
baababaaga. Amahira gakaba nigahimintika kuruga omu bushaija bwabo kandi
bwona buzimbire buri obwabe. Bakaba batarikubaasa kuta akantu koona
ahamubiri namunonga ahabicweka byabo by’enshoni ahabw’obusaasi nyamwingi
obu baabaire baine. Ai zikaba ai.

Omushaho w’eishomero kuyaizire yaabashanga boona nibataka. Omushaho
w’eishomero akaba ari omukazi. Ntiinaki akaba atuura naarahira ku
omushahokazi atarikubaasa kumuteera ekikatu n’obukwakuba okumukyebera
endwara namunonga ezo ezirikukwata ebicweka by’ekihama. Baitu eryo izooba,
akakomoorora akatengye kumworeka oku yaabaire ari. Weeza obusaasi
butaagisa. Kandi owabiso ati ky’okufa ohemuka.

Omushaho w’eishomero kuyaakyebeire baarutsigazi aba yaashanga ngu bakaba
barwaire endwara y’obushambani erikwetwa enziku. Egi endwara neerahuka
kworeka obubonero namunonga omu bashaija kandi kigumire omushaija
kugishereka ahakuba rwata neetaagisa, n’eihano buzima!

Mukuru w’eishomero kuyaahureire ripoota y’omushaho yaamanya ku nibo
baahambire omwishiki owaabaire naagambwaho. Abatsigazi baingi obwire obwo
bakaba nibatiina enziku kukira munywengye ahakuba yo munywengye ekaba
neetwara omwanya kwita omuntu. Hakaba hariho n’emibazi ei omuntu yaabaire
aguma naamira kwenda ngu eheereze abasirikare b’omubiri gwe amaani. Omuntu
kuyaabaire amira egi mibazi, kikaba kigumire kumanya ngu aine rwata rwa
siriimu, ruheekuurura-bazaire erikahwerekyerere. Abamwe egyo mibazi ekaba
ebagomora boona baba baarutaaba. Baitu siriimu eyaabandize, omuntu akaba
arahuka kufa kandi afa n’obusaasi bwingi buri omwe akimanya.

Omu mwaka gwa 1993, siriimu ekaita omushuubuzi kandi omugaiga ruranganwa
ow’omukyaro kya Kabingo owaabaire naamanywa nka Fenehansi. Fenehansi akaba
ashuubwireho omwani, amaarwa hamwe n’ebyenyanja byona ebi yaabaire aihiremu
sente nyingi munonga. Emirimo ye ekaba erimu okutambura munonga
ekyamureeteire yaaguma naabugana abakazi baingi abu yaabaire abyama nabo
omuby’omubonano. Kuyaabaire aza Kabale, atungayo Omukigakazi, akishuuma
Rwanda, atungayo Omunyarwandakazi, ngigo Buganda, aihayo Omugandakazi,
Tooro ayetungirayo Omutoorokaazi, omumatemba, atungayo Omucoorikazi nainga
Omurangokazi, reero burugaizooba atungayo Omutesokazi. Manya amaarwa akaba
agatwara hoona omu Uganda egi. Omu mwaka gumwe oguyaafeereiremu nigwo
n’omukaziwe Biitureesi yaafeereiremu. Nyamukazi akaba ari omukazi ow’ahaka.
Baingi bakaba bagira ngu siriimu ngigo bakagimureetera. Fenehansi ku
yaafeire, abakazi barikuhika omuri ikumi baareeta abaana. Abaana abamwe
bakaba nibashusha Fenehansi kandi abandi bakaba bataine kubari kumushusha
n’obukaakuba ak’omubazi.

N’obu munywengye yaabaire etandikire kwita abantu baingi omuri Uganda,
abantu baingi omu kyaro kya Kabingo bakaba bataikiriza ku buzima eri
siriimu. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu abantu baabo barogirwe. Obwire obwo abafumu
bakaba baine akatare kaingi ahakuba baingi abaabaire bababaine omurwaire wa
siriimu bakaba beebuza aha bafumu. Ente. Embuzi. Esente. Byona bikahwera
omunda y’abafumu. Manya omufumu tabura ki yaakubeiha n’obu oburemeezi bwawe
bwakuba bumubuzaaburize. Hoona naakubuuza yaaba haine enyamaishwa
zirikuraara niziraba ahaka yaawe. Mbwenushi weeza embwa n’enjangu tiziri
kutambura ekiro? Ku orikumugambira ngu biriho, nawe naakugira ngu nibyo
bakusindikiire. Ku arikukuha omubazi gwabura kukutambira naakugira ngu
oburogo n’obw’amaani nibwenda ente ibiri. Ku orikuheza kureeta ezo ente
ibiri oti omuntu wangye atafa aha mukyeeno, nawe naaba naasherura ekindi
kishuba. Ku arikuba akuhaire omubazi ogarukire omuka, omurwaire yaafa biri
toraakurateire ndagiiriro ei yaakuhaire, orubanja n’orwawe tiruri rwe.

Obwire obwo abafumu baingi bakaba nibeeranga aha za reediyo hamwe
n’omumpapura z’amakuru buri omwe arikuhamiza abantu ku aine amaani
g’okutamba. Bakaba baine amaziina agaabaire nigaingana paraguraafu yoona.
Omushomi w’ekirango kuyaabaire abanaamara kushoma eiziina ery’ahamuheru,
omuhurikiriza aba atakibaasa kwijuka ery’okubanza. Bakaba bahamiza abantu
kubaihire amaani masya omubizinga by’omunyanja z’omumahanga g’aheeru nka
Zanziba. Abamwe bakaba babeiha kubaihire amaani omu ba ruhanga b’omubibira
nka Ituri ekya Kongo. Abamwe bakaba baruga omu bicweka nka Karagwe,
Buganda, Tanzania, Burundi hamwe n’ahandi.

Okaba obashanga omu butare barikuraguurira abantu. Bakaba nibahaya kubari
kutamba obugumba, bakahwera kutamba siriimu, ebihungu n’ensimbo, okukwata
abashuma, okukuhwera kutunga emirimo, okutunga oruzaaro, okutunga omushaija
nainga omukazi, hamwe n’okutunga obugaiga. Ezi enshonga zoona zikaba
zireeta ebimbuuro by’abantu abaabaire baija kutambirwa. Buri ibara
buremeezi bukaba bwine omuhendo gwa sente ogu omuntu yaabaire ashemereire
kuhayo. Ekyabaire nikitangaaza n’okureeba omufumu naagambira abantu ngu
naabaha obugaiga kandi obwo uwe ari omworo runuuka orikweyaguza orugusyo.
Abakazi baingi abaabaire bagwire ahamahega bakaba baija omu bwingi, manya
abashaija omunsi baba bakye kukira abakazi. Abandi bakazi bakaba baija
kusherura oruzaaro kwenda kukiza amaka gaabo okushenyuka gakakumbagara
hamwe n’okutangira okushendwa.

Hakaba hariho omufumu omwe owaabaire aha abakazi boona oruzaaro. Abantu ba
Kabingo bakaba bamukubize Ishe-abaana. Tihaine mukazi waabaire aza owe
akaburwa oruzaaro. Ogu mufumu uwe akaba nokwerangiirira ateerangiirira.
Ebikorwa bye bikamba nibyegambira. Baitu ekyabaire kitaaha kishobeire
abantu nookushanga abaana boona abu yaabaire aha abakazi baabaire
nibamushusha. Abo baana ku waabaire obareeba bari hamwe omanya kubuzima
ishe waabo n’omwe. Tugire ngu ekyabaire kyabareetera okumushusha n’amaani
agu yaabaire aine nainga hakaba hariho sayansi endiijo.

Eizooba rimwe omushaija akagyenda n’omukazi we ow’omufumu ogu. Nyamufumu
omubazi gw’okuzaara akaba aguheereza abakazi kandi agubaheera omu kashengye
aku yaabaire araaramu. Omu kashengye aka hakaba harimu ekitanda. Uwe
omubazi akaba aguha abakazi bari bukunya, ngu obwo maawe nibwo gwabaire
gukora kurungi. Kare reka gugyende gukore kurungi . Nyamushaija ogwo mubazi
akaba aguta omu bukazi kandi obwo manya akaba agira ngu nigukora kurungi,
omuntu yaikiriza nyamubazi gukatamburira aha bushaija bwe.

Nyamushaija ku yaareebire nyamufumu yaamara edakiika nka itaano n’omukazi
we omu kishengye yaamanya ngu nyamushaija abaasa kumwonera. Eki yaakozire
nikwo kuteera akaigi akashanga nyamushaija atungamiire omukazi we
ekyeshongoro ky’enkombe kiri ahaiguru. Okuruga eryo izooba, nyamufumu
bakamanya ku niwe yaabaire atweka abakazi baabo kandi baamanya ngu abakazi
abu yaabaire atambira bakaba baabaire bataine buremeezi okwihaho
oburemeezi bukaba bwinwe abashaija baabo.

Ntiinaki ku yaaherize kutaraaka, uwe na bagyenzi be baabingwa omu ishomero.
Ntiinaki nikwo kumutwara St. Kaggwa ei yaamwihire arikumutwara Nganwa. Omu
mwaka gwe gwa kana, Ntiinaki akatweka omwishiki w’omukyaro kya Kibingo.
Omwishiki ogu akaba naayetwa Jooyi Rukundo kandi akaba ari omubaziizi
w’ebijwaro omu kasenta ka Kibingo. Akaba arugire omu ishomero ari omu
kyamukaaga reero ishe nikwo kumutwarira ishenkazi owamwegyeise okubaziira.

Ishe wa Jooyi akaba ari omushaija w’obukare bwingi kandi buri omwe akaba
naamutiina munonga. Akaba akira kutambura n’omuhoro gwe ogwabaire guba
gutyarize gurikurya busha kandi niwe mushaija wenka owaabaire naabaasa
kuraba Ncwera eshaaha z’ekiro. Akaba ari omushaija enkwata-buta kandi
emanzi buzima. Ogu mushaija owaabaire naayetwa Nabosi akaba aine oruhara
ahagati y’omutwe rwona rushagatiirwe eishokye eriyaabaire atakira kumwa.
Ahabuso bwe hakaba hariho emifunyanyara eyaabaire eba nk’empanga yaaheza
kuguubwa kubi. Emikono ye n’amaguru bikaba byona biri nk’eby’abaremi.
Nyamushaija akaba atakira kusheka. Baingi bakaba baikiriza ngu yaasheka
enjura neebaasa kugwa omu bwire bw’ekyanda. Esheko ye okaba noobaasa
kugiihaho omubazi. Abaana bato bakaba nibamutiina. Kubaabaire bamureeba
bairuka. Kikaba kiri eky’omugisha abaaana kubaabaire bamushanga aha maduuka
abazaire baabo baaba baine ekibabatumire, manya bakaba bairukanga buguru-
butakora-hansi. Abeereere kubaabaire baba nibarira waabagambira oti ngugwe
Nabosi yaija bakaba baceceka. Nangwa n’abashaija bataahi be bakaba
nibamweganya. Manya kuyaabaire aba naatambura yaateera omutsindo, obutaka
butengyeta. Akaba ataraba aha muntu atamwakwire kandi bambe akaba ari omwe
aha bashaija bakye abaabaire batarikunywa amaarwa omu kyaaro kyona ekya
Kibingo. Baitu abakye baba bangahi akaba ari uwe hamwe n’omubuurizi
w’ekereziya ya Kibingo.

Ahabw’okugira obukare, Fabiano kuyaahureire amakuru gaatandika kuzeereera
ngu omutabani akatweka muhara wa Nabosi yaatandika kutetema entegye. Akaba
atarikureeba enshonga ahabw’enki omutabani yaabaire naabaasa kuza omu
mukundano n’omwishiki muhara w’omubaagi owaabaire ataine sente n’okumutweka
akamutweka. Akeebuuza ahu omutabani yaihire obumanzi bw’okuza omu mukundano
na muhara w’ogu mushaija ou obukare bwe bwabaire nibweshumba obw’ekicuncu
kitakatungire k’okurogyesa enjoka. Abatsigazi boona bakaba batiina kugamba
na Jooyi. Baingi bakaba nibateekateeka ngu Ntiinaki niwe yaabandize kubyama
nawe omuby’omubonano. Nibaikiriza ngu akaba ashugaine atari nk’abaishiki
abandi abaabaire baabyamire n’abashaija baingi aha myaka ikumi na mushanju
ei Jooyi yaabaire aine. Manya abaishiki bamwe aha mayaka egyo bakaba
bababaabyamire n’abashaija abamwe barikwingana kandi abandi barikukira
baishe. Abaishiki abo bakaba bagyenderera okutunga sente kuruga omu
bashaija abo.

Buri mutsigazi owaabaire ateekateeka ahari Jooyi, ekyo kiteekateeko kikaba
kihuuhwa okuteekateeka aha bukare bwa Nabosi. Baitu nk’oku bamwe bagira ngu
obuzoora-maisho bw’ekikyere tiburikuzibira baana kutaha amaizi, obukare bwa
Nabosi tiburazibaire Ntiinaki kutweka omuhara. Nikireebeka ekiro ekyo
ekikyere kikaba kitazoire maisho. Baitu Abanyankore obubagira ngu
ezirikwenda kuhwaho, n’obuwaakukoza aha rubaju nizanga zihwaho, biri
tibarabeihire.

Ntiinaki akaba ashagaire munywani we omubuduuka bwa Kibingo. Ogwo munywani
we akaba naaza kubaziiza empare ze ezaabaire zitaagukire. Nyamwojo ogu
akaba naakunda kuzaana munonga kandi okwo omumizaano niyo empare
zaataagukiire. Manya ngu ku oza kwetaba omu mpaka z’okutandama biri
nooyesiga omubaziiro gw’empare yaawe. Akaba azaana ryona ryona reero
agaruka omuka omu mwebazyo. Ogu mwojo akaba naashomera Nganwa omu siniya ya
kashatu.

Eizooba rimwe ogu mutsigazi kuyaabaire ari omukishaayi ky’omupiira
arikuzaana na bataahi be, empare ye eti cai. Ekataagukira kimwe aha
mubaziiro reero nikwo kworeka abaabaire bariho firimu. Ekyatangaarize
baingi n’okushanga nyamwojo yaabaire ataine ku ajwaire omunda. Akaba akira
kugira ngu empare ez’omunda uwe nizimubuza obusingye.

Jooyi kuyaareebire Ntiinaki mutabani w’omugaiga, yaamukunda ahabw’okuba
mutabani w’omutungi rurangaanwa. Ekyamutangaarize, Ntiinaki niwe
yaashaswire sente za munywani we ez’okubaziira empare. Ku yaaherize
kushasurira munywani we yaakwata shiringi omutwaro gumwe yaagusigira Jooyi.
Ekiharaani kya Jooyi kikaba kitaasya sente ezo omu saabiiti nka ibiri.
Baakasitoma bakaba baija mpora mpora kandi nabwo bakaba baija kubaziiza
obutaaguka bukye nainga obumwe okutaisaho amapeesha. Okukorera omuntu
omurimo kikaba kitahezaho shiringi bitaano eza Uganda. Jooyi akatandika
kumureebesa akaisho k’embabazi. Akamwebaza reero na Ntiinaki nikwo
kumubuuza obu araagaruke kumutaayaayira. Onu akamugambira ku arikwija
kumumanyisa kwonka kukyabaire kitoorobi.

Ah’eizooba eri baabaire baragaine, Nabosi akaba atarimu. Akaba agiire
Mitooma kusherura ente z’okubaaga. Ishenkazi wa Jooyi nawe akaba aine ahu
yaabaire azindukiire ebiro bibiri. Jooyi akaba naamanya ngu ishe ahu araaze
kugarukira, nibwija kuba bwabaire ekiro. Akaba akira kutaaruuka ekiro.

Aha shaaha nka ikumi n’emwe z’omwebazyo, Jooyi akakinga reero yaataaaha
omunda ahu omugyenyi we yaamushangire obwo ayegwire eby’okunywa
n’eby’okurya. Omuby’okunywa ebi yaareetsire hakaba harimu n’amaarwa. Jooyi
akaba atakanywahoga maarwa. Baitu ahabw’okwenda ngu ashemeza mutabani
w’omugaiga ou yaabaire naamanya ngu naija kumuha ezindi sente, akacwamu ku
ateeraho entama nk’itaano. Kuyaateireho entama nk’ishatu yaateera kimwe
ecupa ahamunwa yaagotomera nk’orikugotomera ekitiribiita, weeza yaaruga
enyima kushungaanwa.

Uwe Ntiinaki akaba asindira aha cupa ya mukaaga. Jooyi kuyaamaziremu
nk’ecupa emwe yaaba obujenzebere, efuruure reero nyakoojo kamukora ebi
kaabaire nikenda kumukora. Ahu Jooyi yaagyereire kutabuukayo nyakatsigazi
kakaba kaamizirwe ensi. Akashanga ari entumbure kandi weena arikujwererana
omu bicweka by’enshoni. Obwo nibwo yaakimanya ku Ntiinaki yaateerana nawe.
Ogu gukaba guri omurundi gwe gw’okubanza kuteerana omu magara ge.

Akaimuka yaayetereeza reero yaigura orwigi rw’ekishengye eki yaabaire arimu
obwo arikweteguurira okugaruka omuka. Aheeru abaabaire bari aha baara
nibagahuuta bakaba nibamanya byona ebyabaho. Bakaba bareebire Ntiinaki
naashohora kuruga omunju egyo obwo empare etasibire zipu. Aho niho
baamanyiire ku enyamwonyo yaariibwa. Ntiinaki akacwanisa n’ecupa
eziyaabaire areetsiremu amaarwa.

Jooyi akashohora naabwerabwera ahakuba akaba naamanya ngu abantu b’ahaduuka
babaasa kuba baakimanya. Akakwata omuhanda yaashuma naataaha obwo omutwe
gumuri obwabe bw’ebiteekateeko. Akaba atarikuteekateeka ngu naija kubyama
na Ntiinaki n’obu yaabaire naayenda kumwihaho sente. Akaba akira kuhurira
emboozi z’abaishiki abaabaire bareire esente z’abashaija bakabura kubyama
nabo.

Okwezi kukaba kumwe, gaaba abiri ngago ashatu obwo Jooyi atarikuza mu micwe
y’abakazi. Hoona nabwo akaba aimuka ataine maani kandi akira
n’okutanakatanaka. Akaba ahurira ngu omuntu yaaba atagiire mu micwe ako
nikaba kari akabonero k’okugira enda. Akacwamu kuhunama. Kugaabaire ameezi
mukaaga abakazi b’aha kyaro baatandika kugashomera omu bbahaasa ku
nyamwishiki aine enda kandi ku eri nkuru eri haihi n’okuzaarwa.

 4

Daudi kuyaabaire aherize ati kukira, yaatunga amakuru marungi. Ngu manya ou
Ruhanga asheenyiire tashambiirira. Ngu kandi Ruhanga yaaheereza omuntu
omugisha tihaine ekirikuguzibira kumuhikaho, manya n’ekitabo ekirikwera
nikihamya enshonga egi obwo kigumize kiti omugisha gwa Ruhanga gutungisa
kandi tagutungikaho mukyeeno.

Daudi n’obu ashomesa bwona akaba atarikumanya yaaba yaabaire naija kuza aha
Yunivasite nainga. Abazaire be bakaba batarikubaasa kumuheera sente z’aha
Yunivasite. Akaba atuura naashaba Ruhanga ku akwata aha muntu akamukwata
aha mukono akamuheera ebishare.

Ebyarugire omu bibuuzo bya siniya ya mukaaga bikaba bishohoire ebiro abiri
na mwenda bya Katumba eizooba eri yaabaire ari Ncwanga atarikumanya ebyaifo
n’oruguru. Akaija kubimanya yaamara kukira. Nyabigyezo akaba abiteereire
ahaiguru n’obubonero makumi abiri na butaano. Eishomero rya Bubaare
rikamuha ekirabo ky’emitwaro makumi ataano eza Uganda. Niwe yaabaire omwegi
w’okubanza kwihayo obwo bubonero omu ishomero eryo kwiha ritandika emyaka
mushanju enyima. Akagabwa aigwire akawunta omu banka eya Sentinare
eyaabaire eine eitaagi omuri Ishaka. N’ahabw’ekyo akairuka ezo sente
yaazibiika omu banka kutangira ababisha kumukora kubi ngu akati kukakuteera
omuriisho, kati hweza.

Eishomero hoona rikagwa omu kwemurikira obwo businguzi obu Daudi yaabaire
abahikizeho. Manya bukaba butari businguzi bwe wenka baitu bukaba buri obwa
ishomero ryona erya Bubaare. Okweshongora. Okuzina. Okutaagurira. Okukoza.
okunywa. Eizooba ry’ebyarugire omu bigyezo byashohora, emirimo yoona
ah’eishomero ekeemerera kumara haihi eizooba ryona. Mukuru w’eishomero
akaragiira ku babaaga enumi ei abeegi baareire. Baitu n’obu baabaire
nibeemurikira obusinguzi bwa Daudi bakaba beerarikiriire ahabw’amagara ge
agaabaire gari omu kaamwenda. Baingi bakaba nibamushabira munonga ngu
ataraake reero bashemererwe kurungi nawe. Kikaba nikiija kuba kita omuntu
owaabandize kumarayo obubonero bwona abiri na butaano kutwarwa atamanyire
ku n’omwe ahari abo abaabaire bakozire kurungi omu Uganda yoona?

Abeegi baingi abaabaire nibamumanya bakaba nibamukundira emicwe ye mirungi.
N’obu yaabaire ari omukibiina ky’ahaiguru akaba ari munywani wa buri mwegi
hahi buri kibiina. Akaba akira kuha baingi obuhabuzi hamwe n’obuhwezi ku
yaabaire aba aine okubaasikirwa. Hoona nabwo akaba atenda kureeba omuntu
weena arikuteganisa mugyenzi we. Abeegi ab’omu bibiina eby’ahaiguru bakaba
bakira kugira omuze gw’okuteganisa n’okuganzya abeegi namunonga
ab’omusiniya y’okubanza abu baabaire beeta engata ahabw’okuba basya omu
ishomero. Abaana boona bakongyera kwerarikiirira kandi baayongyera
n’okwebuuza yaaba ababisha aba baine akakwate n’okusinga kwe.

Bakaba batarikureeba enshonga ahabw’enki Daudi naatunga oburemeezi nk’obu
ahabunaku obu yaabaire ashemeire kuba naashemerererwa omu businguzi obu
baingi baabaire nibaikiriza ngu akaba akoreire. Manya Daudi akaba atashiisa
bwire. Kubwabaire buba buri obwire bw’okushoma biri n’okushoma,
obw’okusheka n’obw’okusheka reero obw’okuhuumuraho n’obw’okuhuumuraho. Uwe
akaba naikiriza ku omuntu naabasa kurugamu ekyo eki arikwenda obwo yaaba
naayorobera obwire. Eizooba eryakuratsireho, abeegi n’abeegyesa ba Bubaare
bakeeshuka omu irwariro rya Ncwanga kureeba omutsigazi owaabaire abahikize
aha businguzi. Abanyamakuru kuruga omu mpapura z’amakuru, zaareediyo hamwe
na zaatiivi omu ihanga abaahureire ekyabaire aha mwojo ogu owaabaire
ateereire ebigyezo ahaiguru, bakaija kumureeba nikwo kumuteera ebishushani
ebibaateire omu mpapura kandi ebindi bakabizaana aha tiivi. Obwire obwo
hakaba haija abanyambabazi abaabaire baraganisa okuhwera abazaire be. Aba
bakaba bari Abanyayuganda abaabaire baine esente nyingi hamwe n’abo
abaabaire bataine sente nyingi baitu baine omutima gw’embabazi.

Abanyambabazi abamwe bakataayaayira amaka g’abazaire ba Daudi. Bakatangaara
okureeba omutsigazi owaabaire naaruga omumaka nk’ago agaabaire niganuuka
obworo yaabaasize kusingira ebibuuzo ahaiguru. Bakacwamu kwombekyera
abazaire be enju hamwe n’okuguma nibabangira abazaire be okuhisya obu
araaheze okwega akabaasa kutandika kubahwera. Hoona nabwo bakacwamu
okuhwera Daudi omu kwega kwe.

Omukuru w’eishomero akamuha omugisha okwegyesa ah’eishomero rya Bubaare.
Akaba akyerera Mushana High reero shaaha munaana atemba akagaari
azakwegyesa abeegi ba Bubaare ei yaabaire ainuka shaaha ikumi n’emwe
arikugaruka owaabo Kabingo. Entaasya ye ekongyera kuhanguha obwo
arikutaasya emitwaro nkaaga burikwezi. Eki kikongyera kumureetera akasheko
hamwe n’amatsiko. Abazaire be, Mangyeri na Yozefu Banturaki bakaba baija
nibatandika kutabuuka omu kurwaza mutabani waabo. Ago makuru g’okuhika
ebigyezo ebiyaateereire ahaiguru nk’empungu gakabagaaruramu amaani. Hoona
nabwo abo banyambabazi bakongyera kubaha amatsiko, manya bakaba bataine
matsiko ngu amagara gaabo nigabaasa kuhinduka. Bakaba bataine matsiko ngu
hariyo abantu abaine embabazi kandi obwo bari abatungi. Abagaiga abu
baabaire nibamanya bakaba bakira kubonaabonesa abantu barikubaihaho
ebibanja byabo hamwe n’okubakora kubi omu miringo etari emwe n’emwe. Manya
n’obu baakugizire amatsiko tibaakugagizire omubanyamahanga abu baabaire
batarikumanya.

Amakuru ga Daudi kusinga ebigyezo, uwe Maria akagamanyira ah’eishomero.
Daudi akaba asingirwe abaishiki babiri omu disiturikiti yoona eya Bushenyi
kandi aba bakaba nibaruga Bweranyangi. Abaishiki n’abeegyesa b’eryo
ishomero bakaba nibeebuuza oku ogu mutsigazi yaabaire abaasize kusingira
atyo ahaiguru. Baingi bakaba batakahuurirahoga eishomero rya Bubaare kandi
bakaba batarikumanya n’ahu ryabaire nirishangwa.

Ebya Daudi kubyayongirwe kushanzuurwa abanyamakuru, abeegi baamanya ku
arikuzaarwa omu kyaro kya Kabingo ei Maria yaabaire naaruga. Mukuru
w’eishomero akashaba Maria ku amureetera ogwo mutsigazi akabaasa kugamba
n’abeegi obwo arikubagana nabo oku yaabaire asingire ebigyezo. Eki kikakira
kushemeza munonga Maria ahakuba omukundwa we akaba naasiimwa baingi
abaabaire nibamureebamu obwengye n’oburyo.

Daudi kuyaayesirwe tarangire, akaza Bweranyangi yaahabura abeegi
okutashiisa mwanya, yaabashaba okutiina Ruhanga, okweyesiga hamwe
n’okubuuza bataahi baabo hamwe n’abeegyesa baabo kubaakuba baine
ekibataayetegyereza. Mukuru w’eishomero akamushaba kuguma naija naarabiramu
abeegi omu mashomo gatari gamwe na gamwe.

Aha biro ikumi na mukaaga by’okwezi Kwa Nyaikoma, Daudi Nkunda akeetwa
kushoma diiguri y’eby’entaasya ah’eitendekyero erikuru erya Makerere.
Amashemererwa agaabaire omuka yaabo hamwe n’ah’eishomero rya Bubaare gakaba
gatarikubaasa kushoboororwa omu bigambo.

 5

Piisi kuyaaherize ebigyezo by’ekibiina kya mukaaga yaacwamu kugyenda ekiro
kimwe akaraarira Sityuwati Muhoozi. Piisia akaba naamanya ku kyabaire
kitarikwija kumworobera kweyongyerayo n’okwega. Akaba areeba nyinenkuru
owaabaire ari eboote kandi atarikubaasa kumuheera ebishare by’eishomero.
Akareeba kitarikwija kumworobera kutegyereza ebiraarugye omu bigyezo ebi
yaabaire akozire. Baitu nabwo uwe kuyaabaire aruga omu kigyezo agambira
bataahi be kukyaba eibaare. Eki akaba akigamba n’obu abandi baabaire
bareeba ebigyezo nk’ebyaba otwizi (nikwo abeegi baabaire beeta ebigyezo
ebyabaire byoroba). N’ahabw’ekyo akaba ataine matsiko maingi
g’okweyongyerayo omu kwega. Haine oburo obu yaabaire aine omungaro, akaba
ayegambira ati tindikubaasa kubega endiijo nogo. Manya abeegi bakaba bakira
kugwa aha siniya ya mukaaga bagwisaho n’enkomo. Bamwe bakaba bagarukamu
okubuuzibwa reero obumwe bagwa nainga bahika. Hariho n’abaabaire bagarukamu
siniya ya mukaaga emyaka eshatu kwonka bambe bikanga bakaremwa
bakabirugamu. Abeegi b’omuringo nk’ogu bakaba babaine omu kibiina kyabo.

Ekiro ekiyaaraara owa Sityuwati, bakaraara bashemereirwe kandi ekigaaniiro
kikwatsire ahansi n’ahaiguru manya muntuwe kikaba kikwatsire akati.
Sityuwati akaba naazaarwa Mbarara kwonka akaba ashomeire omu mashomero ga
Bushenyi kuruga ari omu puriimare. Akaba aija Bushenyi omu kwezi kwa
Biruuru reero agarukayo ahamuheru gwa Muzimbeezi. Abazaire be bakaba
boohereza esente z’ebishare by’eishomero hamwe n’ez’okumuhwera obwo
barikuzirabya omu banyabuzaare baabo abaabaire nibashuuburira omu tauni ya
Ishaka. N’ahabw’ekyo nyamutsigazi akaba ataine muntu weena owaabaire
amugambaho, akaba akora kyona ekiyaabaire ahurira yaayenda ngu akore.

Akaba apangiise enju omu maduuka ga Kibingo ei yaabaire aruga kuza
ah’eishomero. Enju zikaba zitapangisibwa sente nyingi. Omuntu akaba
naabaasa kutunga enju aha shiringi enkumi itaano za Uganda omu buduuka bwa
Kibingo. Baitu ezo nju zikaba ziba zitataire siminti zoona ziri ecuucu.
Abeegi abu baabaire babinga omu mashomero g’omwo, bakaba beerunda omu
buduuka obwo reero bakora ebitakorwa. Bakaba baija n’emicwe yoona emibi ei
baabaire bababingira oshusha oti baagibatuma omu buduuka obwo. Kibingo niyo
yaabaire neekira kubamu abasinzi. Aba okaba obashanga nibagwererana haihi
buri shaaha. Abamwe bakaba bakyera aha baara oshusha oti nizo baraire
nibarootaho oti nainga owaabarogire obusinzi takanaabaga.

Omuri Kibingo, hakaba haijwiremu abantu baingi abaabaire batari nzaarwa
zaamwo. Baingi bakaba bafuruka omu bicweka ebyabaire bigyetooroire kandi
hamwe na hangahari. Abandi bakaba baija kusindira omu buduuka obwo.
Ekicweka eki kikaba kirimu abaana baingi abaabaire bataine bazaire. Aba
bakaba bazaarwa abashaija abaabaire baija kupangisa omu buduuka obwo reero
bakisiga baatweka abaishiki bato abu baabaire babeihabeihisa esente
bakibatweka bakabasigaho.

Ebidongo bikaba biraara nibidukura burugaho bugira buti mwei. Abaishiki ,
abakazi abaabaire bangana, abashaija hamwe n’abatsigazi bakaba baraara omu
nkaito barikuhenda amagufa. Hoona abaana bato nabo bambe bakaba baraba omu
bumoori batoroka kureeba ekyagutura aheeru.

Emizaano ya zaara, waakareeba hamwe na matatu bikaba biri emirimo omuri
Kibingo. Eminyeeto ekaba ekyera kuzaana egyo mizaano oshusha oti nibyo
baakugukiremu. Ekyarugire omwo bukaba buri obushuma ahakuba baanyabene aba
bakaba batagira murimo ogundi gwona ogu baabaire bakora okwihaho zaara.
Bakaba bateera sente reero omuntu bakimuteera yaayoma enshaho aza kwekorera
ebitookye ebi baabaire bapakira aha motoka kubitwara Mbarara nainga
Kampala, omu rurembo rukuru orwa Uganda. Endiijo mirimo ya reijareija ei
baabaire bakora ekaba erimu okwokorera ebinyansi by’okwarira entookye
n’enanansi, hamwe n’okushomba enanansi z’okupakira aha motoka ezaabaire
zikira kuzitwara omu ndembo ahu zaabaire ziguzibwa abaayo aha sente
z’ahaiguru. Manya ahabw’okuba abahingi b’enanansi, bakaba bazibaguraho
ahari shiringi nka magana ashatu eza Uganda buri emwe reero bakizihisya
Kampala, buri emwe bagiguza ahagati ya shiringi rukumi na bitaano hamwe
n’enkumi ibiri. Obumwe omuguzi kuyaabaire agwa aha muzungu agimuguza esente
zirikuhika omu nkumi itaano z’eshiringi za Uganda.

Obumwe abeeguzi aba, kubaabaire bahika aha myanya eyaabaire eyekiikire,
banagayo enanansi ezibaabaire baija bakaihayo bakama baazo baamara kutemba
emotoka kugyenda. Ezi zaamagyendo bakaba baziguza mpaho baihamu esente
z’okureesa, ez’okuteera zaara nainga ez’okugura ak’okunywa. Baitu obumwe
bakaba beebwa kubaasiga enanansi omu bishaka, nainga bakiijuka baazayo
basherura babura kuzibona. Ezimwe zikaba zibonwa abaana abaabaire baba
bariisize kandi ezindi zikaba ziburira kimwe zijunda.

Eki nikyo kika ky’abantu eki Sityuwati yaabaire atwiremu haihi emyaka ikumi
kandi nikyo kika eki Piisi Busingye omurigirwa we yaabaire ariyo naija
kutuuramu. Ekiro kikaba kimwe, byaba bibiri, byaba bishatu mpaho yaaba
esaabiiti, haahwa okwezi kumwe, ameezi abiri, ashatu, ngago gaaba mukaaga,
Piisi yaaba omukazi yaashwerwa kyahanguura.

Obushwere bw’omuringo ogu bukaba bukizire kuhanga. Ogu nigwo muringo ogu
Jowani Naamara, munyaanya wa Daudi Nkunda yaashweirwe owa Raimondi Mukiza,
owaabaire naashuubuurira omubikomera. Abaishiki baingi bakaba bagyenda
kushwerwa omu muringo ogu kubaabaire batwara enda z’endaaro ezi baabaire
benda kushereka baishebo. Abandi bakaba beetaba omu bushwere obwabaire
nibumanywa nk’okufumuurira omu kamoori kwenda ngu abashaija nari abatsigazi
abu bari omu mukundano nabo batabanagaho batungayo abandi abaabaire
nibabakiza oburungi. Manya abo baishiki bakaba baija nk’abaizire kutaayaaya
reero banga kugarukayo. Abandi bakaba bakira kuba bagwire aha mahega reero
bakitunga owaabagambaho oshusha oti yaasindika orotami.

Nyinenkuru omuka enaku y’omwijukuru kubura ekamukiza amaani reero
nyamukaikuru yaanyangarara mpaho gwahwa aha mbaju yaatwarwa. Abantu baingi
abaizire ahakushendekyereza omugyenzi bakaba nibasingisa omwijukuru
orubanja. Bakaba batarikwikiriza ku omukaikuru yaitwa oburwaire obundi
oihire obujune obwabaire niburugiirira omu kibaayetsire obufamutima bwa
Piisi Busingye. Omugambi ahandiijo boona bakajumiirira ebikorwa by’abaana
bato kwirukira omuby’omubonano hamwe n’eby’obushwere obwo bakiri bato.
Abaami ba gavumente bakateerera abazaire omuranga okureeba ngu baakuza
abaana baabo baine emicwe obwo barikubeegyesa okukora n’emikono yaabo
kutari kutegyereza okutunga ebyabusha nk’omura ebi baingi baabaire
nibamanya kurungi kubirikucwa empare.

Eky’obusaasi, Piisi taraizire aha mukoro gw’okushendekyereza nyinenkuru
owaabaire amworoire egyo myaka yoona ahabw’eshoni n’okutiina okukyeenana
kw’abantu abaabaire nibaikiiriza ku niwe arugiriireho okufa kwa nyinenkuru.

 EKICWEKA KYA MUKAAGA

 1

Maria Karungi ku yaaherize ati siniya ya mukaaga, ishe yaamwohereza Nairobi
owa ishento ngu abe niyo yaaza kumarira ekihuumuro. Akabanza kuteekateeka
kumwohereza Kampala eya Buganda kwonka yaamanya ngu Daudi naabaasa
kumubonera aha simu zaahangire.

Kikaba nikiriisa Fabiano omu nda kuhurira ngu aine Daudi. Fabiano akaba
atakendaga Daudi. Ekyabaire kimuri aha mutima n’okuhingira muhara we
mutabani w’omugaiga mutaahi we. Baitu Maria akaba atakakundahoga Edisoni
Mwesigye n’obukaakuba ak’omubazi. Ogwo niwe yaabaire naareeba nk’omushaija
owaabaire ashemeire kushwera omuhara.

N’obu Daudi yaasingire ebigyezo akaba rurangaanwa, n’obu abazaire be
baatungire abahwezi abaabaire bariyo nibombeka enju eyaabaire eri haihi
kuhwa, n’obu Daudi yaabaire ariyo naatamburira omu busingye bwijwire
amatsiko n’obunanukye, uwe Fabiano akaba naatamburira omubusaasi bwijwire
okuteekateeka ngu Daudi naija kuhanantuka ah’eitembezo ry’eidaara eri
yaabaire ahikireho omu mwanya mukye. N’ahabw’ekyo akaba atakendaga ku
omuhara aza omuka egyo kubonaaboneramu.

Kwiha aha muheru gw’okwezi kwa Musenene oku Maria yaaheriizemu ebigyezo,
taragarukire mu Uganda okuhisya omu mwaka gwa 2005. Akahuumurira Nairobi
eya Kenya kandi yaaba niyo yaayegyera diiguri omuby’obwegyese reero mpaho
yaarugayo ari omwegyesa w’eishomo ry’Ebihimbo erimanya nka Liiturica.

Omu bwire obu yaamazire Nairobi obwabaire nibweshumba omu myaka etaano,
Maria akaba ahurizana na Daudi aha simu, aha imeiro nainga obumwe
amuhandiikira. N’obu ebaruha zaabaire zitwara omwanya mwingi kuruga Nairobi
kuhika Kampala nari Kampala kuza Nairobi, hoona ou yaabaire ehika agishoma
emirundi mingiho ahabw’orushusho.

Aha Yunivasite ya Nairobi, hakaba hariho Abanyayuganda nka Magana ataano
abaabaire nibegaitira omu kibiina kimwe. Bakaba babugana kuhaazya esaano
enshonga zitari zimwe na zimwe. Bakaba bagaaruranamu amaani kandi hakiba
hariho aine oburemeezi nk’omubya sente bateeraho kumuhwera manya ngu
ageeteeraine nigo gaata eigufa.

Omu kigombe ekyo nimwo abeegi ba Uganda baabaire bakira kubugabuganira
nangwa n’obumwe bakatebeekanisa obugyenyi. Omu magyenyi nk’ago nimwo bamwe
baabaire batungira abakundwa mpaho bakaza omi mukundano. Baitu
Abanyayuganda abamwe bakaba baza omu mukandano n’abeegi b’Abanyakenya hamwe
n’abandi abaabaire nibaruga omunsi ezindi nka Rwanda hamwe na Tanzania.

Ahabw’oburungi bwa Maria hamwe n’emicwe ye ei baingi baabaire nibaikiriza
ngu nink’eya burangiti, abatsigazi baingi bakaba baija kumushaba ku aza
nabo omu mukundano. Nangwa n’abamwe nawe akaba aba abakunzire kwonka ayanga
kureebya omukundwa we Daudi Nkunda owaabaire ari omu Uganda arikuriitana na
diiguri omu by’entaasya ah’eitendekyero erikuru erya Makerere.

Daudi nawe akaba aine oburemeezi nibwo bumwe. Akaba naatura omu buraaro
obwa Lumumba. Omu kishengye kye hakaba hakira kwijamu abaishiki enyongore
abaabaire nibamukunda nk’esente. Aba bakaba bamwijusya eizooba eri Piisi
Busingye yaabaire arihaihi kumushendashenda okumuta omuby’omubonano. Manya
akatambirwa abazaire be abaagarukire obwo ababiri bari omu mahiisa-nyungu.
Abaishiki b’aha Yunivasite abaabaire nibateganisa Daudi bakaba nibeebuuza
ahabw’enki omutsigazi nk’ogu yaabaire ataine mwishiki omu Yunivasite yoona.
Bakagyezaho kucondooza kumanya yaaba aine omukundwa baashanga ngu akaba
atamwine.

Baingi bakeehayo kubeihabeiha omutima gwa nyamutsigazi kwonka byaba
ebyabusha. Bamwe bakaba bagyezaho kumutonera oturabo, abandi bamweta
kubagyenda hamwe nawe omukukyakara eki baabaire beeta okuza awutu baitu onu
ayanga kugyenda nabo ahabw’okumanya ngu ago n’amarobo agagyendereire
kumureetera okureebya omukundwa we Maria Karungi ou bo baabaire
batarikumanya. Abandi bakaba baija kumutaayaayira omu kishengye kye ei
baabaire bateeraho kumukyema omu muringo nk’ogu Piisi yaabaire ateireho
kumukyema baitu kuyaabaire areeba baza omuri ebyo abagira ngu yaaba aine
ahu yaaba aine okuza reero mpaho abasiibura bataaha barikwebuuza yaaba
nyamutsigazi ari ekifa-bigyere nainga yaaba naakora nk’abandi bashaija.
Abamwe bakaba bamweta kwija kubataayaayira omu bishengye byabo kandi hoona
nabwo bamukyema nk’okwaburiijo baitu nabwo baremwa.

Omu myaka eshatu ei yaamazire aha yunivasite, Daudi tarateereineho
n’omwishiki wa yunivasite n’obu yaakuba omwishiki ondiijo weena owaabaire
naaruga aheeru ya yunivasite. Bataahi be bakaba baine abaishiki baingi
abubaabaire bakunkumuuriraho emikunkuma ya sente. Abamwe bakaba barya na
sente z’ebishare obwo barikwenda kukyakaza ezo mpangare. Baingi bakaba
nibaikirizana ngu Daudi aine oburemeezi omu buhangwa bwe. Bakagyezaho
kumushendashenda kuza omu bukungu bwabo obwabaire burimu okuza omu bakazi,
okunywa amaarwa hamwe n’okureesa ebitokooza-bwonko. Obwire bwe akaba
abumarira omu nteerane z’okushaba aha caporo y’omuhikirire Furansiisi.
Obumwe akaba aza omu ibiikiro ry’ebitabo kushoma aha bitabo bya Liiturica
ebi yaabaire atandikire okukunda ahabw’omukundwa we, Maria kuguma naamuhiga
ku abishoma. Akaba atakira kugira omwanya gw’okushiisa.

Omu mwaka ogu Daudi yaataaha omu Yunivasite omukwezi kwa Nyakanga, Edisoni
Mwesigye nibwo eby’okwega yaabirugaho. Nikireebeka ishomo eri yaabaire
naayega rikamukiza amaani oti akaba naafukaana naryo. Akatandika okurya
sente eziyaabaire aba ahairwe kushasura ebishare. Ezi akaba azitwara omu
bakazi, bazirya, bazinywa, n’ezindi bazitwara.

 2

Obwo barikubangirwa ekitongore ekirikurwaniirira obugabe bw’abantu,
Ayiriini Kyomuhendo na ishe Godoni Ruhangariyo bakaba bagarwirwe eitaka
ryabo eri Fabiano Mpairwe yaabaire atwire. Ekitongore eki kikatunga
okukwatwaho kw’amaani kushanga omukozi waakyo owaabaire naakoresa
obweziriki n’obwegyendesereza ariyo naabonaabonesibwa. Kubaahureire
omuringo ogu Ayiriini n’ishe baabaire nibabonabonesibwamu, bacwamu kutwara
orubanja omu kooti enkuru ei baagugarukiremu bakagucwa gukasinga Fabiano.

Omuramuzi wa kooti owaabaire abingire orubanja, Fabiano Mpairwe hamwe na
Chaimaani Yeremiya Turibamwe bakahonera hakye okubingwa, okutangisibwa
n’okukomwa ahabw’orubanja rw’okuha n’okurya ebituga hamwe n’okwejunisa
obushoboorozi bwabo. Manya ekitongore kikaba nikyenda ngu ababiri
babonerezibwe baitu kooti ekaburwa obujurizi bw’okusingisa abashatu
orubanja.

Encwa y’orubanja oru ekatangaaza baingi abaabaire bagihurira. Abamwe bakaba
babushukanisa ebyabaireho. Abamwe bakaba bagira ngu Ayiriini Kyomuhendo
akashoma ebiragiro kandi naabyetegyereza kurungi munonga reero mpaho
bongyera batangaarira omwishiki muto owaabaire ayehaireyo kurwana
n’omushaija ou buri omwe yaabaire naamanya ngu takaasingwa rubanja
ahabw’esente ze ezibaabaire nibaikiriza ngu nizikora buri kimwe.

Baingi bakaba baine okutiina ku ogu mwishiki muto yaabaire arwecukuriire.
Bakaba nibamanya ngu omutungi, Fabiano Mpairwe naija kukora kyona
ekirikubaasika arikwejunisa sente ze nyingi kwihaho buri muntu weena nari
ekintu kyona ekyabaire kyemerera omu muhanda gwe. Ayiriini akaba ataine
sente baitu akaba aine okwehayo hamwe n’okweikiiririzamu. Akaba
atarikwetiina ahabw’okuba omwana w’omwishiki nainga ahabw’okuba muto. Akaba
naamanya ku niwe aine okuhwera ishe ou Fabiano yaabaire ayogizemu amaisho
kumara omwanya muraingwa. Ahabwa bukuru, obukyene bwe hamwe n’esente
z’omutungi kandi muriraanwa we, Ruhangariyo akaba ataine matsiko goona
ag’okugarurwa eitaka rye eri nyamushaija yaabaire amunyankwireho baitu
muntuwe ngu manya okuzaara kutamba.

 3

Sipayidamaani hamwe na Baatimaani bakashangwa nibasingwa orubanja
rw’obwambuzi, obushuma hamwe n’okuteeraho kwita abantu babiri. Orubanja oru
narwo rukagambwaho munonga abantu ba Kabingo n’emyanya egyetooroire. Kooti
ekashanga Fabiano ataine kakwate n’orubanja oru n’obu baingi baabaire
nibamucumita akakumu. Nyaboojo babiri bakaba batarikumumanya kandi nawe
akaba atarikubamanya n’ahabw’ekyo kooti ekacwamu ngu Fabiano taine kakwate
n’orubanja oru.

Kooti ekongyera yaacwamu ku hataine mwegyesa nainga omwegi owaabaire aine
akakwate omu rubanja oru. Baingi bakaba nibateekateeka ngu hariho omwegyesa
nainga omwegi owaabaire naamanya ku Daudi yaataaha na sente reero bakaza
omu rukwe rw’okuzimwibaho. Kooti ekacwamu ngu Daudi akagwa omubambuzi
nk’omuntu weena oku agwa omubambuzi bakamukora kubi. N’obu baingi baabaire
nibaikiriza ku abashuma babiri aba baabaire nibamanyana n’abeegi bamwe
ah’eishomero nk’omwegi wa siniya ya kashatu owaafumwire omuhengyere omu
rubaaho orwabaire nirutaanisa ebibiina bibiri, ekyakashatu hamwe
n’ekyakana, kooti terashangireho buhame bwona oburikushinja ogwo mwegi
nainga abeegi bataahi be. Ogwo mwegi akaba ashemereirwe kwija omu ishomero
eryo ah’eizooba ry’okuhuumuruka. Abeegi bataahi be bakagira ngu akasiiba
naagurukyeza ryona ryona kandi ngu akaba atarikumanya boojo abo.

Kooti ekahamya ku ababiri bakakora orubanja orwo nikwo kubasindika
Nyamushekyera kukomwa kuheza amagara gaabo goona. Omuramuzi akabakoma
maisha kuha abandi babisha ekyokureeberaho eki yaabaire aine amatsiko ngu
nikiija kutangira hamwe n’okutiinisa abandi bakozi b’ebihagaro. Abantu
bakaba batuura nibeetomboita ku ab’obushoboorozi omu pooriisi baabaire
bakwata ababisha nk’abo bakabarekura batabateireho manja reero bakagaruka
omubyanga byabo kuraaza abantu bagagunwire. Bakaba nibaikiiririza kimwe ku
ababisha abo baabaire baha pooriisi ebituga reero nabo bakabakomoorora
manya omurimo gwa pooriisi kukaba gutarikwesiimisa ahabw’empeera y’enjara.

Baingi bakaba nibaikiriza ku encwa y’orubanja egi yaabaire neija kureetera
obubanda-biragiro bwatuuzaho omukicweka ekyo. Kooti niyo emwe ekaba
ecwereire ababisha abu Fabiano yaabaire apangiise kucumika omuriro ahanju
y’omushaija owaabaire naamanywa nka Mujurizi owaabaire ayangire kuguza
omutungi ogu eitaka emyaka etaano. Okwiha obwo ekyanga kikaba kigiiremu
akasingye okuhisya obubaiba Daudi na Kashaija.

 4

Engambo kuzaagumire nizikanya omukyaro kya Kibingo n’ekya Kabingo ku Jooyi
Rukundo akurize kandi arihaihi kuzaara, abantu baingi baatandika
kweraarikiirira obwo barikumanya ngu eshaaha yoona Nabosi ku arikukimanya
biri ak’omuhara naakaraaza. Manya buri omwe akaba naamutiina.

Ishenkazi wa Jooyi akamuhabura ku ahungira ow’omubuurizi w’ekanisa ya
Kibingo, Yona Twikiriize. Yona akaba ari omushaija omunyambabazi. Akaba
naikiriza ngu ibara muntu naabaasa kuhinduka areke emitwarize y’ekibanda-
biragiro reero agarukire Ruhanga amuruhuure. Akaba akira kwakiira abantu
baingi omuka ye ahu baingi baabaire bahungira nainga bakaija kusherura
obuhabuzi nari obuhwezi. Akaba ayakiira abantu boona ab’enyikiriza zitari
zimwe na zimwe. Omusiraamu, Omukristaayo, Omunyakatoriki, Owamungumwema,
Omucwanga, Owabishaka hamwe n’ezindi nyikiriza ezaabaire zihangire obunaku
obwo, boona akaba naabareeba nk’abaana ba Ruhanga. Omuto n’omukuru boona
bakaba nibamanya ogwo mushaija wa Ruhanga. Akaba agarukanisa abaabaire
bababangaine omu bushwere, abaabaire baine emparana z’eitaka kandi
eminyeeto mingi ekaba ekira kumutaayaayira kumwehabuzaho omubikwatiraine na
rukundo. Akaba ari eiraka ry’obumwe n’enkwatanisa kandi ekyaro kya Kibingo
kikaba kirimu obusingye waagyergyeranisa n’ekya Kabingo eki abakuru
b’enyikiriza zitari zimwe na zimwe baabaire batareebana maisho na maisho.

Okwo niyo Jooyi yaahungiire kandi akamara ebiro bibiri reero ishe akaija
kumutaaruura. Nabosi kuyaizire, Yona yaabanza kumuhuumuririza hamwe
n’okumuhabura okutakora kubi omuhara. Nabosi akagaruka omuka n’omuhara obwe
Jooyi arikubwerabwera. Akaba naamanya kuyaahemwire kandi akareebya ishe.
Hoona nabwo akaba naakimanya ku orugamba rutakahweire ahakuba eshaaha yoona
ishe akaba naabaasa kwehinduurira omu muhini nk’empango, ayebwe ebya Yona
reero amuteere ezi Mbaguta yaateire muha.

Nabosi akaba akizire kuhurira engambo ku Ntiinaki, mutabani w’omutungi niwe
atwekire omuhara baitu ezo akaba naazireeba nk’engambo. Akaba ayeheireyo
kumanya ekyabaire kihikire kuruga omu kanwa k’omuhara, Jooyi. Kubaahikire
omuka nikwo kumubuuza owaamutwekire n’onu akamugambira ku ni Ntiinaki.
Nabosi akaba naamanya kurungi ogwo mutungi Fabiano Mpairwe. Ekiyaabaire
naakira kumumanyaho n’oburimanganyi bwe. Omumutima gwe akaba akira kureeba
Fabiano nk’omuntu mubi munonga. N’ahabw’ekyo akaba agyendereire kumwihura
ahabw’ebicumuro ebi yaabaire akozire abantu ahari ekyo kyaro.

Omwebazyo gumwe akataayaayira Fabiano ngu bagambe ahanshonga z’abaana
baabo. Fabiano nawe akaba aine akooba ahabw’okuba akaba naamanya ku Nabosi
atari mushaija w’okuzaanazaana. Abashaija babiri aba bakashutama hamwe
baagaaniira baitu buri omwe ayerarikiriire mutaahi we.

“Muhara wangye abaire atahikize n’obu yaakuba emyaka ikumi na munaana.
Rutabani rwawe rukamutoroboza. Naija kukumanyisa kundikwija kurutwara omu
kooti nkarutabaariza. Orwo noomanya ngu n’orubanja nyamuhango kandi
ebiheneso noobimanya ahakuba ori omuntu mukuru.” Nabosi kuyaaheriza
kucwera obwo bwanga yaakwata omuhanda gwe yaataaha.

Fabiano akatandika kuteerwa omutwe arikwebuuza eki araakorere ogu mushaija
w’obukare nk’obu. Akaba naikiriza ku mutabani we yaabaire ahanzire kandi
akatweka muhara w’omubaagi. Akasiima Ruhanga ahakuba akaba naamanya ngu
kuyaamushangire atungami aha muhara akaba naakaraaza. Baitu hati nabwo
ebintu bikaba byamara kuhikwamu omwonyo.

Eizooba eryakuratsireho, Fabiano akaza ah’eibaagiro rya Nabosi. Abantu
b’omuri ekyo kyaro bakatangaara ahakuba bakaba batakira kumureeba
omukicweka ekyo. Enyama akaba agigura omu tauni ya Ishaka hatari mukyaro
kya Kibingo nainga Kabingo. Kandi nabwo kuyaabaire naayenda kugura enyama,
takweiziire, akaatumire omukozi.

Abantu b’omukatauni ako bakaba baatandikire kunywa amaarwa gaabo.
Akabahikaho yaabaakura baitu aha maisho ge akaba naareebeka atashemereirwe.

Kuyaahikire ahakwa Nabosi yaamwakura n’onu yaamwetaba. Akamutaasya
omukishengye ekyabaire kiri enyima y’ahu yaabaire naaguriza enyama. Ababiri
bakaza omurukiiko kumara eshaaha nka ibiri. Fabiano akashaba Nabosi ku
aikiriza enshonga ezi bakazimara kitaka. Akamushaba ku agira aku yaamuhayo
nk’enjugano, akamwongyera n’akandi, reero omuhara n’omutabani bakatandika
amaka.

Ogu nigwo murundi gw’okubanza Fabiano kugaaniira n’omukyene, omuntu
w’eidaara ry’ahansi. Akaba atakira kuta eifubo omu bakyene. Akaba atakira
kuza omubuduuka bw’abooro nk’obw’Omukatoogo hamwe na Kibingo. Kikatangaaza
baingi kureeba naataaha omukishengye ky’enyima y’eigurizo ry’enyama. Baingi
omu katauni ako bakaba nibamanya ngu n’ishe wa Ntiinaki ou baabaire
baareebire arikuruga omu kaju ka Jooyi enyimaho. Bakaba nibamanya ku Jooyi
yaabaire abundugwize. Baingi bakaba nibakihamya ku Ntiinaki niwe yaabaire
atwekire Jooyi ahakuba bakaba batakamureebaga aine abandi batsigazi.
Bakabanza kumureeba aine Ntiinaki.

 5

Fabiano ebintu bikaba byaija nibumuhika omu maraka. Akaba yaaheza kuha
Nabosi miriyoni itaano z’esente za Uganda. Ntiinanki, mutabani we akaba
arugire omu ishomero atandikire amaka na Jooyi. Amatsiko akaba agatsigaize
omumuhara ou yaabaire naayenda ngu ashwerwe mutabani wa Kanyankore
owaabaire naayetwa Edisoni Mwesigye.

Edisoni eby’okwega akaba abikwatisize aha rubaju. Ekyabaire nikikizayo
obubi n’okugira ngu ebitokooza-bwonko bikaba bimutabwire omutwe kandi akaba
naaraguurirwa ah’eirwariro ry’abatabuki b’emitwe erya Butabika eya Buganda.
Baingi bakabanza kugira ngu bakaba bamurogire baitu abashaho bakaba
nibakihamya kuyaabaire atabukire omutwe ahabw’okwejunisa ebitokooza-bwonko
ebyabaire bihangire obunaku obwo. N’ahabw’ekyo amatsiko ga Edisoni
okushwera Maria gakaba gaija nigataahiirirwa omwirima gw’obutabuka-mutwe
obwabaire bumutaahireire. Baitu hoona nabwo Edisoni na Maria bakaba batari
mumukundano okwihaho okugira ngu abazaire baabo bakaba nibenda ku ababiri
bakora amaka ahabw’obutungi bw’amaka gaabo.

Embeera ya Daudi ekaba yaatandika kutereera. Enju y’abazaire be ekaba
yaahwaire kandi baatandikire n’okugituuramu. Bakaba batakiri bari
abuwaabaire noomanya. Enjwara, endeebeka, endya hamwe n’entuura yaabo byona
bikaba bihindukire birikushushana n’eby’omumaka ga Fabiano. Hoona nabwo,
akaba aherize diiguri y’eby’obushuubuzi kandi yaatandikire n’okukorera
banka emwe omu rurembo orukuru orwa Kampala. Amatsiko g’okushwera Maria
gakaba gari maingi munonga ahakuba Fabiano akaba atarikubaasa kwekwasa
obworo bw’omwabo ahakuba bukaba bukwasire akacuro.

Omukundwa we Maria akaba ariyo naamariira diiguri omuby’obwegyese aha
Yunivasite ya Nairobi eyaabaire neeshangwa omu rurembo rukuru orwa Kenya.
Akaba akira kuhurizana n’ab’omuka yaabo. Ebyabaire ahari munyaanya,
Ntiinaki bikaba bimuburize obusingye baitu Daudi akaba akira kumhandiikira
arikumuhuumuririza. Hoona n’obu yaabaire atarikukunda Edisoni Mwesigye,
ebyamuhikire bambe bikamwongyera obusaasi omu mutima ogwabaire
gwahutaaziibwe obuhanda bwa Ntiinaki. Akaba aine amatsiko gamwe omu muntu
omwe hamwe n’omu kintu kimwe, omukundwa we Daudi hamwe na rukundo yaabo ei
baizire bakahigikiza emyomyo y’obushwere omwaka ogwakuratsireho. </archive_file>
<archive_file filename="EDITED ESSAYS/OBUZARE BURUGA AHA MUHANDA edited.doc"> OBUZAARE BURUGA AHA MUHANDA
                    By  Bagenda Asuman
Obu naabaire nkiri muto kandi nk’obutikiti naakura nkaba ntaine banywani
bangye omu nsi omu kwihaho Ruhanga wangye owampangire na maama na Taata
abantaire omu nsi egi n'okundeeberera kandi nyowe tiihaine ki naabaire
niimmanya kwihaho nkaba nimmanya kwebaza maama wangye obuziba na mabeere
ngagure kandi ekyabaire nikisingayo nkaba ndi ekyana kirungi ky'amabunu,
amaisho marungi, ndi kutukura.
Kandi bakangambira ngu abantu bakaba nibakunda otakaagira aha bw'o
kubagambira otugambo turungi aha kandi otakaagira aha bw'okukora buri kimwe
ekirungi nainga shi okubahereza amate buri kwija omuka kandi. Ekaba eri
rukundo hatariho nk'emiguha egi kwasireho hamwe na rukundo ebaire eri
hagati nabo hamwe naanye ekyana kirungi ky'ekyojo kirikureebeka gye kandi
noogira hakaba hatariho eky'okutangaaza?
 Noogira hariho okwetomboitwa? Noogira nikibeeta banywani bangye
ab’omubwana? Eee n'obu batarikushushana naanye.
 Bakaba nibatuburira omu mikono eya bumosho kandi barikugamba orurimi ngu
beineyo abu barikweta banywani baabo.
 Oba n’ahabwokugira nk'aba ntarikugamba nainga shi ntarikusheka munonga
nabo ahabwokuba tinkabareebaga. Kare n'ekyabaireho hamwe nebizibu by'abantu
ahu biruga. Emyezi yaaguma neerabaho ndikukura omubiri.
 Eky’omugisha oburugi tiburikuhwaho ekyabeire ekyokutangaaza aha myezi ena
 kumara omwaka maama wangye owaabaire ari omwe ahari munywani wangye
w'obuzaarwa akansigaho yaaza omu mwanya ogu ntarikumanya n'okuhisya na hati
obwo naahisya emyaka 26 y'obuzaarwa. Ningira ngu tihaine ki naabaire
nimbaasa kwekorera omu kuteekateeka kwangye ahabw'okuba nkaba ntaine
kindikuhurira obwo obwire nkaguma na taaata n'abanyani bangye n'abakuru
bangye.
Tihariho ky'okukora obwire bukaguma nibugyenda naija naahisya emyaka eshatu
y'obuzarwa kandi nkirimurungi namaisho garikwera nagarikushushana
nk'egenyena ezairwe y’ekyozi namaino marungi ngateerereire ga mutare
nk’ag'orubaare kwonka taata akagira ngu nkaba nyine amaani nekindi
ndikukyodooza munonga. Nteekateeka baruna bakaba baine eitima ahabw'ebintu
bishatu ebi naabaire nyine abandi abaana batabiine nk'ekyemerero, oburungi
n'okukyodooza aha myaka ei naabaire nyine.
 Nkatwara aha ishomero eryabaire riri haihi naitwe n'ekindi buri mwegyesa
akaba nankunda ari kunkwata gye ahu naamazire esande eishatu ntakabwine
munywani weena ekyareeteire n'abandi baana bateina ahabw'obutabeemanyiza
nainga shi kuzaana nabo bakaba bagubire n'ekindi barikugamba endimi zitari
kwetegyerezebwa ekyo nikyo kyareteire ntaagira banywani.
 Orwokubaza rumwe omu kasheeshe nkaba shutami omu kibiina ninguma
ninyehindura ndikureebera omu dirisa ndikureeba obwana obwine ebyokurya
ebirungi nk'ebitakuri bisanuukire n'ebitookye. Eki naakozire nkaronda omwe
naatambura mpora-mpora aha mwanya naamubuuza, "Ebi n'ebiki” ebyo ebiri omwe
akandeeba yanshekyerera ‘eminekye” yaagira noomanyisa eminekye naanye
nagirya, nangwa n'erizooba rimwe kanyanyazi akampaho ebiri yaagira noobaasa
naiwe kumpaho ebiri! obwo arikuzaanisa. Ahabw’emicwe  mirungi akampaho
eminwa ebiri akyareteire naagyira eizooba rirungi.
 Nkaguma ninkikora burizooba mpaka ahu yangambire eiziina rye, akaba
naayetwa Kangwisagye. Akaba atarikushushana nabusha ari mugufu, mukye,
arikwiragura kwonka akaba munywani wangye aha bw’eminekye twaguma
nutubagana na kakye koona aku tweine.
 Hahwairo omwaka, twena twaza hamwe omu rindi ishomero yaareka kwehemba
eminekye. Yaatandiika kwehemba ebitookye n’ebihimba ebinaabaire
ntakaryahoga kuruga nzaarwa.
 Aho omukago gwatandika kukyedeera buri izooba kwonka tituraarekire kusheka
hamwe okutwabaire tubuguna tutandika kweyujusya eby’eyima.
 Akasheeshe k’orwokubanza tukaba twerundaanira ah’ishomero omunyiriri zaitu
nungi tuhunami tuteegyereize ebigambo bya mukuru w’ishomero burizooba ari
kutugambira orungyereza rugwire tumushekyerera tumuzaanisa turikuhwihwisa.
Bwanyima Tumutegyereize akaija yankwata omu ngaro zangye ahabw’okutukura
njwire ekijwaro kyagye kya kapere n’enkaito. Akamara yandeka enyima naanye
naayemerera aha rwigi rwa ofiisi nagumaaho mpunami reero haija omwojo
ondiijo aboneire yaguma ashutami na kara ani w’ishomero. Kuyaamazire
yaayanga kureetwa aha matembezo g’abashomesa n'abaana haatandika orugambo
ngu nyowe mboneire kumusiga omu bahara nyowe naayimusya amabega gangye
naagira ntihaine kiriho ekiboneire hahaha! Ab'okunyanga baanyanga na
neitima ryabo ry'akare kandi boona hateine ou nsigire yo. Omwojo yaamara
endakiika ikumi na karaani wenka mpaka mukuru w’ishomero amazire kugamba
bwanyima yaatugira ngu tuze omu bibiina byaitu reero ekyabeireho buri omwe
yaayenda kushutama aha rubaju rwe kwonka nyowe naaguma ninkora ekyabaire
kindi aha mutima naanye nkaba ni nyenda kushutama nawe kumanya amaziina ge
na n’okuba munywani wagye nka buriijo.
 Eki naakozire nkagyenda juba juba nashutama omu maisho nateeka eshaho
yangye aharubaju nateegyereza owaakubaasa kushanga tukayomba hatakahwire
eshaha yaamara yaatahamu naa mushemererwa yaamara yaashutama naanye aha
rubaju rwagye bambe twashutama hamwe omu maisho reero abaana baaguma
nibatwebuuzaho barikwenda kushutama omu maisho nabo haihi n'entebe
y'omushomesa.
 Kwonka abaana bo burizooba barikwenda kushutama omumaisho ngu maawe
nibareeba gye aha rubaaho.
Kandi tukaba tweine kutandika n'okubara eryo izooba kwonka omwegyesa
w'okubara eryo izooba tariizire. Ningira akaba arwaire naiga shi akyereire
omu mitsiri ye y'ebicoori atakaizire ah’ishomero kwonka tihaine awaabaire
naamanya twena tukaba nututeebereza naamugira nimbaasa kumanya amaziina
gaawe? ndikushaba! Akahinduka ya deebesa embabazi yangira tiinyeine nshonga
kare nangwa amaziina ngagye ti Kangwisagye ni Muhumuza Johnson, naanye na
mugarukamu nti oine amaziina marungi nangwa naagumizamu namugira nti
kawanyirira nangwa nawe yangarukamu ati, webare kusiima obwo ari kugamba
mpora mpora omu karaka karungi.
 Mbwenu tukagamba mpaka omuri obwo bwire obw'okubara kandi, nti tindibona
munywami wagye aha bw'eshonga nimbanza naamupima naamanya ekindaamugobemu
akaba munywani wangye ow'ahamara ku manya buri kimwe eki nkwasireho nikyo
eki nashariiremu kumukora munywani wagye ow’ahamara ahabw'okuba naanye
nimbanza kunyenta omwojo nkawe kandi oihireho ekyo akanyamba omukundiisa
kyansya yaaburi kasheeshe nagwa kikaba nikiruga omu maka marungi gaine aha
mpiiha obwo nyowe owaitu bikaba bitari birungi omu kikwatiraine n'e mpiiha
tukaba turi abooro kwonka nkaba ntakigamba ahabwokuba nkaba nijwaragye ndi
omuyojo ndi kutambura n'abaana babagaiga buri kimwe ekyomurembe
ndikukyimanya kwonka ndi kumanya okunyemereire nekindi.
 Nyowe na Muhumuza twaba abanywani turikutambura hamwe omu ishomero ryona
buri shaaha turya hamwe kyansya na kyamishana omunshaho ye. Ku twabaire
tuza kutaaha, buri omwe aha akafumito mutaahi we obwo turikusiiburana
tukabugana eizooba erindi kwonka nkaba ntakimanya oba nakunda nainga shi
nanyanga nianga shi ari kunyamba nka mutaahi we kwonka ekyo nikyo eki
naabaire ninyenda ahansi yaiguru rya mukama kubona omunywani nk'ogwe.
 Aho ku twaherize ekya mushanju tukakimara twagiraho akagyenyi k'okumara
ekibiina kya mushanju nangwa naanye aho nkaba nyine esaati zangye eza
yamato ibiri ndikumanya ngu niinye ndiho obwo ndiku zikunda obwo shi niinye
naasingire n'okujwara abaana bakajwara maama! maama! maama! nk'ekwata aha
munwa twashusha nk’abari omu iguru nangwa na Ruhaga akanyamba erizooba
ryahwa kare naagaruka omuka ntakwehurira gye nyine n’itima kwonka
orw’okubanza orwagarukireho naagaruka aha ishemore nyine emicwe mirungi
mpunami ndi ahansi y'ensi n'ekindi nshemereirwe naburi omwe weena.
 Kwonka Muhumuza akaba atarikwenda abantu batumanye buri kutureeba hamwe
kwonka omukakungu kaitu tindakashangiremu buzibu bwona bambe omukushaba
kwangye owa Ruhanga enfurembe yagihwihwisa twahika aha muheru gwa buri
kimwe twatandika ebibuuzo by'okumara ekya mushanju kwonka ekyabaire
eky'okushwazana tukabitandika twageini naamara naamugira ngu obundi mukama
nikwe yaakisiima buri omwe naaza kushatama wenka omu bigyezo yangira ngu
nikyo yaaba naayenda kwonka tikiranyihire aha kigyendererwa kyangye
nkashutamira ebigyezo byagye mpora-mpora mpunami kwonka tina koma aho
namucwera enfumu ibiri zirikugira ngu “Abangana ti bakanya” eya kabiri nayo
erikugira ngu “abatabarirana barya n'abaruga Mbarara”.
 Aho naamara naaruga Ntungamo naija Kampala kwonka kyangumira kubona
abanywani ahabwokuba ab'emyaka yangye bakaba babarekyera abashumba
babazibira kushohora aha mageeti gaabo ngu tutakaazaana hamwe naija naamara
ekihuumuro kyona hataine ou naabaasize kuzaana nawe kwihaho naayongyera
rukundo omuri mukuru wangye ou twabaire nituraara hamwe aha kitanda kimwe
nainga shi tutayayira banywani be hamwe n'okutambura hamwe omu tahuni.
 Hehehehe omurundi ngumwe yantwara omu supamaketi aha ruguuto orwa Martin
omuri Kampala
Haza naaguma nindeeba abantu, buri omwe naakwata eki yaabona baine ebiibo
naanye naatangaara haza naanye mameni naatandika kukwata buri kimwe kwonka
mukuru wangye akandeeba n'obusungu yaambuuza oine zingahi omu nshaho yaawe
naamugira ngu tihaine zirimu, yangira ati, bigarureho, bambe naabigaruraho
banshekyerera naashwara haza shi obwire bwahika naatandika siniya kwonka
yantwara omu siniya ei barikugamba orungyereza rukye obwo nikwe naabaire
ntamanya na Luganda kyangumira kubona abanywani naamara esande emwe hataine
ou ndikugaba nawe hataine orukugamba naanye kwonka ekiro kimwe turikushoma
omu mwabazyo gw'ekiro naashutama omu kibiina ky'embaaho kwonka abahara
bingi bakaruga omu biraasi ebindi nabo baijurirana omu kiraasi aki naabeire
ndimu aha ntebe bambe ya ngabira amaziina ge ngu Latus eizina erinabaire
naashomire omu katabo ka Jack Collins Latus akaba ari omuyonjo aine omubiri
murungi n'a maino marungi agu nkubaire nyine naanye nangwa yaagamba
ebigambo bingi omururimi oru ndikwetegereza kuruga obwo twaba abanywani.
Bambe aha kiro ky'okutureeba aha eishemero abazaire be kubaabaire baija
n'abangye twegaita hamwe ahabwokuba bakaba bakimanyire ku ni munywani
wangye kandi tukaba tubagana ebi baatureetera twena. Kwonka buri omwe akaba
aine ekyarikukunda n'ekyarikwanga akita kaabaho omu bunywani bw'omuhara
n'omusigazi kwoka nyowe latus tukaba twine ekintu kimwe n'ekyamazima
tihaine waabeire naayenda kusaara emirundi etaano omu izooba kwonka
omwegyesa akaba atuteera atakwendera na kimwe kumanya ekituri kwanga mpaka
tumazire siniya ya kana. Bambe ku twamazire ekya kana buri omwe yaaza omu
rindi ishomero. Omuhara yaaza Bushenyi naanye naaza omu mashomero
agarikusingayo omuri Kampala aha shaaha egyo buri kimwe kyahinduka
tinaatereera kwonka ahu naagiire yo okushaba rikaba ritari iteeka buri omwe
aririkora eki yaayenda. Na yunifoomu ziboniire kusinga ezaishomero riri
erinaashomeiremu ekya kana. Kwonka eizooba rya sande omuyaga ngukahuhuuha
omu muringo mubi naagira nahabwokuba ndi omu ishomero risya kwonka ku
gwabaire guhuuha oshusha ngu gwaza kuntwara.
 Aho nkaba ndi aho naahurira ngu tera! tera! tera! ekide maama! maama! aho
abaana bakairuka nibaruga ahu turikuraara ayayaya! hatakahwaireho dakiika
itaano buri mushomesa akaba aine ekinyaafu kiraingwa reero nkaitwe ababeire
turihaihi na ofiisi tukaba turya kibooko nk’itaano tutakagiire omu kiirasi
kushoma omwebaazo naiga shi akasheeshe ahi buri mushomesa yaabeire
naataahamu tutakagiire omukushoma hataine ahi mwagiire okahurira ngu muze
omu kushoma obwo kyagamba. Omushomesa naahurira omwe omu beegi ngu nyowe
tiinyine ki nyine omubitaabo obwo tihaine kitwabaire twine omushaija
akeemerera yaagyira ngu ku orikwija Nalya S.S.S, Namugongo teekateeka buri
kimwe kiine encuukacuuka kandi ngu eki oraabanze kumanya aha nigwo muhanda
gw' obusinguzi. Kwonka bambe abeegi n'a bashomesa bakaba nibafayo munonga
oihireho okuza kushoma ekiro n'a kasheeshe aha eizooba ry'okubanza
obuwaashoma ebya kare nainga shi waatebya emboozi zaawe ezaakare ebyo
nibisigara omungaro zaawe kwonka bo abashomesa nibakora eki bashemeire
kukora.
Obwo haamara kuhwaho edakiika ikumi (10) omu kiraasi haizire omukama omwe
aha beegi arikuhiga abasya kuza omu oriyenteeshoni kandi abaashomire maawe
kwonka tikirabaire kisya ahariinye kwonka nateekateeka obundi haine
ekikirikumanyisa ekindi nyowe tindamanyire abeegi oku baagiireho omuri egyo
oriyenteeshoni kwonka nimmanya ngu haafu y’ekibiina kyona ekaba
etarikumanya eki kirikumanyisa.
 Nkashohora mpora nk'omwika bakaba batugizire ngu tuze omukiraasi eky'aba
siniya y'amukaaga reero abakama baatandika kutushomera ebiragiro ne
bigyenderwaho kwonka twena tukasigara nutangaara oba turaabibaase naiga shi
tukabigyenderaho haza shi abayangyire kuza kuhurira ebyabakama bakaheebwa
ebibonerezo kumara esande yoona.
 Bambe nkaba ndikwera haza nyine ekyemerero ekyabaire kireetera buryomwe
omwana kumanya buri kimwe kyona ekyabaire kimbaho bangira ngu iwe mutsigazi
arikwera ija hanu eee! ku naareebire enaku! niinye onyaama omu kiraasi
nangwa okubaiha nikubi nkaba ngwejegyera ahabw'okubura eky'okukora buri
kimwe kyanshobaire kwonka naagyezaho kukora ebigyendererwa.
Kwonka nabo bakashanga ntaine micwemibi ahabw'okuba ekinaabaire nkora
eky'enshobi nkaba nkyetondera buri omwe okunsaasira ahabw'okuba nkaba
nkikora ntakigyenderiire nabo bakaba bansaasira haza nkisiimira Ruhanga
baija bantwaramu nk’omusya okisingireyo n'emicwe mirungi omuri boona abasya
aho buri mukama yandeka kunteera n’obu naakukora enshobi yoona bandeka
ahabwokuba buri omwe akaba namanya ngu nibambeeherera.
 Kwonka hakaba hariho purifekiti omwe ou naabaire ninyenda buri shaaha,
buri hamwe ariho arikukora buri kimwe. Nka buriijo aine abanywani abu
naabaire ninyetenga ngu bakaaba banywani bangye naija namwehitsya munonga
yanyamba omu bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe. Buri kumubugana ateekaho
akamwenyo n’ekitiinisa. Eky’omugisha nawe akaaba anteeraho akamwenyo hamwe
n’obwire obumwe ankwatira eby’okurya kuruga omu dainingi, omwishiki ogwo
akaaba aboniire ahabw’okunyamba kunkwatira ebyokurya n’amaizi na
n’ahatushango otu naabaire nkora abaihabaiha abandi abakama ku taine
nshonga ahabw’okuba ebyo byona naabikora ahabw’obwana.
 Omu mwezi gumwe nkaaba nabaire ow'akabi omu ishomero ahari hamwe ahabakama
bakaba baabaire banywani bangye otakaagira ahabw’okugira n’okubakunda,
tikyo ekyo! naanye nkaba ningyezaho kwerinda kwenda kureetaho obutebeekana
omu nyentsya.
 Burishaha akaba ari omukama, nkamutwaramu nka munywani wagye arikukirayo.
Ahabw'okuba tukaba tukora bingi turi hamwe. Oihireho nkaba ntakukyenga gye
oba yaabaire nankunda, nkateekateeka akakikora ahabw'okuba nkaba taine ki
naabaire nyine kandi buri zooba arikureeba eki naakora. Oihireho we nkaba
nyineho abandi banywani nka Ninsiima kwonka abo naababaire nibasingaho
ahariinye burizooba turikushemererwa omu birungi hamwe n’omu bibi, akaba
anyimutsya buri kasheeshe kuza kushoma areebeka ngu yampa ahari buri kimwe
eki omuzaire yamureetera aha rutayaayo rw’abazaire kwonka tindabaronzire
ahabwokwenda kubagobamu omwishiki ogwo Ninsiima akaba abaniire kandi ari
omunywani murungi.
 Abandi nk'aba Kyoshabire, Owembabazi na Mwesigwa bakaba bari banywani
bangye.
 Abantu abaabaire bandeetera okuguubwagye ahabwokugamba orurimi rumwe kandi
tukuruga omu kicweka kimwe reero hakaba hariho munywani wangye nka Robert
owaabaire nandaara haihi omu domiture arikunyamba kandi ari ow’omugasho
munonga, omu diini y’ekikurisitaayo twaba nitushoma eby’ediini. Tukakora
bingi hamwe twayambagana ahabwokuba akaba ari munywani wangye n'ahati
ninkimweta munywani wangye.
Obwire ku bwahikire obwaba purifekiti kuruga aha bukama bandekura obukama
naija naaba aha bakama  abatsya. Kwonka nkaba ninkimanya nkanye ekindikwija
kukora nkareebeka naabaihabaiha abaana kundeetera obusinguzi nkaba omukama
nkabagira ngu ninyija kubareetera amaani marungi. Naanye naababuuzi ngu
ekindi nimwenda ki! Bakahika nibangarukamu niiwe ou turikwenda wenka.
Naanye kunamazire kuba omukama nabatungyira mu kurya ahabyokurya bisiikire
n’okuraba aha geeti ntaine rusa, n’okumanya buri kimwe ekirikuza kubaho omu
ishomero ekyabaire kitari kyaburi omwe hamwe na burizooba kuza omu kibiina
orikwenda kukora gye kusinga abataribakama. Eki naakozire nkaba ahari abo
abaabaire beebeembeire ishaza ryona.
Nkaba nza hare n'abashomesa ahabw'okuba nkaba ntakubakunda nkaba nintiina
okurwana naba kwonka nkaba nikunda heedimasita. Ahabw’obutegyeki bye
burungi akeeretera ntakumutiina burishaaha ndikwenda ngire ekinaayega omuri
we.
Madaamu na kakuru hamwe na Mr. Kakembo Ruhanga agume ahabw’okumpereza
omuhanda namatsiko ga nyentsya.
Kunaamazire ekihuumuro eky'ekya mukaaga naaza aha yunivaasite ku naayehinda-
hindwire nareeba omwishiki owaabaire ari munywani wangye ow'ahamara nka
maama na kata barikumumamya owu nashomire nawe siniya ya kana tukagimara
turi abanywani akaza bushenyi naanye nkaguma Kampala kwonka nkaba
namuraganiise ku ariba omukazi wangye.
 Eizooba eryo eri naamubweine yanyijutsya eki naamugambiire tinayehakana
twaguma hamwe mpaka mperize univaasite hahwireho ameezi abiri twakora
amaka. Aho niho ndikuhenderera na n’ekitebyo kyangye ngu obuzaare buruga
aha muhanda.
