<archive_file filename="EDITED ESSAYS/OKUREBYA edited.doc"> OKUREEBYA

Rwakojo omushaija ou orikuza kubugana omu kitebyo eki akaba ari
omushaija w’emyaka ataano na gumwe w'emibiri ebiri akaba akuzire
n’ekyemo kirungi w’enshaya nd’eingwa n’amaino g’orubaare, akaba
aine omutwe gw’ebyeyera n’enyindo y’abahima, kandi oburungi bwe nawe
akaba naabumanya akaba ari omusigazi omwecumi owaabaire amara
omwanya bur kiro naakora aha eishokye rye, amaino ge hamwe n'obureju
 bwe. Akaaba ajwara empare endeingwa hamwe n’esati ez'omurembe
n’ekooti. Akaba naakunda kujwara gaarubindi ezirikwiragura ziriho
akaguha akatoire aha matu.

Omushaija akazaara abaana babiri Yudasi hamwe na Bekunenga. Yudasi
akaba ari omusigazi murungi owaabaire aine obwengye kandi
arikukunda Ruhanga. Bekunenga nawe akaba ari omusigazi ayehosire
kurungi nka ishe, kandi nawe aine obwengye. Ishebo ku baakuzaire
abata omu ishomero obwo Yudasi asigire Bekunenga ebibiina.
Bakashoma baamara eitendkyero rya sekendure, barinzire ebiraarugye
omu bigyezo. Ishebo akabarondera eky'okukora, akaba yaahingire
orutookye akaganiira nabo ku baguma bakavuga ebitookye nibabita
omukatare bakanjurira ishebo esente. Ekyo bakakikora kyagyenda omu
maisho kumara nk’ameezi ataano. eizooba riwe ry'orwamukaaga,
baguruka kare omwitumbi beeshuka omu rutookye n’eishebo kutema
ebitookye, batema, ishebo abakomesa ebyo bitookye aha amagaari bagaha
emigyere ati, baana bangye mugyendegye, atyo agaruka omuka. Yudasi
ahabw'okushanga ngu akaba aine amaani maingi akaseetuka yaatangayo
Bekunenga yaaguza ku yaamara yaatandika kuronda mukuru we
nk’orikuronda empitirizo, kwonko taramuboine, ekiyaakozire akateera
egari ye omugyere yagaruka omuka, ku yaaretaine aha irembo ishe ati:
"Kurikayo mwana wangye. Akatiribiita nkako bobeeza aha mumiro. Kwonka
 Bekunenga omutiima gukaba gutamuri munda ahabw’okushanga mukuru we
akabura n’asente z'ishe.

Atakashukireyo akaceka k'obushera ishe ati Yudasi ari nkahi? obwe
omutiima niguteera nareebesa embabazi, Bekunenga ati: "Taata naanye
namuhereruka buriya twatemba egaari ati yavuugisa amaani yandeka
enyima kandi kuhika omu kataare tinamureebaho.

Ishe akamera orunkukyenkye, amaisho yagazoora nk'ag’enjoka y'encwera,
yacwisa ebiiti amaino obwe naayirukira kimwe munonga naayerekyerera
 ogw'akatare. Nyina owaabaire ari omu musiri ku yaahikire aho
baamuhuura amakuru akagwa kihuumura yagambira omutabani ati
‘’n'owaawe takiri waawe!”

 Omu shaaha ibiri ishe akagaruka naacura ati nkarimweta eiziina
 kwonka ryatadika kunyoreka eki ririkumanyisa. Akashutama aha katebe
ke ataine by'okugamba yaayeyinamirira obwe naashaba Ruhanga ku
amuyamba akamugarura!

Okuruga aha shaaha egyo, aha kiro kya kataano Bekunenga akagaruka
omu katare, agyezaho kubuririza haaba haakuba haine owaareebire
ahari mukuru we, kwonka tihaine owaamugarukiremu. Ku yaamazire kuguza
 atyo ayorekyerera ogw’eka. Ku yaahikireyo ishe amukurusyo atyo ati
kurikayo mwana wangye.

Ku haabaire hahwaireho ameezi ataano bukaba nibutagurikana
bahuriira kodi aha rwigi egumize eti kodi kodi munyigurireho, nyina
aimuka ayiguraho ayecuura omutabani. Akairuka yaagambira ishe ati
mutabani waawe yaija. Ishe akamugarukamu n'ekiniga kingi yamubuuza
ati noogyimuka nk’ahe akasheeshe aka? Nyamutabaani akaguma amuhunami
yaashenshera omunju ishe engungu ekenda kumwita atyo agaruka omu
kitanda abyama.

Kuhabaire hahwireho ameezi nk’ashatu ebyarugire omu bigyezo
bishohora, boona bashanga babihangwire. Ishebo akashemererwa kwonko
aguma abikire aha mutima ekiniga nk’ente y’endaaho. Obwire
bw’okuhuumuruka bukahika boona nibamanya ngu nibaza kuza aha
itendekyero erikuru Makerere kwonka ishebo akahunama mpaka aha
eizooba ryokugyenda. Eizooba ku ryahikire na gaamashemererwa ishe
akagira ati “Nyakwehena akenyampira naarya.” nbwenu iwe ku oraabe
waashaziremu kubura na sente zangye okuza aha eishomero okwawe
kukakoma aho. Nyamusigazi akahwa akamiro k'okuza omu kushoma kukakoma
aho. Bekunenga bakamutwara bamuta aha baasi yaatandika orugyendo yaaza
Buganda kushoma. Akatemba emotoka n’amashemererwa maingi atyo
yaayorekyerera ogwa Buganda. Ku yaahikire omu motoka akashangamu omusigazi
mureingwa awaabaire neiragura akamwakiiza akamwenyo ahabwokushanga ngu
okaba nagamba orurimi rurikushushana n'orwe obwo naamuramusya ati “okwe
muraara n'agahi?” Akashemererwa yamugarukamu ati nimarungi shana imwe?
Twagyenda nitugaaniira yanyoreka emyanya ahakuba gukaba guri omurundi
gwagye gw’okubanza kuza Buganda. Ku twahikire aha mugyera Katonga
akagunyoreka agumize ati ogu nigwo gutaanura Buganda n’owaitu. Bekunenga
akasheka yashemererwa niho yamubuurize ati beitu obutugaaniira bakweta oha
Nyamusigazi ati niinye Byabagambi bakagumizamu nibagaaniira amutebeza oku
yaaboine omurimo Kampala nawe n'okuyatorokire owaabo. Onu amugarukamu ati
yamaawee okatoroka owanyu? aha shaaha egyo Byabagambi magambi wa maingi
ashumuruka aga kuri na kunu agatandika agumize ati nkaba mmazire okushoma
eidaara ery’ahansi ebibuuzo bityo bishohora kwonka obu bishohora nkaba
nyine omukundwa wangye owabaire naayetwa Keminagano w’omunda nk’ahenwa
amaino g’orubaare, agororokiire kurungi nk’enkindo z’ekisharara ategire
eishokye nk’eryakamushungushungu, akankunda naanye naamukunda nka mwine
tata, tugumizamu n’emboozi angaaniirira aha mukundwa we owu baabaire
nibeeta Keminagano. Akangaaniirira ngu Keminagano akamukundira aha ishomero
baakundana baatayaayirana owabo, yaamushaba ku amutaasya nawe yaikiriza ,
abazaire ba Keminagano bakakunda Byabagambi kandi na Byabagambi
yaakunda Keminagano , ngu kwonka omurundi gumwe akakyera kare
akasheshe ka sabiiti yaakyera nanaaba naagorora naajwara kuza aha
kereziya kushaba. Ku yaabaire atakatiire kabunu hansi baamweta
baamuha ebaruha .

Atyo n’obwoba bwingi amera orunkukyenkye ashohora aheeru kugishoma
omukugikomorora ashanga eri eyebigyezo bye kwonka yaagwaire .

Ainunuu nbwenu nkutebeze, ngu hakakurataho ki? Nagagaruka omu kereziya
tindagabione akaiyiruka ekikumi yaahumuriza owaabo omukitanda

Nyina ahu yaiziire, amwimusya kurya obwe namubuza ekyamubaho . Akabanza
kuhunama, ku amara amugambira ati ebibuuzo bishohwire.

Kwonka tindabihangwire nyina akahwa amaani yaagira ekitengo yaamera
orunkukyenkye obwe nagiira ati ayiii mukama eki nenki ? nyamutabani aguma
ayeyinamiriire n’enaku nyingi naatekateka ahu aratooze Byabagambi
nbwenu mwanawe nkutebeza kiiha ndeka kiiha, ebyo obusaasi bw’ebyo
butakahwaire , maawe atandika kungira ngu eby’okushoma by’ayangire
nt’ekateeke aha by’okushwera omukundwa wangye Keminagano ku byabaire kuhika
ngaruka aha kereziya kushaba ku naaheriz e kushaba ntyo nyimuka ninshohora
munywani wangye anyeta ati Byabazaire orara ota? Nti ndarara kurungi tutyo
tugaaniira mbimutebeza angambira ati hati otatasya gyenda Bugaganda
oronde emirimo omukazi t'oraamubaase!!..........

Nkahurira naahwa amaani nikwo kumuhandiikira akabaruha nimumanyiisa
kuntabaaho kandi kuntarabaase kumutaasya, ekiro ekyakurasireho nkakyera
 n’emigugu yangye omwitumbi naarureega Buganda, omu muhanda nk’abugana
omusigazi ou twagyenzire hamwe mpaka Kampala akaba naayetwa Rugyendo.
Rugyendo akaba ari omuntu w’emicwe owaabaire atwire omuri Buganda
kumara obwire tukagyenda ku twahikire Kampala Rugyendo atyo antwara
kuraara owe ahabw’okushanga nkaba ntaine munyabuzaare weena omuri
Buganda. Ku twatandikire nitureetwa aho Rugyendo ahenengyera omu kaju
 ke akatangirirwa orwamba rw’eshagama omu kukahenengyeramu tukagaruka
aheeru twarara ow’abanywani be ku bwabaire nibutaagurikana tuhurira kodi
aha mwango g’orwigi, Rugyendo aimuka n’obwoba arubamburaho abaserukare
baamuhikize omu ngaro nibamutakisa oyisire omuntu , Rugyendo nikwe kumpayo
nabwabwoba ati nyamusigazi ori omukitanda kyangye niwe omwitiire
abaire ari maraya we . Abasirukare batyo banjanduura baanaga aha mabega
bantwara omu kihome . Ku naahikireyo nshanga abandi basiibe tuza aho,
kuhaahweireho omwezi ndi omukihome omusibe omwe owaabaire ari maneja
waakyo ayiba ebishumuuruzo kubamutakisa ati ogwe musigazi Bekunenga
niwe abibire, nbwenu nkugiire nti tibaranyongiize ebiro ebindi haza
k’enda kugwamu.

Ensande nk'ibiri ku zaahwaire bandekure ntaranga ninyorekyerera aha
eishomero ahu nagabirwe naabaire ninza , ku nahikiireyo shanga
baratandikire okushoma boona munywani wangye ou twabaire tukwatanisa buri
kimwe n'obuzakuba esente . Tukashoma twahisya obwire by’ebigyezo
twatandika kubikora ahabwoku shanga akaba ari munywani wangye
ndikumwesiga Fred twakora hamwe ekibuuzo ky'okubanza haza ahabwokumwesiga
niwe yahandiikire n’amaziina gangye ahamutwe gw’ekigyezo, kwonka
ekitakutangaaza Fred akanga kuhandiika eiziina ryangye kubyagiire
kushohora nshaga nyiine zero nikwe kwirurukira ow’omwegyesa obwe
nintetema okweturayo omushomesa angira ati empapura z’ebimwakozire
nzizo ronda ekyawe , okukihikaho nkashusha nk'owaateerwa bomo naamara
kushanga eiziina eryangye atararitaireho nk’ehamba itaama natandika
kweshengyereza omushomesa kwonka ebyange tarabihuriire. Ntyo nshohora
n’engungu nyingi munonga amaisho nagahangire eiguuru obwo ninshaba
Ruhanga okunkwatsa , ku naabaire nateera entambwe nk’itaano
nyamushomesa arabya omutwe omu diriisa naagira ati, nyamusigazi garuka
kakye hanuuya , nkahinduka buguru butakora hansi nagarukayo ku
namuhukire omu maisho angira ati nbwenu naasharamu kukuhwera gyenda
ogarukye orwamukaaga oreebe eki ndaabe ncwiremu.

Ntyo ndureega obwo nyine akamwenyo aha matama. Okwetuura ahu naabaire
nindaara okuteera amaisho aha mushego nkashanga munywani wangye owabaire
nayetwe Bigyega esente zeishomero zoona yabuura nazo, nkagwa kihumura
obwe n’enduuru naagikoronga abantu baahurura nibaija omu kaju kangye
ku naabahaire amakuru bakababa orwari rwaza aha iguru tweena twacuura
emikono twagyegura abantu batangaara bati hoona munywani waawe niwe
 yakukora eki, nkabagarukamu nti n'owaawe takiri waawe omwahure
akarya entanda y’omubuurizi . nkahunama ekininga kyayenda kunyita
obwo nintekateeka oku ndaija kugambira omugurusi wangye hamwe
n’omukaikuru .

Ku haarabireho eizooba rimwe ntyo ntekateeka kwehuurira ondijo
munywani wangye owaabaire natuura Buganda nawe, kwonka omu itumbi
kunaabaire nigyenda mbugana omusigazi mureingwa ou ntarafiireho kumanya
eiziina , ku yampikire haini ambuuza ati omuri eri itumbi nogikwatira
nkahe obwo ari aha kagaari, mmugarukamu nti ninza owa munywani
wangye atyo ati temba aha gaari. Tukatararanga aha gaari obwo
nimmutebeza ebimpikireho nawe anyoreka obusaaasi bwingi, ku twahikire
 omu maduuka mmugiira nti kabanze nze kusheesha ntyo musigira
eshaaho yangye, nyamusigazi naawe akampurutura omutima naamara
kuteera amaisho ahinamusiga nkashanga atagiba, nkagira ekitengo
kwonka nkagumizamu ninza owamunywani wangye. Ku nareteirwe aho obwara
abuha amaino obwe aine amashemererwa maingi akampika haihi kwonka
akareeba ntaine maani andamusya emiziga etandika kuntaranga omu
maisho tugumizamu enju tugirengeramu, ku twahikiremu mmutuura obusaasi
 bwangye nawe ebigambo bimwesiba, tukashusha abaateerwa amashanyarazi
 tugumizamu mmutebeza, ku yaamaziire andondera ekyokukora
tukateekateeka okuza kweguza esente aha ndijo munywani we, ku
twahikiriyo, tugamba nawe ayikiriza kutuyamba ebyo esente azituha
kwonko kushanga akaba namwesiga tituza kukita omu buhandiikye ntyo
ngyenda ndaba aha offiisi y’eishomero nzishashura mukuru waaryo,
ntambura ngaruka ahu naabaire nindaara, ntandika kutekateeka okundaze
 kubugana omushomesa wangye ou twabaire turagaine, ku bwasheeshire
ntyo nyimuka omu itumbi ntandika orugyendo nza kureeba omushomesa ou
twabaire turagaine kukora aha bigyezo byange kunaahikireyo
nyamusigazi anyeta ntaaha omu ofiisi kwonka ndeeba atanfiireho
akandaganisa ku yaaza kureeba omuhandiiki we akabiteereza yangambira
kungaruka erindi izooba, ngaruka ntyo nza aha buraaro bwangye
nkabyama aha katanda kangye natekateeka ebimpikireho nayatuka
nariira.

Ku haabaire hahwaireho esaabiti ntyo nyorekyerera ow’omushomesa
ogundi murundi ntyo ngyenda ku nahikireyo ndeeba omuhandiiki we
aho ahika nangambira ku azitereerize ntyo ngaruka omuka omutiima
gunanukire. Tukagumizamu nitushoma ku twaherize mbona omwishiki murungi
owaabaire naayetwa kekimuri awaabaire nayengyengyeta nk'ebimuri
by'ehangwe aine omunda nkahenwa, aine amaino gorubaare agororokire
 kurungi kenkindo, tukakundana, ku haahwireho ebiro twiririra okugaruka
 omu maka gaitu ahabwekihumuro . Ku naahikireyo ebyambaireho
timbitebya kwonka okushanga naabaire ninkunda omwishiki wangye
munonga nkatebeza abazaire bangye kunaaboine omukundwa ou ndikukunda
 nk’okw’efukuzi ekunda omushorooza. Bakashemererwa munonga naabagira
barinde mpeze kushoma mmureete. Ku haahwireho emyeezi ebiiri
tutandika kworekyerera okugaruka aha ishomero nke’imuka omu itumbi
naayegura emigugu yangye ebwo ndi na murumuna wangye owabaire
anshendekyereize. Kutwahikire aha baasi ntyo ngihenengeramu nawe agaruka
omuka . Baasi ekairuka munonga eshaaha k’itaano tukeshanga Buganda.

 Ku haahwireho ebiro nka bibiiri munywani wangye ampandikira ebaruha ku
ebigyezo bishohoire tukagyenda twabireeba nashanga bir i birungi nagumizamu
ninshomesa amaani ahabwokushanga rwabaire guri omwaka gw'ahamuheeru.

 Tukashoma twakora ebigyezo byaha muheru twataaha kutwahikire omuka
nshanga abazaire bangye bashemereirwe ahabwokushanga ngu nkaba naamara
emishomo yangye. Tukaaza omu kihuumuro twarya ebiro bikuru naataayayira
banywani bangye obwe turinzire ebiraarugye omu bigyezo ebi twakozire aha
muheru.

 Hahwireho ameezi nk’taano ebyarugire omu bigyezo bishohora, nkatemba
emotooka nayorekyerera Buganda kubireeba, kunahikireyo nashanga biri
birungi nikwe kuhandiikira abazaire bangye kubantebekanisiza embaga
yokujwara diguri, nkaguma Buganda nintebeekanisa ebyokujwara kwangye.

 Obwire ku bwahikire baashohoza orukarara rwa’baana boona abarukuza
kujwara duguuri munywani wangye owabaire nayetwa Fred niwe yabandize
kukyebera yaaba turiho., okuza kuhiikayo nkagwerwa akagwe naamara kushanga
ntariho. Nkebuuza ekyakubaasa kuba kyabaireho kyanshobera obwo
harikubuurayo esabiiti ishatu kandi n'abazaire nkaba naabagambire
batebeekanise embaga yangye. Ekyakurasiireho nkagyenda naabyama owangye
obwo ninyebuuza ekindaakore.

 Kuhahwireho ebiiro nka’biina nikwo kweturiira omushomesa kumubuuza
ekyakuba kyakubaasa kuba kyabaireho yangarukamu ati tinkumanya ekyakuba
kyabaireho okubuura aha rukarara. Nanye mmugarukamu nti yiguura ebintuura
ninkora tubireebe , ahashaaha egyo ebyara akabiita omunyindo yayehamba
itaama obwe natetema nk'owareeba abaseerukare. Nkaguma mpunami atyo akora
omu buriifu kesi eyiyabaire atwiire nabiikamu empapura ezo nikwo kungira
ati ronda ahari rumwe aha ku oraayeboone ongambire.

 Ntyo empampura nziragaramu rumwe, Ibiri bitereire, kuhika ahu naabaire
ntarebiire ebyaruiire nshanga nyamushaija obubonero bwangye yambehaire ku
omuhandiiki we yabutaireho kwonka byoona bikaba busha ahabw'okuba bakaba
batakihindiua omu rupapura.

 Nkagaruka omuka nateekateeka okundayemereza abazaire okwija Buganda
obwo tankijwara diguuri. Kuhahwairehonk'esabiiti ishatu ntyo ntemba motoka
nyorekyerera ogw'owaitu kubamanyisa. Nkarara omu muhanda owa munywani
wangye ou naabaire ninshoma nawe omu bibiina ebyahansi naraara niimutebeza
haza nawe yampamya ati huumura ogu tigwo muheru gw'ensi noija kugarukamu
ojware ogundi mwaka.

 Ku bwasheshire omwitumbi ntyo nyimuka orume ndrwerabya ahamaisho.
Mburebera omurwigi nyorekyerra owaitu. Ku nareesirwe aha irembo abazaire
bangye bakashemererwa kwonka baareeba emiziga nentaratamba omu maisho ekyo
kikabagyemesereza kumbuuza ekibaireho kwonka tindabagambiire nkagyenda
naacumita ogw'ekishengye naahuumurira aha kitanda. Obwo omukaikuru wangye
asigara nateekateeka okyokunywa omugurusi ashutami aha eirembo ahu
naabashangire.

 Bwanyima y'eshaaha nk’emwe nyamukaikuru wangye aija anyimusya ati
yimuka ogyende obone eki waarya.

Nkashotooka mpora mpora naaza omwiriro kurya, kunabikoziremu ebiiri
orwakashatu omugurusi wangye ambuza ati mutabani n'enki?

Nk’eyinamirira n’enaku nyingi obwo emiziga nenshununuka omumaisho,
kuhaahwireho edakiika ishatu ntandiika muhuura amakuru mabi obwo
ndikumumanyisa ngu tindajware diguuri. Nkamutebeza oku munywani wangye
Fred yandeebize akabura kunta aha rupapura rwekigyezo bikiza kushohora
nkeija nyine zero, tugumizuamu mutebeza okunabuurize omushomesa wangye
akandagaanisa ku omuhandiiki we yaaza kubitereeza nyowe nkamwesiga
nk’omuntu mukuru kandi ow’amazima, kwonka kubyashohohwire nkashanga
andeebiize ezangye atarazitaireho. Nyamugurusi akaronda eky'okukora
yaayeyinamirira kumara edakiika nk'ishatu ku yaimukireyo akangambira kimwe
ati mutabani oby'okushoma byayangire ndeetera omukazi ntafa ntareeebire
mwijukuru. Nkahurira enaku yaayenda kunyita kwonka ahabw'okushanga nkaba
naabaire naaboine omwishiki ahaishomero ekarahuka kumpwa. Ku naatebeize
maawe nawe yakiimukiramu ntyo ntandika kweteekateekekyera obushwere.

Nkaguruka kare naashaba Ruhanga omwitumbi omuhanda naaguragaramu
naayorekyerera ow'aba nyamwishiki wanggye ou naabaire ntuura naawe ku
naaresirwe aha irembo nshanga we n'abazaire be bashutami aho ku yandeebire
akaimuka nkowariibwa empazi atyo yaahenegyera amu nju nyowe ntekateeka ngu
yaaza kundeteera ak'okunywa kwonka akamirwa enju mpaka ngarukireyo.
Nkeemerera edakiika nk'ibiiri obwo nindamukanya na nyina kimuzaara amweta
ati toreteera omusigazi akatebe okashusha oti t'ahuriire, ntyo nshutama aha
ku yaabaire ashutamireho ngaaniira n'abazaire be. Mbwenu nkubiihe ngu
n'ekyabaire kintwire nkakihikaho? Nkagaaniira ku naashobiirwe naabasiibura
naagarukayo obwo ninyebuuza ekyabaireho.

Ku naahikire omuka, abazaire bambuuza mbagambira ku naamuboona ku batandika
kuteereeza embaga. Ntyo akaju kangye nkahenengyeramu enaku eri ey'okunyita.

Ku haarabireho esabi ti nk’ishatu ngyenda aha kanisa omu rukiiko ku
naataahiremu ntakashutamire ndeeba omwishiki yansindikira ebahaasa, ntyo
nshohora aheeru kugishoma nbwenu ku nagicwire nkugire ngu nkagaruka omu
kaniisa? Nkashanga nyamwishiki owu naabaire nagambiire abazaire ku ninyenda
kutaasya ariimu nangambira ku atakyenda kunshwerwa, nkairuka naamanyisa
abazaire bangye ku omwishiki andeebize basiigara ebyara babitaire omu
nyindo.Nkatandika kuronda ekindi ekinakubaasa kukora namaara kuremwa
okushoma n'okushwera, nkatekateka okutoroka omuka haakiiri nk'aza kupakasa
empiiha Buganda ahabwokushanga nk’aba mamanyiire emyanya myingi omuri
Buganda.

Nk’imuka omu kasheeshe nibutaagurikana natemba emotoka naarureega naaza
Buganda eky’omugisha murungi ekiro eki naahikireyo ngabwa nabaire
naamanyiise naija naawe agyezaho kundondera omurimo. Ku naabaire naataaha
omunju ntyo ndeeba esiimu neyaaka okugikwata nshanga ari munywani wangye
nangambira ku ambonaire omuriimo. Nkashemererwa naamuragaaniisa ku
ndaamuhikeyo eizooba ry’orwa kastatu.

Ku rwahikire ntyo mwehuurira abindabiramu nyikiriza eizooba eryakurasiireho
ntandiika nkora kwonka nawe tukaba nitukora hamwe.

Ku haahwireho ebiro mukama waitu ahabwokushanga nkaba nyine emicwe mirungi
aguma anyesiga ansigira ekishumuruzo ekyayisize munywani wangye engungu
akagyezaho ku bambinga.

Kuhahwireho okweezi nitukoora mukama w’itu agyenda esafaari atyo
ekishumuruzo akinsigira niho munywani wangye yacweriire orwigi akahenengera
omunda akeiba esente n’ebihandiiko mukama w’eitu, ku yaagarukire akatubuuza
nikwo munywani wangye akamwekiikana akamugira ati niinye nabiibire.
Akanyeta yangambira ku ngaruka ahaka mpaka obu araamanyise kugaruka aha
muriimo. </archive_file>
<archive_file filename="EDITED ESSAYS/ORYAKORA KI IWE.doc"> ORYAKORA KI IWE?

 Samuel Kamugisha mwene Mugisha

 ENTANDIKIIRIRO

‘Oryakora Ki Iwe’ n’ekitebyo kiri kukwata aha magara g’abaana n’eminyeeto
hamwe n’ebiri kubahimbya bikabareetera baarugamu ebyo ebi barikwenda.
Nikyoreka ebi Kositensi ou nyina yaafiire ahabw’okubura omushaho
w’okumushemeza ebi arikurabamu kwija kuba omushaho. Eki N’obu baingi
baabaire nibamureeba nk’otari kubaasa, uwe omu mutima gwe akaba naikiriza
ngu naabaasa.

N’obu araabe yaabaire aine mukaishe owaabaire amubeereire enkuuku-mbisi
n’okumutuntuza, Kositensi akaba aine amatsiko ngu naija kuba omushaho.
Okutuntuzibwa oku kukaija kwamurugiramu okuza ow’Omuky. Muramuzi, omwegyesa
waabo, owaatwire nawe okuhitsya obu yaamara ekibiina kya mushanju.

Ekitebyo eki kijwangizemu amashumi ga rukundo y’abaija nibanyeeta. Rukundo
egi egyeragyeranisiibwe. Kiri aha mushomi kwihamu ei arikwenda. Kwonka
kikaabaire kirungi waihamu egyo etarimu kurya emikooto n’ebitumbwe bya
rukundo.

Buri mushomi naashabwa kutoorana ou araareebereho omu magara gye. Emihanda
y’okutoora kuhika aha ki ori kwenda neeyorekyerwa omu magara ga abo abari
kugambwaho omu kitebyo nkiki.

Kyogosirwe omu byeshashuniirizo, enfumu, emiguutuuro, emicoobooro,
ebitongyerero hamwe n’eby’eshongoro. Oihireho okukuteekamu omuhimbo hamwe
n’okukushemeza, bya nyabeene ebi biine amakuru agasherekirwe. Ebimwe nangwa
orabihureireho kwonka ekikuru n’okufa aha makuru agabirimu.

Ninkwendeza okushoma kurungi.

 Nyairirwe 02, 2012

 Samuel Kamugisha mwene Mugisha

 Bushenyi, Uganda.

 EKIBUUZO KIKAHINDUKAMU EKYESHONGORO

Otamugaya na Beekunda ku baabaire baamara kutaaha omu kibiina bakurateine
nk’ebisha by’aboojo, Omuky. Muramuzi, omwegyesa waabo, nawe yaija
abakuratiitre. Baayemerera ,yaabaramusya nabo baamugarukamu, batyo
baashutama.

Eryo izooba ry’Orwakashatu, Omwegyesa w’Orungyereza akaba naaza kwegyesa
aha mirimo ei abantu bakora. Nk’oku baabaire bari bato, Omuky. Muramuzi
akabanza yaayegyesa abeegi b’ekibiina kya kabiri akeeshongoro. Nikwo
kutandika ati;

Oryakoraki iwe? Oryakoraki iwe?

Oryakoraki iwe ku oriheza emishomo yaawe?

Ndyaba dokita, ndyaba dokita

ndyaba dokita kundiheza emishomo yangye

Ku yaaherize kubeeshongooreramu, boona bbaayatika baasheka bagukize bati:
“Mukuru waatubeiha. Ori Omwegyesa. Tokaabaasa kuba dokita.”

Ati kare ebyo reka tubirugyeho, naaba nimboorekyerera.

Nikwo kubashaba ati, “ Niimwe muunyeshongoreremu obwo nimugamba buri omwe
eki arikwenda kuba mwaba mwakuzire.”

Otamugaya areeba Beekunda. Ashanga n’onu agamuteireho. Beekunda ati,
“Otamugaya totandika kan’oba noobureebera omu rwigi buri Sande ngu nooza
kushaba n’okweshongora omu kwaya yaanyu y’abato eya Kiyagaara?”

Omuky. Muramuzi, Omwegyesa waabo areeba eminwa ya Beekunda neimukyera
amubuuza ati, “Beitu iwe Beekunda okarya orugambisa?”

Abeegi boona ngu kwee, reero Beekunda abwerabwera amanya ngu omwegyesa
yaaza kumugira ngu abe niwe yaabanza kandi kwo nikwo yaamugizire. Nawe
Beekunda atandika ayeshongora;

Ndyaba tiica, Ndyaba tiica

Ndyaba tiica kundiheza emishomo yange

Ku yaaherize, baamuteerera omu ngaro nawe ashemererwa nk’ow’ebyaasha
yaareeba ebyozi.

Ku baabaire baamara edakiika nk’ikumi n’itaano baayecura Kositensi Birungi.
Aija naashenshera omu kibiina obwo omutima agukwise omu ngaro agumize ati:
“Bwe kananshekyera obu naakyererwa ogundi murundi.”

Okaba nooshusha oti baamunaabisa omu mucuucu. Ebigyere okaba nooshusha oti
baamuteeramu emisitari ya guraafu. Eishokye rikaba riri nk’erya kajwa. Ku
yaabaire naataaha omu kibiina yainama ahabw’okumanya ku yaakora kubi kwija
kikyererezi kandi ari n’omurofa. Kikaba kiri ekireebwa-omwe kushanga omwana
ari omurofa atyo omu ishomero rya Nkuuna erya Puriimare.

Omuky. Muramuzi akareka Kositensi yaashutama. Nikwo kumuramutsya ati,
“Kositensi oraire ota?” N’onu ati , “Ndaire gye Masita!” Abeegi ngu kwee
obwo bagumize bati, ‘Ogu ti masita , ni Mukuru.”

Omuky. Muramuzi ati, “Kare yaayetegyereza enshobi ye. “ Agumizamu agambira
Kositensi ati, “Mbwenu waaraire gye ku turaaze omu bureeka oije ondonde.”

Obwo abeegi bakaba nibateekateeka oku baraayeshongore. Omwegyesa nikwo
kugira Otamugaya ati ,”ija omu maisho otweshongoreremu.”

Otamugaya abanza yaakora omu iraka obwo abeegi bakwise nibagaya bagumize
ngu, “ Mukuru ogwo akarya ebijunzure.”

Kwonka bakagicwa ngu agu ogaya nigo gabutosha. Otamugaya akaimuka
yaayeshongora agumize ati;

Ndyaba rooya, ndyaba rooya

Ndyaba rooya, kundiheza okushoma.

Weeza okuba omu kwaya y’ekanisa y’Abakirisito eya Kiyagaara kikareetera
Otamugaya yaaza ahaiguru nk’amapeera omu kweshongora. Eiraka rye
rikashororonga gye nk’erya kanyonza. Ekyabuzireho n’engoma yonka. Eki
kikareeta yaanyaata ekyeshongoro.

 2

Ku baagire omu kahuumuro akubeeta bureeka, Otamugaya na munywani we
Beekunda baaza omu kugaaniira. Bakaba nibeegonooza ebi baabaire bakomire
entanda. Otamugaya akaba akomire ebitakuri by’enshushu ebi abamwe beeta
ebiriibwa nari ebishesya-mbwa. Mbwenu nabo batarabeihire embwa ekasheka
ryari. Ebyo byaba bitandeesire, reka ngarukye aha kyaba kindetsire ndekye
kusigisibwa ekinshemeire kukora nkakora ekintashemeire kukora… Aho akaba
agaitsireho obushera bw’ekitiribiita hamwe na muhogo enkoobwa nk’emwe manya
ngu enyongyesherezo teba nkye. Egi nkoobwa nyina, Kendagaano akagimuha ku
yaagarukire omuka nairuka obwo yaamara kwebwa kimwe aha bitabo bye.
Nyamukazi akaba aherize kufeerwa omushaija we Kajura owaabaire ari
omuhingi.

Beekunda akaba akomire kwenca hamwe na za toosi z’emigaati esiigire
buruubandi. Ogu manya we akaba ari mwene Rweiguuga omugaiga w’ekyaro kya
Nkuuna baitu ou enshuro y’obugaiga bwe yaabaire neebuzaabuza nk’orikunyaara
naayoga.

 Baingi bakaba nibeerarikiirira ngu n’omushuma runkunku baitu abandi ngu
abarikumweta omushuma nibamukomaho amatu g’embuzi ngu bamuriise engwe.
Reero nawe eibondo aryebembeza oshusha oti ari haihi kutabaaruka orugamba
rw’enda y’ameezi mwenda.

Ku baashutamire kurya, Otamugaya akooborora mutaahi we aha kitakuri
n’enkoobwa ya muhogo amuha n’aha kitiribiita. Onu abyanga agumize ati,
“Otwire nontega akanyoobwa nondiisa obuhoro bwawe ngu orye emigaati yangye.
Naakweshumba”

Otamugaya tihaine kiyaagarukiremu. Aha myaka ye munaana, akareeba ngu
tikiine nshonga omuntu ku kugambira bwahwayo egyo yoona emuri aha njoka.
Weeza nikyo Mukamaitu yaagiriire ngu obukama bw’omwiguru nink’obwa bari
nk’abaana abo omu kitabo Ekirikwera abu Yesu yaagambiire ngu bareke baije
ahari uwe. Ku yaabaire ari mukuru akaamugarukiremu ati, “Wangambira busha
baasi!” Baitu weeza imwe, busha bagigamba?

Ku baaherize, Otamugaya yaagira munywani we ati, “Ogume onyete Rooya.”

N’onu ati , “Naanye ogume onyete Masita.”

Otamugaya ati, “Hoona iwe noobasa kuba Masita?”

Onu ati, “Ahabw’enki? Okukwata cooka nkahandiika aha rubaaho, abanteganisa
nkabateera!”

Otamugaya ati, “Reero oku orikutiina kibooko, okaayenzire ngu waaba masita
oteere abeegi? Buri bakakuteera waayenyogoora nk’omunyongororwa gwateerwa
akashana.”

Onu nikwo kumugarukamu ati, “Naanye nimbeihura zoona ezibanteire.”

Otamugaya amubuuza ati “Iwe nookunda ba masita na ba mukuru abari kuteera
abaana eminyaafe y’omugongo, engaro, omutwe n’ebindi bicweka reero
ekabafuruutsa?”

Onu ati, “Nibansisira oburo bugoyire kubi.”

Otamugaya nawe nikwo kumugira ati, “Korera abandi nk’oku waakwenzire ngu
bakukorere.”

Batyo baaza kuzaana bairukangamu barikweshongora ekyeshongoro kibaabeegyesa
bagumize bati;

 Ndyaba Rooya, ndyaba Rooya

 Ndyaba Rooya kundiheza emishomo yangye.

 Ndyaba tiica, Ndyaba tiica

 Ndyaba tica kundiheza emishomo yangye

Kubaaherize baashanga abandi baishiki n’aboojo bariyo nibazaana bagumize
ngu;

 Tungutungu aha mureere,

 Oraagambe ni muka Mbeba,

 Oraashekye ni muka Kinya,

 Naamira enkwanzi n’ebigasha,

 Miru!

Uwe Otamugaya akasheka ahabw’okuhurira ngu hariho muka Kinya . Akaba akira
kuhuurira abantu nibagaaniizana ngu ‘kawaabereshera nk’ekinya kihakire’
kwonka we atabyeteho.

Nikwo kugaruka akababuuza ati, “Reero omushaija nawe naaba muka kinya?”

Aho boona bakasheka bati kwee. Ati “Mwena mwaba abakazi ba Kinya na
Mbeba!”

Ku baabaire bakiriyo nibazaana, Bimanywaruhanga na Kagurusi baija
barikurabamu.Bakaba bakira kunyangaraza abandi.Bakaba baiba emipiira
n’otukaraamu tw’abandi weeza babasiga nibariranya. Bimanywaruhanga akaba
aine emyaka nk’ikumi, ari muraingwa kukira aha bandi oihireho Kagurusi ou
baabaiere nibeeta Kaagu. Kaagu akaba aine emyaka nk’ikumi nawe, ari
muraingwa kukira ekibiina kya kabiri kyona. Akaba naayera mu, w’amaisho
g’ebitongaanwa.

Bimanywaruhanga ou baakubize Biima akaba ari mutabani wa Mwesigye owaabaire
aine eduuka ya cakara. Reero we ishe wa Kaagu, Omw. Muhangi akaba ari
omuhingi mukuru omuri Kiyagaara. Kaagu akaba anyangaraza enanansi za ishe.
Ku zaabaire zikitandika kuturubwita, ngugwo yaazikonywire. Obutunda
n’endiijo misiri ya bariranwa akaba atagireebamu. Reero uwe Biima eduuka ya
ishe kakye agikumbagaze, manya omu kwiba ebintu akaba ari rushomba-byoma
nk’embeba yimpurira. Manya ebitabo, keeki, za switi, bisikwiti n’ebindi
akaba abiiba. Weeza akaba ari kaburabuza nk’omwana aiba nyina. Akaba ari
nyakwehena nk’owaaraire eriisho rye.

Nyaboojo ku baabaire nibatambatambura nk’okwabo baashanga Kositensi akwitse
naagehonoora, niimanyisa amaziga

Obwo abandi barikurya n’okuzaana, Kositensi, owaabaire akuziibwe mukaishe
akaba akwitse nibiragara manya obwo akwitse naatakira Biikira Mariya
Omuzaire Omurungi ngu amuyambe Omwegyesa atamuteera ezi Mbaguta yaateire
muha.

Biima na Kaagu ku baashangire naarira nikwo kutandika kumuteerera enaku
barikweshongora bati;

 Kiishamutuutu

 Waaterw’oha

 Ni muka-taata

 Yaakutura ki?

 Yantura okubeiha

 Beiha tureebe

 Tiimanya kubeiha

 Yaataaha omu nju

 Yaija n’empango,

 Yanda kunkonda,

 Naanye naamukonda;

 Twena twashaasha.

 Tuutu-tuutu

 3

Ku baagarukire omu kibiina, we Kositensi yaaza omu biteekateeko. Yaareeba
emirimo ei mukaishe ari kumukozesa akahika ahakukyerererwa. Yaagaruka
yaareeba eshaaha zi ari kumwimukizamu ngu aze kukora obwo abaana abeeye
Twine na Tukahiirwa bariyo babyami.

Amaisho g’omutima gakongyera gaamutwara gaamworeka emizingoonya ei mikaishe
arikumusibura. Ku yaabaire naakigiteekateekaho yaaguruka ahabw’okwekanga.
Ekyo mpaho Omwegyesa tarakireebire. Baitu abaamureebire naaguruka nibo
baine ebigambo.

Ku haahweireho omwanya, yaagaruka omu nyanja y’ebyo biteekateeko. Bambe
nyakaishiki kakaba kataine ryato ry’okwambuka egyo nyanja eyaabaire eijwire
ebingonzi by’okubonaabonesibwa mukaisheko. Manya ngu muka-sho taba nyoko.

Akagumizamu yaijuka nyamwaga. Amaisho yaagahisya aha ku mukaishe Nyanjura
oku arikumwima ebyokurya nangwa obumwe akamuha bikye obwo manya ngu aba
amugiriire embabazi. Aho akaijuka ekitongyerero eki yatongyerereire aha
mutima gwe ati;

 Nsheenya,

 Ntah’amaizi,

 Ns’oburo,

 Ngoya;

 Beitu kwonka

 Muka-tata

 Ampa’akagufa

 Nkanena

 Nti: po,po,po,po

Ku yaabaire naajumbuka ati omu kirooto kye ky’eihangwe, omushomesa nikwo
kumubuuza eki arikwenda kuba omu biro bya nyentsya.

Akaba yaahuriire ekyeshongoro ky’oryakora ki iwe. Kikaba kikira
kweshongorwa Twine na Tukahiirwa abaabaire nibashomera omu ishomero rirungi
munonga erya Kashozi puriimare. Bakaba nibabaheera emitwaro makumi abiri
buri ncuro, niyo taamu. Ishe owaabaire naakorera Mbarara akaba azoohereza
hamwe n’ezindi z’okukozesa aha ka. We Kositensi bakaba nibamuheera emitwaro
ebiri yonka. Beitu ezo mukaishe okuzishashura gakaba gaba gari amaino ga
ruguru.

Kositensi ku baabaire bamubingira fiizi, ateekateeka bingi. Akaba
ateekateeka ahari nyina owaafiire emyaka ebiri enyimaho. Akaba ateekateeka
oku nyina yaabaire amureebeerera gye atari kumugingiiza. Akiteekateeka
rukudo ya nyina ashoberwa atandika kurira.

Mbwenu Ku baamubuurize eki arikwenda kuba, yaatandika kweshongora ati;

 Ndyaba dookita, ndyaba dokita

 ndyaba dokita kundiheza emishomo

Ku yaagambire dokita, boona baasheka, baarya ebinyaatsi. Omuky. Muramuzi
nikwo kubabuuza ekyareeta baasheka bakakwenuuza.

Bati, “Omukazi takaaba dokita.”

Ati, “Naamuba.”

Ngu,”Ngaaha ogwo naaba nansi.”

Ati, “Omushaija naabasa kuba dokita kandi Omushaija abe nansi.”

Otamugaya ati “Ekyo Masita nikiija kita?”

Onu amugarukamu ati, “Ku orikuheza Siniya ya Kana nooshoma obunansi, oba
ori omwishiki nainga omwojo. Reero ku orikuheza Siniya ya Mukaaga waaza aha
Yunivasite nka Makerere, nooshoma obushaho nooba dokita”

Otamugaya ati, “Kwonka orikutunga sente nyingi n’oha?”

Mukuru amugarukamu ati, “Obwire obwingi ni Dokita”

Kositensi n’obu araabe yaabaire naabonabonesibwa, akaba aine ekiteekateeko
ky’okushoma akaba omushaho. Bakamugira ngu nyina akafa ahabw’okubura
omushaho w’okumushemeza omutima. Ekyo kikamushaasha kyareeta akashaasho
kahango omu mutima gwe nikwo kucwamu ngu abe omushaho w’okushemeza ku
araabe yaakuzire.

Obumwe akaba ayefuuza ati, “ Kuri naabaire ndi omushaho,maawe takufiire
nkabonaabonesibwa eki kyata ky’omukazi.”

 4

Ku zaahikire mushanju z’eihangwe baayeshongora eky’okusiibura omwegyesa
waabo bagumize ngu;

Shaaha mushanju zaahika,

Shaaha mushanju zaahika ez’okutaaha.

Omwegyesa osiibe gye

Omwegyesa osiibe gye twataaha.

Ku baabaire nibataaha,Kaagu na Biima baatandika kuteganisa Kositensi obwo
bamugumize ngu

“Hari ngu twahurira ngu nooyenda kuba dokita?”

Onu ati, “Eego!”

Kaagu ati, “Mbwenu esente z’okukutwara Makerere kushoma obushaho sho
aziine?”

Biima nawe akishongyera ati, “Reero iwe ou ab’owaanyu barikweyaguza
orugusyo. Nangwa shi ni Beekunda ou ishe aine epiki?”

Nyaboojo bakaba batakira kureeba Kashaija. Bakaba batari kwetegyereza Twine
na Tukahiirwa. Nahabwekyo bakaba nibamanya ngu Kositensi taine ishe ngu
kandi n’obu yaakuba ariho, hoona n’omworo. Bakaba bareeba Kositensi
nibamubingira fiizi bwakyeire bwizire.

 5

Eizooba eryakutatsireho rukaba ruri Orwakana. Aha eizooba eri, kikaba kiri
ekikomera kya Rutookye. Kositensi akaba ari ow’okubugana Omuky. Muramuzi
omu ofiisi kushoboorora enshonga z’okukyerererwa kwe. Akaba aija abandi
boona baatahire omu kibiina, reero abashomesa bateera ogwo. Omuky. Muramuzi
ku yaareebire omwishiki ogu atarikureka akaze ke, yaayenda ngu atware
obwire ayetegyereze oburemeezi bwe reero abone kubufuutira ekibiriizi.

Eizooba eryo Omuky. Muramuzi ku yaahikire ati omu kibiina yaabuuza abandi
ati, “Kositensi ari nkahi?”

Banu ngu, “takaizire.”

Biima owaabaire naatuura haihi n’owa ba Kositensi yaagambira Omuky.
Muramuzi ati, “Obu naaba niinyija, naamubugana abureire omu muba
gw’ebikaijo by’engooha ayorekyereire ogwa Rutookye naanye nteekateeka nti
yaaba naaza omu kikomera”

Omuky. Muramuzi ati, “Kare, eriizooba niinyenda buri omwe angambire ou
arikwenda ngu abe nkawe nainga shi ou arikureeberaho”

Buri omwe ku yaamazire kumugambire yaabagira ngu bahandiike omu bitabo
byabo.

Ku baabaire nibeeteguurira eishomo erindi obwo ziri shaaha nk’ina, akashana
kaija nikatagata, baayecura Kositensi naatuuheera nk’origisiibwe ekicuncu.
Akaba yaatuutukire munonga oti baamwozya omu ga Ncwera nainga Rutundu.

Akasibira aha muryango gw’ekibiina, akacuucu kaimuka. Omwishiki owaabaire
ashutami aho omu maisho, akeekanga oti yaatiina enkuba.

Kositensi nikwo kuteera kodi agumize ati, “Ninshaba ngu ntaahemu nyabo!”

Onu ati, “Taahamu!”

Ku yataahiremu abeegi boona baayatika baateera akasheko nk’aka’abagyesi.

Kositensi akaba ashangiirwe akacuucu kandi emyenda ye egubire, enziro ziri
akamata.

Omwegyesa akakwata ebitabo bye yaagambira Kositensi ngu amukuratire. Ku
baataahire omu ofiisi, abeegyesa ngu, “Bishi ogu nawe naashomera aha? Ngu
oburofa kayaarenzya!” Manya bamunyankura kumuteera. Ku baabaire nibaihayo
eminyaafu kumunyafura, Omuky.Muramuzi ati,”Mumurekye!”

Nabo bamureka bagumize ngu, “Kwonka omukoreho nk’omushaho.”

Omuky. Muramuzi akabanza yaakora omu nshaho ye yaihamu eminekye ebiri ya
bogoya, ogumwe yaagukwatsa Kositensi reero nawe yaasigaza ogundi.

Ku baamazire kurya egyo minekye, Omuky Muramuzi yaabuza omugyenyi we ati,
“Iwe nooyenda kuba ki?”

Kositensi ati, “Nk’oku naabaire naagambire omu kibiina, nyowe niinyenda ngu
mbe dokita”

N’onu yaamugira ati, “Ekyo ni kirungi kwonka ba dokita tibari kukyerererwa
nkaiwe. Nibakwata obwire kandi nibaba bari abeecumi.”

Ku yaagambire ebyo yaareeba Kositensi yaatandika kureeba ahansi. Nikwo
kumugira ati, “Kositensi niinyenda ngu ongambire amazima. Ekirikureeta
nookyerererwa ni ki?

Kositensi nawe atandika, “Ekizibu ni muka-tata. Niwe arikunkyeza kare,
nkanaabisa Tukahiirwa na Twine nkabashendekyereza, nkabatooza ogwa
Kakurira, ntyo omu iteme rya Kanyamihoro eriijwire omurombe. Amaizi niinye,
okwozya ebintu nakwo niinye, obwo muka-tata abyami.”

Ebigambo ebi akabimariira naarira nikwo Omuky. Muramuzi kwiha akatambaara
omu nshaho ye akamuragaza amaziga. Ku yaaherize yaamugambira kugaruka omu
kibiina.

 6

Omu mwebazyo Omuky. Muramuzi akeetuura owa muka-ishe wa Kositensi,
yaashanga nyamukazi agumize ati, “Oijukye ngu oine okwijuja egirikani
ishatu. Waashanga amacwante aga gaayomire, ogwetimbire.”

Omuky.Muramuzi akamuramusya nk’otaahurira ebi yaaba naagambira Kositensi.
Ku yaaherize yaamushaba kubagaaniiramu hamwe.

Omuky.Muramuzi ati, “Muhara waawe hati noomureeba ota?”

Onu ati, “Yaahamira aho naija kushoma. Akiinemu obwegande”

Omwegyesa ati, “Noomanyisa tihaine ki arikukora aha?”

Na nyamukazi amugarukamu ati, “Nooreeba ekizibu ndi mukaishe. Ku ndikugamba
ngu n’eihari. Kwonka amazima gari ngu Kositensi n’omunafu munonga munonga
kandi munonga emirundi nka rukumi. Omwana ou orikutuma aha iziba akamarayo
omwaka. Naashotooka nk’ekinyantinda, nooshusha oti omu bigyere ainemu
amahwa ga rutazya!

Reero ebyo bikiri aho, naahondeeza, mbwenu we ni mwene-Ruhondeeza ou
mpurira. Banyaanya abari kwegyera Kashozi nibabureebera omu rwigi basiga
arikuhondeeza obwo emigono eri ahaiguru; kandi obwo ni bato ahariwe. Nkaza
na kumuta Kashozi, kwonka ahabw’okuhondeeza naareeba ngu naija kushiisha
sente z’eriigyenda nazo ezaabuzire.

Reero ogu owoorikureeba aha n’omurofa. Enziro nooshanga aine akamata.
Amaizi naagatiina, nooshusha oti gakaita ab’owaabo. Nkabanza kumugorogoza
yaayanga naanye naamurugaho. Omwishiki w’emyaka mwenda aba hati ashemereire
kuba atari kwenaabisa? Hoona ndanaabisa aba munaana na mukaaga ngaiteho
n’owa mwenda?”

Ku yaabaire naamarayo ati nawe nyakaishiki aija. Nyamukazi amugira ati,
“Nangwa hati waarahukayo. Webare! Ija oramusye misitureesi waanyu.
Nyakaishiki kakaija mpora omutima kagutangasi, kari kubwerabwera, kaatsimba
amaju omu maisho ga mukuru waabo kati, “Waasiiba ota Mukuru?”

Mukuru nawe akeetaba ati, “Naasiiba gye shana iwe?”

Kati, “Naasiiba gye!”

Omwegyesa agaruka akabuuza ati, “Ebi bangambira nikwo nainga?”

Ku kaabaire katakakigarukiremu, mukaisheko akateera ekisyori agumizamu
agambira omwegyesa ati, “Ogizire ngu mbwenu akabiikiriza? Ou orikureeba aha
ti yaaayehakana, naacwa enkoko orwara?”

Mukuru ku yaareebire byamushobera ati, “Weeza Kositensi nyegambirira!”

Eki kikatuma nyamukazi kwimukaho akagyenda. Reero na ka Kositensi nikwo
kugambira mukuru waabo kati, “Obu waareeba yaagyenda, nyekiro naija
kunteera ngu naamutabaariza”

Aho nyamwegyesa tihaine ki yaayongyeireho. Akakwata nyakeegi omukono
yaayeta nyamwirukazi ati, “Hoona tinaagarukayo owaitu.” Nyamwegyesa akaba
naatuura omu nju z’abeegyesa ahari Kiyagaara purimare.

Nyamukazi ati, “Beitu ku oraara kabwira.”

Na nyamwegyesa ati, “Ngaaha niinyija kuraara obundi.”

Aheeru bukaba nibutandika kwira kandi hamwe n’okwaba. Ebicu bikaba biija
nibikiza eizooba amaani harikuburayo ehuuzi eiguru rikaata amaizi ngu
n’enjura. Nyanjura akashendekyereza nyamukazi reero ku yaamuhikize omu
maduuka ga Kyabitara onu yaakwata pikipiki ngu enjura etamushekyera.
Nyakuvuga ejo piki agiteera omugyere ahaihi ni Kiyagaara. Ku yaabaire
naahika ah’eishomero ati, enjura eyaaba neehiika nk’ei babingire omwiguru,
yaatandika kusheesheka, waashusha oti eiguru baarifumura.

 7

Nyanjura ku yaahikire omuka yaashanga Twine na Tukahiirwa baizire. Bakaba
bariyo nibazaana bakwitse ebitongyerero. Kositensi akaza kubajuura
yunifoomu baayanga, yaamanya ngu yaagumizamu akabakwataho, nyinabo yaija
nigumwakiira. Ogwa nyakanga kandi ogizire ngu ogundi niimanyisa guuha?.

Twine niwe yaatandikire ati;

 Koomire okamushangahi?

 Koomire omu Kabira”

 Yaarahira “Tindirya nkoko.”

 Yaaguruka yaagicwa omutwe;

 Ati baana “Enkoko enura”

 Na munonga ekipapa kyayo.

Kositensi ku yaakihuriire yaagira ati, “weeza ba Koomire ni baingi.”
Ekyareetsire nyamwana muto naateekateeka atyo ni mukaishe owaabaire
naayeyeta murungi haaba hariho abagyenyi na munonga abaijire kumujuna
omwaga gwa mukaishe.

Akaijuka eizooba rimwe obu yaareetsire Omubuurizi Felekisi kugamba na
mukaishe. Mukaishe kuyaamazire kurenzya wa mubuurizi ak’eirembo, yaacwa
emizingoonya yaamutsibanyagura ati, “Ku ori bigamba ogundi ngu osigye
eiziina ryangye enziro ogwetimbire ogw’enyamurume!”…

Na Twine ati, “Ku ndaakure niinyija kuba Koomire ngume ndye enkoko”

Tukahiirwa nawe amugira ati “Baakukwata nibakuteera nk’orwoma oku rwataeire
enyindo y’omujungu.

Basheka obwo Kositensi ariyo naatasya omu nju ebintu ebyabaire byanikire
ngu enjura etabishekyera bakamuhinga omugusha aha kibunu.

Nyabwana bwo butandika ekyeshongoro ky’orwoma.

 Naabugana orwoma

 Nirwegyendesa,

 Omujungu yaaruteera embundu

 Atarumanyire

 Obuganga bwamuteera enyindo

 Ati “Ndekura.”

Enjura ekatandika kweshuka nk’ei baafukunkura omu mucebe. Nyanjura yaija
naashabagarika. Yaataaha omu nju. Akashanga Kositensi ari omu kiyungu.
Nikwo kumukwata akatandika kumushuna amatu n’okumunyafura. Ku yaamunyafwire
nawe Kositensi ati Kabunu mpa amaguru nikwo kutomera Twine ou omukono gwe
gwateire ekiibo ky’esaano yoona ekahwera omu mwariro atyo akaboorooga byona
bikaba nk’ebya Rusaanuura rwa Kiguruka;

 Rusaanuura rwa kiguruka

 Aguruka ateera enyungu,

 Enyungu eteera omukazi, omukazi amuteera orwiko,

 Orwiko ruteera esaano,

 Esaano ejwara omuriro’

 Omuriro gwotsya enju,

 Gugaruka gujwara ebintu,

 Bashahura baiha omu nju

 Ku birema beeta abantu,

 Enduuru bagikoronga: Araararaararaara!

Kositensi akakwata ekikumi omuri egyo njura, yaagyenda. Ku yaabaire yaahika
Kyabitara obwo naagyema ogwa Kiyagaara, yaareeba Otamugaya owaabaire
nairuka aha mbuzi omu njura eyaabaire yaatwara magru-makye. Obwo manya ziba
nka shaaha ibiri. Kositensi ku yaareebire Otamugaya yairukanga yaamuhikaho
obwo boona bari kutengyeza nk’ebinyonyi byamara kuteerwa enjura. Otamugaya
akabanza yaatwara embuzi eyaabaire ecwire omunaga, atyo yaashanga Kositensi
owaabaire ayehigikire aha nshonda y’enju.

Otamugya akaguzamu, niimanyisa omuhanda, yaatondagira na Kositensi mpaka
Kiyagaara. Kositensi akatekyerereza Omuky. Muramuzi ekyabaho. Nikwo
kubatindira bakabyama mpaka eizooba eryakuratsireho.

Ku bwasheeshire, Otamugaya yaagaruka Kyabitara kujwara yuunifoomu atyo
akagaruka ah’eishomero. We Kositensi akatandika kutuura ow’Omuky. Muramuzi
mpaka obu yaamazire ekya mushanju.

 8

Purimare ekahwa reero boona abeegi baahika okwihaho Kaagu na Biima.

Kositensi akahika n’obubonero 6.

Orungyereza ……………………2

S.ST …………………………….2

Sayansa ………………………...1

Okubara ………………………..1.

Otamugaya nawe akahika n’obuti 3 hamwe na 2 omuri Sayansa.Nizo
 Orungyereza ……………………1

S.ST ……………………………1

Okubara ……………………….1

Sayansa………………………. 2

 Abaatsigaire abandi bakahikira omu idaara ry’okubanza, erya kabiri hamwe
n’erya kashatu reero Kaagu na Biima baaguzingiirira baagwa baagwisa enkomo
ahansi.Nk’oku Otamugaya yaabaire ari owa kashatu omu Disiturikiti eya
Busheenyi akaba naaza kushomera busha. Akaba naaza omu Ishomero erya Ntare
ahu yaabaire atiire coisi y’okubanza.

Kugira ngu akaba akozire gye, Kositensi akatwarwa aba Bweranyangi
kumushomesa obwo arikuha ekicweka kya fiizi. Omuky. Muramuzi akaba agiire
Mbarara ashoboororeire ishe ebya Kositensi. Nangwa akaba amazire ekihuumuro
ky’ekya mushanju Mbarara owa ishe. Manya akaba yaatandika kunyeeta yaaba
omushebashebe ari haihi kurugamu entunguuta y’omwishiki. Nyamiceka ngu
n’emishatuka, Nyakamata ngu n’enziro, Nyamushokye gw’abaana ba muha. Byona
ebyo akaba atakibiine. Abaamureebire bakaba batamanya ngu niwe.

Kandi nyabaana, Twine na Tukahiirwa? Twine akaba atungire obubonero 21.
Akaba amazire kushaba omwanya Nyabubaare omu Siniya. Tukahiirwa akaba akiri
omu kya mukaaga.

Abandi ku baahuumurukire, Kaagu na Biima baasigara omu ka ahakuba bakaba
banyureire omukira, bagwire bahikizeho n’enkomo. Buri omwe akaba aine
enkoni ina za biishoopu. Bombi bakaba baine emyaka nk ‘ikumi n’etaano.
Bakatandika kutega eshonzi. Ngu ku baabaire bakizayo omu mwanya gw’okukwata
eshonzi, bakwata ebiryamba, ebikyere, enjoka nainga obumwe engaara zenda
kubashekyera.

Beekunda we akaihayo obubonero bwe 31 atyo yaaza omu by’okubeija.
Akatandikira aha kibiiziro kya Niimwesiga ou baingi baabaire nibamanya nka
Randa ahabw’okuba omukugu omu kuranda ebiti.

 OKUHUUMURUKA KUZA OMU SINIYA

 1

Aha izooba ry’okuhuumuruka, Kositensi na Otamugaya bakagyenda hamwe mbabo
Ishaka omu tauni. Bakabanza baaraba omu kikomera kya Kizinda batyo baagura
eby’okukozesa aha ishomero. Kositensi akaba akwitse enkarara z’ebintu reero
we Otamugaya ahagatiire sente n’ekishaho ky’okukwatsamu ebintu bibaagura.
Okaba nooshusha oti nibazaarwa kumwe.

Ku baamazire kugura nyabintu aha shaaha ina. Manya ebingi bakaba baraire
babiguzire. Mpaho Kendagaano na Kashaija baabekiina baabagambira amahame
oti bari omu majuta. Baabashaba ku bagumizamu n’omukago gwabo kwonka
kubataza omu by’okuteerana.

Kashaija niwe yaatandikire ago mahame. “Waaba nooyenda kuba omushaho
w’okushemeza emitima, ebintu by’okwegaita obirekye mpaka oshweirwe.
Bweranyangi ei orikuza, baakukwata ngu otwire nibakubinga.”

Nawe Kendagaano akakishongyera agumize ati, “Noomanya ku niiwe nyesigire
mwanangye. Otakaaza okwo okaza omu maarwa hamwe n’abakazi ba Mbarara
okeebwa ahu waarugire. Waaba nooyenda kuba Omunyabiragiro n’okuba
omushuubuzi w’amaani nk’oku ndikuhurira noogamba oine kwehara ebintu
bibiri. Nibyo ebi; ba maraaya hamwe n’otwishiki hamwe n’amaarwa. Ekikuru
munonga oyesigye Ruhanga.” Manya owa biso akakicooboora ati;

Ruhanga naakira byona
 Ebiri
omu nsi n’omu iguru.

Ku oraabe otamanya Ruhanga,

Ebi omanya bifa busha.

Obwengye obutamanya Ruhanga,
 Nink’obwato burimu
omuhengyere.

Ruhanga niwe agira obwengye;

N’obu orihikahi, oryamanya bikye.

N’obu orimanya eby’ahaiguru,
 Torihezayo ebya
Ruhanga.

Ruhanga niwe agira ekitiinisa;

Ekyawe n’eitondo omu nyanja

Ruhanga kandi n’omuzaire.

Ou otarenga sho nari nyoko.

Ruhanga ku orimunaga enyima,
 Oryashanga otaine
butooro.

Omushabe Nyamuhanga,

N’omuzaire, tarikwima.

Oyekwatse Nyamuhanga,
 Omugire oti
‘Ntarikwakwa!’

Omuhaise nk’oku orikubaasa,
 Ebihembo omu iguru
n’ekiyooro.

Ku baarugire omuri ago mahame, Kashaija yaakora omunshaho ye yaakwata buri
omwe yaamuha emitwaro ebiri. Na Kendagaano yaakomoorora omweko gwe yaihamu
emitwaro ebiri buri omwe yaamuha gumwe. Mpaho baabatwara aha siteegi
baabatembesa takisi. Motoka ku yaabaire etakasimbwire ati, “Mwanangye ebi
naakugambira, abakazi n’amaarwa obyetantare” Ori nawe agarukisamu omutwe.
Manya garikaata na Baibuli neegagamba eti, ‘Amaarwa
n’omuteezi w’enaku’

Owa biso we akakihimba ati,

Amaarwa n’embibo mbi.,
 Owaagicooka
temucwekaho.

Amaarwa tigeemanyiizibwa,
 Owaarozaho gamutamu
omunaga

Amaarwa gagira orweto
 Nk’eigufa oku
ryeta emunyu.

Amaarwa gateeza omururu,
 Ogaigutsi ati,
‘Tinkanyweireho’

Amaarwa tigataana na nkoni,
 Ebitomi
n’ekimanyiiro

Amaarwa tigatamba na iriho,
 Omusinzi ati
‘Munkize ekyaka”

Omusinzi oyebirwe Ruhanga,

Ku arifa aryagotomera omuriro.

 2

Ku baahikire Bweranyangi, Kositensi yaarugamu. Na Otamugaya yaashohora
yaaza kukiririzaho munywani we aha bintu. Ku yaamazire yaamusiibura etyo
takisi yaamusigaho. Bombi bakatera orwari, reero abaabaire bagirimu, niyo
takisi, baagambira dereeva na kondakita ku beemerera.

Akaija nairukanga nk’akame, baamwigurira yaataahamu. Reero nyabagyenzi
baamutandika baamukora ekikoro nk’eki omukazi yaakozire mukaiba.

Omushaija w’emyaka yaahamya owaabaire agitembeiremu Kigoma akatandika
nk’owaakyo ati’ “Mbwenu abaana ba hati. Hati ogu yaatandikire kurigira kari
kaishiki. Abaana ba hati nibatandika ebintu by’okwegaita okw’omubonano
bakiri entorobo, encuukye!”

Manya agamuzoorera nk’ag’abarinda wakame obwo amwongyera orwongoto
rw’ebigambo, “Mbwenu iwe waamanyire ki akaana kato nk’iwe? Bakagicwa ngu
etakareebaga erigatsa empango. Ku oraiheyo rwata rwa siriimu, nibwo oraije
kwetegyereza.”

Abantu boona omu takisi bakaba bari ce! Bakaba baruhire ahabwa takisi
kugyenda neeyemayemeerera. Abandi bakaba batarikureeba enshonga ei Muzeeyi
ogu yaabaire naafa n’omutabani ahakuba kikaba kitari kisya kureeba omwojo
n’omwishiki barikurigirana kandi manya okurigirana okubi okurimu okurya
emikooto hamwe n’ebitumbwe. Kikaba kitari kutangaaza kukwata abaana bato
kukira n’abo butunu bari kukora yaamirimo, waagimanya. Abandi bakaba
babakwata n’abantu bakuru, baanyine-amaka.Baingi bakaba batari kwetegyereza
ekyareetera muzeeyi ogu kusheetereza.

Otamugaya akateeraho kwegambaho manya bagira ngu ‘otarihunga otarekiire”.
Nikwo kutandika ati, “Omwishiki ku naaba ntiine ebindi kumushaba nk’oku
muri kuteekateeka. Omwishiki mazire nawe Kiyagaara, yaaba naaza Bweranyangi
naanye obwo nindurambiraho orwa Ntare.”

Ku yaagambire Ntare omwojo omwe owaabaire ari omu takisi ati, “Nooza
Ntare?”

Abandi ngu, “Ka mwize mureebe oku baabonana”

Nyamwojo akaba naaruga omu ishomero erya Kyamamari eya Kyamuhunga kandi
eiziina rye akaba ari, Yowaabu Tumukunde. Yowaabu akaba atungire obubonero
mukaaga kandi aine ekyetengo ky’okuba Omunyabiragiro nka Otamugaya.

Otamugaya na Yowaabu Ku baamanyiine, muzeeyi n’abandi bagyenzi
baamurugaho. Ku baahikire omu rurembo Mbarara, ebintu baabisiga omu nju ya
Kashaija batyo baaza kugira ebi baagura. Otamugaya akagabwa yaizire Mbarara
omu kihuumuro kutaayaayira Kositensi. Kashaija akabarambuza emyaanya
emingi. Nahabwekyo Mbarara akaba naagyetegyereza.

 EIBIIZIRO

Ngu omurimo mubi n’okukyekyera hamwe n’okuroga. Beekunda ku yaareebire ngu
eby’okwega yaasheerwa omutwe gwe, yaacwamu kuza aha kubiiza. Ku yaagiire
aha kibiiziro, byabanza byayanga eranda yaamukiza amaani ahabw’okugira ngu
akaba atamanyiire mirimo egumire. Owaabo bakaba baine omukozi. We akaba
ashutama aho aba boosi arinda ngu bisye, bamureetere arye nigwo gwonka.

Omu kasheeshe ishe akaba amutwara ahari pikipiki ye nangwa n’obumwe batwara
Otamugya baamubugana omu muhanda. Beitu eki we akaba atakyendera kimwe
n’obu nyamwojo yaabaire ari munywani we. Epiki ku yaabaire ebura nyamwojo
okuza aha’eishomero akureka obwo agumize ati, “Tata ku atarashomire ka
n’omugaiga.” Ngu atamanyire ku ashumbire ati ndi omu bya maarimi. Bishi bwo
obugaiga bukaba buri nkahi kan’ow’eriisho rimwe ayebembeire empumi. Kare
reka bugyende bube kwe, esente ezo ka zaabaire zitarikumanywa oburugo
bwazo.

 Nyamwojo akaba atari kumanya n’oku bari kukwata efuka. Ku yaabaire aza
n’abandi aha musiri aba ow’okugaaniira n’obwana bugyenzi bwe obwarabaho
reero nyanfuka agitambika ahi baatandikira orugyezi. Reero akaba naatiina
embeho na munonga ey’omukasheeshe.Kandi ku haabaire hakyeraho
enjura,ekitanda, eki abandi beeta ekitabo, akaba akikwata amaguru.Manya
omushaija akakihimba naahabura abantu boona kukora ati, agumize ati:

 Obe omukozi w’emirimo:

 Otariba omugara, ensi ekakushobera.

 Ogire oyekwatiremu:
 Otaryesiga
 abandi kukugirira.

 N’obu origira ab’okukukorera,
 Hoona
 oyeteeremu akakumu.

 Ku barikuha omwinukirira,
 Oinuze,gutarifeera busha.

 Otariba nyamukoma-ikara,
 Okakirwa
 nyamukangayo.

 Otarigijuumika omu rugyezi yonka:
 Eyaawe ekaba
 kyehingisa.

 Ku orihinga aha muhanda,
 Otariba
 Rutangarira-bagyenzi.

 Otaritiina embeho y’akasheeshe:
 Egyo
 niyo ehimbya abakozi.

 Otarihunga orutoonyerera:

 Ago n’amajuta g’abahingi.

Kwonka owaabaire naamwegyesa omwami Niimwesiga, mwete Randa, akaba ari
omushaija waahamya kandi atari kweganda. Akaba aine emboozi zitari kuhwayo.
Akaba akomire omu kibiina kya mukaaga nawe eby’okwega byangire.

Eibiiziro eri rikaba riri haihi n’ekyaro kya Nkuuna. Karama ahu ryabaire
riri hakaba hari gati na gati ya Kiyagaara hamwe na Nkuuna. Randa akaba
aruga Kiyagaara buri izooba aija kukorera Karama ngigi.

Akaba ari omwesigwa nk’eiziina rye. Tihaine muntu ou yaabaire
araryangataniise ekintu kye. Akaba amarwa ake. Nahabwekyo Beekunda ku
yaamazire ekya mushanju, Rweiguuga niwe ishe, yaamureeta owa Randa ngu
amwegyese okubiiza.

Ngu ku oza Nkore otwaza nk’Abanyankore. Abandi ngu ku oza omu barya-
nshohera, n’iwe ozirya. Baitu ziriibwa zirikaata. Owaabiso ati,
“Okuzikweyareire, nikwo n’iwe ozeeshweka.”

Ku haagiire kuhwaho ameezi abiri, Beekunda akaba yaatandikire kukwata
eranda oti akazaarwa naagimanya. Okaba omushanga ekyeshongoro hamwe
n’ekicuruzo biri ahaiguru. Akaba akira kukunda ekyeshongora kya kabwondera
emanzi y’embeba. Haza nyakyeshongoro kikaba kireeta nyamwingi w’omuntu,
aboojo n’abaishiki, entunguuta hamwe n’emango, abaizire kugura hamwe
n’embura-mukoro.

Omuri ezo ntunguuta hakaba harimu Keezia. Ogu akaba akomire omu kya
mukaaga. Ogu nawe akaba ateeranira aha ibiiziro reero embozi agikwata mpaka
omu shaaha z’ekirenga-bazaana oshusha oti yaaba ahingire. Tokaamanya
okaashanga yaabaire aba ahingire embibo z’orugambo kandi baarushoma-agabira
tobahurira. Embibo ya Keezia ekaguma neekura mpora ngigo yaaba entorobo.
Omu meezi nka abiri, Kezia akaba yaahindukire ekindi kintu. Ebyo reka tube
tubireekiire aho. Otafayo ahabw’okuba Beekunda aikiriize kukutebeza ebye na
wa mwishiki, niimanyisa Keezia.

 AKASHAASHO

Bakagicwa ngu ensi egumire nk’eky’empazi. Otambuuza oti nk’ekiki.
Waakimanya. Waaba otaakimanya ez’Omujuni zikumare, niimanyisa
embabazi.Nangwa zaaba nizikumara,haine abandi abari kuzetenga kukukiza.

Nyanjura we naazetengyera kimwe ahakuba akashaasho aku yaagizire bwanyima
ya Kositensi okwegaranjura Bweranyangi kushoma Siniya kakaba nikacumita
nk’erya rutaazya. Nyamukazi kikamushaasha, kyamutuntuza yaahika n’okuhwa
aha magufa.

Akaba ayebuuza ati, “Omwana wangye naaremwa ata kuza omu ishomero rirungi.
Reero hakazayo rwaKositensi nirukakyengyere!”

Manya ngu Kahendekye terikwita Mbogo.

 Baitu bo abangana banganira ki?

 Baitu ko akashaasho ni akaki?

 Oyanga ondi amutura ki,
 Twena ka
 tuba abaana ba Nyamuhanga?

 Oyanga ondi ateekyereza ki,
 Twena ka tuba
 obusiisibirizi bwa Nyamuhanga.

 Oyanga ondi ayesiga ki,

 Rufu k’eriyo,ekikara kya Nyamuhanga?

 Oyanga ondi we atuura hi,
 Twena ka
 tuba aha butaka bwa Nyamuhanga?

 Oyanga ondi we aihamu ki,
 Ka
 karitushoroma twena, akaibo ka Nyamuhanga?

 Oyanga ondi we aijuka ki,

 K’aribwerabwera omu maisho ga Nyamuhanga?

Mpaho yaaza omu biteekateeko yaaronda eki araakore ki ti ndahi. Manya yaaza
omu kitongyerero n’ishenkazi-mutima we;

Nyanjura: Mwite ?

Ishenkazi-mutima: Ngaaha, Otariita

Nyanjura: Muteme?

Ishenkazi-mutima: Okwo shi nakwo kan’okwita

Nyanjura: Muroge?

Ishenkazi-mutima: Hoona shi kabagira ngu omurimo mubi n’okuroga.

Nyanjura: Ngure omuntu amukore kubi?

Ishenkazi-mutima: Baitu ofa ki?

Nyanjura: Naija kukira abangye

Ishenkazi-mutima: Tokahuriraga ngu twingane eshangwa aha maarwa?

Nyanjura: Ahari oru neija kushangwa omu ri egi ka.

Mbwenu nyakashaasho ku kaamugiire omu mutwe, kaamureetera nyabiteekateeko.
Ekyarugiremu yaagyenda yaatebeekanisa ebyokurya birungi mbibyo aha mutwe
ngu naaza kutaayaayira omuhara Bweranyangi. Akatebeekanisa omubumba, enyama
hamwe n’obijuma birimu emiyembe, emicungwa n’ebindi.

Mpaho yaabiburiramu ngu naaza kutaayaayira omuhara. Ku yaatandikire naahika
ati aha muryango, amaisho gaahikira aha kipande. Nyakipande kikaba
kitarikwikiriza muntu weena kutaayaayira abeegi oihireho aha mazooba abiri
ag’okutayaayiriraho abaana. Nyakipande ekyabaire kiri omu nyuguta mpango
kikaba nikishomwa kiti;

|G’OKUTAYAAYIRAHO. |

|BAKURU B’EISHOMERO |

Nyamukazi akareeba byamuja omu maraka nikwo kucwamu kureeba omukuumi ngu
amuheyo ekituga.

Akakyekyeba na nyantanda erimu obutwa bw’okwita nyamuhara. Nikwo kuramusya
omukumi obwo manya omutima agutangasi omu ngaro.

Ati, ‘Ssebo nyizire kureeba muhara wangye Kositensi.”

Onu ati, “Torikumanya kushoma nyabo?”

Ori ati, “Nangwa ekipande naakishoma kwonka naaba niinyenda ngu onyambe.”

Onu ati “Tinkahenda biragiro by’eishomero ngu n’okukuyamba.”

Ati, “Niinyija kukuhayo akantu.” Nyamukazi nikwo kukora omu nsaho obwo
arikumwaragura amaisho. Okwo kumwaragura kukareetera omukuumi
yaayerarikiirira nikwo kumubuuza ati, “Hoona buzima Kositensi ni muhara
waawe?”

Onu ati, “N’owangye buzima!” Ku yaamazire kukituuraho yaakora omu kashaho
ke yaihamu omushamata gw’emitwaro ebiri y’Eshiringi za Uganda obwo ziri
obwa rukumi rukumi. Bwona hamwe bukaba buri obwa rukumi makumi abiri

Nyamukuumi waitu bambi ku yaareebire nyamushamata ati, “Naateeba erimu
omwonyo.” Mpaho azaakiira aziteera enshaho.

Ati , “Ba ori aha nyije mukwetere aije akutuure ogu mushenga.”

Ku yaahikire omu kibiina kweta Kositensi ashangamu omwegyesakazi Ketura.
Ketura akaba ari mukuru w’Omuky.Muramuzi. Akaba naayenda kwetegyereza kyona
ekyaba aha Kositensi. Omuky. Muramuzi akaba yaamugambiire byona ebiri
kukwata aha muringo ogu Nyanjura ari kubonaabonesamu Kositensi.

Ketura akagambira omukumi ku atwara nyamukazi omu ofiisi. We akaija mpora
na Kositensi reero yaamureka aheeru. Ku yaataahire omu ofiisi, yaaramusya
nyamugyenyi. Nikwo kutandika kumubuuza ati, “Nibakweta oha Nyabo?”

Onu ati, ‘Niinye Nyanjura kandi ndi nyina wa Kositensi”

Ori ati, “Niiwe kimuzaara weenyini?”

Onu ati, “Buzima niinye!”

Ati, “Shi mbwenu waaba oizire kumureebaho?”

Nyanjura ati, “Naaba nyijire kumushuuraho. Naaba mureeteeire n’ogu
mushenga!”

Ketura ati, “Webare kwonka titurikwikiriza bagyenyi aha bwire obu nk’oku
waakishoma aha kipande aha geeti. Kwonka obu waataahiremu nabyo, bimpeereze
mbibiikye hatagira n’owaabireeba reero ogambe nawe omu bwira nk’ori kuhinya
mukaiba!”

Obwo we Kositensi akaba ari aheeru ya ofiisi ahuriire. Ketura ku
yaamwetsire yaataahamu. Ketura nikwo kumubuuza ati, “Ogu omukazi
noomumanya?”

Kositensi ati, “Eego madaamu”

Ketura ati, “Noomumanya ota?”

Kositensi ati, “Ni muka-tata”

Nyamwegyesa ati, “Ni muka-sho? Mwana we oteehakana nyoko nk’abumba
nindeeba.”

Kositensi atandika kurira ahabw’okumugambira nyina. Aha mutima ati, “Ku
nkubaire mwine nkaamwehakaine?”

Ketura akamubuuza ati, “Noorizibwa ki?”

Aho akongyera yaarira waashusha oti baamushara. Akateekateeka oku yaabaire
amubonaabonesa. Yaagaruka yaateekateeka oku yaabaire amuteera oti naateera
ente. Yaijuka nyakitongyerero eki;

 Nsheenya,

 Ntah’amaizi,

 Ns’oburo,

 Ngoya;

 Beitu kwonka

 Muka-tata

 Ampa akagufa

 Nkanena

 Nti: po, po, po, po

Obu abayo arira manya omushaho abayo akyebera nyabyokurya. Okuza kushanga
ashangamu emibazi mingi erimu sipona n’endiijo ei atarashobooroire gye
nk’oku ori kumanya eby’abashaho boona.

Ku baabaire bari aho baayecura nansi naacuza agumize ati,

 Omuntu n’enki?

 Omukazi kandi we n’enki”

 Obwangane n’obwaki?

 Noofaki mukazi we?

Obu agamba ebi byona Nyanjura we abayo airuka naakwata ogwa geeti. Ku
yaareebire nansi yaayekyengyera, mpaho yaatandika kunyomboroka.Omukuumi
nawe akaba yaatuutukire orurimi, arikumagamaga ahabw’empiiha.

Omushaho akagumizamu yaayamuza ati;

 Mumukwate!

 N’omubisha! N’ekyata!

 N’omwitsi! Ni mubi munonga

 OKUHENDERA OMWAKA GWA KABIRI

Kositensi ku yaabaire naamara Siniya ya kabiri nawe Tukahiirwa akaba
naaamara ekibiina kya mushanju arikweteguurira siniya. Ebigyezo ku
biizire,yaashanga aine obubonero mushanju omuri buna.

Orungyereza………………………..1

Okubara…………………………….3

Nyina owaabaire ari omu kihome Nyamushekyera ahabw’okugyezaho kwita
Kositensi ku yaahuriire aga makuru yaashemererwa munonga aha mutima ati;

Kwonka Ruhanga oba murungi!

Naanye waarugaho waanyijuka

Omutima ogundi guti:

Ebishi okeita waaba ekyata

Waayehemura

Mbwenu ku waakufeera omu kihome eki

Tokaasiga ebyaganuka?

Ku yaarugire omuri egyo mitima yaatandika kweteisa omu mutima ati;

Ruhanga onsaasire

Nkacumura ahari iwe

 hamwe na Kositensi

Nkaba maririire kumwita

Kwonka waamukiza

Waamwiha omu maino ga rufu!

Ku yaabaire naamarayo, eshara egyo, baija kumweta ngu haine abaizire
kumureeba. Kuza kureeba ashanga ari Tukahiirwa. Ku yaamuhikire baatandika
kugaaniira. Ku baaherize obwo nyamuhara owaabaire naayeteguurira kuza
Bweranyangi omu Siniya yaamuheereza ebaruha kuruga owa kositensi. Nyabaruha
ekaba neegamba eti;

Omukundwa muka-tata,

Nooraara ota okwo? Ninshaasha kureeba ori Nyamushekyera aha bwangye.
Tiinyine ky’okukukorera ahakuba ngu amasya gaaba gaakugweire aha nda,
kigumire kugakwihaho. Tinkaacwamu ahabw’okuba omuramuzi emyaka eshatu ei
yaakucwereire naanye ekambeera mingi. Nkaba ntarikubaasa kukuyamba ahakuba
nkaba ntari mu kooti.

Ekikuru nyowe ninkushabira ngu orugyeyo gye. Nkaabaasibwaki nkwecura nka
hati! Ninkukunda munonga kandi ninkusaasira eki wankozire ahabw’okuba nyowe
ku naahikire Bweranyangi naajunwa naaba omurokore.

Ka mpereze aho ndikukwendeza embabazi za Nyamuhanga.

 Niinye Owaawe buzima

 Kositensi Birungi

Nyanjura ku yaashomire egi baruha yaayatika yaarira yaayeteera omu kifuba
ati:

Ndi omusiisi,

Ndi omusiisi Buzima!

Omuri ekyo kihuumuro, Otamugaya akataayaayira Kositensi Birungi. Ku
baabaire bariyo nibagaaniira, amaisho ga Otamugaya gaagwa ahari dayare ya
Kositensi reero yo emikono yaagibakura atiine na rusha kuruga owa nyinayo.
Manya bakaba baagiire omuri rukundo kwonka bakaba baikiriziine kutaza omu
by’okuteerana mpaka bamazire okushoma kwabo.

Otamugaya ku yaakubureire dayare, amaisho ge gaahikira aha kitongyerero
ky’okusiima Ruhanga eki;

Eshi Ruhanga onkunda!

Nikyo wankiriza rufu egi

Okaanyiha omu maino gaayo

Obwo yaayeshamwire kundya

Webare kunkiza muka-tata

 12.11. 1993

Nikwo Otamugaya kumubuuza ekyareeteire yaahandiika ekitongyerero ekyo. Nawe
Kositensi taba mubi atandika kutongyerera:

Mmanya mba ndi aho, Omukuumi ati , ‘ndo ndo ndo!”

Manya obwo naiguza omu kibiina kyaitu

Anshaba omwegyesa w’ediini

Omwegyesa ati, “N’oha ori kumwenda”

Onu ati, “nyina”

Ketura agyenda naanye.

Ahaihi n’omu ofiisi.

Manya ebyokurya babimwihaho

Omushaho ashangamu sipona

N’endiijo mibazi y’obutwa

Ahaihi ni Nyamushekyera

Emyaka bakamucwera eshatu.

N’omukumi bamworeka eirembo

Otamugaya ati, “Buzima! Hoona shi toomanyisa?”

Kositensi ati, “ Ntandikirehi, kwiha obwo nkaba ntaine bwikizo. Bakantaho
abakumi ahu naabaire ntoora baanyine. Okugihandiika nkagihandiikire kwonka
shi okugyohereza?”

Ebyo ku baabiherize Kositensi yaatebeza munywani we oku baataayaayiire
eirwariro rwa Yunivasite ya Mbarara. Ati, “Nkareebera okutangaara
ahabw’okuba byona bikambeera bisya. Ku twamazire kureeba, Omushahokazi
owaabaire naakora ahaby’okushemeza emitima, yaatandika kugamba naitwe.
Kyakahaire ebigambo bye akaba abicwire bugifu aha kapapura. Aza
omushanduukye ye akaihamu

 EY’ENDAARO

Keezia akashangwa agweteiremu. Niimanyisa omuguha ogwa rutanga. Beitu ogu
gwo taragurabize mu maraka baitu akagurabya aha mumiro. Hakaba hahweireho
omwanya gw’ameezi nka ataano arikweyiriza haihi na Beekunda owaabaire
abiiriza aha ibiiziro rya Randa. Beekunda akaba ateera obubaare burungi nka
Kabwondera hamwe n’otundi turikusheneneka gye nk’amaizi g’omugyera gwa
Ncwera.

Ahabw’otwo tweshongoro, abaishiki baingi bakaba beekungaaniiraho na munonga
omu shaaha z’omwebazyo. Ku byagiire kuhika omu nzahi n’omundugahi, ebijuma
by’okwo kutaayaya owa Beekunda byayeyoreka. Manya ngu;

 Babikorera omu mwirima,

 byeyoreka omu mushana

Ondiijo akeeshongora ati;

 Eriisho rya Mukama nirikureeba,

 Hoona ahu ori nirikureeba

 Oshambane niri kureeba,

 Orye emikooto nirikureeba!

Reero ondi ati;

 N’obu oba nooza kwiba,

 Agaakuteireho.

 Ebibi byawe byona,

 Naabimanya gye

Manya na Baibuli neekigamba eti;

 Muheru gw’ekibi n’okufa

Ebi tiinye naabyeshongoire n’obu kwakuba okubihimba. Hariho ogu we
owaakigambire butunu obwo arikweshongora agumize ati;

 Ekibi tikisherekwa,

 Kikorerwa omu mwirima,

 Kwonka kimanywa.

 Kitandika mpora mpora

 n’obunuzi bwingi munonga

 Omuheru gw’ekibi eba Geehena

Manya obu Keezia yaabaire naarya ebitumbwe na Beekunda akaba naamanya ngu
tihaine waamureeba. Kwonka we bambe Kiisho-Kihango akaba naamureeba. Akaba
atarikumanya ngu haine ebizibu biraamurugiremu.

Ku yaamanyire ngu aine enda, kandi ku ishe owaabaire ari omushaija
w’obukare yaakimanyire, yaamanya ngu yaija naamushekyera naamuhingaho
omugusha n’oburo. Manya omwana akakyeshongora ati;

 Kaawiini, Kawiini!

 Ngu Kawiini aine enda.

Ngu nawe Kawini ati;

 Otaanyita tata,

 Nkaza kuroza

 Akahuri kankwata!

Ku yaamazire kwetegyereza akabi akari omu kwihamu enda. Yaamanya ku ishe
hoona nabwo yaakimanyire, yaagyenda yaasherura obutwa bwe yaabwenga atyo
yaakinga akashengye ke. Ku yaamazire kuteera nyakatwa pooshi, gwayegama.

Beitu akaba asigire ebaruha erimu ebi bigambo ebyabaire bihandiikire omu
nyuguta empango.

MUGUMEHO, TURYABUGANIRA OMU IGURU

 KEEZIA NAATUKUNDA

Yaakurata Kapere-ka-Bugongi owaasiibwire omu ndimi zirikuhika itaano,
Orufaransa, Orungyereza, Orushwahiri, Oruganda Hmwe n’Orunyankore obwo
agumize ati;

 Taata, maama, banyaanyazi na beene maawe

 Mwena mwije mureebe

 Kapere naafa!

Abapooriisi bakaija reero Beekunda baakimwigatiramu. Akamarayo ameezi abiri
gonka reero ishe yaamwihayo kandi ab’empiiha zaabo!

Ku yaarugireyo ishe yaamutandikiraho ekibanda kye ky’okubiirizamu kandi eki
ozaire. Manya ngu omwana mubi n’enkwita-hoona;

 Omwana mubi akwita hoona:

 omutetsa, agyenda arengahara,

 okiza kumwinika arondogora

 Omwana mubi akwita hoona:
 Akushobera, oti “kuri
 rwabuzire”;

 Akifa, oti ‘kuri mwine’

 Omwana w’amaryo akwita hoona:
 Omutsyaha, agaija buzima;

 Omureka, gamurenga nk’oruhu.

 Omwana ekifeera akwita hoona:
 Omugorogoza, abura akatsibyo;

 Omureka, obwo aba Birindi.

 EMBANDA-BIRAGIRO

Abandi kubaagiire kwega, Kaagu na Biima baaza omu gw’okuteega eshonzi.
Bakaba bamara eizooba ryona. Mbabo Rutundu. Bareebe Ncwera. Mbabo
Kanyamuhoro. Egyo yoona manya n’emigyera. Kanyamuhoro neetaanisa Kakurira
na Nyakashebeya. Ncwera neetaanisa Kakombe na Kiyagaara reero yo Rutundu
etaanisa Kiyagaara na Nyungu.

Mbwenu okwo mpaho niyo baabaire basiiba. Ku baabaire bainuka, baagyenda omu
mushozi gwa Nkuuna bootsya barya. Ku baabaire bakwatayo nyingi, bazitwara
Kizinda kuziguza. Omu kutega ezo shonzi bakaba bakorerayo ebihagaro byona
ebi orikumanya.

Obwishiki ku bwabaire bubareebera hangahari buti ‘kabunu tuhe otuguru’.
Rimwe hariho akaishiki akubaagwereire karikuruga ah’eiziba, bakakawata ngu
bakakore ekikoro nk’eki omukazi yaakozire mukaiba. Waakimanya.

Ekyatambiire nyakaishiki n’omushaija owaabaire naahingura akakahurira
nikajuga nk’embuzi. Kyakahaire tihaine ahu baabaire baahikire. Mpaho
nyamushaija yaakaiha omu maino g’ebicuncu mbibyo ngu n’abaana.

Ku baahungire, baaza hare na nyamushaija, baatandika kumukweshura
baamugambira ebigambo ebintari kubaasa kuhandiika omuri eki kitabo. Ebyo
reka mbisigire enjoka yangye. Manya bakamugambira bwahwayo. Abaabaire bari
seeri na seenu bakaguma bakwatsire aha minwa.

 Buri omwe omuri Kiyaagaara, Nkuuna, Kyabitara hamwe na Nyakashebeya akaba
naabamanya. Manya ngu omu kwiba enkoko baakaba nibakiza akaca. Owa biso ati
bakaba nibacwa enkoko orwara. Mbwenu iwe enkoko zaaracwirwe ebyara?

Ku baabaire barabaho. Manya bo bakaba bakira kucuruza hamwe n’okuteera
ebifiizi. Bakaba baziiba omu kasheeshe hamwe n’omu rwitabaabo. Reero ebyo
bifiizi obumwe bikaba biba nibibikira bakama b’amatungo hamwe n’abo
abaabaire basiga ebyabo aheeru. Mbwenu abazaire ku baabaire bahurira ebyo
bifiizi, bagambira abaana kureeba enkoko zaaba ziriho. Mpaho ohurira abaana
baatandika;

Emwe! Ibiri! Ishatu!.......................................Maama zoona
ziriho nainga

Emwe! Ibiri!...................................................Maama emwe
teriho

 BAARWESIGA-BUGUMI

Baitu nk’oku bagira ngu ebiro by’omushuma biba makumi ana. Rikasheesha
nk’agandi mazooba. Nyaboojo baimuka baaza aha mirimo yaabo y’obutoosha.
Obwe shi eba eha? Kan’okuteganisa ensi hamwe n’okunyangaaraza abagitwiremu.
Mbwenu omushuma ogundi akora guuha gutari gw’okwiba? Okwo nakwo
tink’okureeba amatama n’omunwa gw’enkoko okabuuza amaino gaayo.

Bishi nkusiibizayo ki? Manya hariho omuntu kwehwaho okashoberwa. Okufa
weeza iwe tikwo abantu twena tutiina? Mbwenu shi weeza omuntu yaaba
atakitiina orufu ogwo noomwetata ota? Weeza imwe rufu ayemanyiizibwa? Shana
oihireho Ishe-Katabaazi owaabyamire omu rubungo bakimubuuza ati kambe
niinyemanyiiza. Manya n’obu baabaire batatiina rufu, obumwe n’obasaasira
kugira ngu bakaba bakiri bato. Emyaka ikumi na munaana weeza abo ni bato
nainga? Nyowe mpurira nibabeeta emango.

Kare hoona shi ku waakahurire ngu enjoka teri kuruma, nikimanyisa ngu
ogitamikye orukumu? Bishi bwe enjoka zitarikuruma noomanya zingahi? Enyingi
kaniiruma muntu we. Bagira ngu Rwesiga-Bugumi akombeka omu irembo
ry’Omukama. Hoona shi we ku aba atatiinire ngabo ze tatiina Omukama?

Mbwenu nyamango zigyenda rimwe. Ahaihi n’omwa Ceyamaani. Oti obumwe baineyo
omushango gw’okutongana. Oti nainga haine ou barikuza kutabaariza orubanja.
Manya buba omu ihangwe. Omushana guri kwaka . Gukaba nigwata embwa oruhara.
Beitu embwa ekaiha nkahi oruhara?

Bakaba baringire Ceyamaani barikumanya ngu naija kuba atariyo. Omuntu akaba
afiire nseeri ya Nkuuna haihi na Nyabubaare omuri Nyabitote. Bakaba
nibamanya ngu abantu baingi baaza kushendekyereza nyakwegyendera.

Ceyamaani akaba aine ebuguma nungi z’embuzi, za warushaaki zo otagamba.
Manya nyaboojo batsibura enshaaki ibiri oti baaba baziriisize. Buri omwe
akwata embuzi emwe n’enkoko emwe. Eryo izooba rikaba riri Orwakana, Kiri
ekikomera kya Rutookye. Mbwenu abashuma nabo bagira ebyabo. Bakamanya ngu
abaraababugane nibaija kumanya ngu n’ezaabo nibazitwara omu kikomera
kwihamu esente z’okugarura abaana omu mashomero.

Kwonka n’oha owaabaire atari kumanya ngu omurimo gwabo n’okwiba? N’oha
owaabaire atari kumaanya ngue sente ezibari kwiha omu bibarikwiba baziteera
matatu? Owaabaire atarikumanya ngu oburagarikira bwa nyasente nibazinywamu
amaarwa reero obundi babureesamu amairungi n’oha? N’encuukye zikaba
nizimanya ngu ni bantabo-zaago. Reka kwebuuza oti amaki? Mbwenu shi ti
amaarwa?

Mbwenu ku baabaire baahika Karama haihi n’ahakwa Beekunda, ogwo ni
Ceyamaani. Beitu kugira ngu akaba ari omu bantu baingi,ba nyarutsigazi
bakaba batamureebire. Ku yaagiire kwetegyereza areeba Kaagu na Biima
beegwire embuzi ye. Oti akakimanya ata? Ngu akaawe nikaguma kari akaawe. Ku
yaareebire ekitsibo ky’omwenda gw’omukazi we ogwabaire gukuzire, yaamanya
ngu egi n’embuzi ye.

Manya ngu omubi ahunga ataine omubingire. Abashuma aba ku baareebire mukama
w’amatungo agu baabaire bajandwire obwo nibagatwara Kizinda omu katare
kwihamu eza Uganda, baaganagaho buri omwe ati kabunu mpa amaguru.
Ekikungamusa kya bantu kiijwire emango z’aboojo, emishebashebe hamwe
n’entunguuta z’abaishiki, abakaikuru abaija nibakura hamwe na ba boote,
abagurusi, abashaija hamwe n’abakazi abaija nibahamya boona bakarigitsa
nyabatsigazi mpaka obu baabateire omu ikumi ry’engaro.

Manya kuza kubahisya ahu Ceyamaani yaabaire ari, bakaba baabanogize.
Ow’omugyere, ow’oruhi, ow’ebikonde. Abakaikuru n’abagurusi bo bakaba bari
omu za tphuuu! Tphuuu, obwo buri omwe naabacwera eibutika. Manya kuza
kuruga omuri orwo rwona, okaba nooshusha oti baabozya omu kyambu
ky’eshagama. Ngu akabwa keiba kaihura omugongo gwako.

Bakakibaigatiramu ekya Nyabubaare aha Gomborora. Ku baamazireyo ameezi
abiri, baabainamura aha kahunga ka Nyamushekyera.

 AMAYANGI ABIRI NA RUKUNDO

 1

Tukahiirwa akaimuka kare kuhuumuruka obwo naaza Bweranyangi. Nooshusha oti
akasiimurwa kaanyonza zimpurira nibeeshongora bagumize bati;

 Kaanyonza egamba omu itumbi,

 Esiimura abaishiki ngu bacunde

Manya nawe akaba naaza kucunda emishomo ye ya siniya. Kositensi, mukuru we
w’ishe atari wa nyina akamuhurira ekiro kyona arikwesibangura aha kitandi.
Akateeraho kugwejegyera byaba ebya kubeiha. Kositensi nikwo kumugira ati,
“Obyame niinyija kukwimutsya nitugyenda hamwe.”

Manya boona bakaba bari amayangi. Ku bwasheeshire, baayetebeekanisa batyo
baatandika orugyendo. Omu muhada, Kositensi yaagyenda naayoreka Tukahiirwa
emyanya ei yaabaire atarikwetegyereza. N’iwe okuba musya omu mwanya
noomanya eki kirikumanyisa.

Eby’okumanyiira Bweranyangi tibiratwariire Tukahiirwa omwanya muraingwa.
Kositensi akamurambuza kandi yaamwanjurira banywani be. Okuruga obwo
banywani ba Kositensi baaba banywani ba Tukahiirwa.

 2

Ku baabaire baherize emyaka ebiri Bweranyangi. Obwo Kositensi arikuza
kumara ekya Kana reero we Tukahiirwa akwitse nibiragara kumara Siniya ya
kabiri, Kositensi yaayecura ebaruha kuruga owa Otamugaya. Manya Ntare na
Bweranyangi bagira omukundano gwete omukago gwabo ogubeeta Bwera-Ntare.
Kikaba kitari ky’okutangaaza kushanga aboojo ba Ntare baine abubaabaire
nibeeta abakazi baabo omu ishomero rya Bweranyangi ery’abaishiki.

Ebaruha egi ekaakiirwa Tukahiirwa yaija nairukanga nk’owaakyo. Ku yaahikire
aha kitanda yaagimworeka obwo arikugikoomoorora. Tukahiirwa ati, “Reka
tugishome hamwe kandi!”

 Ntare school

 MBARARA

 UGANDA.

Omukundwa,

 Kositensi,

Niinyesiga ngu nooraara gye. Nyowe tiinyine muraaro murungi ahabw’okuba
naamara omwanya muhango ntarikuhurizangana naiwe. Ebitabo nibigyenda bita?

Obumwe nteekateeka ngu okabona abandi kunu Ntare nti nainga obumwe waabona
aba Kyapa.

Ekikuru nyowe ninkukunda kandi nk’oku naabaire naakugambiire, nkaakunzire
ngu tukore amaka obwo twaheza emishomo yaitu.

Nkaabaasibwaki mpurira Kagambirizi agumize ati, “Eriizooba Dokita na Rooya
nibaija kugaitwa omu bushwere oburikwera.” Ekikuru oyehare okurya
ebitumbwe. Otaryebwa ebi Omushaho ori kushemeza emitima omu irwariro rya
Yunivasite ya Mbarara yaakugambiire.

Niinyenda ngu omanye ebintu bishatu;

 1. NINKUKUNDA MUNONGA

 2. NINKUKUNDA MUNONGA

 3. NINKUKUNDA MUNONGA

 Reka ngarukire aho nkwendeze emigisha ya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo.
 Nkaabasibwaki ohikiiriza ekirooto kyawe.

 Amiina! Amiina!

 Niinye omukundwa

 Manweri Otamugaya

 Egi ebaruha ekareka nyabaishiki bataine bigambo. Amazima gari ngu
 Kositensi akaba naakunda Otamugaya kandi n’Otamugaya akaba naamukunda.
 Ekaba eri rukundo yeenyini nk’ey’enyonyi n’akati, ekikoona
 n’ekinyoobwa hamwe nk’eya Yesu n’ekanisa

 Omu kihuumuro ekyahwaire Kositensi na Tukahiirwa bakaba bataayayiire
 Otamugaya reero nawe Yowaabu nikwo kubashangayo. Aho niho Yowaabu
 yaayehwereireho akashohoza ekigambo. Nyakigambo kikagyendera kimwe
 nk’omwambi gwa rukundo kyateera omutima gwa Tukahiirwa. Okuruga obwo,
 baatandika kuguma nibabugana omu bwire bw’orwitawaabo. Niimanya ngu
 oriyo nooyebuuza ekibaabaire baba nibakora. Kare kankigambe. Bakaba
 baba nibarya emikooto.

 Ku haabaire hahweireho esaabiiti ibiri ebaruha yaaruga owa Yowaabu,
 erikushoma eti;

 OMUKUNDWA,

 TUKAHIIRWA.

 Nimbanza n’okukuramusya omu iziina rya rukundo yaitu eyaabibirwe obu
 waataayaayira Otamugaya, ekatookyera aha nsi y’omuti gw’omuyembe obu
 wanteera orunyogyero rutaaba naanye nkakwongyera orundi. Manya
 ekagumizamu yaamera obu twabuganira Nyakabiriizi obwo orikuhuumuruka
 nooza omu taamu ya kabiri omu siniya y’okubanza. Manya ori kiraasi!

 Ekikuru naaba niinyenda kukumanyisa ngu ninkumiisinga. Noija ryari
 owaitu Kyamamari? Kanyesigye ngu noija kumpa obwire omu kihuumuro eki.
 Manya nduhire na roogi za Nyakabiriizi ahabw’obwecumi bwazo bubi.
 Niinyenda tuhindureho.

 Naasiibura ntakenzire kusiibura. Ekikuru ninkukunda munonga munonga
 munonga munonga!

 Yowaabu Tumukunde

 Omukundwa waawe

 ETAKAREEBAGA ERIGATSA EMPANGO

Hakaba hahweireho omwanya gw’ameezi abiri, Kaagu na Biima babarekwire
kuruga Nyamushekyera. Manya bakaba bateireyo emyaka eshatu. Otamugaya akaba
yaamazire siniya ya mukaaga kandi manya yaatandikire omwaka gw’okubanza
ahari Makerere. Munywani we Kositensi nawe akaba yaatandikire okushoma
eby’okushemeza ah’eirwariro erya Mulago. Ebirooto byabo bikaba biri haihi
kuhikiirira.

Nyanjura akaba yaarugire ahari Kositensi. Obumwe nteekateeka nti akaba
aikiriize ngu ou Ruhanga asheenyeire tashambiirira. Manya ngu Ruhanga
kwaheereza omugisha tayongyeraho mukyeno. Abandi ngu omugisha gwa Ruhanga
nigutungisa. Ruhanga akaba abingiire hare abazigu ba Kositensi na munonga
obu yaabaire naayenda kumusharisiza tiketi y’okuza owa Nyamuteza ahu abaayo
bagyenda ekisiga-nyima. Manya omushaho akakihamya ngu Kositensi ku yaareire
ebyo byokurya biri kaata, akaba naafa akurata nyina owaitsirwe omutima.

Beitu nkusiibiizeyo ki? Twine ku yaamazire Siniya ya kana, yaaza Ruyonza
reero omu bwire bw’emyaka ebiri akaba yaabaire omwegyesa aha ishomero rya
Karama.

Tukahiirwa ku yaabaire yaahika omu siniya ya kataano, yaatwara enda
y’endaaro. Gaabuga, gaaruga oku, gaakanga kuriya. Obwo baitu eba ey’oha?
Niiwe noomumanya. Kare mbwenu reka mukugambire obundi yaakweba. Ni
Tumukunde Yowaabu omwojo wa Kyamamari. Nyamwojo akaba nawe agiire Makerere
kwega eby’obushuubuzi.

Kashaija ku yaagahureire, nikwo kugitemba. Niimanyisa baasi. Ahaihi ni
Makerere eya Kampala. Yowaabu akaba naaruga omu kibiina shaaha nka mwenda
z’eihangwe. Akaba ayorekyereire ogwa Kasubi ei yaabaire naaraara. Omu
biyaabaire naateekateeka, pooriisi ekaba etarimu. Ekihome kikaba kitarimu.

Nyakutweka muhara w’abandi akaba ariyo naashuma ahari kaageeti akakye
arikuza kucwekanisa oruguuto rwa Aporo Kagwa, pooriisi nikwo kumuzandura.
Mpaho emuta omu ikumi ry’engaro. Okucondooza kukorwa reero nyamwojo wa
Kyamamari bamuta aha rimanda obwo arinzire eki omuramuzi araamucwere.

 EIZOOBA RY’OMUSHANGO. EGI NI RUKONDO NAINGA?

Omushango gukacwibwa kandi Yowaabu bambi gwamusinga. Baitu guba guuha,
kan’ogw’okutoroboza. Tukahiirwa obu atwara egyo nda akaba aine emyaka 17.
Omuramuzi akacwera Yowaabu emyaka mushanju kandi yaakomerwa Luzira.

Nyamwishiki ku yaahikire omuka yaahurira yaayetamwa. Akatuntura munonga
kandi ekyarugiremu, yaimuka ekiro yaayenaga omu ga Ncwera reero kubwabaire
nibuyangayanga abahinguzi abaabaire nibaza omu kikomera kya Rutookye
baareeba omutumbi gwe nikwo kumanyisa pooriisi ya Rutookye.

Mbwenu omu mazima Kashaija akaba ahendekiire ki?

 MUHERU

Ku byagiire kuza omu ndugahi n’omunzahi. Buri omwe yaagira muheru ye kandi
omu muringo gumwe. Ebirooto bya bamwe bikahikiirira kandi eby’abandi
byaguma biri ebirooto nk’ebirooto byona ebi ohurira.

Ijuka nyak’eshongoro

 Oryakoraki iwe? Oryakoraki iwe?

 Oryakoraki iwe ku oriheza emishomo?

 Ndyaba dookita, ndyaba dokita

 ndyada dokita kundiheza emishomo

 Ndyaba tiicha, Ndyaba tiicha

 Ndyaba tiicha kundiheza emishomo

 Ndyab’omushuubuzi, ndyab’omushuubuzi

 Ndyab’omushuubuzi kundiheza okushoma.

Abamwe kakabakorera, kandi abandi baarugiramu aho nka besitimaani. Mpaho
abazaire baabo baacundira Kamena!

Ebya Kamena byaba bitandeetsire. Kositensi na Otamugaya ku baamazire
emishomo yaabo Makerere baajwara za diiguri. Kositensi akatunga omurimo
yaatandika kukorera omu irwariro rya Mbarara. Otamugaya nawe akatandika
ey’ebiragiro. Ku haagiire kuhwaho emyaka etaano manya obwo rukundo yaabo
ekaba neekura.

Mpaho baatandika kuteekateeka n’okubeekanisa eby’okukora amaka. Bakabanza
baayombeka enju Kyabitara omu ba Otamugaya. Otamugaya akatandika eduuka
y’ebyoma omu tauni ya Ishaka obwo arikukora n’ogwe gw’ebiragiro. Ogu murimo
akaba agukora n’amazima

Manya nyamayanji, oti gaahi? Ti Otamugaya na Kositensi, bakaba
batakaryahoga mikooto byete ebitumbwe. Buri omwe akaba ategyereize mugyenzi
we.

Aha bugyenyi bwabo bw’okugaitwa abandi boona abu baashomire nabo bakaba
bariho. Bamwe bakaba bari abeegyesa, abashuubuzi, abanansi, abahingi hamwe
n’abariisa. Beekunda akaba aine Kaagu na Biima ahari obwo bugyenyi. Manya
Beekunda nawe ishe akamugorogoza yaamurema nikwo kumurugaho. Ibiiziro
akariguza yaazinywa ,yaaba ntabo-yaago, yaagahuuta okukiza aha rushekye
hamwe na tishengyera. Nyaboojo abo nabo bakaba beetsirwe aha mukoro kandi
bakaija kureeba ebirooto bya Kositensi na Otamugaya oku byabaire
bihikiriire. Ebyabo eky’obusaasi bikaba bitahikiriire ahabw’enshobi zaabo
ezi baayangire kuhuguukamu.

Aha muheru gw’okugaitwa obwo buri omwe arikuhamiza buri omwe ku
‘arikwikiriza’ kutuura n’ondi okuhisya aha bwire bw’okufa, omubuurizi wa
Kihungye akatayo ekyeshongoro reero omukoro gwahwa n’eshara. Mbabo baaba
