LOG

 REPUBLIC OF UGANDA

 OFIISI YA MUKURU W'EIHANGA
 (OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT)

 EKITONGORE KY'EBY'EMICWE N'OBUNTU-BUZIMA
 (DIRECTORATE OF ETHICS AND INTEGRITY)

 EBIRAGIRO EBIRIKUKWATA AHA BURI BW'ENGUZI EBYANGUHI KWETEGYEREZA

 KWOMBEKA OBUSYA

 CAPTION

 EMICWE N'OBUNTU-BUZIMA

 Eiteeka ry'Okurwanisa Enguzi, erya 2009
 Eiteeka ryaba Rwata-bihama, erya 2010

 Eiteeka ry'okumanyisibwa amakuru, erya 2005

EBIRIMU

Okumurika

Ebiragiro by'okurwanisa oburi bw'enguzi ebyanguhi/ebyorobi kwetegyereza
Eiteeka ry'Enguzi, erya 2009

Eiteeka eririkurinda/eririkukuuma Baarwata-bihama, erya 2010
Eiteeka eririkukwata aha kutunga amakuru/okumanyisibwa, erya 2005

Okumurika

Ekitongore ekirikukurira eby'emicwe n'obuntu-buzima nikyesiima kureeba ngu
nikihereza abantu boona ebiragiro ebyanguhi kwetegyereza. Ebiragiro omu nsi
yoona nibihandiikwa omu rurimi rw'ekinyamateeka, oru abamwe barikushanga
oburemeezi kwetegyereza. Ebiragiro by'okurwanisa enguzi nabyo
tibirikutaana aha bindi. Enshonga egi, niyo ehaririize ekitongore
ky'eby'Emicwe n'Obuntu-buzima kworobya ebiragiro ebi.
Amateeka aga aganguhi kwetegyereza tigaihireho biragiro by'okurwanisa
enguzi, kwihaho kukozesebwa nk'akakoryo k'okureeba ngu ebiragiro
byayetegyerezeba abantu boona. N'ekyobusaasi kwikiriza ngu omuze gw'oburi
bw'enguzi gushensheire buri kacweka k'amagara gaitu g'obutoosha. Oburi
bw'enguzi bubaire omuze ogurikutamba eikono entunguuka kandi bukiri
'omuzigu' aha busingye n'obutungi.
Enguzi neehinya obushoborozi bwaitu bw'okurwanisa obworo, egarura
entunguuka ahansi, eshiisha emicwe y'entuura, kandi etamba eikono
obutegyeki bw'oburingaaniza hamwe n'obutegyeki burungi. Nahabwekyo, buri
kintu kyona ekyakuhwera omu kurwanisa hamwe n'okwihaho enguzi nikiba kiri
kikuru munonga. Nitwetenga emiringo mingi y'okurwanisamu enguzi, haza
okworobya ebiragiro by'okurwanisa enguzi nigumwe ahari egyo miringo ei
eihanga ritaireho kurwanisa obushomankuzi. Nitwesiga ngu ebiragiro
ebyanguhi ebi nibiza kuhwera abanyaUganda, kumanya obugabe bwabo,
ebibashemereire kukora hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa obu Engyenderwaho y'eihanga
erikubaha kurwanisa oburi bw'enguzi namunonga aha kuhayo/kuripootinga
omuze. Kucwa kurungi emishango y'enguzi nikibaho enguzi yaaba ehababirwe.
Nitumanya ngu okumanya ebiragiro nikiza kwongyera aha kutunguura emicwe,
obuntu-buzima hamwe n'entegyeka nungi omu Uganda.

 Omu muringo gw'omutaano, Abarikukurira ekitongore eki nibasiima obuhwezi
bw'ab'A kakiiko akarikugaita abanyamateeka aka Inter-Agency Forum Legal
Task Force beebembeirwe abarikukora aha nshonga z'ebiragiro omu kitongore
ky'Eby'emicwe n'obuntu-buzima ahabw'okuhandiika n'okworobyamu ebiragiro
ebi.
AHABWA RUHANGA N'EIHANGA RYANGYE.

Rev. Fr. Simon Lokodo (MP)
Minisita wEby'Emicwe n'Obuntu-buzima
Ofiisi ya Purezidenti

EBIRAGIRO BY'OKURWANISA ENGUZI EBYANGUHI KWETEGYEREZA
Ekitongore ky'Emicwe n'Obuntu-buzima nikyesiima kureeba ngu nikiha abantu
boona ebiragiro by'okurwanisa enguzi ebyanguhi kwetegyereza.
Ebiragiro omu nsi yoona nibihandiikwa omu rurimi rw'ekinyamateeka oru
abamwe barikushanga oburemeezi kwetegyereza. Ebiragiro by'oburi bw'enguzi
nabyo tibirikutaana aha bindi. Enshonga egi, niyo ehaririize ekitongore
ky'eby'Emicwe n'Obuntu- buzima kworobya ebiragiro ebi.

Enguzi neehinya obushoborozi bwaitu bw'okurwanisa obworo, eteganisa
entunguuka, eshiisha emicwe y'entuura, kandi etamba eikono demokuraase
hamwe n'obutegyeki burungi. Nahabwekyo, buri kintu kyona ekyakuhwera omu
kutangira hamwe n'okwihaho enguzi nikiba kiri kikuru munonga.

Ebiragiro by'okurwanisa enguzi nigumwe aha miringo ei Gavumenti etaireho
kurwanisa enguzi. Twine amasiko ngu ebiragiro ebyanguhi ebi, nibiza kuhwera
abanyaUganda, kumanya obugabe bwabo, ebibashemereire kukorwa hamwe
n'obujunaanizibwa obu Konsitityushoni erikubaha kurwanisa enguzi namunonga
aha kuhayo/kuripootinga omuze. Kucwa kurungi emishango y'oburi bw'enguzi
nikibaho enguzi yaaba ehababirwe. Nitumanya ngu okumanya ebiragiro nikiza
kwongyera aha kutunguura emicwe, obuntu- buzima hamwe n'entegyeka nungi omu
Uganda.
Eiteeka ry'Okurwanisa Enguzi erya, 2009
EITEEKA RY'OKURWANISA ENGUZI, ERYA 2009
Ekicweka 1
1.0 Okwanjura
Eiteeka eri n'ekikwato ekirikukozesebwa kurwanisa enguzi omu bakozi ba
gavumenti hamwe n'abarikwekozesa. Eiteeka ry'okurwanisa enguzi erya 2009
niritaho emishango etari emwe n'emwe ey'oburi bw'enguzi. Eiteeka
ry'okurwanisa enguzi erya 2009 rikaihaho Eiteeka ery'okutangira enguzi erya
(1970) eririmu ebituri ebitarikubaasa kuriikiriza kukora gye aha kurwanisa
enguzi. Ebiragiro ebisya ebi, bitwariiremu ebiragiro byona ebirikukwata aha
buri bw'enguzi kandi bigaruka biha enshoboorora y'oburi bw'enguzi engaziho.
Eiteeka eri ritwairemu n'emishango emisya. Eiteeka niryongyera rikora
ebifubiro ebirikureetera enguzi yaatiinwa.

Ebimwe omu iteeka ry'enguzi erya 2009 bihindwirwe, kandi ebicweka ebindi
byayongyerwamu birikuruga omu iteeka ry'enguzi (erihindwirwemu), erya 2015.
Byona ebihindwirwe n'eby'ongyeirwemu bitairwe omu Iteeka eri eryorobi
kwetegyereza.
1.1 Ebirikukwata aha nguzi

Enguzi n'enki?

Eiteeka ry'Okurwanisa Enguzi niriha amateeka n'ebikorwa ebyakubaasa
kwinganisa enguzi omu miringo egi ahaifo:

Omuntu naakora omushango g'woburi bw'enguzi yaakora ebi ahaifo:
 (a) Omukozi wa gavumenti yaashaba, nainga akaikiriza sente nari obuhereza
nainga ekindi kintu kyona ekirikumugasira we nk'omuntu; omurwatu, nainga
bwesherekye nari arikurabira omu muntu ondiijo, obwo arikuhingaana
obuhereza bwe obu aine kuba naaha abantu, nainga akabura kukora emirimo ye
nk'oku ashemereire kugikora.

 CAPTION

 (b) Omuntu ku yaakuha omukozi wa gavumenti sente, nainga ekintu kyona
 ekirikumugasira we nk'omuntu, omu rwatu nainga bwesherekye nari akarabira
 omu ndiijo muntu nainga ekitongore; obwo arikuhingaana obuheereza nainga
 kuremwa kukora emirimo ye nk'oku ashemereire kugikora.

c) Omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakukozesa obushoborozi bwe nainga omurimo gwe
kukozesa ekintu kya gavumenti omu muringo ogu kitashemereire kuba nikikora
obwo ekigyendererwa kiri ekyokugasira.

 (d) Kuheereza, kuragaanisa, nainga kwikiriza omu rwatu, bwesherekye nainga
kurabira omu muntu ondiijo, ekintu kyona aha bwe nk'omuntu, ngu akore
nainga atakora emirimo ei ashemereire kukora.

e) Omuntu ku yaakuha nari akaikiriza nainga nabwo akaragaanisa omuntu weena
oine obushoboorozi bw'okushariraho ondiijo muntu orikukora omurimo omu
ofiisi ya gavumenti nainga ey'omuntu buntu, ngu agire eki yaamushariraho
ekirikugasha we nk'omuntu, obwo arikukikora omu rwatu nainga bwesherekye.

f) Omuntu ku yaakukozesa kubi nainga akashereka ekintu kyona ekirugire omu
kukora ebyagambwaho aharuguru.

g) Omuntu ku yaakwejumbira nainga akagyezaho kwejumbira omu bikorwa
ebyagambwaho aharuguru.

h) Omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakukora nainga akanga kukora emirimo ye
ahabwokwenda kweyendeza ebye nk'omuntu nari kwendeza ondiijo.
i) Obutafa aha murimo - omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakuremwa kukora emirimo
ye nk'oku mukama we arikwenda, nk'okwosha aha murimo ataine rusa, nainga
kuza aha murimo kikyererezi.

 CAPTION

1.2 Enkoragana y'abajwekyerwa omu kurya enguzi

Omujwekyerwa niwe muntu orikukorera ondiijo kandi ari omu miringo nka,
omubiiki, omureeberezi, omukozi nainga omupatani hamwe n'ogwo orikukorera
gavumenti nari omu kitongore.

a) Omujwekyerwa ku yaakwikiriza nainga akatunga, nainga nabwo akaikiriza
nainga akagyezaho kutunga ekintu kyona nainga enguzi kuruga aha muntu weena
ahabwokwegasira reero akamukorera nainga akabura kumukorera eki ashemereire
kuba naakora nainga atarikukora ahabikwatiraine n'emirimo ya mukama we.

(b) Omuntu ku yaakuha nainga yaikiriza kuha nainga yaahwera omujwekyerwa
weena kuha ekituga nainga akasiimo k'okukora nainga kutakora aha
bikwatiraine n'emirimo ya mukama we.

(c) Omuntu ku yaakuha omujwekyerwa risiiti zitahikire nainga omujwekyerwa
kukozesa risiiti nainga ekihandiiko kitahikire n'ekigyendererwa ky'okubaiha
mukama we.

(d) Omujwekyerwa ku yaakuha nainga akaikiriza kuha amagoba g'omuringo
gwona, omuntu weena nk'ekituga nainga ekiconco ahabw'okukora nainga
obutakora ekikorwa kyona ekiine akakwate n'emirimo nainga emirimo ya mukama
we.

e) Omuntu ku yaakwikiriza nainga akatunga amagoba kuruga aha mujwekyerwa
nk'ekituga nainga ekiconco ekye nk'omuntu ahabwe, nainga ahabwa bandi
bantu, ahabw'okukora nainga kutakora akintu kyona ekiine akakwate n'emirimo
nainga bizineesi ya mukama we.

EKICWEKA KYA II

2.0 Emishango hamwe n'ebifubiro byayo omu Eiteeka ry'okurwanisa enguzi.

2.1 Emishango erikukwata aha ndagaano z'okukora amirimo

Omu Iteeka eri, endagaano nikimanyisa kwikirizana kurikukorwa embaju ibiri
(nk'okwikirizana ahagati y'ekitongore hamwe n'omushuubuzi nainga za
biizineesi ibiri). Niguba omushango omu Iteeka eri omuntu kuha nainga
kwikiriza sente nainga akakozesa obushoborozi bwe ahari ogwo oshemereire
kutunga endagaano/omurimo.

2.2 Kutunga tenda omu muringo gw'enguzi

Omuntu naakora omushango ogu yaakora ebyagambwaho ahaifo:

 i) Omuntu arikwenda kutunga konturakita/endagaano kuruga omu kitongore
 kya gaavumenti ku yaakugira eki yaaha omuntu ondiijo ohaireyo
 okushaba kwe kutunga konturakita/endagaano ngu we aiheyo tenda ye.

 ii) Omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakuhayo amakuru agarikukwata ahari tenda
 z'ekitongore kya gavumenti, akagaha ondiijo muntu omukwenda kuremesa
 ondiijo owaakuba nayenda kutwara tenda egyo.

 iii) Omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakwikiriza ebiconco ngu aiheyo okushaba
 tenda.

 iv) Tenda neebaasa kuba eri eyokuha omuntu omurimo nainga kuguza ebintu
 nari kuha obuheereza omu kitongore kya gavumenti nainga aha
 disiturikiti.

Ekifubiro

Omuntu araasingwe omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kuhisya aha myaka
ikumi nainga ahe omutango gurikwingana shiringi 4,800,000/= nainga byombi.

2.3 Kwikiriza nainga kuha ebituga

Eki nikibaho obu abakozi ba gavumenti nainga abo abarikwekozesa, kuha
nainga kwikiriza kukozesa obushoborozi/entebe zaabo, kuha omuntu
amagoba/ebituga ebi bataine kuba nibatunga.

Omushango ogu gurimu:

 1. Kuha ekihembo/ekiconco ekyakushemeza omukozi wa gavumenti ngu akuhe
 tenda.

 2. Kushaba hamwe n'okwikiriza ekiconco kyona.

4. Kutugira omukozi wa gavumenti/Omukozi wa gavumenti kutugisa

Okutugisa nikyo kikorwa ky'okuhayo nainga kwikiriza sente nari ekintu
ekindi nainga shi obuheereza, kwenda kubaihabaiha omuntu omu rwatu nainga
bwesherekye nainga orikurabira omu ndiijo muntu ngu agire eki yaakora.
Omuntu naakora omushango gw'okuha nainga kwikiriza ekituga omu rwatu,
bwesherekye, nainga arikurabira omu muntu ondiijo, ku yaakuha nainga
akaikiriza amagoba nainga ebituga omukozi w'ekitongore kya gavumenti ngu
amukorere ebi ahaifo:

 i) ateere nari abure kuteera akaruuru omu rukiiko rwona rw'ekitongore
 arikwanga enshonga yoona y'ekitongore kya gavumenti ekyo;

 ii) akore nainga ayange kukora emirimo ye kurugiirira aha ki ashemereire
 kukora;

 iii) Kuhwera omu kutunga nainga kuzibira kurabyaho ekiteiso kyona nainga
 kuha omurimo gwona nainga amagoba nari okushoshorera omuntu weena.

 iv) Omukozi w'ekitongore kya gavumenti ku yaakwikiriza amagoba nainga
 ekituga kyona we ahabwe nainga ahabw'omuntu ondiijo nk'okubaihabeihwa
 kukora nainga kwanga kukora ebikorwa ebyagambwaho aharuguru.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu araasingwe omushango ogu, naija kuza omu kihome kuhisya aha myaka
ikumi nainga kuha omutango gurikwingana shiringi 4,800,000/= nainga byombi.

2.5 Kukozesa ebintu bya gavumenti ahabwawe

CASHIER CLAIMS OFFICER
Omukwasi wa Sente Arikukora
 aha nshashura

 CAPTION

Oku nikwo omuntu arikubaasa kukozesa sente za gavumenti eki zitashemereire
kukora nari ahabw'okumugasira we nk'omuntu. Ekyokureeberaho, omukozi wa
gavumenti ku yaakukozesa sente ezishemereire kuba nizombeka eishomero
akaziguramu emotoka ye ya ofiisi.
Ekifubiro
Omuntu araasingwe omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kuhisya aha myaka
ikumi nainga ahe omutango gurikwingana shiringi 4,800,000/= nainga byombi.

2.6 Okubunzya obushoboorozi kubi

Eki nikimanyisa omuntu kukora nainga kubura kukora ekintu arikugyendera aha
biragiro nari enteekateeka eriho, obwo kirikuruga omu bushoborozi
butahikire obu arikukozesa kwerondera ebye ahabwe nainga ebyomuntu ondiijo.
Ekifubiro

Omuntu araasingwe omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kuhisya aha myaka
ikumi nainga ahe omutango gurikwingana shiringi 4,800,000/= nainga byombi.

 CAPTION

2.7 Omuhondano gw'akakwate k'obuzaare omu mirimo

Eki nikibaho ahu omukozi wa gavumenti ari omu nshonga ezi ainemu akakwate
we nk'omuntu kandi atarikubaasa kugigamba. Akakwate k'omuntu nikimanyisa
omukazi/omwami, omwana, ou orikureeberera, omujwekyerwa, omukozi mugyenzi
waawe omumirimo, kandi omuntu yaaba naakimanya nainga yaakimanyire omu
muringo gwona. Omushango ogu gurimu:

 i) Omukozi, omu kukora emirimo ye, ku yaakuza omu nshonga ei we/ekaye
 einemu akakwate.

 ii) Aine omwanya/obushoborozi bw'okubaasa kuhindura ekintu rwatu nainga
 bwesherekye kandi abure kwatura obushoborozi obwo.

 iii) Kwetaba omu nkiiko z'ekyo kitongore eki oinemu akakwate aha enshonga
 zirikukwataho.

 • Ekifubiro
Omuntu araasingwe omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kuhisya aha myaka
ikumi nainga ahe omutango gurikwingana shiringi 4,800,000/= nainga byombi.

2.8 Okushoshora
Omushango ogu nigukorwa obu omuntu arikukozesa ofiisi ye kuhiira omuntu
weena obwo arikugyenderera ahu ogwo muntu arikuruga, enyikiriza ye,
oruganda rwe, nainga enyikiriza ye yaaba ari omu kristo nari omusiraamu,
omukurisitaayo nari omukaturiki, n'ebindi.

Ekifubiro

Omuntu araasingwe omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kuhisya aha myaka
ikumi nainga ahe omutango gurikwingana shiringi 4,800,000/= nainga byombi.

2.9 Okushoshorera abanyabuzaare
Omushango gw'okushoshorera abanyabuzaare nigukorwa omuntu yaakozesa
obushoboorozi bwe nainga ofiisi ye kurabyaho omuntu weena ou aine nawe
obuzaare. Ekyokureeberaho, omuntu kuha omurimo abanyabuzaare be nk'omukazi
we, omutabani, omuhara, ishento, ishenkazi nainga nyinento, omwihwa
n'abandi.

Ekifubiro

Omuntu araasingwe omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kuhisya aha myaka
ikumi nainga ahe omutango gurikwingana shiringi 4,800,000/= nainga byombi.

 CAPTION

2.10 Okurahira okutarikwikirizibwa mu mateeka
Omushango ogu nikorwa omuntu yaarahiza nainga yaayebembera endahiro
zitarikwikirizibwa omu biragiro.
Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena oraakwatirwe omu mushango ogu, naija kutwarwa omu kihome
kumara obwire butarikurenga myaka ebiri nainga kushashura omutango
gutarikurenga shiringi 960,000 nainga byombi.

2.11 Kweha obushoborozi /Kuba Nyamweha

Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu kwekora omukozi wa gavumenti, eki atari,
haza akaba omugyenyi omukuru aha mikoro. Ekyokureeberaho, omuntu ku
yaakwekora omuramuzi akaramura ondiijo nk'omuramuzi.

Ekifubiro

Omuntu weena araasingwe omushango ogu, naija kutwarwa omu kihome kuhisya
aha myaka ishatu nainga agyemwe kushashura omutango gwa shiringi
1,440,000/= nainga byombi.

2.12 Kweyeta omukozi wa gavumenti
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu arikweyeta eki atari, akaba nk'omukozi wa
gavumenti kandi akakora emirimo omu kitiinisa ekyo.
Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena orikushangwa akozire omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome
kuhisya emyaka eshatu nainga ashashure omutango ogutarikurenga shiringi za
Uganda 1,440,000 nainga byombi.

2.13 Kutiinatiinisa omukozi wa gavumenti

Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu yaatiinatiinisa omukozi wa gavumenti kwenda
ngu aikirize nainga ayange kukora emirimo ye.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena orikushangwa akozire omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome
kuhisya emyaka eshatu nainga ashashure omutango ogutarikurenga shiringi za
Uganda 1,440,000 nainga byombi.

 2.14 Obushomankuzi
Omushango ogu nigujunaanwa omukozi wa gavumenti nainga buri mukozi weena ku
yaakukozesa ofiisi ye kwiba sente nainga ebintu bya mukama we.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu oraakwatirwe omushango ogu naija kutwarwa omu kihome amaremu emyaka
ikumi n'ena nainga ashashure omutango/ekicwero kya shiringi 6,720,000
nainga byombi.

2.15 Kufeerereza sente
Omushango ogu nigujunaanwa omuntu ku yaakukora nainga akanga kukora ekintu
eki arikumanya ngu nikiija kufeereza gavumenti, banka, nainga ekitongore
kyona ekirikuhora sente nainga kampuni ezindi.
Ekifubiro
Omuntu oraasingwe omushango ogu naija kukomwa kuhisya emyaka ikumi n'ena
nainga ahe omutango gwa 6,720,000 nainga byombi.

 2.16 Kubuzaho ebintu eby'obiikiibwe
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu orikuba aine ekintu ky'ondiijo muntu, abantu
nainga ekitongore, kukishiisha nkana obwo agyendereire kwiba nainga
kukozesa ekyo kintu omu muringo gutarikwikirizibwa.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu arikujunaanwa omushango ogu naija kutwarwa omu kihome kumara emyaka
mushanju nainga ashashure shiringi 3,200,000 nainga byombi.

2.17 Entwaza y'ebintu ebirikuteekateekwa kuba ebiibirwe
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu yaagura nainga yaaguza ekintu eki arikumanya
ngu n'oky'obushuma nainga obunyagi nari kitungirwe omu muhanda gutahikire.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena orikushangwa akozire omushango ogu naija kutwarwa omu kihome
kumara emyaka mushanju nainga ahe omutango gwa shiringi za Uganda 3,200,000
nainga byombi.
2.18 Omukozi wa gavumenti kuha embaririra erikuhabya
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu okwasiibwe ebintu nainga sente za gavumenti,
kuhayo embariirira erikuhabya aha bintu ebyo nainga sente ezo kandi
akigyendereire.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena orikushangwa akozire omushango ogu naija kutwarwa omu kihome
kumara emyaka eshatu nainga agyemeserezebwe kuha omutango gwa shiringi za
Uganda 3,200,000 nari byombi.

2.19 Embariirira y'obugobya
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuhandiiki nari omukozi, arikugyenderera kwiba, ku
yaakubuzaho bwino, kugingirira ekitabo kyona, ekihandiiko, ekintu
ky'omuhendo nari akaunti ya banka ya mukama we. Ekikorwa ky'obugobya
ekitarimu mazima nainga oburingaaniza nikiba nikigyenderera okubuzaabuza
omukozesa.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena orikujunaanwa omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kumara
emyaka mushanju nainga agyemeserezebwe kuha omutango gurikuhika shiringi
3,360,000 nainga byombi.

2.20 Abakozi ba gavumenti kushaba ebintu ebitari byo
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omukozi wa gavumenti yaahayo embariirira egwire
akigyendereire erikukwata aha sente nainga ebintu.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena orikushangwa akozire omushango ogu naija kutwarwa omu kihome
kumara emyaka eshatu nainga agyemeserezebwe kuha omutango gwa shiringi za
Uganda 1,440,000 nari byombi.

2.21 Abakozi ba gavumenti kuha ebaruha zigwire
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu ogwo aikiriziibwe ebiragiro kuha ebaruha,
enshonga erikukwata aha bugabe bw'abantu, ku yaakuha ebaruha egwire kandi
arikukimanya.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena orikushangwa akozire omushango ogu naija kutwarwa omu kihome
kumara emyaka eshatu nainga agyemeserezebwe kuha omutango gwa shiringi za
Uganda 1,440,000 nari byombi.

EKICWEKA KYA III
3.1 Okuriha

Omuntu arashangwe asingirwe omushango ogw'okuta ebintu bya gavumenti ahu
bitashemereire kuba biri naija kugyemwa kurihirira abo abu yaafeerereize,
kwongyerera aha kifubiro eki aine kuba naaheebwa.

3.2 Obujurizi burikworeka ngu sente nainga ebintu tibibaririirwe gye
Omuntu owaakwatirwa omu mushango, ku yaakushangwa aine sente nainga ebintu
ebitarikwingana n'ebyo ebiringaniire n'entaasya ye, kandi ebi atarikubaasa
kuha embariirira yaabyo, nibibaasa kutwarwa kooti nk'obujurizi burikworeka
ngu esente nainga ebintu ebyo bikatungwa omu muringo gutahikire.

3.3. Okwegaigahaza omu muringo gurikuhenda ebiragiro
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu orikushangwa aine sente nainga ebintu ebi
atungire omu buryo butahikire ebi atarikubaasa kushoboorora gye ahu
birugire kurugiirira aha ntasya ye erikumanywa.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu oraasingwe omushango ogu naija kutwarwa omu kihome kumara emyaka
ikumi nainga agemwe kuha omuntango gwa shiringi 4,800,000 nainga byombi.

3.4 Kooti kuzibira kuguza ebintu nainga kukwatirayo/kwemereza akaunti za
banka za kihababirwa
Omuhababi wa Gavumenti omukuru nainga Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti ku
yaakuhayo okushaba kwe, kooti neebaasa kuragiira kuzibira akaunti ya banka
yoona y'ogwo ahababiirwe nainga ogwo weena aine omushango. Eki
nikigyendererwa kureeba ngu esente eziri aha akaunti zaagumano zihwere omu
kurihiirira kifeerwa omu mushango ogwo.

3.5 Okuriha kuruga aha bintu by'owasingwa omushango
 (1) Kyasharwaho kooti ngu omuntu akafeerwa ebintu ahabw'omushango
ogwasinga kihababirwa, kooti neebaasa kuragiira ngu omuhendo gwona oguri
aha akaunti nainga ekintu kyona ky'owaasingwa omushango, ekyatungirwe omu
mushango kiguzibwe, reero eziraarugemu zikozesebwe kurihiirira ogwo
owaafeereirwe ahabw'omushango ogwo.
 (2) Omuntu afeereirwe ahabw'omushango yaamara kurihiirirwa, omuhendo
gwona oguraasigareho niguza kuheebwa kisingwa.
 (3) Ekintu kyona 'ekiraahindure emikono' kitakuratiire ekiragiro kya
kooti ekirikuzibira kuguza, ekirikwetwa restriction order nikwija kuba
busha.
 (4) Omuntu weena oraatangye/oraaze omu muhanda gw'enkora y'ekiragiro kya
kooti ekirikuzibira naaba yaakora omushango, kandi naija kufubirwa n'okuza
omu kihome kumara emyaka etaano nainga ahe omuntango gwa 3,000,000 nainga
byombi.
EKICWEKA IV
4.0 Obushoboorozi bwa Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti hamwe n'Omuhababi wa
Gavumenti
Eiteeka ry'okurwanisa enguzi niriha Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti hamwe
n'Omuhababi wa Gavumenti obushoborozi obu ahaifo:

4.1 Okucondooza
Kariiso-riiso wa gavumenti, Omuhababi wa gavumenti nainga ondiijo mukozi
oikiriziibwe, baine obushoborozi bw'okuzoora amazima aha makuru nainga
emishango ehababirwe eyegamiire oburi bw'enguzi.

4.2 Kushwijuma
Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti hamwe n'Omuhababi wa Gavumenti nibabaasa kuha
omupooriisi weidaara ry'omuhwezi wa Superintendent nainga omukozi
w'ekitongore omu ofiisi ya Kariiso-riiso, obushoborozi bw'okushwijuma, omu
bwire buringaniire, reero aihe zaakope omu bihandiiko ebirikukwata aha
mukozi wa gavumenti, omukazi/omushaija we nari omwana nari omusigirwa
orikuteeberezibwa kuba akozire omushango omu Iteeka eri.

4.3 Ebiragiro by'okucaaka n'okuhamba
 (1) Omuramuzi, Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti nainga Omuhababi wa Gavumenti
nibabaasa kuha omukozi weena obushoboorozi bw'okutaaha omu mwanya gwona
kifuba akacaaka, akahamba kandi akaguma n'ekihandiiko kyona ekyakubaasa
kuba kiriho obujurizi omu Iteeka eri.

(2) Ahu kyakureebekyera omupooriisi omukuru, Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti
nainga Omucondoozi ow'Omutaano ngu hariho ekihandiiko ekisherekirwe kiriho
obujurizi oburiho okutandika kw'omushango omu Iteeka eri, kwonka orikuza
kucaaka/kwaza naabaasa kutamwa ahabw'okukyerererwa kubona ebaruha
erikumwikiriza okucaaka, Ofiisa omukuru naabaasa kutwara obushoboorozi
bw'okucaaka n'okuhamba kandi agumye ebihandiiko nk'oku Kooti
erikumuragiira.
 (3) Kyamanywa ngu, omu mwanya ogu barimu nibacaaka, omuntu yaashereka
ekihandiiko kirikumukwataho omuntu ogwo nibabaasa kumwaza/kumucaaka
n'ebihandiiko ebiraashangwemu babitware kandi babitware.
 (4) Omuntu orikukyaka yaaba ari omukazi, naija kukyakibwa omukazi mugyenzi
we.

4.4. Obujunaanizibwa bw'okuha obutumwa
Omu Iteeka eri, omuntu ou omupooriisi nainga omucondoozi w'omutaano
arikwendaho obutumwa aine obujunaanizibwa bw'okuhayo amakuru goona agu
arikumanya.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena orikwanga kugamba eki arikumanya aine omushango, kandi
naahebwa ekifubiro ky'okuza omu kihome kumara emyaka eshatu nainga ahe
omutango gwa 4,800,000 nainga byombi.

4.5 Kuzibira/kuteganisa Okucaaka
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu orikuteera, kuzibira,
kukyerereza/kukyerererwa nainga kubura kukorengana n'ekiragiro kya poriisi
nainga kwangira omukozi wa gavumenti weena kutaaha omu mwanya akakyaka
kandi kwanga kuha obutumwa.
Ekifubiro
Omuntu oraasingwe omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kumara emyaka
mushanju nainga aragiirwe kushashura omutango gwa shiringi 1,440,000/=

4.6 Kuremesa okucondooza
Omushango ogu nigukorwa omuntu orikucwekyereza, kuhindura, kutaagura nainga
kugwisa ekintu kyona kya mukama we.
Ekifubiro
Omuntu oraasingwe omushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kumara emyaka
mushanju nainga aragiirwe kushashura omutango gwa shiringi 3,360,000/=

 CAPTION

4.7 Kutunga obutumwa
 (1) Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti hamwe Omuhababin'Omuhababi wa Gavumenti,
omu kucondooza, nibabaasa kwenda ngu kihababirwa ahe ekihandiiko
ekirikworeka orunyiriri rw'ebintu ebi aine, omukazi nainga omushaija we,
abatabani n'abahara, kandi erikushoboorora oku n'obu yaatunga ebyo bintu
ebi aine. Eki nikitwariramu ebintu hamwe n'esente ebi aine omu Uganda hamwe
n'aheero yaayo.

(2) Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti hamwe Omuhababin'Omuhababi wa Gavumenti
nibabaasa kwenda ngu mukuru w'eby'emishoro y'entaasya w'ekyanga,
omukozesa, mukuru wa banka nainga ondiijo muntu kuha obutumwa bwona nainga
ebihandiiko ebirikukwata ahari kihababirwa ebyakubaasa kuhwera omu
kucondooza.

4.8 Obujunaanizibwa bw'okukwata omuntu
Omushango ogu nigujunaanwa omuntu orikwanga kukwata nari kukwatisa omuntu
ogwo orikumuha enguzi nari orikuwenda kugira eki yaamuha ngu kimugasire we
nk'omuntu.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu oraakwatirwe omu mushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kumara emyaka
ebiri nainga aragirwe kushashura omutango gwa shiringi za Uganda 960,000
nainga byombi.
4.9 Kuha obukuumi abarikuha amakuru
Omujurizi omu mushango oguri ahansi y'Eiteeka eri tarikwija kwikirizibwa
kwatura eiziina n'oburuga bw'ogwo omuhaire amakuru.

4.10 Ekifubiro ky'okuha obutumwa bugwire
Omuntu orikuha okumanyisa/obutumwa obu arikumanya nainga kuteekateekwa kuba
bugwire kwonka ngu nibwija kureetaho okucondooza n'okuhoza, naaba yaakora
omushango.

 Ekifubiro
Omuntu oraakwatirwe omu mushango ogu naija kuza omu kihome kumara emyaka
etaano nainga aragirwe kushashura omutango gwa shiringi za Uganda 400,000
nainga byombi.

4.11 Obutaikirizibwa
Omuntu ou kooti eraashangye areesireho/aine omushango ahari egyo
eyaagambwaho aharuguru; tarikwija kwikirizibwa kukorera omu ofiisi ya
gavumenti yoona kumara emyaka ikumi kuruga obu kooti yaasharaho.

4.12 Enshara y'emishango
Enshara y'emishango ahansi y'Eiteeka ry'okuranisa enguzi t'erikwija
kutandika aha muntu weena hatariho rusa rurikuruga aha Muhababi wa
Gavumenti nainga owa Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti. Omuntu naabaasa kukwatwa
asibwe nainga arekurwe rusa rwa poriisi hatariho rusa orwagambwaho kwonka
tihariho kindi kirikubaasa kukorwa hatariho rusa.

4.1 OKutaho abacondoozi b'omutaano
Omu iteeka eri, Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti hamwe Omuhababin'omuhababi wa
Gavumenti, ahabwekigyendererwa ky'okucondooza, nibabaasa kutaho omuntu
orikuteekateekwa kuba aine obukugu ngu abe omucondoozi w'omutaano.

EKICWEKA KYA V

5.1 Obushoborozi bw'okuhozesa emishango

Emishango y'oburi bw'enguzi neija kuhurirwa kooti zoona kutandika n'eidaara
ry'okubanza.
5.2 Ekifubiro ky'okugyezaho, kutebeekanisa, kuhwera hamwe n'okuza omu
rukwe
Omuntu weena orikugyezaho kukora omushango ahansi y'eri Iteeka, arikukora
ekikorwa kyona kyokutebeekanisa kukora omushango, arikuhwera nainga kuza
omu rukwe omu muringo gwona, naaba yaakora omushango, kandi naija kuheebwa
ekifubiro omu muringo nigo gumwe nk'ogwo owaakora ekikorwa.

Ekicweka kya VI
6.1 Enzibira
Eki n'ekihandiiko ekirikushohozebwa kooti kirikwemereza okuguza nainga
okwiha ebintu, ebi omuntu oine omushango gw'enguzi aine nari
arikureeberera.

6.2 Okuha n'okuhandiikisa Enzibira
Enzibira neija kuheebwa kihababirwa kandi ku yaakuba neekwata aha itaka
neija kuhandiikwa n'omuhandiiki w'ebyapa by'amataka. Yaaba neekwata aha
kintu ekindi, neija kuhandiikwa omu b'obushoborozi abu kirikukwataho.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu weena otarikuhandiikisa enzibira erikukwata aha itaka nainga ekintu
ekindi kyona naaba yaakora omushango kandi yaasingwa omushango ogwo naija
kuza omu kihome kumara emyezi mukaaga nainga agyemwe kushashura omutango
gwa shiringi 240,000 nainga byombi.

6.3 Okuguza, kugura nainga kushereka ebintu ebitairweho Enzibira
Enkoragana zoona ezaakubaho ezikukwata aha bintu ebi Enzibirwa yaahereirwe
nizihenda ebiragiro kandi niziija kusharwamu haagira owashaba kooti.

Ekifubiro
Omuntu orikuguza nainga orikugura ekintu eki arikumanya ngu kiriho Enzibira
naija kuba yaakora omushango kandi gwamusinga naija kuza omu kihome kumara
emyaka ena, nainga ahe omutango gwa shiringi 1,920,000 nainga byombi.
Enzibira neija kuguma omu nkora kuhisya:
 i) Obu kooti eraagihindure;
 ii) Haahwaho emyezi mukaaga kuruga aha izooba eri baagikoreraho nainga aha
 bwire obundi obu kooti eraateho; nainga
 iii) Ekiragiro ky'okuhamba nainga omutango gw'esente gwaba niguza kuheebwa
 omu mwanya gw'ekintu ekirikukwata aha nzibira.

EKICWEKA KYA VII
7.1 Kooti okushwijuma ebintu ebirugire omu kikorwa kyokurya enguzi

 (1) Omuntu ku araasingwe omushango gw'oburi bw'enguzi omu Iteeka eri,
Omuhababi wa Gavumenti hamwe na Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti nibabaasa kuhayo
okushaba kwabo omu kooti, obutarenzya myezi mukaaga omushango gumusingire,
kushwijuma omuhendo gw'ebintu n'amagoba agu omuntu ogwo atungire kuruga omu
kikorwa ky'oburi bw'enguzi.

 (2) Buri kintu kyona nainga amagoba goona agatungirwe omu bwire bw'emyaka
ikumi atakasingirwe mushango nibiza kubarwa nk'ebirugire omu buri
bw'enguzi.

 (3) Omuntu ou omushango guraasingye naija kureeta obujurizi bw'okworeka
ngu ebintu ebyo nainga amagoba ago tibirugire omu buri bw'enguzi.

7.2 Ekiragiro ky'okubariirira
Ahu kooti ekakaise ngu omuntu owaasingwa omushango gw'enguzi ebintu
akabiiha omu nguzi ei bamukwatiire omu Iteeka eri, neija kushohoza
ekiragiro ky'okubariirira, erikuragiira omuntu owaasingwa omushango
kushashura omuhendo ogwabarwa, omu myezi mukaaga.
7.3 Ekihandiiko kya 'Bahambe'
Ahu omuntu osingirwe omushango aremirwe kushashura omuhendo ogu
bamushariire omu bwire bw'emyezi mukaaga kuruga ahu embariirira ekoriirwe,
Omuhababi wa Gavumenti nainga Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti nibateekwa kushaba
kooti ekihandiiko ekirikwetwa 'Bahambe'.
7.4 Kooti kutaho omuntu w'okureeberera ebintu ebyahambwa
 (1) Ahu kooti erikukorera 'Bahambe' kandi ekihamize ngu ekyahambwa
nikyetaaga obureeberezi bw'omutaano, naija kutaho omuntu w'okurinda nari
kureeberera ekintu ekyo.
 (2) Omuntu oyemekirwe kureeberera ekintu naija kutwara omu kooti
ebirikushoborora aha kintu, amagoba kandi ashoboorore byona ebitungirwe omu
bwire butarikurenga emyezi mukaaga

7.5 Okushwijuma Ekihandiiko kya 'Bahambe'
Omuntu oine akakwate omu kintu ekiriho ekiragiro kya 'Bahambe' naabaasa
kushaba kooti kugarukamu ekiragiro 'Bahambe' omu biro ikumi na bina.
Orikushaba naabaasa kuha Omuhababi wa Gavumenti kope hamwe na kope
y'okushaba, kandi ateekwa kworeka ngu akatunga ekintu ekyo omu mateeka.
Kooti neebaasa kugarurayo nainga ehinduremu omu kiragiro 'Bahambe', nainga
ekiragiro ekyo kigiremu ebirabanze kukorwa nk'oku kishemereire.

7.6 Ebiraakuratirwe omu kiragiro 'Bahambe' ku mukama w'ebintu yaakufa
nainga akaburaho
Ahu omuntu owaacwerwa omushango omu Iteeka eri yaakufa nainga akabura
kuzayo, Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti nainga Omuhababi wa Gavumenti nainga
ondiijo mukozi oikiriziibwe, naabaasa kuhayo okushaba kwabo omu kooti ngu
ekore ekiragiro 'Bahambe' aha kintu kya kihababirwa 'ekyashongirweho
orukumu', kandi kooti nayo, yaaheza kukakasa etaine kubangaanisa kwona,
neebaasa kuragira ngu ekintu ekyo kihambwe.

EITEEKA ERYA 'BAARWATA-BIHAMA,' ERYA 2010

1.0 Okwanjura

Eiteeka eri rigyendereire kutunguura omucwe gw'obwera-ngaro hamwe
n'okworeka enkozesa y'ebintu nainga sente hamwe n'okuha obukuumi ba rwata-
bihama nainga abo abarikwibiraho gavumenti obutabonabonesebwa, kubingwa
hamwe n'ebindi bikorwa by'okubahooraho enzigu.
1.1 Ekigyendererwa ky'Eiteeka eri
Eiteeka ry'okurinda 'baarwata-bihama' rikahinguzibwa Pariamenti kuha
emihanda ei abantu abari omu gavumenti hamwe nabarikwekozesa ei baakubaasa
kurabamu kushohoza amakuru agarikukwata aha bitahikire, ebitari mu mateeka
nari enguzi; kwenda ngu abantu abarikuhayo amakuru ago, barindwe
obutabonabonesebwa.
1.2 'Rwata-bihama' n'oha?
Rwata-bihama n'omuntu oraagambe/oraaheyo ripoota nainga amakuru g'oburi
bw'enguzi, ahari ogwo orikwikirizibwa.

 CAPTION

Emiringo ya 'baarwata-bihama'
Rwata-bihama naabaasa kuba:
 a) Omukoze kuhayo omukozesa/mukama we;
(b) Omukozi kuhayo omukozi mugyenzi we;(c) Omuntu kuhayo ondiijo, nainga
(d) Omuntu kuhayo ekitongore ky'omuntu-buntu nari ekya gavumenti.

1.3 Omukozi oikiriziibwe kwakiira amakuru n'oha?
Omuntu oikiriziibwe kwakiira obutumwa/amakuru kuruga ahari 'rwata-bihama'
nabaasa kuba:
 i) Omupooriisi atari hansi yeidaara ry'omuhwezi wa Insipekita wa Poriisi
 (owakabaare kamwe)
 ii) Omujwekyerwa wa Purezidenti aha disiturikiti orikwetwa RDC nari
 omuhwezi we;
 iii) Insipekita kuruga omu ofiisi ya Kariiso-riiso;
 iv) Omukozi otari hansi y'eidaara rya Seniya Ethics Officer omu kitongore
 ky'eby'Emicwe n'Obuntu-buzima,
 v) Sipiika wa Paliamenti ya Uganda nari omuhwezi we,
 vi) Orikukurira ekitongoreekya National Environment Management Authority,
 (NEMA)
 vii) Komiishona w'ekitongore ky'Obugabe bw'Abantu ekya Uganda Human Rights
 Commission,
viii) Omuhababi wa Gavumenti.
 ix) Omushwijumi w'ebya gavumenti
 x) Ekitongore ekirikukora aha kugura n'okuguza ebintu bya gavumenti ekya
 Public Procurement and Disposal of Public Assets Authority
 xi) Ekitongore ky'eby'emisoro ekya Uganda Revenue Authority
 xii) Akakiiko k'ekitongore ekiramuzi aka The Judicial Service Commission

2.0 Ni makuru ki agu rwata-bihama arikubaasa kuhayo?
Omuntu naabaasa kuhayo obutumwa/amakuru agarikworeka ngu:

 i) Ekikorwa ky'enguzi, enkora bibi, nari ekikorwa ekirikuhenda ebiragiro
 kyakorwa, kiriyo nikiza kukorwa nainga kiriyo nikikorwa
 ii) Omukozi wa gavumenti yaaremwa, yaayanga nainga tiyaafa aha biragiro
 ebi aine kuba naafaho
 iii) Omuntu Yaaha, yaaba ari haihi kuha, nari naabaasa kucwa kubi orubanja;

 iv) Kimwe ahari ebyo ebyagambwaho byabaho, byaba nibiija kubaho, nainga
 bibaasa kuba bisherekirwe nkana.

2.1 Kurinda amakuru
 • Ekirikutaana aha biragiro ebindi, amakuru agarikukwata aha nguzi nigaija
 kurindwa rwata-bihama yaaba:
 i) agahairweyo omu mutima omurungi
 ii) Akakaise ngu amakuru hamwe n'ebindi ebirimu bihikire
 iii) Ahaire amakuru omukozi oragiirwe omu Iteeka eri.
 iv) Akuumire ebihama ebirikumukwataho
 v) Akuumire ebihama by'amakuru agu yaahayo

2.2 Obukuumi bwa rwata-bihama owaahayo amakuru
Rwata-bihama naija kuguma arinzirwe nainga ahairwe obukuumi n'obu amaziina
ge n'ebindi ebirikumukwataho byakushohora atakimanyire/atakigyendereire.
2.3 Emiringo y'ebirikwaturwa
Hariho emiringo ebiri y'okwatura
 1. Kwatura okw'omunda
Kwatura okw'omunda nikukorwa omukozi yaahayo omukozi mugyenzi we owa mukama
waabo/omukozesa.

 2. Okwatura okw'aheeru
Okwatura aheeru nikukora ahu
 • Okwetomboita kutaine kakwate n'omurimo gwa 'rwata-bihama'
 • Rwata-bihama ahu arikubaasa kubingwa, kufubirwa, kubonabonesebwa,
 kutiinatiinisibwa, mukama we ku yaakukimanya
 • Rwata-bihama ku yaakumanya nainga akatiina ngu obujurizi oburikukwata
 aha buri nguzi nibwija kusherekwa.
 • Okwetomboita kubaire kwakozirwe kwonka tihariho kikozirwe

 CAPTION

2.4 Ebitongore ebi okwatura okw'aheeru kurikukorerwamu
Okwatura nikukorwa omuri buri kitongore eki ahaifo:
 i. Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti
ii. Omuhababi wa Gavumenti
iii. Ekitongore ky'Obugabe bw'abantu ekya Uganda Human Rights Commission
iv. Ekitongore ky'eby'Emicwe n'Obuntu-Buzima
 v. Ofiisi ya RDC
vi. Paaliyamenti ya Uganda
vii. Ekitongore ekya NEMA
viii. Ekitongore kya Pooriisi
ix. Ow'omushwijumi wa gavumenti
 x. Ekitongore ekijunaanwa
 okugura n'okuguza ebintu bya gavumenti
xi. Ekitongore ky'eby'emishoro
xii. Akakiiko k'ekitongore ekiramuzi

 CAPTION

2.5 Emihanda y'okurabamu kwatura
Ahu okwatura kuraakorwe n'omunwa, omukozi oikiriziibwe kwakiira amakuru
naija kugata omu buhandiikye.

2.6 Ebiri omu kwatura

 • Eiziina omu bwijwire, oburugo, omurimo gwa 'rwata-bihama'
 • Omuringo gw'ekikorwa ky'enguzi
 • Eiziina n'ebirikukwata aha muntu orikuteekateekwaho kuba akozire
 ekikorwa ky'oburi bw'enguzi
 • Obwire n'omwanya ogu oburi bw'enguzi bwakoreirwe nainga buriyo
 nibukorerwaho.
 • Eiziina omu bwijwire, oburugo hamwe hamwe n'ebirikukwata aha
 mujurizi/kareebi weena
 • Yaaba rwata-bihama abaire yaagizire ou yaagambira, kyaba kirikwe, n'oha?
 • Yaaba omuntu arikwatura ebirikukwata aha murimo naaguma aha murimo nigwo
 gumwe nainga ngaaha.

2.7 Emihanda y'okuhandiika ebyayaturwa
Omukozi orikwikirizibwa kwakiira ebihama ashemereire:
 • Kwakiira ebi rwata-bihama yaamwaturira
 • Kucondooza kandi akakora ekihikire nainga kwongyerayo ebyatwirwe omu
 b'obushoborozi.
 • Kuhandiika obwire n'omwanya ahu ebyayaturwa byagambirwa
 • Kuha rwata-bihama obuhame omu buhandiikye ngu okwaturwa kwatungwa.
 Kubiika obutumwa/amakuru omu kihama kandi kurungi.

2.8 Emiringo y'okubonabonesebwa
Rwata-bihama naarindwa obutabonabonesebwa mukama we omu miringo egi ahaifo:
 • Kubingwa aha murimo
 • Kwemerezebwa aha murimo
 • Obutakuzibwa ha murimo
 • Okutaheebwa by'okukora
 • Okubuzibwa obusingye
 • Okutiinatiinisibwa
 • Kutiinatiinisa na buri kimwe ekyagambwaho aharuguru
 • Okushoroorwa/bakakuta aharubaju

Nyowe ndi
Rwata-bihama kwonka

 CAPTION

2.9 Nenki ekiraakorwe haabahookubonabonesebwa?
Rwata-bihama orikumanya ngu naaturugunyizibwa ahabw'okwatura, naabaasa
kuhayo okwetomboita kwe owa Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti nainga omu kitongore
ky'eby'Obugabe bw'Abantu ekya Uganda Human Rights Commission nainga areete
omushango omu mbuga z'amateeka bamurihiirire.

2.10 Okurindwa obutatwarwa mu kooti
Rwata-bihama ori ahansi y'endahiro y'ebihama tarikwiza kugira mushango
ahabw'okwatura okutarikwikirizana n'enkora ye y'okukuuma ebihama nainga
obutaatura ku araabe yaakikora omu mutima omurungi.

2.11 Okukuumwa eihanga
Rwata-bihama, orikumanya ngu amagara ge nainga ekintu kye nainga eeka ye
eri omu kabi ahabw'okwatura, naija kushaba obukuumi omu ihanga, kandi
nibwija kumuhebwa.

 i) Rwata-bihama naija kuhikiirira omukozi oikiriziibwe amugambire
 ekizibu/okwerarikirira kwe.
 ii) Omukozi oikiriziibwe naija kuhandiika ebirikugambwa reero agyezeho
 kubuuririza.
 iii) Omukozi oikiriziibwe ku yaakukikakasa ngu hariho akabi akagyendereire
 rwata-bihama, naija kumanyisa Minisita w'Emicwe n'Obuntu-buzima, kandi
 agarukye ahe rwata-bihama obukuumi bw'akaanya-bwanya obwo arindiriire
 eki Minisita araakore.
 iv) Minisita naija kukora enteekateeka zoona z'okuha rwata-bihama
 obukuumi.
 v) Omukozi orikwikirizibwa naija kukuuma amaziina ga 'rwata-bihama'
 nk'ekihama

2.12 Endagaano z'emirimo Ezitahikire mu mateeka
Endagaano y'empa y'emirimo nainga endagaano endiijo eri ahagati y'omukozesa
n'omukozi neija kusazibwamu yaaba:
 • Neetangira omukozi ngu ataryatura
 • Neetanga omukozi ngu abure omuhimbo g'okwatura
 • Neezibira omukozi kwetomboita ku yaakubonabonesa
 • Neezibira omukozi okureeta enshonga ze omu kooti nainga ekitongore
 ezikwatiraine n'okubonabonesebwa
 •
 • Yaaba neeretaho okutiina kandi erikumara amaani abakozi kwenda ngu
 bataatura.

2.13 Ekihembo/ekirabo kya rwata-bihama
Rwata-bihama naija kuheebwa ebicweka bitaano ahari kikumi, aha muhendo
gw'esente eziraasigareho ahanyima y'ezisharwaho, eziraabe zirugire omu
mushango ogu yaayatwire. Ekihembo ekyo nikiija kumuheebwa obutarenzya myezi
mukaaga zaamara kutungwa.

(i) Rwata-bihama naija kuhayo okushaba kwe k'okushashurwa omu minisiture
nainga ekitongore ekyatungire esente ezaacungwirwe.
(ii) Rwata-bihama ku yaakuba atashashwirwe omu bwire bw'emyezi mukaaga,
naabaasa kutwara enshonga ze omu kooti zikorweho.

2.14 Emishango n'ebifubiro
Omuntu naakora omushango ahansi y'Eiteeka eri:
 • Yaayatura ebirikukwata ahari rwata-bihama;
 • Yaayatura ebiri omunda y'obutumwa obwayaturwa
 • Yaabonabonesa rwata-bihama
 • Yaabura kugira eki yaakora ahanyima y'okuwaturirwa
 • Yaayatura ebitahikire/ebishuba

Emishango egi neehebwa ekifubiro ky'okumara omu kihome emyaka etaano (5)
nainga okuha omutango gwa 2,400,000/=

EITEEKA RY'OKUMANYISIBWA AMAKURU ERYA 2005

Eiteeka eri rigyendereire kuba ekikwato ky'okuha abantu obushoborozi ngu
babaase kuta offisi za gavumenti aha mutindo gw'okukora gye, kukozesa gye
ebintu byayo, kukorera omu mushana, kugira obujunaanizibwa hamwe
n'okukorera aha Ngyenderwaho y'eihanga, obwo barikushaba amakuru/okumanya
agarikukwata aha nshonga z'omuntu wa buriijo. Eiteeka niriha obugabe
bw'okushaba n'okutunga okumanyisibwa/amakuru agu ebitongore bya gavumenti
biine. Ekiragiro nikiikiriza okutaho omukozi w'eby'amakuru ou omurimo gwe
mukuru n'okwikiriza kandi akakora aha kushaba kw'ekika ekyo.

EKICWEKA 1
1.0 KUTUNGA EBIHANDIIKO N'AMAKURU
1.1 Obugabe bw'okubibona
Kurugiirira aha Iteeka ry'okutunga amakuru erya 2005, obugabe bw'omuntu
kutunga amakuru nainga okumanyisibwa tibwine kuba nibuteganisibwa:
 • Enshonga ei omuntu yaaha erikushaba kubitunga; nainga
 • Eki omukozi w'ebyamakuru yaateekateeka ngu owaashaba naija kukozesa
 amakuru ago.

Okushaba kushamereire kuba kuri omu bwijwire kuhwere omukozi w'ekitongore
kubona ekihandiiko nainga amakuru.

 CAPTION

1.2 Ni makuru ki agarikubaasa kutungwa?
Omutuuragye aine obugabe bw'okubona amakuru agu eihanga riine otwariiremu
ebihandiiko n'amakuru ebiri omu minisiture za gavumenti, ebitongore bya
gavumenti, gavumenti z'ebyanga, zaakomiishoni za gavumenti hamwe
n'ebintongore ebya gavumenti ebindi byona, kwihaho ku haakuba haine ebi
eiteeka ritarikwikiriza.

1.3 Obukomo bw'obugabe bw'okutunga amakuru
Obugabe bw'okubona amakuru bwine ahu burikukoma, nahabwekyo, tibugabe
bw'okubona buri makuru. Ahansi y'eiteeka eri, obugabe bw'okubona amakuru
tiburikubaasa kubaho amakuru agarikurondwa gaaba gari:
 • Ekihandiiko nainga ebihandiiko by'enkiiko z'aba minisita (Kabineti)
 • Ebihandiiko by'omushango gwa kooti ogukirikugyenda omu maisho.

1.4 Amakuru nabwo nigabaasa kwimwa haaba:
i) Okushohoza amakuru ago kyaba nikita eby'okwerinda by'eihangaomu kabi.
Eki nikimanyisa ngu ahu amakuru garikubaasa kutaahataaha omu by'okwerinda
kw'aihanga nainga nigabaasa kukozesebwa abatahikire kugakozesa
nk'abaheekyera kukora kubi eihanga.
ii) Okushohoza amakuru kwaba nikubaasa kutaahataaha nainga kwaba
nikutaahataaha omu bugabe bw'ondiijo muntu nainga ebihama bye nk'oku kiri
omu kacweka 27 ak'engyenderwaho y'eihanga.
iii) Okuhayo amakuru garikukwata aha magara g'omuntu ondiijo atari ogwo
arikugashaba.
iv) Amakuru agarikuha ebirikukwata ahari sayansi nainga obushuubuzi
ebyakuba biri eby'akabi ahari ogwo obiine nka ebirikuruga omu mutwe hamwe
n'amakuru masya.
v) Ahu amakuru garimu okutaahataaha omu obujunaanizibwa bw'omurimo
n'obwesigwa nk'amakuru g'amagara g'omuntu againwe omushaho, amakuru againwe
ba rooya g'aba kasitoma baabo n'ebindi, nainga ahu endagaano
y'abukirikukwataho ahagati y'omukozi orikuhayo amakuru hamwe n'ondiijo
muntu ngu amakuru atagahayo.

1.5 Ebitongore ebishemereire kuba nibiha amakuru/obutumwa/okumanyisibwa

Minisiture za gavumenti zoona, ebitongore byona, gavumenti z'ebyanga,
zaakomiishoni, n'ebindi bitongore byona ebya gavumenti, shana ebyo
ebitarikwikiriza.

Gavumenti z'ebyanga omuri eki, zirimu na za kanso za disiturikiti,
amagomborora, emiruku, za kanso z'amatahuni. Ebitongore bya gavumenti
birimu ebitongore byona ebya gavumenti nk'ekitongore ky'emishoro, banka
enkuru y'Eihanga, ekitongore ekirikuteeza oburuuru, Akakiiko k'eby'eitaka,
Akakiiko k'ebyobwegyese, n'ebindi.

EKICWEKA KYA II
2.0 EMIHANDA Y'OKUTUNGAMU AMAKURU

2.1 Oku amakuru gashemereire kushabwa

Omuntu nainga ekitongore nikibaasa kushaba omu buhandiikye orikukurira
eby'amakuru omu kitongore kya gavumenti ekirikujunaanwa aha makuru.

Omuntu nainga ekitongore ekirikushaba amakuru kishemereire:

 i) Kuha ebirikukwata aha makuru omu bwijwire kuhwera orikukurira amakuru
 kubona:
 Ekihandiiko nari ebihandiiko ebyashabwa; hamwe

 n'omuntu owaashaba amakuru

 (ii) Kumanya omuntu owaashaba amakuru ahu arikuruga;

 (iii) Okushaba ku kuraakorwe omu mwanya gw'ondiijo muntu, ogwo owaashaba
ashemereire kuba naayegambaho ekiti eki yaiziramu kushaba amakuru.

2.2 Orikukurira eby'Amakuru

Kurugiirira aha Iteeka eri, Omukuru Munonga owa buri kitongore kya
gavumenti ni Mukuru w'Amakuru/w'obutumwa. Eki nikimanyisa, ngu mukuru
w'ekitongore, niwe mukuru w'amakuru. Mukuru w'Amakuru niwe ashemereire
kureeba ngu ebihandiiko ebya gavumenti byatungwa nainga shi biriho
kurugiirira aha Iteeka eri.

2.3 Ekitongore kya gavumenti ku kyakuba kitaine Mukuru w'Amakuru

Buri kitongore kya gavumenti kishemereire kuba n'orikukurira amakuru.
Ekyokureeberaho, aha disiturikiti, Diisi (CAO) niwe Mukuru W'abakozi,
Owaigomborora niwe mukuru w'Eigomborora. Omu bitongore bya gavumenti,
orikukurira ekitongore nibamweta dairekita nari ciifu nari mukuru
w'ekitongore. Ebitongore bya gavumenti biine abagambirizi abarikukora nka
bakuru bamakuru.

2.4 Omuntu ku yaakuba atarikumanya kushoma n'okuhandiika

Omuntu atarikumanya kushoma n'okuhandiika nainga ahabw'obutashoma nainga
oburema ku yaakuremwa kuhandiika okushaba kwe, naabaasa kushabisa omunwa.
Ku yaakushabisa akanwa, orikukurira amakuru omu kitongore kya gavumenti
naija kuhandiika ebi baamugambira kandi ahe kope ehandiikire omuntu
owaahayo okushaba kwe n'akanwa.

 CAPTION

2.5 Eki Mukuru w'Amakuru arikukora yaashabwa amakuru

Mukuru w'Amakuru, yaatunga okushaba kw'amakuru, naashabwa ekiragiro kuha
obuhwezi bwona kureeba ngu omuntu yaatunga amakuru agu yaashaba. Omurimo
ogu gwine kukorerwa busha.

Kuhwerwa kutunga amakuru ahansi y'Eiteeka eri n'okwa busha, kwonka omuntu
naabaasa kushabwa fiizi z'okukoresa amakuru. Fiizi z'okukozesa buri muntu
orikutunga amakuru kuruga omu kitongore kya gavumenti. Fiizi ezi
nizitaibwaho minisita arikurabira omu biragiro. Fiizi ezi nizishashurwa omu
gavumenti, ti ha muntu nainga omukozi.

2.6 Emirimo ya Mukuru w'Amakuru

Omurimo gw'okuhwera abantu abarikushaba amakuru
Mukuru w'amakuru aine omurimo gw'okuha amakuru nk'oku garikushabwa ahansi
y'Eiteeka eri. Ahansi y'Eiteeka eri, buri Mukuru w'Amakuru aine omurimo
gw'okuhwera omuntu orikushaba amakuru. Amakuru tigashemereire kwimwa ngu
ahabwokugira ngu omuntu tiyaakuratira biragiro byokugashaba; kwihaho Mukuru
w'Amakuru naabaasa kwanga okushabwa kw'amakuru:

 i) Omuntu orikushaba amakuru yaaba yaabaire yaagambiirwe ekigyendererwa
 ky'okwanga:

 Okugamba okwo kwine kuba kuriho eshonga z'okwanga

Okugamba okwo kushemereire kuba kuriho Orikukurira amakuru nainga ondiijo
mukozi orikubabaasa kuhwera omuntu ogwo kuta okushaba kwe omu muringo
oguraabaase kureeba ngu tikwayangwa.

 (ii) Mukuru w'Amakuru aine kuha omuntu omugisha gw'okuronda obuhwezi
 kuruga aha mukozi arikugambwa omu baruha kumuhwera kubona amakuru.

 (iii) Mukuru w'Amakuru naija kuha omuntu omugisha guringaniire kuhamya
 nainga kuhindura omu kushaba kwe kwenda ngu kuze aha rurengo
 rw'eby'etaago eby'okushaba.

 CAPTION

2.7 Amakuru ku gaakushabwa omukozi otari ogwo ogaine

Ahu Mukuru w'Amakuru yaakwakiira okushaba kandi kikashangwa ngu okushaba
oku kukaabaire nikutwarwa omu kitongore ekindi, Mukuru w'Amakuru aine
obujunaanizibwa bwa:

(i) Kuhwera nk'oku kirikubaasika omuntu orikushaba amakuru kugashaba omu
kitongore ekigaine.
 i) ii) We naabaasa kutwara okushaba oku owa Mukuru w'Amakuru ahu
 amakuru gari oraabaase kuha amakuru kurugiirira oku Iteeka
 ririkugamba, kuhwera orikushaba amakuru kugatunga.

Ahu amakuru agaashabwa gaakubaasa kutungwa kuruga omu kitongore ekindi,
orikukurira amakuru naija kushaba owaashaba amakuru, kuhindura okushaba kwe
akutware ahu amakuru gari, enshonga ahabwenki aine kuba naahindura okushaba
kwe hamwe n'obwire obu okushaba kwe kuraakorerweho.

2.8 Obu amakuru agaashabwa gatarikubaasa kuboneka

Kurugiirira aha kacweka ka 14 ak'Iteeka ahu okushaba kw'okubona amakuru
kurikukorwa owa Mukuru w'Amakuru kandi na Mukuru w'Amakuru atarikumanya
ekitongore eki garimu,. nainga ahu Mukuru w'Amakuru agyerizeho eki
arikubaasa kuronda ekihandiiko kwonka atarikukibona haza hariho enshonga
zirikuhamya ngu ekihandiiko eki kiriho, Mukuru w'Amakuru naija kumanyisa
omuntu omu buhandiikye ngu tikirabaasike kuha omuntu ekihandiiko.

Ekihandiiko kyaba kitarikureebeka, ekihandiiko eine kworeka omuntu
owaashaba amakuru emihanda ei orikukurira amakuru yaaraba kuronda amakuru
ago kandi n'enshonga ahabwenki Orikukurira amakuru yaahika aha kusharamu
ngu amakuru tigariho.

2.9 N'oha orikusharaho kuha amakuruOrikukurira amakuru ou barikuba
bashabire amakuru niwe aine obushoboorozi/omurimo, kureeba ngu, yaamara
kushabwa amakuru omu biro abiri na kimwe aine:

 i) Kumanya ngu amakuru agaashabwa nigo ago agarikubaasa kutungwa.
(ii) Agarukyemu omuntu owaashaba eki yaasharaho kumuha nainga kutamuha
amakuru. Yaasharaho kumuha amakuru,

Orikukurira amakuru aine obujunaanizibwa bw'okuha owaashaba amakuru
ekihandiiko kandi neeba erimu ebi:
 a) Ebishare ebi aine kushashura kugatunga (byaba biriho)
 b) Omuringo ogu araagatungyemu; na
 Omuntu orikushaba amakuru naabaasa kujuriza omunda omu kitongore
 nainga ahababe omu kooti, kurugiirira oku enshonga eri, ahabw'ebishare
 by'okushashura nainga foomu y'okiwijuza kutunga amakuru nainga emihanda
 y'okurabamu, otairemu obwire bw'okushabiramu.
2.10 Omurimo gw'Orikukurira amakuru ahu okushaba kwayangwa

Mukuru w'Amakuru aine obujunaanizibwa bw'okuha ekihandiko y'okwanga
kw'okushaba. Ebaruha eshemereire kugira:

 (i) Enshonga ahabwenki haabaho okwanga, ataireho n'okutamu ezo eziri omu
iteeka, ezi ayegamiire kuhika aha kwanga.
 i) Omu kuha enshonga z'okwanga, Mukuru w'Amakuru taine kuba naatamu
 ebiri omu kuhandiiko ekyashabwa.
 ii) Aine kugira ngu omuntu naabaasa kujuriza nainga ashabe kooti
 kumugarukamu aha kwanga kumuha amakuru.

 CAPTION

2.11 Omuringo n'oku amakuru garaatungwe
Amakuru gaamara kutungwa, omuntu aine obugabe bw'okutunga ekihandiiko kyona
hatariho kuzibirwa nainga gabaasa kuheebwa omu bicweka by'ekihandiiko
ekyashabwa. Orikukurira amakuru aine omurimo gw'okugambira omuntu omuringo
ogu araamuhe amakuru.

Omuntu naabaasa kubona amakuru ahanyima y'okushashura ebishare nainga
ahabwa busha. Ebishare hoona nibiba byateirweho kare kandi omuntu naabaasa
kujuriza aha bishare ebyo yaaba naateekateeka ngu biri ahaiguru.

2.12 Omuntu naabona ata amakuru yaaheza kwikirizibwa?
Omu Iteeka eri, omuringo ogu amakuru garatungwe nigurugiirira aha muringo
gw'ebihandiiko ebirikushabwa.

 (i) Ekihandiiko ku kyakuba kiri omu buhandiikye, Mukuru w'amakuru aine
omurimo gw'okuha kope y'ekyo kihandiiko. Mukuru w 'amakuru kandi naabaasa
kukora entebeekanisa kureeba ngu owaashaba amakuru yaashwijuma ekihandiiko.
Eki kyabaho, omuntu orikushaba amakuru naija kwikirizibwa kugashoma
atakoziremu kope.
Amakuru gaaba gatari mu buhandiikye:

a) Haaba hariho amakuru agari omu bishushani nainga aha mpapura,
 Orikukurira amakuru naija kutaho entebeekanisa y'okureeba ngu kope ezo
 zaarugamu kandi zaahebwa owaazishaba. Kwonka, empapura eziraateerwe
 naizaija kukorwa ebyoma ebiraabe biri omu kitongore kya gavumenti.
 Ekyokureeberaho, torikubaasa kutunga ekihandiiko kitiirwe kompyuta kandi
 Eekitongore kya gavumenti kiine Taipurwaita.
b) Ku haakuba hariho ekiijusyo, eki ebigambo byakyo nainga amakuru gari omu
 maraka nainga vidiyo, Mukuru w'amakuru naija kukora entebeekanisa
 y'okuhurira nainga kworeka vidiyo. Ekitongore kya gavumenti kyaba
 nikibaasa kuhindura ebyo biijusyo kubita omu buhandiikye, Mukuru
 w'amakuru nabaasa kukora enteekateeka y'okureeba ngu owaashaba amakuru
 yaatungaho kope.
c) Ekiijusyo ku kyakuba kiri omu karimagyezi nainga omu muringo gurikushoma
 ekyoma, Mukuru w'amakuru naabaasa kuha kope omuntu oshabire amakuru.
d) Ekiijusyo ku kyakuba kiri omu kompyuta kandi kirikubaasa kuheebwa
 okishabire omu muringo ogwo; naainga
e) Omu muringo ogundi gwona, harikuheebwayo kope kope.

2.13 Ahu omuntu atarikubaasa kuhayo okushaba kwe ahabw'obutamanya
kuhandiika nainga oburema

Omuntu oine oburema aha mubiri naabaasa kushaba amakuru omu muringo ogundi
kwenda kuhwera omuntu kutunga amakuru ago. Ahu omuntu ogwo yaakushaba
amakuru ngu gamuheebwe omu muringo ogu arikwetegyereza, amakuru nigaija
kumuheebwa omu muringo ogwo, kandi habeho kope yaago omu muringo ogwa
buriijo. Buri muntu weena, nangwa n'otari murema naabaasa kushaba ngu
amakuru bagamuhe omu muringo ogundi kandi kikorwe. Ahu omuntu yaashaba
amakuru omu muringo ogundi, nibaza kugamuha omuri ogwo muringo, kwihaho
kukikora kyaba:
 i) (i) Nikitaaha omu mirimo nainga obwebembezi bw'ekitongore;
 ii) Ahu kibaasa kuba nikireetaho akabi omu kukuuma ekiijusyo;
 iii) Nainga okukora ekyo kyaba nikihenda ekiragiro kya koperaiti
 amakuru ku gaakuba gatari g'ekitongore ekirikugaha.

2.14 Ni ryari obu amakuru agaashaba gaakwimwa
Amakuru nigabaasa kwimirwaho nainga kuraba omu bikorwa Mukuru w'Amakuru
naabaasa kuha ebaruha erikushoboororera omuntu orikushaba amakuru ngu
okubona amakuru kwarema. Ebaruha egyo eine e kuha enshonga z'okwanga. Aha
rubaju orundi, omuntu naabaasa kumanya ngu okushaba kwe kwangirwe mukuru
w'amakuru yaaremwa kusharamu aha kushaba kw'omuntu kumara obwire bw'ebiro
21.

 CAPTION

EKICWEKA III

3.0 Kwetomboita n'okujuriza
Omuntu naabaasa kwetomboita ow'Omuramuzi, arikuhakanisa okusharaho
kw'Omukuru w'amakuru:
 i) (i) Kwanga kumuha amakuru;
 ii) (ii)Kusharaho kwongyera aha bwire obu omuntu ashemereire
 kutungiramu amakuru
 iii) (iii) Kusharaho kushashuza ebishare by'okutunga ekiijusyo
 iv) (iv) Kusharaho obukomo omu kuzibira okutunga amakuru

Omuntu atamazirwe n'okusharaho kw'omuramuzi w'aha rurengo rwa disiturikiti,
naabaasa kujuriza omu Kooti Enkuru arikuhakanisa eky'omuramuzi w'aha
Disiturikiti.

Entasi, Tuesday 06 – 12, 2013
Amakuru

Bakwatsire Motoka ya MP Kyamadidi yaaborooga ahabw’amabanja ga 20m/=

Omushaki: Doreen Nasiima

Ba Burooka ba koti enkuru omuri Kampala aha Rwakashatu esaabiiti ehwaire,
bakwatsire motoka ya MP wa Rwampara Mujuni Vicent Kyamadi di
ahabw’amabanja ga 20m/=

Amakuru agatungirwe Entasi nigooreka ngu Kyamadidi akasinga motoka ye
y’ekika kya PRADO namba UAQ 684A omuri za kafuna ez’omuntu omanyirwe nka
Tumusiime aha sente zirikwingana 20m= baagikwatira ahari Mulago
baagikwatira omu parking yaabo kugiguza. Banyakugikwata babaire nibaronda
MP Kyamadidi na motoka ye bombi kukwatwa. Kyamadidi ku baaherize kukwata
motoka ye atyo we yaataranga yaayeshereka ngu batamuta omu mpingo akaza omu
kihome. Banyakugikwata babaire beebembeirwe Brian Kanyesigye aba Primex
Business Group ey’omuri Kampala kandi babaire baine n’ebaruha ya kooti
enkuru y’okumuronda na motoka ye. Kyamadidi esente ezo bakazimuha kumara
ameezi mukaaga agahingwire enyima kwonka yaazinyaga. Kooti ekaija
yaashohoza ebaruha y’okumukwata ebiro 17/7/2013 kuruga obwo batuura bamuri
aha kagyere baitu batarikumubona. Mbwenu ijo orwakashatu ku abaire ari aha
irwariro Mulago, abareeba aguruka omu motoka, ekishumuruzo akisigamu atyo
airuka, ku bagihikireho baashanga ekishumuuruzo kirimu eriyo
neyaka,baagivuga bagitwara. Hati nibagira ngu motoka bagiine, kwonka
nibamuronda nk’omuntu. Enyimaho, Kyamadidi nabwo motoka egyo neegambwa kuba
yaakwatsirwe abandi baagitwara kwonka yaija yaagicungura. Kyamadidi ebiro
ebi abaire naashaba rifuti omuri ba MP bagenzi be kumwiha Kampala kumureeta
Mbarara atyo akahika omuri Mbarara akavuga ey'omukazi we Shifra UAL 966
y’ekika kya Harrier. Entasi ku eteire esimu ya Kyamadidi kumubuuza aha
birikumugambwaho, ebaire etariho kumara ebiro bibiri.
