 ANKORE

Obutegyeki bw'Abachwezi omuri Ankore ku bwahwaireho omu kyasha kya ikumi-na-
itaano (15), Ruhinda Rwajunaki-mwene-Wamala owaabaire ari omutegyeki
w'Abachwezi akatandikaho Nkore, hati erikwetwa Obugabe bw'Ankore.

Oruganda rw’Abahinda nirwo rwabaire nirutegyeka Ankore. Abahinda nibagambwa
kuba baabaire bari baijukuru ba Ruhinda; akaba ayetwa Ruhinda ahabw’okugira
ekikaba kiri kwiraguura aha maisho ge; ekyo kikaba bakaba nibakyeta
“ekihinda”. Nyina wa Ruhinda akaba naayetwa Njunaki, kandi akaba atuura ari
omuzaana omu kikari ky’Omugabe.

Obutegyeki bw’Abachwezi bukabuga omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe, ebirimu
Zaire, Tanzania, Rwanda, n’ebindi bicweka bingi. Nikyo oreebera Abahaya ba
Karagwe eya Tanzania nibashushanisa engamba n’Abanyankore b’omu
muburegyerwa-izooba bwa Uganda.

Abachwezi bakaba bari baraingwa, baine enyindo naigwa kandi bari abatungi
b’ente z’amahembe maraingwa munonga. Baijukuru baabo bakaba bari Abahima ba
Ankore; Abatutsi ba Rwanda; Abanyamurengye aba Zaire; oteebirwe
n’Abasongora ba Kaseese.

Omu mwaka gwa 1520, Omukama Chwamari ow’Obukama bwa Bunyoro, akataahiirira
Ankore na Rwanda. Omu bunaku obwo, Omugaabe Ntare IV akasherura obweshereko
omu ihamba rya Muzaire-Otaakwa omuri Karagwe eya Tanzania.

Okuruga kare na kare, Ankore ekaba eri emwe baitu eby’entunguuka bya Uganda
bikagibaganisamu omu mwaka gwa 1901, obu endagaano ya Ankore (eyetwa
“Ankore agreement” omu Rungyereza) ehandiikwa. Obwo nibwo ehinduka Ankore
kandi entebe y’omugabe ekaheebwa ekitiinisa kihango munonga. Nibwo
n’Abangyereza - Abajungu kuruga omuri Bungyereza (Britain) baatandika
obutegyeki bwabo, bakakubuura Nkore na Uganda yoona. Endagaano egi ekaba
ebahaire obushoboorozi kutegyeka Ankore.

Obunaku obwo, enganzi ekaheebwa amaani ag’omuringo gw’omutaano, kandi ekaba
etegyeka kuhweraho omugabe. Obutegyeki bw’Abajungu butakaizire, Nkore ekaba
egaita Isingiro, Kashaari, n’ekicweka kimwe kya Rwampara.

Ku baaherize okuta omukono aha ndagaano egi, emyanya eyaabaire erimu
Sheema, Buhweju, Mpororo, yoona ekagaitwa ahari Ankore. Emyanya eya Buhweju
bakaba bari abariisa; Mpororo bari beene-Rukaari na beene-Kirenzi; Igara
bakaba bari beene-Mafundo. Obutegyeki bw’Abangyereza bukagaita hamwe
amashaza ago goona kwenda ku gategyeka kurungi.

Nkore ekategyekwaho abagabe 23 kuruga ahari Ruhinda kuhisya ahari Gasyonga
III. Obugabe bwa Nkore bukaihwaho omwebembezi wa Uganda Milton Obote omu
mwaka gwa 1967 kandi na hati ti bwakagarukahoga.

Ankore nainga Nkore nk’okuyaabaire neemanywa n’emwe aha bugabe
obwarabaireho omu Uganda kandi nk’oku twaba twagigambireho, ekantandika
kare na kare omu kyasha kya 15. Okwiha kare omu buhangwa, Ankore ekaba
neemanywa nka Kaaro-Karungi kandi ekigambo Nkore kiizire kumanywa omu
kyasha kya 17, obu Kaaro-Karungi yaataahirirwa Chwali owaabaire ari Omukama
wa Bunyoro-Kitara akagisheenya.

Aha nyima y’endagaano ei baateireho omukono omu mwaka gwa 1901 nk’oku twaba
twagigambireho aha ruguru, Ankore ekagira emiringo ebiri ey’abatuuragye
abaabaire barimu Abahima – aba bakaba bari abariisa nainga abatungi kandi
baine ente nyingi, kwonka bakaba batahinga. Hakaba hariho n’Abairu – aba
bakaba bari abahingi kandi bakaba bataine nte. Mbwenu eki kikatuma Abairu
n’Abahima kukora hamwe ahabw’okuba omwe akaba ayetenga ebi mutaahi we aine
– nk’amate n’ebihingwa.

Abantu b’omuri Ankore nibeetwa Abanyankore kandi nibagamba orurimi rubari
kweta Orunyankore. Abanyankore aba, nibatuura omuri zaadisiturikiti ezirimu
Mbarara, Bushenyi, Isingiro, Ntugamo, Mitooma, Kiruhuura, Ibanda, kandi ezi
zoona ziri omuri burengyerwa-izooba bwa Uganda. Abantu ba Nkore nibagamba
Orunyankore, kandi omuntu yaaba naayenda kugamba omu bwingi naagira ngu
‘ba’: ekyokureeberaho “Banyankore”; kandi omuntu yaaba naagamba omu bukye
naayejunisa “mu” nka “omuntu”. Omuntu yaaba naayenda kugamba ngu ekintu kya
nanka, naakoresa “ki” nainga ‘bi’ byaba biri bingi.

Abanyankore tibaine biro bikuru nk’ebyabo ahakuba eby’obutegyeki byabo
(obugabe) bikahwaho. Hati ebiro ebikuru ebi baine ninka Nohiri na Paasika
(okuzooka kwa Kristo).

Omuri Ankore, ente nikyo kintu ky’omuhendo eki baabaire baine kandi bakaba
baziihamu ebintu nk’amate, amajuta g’ente, enyama, eshagama, empu z’ente
hamwe n’ebindi. Ente zikaba nizi koresibwa omu by’obushuubuzi ebi Abahima
baabaire bakora n’Abairu, bakaba baziguza kuguramu ebyokurya nainga bahayo
ente reero babaha ebyokurya. Omugasho muhango munonga oguzaabaire zeine
kukaba kuri kuzikozesa omu kuhingira nk’enjugano. Nangwa obumwe ente enungi
munonga ekaba ekoresibwa omu kushaba ku gihongayo owa baaruhanga baabo
batari bamwe na bamwe. Abandi bakaba bazigabira banywani baabo kuhamya
omukago, abandi bazigabira omugabe kumworeka obuhagizi bwabo. Ente ka
yaabaire neetwarwa nk’eky’omuhendo buziima! Eki kikaba kirugiirira aha
bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirimu ebibara, obuhango, amate agu eri
kukamwamu gaaba gari maingi, hamwe n’amahembe gaayo gakaba gaine kuba
maraingwa munonga. Aha myaka mito, abaana bakaba babeegyesa erangi z’ente
zaabo, kwenda ngu zaajwanga n’ez’abandi babe nibabaasa kumanya ezaabo.

Abantu ba Nkore nainga Abanyankore, bakaba nibaikiririza omuri Ruhanga
ninga omuhangi ou baabaire nibamanya ngu ari omwiguru ashwekirwe ebicu.
Abanyankore bakaba nibaikiriza ngu Ruhanga niwe ari kuhanga buri kimwe
kandi niwe ari kuheereza, kandi bakaba nibaikiriza ngu abantu ab’emitima
mibi bakaba bakoresa bwa ruhanga obukye kureetaho ebintu bibi, ebisiraani,
enjara, endwara, ekyanda, okubura ruzaaro hamwe n’okufa omu bantu.

Abahima n’Abairu bakanywana munonga ahabw’okushuubura ebi baabaire bakora
hamwe kwonka bakaba baine obutaikirizana omu kukora hamwe – hakaba hatariho
buraingaaniza ahagati yaabo. Abairu bakaba batari kwingana n’Abahima kandi
ekyabaaire kireeta obutaikirizana obu n’okugira ngu Abahima bakaba baine
amatungo agu Abairu baabaire bataine. Ababiri aba bakaguma n’obutingana obu
kandi Abahima bakaba batashwerwa Abairu kandi ku habaire hagira abaayenda
ku kikora, obugyenyi obwo bukaba bufa bubura kubaho.

Abahima bakaaba baheereza Abairu ebiri kuruga omu nte nk’amajuta, amate
n’ebindi ahakuba Abairu abaabaire bari abahingi tihaine ahu baabaire
babiiha. Abahima bakaba bari bakye aha Bairu mbwenu kikaba kyorobera Abairu
kugabira Abahima ebirabo hamwe n’okugumira emicwe yaabo.

Obugabe bwa Ankore bukaguma nibweyongyera omu mashuuma hamwe na burengyerwa-
izooba. Obugabe bukaba bwine entwaza n’enkora yaabwo. Abashaija bakaba
bahayo ente ow’omugabe kworeka obuhagizi hamwe n’okusiima ahabw’obusinguzi
bwabo nk’omu kutunga ente. Obumwe omugabe akaba aikiriza ente nainga
abashaba ku mwegaitaho omu mahe ge. Omushaija ku yaabaire aruga kurwana,
omugabe akaba amuheereza obukuumi.

Omugabe akaba aine amaani g’okutoorana abaabaire baba abakama haza aba
bakaba bamutooranira abarwani abaabaire bakuuma ekyanga kyona. Kwonka
Abahima bonka nibo baabaire baza omu mahe. Omu bagabe ba Ankore harimu
Ellison Karuhanga, Ruhinda, Nkuba, Nyaika, Ntare I, Rushango, Ntare II,
Ntare III, Kasasira, Kitara, Rumongye, Mirindi, Ntare IV , Macwa,
Rwabirere, Kahaya I, Rwebishengye, Kayungu, Gasyonga I, Mutambuuka,
Rugingiza, Ntare V, Kahaya II, Gasyonga II.

Omu by’obushwere, omwishiki ku yaabaire ahisya emyaka munaana, okukira omu
Bahima, okumutebeekanisiza okushwerwa kukaba kutandika. Omwishiki akaba
atari kugaruka kuzaana n’abandi baana. Abaishiki okukira bakaba babareka
omu nju, bari kubariisa enyama hamwe n’obushera bw’ekinyankore kandi bakaba
babagyema okunywa amate maingi munonga kwenda ngu bagomoke. Omushaija omwe
aha kuhingira akangira ngu “bakaba babariisa kandi babanyweisa amate
oshanga bataine n’agatambura”. Okugomoka omu Bahima nibakitwara nk’oburungi
kandi amate nigamanywa nk’eky’okunywa kiri kuboneza omwishiki.

Omwishiki ku yaabaire atandika kushuna amabeere, akaba aragiirwa kwetwara
gye kandi akaba atashemereire kwejumbira omu nshonga z’omubonano eza baire
zibaasa kumureetera enda – kutwara enda y’endaaro. Obwa kare omwishiki
owaabaire agira enda atakashweirwe akaba afubirwa munonga, kandi abamwe
bakaba baitwa.

Ishe w’omwojo ari kuyambwaho bakye aha banyabuzaare bakaba barondera
omutsigazi omukazi w’okushwera kandi ashashura n’e njugano ei abazaire
b’omwishiki baabaire bamushaba. Obwire obwingi, enjugano ekaba eba erimu;
ente ibiri, embuzi ishatu, hamwe n’enyungu z’amaarwa omu Bairu. Omu Bahima
zikaba ziba ziri ente kuruga ahari ibiri kuta ahari makumi-abiri (20)
kurugiirira aha bugaiga bw’omuntu.

Obumwe omu kuronda omukazi nainga omushaija w’okushwera, abaana bakaba baba
batari kumanya n’oha: abazaire nibo baabaire bakora buri kimwe. Aha nyima,
ab’ow’omwojo bakaba baija kwakiira omukazi waabo. Omu buteeka, omwana
w’omwishiki akaba atashwerwa bakuru be ku baabaire baba batakashwirwe.
Omwishiki omuto ku yaabaire aba niwe yaashabwa, abazaire bakaba bahayo
omukuru aha kuhingira. Omushaija ku yaabaire akimanya, akaba atashemereire
kubuuza, kwihaho akaba aba aine okuheereza ezindi enjugano kutwara
omwishiki omuto. Aha mukoro gw’okuhingira, omwishiki omugore akaba
ashendekyerezibwa ishenkazi. Abamwe nangwa nibagira ngu ishenkazi akaba
abyama n’omugore omwojo kumanya oku arikutwaza enshonga z’omu kitanda.
Kandi abamwe nibagira ngu ishenkazi akaba aza omu kishengye ky’abagore ku
hurikiza yaaba omwojo yaabaire aine amaani. Ogwo ishenkazi akaba ayeshereka
ahansi y’ekitanda.

Ishenkazi ogu akaba ahabura omwishiki aha ku yaabaire ashemereire
kureeberera amaka ge hamwe n’omushaija we. Omwishiki akaba ashemereire kuba
ashugaine, kandi aha kiro kye eky’okubanza bakaba bataho eshuuka ya mutare
reero aha nyima y’okuteerana n’omushaija we, hakaba hazaho eshagama. Kandi
owaabaire atashugaine, bakaba bamuheereza ekinushu kirimu omwina nainga
eshuuka eine ekiina eki yaabaire atwara ow’abazaire be.

Abahima n’Abairu bakaba batashwerana. Abahima bakaba bakishanga nk’ekiri
kuhemurana kushwerwa Omwiru, kandi kikaba kitari kwikirizibwa Omuhima
kuheereza Omwiru ente. Mbwenu omwiru akaba naareebwa nk’otaine nte
z’okuheereza yo nk’enjugano ahakuba bakaba bari abahingi. Ente zikaba ziri
ez’omugasho munonga kutari aha kushwera kwonka baitu n’omu maka ahabw’okuba
nizo zaabaire zoorora abaana.

Omukazi owaabaire atari kuzaara akaba aba ataine ekitiinisa omu Banyankore.
Eki kikaba kituma buri mukazi kwenda okushwerwa akazaara abaana. Omukazi ku
yaabaire atazaara, omushaija we akaba ashwera ondiijo. Omushaija kugira
abakazi baingi kikaba nikiikirizibwa ahakuba omugabe n’abagaiga bakaba
bashwera abakazi baingi.

Obwa hati, nihaaba hariho omuntu wa kashatu ou bari kweta kateera-rume
nainga kyebembera. Aine kuba naamanya amaka gombi kurungi. Ogu niwe ari
kwebembera baakishwera nainga ab’omugore omushaija okuteisa aha njugano
n’eby’okuhingira. Kateera-rume aine ekitiinisa kandi niwe arikuza omu maka
g’omukazi omugore kureebeka ngu ab’omu maka ago baabaikiriza hamwe n’omu
kushaba kushwera omu maka ago.

Okushaba ku kwabaire kwikirizibwa, eka y’omwishiki ekaba ebeeta kugaaniira
aha by’enjugano. Kateera-rume niwe yaabaire ayebembera abagyenyi abo, niwe
ari kuteera kodi aha muryango kandi nibaba tibari kwikirizibwa kutaahamu
baba batabaikiriize. Aha rwigi orwo, hakaba habaho ebibuzo bitari bimwe na
bimwe biri kuruga omu maka g’omukazi. Ab’omushaija nibakira kwija
n’amaarwa. Aha nyima bakaba bagaaniira aha njungano n’ebindi birabo
kurugiirira aha bi eka y’omwishiki eri kwenda. Abamwe nibabiheera aho.
Amaka agamwe bakaba booheerezayo ente ezi baabaire nibeeta enkwata-rugo.
Eki kikaba niki kira kukozesibwa omu Bahima.

Ente ku zaabaire zihika omu maka g’omwishiki, hakaba hakorwa omugyenzo ngu
ahu mukuru w’omugore yaabaire ahemba akariro kandi eki kikaba nikyetwa
“okuhembera”. Aho hakaba hakurataho okwevuga reero orunaku rw’okuhingira
ruheebwa.

Omu kigaaniiro eki nainga omu kwikirizagana, abagore bombi tibashemeire
kwejumbira omu kigaaniiro eki. Omugore ow’omwishiki akaba asherekwa hare
ahu yaabaire atashemereire kuhurikiza ebi bari kugamba nainga kuteisaho;
kandi omugore ow’omwojo akaba aba ataine kugamba, akaba aine okuguma
ahunami ategyereize ebyarugamu. Omu bwire obwo, omugore omushaija naaba ari
nk’omugabe ahakuba buri kimwe niba kimukorera.

Omuri Ankore, omushaija niwe ashwera omukazi, baitu ti mukazi kushwera
omushaija. Kikaba ni kizira omukazi kushaba okushwera omushaija. Kare
abakazi bakye bakaba batari barungi b’okushwera n’obu hati abashaija bari
kukunda abari nk’abo.

Okuhingira nigwo gwabaire guri omukoro muhango munonga. Omugore omwishiki
akaba aheebwa ebirabo bingi kuruna omu banyabuzare be. Ebirabo ebi nibyo
byabaire bimuyamba kutandikaho amaka amasya. Ishe w’omwishiki niwe yaabaire
aine omurimo gw’okuronda ebirabo ebi.

Omugamba nikyo kirabo kyabaire kiri eky’omugasho munonga. Omugamba n’ekiti
kirungi ahu ebirabo bingi by’obuhangwa baabaire babikwasa. Aha mugamba ogu
hakaba hariho ebyanzi. Omubaro gw’ebyanzi gukaba gugyenda n’ente ezi
baaheereza omu njugano. Ku baabaire baheereza ente ishatu, ebyanzi nabyo
bikaaba biba bishatu. Ekindi hakaba haba hariho eicuba ery’okukoresa ku
shukyera ente amaizi, ebishaabo n’ebirere by’okucundiramu n’okubiikamu
amakamo hamwe n’enkuuyo, akarobo, ekigagara, ekicunga, amajuta g’okwesiiga
hamwe n’eky’oku muyamba omu kitanda.

Ebyevugo bikaba bikorwa kuruga omu maka g’omwojo kworeka okusiima kwabo
ahabw’ebirabo. Emikoro ekaba ekuratwa okugamba kw’abantu batari bamwe na
bamwe kuruga embaju zoona, okurya hamwe n’okunywa hamwe n’okushemeza
omukoro.

Akasheeshe akaabaire kakurataho, omwishiki akaba arira obwo arikuruga omu
maka gaabo arikuza ow’iba. Ah’eizooba ry’okuhingira, abaana abato omu maka
ago abu bari kweta eshangarizi bakaba bashendekyereza omugore omukazi
ow’omushaija we beitu obwo yaamara kutunga emigisha kuruga ow’ishe, nyina
n’abandi abakuru omu maka ago. Omushendekyereza omukuru akaba ari
ishenkazi. Omugore omushaija niwe yaabaire atebeekanisa entambura
y’enshagarizi kuza omu maka ge kwonka okurugayo kwabo kukaba kutamukwataho.

Omugore omukazi ku yaabaire ahikayo, akaba atandika n’omugyenzo
gw’okushutama aha bibero by’ishezaara. Eki kikaba nikimanyisa ngu nawe
yaaba omukazi we; kasita n’ente ezaabaire ziba zimujugire zikaba ziba ziri
eze. Enshagarizi zikaba zitaaha nainga obumwe baraara aho ekiro kimwe,
kwonka ishenkazi akaba agumayo kumara ebiro nka bina ari kugumizamu
kuhabura omwishiki aha by’omubonano n’okureeberera amaka. Abandi abantu
kuruga omu maka g’omwishiki bakaba baija kwakiira ishenkazi aha nyima
y’ebiro, kandi omwishiki ku yaabaire aba ashugaine bakaba babaheereza
ebirabo ebyabaire biriimu ente n’embuzi omu bindi bingi.

Aha nyima y’okuhingira, omugore omukazi nabwo ti haine eki arikuba
ashemereire kukora kandi nabwo bakaba bamubiika omu kishengye bari
kumuriisa gye hamwe n’okumunyisa amate. Ti haine murimo gu ashemereire
kukora kumara ebiro ikumi. Eki nibakyeta orusiika. Aho nibamara babakozesa
omugyenzo omu kiyungu ogw’okukoza omuriro ahu omugore ari kuhemba omuriro
omurundi gw’okubanza omu maka ago.

Ku haabaire hahwaho emyezi nk’ena, omwojo n’omwishiki bakaba bagaruka
ow’omwishiki kutayaaya eki baabaire nibeeta “okutaatsya ekihara”. Omukoro
ogu hakaba haba hariho okushemererwa – na munonga omukazi ku yaabaire aba
aine enda. Aha nyima y’okutayaaya, bakaba baheebwa ente y’okugyendana
owaabo. Ogu gukaba gukira kuba omukoro gw’aha muheru.

Hakaba hariho ogundi mugyenzo ogwabaire gwetwa okuteera oruhoko. Eki kikaba
nikikorwa kare na kare. Omwishiki ku yaabaire ayanga kukunda nainga
kushwerwa omwojo ahabw’enshonga ez’omwishiki yaabaire aba aine, omwojo
akaba ateekwa kushwera ogwo mwishiki aha mpaka, kandi atakozire emikoro
nk’okuhingira n’ebindi. Baitu omutsigazi ku yaabaire asigura, akaba
ashashura enjugano nyingiho.

Oruhoko rukaba nirukorwa omu miringo mingi. Omuringo ogw’okubanza bakaba
bakozesa enshaaki. Omwojo oyangirwe omwishiki akaba akwata enshaaki, aza
omu maka g’omwishiki, agitambikayo atwo airuka. Omwishiki akaba aba aine
kutwarwa omu maka g’omwojo ahonaaho ahakuba bakaba nibaikiriza ngu enshaaki
egyo ku yaabaire ejuga omwishiki akiri owaabo atakakurasire omwojo,nainga
batakatandikire entebeekanisa z’obugyenyi, omugore nainga ondiijo muntu omu
maka aga akaba afa.

Ogundi omuringo gw’okuteera oruhoko kukaba kuri okusiiga esaano y’oburo
ah’amaisho n’omwishiki. Omwojo ku yaabaire abona omugisha akashanga
omwishiki naasa esaano – obwire obwo bakaba baseera aha rubengo – akaba
aihaho akasaano aha rubengo, akasiiga aha maisho g’omwishiki reero airuka.
Entebeekanisa y’obugyenyi ekaba etandikiraho ahonaaho kandi ku kyabaire
kitakorwa, omwishiki nainga ondiijo muntu omu maka ago akaba afa.

Namunonga omu Bahima, hakaba hariho emiringo eshatu endiijo ey’okuteera
oruhoko. Omuringo gw’okubanza, omwojo akaba ateeka akahungye omu maraka
g’omwishiki haza eki akaba akikorera omu bantu baingi reero yaamara
akigamba munonga kumanyisa buri omwe ngu yaata akahungye aha mwishiki ou
yaabaire naayenda.

Ogundi muringo kukaba kuri okuteeka ekimera ekibari kweta orwihura aha
mutwe g’omwishiki. Obumwe, omwojo akaba ashuka amate aha maisho g’omwishiki
owamwangire ku yaabaire aba naakama.

Okuteera oruhoko kikaba kiri ekikorwa kibi munonga kandi abatsigazi
abaabaire bakikora bakaba bari bariya abashobiirwe kandi abataine kindi
kintu kibari kubaasa kukora. Omwojo ku yaabaire airuka kwonka akakwatwa
ab’amaka g’omwishiki, ka tugire ngu yaamara kutambika enkoko haza bairuka
baamukwata, akaba atunga ekifubiro.

Omwojo n’omwishiki ku baabaire baremwa okuhangaara omu maka, omwojo akaba
aheereza omutango ahu ente ezindi zaabaire zishabwa baitu obwo batagarurize
ente z’enjugano.

Eki niki kuratwa embaga y’okuhingira. Omuri Ankore, enjugano zikaba ziri
ente – obwire bwingi ente ezirengire ikumi (10). Ebi ebirabo bikaba
biheebwa eka y’omugore omwishiki nk’akabonero k’okworeka ku omwojo aine
obushoboorozi bw’okureeberera omwishiki.

Omuri Ankore, bakaba bataikiriza omwana w’omwishiki kutwarira aha mahega
nainga kutwara enda akiri omu maka g’ishe na nyina. Omwishiki ku yaabaire
atwara enda, akaba ayeita, nainga atoroka aha kyaro abura. Omwishiki
kutwara enda atakashwirwe kikaba nikireebeka nk’ekintu kibi munonga.
Omwishiki owaabaire agira enda akiri omu ka, akaba atwarwa ah’eibango rya
Kisizi, reero omwojo waabo akaba amusindikayo afa.

Abanyankore nibatwara abaana b’aboojo nk’ekintu ky’omuhendo ahakuba nibo
bari kusikira b’ishe. Omuzaire nainga taata ku yaabaire aba arwaire akaba
ashabwa kutoorana omusika omu batabani. Obwire obwingi, omutabani omukuru
niwe yaabaire atooranwa. Omusika akaba atwara eby’obugaiga n’eiziina
ry’ishebo kandi niwe yaabaire areebeerera nyina ishe yaaba yaafiire.
Ab’oruganda ku baabaire bareeba ngu ishe tiyaatoorana kurungi omusika
bakaba bamuhabura kandi ku byabaire birema, bakaba baronda ou bari
kuteekateeka ngu naabaasa obusika.

Kandi omugabe ku yaabaire afa okumusikira kukaba kurugiirira aha bintu
bibiri. Eky’okubanza omuntu ogwo akaba ashemeire kuruga omu ruganda
rw’abagabe. Ekindi akaba naateekwa kuba aine amaani maingi kandi ari kukiza
batabani b’omugabe abandi boona. Obumwe okaba otareeba omuntu aho okamanya
ngu aine amaani. Mbwenu eki babaire bakora, bakaba batebeekanisaho okurwana
kw’abatabani. Omwe ku yaabaire asinga mutaahi we, owaasingwa akaba aburaho
nainga obumwe barwaana oshanga omwe yaafa. Owaabaire asinga aho akaba
aheebwa engoma y’obugabe.

Abanyankore bakaba baine obwebembezi burungi kandi butebeekaine. Aha mutwe
gw’omwebembezi hakaba hariho omugabe,hakurataho enganzi, reero abandi
bakaba bari abakuru b’ebyanga. Entebe y’omugabe ekaba neesikirwa kandi
omugabe akaba aruga omu ruganda rw’Abahinda orwa baire ni rumanywa
nk’oruganda rw’abagabe kandi bakaba nibatwarwa nk’abari kuruga owa Ruhanga.

Omugabe akaba aine amaani maingi kandi eki yaabaire agamba ti haine
owaabaire akihakanisa nainga kuhinduraho. Akaba aine amaani g’okurwana,
kuronda amahe, kandi aine n’obushoboorozi – haihi nk’obwa Ruhanga. Omugabe
akaba acwamu aha nshonga z’okutenga orutaro nainga haaba haine kugumaho
obusingye. Niwe yaabaire atoorana abandi baami b’okukora nabo. Abu yaabaire
atoorana akaba ababinga aha mirimo ku baabaire bakora kubi emirimo yaabo
nainga baareetera omugabe ebisiraani. Omugabe akaba aine abandi bakozi
abaabaire barimu abasirikare nainga amahe, abazaana b’omu rubiri hamwe
n’abandi batari bamwe na bamwe.

Abandi bantu abaabaire baine omugasho omu kikaari ky’omugabe hakaba harimu
nyina w’omugabe nainga omugabe-kazi hamwe na mwene-nyina. Aba nibo baabaire
baine obushoboorozi kuhakanisa ebi omugabe yaagamba nainga kuhinduraho. Ti
haine owaabaire afubirwa omu kikaari ky’omugabe, omugabe yaaba ateebuurize
aha babiri aba.

Aha hakaba hakurutaho enganzi eyaabaire eine agandi maziina nk’omukungu
omukundwa, omukungu owaabaire akira abandi boona, omukungu omuhabuzi,
omukungu orikukiza amaani omu gandi maziina maingi. Enganzi niyo yaabaire
eikirizibwa kutaaha omu kikaari ky’omugabe eshaaha yoona na haaba hatariho
rukiiko. Ekaba etuura haihi n’omugabe kwenda ngu omugabe abone enganzi egi
ahu arikugyendera hoona.

Abangyereza batakaizire, enganzi ekaba etooranwa kuruga omu Bahima kwonka
ku baizire baahinduraho baaragiira ngu enganzi etandike kutooranwa kuruga
omu mbaju zoona. Mpaho n’Abairu nabo bakaba baba enganzi.

Obutware bw’Ankore bukaba bwine amashaza ikumi-na-mukaaga (16) kandi buri
ishaza rikaba riine omukungu owaabaire atooranwa omugabe. Abakungu aba
bakaba bari abariisa baine Abairu nainga abahiigi nk’abakozi baabo.
Omukungu akaba ataine maani maingi gari aho; ogwe gukaba guri
ogw’okureeberera abantu abaabaire baija omu ishaza rye kuriisizamu ente
zaabo. Eitaka ryona rikaba nirikoresibwa owaabiire aba naaryenda okukira
abariisa b’ente. Omukungu ogu nawe akaba aba aine abakama ahansi ye
b’okumuhwera omu kushorooza emishoro hamwe n’okumweta ku haabaire habaho
enshonga mpango erikwetenga obukuru bwe. Abakama aba bakaba bakira kuba
bari Abairu.

Omugabe niwe yaabaire aine amaani g’okushara emishango. Akaba aheereza
ebibonerezo nk’okuteera, okwita, okubonaabonesa, omu bindi bingi. Akaba
ayaka n’abantu ente zaabo. Emishango eyaabaire etari y’amaani akaba
agiheereza engazi ye, kwonka emanja ezaabaire eziba nizirenzya ente 50
nainga abakazi kusigaho b’ibabo, ebyo akaba abyekoreraho. Omugabe akaba
atashutama buriijo kucwan emanja, kwonka ku haabaire hagira ekyabaho,
enganzi ye ekaba ebireeta bikiba nibyetenga omugabe, ayeta orukiiko kucwa
orubanja orwo.

Omuntu ku yaabaire aibwaho ente ze, omugabe akaba areeba ngu omuntu ogwo
baamugarura ente ze. Owaabaire anaga ente ze nainga ebindi bintu, omugabe
akaba amuyamba kureebeka ngu ebintu ebyo nainga ente zaagarukaho, kandi
abantu ku baabaire bafeerwa omunyabuzaare waabo, namunonga yaaba aitsirwe,
omugabe akaba abaheereza orusa kwita eka eyaabashobeize.

Omugabe ku yaabaire afa, hakaba habaho obutaikirizana omu kyanga eki bari
kurondamu oraamuze omu bigyere. Obumwe, abakazi be abamwe nainga abakuru
n’abakozi omu kikaari ky’omugabe bakaba baitwa. Eki kikaba kikorwa ngu
omugabe akaba atafa wenka mbwenu aba bakaba bashendekyereza omugabe omu nsi
endiijo. Abandi abaabaire baitwa hakaba harimu abantu abari kuruga omu
ruganda rw’Abasingo. Omubiri gw’omugabe gukaba nigumanywa nk’omuguta
kwenda ngu gugireho entaaniso n’emibiri ey’abandi bantu eyaabaire neemanywa
nk’emitumbi. Omukama akaba aziikwa ab’oruganda rw’Abayangwe. Kandi omuntu
ku yaabaire aza kubika okufa kw’omugabe akaba atagira ngu omugabe afiire
kwihaho akaba agira ngu omugabe ataahize.

Abairu abingi bakaba bari abakurisitayo, kandi Abahima bari abakurisito.
Mbwenu entebe ez’ahaiguru enyingi zikaba zitwarwa abakurisitayo. Eki
tikirashemeize abakuristu hamwe n’abasiramu bakye abaabaire bariho. Aha
nyima hakabarukaho okurwana, n’obu kuraabe kwarahukire kuhwaho.

Entebe y’omugabe ekaba eine ebintu bingi ebyabaire birimu amacumu n’engoma.
Omuri ebi, engoma niyo yaabaire eri ey’omugasho munonga. Ekaba neeyetwa
Bagyendanwa. Hakaba hariho okwikiriza ngu engoma egi ekakorwa Wamala,
owaabaire ari omwebembezi w’aha amuheru w’Abachwezi. Engoma egi ekaba
eteerwa baba nibataho omugabe omusya. Ekaba neebiikwa omu kafuuha akaayo
kwonka kandi gukaba guri omuziro kukinga akafuuha ako. Hakaba hatuuraho
omuriro guri kwaka kandi gukaba guraazibwa omugabe yaaba afiire. Engoma egi
ekaba eine ente ezaayo hamwe n’ezindi ngoma ezaabaire nizeetwa nyakashaija,
eigura, kooma, njeri ya buremba – kandi ezi zoona bakaziiha omuri Buzimba.

Ekikaari ky’omugabe kikaba kyombekwa aha mugongo, kiine orugo ruraingwa
munonga rukozirwe omu bisharagaate. Akaba aba aine embuga mpango munonga
y’okuriisizamu ente. Hakaba hombekwaho emyanya endiijo mirungi y’abakazi
b’omugabe hamwe n’abakozi be abandi. Hakaba habaho ah’okutaahiramu hahango
ahu abagyenyi baabaire bataahiramu, reero hakaba habaho obundi obuhanda ahu
abakozi baabaire baraba.

Ankore nayo ekaba eine entaro nyingi kutandikira omu maka, kuza omu byanga,
kuza omu mashaza, mpaka aheeru y’amahanga agandi. Hakaba hariho okurwana
omu by’obutegyeki hamwe n’amadiini.

Orutaro rw’ensi yoona orwa kabiri ku rwahweireho, Abairu bakanga enkora
n’ntegyeka eyaabaire eriho ey’Abahima baingi kushutama omu ntebe
ez’ahaiguru. Eki ku baakyangire, baatandikaho akabiina akaabaire nikeetwa
“kumanyana”. Abahima nangwa tibara kihakaniise munonga, kwonka eki kibiina
kikaba kiri eky’okuyamba Abairu kuhezaho okubonaabonesibwa oku Abahima
baabaire babataho.

Orundi rutaro rukaba ruri orw’omugabe n’abebembezi b’Abajungu. Omugabe
akatandika kwereeba nk’ori kujoogwa Abajungu aba kandi obwo Abajungu bo
bakaba nibagira ngu omugabe akaba atari kukora emirimo ye nk’oku yaabaire
ashemereire kugikora.

Ankore ekaba eine amahe marungi munonga kandi aga mahe gakaba gaine emitwe,
buri mutwe gwine mukama waagwo ari kumanywa nka mukuru w’ekyanga kandi
obumwe ari kwetwa omukungu.

Okurwana okwingi kukaba kuruga omu mashaza agaabaire geetooreire Nkore nka
Karagwe na Buhweju. Bunyoro nayo ekaba ekira kutaahiirira Nkore.
Ekataahiiriraho Nkore omu bwire bw’obutegyeki bwa Ntare I, Nyabugaro, Ntare
IV na Kitabanyoro. Omu bwire bwa Ntare IV hakabaho orundi rutaro ahagati
y’Abanyankore n’abaserukare ba Kabaundani omuri Buhweju. Omu bwire
bw’omugabe Machwa aha nyima y’okufa kw’omugabe Ntare IV, okutaahiirira
Irebe omugabe wa Bwera kukabaho. Oku bakaibayo ente nyingi hamwe na rutaari
y’omugabe ogwo ei baabaire bakoresa kugwisa enjura. Abanyarwanda n’omugabe
waabo Kigyeri III Ndarabasa nabo bakataahiirira Nkore omu bwire bw’omugabe
Kahaya I Nyamwanga.

Omu kuzaara, Abanyankore bakaba bataine biragiro. Kwonka omukazi ku
yaabaire aba naaza kuzaara omurundi gwe gw’okubanza, akaba asindikwa owa
nyina. Abakazi abaingi bakaba bazaara bataine buyambi kuruga omu bazaarisa.
Kwonka omukazi ku yaabaire aremwa, omuzaarisa akaba ayetwa. Obwire obwingi
abazaarisa aba bakaba bari abakaikuru aha kyaro. Ekyanyima ku kyabaire
kibura kwija omukazi yaamara kuzaara, emibazi y’ekishaka ekaba eheebwa,
kandi ku yaabaire eremwa kuyamba, omushaija w’omukazi akaba atemba aha
mutwe gw’enju aine eshekur, reero ateera enduru asindika eshekuro egwa
ahansi.

Omwana akaba aheebwa eiziina yaamara ati kuzaarwa. Obumwe kukaba kuri aha
muheru gwa nyina kuruga omu nju, obwire oburi kwetwa ekiriri. Omukazi akaba
aguma omu nju kumara ebiro bina omwana yaaba ari omwojo kandi bishatu aha
mwana w’omwishiki. Ebiro ebyo ku byabaire bihwaho, omukazi akaba agumizamu
n’okuteerana n’omushaija we ekyabaire nikyetwa okucwa ekizaire.

Eiziina eryabaire riheebwa omwana rikaba niri gyendera aha mbeera ezi nyina
nainga ishe baabaire baba nibarabamu, obwire obu omwana yaazaarirwamu,
ebiro by’okwezi, omwanya ogu bamuzaariiremu, nainga eiziina ry’abaafaire.
Eiziina rikaba riheebwa ishe w’omwana, ishenkuru hamwe na nyina w’omwana.
Obwire obwingi ishe niwe yaabaire ariha. Amaziina agaabaire gaheebwa,
gakaba gaba gaine eki gari kumanyisa. Eky’okureeberaho, Kyomuhendo rikaba
nirimanyisa ngu abazaire nibareeba omwana nk’ekintu ky’omuhendo omu maka
ago. Omu maziina ag’aboojo hakaba harimu: Baguma, Baingana, Bajuna,
Bamutonda, Bareeba, Baritsigara, Beesigye, Beeyamba, Buhiirwa n’agandi
maingi kandi omu g’abakazi hakaba harimu Burindana, Birungi, Busingye,
Bwijwiire omu gandi maingi.

Omwana ku yaabaire amara nk’emyezi ena, ishe akaba akwata omwana w’omwojo,
amushutamisa omurundi gw’okubanza, amuheereza eiziena rya beishenkuru
abaafeire, kandi amuheereza ente ibiri z’okukoresa. Omukazi nawe akaba
atwara omwana w’omwishiki amushutamisa omurundi gw’okubanza, amuheereza
eiziina rya baanyinekuru be abaafeire, amutwara aheeru amworeka ebigo
by’ente kandi amugambira ngu obugaiga n’emigisha biraaruga omuri uwe.

Omukazi akaba ashemeire kukuragye, kandi omwana ku yaabaire akura mpora,
namunonga yaaremwa okutambura, bakaba bamukomaho obude aha maguru ge
kumuyamba okutambura kwenda ngu atamburire omu kuteera kw’obude obwo.

Omwana akaba aguma na nyina ekiro n’omushana mpaka omwaka guhwaire. Akaba
amuheeka, ari kukora emirimo ye nainga yaaba ahingire. Omwana akaba aguma
naaraara na nyina mpaka omwana ondijo aizire. Omukazi ku yaabaire agira
enda, omwana akaaba abyama na baishenkazi, nainga abamwe babatwarira
baanyinenkuru, baishentobo.

Omu myaka yaabo ey’obuto, nk’emyaka mushanju, aboojo na’abaishiki bakaba
bazaana hamwe, bariisa hamwe. Namunonga bakaba bazaana emizaano etari emwe
n’emwe aharimu okuzaana eby’abagore, eby’aba maama, okwombeka, okufukaana,
okurasha, okwoga omu bidiba, okuzina, hamwe n’akahuuna. Amate kikaba
nikireebwa nk’ekyokurya ky’abaana kandi abaana bakaba baganywa munonga.

Omwana w’omwishiki ku yaabire aza omu micwe, akaba agambira nyina owaabaire
acwamu kugambira ishe nainga kukihunama mpaka areebire omwishiki we akuzire
ahabwo’kuba, omwishiki ku yaabaire aza omu micwe, entebeekanisa z’oku
muhingira zikaba zitandika.

Omu by’okuzaana, abaana – namunonga aboojo – bakaba bazinga emipiira
y’ebireere, abaishiki boogosha abaana nainga boona hamwe bazaana ebya
baamaama-na-taata, akahuuna, citapo. aboojo nangwa bakaba bakunda okuzaana
eby’okufukaana n’emigyere kureeba ori kukiza amaani.

Abanyankore bakaba nibaikiriza ngu hariho Ruhanga owaabaire naatuura omu
iguru. Bakaba bashaba eshaara zitari zimwe na zimwe. Eshaara namunonga
ez’okumusiima aha kuzaarwa kw’omwana. Bakaba basiima Mukama bari kuteera
omu ngaro bagumize ngu: yebare taata Ruhanga. Omu bwire bw’oburwaire,
bakaba bashaba Ruhanga kutambira omurwaire.

Okurugiirira aha Banyankore, Ruhanga akahanga omuntu w’okubanza Rugabe
hamwe n’omukazi w’okubanza, Nyamate, abaabaire baine kuzaara bakaijuza
ensi. Omuri aba babiri, nibaikiriza ngu hakazaarwamu abagabe, abu ahakufa
kwabo, bakaba batwarwa nka baaruhanga abari kuhwera Ruhanga. Aba bakaba
baine emirimo; hakaba hariho ruhanga ow’emisisa, ruhanga owa ruzaaro,
n’ebindi bingi; kandi abo nibo abu abantu baabaire bashaba ebyetaago byabo.
Bwaruhanga obundi bakaba nibabweta emandwa.

Oihireho abagabe abaabaire bahindukamu baaruhanga aha nyima y’okufa,
Abanyankore bakaba nibaikiririza omu mizimu munonga. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu
emizimu ekaba etuura neetambura ku hwera abahuriire nainga kufubira abo
abaabaire bakora kubi. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu emizimu ekaba etari kureebwa
kwonka ekaba ehurirwa omu miyaga, omu mariisizo hamwe n’omu miti baaba
bariisize. Omu bahingi, emizimu bakaba bagihurira omu misiri yaabo. Abantu
bakaba bakira kushaba emizimu obuyambi kukira okushaba Ruhanga. Emizimu egi
bakaba bagihongyera munonga. Buri ka omuri Ankore ekaba eine akafuuha
k’emandwa kandi hoona n’ente, enyaama, amate n’ebindi bikaba bihongyerwa
emizimu. Abanyankore bakaba bataine diini emwe.

Abanyankore bakaba baine emikoro etari emwe n’emwe. Hakaba hariho
ey’okushemererwa hamwe n’ey’okurira. Emikoro ey’okushemererwa ekaba erimu:
okuzaarwa kw’omwana, okuhayo abaana, okuteeka omugabe aha ngoma, okwakiira
abagyenyi abareesire enjugano, omu bindi bingi. Emikoro ey’enaku ekaba
erimu: okufa kw’omuntu omu maka ago, okufa kw’omugabe, oburwaire n’ebindi
bingi. Emikoro egi ekaba abamu okurya, okuzina, okunywa amaarwa, okutonzya
nainga okugamba omu bindi bingi.

Abanyankore bakaba bakora ebintu bingi by’okushemeza nk’ebyeshongoro,
okuzina, okukora ebibumbe, okuruka, okubaziira, hamwe n’okwevuga.
Abanyankore baingi bahandiikire obutabo obubari kwejunisa omu mashomero.
Abazaire n’abaana baabo nibakira kutebya emboozi barikugaaniira ebyabaireho
ira. Hakaba hariho obweshongoro obw’okusiima abarwani baaheza kusingura
engamba, obweshongoro buri kusiima ente zaabo ahabw’okubonera hamwe
n’ebiziri kukora nk’oku baha amate. Bakaba bakozesa emikuri, bateera engoma
hamwe n’engaro baaba nibazina kandi bari kweshongora.

Bakaba bakora eby’okweyambisa omu kuhinga nk’amafuka, empango, emihoro
kandi bakora eby’okwerindisa nk’emisyo, amacumu hamwe n’obuta. Bakaba
babumba enyungu, baruka emiceeka n’ebiibo; bakaba boogosha enkwanzi
z’okwehundisa omu maraka, omu bigyere, hamwe n’omu matu.

Abanyankore tibari kwikiiririza omu ndwara kandi nibagira ngu endwara
nizireetwa Ruhanga, baaruhanga abandi, emizimu, nainga oburogo. Okukira
munonga, bakaba baikiriza ngu Ruhanga niwe ari kureeta oburwaire n’okufa
ahakuba niwe agaba amagara – mbwenu okugatwara bakaba bakireeba nk’eki
Ruhanga yaacwamu. Omuzimu gukaba gureetaho oburwaire nainga okufa ente ei
baabaire baba baguhongiire ku baabaire bagiguza bateebuurize aha muzimu
ogwo; baabura ku guhongyera; nainga ku baabaire bahenda ebiragiro
by’oruganda rwabo. Omuzimu ogwabaire gwoherezibwa ab’oruganda orundi gukaba
gureeta oburwaire nari rufu. Omuntu ku yaabaire aba anyigire na mutaahi we,
omugyenzo ogu baabaire bakora gukaba guri okuheereza omuntu amaarwa
kunywaho.

Oburwaire ku bwabaire buba butari obw’amaani, omukazi akaba areeberera iba,
kandi nyina w’omwishiki akaba areebeerera omuhara obwo bari kwejunisa
emibazi y’ekishaka. Oburwaire ku bwabaire bwanga ku kira, omushaho
w’ekishaka akaba ayetwa kubaheereza obujanjabi. Omushaho w’ekishaka
ow’omukazi akaba akora aha bakazi bonka kandi ow’omushaija akaba akora aha
bakazi n’abashaija.

Omu Banyankore, okurwara ku kaba kutari kureebwa nk’ekintu ekyabaire kiita
omuntu. Mbwenu omuntu ku yaabaire afa, hakaba habaho okucondooza kuronda
owaareetaho okufa okwo. Abantu abakuru ku baabaire bafa, hakaba hatabaho
okucondooza ahakuba bakaba nibaikiriza ngu Ruhanga akaba ayeta abantu
abakuru ahakuba bakaba baamaara emirimo yaabo omu nsi. Kandi Abanyankore
bakaba nibaikiriza ngu okufa n’okuza omu nsi endiijo.

Omushaija ku yaabaire afa, buri munyabuzaare weena akaba aine kuza aha
rufu, kandi abataahi na banywani b’omushaija nabo bakaba baine kubaho.
Owaabaire aburaho akaba acondoozibwa kandi ku baabaire bashanga ngu yaaba
ataine nshonga y’amaani ahabwaki ataaza aha rufu rwa mutaahi we, akaba
acwerwa omushago gw’okwita omuntu ogwo.

Omutumbi gukaba guguma omu nju mpaka ahu abanyabuzaare be boona baabaire
baija. Omu Bairu, omuntu akaba aziikwa omu mbuga nainga omu rutookye. Kandi
omu Bahiima, omuntu akaba aziikwa omu rugo rw’ente. Okuziika kukaba kukorwa
omu ihangwe.

Orufu ku rwabaire ruba rutakabaireho, omutumbi gukaba gunaabisibwa, amaisho
bagakinga – eki abantu barikweta okuhinya. Omutumbi ku gwabaire guba
niguziikwa, omukono gwe gwa buryo gukaba guteekwa ahansi y’omutwe, reero
ogwa bumosho guza aha kifuba. Omutumbi gukaba gubyamira aha rubaju rwa
buryo.

Ente nk’ibiri zikaba zibaagwa hamwe n’amaarwa gareetwa nk’omuringo gumwe
gw’okusiibura omuntu ogwo. Orufu rukaba rutwara ebiro bina nainga bitaano.
Omukazi nawe ku yaabaire afa, emigyenzo ekaba eri emwe kwihaho bakaba uwe
bakaba bamuteeka omu kituuru ari kureeba bumosho. Eki kikaba nikikorwa omu
migyezo kugira ngu omukazi abyama naareeba omushaija we. Omukono gwe gwa
buryo gukaba gumuza aha kifuba.

0mu bwire bw’orufu, abantu b’aha kyaro bakaba batari kwikirizibwa kuhinga
nainga okukora ogundi murimo gwona ogwabaire nigwetenga okukoresa emikono
yaabo. Omuntu ku yaabaire ahinga, akaba areetera ekyaro kyona kutunga
ebizibu nainga okuteerwa orubaare. Kandi ogu nagwo gukaba guri omuringo
gumwe gw’oku huumuriza ab’eka efeereirwe.

Omufu ku yaabaire aba ari omushaija nyine-eka, enumi enungi omu matungo ge
ekaba ebaagwa kandi eriibwa omu rufu rwe. Abaabaire baba batakashwire haza
bakafa, emigyenzo etari emwe n’emwe ekaba ekorwa. Owaabaire ayeita, akaba
aihwa aha muti ogu ayehanikireho; omukazi otakizaara niwe yaabire ashara
omunaga ogu ayetugiise. Omutumbi gukaba gutakwatwaho kandi ekituuru kikaba
kitimbwa ahansi y’omuti kwenda ngu omunaga baagushara bati, omutumbi guhike
nigugwa omu kiina, reero bashweke bamare. Hakaba hatabaho ekyosho kyona,
nainga okuziika nk’okwa buriijo; hakaba hatabaho okutonzya. Omuti ogu
yaabaire ayehanikireho gukaba gukuurwa kandi bagwosya. Ab’eka ye bakaba
batari kwikirizibwa nangwa n’oku guteekyesa nainga ku gwosyamu amakara.

Emigyenzo eya abo abaabaire batakashwirwe nainga kushwera ekaba etwazibwa
eti: Omwishiki owaabaire aba atakashwirwe akaba akorwaho emigyenzo etari
emwe n’emwe ahakuba bakaba nibaikiriza ngu omuzimu gwe gukaba nigwija ku
garuka kuteganisa abahuriire ahakuba akafa atamazirwe omu nsi – nk’oku
shwerwa n’okuzaara. Mbwenu kwenda kusirika omuzimu ogu, omwe ahari
banyaanya b’omwishiki, omwe omu boojo abari kuzaarwa n’omugyenzi – akaba
ayeshushaniiriza nk’okukora eby’omubonano n’omurambo gw’omwishiki. Eki
kikaba nikimanywa nk’okugyeza empango aha mutwe. Omutumbi bakaba bagurabya
aha rwigi orutari rwa buriijo – orw’ekaanyima. Omwojo ku yaabaire afa,
akaba aziikwa aine omutumba.Ogu gukaba guri ogw’okweshushaniiriza
nk’omukazi we. Omubiri gwe nagwo bakaba bagurabya omu rwigi orutari rwa
buriijo, orw’ekaanyima.

Omu by’okujwara, Abanyankore bakaba bajwara ebijwaro bitari kushushana
kurugiirira aha bitiinisa ebi baabaire baba baine. Abakungu omu
by’obutegyeki omuri Ankore bakaba bajwara ebijwaro biraingwa nainga ekanzu
ebikozirwe omu mpu z’ente. Abantu aba buriijo bakaba bajwara empu eza
buriijo aha mabega gaabo hamwe n’okushweka ebicweka by’ekihama. Abakazi
aha bitiinisa byona bakaba bajwara empu z’ente kandi bashweka emibiri yaabo
yoona. Kandi ku baabaire baaba bari omu bantu, bakaba bashweka ah’amaisho.
Ku haizire omurembe gw’ebijwaro, abashaija hati nibajwara ekanzu naingwa
eza mutare okukira aha mikoro nangwa abamwe nibatekaho n’amakooti. Abakazi
nibajwara obusyuti obu bari kukoramu obuteeteeyi hamwe n’emishanana – kandi
ebi biine kuba biri biraingwa.

Omu Banyankore, eka ekaba eba erimu omwana, nyina n’ishe, baitu obwire
obwingi, bakaba batuura n’abanyabuzaare baabo harimu baanyinenkuru na
baishenkuru, baanyinarimi hamwe n’abandi. Obumwe, omukazi ku yaabaire
ashwerwa akaba aguma naatuura n’eishezaara hamwe na nyinazaara nainga aguma
naatuura haihi nabo bari kukozesa ebintu bimwe nk’embuga, ekiyungu,
ebihoroonyo omu bindi bingi.

Abanyankore bakaba bagira ebibiina biri kwetwa oruganda. Abahinda (oru
rukaba ruri oruganda rw’abagabe), abagahe, abashambo, abateizi, abahira
hamwe n’abandi baingi. Abahinda bakaba baine emiziro ebiri erimu encende
erikwiragura aha maisho hamwe n’oburo butashekwire nainga obutagoire.
Abagahe bakaba batakozesa emibazi y’ekishaka nainga okurya oburo
butashekwire. Okuzira ekintu nikimanyisa ngu torikukikoresa nainga
okukirya. Kandi omwojo n’omwishiki b’oruganda rumwe bakaba bataikirizibwa
kushwerana ahakuba kikaba ni kizira. Omwojo akaba amutwara nka mwene-nyina.

Omuri Nkore, eitaka ryona rikaba riri ery’omugabe, kandi niwe yaabaire
arireebeerera ari kukozesa abakozi be. Kandi n’ente zoona n’amatungo agandi
byona bikaba biri eby’omugabe. Baitu eki kikaba kitazibira abantu kukozesa
eitaka ryabo nainga enyamaishwa – kwihaho bakaba batari kwikirizibwa kuguza
aheeru ya Nkore okuhisya baatunga orusa kuruga ow’omugabe.

Kuruga aha myaka munaana, omwojo akaba ashemereire kuba ow’omugasho omu ka
hamwe n’aheeru y’eka kandi akaba aza ah’eishomero. Akaba agyenda n’abandi
bashaija ku baabaire baza kuriisa ente kwenda ngu ayege okuriisa
n’okureebeerera ente n’agandi matungo, okukama, okuzijanjaba oburwaire
butari bumwe na bumwe, n’okuziyamba zaaba zitaahireirwe ebikooko
nk’ebicuncu.

Aboojo n’abishiki bakaba beega okuhinga omu miringo yoona, nk’okutabira,
okubyara, okwombera n’okureebeerera ebihingirwe nk’okubinga ebinyoyi hamwe
n’okushaaruura.

Abaishiki bakaba beegyesibwa kukora emirimo y’omuka ei baabaire bakora
baamara kushwerwa. Nyin’omwishiki niwe yaabaire atwara omurimo muhango omu
kukuza abaana. Akaba abeegyesa emicwe, abaheereza emirimo y’okukora omu ka,
kandi abareebeerera bari kukora emirimo egi. Emirimo y’omukazi ekaba erimu
okuteeka, okuboneza enju hamwe n’okureebeerera abaana. Abaana bakaba
beegyesibwa okutiina hamwe n’okuheereza abantu bakuru ekitiinisa. Abaana
ababaishiki bakaba beegyesibwa okwozya ebyanzi, okukora amacunda, okuteeka,
okuruka ebiibo n’emiceeka, okutaha amaizi, okusheenya enku, okurera abato
baabo n’ebindi bingi.

Omu Bahima, okutunga, okureebeerera n’okuriisa ente kukaba kuri
okw’aboojo. Bakaba bashemereire kwombeka amaju g’okutuuramu, ebiraaro
by’ente – ah’okuraara hamwe n’ah’okukamira. Omu Bairu, abakazi n’abashaija
bakaba beejumbira omu mirimo y’okuhiiga n’okuhinga kwonka omuri egi mirimo,
abashaija bakaba bahiiga, reero abakazi baba ab’okureebeerera eka. Abakazi
n’abashaija boona nibeejumbira omu kushaaruura kwonka abakazi bari kuboneza
ebyashaaruurwa, okusa oburo, hamwe n’okuteeka. Abairu ku baabaire bamara
obwire bwingi bari kukora, Abahimaakazi bo bakaba bamara obwire bari kufa
aha ndeebeka yaabo n’oburungi bwabo.

Abanyankore abaabaire bahinga, bakaba bashuubuza ebihingwa byabo hamwe
n’amaarwa ku bonamu sente z’okugura ebijwaro, amasiyaani, entebe,
eby’okukozesa omu ka hamwe n’okushomesa abaana baabo. Abaabaire baine
amatungo bakaba baguza ebiri kuruga omu matungo gaabo nk’amate, enyama,
amajuta g’ente, empu, amahuri n’ebindi kutunga esente. Abaabaire nibakora
eby’emikono nabo bakaba baguza ebi baabaire bakora nainga babihaanisamu ebi
baabaire nibenda.

Abanyankore bakaba baine omugyenzo gw’okukora obuzaare eki baabaire beeta
okukora omukago. Omukoro gukaba guba gugira abantu babiri. Aba bakaba
bashutama aha muceeka bahikaine hamwe munonga reero amaguru gaabo
gareebana. Omu ngaro zaabo za buryo, bakaba bakwata ebinyansi by’ejubwe
hamwe n’omuti gw’omurinzi.

Owaabaire aba naagambiirira omukoro akaba ashara aha mikundi y’ababiri.
Omuheru gw’akanyansi k’ejubwe hamwe n’omuti gw’omurinzi bikaba biteekwa omu
shagama reero kaheebwa ondiijo muntu. Omu Bahima, omutooma nigwo gwonka
ogwabaire gukoresibwa reero amate nainga akasaano k’oburo kakaba
kasiigwaho. Mpaho ababiri bakaba bakwatana omu ngaro bari kukozesa omukono
gwa bumosho, reero bakaba bamira eshagama, amate, n’oburo aha bwire bumwe.
Obuzaare obu bukaba butakorwa aha bantu b’oruganda rumwe ahakuba bakaba
nibamanywa nk’ab’oruganda rumwe.

Abanyankore bakaba bahiisa amaarwa. Okukora amaarwa aga bakaba bakwata
ebitookye, okukira eby’embiire ebihiire, babinyuuka, reero eshande ei
baabaire baihamu, bakaba bagigaita n’omugusha hamwe n’amaizi, mpaho ebi
baagaita hamwe biraaraho kumara ekiro kimwe nainga bibiri. Okunyuuka oku
n’okuhiisa amaarwa bakaba babikorera omu bwato. Amaarwa gakaba gakora aha
mikoro mingi eyaabaire ebaho.

Amaarwa ku gaabaire gakorwa, hakaba habaho eki Abanyankore bari kweta
“etereko”. Aga gakaba gari amaarwa agaabaire gasigwaho kugabira abataahi
nk’akamanyiso k’obunywani. Obwire bwingi omuntu ku yaabaire aba ahiisize
amaarwa ge, akaba ayeta abataahi reero abagabira etereko. Kandi owaabaire
atakikora akaba naatwarwa nk’omutaahi mubi.

Aha kunywa etereko, abashaija bakaba bagaaniira ebintu bingi kutandikira
aha biri omu maka gaabo, kuza aha nshonga ezirikufa aha kyaro nainga aheeru
yaakyo. Kandi hakaba hariho okushemererwa munonga kurimu n’okuzina.
Ekitaaguuriro nikyo kizino ky’Abanyankore kandi abashaija n’abakazi bakaba
bakizina. Abahima bo bakaba bakora okwevuga bari kusiima ebirungi ebi baine
nk’ente, ebyokurya, amagara n’ebindi.

Ebyokurya by’Abanyankore bukaba buri oburo hamwe n’ebitookye. Ebitakuri
hamwe na muhogo nabyo bikaba nibiriibwa. Amaka agaabaire gabiika ebyokurya
kumara obwire buraingwa kushanga ngu tibakaabura ebyokurya nangwa n’omu
bwire bw’enjara, bakaba bareebwa nk’abakama. Emboga ezaabaire ziriibwa
hakaba harimu ebihimba, obushaza, eshwiga, enyabutongo, doodo, ekijamba,
enyama y’ente n’agandi matungo hamwe n’enyama y’ebikooko by’omwishwa
abaishaija ku baabaire bahiiga.

Amaka agaabaire gatari kubaasa kubiika ebyokurya kumara omwaka, omu bwiire
bw’enjara bakaba baza kuhinga omu maka gaabo ababiine – eki baabaire
nibeeta okushaka. Kikaba kitakuheisa kitiinisa kandi amaka ago gakaba
gahemuka. Obumwe abaishiki b’omu maka ago bakaba bataboona bashaija ahakuba
bakaba nibatwarwa nk’abooro abatari kukora.

Oburo n’enyama nibyo byabaire biriibwa aha mikoro, kandi ebitakuri na
muhogo bikaba biriibwa munonga omu bwire bw’enjara. Omugyenyi ku yaabaire
atayaaya, bakaba batamugabuurira ebitakuri na muhogo ahakuba bikaba bitari
kuheisa kitinisa. Nyineeka akaba atashemereire kurya obuhoro nainga
ebyokurya bisiriire. Abashaija n’aboojo bakaba batarya bitakuri bisiriire
ngu ahabwokuba bikaba nibinuriira munonga kandi owaabaire abirya akaba
aremwa kukora emirimo nk’ey’omu iriisizo, akaba agaruka kurya ebyokurya
ebinuzire ebyo. Abahima bo bakaba banywa amate n’orwamba rw’ente, oru
baabaire nibeeta enjuba. Aba bakaba bahaanisamu ebitookye, ebitakuri hamwe
na muhogo obwo bari kuhayo amate n’amajuta. Obwire bw’enjara Abahima bakaba
banywa amate gaabo.

Emigane n’ebishaakuzo nabyo bikaba bitebibwa kwegyesa abaana emicwe
n’emitwarize. Okutebya emigane kukaba kukorwa omu bwire obu abantu baabaire
baba bataine mirimo. Emigane ekaba ekira kukwata aha mugabe, ente, okuhiga,
enyamaishwa n’ebindi bintu ebyabaire bishemeza Abanyankore. Omugane gumwe
ogwabaire gukira kuganwa gukaba guri ogwa wakame n’engwe.

Hakaba hariho Wakame na Warugwe abaabaire bari abanywani kandi bari kutuura
omu maka gahikaine. Wakame ku yabaire aza omu musiri kuhinga, akaba akuruza
ebigyere bye omu itaka reero ataaha arikugambira Warugwe ngu yaahinga
yaaruha. Yaaguma naakora atyo kumara obwire buraingwa. Ahabw’okugira ngu
akaba atari kuhinga, enjara ku yaataahire yaatandika kwiba ebihimba bya
Warugwe. Warugwe ku yaakimanyire ngu haine owaabaire naamwibira ebihimba,
akatega akatego k’oku kwata omushuma ogwo. Wakame ku yaagiireyo kwiba,
omutego gwamukwata, yaatandika kucura ari kushaba obuyambi. Wakame akeeta
Wamushega kumuyamba. Ahabw’okugira ngu Wamushega akaba ari muhango, akata
okuguru kwe omu mutego ku yamba Wakame. Aho Wakame ahabw’obwengye bwe
bwingi, akeeta Warugwe ari kumugira ngu yaabona omushuma. Warugwe nawe
akahika naita Wamushega obwo atabuurize bibuuzo byona. Abanyankore
nibakunda omugane ogwo, kworeka abaana baabo ngu ti bashemereire kwesiga
bataahi baabo kandi ngu ti bashemereire kuguma nibakorera eryo batabandize
baayebuuza aha bantu.

Ebindi bitebyo ebi baabaire nibakira kuganira abaana bato, hakaba hariho
ekitebyo ky’omushaija ou baabaire nibeeta Ishe-Katabaazi. Hariho emigane
eri kuhika 80 eri kukwata ahari Ishe-Katabaazi. Omuri egi migane harimu
egi: Obu Ishe-Katabaazi yaaraarira omuhoko; obu Ishe-Katabaazi yaateera
ente z’ow’ishezaara; obu Ishe-Katabaazi yaarya engundu ye wenka; obu Ishe-
Katabaazi yaafukaana n’omukazi w’enda.

Gumwe aha migane ya Ishe-Katabaazi nigukwata aha ku ogu mushaija yaateerize
omukazi. Nigugyenda guti: Ku haabaire hahingwireho emyaka ebiri, Ishe-
Katabaazi aherize kurya wenka enimi ye, mutaahi we agyenda agura ekivune
ky’ente. Nk’oku Ishe-Katabaazi yaabaire akunda okurya, kyamugwa omu kutu
ngu mutaahi we yaagura enyama. Nka kishana kya nyomwabazyo, omushaija ogwo
agyenda aihayo enyama atandika kugishara n’okugyotsya, n’endiijo agiha
omukazi we kugiteeka. Kandi omuka omwo hakaba harimu n’esaano ebiikiirwe
egyo nyama. Mbwenu ku baagyokize, ebisooroora byaita aba seeri, na Ishe-
Katabaazi atababuziremu. Haza Ishe-Katabaazi ku yaabaire ahurira ekigambo
enyama orufuzi rumuragarika, reero ebisooroora byo bikaba bimwitira
kyarumwe.

Ku yaareebire atakibaasa kukyehwera, haimuka we yaaza kushaba enyama ahu
baabaire nibagyotsya. Nyineeka ku yaareebire Ishe-Katabaazi yaareetwa
eirembo, enyama agishereka amwetsiza bagaaniira ebindi, ahakuba akaba
atarikwenda Ishe-Katabaazi kurya enyama ye. Ku areeba Ishe-Katabaazi ataine
katenzyo k’okumushaba enyama, acwa obwengye bw’okuza kweshera. Onu amugira
ati “shohora tugyende”, baihayo eicuba bagyenda. Kuba bahika omu muhanda
Ishe-Katabaazi aroota obwengye bw’oku mutebuka. Amugira ati “naayebwa omuka
omubazi gw’ente yangye, kanze kugwakiira.” Akuba agarukayo, aija ayemerera
ekaanyima ya nyamushaija ori, ayeta mpora omukazi omu nju, n’omukazi
amwetaba ati “aii!” Amugambira omu biho ati: “Rubura Ishe-Katabaazi
yaagyenda, ku ndikugaruka niturya enyama yaitu. Tubanze egyo eyokize.
Kwonka ku ndaije na Rubura waareeba naakuteera ekiisho biri omanye ngu
ndiyo ninkurengyeza ku oteeka oburo, nawe naaba naayenda kutaaha.” Reero
Ishe-Katabaazi asiga yabaiha atyo omukazi, arabaho aza kweshera. Akashanga
ente nizinywa.

Ente kuzaakuukire, omuhanda baaguragaramu. Ku baba bari haihi n’eka
omushaija ayegambagambisa munonga ngu omukazi amuhurire. Ku amuhurira
aihayo enyama zookize azireeta omu muryango, areeta n’omusyo. Omushaija
ataaha omu nju, Ishe-Katabaazi aija amwezingiriire. Ku ashutama, ateera
omukazi ekiisho ngu agarureyo enyama. Omukazi agira ngu naamurengyeza
kuteeka oburo. Atyo agyenda ataho enyungu y’oburo, agaruka ashanga enyama
etakashazirwe. Agira iba ati: “ Baitu enyama ogirindize ki?” Iba akwatwa
enshoni ashara enyama bagirya na Ishe-Katabaazi. Ku baheza kugirya baza aho
batebya ebindi. Omukazi agaruka omu kishengye kwonka iba tamanya ku omukazi
we abayo ateeka oburo.

Ishe-Katabaazi akaba ari omu byafaayo by’Abanyankore kandi naagambwaho
munonga.

Ku baba bari aho, bareeba omukazi naabareetera enyama eziteekire. Omushaija
engaro azita aha munwa. Kuba akishobeirwe, bamwecura n’ekiihuro ky’oburo
akibata omu maisho. Omushaija ashoberwa anaaba, aha Ishe-Katabaazi amaizi
nawe anaaba, batandika kurya. Ku baheza kurya Ishe-Katabazi ati: “Akana ku
kaheza kurya kati ‘owaitu nibaanyeta’.” Akwata akahanda ke ataaha.

Abahororo abari kuruga omuri Rujumbura omu disiturikiti ya Rukungiri
n’abafuruki abaarugire omuri Rwanda omu mwaka gwa 1800. Abahororo nibeetwa
Abatuutsi obwa hati kandi nibatuura omuri Rwanda na Uganda omuri Ntugamo,
Rukungiri na Kabale. Abahororo nibagamba Orunyankore-Rukiga eki baayesire
Oruhororo, kandi enganda ezi baine ziri omu Bakiga n’Abanyankore.

Abagabe ba Nkore bakatahiirira Mpororo, aha muheru gw’okubasingura omu
rutaro, baabagaita ahari Nkore. Omuri Ankore, Abahororo nabo bakaba Abairu
aha rubaju rw’Abahima. Abaabaire batakubaasa kuba abakozi b’Abahima,
bakagarukayo Rwanda.

Omu mwaka gwa 1800 gutakahwaire, Abahororo, bari kukozesa eihe ryabo
bakatoroka baza omuri Rujumbura. Bari kuyambwa Abaharabu, bakabaasa
kusingura abantu abu baashangire omuri Rujumbura. Abahororo omuri Ankore na
Rujumbura bakahinduka Abahima; ab’omuri Kabale baahinduka Abakiga; kandi
ab’omuri Rwanda baahinduka Abatuutsi. Abahororo ku baabaire baaza omu
mwanya bakaba bahinduka batwaza nk’abantu abu baabaire bashangayo kandi
beeyeta amaziina gaabo, bagamba nkabo. Kwenda kurekaho oruganda
rw’Abahororo, bakaikirizana ngu abashaija baabo batashwera aheeru kwihaho
bashwere Abahororo bataahi baabo. </archive_file>

 OKUTUNTUZA ABAANA/OKUBONABONESA ABAANA

Okutuntuza abaana n’ekintu kyona ekiri kubaho otakigyendereire, nari
okigyendereire, kikareeta obuhuta aha magara g’omwana waawe, n’okuhuga
omutima kandi kikateganisa n’enteekateeka . Obutabanguko omu maka
nibureetera abaana kubonaabona kandi n’abazaire bamwe nibatuntuza abaana
baabo ekiri kubareetera kuhunga omu maka bakaza kushumba ow’abandi.

Eki nikibaasa kureeta akabi aha magara g’omwana nka ebironda obwo
yaahutaara ori kumuteera kiboko. Ogundi muringo gw’okutuntuza abaana
n’okubanagaho kandi aogu n’omuze mubi munonga.Abakazi bamwe nibatandika
kubonaabonesa abaana bakiri n’omunda batakazairwe. Omu bugufu, okutuntuza
abaana nikubaho omuzaire, omunyabuzaare, nainga ogwo ori kureebeerera
abaana ku ari kuremwa kutwara obujunaanizibwa bwe obu ashemereire kuba
naakora. Eky’okureeberaho, omuzaire oine sente waashanga abaana be bataine
bishare by’eishomero (fiizi) manya ngu ariyo naabatuntuza. Endiijo miringo
n’okuriisa abaana ebyokurya bibi, kandi eki nikireetera omwana okuguubwa
kubi kumara obwire buraingwa.

Nooshanga omuzaire naahemba omuriro haza agucumika aha mwana; abamwe
nibabookyesa emiriro ya sigara; abandi amaizi gari kwosya, obushera
n’obuhunga buri kutabura hamwe n’okwisa abaana omwika.

Hariho okubonaabonesibwa okuri kurabira omu kuteganisa omwana nk’oku
mujuma, okumugambira kubi ori kumukankamira, hamwe n’okumureeba ekisyori.
Omwana ogu naakura aine obwoba, atari kweikiiririzamu, aine obwesigye bukye
omu muzaire we owaamuzaire nainga omuntu ori kumureebeerera. Abaana aba
hoona nawbo babaasa kutwara emicwe mibi nk’ejo nabo batandike kuyomberera
bataahi baabo, kutiinatiinisiriza abo abu bari kushoma hamwe nabo
ah’eishomero, omu iramizo hamwe n’okugambira busha bagyenzi baabo.

Omwana weena ou bari kuhisyaho ekikorwa nk’eky’okutorobozibwa nainga
okuhambwa naakura aine ebizibu bingi – omu nteekateeka ye hamwe n’embeera
y’amagara ge.

Emicwe mibi nk’egyo neekorwa ogwo ainiire abaana eitima: omuntu otari
kwendeza mugyenzi we entunguuka n’amagara marungi. N’ahabw’ekyo
niky’orikushangira abazaire nibafayo munonga aha baana baabo ahabw’okuba
ebizahambuki, hamwe n’abany’eitima beeyongiire kandi tibari kwendeza muntu
weena: bo baaba baanyanga-birungi.

Okutuntuza abaana nikweyongyera omu Uganda kandi eki nikiribatiirira
obugabe bw’abaana. Ekitongore ekiri kukora aha nshonga z’abaana omu Africa
ekya African Network for Prevention and Protection against Child Abuse and
Neglect( ANPPCAN) nikyoreka ngu omuntu yaaheereza obutumwa bwona obu
kwatiraine n’oburemeezi obu omwana wa Uganda ari kubugana omu mbuga
z’ebiragiro, emanja ezi nizihurirwa omu kooti yoona ekuri
haihi.Okubonaabonesa abaana nikubaasa kubareetera oburemeezi aha magara
gaabo kumara obwire buraingwa. Ebironda by’aha mubiri nibibaasa kukira
kwonka omwana naaguma aine obusaasi aha mutima gwe ahabw’okuba
naabonaabonesibwa nainga ayangwa.

Abaana abari kubonaabonesibwa nibabugana oburemeezi bw’emiringo mingi omu
kukura kwabo, omu kukwatanisa n’abandi bantu, babura amaani g’okurwanisa
endwaara kandi na bukuru yaabo neekira kugira oburemeezi.

Omuzaire okuremwa kureebeerera omwana ekiri kurugamu okufa kw’omwana,
okukozesa omwana omu nshonga z’omubonano, okumuhutaaza nainga
okubonaabonesa omwana akagira ebironda aha mubiri, hamwe n’aha mutima gwe
ni bimwe ahari ebyo ebiri kushoboorora okubonaabonesibwa kw’abaana.

Omuntu ku ari kuba naayenda kuhwera omwana abonaabonesiibwe, aine kumanya
obubonero obu abaana abo barikuba baine. Akabonero kamwe aha mwana
otuntuzibwe tikari kumanyisa ngu omwna ogwo naabonaabonesibwa; omuntu
orikwenda kuyamba aine kureeba n’obwegyedesereza kuhamya kurungi ku
obumanyiso obwo buri kuguma nibwija kumara obwire buraingwa.

Eki nikiza kuhwera abantu kwetegyereza eki okubonaabonesa abaana kiri
kumanyisa, okumanya obubonero n’obumanyiso bw’okubonaabonesibwa. Ebiragiro
ebiri kurinda obugabe bw’abaana nibihamya kurungi munonga ku okutuntuza
abaana ruri orubanja. Ebiragiro ebi hoona nibyoreka ku okutuntura kurimu
zaabutandu ezi omwana ari kutunga yaaba naazaana na bagyenzi be nainga
yaaba naazaana n’abantu abu atari umanya. Ebiragiro nibyo bimwe nibigira
ngu omwana ori kureeba abazaire be nibarwana nawe naaba yaabonaabonesibwa
okukira munonga omu biteekateeko bye.

Hariho emiringo ena (4) ei abaana bari kubonaabonesibwamu. Emiringo egi
erimu: okubakozesa omu nshonga z’omubonano, okuhutaaza embiri yaabo
bakagira ebironda aha mibiri, obutafa ha baana hamwe n’okubagabira ebintu
bitari birungi.

Okubonaabonesa abaana okurimu okuhutaaza emibiri yaabo nikimanyisa omwana
kutunga obuhuta nainga ebironda , okuhendeka hamwe n’okufa, baitu obwo ebi
byona biri kureetwa okubateera ebikonde, okubatambika, okubateera emigyere,
okubaruma n’amaino, okubacumita ebisyo n’okubateera ebindi bintu
nk’eminyaafu, okuboosya, hamwe n’ebindi. Ebi nibikorwa abazaire baabo
nainga abareeberezi baabo bakyimanyisize nainga batakimanyisize – ekikuru
n’okugira ngu omwana yaahutaazibwa: nikyo nikiri kworeka ku omwan
yaatuntuzibwa.

Obutafa ha baana n’obutabaheereza ebyetengo byabo nagwo n’omuringo ogundi
ogu abaana bari kubonaabonesibwamu. Obutafa ah’abaana kurimu;

 ▪ Okubiima ebyokurya, oburaaro, nainga obutabareeberera.

 ▪ Omuzaire kwanga kutwara omwana omu irwariro omwana yaaba arwaire –
 omu magara n’omu biteekateeko.

 ▪ Okwanga kushomesa omwana nainga okumuheereza ebyetengo ah’eishomero.

 ▪ Okuremwa kuhwera omwana omu kukura kurungi omu biteekateeko
 n’emicwe. Eky’okureeberaho, okubaikiriza kukozesa ebibazi ebitokooza-
 bwongo nk’enjaayi, okunywa amaarwa, omu bindi bingi.

Okusigaho abaana nagwo n’omuringo gumwe gw’obutabafaho.Omwana naatwarwa
nk’onagirweho omuzaire we nainga omureeberezi ah’ari kutaaha haaba hatari
kumanywa, nainga omuzaire yaaremwa kuha omwana ebyetengo kumara obwire
buraingwa munonga.

Ebindi ebiri kubaasa kutwarwa nk’obutafa ha baana harimu; omukazi kureetera
omwana we oburemeezi obwo ogwo mukazi ari kukozesa ebibazi bibi omu mubiri
gwe, okukora ebibazi ebi omwana ari kureeba, okuguza nainga okuheereza
omwana ebibazi ebi kubikozesa.

Okukozesa omwana omu nshonga z’omubonano kurimu okubeihabeiha omwana kukora
nainga kuyamba omu kuteerana, okuhamba abaana, okubakwatakwata omu bicweka
byabo by’ekihama hamwe n’okukozesibwa abanyabuzaare baabo.Omuzaire nainga
omureeberezi w’omwana yaaba naakwatakwata ebicweka by’ekihama by’omwana
baitu obwo aine ekigyendererwa ky’okweshemeza, okumutaaha omu bicweka
by’ekihama, okumuhamba, okukoresa omwana omu muringo gw’ebitingwa
(okwegaita kw’abashaija n’abashaija bataahi baabo nainga abakazi n’abakazi
bataahi baabo), okubakozesa obwa maraaya, nainga kubeeyambisa kukora
zaafirimu z’enshoni.

Okuteganisa abaana omu bwongo n’omu biteekateeko, omu kukura kwabo nainga
omu kweikiiririzamu nagwo n’omuringo gumwe gw’okubonaabonesa abaana.Omuri
ebi harimu okujuma munonga abaana, okubatiinisiriza, hamwe n’obutafa aha
micwe n’emitwarize yaabo kandi ebi nibikira kureebeka aha nyima y’endiijo
miring y’okutuntuza abaana.Obu ni bumwe aha bumanyiso bw’okubonaabonesa
omwana nainga obutamufaho.

Omwana naatandika kworeka empinduka omu micwe n’omu kushoma kwe. Abandi
nibatunga ebironda nainga obuhuta aha mibiri yaabo. Aha nyima y’obwire,
omwana tari kuta mutima aha kwega kandi naatandika kwoshayosha. Omwana
nk’ogu yaaba ari omu bantu naaba aine obwoba ari kuteekateeka ngu haine
ekiri kuza kumubaho.

Abaana aba nibaaba bataine bureeberezi kuruga omu bantu bakuru kandi omwana
naatandika kwetomboita munonga, ahunami nainga atari kukwatanisa n’abandi
baana kandi atandika kwija ah’eishomero kare munonga reero akyerererwa
kutaaha.

Aha muzaire

Omuzaire naayehakana omwana, amutonganisa munonga ahari buri kizibu
ky’omwana ari kugira omu ka n’ah’eishomero. Naatandika kugambira
abashomesa kukozesa omukono gugumire aha mwana kandi naareeba omwana ogwo
nk’ekitaine mugasho, amureeba nk’omwana mubi, nk’ekizibu omu magara ge.
Omuzaire ogu naaba naayenda omwana kukoragye kukira oku ari kubaasa kukora.
Omuzaire hoona naaba naayoreka n’obutafayo aha mwana.

Aha mwana n’omuzaire.

Abo babiri nibaba batari kukira kugamba nainga kwekwataho kandi
niboorekamuranga ku obunywani bwaboburi bubi munonga.

Obumanyiso oburi aha ruguru nibubaasa kworeka okubonaabonesibwa kw’omwana,
kwonka abantu bashemeire kufayo munonga aha micwe n’emitwarize y’abaana
baabo etari eya buriijo.Omwana naabaasa kureebeka nk’ori kubonaabonesibwa
yaaba aine amasya g’omuriro, ebironda, ahendekire, amaisho gazimbire,
nainga obumwe yaaba aine obumanyiso busya aha mubiri gwe.Omwana naabaasa
kugira enkojo aha mubiri ezi abaire ataine kandi omuzaire atari kubaasa
kuzishoboorora, obumwe omwana naatiina omuzaire we munonga ekiri
kumureetera okurira yaamureeba, obumwe akamweshereka nainga akanga kutaaha
yaaba ari ah’eishomero.Eki nikireetera omwana kutiina abandi bantu bakuru
kandi oshanga naateera enyamaishwa munonga nk’omuringo gumwe gw’okwemara
ekiniga.

Obumanyiso bw’omwana ou batari kufaho burimu omwana ogwo kwosha munonga
ah’eishomero, ari kushabaguza munonga ebyokurya, nainga arikwiba sente.
Eby’amagara bye nibiba bitari birungi kandi naaba atari kugyemesibwa,
arwaire amaino, amaisho n’ebindi. Omwana ogwo naaba agubire munonga kandi
ari kunuuka, naaba aine ebijwaro bikye oshanga omu bwire bw’enjura ataine
by’okwefubika nk’amashweta. Ebizibu nk’ebi byona nibireetera omwana
kutandika kukozesa ebibazi ebitokooza-bwongo nk’amaarwa ataine kugira ngu
naaba ataine kireebeerera omu ka egyo.

Omwana orikwejunisibwa omu nshonga z’omubonano hamwe n’obutingwa naaba aine
obumanyiso obu: naaba aine obuzibu omu kushutama kandi eki nikikwata aha
baana b’aboojo n’abaishiki.Ku bari kuba bari ah’eishomero, omwana naashanga
oburemeezi omu kwejumbira omu bisasayizi hamwe n’okuzaana n’abandi baana.
Ku ari kubyama naaba naaroota munonga, naabura omuhimbo, atandika kugira
obwengye bwingi aha bikwatiraine n’okuteraana, oshanga naayehisya abantu
bakuru; kandi yaaba ari omwishiki atandika kwehisya abashaija reero we
omwana w’omusigazi ayehisya abakazi bakuru. Omwana w’omwishiki naatwara
enda, nainga arwara endwara eziri kureetwa okuteerana nk’enziku. Aha nyima
y’ebyo byona omwana naaburaho.

Obumanyiso bw’omwana ou omuzaire atari kufaho omu kukura kwe naaba
naayetomboita munonga, arikwenda abandi baana bakore ebi arikwenda kandi
naaba naagira ekininga. Obumwe omwana nk’ogwo naatandika kukora ebintu
by’abakuru nk’okureeberera abandi baana.Obundi abaana nk’aba nibakura mpora
– eki abantu barikweta okuzingama. Omwana naagyezaho kweita kandi eki
nikiretwaho okushanga ngu omuzaire nari omureeberezi naaba atari
kukwatanisa kurungi n’omwana.

Abazaire baingi nibakunda abaana baabo kwonka ku bari kugira ebiteekateeko
bibi, oburuhe, obutamanya, kubura obuhabuzi, obuyambi hamwe n’obuteebaasa
batandika kubonaabonesa abaana babo.

Ebimwe aha biri kureetera abazaire kubonaabonesa abaana harimu okubura
obuyambi, okubura abanywani, okubura emirimo, obworo, emirimo mibi, abaana
kugira emicwe mibi, obushazi, obumuga omu maka, okubura obwengye
bw’okureebeerera abaana, amaryo, hamw n’omuzaire obuteikiiririzamu,
okashanga omuzaire naatiina kushaba obuyambi omu bandi abantu aha bintu ebi
atari kumanya.

Aha nyima y’okureeba obumanyiso obu n’obundi obutari hanu, ni kirungi
kuhababira eka egyo kwenda kukiza omwana ogwe. Abantu baine kumanya ngu
okuhababa eshonga ezo tikiri kumanyisa ngu oine enshonga n’eka egyo,
kwihaho nikihwera omu kucondooza n’okuyamba omwana.

Oine kukimanya ngu omwana weena ku ari kubugana oburemeezi omu kukura kwe
ahabw’okushanga ngu abazaire be naingashi omunyabuzaare ariyo
naamubonaabonesa, omwana ogu naahendera ayetamirwe kandi abaasa kweyanga.
Omuntu weena ku ari kweyanga ahendera ataine ki yaakubaasa kwekoreraho omu
kwetunguura.Okweyanga nainga kwanga abo abari kukwanga nikireetera omuntu
yaagira muheru mbi. Ebi ni bimwe ebiri kuruga omu kweyanga: omuntu naakura
aine amagara mabi, abamwe nibeekwata eijaga, baihamu endwara nka siriimu,
beehwa amatsiko, bahuga omutima kandi abandi batiina kuza omu bantu. Kwonka
ekiri ah’iguru ya byona ni rufu. Noobaasa kushanga omuntu afiire obwo
batari kumanya ekimwitsire.

Omuntu weena naaba aine ebi ari kuteekateeka kandi omuntu ogwo ou oriyo
noobonaabonesa naaba naakuteekateekaho nka munyaanya ahabw’okuba n’iwe ori
kuba omuri haihi kwonka ku ori kumubonaabonesa omureetera enaku ei
yaakubaire ataine. Eki nikiza kumuretera okwetwaramu nk’otagira ab’owaabo,
oshushe ngu tagira ishe kandi obwesigye bumuhwemu. Amazima gari ngu ogu
mwana tagira busingye bwona kandi tabaasa n’okwota omuriro.

Omwana ogu ou ori kubonaabonesa naashusha otaine ebye kandi obwo nooshanga
n’obw’ori kumubonaabonesa n’iwe oshumbire omu bye. Oine ebintu bye niwe
ayetwa mukamaitu; eki nikikushomesa ngu ogwo mwana abaasa kugarukirwa ebye
kandi abe mukama waawe.

Omwana ogwe naija kukura n’omujinya gw’okukora ebye; omwana nk’ogu abaasa
kubiteekamu amaani akore nk’omwiru, abone ebye aije arye kikama. Otamureeba
okamugayira omu riisho. Oijuke ngu oku enduuru ejuga tikwo abantu bafa.

Omu byanga bimwe abaana nibagumizamu kubonaabona ahabw’okuba nikwo kyabaire
kiri kare na kare n’okuhitsya eriizooba kwonka oku Ruhanga ari kukunda
abaana abo nabaiha omu naku omu biro by’omu maisho. Enkora nk’egi neita
obunaku bw’omu maisho bw’abaana kandi eshemereire kurwanisibwa omu maka
gaitu goona.

Aha mashomero, omushomesa ku ari kubonaabonesa omwana, okashanga
naamugambira kubi naamuteera kiboko z’okwitiraho, hamwe n’okumukozesa
emirimo eri kumukiza emyaka, omwana ogwo abaasa kushoma kubi.Omwana ogu
naabaasa kutandika kwosha obwo ari kweshara emicwe mibi y’omushomesa. Eki
nikireetera omwana okukura aine okutiina kuhango munonga obwo ari kumanya
ngu ogwo mushomesa akaba atamwendeza. Omuri ekyo niharugamu rwango ahagati
y’omushomesa n’omwana.

Omunansi ku ari kugambira kubi omwana yaaba ari kumuraguurira, omwana
abaasa kutiina ebikatu kandi ahendere aihiremu obumuga omu kikatu
kibaamuteera.

Obugabe bw’omwana nibu ribatiirirwa abo abari kugyezaho kukora ebi
twagambaho.Omwana w’omwishiki naabaasa kuhendera ashwirwe akiri muto kandi
eki kimureetere okugira amagara mabi agari kuruga omu kuhutaara ari
kuzaara.Uganda ni rimwe aha mahanga 15 agari kukizayo omubaro gw’abaishiki
abari kushwerwa bakiri bato omu nsi yoona kandi ekintu eki nikita amagara
gaabo omu kabi kahango. Abaishiki okushwerwa bakiri bato haza obumwe
nikikomooka aha kubonaabonesibwa.

Abaana nibongyera bagira ngu obworo nabwo n’enshonga endiijo eri kureetera
abaishiki bakiri bato baashwerwa. Obworo waabugaita hamwe n’ezindi nshonga
eziri kureetera omwana yaabonaabona buzima nibureetera bamwe omu baana
kusherura emiringo y’okukira obukyene n’entuura mbi.

Eby’obuhangwa omu byanga bimwe nibireetera abaana baagumizamu
n’okubonaabonesibwa ahabw’okuba nikwo kyabaire kiri kare na kare okuhisya
n’eriizooba.

Enteekateeka eri kugira ngu aboojo nibakiza abaishiki omugasho:
Enteekateeka nk’egi neekworeka ku mazima kwo omwana w’omwishiki tibari
kumuringaaniza n’omwojo. Eki nikireetaho okubonaabona kw’omwana w’omwishiki
yaaba ari ah’eishomero kandi eki kiine akabi kahango aha magara ge ga
nyensya.

Enda ezaara mwiru na muhima: Oine kukimanya ngu abaana bainganira omu
kibuga kandi ababi babahana. Abantu twena tihariho ori maraika;
n’ahabw’ekyo tuerekye kugayana. N’obu bamwe omu batungi batari kwejunisa
ebi batungire omu kwereeberera gye, abantu boona baine kwijuka ngu abaana
abu ori kubonaabonesa bashemereire kuba baine kuba kurungi.

N’obu abaine ebiniga baraabe bateegamirana, abantu baine kukimanya ngu
omwana weena ou ori kubonaabonesa aine omugasho muhango omu nsi omu kandi
n’omwe ahari abo abu Ruhanga ari kureeba. Omwana ogu abaasa kurugamu omuntu
w’omuhendo kandi abe omwe aha bantu b’amaani.

Omu kubonaabonesa abaana harimu okubateeka omu bikorwa by’obushambani
bakiri bato. Nikimanywa ngu hariho emyanya ahu ori kushanga omwana
w’omwishiki nibamureeba nka obugaiga bw’eka egyo. Haza omwana ogu naagira
oburemeezi bwingi omu maka agu ari kushwerwamu. Yaaba akiri muto,
naahutaara ari kuzaara, kandi obumwe aihamu endwara y’okutoonya obwo obubi
n’enkari biri kwereeta. Muheru gwa byona, omushaija naabaasa kumubinga.
Abaaana abaingi nibashwerwa aha myaka nk’ikumi n’eshatu (13), ekiri
kubareetera kushwerwa n’okutwara ez’endaaro obumwe n’abashaija abaine
emyaka nka 30 n’okugarura ahaiguru abari kubatweka. Ahabw’okuba abashaija
nk’abo nibaguma nibaha abaishiki aba sente kwenda kutwara obujunaanizibwa
bw’abazaire abaremirwe kureeberera abaana b’abaishiki, oburemeezi nk’obu
twareeba aha ruguru nibuhika aha baana b’abaishiki aba. Sente ezi niziba
ziri ez’okugura amandaazi, switi kandi abashaija nk’aba nibahendera
bahambire abaana aba.

Nka ekiboneerezo kandi eki ndi kugira ngu ti kihikire, omwana ku bari
kumutweka, abazaire na munonga baataata, nibamwanga. Nooshanga ishe
w’omwana naamurabaho ayanga n’oku mwakura haza omwana ahurira kubi omu
mutima, ahurira naarira omu nda, ahakuba naarira emiziga ehika n’aha
kumuhwamu, kandi obumwe n’ishe ayanga kumusaasira.

Ku mbaire nincondooza enshonga ahu ori kushanga abaana nibashwerwa bakiri
bato aha bw’ebikorwa ebibi nk’ebi na munonga omu bugwa-izooba bwa Uganda na
munonga omu kyanga ekya Rwenzori,mbugaine abaishiki abaratungireho
oburemeezi obu. Aba bangambaire ku baine obusaasi buhango kandi abandi
baayoreka ku baayangire kugumira enaku egi kandi ku abazaire baabo
baababingire omu maka gaabo bakaza omu matauni hati ahu bari kukorera
emirimo erimu nk’obutembeyi, obushuma n’okushara enshaho z’abantu,
okushabiiriza hamwe n’okweguza nka baamaraaya.

Omuri Kabarole, abaishiki abaingi nibaruga omu ishomero ahabwa abazaire
baabo kwenda ngu bashwerwe reero abaabazaire bantuge enjugano n’ebindi
bintu baruge omu bworo. Abaishiki nibagyemwa abazaire baabo kushwerwa kandi
babajuga ebintu ebirimu embuzi hamwe n’ente.

Abamwe nibaremwe kukora ebibuuzo by’ekibiina kya mushanju ahabw’okushanga
ngu abazaire baabo nibabagyema kushwerwa baine emyaka nka 14 ngu babaase
kutunga sente z’okuheera fiizi bato baabo aboojo. Eki nikireeta emiziga omu
maisho g’abaana b’abaishiki. Ekiri kubashaasha munonga n’okushanga ngu
abazaire nibabagyema kushwerwa abaurusi b’emyaka nkaaga (60)n’okugarura
ahaiguru.

Abamwe nibatwara enda kuruga omu kugyemwa eby’omubonano n’abashaija obwe
abazaire baabo bari kubatuma sente omu bashaija aba. Abaana aba nibatiina
kugambira n’abazaire ahabw’okuba nibaba nibamanya ngu ba-ishebo babaasa
kubaita. Ku bari kuheza kuzaara nibagyemwa kushwerwa abashaija
abaabatwekire. Obumwe abaana aba nibabashemeza baaba nibazaara kandi
batunga oburemeezi.

Abamwe nibahendera beegurize nka baamaraaya. Ahabw’okuba nooshanga abazaire
baabo babiimire fiizi kandi bataine ah’okutuura. Ebi byona nibireetwa
abazaire kugyema abaana okushwerwa bakiri bato obwe bari kubagyema
abashaija abu batari kubaasa.

Enshonga eziri kureetera abaana baashwerwa bakiri bato ni nyingi. Omu
byanga bimwe abaishiki nibagumizamu kushwerwa batakahikize emyaka 18
ahabw’okuba nikwo kyabaire kiri kare na kare n’okuhitsya eriizooba. Kwonka
enkora egyo neita obunaku bw’omu maisho bw’omwana kandi eshemereire
kurwanisibwa omu maka gaitu goona.

Enteekateeka ngu aboojo nibakiza abaishiki omugasho nayo neereetaho
okubonaabonesa omwana w’omwishiki kandi ekiri kumurugiramu n’okushwerwa
akiri muto. Abantu b’omu byaro bingi omu abaishiki bari kushwerwa bakiri
bato nibakiteekateeka ngu aboojo nibakiza abaishiki omugasho. Omwegi kuruga
ah’eitendekyero erikuru erya Makerere naagira ngu abazaire b’omu byaro
ebyo baine kwegyesibwa ku abaishiki nabo baine omugasho n’ahabw’ekyo nabo
bashemereire kuguma omu mashomero bakashoma nikwo nabo bakaija kuhwera omu
ntunguuka y’ebyanga byabo n’eihanga ryona okutwariza hamwe.

Obworo omu maka nabwo nibureetaho okubonaabona kw’abaana ahabw’okuba amaka
g’abooro nigakozesa abaana bato emirimo eri kubakiza amaani kwenda kutunga
eky’okurya. Nooshanga omwana w’omwishiki agiire kuhingira eby’okurya kwenda
kubeisaho eka egyo. Bo nibaba ni bateekateeka ngu bariyo nibarwana
kureebeka ngu baatunga eky’okurya kwonka ebiri kuruga omuri ekyo nibyo
bingi kandi birimu abaana kushwerwa bakiri bato. Amaka nigenda kukyendeeza
aha baana b’okureeberera kandi hoona nabwo obworo nibureetera omwana
yaashwerwa kwenda kutunga empiiha.

Okubonaabonesa abaana kushemereire kurwanisibwa, kandi omwegi wa Makerere
ogu uwe naagira ngu omuze ogu guri omu mahanga agandi nk’oku guri omu
Uganda.

Abaana baine obugabe. Hoona ogu mushomi naayongyera agira ngu
okubonaabonesa abaana nikishiisha obugabe bwabo. Naagira ngu omu Uganda
nk’omu mahanga agandi maingi okubonaabonesa abaana bakiri bato nikihenda
ebiragiro n’obugabe bwabo.

Okwongyera obworo omu bantu n’eihanga ryona nakyo kibaasa kurugiirira omuri
eki. Abari kubimanya nibagira ngu omwana weena ori kubonaabona naaba aine
emigisha mikye omu kukorera entunguuka. Eki nikigumizamu kyongyera
kureetaho obworo. Abakugu aba nibagira ngu abaana aba tibari kubaasa
kutunga emyoga y’oku bareetera baabaasa kutunga emirimo ei baarakore
kwebeisaho n’okuhwera amaka gaabo ekintu ekiri kureeta obworo bwagumizamu
omu maka, ebyaro n’eihanga ryona.

Okubonaabonesa n’okutuntuza abaana kushemereire kurwanisibwa hati
ahabw’okuba okutegyereza nikiza kureetera omucwe mubi ogu kuguma
nigweyongyera.

Akabi akari omu kutuntuza abaana ni kaingi munonga ahabw’okuba okutuntuza
nikureetera abaana okutagumiza n’okushoma kwabo, rero Babura kutunga emyoga
y’okwebeisaho, kibata omu kabi k’okugira enda bakiri bato kandi aboojo bo
baza kushumba.

Ebirooto by’abo baana nibiba byatambwa eikono kandi omwana nk’ogu tabaasa
kuhikiiriza ekirooto kye.

Iwe muzaire we, hoona okwo ahu ori nooyetenga sente ziri kwingana ki
kubaasa kureeberera omwana waawe? Tugire ngu abantu mwine ebizubu biri
kwingana ki, ebiri kubareetera mwahuga aha baana baanyu.

Abazaire baremirwe omurimo gwabo gw’okukuza abaana baine emicwe. Haza eki
kireeteire abaana baingi baaremwa kugyenda omu maisho n’emishomo yaabo.
Mwijukye ngu beetingi, nari shi zaara, nayo eyeriisize karungu omu
kuhindura abaana endeme. Omwana naabaasa kusiiba eizoobo ryona ari omu
kibanda ky’omupiira obwe ari kuzaana zaara. Omwana ogu naahendera ari
omushuma obwo ari kuronda sente z’okuzaana zaara ahabw’okuba abafubire
baguraaraho – enfumu egi neecwerwa abatari kuhurira bihaburo; nk’abaine
amaryo, ab’orubwa n’entagambibwa.

Omu bicweka bya Karamoja, abaana baine oburemeezi buhango obu bari kubugana
aha bw’enshonga y’obwegyese bubi. Omwana atashomire aine ekizibu kihango
omu kubonaabonesibwa ahabw’okuba omwana ogu naaba atari kumanya
ebikwatiraine n’obugabe bwe. Haza eki kiine omuringo ogu kiri kwenegyeza
omuriro omu kubonaabona kw’abaana. Omwana ataine mugisha gw’okuza omu
mashomero marungi, ku ari kuruga ah’eishomero agumizamu akora emirimo
y’omu shaaha z’omwebazyo (ekinyamwebazyo) kandi eki nikireetera omwana
yaateganisibwa omu kwega kwe.

Aha mashomero, abeegyesa abamwe baine omuze gw’okuteera abaana kibooko. Eki
nibakikora omu muringo gw’okuhana omwana. Haza abamwe nibakirenzya bateera
bashusha abari kwita enjoka. Haza ekiri kuruga omuri eki obumwe omwana
naagwa ebihungu agumizamu afa. Muheru gwa byona, omwegyesa naahenderera omu
kihome.

Omuzaire ku ari kuremwa kutwara obujunaanizibwa bw’okutwara omwana we omu
irwariro, naaba naamureetera okubonaabona kandi omwana ogwo abaasa kwihamu
rufu.

Abanyankore baine enfumu ngu: “Ekyezaara kiba engwe n’ekicuncu.” Enfumi egi
eine obumanyiso bwingi ahabw’okuba abantu baingi bariyo nibazaara abaana
abari kubashusha emicwe. Emicwe mibi y’abaana obumwe neeba neeshusha
ey’abazaire baabo. N’ahabw’ekyo, omwana weena ari kubonaabonesibwa nawe
abaasa kugira omuze nigwo gumwe nk’ogw’abazaire be.

Omu myaka mikye ehwaire, abaana omu Uganda bongyeire kubonaabona.

Eky’okureeberaho, omwishiki owaabaire naakora emirimo y’aha ka y’omuntu
(mwete omukozi) akatwarwa omu kooti ey’ahaiguru eya (High Court) eya
Buganda Road omuri Kampala. Ogu akaba naamanywa nka Jolly Kasamani.
Ebishushani ebyabaire nibyoreka omukozi ogu ari kutuntuza omwana ou
yaabaire naareeberera obwo ari kumuribata aha mugongo n’ahanda. Ebi byona
bikaija kumanywa kurabira aha mukutu ogw’empurizana ogwa Hariho ki
(Waatisaapu). Ebi bikatandika kujanjaara omu bantu kurabira omu mikutu
yoona kuhisya obu omukozi ogu yaatwirwe omu kooti.

Omukozi w’ahaka ogu akateekwa enyima y’emiteehibwa kumara emyaka ena
ahabw’okushangwa ngu orubanja rw’okugirira omwana wa bakama be eitima kandi
akamutuntuza.

Eki kikareetaho okwerakiirira kuhango ahabw’okuba abazaire bakateekateeka
ngu omwana waabo abaasa kuba yaasiisikaire om unda kandi abaasa kwihamu
rufu.

Okugyema abaana kurya ebyokurya, obwe ori kubateera embooko kibaasa
kubareeteera okukura bari kukutiina kandi eki nikimanyisa ngu omwana waawe
naaba naakureeba nk’enyamaishwa.

Okutuntuza hoona kubaasa kurugamu endwara nk’ez’omutwe hamwe n’okuhuga
omutima kandi endwara ezi ziine akabi kahango omu magara g’abaana.

Okutuntuza abaana kikireeteire abantu baingi omu ihanga eri kwerarikiirira.

Okukyendeeza obutabanguko hamwe n’okubonaabona kw’abaana omu ihanga eri

Oihireho obugabe obu, hariho ebitongore n’ebiragiro ebiri aha rurengo
rw’ensi yoona nk’ekiragiro ekiri kurwaniirira obugabe bw’abaana omu nsi
yoona ekya United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child. Eki
nikyoreka ngu okutuntuza abaana hamwe n’oku babonaabonesa kyeyongyeire omu
mashomero maingi omu Uganda.

Abantu abakuru nabo nibatuntuza abaana kurabira omu bujunaanizibwa bwabo,
amaani, hamwe n’obwesigwa. Abamwe nibagira ngu ekibonerezo n’akarera-baana
kandi ngu okuteera abaana nikyongyera omu kukora kurungi kwabo. Ebi biri
omu myanya eine obworo, obutabanguuko hamwe n’entaro. Omu myanya nk’egi
abeegyesa n’abazaire baine bingi by’okukora kandi baine okumanya kukye aha
kweyongyera omu kubonaabona hamwe n’okutuntura kw’abaana.

Kwenda kukyendeeza obutabanguko hamwe n’okutuntuza abaana, ebintu bingi
bishemereire kukorwa kandi abo abari kubikora bashemeire kubanza ab’omu
mashomero hamwe naabo abari kutuura omu byaro.

Kwenda kutunguura omutindo gw’obwegyese omu mashomero, na munonga omu baana
b’abaishiki. Eki kigyendereire kwongyera amaana hamwe n’okweikiiririzamu
omu baan, okukira baaba nibagamba n’abantu.

Okurwaniirira obugabe bw’abaana kurab omu kucondooza, hamwe n’okureebuuza
ebintu ebyo ebishemeire kutunguura eihanga eri.

Kwongyera amaaani omu kukuratira ebiragiro kwenda kurwanisa okutuntuza
abaana kandi hakabaho oburingaaniza omu mashomero kwenda kukyendeeza ebyo
ebiriyo nibireetaho obutabanguuko omu baana.

Kwongyera amaani omu kumanya omugasho gw’amakuru omu kwegyesa abantu,
kumanyisa ebiriyo nibigyenda omu maisho kandi hamwe n’ebyo ebiri kubaho
kandi biri kuribatiirira obugabe bw’abaana; hamwe n’okuronda eky’okukorera
oburemeezi nk’obu.

Ebishushani by’enshoni nibishiisha abaana. Abaana baingi nibeejumbira omu
kureeba, kushoma hamwe n’okukozesa ebishushani by’enshoni.Omu mwaka 2014,
eihanga eri rikahinguza eiteeka eriri kuzibira abaana obutareeba
ebishushani ebi. Eki baingi bakakireeba nk’obusinguzi omu hururu
y’okukyendeeza okubonaabona kw’abaana.

Abaana bato omu Uganda baine ebintu bingi ebiri kubareetera kukora emirimo
ebakizire. Egi erimu emirimo ey’okuhinga n’okuriisa hamwe n’okweguza nka
baamaraaya.

Omu Uganda, abaana bamwe baine emirimo eri kuribatiirira obugabe bwabo
kandi emirimo egi erimu okuhinga niyo ekizireyo kureetera abaana
kubonaabona na munonga omu mashomero. Nikwo n’eky’omugasho kushomesa abaana
emirimo y’emikono kwonka eki kirengire omu mashomero maingi kandi okuhinga,
okutemuurira hamwe n’emirimo endiijo nk’egi neekira kuhenda abaana
munonga.

Omu kuhinga abaana abari kwosha ah’eishomero, obwo barikusiiba omu mashamba
g’omwani bari kushoroma, abandi bari kusiba omwani omu buveera; abandi bari
kuhinga etaabe, omuceeri; kandi abandi bari kukora nk’abarinzi b’emisiri.
Endiijo mirimo erimu: okuhinga n’okushaaruura ebikaijo, okuriisa ente.

Abandi abaana nibabasiibya omu kujuba ebyenyanja kandi omu mirimo eri
kukorwa harimu okuharagata ebyenyanja, okubyanika, okubiguza, okupakira
amaato hamwe n’okugapangururaho ebyenyanja, hamwe n’okubiteemaatema.

Abaana hoona nabwo nibagyemesirebwa kwejumbira omu murimo gw’okwosya
amakara kandi emirimo nk’egi egumire kanda eine akabi aku erikureeta aha
magara g’abaana. Ekyokureeberaho, abaana abari kwejumbira omu makara
tibaine kagisha k’okuza omu ishomero kubabaasisa kutunga emyoga
y’okubahwera kutunga emirimo mirungi omu biro by’omu maisho. Okwosya
amakara ni gumwe aha mirimo ey’ira; kare abantu bakaba bateejumbira mu
mirimo nk’egi kwonka ahabw’entunguuka abantu baingi bafurukire baaza
kutuura omu ndembo, reero eki kyayongyera amaani omu kutema emiti obwo
barikugyosyamu amakara. Abaana bamwe batwire okwosya amakara
nk’eky’omuhendo kandi baatandika kukora bizineesi y’amakara kandi abaana
abaingi tibaakishoma ahabw’okuba ba-ishe nibabasindika omu mahamba kwosya
amakara.

Okuteera amatafaari: Abazaire baingi nibenda ngu abaana baabo babanze
bakore emirimo y’omuka batakagire ah’eishomero. Omuzaire orikuteera
