Ahabwa abazaire abooro nooshanga batari kubaasa kugura ebitabo n’ekaraamu
by’abaana kuza omu mashomero. Ebyetengo ebi birimu akacumu, ebitabo hamwe
n’ekaraamu kandi omu buryo obuhikire bashemereire kuba nibagura ebyetengo
ebi kwenda kuhisya obwegyese aha baana baabo. Enshonga zo ni nyingi munonga
eziriyo nizireetera abaana bamwe baremwa kuza omu mashomero, kandi abandi
baayongyera kuza omu mashomero n’omujinya.

Waarabaire ori aho okeebuuza enshonga ahabw’enki abazaire bashemereire
kuguurira abaana baabo ebikozesibwa aha mashomero kwenda kwongyera amaani
omu muhendo gw’abaana abashemereire kuba nibaza omu mashomero?

N’obu boona-bashome eriyo neebugaana ebizibu nyamwingi yo yonka ekomirwe
aha muguha, oihireho ekyo ekitwire nikigambwa ngu abazaire nibo bariyo
nibagireetera okugwa. Omu boona-bashome, omuzaire tashemereire kuba
naashashura akantu koona. Kwonka nooshanga omuzaire naashashura sente
nyingi. Omu mashomero gatari gamwe na gamwe abazaire nibashashura ebishare
by’eishomero.

Ku twagambireho n’omuzaire ori kumanywa nka Charles Mugerwa ow’abaana ikumi
n’omwe kuruga omu kyaro kya Kasenyi omu disiturikiti ya Kalangala yaagira
ngu omwana we ashemereire kushoma ari kwoshesamu. Eizooba erimwe
ashemereire kuba naaza ah’eishomero erindi akaza kujuba ebyenyanja. Obumwe
omwana we naaguma om uka abw’okubura yuunifoomu.

Waaba noogyeragyeranisa n’ebyanga eby’abooro n’eby’abagaiga kuruga omu
matemba n’amashuuma ga Uganda, enamba y’abaana abari kuza omu mashomero
gaine entaaniso mpango. Omu matemba ga Uganda, amashomero gaine abaana
bakye abari kwakirwa buri mwaka waaba noogyeragyeranisa n’ago aga Kampala
na bugwa-izooba.

Amashomero gatari gamwe na gamwe obwa hati nigashaba abazaire kutamu amaani
hamwe n’omuhimbo kwenda kutunguura eby’obwegyese omu Uganda kurabira omu
kwongyera enamba y’abaana abari kuza omu mashomero.

Katureebe oku omukago guri kubaasa kureeta entunguuka omu by’obwegyese.
Omukago ogw’ahagati y’orupapura rw’amakuru orwa Monitor hamwe n’ekitongore
empa-buhwezi ekya Inter-Aid Uganda gubaasize kuyamba amashomero agari omuri
Kampala kweyongyera aha bukugu n’obukoryo bw’okuhika ebigyezo.

Omwana weena ku ari kuba yaahikire ah’eishomero omuri Kampala atunga
obuyambi butari bumwe na bumwe. Eki kibaasize kwongyera omubaro gw’abaana
abariyo nibaza omu mashomero aha rurengo orwa purayimare. Eki
nikibareeteera amaani omu kushomesa ekigyendereire kutunguura obwegyese.

Amashomero gari kwingana 192 aga bantu boona, geete aga Gavumenti, nigo
garonzirwe kuba gaine orurengo oruri kushomesa abaana abari ahansi y’emyaka
eshatu. Eki kigyendereire kutunguura hamwe n’okuhaana amagyezi agari kumara
ahari abo abariyo nibeejumbira omu kuza omu ishomero. Abaana aba nibaza
kuba nibashoma bari kutaaha.

Mr. George Mukose, mukuru w’eby’obwegyese omu minisiture y’eby’obwegyese
kwonka naaagira ngu Gavumenti neeza kubombekyera ebyombeko byonka kutari
kubaheereza obuyambi bwa sente zoona.

Amashomero ahu bari kuza kwombeka ebyombeko by’abaana aba gakatooranwa
ekitongore ekikuru eky’ebya sente eky’ensi yoona ekya World Bank. Eki
nikyoreka ku okweyongyera kw’abeegi abasya abari kuza omu ishomero kuriyo
nikuhagirwa n’ebitongore ebindi ebigaba-buhwezi aha rurengo rw’ensi yoona
kwenda kukyendeeza obutamanya kurabira omu kushomesa.

Abaana nibaza kutandikiraho kushomera omu byombeko ebiriho kwenda
kugyendera aha mutindo.

Okushomesa abaana abari ahansi y’emwaka eshatu kiine amakuru maingi,
kurugiirira aha kitongore kya Banka y’ensi yoona ekya World Bank, omwana
ari kutunga obwegyese obwa nasare aine emigisha mingi kumara okushoma kwe.

Nk’oku ebigyendererwaho bigyendereire kuhisya obwegyese omu bantu boona omu
mashomero aga purayimare, Gavumenti y’eihanga rya Uganda omu mwaka ogwa
1997 ekaihaho ebishare aha beegi ba purayimare. Ebishare ebi bikaba biri
bingi munonga kandi abazaire bakaba batabaasa kubishashuurira omu bwire.

Ebirugire omu kukwatanisiza hamwe aha gati y’orupapura rw’amakuru orwa
Daily Monitor n’ekitongore ekiheerereza obuhwezi ekya Inter-Aid Uganda
nibyoreka ngu ku amashomero nyamwingi agari ahansi ya Gavumenti omuri
Kampala obwa hati nigakozesa empapura z’amakuru kushomesa abaana.

Omu mwaka ogu, abeegi bari kuhika ikumi (10) bakateebwa enyima
y’emiteehimbwa ahabw’okukwatwa nibakopa ebigyezo bya siniya ya kana ebya
UNEB. Omuri aba hakaba harimu omwe aha bashomesa, hamwe n’owaabaire naakuma
ebigyezo. Ebi bikabaho ah’eishomero erya Boston omu disiturikiti eya
Wakiso. Eki nikimanyisa ngu omuhendo gw’abaana ku guri kweyongyera omu
mashomero buri mwaka, eishomero rishemereire kuba niryongyera aha byombeko.

Omu mwaka gwa 2014, ekitongore ekiri kukurira ebigyezo omu Uganda
kikashazamu ebigyezo by’abaana ba siniya ya kaana bari kwingana 173,
ahabw’okuteekateekwaho kuba baibire ebigyezo. We omuhandiiki mukuru
w’ekitebe eki, Mathew Bukenya, naagira ngu okwiba ebigyezo nihaba harimu
okuyambwa kuruga aheeru.

Omu disiturikiti ya Sironko, mukuru w’abashomesa aba Sironko Sekendure
akateekwa enyima y’emiteehimbwa ahabw’okushangwa naagyezaho kuremesa omwana
w’omwishiki w’emyaka 17 y’obukuru ahabw’okushanga akurize eishokye.

Obumwe abaana nibafa: Omu disiturikiti eya Kibuku, abantu bana bakateebwa
omu kihome ahabw’okugambwa ngu eishomero erya Kings Kid rikabateekaho
omushango ahabw’okufa kw’abaana baabo bashatu.

Muteekemu omuhimbo omu baana kushoma ebitabo ahabw’okuba enamba eriyo
neeyeyongyera. Omutindo gw’orurimi Orungyereza gubaire gwakyendeera; n’ekya
buriijo kushanga abaana nibakora enshobi omu ndimi nk’ezi, n’ahabw’ekyo
omwana wa Uganda ashemereire kuba naahaburwa omu kushoma ebitabo
ahabw’okuba nibatungiramu amagyezi. Amaduuka g’ebitabo, na zaarayiburare
nari amabiikiro g’ebitabo ag’abantu boona gashemereire kutandikwaho.
Kurabira omu miringo nk’egi, omutindo gw’omwana waawe niguza kweyongyera.

Abaana kubari kuza kushutamira ebibuuzo byabo bya P7, obumwe beebaza abo
ababaasize kubahweraho omu kushoma ebitabo, ogwo n’omuzaire n’omushomesa,
bashaba Ruhanga kubaha obwengye kuhika ebigyezo byabo.

Abazaire nabo nibacumbagiza obuheereza bwa Gavumenti obwo yaaba neegyezaho
kwongyera enamba y’abaana abari kuza omu ishomero busya. Okutuntuza abaana
omu bazaire kuriyo nikweyongyera kandi eki kiriyo niki cumbagiza
eby’obwegyese omu Uganda.

Abakuru omu by’obwegyese beebembeirwe Omukuru Yusufu Nsubuga, nibayamba
abaana omu kurwanisa obunafu, n’obugara omu baana bato ku bari kuhika
ah’eishomero kandi obwo ari kubeeshengyereza kugyenda omu maisho n’okushoma
ebitabo.

Mukuru w’eihanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, naagira ngu Gavumenti
eyetebeekaniise kuheereza abeegi ebitabo, obucumu, hamwe na zaapaadizi
abaana b’abaishiki abari kuza omu ishomero.

Kuruga aza omu bwebembezi, ataaha naashaba abazaire ku bagura ebitabo hamwe
n’ebyokurya by’abaana baaba nibaza ah’eishomero.

Bamwe nibenda kutunguura omuringo gw’eby’obwegyese biriyo nibitunguuramu
eihanga eri. Kanso ya disiturikiti ya Ntungamo neeyenda eshutame ereebe ni
nshonga ki eziriyo nizijumikirira eby’obwegyese omu Uganda. Omu ihanga eri,
amashomero aga boona-bashome gariyo nigasigara enyima munonga. Waareeba
omuringo ogu amashomero aga purayiveti gariyo nigatunguukamu, noogira
amaani kandi waareeba embandama eri omu mashomero aga boona-bashome noogira
ekitengo. Omu Uganda, boona-bashome ekateebwaho kuyamba abo abatari
kwebaasa, kwonka eki tikiri kumanyisa obwegyese bubi! Omu Uganda amashomero
aga nigatunga abaana bakye bari kuhikira omu idaara ery’okubanza
n’obubonero kandi baine n’obubonero bubi. Nikihemurana munonga kushanga ngu
abaana abaingi nibahikira omu idaara rya 3 n’okugaruka ahaiguru.

Jessica Alupo, minisita w’eby’obwegyese n’emizaano, naagira ngu obuhame/
bwino obwatungirwe minisiture egi nibworeea ku amashomero nyamwingi
nigashiisha obwire bwingi ahabw’okubu amashomero aga nigatandika taamu
gakyerereirwe kandi gahendera encuro y’okushoma bukiri kare, ekiri
kureetera abeegi obutahendera mashomo gaabo. Ebi nibibandamya entunguuka
omu kushoma kw’abaana n’eihanga ryona.

Okukora idaara ry’okubanza omu mashomero ga boona-bashome nink’ekirooto;
abakugu omu by’obwegyese, abeegi, abazaire boona baine okweraarikiirira
kuhango munongo ahabw’omuringo ogu abeegi bari kukoramu ebigyezo byabo.

Eidaara eri abaana bariyo nibahikiraho niri reetaho ekibuuzo aha mutindo
gw’eby’obwegyese omu ihanga ryona n’eshonga ahabw’enki abaana kuruga omu
mashomero gatari gamwe na gamwe bariyo nibagyenda omu maisho n’okukora
kubi. Enshonga y’okubanza neegira ngu amashomero amarungi agari aga
Gavumenti n’aga bantu-buntu nigakira abaana abahikiire omu idaara
ry’okubanza ryonka. Eki nikireetaho entaaniso mpango munonga omu ntunguura
y’entaasya y’eihanga ahabw’okuba abeegi abari kukora kurungi kandi bari omu
mashomero marungi nibo bonka abari kuza omu matendekyero marungi aga aha
rurengo rwa yunivasite. Omwegi ashomeire omu matendekyero nk’aga aine
omugisha muhango kureetaho empindahinduka omu Uganda. Ekyokureeberaho,
omwegi/ abeegi ba Makerere Yunivasite nibatuma Gavumenti yaahindura omu
mitwarize yaayo.

Eki tikiri kumanyisa ngu abaana abari kutunga amadaara g’okubanzi nibo
bagyezi bonka. Abaana abari kushomera omu mashomero mabi nibashoma kubi
ahabw’okuba obumwe enguuto eziri kuza aha mashomero ago ni mbi munonga,
kandi abandi baana tibaine bitabo. N’ahabw’ekyo okushomera omu miringo mibi
nikicumbagiza eby’obwegyese n’entunguuka.

Abantu abariyo nibamara emishomo yaabo aha zaayunivasite hati bariyo
nibaija omu nsi egumire munonga etari kushushana n’ey’enyimaho. Ebintu ebi
turi kushoma bigumire kandi ensi eriyo neehinduka. Obwa hati ensi eriyo
neeba ekyaro kimwe, empindahinduka eri ahaiguru munonga. Hariho eibura
ry’emirimo, sente hamwe n’obugwagye, empindahinduka y’obwire, okubura
oburingaaniza, okufeerwa ebintu bingi omu bya sayansi hamwe n’okufuruka
kw’abantu.

N’ahabw’ekyo ebizibu by’ensi egi byebembirwe ab’eby’obutegyeki
ahabw’eshonga y’okushanga nibashiisha sente nyamwingi omu buruuru kandi
hari n’obushomankuzi. Tihariho oburingaaniza omu mwaka 2015 ahabw’okuba
emyanya ejuumikirwe obworo niyo mingi, hariho eibura ry’ebyokurya, kandi
eby’okwerinda byemereire kubi.

Manya ebi nibitworeka ahu eihanga ryorekyereire, kandi abantu bariyo
nibeeyongyera omu nsi egi. Eki nikireetaho ebibuuzo bigumire munonga.
Ebizibu ebi bibasasa kurwanisibwa bita kwenda kutunguura eby’obwegyese
ahabw’enshonga y’entaasya y’eihanga?

Omu buryo obuhikire, ab’amateeka bakiine omurimo muhango gw’okukora. Egi
erimu, enshonga, obutumwa hamwe n’obuyambi, okuketa ebya sente, obuyambi
hamwe n’ebiragiro ebiri kuzibira abo abari kunyunyuuta eihanga kwenda
kureetaho obwegyese obuhamire.

Aha rubaju orundi, abahangu n’abakugu bakashaba bari kurabira omu mpapura
ez’okucondooza kwabo okwabaire kubajunaniziibwe ekitongore ekya UNESCO, ngu
abo abaine emikono omu by’obwegyese bashemereire kureebeka ngu eihanga eri
ryatunga oburingaaniza omu bwegyese.

Abanyamakuru omu mpapura, za reediyo, za terevijoni hamwe n’emikutu emisya
nibashabwa ku bakwatanisiza hamwe n’ebitongore nk’eby’abantu-buntu hamwe
n’abantu kwenda kucondooza hamwe n’okwetegyereza emiringo egi ei amashomero
gariyo nigatunguukamu kwenda kutunguura ihanga. Amashomero agari za nasare,
purayimare, sekendure na zaayunivasite ziriyo nizikora bizineesi zaabo
obw’eby’entunguuka babirekire enyima.

Omu myaka ikumi ey’enyima tutwire nitubangirwa amaani g’ensi yoona
beebembirwe ekitongore ekigaba-buhwezi ekya UNESCO kwenda kuhimbuura
eby’obwegyese kwenda kugumizamu n’entunguuka. Eki nikikorwa kurabira omu
kumanya hamwe n’okujumiirira obwegyese, abashomesa, emiringo ei bari
kushomeramu hamwe n’ebikorwa ebiriyo nibigyenda omu maisho kwenda kumanya
okubaho kw’abantu, entaasya yaabo hamwe oku kyorobi kuhinduka omu bwire
bw’omu maisho.

Aha gati y’omwezi gwa mwenda, ekitongore kya UNESCO hamwe na Gavumenti ya
Japan bakashutamisa orukiiko rw’ensi yoona aha bikwatiraine n’eby’obwegyese
ahabw’entunguuka y’obwire buraingwa. Orukiiko oru rukaba omuri Nagoya.
Abantu bari kwingana 1,000 bakarwejumbiramu kandi Gavumenti ziri kwingana
70 zikajwekyera zaahinguza omurimo gw’amaani munonga omu by’obwegyese
kwenda kureetaho obwegyese butari kujegaajega omu maisho g’okurwanisa
ebizibu by’ensya omu mahanga agariyo nigatunguuka oteihiremu Uganda.

Aha rukiiko oru, ekitongore ekya UNESCO kikatongoza ehururu/omuhanda gw’oku
tunguuriramu entebeekanisa na zaapuraani z’ensi yoona kandi zikateebwa omu
nkora ahabw’entunguuka.

Obwa hati ebintu nibishemeza. Ekitongore eky’okukoondooza omu nsi yoona
ekya Internatiomal Alliance of Research Universities(IARU) kiherize
kutongoza engyendererwaho ya zaayunivasite yoona ehwaireyo kurungi, eri
kwijukiriza amaraka ga UNESCO, kandi eri kuteera akashushani n’okuteera
tooki omu nkora ya UNESCO eri kugira ngu, obwegyese oburi kumara obwire
buraingwa buriyo niburuga omu njegyere buri kuza omu mikoni ehikire.

Obwegyese ahabw’entunguuka bugyendereire kutunguura ebyaro kurabira omu
kwombekaho omukago aha gati ya Gavumenti n’abataka ahabw’okuba tukiine
orugyendo ruraingwa.

Oburungi bw’omuntu n’ebiri kumukwataho omu kurwaniirira ebiro by’omu maisho
bye aha biconco hamwe n’okubaasa kwega n’okuhinduka.

Okutunguuka tikuri kutunguuka kwonka; kirimu ebintu bingi ebiine omugasho
aha magara g’abantu. Nikureeba aha nkora ya Gavumenti, eby’ebiragiro,
eby’obushuubuzi hamwe n’abandi nk’abazaire.

Okutunguuka nikubaasa kubaho kurabira omu kuta omu nkora ebabiteeka ebi.

N’ahabw’ekyo, obwegyese nibwo bwakubaasa kureetaho enkora egi kurabira omu
kukorera hamwe n’ebitongore byona. Kwongyera ahari ekyo, obwegyese
nibureetera empinduka yaamara obwire buraingwa; omuri ebyo harimu okwega
okuhamire obwo abeegi bari kwega n’omutima gumwe.

Obwegyese bwine omurimo muhango munonga ahabw’okuba nibureetaho
okuteekateeka aha nshonga z’entunguuka kandi abeegi bashoma bari kumanya
ekireesire embandama hamwe n’ekishemereire kukorwa kwenda kurwanisa
embandama egi.

Oihireho okusingura omu by’obwegyese ahabw’entunguuka, Uganda eri omu
muringo mubi omu kurwanisa abo abariyo nibaremesa entunguuka kurabira omu
bwegyese.

Okuhinduka mpora-mpora omu by’obwegyese nikwetengwa kwenda kuhika aha
ntunguuka ei Abanyayuganda bari kwenda. Ekibuuzo nikigira ngu: ni muringo
ki ogu eby’obwegyese biri kubaasa kurabiramu omu kutunguura eihanga?
Ekibuuzo eki tusiibire nitu kigarukamu, kwonka okwongyera ahari ekyo omuntu
aine kumanya ngu entunguuka yoona omu ihanga ryona neija mpora-mpora.”
Mpora Mpora ekahisya omunyongororwa ah’eiziba.” Entunguuka yoona noobaasa
kugireebera omu bwegyese obwo eihangi riri kutunguuka omu by’entaasya.

Omu matendekyero ag’ahaiguru, omu bwire obu hariho niheeyongyera okwetenga
kw’amaani omu bwegyese eby’obutegyeki kwenda kutunguura eihanga ahabw’okuba
eby’obutegyeki ebihamire byemereire aha musingye gwa dimokurasiya
nibitunguura eihanga.

Obwegyese bwine eshagama n’akazare omu kushembusya eby’entunguuka kandi
tihariho eihanga ryona eribaasize kutunguuka ritateire sente omu bantu
baaryo. Obwegyese nibwongyera aha kwetegyereza kw’abantu omu kutuura kwabo
n’eihanga ryona; nibutunguura entuura n’embaho y’abantu, kandi bureeta
entunguuka omu kyaro. Nikwongyera aha magyezi g’abantu omu kurinda sente
zaabo; abantu baaba bashomire nibeega okuhandiika n’okubara, obwire
bw’okubiika sente omu banka ku buri kuhika baba nibamanya omuhendo gwa
sente ezi baabiika, ezi baine omu banka hamwe n’ezi baasigaza. Kigumire
kushanga omuntu ashomire naaheereza sente ngu ba mubankingire.

Omu mwaka 1990, ebintu bikaaba biri ebindi. Omugasho g’obwegyese gukaba
gutakamanyirwe. Okubiika sente zaawe omu mwana waawe nikireetaho obugaiga
omu biro by’omu maisho omu ihanga. Enshohoza ei abazaire baabaire nibata
omu by’obwegyese bakaba bazireeba nk’ezaafa. Sente ezi ori kuta omu bitabo,
omu kushomesa emerimo bikaba bitwara obucweka nka 2 ahari igana.

Omu makorere amaingi abakozi abashomire nibeetengwa kwenda kwongyera
omutindo omu bintu byabo. Amakorero agarimu ebyoma by’amashanyarazi
nigakozesa ebyoma bya karimagyezi. Minisita w’eby’emirimo n’amakorero,
Kamanda Bataringanya, naagira ngu emyaka y’okuta sente omu bwegyese
nibw’obu ahabw’okuba abantu baingi beehaireyo n’agabo kwongyera obukoryo
omu makorero.

Omu bwire obw’enyimaho habaire hariho okutunguuka omu by’amagara
n’obwegyese. Amahanga maingi gariyo nigongyera enamba y’amashomero aga
sekendure hamwe n’amatendekyero ag’ahaiguru kwenda kutunguura omutindo
gw’eby’obwegyese omu Uganda okuri kwetengwa omu makorero maingi agari omu
ihanga hamwe n’aheeru y’eihanga. Hariho okwetenga kuhango kw’abaana
abashomire kurungi kandi baine obukugu buri kumara.

Okweyongyera kw’enamba y’abaana abari kumara emishomo yaabo omu mashomo agu
bari kwemariramu nikyetenga munonga kwenda kutunguura omutindo
gw’eby’obwegyese ogu ihanga ryona riri kwenda.

Okushomesa omwana w’omwishiki n’eky’omutaano okureetaho entunguuka, yaaba
ari omukazi omwishiki, amakorero maingi nigaheereza abaana aba emirimo, omu
bwire bukye obuhwaire, emirimo omu by’amakuru na munonga aha tiivi eya NTV
ekatandikaho okuheereza emirimo abaishiki barungi nk’omwoga gw’okutunguura
eby’obuguzi byabo.

Ni kirungi munonga kukura omu bwongo ahabw’okuba abaana aba baba nibakorera
omu ihanga ryabo kireetaho okutunguura ihanga, emishoro eri kusharwa aha
mushaara gwabo niguguma omu ihanga eri kandi eyambaho omu kwombeka
amarwariro, amashomero hamwe n’enguuto.

Endiijo miringo ei okushoma kuri kubaasa kutunguuramu eihanga eri
n’okuyamba abantu kuba abatuuragye barungi, omu Uganda kikooroba munonga ku
Gavumenti yaatandiikireho ehururu y’endanga-muntu. Abantu abashomire
nibeetegyereza kurungi munonga embeera y’ensi kandi ku haakuba empinduka
yoona nibaba baagireebire bagirondera omubazi.

Ahu kiri kworobera n’aha abantu abashomire baaba nibaza kutemba enyonyi,
baaba nibaza aheeru y’eihanga. Eki tikiri kumanyisa ngu abatashomire tibari
kuza aheeru y’eihanga, ngaaha, nabo nibazayo kwonka omuntu oshomire naaba
aine emigisha mingi. Aheeru y’eihanga erya Uganda abantu nibakora sente
eziri kubaasa kubatunguura kandi ahabw’okuba omutindo gwa sente z’aheeru ya
Uganda guri ahaiguru munonga.

Enshonga emwe ei abantu bashemereire kumanya ni okumanya ebiri kugyenda omu
maisho. Abaana abashomire nibamanya ebintu bingi ebiri kujumburwa omu
Uganda. Abantu eki batari kumanya ngu kubari kuba batashomire nibaba
bataine kibari kumanya.

Obumwe abantu abashomire nooshanga nibagyezaho kucondooza enshonga eziri
kureetera Gavumenti yaakora kubi. Omu Uganda amatendekyero ag’ahaiguru aha
rurengo rwa yunivasite gaineho amashomo agari kushomesa eby’obutegyeki,
amashomo aga nigayamba abeegi, kumanya amateeka, enshonga eziri kureetera
Gavumenti yaakora kubi nainga kurungi, enshonga ahabw’enki abantu
bashemeire kuza omu ishomero. Kwonka abantu baingi omu byaro nibaguma bari
baabinkwateireki.

Nk’okuturi kwirira obwire bw’akaruuru ka 2016, abantu baingi bariyo
nibeebuuza enshonga nyingi, ezirimu ahabw’enki Mbabazi yaarekireho Museveni
akamwesimbaho? Ahabw’enki Besigye yaahenzire ekiragiro ky’ekibiina kya FDC?
Ahabw’enki Museveni atakaarekura ngoma? Abantu baingi nibeejumbira omu
kuteera akaruuru kwonka akaruuru kaabo nibakaguza. Eki nikyoreka obutamanya
ahabw’enshonga y’obutashoma. Omuntu oine obwengye takaaguza karuru ke.
Omugasho gw’akaruuru kaawe n’okurwanisa obushomakunzi, obutegyeki bubi,
hamwe n’okuronda omuntu ow’amazima kwonka ku ori kuguza akaruuru kaawe oba
waaguza obugaiga bwawe ahakuba ogwo aine kubanza yaayeshashura ezi yaateire
omu karuuru.

Omuntu ku ari kuba ashomire aba aine eki yaakubaasa ku mutungira omurimo
gw’ebishaju. Kigumire kushanga omuntu atashomire naakora omu banka. N’obu
abakozi abamwe nibaheebwa abantu b’owaabo emirimo etabashemerire kwonka eki
tikiri kureebeka munonga. Omuntu ashomire niwe wenka aine obukugu omu
mirimo nk’obushaho, obushomesa, hamwe n’endiijo.

Obwegyese nibuyamba abakazi abataine bashaija kubaho omu maka gaabo,
omukazi ku ari kuzaara ataine ishe w’omwana, nainga shi akatwara egyo nda
kwonka atari kubaasa bujunaanizibwa, nainga shi akafeerwa omushaija
nikimuyambaho omu kworora abo baana kandi bakakura baine amagara marungi.
Omu mahanga agatunguukire, twine abashaija n’abakazi abaine amaka gaabo
gataine mukundwa kwonka amaka nk’aga gabaasize kutunguura eihanga hamwe
n’amagara gaabo. Abakazi aba baine eby’obushuubuzi byabo kandi nabo
nibashashura omushoro.

Twineho ebitongore ebyatandikirwe abakazi nk’ekya Sanyu Babies Home ekiri
kuhwera abaana abaanagirweho, ebitongore ebiri kurwaniirira obugabe
bw’abakazi omu Uganda, oteebirwe abakazi abaine emikono n’emirimo mihango
omu Gavumenti. Ekyokureeberaho, omugambirizi wa Paramenti ya Uganda
n’omukazi ou bari kweta Rebecca Kadaga; omuhandiiki mukuru w’ekigombe
ky’eby’obutegyeki ekya NRM omu Uganda nawe n’omukazi ou bari kweta Kasule
Lumumba. Abakazi nk’aba bakashoma baahika aha madaara agari kubata omu
ntebe ezaakubaire ziri ez’abashaija. Omukazi ogu ou ori kureeba naayamba
omu kukuza abaana kandi bakakura n’emicwe mirungi.

Emishaara y’abashomesa: Abashomesa omu Uganda nibabaasa kushashurwa kurungi
obwo Gavumenti yaaba eyongyeize emishoro yaayo. Waagyeragyeranisa
n’ab’amahe, abashomesa nibashashurwa kubi munonga kandi batunga n’emishaara
y’ahansi munonga. N’obu endiijo mirimo nayo neeshashurwa kubi kwonka
eky’abashomesa kirengire. N’ahabw’ekyo kwenda kutunguura eby’abashomesa,
tushemereire kukora ebintu bishatu.

Ekyokubanza n’oburingaaniza omu kugaba emirimo. Gavumenti neehereza abantu
baayo emirimo etari kushushana; ekya kabiri emirimo eri kushashurwa sente
nungi; ekya kashatu, obwegyese bw’ekika ky’ahaiguru.

Obwegyese bwine omugasho muhango munonga omu kutunguura eihanga! Omugasho
gw’eby’obwegyese nigubaasa kureebwa omu kuheereza abaana bato ebintu bisya
by’okwegaho, hamwe n’abashomesa obukoryo busya omu kushomesa abaana, omu
mikono, omu bwongo, omu mutima, hamwe n’omu magara gaabo ahabw’ensi nungi.

Oijukye ngu twine emiringo ebiri ei twakubaasa kwetegyererezamu omugasho
gw’eby’obwegyese. Emnirino egi neerugiirira aha nkwatagana y’abantu hamwe
sente ezi ori kuta omu bwegyese. Omugasho omukuru omu bwegyese n’okuheera
fiizi, okumanya, amagyezi, hamwe n’obukugu obwakubaasa kuyamba omuntu omu
bwire bwa nyensya.

Obwegyese nibuheereza omugisha muhango munonga aha muntu ogw ori kugyezaho
kuhikaana haihi n’abandi. Omuntu weena eri kwejumbira omu by’okumanya
naarabira omu nkiiko eziriyo nizigyenda omu maisho. Obwesgyese nibureetera
abantu boona baateeba omu gooro emwe, abantu nibahaana ebiteekateeko, kandi
bagaruka baronda emiringo ei baakubaasa kurwanisamu ebizibu ebi baine.

Omu hururu y’okuronda emirimo n’obwegyese bwawe oburi kukuyamba omu kutunga
omurimo ogwo. Obwegyese buriyo nibukuheereza obukugu, obujunaanizibwa hamwe
n’obukoryo obwa kubaasa kukuyamba aha murimo gwawe.

Abaana baaba baine ebiconco byabo nibayambwaho emishomo yaabo kutunguura
entaranta zaabo. Omu kushoma emizaano etari emwe n’emwe neeba eriyo omu
mashomero ago kandi emizaano egi noogiteeka omu nkora kwenda kutunguura
eby’obwegese bwawe.

Ah’eishomero abaana abari kuhika omu mashomo aga sayansi nooshanga nibo
bari kuronda emirimo ey’obwa dokita. Enshonga nk’ezi niziyamba omwana waawe
omu kurwanira eki ari kwenda omu biro bye by’omu maisho.

Obwegyese nibuyamba omu kureebeerera eby’obuhangwa ahabw’okuba amashomo agu
bari kushoma nigabaha obukugu oburi kumara omu kuteekaho enkora, amateeka
omu kurinda eby’obuhangwa. Omuntu kumanya eki ashemereire kukora
n’ekyomugasho munonga omu kurinda eby’obuhangwa. Ekyokureeberaho, omwana
owaashomire eby’obuhingisa tashemereire kuba naayembwa ngu omuntu weena
waatema omuti oshemerire kubyara ogundi.

Omuntu naaba naamanya eki ashemerire kukora, omu bwegyese omuntu weena
naatunga obujunaanizibwa omu murimo ogu ari kushomera, omwana weena atwire
eishomo naaba naamanya enshonga ahabw’enki yaatwire ishomo eri.
Obujunaanizibwa obu naaba yaaburonzire kuruga akiri muto. Kumanya eki
oshemereire kukora n’ekintu kikuru munonga ahabw’okuba noigura amaisho
g’abantu omu kyanga ekyo. Nikireetaho kushanga nookora n’amaani kwenda
kusingura ekyo eki waashomire.

N’amazima abantu abamwe baine emirimo ei batashomiire kwonka ekyo tikiri
kuzibara omuntu kushoma kugira eki yaatunga omu kuba n’abantu.

Obwegyese nibuheereza abeegi obukugu obu bari kweyambisa omu biro by’omu
maisho. Eki nikibaho obwo abantu baaba baine emigisha ahu ori kushanga
buri muntu aine omugisha gw’okuba omusinguzi. Waaba nooreeba amaani agu
Gavumenti eri kuta omu kutunguura eby’obwegyese, emishomo, n’amashomo
amasya gariyo nigateebwaho omu matendekyero amakuru obwo bagyendereire
kwongyera obukugu omu bukoryo obu abaana bashemereire kukozesa baaba bari
aha murimo. Emirimo mingi eriyo neebaho omu muringo ahu ori kushanga omuntu
naasharamu kukora omurimo gumwe omu aine obukugu. N’obu kiraabe nikireetaho
okwataana omu nganda. Ahabw’okuba nooza kushanga Abakaramoja bari aba
pooriisi, Abakiga bari abahingi, Abanyonkore bari abariisa.

Eishomero niri reetaho okukwatanisa aha gati yaabo abari omu ishomero.
Ah’eishomero abaana nibaaba nibashusha ngu bari omu kyaro kimwe, nibakozesa
orurimi rumwe, nibatambura hamwe kandi bashoma hamwe. Eki nikireetaho
okukwatanisa aha gati yaabo.

Ebiro ebi, abantu nibeejumbira omu kukorera hamwe n’okukwatanisiza hamwe,
ahabw’okuba, nibahaana amagyezi, obukoryo, hamwe n’omutindo. N’ahabw’ekyo
entunguuka n’okwegaitira hamwe kw’abantu, hamwe n’okukwatanisiza hamwe.
N’ahabw’ekyo, twine amashomo amasya agariyo nigatongoziibwa omu kutunguura
eby’obwegyese kwenda kutunguura eihanga eri. Omu mashomo aga, abaana
nibeega emicwe n’emitwarize omu bantu, beega oku bashemerire kuhurikiiriza
ebiragiro, hamwe n’okukora n’amaani, oteebirwe okukora emikago ehamire.
Emikago egi neekuyamba omu kuronda emirimo omu biro by’omu maisho.
Kutunguura obukugu omu miringo egi ori kukora n’abantu nigwo muhanda
gw’amagara gaawe. Ahabw’okuba omu muringo ogu nooza kwega okugambira omu
bantu kandi baaboosi ebiro ebi nibenda abantu abari kubaasa kugambira
kurungi aha murimo. Kandi bakakwatanisiza hamwe nk’abakozi abaine eki
bagyendereire kuhikiiriza.
Omu ihanga eririmu abaana abashomire, eihanga eryo niriba niri tunguuka
kurungi ahabw’okuba emirimo nibaba nibagishoronzya kurungi. N’obu abamwe
nibareeba obwegyese nk’okurya enguzi n’obushomankuzi. Ngu ahabw’okuba
abaana nibabashomesa ekintu kimwe kandi hamwe naabo abari rwagati naabo
bakabashomesa ekindi kandi ekiri eky’omutaano. Ngu obwegyese nibureetaho
abooro n’abagaiga.
Obwa hati abantu abaine ebicweka bitabashemereire omu kyanga, omushango
nibaguta aha bwegyese bubi. Kandi omurimo gw’okushomesa okuheereza
amagyezi. Abantu nibaza kuba nibahikira omu idaara ry’okubanza kandi eki
nikihikibwaho abo abari kwikiriza ngu obwegyese n’omuhanda gw’entunguuka.
Abantu nibaba bakuru b’ebitongore, n’ab’eby’obutegyeki, abamwe batunga
ebitiinisa bitari bimwe na bimwe kwonka nikigambwa ngu aba nibo bari kuba
beebembeire obushomankuzi n’oburi bw’enguzi omu bantu abu bari kuheereza.
Ahabw’okuba nibareetaho okwebaganisamu aha gati y’omworo n’omugaiga.
Nibahendeera banyunyuusire na kakye-na-kahango ak’omworo aine.
Okukwatanisa okuri aha gati y’omugaiga n’omworo ni kukye munonga
ahabw’okuba abantu aba tibakaabaasa kutuura omu nju emwe. Omugaiga
naateekateeka ngu omworo n’ow’oku mubonaabonesa ari kumushabiiriza. Eki
nikireetera omworo nawe kwerinda omugaiga. Omwana w’omuro ataaha aha
ncwamba za rufu ahabw’okuba abaasa kwiba ow’omugaiga ku kyakubaho enjara
ekateera. Omuringo nigwo gumwe, omugaiga ataaha aine okweraarikiirira
kuhango munonga ngu abooro babaasa kuba nibashahura ebye.
Omu muringo nigwo gumwe, abeegi nibatunga idaara ry’ahaiguru ahabw’okuba
nibaba bari koreire munonga. Abaana aba nibatunga emirimo eri
kweshushaniiriza n’abagaiga ahabw’okuba nibaba bagikoreire. Eki obumwe
nikibaingaho eibura ry’obutaingana obumwe kireetaho okwingana aha gati
y’abo abari kugyezaho kukora. Kandi oine kukimanya ngu abaana abo abari
kukora kubi omu mishomo yaabo nibashanga ebintu bigumire omu kuronda
emirimo.
Obwegyese nibwigura amaisho kandi bwikiriza ekyererezi kutaaha omu magara
gaawe kandi abo ababaasize kuza omu mashomero oshanga baine ekyetengo
ky’okushanga ekyaro kyona kishomire. Kwonka mwijukye ngu obwegyese bubaasa
kukunagisa eki okwise. Omu by’obuhangwa, obwegyese nibureetera omuntu
okunagaijura eby’obuhangwa bwe akabireeba nk’ebitaine mugasho. Obwa hati,
abaana tibaakifayo aha nzina ya kare, ebyokurya ebya kare. Bo nibagira ngu
n’okugyenda n’omurembe gwa dooti koomu.
Okukwatanisa nikubaho aha bw’okushoma. Omugasho mukuru omu kushoma
n’okumanya kandi mukamanyana. Ekyokureeberaho, eka neetunga omwana kwonka
abaana aba obwa hati abaingi nibeegyera ah’eishomero. Eki nikyoreka ngu
amashomero n’agandi matendekyero gariho kumariira omurimo gw’abazaire.
Obwa hati abantu nibateekateeka ngu eishomero n’okushomesa omwana weena
kuhika ngu reero okushomesa omwana emicwe mirungi, obumwe, okutwaza gye
hamwe n’ebindi ngu ogu gushemereire kuba guri omurimo gw’omuzaire.
Nooshanga eishomero riteire amaani maingi omu kushomesa abaana okukwatanisa
hamwe, okuba omutuuragye murungi.
Kurabira omu bitabo ebi bari kushoma, abaana aba nibeega emiringo ei
baakubaasa kutunguuramu eihanga, kutegyekamu eihanga, hamwe n’enshonga
z’okurinda sente zaabo omu biro by’omu maisho.
Omwana naashomesa eby’obuhangwa kurabira omu kushoma. Buri kyanga kyona
nikibaho ahabw’eby’obuhangwa ebirimu enyikiriza, okunogoora, ediini,
ebyeshongoro by’enzaarwa ebi abantu bashemereire kwega. Omwana weena ku ari
kwega eby’obuhangwa ayega kutaanuura ekibi n’ekirungi. Ekyokureeberaho, omu
Banyakore, omwojo ku akura ashwera, n’omwishiki ku akura ashwera kwonka eki
tikiri kumanyisa ngu oshwere faa! Nooteekwa kugira ebi waakuratira kwenda
kutunga omwishiki ashugaine.
N’ahabw’ekyo ebintu eby’obuhangwa bishemereire kushomesibwa kurabira omu
kukwatanisiza hamwe, omu kukorera hamwe. N’ahabw’ekyo, obwegyese bwine
obujunaanizibwa bw’okushomesa abaana eby’obuhangwa.
Omuntu ashemereire kuba aine ekitiinisa ekiri omu kishushani
ky’eby’obuhangwa kandi obwegyese bubaasa kukora omurimo ogu obwo eihanga
ryaba niri tunguuka.
Obwegyese nibuyamba omwana kukura ari kutiina abazaire kandi akaheereza
ekiragiro ekitiinisa kiri kumara. N’obujunaanizibwa bw’abashomesa kureebeka
ngu abaana baatunga okumanyisibwa omu by’obwegyese n’ebindi bingi munonga.
Obwegyese nibuyamba omwana kukura aine amagara marungi. Omu kukura kwe
naaba naamanya obu ashemereire kukora ekintu nainga obu atashemereire
kukikora. Omwana w’omwishiki ku ari kuza omu micwe, ku arikuba abishomire
kimuyamba obu tegaita n’omushaija ahabw’okuba ku ari kwegaita n’omushaija
aba naamanya ngu naaza kutunga ebizibu bingi munonga ebirimu enda
yaateeteekateekire hamwe n’endwara z’obushambani.
Obwegyese nibutebeekanisiza omwana nyensya ahabw’okuba eminyeeto nibo
beebembezi ba nyensya, kandi baine emirimo mingi y’okukorera abantu omu
byaro. Eki nikyo ori kushangira amaani maingi Gavumenti neegata omu
by’emikono.
Omuntu naashoma kutunga ekitiinisa. Omuntu ashomire naaba ari ow’ekitiinisa
aha kyaro n’omu ihanga ryona kandi omuntu ogu aine omugisha muhango kuba
omuntu w’amaani. Abantu aba nibaheereza obwebembezi burungi omu bantu kandi
eki kibaasa n’okwihaho oburi bw’enguzi. Ekyokureeberaho, okwetegyereza
kw’omuntu kubaasa kugira ahu kwamuhisya. Enshonga eri ngu nku cayamaani /
cayapaasoni, ari kuhimbisibwa aha kyaro, omuringo nigwo gumwe ogu bari
kuheereza omuntu ashomire ekitiinisa. Ahu ekitiinisa kiri kuba kiri,
entunguuka neeba eriho.
Obwegyese nibureetaho akahayahano aha gati y’abantu kandi eki nikireeta
entunguuka. Ebirungi nibitandika kukorwa omu makorero gatari gamwe na gamwe
ahabw’okuba buri ikorero niryenda rikire ritaahi ryaryo. Ekyokureeberaho,
omushomesa naayesiimiriza omwana ogwo ari kukora kurungi omu kibiina. Kandi
ebirabo nibiza aharyogwe ari kukora kurungi. Omu ringo nigwe gumwe omuntu
nakutunguka yaaba naakora kurungi.
Eihanga ku tunguuka niryenda abantu abashomire; kwenda kugira entaasya
nungi, hamwe n’okubinga obworo abantu bashemereire kuba bashomire.
Ekyokureeberaho, enamba y’abo abari kukora omu bya inginiyaringi, hamwe
n’omubyoma bya kompyuta nibeetengwa munonga kwenda kutunguuka omu Uganda.
Aba nibabaasa kuta omu nkora kurungi munonga kandi bakora puraani
y’eihanga.
Obwegyese nibugyenda n’obutegyeki burungi obwa dimokurasiya; abantu
nibamanya enshonga ezi kwatiraine n’okuteera akaruuru. Omuntu ashomire
naaba naamanya ngu akaruuru ke n’ak’omutaano munonga omu kurwanisa
obutegyeki bubi, oburi bw’enguzi hamwe n’okureetaho oburingaaniza. Okumanya
ni kimwe aha bintu ebiri kuruga omu bwegyese. Obwegyese nibwongyera
omutindo mu kwebembera eihanga.
Amahanga nigakwatanisiza hamwe kurabira omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe
kwenda kutunguura eby’obwegyese. Ebitongore n’ebigomnbe ebirimu ebyo
ebihwera efuuzi, abaana b’amashomero, abarema kwenda naabo bakaagira eki
baayekoreraho.
Eishomero hamwe n’obwegyese nibiyamba omwana kushoma ebintu bisya ebiri
kumuheereza obukugu hamwe n’omugisha kukwatanisa n’abantu b’amaani omu nsi
omu.
Obwire bwona, abantu bataaha nibagamba aha kwegyesa omwana emitwarize
n’emicwe omu kukura kwe na munonga omu bikwatiraine n’obwegyese omu
by’omubonano. Omwana ku ari kuba ari ah’eishomero naashoma ebintu bingi
ebikwatiraine n’eby’omubonano. Ekyokureeberaho hariho emishomo n’amashomo
agari kubeegyesa aha bikwatiraine n’ebicweka byabo by’ekihama. Aho omwana
naakura ari kumanya omugasho gwa buri kicweka. Ekindi, omwana naashomesibwa
akabi akari kureetwa omu kuteerana akiri muto. Eki nikimureetera kukura ari
kumanya akabi k’okwejumbira omu by’omubonano akiri muto nk’okutwara enda
y’endaaro, okukwatwa akakooko ka siriimu, endwara ya kisipi, hamwe n’ezindi
ndwara z’obushambani. Omu Bakiga kuruga Kisiizi, omwishiki ku yaabaire
atwara enda bakaba bamuhiringisa aha kikungu naingashi bamunaga omu mugyera
gwa Kisiizi ahabw’okuba okutwara enda bakaba bagureeba nk’omukyeno.

Ku orikuba otashiishire emitwarize y’ekyanga, omwana aine kwega emicwe
kuruga aha bazaire be ahabw’okuba omuzaire aine obujunaanizibwa kushomesa
omwana we ebikwatiraine n’eby’omubonano. Omwana w’omwishiki ashemereire
kwega ebintu ebi kuruga owa nyina kandi omwojo ashemereire kwega ebintu ebi
kuruga ow’ishe. Omwana weena ashomesibwe aha bikwatiraine n’eby’amagara ge
na munonga aha bicweka bye by’ekihama nikimuyamba omu kukora emikago etari
kubaasa kumushiisira ebiro bye by’omu maisho.
Omu muringo gwona, okushomesa omwana ogu nikimuyamba kumanya ebicweka bye
by’omubiri kandi eki nikimuhweraho omu kumanya eki ari. Omwana w’omwojo
nikimuyamba kumanya ngu ku ari kukura naija kuba omushaija kandi nikyo
kimwe omwana w’omwishiki nawe kimuyamba kwetebeekanisiza ebiro bye by’omu
maisho nk’omushaija n’omukazi.
Omuntu naaba naayenda kumanya eki ashemereire kuba naakora. Akakungu,
naingashi obukungu omu baana nibu bashiisha. N’ahabw’ekyo kubari kuba
batashomesiibwe ekikwatiraine n’eby’omubonano, bashiisikara bakiri bato.
Omu kakungu ako, abaana nibeegyeramu ebintu nk’oku bashemereire kukuura
abashaija bakuru, beete “baashuga-dadi.” Enshonga nk’ezi niziyamba omwana
ogwo kwega oku ashemereire kusharamu kurungi kandi akasharamu omu muringo
oguhikire. Omu murembe ogwa hati (ogwa dooti koomu). Abaana nibakuratira
munonga emikutu y’eby’amakuru erimu nka zaareediyo, zaatiivi, feesibuuku
hamwe n’endiijo eya intaneeti. Aha mikutu egi, abaana nibeegyeraho ebibi
n’ebirungi. Aha mikutu egi, na munonga ogwa feesibuuku, abaana
nibasindakirana ebishushani by’obushambani ebiri kubareetera baaza omu
bikorwa by’obushambani.
Omuzaire aine obujunazibwa bwokureeteraho omwana we yayejumbira omu
kukorera entunguka. Abazaire bashemerire kurekyeraho ekitekyerezo
kyokushanga nibagyira nngu omwana nayegyera ahishomero, ejuke ngu naabo
beine obujunazibwa bwabo nka abazaire obu bashemerire kuba nibakuratira
kwenda kukuza abaana b’emicwe mirungi. Kwenda kuyamba abaana baabo omu
kwebuza kandi baketegyereza kurungi. Omu muringo ogu omwana nabaasa
kutanuura ekibi n’ekirungi.
Abantu baine ekiteekyerezo ngu eishomero niri heereza omwana okukwatanisa
kwa kabiri, omu kwega emitwarize n’emicwe. Omu muringo ogwo abaana nibagira
omwete gw’okukwatanisiza hamwe. Omu muringo ogu, okushomesibwa nikuba
nikugyenda omu maisho obwo ori kushanga abaana nibeega oku bashemereire
kukwatanisa n’abandi bantu. Okutunguura obukugu kurabira omu kukwatanisa
n’abantu boona n’omugasho muhango munonga omu biro byawe by’omu maisho.
Ahabw’okuba abantu bari kuheereza emirimo nibenda abantu abaine obukugu
n’obuhangu omu kumanya.
Kwonka obwegyese obu nibureetaho emiringo ebiri y’abantu omu ihanga. Twine
abantu abooro n’abagaiga. Omu bwegyese, omuntu ku ari kuba ashomire aine
emigisha kutunguuka ahonaaho kandi abo abandi nabo nibaguma baine ebizibu
bingi ebiri kutangira entunguuka omu bantu. Okwongyera ahari ekyo,
nooshanga omworo atari kubarwa nk’omuntu aha kyaro kandi nooshanga omworo
ataine mugisha gwona kutunga entebe y’obukuru aha kyaro nk’oku bagamba ngu
omworo tategyeka.
Abantu ku baakwikiriza ngu okushoma n’omuhanda gw’amagara hamwe
n’entunguuka, eihanga ryona ribaasa kutunguuka ahonaaho. Omuntu weena aine
kuhika ah’eidaara ery’ahaiguru naaba aine omugisha gw’okuba mukuru
w’ekitongore kurugiirira ah’eishomo eri yaashomire, naaba omuntu
w’ekitiinisa. Mwijukye ngu abantu aba nibo bari kuba beebembeiri oburi
bw’enguzi n’obushomankuzi.
Abantu aba nibataho ebiragiro hamwe n’enshonga zitari zimwe na zimwe omu
kutunguura eihanga kandi ebiragiro ebi nibiija bikorera omu bantu
ab’omurembe ogundi. Ebiragiro ebi nibireka abooro bari abooro kandi
omugaiga ari omugaiga. Obu n’okubura oburingaaniza oburi kureetwa omu
kushoma. Okushoma ni kwigura amaisho omu baana bato, bahindukamu etaara ya
nyensya kandi eki kirimu ebintu bingi.
Obwegyese nibuyamba omu kukwatanisiza hamwe: Ekintu ekikuru omu bwegyese
n’okureetaho emikago kandi n’obu eka yaakuba eine omwana, nikiguma
nikyetengyesa ngu omwana kugira ahu yaaraba kwenda kwongyera aha bi
abazaire baabaire nibakora omu kushomesa abaana baabo emicwe n’emitwarize.
Omu ishomero n’omuka abaana nibamanya oku bashemereire kutwaza kurungi
bakaba abantu b’obujunaanizibwa omu biro by’omu maisho. Amashomero
nigagyezaho kureebeka ngu abantu bakwatanisiza hamwe, baba abatuura gye
barungi kandi bakuratira ebiragiro.
Abantu nibagyezaho kureebeka ngu baaguma n’eby’obuhangwa bwabo omu ntuura
yaabo. Ekyokureeberaho n’obu abaana baakuba bari aha mashomero nibagyezaho
kureebeka ngu emitwarize yaabo tiyaafa. Omu mashomero, abaana nibagyenda
omu maisho kureebeka ngu ebyabo nk’Abanyakore, Abaganda, Abanyarwanda
Abatooro byaguma nibimanywa kandi byatunguuka. Amashomero aga nigeejumbira
omu kutunguura emyoga y’abaana, eby’obuhangwa. Ekyokureeberaho, abaana
nibakora emizaano ey’ekinyakore baaba bari omu matendekyero gabo, bazina
ekitaaguuriro n’ekishoomo.
N’obujunaanizibwa bwawe kumanya amagara gaawe oku geemereire, kumanya
entaasya y’eihanga, kumanya obwire obu abantu bashemereire kuba nibahikaana
kwenda kumanya kandi bakashwijuma enshonga z’entunguuka omu kyanga kyabo.
Kwongyera ahari ekyo, emitwarize y’omuntu nayo neerebekyera omu
by’obwegyese bye n’obu waakuba oshomire kwonka akashekye kataaha
nikanyaarira engino, toruga aha baara nooba otari kworeka obujunaanizibwa
bwawe n’ekyogyendereire.
Obwegyese nibuyamba omuntu kutunga emirimo kandi emirimo egi neeba eri
mirungi. Omuntu ku ari kushoma obwa dokita niwe ori kushanga naakora omu
marwariro. Abantu aba nibaba nibatunga emishaara mirungi munonga eri
kubaasa kubayambaho omu kutunguura eka zaabo kandi bakakura n’abaana
ba’amagra marungi. Ahabw’okuba obwegyese nibutebeekanisa omwana oku araije
kutunga omurimo omu biro by’omu maisho kandi emirimo egi neebayamba kugira
eki baayambaho omu kutunguura ekyanga.
Obwegyese nibuyamba omuntu kumanya eki ari, eki ashemereire kuba naaba,
kandi n’eki ashemereire kuba naakora. Omuhendo gw’eby’obwegyese ogu oine
nigu kuyamba kumanya orurengo rwawe. Omuntu ashemereire kwemanya eki ari
kwenda kurwanisa ebizibu ebiri kureetwa omu sente. Nooshanga omuntu aine
akasente kakye ariyo nawe naayenda kuraara nk’omugaiga. Haza omuntu ku ari
kuba ashomire kimuyambaho omu kushohoza sente kurugiirira aha murimo ogu
ari kukora, okushoma kwe oku kuri kwingana.
Obwegyese nibureetaho okuhayahayana omu kuronda emirimo, omu kukorera
entunguuka omu maka hamwe n’ebyanga. Ekyokureeberaho, omushomesa naasiima
omwana ogwo ori kukora kurungi omu kibiina kandi omwana ogwo aheebwa
n’ebirabo. Eki nikireetaho okuhakana aha gati y’abegye.
Obwegyese n’obugabe bw’omuntu kandi twine ku bureeba nk’omuhanda oguri
kwerekyerera entunguuka. Amahanga amaingi gabaasize kutunguuka kurabira omu
bwegyese. Eki n’ahabw’okuba gaine obwegyese burungi, okushanga nigafayo aha
by’obwegyese, kushanga ngu hariho okukwatanisa kuhango aha gati y’amakorere
n’eihanga, kushanga ngu abeegi baine omwete gw’okuta omu nkora ebi
bashomire n’ebindi bingi.
Ahabw’okushoma, amahanga maingi gabaasize kutunguuka kandi gakatunga
abakozi bari kumara. Ekindi, abantu baine amagyezi agari kubaasa kutunguura
eihanga ryabo. Obwegyese nibwongyera aha mutindo gw’ebyo ebiriyo nibikorwa
omu makorero.
Eihanga nk’erya Japan tiriine kantu koona kwonka ririyo niri tunguuka
ahabw’okuba abantu baayo bashomire emyoga etari emwe n’emwe. Eihanga nka
Nigeria n’eri gaiga kwonka abantu baayo tibashomire kandi eki kireesire
eby’obugaiga bwa Nigeria kuguma nibigwa nibi kumbagara obutaka.
Obwegyese bwine omugasho muhango munonga omu kutunguura eihanga kurabira
omu kushomesa abantu emiringo mingi eri kubayambo omu kukura baine amagara
marungi! Omugasho gw’eby’obwegyese nigubaasa kureebwa omu kuheereza abaana
bato ebintu bisya by’okwegaho, hamwe n’abashomesa okugira obukoryo busya
omu kushomesa abaana, omu mikono, omu bwongo, omu mutima, hamwe n’omu
magara gaabo ahabw’ensi nungi.

Omu kuhendera, oijukye ngu twine emiringo ebiri ei twakubaasa
kwetegyererezamu omugasho gw’eby’obwegese omu by’amagara. Omuntu weena
ashomire naayamba abaana be, abantu hamwe n’eihanga kwirukiirira obugabe
omu by’amagara hamwe n’entunguuka, okuba kurungi n’okushemererwa.

 KYAHWAYO </archive_file>

 7. Omurimo gw'ekitongore ekya Public Procurement and Disposal of
 Public Assets Authority (PPDA)

Okumurika
Omu makumi g'emyaka hati, Uganda etengire orugamba rw'okurwanisa enguzi.
Itwe, nka Gavumenti, omu rugamba oru, turwanire omu miringo mingi
turikukozesa ebikwato by'emiringo mingi. Turikugyemwa omuhimbo gwaitu hamwe
n'obuteerekyereza kwenda kuhangura, obwahati tushemereirwe kushohoza
akatabo k'omutuuragye ak'okurwanisa enguzi.

Ekigyendererwa kikuru ky'akatabo aka n'okuha OmunyaUganda obuhwezi
bw'okumworekyerera kutunguura okwetegyereza kwe amatembezo hamwe n'omutindo
ebirikwetengwa omutuuragye omu kurwanisa enguzi, barikwetegyereza omurimo
gwabo.

Akatabo aka k'abatuuragye, ak'okubanza, kaiziire omu bwire ahabw'enshonga
nyingi: kaiziire aha bwire obu abantu boona barikubangaanisa ebirikukwata
aha maani ga Gavumenti kurwanisa enguzi. Akatabo aka kanguhi, nikamarayo
kandi nikooreka ku gavumenti ekozire kihango okwigaza ebiina by'obunaku
bw'enyima. Kandi nikooreka omuhanda gw'okutebeekanisa oburungi kandi, twine
amatisko ngu, nyensya neetangaara twaba tutwarireiremu AbanyaUganda boona
omu kurwanisa enguzi.

Okushohoza akatabo aka, nikiteekateekwa ngu abanyaUganda abaine abahindura
enteekyereza nabaija kukashoma kandi ebirimu bibateere omuhimbo gw'okugira
eki baakora, kugira emicwe yaabo aha bwabo n'abagyenzi baabo nainga
bongyere ahi ei baine.

Ekyahamuheru, nk'ekitongore ky'Emicwe n'Obuntu-buzima, nitusiima munonga
abatuhaire amagyezi, obumanyi, obwire, amaani hamwe n'ebintu ebirekire
akatabo aka kaabaho. Okusiima kwitu namunonga nikuza aha b'akakiiko
akarikugaita abanyamateeka aka Inter-Agency Forum Legal Task Force
beebembeirwe abarikukora aha nshonga z'ebiragiro omu kitongore
ky'Eby'emicwe n'Obuntu-buzima ahabw'okuhandiika, okushwijuma n'okushohoza
kopi y'aha muheru y'Akatabo k'Abatuuragye.

AHABWA RUHANGA, NEIHANGA RYANGYE

Rev. Fr. Simon Lokodo (MP)
Minisita W'eihanga ahabw'Emicwe, n'Obuntu-buzima
OFIISI YA PUREZIDENTI

 Enyanjura

Ekigyendererwa ky'akatabo aka n'okuhwera abanyaUganda kwetegyereza eki
obuntu-buzima hamwe n'enguzi birikumanyisa. Akatabo nikakuhwera kumanya
omurimo gwawe omu kurwanisa enguzi, ebitongore ebiri omu kurwanisa enguzi,
ekirikureetaho hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'enguzi omu kicweka kyaitu.

Amaani gaawe g'okurwanisa enguzi nigaruga omu Ngyenderwaho y'Eihanga
akacweka 17(i) akarikugira ngu:

"N'obujunaanizibwa bwa buri mutuuragye wa Uganda kumaraho enguzi hamwe
n'okukozesa kubi nainga kushiisha ebintu by'abantu boona."
Engyenderwaho y'eihanga neeyongyera egira ngu:

 "Boona abakozi ba gavumenti nibaija kwesigwa ngu bakorere abantu. Abantu
boona abaine emyanya omu bwebembezi kandi obujunaanizibwa nibaija, omu
mirimo yaabo, kugira obujunaanizibwa aha bantu. Kyona ekirikubaasika
nikiija kukorwa, kwanika, kwihaho hamwe n'okumaraho enguzi hamwe
n'okukozesa kubi obutegyeki ahari abo abari omu bwebembezi bw'abantu."

N'obujunaanizibwa bwa buri MunyaUganda kwejumbira omu kurwanisa enguzi.
Okwejumbiramu kwawe omu kurwanisa enguzi nikwija kureetaho Uganda enungi
erimu enguudo nungi, amarwariro amarungi, ebintu n'obuhereza burungi,
amashomero amarungi hamwe n'emyanya mirungi etwetooroire.

1.1 Obuntu-buzima n'enki?
Obuntu-buzima nikimanyisa emicwe mirungi y'omuntu omu bantu n'omu magara ge
nk'omuntu omu kufayo kutaho amaani kuhika aha kutunga ensi nungi.

2.0 Enguzi n'enki? Enguzi nikimanyisa okukozesa kubi ofiisi y'abantu boona
nainga y'omuntu buntu kweyihiramu ebyawe ahabwawe.

2.1 Enguzi eri omu miringo engahi?
Iteeka ry'ekurwanisa enguzi ririmu ebikorwa n'emikorere ebirikwingana
enguzi omu miringo egi ahaifo:
 (a) Omukozi wa gavumenti yaashaba, nainga akaikiriza sente nari
 obuhereza nainga ekindi kintu kyona ekirikumugasira we
 nk'omuntu; omurwatu, nainga bwesherekye nari arikurabira omu
 muntu ondiijo, obwo arikuhingaana obuhereza bwe obu aine kuba
 naaha abantu, nainga akabura kukora emirimo ye nk'oku
 ashemereire kugikora
b) Omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakukozesa obushoborozi bwe nainga omurimo gwe
kukozesa ekintu kya gavumenti omu muringo ogu kitashemereire kuba nikikora
obwo ekigyendererwa kiri ekyokugasira.

(c) Omuntu ku yaakuha omukozi wa gavumenti sente, nainga ekintu kyona
ekirikumugasira we nk'omuntu, omu rwatu nainga bwesherekye nari akarabira
omu ndiijo muntu nainga ekitongore; obwo arikuhingaana obuheereza nainga
kuremwa kukora emirimo ye nk'oku ashemereire kugikora

(d) Omuntu, ku yaakwikiriza nainga akahereza nari akaragaanisa ebituga,
omurwatu, bwesherekye, nari arikurabira omu ndiijo muntu, obwo arikukozesa
entebe ye nainga obukuru bwe, akahindura ensharaho y'ondiijo orikukorera
gavumenti nainga omuntu buntu ngu ashareho ekyo eki arikwenda nainga eki
ondiijo arikwenda.
e) Omuntu ku yaakutunga, kukozesa, nainga kushereka ekintu kyona eki
yaakuba aihire omu mihanda mibi eyagambwaho aharuguru.
f) Omuntu ku yaakuba omwe aha baakora ebyagambwaho aharuguru.
g) Omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakukora nari akabura kukora emirimo ye
ahabw'ekigyendererwa ky'okwenda kwetungira ebye nk'omuntu nainga
kubitungira ondiijo.
h) Kunagiirira omurimo - omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakuremwa kukora emirimo
ye nk'oku kirikwetengwa mukama we; nk'okwosa aha murimo ataine rusa nainga
kuza aha murimo kikyererezi.

 CAPTION

2.2 Emishango erikukwata aha ndagaano z'okukora amirimo

Endagaano nikimanyisa kwikirizana kurikukorwa embaju ibiri (nk'okwikirizana
ahagati y'ekitongore hamwe n'omushuubuzi nainga za biizineesi ibiri).
Niguba omushango omu Iteeka eri omuntu kuha nainga kwikiriza sente nainga
akakozesa obushoborozi bwe ahari ogwo oshemereire kutunga
endagaano/omurimo.

2.3 Kutunga tenda omu muringo gw'enguzi

Omuntu naakora omushango ogu yaakora ebyagambwaho ahaifo:

 i) Omuntu arikwenda kutunga konturakita/endagaano kuruga omu kitongore
 kya gaavumenti ku yaakugira eki yaaha omuntu ondiijo ohaireyo okushaba
 kwe kutunga konturakita/endagaano ngu we aiheyo tenda ye.

 ii) Omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakuhayo amakuru agarikukwata ahari tenda
 z'ekitongore kya gavumenti, akagaha ondiijo muntu omukwenda kuremesa
 ondiijo owaakuba nayenda kutwara tenda egyo.

 iii) Omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakwikiriza ebiconco ngu aiheyo okushaba
 tenda.

 iv) Tenda neebaasa kuba eri eyokuha omuntu omurimo nainga kuguza ebintu
 nari kuha obuheereza omu kitongore kya gavumenti nainga aha
 disiturikiti.

4. Kutugira omukozi wa gavumenti/Omukozi wa gavumenti kutugisa

 CAPTION

Okutuga n'ekikorwa ky'okuha sente, ebintu nainga obuhereza omukozi wa
gavumenti kumubaihabaiha ngu:
 • Ateere akaruuru nari abure kuteera akaruuru aha rukiiko omu kitongore
 kya gavumenti,
 • Akore nainga atakora mirimo ye;
 • Ahwere omu kugura nari azibire okurabaho kw'akaruuru nari kuha nainga
 kwikiriza sente nainga ebintu nari obuheereza kuruga aha muntu nari
 abantu kwenda kumubaihabaiha ngu agire eki yaakora omu rwatu,
 bwesherekye nainga kurabira omu muntu ondiijo.

2.5 Kukozesa ebintu bya gavumenti ahabwawe

Eki nikibaho omuntu kukwata sente za gavumenti akazikozesa emirimo endiijo
etari ei zishemereire kuba nizikora ahabwokweyendeza ebye. Ekyokureeberaho,
omukozi wa gavumenti ku yaakukozesa sente ezishemereire kuba nizikozesebwa
kureeberera amashomero ga gavumenti akaziguramu motoka ye y'omurimo.

 CAPTION

2.6 Kubunzya obushoboorozi kubi

Oku nikwo omuntu arikukora nainga akabura kukora ekintu, kurugiirira aha
biragiro nainga enteekateeka eriho, obwo kirikuruga omu bushoborozi
butahikire obu arikukozesa kwerondera ebye ahabwe nainga ebyomuntu ondiijo.

2.7 Omuhondano gw'akakwate k'obuzaare omu mirimo

Ahu omukozi wa gavumenti ari omu nshonga ezi ainemu akakwate we nk'omuntu
kandi akabura kugigamba. Akakwate k'omuntu karimu omukazi/omwami, omwana,
ou orikureeberera, omujwekyerwa, omukozi mugyenzi waawe omu bizinesi, kandi
omuntu yaaba naakimanya nainga yaakimanyire omu muringo gwona.

2.8 Okushoshora
Eki nikibaho omuntu kukozesa ofiisi ye kuhiira omuntu weena obwo
arikugyenderera ahu ogwo muntu arikuruga, ekibiina kye, oruganda rwe,
nainga enyikiriza ye yaaba ari omu kristo nari omusiraamu, omukurisitaayo
nari omukaturiki, n'ebindi.

2.9 Okushoshorera abanyabuzaare omuntu kukozesa obushoboorozi bwe nainga
ofiisi ye kurabyaho omuntu weena ou aine nawe obuzaare. Ekyokureeberaho,
omuntu kuha omurimo abanyabuzaare be nk'omukazi we, omutabani, omuhara,
ishento, ishenkazi nainga nyinento, omwihwa n'abandi.

2.10 Okurahira okutarikwikirizibwa mu mateeka

Eki nikibaho omuntu yaarahiza nainga akeebembera endahiro ezaakubaasa
kukwata ahari buri kintu zitarikwikirizibwa omu mateeka.

2.11 Kweha obushoborozi

Omuntu kwekora nk'omukozi wa gavumenti, eki atari, haza akaba omugyenyi
omukuru aha mikoro. Ekyokureeberaho, omuntu ku yaakweyeta omuramuzi
akateeza ekiragaano nk'omuramuzi.

2.12 Kweyeta omukozi wa gavumenti

Omuntu kweyeta eki atari, akaba omukozi wa gavumenti, kandi akakora
emirimo omu kitiinisa ekyo.

2.13 Kutiinatiinisa abakozi ba gavumenti

Omuntu kutiinatiinisa omukozi wa gavumenti kwenda ngu aikirize nainga
ayange kukora emimo ye.

2.14 Obushomankuzi

Eki nikimanyisa omukozi w'ekigombe nari ekibiina ky'ediini kwiba sente
nainga ebintu bya mukama we nari eby'ekitongore.

2.15 Kufeerereza sente

Eki nikibaho omukozi wa gavumenti, banka, ekitongore ekihora sente,
insuarensi, nainga ekitongore kya gavumenti kyona, ku yaakukora nainga
akanga kukora ekintu eki arikumanya ngu nikiija kufeereza gavumenti/mukama
we sente.

2.16 Kubuzaho ebintu eby'obiikiibweEki nikibaho omuntu ogwo orikuba aine
ekintu ky'ondiijo muntu, abantu nainga ekitongore, kukibuzaho/kukishiisha
nkana agyendereire kwiba nari kukozesa ekyo kintu omu muringo
gutarikwikirizibwa.

2.17 Omukozi wa gavumenti kuha embaririra erikuhabya
Omuntu okwasiibwe ebintu nainga sente za gavumenti, okuhayo embariirira
egwire aha bintu ebyo nainga sente ezo haza arikukimanya.

2.18 Embariirira y'obugobya

Omukozi, arikugyenderera kwiba, ku yaakubuzaho bwino, kugingirira ekitabo
kyona, ekihandiiko, ekintu ky'omuhendo nari akaunti ya banka ya mukama we.
Ekikorwa ky'obugobya ekitarimu mazima nainga oburingaaniza nikiba
nikigyenderera okubuzaabuza omukozesa.

2.19 Abakozi Kushaba ebintu ebitari byo

Eki nikibaho obu omukozi wa gavumenti kuhayo embariirira ezirikukwata aha
sente nainga ebintu ezigwire haza akigyendereire.

2.20 Abakozi ba gavumenti kuha ebaruha zigwire

Eki nikibaho obu omuntu ogwo aikiriziibwe ebiragiro kuha ebaruha, enshonga
erikukwata aha bugabe bwa burimuntu, ku yaakuha ebaruha egwire kandi
arikukimanya.

2.21 Okwegaigahaza omu muringo gutahikire
Eki nikibaho omuntu ku yaakushangwa aine sente nainga ebintu ebi atungire
omu buryo butahikire kandi atarikubaasa kushoboorora gye ahu birugire
kurugiirira aha ntasya ye erikumanywa.

2.22 Kuzibira/kuteganisa okucaaka

Omuntu ku yaakuteera, akanga, akakyerereza/akakyerererwa, kwanga kuha
amakuru nari akabura kukorengana n'ekiragiro kya pooriisi nainga kwangira
omukozi weena kutaaha omu mwanya akacaaka.

2.23 Kuteganisa okucondooza

Eki nikibaho omuntu orikucwekyereza, kuhindura, kutaagura nainga kugwisa
ekintu kyona kya mukamawe n'ekigyendererwa ky'okushereka obuhame
bw'omushango.

3.0 Enguzi neerugamu ki?

Enguzi eri buri hamwe omunsi yoona. Neeteganisa abantu nyamwingi omu nsi
omu muringo mubi. Neeteganisa emiteekateekyere y'abantu, ahabwokuba,
nk'obuhuuku hamwe n'obutware, ni n'enkora etarimu kusaasira n'embabazi,
kandi t'erikuha kitiinisa ebyetaago by'obuntu nainga ensi. Neeshiisha ahari
buri idaara. Abari b'enguzi bo nibafeerwa kakye, baitu kaaba kariho,
okugumizamu n'ebikorwa byabo. Tibarikutiina bihikirizi ngu nibabaasa
kufeerwa obugaiga bwabo, ebirungi hamwe n'ekitiinisa kyabo. Oburi
bw'enguzzi obw'abakozi ba gavumentinibwongyerera aha kushiisha obuhangwa,
bwongyere amaani okushuubura ebibazi-bazi kandi eyongyere magyendo y'emundu
z'obutwa omu nsi. Enguzi neefeerereza eihanga. Neebaasa kureetaho
obusiisi bw'amani omu nkoresa y'ebintu/sente omu gavumenti kandi eyongyere
omwanya muhango ahagati y'abooro n'abagaiga. Obutagira bwesigye n'okwehwa
amasiko kw'abantu omu ihanga nikibaasa kutabangura za gavumenti, zimareho
y'eby'entaasya kandi n'abantu baburwe emirimo.

Enguzi neeyongyerera kimwe obworo. Neeshenyera kimwe obuhangwa, terikuha
kitiinisa obugabe bw'abantu kandi neekingira entunguuka - aha rurengo rwa
gavumenti hamwe n'aha n'orw'abarikwekozesa. Neereetaho obutaikirizana
ahagati y'amahanga kandi neeshenyera kimwe obwesigwa n'obuhame omu
buringaaniza hamwe n'omu zaagavumenti. Buri omwe naagyeta rwata buri hamwe
omunsi yoona, abanya diini boona omu nsi. Ku baraabe batagitangire, neija
kuzaara akabi akaraashenyere kimwe ensi kandi n'orugamba aha micwe. Enguzi
neereebwa nk'ekintu ekiine ebihikirizi bikye, enkora eyanguhi kandi erimu
amagoba nka ekituga kya haihi, ekiconco, ekihembo. Kwonka, hariho ekihama
ekirikukirira kimwe omuhendo gw'ekiconco.

Enguzi neeteganisa ebyentaasya by'aihanga hamwe n'ebikozeso
(infrastructure) by'eihanga omu miringo mingi. Gavumenti neebaasa
kushashura sente nyingi omu zaapurogyekiti ezitaine mugasho ahabwokugira
ngu harimu ahu abantu baratungire enguzi/ebituga. Eki nikimanyisa ngu
omuhendo gwa purogyekiti gwonka nigwija kuba nigukirira kimwe oku
gwakushemereirekuba guri. Eki nikimanyisa ngu esente nkye niziija kuba
nizikozesebwa aha bintu ebyomugasho nk'okuboneza hamwe n'okwerinda.
Ebikwato by'ahaiguru munonga nibibaasa kugurwa ahabwokugira ngu tihanriho
okucondooza okwakozirwe kureeba yaaba abakozi batendekirwe.
Okukora gye kw'ebyentaasya eby'entaasya y'eihanga nibishenyuka. Omubwire
bizinesi enungi kuba nizo zaasinga, ezo ezisingire nainga ezirikuza aha
mutwe tiziriyo ahabwokuba ziine amaani, kwonka ahabwokugira ngu zihaire
abakuru sente.

Enguzi neereka abantu baiha obwesigwa omu gavumenti hamwe n'okubaasa
kubaramurira omu buringaaniza. Okusharaho kw'ebikuru ebirikuwata aha
eihanga tibirikukorerwa aha buringaaniza nainga aha mazima, kwihaho
okurugiirira ahari ni zingahi eziraatungwe aha muheru gw'okusharaho.
Okusharaho okurimu enguzi tikurikukorwa ngu abatuuragye boona baganyurwemu;
kwihaho n'okwerondera ebyabo nk'abantu nainga nk'ebibiina, batataire mutima
aha by'etaago by'ebyanga.

 1. Okushiisha ebintu

 CAPTION

Esente z'omuhi w'omushoro ziine kukozesebwa omuri zaapurogyekiti
ezirikwetaagwa. Enguzi neegarura ahansi eby'entaasya y'eihanga ahabwokuba
obwire obwingi nibukozesebwa kukora emirimo kandi nyingi nizishashurwa
ebitongore kwenda ngu omurimo gukorwe, kandi zoona nizishashurwa
purogyekiti za gavumenti ez'omutindo gw'ahansi.

 2. Kushiisha ebigabirwe kukora emirimo ya gavumenti

Enguzi neereetera okusharaho kwayegamira ni sente zingahi eziraatungwe
omukuru, kutari kugira ngu n'okwegamira aha byetaago by'ekyanga.
Zaapurogyekiti ezirikuha/ezirikuganyira omukozi omuri w'enguzi niziheebwa
sente, ekirikumanyisa ngu obworo aha rurengo rw'ekyanga nibweyongyera.

 3. Okwihwamu obwesigye

Enguzi neereetera abantu baiha obwesigye omu gavumenti, kandi etaho embeera
y'abantu obuteehwera hamwe n'okwehwa amasiko. Enguzi etarikutangwa nainga
etarikubingwa neereetera enguzi yaayeyongyera. Neekyendeeza aha ntaasya
y'esente omu mirimo kandi eteganisa obwebembezi bw'oburainganiza.

Abari b'enguzi biine kuba nibashereka ebikorwa byabo ngu batabakwata,
kwonka okushereka tikurikukorengana Obutegyeki bw'abantu. Obutegyeki
bw'oburingaaniza n'obutegyeki bw'abantu. Eki nikimanyisa ngu abatuuragye
boona b'eihanga baine obugabe bw'okumanya eki gavumenti erikukora obwire
bwona. Gavumenti neetegyekwa abantu. Abari b'enguzi ku barikushereka
ebikorwa byabo by'oburi bw'enguzi, aho, nibaba bateganisa demokorase.

4.0 Omurimo gwawe ni guuha omu kurwanisa enguzi?

4.1 Ni murimo ki ogu ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti biine omu kurwanisa
enguzi?
Ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti biine omurimo muhango, ahabw'akakwate ku
biine omu kurwanisa enguzi. Nigwo muringo mukuru ogurikuhika aha batuuragye
ba buriijo. Omurimo ogu ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti birikukora,
namunonga omu kumanyisa abantu aha bikwatiraine n'enguzi t'okaagurabyamu
maisho. Ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti biine kukora ebintu ebirikwegyesa
kurwanisa oburi bw'enguzi, nka kimwe aha puroguraamu z'okumanyisa abantu
boona. Biine kwegyesa abantu kushaba ebintu by'omutindo, kuheebwa
obuhereza, obwerangaro hamwe n'okubariirira enkozesa y'esente nainga
ebintu. Ebibiina ebitari bya gavumenti byayejumbira omu kureebuuza
zaapuroguraamu, nibwe obwerangaro hamwe n'embariirira y'ebikozesiibwe
eraahikweho.

4.2 Omurimo gw'amahurire ni guuha?

Omu eihanga ryaitu eri eririmu obutegyeki bw'oburainganiza, ahu obusingye
bw'okugamba ekiri aha mutima buri omu Ngyenderwaho y'eihanga, amahurire
nigakora kihango munonga okwanika enguzi, kumanyisa abantu boona, kukora
kandi kworeka omutindo gw'omwoga. Amahurire gaine obujunaanizibwa
bw'okureeba ngu ebicweka bishatu by'eihanga byarondoorwa aha nguzi. Nitwija
kusiima omurimo gw'abanyamahurire baaba nibatunguura emicwe kandi
bakajumirira enguzi.

4.3 Abatuuragye baine murimo ki?

Okutangira n'okurwanisa enguzi n'obujunaanizibwa bwa buri mutuuragye na
buri ntuura ya Uganda. Eiteeka ry'okurwanisa enguzi erya 2009 nirita
obujunaanizibwa ahari buri mukozi wa gavumenti, orikuba araganisibwe kandi
akaheebwa akasiimo, kuhayo amukuru aha poriisi. Buri muntu weena orikuhayo
akasiimo nawe aine obujunaanizibwa obwo. Nahabwekyo, kishemereire kumanywa
ngu obutahababa omushango gwona gw'enguzi nagwo n'omushango gurikuheebwa
ekifubiro.

 CAPTION

5.0 Noobaasa kukora ki kurwanisa enguzi?
5.1 Noobaasa kweshomesa ota hamwe n'okushomesa bagyenzi baawe aha nguzi?

Nkaidaara ry'okubanza, oine kubanza waamanya eki enguzi eri nainga shi eki
erikumanyisa n'eki orikubaasa kugikorera. Abatuuragye abarikugimanya baine
kwegyesa abandi omu kyanga aha nshonga egi. Omu muringo ogu, buri omwe
arikuha obuheereza omu bantu boona - kahabe omu minisiture, omu kampuni ya
gavvumenti, omu kampuni y'abantu buntu, nainga omu kitongore ekindi kyona
nibabaasa kumureebuuza obumanyiso bwona bw'enguzi. Ekikuru munonga eki oine
kukora kumaraho enguzi, n'okumanya enguzi n'enki, okashomesa abandi aha
nguzi kandi okareeba ngu waakora ekirikubaasika kutangira enguzi.

Abatuuragye bagyenzi baawe oine kubatamu omuhimbo kurugayo baaba nibamanya
ngu beereebaireho omuri w'enguzi.

Ogundi omuringo gw'okureeta eiraka ryawe kuhurirwa n'okutunga abantu baingi
b'ekyanga abarikubaasika kuta omukono aha kihandiiko ky'okweteerera enduuru
omu kwanga enguzzi, ekirikubaasa kuheebwayo aha b'obushoborozi.

Enkiiko z'abantu boona z'obutoosha ez'abatuuragye zishemereire kuteebwaho
kureeba ngu amakuru garikukwata aha nguzi gaamanywa buriijo, nk'oku
kirikubaasika. Enkiiko ezi nazo nizibaasa kukora nk'oruteerane oru abantu
boona babaasa kuhurirwa aha kwetomboita kwabo aha micwe y'abakozi ba
gavumenti ei barikureeba nk'enguzi. Omu nkiiko nk'ezi, abatuuragye
nibabaasa kwejumbira omu kwombeka enkora etari y'oburyarya erikuha
obuhereza aha bantu batari bamwe na bamwe. Mwine kuba nimuteisa aha
mishango y'enguzi hamwe n'ebituga ebirikuba biriirwe abandi ahabwokuba
enguzi neehenda amateeka kandi yaaba etatangirwe neerugamu enguzi empango

5.2 Omurimo gwa ofiisi ya Kariiso-riiso wa gavumenti ni guuha?

Gumwe aha mirimo emikuru eya Kariiso-riiso wa gavumenti n'okucondooza
emishango y'oburi bw'enguzi kandi hamwe n'okutwaza kubi abakozi ba
gavumenti. Noobaasa kuhayo ekwetomboita omu ofiisi ya Kariiso-riiso wa
gavumenti waaba nooyenda ngu bateho okucondooza aha mushango
ogurikuteekateekwaho kuba enguzi. Yaamara kucondooza okwetomboita, kandi
yaashangamu enshonga y'okugumizamu y'okucondooza, naija kumanyisa
owaayetomboita. Haaba hariho enshonga z'okuza omu mbuga z'amateeka, Kariiso-
riiso wa Gavumenti naija kuzitwarayo. Kariiso-riiso aine okureeba ngu
tiyaayatura ebirikukwata ahari ogwo owaahayo okwetomboita.

Ofiisi ya Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti niyo etairweho Engyenderwaho
y'Eihanga. Obushoboorozi bwa Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti niburuga omu mutwe
gwa 13 akacweka ka 225 ak'Engyenderwaho ya Uganda eya 1995 ni "kutunguura
entegyeka enungi omu ihanga rya Uganda, obujunaanizibwa hamwe n'obutegyeki
burikugyendera aha biragiro", omu kukora emirimo egi ahaifo:

 • Omurimo gw'obucondoozi ogw'okutunguura oburingaaniza, kukora gye
 emirimo hamwe n'entegyeka enungi aha bantu boona. akacweka 225(1) (a),
 (c) na (e)eby'Engyenderwaho y'Eihanga.
 • Omurimo ogw'okurwanisa enguzi akacweka 225(1) b ak'Engyenderwaho
 y'Eihanga
Kutaisa omu nkora Engyenderwaho y'Entwaza y'ab'Ebembezi akacweka 225(1) (d)
n'akacweka 234 ak'Engyenderwaho y'Eihanga.
 • Kwongyera amaani omu kumanyisa abantu aha micwe n'omugasho
 gw'okugyendera aha Ngyenderwaho hamwe n'emirimo ya Kariiso-riiso wa
 Gavumenti akacweka 225(1) (f) ak'Engyenderwaho y'Eihanga.

Kariiso-riiso wa gavumenti aine obushoborozi bw'okukyondooza, kureetera
okucondooza, kukoma, kureetera kukoma hamwe n'okuhozesa emishango
erikukwata ahaburi bw'enguzi, kukozesa kubi ofiisi za gavumenti, akacweka
225 ak'Engyenderwaho y'Eihanga.
Ahabw'enshonga z'okuta ebigyendererwa byayo omu nkora, ofiisi ya Kariiso-
riiso wa gavumenti n'ekitongore kimwe kwonka amataagi (directorates)
mukaaga hamwe n'ebicweka (divisions)bishatu. Kwenda ngu ehisye obuhereza
haihi n'abantu, Kariiso-riiso wa gavumenti ataire ofiisi ikumi na mukaaga
(16) omu bicweka byona by'eihanga.

Endagiiriro y'okuhikiirira ofiisi ya Kariiso-riiso wa Gavumenti n'egi
ahaifo:
The Inspectorate of Government
Jubilee Insurance Centre
Plot 14, Parliament Avenue
P.O. Box 1682, Kampala
+256 414 344219 / 414 259733 / 414 255892 / 414 251462 (General Lines esimu
za boona)
+256 414 347387 (Hotline eriho ebwire bwona)
Fax: +256 414 344810
pr@igg.go.ug

5.3 Omurimo gw'ekitongore ky'Emicwe n'Obuntu-buzima ekirikumanywa nka
Directorate of Ethics and Integrity (DEI)

Ekitongore ky'Emicwe n'Obuntu-buzima nikiiha obushoboorozi bwakyo omu
Kacweka ka 99(4) ak'Engyenderwaho y'Eihanga erikuha Puresidenti
orusa/obushoboorozi bwokuha buri kitongore kyona emirimo kumuhweraho omu
kukora emirimo ye erikushoboororwaho omu Kacweka 94(1). Ahabw'ekyetaago
kyokukwatira hamwe kurwanisa enguzi, Ekitongore ky'Ebyemicwe n'Obuntu-
buzima kikataibwaho n'ekigyendererwa ky'okurundaanira hamwe amaani
g'okurwanisa enguzi kandi n'okuha amaani Uganda kureeba ngu yaaguma aha
musingye gw'emicwe n'okugyendera aha mateeka.

Noobaasa kuha okwetomboita kwawe, oteeyatwire, omu kitongore ky'Emicwe
n'Obuntu-buzima aha ndagiriro egi ahaifo:

5.4 Omurimo gwa poriisi ya Uganda ni guuha?
Omu kitongore kya Poriisi ya Uganda, harimu ofiisi z'omutaano eziine
abukugu omu kucondooza enguzi n'obu haraabe hatariho ofiisi etairweho
kucondooza enguzi. Ofiisi ezi ni: Ofiisi ya Mbega nainga CID, ofiisi
erikurwanisa enguzi erikumanywa nka Anti Corruption Unit hamwe n'egyo
erikujunaanwa aha mutindo erikwetwa Professional Standards Unit. Ofiisi ezi
boona ziri aha ntebe nkuru ya Poriisi omuri Kampala.

Obushoboorozi bwa Mbega mukuru wa gavumenti niburuga omu Ngyenderwaho
y'Eihanga hamwe n'omu iteeka erya Poriisi ya Uganda. Mbega mukuru wa
gavumenti aine orusha/obushoborozi bw'okumanya n'okuzibira, okucondooza
emishango omu myanya y'abantu boona hamwe n'omu bicweka. Omugwa 1998,
eitaagi eririkumanywa nka National Fraud Squad rikateebwaho, kucondooza
emishango eine akakwate n'obushomankuzi omu ihanga ryona. Ahabw'obuzibu
oburi omu mishango y'obushuma n'enguzi, ekitongore ekya Anti Corruption
and Economic Crimes kikatandikaho omu Kitongore ky'Obwa mbega ekirikwetwa
Directorate of Criminal Investigations kukora aha nshonga z'enguzi omu
bitongore bya gavumenti n'ebyabantu buntu.

Noobaasa kuhayo okwetomboita kwawe aha kitebe kikuru kya poriisi omuri
Kampala nainga omu poriisi ekuri haihi. Nabwo, noobaasa kuteera esimu ya
poriisi etarugaho eri 0414 233814 nainga 0414 250613, kuruga omu kicweka
kyona omu Uganda.

Endagiiriro ya mukuru wa Poriisi ya Uganda n'egi ahaifo:
P.O. Box 2973
Kampala – Uganda
Phone: +256 – 41 – 234823
Fax: +256 – 41 – 347429

5.5 Omurimo gw'Omuhababi wa Gavumenti orikumanywa nka DPP ni guuha?

Ofiisi y'Omuhababi wa Gavumenti neiha obushoborozi bwayo omu kacweka ka 120
ak'Engyenderwaho y'Eihanga. Emirimo mikuru ya DPP omu kurwanisa enguzi ni:
kuha Mbega mukuru wa gavumenti obuhabuzi bw'ebiragiro omu kucondooza
kw'emishango yoona y'obukozi bwa bibi kandi n'okutaho hamwe n'okuhurira
emishango y'enkozi za bibi eza buri omwe nainga buri kitongore omu kooti ya
buri muringo kwihaho kooti y'amahe erikwetwa Kooti Maasho. Ekindi, ofiisi
y'omuhababi wa gavumenti neekora aha kushaba kwa buri muringo, kushwijuma,
hamwe n'okujuriza kw'emishango ezirikuruga omu bukozi bwa bibi otairemu
ez'enguzi.

Ofiisi y'Omuhababi wa gavumenti ecwiremu ebicweka bibiri: ekirikurwanisa
oburyarya/oburyangatanisa ekiri aha ntebe nkuru, hamwe n'ekirikurwanisa
enguzi ekirikushangwa omu Anti Corruption Court. Ebicweka bibiri ebi,
bikateebwaho abw'obuzibu oburi omu mishango y'oburyarya hamwe n'enguzi,
obwire hamwe n'ebintu ebirikwetaagwa kukora aha mishango egi hamwe
n'obutazaanazaana/ obukuru bw'emishango egi eine aha bwa boona n'akakwate
ku eine aha by'entaasya y'eihanga n'entunguuka. Noobaasa kuhayo
okwetomboita kwawe, oteeyatwire, aha ntebe nkuru ya DPP omuri Kampala
nainga omu disiturikiti yaabwe. Endagiiriro eri:

Directorate of Public Prosecutions
Workers House 12th and 11th Floor Southern Wing, Plot 1
Pilkington Road
P.O. Box 1550
Kampala – Uganda
Esimu: 0414 332504

5.7 Omurimo gw'ekitongore kya Public Procurement and Disposal of Public
Assets Authority (PPDA)

Ekitongore ekya PPDA kitairweho iteeka erya Public Procurement and Disposal
of Public Assets erya 2003. Omurimo mukuru gwa PPDA n'okuta omu nkora
ebiragiro byona ebirikukwata aha kugura n'okuguza ebintu bya gavumenti omu
Uganda, nainga shi, aha rurengo rwa MDA na LG, PPDA neeyetengwa munonga
kureeba ngu okushaba kwaba okwamazima, boona baakwejumbiramu, kwaba
okw'oburingaaniza, tikwasherekwa, kandi kwakuratira amateeka n'omutindo.
Kwongyereraho, PPDA neetaho amateeka g'omutindo ogu ebintu bya gavumenti
biraagurirweho nainga biraagurizibweho abo abashemereire kubiguza
n'okubigura.

Public Procurement and Disposal of Public Asserts Authority (PPDA)
P. O Box 3925
Kampala – Uganda
Tel (+256) 414 311 100
Fax (+256) 414 344 858

5.8 Omurimo gw'Omushwijumi wa Gavumenti
Ofiisi y'Omushwijumi wa Gavumenti etairweho akacweka ka 163
ak'Engyenderwaho ya Uganda kandi orusa, emirimo hamwe n'obushoborozi bwayo
niburuga omu Iteeka ry'Obushwijumi eririkwetwa National Audit Act, erya,
2003. Omurimo omukuru ogw'Omushwijumi n'okushwijuma ebitabo by'ababazi ba
gavumenti hamwe n'ebitongore byona ebitairweho Eiteeka rya pariamenti,
reero akaha ripoota pariamenti buri mwaka. Omurimo ogwo nigukorwa omu
kubara n'okushwijuma ebitabo by'embariirira ebya ebitongore bya gavumenti,
obwo arikwetegyereza yaaba sente zaakozire omurimo gwazo kandi zikozire kyo
kyenyini. Reero yaaheza, akore ripoota za Pariamenti buri mwaka kandi
areeberere enshohoza y'esente ezirikubiika haamwe, enshohoza ya gavumenti,
ebi gavumenti eraatemu sente, ashwijume ebiguzirwe n'ebiguziibwe omu
bitongore bya gavumenti kandi aheyo ripoota ahari ebyo ebitahikire hamwe
n'enguzi ei araashangye omu kushwijuma kwe.

Office of the Auditor General (OAG)
P.O. Box 7083
Kampala – Uganda
Phone 0414-344340

kubariirira sente zoona ezishoroziibwe omu mishoro. Emishango y'okunyaga
emishoro hamwe n'enguzi omu mushoro neeyaturwa omu kitongore ky'emishoro
ekya URA aha ndagiiriro:

OKUSIIMA
Obuyambi bw’esente omu kuhandiika akatabo aka bukaruga omu
kitongore kya Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA),
n’ekya Swiss Agency for Development and Corporation (SDC), n’ekya
United States Agency for International Development (USAID).
Omurimo gwa Beth Oliver omu kuhandiika akatabo aka gukayambwa
obuhagizi bwa ACDI/VOCA-Uganda.
Akatabo aka kakagyeresibwa omu Uganda. Omurimo gw’okukagyeza
ogwakozirwe abantu batari bamwe nitugusiima munonga. Abantu abo
barimu ba memba ba Uganda National seed Potato Producers’
Association (UNSPA), Bugwanyi Farmers Enterprise, Kolonyi Home
and Family child Care Group, Harriet Nafuna owa Mission: Moving
Mountains hamwe na John Kyooma kuruga omu Africare-Kabale.
Rupert Best na Colletah Chitsike bakaheereza obuhabuzi bw’amaani
omu kushwijuma orukanga rw’akatabo aka orwabandize kushohora.

89

ENTURUKIRIRO Y’OBUTABO BW’ABAHINGI B’EMBIBO
AB’ORURENGO RW’AHANSI.
Akatabo aka kagyendereirwe kukoresibwa abahingi b’embibo
ab’orurengo rw’ahansi, abashuubuzi n’ebitongore by’abantu b’omu
byaro nk’amashomero, amakanisa/ amakereziya abaine ekyetengo
ky’okuhinga embibo z’ebihingwa bitari bimwe z’okuguza. Akatabo
kagyendereirwe kuyamba abantu abataine bwegyese omu kuhinga
embibo. Noobaasa kushaba obuyambi kwenda kwetegyereza bimwe
aha bihandiikirwe omu katabo aka kuruga omu bitongore nainga omu
bahingisa abakuru.
Akatabo akandi: “Okuhinga embibo z’ebihimba” (omu Rujungu
nibakeeta “producing bean seed”) omu butabo bw’abahingi b’embibo
kakahandiikwa kuyamba abahingi b’embibo z’ebihimba. Ebihandiiko
ebindi ebirikwegyesa aha kuhinga embibo noobaasa kubitunga kuruga
omu bitongore ebindi.
Akatabo aka akakwasire aha bwengye bw’okuhinga embibo z’okuguza
tikagyendereire kihingwa kimwe. Nitukozesa ekigambo “embibo” obwe
tubariiremu ebihingwa eby’emboga, emiti n’ebindi.
Okushoboorora aha rurimi rwa bizinesi:
Ahabw’okugira ngu ebigambo ebimwe ebirikukoresibwa omu rurimi
rwa bizinesi tibirikushangwa omu ndimi zaitu za Afirika, orikukoresa
akatabo aka nari orikukavunuura naabaasa kutamu ebigambo bisya
nainga akorese eby’endimi ezindi nk’Orungyereza nari Orufaransa.

89

ESHUURA 1:

AHABW’ENKI OSHEMEREIRE
KUTANDIKAHO BIZINESI Y’EMBIBO?
Omu kuhinga ebihingwa ebimwe nk’ebihimba, ebinyobwa, emondi
n’ebitakuri, abahingi abingi nibakoresa embibo nari ebirikubyarwa
kuruga omu byabaire bihingirwe omu sizoni ey’enyima. Hoona obundi
abahingi nibagura embibo kuruga aha bahingi abandi, omu katare, nari
omu maduuka nainga obumwe zibagabirwa. Abahingi nibaronda embibo
kuruga ahandi ahabwokuba:
✓ Nibaba bafeereirwe embibo ahabw’omushana mwingi, enjura
erengyesereize, endwara z’ebihingwa amari nainga
ahabw’okuzibiika kubi
✓ Bakarya nainga bakaguza byona ebi baashaarwire
✓ Nibenda kuhinga emisiri mihango kwonka embibo ezi biine
zitarikumara
✓ Nibenda kuhinga aha mbibo ensya.
Ekigyendererwa ky’okutandika bizinesi y’okuhinga embibo n’okwenda
kushohoza embibo z’okuguza ez’omutindo gw’ahaiguru, kandi
okatunga esente kuruga omu buheereza obwo.

Embibo nizibaasa kukuheereza esente.
89

Bizinesi y’omuringo ogu neekora gye aha bihingwa bimwe bitari
byona.Ekihingwa nikibaasa kurugwamu bizinesi y’embibo haaba hariho
ebi:
✓ Abahingi baaba batamazirwe n’embibo eziriho nainga batakunzire
mutindo gw’embibo zaabo nari ezirikuguzibwa omu butare
n’amaduuka
✓ Abahingi baaba bataine mbibo zirikumara omu bwire bw’okubyara
✓ Ekihingwa kyaba nikikwatwa endwara ezirikushangwa omu mbibo
nari omu itaka (ekyokureeberaho endwara y’emondi)
✓ Abantu ba buriijo baaba nibabaasa kukora embibo z’omutindo
murungi.
Akatabo aka tikarikugamba aha kihingwa kimwe nari bimwe. Kwenda
ngu oyetegyereze gye, nitukuheereza ebyokureeberaho by’emondi
n’ebihimba. Abahingi b’embibo z’ebihimba bashemereire kushoma
akatabo aka hamwe n’akandi aka: “Okuhinga embibo z’ebihimba”
(“Producing bean seed”)
Bizinesi y’embibo neeha abantu obuheereza bw’emiringo eshatu:
1
Embibo z’omutindo murungi: N’obu abahingi barikuba
nibakunda omutindo gw’embibo ezaabo, obumwe nibashanga
omutindo gw’embibo ezibarikugura omu butare, omu maduuka
n’ahandi gutaboneire. Embibo ezi, nk’ez’ebihimba nari ebindi
bihingwa eby’enjuma obumwe niziba zihombataine, zihumbire,
zihindukire nainga zimungirwe nari obundi ziri orujwangye.
Embibo z’emondi obumwe niziba ziine endwara erikuzoomya.
2
Okutunga embibo: Abahingi nibakira kuburwa embibo obwire
bw’okubyara bwaheza kuhika.Embibo zaaba nizikorerwa omu
kicweka ekyo kukira kukorerwa hare munonga nikimaraho
oburemeezi bw’okuburwa embibo omu bwire bw’okubyara.
3
Okuhinga embibo ensya: Abacondoozi nari obumwe abahingi
nibareetaho embibo nungi z’ebihingwa bitari bimwe kwonka
bashanga oburemeezi omu kuzihisya abahingi ahabw’obwingi
bwabo. Abaine bizinesi y’embibo nibabaasa kukoragana
n’abacondoozi nari abahingi abu bari kugyerezaho kwenda
kumanya n’okuguza embibo ezongiirweho omutindo.
89

Okutandika bizinesi y’embibo nikikuyamba kigaruka kiyamba
n’abahingi omu kicweka ekyo ahabwokuba embibo nungi nizireetaho
okweza, abantu batunga ebyokurya bingi n’eby’okuguza. Nikyetaaga
okwegyendesereza munonga waaza kushohoza embibo z’omutindo
murungi. Nahabwekyo nikyetaagisa okutunga obuhabuzi kuruga aha
bacondoozi n’abahingisa abakuru. Noobaasa kutunga ebihandiiko
birikutendeka aha bihingwa ebimwe.

ESHUURA YA 2:

OKUSHARAMU
KUTANDIKA BIZINESI Y’EMBIBO.
Otakatandikire bizinesi, oshemerereire kubanza waayetegyereza waaba
noogibaasa, waaba noobaasa kushohoza embibo omu bwingi,
z’omutindo murungi, kandi aha mihendo eringaniire. Nooyetenga
okumanya kwingi kandi okeebuuza ebibuuzo bingi otakashaziremu
kutandika bizinesi y’embibo.

Teekateeka n’obwegyendesereza otakashaziremu kutandika
bizinesi y’embibo.
Oshemereire kuraba omu matembezo mushanju omu kusharamu
kutandika bizinesi y’embibo.
89

Amatembezo g’okutandikaho bizinesi y’embibo.
Manya yaaba bizinesi y’embibo
neyetaagwa omu kicweka eki orimu.

Hindura
ekihingwa

Manya yaaba noobaasa kushohoza
embibo z’omutindo murungi.
Manya yaaba noobaasa kukora gye
bizinesi y’embibo
Manya eki oshemereire kukora

yaayo.

Sharamu aha kukora bizinesi y’embibo
89

Hindura
omuringo
gw’embibo

Bizinesi y’embibo neeyetaagwa omu kicweka eki?
Manya yaaba embibo nizeetaagwa
Manya ebihingwa n’embibo ebirikwendwa munonga
Teebereza obuhango bw’akatare k’embibo
Manya yaaba hariho abandi abarikuhinga embibo

Okucondooza aha katare n’omuringo gw’obuteeka ogu abashuubuzi
barikutungiramu okumanyisibwa kuhikire okurikubabaasisa
kutebeekanisa n’okubaririra bizinesi zaabo. Ahabw’abakozi b’embibo,
okucondooza aha katare nikubayamba kugarukamu ebibuuzo ebi:
✓ Nibihingwa ki ebi abahingi barikwenda embibo zaabyo?
✓ Ni mihendo ki ei abahingi barikubaasa?
✓ Oshemereire kushohoza embibo zirikwingana ki buri sizoni
y’okugyara?
✓ Buri muhingi naabaasa embibo ziririkwingana ki?
✓ Abahingi nibakunda kugura nkahi embibo?
✓ Ni baguzi ki abandi abaakubaasa kuba nibenda kugura embibo?
✓ Ni biragiro ki ebirikugyenderwaho omu kuhinga embibo za buri
kihingwa?
Okucondooza aha katare kushemereire kukorwa otakatandikire bizinesi
y’embiboo kandi kugume kukorwe aha nyima y’emyaka 3-4 kwenda
ngu omanye empinduka ezirikubaho omu katare k’embibo.
Emiringo ebiri y’okukoramu okucondooza niyo erikushoboororwa omu
kihandiiko eki:okucondooza okw’okubuuza n’okwetegyereza.
Okucondooza okw’okubuuza nikukworwa aha bantu bakye omu
kicweka bwanyima otwara ebigarukwamu kuba ebyo ebi abantu boona
barikwenda.
Okucondooza okw’okwetegyereza, omuntu naayetegyereza embeera
eziriho aha kintu ekyo bwanyima ahendera n’okusharamu kurugiirira
aha bi yaareeba.
89

Okucondooza okw’okubuuza
Waaba noocondooza aha katare k’embibo oshemereire kutunga amakuru
kuruga aha bantu b’emiringo mingi nari ebitongore: abahingi, ebibiina
by’abahingi, n’ebitongore, ab’amaduuka, n’abaine amaduuka
g’eby’obuhingi, amashomero againe emisiri n’ebibiina by’entunguuka
nk’ebigombe bitari bya gavumenti ebirikukorera omu byaro na za
purogyekiti.

Kora okucondooza aha baguzi b’emiringo mingi
Rundaana amakuru g’emiringo mingi kuruga ahari buri bantu
orikukoresa emiringo mingi y’okubuuza nk’oku erikworekwa omu
kipande eki ahaifo:

89
