89

Okubuuza
n’okwetegyereza embeera.

Okubuuza

Sharamu aha bwingi bw’abantu n’ab’ebitongore abu oraagambe nabo.
Ku oraabe ogyendereire kugira akatare kahango, noija kucondooza omu
byaro bingi. Reeba ngu waabuuza abantu abu otarikumanya kwenda
ngu otungye amakuru garukumara. Emibaro egi ahaifo neebaasa
kukuyamba.
Abahingi: 20 buri kyaro. Toorana amaka againe entaasya
entarikushushana (noobaasa kuronda abagaiga 5 abaarwagati 8,
n’abooro 7)
Abashuubuzi: 5-8
Abahingi b’embibo: Nikirugiirira aha mubaro gw’abariho.
Amashomero: 3-5
Ab’ebitongore by’entunguuka: Nikirugiirira aha mubaro gw’ebiriho.
Banza okore orukarara rw’ebibuuzo ebi oraabuuze. Hikiirira abantu
nainga ebitongore ebi otooraine kubuuza. N’eky’omugasho waaba
noobuuza abahingi, kubuuza omuntu oine obujunaanizibwa
bw’okureeberera embibo. Kaingi omuntu nk’ogu naakira kuba ari
omukazi. Handiika ebi abantu barikugarikamu kwenda ngu oije
oyetegyereze ebigarukwamu reero osharemu.
Okucondooza okw’okw’ekwetegyereza embeera
Noobaasa kuntunga amakuru agandi agarikukwata aha katare kurabira
omu kwetegyereza ebirikubaho omu kicweka ekyo. Za omu butare
n’amaduuka omu bwire butari bumwe omu mwaka kureeba abarikuguza
embibo, emiringo y’embibo erikuguzibwa, omutindo gwazo, ni ryari
obu abantu barikuzigura kandi n’ebi barikubuuza abashuubuzi.
Oshemereire kutereeza gye amakuru agu waarundaana. Kworesa
ebipande ebiri aha mpapura 46-47 zikuyambe okutereeza amakuru
g’okwendwa kw’embibo, emihendo y’embibo, ebiine omugasho aha
muhingi, n’emiringo y’embibo ezirikuguzibwa munonga.
Okutoorana ebihingwa n’embibo za bizinesi yaawe.
Nooza kusharamu aha bihingwa n’embibo zaabyo ezi oine kukorera
embibo kandi n’okusharamu obwingi bw’ebihingwa ebi oine kukoraho.
Sharamu eky’okukora waaheza kucondooza aha katare.
89

Bizinesi y’embibo ni nungi aha bihingwa bimwe kwonka bitari
byona.

Okuhinga embibo z’ebihingwa birengire ahari kimwe ziine
emigasho mingi:
✓ Akatare k’ekihingwa kimwe kaaheza kukyendeera,
noogumizamu n’ekihingwa ekindi.
✓ Noobaasa kukora esente kuruga omu mbibo waaba noohinga
orikuhindura ebihingwa.
✓ Nooba oine eby’okuguza bingi ebirikubaasa kukwongyerera
amagoba kandi kikakyendeeza aha kufeerwa munonga omu
mpinduka z’embeera z’obwire.
Oburemeezi buhango oburiho buri omu kuhinga ebihingwa birengire
ahari kimwe n’okugira ngu nooba oine kukora munonga kandi
orikwetaaga ebikoreso bingi n’obukugu bw’amaani. Kwenda ngu
bizinesi yaawe etunguuke, oshemereire kukora aha bihingwa bikye nka
1 nari 2 buri murundi. Waasharamu kuhinga embibo z’ebihingwa 2,
reeba ngu waatoorana ebihingwa ebirikuhingwa hamwe kwenda ngu
okorese eitaka rikye. Ekyokureeberaho ebihimba n’emondi nibigyenda
gye hamwe. Noobaasa kusharamu kubihinga hamwe buri sizoni nainga
sizoni emwe.
89

Okutunguuka kwa bizinesi yaawe nikwija kurugiirira aha mbibo ezi
oraatoorane kukanyisa.

Toorana kurungi embibo zaawe aha bw’okwenda kutunguura
bizinesi yaawe.
Kanyisa embibo eziraagire akatare zonka. Embibo za buri kihingwa
ziri omu miringo eshatu.
1:
Embibo eza buriijo: ezi barikukira kuhinga: Ezi n’embibo ezi
bahingire kumara emyaka mingi.
2
Embibo eza buriijo ezitarikukira kuhingwa: Ezi n’embibo ezi
abantu barikukira kukundaho ebintu bimwe kandi zirikuhingwa
abantu bakye obwire obu. Embibo nizikira kutakanya ahabwa
ibura ry’embibo.
3
Embibo ezongiirwe omutindo: Ezi n’embibo ezikwozirwe
abacondoozi nainga abahingi ezirikwera munonga kandi nizikira
kuba zitarikurahuka kukwatwa burwaire n’obukooko. Embibo
enyingi omuri ezi niziba nizishushanira kimwe n’embibo eza
buriijo.
Waaba nootoorana embibo ezi oraakanyise, omuri ezi ishatu, gyenderera
oburungi n’obubi bwa buri muringo nk’oku biri kworekwa ahaifo.
89

Emiringo y’embibo ezirikubaasa kuhingwa.

ezirikukira kuhingwa

n’omu bandi bahingi.

n’obukooko.

kuzigura aha

ahabwokuba
tizirikukira kukanya

endwara n’obukooko

karungi.

obu abahingi batarikukunda.

Ekirikukurataho n’okuronda embibo ezi oraashohoze. Noobaasa
obutaheza ekicweka eki waaba nooyenda kushohoza embibo ensya ezi
otakatungire ahu oraaziihe. Otakashaziremu eky’okukora,
n’eky’omugasho kubanza waahandiika emihendo y’embibo
zitarikushushana. Ekipande kirikworeka okutereeza amakuru
agarikukwata aha mhendo nikyorekwa aha rupapura rwa 52.
Okusharamu aha buhango bwa bizinesi yaawe.
Waaba noocodooza aha katare, ni kirungi kumamya ni bantu ki ebi
oriije kuguza. Noija kuguza abahingi b’omu kyaro kyawe n’ebyaro
ebikihereire, noija kuguza omu byaro bingi omu disiturikiti yoona nainga
ekicweka kihango kya ihanga?
89

Bizinesi y’embibo neebaasa kugira obutare bw’emiringo mingi.
Akatare aku orikuranzya nikarugiirira aha buhango bwa bizinesi ei
orikwenda n’ebikoreso (eitaka, abakozi, esente, obwire) ebi oine.

Nkaabaasa kushoza embibo z’omutindo murungi?
Sharamu ekika ky’embibo ezi orikwenda kushohozsa
Teekateeka aha bikoreso n’ebintu ebi orikwetaaga
ahabwa bizinesi y’embibo.

89

Okusharamu aha kika ky’embibo ezi orikwenda kushohoza
Embibo niziteebwa omu bika kwenda kworeka entaaniso eri aha
mutindo gwazo. Ahabw’ebihingwa ebimwe nk’ebihimba, omutindo
nigubarirwa aha kumera kwabyo, oburungi nari yaaba embibo zitaine
burwaire n’akakye. Omutindo gw’embibo z’emondi nigureeberwa aha
buhango (eshemereire kurenzya mirimita 35) n’omubaro gw’emitooka
(oguriho ena n’okukiraho). Kaingi gavumenti neehamya ebika bishatu
by’embibo z’okuguza abahingi.
1. Embibo ezihamiibwe: Embibo ezishohoziibwe abakugu
nk’abacondoozi, abaine embibo z’okuguza. Emisiri y’embibo
ezihamiibwe eshemereire kukyeberwa abakugu omu by’embibo
kwenda kuhamya zaaba nizihikiiriza ebyetaago ebitairweho
gavumenti.
2. Embibo ezongiirwe omutindo:(ezirikwetwa ez’omutindo nainga
ez’okushuubura). Embibo z’omutindo gw’ahansi kukira
ez’orurengo rw’ekika ky’embibo ezihamiibwe nizibaasa kukorerwa
omu bahingi baakuratira enkora nungi n’obwegyendesereza.
3. Embibo ez’abahingi: Embibo ezirikushohozibwa abahingi omu
miringo yaabo y’obuhingi bw’obuhangwa batakuratiire muringo
gwona ogundi gw’okuhinga.
Omuringo gwa bizinesi y’embibo ogurikugambwaho omu katabo aka,
ekikuru nigugyenderera kushohoza embibo ezongiirwe omutindo. Noija
kwetaaga kuronda okumanyisibwa okundi kuruga omu bahingisa
ab’ahaiguru waaba nooyenda kushohoza embibo ezihamiibwe.

Ebikoreso n’ebindi bintu ebi orikwetaaga omu bizinesi y’embibo.
Okushohoza embibo nungi nikyetaagisa ebikoreso n’eby’okuhingisa
ebi abahingi batarikukira kukoresa.

89

Okuhinga embibo nikyetaagisa ebikoreso by’omutaano.
Reeba aha rupapura rwa 53 oyetegyereze orukarara rw’ebikoreso
ebirikwetengwa omu kushohoza embibo z’ebihimba n’emondi.
Noobaasa kutandika bizinesi yaawe n’ebikoreso bikye ebiine omugasho
muhango ebindi obitungye bwanyima bizinesi yaawe yaaheza
kuhanguha.

Ninye muntu ohikire orikubaasa kukora bizinesi
y’embibo kurungi?
Noobaasa kureeberera gye bizinesi y’embibo?
Oine obukugu burikumara omu bizinesi y’embibo?
Oshemereire kukora wenka nainga n’abandi?

Abantu abamwe nibakora gye bizinesi kukira abandi. Ni kikuru
kumanya ngu bizinesi ezimwe zigumire kukora kukira ezindi. Kandi
niziba nizenda obukugu burikumara omu bizinesi. Bizinesi y’embibo
ni bisinesi etanguhi, neeyetaaga obukugu bw’amaani ahabw’enshonga
ezi ahaifo:
89

✓ Akatare kaazo tikahamire (nikahindahinduka obwire bwona)
✓ Hariho okuhayana n’abandi bahingi ahabw’okugira ngu baine
embibo ezaabo
✓ Kigumire kumanya nainga kuteebereza oku abantu baraagure
✓ Embeera z’obwire nizibaasa kuba mbi.
Nooyetenga obukugu omu bintu 8 ebiri ahaifo kubaasa kukora bizinesi
y’embibo kurungi. Ebintu 3 eby’okubanza nibikwata aha bukugu
bw’omuntu kurugiirira aha bi arabiremu enyima kandi ni bimwe aha
mitwarize y’omuntu. Ebishatu ebi tibirikushomesibwa omu katabo aka.
1. Okugira obumanyi omu byobuhingi: Waaba otarikumanya
gye ebyobuhingi torikwija kushohoza ekihingwa kirungi nainga
kusharamu oku waakubaasa kuhinga embibo.
2. Ekyetengo ky’okutunguuka: Ku orikutandika bizinesi, nooba
oine ekihika kingi. Ekyetengo ky’okutunguuka nikiba kiri kingi
kandi nooba oine obuhagizi. Embibo ensya n’emiringo
y’okushohoza embibo emisya nibikureetera kwehurira kurungi.
Bwanyima nihabaasa kubaho ebizibu nk’ekyanda, enjura
erengyesereize, obundi abaguzi babure nari hagire owaarwara
kyetaagise esente z’okumutwara omu irwariro. Aho nootandika
kwebuuza yaaba okutandika bizinesi nikyo kibaire kihikire
kukorwa. Waaba oine ekyetengo kihango ky’okutunguuka, noija
kwetegyereza ngu ebizibu buriijo bibaho, kandi okwikiriza ngu
noobaasa kubisingura nikiija kukureetera okutunguuka.
3. Okutatiina bizibu by’omu bizinesi: Okutandika bizinesi
buriijo harimu ebizibu kandi abantu abamwe nibatiina kukora
ekintu ekirimu obuzibu. N’obu kyakuba kirimu obuzibu bukye
oburikubaasa kubaho, oburikuteekateekwa kubaho omu biro
by’omu maisho. Abantu nk’abo nibasharamu kuhamira ahari
kakye aku biine kukira kukora ekintu kisya. Abamwe nibakora
ekyo eki barikureebamu obuzibu bukye kandi nabwe nibabanza
baakiteeketeekaho baareeba yaaba nibakibaasa. Obuzibu
nibukyendeera waaba noomanya gye bizinesi yaawe,
orikumanya akatare aku oine n’abu orikuhayana nabo omu
89

4

5

6

7

8

bizinesi. Hoona nabwe obuzibu obumwe nk’embeera mbi
z’obwire, amateeka ga gavumenti, empinduka omu katare,
endwara z’ebihingwa, obukooko, n’abashuma bigumire
kwerinda.
Obukugu obu ahaifo nibubaasa kushomesibwa. Hati
nitubugambaho kakye kwonka nitwija kubushoboorora omu
bwijwire omu katabo aka.
Okucondooza aha katare: Nooyetenga kumanya ebihingwa,
embibo, n’ekika ky’embibo ebi abahingi barikwenda kandi
n’emihendo ei barikubaasa kushashura.
Okwetegyereza eby’esente: Nooyetenga kumanya obwire
bwona nangwa otakatandikire, oku waakubaasa kumanya yaaba
bizinesi yaawe neekora amagoba. Oshemereire n’okumanya oku
orikushohoza (enshohoza), kandi n’eki orikuteekateeka kutunga
(entasya).
Okwetegyereza bizinesi: Nooyetenga kumanya byona
ebirikukwata aha bizinesi y’embibo n’oku oshemereire
kugireeberera.
Obukoryo bw’okuguza: Oshemereire kureeba oku
waabaihabaiha abaguzi bakagura embibo ezaawe batagiire
kugura ahandi
Obuheereza: Oine kumanya oku oshemereire kutwaza abaguzi
baawe.

Kukora wenka nainga kukora n’abandi
Bizinesi y’embibo neebaasa kukorwa omuntu omwe nari ekibiina.
Ebirungi n’ebibi ebiri omu nkora z’emiringo yombi neeyorekwa ahaifo.
Okukora bizinesi y’embibo wenka
Oburungi bw’omuringo ogu:
✓ Mukama wa bizinesi naabaasa kusharamu aha kintu eki
arikwenda kukora atabandize kushaba orusa kuruga aha ndiijo
muntu.
89

✓ Esente zoona ezirikurugamu niziba eza mukama wa bizinesi.
✓ Noobaasa kugyezaho kukoresa ebiteekateeko bisya, emiringo
misya y’okuhinga, n’emiringo misya y’okuguza otabandize
waabuuza.
✓ Tiharimu buzibu bw’okuteesigana, n’obutiikirizana waaba
okozire bizinesi wenka.

Yetegyereze yaaba noobaasa kukora bizinesi y’embibo wenka.

Obuzibu oburimu:
✓ Esente z’okutandika bizinesi zoona nizirondwa omuntu omwe
mukama wa bizinesi.
✓ Noobaasa kuronda obuyambi aheeru omu kusharamu kwonka
eki nikibaasa kuguma nainga kikutwarire obwire.
✓ Abantu bamwe nibahurira kubi, bagire na ihamba baaba
nibakora bonka kukira baaba nibakora n’abandi nk’ekibiina.
✓ Obuzibu bwa bizinesi bwona, ebikoreso, n’eby’okuta omu
bizinesi nibiba obujunaanizibwa bw’omuntu omwe.
89

Okukora bizinesi y’embibo n’abandi (nk’ekibiina)
Ebirungi ebirimu:
✓ Okushohoza omu by’engyenda, okuronda akatare, orwezo,
n’embibo, neebaganwa ba memba b’ekibiina.
✓ Okugura omu bwingi ebyokutamu nk’orwezo, emibazi
y’okufuuhirira, nikikyendeeza aha nshohoza.
✓ Abari omu kibiina baine omugisha gw’okutunga entandikwa
✓ Abantu baingi baaba nibakorera hamwe nibashohoza ebintu
bingi kandi eki nikibaasa kwongyera entaasya kukira waaba ori
wenka. Entaasya ku erikweyongyera nikyongyera aha sente
ezirikubiikwa ezirikubaasa kwija kuhangusya bizinesi nari
kukora ebindi.
✓ Abantu nibeega okukorera hamwe okushoboorora obuzibu
hamwe n’okuteekateekyera hamwe eby’okukora omu biro
by’omu maisho.
✓ Abakazi nibagira omugisha gw’okutunga eitaka baaba bari omu
kibiina.

Mwetegyereze yaaba murikubaasa kukora bizinesi y’embibo
nk’ekibiina.
89

Obuzibu oburimu:
✓ Nihabaasa kubaho obutabanguko omuri ba memba b’ekibiina
ahabw’enshonga zitari zimwe
✓ Obumwe ebibiina nibiba nibirondera esente aheeru omu bwire
bw’okwegyerezaho bikeerondera esente.
✓ Obwebembezi ku burikuba bubi ekibiina ekyo nikibaasa
obutahikiiriza ebigyendererwa byakyo obundi n‘ekibiina kigwe.
✓ Bamwe omuri ba memba baaba nibakizayo okureeta ebiteiso,
ba memba abandi nibabaasa kugira obutamarwa
ahabw’obutatunga mugisha gw’okuhayo ebiteekateeko ebyabo.
Mwasharamu kukorera omu kibiina, hariho emiringo mingi
y’okutwazamu:
1. Baamemba b’ekibiina nibakorera hamwe emirimo y’okushohoza
embibo kandi babagana amagoba
2. Buri omwe naabaasa kuhinga embibo okwe, bwanyima beeterana
bazibiika n’okuronda akatare.
3. Baamemba b’ekibiina nibeeteerana hamwe baaba nibaza kugura
ebikoreso n’eby’okuta omu misiri bwonka, kwenda kukyendeeza
aha nshohoza.
Kikaabaire kirungi okuza omu kibiina eky’abantu abatunguukire kandi
abarikumanya kukorera hamwe.
Teekateeka munonga aha burungi n’obubi ebiri omuri buri muringo
gw’okukoramu otakashaziremu eky’okukora.
Niki eki nyine kukora kureeba ngu bizinesi yangye
y’embibo yaagyenda gye.
Bariirira esente ezirikwetengwa kutandika bizinesi
y’embibo.
Bariirira entaasya n’enshohoza y’omwaka gwona.
Bariirira amagoba agu orikubaasa kukora.
89

Otakatandikire bizinesi oshemereire kubanza waakora orukanga rwayo
kureeba waaba noobaasa kutandika bizinesi kandi oreebe waaba
noobaasa kukora amagoba. Eki nikimanyisa okubariira ebi ahaifo:

Enshoza aha bikozeso ebirikutwara obwire buraingwa
Omuhendo gw’okugurizaho
Entaasya y’omwaka gwona kuruga omu bi ogurize.
Oku bizinesi yaawe erikugoba.

Kora orukanga rwa bizinesi yaawe otakagitandikire.
Enshohoza omu bizinesi
Hariho enshohoza y’emiringo ebiri omu bizinesi: enshohoza aha bintu
ebirikumara obwire buraingwa, n’enshoza aha kukora kwa buriijo
omu bizinesi. Enshohoza aha bintu ebirikumara obwire buraingwa
neebaho waaba nootandika bizinesi bwonka. Enshohoza egi omu
bizinesi y’embibo erimu okugura ebyoma, kwombeka sitooha, n’ebindi
bikoreso ebirikukoresibwa kurenga aha sizoni emwe omu kushohoza
embibo, kwonka etari myaka mingi. Okugura eitaka nari kuripangisa
ni kimwe aha nshohoza y’ebintu ebirikutwara obwire buraingwa.
Waaba noobara enshohoza aha bikoreso, n’eby’okuta omu musiri, buri
kintu kibariirire obwire obu kiraamare. Obwire obu noobubarira ahari
89

sizoni nainga emyaka ei kiraamare. Ekyokureeberaho efuka neemara
emyaka ebiri.

neeyorekwa ahaifo:

Waaza kutandika bizinesi oshemereire kuba oine esente z’okushashurira
ebintu ebi byona otakatandikire. Oshemereire kumanya ngu nooba
otaine ntaasya yoona kuruga omu bizinesi waaba nootandika kuhisya
obu oraashaaruure ekihingwa ky’okubanza. Nahabwekyo,
otakatandikire bizinesi, oshemereire kuronda ahu oriihe esente
z’okutandikisa. Esente noobaasa kukoresa ezaawe ezi orundaine, nari
oyeguze. Kwonka ku oraayeguze esente, banza oyetegyereze yaaba noija
kushashura eibanja okasigaza ez’okugumizamu na bizinesi.
Ahabw’okushanga enshohoza neerugiirira aha buhango bw’omusiri,
okusharamu aha buhango bw’omusiri gu oraahinge n’ekintu kikuru
munonga otakatandikire kuhinga n’okubyara. Oshemereire kusharamu
kurugiirira aha bintu ebi oine (eitaka, abakozi, n’obwire), esente
z’orikwenda kuta omu bzinesi yaawe n’akatare ku embibo ziine
kurugiirira omu kuteebereza kwawe. Kikaabaire kirungi kutandika
n’omusiri mukye okaguma nooyongyeraho mpora mpora.
Okwenda kukora gye, abahingi b’embibo bashemereire kugira
enshohoza nkye kwonka bakashaaruura bingi. Eki nikikworwa kurabira
omuri ebi ahaifo:
✓ Kubyara embibo ezirikwera munonga
✓ Kubyara embibo ezirikugumira endwara omu kicweka ekyo
✓ Kubyara embibo z’omutindo murungi
✓ Kuronda eitaka eririkwera munonga nainga okakoresa orwezo
orw’engurano nainga oru oyekoreire kwenda kwongyera orwezo
omu itaka
✓ Kureeberera gye emisiri yaawe obwo obyariire omu bwire
burungi, oihiremu omwata, oyerinzire endwara n’obukooko,
okashaaruura omu bwire buhikire kandi okabiika gye embibo
zaawe.
Embeera mbi z’obwire nazo niziita ebihingwa (amashaaruura nigaba
makye), kwonka oburemeezi obu tihaine oku waakubaasa kubwerinda.

89

Okubariirira omuhendo gw’okugurizaho.
Waaheza kumanya oku oraashohoze omu bizinesi yaawe, bariirira
omuhendo ogu oraagurizeho embibo zaawe kandi okashaazyaho
amagoba.
Omuhendo ogu oraagurizeho nigwingana n’esente ezi okoreise kuhinga
embibo zaawe(ekyokureeberaho nk’enshaho nari kiro), ogaisireho
amagoba g’omuhingi, ogaisireho n’ez’orikubariirira okukura
kw’ebikozeso ebi okoreesize.
Omuhendo gw’okugurizaho = enshohoza + amagoba + ez’ebikoreso
Eki n’ekyokureeberaho ahaifo ky’Omuky. Mafabi, omuhingi
w’ebihimba oku yaabazire omuhendo gw’okugurizaho.
Eitembezo 1: Okubariirira enshohoza yoona
Omuky. Mafabi naateekateeka kubyara kiro 300 z’ebihimba
zirikumaraho shiringi 288,000. Bwanyima y’okushaaruura
n’okutoorana, naateekateeka kwihamu kiro 4000 z’ebihimba.
Enshohoza yoona (shs 288,000) naagigabira obwingi bw’amashaaruura
ge (kiro 4000):
288,000/4000=72
Eki nikimanyisa ngu buri kiro emwe neemaraho shs 72. Nahabwekyo,
Omuky. Mafabi aine kuguza buri kiro y’ebihimba shiringi 72 kubaasa
kwihamu ezi yaakoresa. Kwonka kyaba kiri kityo kuguriza ahari shs
72, nikimanyisa ngu taraije kukora magoba goona. Nahabwekyo,
ashemereire kugaitaho ez’amagoba kwenda ngu agire enshaagi.
Eitembezo 2: Okubariira amagoba
Okutwarira hamwe, esente ez’amagoba zibaasa kuba ahagati ya 20-50
ahari 100 z’ezo ezi yaakoreise (ahari kiro nari enshaho). Amagoba
tigarikwingana. Eki nikirugiirira aha mbibo ezi abahingi barikukira
kuhinga munonga. Okugira ngu abahingi nibabaasa kushashurira
embibo ezi barikukira kuhinga omuhendo gw’ahaiguru, naiwe noobaasa
kushaba esente z’ahaiguru oiheho amagoba mingi. Kwonka aha rubaju
orundi, oshemereire kushaba esente nkye aha mbibo ezi orikureeba
89

abahingi batarikukira kuhinga, ezi batarikukunda kurungi kandi
n’ezitaine katare.
Omuky. Mafabi naateekateeka ngu amagoba ga 25_ (ahari igana)
garinganaire.
Naabara ati: 25/100 * shiringi 72
=72 * 25 = shiringi 18
Gaita amagoba ga shiringi 18 ahari shiringi 72 ( enshohoza ahari
buri kiro emwe).
Shiringi 18 + 72 = Shiringi 90
Omu kusharamu aha magoba oshemereire kwebuuza ebibuuzo ebi
ahaifo:
✓ Abaguzi bangye abaingi nibiija kushashura omuhendo ogu?
✓ Omuhendo ogu naataho guri omu rurengo rumwe n’emihendo
y’embibo eziri aha mutindo gumwe?
✓ Omushuubuzi nari ow’eduuka nawe naabaasa kwongyeraho
amagoba age reero abaase kuguza? Omushuubuzi nari ow’eduuka
naija kuteezamu omuhendo ogu yaakushashwire emirundi ebiri nari
kukiraho. N’ahabw’ekyo, oteekateeke munonga aha muhendo
gwawe.
Ku oraareebe ebibuuzo ebi aha ruguru noobigarukamu na ‘ingaaha’
yonka, teekateeka aha kukyendeeza amagoba gaawe.
Eitembezo rya 3: Embariirira y ‘esente ezirikugyenda aha bikozeso
Ebintu eby’okukozesa, nibikura, bihendeka, kandi byetaagisa ebindi.
Ebintu ebi nibiba nibyetaagisa haihi buri mwaka. N’ahabw’ekyo, esente
z’okubigaruraho zishemereire kubarirwa aha mihendo y’okugurizaho
obwe orikwihaho esente nkye aha mihendo y’okugurizaho buri mwaka.
Ahabw’okugira ngu abahingi nibakozesa ebintu bitarikushushana omu
kuhinga, kigumire kusharamu aha sente ez’okwongyera aha muhendo
gw’okugurizaho eza buri kintu. Ekyanguhi n’okuteebereza esente
ezirikuruga aha bintu ebirikukizayo kutwara esente byoka (bitarenga
bibiri).
89

Omuky. Mafabi akagura ekyoma ky’okuhuura ahari shiringi 9,000,
kandi nikikora omu sizoni ishatu zonka kyaheza kisisikare. Okutunga
esente ezirikukirugaho nookwata esente ezi waakiguzire ozigabira
obwire obu orikuteekateeka ngu nikiija kumara.
Omuky. Mafabi akakwata shiringi 9,000, yaazigabira 3.
9,000/3 = shiringi 3,000. Shiringi 3,000 nizo sente ezirikuruga aha
kukozesa ekyoma ky’okuhuura omu mwaka gumwe.
Omuky. Mafabi naakwata obwingi bw’embibo ezi arikuteekateeka
kuguza (kiro 4000) Azigabira esente ezirikuruga aha kyoma kyaba
kikozire omwaka 4000/3000=1.33. Ezi 1.33 noobaasa kuzireka. Zaaba
nizihika sente 50 noogaitaho ezindi aha muhendo. Omuky. Mafabi
naagaita shiringi emwe aha muhendo gwa buri kiro emwe y’embibo.
Shiringi 90 (ez’okuhinga embibo ogaisireho ez’amagoba) + shiringi 1
(ezirikuruga aha bikoreso) = shiringi 91. Okugaita esente ezirugire aha
kyoma ky’okuhuura aha muhendo gw’embibo nikiyamba kugura ekindi
aha nyima ya sizoni ishatu.
Omuhendo gw’okugurizaho kiro y’embibo y’ebihimba omu
kyokureeberaho eki ni shiringi 91.
Okugaitirana esente ez’okuhinga embibo, ez’amagoba, n’ezirikuruga
aha bikoreso omu kutaho omuhendo nikireetera bizinesi yaawe kukora
amagoba. Embibo waaziguza aha sente ezirikwingana n’ezi okoreesize,
bizinesi yaawe neegwa. Esente ezikoresiibwe zaaba nyingi, omuhendo
gwazo niguza ahaiguru kandi gurema abaguzi.
Ekipande eki ahaifo nikyoreka esente ezirikuruga aha bikoreso by’aba
‘Kabale Bean Seed Producers’ omu sizoni emwe. Esente ezirikuruga
ahari buri kintu nizibarwa omu kipande ekiri aha rupapura rwa 15 esente
ezirikuruga aha bikoreso ebirikumara obwire buraingwa eby’aba
‘Kabale Bean Seed Producers’

89

ashatu kubara entaasya yaawe ya buri sizoni buri mwaka.

Okubariira amagoba ga bizinesi.

Eki nikimanyisa ngu entaasya erikuruga omu kuguza embibo
eshemereire kuba neekira enshohoza omu kuhinga. Ni kirungi kumanya
yaaba noobaasa kukora amagoba waaguza embibo otakatandikire
bizinesi. Bizinesi enyingi nizigwa ahabw’obutakora magoba.

yaawe.
89

Ntandike bizinesi y’embibo?
Shwijuma kandi oteekateeke munonga aha birikukwata
aha kuhinga embibo ebi abantu bakuhaire.
Byara embibo haakiri omu sizoni emwe oziguze.
Sharamu yaaba otandika bizinesi y’embibo y’ekihingwa
kimwe nari bingi ebi ogyerizeho, hindura aha kihingwa
nari ebihingwa ebyo nainga ebya bizinesi y’embibo
birekyere kimwe.

Waamara kuhezaho amatembezo agu twagambaho, kandi okateekateka
n’aha bi obuurize ebikwasire aha bizinesi, noobaasa hati kutandikaho
bizinesi yaawe y’embibo obwo orikugyeza. Eitembezo eri riine
omugasho munonga aha bw’okuba nooyereebera ebiri omu kuhinga
n’okuguza embibo obwo otagiire omu kabi kahango k’okufeerwa. Hinga
embibo hakiri sizoni emwe, oziguze reero obariire amagoba
agaraarugyemu omu bizinesi yaawe. Waaba nooza kwihamu amagoba,
sharamu otandike bizinesi y’embibo. Waaba otabaasize kwihamu
amagoba, gyezaho aha bihingwa ebindi. Omu muringo gwona noija
kwetaaga kugarukamu amatembezo agamwe (reeba amatembezo aha
rupapura rwa 4). Waaheza kugyeza okareeba, noobaasa kusharamu ngu
bizinesi y’embibo torikugibaasa, ogirekyere kimwe.

89

ESHUURA YA: 3 ENTEBEEKANISA YA

BIZINESI
Okutebeekanisa orukanga rwa bizinesi nikimanyisa okugiteekateekaho,
n’okutaho entebeekanisa yoona erikwetengwa waaba otakagitandikire.

Okutebeekanisa kwine omugasho aha ntunguuka ya bizinesi.

Omu kutebeekanisa orukanga rwa bizinesi nookuratira amatembezo
abiri. Ni kirungi kuteekateeka aha bizinesi kandi okakora
n’entebeekanisa yoona otakatandikire bizinesi. Waaba waatandikire
bizinesi yaawe, nooba nooyetenga kutebeekanisiza bizinesi yaawe buri
sizoni nainga buri mwaka ahabw’okwenda kutunguura bizinesi yaawe
omu biro by’omu maisho.

89

Hariho enshonga ishatu nkuru ezirikutuma oshemereire kutebeekanisa
bizinesi yaawe y’embibo.
1. Entebeekanisa neeyoreka ekicweka kya bizinesi yaawe eki
orikwenda kutunguura omutindo.
2. Entebeekanisa neekworeka entaasya n’enshohoza omu bizinesi
yaawe.
3. Entebeekanisa neeyoreka ekitongore ekiraije kukuguza esente nka
banka, n’oku orikuteekateeka bizinesi yaawe kwija kukora gye omu
biro by’omu maisho.

Eshuura egi neekworeka oku waakubaasa kutaho emiringo eshatu
y’entebeekanisa: entebeekanisa ya bizinesi, entebekanisa y’entaasya
n’enshohoza, n’entebeekanisa y’enkora y’esente omu bizinesi.
Okukora entebeekanisa ya bizinesi.
Okutebeekanisiza bizinesi nikiija kukuyamba kwetegyereza
n’okuhamiza ebiteekateeko byawe aha kintu kimwe. Nikyongyera
kikuheereza omuhimbo gw’okwija kukora kurungi. Waaba
oyetebeekaniise kurungi, entebeekanisiza ya bizinesi neeyoreka
ekitongore ekiraije kukuguza esente, oku zirikwigana n’oku oraije
kushashura eibanja eryo.
Omu ntebeekanisa ya bizinesi hashemereire kubamu ebi:
1.
Enturukiriro: shoboorora ebihingwa n’emiringo y’embibo ei
orikuza kuhinga, ahabw’enki ekiteekateeko kya bizinesi kiri
kirungi, n’abantu abu orikuza kuba nooguza.
2.

Ebirikukukwataho: harimu eiziina ryawe, eiziina rya bizinesi,
obwegyese bwawe n’obukugu obu oine.

3.

Shoboorora aha kihingwa: Heereza omu bwijwire embibo ezi
oraakanyise, oku oraarinde omutindo kuguma gubonaire, ensiba
n’ebindi. Shoboorora ekintu eky’omutaano aha mbibo zaawe.
89

4.

Shoboorora aha katare: abaguzi ni baahi? Nibashangwa nkahi?
Akatare nikaingana ki? Abantu nibeyongyera kukunda
ebihingwa byawe nainga tibaribikunda? Noohayana na baahi,
kandi nibaza kukora ki ku oraatandike kuhinga?

5.

Shoboorora entebeekanisa y’okuguza: nooza kugaba n’okuguza
ota? Ekihingwa kyawe nooza kukimanyisa ota abantu kandi
ahabw’enki emihanda yaawe erikwija kubonera?

6.

Ebintu by’okukoresa ebirikwetengwa: bizinesi yaawe neija kuba
neeshangwa nkahi? Eitaka noija kuritunga ota? Ni bintu ki
eby’okukoresa ebi orikwetenga, ahabw’enki, kandi nibigura
bita?

7.

Shoboorora aha sente ezirikwetengwa: Nooyetenga esente
zirikwingana ki z’okutambuza bizinesi yaawe omu mwaka
gumwe? Omu bizinesi nooza kutamu esente zirikwingana ki
ezaawe ahabwawe? Waaba nooronda rooni, nooronda
erikwingana ki kandi nooyenda kugikozesa ki? Ni musingo ki
ogu orikwija kutaho ahabw’eibanja eryo (rooni egyo).

8.

Oine nteekateekaki y’ebiro by’omumaisho?
Oine
bigyendererwa ki by’okukora bizinesi? Noija kubihikiiriza ota?
Nooteekateeka ngu n’enki ekiraije kubaho omu myaka 3-5
erikwija?

Ekyokureeberaho ky’enteebeekanisa ya bizinesi kiri aha rupapura rwa
50.
Kukora entebeekanisa y’enshohoza n’entaasya.
Entebeekanisa y’entaasya n’enshohoza neekuyamba kumanya entaasya
n’enshohoza yaawe ya buri kwezi omu mwaka ogurikukurataho. Eki
nikituma waateebereza amagoba agu waakubaasa kutunga omu sizoni
nainga omu mwaka ogurikukurataho. Omu bizinesi y’embibo,
89

noohaburwa kukora entebeekanisa y’entaasya n’enshohoza ya sizoni
naiga omwaka bukiri kare kurugiirira yaaba omu mwaka harimu sizoni
emwe nari ibiri z’okuhinga. Kora entebeekanisa yaawe y’entaasya
n’enshohoza otakeetengire kugikozesa.

SKora enteebeekanisa y’entaasya n’enshohoza bukiri kare.

Eitembezo 1: Teebereza enshohoza aha bikoreso ebirikumara obwire
buraingwa n’enshohoza omu kukora. Ebirikukwata aha nshohoza egi
noobishanga omu bihandiiko bya bizinesi yaawe. Hariho ekintu kyona
eki waakubaasa kwongyeraho? Okakoresa ebintu by’omuhendo mukye
(kwonka oteebwa omutindo gw’ebikoreso waaba noosharamu hah
ryeki)? Okasiisha ebikoreso? Ekindi, manya ebirikukwata aha mwaka
gw’omu maisho. Teekateeka ekintu kyona ekirikubaasa kwongyera aha
nshohoza yaawe.
89

Eitembezo rya 2: Teebereza ebiraaguzibwe n’amagoba agaraakorwe
buri kwezi. Kukora okuteebereza manya ebibaireho omu mwaka
oguhwire. Ebi noobaasa kubimanya kuruga omu bihandiiko bya bizinesi
yaawe. Yetegyereze n’obwegyendesereza ebibaireho enyima. Hariho
ekintu kyona eki waakubaasa kwongyeraho? Ekindi, manya
ebirikukwata aha mwaka gw’omu maisho.
Okwetegyereza eby’omu maisho noobaasa kukureebera omu bwire
bw’okubyariramu. Yebuuze ebibuuzo ebi ahaifo:
Ebi orikukora (ebihingwa nainga emiringo y’embibo)
Ni bintu ki ebi baaguzire munonga? Ahabw’enki?
Ni bintu ki ebi baaguzire kubi? Ahabw’enki?
Ni bintu ki ebi abaguzi baawe barikwenda?
Noobaasa kuguza ebisya?
Omuhendo :
Abaguzi baawe Emihendo ei waateireho bakagikuunda?
Emihendo yaawe ekaba eri ahaiguru kubaasa kukuha amagoba?
Nooyetenga kwongyera nainga kushara aha mihendo yaawe?
Enguza:
Okaguza abantu boona nainga abashuubuzi bonka? Ni muringo ki
gw’okuguza ogwarugiremu amagoba maingi?
Okatunguura ota ebintu byawe. Ni muringo ki ogu waarangiiremu
ogwakureteire okuguza munonga kandi okutunga amagoba mingi omu
bizinesi yaawe? Ni muringo ki omurungi munonga ogu oshemereire
kugurizamu ebintu omu bizinesi yaawe?
Eitembezo rya 3: Koresa entebeekanisa y’enshohoza n’entaasya
kutunguura bizinesi yaawe. Aha muheru gwa buri kwezi, gyeragyeranisa
omuhendo oguri omu ntebeekanisa y’enshohoza n’entaasya
n’omuhendo gw’enyini ogu otungire oguri omu bitabo by’embariirira.
Koresa entebeekanisa yaawe kwetegyereza yaaba bizinesi yaawe
neekora gye nk’oku waabaire nootekateeka.
89

✓ Entaasya yaawe y’okwezi eri nk’oku waabaire ogirangize? Kyaba
kitari kityo yebuuze ahabw’enki entaasya yaawe eri ahansi kutari
nk’oku waabaire nooteekateeka.
✓ Enshohoza yaawe eri ahaiguru kukira oku waabaire ogirangize.
Kyaba kiri kityo yebuuze ahabw’enki enshohoza eri ahaiguru.
✓ Amagoba g’okwezi gari ahansi kukira oku waabaire ogabaririire?
Ronda ekireesire amagoba gaawe okutaba haiguru nk’oku waabaire
ogabaririire.
Okukora entebeekanisa y’enkora y’esente:
Entebeekanisa egi neeyoreka esente ezi orikuteekateeka kuta omu
bizinesi n’ezi orikuteekateeka kuruga omu bizinesi buri kwezi.
Okutebeekanisa oku nikukuyamba kureeba ngu bizinesi yaawe yaagira
esente obwire bwona. Neekurabura bukiri kare ahu waakubaasa
kuburirwa sente omu bwire bw’omu maisho n’ahabw’ekyo noobaasa
kwerinda ekizibu ekyo kitakabaireho. Okugyeraagyeranisa
entebeekanisa egi n’enkozesa y’esente yeenyini ei orikutunga
nikikuyamba kumanya ebi orikuranzya omu maisho oku biri kurugiirira
aha birikukorwa omu bizinesi.
Entebeekanisa egi neebaasa kukorwa ahabwa sizoni nainga
ahabw’obwire buraingwa.
Aha hariho entebeekanisa y’enkora y’esente ya bizinesi y’embibo
z’emondi y’Omw. Tumusiime

Kuratira amatembezo 10 kukora entebeekanisa y’enkora y’esente.
Amatembezo 1 kuhika 4 nag’esente ezirikutaaha omu bizinesi. Kuruga
ahari 5-9 n’ag’esente ezirikushohora. Reeba aha matembezo
ahabw’okwezi kwa kakashatu.
Eitembezo 1. Taasyamu esente ezi orikuteekateeka ngu oine omu kaashi
nainga omu banka (waaba oine akaunta) aha kutandika
kw’Okwakashatu. Zihandiike omu mwanya oguri omu maisho ga
“Esente eziriho aha kutandika kw’omwaka”
Eitembezo 2: Reeba aha ntebeekananisa y’entaasya neeshohoza. Ronda
enteebereza ei waakozire ahabw’entaasya y’Okwakashatu . Handiika
omuhendo ogu omu mwanya oguri omu maisho ga “esente ezirikuruga
omu kuguza”
Eitembezo 3: Noobaasa kuba otungire ezindi sente kuruga omu
mihanda endiijo kutari kuruga omu bizinesi nk’okweguza,omu banka
nainga amagoba g’esente ezi oine omu banka nainga ezikugaabiirwe.
Handiika omuhendo gwazo omu maisho ga,”Esente ezindi
ezirikutungwa.”
89

Eitembezo 4: Gaitirana esente zoona eziri omu matembezo 1, 2 na 3
kutunga omuhendo gw’esente ezitungirwe. Zihandiike omu maisho
ga “Entaasya yoona”
Eitembezo 5: Omu Kwakashatu noobaasa kugura eby’okukoresa omu
bizinesi. Reeba aha ntebeekanisa yaawe y’entaasya n’enshohoza
y’Okwakashatu.Handiika esente ezi waabaririire kugura ebikoreso
ozihandiike omu maisho ga, “Esente ezirikushohora omu kugura ebintu
ebirikumara obwire buraingwa.”
Eitembezo 6: Reeba aha ntebeekanisa yaawe y’entaasya n’enshohoza
y’Okwakashatu kureeba ezi waabaire obaririire kushohoza omu kukora.
Omuhendo gwazo guhandiike omu maisho ga, “Esente ezirikushohora
omu kukora.”
Eitembezo 7: Nooza kugura ebyoma by’okukoresa omu Kwakashatu.
Ronda omuhendo oguraakoresibwe omu kubigura oguhandiike omu
maisho, “Esente ezirikushohora omu kugura ebyoma.”
Eitembezo 8: Haine esente ezi orikureeba ngu bizinesi yaawe neeza
kushohoza omu kwezi oku ekyokureeberaho nk’okushashura rooni?
Handiika omuhendo gwazo omu maisho ga “Esente eziri kushohora
omu bindi”. Ku haakuba hatariho nshohoza endiijo yoona, omwanya
ogureke gutaine kiriho.
Eitembezo 9: Gaitirana “Esente eziri kushohora” kuruga aha itembezo
5, 6, 7, 8. Ezi oraatunge nizo sente ezi orikuteekateeka kushohoza kuruga
omu bizinesi yaawe omu Kwakashatu.
Eitembezo 10: Kwata omuhendo gw’esente ezirikutaaha omu bizinesi
oiheho ezirikuruga omu bizinesi otunge esente eziraije kusigara omu
nshaho nainga aha kaunta ya bizinesi aha muheru gw’Okwakashatu.
Oijuke ngu esente eziraabe ziriho aha muheru gw’okwezi nizo ziraabe
ziriho aha kutandika kw’okwezi okundi.
89

Entebeekanisa y’enkoresa y’esente y’omw. Tumusiime neeyoreka ku
arikuteeteeka kuba aine shiringi 9,360 aha muheru gw’emyezi eshatu.
Koresa entebeekanisa yaawe y’enkoresa y’esente kwenda ngu bizinesi
yaawe egume eine esente zirikumara obwire bwona. Entebeekanisa
yaawe egi ku eraayoreke ngu bizinesi
neebaasa kuburwa esente omu kwezi kumwe, teekateeka aha bibuuzo
ebi ahaifo:
✓ Noobaasa kwongyera aha sente ezitungirwe omu kwezi okwe?
Yetegyereze yaaba nooha amabanja maingi.
✓ Noobaasa kukyendeeza aha nshohoza y’okugura omu kwezi okwe?
✓ Nikyetengyesa kugura ebyoma bisya obwire obu? Noobaasa
kutunga ebyoma aha ibanja nainga kutunga rooni?
Okubara esente eziri omu bizinesi
Okubara sente eziri omu bizinesi n’ekibaro ekirikworeka oku bizinesi
yaawe erikwingana aha bwire obu waabariraho. Ni kirungi kubara esente
eziri omu bizinesi buri myezi 6. Kuratira amatembezo agari ahaifo
kubara esente eziri omu bizinesi.

Bara esente eziri omu bizinesi buri myezi 6.
89

Eitembezo 1. Bara esente eziri omuri buri kintu ekiine akwate na
bizinesi yaawe ekirikubaasa kurugamu esente. Ebintu ebi nibyetwa
ebyomuhendo. Ebyomuhendo omu bizinesi birimu embibo,
ezitakaguziibwe, ebikoreso, ebyoma, n’esente eziriho ezirugire omu
kuguza embibo.
Eitembezo 2. Bara esente eziri omu bintu ebirikumara obwire
buraingwa n’enshohoza omu kukora.
Eitembezo 3. Kwata esente eziri omu bintu n’eziriho oiheho enshohoza
yoona. Omuhendo ogu oraatunge nizo sente eziri omu bizinesi yaawe.

Omu kwezi Kwamunaana esente eziri omu bizinesi y’omuky. Mafabi
ni shiringi 8,300. Esente eziri omu bizinesi ye zaayeyongyera omu myezi

ESHUURA YA 4: OKUBIIKA GYE

EBIHANDIIKO
AHAW’ENTUNGUUKA YA BIZINESI.
Okubiika ebihandiiko kwine omugasho ahabw’okuba Nooba
nooyetaaga byona ebirikukwata aha bizinesi yaawe kwenda kukora
entebeekanisa nungi ya bizinesi.

Okutunguuka kwa bizinesi nikurugiirira aha mbiika nungi
y’ebihandiiko.
Okubiika gye ebihandiiko nikwija kukuyamba kumanya:
✓ Oku esente zaawe zirikukoresibwa
✓ Obu orikuguza munonga
✓ Oku bizinesi yaawe erikukura
✓ Obu oshemereire kugura ebintu.
Emiringo ebiri y’okubiika ebihandiiko neeyetaagwa.
1. Ebihandiiko bya buri sizoni: ebihandiiko ebirikworeka embibo
ezi ogurize, ebintu ebi oguzire, abakozi abu opangiisize, eitaka
89

eri opangiisize, eby’entambura, n’enshohoza ezindi zoona omu
sizoni.
2. Enteebereza y’entaasya: Ebi n’ebihandiiko ebirikworeka esente
ezi orikuteekateka kutunga n’okushohoza nk’omu kwezi
kumwe. Ebihandiiko ebi nibyoreka enteebereza yaawe. Ebintu
nibigyenda nibitereera nk’oku orikweyongyera kukora
n’okumanyiira. Okuteebereza entaasya nikukuyamba kureebera
hare bizinesi yaawe omu biro by’omumaisho, n’okusharamu
aha kuhindura aha nshohoza n’emihendo. Ebyokureeberaho
by’enteebereza y’entaasya ni nk’enteebereza aha mbibo
ezirikuguzibwa n’enshohoza n’entebeekanisa y’enkora y’esente.
Ebihandiiko bya buri sizoni
Ebihandiiko by’entaasya n’enshohoza ya buri sizoni bishemereire
kubiikwa omu kitabo ky’ebyembariirira (regya). *Regya n’ekitabo
ky’okuhandiikamu ebirikukwata aha bizinesi.
Waaba otarikubaasa kugura ekikozirwe noobaasa kukora ekyawe
orikukoresa ruura
n’ekaraamu, nainga akacumu orikusharamu enyiriri z’okuhandiikamu
ebintu byawe. Biika ebihandiiko byawe bya buri sizoni omu regya
emwe, kwonka buri kintu kite aha rupapura orwakyo. Ahaifo
noohaburwa oku oraatwaze kwonka noobaasa kukoresa omuringo
ogwawe ogurikukwanguhira gwaba gurimu ebikuru ebi orikwenda.
Baganisa regya yaawe omu bicweka 2 nainga 3 .
Ekicweka 1: Handiikamu ebintu byona ebi oine omu bizinesi
ebirikumara obwire buraingwa, n’ebirikuhwaho. Ebihandiiko ebi
noobaasa kubihandiika ahansi y’emitwe egi: regya y’ebiguziibwe, regya
y’abakozi, regya y’eitaka, regya y’ebyentambura, na regya y’enshohoza
ezindi zoona.

89

Ekicweka ekya 2: Handiikamu obwingi bw’embibo za buri kihingwa
na buri mbibo ezi obiikire n’omuhendo ogu oraazigurizeho omu
bucweka. Ekyokureeberaho nka buri kiro, nainga enshaho. Ebihandiiko
ebi nibyetwa inventore.
Ekicweka 3: Handiika rooni yaaba eriho.
Ekicweka 1: Ebihandiiko by’ekicweka eki omu regya yaawe noobaasa
kubitereeza omu bundi bucweka kuruga ahari A kuhisya ahari E
nk’ahaifo.
A: Regya y’ebiguziibwe:
Regya y’ebiguziibwe neeyoreka ebintu byona ebi oguzire ahabwa
bizinesi, obu waabigura, esente ezi waabiguzire n’ezi waashashwire.
Biika za risiiti z’ebintu byona ebi oragure. Ebihandiiko ebi nibikuha
ekishushani ky’ebi oine kugura omu biro by’omu maisho, n’omuringo
gu bizinesi yaawe erikugobamu.
Regya y’ebiguziibwe
Ebintu

ebiguziibwe byagurwa

buri kimwe

gwona.

B: Regya y’abakozi
Regya y’abakozi neeyoreka abakozi boona abarikushashurwa, amazooba
agu buri omwe akozire, kandi n’esente ezi buri omwe yaashashwirwe.
Ekihandiiko eki nikiyamba kweteekateekyera enshohoza aha bakozi omu
bwire bw’omu maisho, nikikuheereza emihendo y’okugyenderaho omu
mbariira ya buri kwezi, kandi kikuhwera kusharamu aha bwingi
bw’abakozi abu waakubaasa kwetaaga.
89

Regya y’abakozi.

buri shaaha/buri izooba zoona hamwe

C. Regya y’eitaka
Regya y’eitaka neekoreesibwa kuhandiikamu obuhango bw’eitaka eri
opangiisize n’esente ezi okoreise. Ekihandiiko eki nikikuhwera
kumanya enshohoza y’aha itaka omu bwire bw’omu maisho kandi ekuha
omuhendo gw’okugyenderaho omu mbariira ya buri kwezi.
Regya y’eitaka.

D: Regya y’ebyentambura.
Regya y’ebyentambura neekoreesibwa kubiika ebihandiiko
by’enshohoza aha kutwara embibo omu katare. Ekihandiiko eki
nikikuyamba kuteebereza esente ezi oraakorese aha ntambura omu bwire
bw’omu maisho.

Reegya egi neebaasa kukoresibwa aha kworeka esente ezaapangiisize
ebyoma, kushashura eitaka nainga kushashura rooni. Ekindi neebaasa
kukworeka esente ezi waashohwize omu kugura eby’okukoresa
n’okushashura abakozi n’omu kwombeka sitooha y’embibo.

Ekicweka2: Handiika ebintu ebiine akakwate n’ebyokuguza n’entaasya
omu kicweka kya kabiri kya regya yaawe.
A: Entereeza y’eby’okuguza.
Ekihandiiko eki nikibiika obwingi bw’embibo eziriho ezirikubaasa
kuguzibwa. Ekihandiiko eki nikikworeka gye obwire bwona, obwingi
bw’embibo eziriho ezirikubaasa kuguzibwa. Ebihandiiko ebi nibiyamba
munonga omu kukumanyisa nainga esente ezi orikubaasa kutunga
nainga kufeerwa waaguza nainga waaba otagurize embibo ezo.

89

ESHUURA YA 5: OKUMANYA AKATARE
Hariho ebintu mushanju bikuru ebi oshemereire kwetegyereza waaba
nooyenda bizinesi yaawe kutunguuka n’okukura.
✓ Manya eki abaguzi barikwenda
✓ Okutwariza gye abaguzi
✓ Kukoregana n’abakozi b’embibo abandi
✓ Kwekorera akatare
✓ Okutunguura bizinesi
✓ Ensiba
✓ Entambura

Okutunguuka kwa bizinesi nikwetaaga okukora n’amaani.
89

Manya abaguzi baawe
Nk’omukozi w’embibo, oshemereire kuta omu nkora ebi
abashuubuzi n’abahingi b’embibo barikukunda. Kwonka oijuke
ngu abashuubuzi nibaba nibajwekyera abaguzi: ab’omu byaro
n’ab’omu tauni abarikugura ez’okurya. Abaguzi baawe abakuru
abahingi n’abashuubuzi, nibaba baine ebi barikwenda
bitarikushushana. Abahingi nibaba nibafa aha kwera kw’embibo
omu musiri, enteeka yaayo, oku enuzire, n’akatare kaayo. Kwonka
bo abashuubuzi, nibaba nibafa aha birikubaho bwanyima
y’okushaaruura; nk’enteeka, y’embibo egyo, oku enuzire,
n’akatare kaayo. Obundi abahingi nibaba nibenda embibo
z’ebihingwa ezirikukira kumanywa munonga. Niziba ziri nungi
omu kurya n’okuguza.
Nk’oku ebi abaguzi barikwenda birikukira kuhinduka, buriijo kora
okucondooza aha katare (buri myaka 3-4) kwenda kwongyera
aha kumanya ebyakatare. Manya eki abaguzi baawe barikwenda
kandi ohindure n’aha mbibo nainga ebihingwa kyaba nikyetaagisa.
Oku oshemereire kutwaza abaguzi baawe
Oku orikutwaza abaguzi nikubaasa kukuyamba kuguza munonga.
Obuheereza burungi n’okutwaza gye abaguzi nibikuyamba kuguza
embibo zaawe! Mwenyamu waaba nooramusya abaguzi baawe.

89

Abaguzi baawe baheereze obuheereza burungi.
Yeteekateeke kugarukamu ebi baraakubuuze aha mbibo ezi
orikuguza. Manya oburungi n’obubi bwa buri mbibo, kandi
yeteekateeke kubishoboorora. Omanye kushoboorora oku
orikuhinga embibo zaawe kandi n’ahabw’enki ziine entaaniso aha
mbibo ezindi eziri omu kicweka ekyo.
Waareeba omuguzi ataamarwa, gyezaho omanye ahabw’enki.
Musaasire ahab’oburemeezi obwo kandi gyezaho kubutereeza.
Embibo zaaba nizo ziine oburemeezi, teekateeka aha
ky’okwongyeraho embibo ezindi eza busha. Ekiragiro ky’okuguza
ni; “omuguzi atuura ahikire”. Noobaasa kutiikirizana nawe kandi
noobaasa kuba ohikire kwonka ahabw’okwenda kuguza ebintu
byawe, oshemreire kwijuka ngu omuguzi niwe arikubanza.

89

Okukoregana n’abakozi b’embibo abandi:
Embibo ezirikuruga omu bantu abandi nizibaasa kushiisha
entunguuka ya bizinesi yaawe. N’ahabw’ekyo oshemereire kugira
enkoregana nungi n’abakozi b’embibo abandi.
Noobaasa kugira okuhayana kw’emiringo ebiri:
✓ Embibo ezi barikuguza omu butare n’omu maduuka omu
kicweka ekyo. Ebihingwa ebimwe nk’ebihimba, ebi
barikuguza nk’embibo obumwe nibyo abantu barikugura
kurya.
✓ Embibo ezikukorwa abantu abaine obukugu omu
by’embibo nk’abacondoozi nainga ebitongore by’embibo.
Embibo eza buriijo nizikira kuba nizigura omuhendo gw’ahansi
ahabw’obukuba tizirikwentenga okwegyendesereza kwingi omu
kuzikora. obwire obwingi embibo ezi niziba zitaine ntaaniso
mpango kuruga ahari ezo ezi orikukoresa obwegyendesereza.
Abaguzi nibabaasa n’obutamanya ahabw’enki embibo zaawe
omuhendo gwazo guri ahaiguru. N’ahabw’ekyo n’eky’omugasho
kuta embibo zaawe omu kishushani kirungi ekirikworeka omutindo
gw’ahaiguru. Omuringo gw’okukora eki n’okusiba embibo zaawe.
Ogundi muringo gw’okworeka omugasho gw’embibo z’omutindo
murungi n’okukora eky’okwegyeraho ky’abantu kureeberaho
okuhinga
embibo
(reeba
omu
katabo
“o
z’ebihimba”(Producing bean seed).
Omu ky’okwegyeraho ky’embibo z’omutindo, noobyara embibo
z’emiringo mingi (ezi orikukora, ez’omu katare n’ez’orujwangye)
kwenda ngu oyorekye omutaano oguri aha mutindo gw’embibo
z’ekihingwa ekyo. Ote ekyokureebeberaho eki, omu mwanya ogu
buri omwe arikubaasa kuhika omu kicweka ekyo, kwenda ngu
abantu bareebe ebirugiremu (ekyokureeberaho aha rubaju
rw’oruguuto nainga omuhanda).
Abakugu omu kokora embibo nibakira kushohoreza embibo omu
bwingi ekiri kumanyisa enshohoza yaabo omu kukora embibo
89

neeba nkye. Kwonka oijuke ngu eki tikirikumanyisa ngu omutindo
gw’embibo ezo ni murungi. Abahingi b’embibo baaba nibakora
emiringo mikye y’embibo naiwe noogira omugisha gw’okushohoza
embibo ezindi. Obumwe ebitongore n’abacondoozi nibaba
nibagabira abahingi embibo ensya. Eki nikibaasa kureetera
abahingi kutagura embibo zaawe. Waaheza kumanya eki, manyisa
abantu abo ebi orikukora kandi ogyezeho kubabiihabiiha
kurekyeraaho okugaba embibo zaabusha.
Okwongyera akatare k’embibo
k’embibo.
Ebihingwa ebingi nk’ebihimba, empokya nainga ebinyobwa
abahingi baaba baatungire embibo ez’okutandikanisa nibaguma
nibahinga embibo emwe kumara obwire buraingwa kandi
nibabaasa kukyendeeza aha kugura embibo. Eki nikimanyisa ngu
akatare k’omuringo gw’embibo ogu ezi orikukora nikabaasa
kugyeda nikakyendeera okukira munonga abahingi baaba
nibakuguraho kwenda kutunga embibo ensya guraafu egi ahifo
neeyoreka empinduka y’akatare k’embibo omu bicweka bimwe
ahabw’embibo nsya z’ebihingwa nk’ebihimba.

10%

akatare kakye

Guraafu erikworeka oku akatare k’embibo nsya
karikubaasa kugyeda nikakyendeera.
89

Okwenda kwongyera akatare oshemereire kumanya gye
enshonga ezirikureetera abahingi baakuguraho embibo. Zimwe
aha nshonga ezo ni:
✓ Kutunga emiringo misya y’embibo.
✓ Kutunga embibo ahabw’okuba abahingi nibaba bariire
nainga bagurize embibo zaabo zoona.
✓ Kutunga embibo z’omutindo murungi
✓ Kwongyera aha mbibo ezi baine baaba nibenda kuhinga
emisiri mihango
Waashanga enshonga enkuru ey’okugura embibo zaawe eri
ey’okutunga embibo ensya, noija kuteekateeka munonga aha
ky’okwongyera aha katare buri kaanya.
Ahaifo n’ebihaburo oku waakubaasa kwongyera akatare.
Hangusya akatare kaawe
kaawe:
Otakaaguza embibo zaawe abahingi bonka. Abashuubuzi,
amashomero n’ebitongore ebindi nibibaasa kuba nibyenda kugura
ebimbo. Bamwe omu baguzi aba nibabaasa kuba nibenda kugura
embimbo nyingi kandi nibabaasa kuzitanga bukiri kare.
Tunguura kurungi embibo zaawe:
Reeba peegi 39 otunge ebirikukwata aha ntunguuka.
Hindura emiringo y’embimbo buri kaanya: waareeba okuguza
kwakyendera omanye ngu nooyetaaga kuhindura aha muringo
gw’embimbo. Buuza abacondoozi n’abahingisa aha miringo
y’embibo emisya n’oku waakubaasa kuzitunga. Waaheza
kuzitunga banza ozigyereze aha kasiri kakye kureeba oku zirikwera
otakashaziremu kuzihinga. Waaheza kutandika embibo nsya
nikikuru kugyoreka abaguzi baawe n’okubagambira ahabw’enki
embibo egyo eine omutaano kandi ni birungi ki ebigiriho. Buuza
abaguzi baawe abahingire embibo egyo bakugambire eki
barikugiteekateekaho. Okumanya ekyo nikiija kukuyamba
kumanya obwingi bwayo obu oraahinge omu sizoni erikukurataho.
89

Kyendeeza aha sente ez’orikugurizaho
ez’orikugurizaho:
Waaba nooguriza aha muhendo gw’ahaiguru, noija kuguza
embibo nkye kandi toraakore magoba maingi garikubaasa
kutunguura bizinesi yaawe. Waaba noobaasa, guriza embibo
ahansi kwenda kwongyera akatare okukira munonga bwanyima
y’omwaka gumwe nainga ebiri. Kwonka oine kureeba ngu
omuhendo ogwe niguhisya esente ezi okoreise.
Ensiba:
Ensiba nungi eineho obumanyiso n’ey’omugasho
ahabw’ebihingwa ebimwe nk’ebihimba ahabw’okuba haine eki
erikuba neeyoreka aha mutindo gw’embibo kandi ereetaho
entaniso kuruga aha mbibo ezirugire ahandi. Ensiba neeyamba
abaguzi kutwara gye embibo. Ebihingwa ebimwe nk’ebihimba
ensiba enungi eshemereire kuba obuveera burikureeberwamu
kwenda kuyamba abaguzi kureeba eki barikugura. Obuveera
bw’emiringo mingi buriho kwonka nibubaasa kutaboneka omu
byaro.
Hoona noobaasa kusiba embibo zaawe omu bipapura. Okugura
eby’okusibisa omu bwingi nikiyamba ahabw’okuba nooba
noobigurira aha muhendo gw’ahansi okukira munonga byaba
nibishangwa omu matauni amahango gonka.Waaba otarikubona
buveera nainga empapura z’okusibisa, teekateeka aha
ky’okuronda eby’okusibisa ebyawe ebi waakubaasa kwekorera.
Ekyokureeberaho ekibiina kiimwe kikakora otushaho tukye kuruga
omu pipapura bya siminti.

89

Ensiba nungi neeyamba omu kuguza embibo.
N’obwegyendesereza ronda obwingi bw’embibo ezi oraasibe
kurugiirira aha bi oraihe omu kucondooza aha bintu nk’okwera
kw’embibo, ebi abahingi barikukunda n’omuhendo waaba
noosharamu aha nsiba. Ekyokureeberaho ebihimba
eby’okusimbira obuti (ebya misingiriro) ebirikwera munonga
noobaasa kusiba bikye bikye. Embibo ensya nainga ei
batarikukunda noobaasa kucwamu kugisiba bukye nk’akimwe kya
kana kya kiro buri kashaho. Ebi oraakorese kusiba nibyo
oragyendereho kusharamu aha bwingi bw’embibo ezi oraasibe
omu kashaho. Eby’okusibisa byaba biri bibi nainga buri obuveera
noosiba embibo nkye.
Buri kashaho kashemereire kuba kaine akamanyiso kari aha
kashaho nainga akaveera keenyini nainga kari konka. Obumanyiso
bushemereire kuba bwine ebi: eiziina ry’omukozi w’embibo
n’endagiiriro ye, eiziina ry’embibo n’ebintu bimwe
ebirikugikwataho, obwingi, okurabura aha mbibo n’ebirikworeka
omutindo gw’embibo.
89

Okutunguura embibo
Okutunguura ebi orikukukora nainga kubirangisa n’ekintu kikuru
omu kwongyera, akatare k’ebintu byawe. Hariho emiringo mingi
ei orikubaasa kutunguuriramu embibo zaawe.
Ebyokureeberaho n’ebi:
✓ Mwaba nimukora embibo, nimubaasa kukora omuzaano
gurikworeka omugasho gw’okugura embibo z’omutindo
murungi. Mukore omuzaano aha bwire obu murikumanya
ngu abantu baingi nibaza kugureeba kandi mu gukorere
omu mwanya ogu abantu baingi barikubaasa kwijamu.
✓ ronda emyanya misya ei oraaguzemu embibo omu butare
n’amashomero againe emisiri. Rabira omu bahingisa
n’amaduuka agarikuguza ebintu by’obuhingi. Kwonka
oijuke ngu waaguza abashuubuzi nibakuha omuhendo guri
ahansi.
✓ Gamba n’abeegi aha bikwatiraine n’embibo zaawe kandi
okoregane n’amashomero gaije garambure emisiri yaawe.
Abeegi nibiija kugambira abazaire baabo ebi baareeba.
✓ Hikiirira omuntu oine eduuka omushabe kuta ekyapa aha
duuka ye kandi omushabe kuguma noija noogamba
n’abaguzi ori kubashoboorera aha mbibo zaawe.
✓ Yohereza amabaruha n’ebirango omu bantu abaine
akakwate n’ebyobuhingi omu gavumenti n’omu bitongore
ebitari bya gavumenti omu kicweka ekyo. Obashoborore
aha mbibo ensya n’emihendo yaazo ariho.
✓ Kora empapura z’okuhanika aha bisiika n’ebindi ziri kuranga
embibo zaawe.
✓ Tunguura embibo zaawe omu myoreko y’ebyobuhingi.

89

Koresa emihanda mingi y’okutunguura embibo zaawe.

Entambuura:
Entambura neetwara esente nyingi kwonka neereta amagoba
embibo zaaba ziine akatare omu bicweka ebindi. Ahu akatare
kaawe kari niho harikucwamu entambura ei orikwetenga.
Waaguza embibo zaawe omu kyaro kyawe, entambura neeba
etari kizibu. Kwonka oine kuteekateeka aha ntambura y’emotoka
waaba nooguza embibo zaawe aheeru y’ekyaro ekyo. Omuringo
gw’entambura ei oraakorese neeza kurugiirira aha biriho; esente
n’obwingi bw’embibo ezi orikwenda kutwara.
89

Okuronda entanbura nikirungi kandi nikibaasa kureeta
amagoba
amagoba.

Ekibiina nainga abantu abarikukorera hamwe baine kuteekateeka
aha ky’okurundaana esente bakapangisa emotoka nka roore
nainga piikaapu
ahabw’okuba nikitwara esente nkye baaba nibatwara embibo
nyingi omurundi gumwe. Ogundi muringo gw’okukyendeeza aha
nshohoza n’okupakira embibo n’ebindi bintu omurundi gumwe.
Bariirira enshohoza yoona ogite omu ntebebeekanisa ya bisinesi.
Oreebekye ngu omuringo gw’entambura gwona ogu oraaakorese
nigurinda embibo zaawe okutahikwa enjura, omushana n’embeera
ezindi ezirikubaasa kuzishiisha.

89

OKUHANGUSYA
N’OKUTEREEZA BISINESI YAAWE.
ESHUURA YA 6:

Bizinesi kuza kutunguuka eshemereire kukura buri kaanya.
Eshemereire kuba neekora amagoba kandi neehanguha.

Bizinesi eshemereire kukura nk’muti, mporampora
kwonka kurungi.
Teekateeka aha nshonga nkuru kandi ogarukemu ebibuuzo ebi
otakashaziremu kuhangusya bizinesi yaawe.
✓ Omuringo gu bizinesi yaawe erikugobamu: waayongiire
ahaby’orikuguza omu myaka nk’ebiri ei omazire nookora?
✓ Empinduka omu katare: akatare kahindukireho kurugiirira
omu kucondooza kwawe?
✓ Embibo ensya: noobona embibo ensya ezirikukundwa
abahingi, abashuubuzi n’abarikugura ebyokurya?
✓ Esente: omanye ngu nooza kushohoza esente busya omu
kukora. Oine esente zirikumara z’okuhangusya bizinesi
89

yaawe? Oine eitaka ry’okuhanguhizaho bizinesi yaawe
nainga noobaasa kurigura nari kupangisa aha sente nkye
kandi okaguma nookora amagoba omu mbibo ezi obyaire?
Noobaasa kutunga rooni?
✓ Abakozi: oine abakozi barikumara kwongyera aha mbibo
ezi orikukora?
✓ Entambura: waaboine entambura nungi y’okutwara
embibo nyingi aha muhendo ogu orikubaasa (ogw’ahansi)?
Waashanga noobasa kugarukamu “eego” aha bibuuzo birengire 3,
noobaasa kuba ohikize obwire bw’okuhangusya bizinesi yaawe .
Okukora ekibiina ky’abahingi b’embibo:
Bizinesi yaawe ku eraayeyongyere kukura n’abahingi abandi
baakuguka omu kuhinga embibo, teekateeka aha ky’okukora
ekiibina ky’abahingi b’embibo.
Abantu baaba beetereine hamwe n’abandi abaine ebigyendererwa
bimwe, nibagira amaani kandi nibabaasa kukora ekintu kihango.

Ekibiina ky’abahingi b’embibo nikiyamba abakozi
b’embibo omu kicweka ekyo kukora kurungi.
89

Ekibiina nikibaasa kukorera aha rurengo rutari rumwe: omu
kicweka nainga ebicweka baingi nainga aha rurengo ry’eihanga.
Omugasho gw’ekibiina nk’ekyo ni:
✓ Kuyamba abahingi kumaraho hamwe oburemeezi obu baine
oburikushushana.
✓ Okutwara ebyetengo by’abahingi omu b’obushoboorozi
obw’ahaiguru nk’a gavumenti. Ekyokureeberaho ekibiina
nikibaasa kushaba abarikucondooza kuguma nibakora embibo
ensya.
✓ Kutaho omuhanda gw’okutungiramu okumanyisibwa aha
bikwatiraine n’okukora embibo, eby’obuheereza bwabo
n’ebyokukoresa omu kuhinga nk’embibo z’okubyara n’ebindi.
✓ Kuhwera baamemba b’ekibiina ekyo kutunga eby’okukoresa
omu kuhinga omu bwingi kandi aha muhendo gw’ahansi
bakabaasa kukyendeeza aha nshohoza.
✓ Kuhwera baamemba kugira enkoragana n’abacondoozi hamwe
n’abakugu omu kukora embibo omu bicweka ebindi
by’eihanga.
Ekicweka ekiri ahaifo nikyoreka omu bugufu oku mwakubaasa
kukora ekibiina ky’abahingi b’embibo.
Noobaasa kutunga okumanyisibwa okurikukiraho kuruga omu
bitongore bitari bya gavumenti n’abahingisa.
Oku mwakubaasa kukora ekibiina kyabahingi b’embibo.
Mutebeekanise orukiiko: Manya ebirikukwata aha bahingi
abandi omu kicweka ekyo obwo orikubuuza abahingisa, abakozi
b’ebitongore bitari bya gavumenti n’ebindi bitongore ebiine
akakwate n’eby’obuhingi. Kyaba nikibaasika tebeekanisa
okubugabugana abahingi abamwe kugamba aha by’okukora
ekibiina. N’eky’omugasho kubanza waashoboororera abahingi
abandi omugasho gw’ekibiina otakeesire rukiiko. Nimubaasa
kusharamu kukora ekibiina ky’abahingi b’ekihingwa kimwe nainga
ebihingwa bingi. Eki nikirugiirira aha ntwaza y’abahingi nainga
obwingi bw’abantu abarikuhinga buri kihingwa.
89

Yeta orukiiko rw’abakozi b’embibo omu kyaro kyawe. Handiika
amabaruha orikweta abakozi b’embibo omu rukiiko kuteisa aha
kukora ekibiina. Mute orukiiko omu mwanya ogwanguhi kuhika.
Tunga empapura n’ebikaraamu bukiri kare ebiraakuyambe
kuhandiika ebi murikuteisa. Orukiiko rushemereire kuteisa aha
nshonga eziri kukwata aha bantu boona.

Okukora orukiiko rw’okubanza
rw’okubanza:
Muronde omuntu oraayebembere orukiiko. Omuntu ogwe
naayetwa mukuru w’orukiko. Omurimo gw’omuntu ogwe
n’okutandika okuteisa n’okuhwera abantu kubaasa kugamba
bataine kutiina. Orukiiko rutakatandikire mukuru w’orukiiko
ashemereire kuhandiika orukarara rw’ebintu by’okuteisaho. Ebintu
ebi bishemereire kuba birimu:
✓ Okweyanjura kw’abantu abari omu rukiiko. Buri muntu
ashemereire kugambaho kakye aha bizinesi ye y’embibo,
eky’okureeberaho ebihingwa ebi barikuhinga n’obwingi
bw’embibo ezi barikushaaruura, ebirungi ebiri omu bizinesi
zaabo, n’ebizibu ebi barikushangamu.
✓ Kuteisa oku abari omu rukiiko barahwerwe kuruga omu
kibiina.
✓ Kuteisa aha bigyendererwa by’ekibiina n’ebiri
kuteekateekwa kwija kukorwa. N’eky’omugasho kukora
ebigyendererwa by’ekibiina kurungi. N’enki eki abantu
barikwenda kukora? Nibaija kuhikiiriza bata
ebigyendererwa byabo kandi ryari? Mwijuke ngu abantu
nibaba nibateekateeka kutunga bingi kandi bwangu.
Nibabaasa kuteeketeeka ngu obu baakora ekibiina
oburemeezi bwabo nibuza kuhwaho juba. Bwanyima
abantu nibabaasa kuhwa amaani reero ekibiina kigwe.
Mukuru w’orukiiko aine kwijusya abantu ngu ebirungi
ebirikuruga omu kibiina nibihikwaho kurabira omu kukora
munonga, okwehayo n’okugira ebigyendererwa
birikubaasika.
89

✓ Mushwijume oburemeezi n’oburungi bw’ekibiina. Abakiiki
baine kubariirira okukora ekibiina eki kiraabatwareho. Omu
noobara okuhayo obwire bw’okuza omu nkiiko n’okuhayo
esente. Ebirungi ebirimu nibikira enshohoza? Ku kiraabe
kiri kityo, baamemba boona nibiikiriza kubagana eshohoza?
Baamemba baaba nibiikiriza muze aha kindi kintu.
Okutandika ekibiina ky’abahingi b’embibo:
Abantu ku bariikirize ngu haine eki barikutunga omu kibiina,
muteise aha bintu ebi ahaifo oku ekibiina kiraakore;

Ebiragiro: Muteise ebi baamemba baraakuratire omu kucwamu
aha nshonga ezimwe, oku muraagume nimukora enkiiko n’obu
ziraakorwe, abeebembezi abu muraagire n’oku muraabaronde
n’esente z’okushashura waaza kuba memba. Bwanyima ebiragiro
ebi bishemereire kuhandiikwa omu kitabo ky’engyenderwaho
y’ekibiina (eki n’ekitabo ekirikworeka ebigyendererwa n’ebiragiro
by’ekibiina ). Engyenderwaho neeza kuyamba ekibiina kutabamu
obutabanguko n’obutiikirizana kandi eyoreke obujunaanizibwa
bwa buri memba. Engyederwaho eshemereire kworeka
ebigyendererwa, ebiragiro by’okuba memba, omuringo
gw’okuronda abeebembezi, obwire bw’okukoreraho enkiiko, n’oku
ekibiina kiraayebiiseho omu by’esente.
Obwa memba:: Mukore orukarara rw’abantu (abarikukora omwe
omwe n’abari kukorera hamwe) abaine ekyetengo ky’okukora
ekibiina. Mwijusye abantu ku obwa memba kirikumanyisa okugira
obushoboorozi n’obujunaanizibwa.
Obwebembezi:
Ebibiina nibyetaaga obwebembezi
n’entebeekanisa. Entebeekanisa eyanguhi n’okugira akakiiko
akarikutegyeka ekibiina kandi kashemereire kubamu mukuru
w’entebe, omuhandiiki n’omubiiki abaraayebembere ekibiina omu
kukora kwakyo. Emyanya endiijo omu kakiiko neebaasa
kwongyerwamu kyaba nikyetengyesa. Nimubaasa kuronda
89

obukiiko obundi kukora aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe.

Okubiika ebihandiiko: N’eky’omugasho kubiika ebihandiiko
by’ebiteiso n’okusharamu okuraakorwe omuri buri rukiiko.
Muronde oraabiike ebihandiiko ebyo.
Ekibiina ky’abahingi b’embibo kishemereire kuguma nikitunguuka
nk’oku abahingi abari baamemba baakyo bari kutunguuka.

ESHUURA YA 7:

EBIRI OMU BUGUFU

Hariho ebintu bingi ebirikureetera bizinesi y’embibo yaatunguuka:

Nooyetaaga obwengye buri
kumara, obumanyiirizi
n’ebikoreso kutandika bizinesi
y’embibo.

Toorana ebihingwa n’emiringo
y’embibo zaabyo kurungi
orikugyendera aha bi oihire
omu kucondooza aha katare

Kora amagoba kuruga omu
kuguza embibo zaawe

1. Kwenda kukora gye bizinesi y’embibo,
abahingi baine kukora munonga,
bakeetebeekanisa kurungi kubaasa
kusharamu n’okweteekateekyera
oburemeezi n’okwetegyereza gye
ebya bizinesi n’esente.

2. Bizinesi y’embibo neekora gye aha
bihingwa n’embibo eziine akatare
kahango nainga karinganaire.
Condooza aha katare otakatandikire
bizinesi yaawe kandi na buri myaka
3-4 kwenda kwetegyereza kurungi
ebi abaguzi baawe barikwenda. Kora
enteekateeka nungi ya bizinesi yaawe
orikugyendera aha makuru agahikire
agarikukwata aha katare aku
ogyendereire.
3. Hinga kurungi embibo kwenda
kukyendeeza aha nshohoza
n’okukora amagoba mingi. Hinga
embibo zirikwera munoga omu itaka
rirungi kandi oreeberere kurungi
emisiri yaawe. Taho omuhendo ogu
orikumanya ngu nwija kurugamu
amagoba kandi ogu abahingi
barikubaasa.
89

Tunguura embibo zaawe

Biika gye ebihandiiko bya
bizinesi yaawe kandi okore
enteekateeka za bizinesi
zoona orikugyendera aha
bihandiiko ebi.

4. Gyezaho otunguure akatare
k’embibo, ronda abaguzi abasya
kandi ogume ohindure n’aha miringo
y’embibo buriijo. Reeba ngu
waareetera abaguzi baawe kwikiriza
ku embibo zaawe ziri ez’omutindo
gw’ahaiguru. Eki nookikora kurabira
omu kuzipakira n’okuziha amaziina,
kugiraobuheereza burungi n’omu
kurinda eiziina ryawe.

5. Tebeekanisa bizinesi yaawe obwe
orikubiika ebihandiiko
ebirikukwata aha bi orikuguza,
amagoba n’oku orikukoresa esente
zaawe. Kora entebeekanisa nungi ya
bizinesi yaawe orikugyendera aha
nteebereza y’entaasya ya buri kwezi.

6. Bizinesi erikukora gye neeguma
neekura. Omuhanda gw’okukora gye
bizinesi n’okuhikiiriza ebyetaago
by’abaguzi n’okukora ekibiina
ky’abahingi b’embibo.
Hangusya bizinesi yaawe

89

B. E
kihingwa.
Ekihingwa.
Embibo ezitari zimwe z’ebihimba ezongiirwe omutindo K132,
K131, OBA1, Kahuura.
Okushoboorora emiringo erikuhingwa hati.
K132: Embibo mpango eine obugondo burikutukura, neeyera
munonga, enuzire, eine akatare kahango, neereebeka nk’embibo
eya buriijo erikumanywa.
K131: Embibo nkye, erikwera munonga, enuzire, erikugumira
omushana, kandi neehwera kwerinda enjara.
OBA 1: Embibo mpango eine amabara garikutukura, neeyera
munonga, enuzire, eine akatare kahango.
Ebintu ebikuru ebi orikugyenderaho kutoorana ekihingwa
n’emiringo y’embibo: Abahingi abaingi omu kicweka eki nibahinga
ebihimba by’okuguza n’ahabw’ekyo nibabiika embibo nkye.
Ekirikurugamu embibo ensya n’eza buriijo nizigira akatare.
Abahingi nibabaasa kugurira embibo ez’omutindo murungi aha
muhendo gw’ahaiguru okukira munoga ezongiirwe omutindo.
A katare
katare:
Akatare akagyendereirwe egomborora X. Abahingi b’ebihimba
omu gomborora X (30%), amashomero againe emisiri mihango
(5%), ebitongore ebitari bya gavumenti (40%), ekibiina
ky’abahingi aha disiturikiti (10%) abashuubuzi b’embibo (15%)
Orurengo rw’okushohorezaho embibo: bizinesi neija kushohoza
taani emwe buri sizoni.
Okugaba embibo: Embibo niziija kusibwa omu buveera omu
bwingi butarikushushana (kiro 1, kiro 5, kiro 10) ziguzibwe
abahingi n’amashomero kuruga omuka y’omuhingi w’embibo

kurabira omu bitongore bitari bya gavumenti, abashuubuzi

n’Okwakana.

Ebigambo ebirikukoresibwa omu
rurimi rwa bizinesi
Akatare: nikimanyisa okwendwa kw’ekintu ekirikuguzibwa nainga
ahu kirikubaasa kuguzibwa.
Akatare ak’omu kicweka: abantu b’omu kicweka ekyo abariije
kugura embibo zaawe.
Ebyomuhendo: ebintu ebirikubaasa kurugamu esente byaheza
kuguzibwa nainga byakoresibwa.
Amagoba: esente ezi orikutunga waaza kuguza n’okwihaho esente
ezookoreise.
Embibo: ekicweka ky’ekimera ekiri kubyarwa. Ahabw’ebimera/
ebihingwa ebimwe nk’ebitakuri na muhogo, ekicweka
ekirikubyarwa nikiba kitarikuriibwa.
Embibo eza buriijo: emiringo y’embibo ei abantu batwire
nibahinga kumara obwire buraingwa.
Embibo ezihamiibwe: embibo z’omutaano z’omutindo gw’ahaiguru
ezikozirwe n’obwegyendesereza kandi ezirikuhikiiriza ebyentego
bimwe ebirikwendwa. Ebitongore ebihango nibyo birikukira
kuzikora.
Embibo ezitungwirwe: embibo z’omutindo gw’ahaiguru
ezirikukorwa kurabira omu mihanda y’omutaano.
Emiringo y’embibo etungwirwe: emiringo y’embi bo ekozirwe
abacondoozi. Embibo ezi nizikira kuba nizeera munonga.
Enshohoza omu kukora: enshohoza yoona erikubaho waaba
nookora ekintu.
89

Enshohoza aha bintu ebirikumara obwire buraingwa: enshohoza
omu bizinesi aha bintu ebitarikukira kuhindahinduka. Enshohoza
enyingi erikubaho waaba nootandika bizinesi neekira kuba eri
egi.
Esente eziri omu bizinesi: oku bizinesi yaawe erikwingana
waagibaarira omu sente.
Inventore: okugaba (omu kuguza) nainga kubiika ebirikuguzibwa.
Omuhendo: ezi n’esente ezi orikushashura waaba noogura ekintu
naingwa obwigi bw’esente.
Okutunguura n’okurangisa: emiringo n’ebikorwa ebiri kukoresibwa
omu bashuubuzi kubaihabaiha abantu kugura ebi barikuguza.
Okucondooza aha katare: omuringo gutebeekaine
gw’okuroderamu okumanya ebiri kukwata aha katare.
Rooni: esente ezi orikweguza omu banka nainga ahandi kwija
kuzigaruraho.
Regya: ekitabo ky’omutaano ky’okuhandiikamu ebirikukwata aha
bizinesi.

89

Obutabo bw’abahingi b’embibo ab’orurengo rw’ahansi
obukurateine nibushohozi bwa aba International Centre for
Tropical Agriculture (CIAT)

Kwenda kumanya ebiri kweyongerayo buuza:
CIAT COORDINATOR,
P.O. Box 6247, Kampala, UGANDA

Printed by Swift Commercial Establishment Ltd. Tel/Fax: 256-41-566650

Amakuru (News)

EMINYEETO KUFA AMATU OMU BWIRE BUTARI BWA HARE

Omushaki: Akampumuza Rhita na Shevon Mwesigwa

Omu kwezi kwa 2 omwaka ogu ekitongore ky'eby'amagara ekya World Health
Organisation (WHO) kikashohoza ekihandiiko eki baihire omu kucondooza
ekyabaire nikyoreka ngu eminyeeto erikwingana akahumbi kamwe omu nsi yoona
bari omu kabi k'okufa amatu ahabw'okugira ngu nibakoresa obuzindaaro bw'omu
matu kuheza omwanya muraingwa.

O kurugiririra aha kitongore eky'eby'empurizana ekya Uganda Communications
Commission, amasimu nigaguma nigeeyongyera omu ihanga rya Uganda ahakuba
omu mwaka ogwa 2008/9 abaabaire baine amasimu bakaba nibaingana 9,464,979,
2009/10 baaba 10,375,220, omwaka gwa 2010/11 baayeyongyera baaba
14,676,505, reero 2011/12 baahika ahari 15,535,989, kandi omwaka gwa
2012/13 baahika 16,665,310 kandi omu mwaka oguhwaire ogwa 2013/14 baahika
19,224,020, ekintu ekiri kirungi ahabw'entunguuka baitu omuri abo eminyeeto
abarikukora obucweka 66 ahari 100 omu mubaro gw'abanya Uganda nibo
barikukoresa amasimu kandi ahari abo obucweko 40 ahari 100 nibakoresa
obuzindaaro bw'omu matu okukira abo abashomire kuhika aha idaara rya siniya
kandi barikugamba orungyereza obucweka 20 ahari 100 nibo barikukoresa
obwoma bw'omu matu eshaaha zoona obwo barikuhurikiriza ebyeshongoro nangwa
n'okugambira aha masimu, kandi abarikutuura omu matauni nabo enamba yaabo
neekira abo abarikutuura omu byaro.

WHO neeyongyera egira ngu abantu aba boona obucweka 50 ahari 100 bari omu
kabi k'okufa amatu nangwa n'okutandika kuhurira kubi ahabw'omuringo ogu
barikukoresa omu obuzindaaro obu. Dr. Etienne Krugg, arikukurira ekicweka
ekirikujunaanizibwa endwara ezitarikureebwa aha mubiri omu kitongore ekya
World Health Organisation naagira ngu eminyeeto obwire obwingi terikukira
kufayo kumanya ekirikufa aha magara gaabo ekikuru n'okushanga ngu bo eki
barikuba nibakora eshaaha egyo nikiba nikishemeza amagara gaabo, baitu
obwire obwingi ebintu nk'ebi nibiba nibita amagara gaabo omu kabi.

Dr. Bitekyerezo Medard naagira ngu okuhurira okurungi nikugyenda n'obwingi
bw'amaraka agarikuba nigataaha omu matu gaawe kandi naahamya ngu
okuhurikiriza ebintu birikuyomba munonga nikirugamu okufa amatu. Ngu
ahabwokuba abantu baingi nibakunda kutunguura rediyo y'esimu nari muziki
batyo batamu obuzindaaro namunonga baaheza kutunga eizooba ribi nari baba
bagweriirwe kubi. Naagira ngu okutunguura amaraka (volume) ahaiguru
nikireetera emisi yaawe erikuhwera okuhisya aha kuhurira yaahwa amaani,
ekwatana kandi ezibiire emisi erikuba ne etwara amaraka kuruga omu kuutu
kuza omu bwongo yaremwa kukora, ngu nangwa obumwe nikibasa kubaho akaire
kwonka waaguma nohurikiriza ebintu birikuyomba munonga obwo birikutahira
kimwe omu matu gawe noobaasa kutoreraryo ofe amatu.

AMARIRA G'ORIKUTUNGA ROONI.

Ebi oshemereire kwega otakataire mukono aha ndagaano y'okweguza rooni

EVANS ATWINE

David Wangi Lukyamuzi, omushuubuzi omu rurembo Kampala n'omushubuzi
w'emyenda, omuhingi kandi omuriisa w'enkoko, arikutebya orugyendo oru
arabiremu arikwehora sente omu bari kuha sente (money lenders). Nagira ngu
obwire biringwa obu amazire arikwehora sente omuza banka zitari zimwe
nazimwe, akishangire ngu n'obu barikuheereza sente kwonka nibaba
batarikwenda omuntu orikuzejunisa akatunguka. Nibakira kwejunisa embeera
yaitu abarikuba nibetaaga sente, baturabizamu eby'etengo byaabo by'okukora
amagoba mingi kuruga omuri itwe. Tibakaabaasa kukwikiriza kukuha obwire
bw'okumara kwetegyereza ebihandiiko byabo kandi n'obu orikubibashaba kugira
ngu obanze obitware nk'owarooya aby'tegereza tibakaakwikiriza aho
nibatandika okwebuzabuza kwonka ahabw'okugira ngu eky'etengo kyawe ekihango
nikiba kiri seenta aho n'iwe ofa agikiriza otwara rooni orikuteekateeka ngu
obundi senta ezi okazitungamu omugisha ogira ekiwaziihamu. obumwe sente
ez'orikubashaba tizo barikukuha, n'oshaba miriyooni 10 orikumanya ngu nizo
ezirikuza kumara ebizibu byawe kwonka aha muheeru bahendera bakuhaire
miriyooni 6 oshanga ekibaro kyawe eky'orikuba obaziire kyafa ahabw'okuba
obumwe nibaba bo bakirebire ngu tibaine ah'okugobera kihango,iwe nk'omuntu
nooba ataine ky'okukora osharamu ofa agatwara sente. otakatungiire sente
nooba oine okubanza waiguraho akawunti bakushaba kushashura obusente bwingi
munonga nk'ezakatabo ka ceeki ne'bindi. okumanya ngu zo za banka
nezokutorokamu amagoba ahabw'okuba na waaza kwihayo ekipapura ky'okwereka
akawunti yaawe oku eyemereire bank statement) banka ezimwe nizikusharaho
5000 nokweyongyeraho buri mwezi.

omuntu eki aine kwetegyereza n'okugira ngu okwetegyereza n'okugira ngu
banka kukuha rooni, okushaba omuhendo gw'omusingo ogurikwingaingana na
sente, nooba oine okutunga omubaririzi orikubaasa kukubarira gye omusingo
gwawe nawe n'oba oine okumushashura kwonka aho oijukye ngu manegya wa banka
we naaba atakaikiiirize kukuha sente, yaaheza kwetegyerezagye ripoota
eyaakorwa akaremwa okugisiima rooni naagikwima.Waaza kugaruka kuza omu bank
endiijo nooba oine okugaruka okakora nk'ebyo oshanga ngu aha muheru gwa
byoona sente ezi orikuba oshohoize ni nying otakatungire rooni. Ku
orikuheza kutuga rooni nk'eya miriyooni 20 ekicweka 1 ahari 100 ezo n'eza
insuwarensi,ebicweka 2 ahari 100 ezo n'ezokurahira ku orikuza kushashashura
n'emishoro endiijo ezi barikusharaho aha muheru oshanga waasigaza miriyooni
nka 16 kwonka omu nshasura sente ezo zoona n'oba oine okuzitamu amagoba
kandi obwe baazikushazireho kare. Davide naagira ngu okwega oku atungire
omu kweguza rooni nikumumara ahabw'okuba, akeezuza rooni arikwenda okugura
enkoko 2000, yaikirizana na banka okutandika okubashasura enkoko zaatandika
kuteera amahuri arikuguza tureeyi 35 z'amahuri kuheza omaka gumwe.
Akakikora okuheza ameezi 4, omuhendo gwa sente ezi yabaire aine kuba
naashasura bazongeza, akaba aine kuba naagaruzayo obucweka 13 ahari 100
kwonka bo omu kwongyeza tibaramuganbiire, bamuta aha bucweka 28 ahari 100
buri kwezi, ebeeyi y'amahuri nayo yagwa akatare, okutunga sente ez'abaire
niba nizetagisha kuba aine okuguza tuyeeyi 60 z'amahuri kuza kuhezayo sente
zaabo, akaba aine kuguza bimwe aha bintu bye ebi yabaire aine, aho agizire
ngu kuwakutungamu obuzibu, obaasa kubiguza oyecungure. Banka baba
nibakushobora barikwenda ngu ote omukono aha ndagaano bakuhe rooni yaabo
nibakugambira ebigambo ebirungi byonka. Obwire obwingi nibakoresa abaana
abarikuba baherize emishomo bataine mirimo. Kugira ngu omwana naaba ari
ahaky'okureeba ngu watunga rooni ahakuba we nibwo arikuba yaatunga
komishoni. Ebirikubaho bwanyima n'ebyaawe na banka.

ABANTU OBU TATIINA SIRIIMU BUREETSIRE AKAKOOKO KWEYONGYERA

OMUSHAKI: Lawrence Mucunguzi

Akakoko ka sirimu kakazoorwa omu ihanga rya Uganda Omurundi g'okubanza omu
myaka ya 1980 omuri kashenshero omu disiturikiti ya Rakai. Kwiha obwo
abantu baingi bakatiina ahabw'okuba oburwaire obu bukaita abantu, baingi
omu kaanya kakye munonga kandi bari kufa kubi. Ekyi kikareetera
abanyabutegyeki, gavumenti, abanyadiini na buri omwe kufayo kandi bwaba
obujunaanizibwa bwa buri muntu omu kurwanisa n'kokwerinda akakooko ka
siirimu ekyareeteire eihanga ryateera orutambi ruhango omu bikwatiraine
n'okurwanisa endwara egi. Ebi bigambirwe Dr. Chris Baryomunsi Minisita
omuhwezi ahabw'eby'amagara. Arikugambaho omu mushomo gw'eby'amagara
ogutebeekanisibwe akakiiko ka Uganda AIDS Commission hamwe na Mbarar
University of Science and Technology ahari Lave view omuri Mbarara enshumi
kye ehwaire.

Dr.Baryomunsi naayoreka omuringo ogu akakooko ka siriimu kariyo
nikeeyongyera kujanjaara omu bantu.'' Emibazi ya ARVS ku yaizire abantu
bayeyongera kwetaara n'okumanyira endwara egi baagitwara nk'endwaraediijo
ndwara. Abanyabutegekyi na za kanso aha rurengo rwa disiturikiti
bashemereire kutaho akaire k'okuteisa omu nkiiko aha burwaire obu kureeba
ngu tibwayeyonyera kukanya'' Dr. Baryomunsi nikwo agizire atyo.

Obucweka 7.3 bw'Abanyayuganda abari ahagati y'emwaka 15-49 baine akakooko
ka siriimu kuruga aha bucweka 6.4 omu myaka ehingwire. Ebyo bikiri bityo we
Dr.joshua Muzsinguzi orikukurira eby'okurwanisa akakooko ka siriimu omu
kitongore ky'eby'amagara naagira ngu akakooko ka siriimu nikakyeyongyera
kandi haaba hatabaireho mpinduka yoona omu mwaka gwa 2019 abantu
baarikwingana miriiyoni 2 nibaija kuba baine oburwaire obu. ''Ebiro ebi
abantu kubarikurya emibazi banyirira beeyongyera kwejumbira omu bikorwa
by'obushambani beebwa ngu siriimu ebayo,'' Ekibereire gavumenti omugugu
muhango omu kurwanisa oburwaire obu na munonga omu minyeeto. okucondooza
nikwokumwe nikworeka ngu omubaro gw'abakazi abaine akakooko ka siriimu ni
baingi kukira abashaija. Dr. Musinguzi naagira ngu ebicweka 8.3 by'abakazi
nibo baine akokooko kandi bwo abashsija n'ebcweka 6.1. Abantu 700,000
nibateekateekwa oburwaire obu obwa siriimu omu myaka 5 haaba hataine
kikozirweho.

Dr. Kaguna Amooti orikurira eby'amagara omuri Mbarara aggizire ngu siriimu
ekanyire ahabw'abantu okukopa emicwe y'ekijungu erikubata aha rutezo
rw'okurwara endwara egi. Orikukurira ekitomgore kya Uganda AIDS Commision
Dr. Christine Ondoa naagira ngu abashaziremu kukwatanisa n'amatendekyero
omu nshonga z'okukora okucondooza aha kakoooko ka siriimu.

ORUMURI September 07-13 2015

''WAAGAYA AKATOJO NIKAKUCUMBAGIZA''

Minisita ayakire RDC emotoka yaamubiritirira

OMUSHAKI: OMUSHAKYI W'ORUMURI

KABALLE: Owaagizire ngu akahwa nookaganya kaheza kakucumbagizi tarabihire.
Ahiturikuhandiikira ebi amakuru kuruga kabare na kampara nigireka ku MP wa
Rubanda West kandi ori minisita Henry Banyenzak orugire kwaka otwire ari
omuhwezi wa RDC wa Kaabale Nuwagaba Moses ou abingi bakira kumanya nka
Entwiga ya kashaari, kimubaireho obu agitwire Kampala abarikukurira
eby'entabura omu oofiisi ya puresidenti bakagimmubingisa. amakuru nigooreka
ngu bakanga kugyakiira ahabw'obutamanya oku yaahakireyo n'okuyaarugire
ahari mukama waayo obwo eriho n'orubanja rw'okwibawa aha pooriisi ya
Ntungamo. Minisita Henry Banyenzaki owaabaire naaruga kampala akatangira
RDC Nuwagaba omuri Rubaare yamwaka motorcar egyo kifuba omushana gurikujwa
bwanyima ya Nuwagaba kuza aha radiyo akagambira ngu banyenzaki n'abandi
bakye nibo bamurimiriire bakaguma nibaza owa minista w'enshonga za
purezidenti Frank Tumwebaze n'Enganzi y'ihanga Dr.Ruhakana Rugunda ngu
bamwihe kabare . Nuwagaba kagira ngu Banyenzaki atwire naamutuma
kumujwekyera omuri Rubanda West. Nangwa hariho obu azayo akatamu sente ze
300,000/- arikukwera ngu akagaruka yaagurayo embuzi ngu konka Banyenzaki
taramworekire na rucwekire.

Minisita ku yaatwaire motoka ya RDC Nuwagaba kabale, we Nuwagaba yaaza aha
pooroosi ya Ntungamo yaigiraho orubanja rw'okumwibaho motoka egyo
ahabw'okuba ekaba etarikugikoresa mirimo ei bagimuhereire ngu ekaba
etarikutuura omuri Kabale ahu baabaire bamwohereize ngu we akaba aija aha
maradijo orwamukaaga akimara ayegyendera kukora ebye. Mbwenu we nka
minisita ou baronzire kureeba emiriimo ya gavumenti oku erikukorwa nikyo
amwakiire motoka egyo. Banyenzaki agizire ngo entwiga eri nk'eshazire
naayenda baze kugikyebera obwongo ngu ahabw'okuba naagambisibwa bingi
nk'omushazi aha radiyo akatandika kujuma minisita n'abandi bbeebembezi
arikuhakanisa na puroguraamu za gavumenti.

Omushaki w'orumuri atungire omugisha yaagambaho n'Entwiga kandi yamugambira
ku omu motoka egyo haabaire haitaine ki ayekoreiremu kureka minisita akaba
aizire kumuhisyaho akabi kwonka nawe yaagira amagyezi bashangwa yaayemerera
ahagati y'abantu omu buduuka.

ORUMURI: September, 07-13 2015

AMAJITA NIGARWAZA EKOOKORO.

Abarikugakoresa kurwanisa emibubuuru nabo bari omu kabi

AUTHUR: ABDULKARIM SSENGENDO.

Emiringo 20 y'amajuta agu abantu barikukoresa kunyiriza emibiri yaabo agari
omu butare bwa Ugannda kishangirwe ngu garimu obutwa ekirikuta amagara
g'abantu omu kabi. Okucoondooza okukozirwe ab'ekitongore ekya Uganda
National Bureau of Standards (UNBS) nibagira ugu obutwa obu obugarimu nibwo
bukanyiise endwara omu bantu nk'ekokoro, efumbi hamwe n'endwara z'ebicweka
by'ekihama. Aba UNBS nibagira ngu bagyerizeho kurabura abantu kuruga aha
majuta aga za sabuuni, pawuda n'amajuta g'eisa abaishiki bato. "Tugyerizeho
kurabura abantu obutagaruka kukoresa gamwe aha majuta g'okunyiriza omubiri,
kwonka ahabwo'okugira ngu baingi nibenda kuhindura omubiri gwabo kutukura,
bagumizemu nibakoresa,"Vincent Ochwo orikukurira eby'okukondooza omu
kitongorekya UNBS nikwo agizire.

Agizire ngu amajuta ago agazibiirwe nigashisha omubiri, gareetera ebicweka
bimwe by'omubiri byayanga kukoora, kandi barabwire ngu omuntu yaagumizamu
nagaakoresa ekirikurugamu naafa. Ahabwire abantu ngu orabugane amajuta
gahandikireho ebigambo nka ''hydroquinone'' ngu ago otagagura. Agizire ngu
abakazi abarikuza omu Saaruuni nabo bashemereirwe kwegendesereza amajuta
agu barikubata omu ishokye.

Agizire ngu amajuta amaingi againe akabi aha mubiri g'omuntu nigaba garimu
mercury erikuretera omubiiri kukwatwa endwara nka kansa n'okushisha emisi.
Agizire ngu eki kikanyire omu majuta agari kukoresibwa kutamba emibibuuru.
''Otakaguzire amajuta goona banza oyetegyereze kurungi kikuhuwere obutata
amagara gaawe omu kabi,''

Abahangu omu by'amagara g'abantu nibagira ngu okukoresa munonga amajuta
aga nikireetera omuntu yaagira ekironda na munonga omuntu bamushemeza.
Omubiri niguhwa amaani baatamu ehuuzi zirema kukwata. Kandi n'abakazi
abarikubikoresa munonga nibarahuka kukura.

Dr. Samuel Sseguya, omushaho w'omubiri, naagira ngu nibahabura abantu
obutagyeza kuhisya amajuta aga aha mibiri yaabo. Ekitongore ekya World
Health Organisation nakyo nikirabura abantu okuruga aha kukoresa amajuta
aga gaine n'akabi kahango aha maisho g'omuntu orikugakoresa. Ripoota
eyaakozirwe ekitongore eki World Health Organisation, kukashanga ngu
abakazi ba Nigeria nibo barikukizayo kukoreesa amajuta g'okwetukuza.
obucweka 77 ahari 100 nibo bari kukoresa amajuta kuhindura omubiri.
Nihakurataho elya Togo eriine obucweka 59 kandi Senegal neekwata
ogwakashstu n'obucweka 27 ahari 100.

ABANTU NIBAKIGAMBAHO KI?

Maureen Nantume; Itwe mbwenu ebimwe nituba tutakubikyenga nitwetenga
kwegesibwa abashaho baitu baimukiremu batuhabure.

Calorine Nanyondo; Nitushaba abeebembezi baitu kuturwanaho kurwanisa
ebintu byoona ebiine akabi aha mibiri yaitu.

David kitegye. Nobujunaanizibwa bwaitu nk'abbeebembezi kuhabura abantu
kandi nitushaba na gavumenti kwongyeramu amaaani omu kwegyesa abantu
n'kurwanisa amashuta ago againe akabi kahango kureeba ngu tigaza omu
butare bwaitu.

Grammatical explanation
Verbs
•

All infinitive verbs in Runyankore/ Rukiga begin with Ku- and Okumakes it a gerund noun i.e.
Kugyenda
(to go)
Okugyenda (going) as abstract noun
However in speech the two can be used freely and might not interfere with the
semantics of the sentence
How to learn verbs

Verb

-gyenzire

Taxi situation in Kampala
Taxi parksTaxi- labeled S or T; S- special, T- minibus
Buses: post bus, coaches, coasters
Taxi operators: UTODA/UBOA has guides from whom you can get information
Stages: some are well marked while others are junctions, or any parking space
on the roadside

Comp: Talking about oneself, family members, and others clearly
Objective: By the end of the lesson the learner will be able to describe clearly
where they and their colleagues come from, where they live currently and
what they do.

Topic 4: Time telling
Eshaawa: Shaaha zingahi?
Comp:
Be able to tell time according to the Ugandan way
Objectives: By the end of the lesson the learner will be able to tell time in a
non
confusing way, keep time
Note: In Luganda the day begins at sunrise and ends at sunset. The night
begins at sunset and ends at sunrise for this reason; we have twelve hours of
darkness. We start counting day and night hours at 7:00am/pm respectively.
Which is; shaaha emwe
For divisions of the hour, ekicweka is used for half and for the rest we use
minutes; edakiika
E.g. 1:30 Eshaaha emwe n’ekicweka
7:45 Eshaaha mushanju n’edakiika ana nitaano
